40027058	arɔk ntá Páílet bɛ anchyɛ bɛtaŋ amfɛrɛ ɛrɛnɛ Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Páílet achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ mámfɛ́rɛ́ Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí manchyɛ yi.
40027059	Josɛ́f asɔt yɛ Yesu anɛ́p nɛ ɛ́síɛndɛn nkɔ.
40027060	Josɛ́f abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka nnɛm nɛkɔ ɛnɛ́n yi átɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́. Arɔk abhɛmɛ Yesu ndǔ nnɛm ɛni nɔ. Abɨŋɨri yɛ ɛrɛm ntay áchók nnyǔ nnɛm, agurɛ.
40027061	María, mmɔ̌ ɛtɔk Mágdala nɛ María achák, bábhák kɛ́kwɔ́t chɔ́kɔ́ mánjɨŋɨ nɔkɔ nnɛm.
40027062	Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl, bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bárɔ́k bátɛ́mɛri Páílet.
40027063	Bárɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ mmǔ nsé wu arɛm nyaka bɛ ndǔ manywɔp arat yi ǎpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
40027064	Ɛ́rɨ yɛ bɛ ɔ́nchyɛ́ ɛyɔŋ bo mandɔk mambabhɛri nɔkɔ nnɛm ɛni kpátɛ manywɔp arat amfʉɛt. Bakoŋo bhi bákway bɛrɔŋ mángɛp yi mámpɔkɔ, mándɔk, mámbo yɛ bɛghati bho bɛ yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Nɛ mbák ɛ́mfákárí nɔ́, nsé yap yɔ ǎchɔŋti mɛnyɨŋ ancha nsé anɛ mbɨ.”
40027065	Páílet arɛm bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nɔ. Sɔt ka bhɔ́ mándɔ́k mámbábhɛ́rí nɔ́kɔ́ nnɛm mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎyaŋ.”
40027066	Bárɔ́ yɛ barɔk báfyɛ́ ɛrɨŋ ndǔ ntay, nɛ bárɔ bɔ arɛ bɛ mambabhɛri nɔkɔ nnɛm.
40028001	Nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl nɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, María mmɔ̌ ɛtɔk Mágdala nɛ María achák, báfú ntɨnywɔp, ɛnɛ́ mbaŋ ábhɨ́kɨ́ re kaŋari ndu bɛrɔŋ bɛyɨŋɨ nnɛm Yesu.
40028002	Ɛ́fákárí bɛ́ ángɛl Mandɛm áfú amfay ásɛ̀p amɨk, abɨŋɨri ntay afɛrɛ anyǔnnɛm, achɔkɔ arɛ́.
40028003	Bɛsí ángɛl Mandɛm wu bɛ́ré ghɔɔ mbɔ miámiaŋ, ndɛn ɛyi ɛ́ndiɛrɛ nɔkɔ pɛ́pɛ̌pɛ́p mbɔ ɛtɔkɔfiɔŋ.
40028004	Babhabhɛrǐ nnɛm báré wɛt nɛ bɛcháy nɛ bárɔp mbɔ bawú.
40028005	Kɛ ángɛl arɛm nta baghɔrɛ́ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ chay. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bǎyàŋ Yesu mmu bágó ndǔ ɛkotákátí.
40028006	Apú fá. Mandɛm akʉ yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nkúbhɛ́ mbɔnyu yi arɛmɛ bɛ ɛbhɔŋ bɛfakari. Twɔ́ ká ghɔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bábhʉ́rɛ́ yi.
40028007	Dɔ́k yɛ́ ka áyák mǎngátí bakoŋo bhi bɛ apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ achi be ambɨ ǎrɔ̀ŋ atú Gálili. Chɔŋ mǎngɔ́ yi arɛ! Nnáŋ ngati nɔ bhe.”
40028008	Baghɔrɛ bhɔ bárɔ́ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ nnɛm nɛchi ntiɛ́t ntiɛt. Bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m bɔ, kɛ maŋák nkwɔ ajwi bhɔ antɨ. Bájɛt barɔk bɛ́yáŋ bakoŋo Yesu bɛ mángátí bhɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ángɛl Mandɛm ághátí bhɔ.
40028009	Ndu bárɔ̀ŋ, bápɛ́rɛ ghɔ, Yesu atɛmɛri bhɔ, arɛm bɛ, “Mandɛm ámbák nɛ bhe!” Bárɔ́k bákwɛ́n amɨk bɛsí bhi bábhó bɛkɛm bɛkak ɛbhi mánchyɛ nɔkɔ yi kɛnókó.
40028010	Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ cháy. Dɔ́k ká ghati bakoŋo bha. Ghatí ká bhɔ bɛ, mándɔ́k atú Gálili. Chɔŋ mángɔ́ mɛ arɛ́.”
40028011	Ɛnɛ́ baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ bárɔ̀ŋ, ɛ́fákari bɛ mbɔk bo abhɛn bábhàbhɛri nnɛm bárɔ́k Yerúsalɛm bágháti bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari mpok ángɛl Mandɛm ásɛ́bhɛ́ átwɔ́ ndǔ nnɛm.
40028012	Bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm báchɔ́kɔ nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk, báká ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt, báchyɛ́ bhɔ bɛyǎ nkáp ndǔ bɛsɔŋ.
40028013	Bágháti bhɔ bɛ, “Ghatí nɔ́kɔ́ ká bho chi bɛ bakoŋo bhi bátwɔ́ nɛ bɛti, mpok sɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́ kɛnɔ́, bághɛ́p yi, bápɔ́kɔ bárɔk.
40028014	Mbák gɔ́bhanɔ ángók ndak anɛ, chɔŋ sɛ́ndɨŋɨ ndǔ sɛ́chòk nnyu ywi bɛ ntɨ nɛndɨ yi amɛm, ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bǎpu chwe ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri.”
40028015	Babhabhɛrǐ nnɛm básɔ́t yɛ nkáp bɛsɔŋ wu, bárɔk bákʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǒbati bághátí bhɔ. Nɛ mbok yɔ bɛ́ bakoŋo Yesu bághɛp yi ghɛp kɛ̌ bo Israɛl bábhʉɛ́t bɛghati bo kpatɛ̌ ɛchɔŋ.
40028016	Bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn bati byo nɛ amɔt bárɔ́ yɛ bárɔ́k atú Gálili ndǔ njiɛ anɛ Yesu ághátí nyaka bɔ́ mándɔ́k arɛ́.
40028017	Mpok bághɔ́ yi, bákwɛ́n amɨk babho bɛchyɛ yi kɛnókó. Kɛ mbɔk ayap bare makati mbák, sayri sayri, Yesu kɛ bɔ bághɔ̀ nɔ.
40028018	Yesu akokosi mmʉɛt nɛ bhɔ́, aghati bhɔ bɛsí nɛ bɛsí bɛ, “Ɛtaya achyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm amfǎy yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu awu amfay nɛ fá amɨk.
40028019	Dɔ́k yɛ́ ka, mǎnkʉ́ bɛ bǒ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm mámbak bakoŋo bha, mǎnjwiti bhɔ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Ɛta, nɛ nnyɛ́n Mmɔ, nɛ nnyɛ́n Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ,
40028020	mǎntɔŋ nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ bɛ mánkʉ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ngátí be mǎnkʉ́ nɔkɔ. Nɛ nchí bhák nɛ bhe mpoknkɛm, tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti mmɨk.”
41001001	Fá chí Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo Mmɔ Mandɛm.
41001002	Abho nyaka mbɔ ɛnyǔ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Aisáya ásɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm ɛkáti yi bɛ, Mandɛm arɛm nyaka bɛ, Yɨŋɨ́, chɔŋ ntó mpɔkɔntó wa wɔ ambɨ, bɛ ángókó mbi ywɛ kɛ ɔ́ntwɔ.
41001003	“Mmǔ achi amɛm baso ǎbɨ̀k andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ́, ‘Toŋtí ká mbi anɛ Acha áfʉɛ̀t arɛ́. Kʉ́ ka mbi ywi ambak chak.’”
41001004	Jɔ̌n Njwiti abhésí nyaka amɛm baso angati nɔkɔ bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm bɛ bɔ́ mántɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap mánjwítí bhɔ bɛ Mandɛm amfoŋori bɛbʉ́ bhap.
41001005	Bɛyǎ bho báfú atú Judɛ́ya ankɛm, nɛ bǒ Yerúsalɛm mankɛm mándɔk nɔkɔ ntá Jɔ̌n ndu bɛghok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m. Báré su bɛbʉ́ bhap, Jɔ̌n anjwiti nɔkɔ bhɔ amɛm Nnyɛ́n Jɔ́dan.
41001006	Nkú Jɔ̌n abhak ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ baghoko nɛ babyɔk mpɔŋɔ baso. Mgbat anɛ yi ágwɔ̀t ɛbho abhak nkwɔbhɛ́nya nɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛni nɛ́bhak ngɛ́mtáy nɛ bawɛrɛ́ bɛtu amɛn yi ághɔ̀ amɛm baso.
41001007	Jɔ̌n ǎrɛ̀m nyaka nkwɔ bɛ, “Mmǔ ǎtwɔ mɛ ansɛm anɛ áchá mɛ. Mbɨ́kɨ́ kwáy yɛ̌ bɛ́chóti yi bɛkak bɛ́ nkáŋárí nkubhanya bɛkak ɛbhi.
41001008	Mɛ́jwìti bhe nɛ manyiɛp, kɛ chɔŋ yí anjwiti bhe chí nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.”
41001009	Ndǔ mpok yɔ, Yesu afú Násárɛt atú Gálili arɔk Jɔ̌n ajwiti yi ndǔ Nnyɛ́n Jɔ́dan.
41001010	Nɛfú Yesu áfú anyɛ́n, aghɔ́ ndǔ nɛbu nɛ́nɛ́nɛ́, nɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm asɔt mkpá ɛbhóŋó asɛp yi amʉɛt.
41001011	Ɛyɔŋ ɛ́fú amfay ɛ́ré rɛm bɛ, “Wɔ ɔchí Mɔ́wa. Nkɔŋ wɔ tontó. Ɔ̌chyɛ̀ mɛ bɛyǎ maŋák.”
41001012	Tɛ́mté wu, Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm akʉ yí arɔk amɛm baso.
41001013	Abhak arɛ́ ndǔ manywɔp bɛsa bɛpay Satan amɔ nɔkɔ yí. Nnya ɛbébé ɛ́bhák arɛ́ nkwɔ, kɛ bɔángɛl Mandɛm báchyɛ Yesu nɛkwak.
41001014	Ɛnɛ́ mánáŋ bákɛ́mɛ́ Jɔ̌n báfyɛ́ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, Yesu arɔk atú Gálili abho bɛghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Mandɛm,
41001015	andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mpok anɛ Mandɛm ábhak nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap arɔp chi kɛkwɔt. Tɨ́k ká nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka, mǎnókó Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́!”
41001016	Ɛnɛ́ Yesu ákɔ̀ nɛpaká Manyu Gálili, aghɔ́ Símun nɛ mɔ́mayi Andru ndǔ bágʉɛ̀p bɛyǎ nkáp ndu bɛway nsi mbɔnyunɛ báchí nyaka bawǎnsi.
41001017	Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Twɔ́ ká mǎmbák bakoŋo bha nɛ chɔŋ ntɔŋ bé ɛnyǔ bǎkʉ bɛ́ bo báchák mambak bakoŋo bha.”
41001018	Tɛ́mté wu, bárɔ bɛyǎ nkáp yap bakoŋo Yesu.
41001019	Átɛ́n nɔ́kɔ́ mmʉɛt ambɨ mandú, aghɔ́ Jems nɛ mɔ́mayi Jɔ̌n, bɔ̌ Sɛbɛdi. Báchí nyaka amɛm áchwí mángoko nɔkɔ bɛyǎ nkáp yap.
41001020	Nɛghɔ́ Yesu aghɔ bhɔ, abhɨŋɨ bhɔ bɛ mankoŋo yi. Bárɔ́ ɛtayap Sɛbɛdi amɛm áchwí nɛ bǒ bɛtɨk, bákóŋo yi.
41001021	Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bárɔ́k ɛtɔk Kapɛ̌naum. Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl, Yesu arɔk téé ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ɛyap abho bɛtɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
41001022	Bo abhɛn bachi arɛ bábhák maknkay tontó ɛ̌ti ɛnyu ɛnɛ yi átɔ̀ŋ. Ǎtɔ̀ŋ nyaka mbɔ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m ɛ́may, puyɛ̌ mbɔ batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses.
41001023	Bápɛ́rɛ ghɔ, mmu anɛ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́sɔŋɔri atwɔ́ achwe amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí are bɨk bɛ́,
41001024	“Yesu, Mmu Násárɛt, ɔbhɔŋ yí bɛkʉ nɛ bhɛsɛ! Ɔtwɔ fá bɛway bhɛsɛ? Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mmǔ wɔ ɔ́chí. Ɔ́chí Mmu Nyáŋá anɛ Mandɛm átó!”
41001025	Yesu asáy Ɛfóŋó yɔ bɛ, “Kusí! Fú yi amʉɛt!”
41001026	Ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́nyɨkɨsi yi gbogbǒgbok, ɛ́bɨk nɛ bɛtaŋ, ɛ́rɔ́ yi.
41001027	Bǒ mankɛm bábhák maknkay, nɛ bábho bɛbhɛp batɨ bɛ, “Ɛnɛ́ ɛnyu ɛchi ná? Chi ɛnyǔ nɛtɔŋ ɛnɛn nɛkɔ kɛ? Mmǔ-nɛ abhɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn ásay bɛfɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ nɛ mɛ́ngok yi!”
41001028	Mbok Yesu atɨŋ ataka atú Gálili ankɛm.
41001029	Yesu árɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi, bárɔk téé ndǔ ɛkɛt Símun nɛ Andru. Jems nɛ Jɔ̌n bábhak nɛ bhɔ́.
41001030	Nɛchwe Yesu áchwé anywɔ́p, bágháti yí bɛ nnɔ ngɔrɛ́ Símun achí bhʉ́rɛ́ nɛ mbʉ́ɛ́p amʉɛt.
41001031	Yesu arɔk nɛpakámʉɛt ɛni akɛ́m yí ndu awɔ́ akwak yí afate achɔkɔ chɔ́kɔ́. Mbʉ́ɛ́p wu ámáy. Abho mɛne bhɔ.
41001032	Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ beku, ɛnɛ́ mmok ánɛ́mɛ́, bo báré sɔt bǒmame mankɛm nɛ abhɛn bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri mándɔk nɔkɔ ntá Yesu nɛ bhɔ́.
41001033	Ɛtɔk ɛnkɛm ɛ́rɔk ɛ́chɛm ambǐnywɔp.
41001034	Yesu abú bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mame mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu. Abók bɛyǎ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́rɔ́ bho. Yí kɛka bɛ bɔ́ mɛ́ndɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ mbɔnyunɛ bɛ́rɨŋɨ nyaka mmǔ yi achi.
41001035	Nɛyí nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu afate kpaŋwák, arɔk nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bo bápú arɛ, are nɨkmʉɛt.
41001036	Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, Símun nɛ mamʉɛrɛ bhi báfú báré yaŋ yi.
41001037	Bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi, bárɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ǎyàŋ wɔ.”
41001038	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ ndǔ bɛtɔk bɛchak ɛbhɛn bɛchi fá kɛkwɔt. Mbɔŋ bɛ́gháti Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm árɛ́ nkwɔ mbɔnyunɛ ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ ntwɔ́.”
41001039	Yesu abho yɛ bɛkɔ atú Gálili ankɛm angati nɔkɔ bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkímʉɛt bo Israɛl, ankʉ nɔkɔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ ɛbhɛn bɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri bho mɛ́mfu bɔ́ amʉɛt.
41001040	Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, mmu ɛbhaŋákwa amɔt arɔk akwɛ́n yi bɛkak abho bɛrɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, mbák ɔkɔŋ, ɔ̌kway bɛkʉ mɛ ntáŋ.”
41001041	Yesu aghɔ́ yi ntínso. Anyabhɛ awɔ, atɔk yi, arɛm bɛ, “Nkɔŋ, ɛbhaŋákwa yɛ ɛ́may!”
41001042	Tɛ́mté wu, ɛbhaŋákwa yi ɛ́may, ataŋ.
41001043	Yesu aya yí batú ansɛmti nɔkɔ
41001044	bɛ, “Kɛ́ ghati yɛ̌ mmu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí, kɛ dɔ́k ntá nchiakap Mandɛm bɛ yi ángɔ́ bɛ ɛbhaŋákwa yɛ ɛ́may. Ánáŋ ámbyó wɔ, ɔ́ndɔk, ɔnchyɛ yɛ akap ntá Mandɛm bɛkoŋo ɛbhé Moses. Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́mbak ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bho bɛ ɛbhaŋákwa yɛ ɛ́may.”
41001045	Yɛ̌ nɔ, ndu árɔ̀ŋ, are ghati bho mbǎnkɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari. Akʉ Yesu kɛpɛrɛ kwáy bɛchwe ɛtɔk kpoŋoroŋ. Arɔp chi bhɛsɛ́ bhɛsɛ́ ndǔ mbaŋ ɛnɛ bo bápú arɛ́. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bo báré fú mbǎŋ nɛ mbaŋ mándɔk nɔkɔ ntá yi.
41002001	Ansɛm mpǎy manywɔp, apɛtnsɛm Kapɛ̌naum nɛ mbok ataka mbǎnkɛm bɛ́ Yesu achí ɛtɔk.
41002002	Bɛyǎ bo bárɔ́k ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ yi achi arɛ́, ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɛpok ɛ́pú nyaka bɛsoŋ ɛkak, yɛ̌ chí nɛfí. Yesu are ghati bhɔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
41002003	Ndu árɛ̀m nɔ, bǒ bati anwi bátwɔ́ nɛ mbɛ́ntí amɔt anɛ bápɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ bɛkpaka.
41002004	Kɛ bɔ́ kɛbhɔ́ŋ mbi anɛ báfʉɛt mǎnchwe anywɔ́p ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ bho. Báko amfay ɛkɛt mánɛnɛ mbok arɛ́, básɛbhɛ yi bhʉɛrɛ ndǔ bɛkpaka bhi nɛntɨ bho, bɛsí Yesu.
41002005	Yesu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyǔ nɛka ɛnɛ́n bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ yi, aghati mbɛ́ntí wu bɛ, “Mɔ́wa, mfóŋórí bɛbʉ́ bhɛ.”
41002006	Mbɔk batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses abhɛn báchí nyaka arɛ́ chɔkɔ báre bhɛp mmʉɛt ɛyap bɛ,
41002007	“Agha nɛ́? Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m chi nsɔk ntá Mandɛm! Mandɛm aywǐnti kɛ ákway bɛfoŋori bɛbʉ́ mmu!”
41002008	Tɛ́mté wu, Yesu arɨŋɨ nkaysi yap, abhɛp bhɔ bɛ, “Ndaká yí bǎkàysi mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ?
41002009	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi wɨkɨrɨk bɛrɛm ntá mbɛ́ntí-nɛ chí ɛnɛ́? Bɛrɛm bɛ ‘Mfóŋórí bɛbʉ́ bhɛ’, kɛ chi, ‘Faté pɔkɔ́ bɛkpaka ɛbhɛ kɔ?’
41002010	Kɛ chɔŋ nkʉ mǎndɨŋɨ bɛ, Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm mbɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ fá amɨk ndu bɛfoŋori bɛbʉ́ bho.” Arɛm ntá mbɛ́ntí wu bɛ,
41002011	“Nchí ghati wɔ, faté pɔkɔ́ bɛkpaka bhɛ gurɛ!”
41002012	Bápɛ́rɛ ghɔ, mbɛ́ntí wu afáté kpɛrɛp, apɔkɔ bɛkpaka bhi, afa amɨk. Bɔ́ mankɛm bábhak maknkay tontó bábho bɛbɨti Mandɛm mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ ɛnɛ́ ɛnyu!”
41002013	Yesu apɛt arɔk nɛpaká Manyu Gálili. Ngɛ́mtay bo báre rɔŋ ntá yi, antɔŋ nɔkɔ bhɔ.
41002014	Ndu ákɔ̀ árɔ̀ŋ, aghɔ́ mbɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛ́nti amɔt chɔkɔ amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́bɛtɨk ɛyi. Aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Lɛ́vi. Abhak mmɔ̌ Álfeɔs. Abhɨŋɨ yi, arɛm bɛ, “Twɔ́ bhák nkoŋo wa.” Lɛ́vi afaté, abho bɛkoŋo Yesu.
41002015	Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Yesu nɛ bakoŋo bhi báré nyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ amɛm ɛkɛt Lɛ́vi. Bɛyǎ babhɛbhɛ́ nkábhɛ́nti nɛ bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ báchák bákóŋo Yesu, mányiɛ nɔkɔ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ yi.
41002016	Mbɔk batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm abhɛn báchí nyaka bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndu Yesu ányìɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ bǒ bɛbʉ́ nɛ babhɛbhɛ́ nkábhɛ́nti, bábhɛ́p bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Ndaká yí yi ányìɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ mɛnyǔ bǒbhɛn?”
41002017	Yesu ághók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bárɛ̀m, akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bo abhɛn bapu me, bápú yaŋ ngaŋ. Bǒ mame kɛ báyàŋ ngaŋ. Mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ bɛbhɨŋɨ bǒ abhɛn bákáysí bɛ bachi chak bɛsí Mandɛm bɛ mámbák bakoŋo bha, ntwɔ bɛbhɨŋɨ chi bǒ bɛbʉ́.”
41002018	Bakoŋó Jɔ̌n Njwiti nɛ abhɛn nkwɔ Fárisi báchí nyaka ndǔ nɛtarɛ́nsay mpokófu. Mbɔk bho bárɔ́k ntá Yesu bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ndaká yí bakoŋó Jɔ̌n Njwiti nɛ abhɛn nkwɔ Fárisi bátarɛ nɔkɔ nsay, kɛ babhɔk abhɛ bápu kʉ nɔ?”
41002019	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎkaysi bɛ mankɔ̌ abhɛn ɛpǎ nɛbhay bákway bɛbhak ndǔ nɛtarɛ́nsay? Nsé! Tɛ̌ndu mbǎyngɔrɛ́ abhʉɛ́t nɛ bhɔ́, bápú kway bɛtat nsay.
41002020	Kɛ mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ báfɛrɛ mbǎyngɔrɛ́ ntá yap. Chɔŋ mántarɛ nɔkɔ nsay mpok yɔ.”
41002021	Yesu atɛ́m bɔ́ nɛkay ɛnɛn bɛ, “Yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛsɔt ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ndɛn nkɔ bɛchok mbok ndǔ ɛsɨ́ ndɛn, mbɔnyunɛ mbák ánkʉ nɔ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ndɛn anɛ nkɔ ɛ́ŋati, anɛ nsɨ́ andaka, mbok ámpɛt anchɨk ancha.
41002022	Nɛ ntá bo abhɛn báfyɛ̀ mmɛ́m ndǔ bɛbhǎ nkwɔbhɛ́nya, mmǔ apú kway bɛfyɛ mmɛ́m bakɔ amɛm ɛsɨ́ ɛbhǎ nkwɔbhɛnya, mbɔnyunɛ, mbák ánkʉ ɛnyu yɔ, mmɛ́m bakɔ ǎkʉ ɛsɨ́ ɛbha ɛ́nsɛn, ɛnchɔŋɔ, mmɛ́m andɔk amɨk. Báfyɛ mmɛ́m bakɔ chi amɛm ɛbhǎ nkwɔbhɛ́nya ɛnɛ ɛkɔ.”
41002023	Ɛ́fákári bɛ, Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bákɔ̀ mámfʉɛrɛ nɔkɔ amɛm nkɨ̌ nchwi ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl. Ɛnɛ́ báfʉɛ́t, baghɔkɔ́ bhi bábho bɛkʉɛp ɛnyǔ nchwi yɔ.
41002024	Mbɔk bǒ nkwɔ Fárisi bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, bárɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́, baghɔkɔ́ bhɛ bákʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́pú chak bɛkʉ ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt!”
41002025	Kɛ Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ re pay amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mfɔ Debhít ákú mpok yi áyàŋ ɛnyɨŋ mɛnyiɛ ndǔ nsay ákɛ́mɛ́ yi nɛ bɔ̌bhi?
41002026	Achwe nyáká amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ Mandɛm anyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn báchyɛ́ mbɔ akap ntá Mandɛm. Achyɛ ntá bǒbhi nkwɔ, mányíɛ́, ɛnɛ́ ɛbhé ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ka nyaka bɛ mmu achak anyiɛ, ɛbhɨkɨfʉɛt nkʉbɛtɨk amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Ɛ́fákári nɔ ndǔ mpok anɛ Abíata achi mǔngo ndǔ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm.”
41002027	Bɛ́rɔŋ ndǔ ngwɛnti, Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ bághoko nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt ɛ̌ti nkwǎ, bábhɨ́kɨ́ ghoko nkwǎ ɛ̌ti nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt.
41002028	Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm kɛ̌ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ yɛ bɛrɛm ɛnyǔ mmu abhɔŋɔ bɛkʉ nɛ ɛbhé ɛnɛ ɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt.”
41003001	Yesu apɛt achwe amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl angati nɔkɔ bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́. Mmu amɔt abhak amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ɛyɔ anɛ awɔ́ ywi ágú.
41003002	Mbɔk bho bábhák arɛ́ abhɛn báyàŋ mbi bɛrɛm bɛ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛchi nɛ Yesu. Bátɛ́p yɛ yi amɨ́k amʉɛt bɛghɔ mbák chɔŋ Yesu ambú mmǔ wu ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt.
41003003	Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Fú, twɔ́ fá ambɨ.”
41003004	Abhɛ́p yɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛbhé yɛsɛ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ sɛ́nkʉ yi ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt? Bɛ́ sɛ́nkʉ bɛrɨ kɛ chi bɛbʉ́? Chi bɛ́pɛ́mɛ kɛ chí bɛchɔŋti nɛpɛ́m?” Bárɔp kpákpák.
41003005	Ntɨ nɛ́bé Yesu tontó. Abhaŋari ayɨŋɨ bhɔ́ mankɛm nɛ bɛběntɨ bhɔ mbɔnyunɛ bátàŋ batí. Yɛ̌ nɔ, abhɔ́ŋ ntínso nɛ mmu anɛ awɔ́ ágú nɔ́ yi aghati yi bɛ, “Nyabhɛ́ awɔ́ ywɛ.” Anyabhɛ awɔ wu, apɛt ataŋ abhak mbɔ áchák.
41003006	Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi báfú, bárɔ́k. Bátɛmɛri bo Israɛl abhɛn báté ansɛm Hɛ́rɔd, bákɛ́m ɛchɛmɛ, batɨ bɛway Yesu.
41003007	Yesu nɛ bakoŋo bhi bárɔ bárɔk angɔkɔ Manyu Gálili. Ngɛ́mtay bho báre koŋo yi. Bo báfú atú Gálili, mbɔk atú Judɛ́ya,
41003008	Yerúsalɛm nɛ Iduméya. Báchák báfú ɛbhěnyɛn Jɔ́dan, abhɛ́nɛ́fú báfú atú bɛtɔk Táya nɛ Sídɔn. Bo mankɛm abhɛn mámè bárɔ́k ntá Yesu ndu bághókó mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀.
41003009	Yesu aghati bakoŋo bhi bɛ́ mántóŋtí áchwí anɛ yi áchwè arɛ ndǔ bo baya bacha, bɛ bákɛ́ nyɨrɛ yi.
41003010	Ntí abhak bɛ anáŋ abu nyaka bɛyǎ bǒmame. Bɛyǎ abhɛn bábhʉ́ɛt mɛme báré nu, mányirɛ nɔkɔ batɨ, bɛ mámbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛtɔk yi.
41003011	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ bo abhɛn bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́sɔŋɔri bhɔ bághɔ́ nyaka yi, bákwɛn yi bɛkak mámbɨkɨ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mmɔ Mandɛm!”
41003012	Kɛ Yesu asɛmti bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ ghati yɛ̌ mmu ɛnyǔ mmu mɛ nchí.”
41003013	Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu akó amfǎy njiɛ, abhɨŋɨ bakoŋo bhi mánkóŋó yi. Bárɔ́ŋ nɔ́kɔ́,
41003014	ayap batí byo nɛ apay, áchyɛ bhɔ́ nnyɛ́n bɛ bǒnto. Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Njap be bɛ́ mǎmbák nɛ mɛ. Chɔŋ ntó bhe nɛfí ndu bɛghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Mandɛm,
41003015	nɛ chɔŋ nchyɛ́ bhe bɛtaŋ ndu bɛ́bók bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ ɛbhɛn bɛ́sɔŋɔri bho.”
41003016	Manyɛ́n bǒnto Yesu bhɔ bati byo nɛ apay achi bɛ, Símun anɛ Yesu áchyɛ́ nnyɛ́n nɛchak bɛ Píta; nɛ
41003017	Jems, nɛ mɔ́mayi Jɔ̌n, bɔ̌ Sɛbɛdi [Yesu achyɛ bhɔ́ nnyɛ́n nɛ́chák bɛ́ Boanɛjis, nɔ chi bɔ̌nɛfaŋ]; nɛ
41003018	Ándru, nɛ Fílip, nɛ Batolómio, nɛ Mátio, nɛ Tɔmás, nɛ Jéms mmɔ̌ Alfeyɔs, nɛ Tadiɔs, nɛ Símun, mfyɛ̌-bɛtaŋ ndǔ barakátɔk,
41003019	nɛ Júdas Iskariɔt anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛti Yesu.
41003020	Ɛnɛ́ Yesu nɛ bakoŋo bhi bápɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p, bo abhɛn báchɛ́mɛ́ arɛ́, bápɛt baya bacha, ɛkʉ yí nɛ bakoŋo bhi kɛbhɔ́ŋ yɛ̌ ɛpok ndu mɛ́nyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́.
41003021	Bǒ nnɛrɛ́kɛt ywi bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, bábho bɛrɔŋ ndu bɛsɔt yi mbɔnyunɛ bárɛ̀m nyaka bɛ, “Nti átáká yi amɛm!”
41003022	Mbɔk batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses abhɛn báfú Yerúsalɛm báre rɛm bɛ, “Bɛlsɛbul, mfɔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ, kɛ̌ áchyɛ́ Yesu bɛtaŋ bɛbok bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ.”
41003023	Yesu abhɨŋɨ bhɔ́ bɛ mantwɔ ntá yi. Bárɔ́ŋɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́, abho bɛghati bhɔ ndǔ bakay bɛ, “Satan ǎkway bɛbok mmʉɛt ná?
41003024	Mbák ákɔ́rɛ́ ánkwɛ́n ɛtɔk, bo mánu nɔkɔ nɛ batɨ, ɛtɔk ɛyɔ ɛ́pú te.
41003025	Mbák ákɔ́rɛ́ ánkwɛ́n ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt, bo mánu nɔkɔ nɛ batɨ, nnɛrɛ́kɛt wu ákwɛ̀n.
41003026	Ɛnyumɔt kɛ ɛchi bɛ mbák Satan ǎnù nɛ mmʉɛt ɛyi, ákɔ́rɛ́ ákwɛn ndǔ kɛfɔ ɛki, nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi mɛ́may.
41003027	Ná mmu ákway bɛchwe amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ ntantaŋ angɛ́p mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi mbák abhɨkɨ yambɨ ánkɛ́m yi angwɔt? Ǎnaŋa kɛ́m yi angwɔ́t, kɛ ánkwáy bɛghɛp mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi.
41003028	Dɨŋɨ́ ká, nɛ ɛ́chí tɛtɛp bɛ bákway bɛ́fóŋóri bɛbʉ́ bo mankɛm nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù bho anyu.
41003029	Kɛ bápú foŋori yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ. Ɛ́yɔ̌ ɛnyǔ bɛbʉ́ bɛ́tɨŋɨ mmu anti, ngwɛnti ti.”
41003030	Yesu arɛm nɔ, mbɔnyunɛ mbɔk bho bárɛ̀m nyaka bɛ, ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛsɔŋɔri yi.
41003031	Nnɔ Yesu nɛ bɔ̌mayi bátwɔ́ bátee nɛfí, báto ɛyɔŋ bɛ mámbɨ́ŋɨ́ yi.
41003032	Ngɛ́mtay bo abhɛn báchɔ́kɔ́ bákábhɛ́ Yesu bágháti yi bɛ, “Máyɛ nɛ bɔ̌mayɛ báchí nɛfí téé báyàŋ wɔ”.
41003033	Kɛ Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Sayri sayri, máyá chi agha? Nɛ ntɨkɨ bho bachi bɔ̌maya?”
41003034	Ayibhiri mmʉɛt ayɨŋɨ bo abhɛn báchɔkɔ bákábhɛ yi arɛm bɛ, “Máya chi bǒbhɛn, nɛ bɔ̌maya chi bǒbhɛn,
41003035	Bǒ abhɛn bákʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛtaya mmu achi amfay áyàŋ bɔ́ mánkʉ kɛ báchí máya nɛ bɔ̌maya.”
41004001	Yesu apɛt abhɔ bɛtɔŋ bo angɔkɔ manyu Gálili. Bɛyǎ bho bákoŋo yi arɛ́ báté angɔkɔnyɛ́n. Yesu arɔ bhɔ́ tété, arɔk achwe, achɔkɔ amɛm áchwí.
41004002	Ɛnɛ́ bɛyǎ bǒbhɔ báté angɔkɔnyɛ́n, abho bɛghati bhɔ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ bakay bɛ,
41004003	“Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, nkwaŋankɨ amɔt arɔk bɛtak ɛnyǔ nchwifú amɛm nkɨ̌ ywi.
41004004	Ɛnɛ́ yi átàk árɔ̀ŋ, mbɔk akwɛnti ndǔ mɔ́mbi anɛ áchí amɛm nkɨ. Kɛnɛn kɛ́twɔ́ kɛ́bwɔ́pti yɔ nkɛm
41004005	Mbuɔt áchák akwɛnti ndǔ mmɨk sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́ anɛ ntɔp abhɨkɨ ya arɛ. Awakari achak.
41004006	Kɛ mpok anɛ mmok áfú, ásɔ́ŋ yɔ́ ndǔ bakaŋ ayi ábhɨ́kɨ́ kway bɛchwe amɨk sayri. Anɨŋti, awɔsi.
41004007	Mbuɔt anɛfu akwɛnti ndǔ mmɨk anɛ tákɔ nsěnse ágò arɛ. Achak are gó, kɛ tákɔ nsěnse agó áchók yɔ. Akɛ fyɛ́.
41004008	Nchwi áchák akwɛnti ndǔ mmɨk ndɨ́ndɨ́, achak, agó, achyɛ bɛyǎ nchwi. Nchwi ayá acha anɛ bápɨ́ ndɔŋ ɛsa nsɛm byo, achák ndɔŋ bɛsa bɛrat, anɛfu ndɔŋ bɛsa bɛtay.”
41004009	Ndǔ ngwɛnti, Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mmu anɛ áyàŋ bɛghok, ántá batú angok sayri.”
41004010	Mpok Yesu achi aywǐnti, mbɔk bho nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bati byo nɛ apay bábhak arɛ́, bábhɛ́p yi ntí bakay anɛ yi átɛ́mɛ́.
41004011	Akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ngátí bhé kpoŋoroŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ɛ̌ti Kɛfɔ Mandɛm, kɛ ntá bo báchák, nchí ghati bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ chi ndǔ bakay,
41004012	nɛ ntí bɛ, ‘Bákwày bɛ́yɨŋɨ nɛ amɨ́k kɛ bápú ghɔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ; mángók nɛ batú, kɛ kɛjwimɛm, bɛ́ bákɛ́ pɛtnsɛm ntá Mandɛm yi ámfoŋori bhɔ.’”
41004013	Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bǎbhɨkɨ jwimɛm ndǔ nɛkay ɛnɛn, chɔŋ mǎnjwimɛm chí ndǔ bakay anɛ́fu?
41004014	Mbuɔt anɛ nkwaŋankɨ átíɛ́, chí Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
41004015	Mbɔk bho báchi mbɔ mbwɔt anɛ ákwɛ́ntí ndǔ mɔ́mbi anɛ achi amɛm nkɨ. Nɛghok anɛ bághókó Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, Satan antɨŋ antwɔ́ amfɛrɛ yɔ́ amɛm batɨ̌ yap.
41004016	Bo báchák báchí mbɔ mmɨk sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́ anɛ mbwɔt achak akwɛnti arɛ́. Bághòk Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm mánsɔt yɔ́ nɛ maŋák tɛ́mté.
41004017	Kɛ ɛnyǔ mú wu kɛbhɔ́ŋ bakaŋ amɨk. Ante kákáti ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ mpok. Kɛ mpok ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́twɔ́, bo mámbo mɛnyok yi ɛ̌ti Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ yi ánókó, amfɛrɛ amɔ́ tɛ́mté.
41004018	Bo abhɛ́nɛ́fú báchí mbɔ mmɨk anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ tákɔ nsěnse. Bághòk nkwɔ́ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm,
41004019	kɛ basɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ mmɨk atwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi antɨ, nɛ ngoŋó nkáp, nɛ ɛkwak bɛbhɔŋ mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak mɛnkɛm, angɔkɔntɨk Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ ɛchi arɛ́, yɔ kɛkwak yi ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni.
41004020	Kɛ bo bachak báchí mbɔ mbwɔt anɛ ákwɛ́ntí ndǔ mmɨk ndɨ́ndɨ́. Bághòk Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, mányu kɛpɛm ndǔ bapɛ́m ayap. Mbuɔt amɔt anchyɛ mbwɔt nkɔ anɛ aya acha anɛ bapɨ ndɔŋ ɛsa nsɛm byo, achák ndɔŋ bɛsa bɛ́rát, anɛfú ndɔŋ bɛsa bɛtay.”
41004021	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Bádurɛ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ mánsɔt ɛnyɨŋ mankuti kɛ? Bádurɛ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ mántɛn antɛnɛ́ bɛkɔk kɛ? Pú bádùrɛ ɛrɔŋɔ mánte chi ndǔ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́t anɛ báte ɛrɔŋɔ?
41004022	Chɔŋ mánkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ɛmfu kpoŋoroŋ. Nɛ chɔŋ mánɛnɛ ɛnɛ bákútí.
41004023	Mbák mmu abhɔŋ batú bɛ́ghok mbaŋ, ángók sayri!”
41004024	Yesu apɛt aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Tá ká batú ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghòk! Ɛnyu ɔ́yɛ̀nti ɔnchyɛ ntɨ, nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu yɔ̌ kɛ báyɛ̀nti mánchyɛ wɔ. Bápɛrɛ́ chyɛ wɔ, mámaka ɛ́chák arɛ́,
41004025	mbɔnyunɛ, mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ, mámaka yi ɛ́chák. Kɛ mmǔ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ, yɛ̌ chí mandú anɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́, chɔŋ mánsɔt mamfɛrɛ ntá yi.”
41004026	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Kɛfɔ Mandɛm kɛ́chí mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí ndǔ mpok anɛ nkwaŋankɨ átìɛ̀ mbwɔt ɛbhɨ.
41004027	Bɛti bɛ́gʉ, ambʉrɛ kɛnɔ́. Nɛ́yi nɔ́kɔ́, amfate, ankɔ, ankʉ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ. Mbuɔt anchak, ango nɔkɔ, kɛ yi kɛrɨŋɨ ndu ɛ́fákári.
41004028	Mbuɔt anɛ áchí amɨk ǎchak ndǔ mmʉɛt yi ango nɔkɔ, kpát anchyɛ anɛ nkɔ.
41004029	Mpok áŋáŋ ánkwáy, ǎtó bǒ bɛtɨk nɛ ngak tɛ́mté, mándɔk mámfɛ́rɛ́ yɔ́ ɛbhɨ.”
41004030	Yesu achɔkɔ abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Kɛfɔ Mandɛm fá amɨk kɛchi mbɔ yi? Chɔŋ sɛ́nsɔt ntɨkɨ nɛkay bɛtɔŋ ɛnyu kɔ kɛchi?
41004031	Kɛ́chí mbɔ mɔ́sɛpɛmɛ́nɔk anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ mɔ́stat. Sɛ́gʉpsi sɛ́cha kɛpɛmɛ́nɔk kɛ́chák kɛnkɛm fá amɨk.
41004032	Yɛ̌ nɔ, mbák mmu ánsɔt sɔ́ ampɨ, sɛ́chàk, sɛ́ngó, ɛnɔk ɛ́nchɨk áncha bɔ̌mɛnɔk báchák mankɛm, nɛ ɛ́ngat batáp ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ kɛnɛn kɛ́twɔ kɛnte manyay ndǔ batábhɛ́ yi.”
41004033	Yesu asɔt bɛyǎ bakay mbɔ ɛnɛn ndu bɛtɔŋ bho mpoknkɛm ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bákwày bɛjwimɛm.
41004034	Yi kɛ ghati bhɔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ abhɨ́kɨ́ tɛ́m nɛkay. Kɛ mpok anɛ yi ábhák aywǐntí nɛ bakoŋo bhi, anɛnɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ kpoŋoroŋ ntá yap.
41004035	Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ beku ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ ɛwak ɛyɔ, Yesu arɛm ntá bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Sɛ́mpé sɛ́ndɔ́k ɛbhě manyu ɛnɛ́ awu.”
41004036	Bárɔ yɛ bɛyǎ bho, bátɛmɛri Yesu amɛm áchwi, bábho bɛ́rɔŋ nɛ yi. Báchwi áchák anɛ́ áchí nyaka arɛ́ áre koŋo bhɔ́.
41004037	Bápɛ́rɛ ghɔ́ mbʉ́ɛ́p ataŋataŋ átwɔ, ákʉ mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn ɛ́bho bɛdɛp áchwí, manyiɛp anchwe nɔkɔ amɛm, kpát árɔp kɛkwɔt bɛbɛt.
41004038	Kɛ Yesu abhak anɛt áchwí. Anyáŋá nyaka ntí ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́nti, ambʉɛrɛ nɔkɔ kɛnɔ́. Kɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bárɔ́k máŋɛ́mɛ yi bárɛm bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ yɨŋɨ wɔ bɛ́ sɛ́twɔ̀ gu anyɛ́n-ɛ́?”
41004039	Yesu afaté asáy mbʉ́ɛ́p arɛm bɛ, “Mbaŋ ánkwɛn!” Aghati nnyɛ́n bɛ, “Kwɛn tɨ̌!” Mbʉ́ɛ́p ámáy, mbǎŋ akwɛn chák.
41004040	Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Bǎchay ɛnyunɛ ndaká yí? Bǎbhɨ́kí re bhɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ mɛ?”
41004041	Bɛcháy bɛ́pɛt bɛkɛm bɔ́ tontó. Bábho bɛbhɛp batɨ bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ mmú nɛ? Yɛ̌ chí mbʉ́ɛ́p ághòk yi, mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn ɛ́ngok yi!”
41005001	Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi mánók yɛ bárɔk ɛbhě manyu Gálili ɛchak, báchwɔp angɔkɔnyɛ́n, kɛkwɔt nɛ atú Gɛrása.
41005002	Nɛfú anɛ Yesu áfú amɛm áchwí asɛbhɛ angɔkɔnyɛ́n, mmǔ amɔt anɛ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri afú ndǔ nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́ manɛm arɔk atɛmɛri yi.
41005003	Ǎchɔ̀kɔ nyaka chí ndǔ manɛm nɛ yɛ̌ mmu kɛpɛrɛ kwáy bɛgwɔt yi yɛ̌ chí nɛ ngɛm.
41005004	Báfyɛ́ nyaka yi bɛko bɛkak nɛ ngɛm amɔ́. Kɛ ngɛm ɛyɔ ɛ́ré kɨti kɨ́ti nɛ bɛko mɛ́ndakati nɔkɔ. Yɛ̌ mmu kɛbhɔŋ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn ákway bɛkɛm yi.
41005005	Bɛti nɛ ngósí, arebɨk, andakati nɔkɔ mmʉɛt nɛ batay ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt manɛm nɛ ndǔ njiɛ.
41005006	Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Yesu nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ, ajɛt, arɔk atɛp mánɛ́n bɛsí bhi,
41005007	abho bɛ́bɨk nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Ɛ̌ Yesu, Mmɔ Mandɛm mfay! Ɔ́bhɔ̌ŋ ntɨkɨ ndak nɛ bhɛsɛ́? Yɨkɨ́ Mandɛm bɛ́ ɔpú chyɛ chɔŋ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔrí.”
41005008	Are rɛm nɔ́, mbɔnyunɛ Yesu arɛm bɛ́ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri yí ɛ́ndɔ́ yi.
41005009	Yesu abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Nnyɛ́n ɛnɛ nɛchi bɛ yi?” Akɛmɛ Yesu bɛ, “Nnyɛ́n ɛna nɛchi bɛ ngɛ́mtáy, mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́yǎ tontó.”
41005010	Arɔk ambɨ mɛnɨk Yesu mmʉɛt bɛ ákɛ́ to bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bhɔ atú ɛtɔk achak.
41005011	Ɛrɛmɛ́ nkwɔ́ bakók ányìɛ nyaka ambɨ njiɛ anɛ achi kɛkwɔt.
41005012	Bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bhɔ mɛ́ník Yesu mmʉɛt bɛ andɔ bɔ mándɔk mǎnchwe amʉɛt bakók bhɔ.
41005013	Yesu achyɛ bhɔ mbi. Bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bhɔ bɛ́fú mmǔ wu amʉɛt, bɛrɔk bɛchwe ndǔ nkwɔ́ bakók. Nkwɔ́ bakók ankɛm abhak mbɔ nká ɛpay. Bárókóri básɛp ndǔ nkókónjiɛ dúgúdúgúdúgú kpát bágúrɛ anyɛ́n.
41005014	Bo abhɛn bábhàbhɛri bakók bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, bábʉɛ́ ntiɛ́t ntiɛt bárɔ́k ɛtɔk ɛ́gho nɛ amɛm bakɨ mángati nɔkɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákári. Bo báfú báre rɔŋ bɛghɔ nɛ amɨ́k ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fákárí.
41005015	Bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Yesu achi, bághɔ mmu anɛ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́fú yi amʉɛt arɛ́ chɔkɔ. Abhak sayri ndǔ nkaysi yi, nɛ ndɛn amʉɛt. Bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m bo mankɛm.
41005016	Bo abhɛn bághɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárɨ́, báré ghati bǒ abhɛn bárɔŋ arɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí ntá mmu anɛ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri nyaka nɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fákárí nɛ nkwɔ́ bakók.
41005017	Bábho yɛ mɛ́nɨkmʉɛt ntá Yesu bɛ ándɔ́ atú ɛtɔk ɛyap.
41005018	Nɛchwe anɛ Yesu achwe amɛm áchwi, mmu anɛ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri nyaka yi, abho mɛnɨk yi mmʉɛt bɛ́ ándɔ́ yí ándɔ́k nɛ yi.
41005019	Kɛ Yesu kɛka. Aghati yí chí bɛ, “Pɛtnsɛm ntá bǒbhɛ ghati bhɔ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛnɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ ntá yɛ.”
41005020	Mmǔ wu afa yɛ, arɔk, angati nɔkɔ bho ndǔ bɛtɔk byo mɛnkɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu ákʉ́ ntá yi. Mankɛm abhɛn baghókó bábhák maknkay.
41005021	Yesu apɛtnsɛm ndǔ ɛbhě manyu ɛchak. Ndu yi áchí angɔkɔnyɛ́n téé, bɛyǎ bo bárɔ́k bákáp yi.
41005022	Mǔnti anɛ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi achi, anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Jáyrɔs atwɔ́ arɛ nkwɔ, nɛ ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Yesu, arɔk akwɛ́n yi bɛkak
41005023	abho mɛ́nɨkmʉɛt ntá yi nɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛnkɛm bɛ, “Mɔ́wa anɛ mɔ́ngɔrɛ́ ǎme tontó. Acha, twɔ́ nyaŋá yi amɔ amʉɛt bɛ ántaŋ, ákɛ́ gu.”
41005024	Yesu afa, abho bɛrɔŋ nɛ yi. Bɛyǎ bo bákáp yi bɛbhe bɛpay.
41005025	Ngɔrɛ́ amɔt abhak arɛ́ anɛ áfɛ̀rɛ manoŋ ndǔ mamiɛ́ byo nɛ apay.
41005026	Anáŋ abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri amɔ bɛyǎ baghaŋ nɛ achɔŋti nkáp ankɛm anɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ndɛ́ndɛm. Nte yi ambɛ́p andɔkɔ nɔkɔ chí ambɨ.
41005027	Aghók ɛ̌ti Yesu. Ɛ́kʉ atɔti amɛm bɛyǎ bho kpát arɔk, atɔk nkokoŋ nkú yi.
41005028	Akʉ́ nɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ ǎrɛ̀m nyaka nɛ mmʉɛt yi bɛ, “Mbák ntɔ́k yɛ̌ chí nkú yi, chɔŋ ntaŋ.”
41005029	Nɛtɔk yí átɔ́kɔ́ nkokoŋ nkú Yesu, manoŋ amɛn yi áfɛ̀rɛ nyaka asíɛ́p. Aghók ndǔ mmʉɛt yi bɛ́ nɛme ɛni nɛ́may.
41005030	Tɛ́mté wu, Yesu arɨŋɨ bɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ́fú yi amʉɛt. Ayibhiri mmʉɛt, abhɛ́p bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bachi yi ansɛm bɛ, “Agha átɔ́kɔ́ ndɛn ɛya?”
41005031	Bakoŋo bhi bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Ɔghɔ̌ bɛyǎ bho ndu bákábhɛ́ wɔ, yɛ̌ nɔ, ɔ̌bhɛ́p bɛ, ‘Agha átɔ́kɔ́ mɛ?’”
41005032	Are bhaŋari ndu bɛghɔ mmu anɛ átɔ́kɔ́ yi.
41005033	Mɔ́ngɔrɛ́ wu anáŋ árɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fákárí nɛ yi. Afú angwɛrɛ nɔkɔ gbagbǎgbak nɛ bɛcháy. Atɛp mánɛ́n bɛsí Yesu aghati yi tɛtɛp nkɛm.
41005034	Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Mmá, nɛka ɛnɛ̌ nɛ mɛ nɛ́kʉ ɔtaŋ. Mandɛm áchí nɛ wɔ, dɔ́k sayri, kɛ́pɛrɛ chay.”
41005035	Ɛnɛ́ Yesu ábhʉɛ́t bɛrɛm kɛpɨ nɛ ngɔrɛ́ wu, bǒnto abhɛn báfú ɛkɛt Jáyrɔs, bátwɔ́ bágháti yi bɛ, “Mɔ́ywɛ anáŋ águ, ɔbhʉɛt bɛsɔŋɔri Ntɔŋ yi?”
41005036	Kɛ Yesu kɛfyɛ́ ntí ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bárɛ́mɛ́. Aghati yi bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ cháy. Dɔ́kɔ́ rɔŋ ambɨ mɛnoko.”
41005037	Yesu kɛka yɛ̌ mmu amɔt ánkóŋó yi, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́fʉɛt Píta nɛ Jems nɛ mɔ́mayi Jɔ̌n.
41005038	Bákɔ, bárɔk, báchwɔp ɛkɛt Jáyrɔs. Yesu aghɔ́ ɛbyɔk ɛnɛ ɛchi arɛ́ ndǔ bo bádì, mámbɨk nɔkɔ.
41005039	Achwe, arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Chí yí nɛ bɛyǎ ɛbyɔk nɛ kɛbhɔ? Mɔ́nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ gu. Ǎbhʉrɛ chí kɛnɔ́.”
41005040	Báré way Yesu way. Kɛ Yesu abók bɔ́ mankɛm atɛ́n nɛfí. Asɔt chimɔ nɛ nnɔmɔ nɛ bakoŋo bhi bati arat arɔk, achwe ɛbhak ɛnɛ mɔ́wu áchí bhʉrɛ́.
41005041	Akɛ́m yi ndǔ awɔ arɛm bɛ, “Talíta, kum!” Nɔ chi bɛ, “Mɔ́ngɔsɔŋ, faté!”
41005042	Tɛ́mté wu, afaté abho bɛkɔ. [Achí nyaka mamiɛ́ byo nɛ apay.] Manyu áchók bo mankɛm.
41005043	Kɛ Yesu asɛmti bhɔ́ bɛ́, “Bǎkɛ́ ghati yɛ̌ mmu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí.” Achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mánchyɛ́ Tabíta nɛnyíɛ́ ányíɛ́.
41006001	Yesu afa atú ɛtɔk ɛyɔ apɛtnsɛm ɛtɔk ɛyi Násárɛt. Bakoŋo bhi bárɔ́k nɛ yi.
41006002	Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl, arɔk ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí, abho bɛtɔŋ bo Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Bɛyǎ bho bábhák arɛ́. Bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi átɔ̀ŋ, bɛyǎ bhap bábhak maknkay. Ɛ́kʉ báré bhɛp bɛ, “Aré fú fá nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm? Ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak nɛ́ báchyɛ́ yi? Ná yi ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛ́n?
41006003	Pú mmɔ̌ nchwɛ̌ mɛnɔk nɛ? Pú mmɔ̌ María nɛ? Pú yi achí manɔ́ Jems, nɛ Júdas nɛ Símun? Pú bɔ̌máyi abhɛn baghɔrɛ́ bachí fá nɛ bhɛsɛ́?” Ɛkʉ́ bare byak yi byak.
41006004	Afɔ̌ kɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ ntá yap bɛ, “Bo báchyɛ̀ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm kɛnókó yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak. Ndiɛrɛ ɛtɔk ɛyi nɛ ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt ywi, kɛ bápú chyɛ yi kɛnókó.”
41006005	Ɛkʉ Yesu kɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay arɛ́, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́fʉɛt chí nɛnyaŋa anɛ yi ányáŋá amɔ amʉɛt mpǎy bǒmame, abú bhɔ́.
41006006	Yesu abhak maknkay mbɔnyunɛ bǒ ɛtɔk ɛyi bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nɛka nɛ yi. Yesu are kɔ ndǔ bɔ̌bɛtɔk abhɛn bachi kɛkwɔt, antɔŋ nɔkɔ bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
41006007	Abhɨŋɨ yɛ bakoŋo bhi bati byo nɛ apay ató nɛfí, bati apay apay. Achyɛ bhɔ́ bɛtaŋ bɛbok bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ.
41006008	Asɛmti bhɔ́ bákɛ́ pɔkɔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ nɛkɔ ɛnap, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́fʉɛt chí ntɛ́m. Yí bákɛ́ pɔkɔ nɛnyíɛ́, nɛ yɛ̌ bɛbhǎ-nɛkɔ, nɛ yɛ̌ chi nkáp.
41006009	Yí mámfyɛ́ nkwɔbhánya kɛ bákɛ́ pɔkɔ ndɛn ɛ́chák.
41006010	Nɛ aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ́ básíɛptí bhe arɛ́, bák ká amɛm ɛkɛt ɛ́mɔt kpátɛ mǎndɔ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ.
41006011	Nɛ mbák bǎchwɔp ɛtɔk kɛ bo kɛsyɛpti bhe nɛ maŋák nɛ bɔ́ kɛka bɛghok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎghàti bhɔ, fá ká arɛ́. Nɛ bǎpɛrɛ fá arɛ́, kwɛt ka mfok anɛ achi bhe bɛkak. Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́mbak mbɔ ntísiɛ ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bɔ́ bákʉ́.”
41006012	Bárɔ́ yɛ bárɔ́k, mángati nɔkɔ bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm bɛ bɔ́ mántɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap.
41006013	Báre bok bɛyǎ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ, nɛ mángwati nɔkɔ bɛyǎ bǒmame nɛ bawɛt ólif mámbu nɔkɔ bhɔ.
41006014	Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd aghók ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm, mbɔnyunɛ bo mánáŋ bárɨŋɨ nyaka nnyɛ́n Yesu mbǎnkɛm. Mbɔk bárɛ̀m nyaka bɛ, “Jɔ̌n Njwiti kɛ ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay.”
41006015	Kɛ abhɛ́nɛ́fú bɛ, “Chí Ɛláija.” Báchák bárɛ́m bɛ, “Ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ amɔt anɛ tɛ nyaka”
41006016	Kɛ mbák chí Hɛ́rɔd, ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Chí Jɔ̌n anɛ ndɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ mámkpɔ́t ntí ywi kɛ ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
41006017	Ɛfakari nyaka bɛ Hɛ́rɔd achyɛ ɛyɔŋ, bákɛ́m Jɔ̌n, bagwɔt, nɛ báfyɛ́ yi ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ ɛ̌ti Hɛródias, ngɔrɛ́ mɔ́mayi Fílip anɛ yí áfɔ́ŋɔ́, ábháy.
41006018	Jɔ̌n ǎghati nyaka Hɛ́rɔd bɛ, “Ɛbhé ɛyɛsɛ bo Israɛl ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ ɔ́nsɔt ngɔrɛ́ mɔ́mayɛ ɔmbay.”
41006019	Ɛ̌ti yɔ, Hɛródias afyɛ́ Jɔ̌n antɨ, nɛ are yaŋ bɛrɛm mángwáy yi, kɛ yi kɛbhɔŋ mbi.
41006020	Hɛ́rɔd are cháy bɛway Jɔ̌n mbɔnyunɛ arɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka bɛ Jɔ̌n achi chak nɛ nyáŋá bɛsí Mandɛm. Yɛ̌ndu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Jɔ̌n árɛ̀m ɛ́fyɛ̀ nyaka yi ɛbyɔk antɨ abhɔ̌ŋ maŋák bɛghok Jɔ̌n.
41006021	Nywɔp nɛ́mɔt, Hɛródias abhɔ́ŋ mbi. Hɛ́rɔd anak ɛpa ndǔ bɛtɨk nywɔbhɛ́ nɛbhe ɛni. Abhɨŋɨ manɛ́m bǒ ɛtɔk, nɛ bǒ bagho, nɛ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu, nɛ manɛ́m bo Gálili.
41006022	Mmɔ̌ Hɛródias anɛ mɔ́ngɔrɛ́ arɔk ndǔ ɛpǎ ɛyɔ, abhɛ́n nɛbhɛ́n ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ Hɛ́rɔd nɛ mankɔ̌ bhi bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛyǎ maŋák. Hɛ́rɔd arɛm ntá mɔ́ngɔsɔ́ŋ wu bɛ, “Ghatí mɛ, yɛ̌ ɔ́yàŋ yi, chɔŋ nchyɛ́ wɔ.”
41006023	Ayɨkɨ bɛyǎ ndɔŋ ntá yi bɛ, “Chɔŋ nchyɛ́ wɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́yàŋ nchyɛ́ wɔ, yɛ̌ chí ɛbhakátɔk ɛya ɛ́mɔt.”
41006024	Ngɔsɔ́ŋ wu arɔk ntá nnɔ, abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Mma, ndɛ́m mfɔ ánchyɛ mɛ yi?” Nnɔ yi bɛ, “Ntí Jɔ̌n Njwiti.”
41006025	Ngɔsɔ́ŋ wu apɛtnsɛm áyák ntá mfɔ arɛm bɛ, “Chiɛ́ mɛ ntí Jɔ̌n Njwiti amɛm nchán myákátí nɛ, nɛ́nɛ!”
41006026	Hɛ́rɔd apɔp! Kɛ ɛ́bé yí mmʉɛt bɛkʉ ɛnyu ɛ́chák ɛ̌ti nɛyɨkɨ anɛ yí áyɨ́kɨ́ bɛsí mankɔ̌ bhi.
41006027	Tɛ́mté wu, Hɛ́rɔd ató mbabhɛri ywi amɔt nɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ ándɔk ántwɔ nɛ ntí Jɔ̌n. Arɔk, afɛrɛ ntí ywi amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ,
41006028	atwɔ́ nɛ wu amɛm nchán myákátí, barɔk bachyɛ ntá mmɔ̌ Hɛródias. Asɔt, arɔk achyɛ ntá máyi.
41006029	Bakoŋó Jɔ̌n bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákári, bárɔk basɔt ɛrɛnɛ́ Jɔ̌n, barɔk babhɛmɛ.
41006030	Bǒnto báfú ndǔ nɛkɔ ɛnɛn Yesu átó bhɔ bápɛtnsɛm ntá yi, bágháti yi ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ́ bákʉ nɛ ɛbhɛn bátɔ́ŋɔ́ bho.
41006031	Bɛyǎ bhó bátwɔ̀ nyaka mándɔk nɔkɔ ɛnyunɛ́ Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌ ɛpok mɛnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́. Ɛ́kʉ arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Sɛ́ndɔ́k ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ achi kpák bɛ mǎnjwémʉɛt mandú.”
41006032	Báfa yɛ báre rɔ́ŋ amɛm áchwí ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yɛ̌ mmu achak apu.
41006033	Bɛyǎ bhó bághɔ́ ndu bɔ́ bárɔ̀ŋ. Bárɨ́ŋɨ bɛ́ chí Yesu nɛ bǒbhi bhɔ, nɛ bárɨŋɨ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bárɔ̀ŋ. Bɛyǎ bho báfú ndǔ bɛtɔk nɛ bɛtɔk, báfa nɛ bɛkak, bárɔk ntiɛ́t ntiɛt, báre noŋ bɔ ambɨ.
41006034	Mpok Yesu áfú amɛm áchwi, aghɔ́ ngɛ́mtay bho. Ntínso nɛ́kɛ́m yi nɛ bhɔ mbɔnyunɛ bachi nyaka ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri, nkwak ti, mbɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mbabhɛri. Abho yɛ bɛ́tɔŋ bhɔ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ.
41006035	Ɛnɛ́ mpok áfʉ̀ɛt běku ɛbhɔ, baghɔkɔ́ bhi bárɔ́k ntá yi barɛm bɛ, “Nywɔp nɛ́naŋ nɛrɔŋ nɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ sɛchi-nɛ arɛ́ chi ɛbhɨ.
41006036	Ghatí bǒbhɛn mándɔ́k ndǔ bakɨ nɛ bɔ̌bɛtɔk abhɛn báchí fá kɛkwɔt manku ɛnyɨŋ mɛnyiɛ.”
41006037	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Bě babhɔŋ, chyɛ̌ ká bhɔ nɛnyíɛ́ mányíɛ́.” Kɛ bábhɛ́p yí bɛ, “Ɔ̌yáŋ sɛ́ndɔ́k sɛ́nku nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ nkáp anɛ nkʉ bɛ́tɨk ányìɛ ndǔ bataŋ ánɛn sɛ́chíɛ bǒbhɛn?”
41006038	Yesu abhɛ́p yɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Bǎbhɔŋ bɛkpkɔkɔ́ brɛt afɔ mɛ́ní? Dɔ́k ká byo.” Bábyó nɔ́kɔ́, bárɛm bɛ, “Bɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt bɛ́tay nɛ nsi ɛ́pay.”
41006039	Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ mámfyɛ́ bho ndǔ bakwɔ́, mánkʉ bɔ manchɔkɔ amɨk ndu tákɔ.
41006040	Báchɔ́kɔ yɛ amɨk ndǔ barɔ́ŋ, ndǔ bakwɔ́ bɛsa bɛ́tay nɛ bɛsa bɛ́pay nsɛm byo.
41006041	Yesu asɔt yɛ bɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt bhɔ bɛtay nɛ nsi ɛpay. Ayoŋ amɨ́k amfay. Achyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm, abho bɛ́bɔ́kɔ́ti brɛt wu anchyɛ nɔkɔ ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ mánkɔ́rɛ́ nɛ nsi ntá bɛyǎ bǒbhɔ.
41006042	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ wap anyíɛ́ kpát ajwi.
41006043	Baghɔk Yesu mányókóti nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́. Nɛ́jwí bɛkay byo nɛ bɛpay.
41006044	Mpǎy babhakanɛm abhɛn manyíɛ́ brɛt wu nɛ nsi ɛyɔ abhak mbɔ nka ɛtay.
41006045	Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, Yesu aghati baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ mándɔ́k mǎnchwe amɛm áchwí, mampe nnyɛ́n manjambɨ Bɛtsáida, ndǔ ɛbhě manyu ɛchak. Yímbɔŋ arɔp ansɛm bɛkʉ bɛyǎ bǒbhɔ mángúrɛ́.
41006046	Ágháti nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ bɛ, “Mǎnkɔ sayri”, arɔ akó amfay njiɛ ndu mɛnɨkmʉɛt.
41006047	Ɛnɛ́ mpok ánáŋ árɔ́ŋɔ́ beku bhɔ, áchwí ábhak nɛntɨ manyu, Yesu abhak ɛbhɨ aywǐnti.
41006048	Yesu aghɔ́ ndu ɛ́bè baghɔkɔ́ bhi mmʉɛt mɛ́nók áchwi ɛ̌ti mbʉ́ɛ́p anɛ áfù bhɔ́ ambɨ. Bɛfʉɛt nkárɛ́nká ɛ́rát bɛghaka nkárɛ́nká ɛtandat betí, abho bɛkɔ amfay manyu ankoŋo nɔkɔ bhɔ. Arɔk kpát ɛrɔp kɛkwɔt bɛfʉɛt bhɔ.
41006049	Bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ yi ákɔ̀ anyɛ́n átwɔ̀, bɛ́cháy bɛ́kɛ́m bɔ́ tontó. Bábho bɛbɨk, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Chí ɛfóŋó-ngú! Chi ɛfóŋó-ngú!”
41006050	Bɔ́ mankɛm bághɔ nyaka yi, bɛcháy bɛ́kɛm bhɔ. Tɛ́mté wu, Yesu afyɛ́ bhɔ ntɨ arɛm bɛ, “Chi mɛ, bǎkɛ́ chay!”
41006051	Áchwé nɔ́kɔ́ amɛm áchwí, mbʉ́ɛ́p wu ákwɛn. Bɛchay bɛ́kɛ́m bɔ́ tontó.
41006052	Yɛ̌ndu Yesu ádɨ́k nyaka nka bho ɛtay nɛ bɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt, bɔ kɛjwimɛm ndǔ ɛnyǔ mmu yi achi. Bɔ́ kɛnɛnɛ batɨ̌ yap amɛm.
41006053	Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi mánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛpe manyu, bákó ɛbhɨ, atú Gɛnɛ́sarɛt. Básɛt áchwí wap.
41006054	Nɛfú báfú amɛm áchwi, bo bárɨ́ŋɨ bɛ́ Yesu achi arɛ.
41006055	Ntiɛt ákwɛ́n atú ɛtɔk ɛyɔ ankɛm ndu bápɔ̀kɔ bǒmame ndǔ bɛ̌sák ɛbhap mándɔk nɔkɔ mbǎŋ ɛnkɛm ɛnɛ bághókó bɛ́ Yesu achí arɛ́.
41006056	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yí áchwɔ́bhɛ́ ndǔ bɔ̌bɛtɔk, nɛ yɛ̌ chi amɛm bɛtɔk bɛgho nɛ amɛm bakɨ, báré pɔkɔ́ bǒmame ndǔ mbaŋ ɛnɛ bo báchɛ̀m mbɔ nɛfísiɛ, mánɨk nɔkɔ mʉɛt bɛ yi andɔ bǒmame mantɔk yɛ̌ chi nkokoŋ ndɛn yi. Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ánú átɔ́kɔ́ nkokoŋ ndɛn Yesu, ataŋ.
41007001	Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi nɛ mbɔk batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm abhɛn báfú Yerúsalɛm, bátwɔ́ nyaka bákáp Yesu.
41007002	Bághɔ bɛ́ mbɔk bakoŋo Yesu mányìɛ̀ nɛnyíɛ́ kɛso amɔ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛpɨŋɨ́ bǒ bhap ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ.
41007003	Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi nɛ bo Israɛl mankɛm bápú nyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ kɛ yambɨ bɛso amɔ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛpɨŋɨ́ bachǐmbɨ bhap ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ.
41007004	Nɛ bápu nyiɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fu ɛsiɛ kpátɛ mánso yɔ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛpɨŋ ɛyap ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ. Bábhɔŋ bɛpɨŋ bɛ́chak tontó ɛbhɛn bábhʉ̀rɛ mbɔ bɛ́so nkɔ́p, bɛkpʉrɛ, nɛ bɛte árɨk.
41007005	Mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm bábhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Ndaká yí baghɔkɔ́ bhɛ bápú koŋo bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛn bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ? Ndaká yí mǎnyìɛ nɛnyíɛ́ kɛso amɔ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́yàŋ?”
41007006	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Aisáya arɛm nyaka ndaká yí tɛtɛp ɛ̌ti yɛka! Bǎchi bǒ bɛtábhá nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu yi ásɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ Mandɛm arɛm bɛ, ‘Bǒbhɛn báchyɛ̀ mɛ kɛnókó chi nɛ bɛyɔŋɔ́nyu bhap, batɨ yap ásap nɛkɔ nɛ mɛ.
41007007	Kɛnókó ɛkɛn bɔ báchyɛ̀ mɛ kɛchi chi ndɛ́ndɛm, mbɔnyunɛ bɛbhé ɛbhɛn bakwǎŋwaŋ báfyɛ́ kɛ̌ bɔ bátɔ̀ŋ bho mbɔ bɛ bɛchi Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.’
41007008	Bǎrɔ̀ bɛbhé Mandɛm bǎkoŋo chi bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǒ mmɨk.”
41007009	Yesu arɔk ambɨ aghati bhɔ́ bɛ, “Bǎbhɔŋ ɛrɨ́tí mbi bɛ́rɔ bɛbhé Mandɛm ndu bɛ́koŋo chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bachǐmbɨ bhɛka bátɔ́ŋɔ́!
41007010	Moses arɛm bɛ, ‘Chiɛ́ ɛ́táyɛ nɛ máyɛ kɛnókó’ nɛ bɛ ‘Yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɛ̀m ɛbɛ́ptí ɛyɔŋ ntá ɛtayi, yɛ̌ máyi, bábhɔŋ bɛway yi.’
41007011	Kɛ bǎghàti bho bɛ mbák mmu ándɛ́m ntá ɛtayi, yɛ̌ máyi bɛ, ‘Nsɔt ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ mbʉ bɛkwak wɔ nɛ yɔ, nchyɛ́ ntá Mandɛm’,
41007012	nɔ, bǎchɛt bho mbi bɛ bákɛ́ kwak bachi nɛ manɔ bhap.
41007013	Ndǔ bǎkʉ nɔ, bǎsɔt bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛn bachǐmbɨ bhɛka bɛbyak Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Nɛ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ bɛ́chí mbɔ ɛbhɔ.”
41007014	Yesu árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, apɛt abhɨŋɨ bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bachi arɛ́ arɛm bɛ, “Bě mankɛm, tá ká batú mǎngok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm, mǎnjwimɛm!
41007015	Yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛpu ɛnɛ mmu ányìɛ ɛ́nkʉ bɛ yi akɛ́ bhak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú mmu anyu kɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ákɛ́ bhák pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm.
41007016	Mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batú bɛghok ángók.”
41007017	Yesu árɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ́, arɔk anywɔ́p. Arɛ́, baghɔkɔ́ bhi bábhɛ́p yi ntí bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɔ.
41007018	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bě nkwɔ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́re jwimɛm-ɛ? Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu ányìɛ ɛnchwe yi mɛniɛ ɛ́pú kway bɛkʉ bɛ yi akɛ bhak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm?
41007019	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu ányíɛ́, ɛ́pú chwe yi antɨ, ɛ́rɔŋ chi mɛniɛ ɛbhi nɛ ǎji yɔ amfɛrɛ.” Yesu arɛm nɔ, ndu áyàŋ bo mándɨŋɨ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ́kway mɛnyiɛ.
41007020	Arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fù mmu antɨ kɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ yi akɛ bhak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm.
41007021	Chí amɛm ntɨ mmu kɛ̌ nkaysi mbʉ́mbʉ áfù, antɛ́n yi ndǔ ɛpúsí, nɛ bɛway mmu, nɛ bɛkwɛn bɛrwɔp, nɛ
41007022	bɛ́fyɛ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bo bachak, nɛ ɛbɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ, nɛ bɛrwɔ bho, nɛ ɛpɔ̌ ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu apu kɛm mmʉɛt, nɛ mpap amɨ́k, nɛ bɛchɔŋti nnyɛ́n mmu, nɛ nɛyoŋómʉɛt nɛ ɛchɨŋti.
41007023	Bɛbɛpti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛ́fù mmu chi antɨ nɛ bɔ́ kɛ bɛ́kʉ̀ mmu akɛ bhak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm.”
41007024	Yesu afa yɛ nɛbhʉɛ́t wu are rɔ́ŋ atú ɛtɔk anɛ achi kɛkwɔt Táya nɛ Sídɔn. Arɔk achwe ɛkɛt ɛ́mɔt abhak arɛ́. Akɛ yáŋ mándɨŋɨ bɛ́ yi achi arɛ́. Yɛ̌ nɔ, akɛ rɔp bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́.
41007025	Ngɔrɛ́ amɔt anɛ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri mɔ́ywi anɛ ngɔsɔ́ŋ aghok ɛ̌ti Yesu. Arɔk ntá yi kɛchɔŋti mpok, akwɛ́n bɛkak ɛbhi.
41007026	Ngɔrɛ́ wu apú nyaka mmu Israɛl. Bábhe yi chi atú Síria ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt agho anɛ́ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Fonísia. Anɨk Yesu mmʉɛt bɛ ambok ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ yɔ ɛ́mfu mɔ́ywi amʉɛt.
41007027	Kɛ Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Dɔ̌ sɛ́nchíɛ kpɨ́k mǎmbɔ nɛnyíɛ́. Ɛ́pú chak bɛsɔt nɛnyíɛ́ mǎmbɔ mánchyɛ́ ntá mmú.”
41007028	Ngɔrɛ́ wu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Acha, ɛ́chí tɛtɛp. Kɛ mmú ɛ́nyiɛ nɔkɔ bɛchɔkɔtí ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù ntá mǎmbɔ amfay ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ nɛnyiɛ mɛ́nkwɛnti amɨk.”
41007029	Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ɛ̌ti bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛ ɛbhɛn, pɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p, ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛyɔ ɛ́naŋ ɛ́rɔ mɔ́ywɛ.”
41007030	Apɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p, aghɔ́ mɔ́ bhʉrɛ ndǔ ndu ɛnɛ́ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ yɔ ɛ́náŋ ɛ́rɔ yi.
41007031	Yesu arɔ atú Táya, afʉɛ́t Sídɔn achwe atú bɛtok byo anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Dikápolis, akɔ achwɔp ndǔ Manyu Gálili.
41007032	Básɔ́t mmǔ amɔt bárɔ́k ntá yi nɛ yi. Mbaŋ yi kɛ ghók, kɛpɨ yi kɛrɛm kɔkɔ kɔkɔ. Mánɨk Yesu mmʉɛt bɛ́ ányáŋá yi amɔ anti.
41007033	Yesu aya yí báfá nɛntɨ bho, bárɔk nɛ́kú. Asoŋ yí kɛnɔŋámɔ batú, apá batiɛ́, atɔk nɛ́rɨ ɛni.
41007034	Yesu ayɨŋɨ mfay asɔ́k nsɔk arɛm bɛ, “Ɛfáta” nɔ chi, “Nɛnɛ́.”
41007035	Tɛ́mté wu, batú yi ánɛ́nɛ, nɛrɨ́ nɛ́káŋári yi anyu abho bɛrɛm kɛpɨ sayri.
41007036	Yesu asɛmti bho bɛ bákɛ́ ghati yɛ̌ mmu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákári. Yɛ̌ nɔ, ásɛ́mtí nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ, mángati nɔkɔ ghati bho.
41007037	Bo bábhák maknkay, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yí ákʉ́ ɛ́rɨ ɛcha. Ǎkʉ yɛ̌ chí bo abhɛn batú áchókó mángók mbaŋ, babhók mándɛm kɛpɨ.”
41008001	Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, ɛnɛ́ bɛyǎ bho bápɛt báchɛ̀m nɛbhʉɛt amɔt, Yesu abhɨŋɨ bakoŋo bhi arɛm bɛ,
41008002	“Ntínso nɛ́kɛ̀m mɛ nɛ bǒbhɛn. Báchí fá nɛ mɛ ndǔ manywɔp arat, nɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ mɛnyiɛ.
41008003	Mbák ntó bhɔ mámpɛtnsɛm kɛnyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́, bákway bɛgu nsay ambi, nɛ bɛyǎ bhap báfú bakɔ asiɛ.”
41008004	Bakoŋo bhi bábhɛp yi bɛ, “Ɛtɔk ɛ́pú fá, chɔŋ mmu ambɔŋ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́kwày bǒbhɛn mankɛm fá?”
41008005	Yesu abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎbhɔŋ bɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt afɔ mɛni?” Bákɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛkpɔk tándrámɔt.”
41008006	Yesu achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ bɔ́ mankɛm mánchɔ́kɔ́ amɨk. Asɔt yɛ bɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt bhɔ tándrámɔt. Áchyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bakak ntá Mandɛm, abho bɛbɔkɔti bhɔ anchyɛ nɔkɔ ntá bakoŋo bhi bɛ mánchyɛ́ ntá bo bhɔ. Báré sɔt mánkɔrɛ nɔkɔ.
41008007	Bábhɔŋ nyaka bǎrú nsi nkwɔ. Yesu áchyɛ́ nɔkɔ bakak ntá Mandɛm, achyɛ yɔ́ ntá bakoŋo bhi bɛ mánkɔ́rɛ yɔ nkwɔ.
41008008	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anyíɛ́ ajwi. Baghɔkɔ́ bhi bábwɔ́pti nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́, nɛ́jwí bɛkay tándrámɔt.
41008009	Mpǎy bho abhak mbɔ nka ɛnwi.
41008010	Yesu aghati bhɔ́ mángúrɛ́. Tɛ́mté wu, Yesu nɛ bakoŋo bhi báchwe amɛm áchwí bárɔ́k atú Dalmanúta.
41008011	Mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bárɔk ntá Yesu bábho bɛkɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ yi. Báré yaŋ mbi mɛmɔ yi. Bábhɛ́p yi ankʉ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛnɛ́ ɛ́bhak mbɔ ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔŋ bɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛ́fú chi ntá Mandɛm.
41008012	Yesu asɔ́k nsɔk arɛm bɛ, “Ndaká yí mkpáká bho anɛ́ ɛchɔŋ áyàŋ ɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay? Tɛtɛp, nchí ghati bhe bɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú tɔŋ bhɔ ɛnyǔ ɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛnɛ́ bɔ báyàŋ.”
41008013	Arɛm nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, arɔ bhɔ́ apɛt achwe amɛm áchwi, are pé bɛ́rɔŋ ɛbhě manyu ɛ́chák.
41008014	Bakoŋo Yesu bághɔ́kɔntɨk bɛ́pɔ́kɔ brɛt. Babhɔ̌ŋ nyaka chí mɔ́kpɔkɔ́ brɛt amɔt amɛm áchwí.
41008015	Yesu are sɛmti bhɔ bɛ, “Sɔt ka mpok nɛ yís bǒnkwɔ Fárisi nɛ anɛ Hɛ́rɔd.”
41008016	Bábhó bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Ǎrɛ̀m nɔ mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ brɛt.”
41008017	Yesu arɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ́ bárɛ̀m abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Ndaká yí bárɛ̀m ɛ̌ti brɛt anɛ bǎhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ? Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́re jwimɛm-ɛ? Batɨ ábhʉɛ́t be amɛm chóchókó?
41008018	Bǎbhɔŋ chí amɨ́k ntíako? Bábhɔŋ chí batú nɛmak-a?
41008019	Bǎghɔ́kɔ́ntɨk ndu ndɨ́kɨ́ nka bho ɛtay nɛ bɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt bɛtay? Anɛ árɔ́bhɛ́ abhak bɛkay mɛ́ni?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Bió nɛ bɛpay.”
41008020	Yesu apɛt abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Nɛ mpok nkɔ́rɛ́ anɛ bɛkpɔk tándrámɔt nká bho ɛnwi ɛ́nyiɛ́, anɛ árɔ́bhɛ́ mǎnyokoti, abhak bɛkay mɛ́ni?” Bákɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Tándrámɔt.”
41008021	Abhɛ́p bɔ́ bɛ, “Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́re jwimɛm?”
41008022	Ɛnɛ́ Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bágháká Bɛtsáida, bǒfú básɔ́t nnɛ́mámɨ́k bárɔ́k ntá yi, mánɨkmʉɛt bɛ ántɔk yi.
41008023	Yesu akɛ́m yi ndu awɔ, aya bárɔk antí ɛtɔk. Apá yi batíɛ́ amɨ́k, anyaŋa amɔ́ anti ywi abhɛp yi bɛ, “Ɔ̌ghɔ̀ nɔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ?”
41008024	Mmu wu ayɨŋɨ mfay arɛm bɛ, “Nchí ghɔ́ bo kɛ bachi chi mbɔ bɛ mɛnɔk kɛ bɛ́kɔ̀.”
41008025	Apɛt atɔk amɨ́k yi. Ndɔŋ yɔ, mmǔ wu ayɨŋɨ dǐǐ, apɛt abho bɛghɔ mbaŋ, nɛ are ghɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ sayri.
41008026	Yesu aghati yi bɛ ándɔk ɛkɛt ɛyi, nɛ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ, “Kɛ́pɛtnsɛm ɛtɔk.”
41008027	Yesu nɛ bakoŋo bhi báfʉɛ́t báré rɔŋ ndǔ bɔ̌bɛtɔk abhɛn bachi kɛkwɔt Seséria Fílipi. Ambi, Yesu abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Bo bárɛ̀m bɛ mɛ nchí agha?”
41008028	Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Mbɔk bárɛ̀m bɛ ɔchí Jɔ̌n Njwiti. Bachak bɛ Ɛláija, nɛ abhɛnɛfu bɛ ɔchí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ amɔt.”
41008029	“Kɛ bě babhɔŋ bǎrɛ̀m bɛ mɛ nchí agha?” Símun Píta akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎto.”
41008030	Yesu asɛmti bhɔ bɛ bákɛ́ ghati yɛ̌ mmu.
41008031	Yesu abho bɛghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm mbɔ̌ŋ bɛghɔ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri. Bǒbati ɛtɔk, nɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm, nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm bábyak chɔŋ mɛ nɛ mángwáy mɛ, kɛ ɛ́gháká nɔkɔ manywɔp arat, mpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
41008032	Yesu aghati bhɔ nɔ kpoŋoroŋ. Píta asɔt yi nɛpak arɛm bɛ, “Ɛta kɛrɛm awǔ ndak.”
41008033	Kɛ ndu Yesu áyíbhírí mmʉɛt aghɔ baghɔkɔ́ bhi, aji Píta bɛ, “Satan, fá mɛ́ bɛsí! Nkaysi yɛ chi anɛ nkwǎŋwaŋ, abhɨ́kɨ́ fu ntá Mandɛm!”
41008034	Yesu abhɨŋɨ ngɛ́mtáy bho nɛ bakoŋo bhi arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Mbák mmu ǎyaŋ bɛ́bhak nkoŋo wa, abhɔŋ bɛ́ghɔ́kɔntɨk mmʉɛt yi, ampɔkɔ ɛkotákátí yi, ankoŋo mɛ.
41008035	Yɛ̌ agha anɛ áyàŋ bɛpɛmɛ mmʉɛt yi ǎnɛm nɛpɛ́m ɛni. Kɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ áká mɛnɛm nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛ̌ti ya nɛ ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, ǎbhɔŋ chɔŋ nɔ.
41008036	Ntɨkɨ nsáy mmu ábhɔ̀ŋ mbák abhɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ fá amɨk, kɛ anɛ́m nɛpɛ́m ɛni?
41008037	Nɛ mbák mmu ánɛ́m nɛpɛ́m ɛni, ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ yí ákwày bɛsɔt anchyɛ bɛ yi ampɛt ambɔŋ nɔ́?
41008038	Mbák mmu abhɔ̌ŋ ntíánwɔ́p ɛ̌ti ya nɛ ɛ̌ti Ɛyɔŋ ɛya ndǔ mkpáká bho anɛ́ ápú kʉ mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm áyàŋ, mkpáká bho bɛbʉ́, chɔŋ Mmɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm mbɔ̌ŋ ntíánwɔ́p ɛ̌ti yi mpok nchí twɔ nɛ kɛnɛ́m Ɛtaya nɛ bɔángɛl bhi.”
41009001	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛghati ngɛ́mtáy bǒbhɔ bɛ, “Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mbɔk bho báchi fá abhɛn bápú gu kpátɛ mángɔ ndǔ Kɛfɔ Mandɛm kɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ bɛtaŋ.”
41009002	Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp atandat, Yesu asɔt Píta, nɛ Jems nɛ Jɔ̌n, akó amfay njiɛ ngo nɛ bhɔ. Bábhák arɛ́ bɔ́bhɔ́. Bápɛ́rɛ yɨŋɨ, bɛsí Yesu bɛ́yíbhiri.
41009003	Ndɛn ɛyi nkwɔ ɛ́ré diɛrɛ pɛ́pɛ̌pɛ́p ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ mmu ápú kwáy bɛso ndɛn yɛ̌ chí nɛ babhé ɛ́ndiɛrɛ ɛnyu yɔ.
41009004	Tɛ́mchok, Moses nɛ Ɛláija, barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm abhɛn tɛsáy, bábhési mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ kɛpɨ nɛ Yesu.
41009005	Píta abho bɛrɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ɛ́rɨ tontó bɛ sɛchi fá. Dɔ̌ sɛ́nté bɛ́tɛ́m barat. Ɛ́mɔt ntá yɛ, ɛ́chák ntá Moses, nɛ ɛnɛ́fú ntá Ɛláija.”
41009006	Píta arɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛchák ɛnɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm ndǔ bɛcháy bɛkɛmɛ bhɔ tontó.
41009007	Nɛrɛm anɛ Píta árɛ́mɛ́ ɛnyu yɔ, nɛbháŋ nɛ́sɛp tɛ́mté, nɛbho bɛ́kúti bhɔ. Ɛyɔŋ ɛ́fú amɛm nɛbháŋ ɛ́ndɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Nɛ́ chí Mɔ́wa. Nkɔŋ yí tontó. Ghók ká yi!”
41009008	Tɛ́mté wu, bɔPíta báyɨ́ŋɨ, kɛ bákɛpɛrɛ ghɔ́ yɛ̌ mmu, ɛbhiki fʉɛt chi Yesu aywǐnti.
41009009	Nɛ ndǔ Yesu nɛ bɔPíta básɛ̀p njiɛ, Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ ghati yɛ̌ mmu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎghɔ́ fá, kpátɛ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
41009010	Bábhʉ́rɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu aghati bhɔ antɨ, bɔ́kɛ ghati yɛ̌ mmu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bághɔ. Mámbɛbhɛ nɔkɔ chi batɨ bɛ, “Nɛpɛrɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m chi yi?”
41009011	Bɔ́ bati arat bábhɛp Yesu bɛ, “Ndaká yí batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses bárɛ̀m bɛ Ɛláija abhɔŋ bɛpɛtnsɛm fá amɨk kɛ Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛ ǎtó antwɔ́?”
41009012	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛ́chí tɛtɛp bɛ Ɛláija abhɔŋ bɛyambɨ antwɔ́, anyurɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ambʉrɛ, kɛ ná básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ́ Mmǔ anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛ́ghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ bɛ́ bábyak chɔŋ yi?
41009013	Kɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ Ɛláija anáŋ átwɔ nɛ bo bákʉ́ yi bɛbʉ́ mbɔ ɛnyu bákɔ́ŋɔ́ mbɔ ɛnyu básɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yi.”
41009014	Ɛnɛ́ Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bati arat bápɛ̀tnsɛm, bátɛ́mɛ́ri bakoŋo bhi báchák. Bághɔ́ bɛyǎ bho nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses ndu bákɛ̀m ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ bhɔ.
41009015	Tɛ́mté wu, bɛyǎ bo bho mankɛm bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Yesu, bábhák maknkay tontó. Báre rɔŋ ntiɛ́t ntiɛt bɛkaka yi.
41009016	Abhɛ́p bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ɛpʉ́ítí nɔ bǎkɛ̀m nɛ bhɔ?”
41009017	Kɛ mmu amɔt amɛm nkwɔ bǒbhɔ akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, ntwɔ̌ nɛ mɔ́wa ntá yɛ. Ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛpú ka yi andɛm kɛpɨ,
41009018	nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ ɛfóŋó yɔ ɛ́kɛ́m yi, ɛ́gʉɛp yi amɨk, bɛfɛn mɛ́mfu nɔkɔ yi anyu. Mpok yɔ, ande nyiɛ amɛn nɛ anɔkɔ. Nnɨk baghɔkɔ́ bhɛ mmʉɛt bɛ́ mámbók yɔ ɛ́ndɔ́ yi, kɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ kway bɛkʉ nɔ.”
41009019	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bě mkpaká bho anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nɛka nɛ mɛ, bě bho bǎyìbhiri tɛtɛp ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak, chɔŋ mpɛt ntat nɛ bhe ná? Chɔŋ nkɛ́pntɨ nɛ bhe ngaka fá?” Kɛ ǎrɛm bɛ, “Twɔ́ ká nɛ mɔ́wu fá ntá ya.”
41009020	Básɔt mɔ̌rɛ bárɔ́k ntá Yesu nɛ yi. Ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ yɔ ɛghɔ nɔkɔ Yesu, tɛ́mté wu, ɛ́nyɨ́kɨ́si mɔ́wu gbogbǒgbok, akwɛ́n amɨk are bɨŋɨri, ɛfɛn ɛ́mfu nɔkɔ yi anyu.
41009021	Yesu abhɛ́p chimɔ bɛ, “Ɛfóŋó ɛnɛ ɛ́naŋ ɛtat yi amʉɛt ná?” Chi mɔ́wu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Tɛ kɛmbɔ́ ɛki.
41009022	Bɛyǎ ndɔŋ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ yɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ yi ankwɛ́n ango. Mpokófu ɛ́kʉ yi ankwɛn anyɛ́n ndu bɛway yi. Mbák ɔ̌kway bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ, ghɔ bhɛsɛ́ ntínso kwak bhɛsɛ́.”
41009023	Yesu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Wɔ bɛ́ mbák mɛ̌kwáy bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋɨ́! Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́kway bɛkɔ ntá mmu anɛ ánókó Mandɛm.”
41009024	Tɛ́mté wu, chimɔ arɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay bɛ, “Nnókó kɛ nɛka ɛná nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ taŋ. Kwak mɛ nnókó sayri.”
41009025	Yesu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ bo bátwɔ̀ chi tontó tontó, ásáy ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ yɔ bɛ, “Wɔ ɛfóŋó ɛnɛ́, ɛfóŋó kɛbhók nɛ batú chóchók, ghók. Fú yi amʉɛt, nɛ yɛ̌ ɛwak, ɔ́kɛ́ pɛrɛ twɔ́ yi amʉɛt!”
41009026	Yesu árɛm nɔkɔ nɔ, ɛfóŋó yɔ ɛ́bɨk, ɛ́nyɨkɨsi mɔ́wu gbogbǒgbok, ɛ́fú yi amʉɛt. Arɔp mbɔ ngú. Bo abhɛn báchi arɛ barɛm bɛ, “Ágú.”
41009027	Kɛ Yesu akɛ́m yi ndu awɔ, akwak yi afate.
41009028	Yesu ákʉ́ nɔkɔ nɔ, achwe anywɔ́p. Bakoŋo bhi bábhɛ́p yi ansɛm ansɛm bɛ, “Ndaká yí sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kway bɛbok ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ yɔ?”
41009029	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ndiɛrɛ nɛ nɛnɨkímʉɛt nɛ nɛtarɛ́nsay kɛ bákway bɛkʉ ɛnyǔ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛnɛ ɛ́mfu mmu amʉɛt.”
41009030	Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bárɔ báre fʉɛt atú Gálili mándɔk nɔkɔ. Akɛyáŋ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛbhak ɛnɛ yi achi,
41009031	mbɔnyunɛ, ǎtɔŋ nyaka bakoŋo bhi angati nɔkɔ bhɔ bɛ, “Bákɛ̀m chɔŋ Mmǔ anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm mámfyɛ yi amɔ́ bǒ mmɨk mángwáy yi, nɛ ɛ́ghaka nɔkɔ manywɔp arat ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
41009032	Kɛ bɔ́ kɛjwimɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛmɛ nɛ báre chay bɛbhɛp yi.
41009033	Bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ Kapɛ̌naum, báchwe anywɔ́p. Ɛnɛ́ bachi arɛ́, Yesu abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ̀m mbʉ ɛpʉ́ítí ambi ɛ̌ti yi?”
41009034	Báchɔ́kɔ kpák, mbɔnyunɛ bákɛ̀m nyaka ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ batɨ ankɔŋɔmbi ndu bɛrɨŋɨ mmǔ wap anɛ áchá báchák.
41009035	Yesu achɔkɔ amɨk, abhɨŋɨ bhɔ bati byo nɛ apay, abho bɛghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mmǔ ywɛka anɛ áyàŋ bɛbhak mǔngo, abhɔŋ bɛsɔt mmʉɛt yi mbɔ bɛ apu yɛ̌nyɨŋ nɛ ambak mǔbɛtok ntá bo bachak mankɛm.”
41009036	Asɔt mandú mmɔ́ ate nɛ́ntɨ́ nap, apɔkɔ yɛ yí amʉɛt, arɛm ntá yap bɛ,
41009037	“Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ásɔ́t mmɔ́ mbɔ anɛ sayri ɛ̌ti ya, ǎsɔt chi mɛ, nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ásɔ̀t mɛ sayri, ǎsɔt chi mmu anɛ átó mɛ.”
41009038	Jɔ̌n árɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, sɛ́ghɔ mmu anɛ apu ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛsɛ ndu ábòk bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna. Sɛ́gháti yi bɛ, ákɛ́pɛrɛ kʉ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ apú ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛsɛ.”
41009039	Yesu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ kaŋ mmu mbɔ awu mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú anɛ ákʉ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna antɨŋ anjibhiri mmʉɛt andɛm bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti ya.
41009040	Mmu anɛ apu nu nɛ bhɛsɛ, achí nɛ bhɛsɛ.
41009041	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ áchyɛ́ be nkɔ́p manyiɛp mǎnyú mbɔnyunɛ bǎchí bakoŋo abhɛn Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, apu nɔ́k bɛbhɔŋ akap.”
41009042	Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛp ɛncha ntá mmu anɛ ákʉ́ mɔ́wa amɔt anɛ abhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ mɛ ánkwɛ́n ndǔ bɛbʉ́. Ɛchi sayri ntá mmu wu, bɛ mánsɔt ntǎy nɛgho mánsɛt ɛmɨ yi, mamɛsɛ amɛm manyu.
41009043	Mbák awɔ ywɛ ákʉ̀ ɔnkwɛn ndǔ bɛbʉ́, kpɔ́t wu fɛrɛ! Ɛ́chí sayri bɛ ɔnchwe ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti nɛ awɔ amɔt ɛcha mɛmɛsɛ wɔ amɛm nɛpǐngo anɛ apu nɛmɛ nɛ amɔ apay!
41009045	Mbák ɛkak ɛyɛ ɛ́tò wɔ ndǔ bɛbʉ́, kpɔ́t yɔ fɛrɛ́. Ɛ́chí sayri bɛ ɔ́nchwe ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti nɛ ɛkak ɛ́mɔt ɛcha bɛ́ mámɛ́sɛ wɔ amɛm nɛpǐngo nɛ bɛkak bɛpay.
41009047	Nɛ mbák nyɛ́sɛ́ ɛnɛ nɛ́kʉ̀ ɔ́nkwɛ́n ndǔ bɛbʉ́, poŋórí nɔ́ gʉɛ́p. Ɛ́chí sayri bɛ́ ɔ́nchwe ndǔ Kɛfɔ Mandɛm nɛ nyɛ́sɛ́ nɛmɔt ɛcha bɛ mámɛ́sɛ wɔ amɛm nɛpǐngo nɛ amɨ́k apay.
41009048	Amɛm nɛpǐngo ɛnɔ, kɛ́nyɔrɛ ɛkɛn kɛ́nyiɛ bho kɛ́pú gú, nɛ ngó apu nɛmɛ.
41009049	Chɔŋ mángoko yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu nɛ ngó nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu báfyɛ̀ ngáŋ ndǔ nɛnyíɛ́ bɛ nɛ́ndɨ́ anyu.
41009050	Ngáŋ áchí ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ. Kɛ mbák ngáŋ ábhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ manyɨŋti mi, ná bákway bɛkʉ wu ampɛt ambak ɛrɨ́tɨ́ ngáŋ? Bɔ́ŋ ká ngáŋ amʉɛt, mǎnchɔkɔ ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt nɛ batɨ.”
41010001	Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bárɔ yɛ Kapɛ̌naum bárɔ́k atú Judɛ́ya. Bákɨ́ŋɨ Manyu Jɔ́dan. Ngɛ́mtay bho, bápɛt báre rɔŋ ntá yi. Are tɔ́ŋ bɔ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ákʉ nyaka mpoknkɛm.
41010002	Mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bátwɔ́ mɛmɔ yi. Bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɛbhé yɛsɛ ɛ́ká bɛ mmu ándɔ́ ngɔrɛ́ ywi ndǔ nɛbhay?”
41010003	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Moses aghati nyaka bhe bɛ yi ɛ̌ti awáy nɛbhay?”
41010004	Bákɛ́mɛ bɛ, “Moses arɛm bɛ mmu ǎkwáy bɛrɔ ngɔrɛ́ ywi mbák achyɛ́ yi ɛkáti ɛnɛ́ awáy nɛbhay?”
41010005	Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Chí ɛ̌ti nɛtaŋántɨ ɛnɛka kɛ Moses áchyɛ́ nyaka bhe ɛbhé ɛnɛ.
41010006	Sayri sayri, tɛ nɛbhǒmɨk, ‘Mandɛm ághókó nyaka bo, ngɔrɛ́ nɛ mbakanɛm.’
41010007	Ɛ̌ti yɔ, ‘Mbakanɛm abhɔŋ bɛ́rɔ́ ɛtayi nɛ máyi, ambat mmʉɛt nɛ ngɔrɛ́ ywi,
41010008	bɔ́ batí apay mándɔp mbɔ mmǔ amɔt. Bɔ́ kɛpɛrɛ bhak yɛ bati apay, kɛ mmǔ amɔt.’
41010009	Mmu ákɛ́ fyɛ yɛ ákɔ́rɛ́ nɛntɨ bo abhɛn Mandɛm áchɛ́mtí.”
41010010	Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bápɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nsɛm anywɔ́p, baghɔkɔ́ bhi bápɛt babhɛp yi mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti nkúbhɛ́ ndaka wu.
41010011	Arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɔ́ ngɔrɛ́ ywi ndǔ nɛbhay, abháy achak, akwɛ̌n bɛrwɔp,
41010012	nɛ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ árɔ́ nnɛ́m abháy achak, akwɛ̌n bɛrwɔp.”
41010013	Bofú básɔ́t bɔ̌bhap bárɔ́k ntá Yesu nɛ bhɔ bɛ yi anyaŋa bhɔ amɔ anti anjɛt bhɔ. Baghɔkɔ́ bhi bábho bɛsáyti bhɔ.
41010014	Kɛ Yesu aghɔ nɔkɔ nɔ, ntɨ nɛ́bé yi amɛm, arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ká mǎmbɔ mántwɔ ntá ya, bǎkɛ́ chyɛt bhɔ mbi mbɔnyunɛ bo abhɛn bachi mbɔ bhɔ kɛ̌ Mandɛm abhak Mfɔ wap.”
41010015	“Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mbák mmu apú nɛ Mandɛm mbɔ ɛnyǔ mmɔ́ ábhàk nɛ ɛtayi, apú kway bɛbhak ndǔ mpǎy bho abhɛn Mandɛm achi Mfɔ wap wáwák.”
41010016	Yesu asɔt yɛ bhɔ́ amɔt amɔt, nɛ yɛntɨkɨ anɛ yi ásɔ́rɛ́ ambat amʉɛt, anyaŋa yi awɔ anti, anjɛt yi.
41010017	Ɛnɛ́ Yesu árɔ̀ŋ nɛkɔ, mmǔfú ajiɛt, arɔk, atɛp mánɛ́n bɛsí bhi, abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, wɔ mmǔ ndɨ́ndɨ́, chɔŋ nkʉ yi kɛ mbɔ̌ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ́n nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti?”
41010018	Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ “Ndaká yí ɔ́bhɨŋɨ mɛ bɛ mmǔ ndɨ́ndɨ́? Yɛ̌ mmǔ ndɨ́ndɨ́ apú. Mandɛm aywǐnti kɛ achi Ndɨ́ndɨ́.
41010019	Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛbhé Mandɛm. Bɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Kɛ́wáy mmu, Kɛ́kwɛn bɛrwɔp, Kɛ́ghɛ́p aghɛ́p, Kɛ́te ntísiɛ ákwárɛ́, Kɛ́nyiɛ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmu ndǔ bapu, Chiɛ̌ máyɛ nɛ ɛtayɛ kɛnókó.’”
41010020	Mmu wu arɛm bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, nnáŋ nchí bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm tɛ kɛmbɔ́ ɛka.”
41010021	Yesu ayɨŋɨ yi nɛ bɛyǎ ɛkɔŋ arɛm bɛ, “Ɛ́rɔp chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ɛnɛ́ ɔbhɔŋɔ bɛkʉ. Dɔ́k tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ mɛnkɛm chyɛ̌ nkáp ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho. Mbák ɔ́nkʉ́ nɔ, chɔŋ ɔ́mbɔŋ kɛfɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ amfay. Ɔ́ntwɔ́ yɛ ɔnkoŋo mɛ.”
41010022	Ághoko nɔkɔ nɔ, apɔp, arɔbhɛ rɔ́ŋɔ́rɔŋ nɛ basɛ́mɛ́ antɨ mbɔnyunɛ abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ
41010023	Yesu ayibhiri mmʉɛt arɛm ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Ɛ́be mmʉɛt tontó bɛ mǔnkáp anka Mandɛm ambak Mfɔ ywi!”
41010024	Baghɔkɔ́ bhi bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, mmʉɛt agú bhɔ. Kɛ Yesu apɛt arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bɔ̌bha, ɛ́be mmʉɛt tontó bɛ mmu anka Mandɛm ambak Mfɔ ywi!
41010025	Ɛ́chí wɨkɨrɨk bɛ mpɔŋɔ baso ámfʉɛ́t ndǔ mbok mbíábhan ɛ́cha mǔnkáp bɛka Mandɛm ambak Mfɔ ywi.”
41010026	Bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, mmʉɛt agú bhɔ́ tontó, bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Agha ákwày yɛ bɛbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ́n nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛ́nti?”
41010027	Yesu ayɨŋɨ bhɔ dǐǐ arɛm bɛ, “Ntá nkwǎŋwaŋ, mbi ápú, kɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́pú cha Mandɛm.”
41010028	Píta asá ɛyɔŋ arɛm bɛ, “Ná nɛ bhɛsɛ́? Sɛ́rɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ sɛ́kòŋo wɔ!”
41010029	Yesu aghati bhɔ́ bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mmǔ anɛ árɔ́ yɛ̌ chí ɛkɛt ɛyi, yɛ̌ chí bɔ̌mayi abhɛn babhakanɛm yɛ̌ chí abhɛn baghɔrɛ́, yɛ̌ chí máyi nɛ ɛtayi, yɛ̌ chí bɔ̌bhi, nɛ yɛ̌ chí bakɨ̌ yi ɛ̌ti ya nɛ ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́,
41010030	chɔŋ Mandɛm anchyɛ yi bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ fá amɨk, nɛ chɔŋ ampɛt ambɔ́ŋ bɛkɛt, bɔ̌nnɔ abhɛn babhakanɛm nɛ abhɛn baghɔrɛ́, nɛ mánɔ́, nɛ bɔ, nɛ bakɨ, ndɔŋ bɛsa bɛtay. Chɔŋ bo mánchyɛ yi bɛyǎ nɛnyok, kɛ ndǔ mmɨk nkɔ Mandɛm anchyɛ yi nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ́n nɛbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛ́nti.
41010031	Kɛ chɔŋ bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bachi ambɨ nɛ́nɛ, mándɔp ansɛm, nɛ abhɛn bachi ansɛm, mandɔp ambɨ.”
41010032	Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi báfa báre ko bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm, yi ambɨ, bɔ́ ansɛm. Mmʉɛt agú baghɔkɔ́ bhi nɛ bɛcháy bɛ́kɛm bo abhɛn bákòŋo bhɔ. Apɛt asɔt baghɔkɔ́ bhi bati byo nɛ apay nɛpak abho bɛghati bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛfakari ntá yi bɛ,
41010033	“Ghók ká, sɛ́rɔ̀ŋ nɔ chi Yerúsalɛm, nɛ mpok sɛ́gháká arɛ́, chɔŋ mánti Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm, mánsɔt yi mamfyɛ amɔ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ ntá batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses, mándɛm bɛ mangway yi, mámfyɛ yi amɔ́ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl.
41010034	Chɔŋ mánjɔkɔ yi, mámpati batíɛ́ yi amʉɛt, mándɛn yi nɛ ɛ́kpá nɛ mángwáy yi. Kɛ ɛ́ghaka nɔkɔ manywɔp arat, ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
41010035	Jems nɛ Jɔ̌n, bɔ̌ Sɛbɛdi bárɔ́k ntá Yesu bárɛm bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, sɛ́yàŋ bɛ ɔ́nkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́nɨkmʉɛt bɛ ɔ́nkʉ ntá yɛsɛ.”
41010036	Yesu abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎyaŋ nkʉ be yi?”
41010037	Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Kʉ ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bɛsɛ sɛ́chɔkɔ nɛ wɔ, amɔt ɛbhé awɔ́nɛm, achák ɛbhé awɔ́ghɔ mpok ɔ́bhak ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛyɛ nɛ kɛnókó.”
41010038	Kɛ Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎyàŋ nkʉ ntá yɛka. Bǎkwáy bɛka mɛnyu nkɔ́p ɛsɔŋɔri anɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́nyú? Chɔŋ mǎnkwáy bɛká bɛ́gu ɛnyu nɛwú ɛnɛn mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛgu?”
41010039	Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Sɛ́kwày bɛkʉ nɔ.” Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Tɛtɛp chɔŋ mǎnka ɛnyǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ mɛ̌ghɔ nɛ mǎngu ɛnyǔ nɛwú ɛnɛn mɛ̌gù,
41010040	kɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛyap bo abhɛn bábhɔŋɔ bɛchɔkɔ ɛbhé awɔ́nɛm ɛya nɛ abhɛn bábhɔŋɔ bɛchɔkɔ ɛbhé awɔghɔ. Mandɛm kɛ áchyɛ bɛbhak ɛbhɔ ntá bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhak arɛ.”
41010041	Baghɔk Yesu báchák bati byo bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Jems nɛ Jɔ̌n bárɛ́mɛ́, bábhó bɛběntɨ nɛ bhɔ.
41010042	Yesu abhɨŋɨ bɔ́ mankɛm arɛm bɛ, “Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ, ntá bǒ mmɨk, bo abhɛn básɔt bɛ báchí bafɔ, bábhɔŋ bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ amfay bǒbhap, nɛ bǒbati básɔ̀t bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ bǒbhap mangok bhɔ.
41010043	Kɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛnyu yɔ ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka. Mmu anɛ áyàŋ bɛbhak mǔngo ywɛka, abhɔŋ bɛbhak mǔbɛtok ywɛka,
41010044	nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka anɛ áyàŋ bɛbhak mmǔ mbɨ abhɔŋ bɛbhak nsɛm ywɛka, abhɔŋ bɛbhak nsɛm ntá abhɛnɛfu mankɛm.
41010045	Yɛ̌ chi Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm, mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ bɛ bo mántók mɛ. Ntwɔ chi bɛbhak mǔbɛtok nɛ bɛchyɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ ndu bɛku bɛyǎ bhó mfɛ́rɛ́ bhɔ ndǔ kɛsɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́.”
41010046	Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi báchwɔp Jɛríko. Ɛnɛ́ bɔ́ bárɔ́ Jɛríko bɛ́rɔŋ, ngɛ́mtay bho bare koŋo bhɔ́ ansɛm. Nnɛ́mámɨk amɔt anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Batímaɔs, mmɔ́ Timáyɔs, abhak nɛpaká mbi chɔ́kɔ́.
41010047	Ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Yesu anɛ Násárɛt kɛ áfʉɛ̀t, abho bɛbɨk bɛ, “Yesu! Mmɔ̌ Mfɔ Debhít! Ghɔ́ mɛ ntínso!”
41010048	Bɛyǎ bo báre sayti yi bɛ ánchɔ́kɔ́ kpák. Kɛ akpɨk are bɨk nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay bɛ, “Mmɔ̌ Mfɔ Debhít, ghɔ́ mɛ ntínso!”
41010049	Yesu ághókó nɔkɔ nɔ, ate arɛm bɛ, “Bɨŋɨ́ ká yi antwɔ́.” Bárɔk babhɨŋɨ yi bárɛm bɛ, “Faté twɔ́, ɔ́kɛ́ chay, ǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ wɔ.”
41010050	Nnɛ́mámɨk wu ayók ndɛ yi amɛsɛ awu, afate, báyá yi arɔk ntá Yesu.
41010051	Yesu abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɔ̌yáŋ mɛ nkʉ́ wɔ yi?” Nnɛ́mámɨk wu akɛmɛ Yesu bɛ, “Acha, nchí yaŋ bɛ mpɛt ngɔ́ mbaŋ.”
41010052	Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá yi bɛ, “Gurɛ́, nɛka ɛnɛ nɛ́kʉ ɔtaŋ.” Tɛ́mté wu, abho bɛghɔ mbaŋ, nɛ abho bɛ́kóŋo Yesu.
41011001	Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bákɔ́ baghaka ndǔ bɔ̌bɛtɔk Bɛtfágɛ nɛ Bɛ́tani ndǔ Njiɛ Mɛnok Ólif, kɛkwɔt Yerúsalɛm. Ató baghɔkɔ́ bhi bati apay ambɨ.
41011002	Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká ndǔ mɔ́tɔk anɛ achi afɔ ambɨ. Nɛchwe anɛ bǎchwe arɛ́, chɔŋ mǎngɔ mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu sɛsɛ́t, anɛ yɛ̌ mmu abhɨkɨre kɔ nɛ yɔ́. Kaŋarí ká, twɔ́ nɛ yɔ́.
41011003	Mbák mmú ámbɛ́p bhe ntí anɛ bǎkàŋari yɔ́, ghatí ká yí bɛ, ‘Acha kɛ áyàŋ yɔ, nɛ chɔŋ antó mántwɔ mánkɛmɛ yɔ́ tɛ́mté.’”
41011004	Báfa bárɔk, bághɔ mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu wu sɛsɛ́t nɛfí ɛkɛt, nɛ́kú mbi. Bábho bɛ́kaŋarí yɔ.
41011005	Ɛ́nɛ́ bákàŋari mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu wu, bo abhɛn báchí arɛ téé bábhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Ndaká yí bǎkàŋari mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu wu?”
41011006	Baghɔk Yesu bágháti bhɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ mpok yi átó bhɔ. Bárɔ́ yɛ bɔ mándɔk nɛ mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu.
41011007	Básɔt yɔ bárɔ́k ntá Yesu. Básɔ́t ndɛn mfǎmʉɛt yap básɔbhɛri mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu wu, Yesu achɔkɔ amfay.
41011008	Bo abhɛn bachi arɛ́, báfɛ́rɛ ndɛn mfǎmʉɛt ɛyap baghay ambi. Báchák báré kpɔt bɛ́wuɔ́kɛ́ndé mángay nɔkɔ ndǔ mbi anɛ yí áfʉɛ̀t arɛ. Báchák báré kpɔti kɛfɛ́bhɛ́ ɛkɛn kɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛyé mángay nɔkɔ ambi.
41011009	Ndu bárɔ̀ŋ, bo abhɛn báchi ambɨ nɛ abhɛn báchi ansɛm báre bɨk mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Sɛ́mbɨ́tí Mandɛm mfay! Mandɛm ánjɛ́t mmu anɛ átwɔ̀ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Acha!
41011010	Mandɛm ánjɛ́t kɛfɔ ɛtayɛsɛ Debhít ɛkɛn kɛ́twɔ̀! Sɛ́mbɨ́tí Mandɛm mfay!”
41011011	Nɛchwe yí áchwé Yerúsalɛm, arɔk amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, abyo yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ mpok ǎfʉɛt, asɔt baghɔkɔ́ bhi bati byo nɛ ápay bárɔk ndu mɔ́tɔk Bɛ́tani.
41011012	Nɛ́yi nɔkɔ, ɛnɛ́ Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bárɔ Bɛ́tani bápɛtnsɛm, nsay akɛ́m Yesu.
41011013	Aghɔ́ ɛnɔk fig nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ nɛ bɛyé arɛ́ gɛbhɛɛɛ, arɔk bɛyɨŋɨ mbák ǎkway bɛ́ghɔ yɛ̌ sɛpɛmɛ́nɔk arɛ. Aghaka nɔkɔ arɛ́, akɛ ghɔ́ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛbhɨkɨ fʉɛt chi bɛyé, mbɔnyunɛ mpok mɛnɔk fig mɛ́nyù kɛpɛm abhɨkɨ re ghaka nyaka.
41011014	Yesu arɛm ntá ɛnɔk ɛyɔ bɛ, “Bɛbho ɛchɔŋ, ɔpú pɛrɛ nyu kɛpɛm.” Baghɔk abhi bághok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́.
41011015	Baghaka nɔkɔ Yerúsalɛm, Yesu arɔk achwe amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Abók bakɔ̌siɛ nɛ bo abhɛn bákù mɛnyɨŋ. Atakati bɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ ɛsiɛ bakáp bɛwupsi. Atakati nkwɔ́ mɛnɔk bo abhɛn bátì bɛbhóŋó,
41011016	nɛ akɛka bɛ́ yɛ̌ mmu ámpɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ámfʉɛt amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ndu áyàŋ mbǐ mbɨŋ.
41011017	Are tɔ́ŋ yɛ bho andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Pú basɨ́ŋ Mandɛm arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛkɛt ɛya ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛbhak chi ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ntá bo bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk mɛnkɛm’, kɛ bǎyíbhírí yɔ́ ɛ́rɔp chi ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ baghɛ́p bábhɛ̀sɛ arɛ!”
41011018	Bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm, nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses bághok nɔkɔ nɔ, báre yáŋ mbi bɛway yi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ báchày nyaka ngɛ́mtay bo abhɛn báchi arɛ, nɛ ntí bɛ́ bǒbhɔ bachi nyaka maknkay tontó ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu átɔ̀ŋ.
41011019	Ɛ́gháka nɔkɔ beku, Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bárɔ́ ɛtɔk ɛgho báfú.
41011020	Běti, ɛnɛ Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi báfʉɛ̀t bɛpɛtnsɛm, bághɔ ɛnɔk fig ɛnɛ́ Yesu arɛmɛ bɛ́ ɛpu pɛrɛ kwáy mɛ́nyu kɛpɛm, ndu ɛ́náŋ ɛ́gú tɛ nɛ bakaŋ.
41011021	Píta atɨ́k nɔkɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ ntá ɛnɔk fig ɛyɔ, arɛm bɛ, “Acha, yɨŋɨ́! Ɛnɔk ɛnɛ́ ɔ́rɛ́mɛ́ bɛ ɛpu kwáy mɛnyu kɛpɛm ɛ́gu.”
41011022	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Bɔ́ŋ ká nɛka nɛ Mandɛm.
41011023	Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, yɛ̌ agha anɛ ághàti njiɛ bɛ, ‘Fǎ fá dɔ́k kwɛ́n awu amɛm manyu,’ nɛ yí kɛ makati ndǔ ntɨ ɛni kɛ anoko bɛ Mandɛm ǎkʉ nɔ ntá yi, Mandɛm ǎkʉ yɔ ntá yi mbɔnyunɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ makati bɛ Mandɛm ǎkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi arɛmɛ ɛmfakari.
41011024	Nchí ghati yɛ bhe bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mǎnɨkmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm anchyɛ bhe, nokó ká bɛ mǎnaŋ bǎbhɔŋ yɔ́ nɛ chɔŋ mǎmbɔŋ yɔ tɛtɛp.
41011025	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ mmǔ ywɛka ánɨ̀kmʉɛt, ámfóŋórí yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákʉ́ yi bɛbʉ́. Mbák bǎkʉ̀ nɔ, chɔŋ Ɛtayɛka Mmu achi amfay ámfoŋori be nkwɔ́.”
41011027	Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bápɛtnsɛm Yerúsalɛm. Ɛnɛ́ Yesu ákɔ̀ amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk bárɔ́k,
41011028	bábhɛp yi bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ bɛtaŋ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ ɔ́kʉ̀? Agha áchyɛ́ wɔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɔ?”
41011029	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mɛ nkwɔ́ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ bɛbhɛp be. Mbák mǎnkɛ́mɛ́ mɛ yɔ, chɔŋ mɛ nkwɔ ngati bhe mmu anɛ áchyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀.”
41011030	Ghatí ká mɛ, “Agha áchyɛ́ nyaka Jɔ̌n Njwiti bɛtaŋ bɛjwiti bho? Mandɛm kɛ chí bǒ mmɨk?”
41011031	Báre kɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm bɛ yi? Mbák sɛ́ndɛm bɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Jɔ̌n bɛ́fú nyaka ntá Mandɛm, ǎbhɛ́p bhɛsɛ bɛ, ‘Kɛ ndaká yí bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ noko ɛyɔŋ ɛyi?’
41011032	Kɛ chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm bɛ yi? Sɛ́ndɛ́m bɛ, ‘Bɛ́fǔ nyaka ntá nkwǎ?’ Bápú kway nyaka bɛrɛm ɛnyu ɛyɔ ndu báchày ngɛ́mtáy bo abhɛn báchí arɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ bɔ́ mankɛm mánoko nyaka sayri bɛ Jɔ̌n achi ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm.”
41011033	Ɛkʉ bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.” Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mɛ nkwɔ́ mpú ghati yɛ bhe mmu anɛ áchyɛ́ mɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ́ mɛ̌kʉ̀.”
41012001	Yesu abho bɛ́tɛm bɔ́ nɛkay nɛ́chák bɛ, “Mmǔfú achí nyaka. Atɨ́ nkɨ apɨ mɛnɔk vain arɛ́. Atɛp ɛbhá ɛnɛ ɛghabhɛri nkɨ ankɛm. Atɛ́m mbok aghoko nɛbhʉɛt anɛ báyàt kɛpɛm váin, bɛ nnok ywi ámfu, mánsɔt, máná mmɛm. Ate mɔ́kɛrɛ́mfay amɛm nkɨ wu bɛ́ ámbák nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mmu áchɔ̀kɔ ndǔ bɛ́bhábhɛ́ri nkɨ. Afyɛ́ yɛ bo arɛ́ bɛ mánkʉ bɛtɨk mánkɔrɛ nsáy nɛ yi. Arɔ, arɔk nɛkɔ ɛtɔk ɛchak.
41012002	Mpok bɛkɔk kɛpɛmɛ́nɔk ákwáy nɔ́kɔ́, mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ ató nkʉbɛtɨk ywi bɛ ándɔ́k ánsɔ́t aywi ákɔ́rɛ́ mbwɔt.
41012003	Kɛ bǒ bɛtɨk bhɔ kɛchyɛ. Bákɛ́m yi bádɛ́n, báfɛ́n apɛtnsɛm amɔ́ apay.
41012004	Mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ ató mmɔ̌-bɛtɨk achak. Bákɛ́m awu nkwɔ bádɛ́n báfyɛ́ yi bɛfʉɛt anti nɛ báchyɛ yi ntíánwɔ́p.
41012005	Ató anɛfu anɛ akʉ́ batí arat. Yí wu, bákɛ́m báwáy. Arɔk ambɨ bɛ́tó bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhɛnɛfu. Bákʉ ɛnyumɔt nɛ bhɔ́. Bádɛn mbɔk, báwáy abhɛnɛfu.
41012006	Ɛ́rɔp chi njaŋa-mɔ̌ ywi anɛ yi are kɔŋ. Ndǔ ngwɛnti, mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ arɛm nɛ mmʉɛt yi bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ ntó mbɔ̌ŋ mɔ́wa. Yɛ̌ yí, bábhɔŋ bɛ́chyɛ yi kɛnókó.’ Afɛrɛ yɛ mɔ́ywi ató.
41012007	Kɛ bǒ bɛtɨk bhɔ bághɔ nɔkɔ yi, bábho bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, ‘Yɨŋɨ́ mbɔ̌ŋ mɔ́ywi nɛ́, nɛ yí kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛnyiɛ nɛwú ɛtayi. Twɔ́ ká sɛ́nkɛm yi sɛngway bɛ́ ɛtayi ánáŋ ángú mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi mɛ́ndɔp chi ɛbhɛsɛ.’
41012008	Mɔ́ywi wu áchwé nɔkɔ amɛm nkɨ, bákɛ́m báwáy báfɛ́mɛri ansɛm ɛbhá.
41012009	Bǎkaysi bɛ chɔŋ mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ wu ankʉ yi ntá bo bhɔ? Chɔŋ antwɔ́ angwáy bhɔ anchyɛ nkɨ wu ntá bo bachak.
41012010	Bǎbhɨkɨ re pay ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ basɨŋɨ ndǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ́: ‘Nkúbhɛ́ ntay ɛnɛn batɛ̌kɛt bágʉɛ́bhɛ́ bɛ́ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ, nɔ́ kɛ nɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ ntay ɛnɛn nɛ́kɛ́mɛ́ ɛkɛt nɛchá batay áchák ankɛm?
41012011	Chi Mandɛm Acha kɛ akʉ ɛ́mbak nɔ, nɛ chí ɛrɛmɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ntá yɛsɛ́.’”
41012012	Yesu átɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɛkay ɛnɛn, bárɨŋɨ bɛ atɛ̌m nɛkay ɛnɔ chi ɛ̌ti yap. Báre yaŋ bɛkɛm yi, kɛ ndu báchày bɛyǎ bo abhɛn báchi arɛ, bárɔ́ yi bárɔ́k.
41012013	Bátó mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi nɛ mbɔk bo Israɛl abhɛn báté ansɛm Hɛ́rɔd ntá Yesu ndu bɛbhɛp yi mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ntá ndu bɛkʉ yi ankwɛn anyu.
41012014	Bárɔŋ nɔkɔ ntá Yesu bárɛm bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ ɔchí mmu tɛtɛp, nɛ ɔpú tɔŋ kɛ́rɨ́ŋámík. Sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɔpú yɨŋɨ mmu ndǔ bɛsí ɔ́ncháy yi, kɛ ɔ̌tɔ̀ŋ tɛtɛp ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mánkʉ. Ghatí bhɛsɛ, ɛbhé yɛsɛ ɛ́ka bɛ sɛ́nchíɛ nkábhɛ́nti ntá Mfɔ Rom kɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ka?”
41012015	Yesu arɨŋɨ bapu amap, abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Ndaká yí mǎmɔ̀ mɛ? Tɔ́ŋ ká mɛ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nkáp.”
41012016	Bátwɔ́ yi nɛ ɛbhɔkɔ nkáp. Abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Ntí ághá nɛ́ arɛ́? Nɛ nnyɛ́n chi ɛnɛn ághá?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Chí ntí Sísa, Mfɔ Rom. Nɛ nnyɛ́n, chi ɛni.”
41012017	Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Chiɛ́ yɛ́ ka Mfɔ Rom yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi ɛyi, mǎnchyɛ Mandɛm yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi ɛnɛ Mandɛm.” Bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu arɛmɛ, bápɔ́p!
41012018	Mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Sádusi bárɔ́k ntá Yesu babhɛp yi ɛ̌ti nɛpɛrɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Bǒnkwɔ Sádusi bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko nyaka bɛ chɔŋ bawú mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Babhɛp yi bɛ,
41012019	“Ntɔŋ, Moses asɨŋ ndǔ ɛbhé ɛyɛsɛ bɛ mbák mmu ángú ándɔ́ ngɔrɛ́ kɛbhɔ́ŋ yɛ̌ mmɔ́, mɔ́mayi abhɔŋ bɛsɔt ngɔrɛ́ wu bɛ́ ámbé bɔ nɛ yi ndǔ nnyɛ́n manɔ anɛ ágú.
41012020	Bɔ̌ chi amɔt bati tándrámɔt báchí nyaka. Anɛ mbɨ abháy ngɔrɛ́, agú kɛbhɔ́ŋ yɛ̌ mmɔ́.
41012021	Anɛ ákòŋo asɔt kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ wu ndǔ nɛbhay. Yí nkwɔ agú kɛrɔ mmɔ. Ɛ́fákári ɛnyumɔ́t nɛ anɛ ajwi bati arat.
41012022	Ɛnyu yɔ ɛnyu yɔ kpát mankɛm bati tándrámɔt bágú kɛrɔ yɛ̌ mɔ amɔt. Ndǔ ngwɛnti, ngɔrɛ́ wu nkwɔ agú.
41012023	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, mpok Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bawú mámpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, ngɔrɛ́ wu ǎbhák anɛ agha? Ndu bɔ́ mankɛm, batí tándrámɔt, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ wap abhǎy nyaka yi.”
41012024	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́chí nɛ bhe mbɔnyunɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yɛ̌ chi Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ yɛ̌ chi bɛtaŋ Mandɛm.
41012025	Mpok Mandɛm ákú bawú mámpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, bo bábhak mbɔ bɔángɛl awu amfay. Bápú pɛrɛ bháy nɛbhay.
41012026	Nɛ bɛyɨŋɨ nɛpɛrɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ re pay amɛm ɛkáti Moses ɛ̌ti mɔ́nɔk anɛ ágò ɛbhɨ ndu ádù nyaka kɛsɔŋɔ? Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ pay ndu Mandɛm ághátí Moses bɛ, ‘Mɛ nchí Mandɛm Ábraham, Mandɛm Áisek nɛ Mandɛm Jekɔ́p’?
41012027	Ndɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ndu Ábraham nɛ Áisek nɛ Jekɔ́p bárɔ mmɨkɨ nɛ, báchí nɛpɛ́m, nɛ Mandɛm achi nɛ bhɔ. Mandɛm achí Mandɛm bo abhɛn bachi nɛpɛ́m. Apú Mandɛm bawú. Bě bo Sádusi bǎchi ndǔ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ tontó!”
41012028	Ntɔŋ ɛbhé Moses amɔt achi nyaka arɛ. Aghók ndu Yesu árɛmɛ nɛ bǒ nkwɔ Sádusi. Nɛ ághókó nɔkɔ ndu Yesu ákɛ́mɛ́ bɛbhɛp ɛbhap nɛ bɛyǎ kɛboŋ abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɛbhé Mandɛm ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chá bɛchak mɛnkɛm chi ɛnɛ́?”
41012029	Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛbhé ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chá bɛ́chák mɛnkɛm chi ɛnɛ́ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Bo Israɛl, ghók ká. Mandɛm Acha anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɛsɛ́ mankɛm achí amɔt.’
41012030	‘Nɛ ɔbhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ Mandɛm Acha ywɛ nɛ ntɨ ɛnɛ nɛnkɛm, nɛ ɛfóŋó ɛyɛ ɛnkɛm, nɛ nkaysi yɛ nkɛm, nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛ mɛnkɛm.’
41012031	Ɛnɛ́ ɛ́jwí bɛpay ɛ́chí mbɔ ɛyɔ nɛ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Kɔ́ŋ ntɨ nkwǎ mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́kɔ́ŋɔ́ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ.’ Ɛbhé ɛnɛ ɛ́cha ɛbhɛn bɛpay ɛpu.”
41012032	Ntɔŋ ɛbhé arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Ntɔŋ ɔrɛm sáyri! Ɛ́chi tɛtɛp mbɔnyu ɔ́rɛ́mɛ́ bɛ́ Mandɛm Acha achi amɔt, achák apú.
41012033	Nɛ bɛkɔŋ Mandɛm Acha ywɛ nɛ ntɨ ɛnɛ nɛnkɛm, nɛ nkaysi yɛ nkɛm, nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛ mɛnkɛm, nɛ bɛ́ nkɔŋ ntɨ nkwǎ mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́kɔ́ŋɔ́ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ arɨ acha. Bɛsí Mandɛm, bɛbhʉrɛ bɛbhé ɛbhɛn bɛpay achá akabhɛ́ nya bɛsɔŋ ankɛm nɛ akap achak anɛ bo báchyɛ̀ ntá yi”
41012034	Yesu aghɔ nɔkɔ bɛ ntɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm anɛ akɛmɛ yi sayri nɛ kɛboŋ, arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛ́rɔp wɔ chí mandú bɛ́rɔ Mandɛm ambak nɛ wɔ mbɔnyu Mfɔ ábhàk nɛ mmu anɛ áchí antɛn ɛyi.” Bɛbho mpok ɛyɔ, yɛ̌ mmu kɛpɛrɛ mɔ bɛbhɛp yi yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
41012035	Ɛnɛ́ Yesu átɔ̀ŋ bo Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm amɛm ɛkɛrákap abhɛ́p bɔ́ bɛ, “Ná batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm bárɛ̀m bɛ Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò chi ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Mfɔ Debhít?
41012036	Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ akʉ nyaka mbɔ̌ŋ Mfɔ Debhít arɛm bɛ Mandɛm Acha arɛm nyaka ntá Acha wa bɛ, ‘Chɔkɔ́ fá ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm ɛya ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛnókó, kpatɛ nkʉ bǒmpap abhɛ mámbak mbɔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ ɔ́nyàŋa bɛkak arɛ́.’
41012037	Sɛ́ghɔ̀ fá bɛ mbɔ̌ŋ Debhít ǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ nyaka Mpɛmɛ́ bɛ Acha. Ná Achǎ-rɛ áyibhiri ambak ɛbhárɛ́mɔ ywi?” Bɛyǎ bo babhɔ̌ŋ maŋák bɛ́ghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu átɔ̀ŋ.
41012038	Ɛnɛ́ Yesu átɔ̀ŋ arɛm bɛ, “Sɔt ka mpok nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses. Bákɔŋ bɛ́ghap, mǎnkó mansɛp nɛ bɛwubhɛ wubhɛ́ ndɛn amʉɛt nɛfísiɛ bɛ bo mánkaka nɔkɔ bhɔ nɛ kɛnókó.
41012039	Bákɔŋ nkwɔ́ bɛchɔkɔ ndǔ bɛbhaká kɛnókó amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt nɛ ndǔ bɛpa.
41012040	Nɛ bɔ́ bhɛrɛ kɛ mányìɛ mɛnyɨŋ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ nɛ yɛ̌ chi bɛkɛt ɛbhap ndǔ mangwɔ, mánkʉ nɔkɔ bɛrɔ́rí nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bapu bɛsí bho. Chɔŋ ntɛ́msi yap anjá ancha!”
41012041	Yesu achi nyaka kɛ́kwɔ́t ɛkʉbhɛ́ nkáp amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm anjɨŋɨ nɔkɔ ndu bo báfyɛ̀ bakáp amɛm. Aghɔ́ ndǔ bɛyǎ bǒ nkáp bátwɔ̀, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap amfyɛ nɔkɔ bɛyǎ nkáp amɛm.
41012042	Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, aghɔ́ ndu kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́-ngɔrɛ anɛ ɛyi ɛ́pú átwɔ́, afyɛ́ bɔ̌bɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nkáp bapay abhɛn bapu yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
41012043	Yesu abhɨŋɨ bakoŋo bhi arɛm bɛ, “Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, akap kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́-nɛ ácha anɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
41012044	Ndǔ bɛyǎ bakáp kɛ̌ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap áfɛ́rɛ́ mandú achyɛ mbɔ akap, kɛ nchɛ́bhɛ ngɔrɛ́ nɛ achyɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́.”
41013001	Nɛfú Yesu áfú amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, nkoŋo ywi amɔt arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, yɨŋɨ. Báte ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ɛnɛ-o! Batǎy anɛ́ básɔ́rɛ́ báté yɔ́ árɨ ácha!”
41013002	Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɔghɔ̌ bɛrɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhɛn? Mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ ɛkɛrákap ɛnɛ ɛ́rɔ̀ŋ amɨk ɛnkɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ kɛrɔp téé.”
41013003	Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, ɛnɛ́ Yesu achi chɔ́kɔ́ ɛbhě Njiɛ Mɛnok Ólif ɛnɛ ɛ́yɨŋɨ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, Píta nɛ Jems nɛ Jɔ̌n nɛ Andru bárɔ́k ntá yi ansɛm ansɛm.
41013004	Bábhɛp yi bɛ, “Ɛta, ghati bhɛsɛ, chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari nɔ ntɨkɨ mpok, nɛ ntɨkɨ ɛrɨŋ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ bo mándɨŋɨ bɛ mpok anɛ ɔ́twɔ̀ arɔp kɛ́kwɔ́t.”
41013005	Yesu abho bɛ́ghati bhɔ bɛ, “Sɔt ka mpok bɛ́ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ rwɔ́ bhe!
41013006	Bɛyǎ bo bátwɔ̀ chɔŋ mánsɔt nnyɛ́n ɛna mántɛn ambɨ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap andɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, ‘Mɛ kɛ nchí Mpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtó!’ Nɛ mándwɔ bɛyǎ bho bɛ mánjibhiri batɨ yap.
41013007	Nɛ mpok bǎghókó nsóŋó-nɛnu bǎkɛ́ chay. Mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛfakari, kɛ ɛyɔ ɛpu tɔŋ bɛ ngwɛnti mmɨk aghaka.
41013008	Chɔŋ bɛtɔk mɛ́nu nɛ bɛtɔk bɛ́chák, bafɔ̌ ɛtɔk mánu nɛ batɨ̌ bafɔ̌ ɛtɔk nɛ chɔŋ mmɨk anyɨkɨsi ndǔ bɛyǎ bɛbhak, nsay ankwɛ́n ɛtɔk. Kɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛchi chi mbɔ nɛbhǒnɛt ɛnɛn bɛbe ntá ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ánòŋsi.
41013009	“Kɛ sɔt ka mpok! Chɔŋ mánkɛm be mánchyɛ ntá bǒbati ɛtɔk bɔ́ mántaŋ be. Chɔŋ mángwapti bhe amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt. Chɔŋ mǎnte bɛsí bɔgɔ́bhanɔ nɛ bafɔ ɛ̌ti ya bɛ mǎngátí bhɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti ya.
41013010	Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ abhɔŋ bɛ́gháka bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk mɛnkɛm kɛ ngwɛ́nti antwɔ́.
41013011	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ bákɛ́mɛ́ bhe ndu bɛtaŋ be, bǎkɛ́ sɛmɛ ambɨ ambɨ bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm bɛ yi?’ Mpok ánkwáy, dɛm ka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fú be anyu mbɔnyunɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ kɛ ághàti chɔŋ be ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm.
41013012	Chɔŋ manɔ́ anchyɛ ntɨ manɔ ntá bǒbati bɛ mángwáy. Chɔŋ mbɔk bachi mánkʉ ɛnyumɔt nɛ bɔ̌bhap. Chɔŋ mbɔk bɔ mánte nɛnu nɛ bachi nɛ manɔ bhap, mánkʉ bɛ mángwáy bhɔ.
41013013	Chɔŋ mɛnyǔ bo mɛnkɛm mámpap bhe ɛ̌ti bǎchí bakoŋo bha. Kɛ mmu anɛ átè kákátí tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti, Mandɛm ǎpɛmɛ yi.”
41013014	Yesu apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ mǎngɔ ‘Ɛrɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ápábhɛ́’ téé ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɛ́bhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛbhak. Mpok yɔ, bo abhɛn bachi atú Judɛ́ya mámbʉ́ɛ́ mámbɛ́sɛ́ amfǎy njiɛ. [Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ápáy ɛkáti-nɛ ámbʉ́rɛ́ antí, anjwimɛm.]
41013015	Mpok yɔ, mbák ɛ́fákárí bɛ́ mmu ǎkʉ bɛtɨk amfay ɛkɛt ɛyi, ákɛ́ sɔŋɔri mmʉɛt bɛsɛp kpɨk bɛ andɔk amfɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ anywɔ́p kɛ ambʉɛ.
41013016	Nɛ mmu anɛ achi ɛbhɨ ákʉ̀ bɛtɨk, ákɛ́ rɔ́ŋ kpɨ́k anywɔ́p ndu bɛbwɔp ndɛ yi.
41013017	Nɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ɛncha ntá baghɔrɛ́ nɛ mɛniɛ nɛ abhɛ́n bábhak nɛ bɔ amɔ mpok yɔ!
41013018	Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt bɛ barak anɛ ákɛ́ fakari nɛ ɛso ndu ɛ́bè mmʉɛt bɛ́bʉɛ mpok yɔ.
41013019	Bǎkɛ́ rɔ mɛnɨkmʉɛt, mbɔnyunɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ́ bo bábhɔ̀ŋ mpok yɔ chi ɛnyǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ wáwák tɛ̌ mmɨk ábhó. Nɛ mpok yɔ ánáŋ ámfʉɛ́t, ɛnyǔ ɛsɔŋɔri yɔ ɛpu pɛrɛ bhák wáwák.
41013020	Nɛ mbɔ Acha abhɨ́kɨ́ kpɔt manywɔp yɔ bɛ akɛ ya, mbʉ yɛ̌ nkwǎŋwaŋ amɔt apu rɔp nɛpɛ́m. Kɛ Mandɛm akpɔt mpok ɛsɔŋɔri yɔ mbɨŋ ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn yi áyábhɛ́ bɛ mambak abhi.
41013021	Mpok yɔ, mbák mmu ángátí bhe bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ ká Mpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm átó fá’, yɛ̌ chi bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ yi awu!’ Bǎkɛ́ noko bɛ ɛchi tɛtɛp.
41013022	Bǎkɛ́ noko bɛ́ ɛ́chí tɛtɛp mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ bǒ bɛtábhá mantwɔ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap andɛm nɔkɔ bɛ yi kɛ achi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò. Chɔŋ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nsé nkwɔ mántwɔ. Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ǎtwɔ, ankʉ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ndu bɛrwɔ bho. Nɛ mándwɔ́ yɛ̌ chí bǒ abhɛn Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ bɛ mámbák abhi, mbák bábhɔŋ mbi bɛkʉ nɔ.
41013023	Sɔt yɛ ka mpok! Nnáŋ ngati nɔ bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ambɨ ambɨ.
41013024	“Mbák manywɔp anɛ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri yɔ ámay, mmok ánɛm tɛ́mté, ntaŋ kɛpɛrɛ ghɔɔ,
41013025	mambe ámfu amfay ánkwɛnti, nɛ bɛtaŋ mfáy mɛ́nyɨkɨsi.
41013026	Nɛ chɔŋ Mmǔ anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm ambesi ande twɔ́ amɛm nɛbháŋ nɛ bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ nɛ kɛnókó.
41013027	Mpok yɔ, chɔŋ ntó bɔángɛl abha, mándɔk ndǔ mmɨk nkɛm, bɛbho ndǔ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ mmɨk ɛ́mɔt bɛghaka ndu ɛchak, mánsɔt bo abhɛn Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ mánchɛm nɛbhʉɛt amɔt.
41013028	“Ghɔ́k ká ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛnɔkárɛm ɛnɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ́, fig ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ. Ɛ́náŋ ɛ́mbó bɛtɛm bɛtɔ́, bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ́ ɛso ɛ́rɔp chi kɛ́kwɔ́t.
41013029	Ɛ́chí ɛnyumɔt nɛ nɛtwɔ́ wa, Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm. Mǎnáŋ mǎngɔ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ ngátí bhe bɛ́fàkari, dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mpok nɛtwɔ wa arɔp kɛkwɔt.
41013030	Nchí ghati bhe tɛtɛp bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛfakari, kɛ mkpáká bho abhɛn ɛchɔŋ ámfʉɛt.
41013031	Chɔŋ mfay amfʉɛt, mmɨk amfʉ́ɛ́t, kɛ Ɛyɔŋ ɛya ɛ́pú fʉɛt.
41013032	“Yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nywɔp nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ mpok anɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fàkari chɔŋ. Bɔángɛl Mandɛm bábhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ, yɛ̌ mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ. Ɛta Mandɛm aywǐnti kɛ árɨŋɨ.
41013033	Sɔt yɛka mpok, mǎmbak pɛ̌ mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mbɔ̌ŋ nywɔp ɛnɔ.
41013034	Ɛ́chi ɛnyumɔt mbɔ mmǔ anɛ árɔ̀ŋ nɛkɔ, kɛ ápɛ́rɛ́ rɔ ɛkɛt ɛyi, arɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ amɔ bǒ bɛtɨk abhi, achyɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ayi ntí bɛtɨk. Aghati yɛ mbabhɛri nyǔbha bɛ́ ámbák pě.
41013035	Bák yɛ́ ka pě! Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mbɔ̌ŋ mpok anɛ chi ɛkɛt ápɛ̀tnsɛm. Kɛ chí beku-a, kɛ nɛ nɛ́ntɨ bɛti-a, kɛ manɛ́mnkɔk-a, kɛ chi nɛyǐnywɔp-a, yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.
41013036	Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ bɛ yi ántwɔ́ tɛ́mchok antɛmɛri bhe ndǔ bǎbhʉ̀rɛ kɛŋɔ.
41013037	Mbɔ ɛnyu ngáti nɛ́ bhe, kɛ nchí ghati bo mankɛm fá amɨk: Bák ká pɛ̌.”
41014001	Ɛ́rɔp manywɔp apay ndu mɛ́nyiɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ ndu bɛ́tɨk nɛfɛrɛ Mandɛm áfɛ́rɛ́ bo Israɛl ndǔ kɛsɛm amɛm ɛtɔk Íjip, nɛ Ɛpǎ Brɛt anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yís. Bo bati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses báre yaŋ mbi bɛkɛm Yesu bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ mangway.
41014002	Báre rɛm bɛ, “Sɛ́kɛ́ kɛm yi mpok ɛpa mbɔnyunɛ bo bákway bɛ́chyɛ ɛsɔŋɔri.”
41014003	Yesu abhak ɛtɔk Bɛ́tani, amɛm ɛkɛt Símun anɛ ánáŋ ámé nyaka ɛbhaŋákwa. Ɛnɛ́ yi ányìɛ nɛnyíɛ́ arɛ́, ngɔrɛ́ amɔt atwɔ́ nɛ ɛsáyrí ɛ́kpɛ́mɛ́ bawɛrɛ́riɛp amɛn áyá nkáp. Mɔ́ngɔrɛ́ wu asiɛ́p ɛmɨ ɛ́kpɛ́mɛ́ bawɛt ɛyɔ, apɨkɨri mɔ anti Yesu.
41014004	Ɛkʉ mbɔk bo abhɛn bachi arɛ chɔkɔ bábéntɨ tontó, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Mɔ́ngɔrɛ́ nɛ ǎchɔ̀ŋti bawɛrɛ́riɛp amɛn ndaká yí?
41014005	Bákway mbʉ bɛ́ti mɔ anchyɛ nkáp anɛ́ áyá ɛ́chá nkáp anɛ nkʉbɛtɨk ányiɛ ndǔ mmiɛ, mánsɔt nkáp wu mánchyɛ ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́ bho.” Bǒbhɔ bábho bɛji mɔ́ngɔrɛ́ wu.
41014006	Kɛ Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ká yi. Ndaká yí bǎsɔŋɔri yi? Akʉ mɛ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ.
41014007	Bachɛ́bhɛ́bho báchí nɛ bhe mpoknkɛm. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ mmu ákɔ́ŋɔ́, ánkwák bhɔ. Kɛ mpú bhak chɔŋ nɛ bhe mpoknkɛm.
41014008	Akʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mbi bɛkʉ ntá ya. Awátí mɛ nɛ bawɛrɛ́riɛp kɛ mpok bɛ́bhɛ́mɛ mɛ ankwáy.
41014009	Dɨŋɨ́ ká tɛtɛp bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ bághàti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ndǔ mmɨk nkɛm, chɔŋ bo mándɛm ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɔ́ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ákʉ́.” Nɛ ndǔ bo bárɛ̀m ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yi ákʉ́, chɔŋ mántɨ́k nɔkɔ yi.
41014010	Júdas Iskariɔt achi nyaka mmǔ amɔt ndǔ nkwɔ baghɔk Yesu bati byo nɛ apay. Afuɛ́t arɔk ntá bǒbati bachiǎkap ndu bɛti Yesu ntá yap.
41014011	Ághátí nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ́ nkaysi yi, bábhɔ́ŋ maŋák. Báfyɛ́ bariɛp bɛ́chyɛ yi nkáp. Júdas abho bɛyaŋ yɛ mbi ndu bɛti Yesu ntá yap.
41014012	Ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ mbɨ ɛnɛn Ɛpǎ Brɛt anɛ kɛbhɔ́ŋ yis, nɔ chi nywɔp ɛnɛn bɛway mɔ́nkwɔmɛn ndu bɛkʉ nɛnyíɛ́ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ, baghɔk Yesu bábhɛp yi bɛ, “Ɔ̌yaŋ sɛ́ndɔ́k sɛ́nkʉ nɛnyíɛ́ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ ntá yɛ fá?”
