42009038	Mmǔ amɔt ndǔ nkwɔ bo bhɔ abho bɛbɨk andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, nnɨkmʉɛt, bú mɔ́wa. Achí mbakanɛm nɛ ndiɛrɛ yí kɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́!
42009039	Ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛsɔŋɔri yi. Ɛ́kʉ ǎchɔkɔ ambo bɛbɨk, ɛ́ngʉɛp yi amɨk, ɛ́nkʉ yi ande wɛt ɛ́fɛ́n ɛ́mfu nɔkɔ yí anyu. Nɛ ɛ́taŋ kɛ ɛ́ndɔ yi. Ɛ́dɛ̀n yi, ɛ́mfyɛ yi mɛnɨ amʉɛt.
42009040	Nnɨkmʉɛt ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhɛ bɛ́ mámbók yɔ́ kɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ kway bɛkʉ nɔ.”
42009041	Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Bě mkpáká bho anɛ abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nɛka nɛ mɛ, bě bhó bǎyìbhiri tɛtɛp ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak, chɔŋ mpɛt ntat nɛ bhe ná? Chɔŋ nkɛ́pntɨ nɛ bhe ngaka fá?” Kɛ arɛm ntá chimɔ bɛ, “Twɔ́ nɛ mɔ́ywɛ fá.”
42009042	Mpok mɔ́wu árɔ̀ŋ ntá Yesu, ɛfóŋó yɔ ɛpɛt ɛ́gʉɛp yí amɨk, ɛkʉ yi are wɛt. Kɛ Yesu ásáy ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ yɔ, bɛ ɛ́ndɔ́ mɔ́wu. Yesu abú yi, akɛmɛ ntá ɛtayi.
42009043	Bo mankɛm bábhák maknkay bɛghɔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm. Bo barɔk ambɨ bɛbhak maknkay ɛ̌ti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu ákʉ́. Yesu arɛm ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ,
42009044	“Nɛnɛ́ ká batú sayri mǎngok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nchí ghati bhe. Chɔŋ mánti Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm, mámfyɛ yi amɔ bǒ mmɨk.”
42009045	Kɛ bɔ́ kɛjwimɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́. Mandɛm abhɛsɛ ntí bɛyɔŋ bhɔ ntá yap bɛ bákɛ́ rɨŋɨ ndak anɛ áchí amɛm. Nɛ báre cháy bɛbhɛp Yesu mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́.
42009046	Baghɔkɔ́ bhi bábhó bɛkɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ batɨ ndu bɛrɨŋɨ mmu wap anɛ áchá bachak.
42009047	Yesu arɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ bakaysi. Ɛ́kʉ asɔt mandú mmɔ́, ate nɛpakámʉɛt ɛni.
42009048	Arɛm yɛ ntá yap bɛ, “Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ásyɛpti mandú mmɔ́ mbɔ anɛ nɛ maŋák ndǔ nyɛ́n ɛnɛ, ǎsyɛpti mɛ́; nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ásyɛpti mɛ nɛ maŋák ǎsyɛpti mmu anɛ átó mɛ. Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mmu ywɛká anɛ ásɛ̀pti mmʉɛt ntá abhɛnɛfu, kɛ áchí mǔngo sayri sayri ntá yɛka mankɛm.”
42009049	Jɔ̌n arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Ɛta, sɛ́ghɔ mmu anɛ apu ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛsɛ ndu ábòk bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna, sɛ́gháti yi bɛ, ákɛ́pɛrɛ kʉ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ apú ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛsɛ.”
42009050	Yesu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ káŋ mmu mbɔ awú, mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌agha anɛ ápú mǔmpap ywɛka achí mmǔ ywɛka.”
42009051	Mpok ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t anɛ Mandɛm asɔt Yesu amfay, Yesu akʉ ntɨ ɛni bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm nɛ abho bɛrɔŋ.
42009052	Ndu árɔ̀ŋ, ató bapɔkɔ́ ntó ambɨ. Bárɔk bachwe amɛm mɔ́tɔk amɔt atú Samária ndu bɛtoŋti mbaŋ ntá yi.
42009053	Kɛ bǒ ɛtɔk yɔ kɛ ka yi anchwe arɛ mbɔnyunɛ baghɔ nyaka bɛ yi atɨ bɛrɔŋ chi Yerúsalɛm.
42009054	Baghɔk abhi Jems nɛ Jɔ̌n, bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, bárɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ɔ̌yàŋ sɛ́mbɨ́ŋɨ́ ngó ámfú amfay antwɔ ansɔŋ bǒbhɛn-ɛ?”
42009055	Kɛ Yesu ayibhiri mmʉɛt aghati bhɔ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bárɛmɛ ɛ́pú chak.
42009056	Yí nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi báfʉɛ́t bárɔk ndu mɔ́tɔk achak.
42009057	Ndu bárɔ̀ŋ, mmǔfú arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Chɔŋ mbak nkoŋo ywɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ ɔ̌rɔ̀ŋ.”
42009058	Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Bɛsɔp bɛbhɔŋ babhok, kɛnɛn kɛ́bhɔ́ŋ manyay, kɛ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ɛbhak bɛsoŋ ntí.”
42009059	Arɛm ntá mmu achak bɛ, “Koŋó mɛ́.” Kɛ mmu wu arɛm bɛ, “Acha, dɔ̌ kpɨ́k ndɔ́k mbɛ́mɛ́ Ɛtaya.”
42009060	Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Dɔ̌ bawú mámbɛ́mɛ́ ngú wap. Kɛ wɔ, dɔ́k ghati bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti ɛnyu Mandɛm abhak nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap.”
42009061	Mmǔ achak arɛm bɛ, “Acha, chɔŋ nkoŋo wɔ, kɛ dɔ̌ kpɨ́k ndɔ́k anywɔ́p ndyɛ́p bǒbha.”
42009062	Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ákɛ́mɛ́ ɛnɔ ákwàŋ mbaŋ nɛ anjɨŋɨ nɔkɔ nsɛm, abhɨ́kɨ́ kway bɛbhak mǔbɛtok anɛ Mandɛm achi Mfɔ ywi.”
42010001	Awu áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Acha ayap bakoŋo bhi bachak bɛsa bɛrat nsɛm byo nɛ apay ató ambɨ bati apay apay bɛ mándɔ́k ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk nɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yí mbɔ̌ŋ áyàŋ nyaka bɛrɔŋ.
42010002	Ápɛ́rɛ to bhɔ, aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mbuɔt bɛ́fɛ́rɛ ɛbhɨ aya, kɛ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk bábhɨ́kɨ́ ya. Nɨk yɛka mmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm mmu achi mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ bɛ ántó bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk, mámfɛ́rɛ́ mbwɔt ɛbhɨ.
42010003	Dɔ́k ka! Nchí to be ntá bǒ mmɨk mbɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n nɛntɨ nkwɔ.
42010004	Bǎkɛ́ pɔkɔ́ yɛ̌ mɔ́bha nkáp, yɛ̌ ɛbhǎ nɛkɔ, nɛ yɛ̌ nkwɔbhánya ɛchak. Nɛ bǎkɛ́ kaka yɛ̌ mmu ambi.
42010005	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ bǎchwé arɛ́, mǎnjámbɨ mǎndɛm bɛ, ‘Kpák anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ ámbák fá amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ.’
42010006	Mbák mmu achi amɛm ɛkɛt ɛyɔ anɛ ákɔ́ŋɔ́ kpák, chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ kpák ambak nɛ yí. Kɛ mbák yɛ̌ mmu apú, áfɔ́k wu ǎpɛtnsɛm ntá yɛka.
42010007	Chwé ká mǎmbak chi arɛ. Bǎkɛ́ kɔ bɛkɛt nɛ bɛkɛt. Nyíɛ́ ká, mǎnyú yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bachyɛ bhe. Ɛchi chak bɛ nkʉbɛtɨk ambɔŋ akap ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhi.
42010008	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ bǎchwe arɛ́ nɛ básiɛ́pti be nɛ maŋák, nyiɛ́ ká yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn bachyɛ bhe.
42010009	Bú ká bǒmame abhɛn ɛtɔk ɛyɔ, mǎngati bo abhɛn bachi arɛ bɛ, ‘Mpok anɛ Mandɛm abhak nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap arɔp chi kɛkwɔt.’
42010010	Kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ bǎchwe ɛtɔk kɛ bo abhɛn bachi arɛ kɛsyɛpti bhe nɛ maŋák, fú ka dɔk ndǔ nkɔŋɔ-mbi ɛnɛ ɛtɔk yɔ, mǎndɛm bɛ,
42010011	‘Yɛ̌ chí mfok ɛtɔk ɛyɛka anɛ ábátí ndǔ bɛkak ɛbhɛsɛ sɛ́kwɛ̀t sɛ́fɛ̀rɛ mbɔ ntísiɛ ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎkʉ́. Kɛ dɨŋɨ́ ka bɛ, mpok anɛ Mandɛm abhak nɛ bo mbɔ Mfɔ wap arɔp chi kɛkwɔt.’”
42010012	Yesu arɔk ambɨ arɛm bɛ, “Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, ɛwak ɛnɛ Mandɛm átàŋ bǒ mmɨk, chɔŋ angɔ́ ntínso nɛ bǒ ɛtɔk Sódom ɛncha bǒ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ.”
42010013	“Bě bo Korasín, chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ntá yɛka ɛncha! Bě bo Bɛtsáida, chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ntá yɛka nkwɔ ɛncha! Mbɔ chi amɛm bɛtɔk Táya nɛ Sídɔn kɛ̌ nkʉ́ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn-nɛ nkʉ ntá yɛka, mbʉ́ báfyɛ́ ndɛn pyɔ, mánto batwɔ́p anti tɛsáy, bɛtɔŋ bɛ bátɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap!
42010014	Kɛ ɛwak ɛnɛ Mandɛm átàŋ bǒ mmɨk, chɔŋ angɔ́ ntínso nɛ bǒ-Taya nɛ Sídɔn ɛncha bhe.
42010015	Nɛ bě bho Kapɛ̌naum, bǎkaysi bɛ bǎkway bɛyoŋ mmʉɛt, mǎnkó kpát mǎntɔk nɛbu? Nsé! Chɔŋ Mandɛm amɛsɛ bhɛ amɛm ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú!”
42010016	Yesu apɛt arɛm ntá bakoŋo bhi bhɔ abhɛn yi ato bɛ, “Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ághók bé ǎghók chi mɛ. Anɛ ábyak be ǎbyak chi mɛ. Mmu nɛ ábyak mɛ, ǎbyak chi mmu anɛ átó mɛ.”
42010017	Abhɛn bati bɛsa bɛrat nsɛm byo nɛ apay bápɛtnsɛm nɛ maŋák, báré ghati Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna, yɛ chi bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́sɛ̀pti mmʉɛt ntá yɛsɛ.”
42010018	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ngɔ̌ ndu Satan áfú amfay akwɛnɛ amɨk mbɔ miámiaŋ.
42010019	Ghɔ́ ka! Nchyɛ́ bhe bɛtaŋ bɛ bǎkway bɛyat nnyɔ́ nɛ ngá-nɛghay amɨk. Nchyɛ́ be bɛtaŋ amfay bɛtaŋ Satan, mǔmpap, nɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛpu chyɛ be ɛsɔŋɔri.
42010020	Yɛ̌ nɔ bǎkɛ́ ŋák chi bɛ, bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́sɛ́pti mmʉɛt ntá yɛka. Ŋák ka chi bɛ Mandɛm asɨŋ manyɛ́n yɛka amɛm ɛkáti ɛnɛ amfay.”
42010021	Mpok yɔ, Yesu anɨkmʉɛt bɛ, “Ɛta, wɔ mmu ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ mfay nɛ mmɨk! Nchí chyɛ wɔ bakak ndǔ ɔ́rɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́mbák bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ntá barɨŋɨ́ndak nɛ ntá bo abhɛn bárɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ. Ɔnɛ́nɛ́ bhɔ ɔtɔŋ kpoŋoroŋ ntá bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yɛ̌nyɨŋ mbɔ mǎmbɔ. Ɛta, ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ wɔmbɔŋ ɔ́yáŋá bɛ ɛmbak.”
42010022	Yesu apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Ɛtaya achyɛ́ mɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm. Yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mmu anɛ Mmɔ áchí ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛt chí Ɛtayi. Nɛ yɛ̌ mmu abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ mmu Ɛta áchí ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛt chí Mɔ́ywi nɛ bǒ abhɛn yi áyábhɛ́ ndu bɛkʉ bɔ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ Ɛtayi.”
42010023	Ayibhiri yɛ mmʉɛt arɛm ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi ansɛm ansɛm bɛ, “Ɛ́rɨ ntá yɛka ɛcha bɛ́ bǎghɔ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ bǎghɔ̀!
42010024	Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, bɛyǎ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nɛ bafɔ babhɔ̌ŋ nyaka ɛkwak bɛghɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ̀, kɛ bɔ kɛghɔ bhɔ. Bábhɔ́ŋ ɛkwak bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghòk, kɛ bábhɨkɨ ghok bhɔ.”
42010025	Ɛ́fákari bɛ ntɔŋ ɛbhé Moses arɔk mɛmɔ Yesu. Abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, chɔŋ nkʉ yi kɛ mbɔ̌ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti?”
42010026	Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ yi? Ɔ̌pay arɛ́ bɛ yi?”
42010027	Akɛmɛ bɛ, ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Kɔŋ Mandɛm Acha ywɛ nɛ ntɨ ɛnɛ nɛnkɛm, nɛ ɛfóŋó yɛ ɛnkɛm, nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛ mɛnkɛm, nɛ nkaysi yɛ nkɛm, nɛ kɔ́ŋ nkokosi yɛ mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́kɔ́ŋɔ́ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ.”
42010028	Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Chi ɛnyu yɔ. Kʉ nɔ́, nɛ chɔŋ ɔ́mbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m.”
42010029	Kɛ ndǔ yi áyàŋ bɛtaŋa mmʉɛt, arɛm bɛ, “Kɛ mbɔ̌ŋ nkokosi wa chi agha?”
42010030	Yesu akɛmɛ yi nɛ nɛkay ɛnɛn bɛ, “Mmǔfu afǔ nyaka ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm ǎsɛ̀p Jɛríko. Ndu árɔ̀ŋ, akwɛ́n amɔ baghɛ́p bataŋataŋ. Báfɛ́rɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ yí amʉɛt, bádɛ́n yí, bárɔ́k, barɔ yi mpok árɔbhɛ kɛkwɔt bɛgu.
42010031	Ɛ́fákari bɛ nchiakap Mandɛm amɔt ǎsɛ̀p ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ mbi wu. Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ, aghɔ́ yi, apé ɛbhěmbi, arɔk ɛbhak ɛyi.
42010032	Ɛ́fákári ɛnyumɔt nɛ nkú bɛtɨk amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm amɔt anɛ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Lɛ́vi. Mpok yi aghaka arɛ, aghɔ́ yi, kɛ afʉɛ́t nkwɔ chi ɛbhe ɛchak, arɔk.
42010033	Kɛ mmu Samária fú ǎsɛ̀p nyaka nkwɔ ndǔ mbi wu. Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mmu wu achi, aghɔ́ yi, nɛ abhɔ́ŋ ntínso nɛ yí.
42010034	Arɔk ntá yi, achɨti babhe ndǔ bɛfʉɛt bhi, agwɔ́t. Apɔkɔ yɛ yi anyaŋa amfǎy mpɔŋɔ batu yi, arɔk nɛ yí ndǔ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ mankɔ bachyɛ nkáp kɛ mabʉrɛ arɛ́. Akwak yí.
42010035	Nɛyí nɔ́kɔ́ afɛrɛ nkáp achyɛ ntá mmu anɛ ayɨŋɨ ɛkɛt ɛyɔ arɛm bɛ ‘Yɨŋɨ́ mɛ́ yi. Nnáŋ mpɛtnsɛm chɔŋ nkɛmɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak ɛnɛ ɔ́chɔŋti yi amʉɛt.’”
42010036	Yesu arɛm nɔkɔ nɔ, abhɛ́p ntɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm bɛ, “Ɔkáysí bɛ ndǔ nkwɔ wu bati arat, agha átɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́ achi nkokosi ntá anɛ akwɛnɛ amɔ bághɛ́p?”
42010037	Akɛmɛ bɛ, “Chí anɛ ághɔ́ yi ntínso.” Yesu aghati yɛ yi bɛ, “Dɔ́k yɛ́ kʉ mbɔ yí.”
42010038	Ɛnɛ́ Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bákɔ̀ bárɔ̀ŋ báchwɔ́p ndu mɔ́tɔkɔ́fú. Ngɔrɛ́ amɔt anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Matá abhak arɛ. Asyɛpti Yesu amɔ ápay amɛm ɛkɛt ɛyi.
42010039	Abhɔ́ŋ manɔ anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ María. María arɔk asibhiri ndǔ bɛkak Acha angoko nɔkɔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ yi átɔ̀ŋ;
42010040	Matá ankʉ nɔkɔ chi bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn nywɔp ndu mɛne Yesu. Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ bɛtɨk bɛyǎ ntá yi aywǐntí, arɔk ntá Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Acha, ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ ndǔ mɔ́maya árɔ́ bɛtɨk mɛnkɛm mɛ awɔ́? Ghatí yi antwɔ ankwak mɛ!”
42010041	Kɛ Acha akɛmɛ yi chi bɛ, “Matá, Matá! Ɔ̌fyɛ́ ntí nɛ ɔ̌dɛ̀n mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ.
42010042	Dɨŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt kɛ ɛrɨ ɛcha. Yɔ́ kɛ̌ María áyábhɛ́, nɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛsɔt yɔ ntá yi.”
42011001	Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, Yesu are nɨkmʉɛt nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́fu. Ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́, nkoŋo ywi amɔt arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Acha, tɔ́ŋ bhɛsɛ ɛnyu mánɨkmʉɛt mbɔ ɛnyǔ Jɔ̌n átɔ́ŋ nyaka baghɔk abhi.”
42011002	Yesu aghati baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ mǎnɨkmʉɛt, dɛm ka bɛ́: ‘Ɛta, kʉ bo mánchyɛ́ nnyɛ́n ɛnɛ kɛnókó. Kʉ bo mándɔ́ wɔ ɔmbak Mfɔ wap.
42011003	Chiɛ́ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp, ɛnǐ nɛnyíɛ́.
42011004	Foŋorí bɛbʉ́ bhɛsɛ́, mbɔ ɛnyu sɛ́fòŋori yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákʉ́ bhɛsɛ bɛbʉ́. Nɛ kɛ́ka sɛ́nchwe ndǔ nɛmɔ ɛnɛn nɛ́kʉ sɛ́nkwɛ́n ndǔ bɛbʉ́.’”
42011005	Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá yap bɛ, “Sɛ́nsɔ́t bɛ mmu ywɛka amɔt arɔ̌ŋ ntá mmʉɛrɛ ywi mpok nywɔp nɛ́gháká nɛ́ntɨ́bhɛti, adɛp nɛkok arɛm bɛ, ‘Nkwǎnɛ, nnɨkmʉɛt pwɔ mɛ bɛkpkɔkɔ́ brɛt bɛ́rát.
42011006	Mmʉɛrɛ wa amɔt anɛ achi ambi ndǔ nɛkɔ atwɔ mɛ anywɔ́p nɛ́nɛ, nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nɛnyíɛ́ bɛchyɛ yí anyiɛ!’
42011007	Mmʉɛrɛ ywɛ wu ankɛmɛ bɛ, ‘Kɛ́pɛrɛ sɔŋɔri mɛ. Nnáŋ mfe mbǐnywɔp nɛ nnáŋ mbʉrɛ nɛ bɔ̌bha. Mpú kway bɛfate bɛ nchyɛ́ wɔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ.’
42011008	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, yɛ̌ ndǔ yi ápú kway bɛfate bɛ anchyɛ yi nɛnyíɛ́, ɛ̌ti yi achi mmʉɛrɛ ywi, abhɔŋ bɛ́fáte anchyɛ yi yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yi áyaŋ mbɔnyunɛ atóŋórí bɛ́dɛ́p nɛkok kɛbhɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p.
42011009	Nchí ghati yɛ bhe bɛ́: Nɨk ka mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́yàŋ, chɔŋ Mandɛm anchyɛ wɔ. Yáŋ, chɔŋ ɔngɔ. Dɛp nɛkok, chɔŋ mánɛnɛ ntá yɛ.
42011010	Kʉ nɔ, mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ánɨ̀kmʉɛt ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi áyàŋ, Mandɛm ǎchyɛ yɔ ntá yi. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ áyàŋ ɛnyɨŋ, ǎghɔ yɔ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ádɛ́bhɛ́ nɛkok, mánɛnɛ ntá yi.
42011011	Bě bachǐbhɔ, mmǔ ywɛka anɛ mbák mɔ́ywi abhɛp yi tansi, ansɔt chi nnyɔ́ anchyɛ yi, chi agha?
42011012	Yɛ̌ chí nɛchǐ-nkɔk kɛ̌ mmɔ́ abhɛp wɔ, ɔ̌chyɛ yi ngá-nɛghay?
42011013	Mbák be bǒ bɛbʉ́, bǎbhɔŋ ntɨ bɛchyɛ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ntá bɔ̌bhɛka, bǎkáysí bɛ Ɛta mmu achi amfay, ǎnɔk bɛchyɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ntá bo abhɛn mánɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ yi anchyɛ bhɔ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ kɛ?”
42011014	Mpokófu, Yesu ǎbók ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ́ mmu akwɛnɛ kɛbhok. Ɛ́fú nɔ́kɔ́ mbók wu abho bɛrɛm kɛpɨ. Bo abhɛn bachi arɛ babhak maknkay.
42011015	Kɛ mbɔk yap báré rɛm chi bɛ, “Bɛlsɛbul mfɔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ kɛ áchyɛ́ yi bɛtaŋ bɛbok bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ.”
42011016	Bo bárè yaŋ mbi mɛmɔ yi. Bábhɛ́p yi ankʉ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛnɛ́ ɛ́bhak mbɔ ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔŋ bɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛ́fú chi ntá Mandɛm.
42011017	Kɛ ndu Yesu árɨ́ŋɨ́ nkaysi yap, aghati bhɔ́ bɛ, “Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ akɔrɛ achi arɛ bo mánù nɔkɔ nɛ batɨ, ɛ́bhɔŋ chi mɛnɛmɛ. Nɛ nnɛrɛ́kɛt anɛ́ ákɔ́rɛ́ áchí arɛ nɛ bo mánù nɔkɔ nɛ batɨ, ákwɛ́nɛ́ kwɛn.
42011018	Nɛ mbák Satan ankʉ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bhi mɛnu nɛ batɨ, ná yi ákway bɛbhak ɛnyǔ mfɔ anɛ yi achi ndǔ ɛrɔri mpok? Nchí bhɛp be mbɔnyunɛ bǎrɛ̀m bɛ ndǔ bɛtaŋ Satan kɛ̌ mɛ̌bòk bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ.
42011019	Nɛ mbák ndǔ bɛtaŋ Satan kɛ̌ mɛ̌bòk bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ, bakoŋo bhɛka bábòk bhɔ ndǔ bɛtaŋ agha? Chɔŋ bakoŋo bhɛka mántaŋ be!
42011020	Kɛ mbák, sayri sayri mɛ̌bòk bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ chi ndǔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm, nɔ chi Mandɛm anáŋ achi nɛntɨ ɛnɛka mbɔ Mfɔ.
42011021	Mpok mmǔ ntantaŋ ábhabhɛri ɛkɛt ɛyi nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛnu bhi, yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛghɛp mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi.
42011022	Kɛ mbák mmu anɛ átáŋ acha yi atwɔ ǎnu nɛ yí, andɛ́n yi, ansɔt mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛnu ɛbhi ɛbhɛn yi asɨkɨ ntɨ arɛ, ampɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi andɔk ankɔrɛ nɛ bo bachak.
42011023	Mmu anɛ apu nɛ mɛ, achi chi mǔmpap wa. Nɛ mmu anɛ ápú kwak mɛ ndu mɛ̌nyókóti bho, ǎtàkatak.”
42011024	Bɛ́rɔ́ŋ ambɨ Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mbák mámbók ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́ndɔ́ mmu, ɛ́rɔp chí bóŋboŋbóŋ amɛm baso, ɛ́njaŋ nɔkɔ ɛbhak ɛnɛ yɔ ɛ́chwe. Mbák ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ́ ɛbhak bɛchɔkɔ,
42011025	ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ mpɛtnsɛm ɛbhak ɛnɛ mfú.’ Nɛ ɛ́náŋ ɛ́mpɛ́tnsɛm, ɛngɔ bɛ mányɔ ɛsɨ ɛkɛt ɛyi, bághókó sayri,
42011026	ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛyɔ ɛ́rɔ̀ŋ yɛ, ɛ́nsɔt bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́chák tándrámɔt ɛbhɛn bɛ́bɛ́bhɛ́ bɛcha yɔ. Bɔ́ mɛnkɛm mɛndɔk mɛnchwe mmu wu amʉɛt mɛ́mbak nɛ yi, nté yi ambɛp ancha anɛ mbɨ.”
42011027	Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, ngɔrɛ́ amɔt amɛm ngɛ́mtáy bo abhɛn bachi arɛ arɛm ntá Yesu nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay bɛ, “Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ábhé wɔ, achyɛ wɔ amɨ!”
42011028	Yesu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Bo abhɛn ɛyap ɛrɨ ɛcha chi abhɛn bághòk Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ mánkʉ nɔkɔ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛ́yàŋ!”
42011029	Ɛnɛ́ bo báchák báchɛ̀m arɛ́ mándɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, Yesu abho bɛrɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Mkpáká bho anɛ ɛchɔŋ ábɛp acha! Bábhɛ̀p bɛ mántɔ́ŋ bhɔ́ ɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay. Kɛ yɛ̌ ɛmɔ́t mpu tɔŋ bhɔ, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛt ɛnɛ Jóna.
42011030	Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Jóna achi nyaka ɛrɨŋ ntá bo Ninivɛ, ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm nchí bhak chɔŋ ɛrɨŋ ntá mkpáká bho abhɛn ɛchɔŋ.
42011031	Ɛwak Mandɛm átàŋ bǒ mmɨk, mfɔ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ áchí nyaka ɛtɔk Shɛ́ba ǎfate andɛm bɛ be bo mkpáká mmɨk anɛ ɛchɔŋ bǎkʉ́ bɛbʉ́ mbɔnyunɛ yi afu nyaka nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ arɔk bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mfɔ Sólomon átɔ̀ŋ bho nɛ bɛyǎ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak. Nɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ mmu achi fá nɛ́ntɨ́ ɛnɛka anɛ acha Sólomon, Yɛ̌ nɔ́, bǎpú ka bɛghok yi.
42011032	Ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ manyé, chɔŋ bǒ Ninivɛ mángati be bho mkpáká mmɨk anɛ ɛchɔŋ bɛ́ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛchi nɛ bhe mbɔnyunɛ mpok bɔ bághókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Jóna aghati bhɔ, bátɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap. Nchí ghati bhe bɛ mmu achi fá nɛ́nɛ anɛ áchá Jóna, yɛ̌ nɔ, bǎpú ghok yi!
42011033	“Yɛ̌ mmu apú durɛ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ansɔt ɛnyɨŋ ankuti. Bádʉrɛ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́, mánte chi ɛbhak ɛnɛ babhɔŋɔ bɛte yɔ bɛ mbaŋ angɔ́ɔ́ ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ achwe anywɔ́p.
42011034	Amɨ́k ayɛka achi bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ mǎngɔ mbaŋ. Mpok amɨ́k ayɛka achi arɨ́árɨ́, mmʉɛt ɛyɛka ɛnkɛm ɛ́jwi nɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́. Kɛ mbák amɨ́k ayɛka ápú arɨarɨ, mmʉɛt ɛyɛka ɛnkɛm ɛ́jwi nɛ ɛjuri.
42011035	Sɔt yɛ ka mpok bɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhɛn bǎkaysi bɛ bɛchi be antɨ bɛ́kɛ́ bhak ɛjuri.
42011036	Mbák yɛ batɨ yɛka ankɛm ajwi nɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́, nɛ yɛ̌ mandú ɛjuri apu arɛ, chɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka nɛnkɛm nɛmbak pɛ́pɛ́p, mbɔ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ ɛ́ghɔ̀, ɛntɔŋ nɔkɔ yi mbi.”
42011037	Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛrɛm kɛpɨ ɛkɛn, mǔnkwɔ Fárisi amɔt abhɨŋɨ yi ndǔ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛkɛt ɛyi. Yesu arɔk achwe anywɔ́p, achɔkɔ amɨk mɛnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́.
42011038	Mǔnkwɔ Fárisi wu abhak maknkay bɛ́ghɔ bɛ Yesu abhɨkɨ so amɔ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛpɨŋ ɛyap ɛ́tɔ́ŋ kɛ anyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́.
42011039	Acha aghati mǔnkwɔ Fárisi wu bɛ, “Bě bǒnkwɔ Fárisi, bǎsɔ̀t mpok bɛ́tyɛ́t nsɛmɛ́ nchán kɛ mɛŋɛ́mɛ́ nɛ bɛbʉ́ bɛjwi be antɨ.
42011040	Bě bɛchɨŋtǐ bho! Mandɛm anɛ aghókó ɛnyɨŋ, pú yi kɛ aghoko mmɛm nɛ nsɛm ɛyi nkwɔ?
42011041	Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔŋɔ bɛkʉ chi bɛsɔt mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm bɛkpʉrɛ ɛbhɛka mánchyɛ ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho nɛ chɔŋ bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛka mɛnkɛm mɛ́mbak nkwɔ pɛ́pɛ́p.
42011042	“Bě bǒnkwɔ Fárisi, chɔŋ ɛmbɛp ntá yɛka ɛncha, mbɔnyunɛ bapú kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak ntá bho nɛ bǎbhɨkɨ kɔŋ Mandɛm. Bǎsɔt ndu bɛrɨ amɔt ndǔ baru byo mǎnchyɛ ntá Mandɛm, mǎnkʉ ɛnyumɔt nɛ mbwɔt achak. Bǎbhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ mǎmbak sayri nɛ bho kɛ bǎbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛghɔkɔntɨk bɛbhé bɛ́chák.
42011043	Bě bǒnkwɔ Fárisi, chɔŋ ɛmbɛp ntá yɛka ɛncha! Bǎkɔŋ bɛchɔkɔ ndǔ mɛnɔk kɛnókó amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bo Israɛl, nɛ bǎkɔ̀ŋ bɛ bo mankaka nɔkɔ bhe nɛ kɛnókó nɛfísiɛ.
42011044	Chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ntá yɛka ɛncha! Bǎchí mbɔ manɛm anɛ mmu ákɔ̀ amfay kɛrɨŋɨ bɛ chi manɛm.”
42011045	Ntɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm amɔt arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, mpok ɔ́rɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, ɔ́chyɛ bhɛsɛ nkwɔ ntíánwɔ́p!”
42011046	Yesu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Bě batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm, chɔŋ ɛmbɛp ntá yɛka nkwɔ ɛncha! Nti achi bɛ mǎnyìɛ̀rɛ bo mámpɔ́kɔ́ mɛnwɔ́ptí batu anɛ́ be babhɔŋ bǎpú kwak bo mámbʉ́rɛ́ bɛbhé bhɔ yɛ̌ mandú.
42011047	Chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ntá yɛka ɛncha! Bachǐmbɨ bhɛka báwày nyaka barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ. Bǎtè manɛm ayap nɛ́nɛ, mǎngwati mbɨ arɛ́ bɛkʉ yɔ ándɨ́ amɨk.
42011048	Bɛkʉ ɛnyu ɛyɔ, ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ bǎchi ɛnyumɔt mbɔ bachǐmbɨ bhɛka abhɛn báwáy nyaka barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm ndǔ bǎtè bɛrɨ́ti manɛm ntá yap.
42011049	Ɛ̌tiyɔ, kɛ Mandɛm, ndǔ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛni, árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ ‘Chɔŋ ntó barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nɛ bǒnto bha ntá bo Israɛl; nɛ chɔŋ mǎngwáy mbɔk ɛyap, nɛ mánchyɛ abhɛ́nɛ́fú bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri.’
42011050	Chɔŋ Mandɛm antɛmsi yɛ mkpáká bho abhɛn ɛchɔŋ ɛ̌ti manoŋ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ mankɛm abhɛn bɔ báwáy tɛ nɛbhǒmɨk,
42011051	bɛbho nɛ Ábɛl kpát bɛghaka amʉɛt Sakaría mu báwáy nɛntɨ ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ akap nɛ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Nchí ghati bhe bɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm antɛmsi mkpáká bho abhɛn ɛchɔŋ ɛ̌ti bawú yɔ ankɛm!
42011052	Bě batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm, chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛp ntá yɛka ɛncha! Bǎbhɛsɛ ɛfɨŋɨ́ ɛnɛ mánɛ̀nɛ mbǐnywɔp anɛ mmu áfʉɛ̀t arɛ́ kɛ ambɔ́ŋ nɛjwǐmɛm ndǔ barak Mandɛm. Bǎbhɨkɨ chwe arɛ, nɛ bǎchyɛt mbi ntá abhɛn báyàŋ nyaka bɛchwe arɛ!”
42011053	Nɛrɔ anɛ Yesu árɔ̀ nɛbhʉɛt wu, batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi babho bɛchiti yi nɛ bɛbhɛ́p, mányɔŋti nɔkɔ yi bɛkʉ yi ankwɛn anyu.
42011054	Nɛ mánɔbhɛri nɔkɔ yí ndu bɛkʉ yi ákwɛ́n ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu.
42012001	Ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ́m nɔ, bo báre twɔ, kpát báyá báchá, mánjati nɔkɔ batɨ. Yesu ayambɨ arɛm ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Sɔt ka mpok nɛ yís bǒnkwɔ Fárisi. Báchi chi bǒ bɛtábhá.
42012002	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bakuti, chɔŋ mánɛnɛ. Nɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ chɔŋ mánkʉ bo mandɨŋɨ yɔ.
42012003	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎrɛ́mɛ́ ansɛm ansɛm, chɔŋ bo mangok yɔ kpoŋoroŋ. Nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghati bǎrǔ bho ansɛm ansɛm chɔŋ bo mánte amfay bɛkɛt mámbɨk bɛ bo mángók.
42012004	“Mamʉrɛ bha, nchí ghati bhe bɛ, bǎkɛ́ cháy bǒ mmɨk. Bǎkway bɛway chi mmʉɛt nkwǎ kɛ bápu kway bɛku ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak ɛnɛ ɛbɛbhɛ ɛcha ɛyɔ.
42012005	Ghók ká mmu anɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́chay. Cháy ka mmu anɛ ákway bɛway mmʉɛt yɛka, nɛ ankwáy mɛmɛsɛ be amɛm nɛpǐngo!
42012006	Pú mmu akway bɛku bɔ̌kɛnɛn batay nɛ nkáp anɛ apu yɛ̌nyɨŋ? Yɛ̌ nɔ, Mandɛm apú ghɔkɔntɨk yɛ̌ amɔt.
42012007	Kɛ ná nɛ be? Mandɛm arɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ chí mpǎy bɛkaká ɛmɛnɛ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka anti. Bǎkɛ́ chay yɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bo bakway bɛkʉ bhe. Bɛsí Mandɛm, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka abhɔŋ mɛnwɔp tontó achá ngɛ́mtáy kɛnɛn.
42012008	“Nchí ghati yɛ be bɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m kpoŋoroŋ bɛsí bǒ mmɨk bɛ yi achi mmu wa, chɔŋ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ndɛm bɛsí bɔángɛl Mandɛm ndǔ nywɔp manyé bɛ mmu wu achi awa.
42012009	Kɛ mmu anɛ ataŋa kpoŋoroŋ bɛsí bho bɛ apu mmu wa, chɔŋ mɛnkwɔ ntaŋa bɛsí bɔángɛl Mandɛm bɛ yi apu mmu wa.
42012010	Nɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm amfoŋori yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm, kɛ apú foŋori mmu anɛ árɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.
42012011	Mpok básɔ́rɛ́ bhe ambɨ ndu bɛtaŋ be amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛbhap nɛ bɛsí bǒbati ɛtɔk nɛ bɔgɔ́bhanɔ, bǎkɛ́ sɛmɛ ɛnyǔ bǎkwày bɛtaŋa mmʉɛt nɛ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ bɛrɛm.
42012012	Mpok ɛyɔ chɔŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ántɔ́ŋ be ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm.”
42012013	Ɛnɛ́ Yesu ǎchyɛ̀ baghɔkɔ́ bhi maniɛ ɛnyu ɛyɔ, mmu amɔt amɛm ngɛ́mtáy bho arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, ghatí mɔ́maya ánkɔ́rɛ́ nɛwú ɛtayɛsɛ ánchyɛ́ ɛbha mɛnyɨŋ!”
42012014	Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Nkwánɛ, agha ábhʉ́rɛ́ mɛ́ ntaŋá manyé nɛ nkɔ́rɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛwú ntá yɛka?”
42012015	Kɛ arɔk ambɨ arɛm ntá bo mankɛm bɛ, “Sɔt ka mpok! Kɛ́m ká mmʉɛt bɛ bǎkɛ́ fyɛ ngoŋo ndu bɛbhɔŋ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ. Puyɛ̌ chi bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ kɛ bɛ́kɛ̀m nɛpɛ́m nkwǎ.”
42012016	Yesu átɛ́m bɔ́ nɛkay bɛ, “Nkɨ mǔnkáp amɔt áchyɛ̀ nyaka yi bɛyǎ mbwɔt.
42012017	Ɛkʉ abho bɛ́káysi andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ nkʉ yi? Mbɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ nɛbhʉɛt bɛ́bhʉrɛ mbwɔt?’
42012018	Kɛ árɛm nɛ mmʉɛt yi bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ mmokoti bɛ̌tak ɛbha, ngoko ɛbhɛn bɛ́chɨ́kɨ́tí, mfyɛ́ mbwɔt aya nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbha arɛ.’
42012019	Ndɛm yɛ nɛ mmʉɛ́t ɛya bɛ, ‘Ɔnáŋ ɔbhɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛsɔt bɛyǎ mamiɛ́. Kɛ́pɛrɛ sɔŋɔri mmʉɛt. Nyiɛ́, nyú, ɔ́nkʉ maŋák.’
42012020	Kɛ Mandɛm aghati yi bɛ, ‘Wɔ ɛchɨŋtɨ́mu! Nkúbhɛ́ bɛti ɛbhɛn, nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ nɛ́may. Kɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n ɔ́bhʉ́rɛ́ bɛ́rɔ̀p chɔŋ chi ɛbhɛn bo bachak!’
42012021	Nɔ́ kɛ ɛ́fakari nɛ mmu anɛ ábhʉ́rɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ntá yímbɔŋ, kɛ yi kɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛnwɔp bɛsí Mandɛm.”
42012022	Yesu aghati yɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Nɔ́ kɛ̌ nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mmu ákɛ́ bhɔŋ basɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛ́m ɛni bɛ chɔŋ nyiɛ́ yi, chɔŋ mfyɛ́ yi?
42012023	Nɛpɛ́m nkwǎ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ cha nɛnyíɛ́? Nɛpɛ́m nkwǎ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ cha ndɛnɛ́?
42012024	Yɨŋɨ́ ká kɛnɛn. Kɛ́pú kwaŋ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ kɛ́pú fɛrɛ mbwɔt ɛbhɨ. Kɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛkɛt nɛ yɛ̌ chi bɛ̌ták ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhʉ̀rɛ nɛnyíɛ́ arɛ́. Mandɛm kɛ áchyɛ̀ kɔ nɛnyíɛ́, nɛ bɛsí Mandɛm, bǎcha kɛnɛn tontó!
42012025	Nɛ ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka basɛ́mɛ́ ákway bɛkʉ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛ́nsap, yɛ chi mandú nɨŋɨnɨŋɨ nɛ́nchá ɛnyu nɛbhɔŋɔ bɛbhak?
42012026	Mbák yɛ bapú kway bɛkʉ mandú ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛyɔ, ndaká yi bǎbhɔŋ basɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak?
42012027	Yɨŋɨ́ ká bɔchuchu abhɛn bágò. Bápú kʉ bɛtɨk, nɛ bapu ghoko ndɛn. Kɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ, yɛ̌ chí Mfɔ Sólomon mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛyǎ kɛnɛ́m, abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nyaka ndɛn ɛnɛ ɛrɨ mbɔ yɛ̌ chuchu amɔt.
42012028	Mandɛm kɛ̌ ághókó tákɔ nɛ bɛrɨ ɛbhi, tákɔ anɛ ákway bɛbhak ɛchɔŋ, mbúrɛ́ angwɔsi, mámfyɛ́ ango. Bǎkáysí bɛ́ be kɛ̌ Mandɛm apu kwáy bɛ́kwák mǎmbɔ́ŋ ndɛn bɛ́fyɛ́ amʉɛt kɛ? Nɛka ɛnɛká nɛ Mandɛm nɛ́gʉ́psi nɛcha!
42012029	Bǎkɛ́ sɔŋɔri yɛ batɨ̌ yɛka bɛbhɛp ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ mɛ́nyiɛ nɛ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ mɛnyu.
42012030	Bǒ mmɨk bákòŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn kɛ dɨŋɨ́ ka bɛ Ɛtayɛka arɨŋɨ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛbhɔŋ bɔ́.
42012031	Fíɛ́ ká ntí chi bɛ Mandɛm ámbák Mfɔ ywɛka, nɛ chɔŋ yí anchyɛ be mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm nkwɔ.
42012032	“Bɔ̌bha, bǎkɛ́ chay, yɛ̌ndu bǎchi nkwɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n anɛ abhɨkɨ ya. Mandɛm abhɔŋ maŋák bɛchyɛ be akɔrɛ ndǔ kɛfɔ ɛki.
42012033	Tí ká mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ mǎnchyɛ nkáp ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho. Bɔ́ŋ ká bɔ̌bɛbhǎ-nkap abhɛn bápú chɔŋɔ bɛ nkáp anɛm. Bʉrɛ́ ká kɛfɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ɛkɛka amfay. Arɛ́, kɔ́ kɛ́bhak mpoknkɛm. Yɛ̌ ngɛ́p apu kway bɛghɛp ɛnyɨŋ arɛ, nɛ kɛngɔk apú chwe ánchɔŋti yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
42012034	Ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ nkáp ywɛ áchí, arɛ́ kɛ̌ ntɨ ɛnɛ nkwɔ nɛ́bhak.
42012035	“Toŋtí ká mmʉɛt mǎndurɛ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɛka.
42012036	Bák ká mbɔ bɔ̌-bɛtok abhɛn mánòŋ bɛ chi-bɛtɨk awap amfu ndǔ ɛpǎ nɛbhay ɛnɛ yi árɔ́ŋɔ́ arɛ ampɛtnsɛm bɛ mánɛ́nɛ́ mbǐnywɔp ntá yi tɛ́mté, mpok yi átwɔ́ ádɛ́bhɛ́ nɛkok.
42012037	Chɔŋ ɛndɨ ɛncha ntá bo abhɛn bábhak pě mpok ɛtayap átwɔ́! Tɛtɛp nchí ghati bhe bɛ mpok yi atwɔ, ǎghati bhɔ manchɔkɔ amɨk, anchóŋ ndɛn ɛyi, ansɔt nɛnyíɛ́ anchyɛ bhɔ manyíɛ́.
42012038	Yɛ̌ antwɔ́ chí nɛ nɛ́ntɨ́ bhiti, yɛ̌ chí mpok nkɔk ɛ́kòk, kɛ antɛmɛri bhɔ pě, ɛ́rɨ ɛncha ntá bǒ bɛtok bhɔ!
42012039	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mbɔ mbɔŋɔ́kɛt ǎrɨŋɨ nɛŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp ɛnɛn ngɛ́p átwɔ̀, mbʉ apú rɔ mándak ɛkɛt ɛyi.
42012040	Bě nkwɔ bǎbhɔŋ bɛtoŋti mmʉɛt Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm átwɔ̀ chɔŋ chi ndǔ mpok anɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ kaysi bɛ yi ǎtwɔ̀.”
42012041	Píta abhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ɔtɛ̌m nɛkay ɛnɛn chí ntá yɛsɛ kɛ chi ntá bo mankɛm?”
42012042	Acha akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mmǔ bɛtok anɛ achi tɛtɛp nɛ ndɨŋɨndak chí anɛ? Chí anɛ chi-bɛtɨk ywi áchyɛ́ yi bɛtaŋ bɛ anjɨŋɨ nɔkɔ batɨ̌ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhɛn bachi amɛm ɛfo yi, anchyɛ nɔkɔ bhɔ awap ákɔrɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ndǔ mpok.
42012043	Chɔŋ ɛndɨ ɛncha ntá mǔbɛtok wu anɛ chi-bɛtɨk ywi átwɔ antɛmɛri yi ndu ákʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ baghati yi ankʉ!
42012044	Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mbák nkʉbɛtɨk wu ákʉ nɔ chi-bɛtɨk ywi ǎchyɛ yi bɛtaŋ amfǎy mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhí mɛnkɛm.
42012045	Kɛ mbák mǔbɛtok arɛm bɛ, chi-bɛtɨk awa ǎtat bɛ́twɔ, ambo bɛdɛn bɔ̌-bɛtok bachak, abhɛn baghɔrɛ́ nɛ abhɛn babhakanɛm, nɛ ambo mɛ́nyiɛ, anyu nɔkɔ, kpát mmɛm ánkɛm yi,
42012046	chi-bɛtɨk ywi ǎtwɔ̀ ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn mǔbɛtok abhɨkɨ kaysi bɛ yí ǎtwɔ̀ nɛ ndǔ nɛŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp ɛnɛn mǔbɛtok wu abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ. Antɛmsi yi, amfyɛ yi nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Mandɛm bachi.
42012047	Nɛ mǔbɛtok anɛ árɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ chi-bɛtɨk áyàŋ yi ankʉ, kɛ yi kɛ toŋti mmʉɛt ankʉ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́yaŋ, bátɛmsi chɔŋ yi sayri.
42012048	Kɛ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ chi-bɛtɨk áyàŋ yi ankʉ, mbák akʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́yàŋ mantɛmsi yi, báchyɛ yi chi mandú ntɛmsi. Bábhɛp tontó ntá mmu anɛ báchyɛ́ yi tontó. Nɛ báfyɛ amɨ́k tontó ntá mmu anɛ báfyɛ́ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ amɔ́ yi.”
42012049	Yesu apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Ntwɔ bɛgʉɛp chi ngó fá amɨk. Mbɔ ánaŋ akɛm, mbʉ nkɔŋ tontó!
42012050	Chɔŋ mámfyɛ́ mɛ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔ mmǔ anɛ báfyɛ́ yi anyɛ́n ndǔ mpok anɛ bájwìti yi. Ntɨ nɛ́pú pɔp mɛ amɛm tɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ ɛ́ntwɔ ɛmfʉɛt!
42012051	Bǎkáysí bɛ́ ntwɔ fá amɨk chi bɛkʉ bo mámbák ndu kpák nɛ batɨ kɛ? Ǎe, ntwɔ chí nɛ akɔrɛ.
42012052	Bɛ́bhó nɛ́nɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ bo bachi arɛ bati atay, chɔŋ ákɔ́rɛ́ ámbak nɛntɨ nap. Bati arat kɛka abhɛn bati apay. Bati apay kɛka abhɛn bati arat.
42012053	Ákɔ́rɛ́ ábhak chɔŋ ɛnyunɛ́ chi ápap mɔ́ywi anɛ mbakanɛm, mmɔ̌ anɛ mbakanɛm ampap ɛtayi, nnɔ ampap mɔ́ywi anɛ ngɔrɛ́, mɔ́ywi anɛ ngɔrɛ́ ampap nnɔ. Nnɔnɛ́m ampap ngɔrɛ́ mɔ́ywi, ngɔrɛ́ ampap nnɔnɛ́m ɛ́ywi.”
42012054	Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá ngɛ́mtay bho abhɛn bachi arɛ bɛ, “Mǎnáŋ mǎngɔ́ nɛbu ndǔ nɛ́gírí ndǔ ɛbhě nɛbu ɛnɛ mmok ánɛm arɛ, bǎrɛm bɛ ‘Manyiɛp átwɔ kwɛn’; nɛ ɛ́mbak ɛnyu yɔ.
42012055	Nɛ mǎnáŋ mǎngɔ nɛbháŋ ndu nɛbho bɛkwɛn, bǎrɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛnɛm ɛ́twɔ̀’; nɛ ɛ́mbak ɛnyu yɔ.
42012056	Bě bǒ bɛtabha! Bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ nɛbu mǎndɛm mbák manyiɛp ǎkwɛn chɔŋ, nɛ mbák apu kwɛn. Ndaká yí bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ákʉ̀ ndǔ mpokó-nɛ?
42012057	“Ndak yí bě babhɔŋ bapú kway bɛrɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak bɛ mmu ankʉ?
42012058	Mbák ɔbhɔ̌ŋ ndak nɛ mmu nɛ yi ákʉ́ manyé nɛ wɔ, ɔ̌kʉ yi? Ɔ́bhɔ̌ŋ bɛ́ghɔ bɛ ndaka wu ámay ansɛm ɛnɛ́ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ ndu acha manyé. Mbák ɔ́nká yi ansɔt wɔ ambɨ ndǔ manyé, ntaŋá manyé ǎchyɛ̀ wɔ ntá bo mbɨ̌ŋ nkú nɛ bɔ mámfe wɔ.
42012059	Nchí ghati wɔ bɛ, ɔpú fu wawak kpátɛ ɔnchyɛ ákwɔ́ ywɛ ankɛm, yɛ̌nyɨŋ kɛrɔp.”
42013001	Nkúbhɛ́ mpok yɔ, mbɔk bho abhɛn bachi arɛ́, bátɛ́mɛ Yesu ɛ̌ti bo Galili abhɛn Páílet akʉ baway mpok báchyɛ̀ akap ntá Mandɛm.
42013002	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎkáysí bɛ bo Galili bhɔ bákʉ́ nyaka bɛbʉ́ bacha bǒ ɛtɔk Gálili bachak kɛ?
42013003	Nɔ́ bhɔ! Dɔ̌ ngati be bɛ, mbák bǎbhɨkɨ tɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka, chɔŋ be mankɛm mǎngu mbɔ bhɔ.
42013004	Ná nɛ bǒ batí nɛku-nɛ-arat abhɛn ɛkɛrɛ́mfáy ɛnɛ ɛchi nɛpak ɛ̌ntɨ́ŋnyɛn Sílom ɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́ ɛ́wáy? Bǎkáysí bɛ́ ɛfákárí nyaka nɛ bhɔ ɛnyu yɔ chí ndu bákʉ́ bɛbʉ́ bacha bo bachak abhɛn bachi ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm yɔ kɛ?
42013005	Nɔ́ bhɔ! Nchí ghati be bɛ, mbák bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ tɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka, chɔŋ bě mankɛm mǎngu mbɔ bhɔ.”
42013006	Yesu atɛ́m yɛ bhɔ nɛkay ɛnɛn bɛ, “Mmu amɔt apɨ nyaka ɛnɔk ɛnɛ babhɨŋɨ bɛ́ fig amɛm nkɨ ywi. Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ mɛ́nyu kɛpɛm, are kɔ ambyo nɔkɔ mbák ɛ́nyu kɛpɛm, kɛ akɛ ghɔ́ yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
42013007	Aghati mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛtɨk amɛm nkɨ wu bɛ ‘Yɨŋɨ́, ndǔ mamiɛ́ árát nchí twɔ bɛyaŋ kɛpɛm ndǔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ, kɛ mpu ghɔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Kpɔ́t yɔ́ gʉ́ɛ́p amɨk! Ɛ́kʉ̀ kpɨ́k yi fá téé, ɛ́nchɛt nɔkɔ mmɨk ndɛ́ndɛm?’
42013008	Nkʉ bɛtɨk wu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, ‘Ɛta, dɔ̌ ɛ́mpɛ́t ɛmbak ndǔ mmíɛ́ ɛnɛn nkwɔ. Chɔŋ ntɛ́m nnɛt ywi ngabhɛri, mfyɛ́ ntɔbhɛ́-píɔ.
42013009	Nɛ mbák ɛ́nyu kɛpɛm mmíɛ́ mbúrɛ́ ɛ́ndɨ, kɛ mbák ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ nyu kɛpɛm, ɔ̌kwáy bɛghati mɛ mkpɔt yɔ ngʉɛp amɨk.’”
42013010	Ɛwak nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt bo Israɛl, Yesu áre tɔŋ bo amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ɛyap.
42013011	Ngɔrɛ́ amɔt abhak arɛ́ anɛ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́kʉ́ yi ápɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ mamiɛ́ nɛku-nɛ-arat, yí kɛpɛrɛ kway bɛkɔ chak.
42013012	Yesu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi, abhɨŋɨ yí arɛm bɛ, “Mmá, nɛme ɛnɛ nɛ́may.”
42013013	Atɔk yi nɛ amɔ. Tɛ́mte wu, anyabhɛ mmʉɛt téé, abho bɛbɨti Mandɛm.
42013014	Mǔnti ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Yesu akʉ mɔ́ngɔrɛ́ wu ataŋ ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt ɛnap, abé ntɨ, abho bɛrɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ ntá bo abhɛn bachi arɛ bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɔŋ manywɔp átándat ndǔ bɛ́kʉ bɛtɨk. Mmu ámbɔ́ŋ nɛme, ántwɔ́ chí amɛm manywɔp ayɔ bɛ mámbú yi. Ɛ́kɛ́pɛrɛ bhak chi ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt.”
42013015	Yesu Acha akɛmɛ yɛ yi bɛ, “Bě bǒ bɛtabha! Ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka ápú kaŋari yɛ chí mpɔŋ yi, yɛ̌ chi mpɔŋɔ batu yi ándɔ́k anchyɛ yɔ́ manyiɛp ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt?
42013016	Ná nɛ ngɔrɛ́ nɛ, mmɔ́ Ábraham anɛ Satan ágwɔ́rɛ́ ndǔ mamiɛ́ nɛku nɛ arat. Ɛ́chí ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ bɛfɛrɛ yi ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt kɛ?”
42013017	Nɛrɛm Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ, ntíánwɔ́p akɛm bǒmpap abhi mankɛm. Kɛ bɛyǎ bo bábhɔ́ŋ maŋák bɛ yi ǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay bhɔ mɛnkɛm.
42013018	Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, Yesu arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Kɛfɔ Mandɛm kɛ́chí mbɔ yi? Chɔŋ njɛnti kɔ nɛ yí?
42013019	Kɛfɔ Mandɛm fá amɨk kɛ́chi mbɔ mɔ́sɛpɛm anɛ ɛ́nɔk ɛnɛ́ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ mɔ́stat, anɛ bápɨ́ amɛm nkɨ, sɛ́chák, sɛ́gó, sɛ́rɔ́p ɛnɔk ɛnɛ kɛnɛn kɛ́twɔ̀ kɛ́nte manyay ndǔ batáp ayi.”
42013020	Yesu apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ mpɛt njɛnti Kɛfɔ Mandɛm nɛ yi?
42013021	Kɛchi mbɔ yís anɛ ngɔrɛ́ ásɔ́rɛ́ achɛm nɛ nchán fláwa ɛ́rát. Mandu yís wu akʉ fláwa nkɛm amwɔt, kpát ajwi amɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yi achi arɛ́.”
42013022	Ɛnɛ́ Yesu árɔ̀ŋ Yerúsalɛm, are te ndǔ bɛtɔk bɛgho nɛ bɔ̌bɛtɔk antɔŋ nɔkɔ bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
42013023	Mmǔ amɔt abhɛp yi bɛ, “Acha, chɔŋ Mandɛm ampɛmɛ chi bǎru bho?” Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ,
42013024	“Nu ka bɛ́fʉɛ́t ndǔ nyǔbhá anɛ áchí mábhɛ́rí. Nchí ghati bhe bɛ bɛyǎ bho báyàŋ chɔŋ bɛfʉɛt manchwe kɛ bápú bhɔŋ mbi.
42013025	Mbɔŋɔ́kɛt ánáŋ chɔŋ amfate antiɛp mbǐnywɔp, bǎte nɛfí mǎndɛp nɔkɔ nɛkok nɛ mǎnɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt bɛ, ‘Acha, nɛnɛ́ bhɛsɛ mbǐnywɔp.’ Kɛ mbɔŋɔ́kɛt ankɛmɛ chí bɛ, ‘Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bhe nɛ yɛ̌ chí ɛbhak ɛnɛ bǎfú.’
42013026	Mǎmbo yɛ bɛrɛm bɛ, ‘Pú sɛ́chɔkɔ nyaka nɛbhʉɛt amɔt sɛ́nyíɛ́, nɛ sɛnyu nɛ wɔ? Nɛ ɔtɔ́ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm amɛm bɛtɔk ɛbhɛsɛ?’
42013027	Kɛ ákɛmɛ bhe chi bɛ, ‘Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bhe nɛ yɛ̌ chi ɛbhak ɛnɛ bǎfú. Fǎ ká mɛ bɛsí, bě bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ mankɛm!’
42013028	Arɛ́, chɔŋ mǎndi kɛbhɔ nɛ mǎmbak ndǔ nɛnyiɛ ámɛ́n mpok bǎghɔ Ábraham nɛ Áisek nɛ Jekɔ́p nɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ mankɛm chɔkɔ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́ kɛfɔ̌ Mandɛm, ɛnɛ́ bátiɛ́bhɛ́ be nɛfí.
42013029	Chɔŋ bo mámfu mbɨ nɛ nsɛm, ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm nɛ awɔ́ghɔ, mánchɔkɔ mányiɛ ɛpǎ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́ kɛfɔ̌ Mandɛm.
42013030	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, chɔŋ mbɔk bho abhɛn báchí ansɛm nɛ́nɛ mándɔp bǒmbɨ, nɛ abhɛn báchí bǒmbɨ mandɔp ansɛm.”
42013031	Ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ mpok ɛyɔ, mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bárɔk bágháti Yesu bɛ, “Fǎ fá dɔk ɛbhak ɛ́chák. Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd ǎyàŋ bɛ́way wɔ!”
42013032	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká ghatí Hɛ́rɔd ɛsɔp ɛyɔ bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ ndɔk ambɨ bɛ́bok bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ nɛ mbú bho ɛchɔŋ nɛ mbúrɛ́, nɛ ɛ́gháká nɔkɔ manywɔp arat, nnaŋa bɛtɨk ɛbha.
42013033	Yɛ̌ndu ɛ́chí nɔ́, mbɔŋ bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm. Nchí kɔ ɛchɔŋ nɛ mbúrɛ́ nɛ ɛ́ghaka nɔkɔ ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn nɛjwi arat ńgaka arɛ́. Amɛm Yerúsalɛm kɛ báway nɔkɔ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm.’
42013034	Yesu akók arɛm bɛ, Eé Yerúsalɛm, bǒ Yerusalɛm! Bě bo bǎwày barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm, mǎntɛmti nɔkɔ nɛ batay ndu bɛ́wáy bo Mandɛm átó bɛ mángátí bhe Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi. Ndǔ bɛyǎ mpok, njáŋ bɛsɔt be mfyɛ́ amʉɛt bɛ́ mǎmbak nɛ mɛ mbɔ bɔ̌nkɔk abhɛn nnɔ nkɔk ákútí nɛbhʉɛt amɔt nɛ bɛbhap ɛbhi, kɛ bǎpú ka bɛ nkʉ nɔ!
42013035	Nɛ nɛ́nɛ, chɔŋ Mandɛm amfɛrɛ ntí ndǔ ɛkɛt ɛyɛka, ɛ́ndɔp ɛnyu ɛyɔ. Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, bǎpú pɛrɛ ghɔ́ chɔŋ mɛ́, kpátɛ mpok anɛ bǎrɛ̀m chɔŋ bɛ ‘Sɛ́mbɨ́tí mmu anɛ átwɔ̀ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Mandɛm Acha.’”
42014001	Ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl nɛmɔt, Yesu arɔk mɛ́nyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ mǔnti amɔt anɛ achi mǔnkwɔ Fárisi. Bo Fárisi bhɔ bátɛp yi amɨ́k amʉɛt bɛghɔ ndǔ yi ákʉ̀.
42014002	Mǔfú abhak bɛsí Yesu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛmě afɛmntay.
42014003	Yesu abhɛ́p batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi abhɛn bachi arɛ bɛ, “Ɛbhé ɛyɛsɛ ɛ́ká bɛ mámbú mmu ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt kɛ?”
42014004	Kɛ bákɛ rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Yesu asɔt mmu wu abú yí. Arɔ yɛ yí arɔk.
42014005	Abhɛ́p yɛ́ bhɔ bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka anɛ mɔ́ywi nɛ yɛ̌ mpɔŋ yi ákwɛn amɛm mbokó manyiɛp ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt kɛ yi kɛya yɛ̌ yi, yɛ̌ yɔ tɛ́mté ámfɛ́rɛ́?”
42014006	Bɔ́ kɛkwáy bɛ́kɛmɛ Yesu yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
42014007	Ɛnɛ́ Yesu áyɨ̀ŋɨ, aghɔ́ ndǔ bǒ abhɛn mánáká ndǔ ɛpa báre yap bɛbhaká kɛnókó. Achyɛ bhɔ maniɛ bɛ,
42014008	“Mpok mánáká wɔ ndǔ ɛpǎ nɛbhay, ɔ́kɛ́ tɨŋɨ yap ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛnókó ɔ́nchɔkɔ arɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ ɛ́kwáy bɛfakari bɛ mának mmǔ anɛ acha wɔ.
42014009	Nɛ mmu anɛ ánáká bhe antwɔ́ andɛm bɛ, ‘Faté chyɛ ɛpok ɛnɛ ntá mmǔ-nɛ.’ Mbák ɛ́mfákárí ɛnyu yɔ, ɔ̌faté nɛ bɛyǎ ntíánwɔ́p bɛ́rɔŋ bɛchɔkɔ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌ mandú kɛnókó.
42014010	Mpok mánáká wɔ ndǔ ɛpa, yap chi ɛnɔk ɛnɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌ kɛnókó, bɛ mmu anɛ ánáká ɛpa ántwɔ́, ankwáy bɛrɛm ntá yɛ bɛ, ‘Nkwǎnɛ, twɔ́ chɔkɔ ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛnókó.’ Bǒ ɛpa bachak mángɔ bɛ mmu anɛ ánáká ɛpa ǎchyɛ̀ wɔ kɛnókó.
42014011	Yɛ̌ agha anɛ áyòŋ mmʉɛt, Mandɛm ǎsɛ̀pti yi amɨk. Nɛ mmu anɛ ásɛ̀pti mmʉɛt amɨk, Mandɛm ǎkòsi yi amfay.”
42014012	Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá mmu anɛ ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ yí ndǔ ɛpa nkwɔ bɛ, “Mpok ɔ́bhɨ́ŋɨ́ bho ndǔ nɛnyíɛ́, ɔ́kɛ́ bhɨŋɨ chi mamʉɛrɛ bhɛ, nɛ bǒnɛrɛ́kɛt ywɛ, nɛ bǒ nkáp abhɛn bachi kɛkwɔt nɛ wɔ. Mbák ɔ́mbɨ́ŋɨ́ chi mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ, bɔ́ nkwɔ́ bákway bɛbhɨŋɨ wɔ bɛ́ ɔ́nyíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ bhɔ nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́mbak akap anɛ ɔ́bhɔŋ.
42014013	Mbák ɔ̌nàk ɛpa, bɨŋɨ́ bachɛ́bhɛ́bho, nɛ babák, nɛ bakɛm, nɛ manɛmamɨ́k.
42014014	Nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́ndɨ ɛncha mbɔnyunɛ mɛnyǔ bǒbhɔ bápú kway bɛkɛmɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́kʉ́ ntá yap. Kɛ Mandɛm ǎkap wɔ mpok yi ákʉ̀ bo abhɛn bachi chak bɛsí bhi mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
42014015	Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́rɛ́m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, mmu amɔt anɛ áchí ndǔ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ yi, arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Chɔŋ ɛ́ndɨ ntá yɛ̌ agha anɛ ányíɛ ɛpǎ ɛnɛ ɛ́bhak ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt Kɛfɔ Mandɛm awu amfay!”
42014016	Nɛ Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Mmǔfu anak nyaka ɛrɛm ɛpa, abhɨŋɨ bɛyǎ bho.
42014017	Mpok anɛ ɛpa ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbho ákwáy nɔ́kɔ́, ató mɔ̌bɛtok ywi bɛ andɔk angati bo abhɛn yi anaka bɛ, ‘Twɔ́ ká, mánaŋ batoŋti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.’
42014018	Arɔk aghati bhɔ́, kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap arɔbhɛ ghati yi chí bɛ ndak akɛm yi. Anɛ mbɨ arɛm bɛ ‘Nku nkɨ nɛ mbɔŋ bɛ́rɔŋ bɛyɨŋɨ wu. Nɨkmʉɛt, ghatí ɛtayɛ bɛ ákɛ́ bentɨ.’
42014019	Achák arɛm bɛ, ‘Nku mpɔŋ byó ɛnɛ ɛ́kwàŋ bakɨ. Nchí yaŋ ndɔ́k ngɔ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn yɔ ɛ́kwày bɛkʉ. Nɨkmʉɛ́t. Ghatí Ɛtayɛ bɛ́ ákɛ́ bentɨ.’
42014020	Anɛfú arɛm bɛ, ‘Nɛ́nɛ kɛ mbáy ngɔrɛ́. Mpú kwáy yɛ bɛ́twɔ.’
42014021	Mmɔ̌ bɛtok wu arɔk aghati ɛtayi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǒbhɔ bárɛmɛ. Mbɔŋɔ́kɛt abéntɨ. Aghati mɔ̌bɛtok yi wu bɛ, ‘Fú, dɔ́k áyák ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbay anɛ áchí ɛtɔk nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛbhʉɛ́t anɛ bo báchí arɛ sɔt bachɛ́bhɛ́bho twɔ ndǔ ɛpa nɛ bhɔ. Twɔ́ nɛ babák nɛ bakɛm nɛ manɛ́mámɨk.’
42014022	Mmɔ̌ bɛtok arɔk atwɔ́, arɛm ntá yi bɛ, ‘Ɛta, nkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɔ́rɛ́mɛ́ kɛ ɛkɛt ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re jwi.’
42014023	Ɛtayi arɛm bɛ, nɛ́nɛ ‘Fú, dɔ́k, ɛtɔk ndǔ babhǐ agho nɛ ndǔ babhǐ bɛbhɨ. Fíɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ́ bo mántwɔ́ bɛ́ ɛkɛt ɛpa ɛ́njwi.
42014024	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, yɛ̌ mmu amɔt ndǔ bo abhɛn njambɨ kɛ bɔ́ kɛtwɔ́, apú kwáy bɛ́ghókóti ɛnyɨŋ ndǔ ɛpa ɛya-nɛ.’”
42014025	Ngɛ́mtay bho báré kɔ nɛ Yesu. Ayibhiri mmʉɛ́t arɛm ntá yap bɛ,
42014026	“Mbák mmu áyàŋ bɛ́bhak nɛ mɛ apú kwáy bɛbhák nkoŋo wa mbák abhɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ mɛ ánchá ɛtayi nɛ máyi, nɛ ngɔrɛ́ ywi, nɛ bɔ̌bhi, nɛ, bɔ̌mayi abhɛn babhakanɛm nɛ abhɛn baghɔrɛ́ nɛ ankɔŋ mɛ ancha yɛ chí mmʉɛrɛ́ yi.
42014027	Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛpɔkɔ ɛyi ɛko ankoŋo mɛ apú kway bɛbhak nkoŋo wa.
42014028	“Mbák mmu ywɛka ǎyàŋ bɛte ɛkɛt ɛgho, pú ǎyambɨ anchɔkɔ amɨk ankay, angɔ mbák nkáp anɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ akway anɛ yi áte ɛkɛt anaŋa?
42014029	Mbák abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ nɔ, ǎkwáy bɛghoko nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́kɛt kɛ yí kɛte ɛkɛt ánáŋá, nɛ bo abhɛn bághɔ́ yɔ mámbo bɛ́wáy yi bɛ,
42014030	‘Anɛ abho bɛte ɛkɛt kɛ ɛcha yi mɛnaŋa.’
42014031	“Nɛ sɛ́nsɔt bɛ mfɔ amɔt abhɔ̌ŋ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nka byo (10, 000). Apɛrɛ́ rɔŋ mɛnu nɛ mfɔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nka ɛsa, (20, 000) ǎkʉ yi? Pú ǎyambɨ anchɔkɔ, ankaysi sayri, mbák ǎkway mɛnu nɛ mfɔ wu?
42014032	Nɛ mbák ángɔ́ bɛ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kway, ǎto bo ntá mfɔ wu mpok batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bhi babhʉɛt nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ bɛ mánsókórí ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bápú nu nɛ batɨ.”
42014033	Yesu arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Ɛ́chí ɛnyumɔt nɛ be mankɛm. Mbák mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ntɨ bɛrɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́, apú kway bɛbhak nkoŋo wa.”
42014034	Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ngáŋ áchí ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ. Kɛ mbák ngáŋ ábhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ manyɨŋti mi, ná bákway bɛkʉ wu ampɛt ambak ɛrɨ́tí ngáŋ?
42014035	Ɛnyǔ ngáŋ wu ápú pɛrɛ rɨ́ ndǔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Ápú rɨ amɨk nɛ apu rɨ yɛ̌ ndu bɛfyɛ ndu ntó-takɔ anɛ báyàŋ ámpɔ́ɔ́ ánchyɛ ntɔbhɛ́-píɔ. Báto wu to. Mmǔ anɛ áyàŋ bɛghok ántá batu angok sayri.”
42015001	Mpokófu, babhɛbhɛ́ nkábhɛ́nti nɛ bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ bachak báré kap Yesu ndu bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yí átɔ̀ŋ.
42015002	Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm bábho mɛ́nywínti bɛ, “Mɔ́nkwǎnɛ ǎsyɛpti bǒ bɛbʉ́, nɛ ǎnyiɛ tɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ bhɔ.”
42015003	Ɛ́kʉ Yesu atɛ́m bɔ́ nɛkay ɛnɛn bɛ:
42015004	“Sɛ́nsɔ́t bɛ mmǔ ywɛka amɔt abhɔŋ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n bɛsa bɛtay. Mbák amɔt anɛm ɛbhɨ, ǎkʉ̀ yi? Pú ǎrɔ̀ anɛ́ bɛsa mɛnwi nsɛm nɛkʉ nɛ anwi, andɔk bɛyaŋ awu ámɔt kpát ambɔŋ wu?
42015005	Nɛ mbák aghɔ wu, ǎpɔkɔ anyaŋa mankɨ nɛ maŋák,
42015006	nɛ mpok anɛ yi ágháká anywɔ́p, ǎbhɨŋɨ mamʉɛrɛ bhi nɛ bakokosi bhi, angati bhɔ bɛ, ‘Ŋák ká nɛ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ́, mbɔ̌ŋ ághɔ́ŋɔmɛn wa anɛ ánɛ́mɛ́ nyaka.’”
42015007	Yesu arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Nchí ghati bhe bɛ nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ maŋák ǎbhák amfay ntá Mandɛm nɛ bɔángɛl ɛ̌ti mmǔ bɛbʉ́ amɔt anɛ átɨ́kɨ́nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi ɛncha bo bɛsa mɛnwi nsɛm nɛku nɛ anwi abhɛn bákáysi bɛ bachi chak bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ ntí apú anɛ bɔ́ bátɨ̀k nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap.”
42015008	Yesu apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Sɛ́nsɔ́t bɛ ngɔrɛ́ amɔt abhɔŋ bɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nkáp byó. Mbák ɛbhɔk ɛ́mɔt ɛ́nɛm, ǎkʉ yi? Pú ǎdurɛ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́, ansɔt kɛtɨ́ŋɨ́ anyɔ ɛkɛt ɛnkɛm, ambyo sayri mbǎnkɛm kpatɛ angɔ́ yɔ́?
42015009	Nɛ mpok ághɔ́ yɔ ǎbhɨŋɨ mamʉɛrɛ nɛ bakokosi bhi, angati bhɔ bɛ ‘Ŋák ká nɛ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ ngɔ̌ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nkap ɛnɛ ɛnɛmɛ.’
42015010	Yesu arɛm yɛ bɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ bɔángɛl Mandɛm bábhɔŋ maŋák ɛ̌ti mmǔ bɛbʉ́ amɔt anɛ átɨ́kɨ́nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi.”
42015011	Ndu bɛrɔŋ ambɨ Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mmǔfú abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɔ̌ babhakanɛm bati apay.
42015012	Ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t, anɛ mɔ́nkwɛn arɛm ntá ɛtayi bɛ, ‘Ɛta, chyɛ awa ákɔ́rɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́.’ Ɛtayap akɔrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi ntá yap bati apay.
42015013	Ansɛm mpǎy manywɔp, anɛ mɔ́nkwɛn anyokoti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi apɔkɔ arɔk ɛtɔk ɛ́chák nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ. Arɛ́ achɔŋti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi mɛnkɛm ndu mɛ́nyiɛ ɛpɔ̌ nɛpɛm.
42015014	Áchɔ́ŋtí nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, ɛrɛmɛ́ nsay ɛ́kwɛ́n ɛtɔk ɛyɔ ɛnkɛm, arɔp amɔ apay.
42015015	Ɛkʉ arɔk, abhat mmʉɛt nɛ mmǔ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ amɔt. Ató yi bɛ ándɔ́k, áne nɔ́kɔ́ bakók bhi amɛm nkɨ ywi.
42015016	Are yáŋ mɛnyiɛ nɛnyiɛ́ bakók, kɛ yɛ̌ mmu kɛchyɛ yi ɛnyɨŋ mɛnyiɛ.
42015017	Kɛ ásɔ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nkaysi nɛ mmʉɛt yi arɛm bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ ká mɛ-á, bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk ɛtaya báchí awu mányìɛ̀ nɛnyíɛ́ mmʉɛt ngɔkngɔk, mándɔ nɔkɔ mbɔk, nsay átwɔ way mɛ fá!
42015018	Chɔŋ mfá mpɛtnsɛm ntá Ɛtaya ngati yi bɛ, “Ɛta, nkʉ Mandɛm bɛbʉ́, nɛ nkʉ wɔ bɛbʉ́.
42015019	Mbɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ kway mmu anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ mɔ́ywɛ. Sɔt mɛ chí mbɔ nkʉbɛtɨk ywɛ̌ amɔt.”’
42015020	Afate abho bɛpɛtnsɛm ntá ɛtayi. Kɛ ɛnɛ́ yi abhʉɛt nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ, chi aghɔ́ yi ndu átwɔ̀. Ntínso nɛ́kɛ́m yi, afate, ajɛt arɔk akɛ́m yi abhɛnɛ.
42015021	Mmɔ arɛm ntá yi bɛ, ‘Ɛta, nkʉ Mandɛm bɛbʉ́, nɛ nkʉ wɔ bɛbʉ́, nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ kwáy mmu anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ mɔ́ywɛ.’
42015022	Kɛ chi aghati bɔ̌-bɛtok bhi bɛ, ‘Twɔ́ ká ayak nɛ ɛ́wɛt ɛnɛ ɛrɨ́ ɛ́chá mǎnsɔbhɛri yi nɛ yɔ, mǎmfyɛ́ yi sɛnɔŋ ndǔ sɛnɔŋáwɔ, nɛ nkwɔbhánya bɛkak.
42015023	Dɔ́k yɛ ká mǎnkɛm mɔ́sɛnɛ́ mpɔŋ mǎngwáy mǎnkʉ nɛnyíɛ́ bɛ sɛ́nyíɛ́ sɛnkʉ maŋák,
42015024	mbɔnyunɛ mɔ́wa-nɛ agǔ nyaka, kɛ nɛ̌nɛ apɛt achi nɛpɛ́m. Anɛm nyaka kɛ mpɛt ngɔ yí.’ Afɔ̌ kɛ̌ ɛpa ɛ́bhó.
42015025	“Mpǒk yɔ, mɔ́ywi anɛ nsénsí abhak ɛbhɨ. Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛkwɔ́t nɛ ɛkɛt ndǔ yi afu ɛbhɨ ápɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p, aghók ndǔ nkɛnkwɛt nɛ nɛbhɛ́n nɛ́chí anywɔ́p.
42015026	Abhɨŋɨ mmɔ̌bɛtok amɔt abhɛ́p yí bɛ ‘Ntɨkɨ ndak áchí fá ɛchɔŋ?’
42015027	Mmɔ̌ bɛtok wu aghati yí bɛ ‘Mɔmáyɛ apɛtnsɛm, kɛ ɛtayɛ áway mɔ́sɛnɛ́ mpɔŋ mbɔnyunɛ́ apɛtnsɛm dok.’
42015028	Mɔ̌mbɨ wu abéntɨ, anisi bɛchwe anywɔ́p. Chi afú arɔk are anɨk yí mmʉɛt bɛ anchwe anywɔ́p.
42015029	Kɛ akɛmɛ ɛtayi chi bɛ, ‘Yɨŋɨ, bɛyǎ mamiɛ́ anɛ ankɛm, nchí fá nɛ wɔ, nkʉ nɔkɔ bɛtɨk ntá yɛ mbɔ nsɛm. Yɛ̌ ɔrɛm bɛ yi, nkʉ kʉ, nkɛ taŋ ntí. Yɛ̌ nɔ, ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ re chyɛ mɛ yɛ̌ chi mɔ́mɛn bɛ́ nkʉ mǎŋák nɛ mamʉɛrɛ bha.
42015030	Kɛ mpok mɔ́ywɛ-nɛ mmu árɔ́ŋɔ́ ányíɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ nɛ baghɔrɛ́-nɛkɔ ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm, ɔwǎy yi ɛsɛnɛ́- mpɔŋ!’
42015031	Chi abhɨŋɨ yɛ yí arɛm bɛ, ‘Mɔ́wa, ɔchí fá nɛ mɛ mpǒk nkɛm, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛya, chí ɛyɛ.
42015032	Ɛ́chí mbʉ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ bɛ sɛnkɛm ɛpa ɛ́nɛ, sɛ́nkʉ́ maŋák, mbɔnyunɛ mɔmáyɛ nɛ agǔ nyaka kɛ nɛ́nɛ achi nɛpɛ́m. Anɛm nyaka kɛ sɛ́pɛt sɛghɔ yi.’”
42016001	Yesu apɛt arɛm ntá bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Mǔnkáp amɔt achi nyaka. Abhɔ́ŋ mǔbɛtɨk anɛ ákɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi mɛnkɛm. Bo bágháti yi bɛ, mmʉ̌ bɛtɨk ywí wu ǎchɔŋti nkáp ywi.
42016002	Abhɨŋɨ mǔbɛtɨk wu arɛm bɛ ‘Ntɨkɨ ndak nɛ́ ngoko ɛ̌ti yɛ? Dɔ́k twɔ́ mɛ́ nɛ bɛkáti ɛbhɛn ɔ́sɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛya arɛ́. Ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ kwáy bɛ́kɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbha.’
42016003	“Mmǔ bɛtɨk wu arɛm nɛ mmʉɛt yi bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ nkʉ yi? Mmʉɛt ápú mɛ́ bɛ́kʉ bɛtɨk bɛtaŋ bɛtaŋ, nɛ ntí ánwɔ̀p mɛ mɛnɨŋɨ mɛnɨŋɨ.
42016004	Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, arɛm bɛ, nɛ́nɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nchí kʉ bɛ́ bo mánsíɛ́ptí mɛ amɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhap mpok báfɛrɛ mɛ ndǔ bɛtɨk.’
42016005	Abhɨŋɨ bǒ barɛm abhɛn chi-bɛtɨk ywi amɔt amɔt. Abhɛ́p anɛ mbɨ bɛ, ‘Yi ɔ́kɛ̀m chi-bɛtɨk wa?’
42016006	Akɛmɛ yi bɛ ‘Babhaŋá bawɛt bɛsa bɛtay.’ Mmǔ bɛtɨk wu aghati yi bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ ɛkati barɛm ɛyɛ, sɔt, wupsi, sɨŋ babhaŋ bɛsa bɛpay nsɛm byo ndǔ ɛnɛ́ ɛkɔ nɛ.’
42016007	Abhɛ́p yɛ anɛfú bɛ, ‘Ɔ̌kɛ́m ná?’ Akɛmɛ bɛ, ‘Bɛbhǎ nchwi bɛsa bɛtay.’ Mmǔ bɛtɨk wu achyɛ yí ɛkati barɛm arɛm bɛ, ‘Sɔt, wupsí sɨ́ŋ bɛbhǎ nchwi bɛsa mɛnwi ndǔ ɛnɛ ɛkɔ.’
42016008	Chi-bɛtɨk ywi ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ arwɔ̌ yi ɛnyuyɔ, akaka yí bɛ́ yi abhɔŋ kɛ́ŋwáŋ bɛ́káysi ndak. Ɛchi tɛtɛp bɛ bǒ mmɨkɨ nɛ bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhap nɛ kɛŋwaŋ bácha ɛnyǔ bo Mandɛm bákʉ̀ ɛbhap.”
42016009	Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Kɛfɔ̌ bakáp nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk kɛ́kway bɛ́twɔ nɛ bɛbɛ́pti mɛnyɨŋ kɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mǎnsɔ́t kɔ mǎnkʉ bo mámbák mamʉɛrɛ bhɛka bɛ́ mpok kɛ́máy, Mandɛm ánsɔt bhe ndǔ bɛchɔ́kɔ́ bhi ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
42016010	Mmǔ anɛ ábhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp ndǔ bǎru mɛnyɨŋ, ǎbhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp mi ndǔ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ. Nɛ mmu anɛ ápú bhʉɛrɛ bariɛp ndǔ bǎru mɛnyɨŋ, apú bhʉɛrɛ bariɛp ndǔ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ nkwɔ.
42016011	Mbák bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ tɔŋ bɛ bǎbhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp ndǔ baraká nkáp nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk, agha ákway bɛsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ be amfyɛ kɛfɔ̌ bakáp ɛkɛn kɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti amɔ yɛka?
42016012	Mbák bǎpú bhʉɛrɛ bariɛp ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn báfyɛ́ amɔ yɛka, yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛchyɛ bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amfay?
42016013	Yɛ̌ mɔbɛtok apu kwáy bɛtok bachi batí apay ndɔŋ amɔt. Mbák ámbɔ́ŋ bachi bapay, ǎkɔŋ amɔt ancha anɛfú, mbák ɛ́pú nɔ́, ǎchyɛ kɛnókó ntá amɔt, ambyak anɛfu. Mmu apu kwáy bɛtok Mandɛm antok nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ mmɨk.”
42016014	Yesu árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, nkwɔ Fárisi bo bákɔ́ŋɔ́ nkáp tontó báre way yi.
42016015	Yesu aghati bɔ bɛ, “Bě bǎchí bo abhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ mmʉɛt bɛ bǎchi chak bɛsí bho. Kɛ Mandɛm arɨŋɨ batɨ yɛka. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bo báyɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ ɛbhɔŋ mɛnwɔp chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ápàp.”
42016016	Yesu apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Jɔ̌n Njwiti ápɛ́rɛ twɔ, bo bátɔ̀ŋ nyaka chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm basɨŋ Moses nɛ amɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ. Basɨŋɨ́ mɔ kɛ̌ bo bákòŋo nyaka. Jɔ̌n átwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́, bábho bɛghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kɛfɔ Mandɛm, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu are nu bɛchwe arɛ́ nɛ bɛtaŋ.
42016017	Kɛ ɛchi wɨkɨrɨk bɛ mfay ámfʉ́ɛ́t, mmɨk amfʉɛt, ɛcha bɛ mandú ɛnyɨŋ ndǔ basɨŋ amɛn Moses nɛ amɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ ánɛ́m.
42016018	Ɛchi yɛ bɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ árɔ́ ngɔrɛ́ ywi ndǔ nɛbhay, akwɛ̌n bɛrwɔp. Nɛ mmǔ anɛ ábháy ngɔrɛ́ anɛ nnɛ́m árɔ́ ndǔ nɛbhay, akwɛ̌n nkwɔ bɛrwɔp.”
42016019	Yesu atɛ́m nɛkay ɛnɛ́n bɛ, “Mǔnkáp amɔt achi nyaka anɛ afyɛ́ ndɛn bɛyǎ nkáp, anyiɛ nɔkɔ ɛpa yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp.
42016020	Nchɛ́bhɛ́mu amɔt achí nyaka. Aka nyɛ́n bɛ Lásárɔs. Báre bhʉrɛ yi ndǔ nyǔbha mǔnkáp wu mpoknkɛm. Mmʉɛt yi ajwi nɛ bɛfʉɛt.
42016021	Abhɔ́ŋ ɛkwak mɛnyiɛ yɛ̌ chi bɛchɔkɔti ɛbhɛn bɛ́kwɛ̀nti amɨk mpok mǔnkáp anyiɛ nɛnyiɛ. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak abhak bɛ mmú mǔnkáp ɛ́ré rɔŋ ɛ́nɨŋɨ nɔkɔ bɛfʉɛt ɛbhi.
42016022	Ansɛm mpok, nchɛ́bhɛ́mú wu agú, bɔángɛl Mandɛm basɔt yi barɔk amfay, bákʉ yi achɔkɔ kɛkwɔt nɛ Ábraham. Mǔnkáp agú nkwɔ, bábhɛ́mɛ yi.
42016023	Arɔk ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú, abhak ndǔ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri arɛ́. Áyóŋ nɔ́kɔ́ amɨ́k amfay, aghɔ́ Ábraham nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ nɛ Lásárɔs abhak yí nɛpaká mmʉɛt.
42016024	Mǔnkáp wu akók yɛ arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛta, Ábraham, ghɔ mɛ ntínso. Tó Lásárɔs ántáp sɛnɔŋ awɔ ndǔ manyiɛp antwɔ ankwɛnɛ mɛ ntɨ mandú. Nchí ndǔ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri amɛm ngó-nɛ.’
42016025	Kɛ Ábraham akɛmɛ yi chi bɛ, ‘Mɔ́wa, kɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ mpok ɔchí awu amɨk, ɔbhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Lásárɔs ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ chí bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ. Kɛ nɛ́nɛ yí achí sayri fá ɛnɛ́ wɔ ɔ́chí ndǔ nɛnyíɛ́ ámɛ́n.
42016026	Dɨŋɨ́ nkwɔ bɛ, ɛrɛmɛ́ nɛpi nɛ́kɔrɛ bhɛsɛ ɛnyunɛ́, yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛfu fá ampe antwɔ ntá yɛka; nɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛrɔ ɛbhě yɛká, ampé ántwɔ́ fá ntá yɛsɛ.’
42016027	Mǔnkáp wu arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛta Ábraham, nɨkmʉɛt tó yɛ Lásárɔs ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt ɛtaya.
42016028	Mbɔ̌ŋ bɔ̌maya batí atay. Ghatí yi ándɔ́k ánsɛmti bhɔ bɛ bákɛ́ twɔ nkwɔ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛ́t nɛnyiɛ́ ámɛ́n anɛ.’
42016029	Kɛ Ábraham akɛmɛ yi chí bɛ ‘Bɔ̌mayɛ babhɔŋ basɨŋ Moses nɛ amɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ. Mángók mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn basɨŋɨ́ mɔ ághàti bhɔ.’
42016030	Arɛm ntá Ábraham bɛ, ‘Ǎe Ɛta Ábraham, ɛyɔ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kway. Mbák mmu amɔt anɛ ánáŋá ágú ámpɛ́tnsɛm angati bhɔ, chɔŋ mántɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap.’
42016031	Ábraham aghati yɛ yi bɛ, ‘Mbák bɔ̌mayɛ babhɨkɨ ka bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm basɨŋ Moses nɛ amɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ, nɔ bápú kway bɛghok yɛ chi mmu anɛ ánáŋá ágú kɛ ǎpɛtnsɛm ntá yap.’”
42017001	Yesu abho bɛ́gháti bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Mamɔ anɛ átɛ̀n bo ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ápú nɔ́k bɛ́twɔ. Kɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛp ɛ́ncha ntá mmú anɛ ákʉ̀ mamɔ ántwɔ́ ntá bho!
42017002	Ɛ́chí sáyrí ntá mmu wu bɛ mánsɔt ntay nɛgho mánsɛt ɛmɨ ɛyi, mámɛsɛ yí amɛm manyu ɛcha yi bɛbhak nɛpɛ́m ankʉ mmǔ amɔt anɛ ánókó Mandɛm ankwɛn ndǔ bɛbʉ́.
42017003	Sɔt ka mpok! Mbák mɔ́mayɛ ánkʉ wɔ bɛbʉ́, ghatí yi bɛ́ ándɔ́ ɛpɨŋ ɛyɔ. Mbák atɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi, foŋorí yi.
42017004	Nɛ mbák akʉ wɔ bɛbʉ́ ndɔŋ tándrámɔt ndǔ ɛwak nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ndɔŋ antwɔ́, anɨk wɔ mmʉɛt bɛ, ‘Ɛta foŋorí mɛ́,’ ɔbhɔŋ bɛ́fóŋóri yi.”
42017005	Bǒnto Yesu barɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Acha, kwak bɛ́ nɛka ɛnɛsɛ nɛ́ntáŋ nɛndɔk ambɨ.”
42017006	Acha akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mbɔ bǎbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm ɛnɛ́n nɛ́chí yɛ̌ chi nɨ́ŋɨ́nɨ́ŋɨ́ mbɔ mɔ́sɛpɛm anɛ ɛnɔk ɛ́nɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ mɔ́stat, mbʉ bǎkway bɛ́ghati ɛnɔk ɛnɛ bɛ, ‘Fǎ fá nɛ bakaŋ dɔ́k tě awu amɛm manyu’, nɛ yɔ́ ɛ́ngok be.”
42017007	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛtɔŋ. Arɛm bɛ, “Sɛ́nsɔ́t bɛ mmǔ ywɛka amɔt abhɔŋ mǔbɛtɨk anɛ áchí ɛbhɨ ákʉ̀ bɛtɨk, yɛ̌ chí ndu bɛbhábhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n, yɛ̌ chi ndu bɛ́kwáŋ mbaŋ. Mbák afǔ ɛbhɨ apɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p, wɔ chi-bɛtɨk ywi ɔ̌ghati yi bɛ, ‘Twɔ́ chɔkɔ́ amɨk nyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́’?
42017008	Pú ɔ̌ghati yi chi bɛ, ‘Dɔ́k wupsí ndɛn, kʉ nɛnyíɛ́ twɔ nɛ nɔ. Nnáŋ nnyiɛ́ nnáŋá, ɔ́nsɔt ɛnɛ ɔnyiɛ’?
42017009	Mbák akʉ mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́ghátí yi ɔpú kwáy bɛkaka yi bɛ, ‘Ɔkʉ a’ mbɔnyunɛ akʉ chí bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ.
42017010	Ɛ́mbák yɛ ɛnyumɔt nɛ bhe. Mǎnáŋ mǎnkʉ bɛtɨk mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn báchyɛ́ bhe, bǎbhɔŋ bɛrɛm chi bɛ, ‘Sɛ́chí chí bǒ bɛtok, yɛ̌ ndak áchák ápú. Sɛ́kʉ́ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kʉ.’”
42017011	Ndu Yesu ákɔ̀ bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm, are fʉɛ́t ndǔ ndyɛrɛbhɨ Samária nɛ Gálili.
42017012	Nɛchwe áchwè amɛm mɔ́tɔk amɔt, bǒ ɛbhaŋákwa bati byo bághɔ́ yi ndu átwɔ̀, báte, kɛrɔ́ŋ kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ yí.
42017013	Bábho bɛbɨk mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ́, “Yesu, Ɛta, ghɔ́ bhɛsɛ ntínso.”
42017014	Yesu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ, aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká ntá bachiǎkap Mandɛm bɛ mánchák bhe.” Ɛnɛ́ bárɔ̀ŋ, ɛbhaŋákwa yap ɛ́may.
42017015	Mmu wap amɔt ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ ataŋ, abho bɛpɛtnsɛm ntá Yesu ambɨti nɔkɔ Mandɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay.
42017016	Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ bɛsí Yesu, akwɛ́n yi bɛkak ankaka nɔkɔ yi. Ɛ́fákárí bɛ mmǔ wu achí chi mmu Samária.
42017017	Yesu arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Pú bǒ bati byo kɛ mbúú? Abhɛ́nɛ́fú bati nɛ́nɛ́namɔt báchí fá?
42017018	Ndiɛrɛ kɛnkɔ̌ nɛ aywǐntí kɛ ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm bɛbɨti Mandɛm-ɛ́?”
42017019	Yesu aghati yɛ mmu wu bɛ, “Faté, dɔ́k ɛbhak ɛyɛ. Nɛka ɛnɛ́n ɔbhɔŋɔ nɛ mɛ nɛ́kʉ ɔtaŋ.”
42017020	Nywɔp nɛ́mɔt, mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bábhɛp Yesu bɛ, “Ntɨ́kɨ́ mpok Mandɛm ábhák nɛ bo fá amɨk mbɔ Mfɔ wap?” Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Yɛ̌ ɛrɨŋ ɛ́pú ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ Mandɛm abho bɛ́kɛm bo mbɔ Mfɔ wap.
42017021	Nɛ yɛ̌ mmú apú kwáy bɛrɛm yɛ̌ bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ ká Mandɛm fa nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap!’ Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ Mandɛm anáŋ achi Mfɔ ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka.”
42017022	Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ bǎbhɔ̀ŋ chɔŋ ɛkwak bɛbhak nɛ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm yɛ̌ chi ndǔ nywɔp nɛmɔt kɛ be kɛbhɔŋ mbi.
42017023	Mpók yɔ, chɔŋ bo mámbak abhɛn bághàti bhe bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ ká yi awu!’ Báchák mandɛm bɛ, ‘Ghɔ́ ká yi fá!’ Mbák mǎngók nɔ, bǎkɛ́ rɔŋ, bǎkɛ́ bho bɛ́koŋo bhɔ.
42017024	Mbɔ ɛnyǔ miámiaŋ ákɔ̀t angɔɔ, bɛfu ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nɛbu ɛ́mɔt bɛghaka ɛ́chák, nɔ́ kɛ̌ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhak mpok Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm nchí twɔ.
42017025	Kɛ yí abhɔŋ bɛyambɨ angɔ́ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ mkpáká bho abhɛn ɛchɔŋ mámbyak yí, kɛ antwɔ́.
42017026	Mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́fákárí nyaka mpok Nóa, nɔ́ kɛ̌ ɛ́fàkari chɔŋ kɛ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm ambesi.
42017027	Bo mányìɛ̀ nyaka mányù nɔkɔ, abhɛn bábhày baghɔrɛ́ mámbay nɔkɔ, nɛ abhɛ́n bátòk bhɔ mántoko nɔkɔ kpatɛ nywɔp ɛnɛn Nóa áchwé amɛm áchwí, nɛ manyiɛp átwɔ́ akuti mmɨk awáy bǒ mankɛm.
42017028	Chɔŋ ɛ́mbak nkwɔ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛchi nyaka mpok Lɔt. Bo mányìɛ̀ nyaka nɛ mányu nɔkɔ. Bákù nyaka mɛnyɨŋ nɛ abhɛn bɛ́ti mánti nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhap. Mbɔk bákwàŋ nyaka nɛnyíɛ́, abhɛ́nɛ́fú mánte nɔkɔ bɛkɛt.
42017029	Kɛ ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ nywɔp ɛnɛ́n Lɔt afa ɛtɔk Sódom, Mandɛm akʉ ngó áfú amfay nɛ ɛkɛm mbɔ batay anɛ ádù, anyɛ mbɔ manyiɛp, ásɔ́ŋ bɔ mankɛm.
42017030	Nɔ́ kɛ ɛ́bhàk chɔŋ nɛ bo mpok Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm ábhèsi.
42017031	“Ɛwak ɛyɔ, ɛ́bhák ɛnyumɔt nɛ mmu anɛ achi amfǎy ɛkɛt. Ákɛ́ rɔ́ŋ kpɨ́k anywɔ́p bɛ ampɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ kɛ ambʉɛ. Ɛnyumɔt nɛ mmu anɛ achi ɛbhɨ. Ákɛ́ rɛm bɛ́ ǎpɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p ansɔt yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
42017032	Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí nyaka nɛ ngɔrɛ́ Lɔt.
42017033	Mmǔ anɛ áyàŋ bɛpɛmɛ mmʉɛt, chɔŋ anɛ́m nɛpɛ́m ɛni. Kɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ áká mɛ́nɛm nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛ̌ti ya, chɔŋ ambɔ́ŋ nɔ́.
42017034	Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, ndǔ mpok yɔ anɛ mɛ̌pɛtnsɛm, bǒ bati apay bákway bɛbhʉrɛ ndǔ bɛkɔ́k mɛ́mɔt, mánsɔt amɔt mandɔk nɛ yí, mándɔ anɛfu.
42017035	Baghɔrɛ́ bati ápay bákway bɛbhak ndǔ ntay nɛmɔt mánkɔk nɔkɔ nchwi, mánsɔt amɔt mándɔk nɛ yi, mándɔ anɛfú.”
42017036	[Bǒ bati apay bákwày bɛbhak ɛbhɨ, mánsɔt amɔt, mándɔ anɛfú.]
42017037	Bakoŋo Yesu bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Acha, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́fàkari chɔŋ fá?” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɛgú-nnya ɛchi, arɛ́ kɛ̌ kɛnɛn ɛkɛn kɛ́nyìɛ̀ bɛgú nnya kɛ́chɛmɛ.”
42018001	Yesu atɛ́m nɛkay ɛnɛ́nɛ́fú ntá bakoŋo bhi ndu bɛtɔŋ bhɔ bɛ, bábhɔŋ mɛnɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm mpoknkɛm, kɛfɛrɛ ntí arɛ.
42018002	Arɛm bɛ, “Ntaŋá-manyé amɔt achi nyaka ɛtɔkɔfú, Mandɛm yi kɛ chyɛ kɛnókó, ntɨ nkwǎ yi kɛbhɔŋ mpok nɛ yi.
42018003	Kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ amɔt abhak nkwɔ́ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ. Are rɔ́ŋ ntá ntaŋá manyé wu anɨk nɔkɔ yí mmʉɛt bɛ, ‘Ɛta, táŋ manyé ya sayri fɛrɛ mɛ amɔ́ mǔmpap awa.’
42018004	Ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt, ntaŋá manyé wu kɛfyɛ́ ntí. Kɛ ansɛm mpok, achɔkɔ diíí arɛm nɛ mmʉɛt yi bɛ, ‘Yɛ̌ndu mpú chyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó, nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mpok nɛ ntɨ nkwǎ,
42018005	kɛ ndu mɔ́ngɔrɛ́-nɛ árɔ̀ŋ chi ambɨ bɛchyɛ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔri, chɔŋ ntáŋ manyé yi sayri nchyɛ́ yi. Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ́, apú sɛbhɛ mɛ ante amɨk.’”
42018006	Yesu Acha arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Bǎghok nɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ntaŋá manyé anɛ ápú chak árɛ́mɛ́?
42018007	Mbák mmu mbɔ yi ǎkwáy nyaka bɛ́kwak mɔ́ngɔrɛ́ wu, Mandɛm kɛ apu kway bɛkwak bo abhɛn yi áyábhɛ́ mbák bádì kɛbhɔ ntá yi bɛ̌ti nɛ ngósí? Ǎkway bɛ́chɔ́ŋti mpok kɛ ankwak bhɔ?
42018008	Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, chɔŋ Mandɛm amkpɔ́t manyé áyák anchyɛ bǒbhi. Kɛ mpok Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm, chɔŋ angɔ́ bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm fá amɨkɨ́?”
42018009	Yesu atɛ́m nɛkay ɛnɛ́nɛ́fú ntá bo abhɛn bakaysi nyaka bɛ bachi chak bɛsí Mandɛm, mámbyaka nɔkɔ bo bachak.
42018010	Yi bɛ, “Bo bati apay bárɔŋ nyaka mɛnɨkmʉɛt amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Amɔt abhak mǔnkwɔ Fárisi, anɛfú abhak mbɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛ́nti.
42018011	Mǔnkwɔ Fárisi ate ɛyǐ ɛbhak anɨk mmʉɛt bɛ, ‘Mandɛm, nkáká wɔ́ bɛ mpú mbɔ bo báchák abhɛn bachi baghɛ́p, bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́, nɛ bakwɛnɛ́ bɛrwɔp. Nkáká wɔ bɛ mpú mbɔ yɛ̌ chí mbɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛ́nti anɛ áté nɔ́ awu.
42018012	Nchí bhak ndǔ nɛtarɛ́nsay ndɔŋ ɛ́páy ndu sɔ́nde amɔt. Nɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbha mɛnkɛm nchí chyɛ ndu amɔt amfay baru byo mbɔ akap ntá yɛ.’
42018013	Kɛ mbɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛ́nti ate nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ. Ntí, yi kɛ yoŋ amfay, nɛ adɛp awɔ́ antɨ arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛta Mandɛm, nchí mmǔ bɛbʉ́. Ghɔ́ mɛ ntínso!’
42018014	Nchí ghati bhe bɛ Mandɛm ásɔ́t nyaka bɛ mbɛbhɛ́ nkabhɛ́nti wu achí chak bɛsí bhi. Ɛ́kɛbhák nɔ nɛ mǔnkwɔ Fárisi mbɔnyunɛ́ Mandɛm ǎsɛ̀pti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ áyòŋ mmʉɛt, kɛ ǎkòsi yɛ̌ agha anɛ ásɛ̀pti mmʉɛt amɨk.”
42018015	Bofú básɔ́t bɔ̌bhap bárɔ́k ntá Yesu nɛ bhɔ bɛ yi anyaŋa bɔ amɔ anti anjɛt bhɔ. Baghɔkɔ́ bhi bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, bábho bɛsáyti bhɔ bɛ bákɛ́ kʉ nɔ.
42018016	Kɛ Yesu abhɨŋɨ bǒbhɔ nɛ bɔ̌bhap. Nɛ ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi arɛm bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ká mǎmbɔ mántwɔ ntá ya, bǎkɛ́ chyɛt bɔ mbi mbɔnyunɛ bǒ abhɛn bachi mbɔ bhɔ́ kɛ̌ Mandɛm abhak Mfɔ wap.”
42018017	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, mbák mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ rɔ Mandɛm ankɛm yi mbɔ mɔ́nkwɛn apú kway bɛbhak ndǔ mpǎy bo abhɛn Mandɛm achi Mfɔ wap wáwák.
42018018	Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, mǔnti bo Israɛl abhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, wɔ mmǔ ndɨ́ndɨ́, chɔŋ nkʉ yi kɛ mbɔ̌ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ́n nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti?”
42018019	Yesu akɛmɛ yí bɛ, “Ndaká yí ɔ́bhɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ bɛ mmǔ ndɨ́ndɨ́? Mmǔ ndɨ́ndɨ́ apú. Mandɛm aywǐnti kɛ achi Mmǔ ndɨ́ndɨ́.
42018020	Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛbhé Mandɛm. Bɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Ɔ́kɛ́ kwɛn bɛrwɔp. Ɔ́kɛ́ wáy mmu. Ɔ́kɛ́ ghɛp. Ɔ́kɛ́ te ntísiɛ ákwárɛ́. Chiɛ̌ máyɛ nɛ ɛtayɛ kɛnókó.’”
42018021	Mmǔ wu árɛm bɛ́ “Nnáŋ nchí bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm.”
42018022	Yesu ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛ́rɔp ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ɛnɛ́ ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re kʉ. Dɔ́k tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ mɛnkɛm, chyɛ̌ nkáp ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho. Mbák ɔ́nkʉ́ nɔ, chɔŋ ɔ́mbɔ́ŋ kɛfɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ amfay. Ɔ́ntwɔ́ yɛ ɔnkoŋo mɛ. Nɛ chɔŋ ɔ́mbɔ́ŋ kɛfɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ awǔ amfay.”
42018023	Ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, apɔp, arɔbhɛ rɔ́ŋɛ́rɔ́ŋ mbɔnyunɛ abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ.
42018024	Yesu ayɨŋɨ yí, arɛm bɛ, “Ɛ́bèmʉɛt tontó bɛ mǔnkáp anka Mandɛm ambak Mfɔ ywi.
42018025	Ɛ́chí wɨkɨrɨk bɛ mpɔŋɔ baso ámfʉɛ́t ndǔ mbok mbíábhan ɛ́cha mǔnkáp bɛ́ka Mandɛm ambak Mfɔ ywi.”
42018026	Bo abhɛn baghoko bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɔ bábhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Agha ákwày yɛ bɛbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti?”
42018027	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́cha nkwǎŋwaŋ, ɛ́pú cha Mandɛm.”
42018028	Píta asá ɛyɔŋ arɛm bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́, sɛ́rɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm sɛ́kòŋo wɔ.”
42018029	Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, nchí ghati bhe bɛ, “Mmǔ anɛ árɔ́ yɛ̌ ɛkɛt, yɛ̌ ngɔrɛ́, yɛ̌ bɔ̌mayi, yɛ̌ ɛtayi nɛ máyi, nɛ yɛ̌ bɔ̌bhi ɛ̌ti Kɛfɔ Mandɛm,
42018030	Mandɛm ǎchyɛ chɔŋ yi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛyǎ bɛcha ɛbhɛn yi anɛmɛ fá amɨk. Nɛ chɔŋ ambɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti ndǔ mmɨk nkɔ.”
42018031	Ɛ́tat nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu asɔt baghɔkɔ́ bhi bati byo nɛ apay nɛpak. Abho bɛ́gháti bhɔ bɛ, “Ghók ká! Sɛ́rɔŋ nɔ chí Yerúsalɛm, nɛ arɛ́, chɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm básɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm ɛ́mfakari.
42018032	Chɔŋ mánkɛ́m yi mámfyɛ amɔ́ bǒbati abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, mánjɔ́kɔ́ yi, nɛ mánsɔkɔti yí, nɛ mámpati yi batiɛ́ amʉɛt.
42018033	Chɔŋ mándɛ́n yi nɛ ɛkpa, nɛ mángwáy yi. Kɛ ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp arat, ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
42018034	Kɛ baghɔk Yesu kɛjwimɛm yɛ̌ chi ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ndǔ ɛbhɛn yi árɛ́mɛ́. Bɛ́bhak bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ntá yap nɛ bɔ́ kɛkɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi arɛmɛ.
42018035	Mpok Yesu aghaka kɛkwɔt nɛ Jɛríko, nnɛ́mámɨ́k amɔt abhak nɛpak mbi chɔ́kɔ́, anɨŋɨ nɔkɔ mɛnɨ́ŋɨ́.
42018036	Ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ bɛyǎ bó báfʉɛ̀t, abhɛ́p ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fàkari.
42018037	Bágháti yi bɛ, “Yesu anɛ Násárɛt kɛ áfʉɛ̀t.”
42018038	Abho yɛ bɛ́bɨ́k bɛ, “Yesu! Mmɔ̌ Mfɔ Debhít! Ghɔ́ mɛ́ ntínso!”
42018039	Bo abhɛn bárɔ̀ŋ ambɨ báré sayti yi bɛ ánchɔ́kɔ́ kpák; kɛ akpɨk are bɨk nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋɛtaŋ bɛ, “Mmɔ̌ Mfɔ Debhít! Ghɔ́ mɛ́ ntínso!”
42018040	Yesu áte, achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mántwɔ́ nɛ yi. Bátwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ yi, Yesu abhɛ́p yi bɛ,
42018041	“Ɔ̌yáŋ mɛ̌nkʉ́ wɔ yi?” Akɛmɛ Yesu bɛ, “Acha, nchí yaŋ mpɛt ngɔ mbaŋ.”
42018042	Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá yi bɛ, “Ghɔ́ mbaŋ. Nɛka ɛnɛ́n ɔbhɔŋɔ nɛ mɛ nɛ́kʉ ɔtaŋ.”
42018043	Tɛ́mté wu, abho bɛghɔ mbaŋ! Nɛ abho bɛkoŋo Yesu, ambɨti nɔkɔ Mandɛm. Bo mankɛm bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, babhɔ bɛbɨti nkwɔ Mandɛm.
42019001	Yesu achwe ɛtɔk Jɛríko are kɔ bɛfʉɛt.
42019002	Mmu amɔt abhak arɛ́ anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Sakio. Abhak mǔnti babhɛbhɛ́ nkábhɛ́nti. Abhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ nkáp.
42019003	Árɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Yesu ǎfʉɛ̀t, abho bɛyaŋ mbi bɛ ángɔ́ ɛnyǔ mmu Yesu achi, kɛ ɛ̌ti kɛmbɨŋ ɛki nɛ bɛyǎ bo, yi kɛkwáy bɛghɔ yi.
42019004	Ajɛt arɔk ambɨ, akó amfǎy ɛnɔk ɛnɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Síkámɔ ndǔ mbi anɛ Yesu ákɔ̀ arɛ ndu áyàŋ bɛghɔ yi.
42019005	Yesu ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ, ayoŋ amɨ́k amfay aghati Sakio bɛ, “Sakio, sɛp twɔ́ áyák. Mbɔŋ bɛ́bhak ɛkɛt ɛyɛ ɛchɔŋ.”
42019006	Sakio asɛp amɨk áyák, anak Yesu ɛkɛt yi nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák.
42019007	Bo bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ Yesu árɔ̀ŋ ndǔ ɛkɛt Sakio, báré nywinti mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Yesu ǎrɔ̀ŋ bɛbhák kɛnkɔ amɛm ɛkɛt nkʉ bɛbʉ́.”
42019008	Ɛnɛ́ Yesu nɛ Sakio báchí anywɔ́p, Sakio afate arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ghók, chɔŋ nkɔ́rɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbha ndǔ baru apay, nchyɛ́ ndu amɔt ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́ bho. Nɛ mbák nsɔt ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmu ndǔ mangwɔ, chɔŋ nkɛmɛ yɔ ndɔŋ ɛnwi.”
42019009	Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛchɔŋ, Mandɛm apɛ́mɛ́ wɔ́ nɛ ɛfo ɛyɛ ɛnkɛm mbɔnyunɛ wɔ nkwɔ́ ɔchí ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Ábraham anɛ Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋ bɛ́pɛ́mɛ.
42019010	Nɛ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ntwɔ bɛ́yáŋ nɛ bɛ́pɛ́mɛ chi bo abhɛn manɛ́mɛ́ ɛbhɨ.”
42019011	Ɛnɛ́ bo bághòk mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu árɛ̀m, arɔk ambɨ bɛtɛm nɛkay nɛchak. Ntí abhak bɛ, anáŋ agháká nyaka kɛkwɔt nɛ Yerúsalɛm, nɛ bo bákàysi nyaka bɛ Kɛfɔ Mandɛm kɛ́twɔ̀ fá amɨk mandú mpok.
42019012	Yesu aghati yɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Nnɛ́m mmu amɔt arɔ́ nyaka ɛtɔk yi arɔk ɛtɔk ɛ́chák nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ bɛ́ mánkʉ́ yí mfɔ ntá bǒbhi kɛ ampɛtnsɛm.
42019013	Ápɛ́rɛ rɔŋ, abhɨŋɨ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhi bati byo. Achyɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ɛbhǎ nkáp, arɛm bɛ ‘Kɔ nɔ́kɔ́ ká ɛsiɛ nɛ nkáp wu kpátɛ̌ mpok nɛpɛrɛ́nsɛm ɛná.’
42019014	Arɔ yɛ are rɔ́ŋ. Kɛ bǒ ɛtɔk yi bápap nyaka yi. Bátó yɛ bo bɛ mándɔ́k mángátí mfɔ ngo bɛ ‘Acha, sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ mmǔ-nɛ ambák mfɔ ywɛsɛ.’
42019015	Yɛ̌ nɔ, nɛrɔŋ yi arɔŋɔ bákʉ́ yí mfɔ. Ápɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nsɛm ɛtɔk yi, abhɨŋɨ bǒ bɛtɨk abhɛn yi achyɛ nyaka nkáp bɛ mántwɔ́ yi angɔ nsay anɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́.
42019016	Anɛ mbɨ arɔk aghatí yí bɛ, ‘Acha, mbɔ̌ŋ nsáy bɛbhǎ nkáp byo amfay ɛbha ɛ́mɔt ɛnɛ ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ.’
42019017	Mfɔ wu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, ‘Ɔkʉ sayri, ɔchí ɛrɨ́tí nkʉbɛtɨk! Tɛ̌ndu ɔ́tɔ́ŋɔ́ ndǔ mandú ɛnyɨŋ bɛ ɔ̌bhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp, mɛ̌chyɛ̀ wɔ bɛtaŋ bɛkɛm bɛtɔk byo.’
42019018	Anɛ ájwí bati apay atwɔ́ arɛm bɛ, ‘Acha, mbɔ̌ŋ nsay bɛbhǎ nkáp bɛtay amfay ɛbha ɛ́mɔt ɛnɛ ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ.’
42019019	Mfɔ arɛm ntá nkʉbɛtɨk wu bɛ, ‘Mɛ̌chyɛ̀ wɔ bɛtaŋ bɛ́kɛ́m bɛtɔk bɛgho bɛtay.’
42019020	Nkʉ bɛtɨk achák atwɔ arɛm bɛ, ‘Acha, ghɔ́ ɛbhǎ nkáp ɛyɛ. Nnɛp nyaka wu ndǔ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ndɛn mbɛsɛ. Mbɨ́kɨ́ kʉ ɛnyɨŋ nɛ wu.
42019021	Mbɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛchǎy mbɔnyunɛ ɔchí mmu mbeápak. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́pú ɛyɛ, ɔ̌sɔrɛsɔt. Nɛ ɔ̌ghɛ̀m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ pɨ.’
42019022	Mfɔ wu aghati yi bɛ ‘Wɔ nkʉbɛtɨk mbʉ́mbʉ, ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu yɛ ɛ́way wɔ! Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ nchí mmu mbeápak. Ɔrɨŋɨ bɛ́ nchí sɔt ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pú ɛya, nɛ nchí ghɛm ɛnɛ́ mbɨ́kɨ́ pɨ, pú nɔ́?
42019023	Kɛ ndak yi ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fyɛ́ nkáp awa amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́nkap? Mbɔ ɔkʉ nɔ, mbʉ́ ndu ntwɔ́ nɛ́, mbɨ́kɨ́ sɔt wú nɛ nsáy?’
42019024	Aghátí yɛ bo abhɛn báchí arɛ téé bɛ, ‘Sɔt ka ɛbhǎ nkáp ɛyǐ yɔ mǎnchyɛ ntá mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbha byo.’
42019025	Bárɛ́m ntá yi bɛ, ‘Acha, pú yi abhɔŋ bɛbhǎ byo?’
42019026	Mfɔ wu akɛmɛ bɛ, ‘Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́, báchyɛ yi ɛ́chák. Kɛ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ, básɔ̀t ntá yi yɛ̌ chí mandú anɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́.
42019027	Nɛ mbák chí bǒmpap abha bhɛn, abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ nyaka bɛ mbák mfɔ wap, twɔ́ ká nɛ bhɔ fá, mǎngwáy bhɔ́ bɛsí bha.’”
42019028	Yesu átɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ́ nɛkay ɛnɛn, arɔk ambɨ bɛ́kɔ bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm, yi abhak ambɨ, bo abhɛn báchi nɛ yi mankoŋo nɔkɔ ansɛm.
42019029	Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t bɔ̌bɛtɔk Bɛtfágɛ nɛ Bɛ́tani, ndǔ Njiɛ Mɛnɔk Ólif, ató baghɔkɔ́ bhi bati apay ambɨ.
42019030	Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká ndǔ mɔ́tɔk anɛ achi afɔ ambɨ. Nɛchwe anɛ báchwe arɛ chɔŋ mǎngɔ mɔ́ mpɔŋɔ batu sɛsɛ́t, anɛ yɛ̌ mmu abhɨkɨ re kɔ nɛ yɔ́. Kaŋarí ká twɔ́ mɛ nɛ yɔ́.
42019031	Mbák mmú ámbɛ́p be ntí anɛ bǎkàŋari yɔ́, ghati ka yí bɛ, ‘Acha kɛ áyàŋ yɔ.’”
42019032	Bǒ abhɛn yi átó, bárɔ́k, bághɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi aghati bhɔ.
42019033	Ɛ́nɛ́ bákàŋari mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu wu, bǒ abhɛn babhɔŋɔ yɔ, bábhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Ndaká yí bǎkàŋari mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu wu?”
42019034	Bákɛ́mɛ bɛ, “Acha ǎyàŋ yɔ.”
42019035	Bárɔ́k yɛ nɛ yɔ ntá Yesu. Básɔ́t ndɛn ɛnɛ́ mfǎymʉɛt ɛyap basɔbhɛri mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu wu, bákwák yi achɔkɔ amfay.
42019036	Nɛ ndǔ yi ákɔ̀ árɔ̀ŋ, bo báré sɔt ndɛnɛ́ mfǎymʉɛt ɛyap mángay nɔkɔ ambi bɛ mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu wu ankɔ amfay.
42019037	Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mbi árɔ̀ Njiɛ Mɛnɔk Ólif ásɛ̀p Yerúsalɛm, ngɛ́mtáy bakoŋo bhi bábhó mɛŋák, mámbɨti nɔkɔ Mandɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɔ́ bághɔ́.
42019038	Mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mandɛm ánjɛ́t mmu anɛ átwɔ̀ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Acha! Mandɛm Mfay kɛ áchyɛ̀ kpák. Sɛ́nchíɛ yí kɛnókó!”
42019039	Mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi abhɛn báchí ndǔ ngɛ́mtáy bo bhɔ, bárɛ́m ntá Yesu bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, sáy bakoŋo bhɛ mánchɔkɔ kpák.”
42019040	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Nchí ghati bhe bɛ yɛ̌ mbʉ́ mánchɔkɔ chí kpák, batay ábɨk ambɨti Mandɛm.”
42019041	Yesu ágháká kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ Yerúsalɛm, aghɔ́ ɛtɔk, adi kɛbhɔ ndǔ ntínso nɛ́kɛm yi nɛ Yerúsalɛm,
42019042	andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mbɔ be bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ chí ɛchɔŋ, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ bo mámbɔ́ŋ kpák, mbʉ́ ɛ́rɨ-e! Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, bɛchi bhɛsɛ bhɛsɛ nta yɛka nɛ bǎpú ghɔ bhɔ.
42019043	Mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ bǒmpap abhɛka bátwɔ̀ mánkap be, mántɛp nkók ankap ɛtɔk yɛka, mánchɛt bhe bɛbhě mɛnkɛm.
42019044	Nɛ mánchwe mánaŋa bhe nɛ bɔ̌bhɛka mankɛm, mámokoti ɛtɔk ɛnkɛm ɛnyunɛ́ yɛ̌ ntay nɛ́pú rɔp amfǎy ntɨ. Chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari nɔ, mbɔnyunɛ́ bǎbyak Mandɛm mpok yi átwɔ́ bɛ́pɛ́mɛ bhe.”
42019045	Yesu arɔk achwe amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm abho bɛbok bǒ abhɛn bákɔ̀ ɛsiɛ́ amɛm,
42019046	ambe nɔkɔ nɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ́ Mandɛm arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛkɛt ɛya ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛbhak chi ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt’, kɛ bǎyíbhírí yɔ́ ɛ́rɔp chi ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ baghɛ́p bábhɛ̀sɛ arɛ!”
42019047	Yesu are rɔ́ŋ yɛ antɔŋ nɔkɔ bo amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp. Bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm, nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Moses, nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk bachak báre yáŋ mbi bɛway yi.
42019048	Kɛ bɔ́ kɛbhɔ́ŋ mbi mbɔnyunɛ́ bo mankɛm bábhɔ̌ŋ nyaka ɛkwak bɛ́ghok mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn Yesu árɛ̀m.
42020001	Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, ɛnɛ́ Yesu átɔ̀ŋ bo amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm angati nɔkɔ bhɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk bárɔ́k ntá yi,
42020002	barɛm bɛ, “Ghatí bhɛsɛ, ntɨkɨ bɛtaŋ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ́ ɔ́kʉ̀? Agha áchyɛ́ wɔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɔ?”
42020003	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mɛ nkwɔ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ bɛbhɛp be. Ghatí ká mɛ.
42020004	Bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Jɔ̌n ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka ndu bɛjwiti bho, bɛ́fú chi ntá Mandɛm kɛ ntá nkwǎ?”
42020005	Báre kɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm bɛ yi? Mbák sɛ́ndɛm bɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Jɔ̌n bɛ́fú nyaka ntá Mandɛm, ǎbhɛ́p bhɛsɛ bɛ, ‘Kɛ ndaká yi bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ noko ɛyɔŋ ɛyi?’
42020006	Nɛ mbák sɛ́ndɛ́m bɛ, ‘Bɛ́fǔ nyaka ntá nkwǎ’, bǒ mankɛm bátɛmti bhɛsɛ nɛ batay mangway, mbɔnyunɛ bɔ́ mankɛm mánóko sayri bɛ Jɔ̌n achi nyaka ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm.”
42020007	Ɛ́kʉ́ bakɛmɛ Yesu bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.”
42020008	Nɛ Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mɛnkwɔ́ mpú ghati yɛ be mmu anɛ áchyɛ́ mɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ́ mɛ̌kʉ̀.”
42020009	Yesu abho yɛ bɛ́tɛm bɔ nɛkay nɛchak bɛ, “Mmǔfú achi nyaka. Atɨ nkɨ apɨ mɛnɔk vain arɛ. Afyɛ́ bo arɛ, bɛ mánkʉ bɛtɨk mankɔrɛ nsáy nɛ yi. Arɔ yɛ arɔk nɛkɔ ɛnɛn yi átàt, ɛtɔk ɛchak.
42020010	Mpok bɛkɔk kɛpɛm ɛ́nɔk ákwáy nɔ́kɔ́, mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ ató bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhi bachak bɛ mándɔ́k mánsɔ́t aywi ákɔ́rɛ́ mbwɔt. Kɛ bǒ bɛtɨk bhɔ kɛchyɛ. Bákɛ́m yi badɛn, bábók, apɛtnsɛm amɔ́ amɔ.
42020011	Mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ ató mǔbɛtok achak. Bákɛ́m awu nkwɔ́ bádɛn, báchyɛ́ yi ntiánwɔ́p, bábók apɛtnsɛm amɔ́ apay.
42020012	Ató mmɔ̌bɛtok anɛ ajwi bati arat. Bádɛ́n, báfyɛ́ bɛfʉɛt amʉɛt, bábók, afú arɔk.
42020013	Ɛ́kʉ mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ wu arɛm nɛ mmʉɛ́t ɛyi bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ nkʉ ná? Chɔŋ ntó mbɔ̌ŋ mmɔ̌ntɨ wa. Yɛ̌ yí, bábhɔŋ bɛ́chyɛ yi kɛnókó.’
42020014	Kɛ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi, bábhó bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, ‘Yɨŋɨ́ mbɔ̌ŋ mɔ́ywi nɛ́, nɛ yí kɛ̌ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́nyiɛ́ nɛwú ɛtayi. Twɔ́ ká sɛnkɛm yi sɛ́ngwáy bɛ́ ɛtayi ánáŋ ángú, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi mɛ́ndɔp chi ɛbhɛsɛ.’
42020015	Mɔ́ywi wu áchwé nɔ́kɔ́ amɛm nkɨ, bákɛ́m yi baya báfú amɛm nkɨ nɛ yi, barɔk baway.” Yesu átɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɛkay ɛnɛn, abhɛ́p bɔ́ bɛ, “Bǎkaysi bɛ chɔŋ mbɔŋɔ́nkɨ wu ankʉ yi ntá bǒbhɔ?
42020016	Chɔŋ antwɔ́ angway bhɔ, anchyɛ nkɨ wu ntá bo bachak.” Bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, babho bɛrɛm bɛ, “Mandɛm akɛ ka!”
42020017	Yesu ayɨŋɨ bhɔ dǐǐ, abhɛp bɛ, “Ntí basɨŋɨ́ amɛn achi bɛ yi? Basɨŋɨ́ amɛn árɛ̀m bɛ: ‘Nkúbhɛ́ ntay ɛnɛn batɛ̌kɛt bágʉɛ́bhɛ́ bɛ́ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ, nɔ́ kɛ nɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ ntay ɛnɛn nɛ́kɛ́mɛ́ ɛkɛt nɛchá batay áchák ankɛm.’
42020018	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ akwɛnɛ ndǔ ntay ɛnɛn, ǎsìɛpti ndǔ mbɨŋ, nɛ mmu anɛ ntay ɛnɛn nɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́ yi amʉɛt, nɛ́chɔ̀kɔti yi.”
42020019	Yesu atɛm nɔkɔ nɛkay ɛnɛn, batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm bárɨŋɨ bɛ atɛm nɛkay ɛnɔ chi ɛ̌ti yap. Báre yaŋ bɛkɛm yi, kɛ báchày bo abhɛn báchi arɛ.
42020020	Bárɔ́k yɛ ambɨ bɛyaŋ mbi bɛkɛm yi. Bátó baghokotǐ kɛpɨ ntá yi bɛ mánkɔt ngɛpti bɛ bachi bǒ tɛtɛp. Kɛ bárɔ̌ŋ nyaka chi bɛ mámbɛ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi mɛnyɨŋ kpát ankwɛ́n anyu, ankwɛ́n ndǔ ntǎ yap bɛ mansɔt yi manto ntá Gɔ́bhanɔ Rom mmǔ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm bɛchi yi amɔ.
42020021	Baghokotǐ kɛpɨ bhɔ bárɔ́ŋɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ntá Yesu, babhɛp yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́rɛ̀m nɛ ɔ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛchi chak. Sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɔpú yɨŋɨ mmu ndǔ bɛsí ɔ́ncháy yi, kɛ ɔ̌tɔ̀ŋ tɛtɛp ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mánkʉ.
42020022	Ghatí bhɛsɛ, ɛbhé yɛsɛ ɛka bɛ sɛ́nchíɛ nkábhɛ́nti ntá Mfɔ Rom kɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ka?”
42020023	Yesu arɨŋɨ bapu map, arɛm ntá yap bɛ,
42020024	“Tɔ́ŋ ká mɛ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nkap.” Bátɔ́ŋ nɔ́kɔ́ yi abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Ntí ághá nɛ́ arɛ́? Nɛ nnyɛ́n chí ɛnɛn ághá?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Chí ntí Sísa, Mfɔ Rom. Nɛ nnyɛ́n, chi ɛni.”
42020025	Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Chiɛ́ yɛ́ ka nta Mfɔ Rom yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi ɛyi, mǎnchyɛ ntá Mandɛm yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi ɛnɛ Mandɛm.”
42020026	Bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu arɛmɛ, bápɔ́p! Bɔ́ kɛbhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́, ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ yi ankwɛn anyu bɛ bɔ mánkɛ́m yi bɛsí bho. Bárɔp kpákpǎkpak.
42020027	Mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Sádusi bárɔ́k ntá Yesu babhɛp yi ɛ̌ti nɛpɛrɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Bǒnkwɔ Sádusi bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko nyaka bɛ bawú bápɛ̀t chɔŋ nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Babhɛp yi bɛ,
42020028	“Ntɔŋ, Moses asɨŋ ndǔ ɛbhé ɛyɛsɛ bɛ, mbák mmu ángú ándɔ́ ngɔrɛ́ kɛ bɔ́ kɛbhɔŋ yɛ̌ mmɔ́, mɔ́mayi abhɔŋ bɛsɔt ngɔrɛ́ wu bɛ́ ámbé bɔ nɛ yi ndǔ nnyɛ́n manɔ anɛ ágú.
42020029	Bɔ̌ chi amɔt bati tándrámɔt báchí nyaka. Anɛ mbɨ abháy ngɔrɛ́, agú kɛbhɔŋ yɛ̌ mmɔ́.
42020030	Anɛ ákòŋo asɔt kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ wu ndǔ nɛbhay agú kɛbhɔŋ mmɔ́.
42020031	Anɛ ájwí bati arat nkwɔ asɔt yí kɛ agú kɛbhɔ́ŋ mmɔ́ nɛ yi. Ɛ́fákári ɛnyumɔt nɛ bɔ mankɛm bati tándrámɔt.
42020032	Ndǔ ngwɛnti, ngɔrɛ́ wu nkwɔ agú.
42020033	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, mpok Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bawú mámpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, ngɔrɛ́ wu ǎbhák anɛ agha? Ndu bɔ́ mankɛm, bati tándrámɔt, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap abhay nyaka yi.”
42020034	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Fá amɨk, baghɔrɛ́ nɛ babhakanɛm bábháy batɨ,
42020035	kɛ bo abhɛn chɔ́ŋ bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, mǎnchwe ndǔ mmɨk nkɔ, bápú pɛrɛ bháy nɛbhay
42020036	mbɔnyunɛ bápú pɛrɛ kway bɛgu. Bábhak mbɔ bɔángɛl Mandɛm, bábhak bɔ̌ Mandɛm abhɛn yi akʉ bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
42020037	Yɛ̌ chí Moses atɔŋ nyaka kpoŋoroŋ ndǔ mbok ɛnɔk ɛnɛ́ ngó ádù arɛ bɛ bawú bápɛt chɔŋ nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Ndǔ basɨŋɨ́ mi ɛ̌ti mbok ɛyɔ, Moses ǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ Mandɛm mmu achi Acha bɛ, ‘Mandɛm Ábraham, Mandɛm Áisek, Mandɛm Jekɔ́p!’
42020038	Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ Mandɛm achí Mandɛm bo abhɛn bachi nɛpɛ́m. Apú Mandɛm bawú. Ntá Mandɛm, bǒbhɔ mankɛm bachi nɛpɛ́m.”
42020039	Mbɔk batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm báká nɛ yi, barɛm bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, ɔrɛm sayri!”
42020040	Yɛ̌ mmu kɛpɛrɛ mɔ bɛ́bhɛp yi yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
42020041	Yesu abhɛ́p bo abhɛn bághòk yi bɛ, “Ná bákwày bɛrɛm bɛ Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò achi ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Mfɔ Debhít?
42020042	Mbɔ̌ŋ Debhít asɨ̌ŋ amɛm Ɛkáti Bakway bɛ: ‘Mandɛm Acha arɛm nyaka ntá Acha wa bɛ, chɔkɔ fá ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm ɛya ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ-kɛnókó,
42020043	kpatɛ nkʉ bǒmpap abhɛ mándɔp mbɔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ chɔŋ ɔ́nyàŋa bɛkak arɛ.’
42020044	Debhít ǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ nyaka Mpɛmɛ ɛrɛ bɛ Acha. Ná Achǎ áyibhiri ambak ɛbhárɛ́mɔ ywi?”
42020045	Bɛsí bo mankɛm abhɛn bághòk yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, Yesu arɛm ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ,
42020046	“Sɔt ka mpok nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm. Bákɔŋ bɛghap mánkó mansɛp nɛ bɛwubhɛ wubhɛ́ ndɛn amʉɛt nɛfísiɛ bɛ bo mánkáká nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ nɛ kɛnókó. Bákɔŋ nkwɔ́ bɛ́chɔkɔ ndǔ bɛbhaká kɛnókó amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt nɛ ndǔ bɛpa.
42020047	Nɛ mányìɛ̀ mɛnyɨŋ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ ndǔ mangwɔ, mánkʉ nɔkɔ bɛrɔ́rí nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bɛsí bhó mbɔ bɛ bachi bɛrɨtí bho. Chɔŋ ntɛ́msí yap anjá ancha.”
42021001	Ɛnɛ́ Yesu achi amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, ayɨŋɨ aghɔ́ ndǔ bǒ bakáp báfyɛ̀ akap amɛm ɛkʉbhɛ́ nkáp.
42021002	Aghɔ́ nkwɔ kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ amɔt anɛ ɛyi ɛ́pú ndu afyɛ́ bɔ̌bɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nkap bapay.
42021003	Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, akap kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́-nɛ ácha anɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
42021004	Ndǔ bɛyǎ bakap kɛ̌ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap áfɛ́rɛ́ mandú achyɛ mbɔ akap, kɛ nchɛ́bhɛ́ ngɔrɛ́ nɛ, achyɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́.”
42021005	Mbɔk baghɔkɔ́ bhi báré rɛm ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, mánkak nɔkɔ bɛrɨtí batay anɛ́ básɔ́rɛ́ báté yɔ́ nɛ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo báchyɛ́ bɛ mánsɔ́bhɛ́rí ɛkɛt ɛ́rɛ. Kɛ Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ,
42021006	“Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ̀ nɛ mɛnkɛm, mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ ɛ́rɔ̀ŋ amɨk ɛnkɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ kɛrɔp téé.”
42021007	Bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, ntɨkɨ mpok chɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fakari, nɛ ntɨkɨ ɛrɨŋ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ bo mandɨŋɨ bɛ mpok anɛ ɔ́twɔ̀ arɔp kɛ́kwɔ́t?”
42021008	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Sɔt ka mpok bɛ bákɛ́ rwɔ bhe mǎnjíbhírí batɨ yɛka. Bɛyǎ bo bátwɔ̀ chɔŋ mánsɔt nnyɛ́n ɛna mántɛn ambɨ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap andɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, ‘Mɛ kɛ nchi Mpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtó!’ Nɛ bɛ, ‘Mpok akway anɛ Mandɛm ápɛ̀mɛ mmɨk!’ Mbák mǎngók nɔ́ bǎkɛ́ koŋo bhɔ́.
42021009	Nɛ mpok bǎghókó nsóŋó-nɛnu nɛ ɛbyɔk, bǎkɛ́ chay. Mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛbhɔŋ bɛfakari, kɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́pú tɔŋ bɛ ngwɛnti mmɨk arɔp kɛkwɔt.”
42021010	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛ́rɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ bɛtɔk mɛ́nu nɛ bɛtɔk bɛ́chák, bafɔ̌ ɛtɔk mánu nɛ batɨ̌ bafɔ̌ ɛtɔk.
42021011	Chɔŋ bɛtaŋtí nɛnyikisǐ mmɨk nɛ nsay nɛ bɛghorǐ mame mɛ́mbak mbǎŋ nɛ mbaŋ. Nɛ chɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́ntwɔ nɛ bɛyǎ bɛcháy, nɛ bɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay mɛ́mfu amfǎy.
42021012	Kɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛ́pɛrɛ́ fákári, chɔŋ mánkɛm be, mánchyɛ ɛsɔŋɔri, mánsɔt be mandɔk amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛbhap mántaŋ be arɛ, mamfyɛ́ bhe amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Nɛ chɔŋ mámfyɛ be amɔ́ bafɔ nɛ bɔgɔ́bhanɔ bɛ mántáŋ be ɛ̌ti ya.
42021013	Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́nchyɛ bhe mbi bɛghati bɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti ya.
42021014	Kʉ yɛka batɨ̌ yɛka bɛ bǎpú sɛmɛ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔŋɔ bɛrɛm ndu bɛtaŋa mmʉɛt,
42021015	mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ mɛmbɔŋ nchyɛ́ bhe ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm, nchyɛ́ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak bɛ mǎnchók manyǔ bǒmpap abhɛka.
42021016	Chɔŋ yɛ̌ chí bachi nɛ manɔ bhɛka, nɛ bɔ̌mayɛka, nɛ bǒ nnɛrɛ́kɛt, nɛ mamʉɛrɛ bhɛka mámfyɛ be amɔ́ bǒmpap abhɛka. Nɛ chɔŋ mángwáy mbɔk yɛka.
42021017	Chɔŋ bo mankɛm mámpap be ɛ̌ti bǎchí bakoŋo bha.
42021018	Chɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhɛn mɛ́nkway bɛfakari nɛ bhe kɛ yɛ̌ ɛkǎk ɛmɛnɛ́nti mmu ywɛka ɛpu nɛm.
42021019	Mbák mǎnté kákátí, chɔŋ mǎmpɛmɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛka.
42021020	“Mpok bǎghɔ́ bakwɔ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu ndu bákábhɛ́ Yerúsalɛm, dɨŋɨ́ yɛ́ ka bɛ mpok bɛchɔŋti Yerúsalɛm akway.
42021021	Mpok yɔ, bǒ abhɛn bachi atú Judɛ́ya mámbʉ́ɛ́, mámbɛ́sɛ́ amfay njiɛ. Abhɛn báchi amɛm ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm mámbʉ́ɛ́ mándɔ́k. Nɛ abhɛn bachi nɛfí bákɛ́ chwe ɛtɔk,
42021022	mbɔnyunɛ manywɔp ayɔ chi anɛ ntɛmsi, bɛ́kʉ bɛ, mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm mɛ́mfú tɛtɛp.
42021023	Nɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ɛncha ntá baghɔrɛ́ nɛ mɛniɛ nɛ abhɛn báchí nɛ bɔ amɔ mpok ayɔ! Chɔŋ bɛyǎ bɛsɔŋɔri mɛ́ntwɔ fá amɨk nɛ Mandɛm ankʉ bǒ Yerúsalɛm mángɔ bɛběntɨ bhi.
42021024	Chɔŋ mángwáy bɛyǎ bhap nɛ bɔakparɛnja, nɛ mánkɛmti bachak mbɔ basɛ́mɛ́ nɛnú ndǔ bɛtɔk nɛ bɛtɔk. Chɔŋ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm mánjati Yerúsalɛm kpatɛ mpok ayap amfʉɛt.
42021025	“Mpok yɔ, chɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay mɛ́mbak amfay ndǔ mmok, nɛ ndǔ ntaŋ nɛ ndǔ mambe. Nɛ fá amɨk, chɔŋ bɛtɔk mɛ́mbɔ́ŋ basɛ́mɛ́ nɛ bɛcháy ɛ̌ti bɛrɛmti ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́fù ndǔ mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn ɛnɛ bɔmanyu.
42021026	Chɔŋ bo mámbɔŋ bɛcháy kpátɛ mbɔk mámfe ndu bárɨŋɨ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhó bɛfakari fá amɨk. Chɔŋ bɛtaŋ mfáy mɛ́nyɨkɨsi.
42021027	Nɛ chɔŋ Mmǔ anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm ambesi, ande twɔ́ amɛm nɛbháŋ, nɛ bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ nɛ kɛnókó.
42021028	Mpok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhó bɛfakari, tě ká sɛnɛ́ nɛ nkaysi bɛ mpok anɛ Mandɛm áfɛrɛ bhe ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri arɔp chi kɛkwɔt.”
42021029	Yesu atɛ́m bɔ nɛkay ɛnɛ́n bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́ ká ɛnɔk fig nɛ mɛnɔk bɛ́chák.
42021030	Nɛtɛ́m anɛ bɔ́ bɛ́bho bɛ́tɛm bɛtɔ́, bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ ɛso ɛ́rɔp chi kɛ́kwɔ́t.
42021031	Ɛ́chí ɛnyumɔ́t nɛ nɛtwɔ́ wa, Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm. Mǎnáŋ mǎngɔ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n-nɛ ngátí bhe bɛ́fàkari, dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mpok anɛ Kɛfɔ Mandɛm kɛ́twɔ arɔp kɛkwɔt.
42021032	Nchí ghati bhe tɛtɛp bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛfakari, kɛ mkpáká bho abhɛn ɛchɔŋ amfʉɛ́t.
42021033	Chɔŋ mfay amfʉɛt, mmɨk amfʉɛ́t, kɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛya ɛ́pú fʉɛt wáwák.
42021034	“Sɔt ka mpok bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ fyɛ ntí ndǔ mɛ́nyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ tontó, bǎkɛ́ fyɛ ntí ndu mmɛ́m nɛ bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ basɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛpɛmɛ́ mmɨk ɛnɛn. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kway bɛkʉ bɛ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛtwɔ́ ɛna nɛ́mbák tɛ́mchok ntá yɛka ndǔ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ toŋti mmʉɛ́t, nɛ nɛ́mbayti bhe mbɔ ntá.
42021035	Chɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fàkari ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɔ mɛ́njɨŋɨ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu fá amɨk.
42021036	Bák yɛ ka pě mpoknkɛm, mǎnɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt bɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́bʉɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛfakari, mǎnte bɛsí Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm.”
42021037	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp Yesu are tɔ́ŋ bo amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Ɛ́ghaka nɔkɔ běku, ankó andɔk ambʉrɛ amfay njiɛ mɛnɔk Ólif.
42021038	Nɛ nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, bo mámpu mandɔk ntá yi amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ndu bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi átɔ̀ŋ.
42022001	Mpok anɛ bo Israɛl mányìɛ̀ ɛpǎ Brɛt anɛ kɛbhɔŋ yís arɔp kɛkwɔt. Bábhɨŋɨ ɛpǎ yɔ bɛ, Nɛkɨŋɨ.
42022002	Bǒ batí bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm báré yaŋ mbi bɛway Yesu bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ báchày nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bo bakway bɛkʉ.
42022003	Satan akó anti Júdas anɛ mpɨ́kɨ́rí nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛchi bɛ Iskariɔt. Júdas achi nyaka mmu amɔt ndǔ nkwɔ baghɔk Yesu bati byo nɛ apay.
42022004	Arɔk anyiɛ́ bɛti nɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bábhàbhɛri ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, ɛnyu yi ákway bɛti Yesu ntá yap.
42022005	Bábhɔ́ŋ maŋák tontó, nɛ báká bɛchyɛ yi nkáp.
42022006	Júdas aka nɛ bhɔ́. Abho bɛyaŋ mbi ndu bɛ́tí Yesu ntá yap ndǔ mpok anɛ ngɛ́mtay bho bapu ghɔ.
42022007	Nywɔp Brɛt anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yís nɛ́kwáy. Ndu nywɔp ɛnɔ kɛ̌ báwày nyaka mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n anɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ,
42022008	Yesu ató yɛ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n nɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ, “Dɔ́k ká toŋtí mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́ sɛ́nyíɛ́ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ.”
42022009	Bábhɛp yi bɛ, “Ɔ̌yàŋ sɛ́ntóŋtí yɔ́ fá?”
42022010	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́ ká, nɛchwe anɛ bǎchwé ɛtɔk, chɔŋ mǎngɔ́ mmu anɛ ápɔ́kɔ́ ɛjɔ̌ manyiɛp. Koŋó ká yi kpátɛ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ yi áchwe,
42022011	mǎngati mbɔŋɔ́kɛt bɛ, ‘Ntɔŋ ǎto bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́mbɛp wɔ bɛ, mɔ́kɛrɛ́ mankɔ anɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́nyiɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ nɛ baghɔk abha achí fá?’
42022012	Chɔŋ antɔ́ŋ be mɔ́kɛt anɛ achi amfay nɛ achɨk anɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛsɔbhɛri. Toŋtí ká yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ arɛ́.”
42022013	Bárɔ́k, baghɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi aghati bhɔ. Bátóŋti Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ arɛ́.
42022014	Mpok ákwáy nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu achɔkɔ ndu ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ nɛnyiɛ nɛ bǒnto.
42022015	Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Nnáŋ njǎŋ mɛnyiɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ ɛnɛ́ nɛ bhe tontó kɛ nchwe ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri.
42022016	Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mpú pɛrɛ nyiɛ́ chɔŋ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ kpátɛ mpok Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bo mándɨŋɨ ntí ɛpǎ ɛnɛ, nɔ́ chi mpok yi ábhák Mfɔ bǒ mankɛm.”
42022017	Yesu asɔt yɛ nkɔ́p nɛ mmɛ́m amɛm. Áchyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bakak ntá Mandɛm, achyɛ ntá bǒnto andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Sɔt ka nyú, ntɨ anyǔ anchyɛ ntɨ.
42022018	Nchí ghati bhe bɛ, bɛ́bhó ɛchɔŋ, mpú pɛrɛ nyú mmɛ́mɛn kpátɛ mpok anɛ Mandɛm abhak Mfɔ bo mankɛm.”
42022019	Asɔt yɛ ɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛd. Achyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm. Are bɔkɔti anchyɛ nɔkɔ ntá baghɔkɔ́ bhi, andɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, “Brɛt-nɛ até ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛya anɛ nchí chyɛ mbɔ akap ɛ̌ti yɛka. Mǎndɔp, mǎnkʉ nɔkɔ ɛnyunɛ ndu bɛ́tɨk mɛ.”
42022020	Mánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ mɛ́nyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́, asɔt nkɔ́p nɛ mmɛ́m amɛm, achyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yí ákʉ́ nɛ nɛnyíɛ́. Arɛm bɛ, “Nɛ́ chí Nku Nkɔ anɛ Mandɛm ányú nɛ bǒ mmɨk ɛ̌ti nɛwú ɛna ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ chɔŋ ankʉ Nku Nkɔ anɛ yi ányú nɛ bo ante.
42022021	Kɛ mmu anɛ átì mɛ achí fá chɔkɔ ǎnyìɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ mɛ.
42022022	Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ngu mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi árɛ́mɛ́. Kɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛ́p ɛncha ntá mmu wu nɔ átì mɛ ntá bǒmpap abha!”
42022023	Bǒnto bábhó bɛbhɛp batɨ bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛsɛ ákway bɛkʉ anɛ ɛnyǔ ndak ntá yi e?”
42022024	Baghɔkɔ Yesu babho bɛkɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ batɨ ndu bɛ́rɨŋɨ mmu wap anɛ áchá abhɛnɛfu.
42022025	Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bafɔ abhɛn bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk babhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay bǒbhap nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfay bho, ǎyàŋ mámbɨŋɨ yi bɛ, ‘Nkwaka-bho.’
42022026	Kɛ ɛ́kɛ́ bhák nɔ nɛ bhe. Mǔngo ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛbhak mbɔ mɔ́nkwɛn ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka, mǔnti ambak mbɔ mǔbɛtok.
42022027	Agha áchá ntɨ? Mmǔ anɛ báfʉɛ̀t yi nɛnyíɛ́ kɛ anɛ áfʉɛ̀t nɛnyíɛ́? Pú anɛ áchɔkɔ mámfʉɛt yi nɛnyíɛ́? Kɛ nchí nɛ bhe mbɔ mǔbɛtok.
42022028	“Bě kɛ̌ bǎté nɛ mɛ ndǔ bɛsɔŋɔri bha mɛnkɛm.
42022029	Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu Ɛtaya áchyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ mɛnyiɛ kɛfɔ, ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ nchí kʉ chɔŋ bɛ be nkwɔ́ manyíɛ́ kɛfɔ.
42022030	Chɔŋ mǎnyiɛ nɛ mǎnyú nɛ mɛ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt ndǔ ɛpǎ kɛfɔ ɛya, nɛ mǎnchɔkɔ nkwɔ ndǔ mɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ndu bɛkɛm manɛrɛ́kɛt Israɛl byo nɛ apay.”
42022031	Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu arɛm ntá Píta bɛ, “Símun, Símun, ghók! Báchyɛ́ Satan bɛtaŋ bɛ́ ámɔ́ bhe, amfap abhɛ́n bárɨ́ nɛ abhɛn babɛbhɛ mbɔ mmǔ ǎnyɨ̀kɨsi kasárá ndu bɛsɔt anɛ yi ághàŋ gari.
42022032	Kɛ nnɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛ bɛ́ ɔ́kɛ́ rɔ bɛ́bhɔŋ nɛka nɛ mɛ. Nɛ ɔ́náŋ ɔ́mpɛ́tnsɛm ntá ya, ɔ́kɛ́ rɔ bɛfyɛ bɔ̌mayɛ ntɨ.”
42022033	Píta akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Acha, yɛ̌ báfyɛ̀ wɔ chi ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, yɛ báwày wɔ wáy, mɛ̌gú chi nɛ wɔ.”
