42022034	Yesu aghati yí bɛ, “Píta, dɨŋɨ bɛ́ nkɔk apɛrɛ́ kók bɛtǐ ɛbhɛn, chɔŋ ɔ́ndɛm ndɔŋ ɛ́rát bɛ ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛ.”
42022035	Yesu abhɛ́p baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Mpok ntó bhe pósá ti, ɛbha ti, nkwɔbhánya bɛkak ti, bǎchɛp nyaka yɛ̌nyɨŋ kɛ?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Wáwák.”
42022036	Aghati yɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nkáp ankɛm wu amʉɛt. Mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛbhǎ nɛkɔ ánsɔ́t yɔ. Anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ akparɛnja, ántí ndɛ́ yi anku akparɛnja.
42022037	Nchí ghati bhe bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ ndǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ̌ti ya, ɛbhɔŋ bɛfu tɛtɛp. Nɔ chi ɛnɛ́ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Básɔt yi mbɔ nkʉ bɛbʉ́ amɔt.’ Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn básɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti ya bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛfu tɛtɛp.”
42022038	Baghɔkɔ́ bhi barɛm bɛ, “Acha, ghɔ́ bɔakparɛnja bapay fá.” Aghati bhɔ́ bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ká nɔ.”
42022039	Yesu afa yɛ arɔk amfay Njiɛ Mɛnok Ólif mbɔ ɛnyu ɛsɨ́. Baghɔkɔ́ bhi barɔk nɛ yi.
42022040	Arɛ́, aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt bɛ mbák nɛmɔ nɛ́twɔ bǎkɛ́ kwɛn.”
42022041	Árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, arɔ bhɔ, atɛ́n mmʉɛt ambɨ mandú, mbɔ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɔ́tɛ́m ntay nɛngaka. Atɛp mánɛ́n amɨk, abho mɛnɨkmʉɛt bɛ,
42022042	“Ɛtaya, mbák ɔkɔŋ, fɛrɛ́ nkɔ́p ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ bɛ́ ámfórí mɛ. Kɛ ɔ́kɛ́ kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌yáŋ, kʉ chi ɛnɛ́ wɔmbɔŋ ɔ́yàŋ.”
42022043	[Ɛnɛ́ yi ánɨ̀kmʉɛt nɔ, ángɛl Mandɛm abhesi yi bɛsí, afyɛ́ yi ntɨ.
42022044	Nɛ ndǔ bɛyǎ basɛmɛ, are nɨkmʉɛt nɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛnkɛm. Nsɔ́ŋtí anɛ áfú yi amʉɛt are chɨti amɨk mbɔ bakɔŋ manoŋ.]
42022045	Ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnɨkmʉɛt, afate, apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yí árɔ́ baghɔkɔ́ bhi. Aghɔ bhɔ ndu bábhʉrɛ kɛnɔ́ ndu mánáŋ bápɔ́bhɛ́ ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ basɛ́mɛ́.
42022046	Yesu abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ndaká yí bǎbhʉ̀rɛ kɛnɔ́? Faté ká, mǎnɨkmʉɛt bɛ nɛmɔ nɛ́ntwɔ́, bǎkɛ́ kwɛn.”
42022047	Ɛnɛ́ Yesu abhʉɛ́t bɛrɛm nɔ nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi, ɛká bho ɛ́chwɔ́p. Júdas, mmu amɔt ndǔ nkwɔ baghɔk Yesu batí byó nɛ apay, abhak bɔ ambɨ. Arɔk kɛkwɔt nɛ Yesu ndu bɛ́bhɛ́nɛ yi.
42022048	Kɛ Yesu abhɛp yi bɛ, “Júdas, ɔ̌bhɛ̀nɛ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ndu bɛti mɛ ntá bǒmpap abha?”
42022049	Baghɔkɔ́ bhi bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́twɔ̀ fakari, bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Acha, sɛ́nsɔ́t bɔakparɛnja bhɛsɛ sɛnu nɛ bǒbhɛn-ɛ?”
42022050	Mmǔ wap amɔt agwɔp akparɛnja ywi. Akpɔ́t atú nsɛ̌m mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm chwát agʉɛ́p amɨk.
42022051	Kɛ Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ká nɔ!” Atɔk yɛ atú mmu wu, abu yi.
42022052	Yesu abhɛ́p yɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bábhàbhɛri ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk abhɛn bátwɔ́ bɛkɛm yi bɛ, “Bǎtwɔ bɛkɛm mɛ nɛ bɔakparɛnja nɛ nkɨ́k mbɔ bɛ nchí chí ngɛ́bhɛ ntantaŋ?
42022053	Mpok nchí nɛ bhe amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm nɛ́nji nɛnji, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ kɛm mɛ. Kɛ mpok yɛka nɛ Satan, mfɔ ɛjuri, akway nɛ́nɛ.”
42022054	Bǒbhɔ bákɛ́m yɛ́ Yesu, bábhó bɛrɔŋ ndǔ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm. Píta are koŋo bhɔ ansɛm nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ.
42022055	Bábháyti ngó nɛntɨ sɛnta. Bo báchɔ́kɔ nɛpaká ngó mángwaka nɔkɔ ngo. Píta achɔkɔ arɛ́ nɛ bhɔ.
42022056	Ngɔrɛ́ bɛtok amɔt anɛ achi arɛ, aghɔ́ Píta nkwɔ arɛ́ chɔkɔ ndǔ ngo ághɔ̀ yi amʉɛt. Áyɨ́ŋɨ́ yi dǐǐ, arɛm bɛ, “Mɔ́nkwǎnɛ nkwɔ́ achi mbʉ nɛ Yesu.”
42022057	Píta ataŋa, arɛm bɛ, “Mma, mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yi.”
42022058	Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, mmǔ achak aghɔ́ Píta arɛm bɛ, “Wɔ nkwɔ ɔchí mmǔ ywi amɔt.” Píta akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Cháá, mpú nɛ bhɔ”
42022059	Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔkɔ mbɔ nɛŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp nɛmɔt, mmǔ achak arɛm bɛ, “Tɛtɛp, mmǔ-nɛ nkwɔ́ achi mbʉ nɛ Yesu. Yi nkwɔ chi mmu Gálili.”
42022060	Píta aghati yi bɛ, “Nkwǎnɛ, mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ wɔ ɔ́rɛ̀m!” Tɛ́mté wu, ɛnɛ́ yi ábhʉɛ́t bɛrɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m, nkɔk akók.
42022061	Acha ayibhiri mmʉɛ́t ayɨŋɨ Píta. Amɨ́k ayap átɛ́mɛ́ri. Píta atɨk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu ághátí yi bɛ, “Nkɔk apɛrɛ́ kók bɛti ɛbhɛn, chɔŋ ɔ́ndɛm ndɔŋ ɛrat bɛ ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛ.”
42022062	Afú nɛfí, adi kɛbhɔ, nɛ bɛyǎ basɛ́mɛ́ antɨ.
42022063	Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bábhàbhɛri Yesu bábho bɛyɔkɔ yi nɛ mándɛnɛ nɔkɔ yi nɛ ɛ́kpá.
42022064	Bágwɔ́t yi amɨ́k nkwɔ, mámbɛbhɛ nɔkɔ yi bɛ, “Wɔ mmu ɔ́chí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ, ghatí bhɛsɛ! Agha ádɛ́bhɛ́ nɔ́ wɔ?”
42022065	Bárɛ́m bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak, mánso nɔkɔ yi nɛ nsɔk.
42022066	Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, bǒbati ɛtɔk, bǒ batí bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm bákɛ́m ɛchɛmɛ ɛghǒ yap. Básɔ́t Yesu barɔk arɛ́ nɛ yi.
42022067	Bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ghatí bhɛsɛ, ɔchí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò?” Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mbák ngátí bhe bǎpú noko;
42022068	nɛ mbák mbɛ́p bé ɛnyɨŋ, bapú kɛmɛ mɛ.
42022069	Kɛ bɛ́bhó ɛchɔŋ, chɔŋ Mandɛm Bɛtaŋ Mɛnkɛm amfyɛ́ Mɛ Mmu mfú amfay nchɔkɔ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt bɛyǎ kɛnókó, ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm ɛyi.”
42022070	Bɔ́ mankɛm babhɛp yi bɛ, “Nɔ́ ɔchí Mmɔ̌ Mandɛm-ɛ?” Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎrɛ́mɛ́.”
42022071	Bɔ́ bárɛ́m bɛ, “Sɛ́pɛ́t sɛ́yàŋ batísiɛ́ mántwɔ́ mándɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́ ndaká yí? Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛ́ghok nɛ batú ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú yi anyu.”
42023001	Nkwɔ́ bataŋá manyé bárɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, bɔ̌ mankɛm báfáte, básɔt Yesu báré rɔ́ŋ ntá Páílet nɛ yi.
42023002	Bábhó bɛbhat yi barak amʉɛt mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Sɛghɔ̌, mmǔ-nɛ ndu ákʉ̀ bɛ bǒ bhɛsɛ bákɛ́ bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé ɛtɔk. Ǎkàŋ nkwɔ bɛ́ bo bákɛ́ chyɛ nkábhɛ́nti ntá Sísa, Mfɔ Rom. Nɛ árɛ̀m bɛ yí achi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, nɔ́ chi bɛ achí Mfɔ.”
42023003	Páílet abhɛ́p yɛ Yesu bɛ, “Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí nɛ́ Mfɔ bo Israɛl?” Akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ɛ́chí mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́rɛ́mɛ́.”
42023004	Páílet arɛm yɛ ntá bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ ngɛ́mtay bo abhɛn bachi arɛ bɛ, “Mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ yɛ̌ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mmǔ-nɛ.”
42023005	Kɛ bárɔ́k ambɨ bɛkɛmɛ bɛ, “Ǎkɔ̀ atú Judɛ́ya ankɛm antɔŋ nɔkɔ bho ndu mɛ́nyɨ́kɨ́si batɨ̌ yap amɛm bɛ mángʉ́ɛ́p ɛsɔŋɔri ɛtɔk. Akʉ nɔ́, bɛbho atú Gálili kpát bɛ́gháka fá Yerúsalɛm.”
42023006	Páílet ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, abhɛ́p bhɔ mbák Yesu achi mmu atú Gálili.
42023007	Árɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Yesu afǔ atú ɛtɔk ɛnɛ Hɛ́rɔd achi mfɔ arɛ́, achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mandɔk nɛ yi ntá Hɛ́rɔd. Mbɔŋ Hɛ́rɔd achi nyaka Yerúsalɛm mpok yɔ.
42023008	Hɛ́rɔd ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Yesu, ábhɔ́ŋ maŋák tontó, mbɔnyunɛ anáŋ ǎghòk nyaka ɛ̌ti yi nɛ abhɔ́ŋ ɛkwak tɛntɛp bɛghɔ yi nɛ amɨ́k. Ǎbhàka nyaka ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ Yesu ankʉ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay yí angɔ́.
42023009	Ɛ́kʉ́ Hɛ́rɔd abhɛ́p Yesu bɛyǎ bɛbhɛp kɛ yɛ ɛ́mɔt Yesu ábhɨ́kɨ́ kɛmɛ.
42023010	Ɛnɛ́ Hɛ́rɔd árɔ̀ŋ ambɨ bɛbhɛp yi bɛbhɛp, bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm báte kɛkwɔt, mámbat nɔkɔ yi barak amʉɛt nɛ bɛyǎ ɛ̌yu.
42023011	Hɛ́rɔd nɛ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bhi báré byak yi, mámfyɛ nɔkɔ yí ɛtáŋɔk. Mámɛ́sɛ yi nkú kɛfɔ amʉɛt. Arɛm bɛ́ mánsɔ́t yí mámpɛtnsɛm ntá Páílet nɛ yi.
42023012	Kɛmmʉɛrɛ Hɛ́rɔd nɛ Páílet kɛ́bho ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ nywɔp ɛnɔ. Ndǔ mpok anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm bachi nyaka chi ndǔ mpap.
42023013	Bápɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nsɛm ntá Páílet nɛ Yesu, Páílet ató bábhɨ́ŋɨ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk nɛ bǒ ɛtɔk.
42023014	Arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bǎtwɔ̀ fá ntá ya nɛ mmǔ-nɛ bɛ ǎkʉ̀ bo bákɛ́ bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé ɛtɔk. Mbɛ̌p yi mɛnyɨŋ bɛsí bhɛka, nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ́ yɛ̌ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ɛbhě yi.
42023015	Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd nkwɔ́ abhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ yɛ̌ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ɛbhě yi mbɔnyunɛ atǒ yi apɛtnsɛm ntá ya. Nchí ghati bhe bɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ yi abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ mangway yi.
42023016	Chɔŋ nchyɛ́ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mándɛ́n yi, mámfɛrɛ yi amɔ.”
42023017	[Ɛpɨŋɨ́ bo Israɛl ɛ́chí nyaka bɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ bɔ́ mányìɛ̀ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ, Páílet abhɔŋ bɛ́fɛ́rɛ mmu amɔt anɛ bǒ Yerusalɛm báyàŋ yi amfɛrɛ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.]
42023018	Bɔ́ mankɛm bábɨ́k mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Dɔ̌ mángwáy yi. Fɛrɛ́ bhɛsɛ chi Barábas!”
42023019	Barábas chi mmu anɛ báfyɛ́ nyaka ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ ndǔ barak apay, “Agʉɛbhɛ́ nyaka ɛbyɔk ɛtɔk, nɛ awáy mmu.”
42023020	Páílet apɛt arɛm kɛpɨ ntá yap nɛ nkaysi bɛ́fɛ́rɛ Yesu amɔ.
42023021	Kɛ bárɔ́k ambɨ bɛbɨk bɛ, “Dɛm mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí! Mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí!”
42023022	Ndǔ ndɔŋ anɛ ájwí ɛ́rát Páílet arɛm bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ɛbɛ́ptí ndak yi ákʉ́? Mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ́ yɛ̌ ɛ́bɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́ ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ mángwáy yi. Chɔŋ nchyɛ́ ɛyɔŋ mándɛ́n yi nɛ ɛ́kpá, mámfɛrɛ yi amɔ.”
42023023	Kɛ bárɔ́k ambɨ bɛkpɛmɛ, mambɨkɨ nɔkɔ bɛ Páílet andɔ mango yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Bǎri map anyiɛrɛ Páílet, awupsi ntɨ.
42023024	Áká yɛ bɛ́ mánkʉ́ nɛ Yesu mbɔ ɛnyu bakɔŋɔ.
42023025	Afɛrɛ Barábas mmu ágʉ́ɛbhɛ́ ɛbyɔk ɛtɔk nɛ awáy mmu, ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, mbɔ ɛnyu bɔ báyàŋ. Achyɛ Yesu ntá bo Israɛl bɛ mánkʉ nɛ yi mbɔ ɛnyu bákɔ́ŋɔ́.
42023026	Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu básɔ́t Yesu báre rɔ́ŋ nɛ yi. Ndu bárɔ̀ŋ, bátɛ́mɛri mmǔ ɛtɔk Sírene amɔt anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Símun. Áfǔ nyaka ɛbhɨ ǎpɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p, Yerúsalɛm. Bákɛ́m yi bábáyti nɛ ɛko Yesu, bákʉ yi apɔkɔ yɔ́ ankoŋo nɔkɔ Yesu.
42023027	Ngɛ́mtáy bhó báre koŋo Yesu ansɛm. Mbɔk yap bábhák baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn básɛ̀mɛ nyaka, mándi nɔkɔ yi.
42023028	Kɛ Yesu ayibhiri mmʉɛt arɛm ntá baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ bɛ, “Baghɔrɛ Yerúsalɛm, bǎkɛ́ di mɛ! Dí ká chí mmʉɛt ɛyɛka nɛ bɔ̌bhɛka.
42023029	Nchí ghati bhe bɛ mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ bo bárɛ̀m chɔŋ bɛ, ‘Ɛ́rɨ ntá yɛntɨkɨ nkongɔrɛ́ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ re bhé!’
42023030	Ndǔ mpok yɔ, chɔŋ bo mándɛm ntá njiɛ ɛgho bɛ, ‘Kwɛ́n ká bay bhɛsɛ́’; nɛ ntá bɔ̌njiɛ bɛ, ‘Kutí ká bhɛsɛ.’
42023031	Bo bárɛ̀m chɔŋ nɔ́, mbɔnyunɛ, mbák bákwày bɛ́kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ntá ya, Mmɛ mmu nchí ɛnɔk ɛbɨk, chɔŋ ɛ́mbak ná nɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́gú?”
42023032	Ɛnɛ́ bárɔ̀ŋ nɔ, basɔt bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ bati apay nkwɔ abhɛn batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bárɔ̀ŋ nyaka bɛway nɛ Yesu.
42023033	Bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ njiɛ anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Ɛ̌nkɔ́nti, bágó Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Bágó nkwɔ́ bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ bhɔ bati apay, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ndǔ ɛyi ɛkotákátí, amɔt ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm Yesu, achák ɛbhě awɔ́ghɔ.
42023034	Arɛ́, amfǎy ɛkotákátí, Yesu anɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, foŋorí bhɔ́, mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bákʉ̀.” Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bágʉɛp ɛbháŋá ndu bɛ́rɨŋɨ ɛnyu bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kɔ́rɛ ndɛn Yesu.
42023035	Bo bábhák arɛ́ tee mámkpɔkɔ nɔkɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fàkari. Kɛ bǒbati báré way yí way mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Ǎpɛ̀mɛ nyaka bo bachak! Ámpɛ́mɛ́ mmʉɛt ɛyi mbák achi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, Mmu Mandɛm Ayabhɛ!”
42023036	Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nkwɔ báré way Yesu, mándɔkɔ nɔkɔ bɛchyɛ yi mmɛ̌m amɛn ábáká.
42023037	Nɛ mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mbák tɛtɛp ɔchí Mfɔ bo Israɛl, pɛmɛ́ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ!”
42023038	Amfay ntí Yesu, ɛbhɔ́kɛnɔk ɛbhak babhát ndǔ ɛko ɛnɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ arɛ bɛ: “Nɛ́ chi Mfɔ bo Israɛl.”
42023039	Nkʉ-bɛbʉ́ amɔt anɛ áchi nkwɔ́ kpaŋkpáŋ ndǔ ɛyǐ ɛkotákátí are way Yesu andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Pú wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò? Pɛmɛ́ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ, ɔ́mpɛmɛ bhɛsɛ́ nkwɔ bhɔ!”
42023040	Kɛ mmʉ̌ bɛbʉ́ achák wu are sayti yi bɛ, “Yɛ̌ndu ɔ́gù ndǔ ɛkotákátí mbɔ Yesu, ɔpú cháy Mandɛm-ɛ́?
42023041	Wɔ nɛ mɛ sɛ́gù ɛ̌ti bɛpɔ̌ barak ayɛsɛ, kɛ mmǔ-nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ yɛ̌ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ?”
42023042	Arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Yesu, ghɔ́ mɛ ntínso, mpok ɔ́bhak Mfɔ.”
42023043	Yesu aghati yí bɛ, “Nchí ghati wɔ bɛ, ɛchɔŋ, chɔŋ ɔ́mbak nɛ mɛ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt maŋák anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Párádis.”
42023044	Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nkárɛ́nká byo nɛ ɛpay nɛ ngósí, mmok ánɛ́m, ɛjuri ɛ́kwɛn ɛkuti ɛtɔk ɛnkɛm kpátɛ nkárɛ́nká ɛ́rát beku,
42023045	mbɔnyunɛ mmok ábhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ ghɔɔ. Nɛ ɛkát ɛnɛ ɛchi amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ɛ́ghárɛ ndǔ bɛbhɔk bɛpay gbee.
42023046	Yesu abɨk arɛm bɛ, “Ɛtaya, ndɔ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛna amɔ́ yɛ!” Árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, asɛbhɛ.
42023047	Mǔnti batɛmɛ́ nɛnu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛfakari, abɨti Mandɛm, andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Tɛtɛp, mmǔ-nɛ achí mbʉ chak bɛsí Mandɛm!”
42023048	Ngɛ́mtay bo abhɛn báchɛ́mɛ́ nyaka arɛ ndu bɛghɔ, bághɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari. Bágúrɛ nɛ basɛ́mɛ́, mámbyaka nɔkɔ amɔ antɨ.
42023049	Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bárɨ́ŋɨ́ Yesu, nɛ baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn bábhó bɛkoŋo yi tɛ Gálili, báté nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ mángɔ nɔkɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
42023050	Mmǔ amɔt achí nyaka Yerúsalɛm mpok yɔ. Aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Josɛ́f. Achi nyaka mmǔ Arimátia, ɛtɔk bo Israɛl. Abhak ndɨ̌ndu nɛ mmǔ chak nɛ ǎnòŋ nyaka mpok anɛ Mandɛm abhak Mfɔ bho. Abhak mmǔ amɔt ndǔ ɛchɛmɛ ɛgho ɛnɛ bǒ batí ɛtɔk. Kɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ ka nyaka nɛ bhɔ ndǔ nkaysi yap nɛ nɛkʉ wap.
42023052	Yí arɔk ntá Páílet bɛ́ ánchyɛ́ yi bɛtaŋ amfɛrɛ Yesu amfǎy ɛkotákátí. Páílet áchyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi bɛtaŋ,
42023053	arɔk yɛ asɛbhɛ Yesu amɨk, anɛ́p yi nɛ ɛsyɛ̌ndɛn, arɔk afyɛ́ amɛm nnɛm ɛnɛ́n bátɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́, kɛ kɛre bhɛmɛ yɛ̌ mmu arɛ́.
42023054	Ɛ́chí nyaka chi nywɔp ɛnɛn bo bátòŋti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt, nɛ ɛ́rɔp chi mandú bɛgháká ndǔ mpok anɛ Nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt nɛ́bho.
42023055	Baghɔrɛ abhɛn báfú nɛ Yesu tɛ Gálili, bákóŋo, baghɔ nnɛm, nɛ ɛnyǔ bábhʉ́rɛ́ mmʉɛt yi amɛm.
42023056	Bápɛ́t yɛ nsɛm ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ báchɔ̀kɔ amɛm Yerúsalɛm. Bátóŋti bawɛt ɛrɨ́tí ɛriɛp amɛn báwati amʉɛt ngu. Nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛnap nɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́, báywěmʉɛt mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛbhé Moses ɛ́rɛ̀m.
42024001	Nɛ nɛyǐnwyɔp ndǔ Nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt, baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ básɔ́t bawɛrɛ́riɛp amɛn bɔ bághókó bárɔ́k ndǔ nnɛm Yesu nɛ nɛyǐnwyɔp.
42024002	Bághɔ́ bɛ ntay ɛnɛn anyǔ nnɛm nɛ́rɔp chi nɛpaká nnɛm.
42024003	Báchwé amɛm nnɛm, kɛ bákɛ ghɔ mmʉɛt yi.
42024004	Ɛ́chá bhɔ ɛnyu bákʉ. Tɛ́mté wu, babhakanɛm bati apay nɛ ndɛn amʉɛt ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kɔ̀t ŋwaŋwǎŋwaŋ báté kɛkwɔt nɛ bhɔ.
42024005	Bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ tontó. Bátɛ́p bati amɨk. Bǒ-bhɔ bábhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Ndaká yí báyàŋ mmu anɛ achi nɛpɛ́m ndǔ nkwɔ́ bawú?
42024006	Apú fá. Mandɛm akʉ yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ ɛbhɔŋ bɛfakari. Twɔ́ ká ghɔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bábhʉ́rɛ́ yi. Tɨ́k ka ndǔ yi ágháti bhe mpok ábhʉɛ́t atú Gálili nɛ bhe.
42024007	Yi arɛm nyaka bɛ, chɔŋ mámfyɛ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm amɔ́ bǒ bɛbʉ́, mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí, nɛ ɛ́ghaka nɔkɔ manywɔp arat, ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
42024008	Baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ bátɨk yɛ bɛyɔŋ Yesu.
42024009	Bápɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nsɛm, bágháti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛfakari ntá bǒnto Yesu bati byo nɛ amɔt nɛ bakoŋo bhi abhɛ́nɛ́fú mankɛm.
42024010	Baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn bághátí nyaka bǒnto Yesu mbok yɔ chi María anɛ áfú ɛtɔk Mágdala, nɛ Joana, nɛ María nnɔ Jems, nɛ baghɔrɛ́ báchák abhɛn báchi nyaka nɛ bhɔ.
42024011	Kɛ bǒnto básɔ́t ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ bárɛ́mɛ́ mbɔ ɛráká ndak, bɔ́ kɛnókó wáwák.
42024012	Yɛ̌ nɔ́, Píta afate, ajɛt arɔk ndǔ nnɛm. Ákúrí nɔ́kɔ́, agʉɛp amɨ́k, ayɨŋɨ amɛm nnɛm. Aghɔ́ bɛbhɔ́kɔ́ ndɛn ɛbhɛn mánɛ́bhɛ́ nyaka mmʉɛt Yesu nɛ bhɔ bhʉ́rɛ́. Apɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p, amakati nɔkɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́nɛ́ ɛ́fákárí.
42024013	Nkúbhɛ́ ɛwak ɛyɔ, bakoŋo Yesu bati apay báfá Yerúsalɛm bare rɔŋ ndu mɔ́tɔk anɛ bábhìŋɨ bɛ Ɛmayus, nɛkɔ̌ ɛnɛn nɛchi mbɔ bɔkilɔ́mɛta nɛ́nɛnamɔt nɛ ɛbhɔ́k.
42024014	Mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́fákárí.
42024015	Ɛnɛ́ bárɛ̀m mánkɛm nɔkɔ ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ batɨ, mbɔŋ Yesu arɔk kɛkwɔt nɛ bhɔ ankɔ nɔkɔ nɛ bhɔ.
42024016	Kɛ ɛ́bhák mbɔ bɛ́ bágwɔt amɨ́k ayap. Bɔ́ kɛrɨŋɨ bɛ́ chí Yesu.
42024017	Abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ndak bǎkɔ̀ mǎndɛmɛ nɔkɔ ɛnyunɛ?” Báté nsónso.
42024018	Mmu wap amɔt anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Klópas abhɛ́p yɛ yi bɛ, “Ndiɛrɛ wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí kɛnkɔ̌ anɛ átwɔ́ Yerúsalɛm anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛfakari arɛ́ ndǔ manywɔbhɛ́-nɛ?”
42024019	Abhɛ́p bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ mɛnyɨŋ?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fákárí nɛ Yesu anɛ Násárɛt. Achi nyaka ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm, nɛ atɔ́ŋ bɛsí bho nɛ bɛsí Mandɛm bɛ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm bɛchi nɛ yi ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi árɛ̀m nɛ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀.
42024020	Kɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒ batí ɛtɔk abhɛsɛ bákɛ́m yi bachyɛ mangway, nɛ bágó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí.
42024021	Sɛ́bhaka nyaka ntɨ bɛ yí kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́fɛ́rɛ bo Israɛl ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri. Ɛ́chí nɛ́nɛ manywɔp arat ɛnɛ́ ndak anɛ́ áfákárí.
42024022	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák ɛ́chí bɛ́ mbɔk baghɔrɛ́ ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛsɛ bákʉ batí átaka bhɛsɛ amɛm. Bárɔ́k ndǔ nnɛm běti bheti,
42024023	kɛ bákɛ ghɔ Yesu. Bápɛtnsɛm barɛm bɛ bághɔ̌ bo mbɔ bɔángɛl Mandɛm ndǔ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k antifú abhɛn bághátí bhɔ bɛ Yesu achi nɛpɛ́m.
42024024	Mbɔk bo abhɛn báchí nyaka ndǔ nkwɔ́ ywɛsɛ bárɔ́k ndǔ nnɛm bághɔ́ bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchi nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ bárɛ́mɛ́, kɛ bɔ́ kɛghɔ́ mbɔŋ Yesu.”
42024025	Afɔ̌ kɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ ntá yap bɛ, “Bǎchɨŋti bǎcha! Nɛ batɨ̌ yɛka ápú wakari mɛ́nóko mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bárɛmɛ!
42024026	Pú Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛghɔ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm kɛ anchwe ndǔ kɛfɔ ɛki?”
42024027	Yesu abho yɛ mɛnɛnɛ ntá yap bɛ manjwimɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn básɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti yi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm, bɛ́bho ndǔ Basɨŋɨ Moses bɛrɔ́ŋ bɛghaka ndǔ amɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm mankɛm.
42024028	Bágháká kɛkwɔt ɛtɔk ɛnɛ bárɔ̀ŋ, Yesu akʉ mbɔ bɛ ǎrɔ̀ bhɔ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ.
42024029	Kɛ bájwɛ́ yi, barɛm bɛ, “Bʉrɛ́ nɛ bhɛsɛ. Nywɔp nɛ́rɔŋ nɛ mbaŋ anaŋ ǎgiri.” Arɔk yɛ bɛbhʉrɛ nɛ bhɔ.
42024030	Mpok nɛnyíɛ́ ákwáy nɔ́kɔ́, asɔt ɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt. Áchyɛ́ bakak ntá Mandɛm. Abho yɛ bɛ́bɔ́kɔ́ti anchyɛ nɔkɔ ntá yap.
42024031	Amɨ́k ánɛ́nɛ bhɔ, bárɨ́ŋɨ yɛ bɛ chi yi. Kɛ anɛmsi bhɔ́ bɛsí.
42024032	Babho bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Nyakányɛt maŋák achi mbʉ bhɛsɛ antɨ mpok yi árɛ̀m kɛpɨ nɛ bhɛsɛ ambi, anɛnɛ nɔkɔ basɨŋ ntá yɛsɛ!”
42024033	Báfáte tɛ́mté bápɛtnsɛm Yerúsalɛm. Bághɔ́ bǒnto Yesu bati byo nɛ amɔt nɛ bakoŋo bhi abhɛ́nɛ́fú abhɛn báchí nɛ bhɔ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt.
42024034	Nɛchwe báchwé, bágháti bhɔ bɛ, “Acha apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m tɛtɛp! Atɔ̌ŋ mmʉɛt ntá Símun!”
42024035	Bǒbhɔ bati apay bágháti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari ambi, nɛ ɛnyu bɔ́ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ yi mpok yi abɔkɔti brɛt achyɛ bhɔ manyíɛ́.
42024036	Ɛnɛ́ bárɛ̀m nɔ ɛ̌ti yi, mbɔŋ Yesu abhesi bɛsí bhap! Arɛm bɛ, “Kpák ámbák nɛ bhe.”
42024037	Bácháyti, nɛ bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m bhɔ. Bákáysi bɛ bághɔ̀ nɔ chi ɛfóŋó ngu.
42024038	Kɛ abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Bǎcháy yi? Yi mǎmàkati amɛm batɨ yɛka?
42024039	Ghɔ́ ká amɔ ya nɛ bɛkak ɛbha, mǎndɨŋɨ bɛ chi mɛ tɛtɛp. Mɔ́ ká mmʉɛ́t ya mǎngɔ bɛ chi mɛ. Ɛfóŋó ɛ́pú bhɔŋ mmʉɛt nɛ bɛghɛp mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎghɔ́ bɛ mbɔŋ.”
42024040	Arɛm nɔkɔ nɔ, atɔ́ŋ bɔ́ amɔ yi nɛ bɛkak.
42024041	Bábhɔ́ŋ maŋák tontó nɛ babhak maknkay bɛ yi achi nɛpɛ́m. Ɛkʉ bɔ́ kɛnókó bɛ ɛchi tɛtɛp. Yesu abhɛ́p bɔ́ bɛ, “Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ mɛnyiɛ fá?”
42024042	Báchyɛ yi mbɨŋɨ́ nsi anɛ bágwɔ́.
42024043	Asɔt anyiɛ́ bɛsí bhap.
42024044	Aghati yɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ̀-nɛ́, chí nkúbhɛ́ barak anɛ mɛ̌ghàti nyaka bhe mpok mbʉɛt nɛ bhe. Mɛ̌ghàti nyaka be bɛ, mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́chi amɛm basɨŋɨ́ Moses nɛ amɛn abhɛn bɛchi ndǔ basɨŋɨ́ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nɛ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí amɛm Ɛkáti Bakway ɛ̌ti ya, bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛfu tɛtɛp.”
42024045	Anɛnɛ yɛ nkaysi yap bɛ mánjwimɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm.
42024046	Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Básɨŋ bɛ, Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò abhɔŋ bɛ́ghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri, angú, nɛ bɛghaka manywɔp árát, ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
42024047	Nɛ bɛ bábhɔŋ bɛghati bǒ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛni bɛbho Yerúsalɛm bɛ Mandɛm ǎfòŋori bo abhɛn bátɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap.
42024048	Bǎchí batísiɛ́ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm nɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛ́gháti bo bachak bɔ mɛnkɛm.
42024049	Ghɔ́ ka, chɔŋ nto be akap anɛ Ɛtaya afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛ ǎtò ntá yɛka. Kɛ bǎbhɔŋ mɛ́noŋ fá amɛm ɛtɔk kpátɛ bɛtaŋ mɛ́mfu amfay mɛ́mbak nɛ bhe.”
42024050	Yesu asɔt yɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi, afú ɛtɔk nɛ bhɔ. Bárɔ́k bachwɔp ɛtɔk Bɛ́tani. Arɛ́, ayoŋ amɔ amfay, are yɛt bhɔ.
42024051	Ɛnɛ́ yi áyɛ̀t bhɔ, arɔ bhɔ́, Mandɛm asɔt yi ámpɛ́tnsɛm amfay.
42024052	Nɛ ndǔ yi ákò baghɔkɔ́ bhi báré chyɛ yi kɛnókó. Bápɛ́t yɛ nsɛm Yerúsalɛm nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák.
42024053	Báre rɔ́ŋ ɛkɛrákap mámbɨti nɔkɔ Mandɛm.
43001001	Bápɛ́rɛ ghoko mmɨk, mmu anɛ achi Ɛyɔŋ anáŋ achi nyaka. Abhak nɛ Mandɛm, nɛ abhak Mandɛm.
43001002	Abhak nɛ Mandɛm tɛ ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt.
43001003	Mandɛm afʉɛ́t ntá yi kɛ ǎghoko mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm. Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ ghoko yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi apu nɛ yi.
43001004	Nɛpɛ́m nɛ́fù chí ntá yi mmu bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Ɛyɔŋ. Nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́bhak ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ̀ bo mángɔ́ tɛtɛp.
43001005	Ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ yɔ ɛ́ghɔ̀ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɛjuri ɛchi, nɛ ɛjuri ɛ́pú kway mɛnɛmɛ yɔ.
43001006	Mandɛm atǒ nyaka mmu amɔt anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Jɔ̌n.
43001007	Atwɔ́ bɛ́gháti bho ɛ̌ti ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛyɔ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ághókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m, anoko yɔ.
43001008	Jɔ̌n apu nyaka ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ yɔ. Atwɔ́ chí bɛ́gháti bho ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi arɨŋɨ ɛ̌ti ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ yɔ.
43001009	Ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnɛ tɛtɛp, ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu angɔ mbaŋ ɛ́twɔ́ ntá bǒ mmɨk.
43001010	Ɛyɔŋ ɛ́bhak fá amɨk, nɛ báfʉ́ɛ́t ntá yi kɛ bághoko mmɨk. Yɛ̌ nɔ, mpok yi átwɔ́ fá amɨk, bǒ mmɨk kɛrɨŋɨ ɛnyu mmu yi achi.
43001011	Atwɔ́ ntá bǒbhi, kɛ bǒbhi bábhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt yi nɛ maŋák.
43001012	Kɛ bo mankɛm abhɛn básɔ́rɛ́ yí nɛ maŋák, básɨ́kɨ ntɨ nɛ yi, ǎchyɛ bhɔ bɛtaŋ bɛ́ mándɔp chí bɔ Mandɛm.
43001013	Mbɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ ákʉ̀ bɔ mambak bǒbhi. Bábhɨ́kɨ́ fu nyaka yɛ chi amʉɛt nkwǎ, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ndǔ nkaysi nkwǎŋwaŋ.
43001014	Ɛyɔŋ, ɛ́yíbhiri nkwǎ, atwɔ́ achɔkɔ nɛ bhɛsɛ. Sɛ́ghɔ́ mɛnwɔp ɛbhi ɛbhɛn bɛjwi nɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu nɛ tɛtɛp. Ɛyɔŋ chi Njaŋamɔ anɛ áfú ntá Ɛta.
43001015	Jɔ̌n ǎghàti nyaka bho ɛ̌ti yi ambɨk, andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Nɛ́ chi mmǔ anɛ mɛ́rɛ̀m nyaka ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, ‘Mmǔ anɛ átwɔ̀ mɛ ansɛm achá mɛ. Bápɛ́rɛ bhe mɛ, yí achi.’”
43001016	Ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi, achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ áfɔ́k ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ.
43001017	Mandɛm afʉɛt nyaka ntá Moses achyɛ bho bɛbhé. Kɛ afʉɛt chi ntá Yesu Kristo kɛ ǎtɔŋ bhɛsɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu bhi nɛ tɛtɛp.
43001018	Yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ Mandɛm. Njaŋamɔ ywi mmu achi nɛbhʉɛt amɔt nɛ yi kɛ ákʉ́ bo mandɨŋɨ mmu yi achi.
43001019	Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, bǒbati bo Israɛl abhɛn Yerúsalɛm bátó bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒnɛrɛ́kɛt Lɛ́vi ntá Jɔ̌n bɛ mámbɛ́p yi angati bhɔ ɛnyǔ mmu yi achi. Nɛ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú Jɔ̌n anyu mbɔ ntísiɛ.
43001020	Yi kɛ bhɛsɛ bhɔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ nɛ yi kɛ rɔ bɛkɛmɛ bhɔ. Arɛm bɛ, “Puyɛ̌ mɛ kɛ nchí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.”
43001021	Bǒ bhɔ bápɛt bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Wɔ ɔchí yɛ́ agha? Ɛláija kɛ?” Jɔ̌n yi bɛ, “Mpú Ɛláija.” Bápɛ́t babhɛp yi bɛ, “Ɔchí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ anɛ Moses árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ ǎtwɔ̀?” Akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ǎe.”
43001022	Ndɔŋ ɛyɔ bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Wɔmbɔ̌ŋ ɔrɛm bɛ ɔchí agha? Ghatí bhɛsɛ mmu wɔ ɔchí bɛ́ sɛ́mpɛ́tnsɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ntá bo abhɛn bátó bhɛsɛ. Wɔmbɔ̌ŋ ɔchí agha?”
43001023	Jɔ̌n aghati bhɔ mbɔnyǔ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Asaya arɛmɛ nyaka bɛ, “Nchí mmǔ anɛ achi amɛm baso ábɨ̀k nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, ‘Nyabhɛ́ ká mbi Acha ambak chak.’”
43001024	Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi kɛ bátó nyaka bǒbhɔ ntá Jɔ̌n.
43001025	Bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɔbhɛ́ ɔpú Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, ɔbhɛ́ ɔpú Ɛláija, nɛ ɔpú ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ, kɛ ndaká yí ɔ́jwìti bho?”
43001026	Jɔ̌n akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Mɛ̌jwìti bho nɛ manyiɛp, kɛ mmu áchí fá téé nɛntɨ ɛnɛka anɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.
43001027	Yi ǎtwɔ̀ mɛ ansɛm. Mbɨ́kɨ́ kway mmu anɛ nchí kaŋari nkwɔbhɛ́nya bɛkak ɛbhi.”
43001028	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fákárí chi ɛtɔk Bɛ́tani, ɛbhě Nyɛ́n Jɔ́dan, nɛ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Jɔ̌n ájwìti nyaka bho.
43001029	Ntɨ nywɔp, Jɔ̌n aghɔ Yesu ndu átwɔ̀ ntá yi, arɛm bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n Mandɛm anɛ ápɔ̀kɔ bɛbʉ́ bo mankɛm fá amɨk!
43001030	Yí kɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m nyaka ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, ‘Mmǔ ǎtwɔ̀ mɛ ansɛm anɛ acha mɛ mbɔnyunɛ bápɛrɛ bhe mɛ, yi achi.’
43001031	Yɛ̌ mɛmbɔŋ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nyaka bɛ chi yí, kɛ ntí anɛ ntwɔ́ njwiti nɔkɔ bho nɛ manyiɛp chí ndu bɛkʉ bo Israɛl mandɨŋɨ mmu yi achi.”
43001032	Jɔ̌n abho bɛghati bho ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ághɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k ɛ̌ti Yesu. Yí bɛ, “Ngɔ ndǔ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm áfú amfay asɔt mkpá ɛbhóŋó are sɛp kpát ate yi amʉɛt.
43001033	Kpátɛ mpok ɛyɔ, nkɛ rɨŋɨ bɛ́ chí yí. Kɛ Mandɛm mmu átó mɛ njwiti bho nɛ manyiɛp, anáŋ aghati nyaka mɛ bɛ, ‘Mmu anɛ ɔ́ghɔ́ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm asɛbhɛ arɔp nɛ yi, yí wu kɛ achi mmu anɛ ájwìti bho nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.’
43001034	Mɛ Jɔ̌n ngɔ nɛ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fákárí, nɛ nchí rɛm mbɔ ntísiɛ bɛ tɛtɛp mmǔ-nɛ chi Mmɔ Mandɛm.”
43001035	Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, Jɔ̌n apɛt abhak téé nɛ bakoŋo bhi bati apay.
43001036	Aghɔ́ ndǔ Yesu áfʉɛ̀t, arɛm bɛ, “Ghɔ́ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n Mandɛm!”
43001037	Bakoŋó Jɔ̌n bati apay bághók nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́, bárɔ́ yi bábho bɛkoŋo Yesu.
43001038	Yesu ayibhiri mmʉɛt aghɔ bhɔ ndu bákòŋo yi. Abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎyàŋ yi?” Bákɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Rábay, ɔ̌chɔkɔ fá?” [Rábay chi Ntɔŋ]
43001039	Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Twɔ́ ká ghɔ.” Bárɔ́k nɛ Yesu baghɔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi áchɔ̀kɔ. Mpok yɔ nywɔp nɛ́bhák mbɔ nkárɛ́nká ɛnwi ɛnɛ́ ngósí. Bábhák nɛ yi kpátɛ̌ bɛti bɛgʉ.
43001040	Mmu amɔt ndǔ bǒbhɔ bati apay abhɛn bághoko nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Jɔ̌n árɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu, nɛ abho bɛkoŋo yi aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Andru. Abhak manɔ Símun Píta.
43001041	Arɔk tɛ́mté, aghɔ mɔ́mayi Símun, aghati yi bɛ, “Sɛ́ghɔ mmu anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ, ‘Mɛsáya’”, nɔ chi, Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.
43001042	Andru asɔt Símun arɔk ntá Yesu nɛ yi. Yesu ayɨŋɨ yí, arɛm bɛ, “Wɔ ɔchí Símun, mmɔ̌ Jɔ̌n. Chɔŋ nnyɛ́n ɛna nɛ́chák nɛ́mbak bɛ Sɛ́fas” [nɔ chí Sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́].
43001043	Ntɨ nywɔp, Yesu akʉ ntɨ bɛ́rɔŋ atú Gálili. Arɔk aghɔ́ mmu anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Fílip. Aghati yi bɛ, “Twɔ́ bhák nkoŋo wa.”
43001044	Fílip abhak mmǔ Bɛtsáida, nkúbhɛ́ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ Andru nɛ Píta báfú arɛ́.
43001045	Fílip arɔk atɛmɛri Natániɛl aghati yi bɛ, “Sɛ́ghɔ̌ mmu anɛ Moses ásɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka ɛ̌ti yi amɛm Ɛkáti Bɛbhé Mandɛm, nkúbhɛ́ yi mmǔ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nkwɔ básɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti yi. Nɔ chi, Yesu mmu Násárɛt, mmɔ̌ Josɛ́f.”
43001046	Natániɛl ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Fílip árɛ́mɛ́ abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́kway bɛfu Násárɛt?” Fílip aghati yi bɛ, “Wɔmbɔŋ twɔ́ ghɔ́.”
43001047	Yesu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ Natániɛl átwɔ̀ ntá yi, arɛm ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, “Nɛ́, chi mbɔ̌ŋ mmǔ Israɛl tɛ́mɛ́ tɛ́mɛ́. Bapu apú nɛ yi wáwák.”
43001048	Natániɛl abhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Ɔkʉ ná kɛ ɔ̌rɨŋɨ mɛ?” Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Fílip ápɛ́rɛ bhɨŋɨ wɔ ndǔ mpok anɛ ɔ́chí anɛrɛ́nɔk fig, nnáŋ ngɔ wɔ.”
43001049	Natániɛl arɛm bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, ɔchí Mmɔ Mandɛm tɛtɛp! Ɔchí Mfɔ bo Israɛl!”
43001050	Yesu ákɛ́mɛ́ yí bɛ, “Ɛ̌ti ndɛ́mɛ́ bɛ́ ngɔ wɔ anɛrɛ́nɔk fig kɛ ɔ́nókó bɛ́ nchí Mmɔ Mandɛm? Chɔŋ ɔ́ngɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛcha ɛbhɛn.”
43001051	Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, chɔŋ mǎngɔ ndǔ nɛbu nɛ́nɛnɛ gbee, bɔángɛl Mandɛm mánkó amfay mánsɛbhɛ nɔkɔ amɨk bɛtɛmɛri Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm.”
43002001	Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp apay, ɛpǎ nɛbhay ɛ́bhák amɛm ɛtɔk Kána, atú Gálili. Nnɔ Yesu abhak arɛ́.
43002002	Mának nyaka Yesu nkwɔ́ nɛ bakoŋo bhi ndǔ ɛpǎ nɛbhay ɛyɔ.
43002003	Mmɛ́m ámáy nɔ́kɔ́, nnɔ Yesu arɔk aghati yi bɛ, “Mmɛ́m ɛpǎ amay.”
43002004	Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mmá, ndaká yí ɔ́sɔŋɔri mɛ ɛ̌ti mmɛ́m? Mpok aya abhɨ́kɨ́ re kway.”
43002005	Máyi aghati bo abhɛn bákɔ̀rɛ mmɛm bɛ, “Kʉ ka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yí ághàti bhe.”
43002006	Bɛjɔ̌ manyiɛp bɛtandat bɛchi nyaka arɛ téé. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛjɔ ɛ́sɔ̀t nyaka mbɔ líta manyiɛp bɛsǎ byo. Bɛ́kóŋo ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bo Israɛl, básɔ̀t nyaka manyiɛp ndǔ bɛjɔ ɛbhɔ ndu bɛ́so bɛ́pókó mmʉɛt.
43002007	Yesu aghati bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk bɛ, “Fíɛ́ ká manyiɛp amɛm bɛjɔ ɛbhɔ kpát mɛ́njwi.” Báfyɛ́ manyiɛp amɛm bɛjɔ, bɛ́jwí tɛ anyu.
43002008	Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Sɔt ka mbɔk mǎnchyɛ́ ntá mǔnti ɛpǎ nɛbhay”. Bákʉ́ nɔ́.
43002009	mǔnti ɛpǎ nɛbhay ághókótí nɔ́kɔ́, aghɔ́ bɛ́ manyiɛp mɔ arɔp chi mmɛ́m. Yi kɛrɨŋɨ ɛbhak mɔ́ áfú, yɛ̌ndu bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhɛn bákò mɔ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka bɛ manyiɛp kɛ ayibhiri ndǔ mmɛm. Mǔnti ɛpǎ nɛbhay abhɨŋɨ mbǎyngɔrɛ́,
43002010	arɛm bɛ, “Ndǔ ɛpa, báyambɨ mantwɔ chi nɛ ɛrɨ́tí mmɛ́m. Nɛ bo mǎnáŋ mányú ánchwé bhɔ amʉɛt, kɛ mántwɔ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ mmɛ́m báchák. Kɛ ɔrɔ́ ɛrɨ́tí mmɛ́m ansɛm, nɛ nɛ́nɛ kɛ ɔ́twɔ̀ nɛ mɔ́.”
43002011	Yesu akʉ nyaka ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛnɛ amɛm ɛtɔk Kána, atú Gálili. Ɛ́bhák ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mbɨ ɛnɛ yi akʉ́ ndu bɛtɔŋ ɛnyǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́. Ɛ́kʉ́, bakoŋo bhi mánóko bɛ yi achi Mmɔ Mandɛm.
43002012	Ɛpǎ nɛbhay ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu asɛp arɔk Kapɛ̌naum nɛ máyi nɛ bɔ̌mayi nɛ bakoŋo bhi. Bábhak arɛ́ ndǔ mpay manywɔp.
43002013	Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ ɛnɛ bo Israɛl ɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t, Yesu akó, arɔk Yerúsalɛm ndu mɛnyiɛ ɛpǎ ɛyɔ.
43002014	Arɛ́, arɔk achwe amɛm ɛ́kírí ɛnɛ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Aghɔ́ bo abhɛn bátì mpɔŋ nɛ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n nɛ bɛbhóŋó. Bo básɔ̀t nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ ndu bɛchyɛ akap. Aghɔ́ bawupsǐ bakap nkwɔ arɛ́.
43002015	Asɔt nnɨk aghoko ɛ́kpá, abho bɛ́bok bho nɛ yɔ, bɛ mámfú amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Akʉ ɛnyumɔt nɛ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n, nɛ mpɔŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí arɛ́. Atakati bɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ ɛsiɛ́ bakáp bɛwupsi, nɛ atakati bakáp ayap.
43002016	Aghati batǐ bɛbhóŋó bɛ, “Fɛrɛ́ ká mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn fá! Bǎkɛ́ sɔt ɛkɛt Ɛtaya mǎnjibhiri ndǔ ɛkɛrɛ́siɛ!”
43002017	Ndak awu ákʉ́ bakoŋo bhi bátɨk bɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Chɔŋ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ ɛkɛt ɛyɛ ɛ́ngway mɛ.”
43002018	Bɛ́kóŋo ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu ákʉ́, bo Israɛl bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɔ́kway bɛkʉ mbɔ ɛrɨŋ ndu bɛtɔŋ bhɛsɛ bɛ ɔbhɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn?”
43002019	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mbák mǎnchɔ́ŋtí ɛkɛrákap ɛnɛ, chɔŋ mpɛt nte yɔ́ ndǔ manywɔp arat.”
43002020	Bo Israɛl bárɛ́m bɛ, “Cháá, báté ɛkɛt ɛnɛ ndǔ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛpay nsɛm atandat, ɔbhɛ́ ɔ̌kway bɛte yɔ ndǔ manywɔp ararɛ?”
43002021	Kɛ ɛkɛrákap ɛnɛ́ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ ɛ́bhak chi mmʉɛt yi.
43002022	Mpok Mandɛm akʉ yi ámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, kɛ̌ bakoŋo bhi bátɨk bɛ yi arɛm nyaka bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn. Ɛ́kʉ́ bɔ mánóko mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm nɛ ɛbhɛn Yesu árɛ́mɛ́.
43002023	Ɛnɛ́ Yesu áchí Yerúsalɛm ndǔ mpok Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ, bɛyǎ bo básɨ́kɨntɨ nɛ yi ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn bághɔ́ yi ákú.
43002024	Kɛ Yesu kɛgʉɛ́p mmʉɛt ntá yap, mbɔnyunɛ, arɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka ɛnyǔ nkwǎŋwaŋ achi.
43002025	Yɛ̌ mmu kɛghati yi nkaysi bǒbhɔ mbɔnyunɛ yímbɔŋ arɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka ndǔ ntɨ̌ nkwǎ nɛchi amɛm.
43003001	Mǔnti bo Israɛl amɔt achi nyaka. Aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Nikɔdɛ́mɔs. Abhak mǔnkwɔ Fárisi.
43003002	Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt arɔk ntá Yesu nɛ bɛti arɛm bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ Mandɛm kɛ̌ átó wɔ bɛ ɔ́ntwɔ́ ɔ́ntɔ́ŋ bo mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn ɔ́kʉ̀ mbák Mandɛm apu nɛ yi.”
43003003	Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, Mandɛm apú kway bɛbhak ntá mmu mbɔ Mfɔ ywi, kpátɛ mámbe yi ndɔŋ achak.”
43003004	Nikɔdɛ́mɔs abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ná bákway bɛbhe mmu anɛ ánáŋ áchɨ́kɨ́? Ǎkway bɛ́pɛ́tnsɛm amɛm mɛniɛ máyi bɛ mámbé yi ndɔŋ achak kɛ?”
43003005	Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, Mandɛm apú kwáy bɛbhak ntá mmu mbɔ Mfɔ ywi kpátɛ mámbé yi nɛ manyiɛp nɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm.
43003006	Nɛbhě ɛnɛn nkwǎ chi nɛbhě nkwɔmʉɛt, kɛ nɛbhě Ɛfóŋó chí ɛnɛn nɛ́fú ntá Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm.
43003007	Ɔ́kɛ́ bhák maknkay ndu ngátí wɔ bɛ, ‘Bábhɔŋ bɛbhe wɔ ndɔŋ achak.’
43003008	Mbʉ́ɛ́p áfòk, ándɔk ɛbhak ɛnɛ wu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́rɔŋ. Ɔ̌ghok ndu wu áfʉɛ̀t kɛ ɔpú rɨŋɨ ɛbhak wu áfú nɛ ɛbhak ɛnɛ wú árɔ̀ŋ. Ɛ́chí ɛnyumɔt nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ bábhé yi ndu bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.”
43003009	Nikɔdɛ́mɔs abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɛyɔ ɛkway bɛ́fàkari ná?”
43003010	Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɔchí ntɔŋ ntá bo Israɛl anɛ bo bárɨŋɨ sayri, yɛ̌ nɔ ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n-ɛ?
43003011	Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, sɛ́rɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́, nɛ sɛ́ghàti bho chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k, yɛ̌ nɔ bǎpú noko mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghàti bhe.
43003012	Mbák ngátí bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti barak anɛ́ áfàkari fá amɨk be kɛnókó, ná bǎkwáy mɛnoko mbák ngátí bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti barak anɛ áfàkari awu amfay?
43003013	Yɛ̌ mmu amɔt ábhɨ́kɨ́ re ko amfay ɛbhak ɛnɛ Mandɛm achi, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛt Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm, yi mmu áfú amfay atwɔ amɨk.
43003014	Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Moses ásɔ́rɛ́ nyaka nnyɔ́-sɛnɔŋ abhat ndǔ ɛnɔk, ayoŋ amfay, amɛm baso, ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ̌ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛyoŋ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm nkwɔ amfay.
43003015	Bábhɔŋ bɛkpaŋ yi amfay ɛnɔk bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ anoko yi, ámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
43003016	“Mandɛm akɔŋ nyaka bǒ mmɨk tontó, kpát achyɛ Njaŋá Mɔ́ywi bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ánókó yi, ákɛ́ gu ánɛ́m, kɛ ámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛ́nti.
43003017	Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ to Mɔ̌ywi fá amɨk bɛ ántwɔ́ ántáŋ bǒ mmɨk andɛm bɛ babhɔŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́. Atǒ yí chi bɛ́ ámfʉɛ́t ntá yi, ampɛmɛ bǒ mmɨk.
43003018	Bápú tɛmsi mmu anɛ ánókó yi, kɛ mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ ka mɛnoko, bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛchi nɛ yi mbɔnyunɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ ka mɛnoko Njaŋa-Mɔ Mandɛm.
43003019	Ntí anɛ Mandɛm átàŋ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Mɔ́ywi chi bɛ́ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛ́twɔ fá amɨk kɛ bo bákɔŋ ɛjuri bácha ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́, mbɔnyunɛ barak abʉ́abʉ kɛ bɔ bákʉ̀.
43003020	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ barak abʉ́abʉ ǎpap ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́. Apú rɔŋ ɛbhak ɛnɛ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛchi ndǔ ápú yaŋ bo mangɔ mɛnyɨŋ yi ákʉ̀.
43003021	Kɛ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp ǎtwɔ ndǔ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ maŋák, bɛ bo mangɔ bɛ Mandɛm kɛ ákwak yi ankʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ.”
43003022	Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́rɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yi ághàti Nikɔdɛ́mɔs, arɔk bɛbhak bɛchak atú Judɛ́ya nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi. Abhak arɛ́ nɛ bhɔ anjwiti nɔkɔ bho.
43003023	Mpok ɛyɔ, Jɔ̌n abhak Áénɔn, kɛkwɔt nɛ Sálim, anjwiti nɔkɔ bho. Abhak arɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ manyiɛp aya nyaka ɛbhak ɛyɔ. Bo báré rɔŋ ntá yi, anjwiti nɔkɔ bhɔ.
43003024	Bábhɨ́kɨ́ re kɛm nyaka Jɔ̌n mamfyɛ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
43003025	Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, ɛpʉ́ítí ɛ́kwɛ́n nɛntɨ bakoŋo Jɔ̌n nɛ mmu Israɛl achak ɛ̌ti ɛnyǔ nɛso ɛnɛn nɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ambak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm.
43003026	Ɛ́kʉ́ bakoŋo Jɔ̌n bárɔ́k ntá yi barɛm bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, mmu anɛ achi nyaka nɛ wɔ ɛbhé Nyɛ́n Jɔ́dan ɛnɛ́ awu ɔ́ngati nɔkɔ bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi, ǎjwiti bho nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu árɔ̀ŋ ntá yi.”
43003027	Jɔ̌n akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛbhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ kpátɛ Mandɛm anchyɛ yi yɔ.
43003028	Bě babhɔŋ bǎchí batísiɛ ndǔ ndɛ́mɛ́ bɛ́ puyɛ̌ mɛ kɛ̌ nchí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò. Nchí chí mpɔkɔntó anɛ Mandɛm átó bɛ njambɨ kɛ yi antwɔ.
43003029	Mbǎy-ngɔrɛ kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ngɔrɛ́. Mmʉɛrɛ mbǎyngɔrɛ́ anɛ áchí téé ánòŋ bɛ́ghok ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ mbǎyngɔrɛ́, ǎghok ɛyɔŋ ɛyi, ambɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ maŋák. Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛ́chi nɛ mɛ. Maŋák ama ajwí pɔɔt nɛ́nɛ.
43003030	Nsóŋó yí abhɔŋ bɛ́kó nɔ́kɔ́ kó, aya ansɛp nɔkɔ.
43003031	“Mmu anɛ áfú amfay, achá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak. Mmǔ mmɨk afu fá amɨk, nɛ ǎrɛm chi barak anɛ́ mmɨk. Mmu anɛ áfú amfay achá bǒ mmɨk mankɛm.
43003032	Yí ǎghati bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi aghɔ nɛ amɨ́k, aghók nɛ batú. Yɛ̌ nɔ, yɛ̌ mmu apú noko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ.
43003033	Kɛ mmu anɛ ághókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yi arɛmɛ anoko, ǎtɔŋ bɛ yi anókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ ɛ́chí tɛtɛp.
43003034	Ɛchi nɔ mbɔnyunɛ yí mmu Mandɛm átó, árɛ̀m chi Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm achyɛ́ yi Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ njɛnti ti.
43003035	Ɛta Mandɛm akɔŋ Mɔ́ywi nɛ afyɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm yi awɔ. Mandɛm achyɛ́ yi Ɛfóŋó ɛyi njɛnti ti.
43003036	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ánókó Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm, ǎbhɔ̀ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm apú bhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m. Kɛ bɛběntɨ Mandɛm bɛ́tɨŋɨ nɛ yi.”
43004001	Yesu arɨŋɨ bɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bághók bɛ bɛyǎ bo bárɔbhɛ koŋo chi yi nɛ yí anjwiti nɔkɔ bhɔ, nɛ bɛ́ bakoŋo bhi báyá máncha nɔkɔ abhɛn Jɔ̌n.
43004002	Sayri sayri, puyɛ̌ Yesu kɛ ájwìti nyaka bho, chí bakoŋo bhi.
43004003	Yesu árɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔkɔ nɔ, afa atú Judɛ́ya apɛt atú Gálili.
43004004	Abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛ́fʉɛ́t atú Samária ndu bɛrɔŋ Gálili.
43004005	Ɛ́kʉ, akɔ aghaka ɛtɔk Samária ɛnɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ́ Síka, kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́mɨk anɛ Jekɔ́p áchyɛ tɛntɛp ntá mɔ́ywi Josɛ́f.
43004006	Mbokó manyiɛp anɛ Jekɔ́p ábhák arɛ. Yesu ágháká nɔkɔ arɛ́, ndǔ yi ánáŋ ápɔ́bhɛ́, achɔkɔ nɛpaká mbokó manyiɛp wu. Nywɔp nɛ́bhák mbɔ nkárɛ́nká byo nɛ ɛpay.
43004007	Ngɔrɛ́ Samária amɔt atwɔ́ ndu bɛya manyiɛp arɛ́. Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Mma, chyɛ mɛ manyiɛp nnyú.”
43004008	Mpok ɛyɔ, bakoŋo Yesu bárɔŋ nyaka ɛtɔk ndu bɛ́kú nɛnyíɛ́.
43004009	Ngɔrɛ́ Samária wu akɛmɛ Yesu bɛ, “Wɔ, ɔchí mmu Ju, atú Judɛ́ya, mɛ mbák ngɔrɛ́ atú Samária, ɛkɔ ná kɛ ɔ̌rɛm bɛ nchyɛ́ wɔ manyiɛp ɔ́nyú. Bǒ Judeya bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ bhɛsɛ bo Samaria!”
43004010	Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mbɔ ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ akap anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ bho, nɛ mmu anɛ árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́ bɛ, ‘Chiɛ mɛ manyiɛp’, mbʉ ɔrɛm mɛ nchyɛ́ wɔ manyiɛp amɛn áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m.”
43004011	Ngɔrɛ́ wu arɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ ndu bɛ́yǎ manyiɛp nɛ yɔ, nɛ mbokó manyiɛp áchwe, ɔ̌bhɔŋ manyiɛp amɛn áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m fá?
43004012	Ɔchá ɛtayɛsɛ Jekɔ́p mmu átɛ́mɛ́ nyaka mbokó manyiɛp anɛ arɔ ntá yɛsɛ? Ná ɔ́kway bɛchyɛ mmu manyiɛp amɛn áchá amɛn yímbɔŋ ányu nyaka, nɛ bɔ̌bhi mányú, mpɔŋ ɛyi ɛ́nyú?”
43004013	Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ányù manyiɛp amɛn, apú rɔ bɛ́bhɔŋ ɛkwaká manyiɛp.
43004014	Kɛ mmu anɛ ányù manyiɛp amɛn mɛ̌chyɛ̀, apú pɛrɛ bhɔŋ ɛkwaká manyiɛp wáwák. Manyiɛp amɛn mɛ̌chyɛ̀ yi, ǎbhák ntá yi mbɔ ntí mɔ́nyɛn anɛ́ manyiɛp ányày arɛ, anchyɛ nɔkɔ yi nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.”
43004015	Ngɔrɛ́ wu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛta, chyɛ mɛ manyiɛbhɛ́ mɔ, bɛ́ manyiɛp ákɛ́ pɛrɛ kwak mɛ, nɛ bɛ nkɛ́pɛrɛ twɔ fá ndu bɛya manyiɛp.”
43004016	Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Dɔ́k bhɨŋɨ nnɛ́m aywɛ, twɔ́ nɛ yí.”
43004017	Ngɔrɛ́ wu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ nnɛ́m.” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ɔrɛm tɛtɛp bɛ́ ɔbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nnɛ́m.
43004018	Ɔnáŋ ɔbhɔ̌ŋ manɛ́m batay, nɛ mmǔ anɛ ɔ́chí nɛ yi nɛ́nɛ, abhɨkɨ bhay wɔ. Ɔrɛm tɛtɛp!”
43004019	Ngɔrɛ́ wu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛta, ngɔ nɛ́nɛ bɛ ɔchí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm.
43004020	Bɔtayɛsɛ bátwɔ̀ nyaka fá ndǔ njiɛ nɛ mánchyɛ nɔkɔ Mandɛm kɛnókó, kɛ be bǒ Judeya bǎrɛ̀m bɛ Yerúsalɛm kɛ áchi ɛbhak ɛnɛ bo bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó arɛ.”
43004021	Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mmá, nokó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌ghàti wɔ. Mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ bo bápú pɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛchyɛ Ɛta Mandɛm kɛnókó yɛ̌ chi fá ndǔ njiɛ nɛ, yɛ̌ chi Yerúsalɛm.
43004022	Bě bo Samaria, bǎchyɛ̀ kɛnókó ntá ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɨ́kí rɨŋɨ. Bɛsɛ bo Judeya sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ mmu anɛ sɛ́chyɛ̀ kɛnókó mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm ǎfʉɛt chí ntá bo Judeya bɛ́pɛ́mɛ bho.
43004023	Mpok ǎtwɔ̀, nɛ mpok ɛyɔ anáŋ aghaka anɛ bo abhɛn báchyɛ̀ Ɛta Mandɛm kɛnókó, bákʉ̀ nɔ ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí tɛtɛp bɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ǎtɔ̀ŋ bhɔ mbi. Mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ kɛ̌ Mandɛm áyàŋ mánchyɛ́ yi kɛnókó.
43004024	Mandɛm achi Ɛfóŋó, nɛ bǒ abhɛn báchyɛ̀ yi kɛnókó, bábhɔŋ bɛchyɛ yi kɛnókó nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.”
43004025	Mɔ́ngɔrɛ́ wu arɛm bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, yi mmu bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Kristo átwɔ̀. Ánáŋ ántwɔ́, chɔŋ angati bhɛsɛ barak ankɛm.”
43004026	Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Mɛ, mmu nchí rɛm nɛ́ kɛpɨ nɛ wɔ, kɛ nchí Mpɛmɛ.”
43004027	Nkúbhɛ́ mpok yɔ, bakoŋo Yesu báfú ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ bárɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛku nɛnyíɛ́ bápɛtnsɛm. Bábhák maknkay bɛghɔ bɛ Yesu ǎrɛ̀m kɛpɨ nɛ ngɔrɛ́, kɛ yɛ̌ mmǔ wap kɛbhɛ́p ngɔrɛ́ wu bɛ, “Ɔ̌yàŋ yi?” Nɛ yɛ̌ amɔt kɛbhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Ndaká yí ɔ́rɛ̀m kɛpɨ nɛ yi?”
43004028	Ngɔrɛ́ wu arɔ ɛtě manyiɛp ɛyi, arɔk ɛtɔk téé, abho bɛ́gháti bho bɛ,
43004029	“Twɔ́ ká ghɔ mmǔ anɛ ághátí mɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ nkʉ́ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna. Chí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò kɛ?”
43004030	Ɛ́kʉ́ ɛtɔk ɛnkɛm ɛ́móko, bábhó bɛ́rɔŋ ntá Yesu.
43004031	Mpok anɛ ngɔrɛ́ wu árɔ́ árɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛtɔk, bakoŋo Yesu báré nɨk yí mmʉɛt bɛ́ “Ntɔŋ, nnyiɛ́ mbɔ nɛnyíɛ́.”
43004032	Kɛ yí aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mbɔ̌ŋ nɛnyíɛ́ mɛ́nyiɛ ɛnɛ́n bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.”
43004033	Ɛ́kʉ́, bábho bɛbhɛp batɨ bɛ, “Mmǔfú atwɔ yi nɛ nɛnyíɛ́ kɛ́?”
43004034	Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Nɛnyiɛ́ ɛna chi bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu anɛ átó mɛ áyàŋ nkʉ́, nɛ mɛnáŋá bɛtɨk ɛbhi.
43004035	Pú bǎrɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Mbák ɛ́ngáká bataŋ anwi, chɔŋ mámfɛrɛ mbwɔt ɛbhɨ?’ Kɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ mǎnjoŋ amɨ́k mǎnjɨŋɨ nkɨ, mǎngɔ́ ndǔ mbwɔt ánáŋ ágháká bɛ́fɛ́rɛ ɛbhɨ.
43004036	Mmu anɛ áfɛ̀rɛ mbwɔt ɛbhɨ, ǎbhɔŋ akap ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhi. Nɛ ǎnyokoti mbwɔt anɛ áchí chí bo abhɛn bábhɔ̀ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti, bɛ mmu anɛ ápɨ̀ mbwɔt nɛ anɛ áfɛ̀rɛ yɔ ɛbhɨ, bɔ́ mankɛm mámbɔ́ŋ maŋák.
43004037	Ɛchí tɛtɛp mbɔ ɛnyu bárɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Mmu bɛ́pɨ ǎpɨ, anɛ bɛghɛm angɛm.’
43004038	Ntǒ be bɛ mǎndɔk mǎmfɛrɛ mbwɔt anɛ bǎbhɨkɨ pɨ. Bo bachak bápɨ, be bǎghɛ̀m mbwɔt anɛ bɔ bapɨ.”
43004039	Bɛyǎ bo Samaria abhɛn báfú ɛtɔk mánóko Yesu ɛ̌ti nɛrɛm anɛ ngɔrɛ́ wu arɛmɛ bɛ, “Aghátí mɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nkʉ́ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna.”
43004040	Mpok bátɛ́mɛ́rí Yesu, mánɨ́k yi mmʉɛt bɛ ámbák nɛ bhɔ, nɛ abhak nɛ bhɔ́ ndǔ manywɔp apay.
43004041	Nɛ bɛyǎ bo báchák mánóko ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu aghati bhɔ.
43004042	Ɛ́kʉ bárɛ́m ntá ngɔrɛ́ wu bɛ, “Ɛpɛ́t ɛpu bɛ́ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́rɛ́mɛ́ kɛ sɛ́nókó. Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛ́ghok nɛ batú bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú yi anyu, nɛ sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ nɛ́ chí Mpɛmɛ bǒ mmɨk tɛtɛp.”
43004043	Manywɔp apay anɛ Yesu achi nɛ bo Samária áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, afa bɛrɔŋ atú Gálili.
43004044	Yímbɔŋ arɛm nyaka bɛ, “Bápú chyɛ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ kɛnókó amɛm ɛtɔk ɛyi.”
43004045	Mpok Yesu áchwɔ́bhɛ́ Gálili, bǒ Galili básɔt yi nɛ maŋák ndu bághɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́ Yerúsalɛm mpok bárɔ́ŋɔ́ arɛ ndǔ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ. Bɔ́ nkwɔ bárɔŋ nyaka ndǔ ɛpǎ yɔ.
43004046	Yesu apɛt arɔk ɛtɔk Kána, atú Gálili, ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi ákú nyaka manyiɛp áyíbhírí mmɛ́m. Mǔnti amɔt abhak Kapɛ̌naum anɛ mɔ́ywi áme.
43004047	Ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Yesu afǔ atú Judɛ́ya átwɔ̀ Gálili, arɔk are nɨk yi mmʉɛt bɛ ándɔ́k Kapɛ̌naum ámbú mɔ́ywi. Mɔ́wu arɔp nyaka chi kɛ́kwɔ́t bɛ́gu.
43004048	Yesu aghati mǔngo wu bɛ, “Bǎpú ka mɛnoko mɛ mbák bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ́ bɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay.”
43004049	Mǔngo wu arɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, twɔ́ sɛ́ndɔ́k bɛ mɔ́wa ákɛ́ sɛbhɛ.”
43004050	Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Pɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p, mɔ́ywɛ apú gú.” Mǔngo wu anoko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́, afa, are gurɛ.
43004051	Ɛnɛ́ yi ásɛ̀p árɔ̀ŋ, bǒ bɛtok bhi bátɛ́mɛ́ri yi ambi, baghati yi bɛ, “Mɔ́ywɛ achí nɛpɛ́m.”
43004052	Abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ mpok yi ábhó bɛ́chɔkɔ sayri?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛ́yu ndu nkárɛ́nká amɔt nɛ ngósí.”
43004053	Chi mɔ́wu atɨk bɛ́ ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ nɛŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp ɛnɔ kɛ̌ Yesu ághati yi bɛ, “Mɔ́ywɛ apú gú.” Ɛ́kʉ́ mǔngo wu nɛ ɛfo ɛyi ɛnkɛm mánóko Yesu.
43004054	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́bhák ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́jwí bɛpay ndǔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn Yesu ákʉ́ mpok yi áfú atú Judɛ́ya arɔŋɔ atú Gálili.
43005001	Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, mpok ɛpǎ bo Israɛl ɛ́chák akwáy. Yesu akó, arɔk Yerúsalɛm.
43005002	Ɛ̌ntɨ́ŋnyɛ́n ɛbhak Yerúsalɛm, kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ nyǔ-ɛbhá anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ nyǔbha bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n. Bábhɨŋɨ ɛ̌ntɨ́ŋnyɛn ɛyɔ ndǔ ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ́ bo Israɛl bɛ Bɛtsáta. Bɛ́tɛm bɛtay bɛbhak kɛkwɔt nɛ ɛ̌ntɨŋ ɛyɔ.
43005003	Bɛyǎ bǒmame bábhák arɛ́; manɛ́mámɨk, nɛ babhɛ́nti, nɛ abhɛn bachi bhʉrɛ́. Báré noŋ bɛ nnyɛ́n nɛ́mboŋ.
43005004	Mpok nɛ mpok, ángɛl Mandɛm ǎsɛ̀p nyaka amɨk amboŋ ɛ̌ntɨ́ŋnyɛn ɛyɔ. Nɛ mmǔ nɛme anɛ áyámbɨ ásɛ́bhɛ́ amɛm, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ nɛme ɛnɛn yi abhɔŋɔ nɛ́may.
43005005	Mmǔ amɔt abhak arɛ́ anɛ ánáŋ áchí nyaka amɨk ndǔ nɛme mamiɛ́ ɛsǎ nsɛm nɛku nɛ arat.
43005006	Yesu ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ ndu bɛtɛm ɛbhɔ, aghɔ́ mmu wu bhʉ́rɛ́. Arɨŋɨ bɛ́ yi anáŋ atat arɛ́ ndǔ ɛrɔ́rí mpok. Abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɔ̌yáŋ bɛ́ ɔ́ntáŋ?”
43005007	Mmǔ nɛme wu akɛmɛ Yesu bɛ, “Ɛta, mmu apú anɛ ápɔ̀kɔ mɛ nsɛp anyɛ́n ayak mpok nnyɛ́n nɛ́bòŋ. Mpɛrɛ́ nu bɛ́chwɔ́p arɛ́, mmu achák anáŋ áyámbɨ.”
43005008	Yesu aghati yí bɛ, “Faté, pɔkɔ́ ɛ̌sák ɛyɛ kɔ.”
43005009	Tɛ́mté wu, mmu wu ataŋ. Asɔt bɛkpaka bhi abho bɛkɔ. Nywɔp ɛnɔ nɛ́bhak chí nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl.
43005010	Ɛ́kʉ, bo Israɛl bárɛm ntá mmu anɛ bábú yi bɛ, “Ɛchɔŋ chi nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt nɛ ɛbhé ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ ɔ́mpɔ́kɔ́ ɛ̌sák ɛyɛ.”
43005011	Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mmu anɛ ábú mɛ kɛ ághátí mɛ bɛ, ‘Pɛ́t ɛ̌sák ɛyɛ, faté kɔ.’”
43005012	Bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Mmǔrɛ́ ághátí wɔ ɔmpɛt ɛ̌sák ɛyɛ ɔnkɔ chí agha?”
43005013	Kɛ yi kɛ rɨŋɨ mmu wu. Yesu ábú nyaka yi anɔnɛ arɔk mbɔnyunɛ bɛyǎ bo báchí nyaka arɛ́.
43005014	Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, Yesu atɛmɛri yi amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, aghati yi bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́, ɔnáŋ ɔtaŋ! Dɔ̌ bɛbʉ́ bɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chá ɛyɔ ɛ́kɛ́ tɛmɛri wɔ.”
43005015	Mmǔ wu arɔ, arɔk, aghati bǒbati bo Israɛl bɛ Yesu kɛ ábú yi.
43005016	Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ bo Israɛl bábhó bɛ́chyɛ Yesu nɛnyok, bɛ yi akʉ mmu ataŋ ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt.
43005017	Kɛ Yesu aghati bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ɛtaya ǎkʉ̀ bɛtɨk mpoknkɛm, nɛ mɛnkwɔ́ mbɔŋ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk.”
43005018	Ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́, bo Israɛl bápɛ́t báre yaŋ mbi bɛway yi. Ntí abhak bɛ, puyɛ̌ chi ndiɛrɛ bɛ akwɛn ɛbhé nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt, kɛ ndak anɛ́ akpɨk ábɛ́bhɛ́ áchá ábhák bɛ, yí ǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ Mandɛm bɛ ɛtayi, nɛ bɛ bɛ́kʉ nɔ chi bɛyɛnti mmʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm.
43005019	Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, Mmɛ Mmɔ Mandɛm mpú kwáy bɛkʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbha. Mɛ́kʉ̀ chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ngɔ́ Ɛtaya ákʉ̀. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Ɛtaya ákʉ̀, yɔ́ kɛ Mɛ Mɔ́ywi nchí kʉ nkwɔ́.
43005020	Ɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ Ɛta akɔŋ Mmɛ Mɔ́ywi, nɛ ǎtɔŋ mɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yímbɔŋ ákʉ̀. Nɛ chɔŋ antɔŋ mɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn bɛcha ɛbhɛn, bɛ manyu ánchók bhe.
43005021	Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛta áŋɛ̀mɛ bawú anchyɛ bhɔ nɛpɛ́m, nɔ́ kɛ̌ Mmɛ Mɔ́ywi nchí chyɛ nɛpɛ́m ntá yɛ̌ agha anɛ mɛ́yàŋ bɛchyɛ nɛpɛ́m.
43005022	Yɛ̌ mmu, Ɛta apu taŋ manyé yi. Áchyɛ́ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm ntá ya, Mmɛ Mɔ́ywi, bɛ ntáŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
43005023	Ǎkʉ nɔ bɛ bo mankɛm mánchyɛ́ Mmɛ Mɔ́ywi kɛnókó nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ báchyɛ̀ yi kɛnókó. Mmǔ anɛ apu chyɛ Mmɛ Mɔ́ywi kɛnókó, apú chyɛ kɛnókó ntá Ɛtaya mmu ato mɛ.
43005024	Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mmǔ anɛ ághókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m, anoko mmu anɛ átó mɛ, ǎbhɔ̀ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Mandɛm apú rɛm bɛ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛchi nɛ yi. Afǔ ndǔ nɛwú, achwe ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
43005025	“Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mpok ǎtwɔ̀, nɛ anáŋ akway, anɛ bawú bághòk ɛyɔŋ ɛya, Mmɛ Mmɔ Mandɛm, nɛ abhɛn bághókó mámbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m.
43005026	Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛta áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m, nɔ kɛ̌ yi áchyɛ́ Mmɛ Mɔ́ywi nkwɔ bɛtaŋ bɛ́chyɛ bo nɛpɛ́m.
43005027	Nɛ achyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛ́táŋ bo, mbɔnyunɛ mɛ kɛ mfú ntá Mandɛm.
43005028	Bǎkɛ́ bhak maknkay bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn. Mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ bawú mankɛm bághok ɛyɔŋ ɛya amɛm manɛm ayap.
43005029	Nɛ mǎnáŋ mángók ɛyɔŋ ɛya, báfù ndǔ manɛm ayap. Abhɛn bákʉ́ nyaka bɛrɨ ndǔ mmɨk nɛ, máŋɛmɛ, manchwe ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti, nɛ abhɛn bákʉ́ nyaka bɛbʉ́, máŋɛmɛ mámbɔ́ŋ ntɛmsi.”
43005030	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Mpú kwáy bɛkʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbha. Ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌kʉ̀ nchí kʉ chi ndǔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm mmu átó mɛ. Mɛ̌tàŋ bo mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi aghati mɛ ntaŋ bo. Nɛ mɛ̌tàŋ bo chí ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɛchí chak, mbɔnyunɛ mpú kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛmbɔŋ nchí yaŋ bɛkʉ. Nchí kʉ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmu anɛ átó mɛ áyàŋ nkʉ.
43005031	Mbák ndɛm ɛ̌ti mmʉɛ́t ɛya, mbɔ̌ŋ bo abhɛn bakway bɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mɛnwɔp.
43005032	Mmǔ anɛ áté mɛ ntísiɛ achi nyáŋá, nɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yi árɛ̀m ɛ̌ti ya ɛbhɔŋ mɛnwɔp.
43005033	Bǎtò nyaka bo ntá Jɔ̌n bɛ mámbɛp yi ángati bhe ɛ̌ti ya, nɛ aghati bhe ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛchi tɛtɛp.
43005034	Puyɛ̌ chi bɛ nkwǎŋwaŋ kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́té mɛ ntísiɛ, nchí ghati bhe ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Jɔ̌n árɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti ya bɛ Mandɛm ámpɛ́mɛ́ bhe.
43005035	Jɔ̌n achi nyaka mbɔ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnɛ ɛ́dù ɛ́ngɔ nɔkɔ ŋwaaŋ, ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok, bǎka ɛyɔŋ ɛyi nɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋ maŋák ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok.
43005036	Kɛ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chí ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti ya ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chá ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Jɔ̌n árɛ̀m. Nkúbhɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́kʉ̀, bɛ́tè mɛ ntísiɛ bɛ Ɛta kɛ átó mɛ.
43005037	Nɛ Ɛta, yímbɔŋ, mmu átó mɛ áté mɛ ntísiɛ. Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ re ghok ɛyɔŋ ɛyi, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ́ ɛnyǔ yi achi.
43005038	Nɛ Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛ́pú amɛm batɨ yɛka mbɔnyunɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ noko mmu anɛ yi átó.
43005039	Bǎfyɛ̀ bɛtaŋ bɛpay Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ bǎkáysí bɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ be mbi nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti nɛ yɔ́ ɛ́rɛ̀m chi ɛ̌ti ya.
43005040	Yɛ̌ nɔ, bǎpú ka bɛ́twɔ ntá ya bɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m.
43005041	Mpú yáŋ nɔ chi kɛnókó ntá nkwǎ.
43005042	Nchí rɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mbɔnyunɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɛkɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ́pú amɛm batɨ yɛka.
43005043	Ntwɔ̌ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Ɛtaya, nɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt mɛ mbɔ mmu. Mbɔ mmu achák kɛ átwɔ́ nɔ́ árɛ̀m ɛ̌ti ndu mmʉɛt yi nɛ ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi mbʉ bǎsɔ́t yi mbɔ mmu ywɛka.
43005044	Ná bǎkway mɛnoko ɛnɛ́ báyàŋ chi bakak amɛn bǎchyɛ̀ batɨ, kɛfyɛ́ ntí ndǔ bakak amɛm Mandɛm áchyɛ.
43005045	Bǎkɛ́ kaysi bɛ́ chɔŋ ngati Ɛta ɛnyǔ bho bǎchi. Moses kɛ ághati chɔŋ yi, Moses mmu bǎbhaka ntɨ nɛ yi.
43005046	Mbɔ mǎnókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Moses ásɨ́ŋɨ́ tɛtɛp, mbʉ́ mǎnókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌ghàti bhe. Moses asɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka chí ɛ̌ti ya.
43005047	Mbák bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ noko basɨŋ ami, ná bǎkway mɛ́nóko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́rɛ̀m?”
43006001	Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu apé, arɔk ɛbhě Manyu Gálili. Nkúbhɛ́ Manyu wu kɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Manyu Tibérias.
43006002	Ngɛ́mtay bo báré koŋo yi mbɔnyunɛ bághɔ̌ nyaka mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́ ntá bǒmame.
43006003	Yesu akó ambɨ njiɛ, achɔkɔ arɛ́ nɛ bakoŋo bhi.
43006004	Ɛpǎ bo Israɛl ɛnɛ́ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ ɛ́rɔ́p kɛkwɔt.
43006005	Ayibhiri mmʉɛt, ayɨŋɨ, aghɔ́ ndǔ ngɛ́mtay bho bátwɔ̀ ntá yi. Abhɛ́p Fílip bɛ, “Chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔŋ brɛt bɛ́ku fá anɛ ákway bǒbhɛn?”
43006006	Yesu arɛm nɔ ndu mɛmɔ Fílip mbɔnyunɛ yímbɔŋ árɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ.
43006007	Fílip akɛmɛ Yesu bɛ, “Nkáp nkʉbɛtɨk ndǔ manywɔp bɛsǎ byo ápú kway bɛ́ku brɛt anɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap akway bɛbhɔŋ mandú.”
43006008	Nkoŋo ywi amɔt anɛ achí manɔ Símun Píta anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Andru arɛm ntá yi bɛ,
43006009	“Mmɔ̌ amɔt achi fá, anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt bɛtay nɛ nsi ɛpay, kɛ ɛyɔ chi yi ntá bɛyǎ bǒbhɛn?”
43006010	Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Kʉ ka bo mánchɔ́kɔ́ amɨk.” Tákɔ ayá nɛbhʉɛt ɛ́rɛ. Ɛ́kʉ bo báchɔ́kɔ amɨk. Babhakanɛm bábhák mbɔ nká ɛtay.
43006011	Yesu asɔt yɛ bɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt bhɔ. Áchyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bakak ntá Mandɛm, akɔrɛ ntá bo abhɛn báchɔ́kɔ́ amɨk. Akʉ ɛnyumɔ́t nɛ nsi. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anyiɛ́ kpát ajwi.
43006012	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ányíɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnǐ ɛnɛ́n nɛ́kwáy yi, Yesu aghati bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Nyokotí ká mbwɔ́ptí anɛ árɔ́bhɛ́ bɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛkɛ chɔŋti ndɛ́ndɛm.”
43006013	Mányókóti yɛ mbwɔpti anɛ bo mányíɛ́, bárɔ́. Ajwi bɛkay byo nɛ bɛpay.
43006014	Bo abhɛn báchi arɛ́, bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛyɔ, bárɛ́m bɛ, “Tɛtɛp, nɛ́ chi ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛ́twɔ fá amɨk.”
43006015	Yesu aghɔ́ bɛ bo báyàŋ bɛ́kɛm yi nɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ mánkʉ yi Mfɔ, afa, akó njiɛ, abhak arɛ́ aywǐnti.
43006016	Běku bɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́, bakoŋo Yesu basɛp, barɔk angɔkɔ manyu,
43006017	báchwe amɛm áchwi bárè pé nnyɛ́n bɛrɔŋ Kapɛ̌naum. Bɛti mɛ́naŋ bɛ́gʉ nyaka ɛnɛ́ Yesu ábhɨ́kɨ́ re tɛmɛri bhɔ.
43006018	Mbʉ́ɛ́p ataŋataŋ abho mɛnu. Ɛkʉ bɛtaŋtí mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn ɛya anyɛ́n.
43006019	Bakoŋo bhi mánók mbɔ bɔkilomɛta batay nɛ batandat. Bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ yi ákɔ̀ anyɛ́n átwɔ̀ kɛkwɔt nɛ bhɔ, bɛ́cháy bɛ́kɛ́m bhɔ tontó.
43006020	Kɛ Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ chay. Chi mɛ!”
43006021	Báká yɛ bɛ yi anchwe amɛm áchwí. Nɛchwe yi áchwé, áchwí arɔk atɛmɛ angɔkɔnyɛ́n, ndǔ nɛchyɛ̌nyɛn ɛnɛn bɔ́ bárɔ̀ŋ arɛ́.
43006022	Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, bo abhɛn bárɔ́bhɛ́ ɛbhěnyɛn ɛnɛ Yesu nɛ bakoŋo bhi báfú arɛ́, bátɨk bɛ ndiɛrɛ áchwí amɔt kɛ áchí nyaka arɛ, nɛ bɛ Yesu abhɨ́kɨ́ chwe amɛm áchwí wu andɔk nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi. Bɔ́ bárɔ́ nyaka yi bárɔ́k.
43006023	Ɛ́fákári bɛ bachwi achak anɛ áfú Tibérias átwɔ́ kɛkwɔt ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bɔ mányíɛ́ nyaka brɛt mpok Acha ánaŋ áchyɛ́ bakak ntá Mandɛm.
43006024	Bǒ bhɔ bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ bɛ Yesu nɛ bakoŋo bhi, bápɛ́t bapu arɛ́, bɔ babhɔŋ báchwé amɛm bachwi yɔ, barɔk Kapɛ̌naum ndu bɛ́yaŋ Yesu.
43006025	Bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ ɛbhě manyu ɛnɛ Yesu árɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ bakoŋo bhi, bághɔ́ yi arɛ, babhɛp yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, ɔpě ɔtwɔ wɛn ntɨkɨ mpok?”
43006026	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, bǎpú yaŋ mɛ ɛ̌ti bǎghɔ́ bɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay, kɛ ɛ̌ti brɛt anɛ mǎnyiɛ́ bǎjwi.
43006027	Bǎkɛ́ fyɛ ntí ndǔ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́chɔ̀ŋti. Fíɛ́ ká ntí chí ndǔ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛpu chɔŋti, nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti, ɛnɛn Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm nchí chyɛ chɔŋ be. Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ Ɛtaya achyɛ ɛrɨŋ bɛtɔŋ bɛ yi kɛ átó mɛ.”
43006028	Bɔ bábhɛ́p yɛ Yesu bɛ, “Bɛtɨk Mandɛm ɛbhɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ nɔ́kɔ́ chi yi?”
43006029	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ mǎnkʉ chi bɛ mǎnókó mmu anɛ yi átó.”
43006030	Ɛ́kʉ bárɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ɛrɨŋ ɔ́kwày yɛ bɛkʉ bɛ́ sɛ́ngɔ́, sɛ́noko wɔ? Chɔŋ ɔ́nkʉ yi ntá yɛsɛ?
43006031	Bǎchǐ mbɨ bhɛsɛ́ mányìɛ nyaka mana mpok bákɔ̀ amɛm baso. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, ‘Achyɛ nyaka bhɔ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́fù amfay!’”
43006032	Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, puyɛ̌ Moses kɛ áchyɛ́ nyaka bachǐmbɨ bhɛka nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́fú amfay. Ɛtaya kɛ áchyɛ̀ bhe nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn mbɔŋ ɛnɛ́n nɛ́fú amfay.
43006033	Nɛnyiɛ Mandɛm chi mmu anɛ áfú amfay atwɔ, nɛ ǎchyɛ nɛpɛ́m ntá bǒ mmɨk.”
43006034	Bárɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛta, chyɛ̌ bhɛsɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɔ mpoknkɛm.”
43006035	Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mɛ kɛ nchí nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m. Mmu anɛ átwɔ́ ntá ya apu pɛrɛ ghok nsay nɛ mmu anɛ ásɨ̀kɨ ntɨ nɛ mɛ, apú bhɔ́ŋ ɛkwaká manyiɛp wáwák.
43006036	Kɛ ngátí bhe bɛ yɛ̌ndu bǎghɔ́ mɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ noko mɛ.
43006037	Yɛ̌ nɔ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ Ɛta áchyɛ́ mɛ, ǎtwɔ̀ ntá ya. Nɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú twɔ ntá ya mɛ̌mbók yi,
43006038	mbɔnyunɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ fú amfay ntwɔ́ fá amɨk bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌yáŋ. Ntwɔ bɛkʉ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu anɛ átó mɛ áyàŋ mɛ̌nkʉ.
43006039	Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu anɛ átó mɛ áyàŋ nkʉ chi bɛ nkɛ́rɔ yɛ̌ mmu amɔt anɛ yi áchyɛ́ mɛ ánɛ́m, kɛ bɛ́ nkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn ngwɛnti.
43006040	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛta áyàŋ chí bɛ́ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ághɔ́ Mɔ́ywi, asɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ yi, ámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Nɛ chɔŋ nkʉ yi ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn ngwɛnti.”
43006041	Bo Israɛl bábhó yɛ mɛ́nywinti ɛ̌ti Yesu, ndǔ yi árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, “Mɛ kɛ nchí nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́fú amfay.”
43006042	Báre rɛm bɛ, “Pú Yesu mmɔ̌ Josɛ́f nɛ́? Pú sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛtayi nɛ máyi? Ɛ́kɔ ná kɛ yi arɛm bɛ, ‘Mfu amfay kɛ nchí ntwɔ fá amɨk’?”
43006043	Yesu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ká nɛnywíntí ɛnɛká nɔ.
43006044	Yɛ̌ mmu apú kwáy bɛ́twɔ ntá ya mbák Ɛtaya mmu átó mɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ ya yi ntá ya. Nɛ mmu anɛ átwɔ́ ntá ya, chɔŋ nkʉ yi ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ndǔ nywɔp ngwɛnti.
43006045	Ɛchí amɛm basɨŋɨ́ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ Mandɛm ántɔ́ŋ bɔ́ mankɛm.’ Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ághókó, nɛ aghɔ́k ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛtaya árɛ́mɛ́, ǎtwɔ̀ ntá ya.
43006046	Mpú rɛm chi bɛ mmu achi anɛ anaŋ aghɔ Ɛtaya. Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm kɛ ánáŋ ághɔ́ yi.
43006047	Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mmǔ anɛ anoko ǎbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
43006048	Mɛ kɛ nchí nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛ́n nɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m.
43006049	Bachǐmbɨ bhɛka mányìɛ nyaka mana amɛm baso, yɛ̌ nɔ, bɔ mankɛm bágú.
43006050	Kɛ nɛ́ chi nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́fú amfay, bɛ́ mmǔ anɛ ányíɛ́ nɔ́ ákɛ́ gu.
43006051	Mɛ kɛ nchí nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́fú amfay. Mmu anɛ ányíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn, ǎbhák nɛpɛ́m mpoknkɛm. Nɛnyiɛ́ ɛnɛ́n mɛ̌chyɛ chɔŋ bɛ́ bǒ mmɨk mámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m, chi nyamwʉɛ́t ɛya.”
43006052	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ ɛ́kʉ́ bo Israɛl bábho bɛkɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ batɨ, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Ná mmǔ-nɛ ǎkway bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ nyamwʉɛ́t ayi bɛ sɛnyiɛ?”
43006053	Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mbák bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ nyiɛ́ nyamwʉɛ́t Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm, mǎnyú manoŋ ami, bǎpú bhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m.
43006054	Mmǔ anɛ ányíɛ́ nyamwʉɛ́t ya nɛ anyú manoŋ ma, ǎbhɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti, nɛ chɔŋ nkʉ yi ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn ngwɛnti.
43006055	Nyamwʉɛ́t ɛya kɛ áchí mbɔ̌ŋ nɛnyíɛ́ mɛnyiɛ, nɛ manoŋ ama kɛ áchí mbɔ̌ŋ mmɛ́m amɛn mɛnyu.
43006056	Mmu anɛ ányìɛ nyamwʉɛ́t ya nɛ anyú manoŋ ma, achí babhát nɛ mɛ, nɛ mɛ nkwɔ́ nchí babhat nɛ yi.
43006057	Ɛta mmu achi nɛpɛ́m kɛ átó mɛ, nɛ ɛ̌ti yi kɛ nchí nɛpɛ́m. Nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ, mmǔ anɛ ányìɛ mɛ ǎbhák nɛpɛ́m ɛ̌ti ya.
43006058	Nɛ́ chi nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛ́n nɛ́fú amfay nɛ́twɔ́ fá amɨk. Nɛ́pú mbɔ ɛnɛ́n bachǐmbɨ bhɛka mányíɛ́ nyaka, bágú. Mmǔ anɛ ányíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn ǎbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.”
43006059	Yesu arɛm barak anɛ mpok yi áchí amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ɛnɛ ɛtɔk Kapɛ̌naum átɔ̀ŋ bo.
43006060	Bakoŋo Yesu bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ kɛpɨ ɛkɛn yi árɛ̀m, bɛyǎ bhap báré rɛm bɛ, “Anɛ́ ndak ataŋ acha, agha ákwày bɛka wu?”
43006061	Yesu árɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ baghɔkɔ́ bhi mánywìnti ɛ̌ti ndak anɛ. Abhɛ́p bɔ bɛ, “Batɨ ábé bhe ɛ̌ti ndak anɛ ndɛ́mɛ́?
43006062	Mbák mǎngɔ́ yɛ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm ndu nchí pɛtnsɛm amfay ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mfú, bǎrɛm bɛ́ yi?
43006063	Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm kɛ áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m. Mmʉɛt nkwǎ apu kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛ́n ngátí bhe bɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm nɛ bɛ́chyɛ nɛpɛ́m.
43006064	Yɛ̌ nɔ, mbɔk yɛka bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko.” Yesu arɨ́ŋɨ́ bo abhɛn bábhɨkɨ noko yi tɛ ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt, nɛ arɨ́ŋɨ́ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛti yi.
43006065	Yesu arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ ngátí bhé bɛ mmu apú kway bɛ́twɔ ntá ya mbák Ɛta abhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ yi mbi.”
43006066	Nɛbho mpok yɔ, bɛyǎ bakoŋo bhi báya mmʉɛt ansɛm, bɔ́ kɛpɛrɛ koŋo yi.
43006067	Ɛ́kʉ́ Yesu abhɛ́p baghɔkɔ́ bhi bati byo nɛ apay bɛ, “Ná nɛ bhe, bǎrɔŋ nkwɔ?”
43006068	Símun Píta akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛta, ntá agha? Wɔ kɛ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
43006069	Sɛ́noko nɛ sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mmu Nyáŋá anɛ Mandɛm átó.”
43006070	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Pú njap be bati byo nɛ apay? Yɛ̌ nɔ, mmǔ ywɛka amɔt abhɔŋ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ.”
43006071	Yesu ǎrɛ̀m nyaka nɔ ɛ̌ti Júda, mmɔ̌ Símun Iskariɔt, mbɔnyunɛ Júda, mmu amɔt ndǔ nkwɔ́ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bati byo nɛ apay, abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka nkaysi bɛti yi.
43007001	Barak anɛ áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu are kɔ mbǎŋ nɛ mbaŋ, atú Gálili. Yi kɛyáŋ bɛkɔ atú Judɛ́ya mbɔnyunɛ bo Judeya báyàŋ nyaka mbi bɛ́way yi.
43007002	Mpok yɔ, ɛpǎ bo Israɛl ɛnɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Ɛpa Bɛ́tɛm ɛ́rɔp kɛkwɔt.
43007003	Ɛkʉ bɔ̌mayi bárɛ́m ntá yi bɛ, “Fǎ fá, dɔ́k atú Judɛ́ya bɛ bakoŋo bhɛ mángɔ́ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn ɔ́kʉ̀.
43007004	Yɛ̌ mmu apú kʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ mbák ǎyàŋ bo mándɨ́ŋɨ́ yi. Tɛ̌ndu ɔ́kʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay, kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ mmɨk nkɛm ángɔ́.”
43007005	Kɛ yɛ̌ chi bɔ̌mayi kɛnoko yí.
43007006	Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Mpok aya ábhɨ́kɨ́ re kway, kɛ ntá yɛka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok akway.
43007007	Bǒ mmɨk bápú kwáy bɛpap be. Bápap mɛ mbɔnyunɛ nchí rɛm bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ́ bákʉ̀ bɛbɛp.
43007008	Bě babhɔŋ mǎndɔ́k ndǔ ɛpa. Mpú rɔŋ. Mpok aya abhɨ́kɨ́ re kwáy.”
43007009	Yesu árɛ́m nɔ́, arɔp atú Gálili.
43007010	Ɛnɛ́ bɔ̌mayi mǎnáŋ bárɔ́, bárɔ́ŋɔ́ Yerúsalɛm ndǔ ɛpa ɛyɔ, Yesu arɔk arɛ́ nkwɔ. Kɛ arɔk chi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́, kɛrɔ́ŋ kpoŋoroŋ.
43007011	Bǒbati bo Judeya báré yaŋ yi arɛ́ mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Yi achí fá?”
43007012	Bo báré rɛm bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi. Mbɔk mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Yí achi ɛrɨ́tí mmu.” Báchák bɛ, “Nsé, ǎrwɔ̀ bho bɛ mánɛ́m ɛbhɨ!”
43007013	Yɛ̌ nɔ, yɛ̌ mmu amɔt kɛrɛm ɛnyɨŋ kpóŋóróŋ ɛ̌ti yi, mbɔnyunɛ báchày nyaka bǒbati bhap.
43007014	Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nɛntɨ ɛpa, Yesu arɔk amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm abho bɛtɔŋ bo Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
43007015	Bǒbati bo Judeya bábhák maknkay ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi átɔ̀ŋ mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Ná mmǔ-nɛ áré rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnyu ɛnɛ, ɛnɛ́ yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔk ɛkáti?”
43007016	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fu ntá ya. Bɛ́fú chi ntá mmu anɛ átó mɛ.
43007017	Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ntɨ bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ, ǎrɨŋɨ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n mɛ̌tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́fú chi ntá Mandɛm nɛ bɛ puyɛ̌ mɛmbɔŋ kɛ ntɨ́ bɛtɔŋ bhɔ.
43007018	Mmu anɛ árɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi, ǎyaŋ kɛnókó ɛki yímbɔŋ. Mmu anɛ áyàŋ bo mánchyɛ́ kɛnókó chi ntá mmu anɛ átó yi, achí mmǔ tɛtɛp, bapu apú nɛ yi.
43007019	Moses achyɛ́ nyaka bhe bɛbhé, pú nɔ́? Yɛ̌ nɔ́, yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka apú bhʉrɛ́ bhɔ. Ndaká yí bǎyáŋ bɛway mɛ?”
43007020	Bɛyǎ bo abhɛn báchí arɛ bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri wɔ! Agha áyàŋ bɛway wɔ?”
43007021	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Nkʉ ɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛ́mɔt manyu áchok bhe.
43007022	Moses aghátí nyaka bhe bɛ mǎnsyɛ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɔ̌bhɛka. Yɛ̌ nɔ, ɛbhé yɔ ɛbhɨkɨ fu nyaka ntá Moses. Ɛ́fú chí ntá bachǐmbɨ abhɛka. Nɛ bǎsìɛp mmu ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt.
43007023	Bě bǎsiɛ̀p bo ndǔ nywɔp nɛywěmʉɛt bɛ bǎkɛ kwɛn ɛbhé Moses. Bǎbentɨ nɛ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ́ nkʉ mmǔ nɛme átáŋ ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt?
43007024	Bǎkɛ́ kpɔ́t manyé mmu bɛkoŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ́ yi ákʉ̀. Bǎbhɔŋ bɛkpɔt manyé sayri bɛkoŋo tɛtɛp Mandɛm.”
43007025	Mbɔk bo Yerusalɛm báré rɛm yɛ bɛ, “Pú mmǔ rɛ́ báyàŋ bɛway nɛ?
43007026	Achí fá árɛ̀m kɛpɨ kpoŋoroŋ, nɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ ntá yi. Ɛ́kway bɛbhak bɛ bǒbati bárɨŋɨ bɛ yí chí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò?
43007027	Kɛ sɛ́rɨŋɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ mmǔ-nɛ áfú. Mpok Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò átwɔ́, yɛ̌ mmu apú rɨŋɨ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi áfú.”
43007028	Ɛ́kʉ́, ndu Yesu átɔ̀ŋ bho amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, arɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Bǎrɨŋɨ mɛ, nɛ bǎrɨŋɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ mfú? Mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbha. Mmǔ anɛ átó mɛ achí mmǔ tɛtɛp. Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yi.
43007029	Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ yi, mbɔnyunɛ mfú chí ntá yi, nɛ yi kɛ átó mɛ.”
43007030	Ɛnyɨŋ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ ɛ́kʉ́ báré yaŋ bɛkɛm yi, kɛ yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ tɔk yi awɔ amʉɛt, mbɔnyunɛ mpok ayi abhɨ́kɨ́ re kway nyaka.
43007031	Bɛyǎ bo mánóko yi, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mbák Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò ántwɔ́, chɔŋ ankʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn bɛ́chá ɛbhɛn mmǔ-nɛ ákʉ̀?”
43007032	Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ bǒ ɛka yɔ bárɛ̀m bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti Yesu, báchɛm nɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap, bátó babhabhɛrí abhɛn ɛkɛrákap bɛ mankɛm yi.
43007033	Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá yap bɛ, “Mbɔŋ bɛ́pɛt bɛbhak nɛ bhe ndǔ mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok kɛ ndɔ́k ntá mmu anɛ átó mɛ.
43007034	Chɔŋ mǎnjaŋ mɛ, kɛ bǎpú ghɔ mɛ. Nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mɛ́rɔ̀ŋ bǎpú kwáy bɛ́twɔ arɛ́.”
43007035	Bo Israɛl bábhó bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Atɨ bɛ́rɔ́ŋ fá, ɛnɛ́ sɛ́pú kway chɔŋ bɛghɔ yi? Atɨ bɛrɔŋ chi ɛtɔkɔ́ mankɔ ɛnɛ́ bǒ bhɛsɛ bátáká bárɔ́ŋɔ́ arɛ́ kɛ? Ǎyàŋ bɛrɔŋ bɛ́tɔŋ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl arɛ́ kɛ?
43007036	Yi bɛ ‘Chɔŋ sɛ́njáŋ yi, kɛ sɛpu ghɔ, nɛ bɛ́ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi árɔ̀ŋ, sɛ́pú kway bɛrɔŋ arɛ. Nɔ́ bɛ yi?’”
43007037	Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nywɔbhɛ́ ngwɛnti ɛpa, nɔ́ chi, nywɔp nɛgho ɛnɛn ɛpǎ ɛyɔ, Yesu afate arɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Mmǔ anɛ manyiɛp ákwak yi, ántwɔ́ ntá ya.
43007038	Ɛ́chí nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, ‘Mmǔ anɛ anókó mɛ, manyiɛp amɛn áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m ǎfu yi antɨ ansɛp nɔkɔ mbɔ nyɛ́n.’”
43007039	Yesu ǎrɛ̀m nyaka nɔ ɛ̌ti Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ɛnɛ́ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛchyɛ ntá bo abhɛn mánóko yi. Bábhɨ́kɨ́ re chyɛ nyaka Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ntá bo abhɛn mánóko mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm ábhɨ́kɨ́ re sɔt nyaka Yesu amfay, ánchyɛ́ yi kɛnókó.
43007040	Bo bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛ́n Yesu árɛ́mɛ́, mbɔk bo bábho bɛrɛm bɛ, “Nɛ́, chí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛ́twɔ.”
43007041	Báchák bɛ, “Chi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.” Kɛ abhɛ́nɛ́fú bárɛm bɛ, “Yi abhɔŋ bɛfu chi atú Gálili kɛ?
43007042	Pú básɨŋ amɛm ɛkáti bɛ, Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò chi ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Mfɔ Debhít nɛ abhɔŋ bɛ́fu chi Bɛ́tlɛhɛm, ɛtɔk nɛbhe Mfɔ Debhít?”
43007043	Ɛ́kʉ́ ákɔ́rɛ́ nɛ bɛtaka bɛkwɛn nɛntɨ nap ɛ̌ti Yesu.
43007044	Mbɔk ayap báyàŋ nyaka bɛkɛm yi kɛ yɛ̌ mmu kɛtɔk yi awɔ amʉɛt.
43007045	Babhabhɛri abhɛn ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm bápɛ́t yɛ nsɛm ntá bǒbati bachiǎkap nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi. Bǒbati bábhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ndaká yí bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ twɔ nɛ yi?”
43007046	Babhabhɛri ɛkɛrákap bákɛ́mɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ re rɛm mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmǔ wu árɛ̀m!”
43007047	Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bákɛ́mɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Arwɔ̌ be nkwɔ bǎgúrɛ́ ɛbhɨ?
43007048	Bǎghɔ yɛ̌ mǔnti ɛtɔk amɔt anókó yi? Bǎghɔ yɛ̌ mǔnkwɔ Fárisi anókó yi?
43007049	Ndiɛrɛ ndɛ́ndɛmɛbho abhɛn, bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛbhé Moses kɛ mánóko yi. Ntá Mandɛm, bɔ mankɛm bábɛp!”
43007050	Nikɔdɛ́mɔs, mmǔ wap amɔt anɛ ánáŋ árɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka ntá Yesu abhɛp bhɔ bɛ,
43007051	“Ɛbhé ɛyɛsɛ ɛ́ká bɛ mánchyɛ́ mmu ntɛmsi ɛnɛ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ re taŋ yi, mándɨ́ŋɨ́ sayri sayri ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yi ákʉ?”
43007052	Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Wɔ nkwɔ́ ɔchí mmǔ Gálili? Yɨŋɨ́ Ɛkáti Mandɛm, chɔŋ ɔ́ngɔ́ bɛ́ yɛ̌ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ amɔt apú kway bɛfu atú Gálili.”
43007053	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu árɔ́ yɛ, agurɛ ɛkɛt ɛyi.
43008001	Yesu arɔk amfay Njiɛ Mɛnɔk Ólif.
43008002	Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, apɛtnsɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm běti běti. Bǒ mankɛm bárɔ́k ntá yi. Achɔkɔ amɨk, abho bɛtɔŋ bhɔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
43008003	Batɔŋ-ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi báyá ngɔrɛ́ anɛ bákɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ akwɛn bɛrwɔp, bátwɔ́ nɛ yi, bátɛp bɛsí bǒ mankɛm.
43008004	Bárɛ́m ntá Yesu bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, bákɛ̌m ngɔrɛ́ ndu ákwɛ̀n bɛrwɔp.
43008005	Ɛkáti bɛbhé Moses ɛ́ghàti bhɛsɛ bɛ bábhɔŋ bɛ́tɛ́mti ɛnyǔ ngɔrɛ́ nɛ nɛ batay mángwáy. Ɔrɛm bɛ́ yí?”
43008006	Bárɛ́m nɔ ndu mɛmɔ yi bɛ mámbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛbhat ndak yi amʉɛt. Yesu atɛp ntí amɨk, ansɨŋɨ nɔkɔ ɛnyɨŋ amɨk nɛ sɛnɔŋ awɔ.
43008007	Ndu bárɔŋ ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ yi ánchyɛ́ bhɔ ɛyɔŋ, anyabhɛ mmʉɛt téé, aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mmǔ ywɛka anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ re kʉ bɛbʉ́ ánjámbɨ ámbwɔ́p ntay antɛm yi.”
43008008	Apɛt atɛp ntí amɨk ánsɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ amɨk nɛ sɛnɔŋ awɔ.
43008009	Bǒ bhɔ bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́, bábhó bɛrɔ amɔt amɔt, bɛbho nɛ baseansi. Yesu arɔp aywǐnti nɛ ngɔrɛ́ wu arɛ́ téé, bɛsí bhi.
43008010	Yesu ayoŋ amɨ́k arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Mma, bɔ́ báchí fá? Yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm bɛ mángwáy wɔ?”
43008011	Akɛmɛ Yesu bɛ, “Ɛta, yɛ̌ amɔt.” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mɛ nkwɔ́ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɛm bɛ mángwáy wɔ. Dɔ́k, kɛ ɔ́kɛ́ pɛrɛ kʉ bɛbʉ́”.
43008012	Yesu apɛt abho bɛ́gháti bho mɛnyɨŋ. Arɛm bɛ, “Nchí ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnɛ ɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m. Mmu anɛ ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ, ǎbhɔŋ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ bo mámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m, nɛ apú kɔ amɛm ɛjuri.”
43008013	Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bárɛm yɛ ntá yi bɛ, “Wɔ mbɔŋ ɔ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti mmʉɛt yɛ. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɔ́rɛ̀m puyɛ̌ ndak.”
43008014	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Yɛ̌ ɛ́mbak bɛ nchí rɛm chi ɛ̌ti mmʉɛ́t ɛya, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ́rɛ̀m chí mbɔŋ ndak, mbɔnyunɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ mfú nɛ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ mɛ́rɔ̀ŋ. Kɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ mfú nɛ ɛbhak anɛ mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ.
43008015	Bǎyɨ̀ŋɨ bho chí nɛ amɨ́k kɛ mǎmkpɔt manyé yap. Mɛmbɔŋ mpú kpɔ́t manyé mmu.
43008016	Yɛ̌ ɛ́mbak chí bɛ́ mɛ́tàŋ bhó, ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ mɛ́tàŋ ɛ́chí ɛrɨ́rɨ́ mbɔnyunɛ puyɛ̌ mɛ awántí kɛ nchí taŋ bo. Mɛ nɛ mmu anɛ átó mɛ kɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m ɛnyǔ mmu áchí.
43008017	Básɨŋ ndǔ ɛkáti bɛbhé ɛyɛka bɛ, batísiɛ bati apay mándɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt, nɔ́ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ́ bárɛ́mɛ́ ɛ́chí tɛtɛp.
43008018	Mɛmbɔŋ nchí te ntísiɛ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́rɛ̀m chí mbɔ̌ŋ ndak, nɛ Ɛtaya mmu átó mɛ ǎtè mɛ ntísiɛ nkwɔ́ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m ɛchi tɛtɛp.”
43008019	Bábhɛ́p yɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛtayɛ achí fá?” Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛ, nɛ yɛ̌ Ɛtaya, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ. Mbɔ bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ, mbʉ bǎrɨŋɨ Ɛtaya nkwɔ.”
43008020	Mpok Yesu átɔ̀ŋ bho amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm kɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn. Achí nyaka kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ bɛkʉbhɛ akap. Yɛ̌ mmu kɛtɔk yí mbɔnyunɛ mpok yi abhɨ́kɨ́ re kway nyaka.
43008021	Yesu apɛt aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Nchí rɔ bhe, bɛ́rɔŋ. Nnáŋ ndɔ́k, chɔŋ mǎnjaŋ mɛ. Kɛ bǎgu chɔŋ ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka. Bǎpú kwáy bɛ́twɔ ɛbhak ɛnɛ mɛ́rɔ̀ŋ.”
43008022	Bo Israɛl bábhó yɛ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Yí bɛ ‘Nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ, bǎpú kwáy bɛ́twɔ arɛ,’ ǎyaŋ bɛway mmʉɛt kɛ?”
43008023	Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎchí bǒ mmɨk. Mfu chi amfay. Bǎchí bǒ mmɨk nɛ, mpú mmǔ mmɨk nɛ.
43008024	Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ ngáti be bɛ́ chɔŋ mǎngú ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka. Chɔŋ mǎngú ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka mbák bǎbhɨkɨ noko bɛ́ nchí mmu anɛ nchí.”
43008025	Bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Wɔ ɔchí agha?” Yesu ákɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Nchí mmu anɛ ngáti bhe tɛ nɛbhǒnɛt bɛ nchi.
43008026	Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kwáy bɛrɛm ɛ̌ti yɛka nɛ nsɔt bɛtaŋ be. Kɛ mpú kʉ nɔ, mbɔnyunɛ mmu anɛ átó mɛ ǎbhʉɛrɛ bariɛp ami, nɛ ndiɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ághàti mɛ kɛ nchí ghati bǒ mmɨk.”
43008027	Ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ̀m nɔ, bɔ́ kɛjwimɛm bɛ́ yi árɛ̀m chí ɛ̌ti Ɛta.
43008028	Ɛ́kʉ́ Yesu aghati yɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mǎnáŋ mǎnjoŋ Mɛ Mmu mfú ntá Mandɛm amfay, chɔŋ mǎndɨŋɨ bɛ́ nchí mmu anɛ nchí, nɛ bɛ́ mpú kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbha. Nchí rɛm chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛta ágháti mɛ ndɛ́m.
43008029	Nɛ yí mmú átó mɛ, achi nɛ mɛ. Abhɨ́kɨ́ rɔ mɛ mbak awanti mbɔnyunɛ mɛ́kʉ̀ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákɔ́ŋɔ́.”
43008030	Bɛyǎ bó abhɛn bághókó bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn, mánóko yi.
43008031	Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá bo Israɛl abhɛn mánóko yi bɛ, “Bǎchí bakoŋo bha tɛtɛp mbák mǎndɔ́k ambɨ bɛkoŋo bɛyɔŋ ɛbha,
43008032	nɛ chɔŋ mǎndɨŋɨ tɛtɛp anɛ Mandɛm, nɛ tɛtɛp wu amfɛrɛ be ndǔ kɛsɛm.”
43008033	Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Sɛ́chí bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham, nɛ yɛ̌ mpok apú anɛ sɛ́chí basɛm ntá mmu. Ndaká yí ɔ́rɛ̀m bɛ chɔŋ sɛ́mfú ndǔ kɛsɛm?”
43008034	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́, achí nsɛmɛ́-bɛbʉ.
43008035	Nsɛm apú bhak ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt mpoknkɛm. Mmɔ̌ nnɛrɛ́kɛt kɛ ábhák arɛ mpoknkɛm.
43008036	Mbák yɛ mbɔ̌ŋ mmɔ́ amfɛrɛ be ndǔ kɛsɛm, chɔŋ mǎmbak ngǎngaŋ tɛtɛp.
43008037	Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bǎchí bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham. Yɛ̌ nɔ́, bǎyaŋ mbi bɛway mɛ mbɔnyunɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛya ɛ́pú chwe amɛm batɨ yɛka.
43008038	Nchí ghati bhe chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ngɔ́ ntá Ɛtaya, kɛ bǎkʉ̀ chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɛtayɛka ágháti bhe.”
43008039	Bágháti Yesu bɛ, “Ɛtayɛsɛ chi Ábraham.” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mbɔ bǎchí bɔ̌ Ábraham tɛtɛp, mbʉ́ bǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ Ábraham ákʉ̀ nyaka.
43008040	Kɛ bǎyàŋ mbi bɛway mɛ, mɛ mmu ngátí bhe tɛtɛp anɛ ngókó ntá Mandɛm. Ábraham apú kʉ nyaka nɔ.
43008041	Bǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛtayɛka.” Bágháti yi bɛ, “Mandɛm kɛ achi ɛtayɛsɛ, sɛ́pú bɔ̌-ɛnɔŋ.”
43008042	Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mbɔ Mandɛm achi ɛtayɛka, mbʉ bǎkɔ̀ŋ mɛ, mbɔnyunɛ mfú chí ntá Mandɛm. Mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ́ chí ndǔ mmʉɛt ya, yi kɛ átó mɛ.
43008043	Ndaká yí bǎpú jwimɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́rɛ̀m? Chi mbɔnyunɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ntɨ bɛghok bɛyɔŋ ɛbha.
43008044	Bě bǎchi bɔ̌ ɛtayɛka Satan, nɛ bǎkɔŋ bɛkʉ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɛtayɛka áyàŋ mǎnkʉ. Achí ngwayti bho tɛ nɛbhǒnɛt. Abhɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ tɛtɛp Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ tɛtɛp apu nɛ yi. Mpok yi ásè nsé, ǎkʉ̀ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kɔ́ ndɔ́ŋ ámɔt nɛ ɛpɨŋ ɛyi, mbɔnyunɛ achi nsěnse, nɛ nsé ɛnkɛm ɛ́fù chí ntá yi.
43008045	Kɛ tɛ̌ndu mɛ̌ghàti bhe chí tɛtɛp Mandɛm, bǎpú noko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m.
43008046	Ntɨkɨ mmǔ ákwày bɛtɔŋ bɛ nkʉ bɛbʉ́? Mɛ̌rɛ̀m chi tɛtɛp, ndaká yí bǎpú noko mɛ?
43008047	Mmu anɛ Mandɛm áchí ɛtayi, ǎkɔŋ bɛghok ɛyɔŋ ɛyi. Ntí anɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ bɛghok Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm achí bɛ bǎpú bɔ̌bhi.”
43008048	Bǒbati bo Israɛl bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ nɛfwɔp bɛrɛm bɛ ɔchí mmu Samária nɛ bɛ́ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri wɔ?”
43008049	Yesu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ. Mɛ̌chyɛ̀ Ɛtaya kɛnókó, kɛ bǎchɔŋti nnyɛ́n ɛna.
43008050	Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhʉɛrɛ ntɨ bɛ́ bo mánchyɛ́ mɛ kɛnókó. Kɛ mmǔ achí anɛ áyàŋ bɛ́ bo mánchyɛ́ mɛ kɛnókó, nɛ yí kɛ ákway bɛrɛm ɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhak.
43008051	Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mmu anɛ ábhʉ̀rɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛya, apú gú wáwák.”
43008052	Bo Israɛl bhɔ bárɛm bɛ, “Bɛ́kóŋo bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛ, sɛ́ghɔ nɛ́nɛ bɛ ɔbhɔŋ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ. Ábraham agǔ nyaka, barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm mankɛm bágú nkwɔ, kɛ wɔ, ɔ̌rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Mbák mmu ámbʉ́rɛ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbha apú gú wáwák.’
43008053	Wɔ, ɔchá ɛtayɛsɛ Ábraham mmu ágú nyaka? Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm nkwɔ bágú nyaka! Ɔ̌sɔ̀t mmʉɛt yɛ mbɔ agha?”
43008054	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mbák mɛ̌chyɛ̀ mmʉɛ́t ɛya kɛnókó, nɔ́ kɛnókó ɛka kɛ́pú yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Ɛtaya kɛ áchyɛ̀ mɛ kɛnókó, nɛ nkúbhɛ́ yi kɛ bǎrɛ̀m bɛ achi Mandɛm aywɛka.
43008055	Kɛ yɛ̌ndu bǎrɛ̀m bɛ yi achi Mandɛm aywɛka, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yi, mɛ kɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ yi. Mbɔ ndɛm bɛ́ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yi, mbʉ nchí se chi nse mbɔ běka. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ yi nɛ nchí bhʉɛrɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi.
43008056	Chi-mbɨ ywɛka Ábraham, ǎnòŋ nyaka nɛ maŋák bɛ́ghɔ nywɔp nɛtwɔ ɛna. Aghɔ́ nɔ́, ntɨ nɛ́rɨ yi amɛm.”
43008057	Bǒbati bo Israɛl bhɔ bárɛm yɛ ntá yi bɛ, “Ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ re ghaka yɛ̌ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛpay nsɛm byo, ɔbhɛ́ ɔnáŋ ɔghɔ Abraham-ɛ?”
43008058	Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, Ábraham ápɛ́rɛ bhák, Mɛ Nchí.”
43008059	Ɛ́kʉ bábho bɛbwɔpti batay bɛtɛmti yi nɛ yɔ́ mángwáy, kɛ Yesu abhɛsɛ, tɛ áfú amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm.
43009001	Ɛnɛ́ Yesu áfʉɛ̀t árɔ̀ŋ, aghɔ́ mmú anɛ achi nnɛ́mámɨk tɛ ndǔ nɛbhe ɛni.
43009002	Bakoŋo bhi bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, bɛbʉ́ agha bɛkʉ amɨ́k mmǔ nɛ ánɛ́mɛ́? Ɛbhi yímbɔŋ, kɛ ɛbhɛn chi nɛ nnɔ?”
43009003	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Puyɛ̌ chi bɛ́ mmǔ-nɛ akʉ bɛbʉ́, nɛ puyɛ̌ chí bɛ ɛtayi nɛ máyi bakʉ bɛbʉ́. Amɨ́k ánɛmɛ yi chi bɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkwak bo mángɔ ɛnyǔ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛnɛ Mandɛm aywǐnti ákway bɛkʉ.
43009004	Sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn mmu anɛ átó mɛ ndǔ mpok anɛ bɛti bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re twɔ. Bɛti bɛ́twɔ̀, nɛ mɛ́náŋ mɛ́ntwɔ́, yɛ̌ mmu apú pɛrɛ kway bɛkʉ bɛtɨk.
43009005	Mpoknkɛm anɛ nchí fá amɨk, nchí ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ntá bǒ mmɨk.”
43009006	Árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, apá batiɛ́ amɨk, anywɔbhɛri ntɔp nɛ sɛnɔŋ awɔ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi apá batiɛ́, asɔt ntɔp wu achɔri yi amɨ́k
43009007	aghati yi bɛ, “Dɔ́k ndǔ ɛ̌ntɨ́ŋnyɛ́n Sílom, sǒ bɛsí arɛ́.” Sílom chi “Bátó”. Mmu wu arɔk, aso bɛsí arɛ nɛ mpok ápɛ̀tnsɛm are ghɔ́ mbaŋ.
43009008	Bakokosi bhi nɛ bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bárɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka yi mbɔ nnɨŋɨ́ mɛnɨ́ŋɨ́, bábho bɛrɛm bɛ, “Pú mmú nyaka áchɔ̀kɔ anɨŋɨ nɔkɔ mɛnɨ́ŋɨ́ nɛ?”
43009009	Mbɔk bho bárɛ́ rɛm bɛ, “Chí yi.” Báchák bɛ, “Ǎe, kɛ achí mbɔ yi,” kɛ yímbɔŋ arɛm bɛ, “Chí mɛ.”
43009010	Bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɛ́fákárí ná kɛ ɔbho bɛghɔ mbaŋ?”
43009011	Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mmu anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Yesu kɛ ányɔ́bhɛ́rí ntɔp, asɔt, achɔri mɛ amɨ́k, arɛm bɛ ndɔ́k ndǔ ɛ̌ntɨ́ŋnyɛ́n Sílom nsó bɛsí arɛ. Ndɔk arɛ́ nso bɛsɨ́, mbo bɛghɔ mbaŋ.”
43009012	Bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Mmǔ-rɛ́ achí fá?” Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.”
43009013	Básɔt nnɛ́mámɨk anɛ Yesu ákʉ́ yi ághɔ̀ mbaŋ bárɔ́k ntá bǒnkwɔ Fárisi.
43009014	Ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt bo Israɛl kɛ Yesu ányɔ́bhɛ́rí nyaka ntɔp awati yi amɨ́k, amɨ́k anɛnɛ yi.
43009015	Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bápɛt bábhɛp yi ɛnyu ɛ́fákari kɛ yi ághɔ̀ mbaŋ. Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Awátí ntɔp mɛ amɨ́k, nsó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛsí, mbo bɛghɔ mbaŋ.”
43009016	Mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bhɔ bárɛm bɛ, “Mmǔ anɛ akʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ fú chi ntá Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ apú noko nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt ɛnɛsɛ.” Kɛ bachak báré rɛm bɛ, “Ná mmu bɛbʉ́ ákway bɛkʉ mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn?” Akɔrɛ akwɛn nɛntɨ ɛnap.
43009017	Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bápɛt bábhɛ́p nnɛ́mámɨk anɛ Yesu ákʉ yi ághɔ̀ mbaŋ bɛ, “Wɔ bɛ́ mmu wu kɛ ákʉ́ ɔ́ghɔ̀ mbaŋ, ɔkáysí bɛ yi achi agha?” Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Chí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm.”
43009018	Bǒbati bo Israɛl kɛnókó bɛ amɨ́k anaŋ anɛmɛ nyaka yi kɛ apɛt abho bɛghɔ mbaŋ, kpatɛ mpok bábhɨ́ŋɨ́ máyi nɛ ɛtayi,
43009019	bábhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Mmɔ̌ ywɛka nɛ, bárɛ̀m bɛ́ amɨ́k anɛmɛ yi tɛ̌ndu nɛbhe ɛni? Ɛ́fakari ná kɛ yi ághɔ̀ mbaŋ nɛ́nɛ?”
43009020	Nnɔ nɛ chi bákɛmɛ bɛ, “Sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ nɛ chi mmɔ́ ywɛsɛ, nɛ bɛ́ amɨ́k anɛmɛ yi tɛ̌ndu nɛbhe ɛni.
43009021	Kɛ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyu ɛ́fákárí kɛ yi ághɔ̀ mbaŋ nɛ́nɛ. Nɛ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mmǔ anɛ anɛnɛ yi amɨ́k. Bɛ́p ká yi. Apú chí mandú mmɔ́. Chɔŋ yímbɔŋ angati bhe.”
43009022	Chi nɛ nnɔ bákɛ́mɛ ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ báchày nyaka bǒbati bo Israɛl nɛ ntí bɛ báká nyaka ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt bɛ mbák mmu ándɛm bɛ Yesu chi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, bábòk yi ndǔ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ɛyap.
43009023	Ɛkʉ yɛ chi nɛ nnɔ bárɛm chi bɛ, “Ápú mandú mmɔ́. Bɛ́p ká yímbɔŋ angati bhe.”
43009024	Ndɔŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́jwí ɛpay, bábhɨ́ŋɨ nnɛ́mámɨk anɛ Yesu ákʉ yi ághɔ̀ mbaŋ, baghati yi bɛ, “Dɛm tɛtɛp aywɛ bɛsí Mandɛm. Sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mmǔ anɛ ɔ́rɛ̀m nɔ bɛ anɛ́nɛ́ wɔ amɨ́k chi mmǔ bɛbʉ́.”
43009025	Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Kɛ chí mmǔ bɛbʉ́ kɛ puyɛ̌ mmǔ bɛbʉ̌-a, mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ. Ɛnɛ́ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ chi bɛ nchí nyaka nnɛ́mámɨk, kɛ nɛ́nɛ nchí ghɔ mbaŋ.”
43009026	Bábhɛp yi bɛ, “Akʉ́ yi ntá yɛ? Ná yi ákʉ́ kɛ ɔ̌ghɔ mbaŋ?”
43009027	Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Nnáŋ ngáti bhe, kɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ noko, ndaká yí bǎpɛt bǎbhɛ̀p mɛ? Bě nkwɔ́ báyàŋ bɛbhak bakoŋo bhi?”
43009028	Bábhó bɛsɔkɔti yi mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí nkoŋo ywi, bɛsɛ sɛ́chí chí bakoŋo Moses.
43009029	Sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ Mandɛm arɛm nyaka kɛpɨ nɛ Moses, kɛ mmǔ-nɛ, sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ yi áfú.”
43009030	Akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛchí mɛ nɛpɔp tontó bɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ yi áfú, yɛ̌ndu yi ánɛ́nɛ́ mɛ amɨ́k!
43009031	Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ Mandɛm apu ghok bǒ bɛbʉ́. Ǎghok chi mmu anɛ áchyɛ̀ yi kɛnókó, ankʉ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi Mandɛm áyàŋ.
43009032	Tɛ̌ mmɨk ábhó, sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re ghók bɛ mmu akʉ amɨ́k ánɛ́nɛ́ mmu anɛ bábhé yi amɨ́k nɛ́mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́.
43009033	Mbɔ mmǔ nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ fú chi ntá Mandɛm, mbʉ abhɨkɨ kway bɛ́kʉ ɛnɛ ɛnyɨŋ.”
43009034	Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Kwáé, wɔ mmu bábhé ndǔ bɛbʉ́, ɔ́yàŋ bɛtɔŋ bhɛsɛ?” Bapuri yí bátɛ́n nɛfí bɛ ámfú ɛkɛt nɛnɨkímʉɛt ɛyap.
43009035	Yesu aghók bɛ́ bábók mmu anɛ yi ákʉ́ amɨ́k ánɛ́nɛ́ batɛn nɛfí. Abho bɛyaŋ yi. Ághɔ́ nɔkɔ yi, abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɔnókó Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm?”
43009036	Yi akɛmɛ Yesu bɛ, “Ɛta, mmu wu chi agha? Ghatí mɛ, bɛ nnókó yi.”
43009037	Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Ɔnáŋ ɔghɔ̌ yi, nɛ yí kɛ árɛ̀m kɛpɨ nɛ wɔ nɛ́nɛ.”
43009038	Mmǔ wu arɛm bɛ, “Acha, nnókó.” Akwɛ́n Yesu bɛkak, abho bɛ́chyɛ yi kɛnókó.
43009039	Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ntwɔ fá amɨk bɛ mámkpɔ́t manyé bho. Ntwɔ bɛ́ bo abhɛn bachi amɨ́k nɛ́mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́ mangɔ mbaŋ, nɛ bɛ́ amɨ́k ánɛ́mɛ́ abhɛn bághɔ̀ mbaŋ.”
43009040	Mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Fárisi abhɛn bachi nyaka kɛkwɔt bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́, bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɔ̌rɛ̀m nɔ chi bɛ bɛsɛ nkwɔ sɛ́chí amɨ́k nɛ́mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́ kɛ?”
43009041	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mbɔ bǎchí amɨ́k nɛ́mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́ mbʉ́ bɛbʉ́ bɛ́pú nɛ bhe. Kɛ tɛ̌ndu bǎrɛ̀m bɛ bǎghɔ̀ mbaŋ, bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka bɛrɔp nɛ bhe.”
43010001	Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mmǔ anɛ ápú fʉɛ́t ndǔ nnyǔbha ánchwe ndǔ nkwɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n, kɛ ǎko chí ɛbhak ɛ́chák anchwe amɛm, chí ngɛ́p. Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ, chí ngɛ́bhɛ́ ntantaŋ.
43010002	Kɛ anɛ áfʉɛ̀t ndǔ nyǔbhá, chí mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n.
43010003	Mbabhɛri nnyǔbha, ǎnɛ̀nɛ nyǔbhá ntá yi. Bághɔ́ŋɔ́mɛn árɨŋɨ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi. Ǎbhɨŋɨ yɔ́ ndǔ manyɛ́n ayap, ansɔt yɔ́ amfu nɛ yɔ.
43010004	Nɛ ánáŋ ántɛ́n yɔ́ ankɛm nɛfí, ǎrɔ́ŋ ambɨ, yɔ́ ánkoŋo nɔkɔ ansɛm, mbɔnyunɛ árɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi.
43010005	Ápú koŋo kɛnkɔ̌ mmu. Ǎbʉɛ̀ yi bʉɛ, mbɔnyunɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi.”
43010006	Yesu atɛ́m bo Israɛl nɛkay ɛnɛn, kɛ bɔ́ kɛjwimɛm ndǔ ntí nɛkay.
43010007	Ɛkʉ, Yesu apɛt aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mɛ kɛ nchí nyǔbhá bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n.
43010008	Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bayambɨ bátwɔ́ kɛ mɛ̌twɔ̀, chí baghɛ́p nɛ baghɛ́p bataŋ bataŋ. Baghɔŋɔmɛn ábhɨ́kɨ́ ghók bhɔ.
43010009	Mɛ kɛ nchí mbǐnywɔp. Mmu anɛ áfʉɛ̀t ntá ya kɛ anchwe, ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́pú tɔk yi. Ǎchwè, amfú mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ákɔ́ŋɔ́, ambɔ́ŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi áyàŋ.
43010010	Ngɛ́p ǎtwɔ̀ chí bɛ́ghɛp aghɛ́p, bɛ́wáy, nɛ bɛ́chɔ́ŋti. Ntwɔ bɛ́ bo mámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m nɛ bɛ́ mámbɔ́ŋ nɔ nɛ́njwí pɔɔt nɛ áfɔ́k ankɛm.
43010011	“Mɛ kɛ nchí ɛrɨ́tí mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n. Ɛrɨ́tí mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n ǎchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛ̌ti bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n ayi.
43010012	Mmǔ anɛ básɔ́rɛ́ ndǔ bɛtɨk bɛ ámbábhɛ́rí nɔ́kɔ́ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n ɛnɛ́ yi ápú mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n nɛ yɔ apu ayi, ǎghɔ nkwɔ ndu átwɔ̀ andɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n ambʉɛ́, nkwɔ ankɛ́m mbɔk, nɛ antak achak.
43010013	Ǎbʉɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ achí chí mǔbɛtɨk, nɛ ápú fyɛ́ ntí nɛ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n.
43010014	Mmɛ kɛ nchí ɛrɨ́tɨ́ Mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n aya, nɛ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n aya árɨŋɨ mɛ,
43010015	nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛtaya árɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ, mɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ Ɛtaya. Nɛ nchí chyɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ ɛ̌ti bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n.
43010016	Mbɔ̌ŋ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n áchák anɛ́ ápú ndǔ nkwɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n anɛ. Mbɔŋ bɛ́sɔt yɔ́ nkwɔ, ntwɔ́ nɛ yɔ, bɛ́ ánchɛ́m mmʉɛt nɛ anɛ́fú. Chɔŋ ánkoŋo ɛyɔŋ ɛya. Ɛnkʉ yɔ́ ankɛm ámbak ndǔ nkwɔ́ ámɔt anɛ́ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n amɔt.
43010017	Ɛtaya akɔŋ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ nchí chyɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛna bɛ mpɛt mbɔŋ nɔ.
43010018	Yɛ̌ mmu apú anɛ ásɔ̀t nɛpɛ́m ɛna ntá ya. Mɛmbɔ̌ŋ kɛ nchí chyɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛna. Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́chyɛ nɔ, nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́pɛ́t bɛbhɔŋ nɔ. Ɛnɛ, chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Ɛtaya ághátí mɛ nkʉ.”
43010019	Bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ ákɔrɛ ápɛt ákwɛ́n nɛntɨ bo Israɛl.
43010020	Bɛyǎ bhap báré rɛm bɛ, “Ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri yi! Ǎbhokori! Ndaká yí bǎté, bǎghòk ɛnyɨŋ yi árɛ̀m?”
43010021	Kɛ báchák báré rɛm chi bɛ, “Puyɛ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmu anɛ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri yi akwáy bɛrɛm nɛ. Ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́kwày bɛ́kʉ nnɛ́mámɨ́k ángɔ́ mbaŋ-á?”
43010022	Mpok aghaka anɛ bo Israɛl mányìɛ ɛpa ɛnɛ bátɨ̀k ndu mánɨ́kɨ́mʉɛt báfyɛ́ ɛkɛrákap ɛnɛ Yerúsalɛm awɔ Mandɛm.
43010023	Mbaŋ are kwɛn, Yesu arɔk ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, are kɔ ndu mɔ́kɛt mambarɛnkók anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ mɔ́kɛt mambarɛnkók Sólomon.
43010024	Bo Israɛl bárɔ́k, bákáp yi, bábhó bɛbhɛp yi bɛ, “Chɔŋ ɔ́ndɔ sɛ́noŋ ɛntat ná kɛ ɔ́ngati bhɛsɛ mbák wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò. Mbák wɔ kɛ ɔchí Mpɛmɛ, ghatí bhɛsɛ́ kpoŋoroŋ.”
43010025	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Nnáŋ ngáti bhe, kɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ noko. Bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Ɛtaya bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ be ɛnyǔ mmu nchí.
43010026	Yɛ̌ nɔ, bǎpú noko mbɔnyunɛ bǎpú ndǔ nkwɔ́ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n aya.
43010027	Bághɔ́ŋɔ́mɛn aya ághòk ɛyɔŋ ɛya. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ yɔ́, nɛ yɔ ákòŋo mɛ.
43010028	Nɛ nchí chyɛ yɔ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Ápú gú ánɛ́m. Mmu apú anɛ ákwày bɛ́fɛrɛ yɔ́ amɔ́ya.
43010029	Ɛtaya mmu áchyɛ́ mɛ yɔ, achá bo mankɛm. Nɛ mmu apú kwáy bɛfɛrɛ yɔ ndu amɔ yi.
43010030	Mɛ nɛ Ɛtaya sɛ́chí mmu amɔt.”
43010031	Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, bo Israɛl bápɛt bábho bɛbwɔpti batay ndu bɛtɛmti yi nɛ yɔ́ mángwáy.
43010032	Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ntɔ̌ŋ be bɛyǎ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nkʉ́ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Ɛtaya. Ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm, ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ́ bǎyaŋ bɛway mɛ nɛ batay chí ɛnɛ́?”
43010033	Bo Israɛl bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Sɛ́pú yaŋ bɛ́wáy wɔ nɛ batay ɛ̌ti ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́kʉ́, kɛ ɛ̌ti ɔ́rɛ̀m bɛ ɔchí Mandɛm yɛ̌ndu ɔ́chí nkwǎŋwaŋ.”
43010034	Yesu akɛmɛ bɔ́ bɛ, “Pú básɨŋ amɛm ɛkáti bɛbhé ɛyɛka bɛ Mandɛm arɛm bɛ, ‘Mɛ ndɛm bɛ́ bǎchí bɔmandɛm’?
43010035	Sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ́pú kway bɛwupsi ɛnyu. Mbák Mandɛm abhɨŋɨ nyaka bo abhɛn bághòk ɛyɔŋ ɛyi bɛ bɔmandɛm,
