43010036	ná bǎkway bɛrɛm bɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m bɛ nchí Mandɛm ndǔ ndɛ́mɛ́ bɛ nchí Mmɔ Mandɛm, mmu yi áyábhɛ́ átó fá amɨk?
43010037	Mbák mpú kʉ chi bɛtɨk Ɛtaya, bǎkɛ́ noko mɛ.
43010038	Kɛ mbák mɛ̌kʉ̀ chí bɛtɨk Ɛtaya, yɛ̌ndu bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ noko mɛ, nokó ká ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛ́n mɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ́ghàti bhe. Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkwak mǎndɨŋɨ, nɛ mǎnjwimɛm bɛ́ Ɛtaya achi babhat nɛ mɛ, nɛ mɛ nchí babhat nɛ Ɛtaya.”
43010039	Bápɛt babho bɛyaŋ mbi ndu bɛkɛm yi, afori bɔ́ amɔ arɔk ɛbhakayi.
43010040	Apɛtnsɛm ɛbhě manyu Jɔ́dan, ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Jɔ̌n ájwìti nyaka bho, abhak arɛ́.
43010041	Bɛyǎ bo bárɔ́k ntá yi mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Jɔ̌n ábhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛ́mɔt, kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti mmǔ anɛ ɛ́chí tɛtɛp.”
43010042	Bɛyǎ bo mánóko Yesu ɛbhak ɛyɔ.
43011001	Mmǔ amɔt achi nyaka ɛtɔk Bɛ́tani, anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Lásárɔs. Akwɛ́n nɛme. Bɛ́tani abhak ɛtɔk ɛnɛ María nɛ mɔ́mayi Matá báchɔ̀kɔ.
43011002	María wu, kɛ áwáti nyaka bɛkak Yesu Acha nɛ bawɛrɛ́riɛp, are tɛsɛ nɛ ɛmɛnɛ́ntí yi. Yi kɛ mɔ́mayi Lásárɔs akwɛnɛ nyaka nɛme.
43011003	Ɛ́kʉ́ bɔ̌mayi bátó ɛyɔŋ ntá Yesu Acha bɛ, “Acha, mmʉɛrɛ ywɛ anɛ ɔ́kɔ́ŋɔ́ ǎme.”
43011004	Yesu ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ntó ɛnɛn arɛm bɛ, “Nɛme ɛnɛ́n nɛ́pú nɛmě nɛwú, nɛ́chí chí bɛ́kʉ bo mángɔ́ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm. Nɛ́twɔ chí bɛ nɛ́mbák ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ̀ bo mángɔ́ bɛ Mmɔ Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ.”
43011005	Yesu akɔŋ nyaka Matá nɛ bɔ̌mayi María nɛ Lásárɔs tontó.
43011006	Yɛ̌ nɔ, mpok yi ághókó bɛ́ Lásárɔs ǎme, achɔkɔ ɛbhak ɛnɛ yi achi ndǔ manywɔp apay.
43011007	Manywɔp yɔ apay áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, arɛm ntá bakoŋo bhi bɛ, “Sɛ́mpɛ́tnsɛm atú Judɛ́ya.”
43011008	Bakoŋo bhi bárɛm bɛ, “Ntɔŋ, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re tat ɛnɛ bǒ batí Israɛl báyàŋ bɛ́tɛmti wɔ nɛ batay mángwáy, ɔbhɛ́ ɔ̌pɛtnsɛm arɛ́?”
43011009	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Pú maŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp áchi byo nɛ apay bɛ́bho beti bɛ́gháka beku? Mmu anɛ ákɔ̀ nɛ ngósí, apú chɨŋti nɛkwɛn mbɔnyunɛ ǎghɔ̀ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ mmɨk.
43011010	Kɛ mmu anɛ ákɔ̀ nɛ bɛti ǎchɨ̀ŋti ankwɛn mbɔnyunɛ mbaŋ apu ghɔ.”
43011011	Yesu átɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛkay ɛnɛn, aghati yɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mmʉɛrɛ ywɛsɛ Lásárɔs akwɛn kɛnɔ́, kɛ nchí rɔŋ mɛ́ŋɛ́mɛ yi ndǔ kɛnɔ́.”
43011012	Bakoŋo bhi bárɛm bɛ, “Acha, mbák ǎbhʉ̀rɛ kɛnɔ́, chɔŋ aŋɛmɛ, ambak sayri.”
43011013	Kɛnɔ́ ɛkɛn Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ Lásárɔs ǎbhʉrɛ kɛbhak chi nɛwú kɛ bákáysi bɛ Yesu arɛm chi bɛ Lásárɔs ábhʉ̀rɛ kɛnɔ́ mbɔ́ŋ.
43011014	Ɛ́kʉ́, yɛ Yesu aghati bhɔ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ, “Lásárɔs agu,
43011015	nɛ ɛ̌ti yɛka, mbɔ̌ŋ maŋák bɛ mpú arɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ ɛfakari chi bɛ be mǎnókó. Sɛ́ndɔ́k sɛ́ngɔ́ yi.”
43011016	Tɔmás anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Ɛfák, arɛm ntá batɨ bakoŋo Yesu abhɛ́nɛ́fú bɛ, “Sɛ́ndɔ́k ká nkwɔ bɛ Yɛ̌ chí nɛwú, sɛ́ngú nɛ yi.”
43011017	Yesu ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ Bɛ́tani, arɛ́, aghɔ́ bɛ́ mǎnáŋ bábhɛ́mɛ Lásárɔs kpát ɛfʉɛt manywɔp anwi.
43011018	Bɛ́fu Bɛ́tani bɛ́gháka Yerúsalɛm achi nyaka mbɔ nɛkɔ̌ bɔkilomɛta babay nɛ ɛbhɔk,
43011019	nɛ bɛyǎ bo Israɛl bárɔ́k bɛ́wáka nɛ Matá nɛ María ndǔ nɛwú mɔ́mayap.
43011020	Matá ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Yesu ǎtwɔ̀, afú, arɔk atɛmɛri yi ɛnɛ́ María árɔ́bhɛ́ anywɔ́p.
43011021	Matá ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Yesu, arɛm bɛ, “Acha, mbɔ ɔchí fá, mbʉ mɔ́maya abhɨkɨ gu!
43011022	Kɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ yɛ̌ chí nɛ́nɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́bhɛ́bhɛ́ Mandɛm ǎchyɛ.”
43011023	Yesu aghati Matá bɛ, “Chɔŋ mɔ́mayɛ ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
43011024	Matá arɛm bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ chɔŋ ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛwak ɛnɛ bawú mankɛm bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, ndǔ ngwɛnti mmɨk.”
43011025	Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mɛ kɛ nchí kʉ bawú mampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, mámbak nɛpɛ́m. Mmu anɛ ánókó mɛ, yɛ̌ angú gú, chɔŋ ampɛt ambak nɛpɛ́m.
43011026	Nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ áchí nɛpɛ́m, anoko mɛ, apú gú wáwák. Matá, ɔnókó bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn?”
43011027	Matá akɛmɛ bɛ, “Acha, nnókó. Nnókó bɛ́ ɔchí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, Mmɔ Mandɛm anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛ́twɔ fá amɨk.”
43011028	Matá árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, arɔk abhɨŋɨ mɔ́mayi María, aghati yí ndǔ ɛyu bɛ, “Ntɔŋ atwɔ, nɛ ǎyáŋ bɛghɔ wɔ́.”
43011029	María ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, afate, áyák arɔk ntá Yesu.
43011030	Yesu abhɨ́kɨ́ re ghaka nyaka ɛtɔk, abhak chí ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Matá atɛmɛri yi.
43011031	Bo Israɛl abhɛn báchí anywɔ́p nɛ María báwaka nɛ yi, bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ yi afate áyák áfú nɛfí, bákóŋo yi nɛ nkaysi bɛ ǎrɔ̀ŋ ndǔ nnɛm bɛdi kɛbhɔ arɛ.
43011032	María arɔk nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Yesu achi. Nɛghɔ́ yí ághɔ́ Yesu, akwɛ́n yi bɛkak abho bɛrɛm bɛ, “Acha, mbɔ ɔchí fá, mbʉ́ mɔ́maya abhɨ́kɨ́ gú!”
43011033	Yesu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ María ádì nɛ bo Israɛl abhɛn bátwɔ́ bɛ́wáka nɛ yi bádì nkwɔ, ɛ́tɔ́k yi tɛ antɨ, ntínso nɛ́kɛ́m yi.
43011034	Abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Bábhɛ́mɛ́ yi fá?” Bákɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Acha, twɔ́ ghɔ́.”
43011035	Yesu adi.
43011036	Ɛ́kʉ́ bo Israɛl bhɔ bábhó bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Akɔŋ nyaka Lásárɔs achá! Ghɔ ndu áré di.”
43011037	Kɛ mbɔk ɛyap báré rɛm chi bɛ, “Yi mmu ákʉ́ nnɛ́mámɨ́k ǎghɔ mbaŋ, apú kwáy nyaka bɛkʉ bɛ Lásárɔs ákɛ́ gú?”
43011038	Ɛ́pɛ́t ɛtɔk Yesu tontó, afa, arɔk ndǔ nnɛm. Nnɛm ɛnɔ nɛ́bhak chi mbok anɛ achi ndǔ sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́. Mánaŋ básɔt nyaka ntay nɛgho bákúti nyǔnɛm.
43011039	Yesu aghati yɛ bo abhɛn bachi arɛ bɛ, “Bɨŋɨrí ká ntay ɛnɔ fɛrɛ́.” Kɛ Matá, manɔ ngú arɛm bɛ, “Acha, ɛriɛp ɛ́ya chɔŋ ɛncha. Ɛ́kʉ manywɔp anwi ɛchɔŋ ɛnɛ́ bábhɛ́mɛ́ yi!”
43011040	Yesu aghati Matá bɛ, “Matá, pú ngátí wɔ́ bɛ mbák ɔnókó, chɔŋ ɔ́ngɔ́ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm?”
43011041	Bábɨ́ŋɨri yɛ ntay ɛnɔ báfɛ́rɛ anyǔ nnɛm. Yesu ayoŋ amɨ́k ayɨŋɨ mfay arɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, nkáká wɔ bɛ́ ɔghok mɛ.
43011042	Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɔ̌ghok mɛ mpoknkɛm, kɛ ndɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ chí ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn bachi fá téé bɛ́ mánkwáy mɛnoko bɛ wɔ kɛ ɔ́tó mɛ fá amɨk.”
43011043	Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, abɨk bɛ, “Lásárɔs, fú twɔ́!”
43011044	Lásárɔs mmu anɛ ánáŋ ágú nyaka, afú ndǔ nnɛm, nɛ ndɛn ɛnɛ mánɛ́bhɛ́ yí amɔ nɛ bɛkak nɛ bɛsí kɛ bábhɛ́mɛ yi. Yesu aghati bɔ bɛ, “Kaŋarí ká ndɛn ɛyɔ yi amʉɛt, bɛ yi ándɔ́k.”
43011045	Bɛyǎ bo Israɛl abhɛn bakoŋo María bághɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu ákʉ́, mánóko yi.
43011046	Kɛ mbɔk yap báfá bárɔ́k ntá bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bághati bhɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu akʉ.
43011047	Bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bábhɨ́ŋɨ bo ndǔ ɛchɛmɛ́ bǒbati Israɛl. Báchɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt bárɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ sɛ́nkʉ ná? Mmǔ-nɛ ǎtɔ̀ŋ bɛyǎ bɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay.
43011048	Mbák sɛ́ndɔ́ yi andɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, chɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anoko yi. Nɛ mbák ɛ́mfákárí ɛnyu yɔ, bǒ Rom bátwɔ́ mánchɔŋti ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ɛyɛsɛ nɛ ɛtɔk ɛyɛsɛ.”
43011049	Kɛ mmǔ wap amɔt anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Káyfas anɛ achí nyaka mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm ndǔ mmíɛ́ ɛnɔ, arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yɛ̌nyɨŋ!
43011050	Bǎbhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ bɛ ɛrɨ ntá yɛka bɛ mmu amɔt ángú ɛ̌ti bo mankɛm ɛcha bɛ ɛtɔk ɛnkɛm ɛnɛm?”
43011051	Káyfas abhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm nyaka nɔ chi mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú ndǔ nkaysi yi. Mandɛm kɛ ákʉ́ nyaka bɛ yi andɛm nɔ mbɔ mǔngo bachiǎkap ndǔ mmíɛ́ ɛnɔ. Arɛm bɛ́ chɔŋ Yesu ángú ɛ̌ti bo Israɛl mankɛm.
43011052	Yesu abhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ nyaka bɛ́gu chí ndiɛrɛ ɛ̌ti bo Israɛl. Abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛ́gu ɛ̌ti bɔ̌ Mandɛm abhɛn bátáká mmɨk nkɛm bɛ mambak ndǔ nkwɔ́ amɔt.
43011053	Bɛ́bhó ɛwak ɛyɔ, bǒbati bo Israɛl báré yáŋ mbi bɛ́wáy Yesu.
43011054	Yesu kɛpɛrɛ kɔ yɛ kpoŋoroŋ atú ɛtɔk bo Israɛl. Afa arɛ́, arɔk atú ɛtɔk ɛnɛ ɛchi kɛkwɔt nɛ baso, amɛm ɛtɔk ɛnɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Ɛfraim, abhak arɛ nɛ bakoŋo bhi.
43011055	Mpok mɛnyiɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ bo Israɛl arɔp kɛkwɔt. Bɛyǎ bho báfa ndǔ bɔ̌bɛtɔk bhap bako, barɔk Yerúsalɛm ɛnɛ́ mpok ɛpǎ ɛyɔ ábhɨ́kɨ́ re ghaka, ndu bɛkʉ bɛ mámbák pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm mbɔ ɛnyu bo Israɛl bákʉ nɔkɔ nyaka.
43011056	Bǒ bhɔ báyàŋ nyaka Yesu, nɛ ndu báchɛ́mɛ́ amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm báré bhɛ́p batɨ bɛ, “Bǎkáysí bɛ́ yí? Bǎkáysí bɛ́ apu twɔ ndǔ ɛpǎ?”
43011057	Bǒbati bachiǎkap nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi báchyɛ́ nyaka ɛyɔŋ bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɨŋɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ Yesu achi, ángátí bhɔ́ bɛ mánkɛ́m yi.
43012001	Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ ɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp atandat, Yesu afa arɔk Bɛ́tani. Bɛ́tani abhak ɛtɔk Lásárɔs anɛ Yesu akʉ yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
43012002	Arɛ́, bákʉ́ yi nɛnyíɛ́ běku. Matá kɛ áfʉɛ̀t nyaka nɛnyíɛ́. Lásárɔs abhak mmu amɔt ndǔ bo abhɛn bachɔkɔ mányiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ Yesu.
43012003	María asɔt ɛsáyrí ɛ́kpɛ́mɛ́ bawɛrɛ́riɛp amɛn áyá nkáp apɨkɨri bɛkak Yesu, antɛsɛ nɔkɔ nɛ ɛmɛnɛ́ntí yi. Ɛkɛt ɛnkɛm ɛ́jwi nɛ ɛrɨ́tí ɛriɛbhɛ́ bawɛrɛ mɔ.
43012004	Júdas Iskariɔt, nkoŋo Yesu amɔt anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛti yi arɛm bɛ,
43012005	“Bákway mbʉ bɛti bawɛrɛ́riɛp amɛn anchyɛ nkáp anɛ́ nkʉbɛtɨk ányiɛ ndǔ mmíɛ́. Ndaká yí bábhɨ́kɨ́ tí mɔ́ mánsɔt nkáp mánchyɛ ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho?”
43012006	Júdas abhɨkɨ rɛm nyaka ɛnyu ɛyɔ chi bɛ ǎghɔ báchɛ́bɛ́ bho ntínso. Arɛm nɔ chi ndu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka ntɨ ngɛ́p. Nɛ ndǔ nkwɔ bakoŋo Yesu, yi kɛ áchí nyaka mbʉrɛ nkáp, nɛ ǎsɔ̀t nyaka aywi arɛ́ ansɛm ansɛm anyiɛ nɔkɔ.
43012007	Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Dɔ̌ yí! Ɛ́rɨ yi ambʉrɛ bawɛt amɛn bɛ ámbák ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn bábhɛmɛ mɛ.
43012008	Bachɛ́bhɛ́bho bachi nɛ bhe mpoknkɛm, kɛ mpú bhak nɛ bhe mpoknkɛm.”
43012009	Bɛyǎ bo Israɛl bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Yesu achi Bɛ́tani, bárɔ́k arɛ, puyɛ̌ ndiɛrɛ ndu bɛ́ghɔ Yesu kɛ ndu bɛghɔ Lásárɔs nkwɔ mmǔ yi akʉ apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
43012010	Ɛ́kʉ́ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm báté ɛyu bɛ mángwáy Lásárɔs nkwɔ.
43012011	Báyàŋ nyaka bɛ mángwáy Lásárɔs nkwɔ mbɔnyunɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari nɛ yi ɛ́kʉ́ nyaka batɨ̌ bo Israɛl bábʉɛ̀ bhɔ, mánoko nɔkɔ Yesu.
43012012	Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bátwɔ́ ndǔ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ bághók bɛ́ Yesu ǎtwɔ̀ Yerúsalɛm.
43012013	Ɛ́kʉ́ bo babho bɛ́kpɔ́ti bɛ́wɔ̌amáŋ mandɔkɔ nɔkɔ bɛtɛmɛri yi, mámbɨk mandɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Sɛ́mbɨ́tí Mandɛm mfay! Mandɛm ánjɛ́t mmu anɛ átwɔ̀ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Acha! Sɛ́mbɨ́tɨ́ Mfɔ bo Israɛl!”
43012014	Yesu asɔt mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu, achɔkɔ yɔ́ ansɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu básɨŋɨ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ,
43012015	“Bǒ ɛtɔk Síɔn, bǎkɛ́ cháy. Ghɔ́ ká, Mfɔ ywɛka ǎtwɔ̀, chɔ́kɔ́, amfay mɔ́mpɔŋɔ batu.”
43012016	Mpok anɛ barak ayɔ áfákárí, baghɔk Yesu kɛjwimɛm bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn básɨŋɨ ɛ̌ti yi kɛ bɛ́fù nɔ́ tɛtɛp. Kɛ mpok Yesu apɛrɛnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ Mandɛm asɔt yi amfay achyɛ yi kɛnókó, bátɨk yɛ bɛ básɨŋ nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ ɛ̌ti yi. Bátɨk nkwɔ́ ɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́fákári ntá yi.
43012017	Bo abhɛn bachi nɛ Yesu mpok yi ákʉ́ Lásárɔs afu ndǔ nnɛm báre ghati bo ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí mbɔ batísiɛ Yesu.
43012018	Ntí anɛ bɛyǎ bo bárɔ̀ŋ nyaka bɛghɔ Yesu chí bɛ, bághok bɛ́ yi akʉ ɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛyɔ.
43012019	Bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ bɛyǎ bo bárɔ̀ŋ ntá Yesu bábho yɛ bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Sɛ́wày chí mmʉɛt. Yɨ́ŋɨ́, mmɨk nkɛm arɔbhɛ koŋo chi yi.”
43012020	Mbɔk bǒ Grik nkwɔ báchí nyaka ndǔ nkwɔ bho abhɛn bárɔ́ŋɔ́ Yerúsalɛm bɛchyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm ndǔ mpok Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ.
43012021	Bǒ Grik bhɔ bárɔ́k ntá Fílip anɛ áfú nyaka Bɛtsáida, atú Gálili barɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, sɛ́yàŋ bɛ́ghɔ Yesu.”
43012022	Fílip afa, arɔk aghati Andru. Bɔ́ bati apay bárɔ́k baghati Yesu.
43012023	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mpok akway anɛ Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bo mánchyɛ́ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá yi kɛnókó.
43012024	Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mbák bábhɨ́kɨ́ pɨ nyɛ́sɛ́ nchwi amɨk nɛ́mpɔ́, nɛ́bhak chi nyɛ́sɛ́ nchwi nɛmɔt. Kɛ mbák mámpɨ́ nyɛ́sɛ́ nchwi amɨk nɛ́mpɔ, nɛ́nchak, nɛ́chyɛ bɛyǎ nchwi nkɔ.
43012025	Mmǔ anɛ ákɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni, ǎnɛm nɔ́, kɛ mmu anɛ ápú re fyɛ ntí ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛnɛn fá amɨk apu nɛ́m nɔ́, ǎbhɔŋ nɔ́ kpát anchwe ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
43012026	Mmu anɛ áká bɛtok mɛ, abhɔŋ bɛ́kóŋo mɛ. Nɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mɛ̌bhák, arɛ́ kɛ̌ nkʉbɛtɨk awa ábhák nkwɔ. Mbák mmu ántók mɛ, Ɛtaya ǎkʉ yi ambɔŋ kɛnókó.”
43012027	Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Nɛ́nɛ, ntɨ ɛna nɛ́pú amɛm kpák. Chɔŋ ndɛm bɛ yi? Chɔŋ ndɛm chí bɛ ‘Ɛta, fɛrɛ́ mɛ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ ɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ́ kɛ?’ Wáwák! Mbɔ̌ŋ ɛ̌ti ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ́ kɛ ntwɔ́ fá amɨk!
43012028	Ɛta, kʉ bo mánchyɛ́ nnyɛ́n ɛna kɛnókó.” Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, ɛyɔŋ ɛ́fú amfay ɛrɛm bɛ, “Nnáŋ nkʉ nnyɛ́n ɛna nɛ́mbɔ́ŋ kɛnókó nɛ chɔŋ mpɛt nkʉ nɔ.”
43012029	Bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bachi arɛ́ téé bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛyɔŋ ɛyɔ, bare rɛm bɛ, “Nɛfaŋ kɛ ásáy!” Báchák bɛ, “Ángɛl Mandɛm árɛ̀m kɛpɨ nɛ yi.”
43012030	Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́twɔ́ ɛ̌ti yɛka. Ɛbhɨkɨ twɔ ɛ̌ti ya.
43012031	Mpok akway anɛ Mandɛm átàŋ mmɨk nɛ, mpok ákway anɛ báfɛ̀rɛ mfɔ mmɨk nɛ ndǔ kɛfɔ ɛki.
43012032	Nɛ mǎnáŋ mamkpáŋ mɛ amfay ndǔ ɛkotákátí, chɔŋ nja bǒ mankɛm bɛ mándɔ́ mmɨk mantwɔ ntá ya.”
43012033	Yesu arɛm bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn ndu bɛtɔŋ ɛnyǔ nɛwú ɛnɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́gu.
43012034	Bɛyǎ bo abhɛn báchí arɛ bárɛ́m bɛ, “Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́ghati bhɛsɛ bɛ, ‘Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò apú gú. Ndaká yí ɔ́rɛ̀m bɛ chɔŋ mánsɔt mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm mango ndǔ ɛkotákátí? Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm chi agha?’”
43012035	Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛ́bhʉɛ́t nɛ bhe ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok. Dɔk yɛ ka ambɨ bɛkɔ ndǔ mpok anɛ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛ́bhʉɛ́t nɛ bhe, bɛ ɛjuri ɛkɛ twɔ ɛmfɔkɔri bhe. Mmǔ anɛ ákɔ̀ amɛm ɛjuri, apú rɨŋɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ yi árɔ̀ŋ.
43012036	Sɨkɨ́ ká ntɨ nɛ mmǔ anɛ áchyɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ nɛ́nɛ, ndǔ yi abhʉɛ́t nɛ bhe, bɛ́ mǎmbák bɔ̌ bɛdyɛrɛ.” Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, arɔk abhɛsɛ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ bo bápú kwáy bɛghɔ yi.
43012037	Yɛ̌ndu yi ákʉ́ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay bɛsí ɛbhap, bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko yí.
43012038	Ɛ́bhak ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Aisáya árɛ́mɛ́ tɛntɛp bɛ́ chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari, ɛ́mfú tɛtɛp. Nɔ chí bɛ, “Ɛta Mandɛm, agha ánókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́gháti bhɔ? Agha ághɔ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛ?”
43012039	Bǒbhɛn bábhɨkɨ kwáy nyaka mɛ́nóko, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu Aisáya apɛt árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ
43012040	“Mandɛm akʉ bɔ́ mámbák amɨ́k nɛ́mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́, agwɔ́t batɨ ayap, báchí mbɔ bo abhɛn bákútí amɨ́k bɛ bákɛ́ ghɔ́ mbaŋ, nɛ bɛ́ batu yap ákɛ́ ghók yɛ̌nyɨŋ, nɛ bɛ bákɛ́ jwimɛm, mantwɔ ntá ya, mbú bhɔ.”
43012041	Aisáya arɛm nyaka nɔ mbɔnyunɛ aghɔ nyaka kɛnókó Yesu, nɛ are rɛm ɛ̌ti yi.
43012042	Kɛ yɛ̌ndu bɛyǎ bo mánóko nyaka Yesu, bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm kpoŋoroŋ bɛ mánóko, ndu báchày bǒnkwɔ Fárisi, bɛ bákɛ́ bók bhɔ ndǔ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkímʉɛt.
43012043	Bákɔŋ kɛnókó ɛkɛn bǒ mmɨk báchyɛ̀ bhɔ, ɛcha kɛnókó ɛkɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ.
43012044	Yesu arɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay bɛ, “Mmǔ anɛ ánókó mɛ, abhɨ́kɨ́ noko chí mɛ, anókó mmu anɛ ato mɛ nkwɔ.
43012045	Nɛ mmǔ anɛ ághɔ́ mɛ, ághɔ̌ mmu anɛ átó mɛ nkwɔ.
43012046	Ntwɔ fá amɨk mbɔ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ánókó mɛ, ákɛ́ rɔp amɛm ɛjuri.
43012047	Mmu anɛ ághókó ɛyɔŋ ɛya kɛ yi kɛkʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yí ághókó, mpú táŋ yí. Mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ fá amɨk bɛ́táŋ bo, ntwɔ chi bɛpɛmɛ bho.
43012048	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chí ɛnɛ ɛ́taŋ mmu anɛ ábyak mɛ, yi kɛnókó ɛyɔŋ ɛya. Chɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndɛ́mɛ́ mɛntaŋ yi ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn bátaŋ bo.
43012049	Ɛbhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n ndɛ́mɛ́, mbɨ́kɨ́ rɛm chí ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbha. Ɛtaya mmu átó mɛ kɛ ághátí mɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́rɛm.
43012050	Nɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛnɛ yí áchyɛ́ mbɔ ɛbhé ɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m yɛ chí ɛnɛ́ Ɛta ágháti mɛ ndɛm.”
43013001	Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ ɛ́pɛ́rɛ ghaka, Yesu arɨŋɨ bɛ mpok akway anɛ yi árɔ mmɨk, ampɛtnsɛm ntá ɛtayi. Ndǔ yi ákɔ́ŋ nyaka bǒbhi fá amɨk, nɛ́nɛ atɔ́ŋ bɛ́ akɔŋ bɔ acha.
43013002	Mpok Yesu áchɔ́kɔ́, ányìɛ nɛnyíɛ́, běku nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi. Satan anáŋ achwe nyaka antí Júdas, mmɔ̌ Símun Iskariɔt, ndu bɛkʉ yi ántí Yesu.
43013003	Yesu arɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ ɛtayi achyɛ yi bɛtaŋ amfay mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm, nɛ bɛ́ yí afú chí ntá Mandɛm nɛ ǎpɛ̀tnsɛm ntá Mandɛm.
43013004	Mpok báchɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɔ, Yesu afaté, afɛrɛ ɛ́wɛt ɛyi amʉɛt, asɔt táwáy atɛ́m ɛbho.
43013005	Asɔt yɛ manyiɛp afyɛ́ ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ, abho bɛso bɛkak bakoŋo bhi, antɛsɛ nɔkɔ nɛ táwáy anɛ yi átɛ́mɛ́ ɛbho.
43013006	Áchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ntá Símun Píta, Píta arɛm bɛ, “Acha, ɔ̌yàŋ bɛso bɛkak ɛbha?”
43013007	Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Nɛ́nɛ, ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ntí anɛ mɛ̌kʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌kʉ̀, kɛ ansɛmpok chɔŋ ɔ́njwimɛm.”
43013008	Píta arɛm bɛ, “Ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛso mɛ bɛkak wáwák.” Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mbák mbɨ́kɨ́ so bɛkak ɛbhɛ, nɔ mɛmay nɛ wɔ sɛ́may.”
43013009	Píta arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ɔ́kɛ́ so chi ndiɛrɛ bɛkak ɛbha, sǒ amɔ́ ya nɛ ntí wa nkwɔ!”
43013010	Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Mmǔ anɛ ánáŋ ásó mmʉɛt, abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛso mmʉɛt, ɛbhɨkɨ fʉɛt bɛkak ɛbhi, mbɔnyunɛ mmʉɛt nkɛm achi pɛ́pɛ́p. Nɛ bǎchi pɛ́pɛ́p, kɛ puyɛ̌ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka.”
43013011	Yesu anáŋ arɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛti yi. Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, “Puyɛ̌ be mankɛm kɛ bǎchí pɛ́pɛ́p.”
43013012	Ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́só bɛkak ɛbhap, akɛmɛ nkú amʉɛt, apɛtnsɛm, arɔk, achɔkɔ amɨk. Abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎjwímɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nkʉ́ ntá yɛka?
43013013	Bǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ mɛ bɛ, ‘Ntɔŋ’ nɛ ‘Acha’ nɛ ɛ́chí tɛtɛp. Nchí Ntɔŋ nɛ Acha ntá yɛka.
43013014	Mbák mɛ, Acha nɛ Ntɔŋ aywɛka nsó bɛkak ɛbhɛka, be nkwɔ bǎbhɔŋ bɛso bɛkak batɨ!
43013015	Ntɔ̌ŋ be chi ɛrɨŋ bɛ be nkwɔ mǎnkʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ nkʉ.
43013016	Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mǔbɛtok apú cha chi-bɛtok aywi, nɛ mǔnto apú cha mmǔ anɛ átó yi.
43013017	Nɛ́nɛ, bǎrɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn. Chɔŋ ɛndɨ ntá yɛka ɛncha mbák bǎkʉ̀ bhɔ.
43013018	Mpú rɛm chi ɛ̌ti yɛka mankɛm, ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bo abhɛn njábhɛ́. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́ghàti bhɛsɛ ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛ́fú kpoŋoroŋ mbɔ ɛnyu basɨŋɨ bɛ, ‘Anɛ ányíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ mɛ ǎti chɔŋ mɛ.’
43013019	Nchí ghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ́nɛ ndu bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re fakari, bɛ́ mɛ́náŋ mɛ́mfákárí, mǎnókó bɛ, ‘Nchí mmu nchí’ mpoknkɛm.”
43013020	Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, “Mmǔ anɛ ásɔ̀t yɛ̌ agha anɛ ntó sayri, ǎsɔt mɛ. Nɛ mmǔ anɛ ásɔ́rɛ́ mɛ́ sayri, ǎsɔt mmǔ anɛ átó mɛ.”
43013021	Yesu árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, ntɨ nɛ́ré sɔŋɔri yi amɛm, arɛm kpoŋoroŋ bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mmu ywɛka amɔt ǎtí chɔŋ mɛ.”
43013022	Bakoŋo bhi bábhó bɛyɨŋɨ batɨ, kɛrɨŋɨ mmu anɛ Yesu árɛ̀m nɔ ɛ̌ti yi.
43013023	Nkoŋo anɛ Yesu ákɔ́ŋɔ́ tontó abhak chɔ́kɔ́ kɛkwɔt nɛ yi.
43013024	Símun Píta amak yi nɛ awɔ arɛm bɛ, “Ghatí bhɛ́sɛ́ mmu anɛ ɔ́rɛ̀m nɔ ɛ̌ti yi.”
43013025	Nkoŋo wu akokosi mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Acha, chí agha?”
43013026	Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Chi mmu anɛ mɛ̌tap chɔŋ brɛt anɛ amɛm nchán nnok nchyɛ́ yí.” Yesu asɔt yɛ ɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt atap ndǔ nnok, achyɛ Júdas, mmɔ̌ Símun Iskariɔt.
43013027	Nɛsɔt Júdas ásɔ́rɛ́ brɛt wu, Satan akó yi anti. Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ chɔŋti mpok bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́yàŋ bɛkʉ.”
43013028	Bakoŋo Yesu báchák kɛrɨŋɨ ntí anɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ ntá Júdas.
43013029	Tɛ̌ndu Júdas kɛ ákɛm nyaka ɛbhǎ nkáp, mbɔk ɛyap báré kaysi bɛ Yesu ǎghàti yi chi bɛ ándɔ́k, ánkú mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ básɔt mɛnyiɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ. Báchák bákáysi bɛ Yesu ato yi ándɔ́k ánchyɛ́ nkáp ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho.
43013030	Júdas ásɔ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt ɛyɔ, afú nɛfí tɛ́mté. Nɛ bɛti bɛ́gʉ́.
43013031	Júdas áfú nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Nɛ́nɛ, chɔŋ bo mángɔ́ ndu báchyɛ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm kɛnoko, nɛ bɛfʉɛt ntá yi mángɔ ndu bachyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó.
43013032	Mbák Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm ákʉ̀ mánchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó, mbɔ̌ŋ Mandɛm ǎkʉ̀ bo mánchyɛ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá yi kɛnókó, nɛ chɔŋ ankʉ nɔ tɛ́mté.
43013033	Bɔ̌bha, mpú pɛrɛ tat nɛ bhe. Chɔŋ mǎnjáŋ mɛ, kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ngátí nyaka bǒbati bo Israɛl, nchí ghati bhe nɛ́nɛ bɛ, ‘Ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ, bǎpú kwáy bɛ́twɔ arɛ́’.
43013034	Nchí chyɛ be ɛbhé ɛkɔ. Kɔŋ ka batɨ mbɔnyu nkɔ́ŋ be. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ̌ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkɔŋ batɨ.
43013035	Mbák mǎnkɔ́ŋ batɨ, chɔŋ ɛ́nkʉ bǒ mankɛm mándɨŋɨ bɛ bǎchí bakoŋo bha.”
43013036	Símun Píta abhɛp Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ɔ̌rɔ̀ŋ fá?” Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ, ɔpú kway bɛ́twɔ arɛ́ nɛ́nɛ, kɛ chɔŋ ɔ́nkoŋo mɛ arɛ́ ansɛmpok.”
43013037	Píta arɛm bɛ, “Acha, ndáká yí mpú kwáy bɛ́kóŋo wɔ nɛ́nɛ? Yɛ̌ chí nɛwú, nká bɛ́gu ɛ̌ti yɛ.”
43013038	Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɔbhɛ́ yɛ̌ chí nɛwú ɔká bɛ́gu ɛ̌ti ya? Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, nkɔk apɛrɛ́ kok nkúbhɛ́ bɛti ɛbhɛn, chɔŋ ɔ́ndɛm ndɔŋ ɛ́rát bɛ ɔbhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ mɛ.”
43014001	Yesu aghati baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ rɔ batɨ ánsɔ́ŋɔ́rí be amɛm. Sɨkɨ́ ká ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm, mǎnsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ mɛnkwɔ.
43014002	Ɛkɛt Ɛtaya ɛbhɔŋ bɛyǎ bɔ̌bɛkɛt. Mbɔ ɛ́pú nɔ, mbʉ mbɨ́kɨ́ ghati bhe bɛ nchí rɔ́ŋ arɛ́ bɛ́tóŋti ɛbhak ntá yɛka.
43014003	Nɛ nnáŋ, ndɔ́k, ngókó ɛbhak mbʉrɛ́, ntá yɛka chɔŋ mpɛtnsɛm, nsɔt be, bɛ́ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ nchí, bě nkwɔ mambák arɛ.
43014004	Bǎrɨŋɨ mbi anɛ árɔ̀ŋ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ.”
43014005	Tɔmás arɛm ntá Yesu bɛ, “Acha, sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɔ́rɔ̀ŋ, ná sɛ́kwày bɛrɨŋɨ mbi?”
43014006	Yesu aghati yi bɛ, “Mɛ kɛ nchí mbi, mɛ kɛ nchí tɛtɛp, mɛ kɛ nchí nɛpɛ́m. Yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛ́twɔ ntá Ɛta ɛnɛ́ ábhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛt ntá ya.
43014007	Mbɔ bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ́ tɛtɛp, mbʉ́ bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ Ɛtaya nkwɔ́. Nɛbho nɛ́nɛ, bǎrɨŋɨ yí nɛ mǎnáŋ bǎghɔ́ yí.”
43014008	Fílip arɛm bɛ, “Acha, tɔ́ŋ bhɛ́sɛ́ mbɔŋ ɛtayɛ. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák ɛnɛ sɛ́yàŋ ɛ́pú.”
43014009	Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Fílip, mpok anɛ nkɛm nchí nɛ bhe, yɛ̌ nɔ, ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛ? Mmu ángɔ́ mɛ nɔ́ aghɔ Ɛtaya nkwɔ. Ná ɔ́rɛ̀m yɛ bɛ, ‘Tɔ́ŋ bhɛsɛ́ ɛtayɛ?’
43014010	Ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ noko bɛ nchí babhát nɛ Ɛtaya nɛ Ɛtaya achi babhat nɛ mɛ? Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́ghàti bhe, mpú kʉ nɔ chi ndǔ mmʉɛ́t ɛya. Ɛtaya mmu achí babhat nɛ mɛ ǎkʉ̀ bɛtɨk ɛbhi.
43014011	Nokó ka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ngátí bhe bɛ́ nchí babhat nɛ Ɛtaya nɛ Ɛtaya achi babhat nɛ mɛ. Mbák bápú kway mɛnoko mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌rɛ̀m, nokó ká ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀.”
43014012	Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, “Mmu anɛ asɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ mɛ, ǎkway bɛ́kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀. Ǎkwáy bɛ́kʉ yɛ̌ chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chá ɛbhɛn, mbɔnyunɛ mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ ntá Ɛtaya.
43014013	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɛ́bhɛ́ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna, chɔŋ nkʉ yɔ́ bɛ́ bo mángɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmɔ́ ákʉ̀ nɛ mánchyɛ Ɛta kɛnókó ɛ̌ti Mɔ́ywi.
43014014	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bábhɛ́bhɛ́ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna, chɔŋ nkʉ yɔ nta yɛka.”
43014015	Yesu apɛt aghati baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Mbák bǎkɔŋ mɛ, bʉrɛ́ ká ɛyɔŋ ɛbha.
43014016	Mbák bǎkʉ̀ nɔ, chɔŋ nnɨk Ɛtaya mmʉɛt, nɛ yi anchyɛ bhe Nkwak achak, yi ambák nɛ bhe mpoknkɛm.
43014017	Yí chí Ɛfóŋó ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ bo mándɨ́ŋɨ́ barak anɛ tɛtɛp. Bǒ mmɨk bápú kway bɛsɔt yi nɛ maŋák mbɔnyunɛ bápú kway bɛghɔ yi, nɛ bapu kway bɛrɨŋɨ yí. Kɛ chɔŋ mǎndɨ̀ŋɨ yi mbɔnyunɛ ǎbhák chɔŋ nɛ bhe, nɛ amɛm batɨ yɛka.”
43014018	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Nnáŋ ndɔ́k, mpú rɔ mǎmbák mbɔ bɔ̌bɛrǎ. Chɔŋ mpɛtnsɛm ntá yɛka.
43014019	Mandú mpok, bǒ mmɨk bápú pɛrɛ ghɔ́ mɛ kɛ bǎghɔ́ chɔŋ mɛ. Nɛ tɛ̌ndu mpɛt nchi bhak chɔŋ nɛpɛ́m, chɔŋ bě nkwɔ mǎmpɛt mǎmbak nɛpɛ́m.
43014020	Ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɔ, chɔŋ mǎndɨŋɨ bɛ́ nchí babhat nɛ Ɛtaya, nɛ bǎchi babhat nɛ mɛ, nɛ nchí babhat nɛ bhe.
43014021	Mmu anɛ ághòk ɛnyɨŋ mɛ̌rɛ̀m ánkʉ mbɔ ɛnyu yi ághókó, yi kɛ áchí mmu anɛ ákɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ. Nɛ Ɛtaya akɔŋ mmu anɛ akɔŋ mɛ. Mɛnkwɔ́ nchí kɔŋ bɛ yi ántwɔ́ ntá yi, nkʉ yí ándɨŋɨ mɛ.”
43014022	Júdas, [anɛ áchí kɛkúrí nɛ Júdas Iskariɔt] abhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ndaká yí ɔ́twɔ̀ chɔŋ chi ntá yɛsɛ bakoŋo bhɛ bɛ́kʉ sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ, kɛbhák bɛ́ ɔ̌kʉ nɔ chi ntá bǒ mmɨk bachak?”
43014023	Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mmu anɛ ákɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ, ǎbhʉ̀rɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛya. Ɛtaya ǎkɔ̀ŋ yi. Nɛ mɛ, nɛ Ɛtaya sɛ́ntwɔ sɛnchɔkɔ nɛ yi.
43014024	Mmǔ anɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ mɛ, apú bhʉɛrɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛya. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bǎghoko mɛ ntɔ́ŋɔ́, bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fu ntá ya. Bɛ́fu chi ntá Ɛtaya mmu átó mɛ.
43014025	“Ngátí bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɛnɛ́ mbʉɛ́t nɛ bhe.
43014026	Kɛ Ɛta ǎtò chɔŋ Nkwak ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna. Yí wu chi Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ. Ánáŋ ántwɔ́, chɔŋ antɔŋ be yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, ankwak be mǎntɨk mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn ngáti bhe.
43014027	Nchí rɔ kpák ámbák nɛ bhe. Nchí chyɛ bhe kpák anɛ áfù ntá ya. Puyɛ̌ ɛnyǔ mmɨk áchyɛ̀ bho kpák kɛ̌ mɛ̌chyɛ. Bǎkɛ rɔ batɨ ánsɔ́ŋɔ́rí bhe amɛm, nɛ bǎkɛ rɔ bɛcháy mɛ́mbak amɛm batɨ yɛka.
43014028	Bǎghok ndu ngátí bhe bɛ, ‘Mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ, kɛ chɔŋ mpɛtnsɛm ntá yɛká.’ Mbɔ bǎkɔ̀ŋ mɛ mbʉ bǎbhɔŋ maŋák bɛ́ mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ ntá Ɛtaya, mbɔnyunɛ Ɛtaya acha mɛ.
43014029	Ngátí nɔ́ bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ́nɛ ɛnɛ́ bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re fakari, nɛ ntí bɛ mɛ́náŋ mɛ́mfákárí, mǎnókó.
43014030	Mpú pɛrɛ ghati bhe bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔnyunɛ mfɔ mmɨk ǎtwɔ̀. Abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay ya.
43014031	Kɛ nchí kʉ chí mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛtaya ághátí mɛ, bɛ́ bǒ mmɨk mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ nkɔŋ yi. Faté ká sɛ́ndɔ́k.”
43015001	Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mɛ kɛ nchí mbɔ̌ŋ nnɛrɛ́nɔk, nɛ Ɛtaya achi nkwaŋankɨ.
43015002	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ntábhɛ́nɔk awa anɛ́ ápú nyu kɛpɛm, Ɛtaya ǎkpɔt angʉɛp. Nɛ ntábhɛ́nɔk anɛ ányù kɛpɛm, ǎkpɔti batap rɔrɔt amfɛrɛ bɛ́ wú ányú kɛpɛm ancha ɛnyu ɛsɨ́.
43015003	Bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛ́n ngátí bhe bɛ́kʉ bǎchí pɛ́pɛ́p.
43015004	Bat yɛ ka mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ mpoknkɛm, bɛ́ mɛnkwɔ mbát mmʉɛt nɛ bhe. Mbák ntabhɛ́nɔk ápú babhát ndǔ ɛnɔk, ápú nyu kɛpɛm. Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛchi nɛ bhe. Mbák mmǔ abhɨ́kɨ́ bhat mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ, apú kwáy mɛ́nyú kɛpɛm.
43015005	Mɛ kɛ nchí nnɛrɛ́nɔk. Bǎchí batáp. Mmu anɛ achí babhat nɛ mɛ mpoknkɛm, mɛnkwɔ́ mbak babhát nɛ yi, yí wu kɛ ányù bɛyǎ kɛpɛm. Mbák mpú nɛ bhe, bǎpú kway bɛkʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
43015006	Mbák mmu apú babhát nɛ mɛ, ǎbhák mbɔ ntábhɛ́nɔk anɛ́ bákpɔ́t báfɛ́rɛ́, ágú. Mányókóti mɛnyǔ batap ayɔ mámɛsɛ ango, ánsɔŋɔ.
43015007	Mbák mǎndɔk ambɨ bɛbhat mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ, nɛ bɛyɔŋ ɛbha mɛ́mbak amɛm batɨ yɛka, nchí chyɛ bhe yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ babhɛbhɛ mɛ.
43015008	Ndǔ mǎnyú bɛyǎ kɛpɛm, bǎtɔŋ bɛ bǎchí bakoŋo bha, nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ bo mánchyɛ Ɛtaya kɛnókó.
43015009	Mbɔ ɛnyu Ɛtaya ákɔ́ŋ mɛ, nɔ́ kɛ nkɔ́ŋɔ́ bhe. Bat ka mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ bɛ́ ɛkɔŋ ɛya ɛ́mbák amɛm batɨ yɛka mpoknkɛm.
43015010	Mbák mǎndɔk ambɨ bɛbhʉrɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛya, mpú rɔ bɛkɔŋ be nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ nchí bhʉɛrɛ Ɛyɔŋ Ɛtaya nɛ yi akɔŋ mɛ mpoknkɛm.
43015011	Ngátí bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ maŋák ama ámbák nɛ bhe, nɛ bɛ maŋák amɛka anjwi pɔɔt.
43015012	“Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nchí ghati bhe chi bɛ mankɔ́ŋ batɨ mbɔnyu nkɔ́ŋ be.
43015013	Ɛkɔŋ ɛchak ɛ́pú ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chá ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ́ mmu ánchyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛ̌ti mamʉɛrɛ bhi.
43015014	Bǎbhak mamʉɛrɛ bha mbák bǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ngátí bhe.
43015015	Mpú pɛrɛ bhɨŋɨ be bɛ́ bɔ̌bɛtok, mbɔnyunɛ mmɔ̌bɛtok apu rɨŋɨ nkaysi chi-bɛtɨk ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ̀. Mbɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe bɛ́ mamʉɛrɛ bha mbɔnyunɛ ngátí bé mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n ngókó ntá Ɛtaya mɛnkɛm.
43015016	Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ yap mɛ, mɛ kɛ njábhɛ́ bhe ntó bɛ́ mǎndɔ́k mǎnyú kɛpɛm, nɛ bɛ́ kɛpɛm ɛkɛka kɛ́mbák mpoknkɛm. Kʉ ka nɔ́ bɛ Ɛtaya ánchyɛ́ bhe yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɛbhɛ yi ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna.
43015017	Ɛnɛ kɛ nchí ghati bhe bɛ mǎnkɔ́ŋ batɨ.”
43015018	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Mbák bǒ mmɨk bápap bhe, dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ báyambɨ bápap mɛ.
43015019	Mbɔ bǎchí bǒ mmɨk, mbʉ́ mmɨk akɔŋ be nɛ ntí bɛ́ bǎchí bo bhi. Kɛ ndǔ njábhɛ́ bhe mfɛ́rɛ́ nɛ́ntɨ bǒ mmɨk, ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ bápábhɛ́ be.
43015020	Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ngátí nyaka bhe bɛ ‘Mmǔ bɛtok apú cha chi-bɛtok aywi.’ Mbák bǒ mmɨk báchyɛ́ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔri, chɔŋ mánchyɛ be nkwɔ́ ɛsɔŋɔri. Mbɔ bábhʉ́rɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ngátí bhɔ, mbʉ́ chɔŋ mámbʉrɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ be nkwɔ bǎghàti bhɔ.
43015021	Báchyɛ̀ chɔŋ be bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm ɛ̌ti bǎkoŋo mɛ, mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mmu anɛ átó mɛ fá amɨk.
43015022	Mbɔ mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ́ ngátí bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ, mbʉ bákwáy bɛtaŋa mmʉɛt bɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ bɛbʉ́. Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, bápú kway bɛtaŋa bɛ babhɨkɨ kʉ bɛbʉ́.
43015023	Mmu anɛ ápábhɛ́ mɛ, apap Ɛtaya nkwɔ́.
43015024	Mbɔ mbɨ́kɨ́ kʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay bɛsí bhap ɛbhɛ́n yɛ̌ mmu áchák ábhɨ́kɨ́ re kʉ, mbʉ́ bákway bɛtaŋa mmʉɛt bɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ bɛbʉ́. Kɛ bághɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n nkʉ́, yɛ̌ nɔ bápàp mɛ, nɛ bápáp Ɛtaya.
43015025	Ɛchi ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́ghàti bhɛsɛ ɛmfu tɛtɛp, nɔ chi bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ ‘Bápap mɛ ntí tí.’
43015026	Kɛ Nkwak anɛ mɛ̌tò chɔŋ ntá yɛka, ǎfù chi ntá Ɛtaya. Chɔŋ yi angati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti ya mbɔ ntísiɛ awa. Yi chí Ɛfóŋó mmu ákʉ̀ bo mandɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp.
43015027	Bě nkwɔ́ bǎchí batísiɛ́ bha mbɔnyunɛ bachí nɛ mɛ tɛ̌ndu nɛbhǒnɛt.”
43016001	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Ngátí bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ kwɛn ansɛm.
43016002	Chɔŋ mámbok bhé ndǔ bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛbhap. Mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ áwày bhe, akaysi bɛ́ ǎkʉ̀ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ.
43016003	Báchyɛ̀ chɔŋ be bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn, mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Ɛtaya nɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛ.
43016004	(a) Kɛ ngáti bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́ mpok anaŋ ánkwáy anɛ bɔ bɛ́fàkari, mǎntɨk bɛ nnáŋ ngátí bhe. (b) “Mbɨ́kɨ́ ghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mpok bǎhó bɛkoŋo mɛ mbɔnyunɛ nchí nyaka nɛ bhe.
43016005	Kɛ nɛ́nɛ nchí pɛtnsɛm ntá mmu anɛ átó mɛ, Yɛ̌ nɔ, yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɛp mɛ bɛ, ‘Ɔ̌rɔ̀ŋ fá?’
43016006	Batɨ ayɛka ájwí nɛ́nɛ nɛ basɛ́mɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ ngátí bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn.
43016007	Yɛ̌ ndu ɛchi nɔ, nchí ghati bhe ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi tɛtɛp. Ɛ́rɨ ntá yɛka bɛ́ ndɔ́k mbɔnyunɛ mbák mbɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ, Nkwak apú twɔ́ ntá yɛka. Kɛ mbák ndɔ́k, chɔŋ ntó yi ntá yɛka.
43016008	Nɛ ánáŋ ántwɔ́, chɔŋ ankʉ bǒ mmɨk mangɔ bɛ báchí bǒ bɛbʉ́, mángɔ bɛ mɛ nchí chak bɛsí Mandɛm, nɛ mangɔ bɛ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛchi nɛ bhɔ ndǔ nɛtaŋ anɛ bɔ bátàŋ mɛ.
43016009	Ǎkʉ bɔ mangɔ bɛ bachi bǒ bɛbʉ́ mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko mɛ.
43016010	Ǎkʉ bɔ mangɔ bɛ nchí chak bɛsí Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ ntá Ɛtaya nɛ bǎpú pɛrɛ ghɔ́ chɔ́ŋ mɛ.
43016011	Ǎkʉ mángɔ́ bɛ chɔŋ mántáŋ bǒ bɛbʉ́ ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm átáŋ mfɔ mmɨk, afɛrɛ yi ndǔ kɛfɔ ɛki.
43016012	“Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ bɛghati bhe, kɛ mbák ngátí bhe bɔ mɛnkɛm nɛ́nɛ, bǎpú kway bɛ́jwimɛm.
43016013	Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ kɛ ákʉ̀ chɔŋ bo mándɨŋɨ tɛtɛp nkɛm anɛ áyɨ́ŋɨ́ Mandɛm. Anaŋ ántwɔ́ chɔŋ ankʉ mǎndɨŋɨ tɛtɛp nkɛm, mbɔnyunɛ ápú rɛm chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú yi antɨ. Ɛnɛ́ yi aghoko kɛ árɛ̀m, nɛ chɔŋ angati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ ambɨ.
43016014	Chɔŋ anchyɛ mɛ kɛnókó mbɔnyunɛ ǎsɔ̀t chɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá ya, angati bhe.
43016015	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ Ɛtaya chi ɛya nkwɔ. Nɔ́ kɛ ngátí bhe bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ághàti chɔŋ bhe, ǎsɔt chi ntá ya.”
43016016	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛghati baghɔkɔ́ bhi bɛ, “Mandu mpok, bǎpú pɛrɛ ghɔ mɛ. Kɛ mandú mpok, chɔŋ mǎmpɛt mǎngɔ mɛ.”
43016017	Mbɔk baghɔkɔ́ bhi báré rɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Ɛnɛ́ yí árɛ̀m nɔ chí yí. Yí bhɛ mandú mpok, sɛ́pú pɛrɛ ghɔ́ yí, nɛ mandú mpok chɔŋ sɛ́mpɛt sɛ́ngɔ́ yi. Apɛt arɛm bɛ chi mbɔnyunɛ yí ǎrɔŋ ntá ɛtayi. Nɔ́ bɛ́ yí?”
43016018	Bápɛt báré rɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Yi bɛ́ ‘Mandu mpok’, mandú mpok, nɔ bɛ́ yi?” Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ jwimɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́.
43016019	Yesu arɨŋɨ bɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi báyàŋ bɛbhɛp yi ɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti ndak anɛ. Arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Ngátí bhe bɛ mandú mpok, bǎpú pɛrɛ ghɔ́ mɛ, kɛ mandú mpok chɔŋ mǎmpɛt mǎngɔ́ mɛ. Yɔ́ kɛ ɛ́sɔŋɔri nɛ́ bhe?
43016020	Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, chɔŋ mǎndi babhɛsɛ ansɛp nɔkɔ amɨ́k nɛ mámbɔŋ basɛ́mɛ́, kɛ bǒ mmɨk mámbɔŋ maŋák. Chɔŋ mǎmbɔ́ŋ basɛ́mɛ́ kɛ basɛ́mɛ́ amɛka anjibhiri andɔp chí maŋák.
43016021	Mpok ngɔrɛ́ nɛ mɛniɛ ánòŋsi, ǎbhɔ́ŋ basɛ́mɛ́ antɨ mbɔnyunɛ mpok nɛbhe akway. Kɛ ánáŋ ámbé, maŋák ǎbhák nɛ yi bɛ mɔ́nkɔ átwɔ́ fá amɨk. Ɛ́nkʉ angɔkɔntɨk bɛbě nɛbhe.
43016022	Nɔ́, kɛ ɛ́chi nɛ be nkwɔ́. Nɛ́nɛ basɛ́mɛ́ ajwí be antɨ, kɛ chɔŋ mpɛt ngɔ́ bhe, nɛ mpok yɔ chɔŋ mǎmbɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ maŋák, nɛ yɛ̌ mmú apu kway bɛfɛrɛ mɔ́ amɛm batɨ ayɛka.
43016023	Ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɔ, bapú pɛrɛ bhɛ́p mɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mbák mǎmbɛp Ɛtaya yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna, ǎchyɛ bhe.
43016024	Kpátɛ̌ ɛchɔŋ, bǎbhɨkɨ re bhɛ́p Ɛtaya yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna. Bɛ́p ká, nɛ chɔŋ anchyɛ be bɛ maŋák amɛka anjwi pɔɔt.”
43016025	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Mpok anɛ nkɛm, ngátí bhe barak anɛ chí ndǔ bakay. Kɛ mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ mpú pɛrɛ ghati be mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ bakay. Mpok yɔ ánkwáy, ndɔbhɛ ghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti Ɛtaya chi kpoŋoroŋ.
43016026	Mpok yɔ, chɔŋ mǎmbɛp Ɛtaya mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna. Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɛm bɛ chɔŋ nɨkmʉɛt ntá yi bɛ ánchyɛ́ bhe ɛnyɨŋ.
43016027	Mbɔŋ Ɛta akɔŋ be mbɔnyunɛ bǎkɔŋ mɛ, nɛ mǎnókó bɛ mfu chí ntá yi.
43016028	Mfú chí ntá Ɛta kɛ nchí twɔ fá amɨk. Nɛ́nɛ, nchí rɔ mmɨk, nchí pɛtnsɛm ntá Ɛta.”
43016029	Baghɔk abhi barɛm yɛ ntá yi bɛ, “Mhm! Nɛ́nɛ ɔ̌rɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ kpoŋoroŋ nɛ sɛ́jwimɛm. Ɔpú pɛrɛ rɛm kɛpɨ ndǔ bakay!”
43016030	Nɛ́nɛ, sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ antɨ bɛbhɛp wɔ. Ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ sɛ́nókó bɛ́ ɔfu chí ntá Mandɛm.
43016031	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mǎnókó nɛ́nɛ?
43016032	Mpok ǎtwɔ̀, tɛtɛp anáŋ atwɔ, anɛ bǎtaka chɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu andɔk ɛyi ɛbhak mǎndɔ mɛ awánti. Kɛ sayri sayri, mpú mɛ awánti mbɔnyunɛ, Ɛta achi nɛ mɛ.
43016033	Ngátí bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ mǎmbát mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ kpák amɛm batɨ ayɛka. Chɔŋ mǎmbɔŋ bɛsɔŋɔri fá amɨk, kɛ bɔ́ŋ ká nɛtaŋántɨ́, nnáŋ mfɔ́kɔ́rí mmɨk.”
43017001	Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, ayoŋ amɨ́k ayɨŋɨ mfay, arɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, mpok akway. Chiɛ́ Mɔ́ywɛ kɛnɛ́m bɛ ɛ̌ti ya bo mángɔ́ kɛnɛ́m ɛkɛ.
43017002	Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ́ bɛtaŋ amfay bǒ mankɛm bɛ́ nkʉ mankɛm abhɛn ɔ́chɛ́ mɛ mambɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
43017003	Nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti, chí bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ, wɔ mmu ɔ́chí Mandɛm tɛtɛp nɛ achák apu nɛ bɛrɨŋɨ Yesu Kristo mmu ɔ́tó.
43017004	Nkʉ bo mángɔ́ kɛnɛ́m ɛkɛ ndu nnáŋá bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ.
43017005	Ɛta, nɛ́nɛ sɔt mɛ mbak nɛ wɔ, ɔ́nchyɛ mɛ kɛnɛ́m bɛsí ɛbhɛ, nkúbhɛ́ kɛnɛ́m ɛkɛn mbɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka nɛ wɔ kɛ ɔ̌ghoko mmɨk.
43017006	“Nkʉ bo mándɨ́ŋɔ́ wɔ, bo abhɛn ɔ́yábhɛ́ fá amɨk ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ. Báchí bǒ bhɛ, nɛ wɔ kɛ ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ bhɔ. Bábhʉ́rɛ́ ɛyɔŋ ɛyɛ.
43017007	Nɛ́nɛ bárɨŋɨ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́, ɛ́fú chí ntá yɛ.
43017008	Ngátí bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ bɛ ngati bhɔ. Báká nɛ mɛ, nɛ bárɨŋɨ yɛ tɛtɛp bɛ mfu chí ntá yɛ. Mánoko nkwɔ bɛ wɔ kɛ ɔ́tó mɛ.
43017009	Nchí nɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yap. Mpú nɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti mmɨk nkɛm. Nchí nɨkmʉɛt chi ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ bɔ́ báchí bǒ bhɛ.
43017010	Bǒbha mankɛm chí abhɛ, nɛ abhɛ chí abha. Nɛ bɔ́ kɛ̌ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap nɛ́kù bo mángɔ́ kɛnókó ɛka.
43017011	Nɛ́nɛ, mpɛt mpú fá amɨk, kɛ bɔ́ bábhʉɛ́t arɛ. Nchí twɔ ntá yɛ. Ɛta! Wɔmbɔŋ mmú ɔ́chí Nyáŋá, kɛ́m bɔ̌ nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛ, bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛ́n ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ bɛ mambak mbɔ mmu amɔt, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ wɔ nɛ mɛ sɛchi mmu amɔt.
43017012	Mpok nchí nɛ bhɔ, nkɛ́m bɔ sayri nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna, nnyɛ́n ɛnɛn ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ. Nkɛm bɔ́, nɛ yɛ̌ mmu wap amɔt abhɨkɨ nɛm ɛbhɨ, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛt chí anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka mɛ́nɛm, bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ́mfú tɛtɛp.
43017013	Nɛ́nɛ, nchí twɔ ntá yɛ, nɛ nchí rɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndǔ mpok mbʉɛ́t fá amɨk, bɛ́ maŋák ama ámbák nɛ bhɔ.
43017014	Ngátí bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ ngati bhɔ. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, mmɨk apap bhɔ mbɔnyunɛ bápú bǒ mmɨk anɛ, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mpú mmǔ mmɨk.
43017015	Mpú nɨkmʉɛt bɛ́ ɔ́mfɛ́rɛ́ bhɔ fá amɨk, kɛ chí bɛ́ ɔ́nkɛ́m bɔ́ bɛ mbʉ́mbʉ ákɛ́ kʉ bhɔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
43017016	Bápú bǒ mmɨk nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mpú mmǔ mmɨk.
43017017	Sɔt tɛtɛp kʉ bɔ́ mámbák nyáŋá. Ɛyɔŋ ɛyɛ ɛchi tɛtɛp.
43017018	Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɔ́tó mɛ fá amɨk, nɔ́ kɛ̌ nchí to bhɔ amɨk.
43017019	Nɛ ɛ̌ti yap, nchyɛ́ mmʉɛt ntá yɛ bɛbhak nyáŋá bɛ́ bɔ́ nkwɔ́ mankway bɛbhak nyáŋá tɛtɛp.
43017020	“Mpú nɨkmʉɛt chi ɛ̌ti bakoŋo abhɛn bɔ́bhɔ, kɛ ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn bághòk mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bátɔ̀ŋ, mánsɨkɨntɨ nɛ mɛ nkwɔ.
43017021	Nchí nɨkmʉɛt bɛ́ bɔ́ mankɛm mámbák mbɔ mmu amɔt. Ɛtaya, mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɔ́bhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ nɛ mbát mmʉɛt nɛ wɔ, bɔ́ nkwɔ mámbát mmʉɛt nɛ bhɛsɛ bɛ́ mmɨk ánkwáy mɛ́nóko bɛ wɔ kɛ ɔ́tó mɛ tɛtɛp.
43017022	Nchyɛ́ bhɔ́ nkúbhɛ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ, bɛ́ bɔ́ mámbák mmu amɔt, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ wɔ nɛ mɛ sɛchi.
43017023	Chɔŋ mbak nɛ bhɔ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɔ́chí nɛ mɛ, bɛ sayri sayri, mándɔp chi mmu amɔt, bɛ́ mmɨk ankway bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ wɔ kɛ ɔ́tó mɛ, nɛ bɛ́ ɔkɔŋ bɔ́ mbɔnyu ɔ́kɔ́ŋ mɛ.
43017024	Ɛta, mɛ̌yáŋ bɛ bɔ́ nkwɔ, bǒ ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ mámbák nɛ mɛ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mɛnchí, bɛ́ mángɔ́ kɛnókó ɛkɛn ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ ɔkɔŋ mɛ tɛ mpok ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re ghoko mmɨk.
43017025	Ɛta, wɔ mmu ɔ́chí chak, bǒ mmɨk bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ wɔ, kɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ, nɛ nkwɔ wa anɛ bárɨŋɨ bɛ́ wɔ kɛ ɔ́tó mɛ.
43017026	Nkʉ bɔ́ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ́, nɛ chɔŋ ndɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ nɔ, bɛ bɔ mankɔŋ batɨ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔnyu ɔ́kɔ́ŋ mɛ, nɛ bɛ mɛ́mbák amɛm batɨ ayap.”
43018001	Yesu ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnɨkmʉɛt ɛnyu ɛyɔ, afa nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi, bákɨŋɨ mɔ́nyɛn anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Kídrɔn. Mɔ́nkɨ áchí nyaka arɛ anɛ yí achwe amɛm nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi.
43018002	Júdas mmu átí yi arɨŋɨ nkwɔ ɛbhak ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ Yesu nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi bátɛmɛri nɔkɔ nyaka arɛ.
43018003	Júdas asɔt ɛká batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nɛ mbɔk babhabhɛri abhɛn ɛkɛrákap abhɛn bǒbati bachiǎkap nɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bátó. Bɔ́ mankɛm barɔk arɛ nɛ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛnu amɔ.
43018004	Yesu arɨŋɨ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́fákári nɛ yí. Afú ndǔ nkwɔ́ baghɔkɔ́ bhi, atɛ́n mmʉɛt ambɨ arɛm bɛ, “Agha bǎyáŋ?”
43018005	Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Yesu mmu Násárɛt.” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ghɔ́ mɛ́ nɛ.” Júdas mmu atí yi abhak arɛ́ téé nɛ bhɔ.
43018006	Mpok Yesu aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Ghɔ́ mɛ́ nɛ”, bárɔ́k nɛ nsɛm nɛ nsɛm bákwɛ́nti amɨk.
43018007	Yesu apɛt abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Aghǎ bǎyàŋ?” Bárɛ́m bɛ, “Yesu mmu Násárɛt.”
43018008	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ngátí bhe bɛ chi mɛ. Mbák yɛ mɛ kɛ bǎyàŋ, dɔ̌ ká bakoŋo bha abhɛn mandɔk.”
43018009	Arɛm nɔ, bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ, “Ndu bo abhɛn ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ nɛm yɛ amɔt,” ɛmfu tɛtɛp.
43018010	Símun Píta mmu achi nɛ akparɛnja amʉɛt, agwɔp akparɛnja wu ndǔ kɛ́nkwɔ́p, kpɔ́t atú nsɛm Mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm chwát agʉɛp amɨk. Nnyɛ́n nsɛm ɛrɛ nɛ́bhak bɛ Málkɔs.
43018011	Yesu aghati Píta bɛ, “Kɛmɛ́ akparɛnja ywɛ amɛm kɛ́nkwɔ́p. Nkɛ́ nyu nkɔ́p ɛsɔŋɔri anɛ Ɛta áchyɛ́ bɛ mɛ nyu kɛ?”
43018012	Mǔnti batɛmɛ́ nɛnu asɔt ɛká batɛmɛ́ nɛnu ɛyi, bárɔ́k, bákɛ́m Yesu bágwɔ́t. Babhabhɛrǐ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm bábhák nɛ bhɔ.
43018013	Báyámbɨ bárɔ́k ntá Ánas, chi ngɔrɛ́ Káyfas. Káyfas abhak mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm ndu mmiɛ ɛnɔ.
43018014	Yi kɛ áchyɛ́ nyaka maníɛ́ ntá bo Israɛl bɛ, “Ɛ́rɨ bɛ mmu amɔt ángú ɛ̌ti bo mankɛm.”
43018015	Símun Píta nɛ nkoŋo Yesu achák báré koŋo Yesu. Ndǔ nkoŋo Yesu achák wu achí mmǔ anɛ mǔngo bachiǎkap árɨŋɨ sayri, yí akoŋo Yesu kpát arɔk achwe amɛm sɛnta mǔngo bachiǎkap.
43018016	Píta ate nɛfí ndǔ nyǔ-ɛbhá. Ɛ́kʉ́ nkoŋo achák wu, anɛ mǔngo bachiǎkap árɨ́ŋɨ́ apɛtnsɛm nɛfí, arɛm kɛpɨ nɛ ngɔsɔ́ŋ anɛ áchí anyǔbhá. Asɔt yɛ Píta áchwé amɛm nɛ yi.
43018017	Ngɔsɔ́ŋ wu nɔ ábhàbhɛri nyǔ-ɛbhá abhɛ́p Píta bɛ, “Pú wɔ nkwɔ ɔchí nkoŋo mmǔ-nɛ?” Píta akɛmɛ bɛ, “Mpú nɛ yi.”
43018018	Mbʉ́ɛ́p áchí nyaka mpok yɔ. Ɛ́kʉ́ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhɛn mǔngo bachiǎkap nɛ babhabhɛrǐ ɛkɛrákap báfyɛ́ ngo ndu nntó bakiri, báté bághábhɛri mángwák nɔkɔ ngó wu. Píta nkwɔ arɔk ate nɛ bhɔ angwaka nɔkɔ ngo.
43018019	Mǔngo bachiǎkap abhɛ́p Yesu ɛ̌ti bakoŋo bhi nɛ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi átɔ̀ŋ bho.
43018020	Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ndɛm mɛnyɨŋ kpoŋoroŋ ntá bo mankɛm. Ntɔ́ŋ bo amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt nɛ amɛm ɛkɛrákap mpoknkɛm ndǔ mbaŋ ɛnɛ bo Israɛl báchɛ̀m arɛ. Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́.”
43018021	Ndak yí ɔ́bhɛ́p mɛ mɛnyɨŋ? Bɛ́p bo abhɛn bághókó mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndɛ́mɛ́. Bɛ́p bɔ́ mángátí wɔ. Bárɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndɛ́mɛ́.
43018022	Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, mbabhɛri ɛkɛrákap amɔt anɛ áchí arɛ́ téé, adɛp Yesu nɛ awɔ́ arɛm bɛ, “Kwáé, ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɔ́rɛ̀m kɛpɨ ntá mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm-ɛ?”
43018023	Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mbák ndɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pú chak, ghatí mɛ yɔ. Kɛ mbák ndɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak, ɔdɛp mɛ ndáká yí?”
43018024	Afɔ̌ kɛ Ánas átó Yesu nɛ ngɛm amɔ ntá Káyfas, mǔngo bachiǎkap.
43018025	Símun Píta abhʉɛ́t nyaka téé, angwaka nɔkɔ ngo. Mbɔk bo abhɛn bachi arɛ bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Pú wɔ nkwɔ́ ɔchí nkoŋo ywi?” Píta ataŋa, arɛm bɛ, “Cháá, mpú nɛ yi”
43018026	Mmɔ̌ bɛtok amɔt anɛ mǔngo bachiǎkap abhak arɛ́. Atú mɔ́mayi kɛ̌ Píta ákpɔ́rɛ́ nyaka. Yí wu abhɛ́p Píta bɛ, “Pú ngɔ̌ nyaka wɔ amɛm mɔ́nkɨ nɛ yi?”
43018027	Píta apɛt ataŋa. Tɛ́mté wu, nnɛ́m nkɔk akók kɔkɔrɔ́kɔ̌ɔ.
43018028	Básɔ́t yɛ Yesu ɛkɛt Káyfas betí beti bárɔk ndǔ sɛnta gɔ́bhanɔ nɛ yi. Gɔ́bhanɔ abhak mmǔ Rom. Babhɔŋɔ́ bo Israɛl kɛchwe ndu áchá gɔ́bhanɔ. Ɛbhé yap ɛ́rɛ̀m nyaka bɛ́ mbák mmu Israɛl ánchwé ɛkɛt mmu anɛ ápú mmu Israɛl, apú bhák pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm. Ndu báyàŋ nyaka mɛnyiɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ, bɔ́ kɛyaŋ bɛ́bhak nɛ bakwap bɛsí Mandɛm.
43018029	Ɛ́kʉ́ Páílet afú amɛm sɛnta ywi arɔk atɛmɛri bhɔ nɛfí, abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mmǔ-nɛ akʉ́?”
43018030	Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Mbɔ mmǔ nɛ apú nkʉ bɛbʉ́, mbʉ́ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ twɔ fá ntá yɛ nɛ yi.”
43018031	Páílet aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Sɔt ka yi bɛ bě babhɔŋ mǎntáŋ manyé yi bɛ́kóŋo ɛbhé ɛyɛka.” Bákɛ́mɛ Páílet bɛ, “Ɛbhé ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ bhɛsɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ́táŋ manyé mmu, kpát sɛ́nchyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mangway yi.”
43018032	Ɛ́fákári ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka ndu bɛtɔŋ ɛnyǔ nɛwú yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́gu ɛmfu tɛtɛp.
43018033	Páílet apɛt achwe amɛm áchá ywi. Abhɨŋɨ Yesu abhɛp yi bɛ, “Wɔ kɛ ɔ́chí Mfɔ bo Israɛl?”
43018034	Yesu akɛmɛ yí bɛ, “Ndak anɛ́ ɔ́bhɛ́bhɛ́ mɛ, áfu chi wɔmbɔ̌ŋ antɨ kɛ bo báchák kɛ̌ bágháti wɔ wu ɛ̌ti ya?”
43018035	Páílet akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ɔkáysí bɛ nchí mmu Israɛl? Bǒ ɛtɔk ɛyɛ nɛ bǒbati bachiǎkap Mandɛm kɛ bákɛ́m wɔ batwɔ ntá ya nɛ wɔ. Mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́kʉ́ chi yi?”
43018036	Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Kɛfɔ ɛka kɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fu fá amɨk. Mbɔ kɛfɔ ɛka kɛ́fu chi fá amɨk, mbʉ bǒbha mánú bɛ bákɛ́ kɛm mɛ manchyɛ ntá bo Israɛl. Kɛ, kɛfɔ ɛka kɛbhɨkɨ fu ndǔ mmɨkɨ nɛ.”
43018037	Páílet abhɛp yi bɛ, “Nɔ ɔchí mfɔ?” Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɔrɛm bɛ mɛnchí mfɔ. Ɛ̌ti ɛyɔ kɛ bábhé mɛ, nɛ ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ ntwɔ fá amɨk bɛghati bho tɛtɛp Mandɛm. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ anɛ ákòŋo tɛtɛp Mandɛm, ǎta batú bɛ́ghok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m.”
43018038	(a) Páílet abhɛ́p Yesu bɛ, “Tɛtɛp chí yí?” (b) Páílet árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, arɔ Yesu apɛt afú nɛfí ntá bo Israɛl aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi akʉ.
43018039	Kɛ ɛpɨŋ ɛyɛka ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmíɛ́, mpok Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ, mbɔŋ bɛrɔ mǔkɛnɔŋ amɔt anɛ bǎyàŋ mandɔ yi andɔk. Bǎyaŋ mámfɛ́rɛ́ Mfɔ bo Israɛl amɔ, yí ándɔ́kɔ́?”
43018040	Bápɛ́t babɨk bɛ, “Puyɛ̌ mmǔ-nɛ, fɛrɛ́ chí Barábas. Barábas achí nyaka ngɛ́bhɛ́ ntantaŋ.”
43019001	Páílet achyɛ yɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mánsɔ́t Yesu mandɛn nɛ ɛ́kpá.
43019002	Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu básɔ́t bɔ̌batábhɛ́nɔk abhɛn báchí nsěnse, mánɨ́ ntá bábáy yi anti, barɛm bɛ chi nta kɛfɔ. Básɔ́t nkú chu bafyɛ́ yi amʉɛt, bárɛm bɛ chí ayi nkú kɛfɔ.
43019003	Bábhó bɛrɔŋ ntá yi máŋɔkɔ nɔkɔ yi bɛ, “Acha mfɔ bo Israɛl, kɛnókó kɛ́chí ɛkɛ ɛta!” Ndu bárɛ̀m nɔ, manchyɛ nɔkɔ yi nsáp bɛsí.
43019004	Páílet apɛt arɔ áchá ywi afú nɛfí ntá bo Israɛl arɛm bɛ, “Ghok ka, nchí ntwɔ́ nɛfí nɛ yi ntá yɛka bɛ mǎndɨŋɨ bɛ́ mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́yàŋ bɛ mángwáy yi.”
43019005	Yesu afú yɛ, arɔk nɛ ntá kɛfɔ nsěnse yɔ antí, nɛ nkú chú yɔ amʉɛt. Páílet arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Yɨ́ŋɨ́ mmǔ ywɛka nɔ!”
43019006	Bǒbati bachiǎkap nɛ babhahɛrǐ ɛkɛrákap bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yí, bábho bɛbɨk mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Dɛm mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí! Mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí!” Páílet arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bě babhɔŋ mǎnsɔt yi mǎngó ndǔ ɛkotákátí, mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́ ɛnɛ ɛ́yàŋ mángwáy yi.”
43019007	Bo Israɛl, bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɔ̌ŋ ɛbhé, nɛ bɛkoŋo ɛbhé yɔ, abhɔŋ bɛ́gu mbɔnyunɛ ákʉ́ mmʉɛt yi Mmɔ Mandɛm.”
43019008	Páílet ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn, bɛcháy bɛ́pɛ́t bɛkɛm yi bɛcha.
43019009	Apɛt achwe amɛm áchá abhɛp Yesu bɛ, “Ɛtɔk ɛnɛ ɔ́fú arɛ chi ɛnɛ́?” Kɛ Yesu abhɨkɨ kɛmɛ yɛ ɛyɔŋ.
43019010	Páílet arɛm yɛ ntá yi bɛ, “Ɔpú kɛmɛ mɛ yɛ̌ ɛyɔŋ? Ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛrɛm bɛ mándɔ́ wɔ mándɔ, nɛ mbák ndɛ́m bɛ mángó wɔ́ ndǔ ɛkotákátí, bágò?”
43019011	Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mandɛm kɛ áchyɛ́ wɔ bɛtaŋ. Mbɔ ɛ́pú nɔ́, mbʉ ɔbhɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ amfay ya fá? Nɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ bɛbʉ́ mmu anɛ ákɛ́mɛ́ mɛ́ áchyɛ́ ntá yɛ, bɛ́chá ɛbhɛ.”
43019012	Páílet ághókó nɔkɔ nɔ, abho bɛyaŋ mbi bɛfɛrɛ Yesu amɔ. Kɛ bo Israɛl bárɔ́k chí ambɨ bɛbɨk bɛ, “Mbák ɔ́ndɔ́ mmǔ-nɛ ándɔ́k, nɔ́ ɔpú mmʉɛ́rɛ Mfɔ Rom! Mmu anɛ ǎrɛ̀m bɛ áchí Mfɔ, chi mmǔ anɛ ánù nɛ Mfɔ Rom bɛ ambak ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛyi!”
43019013	Páílet ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn, asɔt Yesu afú nɛ yi, achɔkɔ ndǔ ɛnɔk ntaŋá manyé, nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ ndu ɛyɔŋ bo Israɛl bɛ́ Gabáta. Nɔ́ chi, nɛbhʉɛt batǎy batay.
43019014	Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nkárɛ́nká byo nɛ ɛpay ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn bátòŋti mmʉɛt mɛnyiɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ, Páílet arɛm ntá bo Israɛl bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́ ka Mfɔ ywɛka nɛ!”
43019015	Bábhó bɛbɨk mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Dɔ̌ mángwáy yi! Dɔ̌ mǎngwáy! Dɛm mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí!” Páílet arɛm bɛ, “Ngó Mfɔ ywɛka ndǔ ɛkotákátí?” Bǒbati bachiǎkap bákɛ́mɛ bɛ, “Mfɔ amɔt kɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́, nɛ chí Sísa.”
43019016	Páílet ásɔ́t yɛ Yesu achyɛ ntá yap bɛ mándɔk mángó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí.
43019017	Básɔ́t ɛkotákátí ɛnɛ́ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛgo Yesu arɛ báchyɛ́ yímbɔŋ ámpɔ́kɔ́. Apɔkɔ kpát bárɔ́k bágháká ndǔ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ Golgóta, nɔ́ chi “Nɛbhʉɛt Ɛnkɔ́nti.”
43019018	Arɛ́, bágó Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Bágó bo báchák nkwɔ bati apay, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ndǔ ɛyi ɛkotákátí, amɔt ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm Yesu, achák ɛbhe awɔghɔ.
43019019	Páílet nkwɔ arɛm básɨ́ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ndǔ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́nɔk bábhát ndǔ ɛkotákátí, amfay ntí Yesu. Básɨ́ŋ amɔ ábhák bɛ, “Yesu mmu Násárɛt, Mfɔ bo Israɛl.”
43019020	Básɨ́ŋ amɔ achí nyaka ndǔ bɛyɔŋ ɛtɔk bɛrat, ndǔ ɛyɔŋ bo Israɛl, nɛ ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ Latin, nɛ ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́ Grik. Nɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bágó Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí abhak kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ ɛtɔk ɛgho. Ɛ́kʉ́, bɛyǎ bo Israɛl bápáy basɨ̌ŋɨ́ mɔ.
43019021	Bǒbati bachiǎkap bárɔ́k ntá Páílet barɛm bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ sɨ́ŋ bɛ, ‘Mfɔ bo Israɛl.’ Sɨ́ŋ chí bɛ, ‘Mmǔ-nɛ arɛm nyaka bɛ achí Mfɔ bo Israɛl.’”
43019022	Páílet akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nsɨ́ŋɨ́ nnáŋ nsɨŋ.”
43019023	Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bágó nɔ́kɔ́ Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí, básɔ́t ndɛn ɛyi bákɔ́rɛ ndǔ baru anwi, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap asɔt ndu amɔt. Kɛ ɛ́rɔp nkú amɔt. Nkú yɔ abhak ntěndɛn nɛmɔt ɛnɛn báyɛ́mɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛku ɛni bɛ́fú amfay bɛ́gháka amɨk, kɛkpɔti yɔ́ yɛ̌ ɛbhak.
43019024	Ɛkʉ báré rɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Sɛ́kɛ́ dakati nkú anɛ. Sɛ́ngʉɛ́p chí ɛbháŋá, sɛ́ngɔ́ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛsɔt yɔ.” Ɛ́fákárí ɛnyunɛ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ́mɛ́ ɛ́mfú tɛtɛp. Nɔ́ chí, basɨ̌ŋ amɛn árɛ̀m bɛ, “Básɔ́t ndɛn aya bákɔ́rɛ́. Bágʉɛ́p ɛbháŋá bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́sɔt nkú aya.”
43019025	Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bákʉ nɔ. Nnɔ Yesu abhak téé kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ ɛkotákátí, nɛ manɔ́ máyi, María, ngɔrɛ́ Klopas, nɛ María mmɔ̌ ɛtɔk Mágdala.
43019026	Yesu ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ máyi nɛ nkoŋo anɛ yi ákɔ́ŋɔ́ téé kɛ́kwɔ́t, arɛm ntá máyi bɛ, “Mmá, ghɔ́ mɔ́ywɛ nɔ!”
43019027	Arɛm yɛ ntá nkoŋo wu bɛ, “Ghɔ́ máyɛ nɔ!” Nɛ bɛbho ɛwak ɛyɔ nkoŋo wu asɔt nnɔ Yesu arɔk ɛkɛt ɛyi nɛ yí.
43019028	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu arɨŋɨ bɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhi mɛmay. Ndu bɛkʉ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́mfú tɛtɛp, arɛm bɛ, “Manyiɛp ǎkwak mɛ.”
43019029	Ɛjɔ̌ mmɛ́m amɛn ánɛn ɛchí nyaka arɛ téé. Básɔ́t ɛkuchá fofok bágwɔ́t antí ntábhɛ́nɔk ɛnɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ haysɔp, bátáp ndǔ mmɛm mɔ básá yi anyu.
43019030	Yesu asɔ́k mmɛ́m mɔ, arɛm bɛ, “Bɛtɨk ɛbha mɛ́may.” Akʉ́ɛ́p ɛmɨ, arɔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛndɔk.
43019031	Nywɔp ntóŋtí bo Israɛl nɛ́kwáy. Bɛkʉ yɛ bɛ́ ɛrɛnɛ ngú ɛ́kɛ́ rɔp amfay ɛkotákátí ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl, bárɔ́k babhɛp Páílet bɛ ánchyɛ́ bɛtaŋ mánsíɛ́ptí bɛkak ɛbhap, mámfɛ́rɛ́ bhɔ ndǔ bɛkotakati. Nywɔp nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛnɔ nɛ́bhak nywɔp nɛgho.
43019032	Ɛkʉ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bárɔk, básiɛ́ptí bɛkak mmǔ mbɨ, básiɛ́ptí bɛkak anɛfú.
43019033	Kɛ bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ amʉɛt Yesu, bághɔ́ bɛ́ anáŋ agu, bɔ́ kɛsyɛpti bɛkak ɛbhi.
43019034	Kɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu amɔt asɔt nɛkɔŋ ayɛm Yesu ambeápak. Tɛ́mté wu, manoŋ nɛ manyiɛp abho bɛfu.
43019035	Mmǔ anɛ ághɔ́ nyaka ndu ɛ́fákárí kɛ̌ ágháti bhɛsɛ nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ǎrɛ̀m ɛchí tɛtɛp. Arɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ árɛm chi tɛtɛp bɛ be nkwɔ́ mǎnsɨ́kɨ́ntɨ nɛ Yesu.
43019036	Ɛ́fákárí ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛchí amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́mfú tɛtɛp. Nɔ́ chí, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka bɛ, “Yɛ̌ ɛghɛp ɛyi ɛ́mɔt bápú syɛp.”
43019037	Nɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛpɛt ɛ́rɛ̀m ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt áchák bɛ, “Chɔŋ bo mámkpɔk yi anɛ báyɛ́mɛ́.”
43019038	Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, mmǔ amɔt átwɔ́. Áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Josɛ́f. Abhak mmǔ ɛtɔk Arimátia. Achí nyaka mmu anɛ ákòŋo Yesu. Ǎcháy nyaka bo Israɛl ndu yi achi nkoŋo Yesu. Afʉɛ́t arɔk ntá Páílet bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́, anɨkmʉɛt bɛ Páílet andɔ yi ámfɛ́rɛ́ mmʉɛt Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Páílet achyɛ yi bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ nɔ. Josɛ́f arɔk yɛ, afɛrɛ mmʉɛt Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí.
43019039	Nikɔdɛ́mɔs mmu árɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛghɔ Yesu nɛ betí ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, abhak nkwɔ nɛ Josɛ́f. Yí, Nikɔdɛ́mɔs arɔk nɛ babhé amɛn bábyɔk amʉɛt ngu bɛ́ ákɛ́ chɔŋɔ. Babhé mɛ́rɛ́ abhak nchɔ́ptí myrrh nɛ álos. Ǎkway nyaka bɛbhak mbɔ kilo bɛsa bɛpay nsɛm byo ndǔ mɛnwɔp ɛbhi.
43019040	Josɛ́f nɛ Nikɔdɛ́mɔs báfɛ́rɛ Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí, básɔ́t bɛ́syɛ́ndɛn nɛ babhé amɔ arɛ́, mánɛ́p yi bɛkoŋo ɛpɨŋ bo Israɛl.
43019041	Mɔ́nkɨ áchi nyaka ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bágó Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Nnɛm nɛkɔ nɛ́bhák arɛ ɛnɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ re bhɛmɛ yɛ̌ ngú amɔt amɛm.
43019042	Tɛ̌ndu nywɔp ɛnɔ nɛ́chí nyaka chí nywɔp ɛnɛn bo Israɛl bákʉ̀ ntoŋti bɛ́chwe ndǔ nywɔp nɛywěmʉɛt ɛnap, nɛ mbɔnyunɛ nnɛm ɛnɔ nɛ́bhɨkɨ sap nyaka nɛkɔ, Josɛ́f nɛ Nikɔdɛ́mɔs bárɔ́k bábhɛ́mɛ Yesu arɛ.
43020001	Nywɔp nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt bo Israɛl nɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, María mmɔ̌ ɛtɔk Mágdala afa nɛ nɛyǐnywɔp arɔk ndǔ nnɛm Yesu. Aghɔ́ bɛ́ mǎnáŋ bábɨ́ŋɨ́rí ntay ɛnɛn nɛchi anyǔ nnɛm báfɛrɛ.
43020002	María afa yɛ arɔk ntiɛ́t ntiɛt ntá Símun Píta nɛ nkoŋo Yesu áchák anɛ Yesu ákɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka, arɛm bɛ, “Báfɛ́rɛ́ Yesu Acha ndǔ nnɛm nɛ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bárɔ́ŋ bábhʉ́rɛ́ yi.”
43020003	Píta afú yɛ nɛ nkoŋo anɛfú wu, báfá, báré rɔ́ŋ ndǔ nnɛm.
43020004	Báre rɔŋ ntiɛ̌ntiɛt, kɛ nkoŋo anɛfú wu ajɛt acha Píta. Ayambɨ aghaka ndǔ nnɛm.
43020005	Akuri amɨk. Asá nɔ́kɔ́ amɨ́k awu amɛm, aghɔ́ bɛbhɔ́k ɛ́síɛndɛn arɛ kɛ akɛ chwe amɛm.
43020006	Símun Píta mmu ákòŋo yi ansɛm áchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ nnɛm, afʉɛ́t, arɔk amɛm, aghɔ́ bɛbhɔ́k ɛ́síɛndɛn ɛbhɔ arɛ bhʉ́rɛ́.
43020007	Aghɔ́ ndɛn anɛ mánɛ́bhɛ́ nyaka ntí Yesu nɛ yɔ nkwɔ. Nɛ ndɛn ɛyɔ ɛbhak aywi nɛbhʉɛt kɛkúrí nɛnɛp.
43020008	Kɛ nkoŋo anɛfú wu anɛ ayambɨ áchwɔ́bhɛ́ ndǔ nnɛm achwe amɛm nkwɔ, aghɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k, anoko.
43020009	Kpátɛ mpok yɔ, bɔ́ bábhɨkɨ re jwi nyaka mmɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ́mɛ́ bɛ́ Yesu abhɔŋ bɛpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
43020010	Bakoŋo Yesu bhɔ bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ bɛkɛt ɛbhap.
43020011	Kɛ María ate nɛpaka nnɛm andi nɔkɔ kɛbhɔ, nɛ ɛnɛ́ yí ábhʉɛ́t bɛdi, akuri amɨk, agʉɛ́p amɨ́k awu amɛm nnɛm.
43020012	Aghɔ́ bɔángɛl Mandɛm bati apay chɔ́kɔ́ nɛ ndɛn pɛ́pɛ́p amʉɛt ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bábhʉ́rɛ́ nyaka Yesu. Amɔt abhak ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt ntí ywi achi nyaka. Achák ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt bɛkak.
43020013	Bárɛ́m ntá María bɛ, “Mmá, ɔ̌di yi?” María akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Chi ɛ̌ti báfɛ́rɛ́ Acha bárɔŋ nɛ yi, nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ bábhʉ́rɛ́ yi.”
43020014	Árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, ayibhiri mmʉɛt aghɔ́ Yesu téé, kɛ yi kɛrɨŋɨ bɛ chi yi.
43020015	Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Mma, ɔ̌di yi? Ɔ̌yàŋ agha?” Ndǔ María ákáysí bɛ́ chí mmu anɛ áyɨ̀ŋɨ nkɨ, arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɛta, mbák ɔ́fɛ́rɛ́ yi, ghatí mɛ́ ɛbhak ɛnɛ ɔ́bhʉ́rɛ́ yi bɛ́ ndɔ́k nsɔt yí.”
43020016	Yesu arɛm bɛ, “María!” María ayibhiri mmʉɛt arɛm ndǔ ɛyɔŋ bo Israɛl bɛ, “Rabóni!” [Nɔ chí “Ntɔŋ”].
43020017	Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Kɛ́kɛm mɛ, mbɔnyunɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ re rɔŋ amfay ntá Ɛtaya. Kɛ dɔ́k ntá bɔ̌maya ghatí bhɔ bɛ́ mɛ̌pɛtnsɛm ntá Ɛtaya, nɛ ɛtayɛka. Ntá Mandɛm awa, nɛ Mandɛm aywɛka.”
43020018	María mmɔ̌ ɛtɔk Mágdala arɔk aghati bakoŋo Yesu bɛ, “Ngɔ Yesu Acha.” Nɛ aghati bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu aghati yi.
43020019	Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ beku ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt ɛnɔ, bakoŋo Yesu bábhak amɛm ɛkɛt ɛ́mɔt nɛ babhǐnywɔ́p femfé ndu báchay bǒbati bo Israɛl. Yesu arɔk ate bɔ́ bɛsí, arɛm bɛ, “Kpák ámbák nɛ bhe.”
43020020	Árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, atɔ́ŋ bɔ amɔ yi nɛ mbeápak ɛyi. Bakoŋo abhi bájwí nɛ maŋák ndu bághɔ́ Yesu Acha.
43020021	Yesu apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Kpák ámbák nɛ bhe! Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛtaya átó mɛ, kɛ nchí tó be.”
43020022	Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, afɛ́p bhɔ ɛ̌yú, arɛm bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ka Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ámbák nɛ bhe.
43020023	Mbák mǎmfóŋórí mmu bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi, Mandɛm nkwɔ ǎfoŋori yi. Mbák bǎbhɨkɨ foŋori bɛbʉ́ mmu, bɛ́rɔ̀p yi anti.”
43020024	Nkoŋo Yesu amɔt ndǔ abhɛn bati byo nɛ apay, anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Tɔmás, nɔ chí ɛfák, apú nyaka nɛ batɨ, mpok Yesu átwɔ́.
43020025	Tɔmás átɛ́mɛ́rí nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ, báré ghati yi bɛ, “Sɛ́ghɔ Yesu Acha.” Kɛ yi akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Kpátɛ ngɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k bɛbhé-mpi yí amɔ, ntɔk bhɔ́ nɛ sɛnɔŋ awɔ, mbát awɔ́ ndǔ tambe ywi mpú noko.”
43020026	Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp ánɛn, bakoŋo Yesu bápɛ́t babhak anywɔp ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt. Tɔmás abhak nɛ bhɔ. Babhǐnywɔp ábhák femfé, Yɛ̌ nɔ, Yesu atwɔ́, ate nɛntɨ ɛnap, arɛm bɛ, “Kpák ámbák nɛ bhe.”
43020027	Arɛm yɛ ntá Tɔmás bɛ, “Tɔ́k bɛrɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi ndu amɔ́ ya nɛ kɛnɔŋámɔ ɛkɛ ghɔ. Sá awɔ́ fá ndǔ tambe wa. Kɛ́pɛrɛ makati. Bák mmu anɛ ánòko!”
43020028	Tɔmás akɛmɛ yí bɛ, “Acha nɛ Mandɛm awa!”
43020029	Yesu arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɔnókó mbɔnyunɛ ɔ́ghɔ́ mɛ nɛ amɨ́k? Ɛrɨ ɛcha ntá bo abhɛn mánòko yɛ̌ndu bábhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k.”
43020030	Yesu akʉ nyaka bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay bɛ́chák bɛsí bakoŋo bhi, ɛbhɛ́n bábhɨ́kɨ́ sɨŋ amɛm ɛkáti ɛnɛ.
43020031	Básɨŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí amɛm ɛkáti ɛnɛ bɛ mɛnkwak be mǎnókó bɛ Yesu kɛ achi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, Mmɔ Mandɛm. Nɛ bɛ́ ndǔ mǎnókó yí, mǎmbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛni.
43021001	Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Yesu apɛt atɔ́ŋ mmʉɛt ntá bakoŋo bhi. Ndɔŋ yɔ, ɛbhák chi nɛpaka Manyu Tibérias. Sɛ́ngɔ́ ɛnyǔ yi atɔŋ nyaka mmʉɛt ntá yap.
43021002	Símun Píta nɛ Tɔmás anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ ɛfák, nɛ Natániɛl anɛ áfú Kána atú Gálili, nɛ bɔ̌ Sɛbɛdi bati apay, nɛ bakoŋo Yesu báchák bati apay bachi nyaka ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt.
43021003	Símun Píta arɛm bɛ, “Mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ anyɛ́n nɛ ási.” Bakoŋo Yesu báchák bárɛ́m bɛ, “Sɛ́rɔ̀ŋ nɛ wɔ.” Bɔ́ bárɔ́k básɔ́t áchwí, báré gháp anyɛ́n amɛm áchwí wu bɛti mɛnkɛm ndu bɛkɛm nsi, kɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɔ́kɛ kɛ́m.
43021004	Ndu mbaŋ ákàŋari, Yesu ate nɛpakányɛ́n. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bakoŋo bhi kɛrɨŋɨ bɛ chi yi.
43021005	Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bɔ̌bha, bǎkɛm nsi?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Ǎe.”
43021006	Aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Gʉɛ́p ká asɨ ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm áchwí, chɔŋ mǎnkɛ́m nsi.” Bágʉɛ́p asɨ ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm. Bɛyǎ nsi ɛkwɛn, kpát ɛ́chá bhɔ́ bɛyǎ bɛyǎ nkáp ɛbhɨ.
43021007	Nkoŋo anɛ Yesu ákɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka arɛm ntá Píta bɛ, “Chi Acha!” Píta ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ chi Yesu Acha, asɔt ndɛn ayi afyɛ́ amʉɛt, adók, akwɛn amɛm manyu. Afɛ́rɛ́ nyaka yɔ amʉɛt ndu bɛkʉ bɛtɨk.
43021008	Kɛ bakoŋo abhɛn bárɔ́bhɛ́ amɛm áchwí báré nok bɛkoŋo yi angɔkɔnyɛ́n, mánja nɔkɔ bɛyǎ nkáp anɛ ajwi nɔ nɛ nsi. Nɛbhʉɛt anɛ báfú bɛ́rɔ́ŋ angɔkɔnyɛ́n kɛ sap. Abhak mbɔ bayat bɛsa bɛtay.
43021009	Bákó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛbhɨ baghɔ ngo anɛ bábháytí nɛ bakiri. Nsi ɛbhak arɛ. Brɛt nkwɔ abhak arɛ.
43021010	Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Twɔ́ ká, nɛ mbɔk nsi ɛyɔ nɔ́ bǎkɛ́mɛ́.”
43021011	Píta arɔk ndu áchwí, aya bɛyǎ nkáp, akó ɛbhɨ nɛ wu. Ájwí nɛ nsi ɛgho ɛbhak bɛsa tándrámɔt nsɛm byo nɛ ɛ́rát. Kɛ yɛ̌ndu nsi ɛyɔ ɛ́yá nɔ́, ásɨ kɛdakati.
43021012	Yesu arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Twɔ́ nyiɛ́ ká nɛnyíɛ́.” Kɛ yɛ̌ nkoŋo amɔt kɛmɔ bɛbhɛp yi bɛ, “Ɔchí agha?” Bárɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ chí Yesu Acha.
43021013	Yesu asɔt brɛ́t achyɛ bhɔ. Akʉ ɛnyumɔt nɛ nsi.
43021014	Ndɔŋ ayɔ abhak anɛ ajwi ɛrat ɛnɛ́ Yesu átɔ́ŋɔ́ mmʉɛt ntá bakoŋo bhi, bɛbho ndǔ mpok anɛ yi ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
43021015	Mányiɛ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛnyíɛ́, Yesu arɛm ntá Símun Píta bɛ, “Símun, mmɔ̌ Jɔ̌n, ɔkɔŋ mɛ ɔchá mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn-ɛ?” Símun akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ɛɛ, Acha, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ nkɔŋ wɔ.” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ne bɔ̌bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n ayá.”
43021016	Bɛ́jwí ndɔŋ ɛpay, Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Símun, mmɔ̌ Jɔ̌n, ɔkɔŋ mɛ?” Símun akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ɛɛ, Acha, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ nkɔŋ wɔ.” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Babhɛri nɔkɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n aya.”
43021017	Bɛ́jwí ndɔŋ ɛ́rát, Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Símun, mmɔ̌ Jɔ̌n, ɔkɔŋ mɛ?” Píta abé ntɨ mbɔnyunɛ Yesu ábhɛp yi ɛnyɨŋ ɛrɛ ɛ́mɔt ndɔŋ ɛ́rát. Ɛ́kʉ, aghati Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ nkɔŋ wɔ.” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ne bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n aya.
43021018	Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mpok ɔ́chí ɛsakámu, ɔre gwɔ́t mmʉɛt, ɔ́ndɔk yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ ɔ́kɔ́ŋɔ́. Kɛ mpok ɔ́kɔ́kɔ́, chɔŋ ɔ́njoŋ ámɔ́ amfay, mmu achák amfyɛ wɔ́ ndɛn amʉɛt, ansɔt wɔ andɔk ɛbhak ɛnɛ ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ bɛrɔŋ.”
43021019	Yesu arɛm nɔ́ bɛtɔŋ ɛnyǔ nɛwú ɛnɛn Píta ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́gu ndu bɛchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Yesu arɛm yɛ ntá Píta bɛ, “Koŋó mɛ́.”
43021020	Píta ayibhiri mmʉɛt aghɔ́ nkoŋo anɛ Yesu ákɔ́ŋɔ́ ndu ákòŋo bhɔ́ ansɛm. Nkoŋo wu kɛ ághɔ́kɔ́ nyaka amʉɛt Yesu mpok mányìɛ̀ nɛnyíɛ́, nɛ yí wu kɛ ábhɛ́bhɛ́ nyaka Yesu bɛ, “Acha, agha áti chɔŋ wɔ?”
43021021	Píta ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi, abhɛp Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ná nɛ anɛ?”
43021022	Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Mbák mɛ̌yaŋ bɛ́ yi wu ambak nɛpɛ́m tɛ mpɛtnsɛm, ɛyɔ ɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ́ ná? Koŋó mɛ́!”
43021023	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́, ɛ́táká nɛntɨ bǒnkwɔ bɛ nkoŋo Yesu wu abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛ́gu. Kɛ, sayri sayri, Yesu abhɨ́kɨ́ ghati nyaka Píta bɛ Jɔ̌n apu gú. Arɛm chi bɛ, “Mbák mɛ̌yáŋ bɛ yi ákɛ́ gú tɛ́ mpɛtnsɛm, ɛyɔ ɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ́ ná?”
43021024	Nkoŋo Yesu wu kɛ ághàti bhɛsɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, nɛ yi kɛ ásɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɔ amɨk. Nɛ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yí árɛ̀m ɛchi tɛtɛp.
43021025	Yesu akʉ nyaka bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak. Mbɔ básɨ́ŋ bɔ́ mɛnkɛm amɨk ɛ́mɔt ɛ́mɔt, nkáysí bɛ́ mbʉ mmɨk nkɛm ajwí nɛ bɛkáti, kpátɛ mbɔk andɔp.
44001001	Ɛta Tiófilɔs, ndǔ ɛkáti ɛya ɛnɛ mbɨ, nsɨŋ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛ́n Yesu ákʉ́ nɛ ɛbhɛn yi atɔŋɔ bɛbho mpok yi ábhó bɛtɨk ɛbhi fá amɨk,
44001002	kpát bɛ́gháka nywɔp ɛnɛn Mandɛm ákʉ́ yi akó amfay. Ápɛ́rɛ ko amfay, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ akʉ yi angati bo abhɛn yi ayabhɛ bɛ mámbák bǒnto bhi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ babhɔŋɔ bɛkʉ.
44001003	Mpok yi apɛrɛnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, atɔ́ŋ mmʉɛt ntá yap ndǔ bɛyǎ ndɔŋ ndǔ manywɔp bɛsa bɛpay. Bághɔ́ yi kpoŋoroŋ ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bápú kway mɛmakati bɛ, sayri sayri, apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Apɛt nyaka nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m antɔŋ nɔkɔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm bɛkʉ bo mándɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm ábhák nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap.
44001004	Mpok yí ábhʉɛ́t nɛ baghɔkɔ́ bhi aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ fá Yerúsalɛm. Chɔkɔ́ ká noŋ akap anɛ́ Ɛta afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛ́tó mbɔ ɛnyǔ ngátí bhe.
44001005	Jɔ̌n ájwìti nyaka bo nɛ manyiɛp, kɛ ndǔ mpǎy manywɔp, chɔŋ Mandɛm anjwiti bhe nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.”
44001006	Mpok Yesu achi nɛ bǒnto bábhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Acha, chɔŋ ɔ́nsɔt kɛfɔ Israɛl ɔ́nkɛmɛ ntá yɛsɛ bo Israɛl kɛ?”
44001007	Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛriŋɨ mpok anɛ Ɛta afyɛ́ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛmfakari. Ɛta mmu afyɛ́ mpok ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi kɛ árɨ́ŋɨ́.
44001008	Chɔŋ Mandɛm anchyɛ bhe bɛtaŋ mpok Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ atwɔ́ ntá yɛka, mǎmbak yɛ batísiɛ bha amɛm Yerúsalɛm, nɛ atú Judɛ́ya ankɛm, nɛ atú Samária, nɛ ndǔ mmɨk nkɛm.”
44001009	Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, Mandɛm asɔt yi apɛtnsɛm amfay. Báte mánjɨŋɨ nɔkɔ yi ndu árɔ̀ŋ. Nɛbháŋ nɛ́kúti yi, bɔ kɛpɛrɛ ghɔ́ yi.
44001010	Báré yɨŋɨ gbɔkɔ́ɔ́ ndǔ yi árɔ̀ŋ amfay. Bápɛ́rɛ ghɔ, bo bati apay nɛ nkú pɛ́pɛ́p amʉɛt báté kɛkwɔt nɛ bhɔ.
44001011	Barɛm bɛ, “Bě bo Galili, ndáká yi bachi afɔ téé mánjɨŋɨ nɔkɔ awu amfay? Chɔŋ Yesu mmu árɔ́ be arɔŋɔ amfay, ampɛtnsɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎghɔ́ yi árɔ̀ŋ amfay.”
44001012	Bǒnto Yesu barɔ yɛ Njiɛ Mɛnɔk Ólif bápɛtnsɛm Yerúsalɛm, nɛkɔ ɛnɛ́n nɛchi mbɔ kilómɛta amɔt.
44001013	Báchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ́, bákó amfay ndu mɔ́kɛt amɔt amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́mfáy anɛ bɔ báchɔ̀kɔ nyaka arɛ. Bǒnto bhɔ babhak Píta, nɛ Jɔ̌n, nɛ Jems, nɛ Andru, nɛ Fílip, nɛ Tɔmás, nɛ Batolómio, nɛ Mátio, nɛ Jems mmɔ́ Alfeyɔs, nɛ Símun anɛ achi nyaka ndǔ nkwɔ bo abhɛn mánù ɛ̌ti ɛtɔk ɛyap, nɛ Júdas mmɔ́ Jems.
44001014	Bɔ mankɛm babhak ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt. Báchyɛ́ mmʉɛt ndǔ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt nɛbhʉɛt amɔt chɛchɛm nɛ mbɔk bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn baghɔrɛ́, nɛ María nnɔ Yesu, nɛ bɔ̌máyi abhɛn babhakanɛm.
44001015	Ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t ndǔ manywɔp ɛyɔ, bakoŋo Yesu bákɛ́m ɛchɛmɛ. Bábhák batí bɛsa bɛtandat. Arɛ, Píta afate arɛm bɛ,
44001016	“Bɔ̌ma, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ̌ti Júdas mmu ákwáká bo mankɛm Yesu bɛbhɔŋ nyaka bɛfu tɛtɛp. Nɔ chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ákʉ́ nyaka Mfɔ Debhít ándɨ́ŋɨ́ nɛ arɛm bɛ bɛbhɔŋ bɛfakari.
44001017	Yí Júdas achí nyaka ndǔ nkwɔ́ ywɛsɛ́ ndu Yesu áyábhɛ́ yi bɛ ankʉ bɛtɨk nɛ bhɛsɛ.
44001018	“Júdas atí nɔ́kɔ́ Yesu, asɔt nkáp manoŋ anɛ́ báchyɛ́ yi aku ɛkpɔkɔ́ mmɨk. Nɛ ndǔ ɛkpɔ́kɔ́ mmɨk ɛyɔ, yímbɔŋ akwɛ́n kɛ́bhɛri mɛniɛ bɛ́sɛ́n, mántɛp árɔ́ri amɨk, agú.
44001019	Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn báchí amɛm ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm bághók ndak anɛ áfákárí. Ɛ́kʉ́ bábhó bɛ́bhɨ́ŋɨ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́mɨk wu ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛyap bɛ Akɛldáma, nɔ́ chí mmɨkɨ́ manoŋ.
44001020	“Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mfɔ Debhít asɨŋɨ amɛm Ɛkáti Bakway bɛ́: ‘Ɛkɛt ɛyi ɛ́ndɔ́p ɛwɔ́, yɛ̌ mmu kɛ́chɔkɔ amɛm.’ Nɛ Debhít apɛt asɨŋ bɛ, ‘Mmu áchák ánsɔ́t ɛ́pɔ́kɔ́ bɛtɨk ɛyi.’
44001021	“Ɛ́rɨ yɛ bɛ́ mmu áchák ánchɛ́m nɛ bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́ngátí nɔ́kɔ́ bo mbɔ batísiɛ bɛ Yesu apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Mmu wu abhɔŋ bɛ́bhak chi mmu anɛ achi nyaka ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛsɛ mpok Yesu Acha achi nɛ bhɛsɛ, bɛ́bho mpok Jɔ̌n ájwítí yí bɛghaka nywɔp ɛnɛn yi arɔŋɔ amfay.”
44001023	Nkaysi yap akwɛ́n amʉɛt bo bati apay: Josɛ́f nɛ Matías. Josɛ́f abhɔ́ŋ manyɛ́n áchák ápáy. Nɔ́ chí Jústɔs nɛ Básabas.
44001024	Mánɨ́k yɛ mmʉɛt bɛ́, “Acha, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ nkaysi yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu. Ndǔ bǒbhɛn batí apay, ntɨkɨ mmu ɔ́yábhɛ́
44001025	bɛ́ ambak mǔnto ndu bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn ndu bɛsɔt ɛpók Júdas mmú árɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kwáy nɛ yi?
44001026	Bágʉɛ́p yɛ ɛbhaŋa ɛ̌ti bǒbhɛn batí apay. Ɛ́ká Matías. Básɔ́t yɛ Matías báchɛm nɛ nkwɔ bǒnto Yesu bachak batí byó nɛ amɔt.”
44002001	Nywɔp ɛpǎ bo Israɛl ɛnɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ Pɛ́ntɛkɔs ɛghaka nɔkɔ, bakoŋo Yesu mankɛm bábhák nɛbhʉɛt amɔt.
44002002	Ɛwat ɛ́fú amfáy tɛ́mchók mbɔ ɛnɛ́ mbʉ́ɛ́p ataŋataŋ ɛ́jwǐ amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ bɔ bachi arɛ.
44002003	Bághɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ bárɨ́ngo. Átáka, ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap abhɔ́ŋ nɛmɔt ɛnɛn nɛte yi anti.
44002004	Tɛ́mté wu Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhak nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap tontó. Akʉ́ bábhó bɛ́rɛ́m bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn bɔ babhɨkɨ ghɔk.
44002005	Mpok yɔ, bǒ abhɛn báfyɛ̀ bɛtaŋ bɛbhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé bo Israɛl babhak Yerúsalɛm. Báfú ndǔ bɛyǎ bɛtɔk.
44002006	Bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛwat ɛyɔ, bárɔk ntiɛ́t ntiɛt bɛ́ghɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fàkari. Bábhak maknkay bɛghók ndǔ bakoŋo Yesu bárɛ̀m bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk nyáŋá nyáŋá ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ághòk ndu ɛyi ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bárɛ̀m.
44002007	Bábhák maknkay tontó, bábho bɛrɛm bɛ, “Pú bǒbhɛn mankɛm chi bo Galili?
44002008	Ná ɛ́chí bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛsɛ ǎghòk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bɔ́ bárɛ̀m ndǔ ɛyi ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk?
44002009	Sɛ́fǔ bɛtɔk nyáŋá nyáŋá: Mbɔk báfu Pátia, báchák Mídia, abhɛ́nɛ́fú Ɛ́lam; mbɔk báfú Mɛsopotemia, báchák atú Judéya, abhɛ́nɛ́fú atú Kapadóshiya; mbɔk báfú atú Pɔ́ntɔs, báchák atú Ésia.
44002010	Mbɔk báfú atú Fríjia, báchák atú Pamfília. Mbɔk báfú Íjip, báchák báfú ndǔ batáp ɛtɔk Líbia anɛ achi kɛkwɔt nɛ Sírene. Ndú abhɛn báfú Rom, mbɔk chi bo Israɛl, báchák bǒ abhɛn bákòŋo Mandɛm mbɔ bo Israɛl,
44002011	báchák báfú Krɛt, abhɛ́nɛ́fú Arébia. Yɛ̌ nɔ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛsɛ ǎghòk ndu bɔ́ bárɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ákʉ́ ndu ɛyi ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk.”
44002012	Bɔ́ mankɛm bábhák maknkay, batí átáká bhɔ́, bábhó bɛbhɛp batɨ bɛ, “Anɛ́ ndak-aa?”
44002013	Kɛ bachak báré way bakoŋo Yesu mándɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mmɛ́m akɛm bǒbhɛn!” Nɛtwɔ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ
44002014	Píta afate yɛ nɛ bǒnto báchák batí byó nɛ amɔt, abho bɛrɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ ntá bɛyǎ bǒbhɔ bɛ, “Bǒ Judɛ́ya nɛ be mankɛm abhɛn bǎchi Yerúsalɛm, tá ká batú mǎngók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m.
44002015	Bǒbhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ kwɛ́n chi mmɛ́m mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎkàysi. Nywɔp nɛchi ndiɛrɛ nkárɛ́nká nɛ́nɛ́namɔt běti.
44002016	Nɛ́ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Jóɛl arɛmɛ nyaka bɛ chɔŋ ɛmfakari. Joɛl arɛm nyaka bɛ,
44002017	Mandɛm arɛm bɛ ‘Ndǔ manywɔbhɛ́ ngwɛnti, chɔŋ nkʉ Ɛfóŋó ya antwɔ ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu. Bɔ̌bhɛka mángati barak anɛ́ mɛ mfyɛ́ bɔ́ antɨ. Bɛsak ɛbhɛka mángɔ́ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k antifu, nɛ baseansi bhɛka mángɔ kɛnɔ́.
44002018	Ndu manywɔp ɛyɔ, chɔŋ nkʉ Ɛfóŋó ya ɛ́ntwɔ́ ntá bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abha, abhɛ́n baghɔrɛ́, nɛ abhɛn babhakanɛm, nkʉ bɔ́ mángati barak anɛ́ mfyɛ́ bɔ́ antɨ.
44002019	Nɛ chɔŋ nkʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay mɛ́mfakari amfay, nɛ ntɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay fá amɨk. Chɔŋ manoŋ ambak, ngó ambak, mɔ́ngo ambak.
44002020	Chɔŋ mmok anjibhiri ándɔp ɛjuri, ntaŋ ánjibhiri andɔp manoŋ, kɛ nywɔp nɛgho ɛnɛ́n Acha átwɔ̀ nɛngaka.
44002021	Nɛ chɔŋ ɛmbak bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhɨ̀ŋɨ Acha bɛ ánkwák yi, Acha ǎpɛmɛ yi.’”
44002022	Píta arɔk ambɨ bɛ́rɛ́m bɛ, “Bo Israɛl, ghók ká bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛ́n: ‘Yesu mmu Násárɛt chí mmu anɛ Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ nyaka. Atɔ́ŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ́ ayap yí ndǔ áchyɛ́ yi bɛtaŋ. Akʉ yɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay. Atɔ́ŋ bɛrɨŋ. Bě babhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ nɔ sayri mbɔnyunɛ akʉ nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛsí ɛbhɛka.
44002023	Mandɛm anáŋ arɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛfakari nɛ Yesu bɛkoŋo nkaysi yi. Báfyɛ́ yɛ́ yi amɔ yɛká bɛ mǎnchyɛ yi ntá bo bɛbʉ́ bɛ mángó ndǔ ɛkotákátí, mángway.
44002024	Kɛ Mandɛm akʉ yí ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, afɛrɛ yí ndǔ bɛbě nɛwú mbɔnyunɛ nɛwú nɛpu kway nyaka bɛbhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfǎy yi.’”
44002025	Mfɔ Debhít asɨŋ nyaka ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, “Nchí ghɔ nyaka Acha mpoknkɛm bɛsí bha, abhak ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm ɛya, bɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛkɛ nyɨkɨsi mɛ.
44002026	Ntǐ ɛna nɛ́jwi yɛ nɛ maŋák, nɛ nchí rɛm kɛpɨ nɛ maŋák. Nɛ mbákántɨ chí nɛ Mandɛm,
44002027	Mbɔnyunɛ wɔ Mandɛm ɔpú chɛn chɔŋ mɛ ɔ́ndɔ́ amɛm ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú, ɔpú rɔ chɔŋ Mmu anɛ áchyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ntá yɛ ámpɔ́ amɛm nnɛm.
44002028	Ɔkʉ mɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mbi nɛpɛ́m. Ndǔ ɔ́chí nɛ mɛ mpoknkɛm, chɔŋ ɔ́nkʉ mɛmbɔŋ bɛyǎ maŋák.”
44002029	Píta arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma, nchí kway bɛghati bhe kpoŋoroŋ ɛ̌ti Mfɔ Debhít, chi mbɨ ywɛsɛ. Agu nyaka, bábhɛ́mɛ yi, nɛ nnɛm ɛni nɛbhʉɛt fá nɛ bhɛsɛ kpatɛ ɛchɔŋ.
44002030	Achí nyaka ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ. Arɨŋɨ bariɛp amɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ́ yi, kpát anyú nku bɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ ɛbhárɛ́mɔ ywi anyiɛ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛyi.
44002031	Debhít ayambɨ aghɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛkʉ ndǔ mpok anɛ átwɔ̀ ambɨ kɛ yɔ ɛmfakari. Aghɔ́ bɛ, chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, Debhít arɛm nyaka bɛ, ‘Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ chɛn Mpɛmɛ yí áyábhɛ́ ándɔ́ amɛm ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ chɛn mmʉɛt yi ámpɔ́ amɛm nnɛm.’
44002032	Mandɛm akʉ Yesu apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́ghɔ́ yi nɛ sɛchi batísiɛ bɛ achi nɛpɛ́m.
44002033	Mandɛm achyɛ yí bɛyǎ kɛnókó ndu akʉ yi achɔkɔ ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm ɛyi ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ. Ɛta abhʉrɛ bariɛp ami ndu achyɛ yí Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ. Nɛ chí Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmu Yesu achyɛ bhɛsɛ kɛ ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́fàkari nɛ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎghɔ̀ nɛ bǎghòk.
44002034	Debhít abhɨ́kɨ́ rɔ nyaka ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú ándɔ́k amfay. Kɛ yímbɔŋ arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɛta Mandɛm arɛm nyaka ntá Acha wa bɛ́: “Chɔkɔ́ fá ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm ɛya ndu ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ,
44002035	kpátɛ nkʉ bǒmpap abhɛ mámbak mbɔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ ɔ́chɔkɔ ɔ́nyaŋa bɛkak arɛ́.”’
44002036	“Bo Israɛl mankɛm bábhɔŋ bɛ́rɨŋɨ yɛ sayri bɛ, Yesu mmu be bǎgo ndǔ ɛkotákátí kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ yi áchi Acha nɛ Mpɛmɛ yi áyábhɛ́.”
44002037	Bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Píta arɛmɛ, ɛ́kwɛ́n bɔ́ tɛ antɨ. Babhɛp Píta nɛ bǒnto bachak bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma, chɔŋ sɛ́nkʉ yɛ ná?”
44002038	Píta akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ yɛka abhɔŋ bɛ́tɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi nɛ mánjwiti yi ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo bɛ Mandɛm amfoŋori bɛbʉ́ bhi. Mmǔ anɛ ákʉ́ nɔ Mandɛm ǎchyɛ yi Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mbɔ akap.
44002039	Bariɛp amɛn ayɨ́ŋɨ́ be nɛ bɔ̌bhɛka, nɛ bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bachi nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ. Ayɨ́ŋɨ́ nkwɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ Mandɛm Acha yɛsɛ ábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ antwɔ ntá yi.”
44002040	Píta arɔk ambɨ bɛ́rɛm baya mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chák ansɛmti nɔkɔ bhɔ bɛ́ “Fɛrɛ́ ká mmʉɛt ndǔ ntɛmsi anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́twɔ ntá bǒ bɛbʉ́ abhɛn fá ammɨk.”
44002041	Ɛkʉ bo abhɛn mánóko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Píta arɛmɛ bárɔ́k bájwiti bhɔ. Nɛ bo abhɛn bachɛmɛ nɛ bakoŋo Yesu nywɔp ɛnɔ babhak mbɔ nká ɛ́rát.
44002042	Bachyɛ mmʉɛt ndu bɛ́ghɔ́k mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǒnto Yesu bátɔ̀ŋ. Bɔ́ mankɛm abhɛn manókó babhak ndu nsoŋ amɔt ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, ndǔ Nɛnyiɛ Acha nɛ ndu nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt.
44002043	Bǒnto Yesu bábho bɛkʉ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay nɛ bɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay. Bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m bo mankɛm abhɛn bághɔ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ.
44002044	Nɛ bo abhɛn mánóko mankɛm babhák ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔ́t, mánkɔrɛ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhap ndǔ nsoŋ amɔt.
44002045	Mpok nɛ mpok, abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ bátì nyaka mánkɔrɛ nɔkɔ nkáp nɛ abhɛn ɛyap ɛ́pú ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap abhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ.
44002046	Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp báchɛ̀m nyaka amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm amɛm Yerúsalɛm ndu mɛ́nɨ́kmʉɛt. Báchɛ̀m nyaka nkwɔ amɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhap ndǔ Nɛnyiɛ Acha nɛ ndǔ mɛnyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt,
44002047	mámbɨti nɔkɔ Mandɛm. Bǒ mankɛm bághɔ́ ndǔ bakoŋo Yesu bákʉ̀ nɛ báre bhɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ bhɔ. Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛwak Acha ankʉ nɔkɔ bo abhɛn yi ápɛ́mɛ́ mánchɛ́m nɛ bakoŋo bhi.
44003001	Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n bare rɔŋ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ndu nkárɛ́nká ɛ́rát nɛ ngósí mpok nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt.
44003002	Bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ nyǔbha anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Ɛrɨ́tí Nyǔbha, bághɔ́ mmu anɛ áchí mbɛ́ntí tɛ nɛbhe ɛni arɛ́ chɔ́kɔ́. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛwak bo bápɔ̀kɔ nyaka yi mámbʉrɛ ndu nyǔbha wu bɛ́ ánɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nkáp ntá bo abhɛn báfʉɛ̀t bɛrɔŋ amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm mɛnɨkmʉɛt.
44003003	Mbɛ́ntí wu aghɔ nɔkɔ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n ndǔ báyaŋ bɛfʉɛt mandɔk ɛkɛrákap, abho mɛ́nɨŋɨ bhɔ nkáp.
44003004	Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n báyɨŋɨ yi diíí. Píta arɛm yɛ bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́ bhɛsɛ!”
44003005	Atɛp bɔ amɨ́k amʉɛt nɛ nkaysi bɛ́ chɔŋ manchyɛ yi ɛnyɨŋ.
44003006	Kɛ Píta arɛm bɛ, “Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nkáp, kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ chɔŋ nchyɛ́ wɔ. Ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo mmu Násárɛt, faté kɔ!”
44003007	Akɛ́m yi ndǔ awɔ́nɛm ayoŋ. Tɛ́mté wu, bɛtaŋ Mandɛm bɛ́chwe ndu bɛkak nɛ mɛmɨ̌ bɛkak ɛbhi.
44003008	Adók ate kpɛrɛp, abho bɛkɔ. Are kɔ andokoti nɔkɔ, nɛ ambɨtɨ nɔkɔ Mandɛm, kpát arɔk achwe amɛm ɛkɛrákap nɛ bhɔ.
44003009	Bo mankɛm abhɛn bachi arɛ bághɔ́ yi ndu ákɔ̀ ambɨti nɔkɔ Mandɛm.
44003010	Bárɨ́ŋɨ bɛ yi kɛ áchɔ̀kɔ nɔ́kɔ́ nyaka ndǔ Ɛrɨ́tí Nyǔbha anɛ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm anɨŋɨ nɔkɔ nkáp. Ɛkʉ bábhák maknkay, nɛ manyu arɔp bhɔ fúfú bɛghɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari.
44003011	Mmu wu abhat mmʉɛt nɛ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n kpát bárɔk baghaka amɛm nɛbhʉɛt ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Áchá Sólomon. Bo mankɛm bare rɔŋ arɛ ntiɛ́t ntiɛt bɛghɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fàkari. Babhak maknkay tontó.
44003012	Píta aghɔ nɔkɔ ndǔ bǒbhɔ bákàp bhɔ, arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma, bo Israɛl, ndaká yi bǎchí maknkay, mǎmkpɔkɔ nɔkɔ bhɛsɛ ɛnyu ɛyɔ? Bǎkaysi bɛ chi ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛsɛ́ kɛ̌ yí ákɔ̀ nɛ́nɛ kɛ? Nɛ puyɛ̌ chi bɛ sɛ́chày Mandɛm tontó.
44003013	Mandɛm bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ, Mandɛm Ábraham nɛ Áisek nɛ Jekɔ́p kɛ achyɛ mǔbɛtok ywi Yesu kɛnókó. Achyɛ́ yi kɛnókó yɛ̌ndu be bǎrɛ̀m nyaka bɛ bǎbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ yi mpok Páílet áyàŋ bɛfɛrɛ yi amɔ. Bǎsɔ́t yi bǎchyɛ́ ntá bǒbati Rom bɛ mángwáy.
44003014	Yesu achí nyaka nyáŋá nɛ chak bɛsí Mandɛm, Yɛ̌ nɔ be kɛka bɛ Páílet ándɔ́ yi andɔk. Bǎrɛ́m bɛ Páílet ándɔ́ chí ngwayti bho andɔk.
44003015	Bǎkʉ́ báwáy yi mmu áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m. Kɛ Mandɛm akʉ yí apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Bɛsɛ́ sɛ́ghɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari.
44003016	Yesu kɛ ákʉ́ mbɛ́ntí nɛ áfáté. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎghɔ́ nɛ ɛnɛ́ bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ ɛfakari, mɛnkɛm bɛ́chí ɛnyu yɔ mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́sɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ yi. Chí ndu sɛ́sɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ yí kɛ ɛ́kʉ mbɛ́ntí nɛ áfáté kpɛrɛp mbɔ ɛnyǔ bě mankɛm bǎghɔ́.
44003017	“Bɔ̌ma, nɛ́nɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ká bɛ́ be nɛ bǒ batí bhɛka bǎchí nyaka chi amɛm ɛjuri bɛyɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎkʉ́ ntá Yesu.
44003018	Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bhi bághátí bo tɛsáy bɛ, Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, abhɔŋ bɛghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri, Mandɛm akʉ yɔ ɛfu tɛtɛp.” Tɨ́k yɛ́ ka nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka, mámpɛtnsɛm ntá Mandɛm, bɛ yi amfoŋori bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka.
44003019	Mbák mǎnkʉ ɛnyu yɔ, Acha ǎkʉ mǎmbɔŋ mpok nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ndǔ bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛka,
44003020	antó be Mpɛmɛ yi afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò bɛ ambak Mpɛmɛ yɛka.
44003021	Yí wu chi Yesu mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhak amfay nɛ Mandɛm kpátɛ mpok anɛ yi ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm mɛ́njíbhírí mɛ́ndɔp bɛkɔ. Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm mánáŋ bárɛm tɛntɛp bɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mbak ɛnyu yɔ.
44003022	Moses arɛm nyaka bɛ, “Chɔŋ Mandɛm Acha antó be ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ ywi mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ato mɛ. Nɛ chɔŋ yi ambak mmu ywɛka amɔt nɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ághàti bhe mǎnkʉ.
44003023	Nɛ chɔŋ ɛmbak bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ apu ghok ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ wu, báfap yi nɛ bǒ Mandɛm, mangway.
44003024	Samuɛl nɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ abhɛn báfú yi ansɛm, mankɛm bárɛm nyaka nkwɔ́ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́fàkari manywɔp anɛ́ ɛchɔŋ.
44003025	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bárɛ́mɛ́ mɛnkɛm bɛ́yɨŋɨ bhe. Nɛ nku anɛ Mandɛm ányú nyaka nɛ bachǐmbɨ bhɛka, ányu nɛ be nkwɔ́, mbɔnyunɛ arɛm nyaka ntá Ábraham bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ mfʉɛ́t ntá bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ bhɛ ńjɛt manɛrɛ́kɛrɛ́ mmɨk ankɛm.’
44003026	Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ Mandɛm ayap nyaka mǔbɛtok ywi, ayambɨ átó yi chi ntá yɛka bɛ́ ánjɛ́t be ndǔ ákʉ̀ be mandɔ́ nɛpɛ́m bɛbʉ́ ɛnɛka.”
44004001	Ɛnɛ́ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n bághàti bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛnyu yɔ, mbɔk bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ mǔnti babhabhɛri ɛkɛrákap nɛ mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Sádusi bátwɔ́ ntá yap.
44004002	Batɨ ábé bhɔ mbɔnyunɛ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n bátɔ̀ŋ mángati nɔkɔ bo bɛ́ Yesu apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m bɛtɔŋ bɛ chɔŋ bawú mámpɛtsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
44004003	Bákɛ́m Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n bárɔ́k báfe, nɛ tɛ̌ndu beku mɛnaŋ bɛ́gháká nyaka, barɔ bhɔ arɛ tɛ ntɨnywɔp.
44004004	Yɛ̌ nɔ, bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bághókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n bághátí bhɔ, mánóko. Mpǎy bakoŋo Yesu mankɛm akó aghaka mbɔ nká ɛtay.
44004005	Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, bakɛmɛ́ ɛtɔk nɛ bǒ batí bo Israɛl, nɛ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm bákɛ́m ɛchɛmɛ amɛm ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm.
44004006	Ánas mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm, nɛ Káyfas, nɛ Jɔ̌n, nɛ Aleksánda, nɛ bǒnɛrɛ́kɛt mǔngo bachiǎkap báchɛm nɛ bhɔ.
44004007	Básɔ́t Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n bákʉ bɔ́ báte bɛsí bhap, bábhɛ́p yɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Ndu nnyɛ́n agha bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn? Agha áchyɛ́ bhe bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ bhɔ?”
44004008	Ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ, Píta akɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ, “Bě bakɛmɛ́ ɛtɔk nɛ bǒ batí ɛtɔk,
44004009	mbák bábhɛ̀p bhɛsɛ ɛchɔŋ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ ɛbhɛn sɛ́kʉ́ ntá mbɛ́ntí-nɛ, nɛ ɛnyǔ ɛ́fákárí kɛ yi ǎtaŋ,
44004010	Bě mankɛm nɛ bo Israɛl mankɛm dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ chí Yesu Kristo mmu Násárɛt kɛ ákʉ́ mmǔ-nɛ ataŋa. Yí mmu bágó ndǔ ɛkotákátí, kɛ̌ Mandɛm akʉ yí apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi kɛ̌ bǎghɔ́ mmǔ-nɛ áté be bɛsí kpɛrɛp.
44004011	Nkúbhɛ́ Yesu kɛ̌ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti yi bɛ́: ‘Ntay ɛnɛ́n bě batě bɛkɛt bǎbyáká, nɔ́ kɛ nɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ ɛkwap ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kɛ́mɛ́ ɛkɛt.’
44004012	Ndiɛrɛ yí kɛ ákway bɛpɛmɛ bhɛsɛ. Mmu achak apú fá amɨk anɛ Mandɛm achyɛ bɛ ampɛmɛ bhɛsɛ.”
44004013	Bo ɛchɛmɛ́ bǒ batí ɛtɔk bághɔ́ nɛtaŋántɨ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n ndǔ bárɛ̀m kɛpɨ kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy nɛ ndǔ bághɔ́ nkwɔ bɛ́ bɔPíta báchí chí ndɛ́ndɛmɛ́ bho, nɛ bɛ bɔ bábhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔk ɛkáti, bábhák maknkay. Kɛ bághɔ́ bɛ bɔPíta mánáŋ bákɔ̀ nyaka nɛ Yesu.
44004014	Nɛ ndu bághɔ́ mbɛ́ntí anɛ bákʉ́ yi ataŋa nɛpak Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n, manyu áchók bhɔ.
44004015	Ɛ́kʉ́ bátɛ́n kpɨ́k bɔ́ nɛfí. Bábho bɛsokori mámbɛbhɛ nɔkɔ batɨ bɛ,
44004016	“Chɔŋ sɛ́nkʉ yi nɛ bǒbhɛ́n? Bǒ mankɛm fá ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm baghɔ ɛrɛmɛ́ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛnɛ́ bɔ́ bákʉ́ nɛ sɛ́pú kway bɛtaŋa.
44004017	Kɛ ndu bɛkʉ bɛ mbok anɛ ákɛ́pɛrɛ taka ɛtɔk, sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛya bǒbhɛn batú bɛ bákɛ́pɛrɛ rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ ntá mmu ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu.”
44004018	Bábhɨ́ŋɨ yɛ bhɔ bápɛtnsɛm amɛm áchá. Básɛ́mti bhɔ́ bɛ bakɛpɛrɛ rɛm nɛ bakɛpɛrɛ tɔ́ŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu.
44004019	Kɛ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n bákɛ́mɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Bě babhɔŋ bɛ́p ká mmʉɛt ɛyɛka ndak anɛ. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́chí chak bɛsí Mandɛm chi ɛnɛ́? Bɛ́ghok bhe kɛ chi bɛghok Mandɛm?
44004020	Sɛ́pú kwáy bɛrɔ bɛrɛm ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k nɛ sɛ́ghók nɛ batú.”
44004021	Nkwɔ ɛchɛmɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk bapɛt básɛ́mtí nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ, báfɛrɛ bhɔ amɔ. Bɔ́ kɛbhɔŋ mbi bɛtɛmsi bɔPíta mbɔnyunɛ bǒ mankɛm bákàka nyaka Mandɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari.
44004022	Nɛ mamiɛ́ mbɛ́ntí wu acha nyaka bɛsa bɛpay.
44004023	Báfɛ́rɛ́ nɔkɔ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n amɔ, bápɛtnsɛm ntá batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ Yesu, baghati bhɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǒbatí ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk bárɛ́mɛ́ ntá yap.
44004024	Bakoŋo Yesu bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, bɔ́ mankɛm babho mɛnɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ; “Ɛta, wɔ ɔchí Acha, wɔ kɛ ɔ́ghókó mfay nɛ mmɨk, nɛ manyɛ́n nɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí arɛ.
44004025	Wɔ kɛ ɔ́kʉ́ nyaka bɛ mǔbɛtok ywɛ Mfɔ Debhít, chi-mbɨ ywɛsɛ́, ándɛm ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ bɛ: ‘Ndaká yí bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bábèntɨ nɛ wɔ Mandɛm? Ndaká yí bǒbhɛn bátè bɛyu ɛbhɛn bɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ntí nɛ nnɛt?
44004026	Bafɔ̌ mmɨk bátòŋtí mmʉɛt mɛ́nu nɛnu, bǒbatí ɛtɔk báchɛm nɛbhʉɛt amɔt, báte ɛyu mɛnu nɛ Mandɛm Acha nɛ Mpɛmɛ yí afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.’
44004027	“Hɛ́rɔd nɛ Pɔ́ntiɔs Páílet báchɛm nɛ bo Israɛl nɛ mbɔk bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl fá amɛm Yerúsalɛm, báte ɛyu antí Yesu mmǔ bɛtok ywɛ anɛ achi nyáŋá.
44004028	Báchɛ́m bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́náŋ ɔ́bhʉ́rɛ́ nyaka bɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari.
44004029	Acha, ghɔ́ yɛ ndǔ bápà bhɛsɛ. Kʉ bɛ bhɛsɛ́ bǒ bɛtok abhɛ, sɛ́ngátí nɔ́kɔ́ bho Ɛyɔŋ ɛyɛ nɛ nɛtaŋántɨ nɛnkɛm.
44004030	Chiɛ́ bhɛsɛ bɛtaŋ bɛbú bǒmame, nɛ bɛtɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay nɛ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ndǔ nnyɛ́n mǔbɛtok ywɛ Yesu, mmu achi nyáŋá.”
44004031	Mánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnɨkmʉɛt, nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bɔ bachi arɛ anyɨkɨsi. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhak nɛ bhɔ tontó akʉ bábhó bɛghati Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy.
44004032	Nkwɔ́ bo abhɛn mánókó Yesu bábhɔ́ŋ ntɨ nɛ́mɔt nɛ nkaysi amɔt. Yɛ̌ mmu wap akɛ rɛm bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi bɛ́chí chí ndiɛrɛ ntá yi aywǐntí. Ɛnyɨŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ɛbhak ɛnyɨŋ ɛyap mankɛm.
44004033	Bǒnto Yesu báré ghati bo nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhap mɛnkɛm bɛ Yesu Acha apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm bɛbhak nɛ bɔ mankɛm tontó.
44004034	Yɛ̌ mmu wap abhɨkɨ chɛ́p nyaka ɛnyɨŋ mbɔnyunɛ abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bakɨ nɛ yɛ̌ chi bɛkɛt, bátì nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ mántwɔ nɛ nkáp
44004035	mámbʉrɛ bɛsí bǒnto, nɛ bɔ mánkɔrɛ nkáp wu bɛkoŋo nté anɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap.
44004036	Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ mmǔ anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Josɛ́f akʉ nyaka. Abhak mmu nnɛrɛ́kɛt Lɛ́vi nɛ mmu ɛtɔk Sáyprɔs. Bǒnto Yesu bádú yí nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Banábas, nɔ́ chí, “Mmǔ anɛ afyɛ́ bo ntɨ.”
44004037	Abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka nkɨ, atí wú, atwɔ́ nɛ nkáp, abhʉrɛ bɛsí bǒnto Yesu.
44005001	Kɛ ɛwak ɛmɔt, mmǔ anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Ananías nɛ ngɔrɛ́ aywi Safíra bátí nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́mɨk.
44005002	Ananías abhɛsɛ mbɔk nkáp ansɛm. Ngɔrɛ́ aywi arɨŋɨ bɛ yi akʉ nɔ. Asɔt anɛ́ árɔ́bhɛ́ arɔk abhʉrɛ bɛsí bǒnto Yesu.
44005003	Kɛ Píta abhɛp yi bɛ, “Ananías, ndaká yí ɔ́rɔ́ Satan ánkó wɔ́ antí bɛ ɔ́nsé nsé ntá Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nɛ ɔrɔ mbɔk nkáp anɛ ɔ́tí mmɨk ansɛm?
44005004	Mpok ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re tí yɔ́, mmɨk achi nyaka chi ayɛ. Nɛ mpok ɔ́tí yɔ́ nkáp abhak chi aywɛ. Ndaká yí ɔkaysi bɛkʉ ɛnɛ ɛnyǔ ɛnyɨŋ? Ɔsensé chi ntá Mandɛm, puyɛ̌ ntá nkwǎ!”
44005005	Nɛghók Ananías ághókó bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn, akwɛ́n amɨk agú. Bɛyǎ bɛcháy bɛ́kɛm yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ághoko ndak anɛ.
44005006	Bɛsak báchwe, mánɛ́p yi nɛ ndɛn, bápɔ́kɔ, barɔk babhɛmɛ.
44005007	Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mbɔ maŋɔk nywɔp arat, ngɔrɛ́ Ananías achwe anywɔ́p, yi kɛrɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari.
44005008	Píta abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ghatí mɛ tɛtɛp, nkáp ankɛm anɛ́ wɔ nɛ nnɛ́m aywɛ bǎtí mmɨk nɛ?” Akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ɛɛ, yɨŋɨ wu ankɛm nɔ.”
44005009	Píta arɛm bɛ, “Ná wɔ nɛ nnɛ́m aywɛ bǎká ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt mɛmɔ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm Acha ɛnyǔ ɛyɔ? Ghok! Bo abhɛn bábhɛ́mɛ́ nnɛ́m aywɛ, báchi afɔ ambǐnywɔp, nɛ chɔŋ mampɔkɔ wɔ nkwɔ.”
44005010	Tɛ́mté wu, Safíra akwɛ́n bɛkak Píta agú. Bɛsak báchwé nɔ́kɔ́ bághɔ́ bɛ agu, bápɔkɔ bafu barɔk babhɛmɛ kɛkwɔt nɛ nnɛ́m.
44005011	Bɛyǎ bɛcháy bɛkɛm bǒnkwɔ Yesu mankɛm nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak anɛ aghoko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari.
44005012	Bǒnto Yesu báre kʉ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay bɛchak bɛsí bo ndǔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm. Báre chɛm nɛbhʉɛt amɔt amɛm nɛbhʉɛt ɛkɛrákap anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ nyaka bɛ Acha Sólomon.
44005013	Yɛ̌ mmu achak kɛchɛm nɛ bhɔ ɛ̌ti bɛcháy, kɛ bo báre chyɛ̀ bhɔ kɛnókó.
44005014	Nɛ bɛyǎ bo, baghɔrɛ́ nɛ babhakanɛm, báré noko, manchɛm nɔkɔ mmʉɛt nɛ nkwɔ́ Yesu.
44005015	Ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn bǒnto bákʉ̀, bo báré pɔkɔ́ bǒmame mámbʉrɛ nɔkɔ nɛpaká mbi, mbɔk ndu bɛkɔ́k, bachak ndu bɛ̌sak, bɛ́ Píta apɛrɛ́ fʉɛt ndɨkandi ywi ánkwɛ́n mbɔk ayap amʉɛt.
44005016	Bɛyǎ bo bare fu ndǔ bɔ̌bɛtɔk abhɛn bachí kɛkwɔt nɛ Yerúsalɛm, mándɔkɔ nɔkɔ nɛ bǒmame, nɛ abhɛ́n bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri bhɔ. Bɔ mankɛm bataŋ.
44005017	Kɛ mǔngo bachiǎkap nɛ bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bachi nɛ yi, nɔ chi bǒnkwɔ Sádusi, bábhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ mpap amɨ́k.
44005018	Bákɛ́m bǒnto báfyɛ́ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
44005019	Kɛ ángɛl Mandɛm atwɔ́ nɛ bɛti, anɛnɛ babhǐnywɔp ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, asɔt bɔ́ báfú, arɛm bɛ
44005020	“Dɔ́k ká amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, mǎnte, mǎngati bo yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ ɛnɛn.”
44005021	Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, bárɔ́k bachwe amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm bábhó bɛtɔŋ bo mbɔ ɛnyǔ ángɛl aghati bhɔ. Mǔngo bachiǎkap nɛ nkwɔ́ ywi bábhɨŋɨ bǒbati ɛtɔk Israɛl mankɛm, bákɛ́m ɛchɛmɛ, bachyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mandɔ́k mamfɛrɛ bǒnto ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ mantwɔ nɛ bhɔ.
44005022	Babhabhɛri abhɛn ɛkɛrákap báchwɔ́p arɛ, kɛghɔ bhɔ. Bápɛtnsɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ,
44005023	“Sɛ́rɔŋ, sɛghɔ babhǐnywɔp femfé, nɛ babhabhɛri nɛfí téé, kɛ sɛ́nɛ́nɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ babhǐnywɔp, sɛbhɨkɨ ghɔ́ yɛ̌ mmu amɛm.”
