44005024	Mǔnti babhabhɛri ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm nɛ bǒ batí bachiǎkap baghoko nɔkɔ nɔ, batí átáka bhɔ amɛm, bare bhɛp mmʉɛt ɛyap ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari nɛ bǒnto Yesu.
44005025	Ɛbhɨkɨ tat, mmu amɔt achwe aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Ghók ká, bo abhɛn bǎfé ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ ɛ́yu, báchí awu amɛm ɛkɛrákap téé bátɔ̀ŋ bo.”
44005026	Mǔnti babhabhɛri ɛkɛrákap nɛ bǒbhi bárɔk basɔt bǒnto, kɛ bákɛ tɔk bɔ́ awɔ amʉɛt ndǔ báchày bɛ bo bákɛ́ tɛmti bɔ́ nɛ batay mangway.
44005027	Bápɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛ bhɔ, bakʉ bɔ baté bɛsí ɛchɛmɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk. Mǔngo bachiǎkap abhɛ́p bɔ́ bɛ
44005028	“Sɛ́yɛp be batu bɛ bǎkɛ́ pɛrɛ rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndǔ nnyɛ́n mmǔ-nɛ? Yɛ̌ nɔ, bǎtàk mbok Yesu amɛm Yerúsalɛm nkɛm nɛ bǎyàŋ bɛkʉ ɛmbak bɛ bɛsɛ́ kɛ sɛ́kʉ́ báwáy yi.”
44005029	Píta nɛ bǒnto Yesu mankɛm bakɛmɛ bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛghok chi Mandɛm, puyɛ̌ nkwǎŋwaŋ.
44005030	Mandɛm bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ́ akʉ Yesu mmu báwáy ndu bago yi ndu ɛkotákátí ampɛtnsɛm ndu nɛpɛ́m.
44005031	Mandɛm akósí yí amfay, afyɛ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt kɛnókó bɛ ambak Mǔntí nɛ Mpɛmɛ, bɛ́ ánchyɛ́ bo Israɛl mbi bɛtɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap Mandɛm amfoŋori bhɔ.
44005032	Sɛ́ghàti bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n sɛ́ghɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k mbɔ batísiɛ, nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmu Mandɛm achyɛ́ ntá bo abhɛn bághòk yi achi ntísiɛ nkwɔ.”
44005033	Bǒ ɛchɛmɛ bǒbatí ɛtɔk bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, batɨ ábe bhɔ tontó. Bábho bɛyaŋ mbi ndu bɛ́way bǒnto Yesu.
44005034	Kɛ mǔnkwɔ Fárisi amɔt, anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Gamáliɛl, abhak arɛ́. Abhak mmu ɛchɛmɛ́ bǒ batí amɔt nkwɔ́ nɛ ntɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm. Bǒ mankɛm báchyɛ̀ nyaka yi kɛnókó. Afate achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mántɛn kpɨk bǒnto Yesu nɛfí.
44005035	Arɛm yɛ ntá bǒbati ɛtɔk bɛ, “Bo Israɛl, sɔt ka mpok ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎkáysi bɛkʉ nɛ bǒbhɛn.
44005036	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ Tiódas árɛ̀m nyaka bɛ yi achi nnɛ́m mmu. Bǒ mbɔ batí bɛsǎ ɛsa (400) babhak bákoŋo bhi. Báwáy nɔ́kɔ́ yi, bakoŋo bhi bhɔ bátáka, nsóŋó ɛyi amay.
44005037	Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, Júdas mmu Gálili nkwɔ afú mpok básɔ̀t mpǎy bho. Aya mbɔk bho báré koŋo yí. Yi nkwɔ agú, nɛ bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bákòŋo nyaka yi bátáka.
44005038	Bɛ́yɨŋɨ yɛ ndak anɛ, nchí ghati beka bɛ mǎndɔ́ bǒbhɛn, bǎkɛ́ kʉ bhɔ́ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Mbák nkaysi-nɛ, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ batɨ̌ bɛkʉ bɛfu chí ntá nkwǎ, chɔŋ mánkwɛn.
44005039	Kɛ mbák bɛfu chi ntá Mandɛm, bǎpú kway bɛchyɛt bhɔ mbi. Bǎkway mbɔŋ bɛghɔ bɛ mánù chí nɛ Mandɛm!”
44005040	Bábhɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ bǒnto Yesu, badɛn bɔ, básɛ́mti bhɔ bɛ bákɛ́pɛrɛ rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu, barɔ bɔ mándɔ́k.
44005041	Bǒnto báfú bárɔ ɛchɛmɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk bárɔ́k nɛ maŋák mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm aghɔ bɛ bɔ bakway bo abhɛn bábhɔ̀ŋ kɛyɔ́rɛ́ ɛ̌ti nnyɛ́n Yesu.
44005042	Bɔ kɛrɔ bɛtɔŋ nɛ bɛ́gháti bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ bɛ Yesu chi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò. Báre kʉ nɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm nɛ amɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhap.
44006001	Mpok yɔ, bakoŋo Yesu báre yá mándɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ. Bɛ́táŋá bɛ́kwɛ́n. Bo Israɛl abhɛn bárɛ̀m ɛyɔŋ Grik nkwɔ báré nywinti bɛ abhɛn bárɛ̀m chi ndiɛrɛ ɛyɔŋ bo Israɛl bákɔ̀rɛ mɛnyɨŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛwak kɛfyɛ́ ntí ndu bɛchyɛ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ bhap.
44006002	Ɛkʉ bǒnto Yesu batí byó nɛ apay bábhɨŋɨ nkwɔ bakoŋo Yesu bárɛm bɛ, “Ɛpú chak bɛ sɛndɔ bɛghati bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, sɛ́ndɔbhɛ taŋ chi baraká nɛnyɛ́.
44006003	Bɔ̌ma, yap yɛ ka bǒbati tándrámɔt. Bábhɔŋ bɛbhak bo abhɛn bo bárɛ̀m ɛrɨ́rɨ́ ɛ̌ti yap, mámbak bo abhɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achi nɛ bhɔ sayri, nɛ mámbak barɨŋɨ́ndak. Yap ka bhɔ́. Sɛ́kway bɛchyɛ bhɔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn.
44006004	Mbák ɛchi nɔ́, chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ mpok bɛchyɛ mmʉɛt ndǔ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt, nɛ ndu bɛ́ghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nɛ ndu bɛ́tɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.”
44006005	Bǒnkwɔ mankɛm bábhɔ́ŋ maŋák ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǒnto barɛmɛ. Báyáp Stífin mmu amɔt anɛ abhɔŋɔ nɛka nɛ Yesu tontó nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achi nyaka nɛ yi mpoknkɛm. Báyap Fílip nkwɔ́, nɛ Prokórɔs, nɛ Nikanɔ́, nɛ Tímɔn, nɛ Pamɛ́nas, nɛ Níkolas, kɛnkɔ anɛ áfú nyaka Antiɔk. Anáŋ áchyɛ̀ nyaka Mandɛm kɛnókó mbɔ ɛnyǔ bo Israɛl bákʉ̀ kɛ ǎnoko Yesu.
44006006	Básɔt bhɔ bɛsí bǒnto Yesu. Bǒnto mánɨkmʉɛt mányáŋa bɔ́ amɔ anti.
44006007	Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ́re go ɛndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, nɛ mpǎy bakoŋo Yesu ayá tontó amɛm ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm. Bɛyǎ bachiǎkap Mandɛm nkwɔ́ báre noko Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́.
44006008	Stífin chí mmu anɛ Mandɛm átɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ndu, achyɛ yí bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ. Stífin akʉ bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay nɛ atɔ́ŋ bɛrɨŋ bɛsí bo.
44006009	Mbɔk bo báfate bábhó bɛkɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ yi. Bábhak bǒ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ɛnɛ bo abhɛn báfɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ kɛsɛm. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ bábhɨŋɨ nyaka yɔ. Bábhák bo Israɛl abhɛn bafu Síren nɛ mmu Aleksánda. Bɔ́bhɔ nɛ bo Israɛl bachak abhɛn bafu atú Silísha nɛ Esia bare kɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ Stífin.
44006010	Kɛ bɔ kɛkwáy bɛkɛmɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́ nɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achyɛ yi.
44006011	Bákú bo mámpu bɛ bághok ndǔ yi árɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Moses nɛ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm.
44006012	Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ mányɨkɨsí batɨ̌ bǒ batí ɛtɔk amɛm, nɛ batɨ batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm, nɛ batɨ bǒ mankɛm. Bákɛ́m yɛ Stífin barɔk bɛsí ɛchɛmɛ bǒ batí ɛtɔk nɛ yi.
44006013	Bátwɔ́ nɛ batísyɛ ákwárɛ́ abhɛn bárɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, “Mmǔ-nɛ apú rɔ bɛrɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ mpoknkɛm ɛ̌ti ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ywɛsɛ́ nɛ nɛ ɛ̌ti ɛbhé Moses.
44006014	Sɛ́ghok ndǔ yi árɛ̀m bɛ chɔŋ Yesu Mmǔ Násárɛt wu amokoti ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ɛnɛ, nɛ angupsi bɛpɨŋ ɛtɔk ɛbhɛn Moses árɔ́ ntá yɛsɛ.”
44006015	Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn báchí amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ manyé chɔkɔ, batɛp Stífin amɨ́k amʉɛt, bághɔ́ bɛ́ bɛsí bhi bɛ́yibhiri bɛrɔbhɛ ghɔɔ chi mbɔ ɛbhɛ́n ángɛl Mandɛm.
44007001	Mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm abhɛ́p Stífin bɛ “Ɛchi tɛtɛp bɛ ɔkʉ barak anɛ bárɛ̀m nɔ bɛ ɔkʉ?”
44007002	Stífin akɛmɛ bɛ, “Bɔmá nɛ bɔta, ghók ka mɛ! Mandɛm bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm abhesi nyaka ntá chi-mbɨ aywɛsɛ́ Ábraham mpok yi achi atú Mɛsopotemia kɛ árɔ̀ŋ ɛtɔk Haran,
44007003	arɛm ntá yi bɛ, ‘Fǎ ɛtɔk ɛyɛ, dɔ̌ nnɛrɛ́kɛt aywɛ dɔ́k atú anɛ mɛ́tɔ̀ŋ chɔŋ wɔ.’
44007004	Ábraham afa yɛ atú bo Cháldia wu, arɔk achɔkɔ ɛtɔk Háran. Ɛtayi ágú nɔ́kɔ́, Mandɛm akʉ yi afa arɛ́ atwɔ́ ndǔ mmɨk anɛ bǎchí arɛ́ ɛchɔŋ.
44007005	Ábraham abhak fá, yɛ̌ nɔ, Mandɛm kɛchyɛ yí yɛ̌ chí mɔ́nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́ mmɨk. Afyɛ́ chí bariɛp bɛ́chyɛ mmɨk ntá yi nɛ ntá bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ bhi yɛ̌ndu yi abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nyaka mmɔ́.
44007006	Mandɛm arɔk ambɨ bɛ́ghati yi bɛ: ‘Chɔŋ bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ bhɛ mámbak mankɔ amɛm ɛtɔk bǒ bachak. Bǒ bhɔ mambʉrɛ bhɔ ndu kɛsɛm, mánchyɛ nɔkɔ bhɔ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri ndu mamiɛ́ bɛsǎ ɛsa.
44007007	Kɛ chɔŋ nchyɛ́ ntɛ́msí ntá bǒ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ́ bɔ bátòk. Nɛ ansɛm mpok, chɔŋ mámfa mántwɔ, mánchyɛ̀ nɔkɔ mɛ kɛnókó fá.’
44007008	Mandɛm anyú yɛ nku nɛ Ábraham. Ɛrɨŋɨ́ nku yɔ ɛbhak nɛsiɛ́p anɛ básiɛ̀p bɔ̌babhakanɛm. Ábraham abhé nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ Áisek, asiɛ́p yi mpok yi ágháká manywɔp ánɛn. Áisek ábhé Jekɔ́p, Jekɔ́p abhak chi ntá bɔ̌ bati byo nɛ apay abhɛn báchí nyaka bachǐmbɨ manɛrɛ́kɛt bo Israɛl.
44007009	“Bachǐmbɨ bhɔ bábhɔ́ŋ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ mɔ́máyap Josɛ́f. Bátǐ yi mbɔ nsɛm ntá bakɔ̌siɛ, Bɔ́ bárɔ́k ɛtɔk Íjip nɛ yi. Kɛ Mandɛm abhak nɛ yi,
44007010	afɛrɛ yí ndǔ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhi mɛnkɛm, atɔ́ŋ yi bɛrɨ̌ndu, nɛ achyɛ́ yi nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak bɛsí Mfɔ Íjip. Mfɔ Íjip achyɛ yi bɛtaŋ amfǎy ɛtɔk Íjip ɛnkɛm, nɛ ɛkɛt ɛyi ɛnkɛm.
44007011	Ansɛm mpok, nsay akwɛ́n ɛtɔk Íjip ɛnkɛm nɛ ɛtɔk Kánǎn. Ɛkʉ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛya ɛcha. Bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ kɛkwáy bɛbhɔŋ nɛnyiɛ.
44007012	Jekɔ́p ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ bɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛchi Íjip, ató bachi bhɛsɛ arɛ́. Ɛbhak ndɔŋ anɛ mbɨ anɛ bɔ́ bárɔ́ŋɔ́ Íjip.
44007013	Nɛrɔ́ŋ anɛ bɔ́ bárɔŋɔ arɛ́ ndɔŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛjwi ɛ́páy, Josɛ́f akʉ bɔ̌mayi bárɨŋɨ yí, nɛ Mfɔ Íjip arɨŋɨ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Josɛ́f.
44007014	Josɛ́f ató yɛ bábhɨŋɨ ɛ́táyi Jekɔ́p nɛ bǒnɛrɛ́kɛt ywi mankɛm, batí bɛsa bɛ́rát nsɛm nɛku.
44007015	Jekɔ́p arɔk ɛtɔk Íjip nɛ nnɛrɛ́kɛt ywi ankɛm. Abhak arɛ́ tɛ mpok anɛ yi ágú nɛ bɔ̌bhi bo bachi bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ.
44007016	Bápɔ́kɔ́ yi bápɛtsɛm Shɛ́kɛm, bábhɛ́mɛ ndǔ nnɛm ɛnɛn Ábraham ákú nyaka ntá bɔ Hamɔ amɛm ɛtɔk Shɛ́kɛm nɛ nkáp sílbhá.
44007017	“Mpok anɛ Mandɛm abhɔŋɔ bɛkʉ bariɛp amɛm yi afyɛ́ nyaka nɛ Ábraham aghaka nɔkɔ kɛkwɔt, mpǎy bo Israɛl abhɛn bachi Íjip bɛpɛt baya tontó.
44007018	Ɛbhak ɛnyu yɔ kpatɛ mmu achak abhak Mfɔ Íjip anɛ abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ nyaka Josɛ́f.
44007019	Mfɔ wú achyɛ bǒ bhɛsɛ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, akʉ bɔtayɛsɛ mándɔ́ bɔ̌bhap nɛfí mángú.
44007020	“Mpok yɔ kɛ bábhé Moses. Arɨ́ tontó nɛ Mandɛm akɔŋ yi. Máne yí ɛkɛt ɛtayi ndǔ bataŋ árát.
44007021	Bárɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi nɛfí, mmɔ́ Mfɔ Íjip anɛ ngɔrɛ́, asɔt yi mbɔ mɔ́ywi, ane yi.
44007022	Bátɔ́ŋ yí nɛrɨŋɨ́ kɛpɨ bo Íjip nɛnkɛm, ágó abhak ɛrɨ́tí ndɛmɛ kɛpɨ nɛ nnɛ́m mmu ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀.
44007023	“Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛ́páy, nkaysi atwɔ́ yi antɨ bɛ ándɔ́k ángɔ́ bɔ̌mayi, bo Israɛl.
44007024	Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ mmu Íjip ádɛ̀n mmu Israɛl amɔt, arɔk bɛkwak yi. Akɛmɛ kɛ́mbé, kpát awáy mmu Ijip wu.
44007025	Moses akaysi bɛ bǒbhi bárɨŋɨ bɛ́ Mandɛm kɛ átó yi ámfɛ́rɛ́ bhɔ́ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri, kɛ bɔ́ kɛrɨŋɨ ɛnyu ɛyɔ.
44007026	Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, arɔk atɛmɛri ndu bǒbhi, bo Israɛl bati apay mánù. Achwe bɛkʉ bɔ mambak ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt, arɛm bɛ, ‘Ghók ká, bǎchí bǒ mmu amɔt, ndaká yí mánù nɛ batɨ?’
44007027	Kɛ anɛ áyáŋ ntɨ mpay, apuri Moses, abhɛ́p yí bɛ, ‘Agha ákʉ́ wɔ mfɔ nɛ ntaŋá manyé yɛsɛ́?
44007028	Ɔ́yàŋ bɛ́way mɛ mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́wáy mmu Íjip ɛ́yú?’
44007029	Moses ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, abʉɛ́ arɔk achɔkɔ ɛtɔk Mídia. Arɛ́ kɛ yi ábháy ngɔrɛ́ abhɔ́ŋ bɔ̌ babhakanɛm bati apay.
44007030	“Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛpay, ángɛl Mandɛm abhesi ntá yi amɛm baso, kɛkwɔt Njiɛ Sináy. Ángɛl wu abhak amɛm ngó anɛ ádù ndǔ mɔ́nɔk amɔt anɛ ágò ɛbhɨ.
44007031	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Moses ághɔ́ ɛkʉ yi abhak maknkay. Nɛ nɛrɔŋ yi árɔ̀ŋ kɛkwɔt bɛyɨŋɨ, aghók Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm Acha ndu ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ,
44007032	‘Mmɛ kɛ nchí Mandɛm bachǐmbɨ bhɛka, Mandɛm Ábraham, Mandɛm Áisek, nɛ Mandɛm Jekɔ́p.’ Nɛ́kóŋó nɛ́kɛ́m Moses, afɛrɛ amɨ́k arɛ.
44007033	Mandɛm Acha arɛm yɛ ntá yi bɛ, ‘Fɛrɛ́ nkwɔbhánya ɛyɛ bɛkak, mbɔnyunɛ nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́mɨk anɛ ɛ́té nɔ arɛ achi nyáŋá.
44007034	Ngɔ̌ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn bǒbha bábhɔ̀ŋ amɛm ɛtɔk Íjip nɛ ngók nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ ɛnap, nɛ nsɛp ntwɔ bɛfɛrɛ bhɔ́ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛyɔ. Twɔ́ yɛ́, chɔŋ ntó wɔ Íjip.’
44007035	“Stífin arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, nkúbhɛ́ Moses anɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ ka nyaka bɛghok yi, nɛ babhɛp yi bɛ, ‘Agha ákʉ́ wɔ mfɔ nɛ ntaŋá manyé ntá yɛsɛ?’ Mandɛm afʉɛt ntá ángɛl anɛ abhesi ntá yi ndu mɔ́nɔk bɛghati yi bɛ ándɔ́k ámbák mǔnti wap nɛ mmu anɛ áfɛrɛ bhɔ ndu ɛsɔŋɔri.
44007036	Moses akʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay, nɛ atɔ́ŋ bɛrɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm amɛm ɛtɔk Íjip. Afɛrɛ bo Israɛl arɛ́, akʉ báfʉɛ́t ndǔ Manyu Chu, nɛ amɛm baso ndǔ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛpay.
44007037	Nkúbhɛ́ Moses-nɛ árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka ntá bo Israɛl bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ Mandɛm anchyɛ bhe ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ achak anɛ áfù ndu nkwɔ yɛka mbɔ ɛnyǔ achyɛ mɛ ntá yɛka.’
44007038	Yí Moses kɛ achi nyaka nɛ́ntɨ́ bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ́ nɛ ángɛl Mandɛm amɛm baso. Mpok yɔ, ángɛl Mandɛm árɛ́m kɛpɨ ntá yi ndu Njiɛ Sináy, akʉ yi arɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ yí ankʉ sɛndɨŋɨ, nɔ́ chí Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí tɛtɛp mpoknkɛm.
44007039	“Kɛ bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ kɛka bɛghok yi. Bápúri yi batɛn nɛpak, kɛ bápɛ́tnsɛm Íjip amɛm batɨ̌-yap.
44007040	Ɛ́kʉ́ barɛm ntá Arɔn bɛ, ‘Ghokó bɔmandɛm ntá yɛsɛ, bɛ mandɔkɔ nɔkɔ bhɛsɛ ambɨ. Mbák chi Moses mmu áfɛ́rɛ́ bhɛsɛ ɛtɔk Íjip, sɛbhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari nɛ yi.’
44007041	Bághóko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi mbɔ mɔ́mpɔŋ, bare chyɛ yɔ akabhɛ́ nya, nɛ mányíɛ́ ɛpa ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ baghoko nɛ amɔ.
44007042	Kɛ Mandɛm atɨknsɛm ntá yap akpɨk arɔ bɔ mánchyɛ̀ nɔkɔ kɛnókó ntá mmok, nɛ ntaŋ nɛ mambě mfay mbɔ bɔmandɛm abhap, mbɔ ɛnyu ɛchi amɛm bɛkáti barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bɛ, ‘Bo Israɛl! Mpok anɛ bǎkɔ̀ amɛm baso ndǔ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛ́páy, ntá yá kɛ̌ báwày nyaka nnya mánchyɛ̀ nɔkɔ akap kɛ?
44007043	Bǎpɔkɔ nyaka ɛ́tɛm ɛnɛ́ mandɛm nsé anɛ áká nyɛ́n bɛ Mɔ́lɔk. Nɛ nɛmbe ɛnɛn mandɛm nsé Ráfan. Nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghókó ndu bɛchyɛ bhɔ kɛnókó. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, chɔŋ mfɛ́rɛ́ be ntó ɛtɔk ɛ́chák bɛfʉɛt Bábilɔn.’
44007044	“Stífin arɔk ambɨ bɛ́rɛm bɛ Bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ́ babhɔ̌ŋ nyaka ɛ́tɛm amɛm baso ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔ́ŋ bɛ́ Mandɛm achí nɛ bhɔ. Moses aghókó nyaka yɔ ɛ́bhák mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm aghati yi, nɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm átɔ́ŋ yi amfay Njiɛ Sináy bɛ ɛbhɔŋ bɛbhak.
44007045	Ansɛm mpok, bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ́ bárɔ yɔ́ ntá bɔ̌bhap. Bápɔ́kɔ́ yɔ́ mpok bákɔ̀ nɛ Jóshua. Mandɛm abók bo abhɛn báchí arɛ bɛsí bɔtayɛsɛ, basɔt mmɨk. Ɛ́tɛm ɛyɔ ɛ́bhák arɛ́ tɛ mpok anɛ Debhít achi mfɔ.
44007046	Mandɛm atɔ́ŋ Debhít bɛrɨ̌ndu. Anɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm Jekɔ́p bɛ andɔ yi anté ɛkɛt ntá yi.
44007047	Sólomon kɛ áté ɛkɛt ɛyɔ ntá Mandɛm.
44007048	Yɛ̌ nɔ, Mandɛm Acha apu chɔkɔ ndǔ bɛkɛt ɛbhɛ́n bo bate nɛ amɔ. Ɛ́chí mbɔ ɛnyǔ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ Mandɛm arɛm bɛ,
44007049	‘Mfay chí ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛya, nɛ mmɨk chi ɛrwɔ ɛnɛ mɛ́sɨ̀kɨ bɛkak arɛ. Ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ ɛkɛt ɔ́kway bɛte ntá ya? nɛbhʉɛ́t anɛ mɛ̌kwáy bɛywemʉɛt achí nɛ fá?
44007050	Pú amɔ́ ya kɛ ághókó mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm-ɛ?’
44007051	“Bɛ́rɔŋ ndǔ ngwɛ́nti, Stífin arɛm bɛ, ‘Bě bo nɛtaŋántɨ, bě bo bǎpu noko Mandɛm nɛ bǎpú ghok ɛyɔŋ ɛyi. Bǎchɛt Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mbi mbɔ bachǐmbɨ bhɛka.
44007052	Ntɨkɨ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ bachǐmbɨ bhɛka bábhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ ɛsɔŋɔri? Nɛ báwày nyaka barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm abhɛn bárɛ́mɛ́ mbɨ mbɨ bɛ, Mmɔ̌ bɛtok anɛ achí chak bɛsí Mandɛm ǎtwɔ̀. Yí wu kɛ bǎtí nɛ bǎwáy.
44007053	Bě kɛ̌ Moses ásɔ́rɛ́ ɛbhé Mandɛm ntá bɔángɛl achyɛ ntá yɛka, yɛ̌ nɔ, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhʉɛrɛ yɔ́.’”
44007054	Bo ɛchɛmɛ bǒ batí ɛtɔk bághókó nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Stífin árɛ̀mɛ, batɨ ábé bɔ tontó, amɨ́k apěti anti.
44007055	Kɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achi nyaka nɛ Stífin tontó. Ayoŋ amɨ́k ayɨŋɨ mfay, aghɔ́ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm, nɛ Yesu téé ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt kɛnókó Mandɛm,
44007056	Stífin arɛm bɛ, “Ghók ka! Ngɔ ndǔ mánɛ́nɛ́ mbǐnywɔp ɛtɔkɔ́ mfay, Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm abhak téé ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt kɛnókó ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm Mandɛm.”
44007057	Kɛ bábhó bɛbɨk ɛ̌ri, báchók batú nɛ amɔ, bádú bárɔ́k bákɛ́m yi.
44007058	Báyá yi báfú ɛtɔk nɛ yí, bátɛ́mti yi nɛ bɛtay bawáy. Batísiɛ bɛtábhá báfɛ́rɛ nkú mfǎmʉɛt ɛyap, barɔ ntá ɛsakámu amɔt bɛ ambabhɛri nɔkɔ. Ɛsakámu wu aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Sɔ̌l.
44007059	Mpok bátɛ̀mti Stífin nɛ batay, anɨkmʉɛt bɛ, “Yesu Acha, sɔt Ɛfóŋó ɛya!”
44007060	Akwɛ́n atɛp mánɛ́n amɨk, arɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Acha, foŋori bhɔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhap ɛbhɛn.” Árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, asɛbhɛ.
44008001	(a) Sɔ̌l abhak arɛ́ téé, aka bɛ́ ɛrɨ mángwáy Stífin. (b) Bɛ́bhó ɛwak ɛyɔ, báré chyɛ nkwɔ Yesu abhɛn báchí Yerúsalɛm bɛyǎ nɛnyok. Ɛkʉ bɔ́ mankɛm bábʉɛ́ bataka atú ɛtɔk Judɛ́ya nɛ átú Samária ankɛm. Ɛrɔp chi bǒnto Yesu bɔ́bhɔ́ amɛm ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm.
44008002	Baway nɔkɔ Stífin, mbɔk bo abhɛn báchyɛ̀ Mandɛm kɛnókó bápɔ́kɔ yi bárɔ́k bábhɛ́mɛ, nɛ bádi yi tontó.
44008003	Mbák chi Sɔ̌l, are yáŋ mbi mɛ́nɛ́mɛ bǒnkwɔ Yesu. Ɛ́kʉ abho bɛ́chwé ɛkɛt nɛ ɛkɛt anja nɔkɔ abhɛn mánókó, baghɔrɛ́ nɛ babhakanɛm, amfyɛ nɔkɔ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
44008004	Bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn bábʉɛ̀ bátáka mbankɛm báre kɔ mángati nɔkɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu.
44008005	Anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Fílip arɔk ɛtɔk ɛ́gho atú Samária angati nɔkɔ mbok ɛ̌ti Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.
44008006	Akʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay arɛ́. Bo baghɔ nɔkɔ nɔ, bɛyǎ bhap báre tá batú sayri ndu bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yí árɛ̀m.
44008007	Bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri bo bɛ́re rɔ bhɔ mɛ́mbɨkɨ nɔkɔ nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ. Bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bachi bhʉrɛ́ nɛ bakɛm bátaŋ nkwɔ.
44008008	Ɛkʉ bɛyǎ maŋák abhak nɛ bǒ ɛtɔk ɛgho Samária ɛyɔ.
44008009	Mmǔfú anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Símun achí nyaka ɛtɔk ɛyɔ nkwɔ. Abhak mǔnjɔ. Anaŋ ákʉ̀ nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ ndu ɛrɔri mpok, andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ́ yí achí ɛtaŋtí mmu. Bǒ Samária babhak maknkay bɛ́ghɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀.
44008010	Bɔ mankɛm, manɛ́m bo nɛ ndɛ́ndɛ́mɛ́ bho bare tá batú bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ághàti bhɔ, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mmǔ-nɛ chi mmu Mandɛm anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Ɛtaŋtǐ mʉ.”
44008011	Barak mandɛm nsé anɛ yi ákʉ̀ ndu ɛrɔ́ri mpok, akʉ bo báre ta batú bɛghók mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi árɛ̀m.
44008012	Fílip átwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti ɛnyu Mandɛm abhak nɛ bǒbhi mbɔ Mfɔ wap nɛ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo, baghɔrɛ́ nɛ babhakanɛm bábho mɛ́nóko mándɔkɔ nɔkɔ bɛ mánjwiti bhɔ́.
44008013	Yɛ̌ Símun nkwɔ́ anoko bájwíti yí. Bájwítí nɔ́kɔ́ yí, abhat mmʉɛt nɛ Fílip, ankoŋo nɔkɔ yi yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak. Nyu arɔp yi fuu ɛ̌ti bɛrɛmɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛ́n Fílip ákʉ̀, nɛ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n Mandɛm áfʉɛ̀t ntá Fílip antɔŋ nɔkɔ.
44008014	Bǒnto abhɛn Yerúsalɛm bághoko nɔkɔ bɛ bǒ-Samaria mánoko Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, bátó Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n arɛ́.
44008015	BɔPíta bachwɔp nɔkɔ Samária, bare nɨkmʉɛt bɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ántwɔ ntá bo abhɛn mánóko Yesu.
44008016	Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhɨkɨ re twɔ nyaka ntá yɛ̌ mmu wap. Yɛ̌ nɔ, manaŋ bajwiti nyaka bhɔ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Acha.
44008017	Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n mányáŋa amɔ́ antí bǒbhɛn manɨkmʉɛt, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ atwɔ́ abhak nɛ bhɔ.
44008018	Símun ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ atwɔ achi nɛ bhɔ́ ndǔ bǒnto mányáŋá bɔ amɔ antí, afɛrɛ nkáp bɛ́chyɛ bǒnto,
44008019	arɛm bɛ, “Kʉ ká mɛnkwɔ́ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́ yɛ̌ agha anɛ nyáŋá yi amɔ́ anti Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ántwɔ́ ntá yi.”
44008020	Kɛ Píta akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛghori ɛ́mpɔ́kɔ́ wɔ́ nɛ nkáp aywɛ! Ɔkáysí bɛ́ ɔ̌kwáy bɛ́ku akap Mandɛm nɛ nkáp na?
44008021	Dɨŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ yɛ ɛnyɨŋ ndu bɛtɨk ɛbhɛsɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ ntɨ ɛnɛ nɛ́pú chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
44008022	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, tɨ́k nsɛm ndǔ nkaysi bɛbʉ́ anɛ achi wɔ antɨ ɔ́nɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm Acha. Ngufú chɔŋ amfoŋori nkaysi anɛ achi wɔ antɨ.
44008023	Ngɔ bɛ́ ɔbhɔŋ ɛpɔ̌ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ ɔ́kwɛ̌n nsɛm antɛn bɛbʉ́.”
44008024	Símun aghoko nɔkɔ nɔ, akɛmɛ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Bɔta, nɨk ka Mandɛm mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti ya bɛ́ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ɛnɛ bǎrɛ́mɛ́ ɛ́kɛ́ fakari nɛ mɛ.”
44008025	Mánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ghati bo mbok Yesu nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi akʉ ntá yap, bárɔ́ bare pɛtnsɛm Yerúsalɛm. Báre téé ndǔ bɔ́bɛtɔk Samária mangati nɔkɔ bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu.
44008026	Kɛ ángɛl Acha atwɔ́ arɛm ntá Fílip bɛ, “Faté sɛp ndǔ ɛsɨ́ mbi anɛ áfù Yerúsalɛm árɔ̀ŋ Gása”.
44008027	Fílip afate abho bɛ́rɔŋ. Ɛ́fákari bɛ́ mmǔ Ɛtǒpia amɔt anɛ afú Yerúsalɛm ndǔ mɛnɨkmʉɛt ápɛtnsɛm ɛtɔk ɛyi amɛm ɛ́kárɨk ɛnɛ mpɔŋɔ́ndɨ́k ɛ́yà. Abhak mǔngo Ɛtǒpia anɛ baghaka nɛ yi kɛ akɛmɛ nyaka ɛfɨŋɨ́ ɛkɛrɛ́ nkáp mbɔ mmu anɛ baghaka yi apu kway nyaka bɛchɛm nɛ bo abhɛn mfɔ ngɔrɛ́ Mfɔ Ɛtǒpia wu aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Kándas. Ɛnɛ́ yí áchi amɛm ɛkarɨk ɛyi árɔ̀ŋ, are pay ɛkáti ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Aisáya.
44008029	Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ aghati Fílip bɛ, “Dɔ́k awu kɔ nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ ɛkarɨk ɛyɔ.”
44008030	Fílip ajɛt arɔk kɛkwɔt nɛ yɔ́, aghók ndǔ mmu wu ápày ɛkáti ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Aisáya. Abhɛ́p yí bɛ, “Ɔ̌bhɔŋ nɔ nɛjwǐmɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɔ́pày?”
44008031	Mǔngo Ɛtǒpia wu akɛmɛ bɛ, “Mɛ̌kwáy bɛjwimɛm ná ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ mmu ábhɨ́kɨ́ nɛ́nɛ angati mɛ?” Abhɨŋɨ yɛ Fílip ánkó ánchɔ́kɔ́ nɛ yí amɛm ɛ́kárɨ́k.
44008032	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ápày ndǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛbhak bɛ́: “Achí nyaka mbɔ ághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n anɛ bakɛmɛ bárɔŋ bɛway, mbɔ mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n anɛ báfɛ̀rɛ ɛmɛnɛ ɛyi, yɛ̌ bɛbɨk yɔ kɛbɨk. Akɛ nɛ́nɛ ɛyɔŋ. Báyɔ́rɛ yi, bataŋ yi, bákpɔ́t nyé ɛni, bachyɛ yi ɛsɔŋɔri ndɛ́ndɛm. Agha ákway bɛtɔŋ bɛ, Yɨŋɨ́ mɔ̌wa nɛ́, ɛnɛ́ bákpɔ́rɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ambɨ ambɨ fá amɨk?”
44008034	Mǔngo wu abhɛ́p Fílip bɛ, “Ɛ̌tá, ghati mɛ́, ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ asɨ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m nɔ́ ɛ̌ti agha? Arɛm nɔ chí ɛ̌ti mmu áchák kɛ ɛ̌ti mmʉɛt ɛyi?”
44008035	Fílip abho ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt ɛkáti Aisáya wu agháti mǔngo Ɛtǒpia Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Yesu.
44008036	Báre kɔ mándɔkɔ nɔkɔ. Bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ manyiɛp achi, arɛm ntá Fílip bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́ manyiɛp. Ntí achí anɛ bábhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́jwiti mɛ?”
44008037	[Fílip akɛmɛ yí bɛ, “Mbák ɔ́sɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ ɛnɛ nɛnkɛm nɛ Yesu, mɛ̌kwáy bɛ́jwiti wɔ.” Mmǔ wu akɛmɛ yí bɛ́ “Nnókó bɛ Yesu Kristo chí Mmɔ Mandɛm.”]
44008038	Mǔngo wu achyɛ yɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ mánkʉ ɛ́kárɨk ɛ́nté. Ɛ́té nɔ́kɔ́, bɔ́ nɛ Fílip básɛp báchwe anyɛ́n, Fílip ajwiti yí.
44008039	Báfú nɔ́kɔ́ anyɛ́n, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ afɛrɛ Fílip arɛ́, mǔngo Ɛtǒpia wu kɛpɛrɛ ghɔ́ yi. Yɛ̌ nɔ, arɔk ambɨ nɛ nɛkɔ ɛni nɛ maŋák.
44008040	Fílip ápɛ́rɛ yɨŋɨ arɔp chí ɛtɔk Asótus. Abho bɛ́ghati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ arɛ. Arɔk ambɨ bɛ́kʉ nɔ ndu bɔ̌bɛtɔk mankɛm abhɛn báchi ambi kpátɛ mpok yi aghaka Seséria.
44009001	Mpok ɛyɔ nkɛm, Sɔ̌l arɔk ambɨ bɛpa bɛ yi abhɔŋ bɛway bakoŋo Yesu. Arɔk ntá mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm,
44009002	aghati yi bɛ anchyɛ yi bɛkáti ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́chyɛ yi bɛtaŋ bɛrɔŋ Damáskɔs ndu bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bo Israɛl bɛ́ mbák ángɔ́ bakoŋo Mbi Yesu arɛ́, ankwáy bɛ́kɛ́mti bhɔ́, baghɔrɛ́ nɛ babhakanɛm, angwɔ́t, andɔk Yerúsalɛm nɛ bhɔ́.
44009003	Sɔ̌l afa yɛ are rɔ́ŋ. Agháká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ Damáskɔs, bɛdíɛ́rɛ́ bɛfú amfay tɛ́mchok bɛsɛp bɛ́káp yi.
44009004	Sɔ̌l akwɛ́n amɨk, aghók ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́bhɛ̀p yi bɛ, “Sɔ̌l, Sɔ̌l, ndaká yí ɔ́chyɛ̀ mɛ nɛnyok?”
44009005	Sɔ̌l akɛmɛ bɛ, “Acha, chí wɔ agha?” Ɛyɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́kɛ́mɛ yí bɛ, “Mmɛ Yesu kɛ ɔ́kòŋo gbɔkɔ́gbɔkɔ ɔnchyɛ nɔkɔ nɛnyok.
44009006	Kɛ faté, dɔ́k amɛm ɛtɔk ɛgho. Chɔŋ mángati wɔ́ arɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kʉ.”
44009007	Bǒ abhɛn bákɔ̀ nyaka nɛ Sɔ̌l, bághók ɛyɔŋ ɛyɔ, kɛ bɔ kɛghɔ yɛ̌ mmú. Báte manyu chochok.
44009008	Sɔ̌l afate amɨk, anɛnɛ amɨ́k, kɛ yi kɛkwáy bɛghɔ mbaŋ. Bákɛ́m yi ndu awɔ, baya barɔk ɛtɔk Damáskɔs.
44009009	Abhak arɛ́ ndǔ manywɔp árát, yi kɛkwáy bɛghɔ mbaŋ. Mpok yɔ nkɛm yi kɛnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́, yɛ̌nyɨŋ yi kɛ nyu.
44009010	Nkoŋo Yesu amɔt achi nyaka Damáskɔs anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Ananías. Aghɔ́ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k ántífú ndu Yesu Acha abhɨŋɨ yí bɛ, “Ananías.” Aka arɛm bɛ, “Acha, ghɔ́ mɛ́ nɛ.”
44009011	Acha aghati yi bɛ, “Faté dɔ́k ndu nkɔngɔ-ɛtɔk anɛ́ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ́ Téé. Ɔ́náŋ ɔ́nchwɔp ndǔ ɛkɛt Júdas bɛ́p mmu Tásɔs anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Sɔ̌l. Achí arɛ́ ǎnɨ̀kmʉɛt.
44009012	Nɛ ndǔ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k ántí fúú, aghɔ́ mmu anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ́ Ananías, ndu áchwé anywɔ́p. Anyaŋa amɔ anti ywi bɛ́ ámpɛt ankway bɛghɔ mbaŋ.”
44009013	Ananías akɛmɛ bɛ, “Acha, bɛyǎ bo bághátí mɛ mbok Sɔ̌l wu nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákú ntá bǒbhɛ awu Yerúsalɛm.
44009014	Bǒbatí bachiǎkap Mandɛm báchyɛ́ yí bɛtaŋ, nɛ atwɔ fá chi bɛ́kɛmti bǒbhɛ.”
44009015	Kɛ Yesu Acha aghati yi bɛ, “Dɔ́k mbɔnyunɛ njap yí ámbák mʉ̌bɛtɨk awa, bɛ́ ándɔk ángati bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, nɛ bafɔ bhap, nɛ bo Israɛl ɛ̌ti ɛya.
44009016	Chɔŋ mɛmbɔŋ ntɔŋ yí ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnkɛm ɛnɛ́ yí ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛghɔ ɛ̌ti ya.”
44009017	Ananías árɔ́ yɛ arɔk áchwé amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ Sɔ̌l áchi arɛ. Anyaŋa yí amɔ ántí arɛm bɛ, “Sɔ̌l, manɔ́, mbɔŋ Yesu Acha mmu abhésí ntá yɛ ankɔŋɔmbi mpok ɔ́twɔ̀ fá, kɛ átó mɛ́ nkʉ́ ɔ́mpɛt ɔ́ngɔ́ mbaŋ nɛ bɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ambak nɛ wɔ.”
44009018	Tɛ́mté wu ɛbhak ntá Sɔ̌l mbɔ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ bɛfabhɛ́ nsi bɛfu yí amɨ́k bɛkwɛnti. Apɛt abho bɛghɔ mbaŋ. Afate yɛ arɔk bájwíti yi.
44009019	Anyíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛ́pɛ́tnsɛm. Sɔ̌l abhak Damáskɔs nɛ bakoŋo Yesu ndu mpǎy manywɔp.
44009020	Abho yɛ bɛ́rɔ́ŋ ndǔ bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bo Israɛl tɛ́mté angati nɔkɔ bo ɛ̌ti Yesu bɛ́, “Yesu áchí Mmɔ Mandɛm.”
44009021	Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bághókó yi, bábhák maknkay, mámbɛbhɛ nɔkɔ batɨ bɛ, “Pú nkúbhɛ́ mmǔ-nɛ kɛ ákɔ̀ nyaka angʉɛbhɛ nɔkɔ nɛnu nɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨ̀ŋɨ nnyɛ́n Yesu awu Yerúsalɛm nɛ? Atwɔ fá chí bɛ́ ánkɛ́mtí bo Yesu angwɔt, ansɔt ampɛtnsɛm nɛ bhɔ Yerúsalɛm. Atwɔ fá ndu bɛkɛmti bhɔ bɛ ansɔt ampɛtnsɛm nɛ bhɔ́ ntá bǒ batí bachiǎkap Mandɛm.”
44009022	Yɛ̌ nɔ, Sɔ̌l are tɔ́ŋ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu andɔk nɔkɔ chí ambɨ. Are fʉɛ́t ndu bɛyǎ babhi bɛtɔŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ́ Yesu kɛ áchí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò ɛnyunɛ́ bo Israɛl abhɛn báchí Damáskɔs bábhɨkɨ kwáy bɛkɛm kɛfe nɛ yí.
44009023	Ɛfʉɛrɛ nɔkɔ bɛyǎ manywɔp, bǒbati bo Israɛl báté ɛyu bɛway Sɔ̌l.
44009024	Sɔ̌l arɨŋɨ nkaysi yap. Báre noŋ yi bɛti nɛ ngósí ndu manyǔbhá anɛ Damáskɔs bɛ mpok yi áyàŋ bɛfʉɛt, mankɛm yí mangway.
44009025	Kɛ bɛti mɛ́mɔt, bakoŋó Sɔl basɔt yi báfyɛ́ amɛm ɛkay bákʉ yi áfʉɛ́t ndǔ mbok anɛ́ áchi ndǔ nkok anɛ ákábhɛ́ ɛtɔk, básɛ́bhɛ yi amɨk ansɛm ɛbhá. Abʉɛ́.
44009026	Sɔ̌l apɛtnsɛm Yerúsalɛm are mɔ bɛ́chɛm mmʉɛt nɛ bakoŋo Yesu arɛ́, kɛ bɔ́ kɛnoko bɛ yi achi nkoŋo Yesu. Báre chay mámbʉɛ nɔkɔ yí.
44009027	Kɛ mmu amɔt anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Banábas asɔt yí arɔk ntá bǒnto Yesu. Aghati bhɔ ɛnyǔ Sɔ̌l aghɔ Yesu Acha ambi mpok yi árɔ̀ŋ Damáskɔs nɛ ɛnyǔ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ kɛpɨ nɛ yi. Aghati nkwɔ́ bɔ́ ɛnyǔ Sɔ̌l átɔ́ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm kpoŋoroŋ ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu awu Damáskɔs kɛbhɔ́ŋ bɛcháy.
44009028	Bɛbho yɛ mpok yɔ, achɛm mmʉɛt nɛ bakoŋo Yesu Acha ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ bákʉ̀.
44009029	Are tɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu kɛbhɔ́ŋ bɛcháy. Mpók nɛ mpok ándɛm nɔkɔ ɛ̌ti Yesu ntá bo Israɛl abhɛn bárɛ̀m ɛyɔŋɔ Grik, ankɛm nɔkɔ ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ bhɔ́. Ɛkʉ bare yáŋ chí bɛ́wáy yí.
44009030	Batɨ̌ Bǒ nkwɔ́ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, básɔt yi barɔk Seséria, bátó yí ándɔ́k Tásɔs.
44009031	Ɛ́fákári yɛ bɛ bǒnkwɔ Yesu abhɛn bachi atú Judɛ́ya, nɛ abhɛn atú Gálili, nɛ abhɛn atú Samária nkɛm kɛpɛrɛ bhɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri. Bakoŋo Yesu bábhʉrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ nɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ bɔ báchyɛ̀ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ are chyɛ bhɔ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́, anchyɛ nɔkɔ bhɔ bɛtaŋ. Ɛ́kʉ bɛyǎ bo báchák báre noko Yesu mánchɛm nɔkɔ nɛ bhɔ.
44009032	Ɛ́fákari bɛ Píta ǎkɔ̀ nyaka mbǎŋ nɛ mbaŋ ndu bɛ́byo bo Mandɛm. Ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t, arɔk bɛbyo abhɛn bachi ɛtɔk ɛnɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Lída.
44009033	Akwɛsɛ mbɛ́ntí amɔt arɛ́. Báre pɔ̀kɔ yi yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ yi árɔ̀ŋ. Abhak ɛnyu yɔ ndu mamiɛ́ ánɛ̀n. Aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Aénias.
44009034	Píta arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Aénias, Yesu Kristo ǎkʉ̀ wɔ ɔ́ntáŋ nɛ́nɛ. Faté pɛ́t ɛ̌sák ɛyɛ.” Tɛ́mte wu, atɛ́m afate.
44009035	Bǒ ɛtɔk Lída nɛ Shárɔn babhak arɛ́. Bɔ mankɛm bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndu Aénias ákɔ̀, mánókó Yesu Acha.
44009036	Ngɔrɛ́ amɔt achi nyaka ɛtɔk Jopa anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Tabíta, [Nɔ́ chí Dɔ́kas ndu ɛyɔŋ Grik] abhak nkoŋo Yesu. Ǎkʉ nyaka bɛrɨ, ankwak nɔkɔ bachɛ́bhɛ́bho mpoknkɛm.
44009037	Mpok yɔ, akwɛ́n nɛme agú. Báso yi bábhʉrɛ amɛm mɔ́kɛrɛ́mfay ndu ɛkɛrɛ́ mfay.
44009038	Jopa kɛsap nɛkɔ nɛ Lída. Bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn Jopa bághók bɛ Píta achi Lída. Bátó bo batí apay, ntá yi. Bárɔk manɨk yi mmʉɛt bɛ, “Ɛta, twɔ ghɔ bhɛsɛ́ ayak, kɛ́chɔŋti mpok.”
44009039	Píta afa yɛ are rɔŋ nɛ bhɔ. Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ́, basɔt yi bako ndu mɔ́kɛrɛ́mfay. Bɛyǎ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ bábhak arɛ. Bɔ́ mankɛm bakap Píta. Báre di, mántɔŋ nɔkɔ ndɛn ɛnɛ Tabita áyɛ́mɛ́ ntá yap mpok yi achi nɛpɛ́m.
44009040	Píta aghati bɔ́ mankɛm mámfu nɛfí. Atɛp mánɛ́n amɨk anɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm. Ayibhiri mmʉɛt ntá ngu arɛm bɛ, “Tabíta, faté!” Tabíta anɛnɛ amɨ́k. Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Píta afate achɔkɔ chɔ́kɔ́.
44009041	Píta asá áwɔ́ akɛm yi akwak yi afate. Abhɨŋɨ yɛ bo Mandɛm nɛ mánkwɛ́sɛ́, asɔt Dɔ́kas atɔ́ŋ bɔ́ bɛ mangɔ bɛ́ yi achí nɛpɛ́m.
44009042	Mbok Dɔ́kas ataka ɛtɔk Jopa ɛnkɛm. Bɛyǎ bo mánóko, básɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Yesu Acha.
44009043	Píta arɔk ambɨ bɛchɔkɔ Jopa ndǔ bɛyǎ manywɔp nɛ ngoko nkwɔbhɛ́nya ɛnɛ bághárɛ́ amʉɛt nnya ɛnɛ baway. Nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛ́bhak bɛ Símun.
44010001	Mmufú achí nyaka ɛtɔk Seséria, anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Kɔnéliɔs. Abhak mǔntí ɛ́ká batɛmɛ́ nɛnu Rom bɛsa bɛ́táy. Báré bhɨŋɨ ɛka ɛyɔ bɛ́ Ɛka Itália.
44010002	Kɔnéliɔs abhak mmu anɛ ákɔ́ŋɔ́ baraká Mandɛm nɛ ǎchyɛ̀ nyaka Mandɛm kɛnókó nɛ ɛfo ɛyi ɛnkɛm. Abhak mmu anɛ ánɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm mpoknkɛm, anchyɛ nɔkɔ bɛyǎ nɛkwak ntá bo Israɛl abhɛn bachi bachɛ́bhɛ́bho.
44010003	Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, mbɔ nkarɛnka ɛrat nɛ ngósí, aghɔ́ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k anti fúú. Aghɔ́ sayri ndu ángɛl Mandɛm amɔt átwɔ́ ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ yi bɛ, “Kɔnéliɔs!”
44010004	Ayoŋ amɨ́k are yɨŋɨ ángɛl wu nɛ bɛcháy, abhɛp yi bɛ, “Ɛta chí yi?” Ángɛl Mandɛm akɛmɛ bɛ, “Mandɛm aghok nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnɛ, aghɔ́ nɛkwak ɛnɛ́n ɔ́chyɛ́ ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho nɛ abhɔŋ maŋák nɛ wɔ.
44010005	Tó yɛ bo Jopa bɛ mandɔ́k mámbɨ́ŋɨ́ mmu anɛ ákà nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Símun anɛ nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛchak nɛchi bɛ Píta.
44010006	Ǎchɔ̀kɔ nɛ Símun ngoko nkwɔbhɛ́nya. Ɛkɛt Símun wu ɛchi angɔkɔ manyu.”
44010007	Ángɛl Mandɛm árɔŋɔ nɔkɔ, Kɔnéliɔs nkwɔ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhi batí apay nɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu amɔt anɛ achi nyaka nɛ yi mpoknkɛm ankwaka nɔkɔ yi. Ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu wu abhak mmu anɛ áchày Mandɛm.
44010008	Bátwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́, aghati bhɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ángɛl Mandɛm árɛ́mɛ́. Ató yɛ bɔ́ ɛtɔk Jopa.
44010009	Bárɔ bare rɔŋ, bágháká kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ ɛtɔk mbɔ nkárɛ́nká byo nɛ ɛpay. Nkúbhɛ́ mpok yɔ, Píta akó amfay ɛkɛt ndu mɛnɨkmʉɛt. Mfay ɛkɛt abhak ransi.
44010010	Nsay akɛ́m yi, are yáŋ ɛnyɨŋ mɛ́nyiɛ́ mpok anɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛbhʉɛt angó, aghɔ́ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k ántífú.
44010011	Aghɔ́ bɛ́ nɛbu nɛ́nɛ́nɛ. Ɛnyɨŋɨ́fú ɛ́fú arɛ ɛre sɛp amɨk. Ɛ́bhak mbɔ ntěndɛn nɛgho ɛnɛ́n bákɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ batí yi anwi básɛ̀bhɛ amɨk.
44010012	Mɛnyǔ nnya mɛnkɛm bɛ́bhak ndu ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ. Nnya ɛnɛ́ bɛkak mɛnwi ɛbhak arɛ́ nɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́sù mɛniɛ amɨk nɛ kɛnɛn.
44010013	Aghók ɛyɔŋ ndu ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Píta, faté, wáy nyìɛ.”
44010014	Kɛ Píta akɛmɛ bɛ, “Cháá! Acha mbɨ́kɨ́ re nyiɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛpu pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm wáwák.”
44010015	Ɛyɔŋ ɛpɛt ɛtwɔ ntá yí ndɔŋ anɛ ájwí ɛpay bɛ, “Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm akʉ bɛ ɛmbak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí bhi, yɛ̌ mmu akɛ rɛm bɛ ɛ́pú pɛ́pɛ́p.”
44010016	Ɛ́fákárí nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyu yɔ ndɔŋ ɛ́rát, ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́pɛ́tnsɛm amfay.
44010017	Ɛnɛ́ Píta abhʉɛ́t bɛyaŋ bɛrɨŋɨ ntí kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k antífú ɛkɔ, bǒ abhɛn Kɔnéliɔs átó, bare bhɛp ɛbhak ɛnɛ Símun áchí. Bárɔ́k kpát báchwɔp ndǔ nyǔbha ɛkɛt ɛnɛ yi achi arɛ.
44010018	Básá ɛyɔŋ babhɛp mbák mmu anɛ ákà nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Símun Píta achí arɛ́.
44010019	Nɛ ɛnɛ́ Píta abhʉɛ́t bɛkáysi kɛnɔ́ ɛkɔ, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ arɛm ntá yí bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́, bǒ batí árát báyàŋ wɔ.
44010020	Faté, sɛp, dɔ́k áyák nɛ bhɔ nɛ ɔ́kɛ́ chɔnti mpok. Mɛ kɛ ntó bɔ.”
44010021	Píta asɛp arɔk ntá bǒbhɔ, arɛm bɛ, “Mɛ kɛ nchí mmu anɛ bǎyàŋ. Bǎtwɔ ndaká yí?”
44010022	Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Kɔnéliɔs, mǔnti batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bɛsa bɛ́tay, kɛ ato bhɛsɛ́ ntá yɛ. Achí chak bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ ǎchày Mandɛm. Bo Israɛl mankɛm báchyɛ̀ yi kɛnókó tontó. Ángɛl Mandɛm ághátí yi ántó mámbɨŋɨ wɔ, ɔ́ntwɔ ɛkɛt ɛyi, bɛ angok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́gháti yi.”
44010023	Píta asɔt bɔ́ árɔk anywɔ́p nɛ bhɔ. Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, Píta afa are rɔ́ŋ nɛ bɔ́. Mbɔk bǒ nkwɔ́ Yesu abhɛn Jopa bárɔ́k nɛ yi.
44010024	Bákɔ bábhʉrɛ ambi, kɛ nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́ báchwɔp Seséria. Kɔnéliɔs anáŋ arɨŋɨ nyaka bɛ́ Píta ǎtwɔ̀. Ató bábhɨŋɨ bǒ nnɛrɛ́kɛt nɛ mamʉɛrɛ bhi. Bɔ́ mankɛm bachɔkɔ mánoŋ nɔkɔ bɔPíta.
44010025	Nɛchwe Píta áchwe anywɔ́p, Kɔnéliɔs akwɛ́n yi bɛkak, abho bɛ́chyɛ yí kɛnókó.
44010026	Kɛ Píta akɛm yí ndu awɔ, bɛ yí amfate, arɛm bɛ, “Mɛ nkwɔ́ nchí chí nkwǎ mbɔ wɔ.”
44010027	Nɛ ndu bárɛ̀m kɛpɨ nɛ Píta, Píta achwe anywɔ́p, aghɔ́ bɛyǎ bo.
44010028	Arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bě babhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ ndu ɛbhé ɛyɛsɛ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ mmu Israɛl abhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ bɛfyɛ mmʉɛt nɛ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nɛ abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌ chi bɛrɔŋ bɛghɔ bhɔ. Kɛ Mandɛm atɔŋ mɛ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ, nkɛ́ yɨŋɨ yɛ̌ mmu mbɔ bɛ abhɨkɨ kway bɛsí bha.
44010029	Ngɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ bo abhɛn ɔ́tó, mfá nde twɔ́ nkɛkɛ́m ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ mmu. Ghatí yɛ mɛ ntí anɛ ɔ́bhɨŋɨ mɛ́!”
44010030	Kɔnéliɔs akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Ɛ́kʉ manywɔp anwi ɛchɔŋ ɛnɛ́ nchí amɛm ɛkɛt ɛya nchí nɨkmʉɛt. Nkúbhɛ́ mpok mbɔ anɛ, mbɔ nkarɛnka ɛ́rát nɛ ngósí, mmu abhesi mɛ bɛsí nɛ nkú anɛ are ghɔɔ,
44010031	árɛm bɛ, ‘Kɔnéliɔs, Mandɛm aghok nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnɛ, nɛ aghɔ nɛkwak ɛnɛ́n ɔ́chyɛ̀ bachɛ́bhɛ́ bho.
44010032	Tó yɛ mmu Jopa bɛ andɔk ambɨŋɨ mmu anɛ ákà nnyɛ́n bɛ Símun Píta. Achí kɛnkɔ amɛm ɛkɛt Símun ngoko nkwɔbhɛ́nya nɛ ɛkɛt ɛyi ɛ́chí angɔkɔ manyu!’
44010033	Ntó yɛ bo tɛ́mté bɛ́ mámbɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ, nɛ ɛ́rɨ ndu ɔ́twɔ́. Bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́chí fá bɛsí Mandɛm ndu bɛghok yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Acha ágháti wɔ ɔ́ngátí bhɛsɛ́.”
44010034	Píta abho yɛ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Ngɔ sayri bɛ́ Mandɛm apú tɔŋ kɛ́rɨ́ŋámík.
44010035	Kɛ ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk, yɛ agha anɛ áchày Mandɛm ankʉ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́chi chak bɛsí bhi, Mandɛm ǎsɔt yi ambak mmǔ ywi.
44010036	Nkáysí bɛ bǎrɨŋɨ ntó ɛnɛn yi ató nyaka ntá yɛsɛ bo Israɛl bɛ chɔŋ ankʉ bo mambak sayri nɛ yi ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Kristo akʉ. Yi Yesu achí Acha amfǎy bo mankɛm.
44010037	Bǎrɨŋɨ ɛrɛmɛ́ ndak anɛ́ áfákárí atú Judɛ́ya ankɛm, bɛ́bho atú Gálili, mpok Jɔ̌n ánáŋ ánáŋá nyaka bɛghati bo bɛ mántɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap yi anjwiti bhɔ.
44010038	Bǎrɨŋɨ ɛ̌ti Yesu mmu Násárɛt, nɛ ɛnyu Mandɛm achyɛ́ nyaka yi Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nɛ bɛtaŋ. Akɔ mbǎnkɛm ankʉ nɔkɔ bɛrɨ nɛ ambu nɔkɔ bǒ mankɛm abhɛn Satan áchyɛ̀ bhɔ ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm achi nɛ yí.
44010039	Nɛ sɛ́ghɔ nɛ amɨ́k mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́ Yerúsalɛm nɛ mbaŋ ɛchak amɛm ɛtɔk bo Israɛl. Bágó yí ndu ɛkotákátí, agú.
44010040	Kɛ ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp árát, Mandɛm akʉ yi apɛtnsɛm ndu nɛpɛ́m, atɔ́ŋ mmʉɛt kpoŋoroŋ ntá bo.
44010041	Kɛ abhɨkɨ tɔ́ŋ mmʉɛt chí ntá bo mankɛm. Atɔ́ŋ mmʉɛt ntá batísiɛ́ abhɛn Mandɛm ánáŋ áyábhɛ́, nɔ́ chí bhɛsɛ́ bo sɛ́nyíɛ́ nɛ sɛ́nyú nɛ yi mpok yi ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndu nɛpɛ́m.
44010042	Nɛ yi aghátí bhɛsɛ bɛ́ sɛ́kɛ́rɔ bɛghati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ yɔ ntá bo, nɛ bɛ́ sɛ́nkʉ bo mándɨŋɨ bɛ́ yí kɛ̌ Mandɛm ayabhɛ bɛ ambak mmu nɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́táŋ bo abhɛn bachi nɛpɛ́m nɛ abhɛn bágú.
44010043	Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ mankɛm bárɛ̀m nyaka ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, yɛ̌ agha anɛ asɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Yesu, Mandɛm ǎfoŋori bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi ɛ̌ti yi Yesu.”
44010044	Ɛnɛ́ Píta abhʉɛ́t bɛ́rɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ atwɔ́ abhak nɛ bo mankɛm abhɛn bághòk Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
44010045	Bǒ nkwɔ́ Yesu abhɛn bachí bo Israɛl, nɔ́ chí abhɛn báfú Jopa nɛ Píta, bábhak maknkay tontó mbɔnyunɛ bághɔ́ bɛ Mandɛm achyɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nkwɔ.
44010046	Bábhak maknkay mbɔnyunɛ bághók ndu bobhɔ́ bárɛ̀m bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk bɛ́chák bɛ́chák ɛbhɛ́n bɔ́ bábhɨkɨ ghɔ́k, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mandɛm ataŋ nɛ arɨ achá!” Ɛ́kʉ Píta arɛm bɛ́,
44010047	“Mandɛm achyɛ́ bǒbhɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔnyu yí áchyɛ́ nyaka bhɛsɛ bo Israɛl. Agha ákwáy yɛ bɛ́káŋ bɛ́ bákɛ́ jwiti bhɔ́?”
44010048	Achyɛ yɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ mánjwiti bhɔ́ ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo. Bájwítí bhɔ. Bárɛm bɛ Píta anchɔkɔ nɛ bhɔ ndu mpǎy manywɔp.
44011001	Bǒnto nɛ bakoŋo Yesu báchák atú Judɛ́ya ankɛm, bághók bɛ mbɔk bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl mánóko Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nkwɔ.
44011002	Mbɔk bo bachi nyaka ndu nkwɔ́ bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn báte bɛ bábhɔŋ bɛ́siɛ́p yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu mbɔ bɔ́ bo Israɛl, kɛ ankwáy bɛ́bhak mmu Mandɛm. Píta ápɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nsɛm Yerúsalɛm, bǒbhɔ báré ji yí mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ,
44011003	“Yí ɛkʉ ɔ́rɔ́ŋ ɔ́chwé amɛm ɛkɛt bo ɛtɔk ɛ́chák abhɛn bábhɨkɨ syɛp bhɔ kpátɛ ɔ̌nyìɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ bhɔ́?”
44011004	Píta abho yɛ bɛ́ghati bhɔ́ sayri yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fákári tɛ ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt bɛ,
44011005	“Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt ndu nchí nɨkmʉɛt awu ɛtɔk Jopa, ngɔ́ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k antífú. Ngɔ́ ndu ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́fú amfay ɛ́sɛ̀p. Ɛbhak mbɔ ntěndɛn nɛgho ɛnɛn bákɛ́mɛ́ bati yi anwi básɛ̀bhɛ amɨk. Ɛgháká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛkwɔ́t nɛ mɛ ɛ́te.
44011006	Njɨŋɨ sayri bɛghɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi arɛ. Ngɔ́ nnya mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu. Nnya ɛnɛ anywɔ́p nɛ nnya ɛbebe nɛ nnya ɛnɛ́ ɛ́sù mɛniɛ amɨk nɛ kɛnɛn.
44011007	Ngók ɛyɔŋ ndu ɛ́ghàti mɛ bɛ ‘Píta, faté, wáy nyiɛ!’
44011008	Kɛ nkɛmɛ bɛ ‘Acha wáwák! Mbɨ́kɨ́ re nyiɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pú pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí ɛbhɛ.’
44011009	Kɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛpɛt ɛrɛm ndɔŋ anɛ ájwi ɛpay bɛ, ‘Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm akʉ bɛ ɛmbak pɛ́pɛ́p, yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ rɛm bɛ ɛpu pɛ́pɛ́p.’
44011010	Ɛ́fákári ɛnyu ɛyɔ ndɔŋ ɛ́rát, ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́pɛ́tnsɛm amfay.
44011011	Nkúbhɛ́ mpok yɔ, bo batí arat bachwɔp ambǐnywɔp ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ nchí arɛ́. Báfú Seséria nɛ ntó bɛ́ mánsɔt mɛ.
44011012	Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ aghati mɛ bɛ, ‘Faté sɛp dɔ́k nɛ bhɔ. Ɔ́kɛ́ fyɛ ntí bɛ́ bápú bo Israɛl.’ Bɔ̌mayɛsɛ abhɛn batí átándát abhɛn Jopa bákóŋo mɛ sɛ́rɔk Seséria, nɛ bɛsɛ mankɛm sɛ́chwe ɛkɛrɛ́ mmu wu Kɔnéliɔs.
44011013	Aghati bhɛsɛ́ ndu yí ághɔ́ ángɛl Mandɛm ɛkɛt ɛyi nɛ ángɛl wu ágháti yi bɛ ántó bo Jopa mámbɨŋɨ mɛ Símun Píta bɛ
44011014	ndɔ́k ngáti yi mbok anɛ ákʉ̀ yi andɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyu Mandɛm akway bɛpɛmɛ yi nɛ ɛfo ɛyi ɛnkɛm.
44011015	Nɛbho mbó bɛ́gháti bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ atwɔ́ ntá yap nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́fákári nyaka nɛ bhɛsɛ ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt.
44011016	Ntɨk yɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Acha árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ, ‘Jɔ̌n ǎjwiti bo nɛ manyiɛp, kɛ chɔŋ mánjwiti bhe nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.’
44011017	Be bábhɔŋ, ghɔ́ yɛka! Mandɛm achyɛ́ bǒbhɔ nkúbhɛ́ akap anɛ́ yi achyɛ́ nyaka bhɛsɛ mpok sɛ́nókó Yesu Kristo Acha. Nchí yɛ́ nyaka agha bɛchɛt Mandɛm mbi?”
44011018	Bághókó nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Píta árɛ́mɛ́ mɛnkɛm, manyu áchók bhɔ. Báre chyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó mandɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, “Nɔ Mandɛm achyɛ mbi ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nkwɔ bɛ mankway bɛtɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhap, mambɔŋ nɛpɛ́m!”
44011019	Bɛyǎ bakoŋo Yesu báfú nyaka Yerúsalɛm ɛ̌ti ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ ɛbho mpok báwáy Stífin bataka mbaŋ nɛ mbaŋ. Mbɔk bárɔk kpatɛ atú Foníshia, báchák tɛ Sáyprɔs nɛ abhɛnɛfu tɛ Ántiɔk. Bárɔŋ nɔkɔ nɔ, mangati nɔkɔ mbok Yesu ntá bo Israɛl bɔ́bhɔ.
44011020	Kɛ mbɔk abhɛn bachi bo Sáyprɔs nɛ abhɛn bachi bo Sírene bárɔk Ántiɔk bábhó bɛ́gháti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Yesu ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nkwɔ́.
44011021	Acha abhak nɛ bhɔ́, akwak bɛyǎ mánoko bábho bɛkoŋo mbi ywi.
44011022	Mbok akɔ aghaka ntá bǒnkwɔ Yesu abhɛn Yerúsalɛm. Bátó Banábas ɛtɔk Ántiɔk.
44011023	Agháká nɔ́kɔ́ árɛ́, aghɔ́ ndu Mandɛm átɔ́ŋɔ́ bǒbhɔ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi, abhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ maŋák, abho bɛ́fyɛ́ bhɔ́ ntɨ bɛ mámbak tɛtɛp nɛ Yesu, mánte kpirí mpoknkɛm nɛ ntɨ nɛnkɛm.
44011024	Banábas achí nyaka ɛrɨ́tí mmu anɛ asɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Yesu sayri. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhak nɛ yí tontó. Akwak bɛyǎ bo mánoko mbok Yesu, báchɛm mmʉɛt nɛ bakoŋo bhi.
44011025	Banábas arɔk yɛ Tásɔs bɛ́yaŋ Sɔ̌l.
44011026	Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi, asɔt yí apɛtnsɛm Antiɔk nɛ yi. Sɔ̌l nɛ yi bábhak arɛ ndǔ mmíɛ́ nɛnkɛm nɛ nkwɔ Yesu, mántɔŋ nɔkɔ bɛyǎ bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́. Chi Antiɔk kɛ bábhó nyaka bɛbhɨŋɨ bakoŋo Yesu bɛ, “Nkwɔ Kristo.”
44011027	Mpok yɔ, mbɔk barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ báfú Yerúsalɛm barɔk Antiɔk.
44011028	Mmu wap amɔt áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Ágábɔs. Ndu bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ afate arɛm bɛ chɔŋ ɛrɛmɛ nsay ɛ́nkwɛ́n ndǔ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́chí antɛn Mfɔ Rom. [Nsay yɔ akwɛ́n mpok Klaodiɔs áchí Mfɔ Rom].
44011029	Bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn Antiɔk baghoko nɔkɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ágábɔs árɛ́mɛ́, báká ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt bɛ mánchwɔp nkáp manto ndu bɛkwak batɨ̌ bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn báchi atú Judɛ́ya. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛ́chyɛ mbɔ ɛnyu amɔ yi atɔŋɔ.
44011030	Bákʉ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ, bátó Banábas nɛ Sɔ̌l Yerúsalɛm bɛ mándɔk mánchyɛ nkáp wu ntá bǒbati bǒnkwɔ Yesu.
44012001	Ndu mpok yɔ, Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd abho bɛ́chyɛ nɛnyok ntá mbɔk bǒnkwɔ.
44012002	Achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bákɛ́m Jems manɔ Jɔ̌n báwáy nɛ akparɛnja.
44012003	Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yí ákʉ́ ɛ́chyɛ̀ bo Israɛl maŋák, arɔk ambɨ nɛ bɛbʉ́ bhi, achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mánkɛ́m Píta nkwɔ́. Ɛyɔ ɛ́fákárí ndǔ mpok Ɛpǎ brɛt anɛ kɛbhɔŋ yís.
44012004	Bákɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ Píta, arɛm báfyɛ́ yi ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Bakwɔ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu ábhak anwi ndu bɛbhabhɛri yi mkpák nɛ mkpák. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nkwɔ́ wap ábhɔ́ŋ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu manwi. Hɛ́rɔd abhɔ́ŋ nkaysi bɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ ɛ́mfʉ́ɛ́t, mámfɛrɛ yi mántáŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛsí bho.
44012005	Kɛ ɛnɛ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bábhàbhɛri Píta ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, bakoŋo Yesu báré nɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm nɛ batɨ yap ankɛm ɛ̌ti yi.
44012006	Nkúbhɛ́ bɛti ɛbhɛ́n Hɛ́rɔd árɔ́bhɛ́ nóŋ chi bɛ nywɔp nɛ́njí mámfɛ́rɛ́ Píta ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ mántáŋ yi bɛsí bho, Píta abhak bhʉrɛ nɛ́ntɨ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bati apay, femfé nɛ ngɛm. Ngɛm amɔt abhat yi nɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu amɔt ndǔ ɛbhěmʉɛt ɛ́mɔt, achák abhat yi nɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu anɛfú ndǔ ɛbhěmʉɛt ɛ́chák. Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu báchák bábhak anyǔbhá mámbabhɛri nɔkɔ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
44012007	Ángɛl Mandɛm abhesi tɛ́mchók, bɛdiɛrɛ bɛ́kwɛ́n amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Ángɛl akɛ́m Píta ndǔ nɛnkɨ anyɨkɨsi, áŋɛ́mɛ́ yí arɛm bɛ, “Faté áyák!” Tɛ́mté wu ngɛm ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí amɔ́ Píta ɛ́yóko ɛ́kwɛ́n amɨk.
44012008	Ángɛl ágháti yɛ Píta bɛ, “Fíɛ́ nkú nɛ nkwɔbánya ɛyɛ.” Píta akʉ nɔ. Apɛt aghatí yi bɛ, “Bhat ndɛ́ yɛ amʉɛt, koŋó mɛ.”
44012009	Píta abho bɛ́koŋo yi. Nɛfú anɛ báfú ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, yí kɛrɨŋɨ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ángɛl ákʉ̀ ntá yi chí ndaká tɛtɛp. Are kaysi bɛ́ ághɔ̀ nɔ chi kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k antífú.
44012010	Báfʉɛ́t nɛbhʉɛt anɛ babhabhɛri abhɛn mbɨ nɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ abhɛn bákòŋo báchwɔp ndu nyǔbha anɛ́ mmu ǎfʉɛt anchwe ɛtɔk. Nnyǔbha wu ánɛ́nɛ ndu mmʉɛt ɛyi. Báfú bárɔ́k nɛfí, bákɔ baghaka ndʉ́ nkɔngɔ ɛtɔk amɔt. Píta ápɛ́rɛ́ yɨŋɨ ángɛl ánáŋ árɔ́ yi arɔŋ.
44012011	Píta arɨŋɨ yɛ bɛ́ tɛtɛp yí afuu ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, arɛm bɛ, “Nɛ́nɛ, ndɨ́ŋɨ́ tɛtɛp bɛ́ Mandɛm ato ángɛl aywi ántwɔ́ ámfɛ́rɛ́ mɛ́ amɔ Hɛ́rɔd nɛ ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bo Israɛl batɨ bɛ́kʉ mɛ.”
44012012	Árɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fákárí ntá yi, afʉɛ́t arɔk ɛkɛrɛ́ Maria, nnɔ Jɔ̌n Mák. Bɛyǎ bo báchɛmti nyaka arɛ mánɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt.
44012013	Píta abho bɛ́dɛp nɛkok ɛnɛn mbɨ. Ngɔsɔ́ŋ anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Róda áchí nyaka mmɔ̌ bɛtok anywɔ́p. Arɔk bɛrɨŋɨ mmu anɛ ádɛ̀p nɛkok.
44012014	Aghók bɛ́ chí ɛyɔŋ Píta. Nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák, arɔ mbǐnyɔ́p kɛnɛnɛ apɛtnsɛm aghati bǒ mankɛm bɛ́, “Píta achí ambǐnywɔp téé!”
44012015	Bárɛm bɛ, “Ɔ̌bhokori!” Kɛ arɔk chi ambɨ bɛ́gháti bhɔ bɛ́, “Chí Píta tɛtɛp.” Afɔ̌ kɛ barɛmɛ bɛ, “Chi ángɛl aywi.”
44012016	Mpok yɔ nkɛm, Píta are dɛp nɛkok. Mánɛ́nɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mbǐnywɔp, bághɔ́ bɛ chi Píta tɛtɛp.
44012017	Asá awɔ́ bɛ mánchɔ́kɔ́ kpák. Báchɔkɔ kpák kpák. Abho yɛ bɛ́gháti bhɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm afɛrɛ yi ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́, aghati bhɔ́ bɛ mángátí Jems nɛ bǒnkwɔ́ bachak ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fákári. Arɔ yɛ bhɔ́, arɔk ɛbhak ɛchák.
44012018	Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, ɛbyɔk ɛ́kwɛ́n ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bábhàbhɛri Píta, báré makati mámbɛbhɛ nɔkɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí nɛ yi.
44012019	Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ bábhɨkɨ ghɔ́ Píta, achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ mánjáŋ yi. Báyáŋ yí kɛ bákɛ ghɔ yi. Hɛ́rɔd abhɨŋɨ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bhɔ, ábhɛ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ, achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ mángwáy bhɔ́. Hɛ́rɔd afa atú Judɛ́ya anɛ́ yí áchí arɛ arɔk atú Seséria áchák achɔkɔ arɛ́.
44012020	Hɛ́rɔd ǎbentɨ tontó nɛ bǒ-Taya nɛ abhɛn Sídɔn. Ɛkʉ bɛtɔk ɛbhɔ bɛ́pay bɛyap nkwɔ bho. Bátó bhɔ́ mándɔ́k mángɔ́ Hɛ́rɔd. Báyámbɨ bághɔ́ chí Blastɔs, nkɛ́mfɔ anɛ Hɛ́rɔd. Aka bɛkwak bhɔ mánsókórí nɛ Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd bɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́máy nɛ́ntɨ́ bɛtɔk Táya nɛ Sídɔn nɛ ɛyi. Báyàŋ nyaka bɛbhak ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt nɛ Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd mbɔnyunɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnap nɛ́fù nyaka chi atú ɛtɔk ɛnɛ achi antɛn yi.
44012021	Nywɔp Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd afyɛ́ ndu bɛrɛm kɛpɨ nɛ bhɔ nɛkwáy nɔ́kɔ́, afyɛ́ ndɛn kɛfɔ yi, achɔkɔ ndu ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ arɛm kɛpɨ bɛsi bǒbhɔ.
44012022	Bǒbhó bare bɨk bɛ, “Chi ɛyɔŋ mandɛm. Puyɛ chi ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ nkwǎŋwaŋ!”
44012023	Tɛ́mté wu, ángɛl Mandɛm aguɛ́p yi nɛme amʉɛt mbɔnyunɛ arɔ́ bo mánchyɛ yi kɛnókó ɛkɛn babhɔŋɔ bɛchyɛ chi ntá Mandɛm. Kɛ́nyoŋo kɛ́nyíɛ́ yi, agú.
44012024	Kɛ, Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ́re go ɛ́ndɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ.
44012025	Banábas nɛ Sɔ̌l, mánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ́ Yerúsalɛm, bápɛtnsɛm Antiɔk. Básɔ́t Jɔ̌n Mák, arɔk nɛ bhɔ.
44013001	Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nɛ batɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm báchi nyaka ndǔ Nkwɔ Yesu abhɛn Antiɔk. Bábhak Banábas, nɛ Símiɔn anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ Ɛgírímɔ, nɛ Lusiɔs anɛ áfú Sírene, nɛ Manáen anɛ áchí nyaka mmʉɛrɛ kɛmbɔ́ anɛ Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd Ántipas, nɛ Sɔ̌l.
44013002	Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, ɛnɛ báchí ndǔ nɛtarɛ́nsay nɛ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt mánchyɛ nɔkɔ Mandɛm kɛnókó, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ arɛm bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ká Banábas nɛ Sɔ̌l, mámbák nyáŋá ndu bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn mbɨŋɨ bɔ mankʉ.”
44013003	Bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, bárɔ́k ambɨ nɛ nɛtarɛ́nsay nɛ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt. Mányáŋa yɛ amɔ anti Banábas nɛ Sɔ̌l manɨkmʉɛt, barɔ yɛ bɔ mandɔk.
44013004	Banábas nɛ Sɔ̌l bárɔk mbɔ ɛnyu Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ átó bhɔ. Bárɔ́k Sɛlusia básɔt achwǐnyɛ́n anɛ árɔ̀ŋ ndǔ ɛtɔk nɛ́ntɨ́nyɛn ɛnɛ babhɨŋɨ bɛ Sáyprɔs.
44013005	Báchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔkɔ arɛ ndu mɔ́tɔk anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ́ Salamis, bárɔ áchwi nɛkunyɛ́n bákó ɛtɔk mángati nɔkɔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bo Israɛl. Jɔ̌n Mák abhak nɛ bhɔ́, ankwak nɔkɔ bhɔ.
44013006	Bárɔ́k ambɨ ɛnyuyɔ ndǔ bɛtɔk nɛ bɛtɔk kpát bákɨŋɨ ɛtɔk nɛntɨnyɛn Sáyprɔs ɛyɔ ɛnkɛm báchwɔp Pafɔs. Bátɛ́mɛri mmu Israɛl arɛ́ anɛ achi mǔnjɔ kɛ ǎpù bapu bɛ́ achí ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm. Aka nnyɛn bɛ́ Ba-Jesus.
44013007	Achí nyaka mpoknkɛm nɛ gɔ́bhanɔ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Sɛjɔs Paólɔs. Sɛjɔs Paólɔs abhak ndɨŋɨndak. Abhɨŋɨ Banábas nɛ Sɔ̌l mbɔnyunɛ áyàŋ nyaka nkwɔ bɛghok Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
44013008	[Nnyɛ́n Ba-Jesus nɛchak nɛchi nyaka bɛ́ Ɛ́límas nɔ chi mǔnjɔ ndu ɛyɔŋ Grik.] Ɛ́límas mǔnjɔ abho bɛ́kɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ bhɔ ndu yi áyàŋ bɛ́kʉ gɔ́bhanɔ ákɛ́ koŋo mbi Yesu.
44013009	Bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ bɛbhak nɛ Sɔ̌l anɛ nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛ́chák nɛ́chí nyaka bɛ́ Pɔ̌l. Pɔ̌l atɛp yi amɨ́k amʉɛt,
44013010	arɛm bɛ, “Wɔ mmɔ̌ Satan! Wɔ mmu ɔ́pábhɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Wɔ mmu bapu ájwí wɔ́ mɛniɛ. Ɔpú rɔ bɛkʉ mbi Mandɛm anɛ achí chak ambak ŋɔ́tíŋɔ́tí?”
44013011	Dɨŋɨ́ bɛ awɔ Mandɛm ákwɛn wɔ amʉɛt nɛ́nɛ. Nɛ chɔŋ amɨ́k ánɛmɛ wɔ, ɔ́kɛ́pɛrɛ kwáy bɛghɔ mbaŋ ndǔ mbɨŋɨ́ mpok. Tɛ́mté wu, nɛbháŋ nɛ́kúti yi amɨ́k ɛjuri ɛ́kwɛ́n yi bɛsí arɔbhɛ nɛmɛri nɛ́mɛ́ri ambɛbhɛ nɔkɔ mbák mmu achí anɛ ákway bɛkɛm yi awɔ ánjá yi mbi.
44013012	Gɔ́bhanɔ ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákári, anoko Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu. Ɛ́bhak yi maknkay bɛ́ghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ ɛ̌ti Yesu Acha.
44013013	Pɔ̌l nɛ bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ nɛ yi bachwe ɛtɔk Pafɔs, bákɔ́ anyɛ́n anyɛ́n barɔk bágháka Pɛ́ga atú Pamfília. Jɔ̌n Mák arɔ bhɔ́ arɛ apɛtnsɛm Yerúsalɛm.
44013014	Bárɔ Pɛga bárɔk ambɨ kpát báchwɔ́p Antiɔk atú Pisídia. Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl, bárɔk bachwe ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí báchɔkɔ amɨk.
44013015	Bápáy nɔkɔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm mbɔ ɛnyu Moses asɨ́ŋɨ́ nɛ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú ndǔ basɨŋɨ́ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ, bǒ batí ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ɛyɔ bátó mmu bɛ ángátí bɔPɔ̌l bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma, mbák bǎbhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛkway bɛfyɛ bhɛsɛ ntɨ, ghatí ká bhɛsɛ.”
44013016	Pɔ̌l afate yɛ asá nɛ awɔ bɛ bo manchɔkɔ kpák. Abho yɛ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Bo Israɛl nɛ bo bɛtɔk bɛ́chák abhɛn báchày Mandɛm, ghók ká!
44013017	Mandɛm bo Israɛl ayap nyaka bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ́ akʉ nnɛrɛ́kɛt bǒ bhɛsɛ áchɨk mpok báchí mankɔ amɛm ɛtɔk Íjip. Mandɛm afɛrɛ bhɔ́ ndu kɛsɛm arɛ́ nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi ɛbhɛn bɛyǎ bɛcha.
44013018	Ndǔ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛpay, abhak nɛ bhɔ́ amɛm baso, abhɔ́ŋ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́ nɛ bhɔ.
44013019	Mpok babhɔŋɔ bɛ́chwe ɛtɔk Kánǎn akʉ mánáŋa manɛrɛ́kɛt bo tándrámɔt anɛ achi arɛ, achyɛ bo Israɛl mmɨk Kánǎn.
44013020	Ndǔ mamiɛ́ ankɛm anɛ́ bɔ báchɔ́kɔ́ ɛtɔk Íjip nɛ anɛ́ báchí amɛm baso kɛ báchwe Kánǎn ábhák mbɔ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛbay nsɛm byo (450). Achyɛ yɛ bhɔ bataŋá manyé nɛ bɔ babhak kpátɛ ndǔ mpok Samuɛl anɛ achi nyaka ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm.
44013021	Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ mpok bábhɛ́bhɛ́ yɛ Samuɛl bɛ ánchyɛ bhɔ mfɔ, Mandɛm ayap Sɔ̌l, mmɔ̌ Kish. Kish afú ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Bɛnjamin. Sɔ̌l abhak mfɔ wap ndǔ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛ́pay. Kish afú nyaka ndu nnɛrɛ́kɛt Bɛnjamin.
44013022	Mandɛm áfɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ, ayap Debhít bɛ ambak mfɔ wap. Mandɛm arɛm ɛ̌ti Debhít bɛ, ‘Debhít mmɔ̌ Jése, chí mmu anɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ maŋák nɛ yi, mmu anɛ apú nɔ́k bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ndɛ́mɛ́ yi ankʉ.’
44013023	Mandɛm akʉ ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Debhít ambák Mpɛmɛ bo Israɛl bɛ́kóŋo bariɛp ami ntá bachǐmbɨ bhap. Mpɛmɛ wu chí Yesu.
44013024	Jɔ̌n anáŋ ayambɨ aghátí nyaka bo Israɛl mankɛm bɛ mántɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap mámpɛtnsɛm ntá Mandɛm bɛ yi anjwiti bhɔ́, kɛ Yesu antwɔ.
44013025	Ɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t bɛ Jɔ̌n ánaŋa bɛtɨk ɛbhi, abhɛ́p bo bɛ, ‘Bǎkáysí bɛ́ mɛ kɛ nchí Mpɛmɛ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́twɔ kɛ? Chao! Puyɛ̌ mɛ! Ghók ka, yí átwɔ̀ mɛ ansɛm, nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ kway mbɔ̌ŋ mmu anɛ áchoti, bɛfɛrɛ nkwɔbhánya bɛkak ɛbhi.’”
44013026	Pɔ̌l apɛt arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma, bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham, nɛ beká bo bɛtɔk bɛ́chák abhɛn báchày Mandɛm, chi ntá yɛsɛ kɛ Mandɛm átó yɛ ntó ɛnɛ́n nɛ́ghàti bhɛsɛ ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yi akway bɛpɛmɛ bhɛsɛ!
44013027	Bǒ Yerusalɛm nɛ bǒbatí bhap bábhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt nyaka Yesu mbɔ Mpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm átó. Ɛkʉ bátáŋ yi, bakpɔt manyé yi bɛ babhɔŋ bɛway yi. Nɛ ndu bákʉ́ nɔ, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bárɛ́mɛ́ nyaka ɛ̌ti yi ɛ́fú tɛtɛp. Nɛ yɔ kɛ bɔ bápày nyaka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛnap.
44013028	Yɛ̌ndu bábhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ́ ntí anɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́rɛm bɛ mangway yi, bárɛm bɛ Páílet andɔ mangway Yesu.
44013029	Nɛ mánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́kʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyu Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti yi, báfɛ́rɛ yi amfǎy ɛkotákátí barɔk babhʉrɛ amɛm nnɛm ɛnɛ́n bághókó ndu sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́.
44013030	Yɛ̌ nɔ, Mandɛm akʉ yi apɛtnsɛm ndu nɛpɛ́m.
44013031	Nɛ ndu bɛyǎ manywɔp are bhesi bɛsí bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ nyaka nɛ yi bɛbho Gálili kpatɛ Yerúsalɛm. Bɔ́bhɔ kɛ báchí batísiɛ́ bhi ntá bo Israɛl.
44013032	Banábas nɛ mɛ sɛ́twɔ fá bɛ́gháti beka Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ bɛ bariɛp amɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka nɛ bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ́,
44013033	akʉ mɔ́ afǔ tɛtɛp ntá yɛsɛ́ bɛbhárɛ́ bhɔ́ bhap, ndu ákʉ́ Yesu apɛrɛnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Mandɛm akʉ bariɛp ɛmɔ afǔ tɛtɛp mbɔ ɛnyu ɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Bakway, bɛbhɔ́k bɛpay bɛ Mandɛm arɛm bɛ: ‘Wɔ ɔchí Mɔ́wa, nɛ ɛchɔŋ nchí rɛm kpoŋoroŋ bɛ Nchí Ɛtayɛ.’
44013034	Nɛ bɛ́yɨŋɨ nɛkʉ anɛ Mandɛm akʉ Yesu ámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnyu ɛnɛ yi ápú pɛrɛ gú, Mandɛm arɛm nyaka bɛ́: ‘Chɔŋ nchyɛ́ bhe áfɔ́k mbɔ ɛnyu mfyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp nɛ Debhít nɛ njɛt yi nɛ ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛnyu ɛyɔ.’
44013035	Nɛ ndu bɛ́rɔŋ ambɨ, ɛ́chí nɛbhʉɛt achák amɛm Ɛkáti Bakway bɛ Debhít arɛm ntá Mandɛm bɛ, ‘Ɔpú rɔ chɔŋ Mmu anɛ áchyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ntá yɛ ámpɔ́ amɛm nnɛm.’
44013036	Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn chi ɛ̌ti Mfɔ Debhít mbɔnyunɛ Debhít ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛtɨk Mandɛm áchyɛ́ yi ánkʉ́ fá amɨk ndu ayi mpok, agú akoŋo bachǐmbɨ bhi. Apɔɔ ndǔ nnɛm.
44013037	Mandɛm arɛm nyaka chi ɛ̌ti mmu achák, anɛ yi ákʉ́ ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m anɛ mmʉɛt ayi abhɨkɨ pɔɔ.
44013038	Bɔ̌ma dɨŋɨ́ yɛ ká bɛ́ chí ɛ̌ti Yesu kɛ Mandɛm áfòŋori bɛbʉ́ mbɔ ɛnyu sɛ́ghàti bhe.
44013039	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ánókó Yesu, Mandɛm ǎsɔ̀t bɛ yi achi chak bɛsí bhi. Ɛbhé Moses ɛ́pú kwáy bɛ́kʉ nɔ ntá mmu.
44013040	Sɔt yɛka mpok bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ básɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ́kɛ́ fakari nɛ bhe. Nɔ́ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ básɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ,
44013041	‘Bě bho bǎbyàk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm árɛ̀m, yɨŋɨ́ ka mbaŋ sayri, mǎmbák maknkay, nɛ mǎngu, nɛ ntí bɛ́ mɛ̌kʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ndu manywɔp ayɛka, ɛnɛ yɛ mángátí bhe, bǎpú noko wawak!’”
44013042	Ɛnɛ Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas báfù ndǔ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl, bo báre nɨk bɔ́ mmʉɛt bɛ́ mámpɛ́tnsɛm mandɔk ambɨ bɛghati bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndu nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛnɛ́n nɛ́twɔ̀ ambɨ.
44013043	Bo báfú nɔ́kɔ́ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí, bɛyǎ bo Israɛl nɛ bo abhɛn bápu bo Israɛl kɛ báchày Mandɛm, báré koŋo Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas. BɔPɔ̌l básɛ́mti bhɔ́ bɛ́ mánté kpirí, mándɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ bɛghɔkɔ mmʉɛt ndu bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm.
44013044	Ɛ́gháká nɔkɔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt ɛnɛn nɛ́kòŋo, ɛtɔk ɛnkɛm ɛ́twɔ́ bɛ́ghok Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
44013045	Kɛ bo Israɛl bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ ngɛ́mtay bo báchɛ̀m arɛ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ, bábhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ bɔPɔ̌l. Bábhó bɛsɔkɔti Pɔ̌l mánkɛmɛ nɔkɔ ɛpʉ́ítí ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m.
44013046	Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ́ Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas bábhó bɛ́rɛm kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy bɛ, “Bě bo Israɛl kɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́yámbɨ bɛ́gháti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm. Kɛ tɛ̌ndu bǎbyàk yɔ́, nɛ bǎyɨ́ŋɨ mmʉɛt ayɛka bɛ́ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ kwáy bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛ́nti, sɛ́rɔ̀ yɛ be nɛ sɛ́rɔ̀ŋ ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nɛ yɔ.
44013047	Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ Mandɛm Acha ághátí bhɛsɛ sɛnkʉ, mpok árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, ‘Nkʉ wɔ ɔ́mbák ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, bɛ́ ndǔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm, ɔ́nkwak mmɨk nkɛm ambɔŋ nɛpɛ́m.’”
44013048	Bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, bábhɔŋ bɛyǎ maŋák, bábhó bɛ́chyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm ɛ̌ti ɛyɔŋ ɛyi. Nɛ abhɛn Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ bɛ́ mámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ́n nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ ngwɛnti, mánoko Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu.
44013049	Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ́táka atú ɛtɔk wu ankɛm.
44013050	Kɛ bo Israɛl abhɛn báchí arɛ́ mányɨ́kɨ́si batɨ bǒbatí ɛtɔk ɛyɔ nɛ manɛ́m baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn mánókó Mandɛm. Bákʉ bo báchyɛ Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas nɛnyok kpát bábók bhɔ báfá atú ɛtɔk ɛyap.
44013051	Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas bákwɛ́t mfok ɛtɔk ɛyɔ anɛ áchí bhɔ́ bɛkak bɛtɔŋ bɛ́ chɔŋ Mandɛm antáŋ bǒbhɔ ndu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bɔ́ bákʉ́. Báfa báré rɔ́ŋ Ikɔ́niɔm.
44013052	Bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn ɛtɔk Antiɔk, bájwi nɛ maŋák nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhak nɛ bhɔ́ sayri.
44014001	Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas báchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Ikɔ́niɔm, bárɔk báchwe ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl baghati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Yesu arɛ. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhak nɛ bhɔ. Ɛ́kʉ́ bɛyǎ bo mánóko. Bo abhɛn mánóko bábhák bo Israɛl nɛ bo bɛtɔk bɛchak.
44014002	Kɛ bo Israɛl abhɛn bábhɨkɨ noko mbok Yesu bábho bɛrɛm bɛpɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́nyɨkɨsi batɨ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl. Bárɔ́bhɛ bé chí ntɨ nɛ bhɔ.
44014003	Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas babhak Ikɔ́niɔm ndu ɛrɔri mpok mángati nɔkɔ bo mbok Acha kpoŋoroŋ kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy. Mandɛm are tɔ́ŋ bo Ikɔ́niɔm kpoŋoroŋ bɛ́ mbok anɛ bɔ́ Pɔ̌l bághàti bho ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi achí tɛtɛp, akʉ nɔ ndu áchyɛ́ bhɔ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ́kʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay.
44014004	Ɛtɔk ɛ́kɔ́rɛ bɛbhe bɛpay, mbɔk bábhak ansɛm bo Israɛl, bo báchák bábhak nɛ bǒnto Yesu.
44014005	Mbɔk bo Israɛl nɛ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl báchɛ́m nɛ bǒ batí bhap báká ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt bɛ mánchyɛ bǒnto Yesu ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ bɛ mantɛmti bhɔ nɛ batay mángwáy.
44014006	Bǒnto bárɨŋɨ nɔ́kɔ́ nkaysi yap, bábʉɛ́ bárɔk atú Likáonia, ndu bɛtɔk Lístra nɛ Dɛ́be nɛ mbaŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi kɛkwɔt arɛ,
44014007	mángati nɔkɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu.
44014008	Mmufú achí nyaka ɛtɔk Lístra. Abhak mbɛ́ntí tɛ nɛbhe ɛni.
44014009	Ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t, abhak chɔ́kɔ́ anta nɔkɔ batú ndu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Pɔ̌l árɛ̀m. Pɔ̌l ayɨŋɨ yi dǐǐ, ághɔ́ bɛ́ yí wu anókó bɛ́ Mandɛm ǎkwáy bɛ́bú yi.
44014010	Pɔ̌l arɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Faté tě chak!” Afate kpɛrɛp abho bɛ́kɔ.
44014011	Ngɛ́mtay bo abhɛn bachi arɛ bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ Pɔ̌l ákʉ́, bábhó bɛ́bɨk ndu ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛyap, ɛyɔŋ bǒ Likáonia mandɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Bɔmandɛm básɔt mmʉɛt bakwǎŋwaŋ bátwɔ fá amɨk ntá yɛsɛ!”
44014012	Bárɛ́m bɛ́ Banábas chí mándɛm anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Sús, nɛ bɛ Pɔ̌l chi mándɛm anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Hɛmes mbɔnyunɛ yí kɛ achi nyaka ndɛmɛ kɛpɨ.
44014013	Ɛkɛrákap mandɛm nsé Sús ɛ́chí nyaka nɛfí bɛfʉɛt nkok ɛtɔk. Nchiakap mandɛm nsé Seus asɔt manɛ́m mpɔŋ nɛ bɔchuchu abhɛn mánɨ́ arɔk antí ɛtɔk mbɔnyunɛ yí nɛ ngɛ́mtáy bhó abhɛn báchi arɛ báyàŋ nyaka bɛchyɛ akap ntá Banábas nɛ Pɔ̌l.
44014014	Kɛ Banábas nɛ Pɔ̌l, bǒnto Yesu, bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǒbhɔ báyàŋ bɛkʉ, batɨ achɔŋti bhɔ amɛm kpát bádákáti ndɛn ɛ́yap amʉɛt. Bájɛt báchwe amɛm ɛká bo ɛyɔ nɛ bǎrí mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ,
44014015	“Bɔta, ndaká yi bákʉ̀ ɛnyunɛ? Sɛ́chí nkwɔ chi bakwǎŋwaŋ mbɔ bhe! Sɛ́twɔ fá bɛ́gháti bhe Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu bɛ́ mǎntɨk nsɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nsay mǎntwɔ́ ntá Mandɛm mmu áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m. Yí kɛ ághókó mfay nɛ mmɨk nɛ manyɛ́n nɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛchi arɛ́.
44014016	Ndu mpok anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, arɔ́ nyaka bo bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk mankɛm mánkʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bákɔ́ŋɔ́.
44014017	Yɛ̌ nɔ, abhɨkɨ rɔ nyaka bɛtɔŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ́ yí áchí. Ǎkʉ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ. Yí kɛ ákʉ̀ manyiɛp ámfú amfay nɛ ǎchyɛ̀ mbwɔt ndǔ ayi mpok, anchyɛ bhe nɛnyíɛ́, anchyɛ maŋák.”
44014018	Pɔ̌l nɛ mmʉɛrɛ ywi bárɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ bo bhɔ mángɔ́ bɛ́ bɔ́ nkwɔ́ báchí chí bakwǎŋwaŋ. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bábhɨ́kɨ́ kwáy bɛchyɛt bɔ mbi bɛ́ bɛ́kɛ́ chyɛ bhɔ́ akap anɛ́ babhɔŋɔ bɛchyɛ chi ntá Mandɛm.
44014019	Kɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, mbɔk bo Israɛl báfú Antiɔk anɛ atú Pisídia, báchák báfú Ikɔ́niɔm. Bákʉ́ bɛyǎ bo mánká nɛ bhɔ. Ɛkʉ bátɛ́mti Pɔ̌l nɛ batay, básu bárɔk bárɔ antí ɛtɔk nɛ nkaysi bɛ́ anáŋ agu.
44014020	Kɛ mpok anɛ bakoŋo Yesu bárɔ́ŋɔ́ arɛ bákap yi, afate apɛtnsɛm ɛtɔk Lístra nɛ bhɔ́. Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, Banábas nɛ yi bárɔ bárɔk Dɛ́be.
44014021	Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas báre ghati bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu amɛm ɛtɔk Dɛ́be. Bɛyǎ bo mánoko nɛ bábho bɛ́kóŋo Yesu. Bɔ Pɔ̌l bápɛt yɛ nsɛm Lístra nɛ Ikɔ́niɔm nɛ Antiɔk anɛ Pisídia.
44014022	Báré fyɛ́ bakoŋo Yesu ntɨ mbaŋ ɛyɔ ɛnkɛm mánchyɛ nɔkɔ bhɔ́ maníɛ́ bɛ́ mándɔ́k ambɨ bɛ́te kpirí ndʉ̌ nɛsɨkɨ́ntɨ ɛnap nɛ Yesu. BɔPɔ̌l bágháti bhɔ́ bɛ bábhɔŋ bɛghɔ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri kɛ mǎnchwe ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ́n Mandɛm ǎbhák Mfɔ wap.
44014023	Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas báyap bǒ batí ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛkɛrɛ́ Mandɛm. Báfyɛ́ bhɔ́ amɔ Yesu Acha mmu bɔ́ básɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ yi ndu nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt nɛ nɛtarɛ́nsay.
44014024	Báfʉɛt yɛ atú Pisídia, bárɔk atú Pamfília.
44014025	Arɛ́, bágháti mbok Yesu amɛm ɛtɔk Pɛga. Báfá Pɛga basɛp bárɔk Atália.
44014026	Básɔ́t achwǐnyɛ́n bɛfu Atália bápɛtnsɛm Antiɔk. Amɛm ɛtɔk Antiɔk kɛ̌ bǒnto Yesu mánɨ́kɨ́mʉɛt ɛ̌ti Banábas nɛ Pɔ̌l bɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm mɛ́mbák nɛ bhɔ ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bákʉ́ kɛ bápɛtnsɛm Antiɔk.
44014027	Báchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Antiɔk, babhɨŋɨ Bǒ nkwɔ́ Yesu báchɛm nɛbhʉɛt amɔt. Bágháti bhɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ́ ndu bɛtaŋ Mandɛm, nɛ ɛnyu Mandɛm ánɛ́nɛ́ mbi bɛ́ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl mánsɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ Yesu.
44014028	Babhak arɛ́ nɛ bakoŋo Yesu ndǔ mpǎy bataŋ.
44015001	Bo báfú Judɛ́ya bátwɔ́ Antiɔk bábhó bɛtɔŋ bǒnkwɔ Yesu mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mandɛm apú kway bɛ́pɛ́mɛ mmu mbák babhɨkɨ syɛp yí bɛkoŋo ɛbhé Moses.”
44015002	Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas bákɛ́m ɛtaŋtí ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ bhɔ́ ɛ̌ti ndaka wu kɛghɔ́ ntí. Ɛ́kʉ baka ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt bɛ Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas nɛ mbɔk bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn Antiɔk mándɔ́k Yerúsalɛm, mángɔ́ bǒnto nɛ bǒbati nkwɔ́ Yesu ɛ̌ti ndaka wu.
44015003	Bafa bare rɔŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ nkwɔ Yesu bátó bhɔ́. Ɛnɛ́ bárɔ̀ŋ atú Foníshia nɛ atú Samária, báre téé ndǔ bɛtɔk ɛbhɛn bɛchi ambi mángati nɔkɔ bǒnkwɔ́ bɛ́ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl mánóko mbok Yesu nkwɔ. Ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ bakoŋo Yesu bɛyǎ maŋák.
44015004	Báchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Yerúsalɛm, bǒnkwɔ, nɛ bǒnto Yesu nɛ bǒbatí ɛtɔk básɔt Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas nɛ bo bachak nɛ maŋák. Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas bágháti yɛ bhɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛ́n Mandɛm ákwáká bɔ mankʉ.
44015005	Kɛ mbɔk bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn bachi bǒnkwɔ Fárisi bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, báfáte babho bɛ́rɛm bɛ, “Bábhɔŋ bɛsyɛp bɔ, mángati bhɔ bɛ mámbʉrɛ bɛbhé Moses.”
44015006	Bǒnto Yesu nɛ bǒbatí bapɛt bachɔkɔ bɛyɨŋɨ ndaka wu.
44015007	Bátát nɔkɔ arɛ́ ndu bárɛ̀m ndaka wu, Píta afate aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma, bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ Mandɛm anáŋ ayap mɛ nɛ́ntɨ ɛnɛka tɛ mpok anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm bɛ́ ngati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bɛ́ bɔ́ nkwɔ́ mangok, mánoko.
44015008	Nɛ Mandɛm mmu arɨŋɨ batɨ bo mankɛm, atɔŋ kpóŋóróŋ bɛ́ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bákway mɛ́nóko nkwɔ. Akʉ nɔ́ ndu áchyɛ́ bhɔ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu yi achyɛ nyaka bhɛsɛ.
44015009	Afoŋori bɛbʉ́ bhap ndu básɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ Yesu nɛ akɛ tɔ́ŋ bɛ́ bɛsɛ bo Israɛl sɛ́chí kɛkúrí nɛ bhɔ.
44015010	Ntí anɛ bǎyàŋ yɛ mɛmɔ Mandɛm, bɛ́ghɔ mbák chɔŋ yi ambé ntɨ achí bɛ́ yí? Ndaká yí bǎchyɛ̀ batu anɛ yɛ̌ chi bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ babhɨkɨ kway nyaka bɛpɔkɔ ntá bo abhɛn bachi bakoŋo Yesu? Yɛ̌ chi bɛsɛ nkwɔ sɛ́bhɨkɨ kway bɛpɔkɔ batǔ yɔ.
44015011	Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ bɛkʉ nɔ! Sɛ́noko bɛ́ Mandɛm ǎpɛ̀mɛ bhɛsɛ́ chí ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn Yesu Acha átɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɛsɛ́ nɛ nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ǎpɛ̀mɛ bɔ nkwɔ.”
44015012	Píta árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, ɛchɛmɛ ɛnkɛm ɛ́kwɛ́n kpák ndu bɛ́ghok ndu Banábas nɛ Pɔ̌l bághàti bhɔ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ́ bhɔ́ bɛtaŋ, bákʉ́ nɛntɨ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl.
44015013	Mánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́rɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bárɛ̀m, Jems afate abho bɛ́rɛm bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma, ghók ká ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m!
44015014	Símiɔn anaŋ ághátí bhɛsɛ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm ábhó bɛtɔŋ bɛ́ akɔŋ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nkwɔ, nɛ ayap mbɔk ɛyap bɛ mámbák bǒbhi.
44015015	Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́ ɛ́kɔ ndɔŋ amɔt nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bárɛ́mɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu básɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ
44015016	‘Ansɛm mpok, chɔŋ mpɛtnsɛm mpɛt ntee ɛkɛt Debhít ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́. Chɔŋ njoŋ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ ɛ́báy mmʉɛt amɨk nkʉ yɔ ɛmpɛt ɛnte.
44015017	Chɔŋ nkʉ nɔ bɛ bǒbhɔ mankɛm mámbo bɛyaŋ mbi bɛ́twɔ ntá ya, yɛ̌ chi bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, mankɛm abhɛn mbɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mámbák bǒbha nkwɔ.
44015018	Nɔ kɛ Mandɛm Acha mmu akʉ bo mándɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn arɛmɛ tɛsáy.’”
44015019	Jems arɔk ambɨ bɛ́rɛm bɛ, “Ndu nkaysi aya, sɛ́kɛ́pɛrɛ sɔŋɔri bǒ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl abhɛn bátwɔ̀ ntá Mandɛm.
44015020	Sɛ́nsɨ́ŋ chí ɛkáti sɛ́ngáti bhɔ bɛ bákɛ́ nyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ nya anɛ áfú ndǔ akap anɛ báchyɛ́ ntá mandɛm nsé, nɛ bɛ mándɔ ɛpúsí, nɛ bɛ bákɛ́ nyiɛ́ nya ɛnɛ́ manoŋ amap ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ amɨk, nɛ bɛ bákɛ́ nyiɛ manoŋ.
44015021	Sɛ́nsɨ́ŋ bɔ́ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ bábho bɛ́pay bɛbhé Moses ɛbhɛ́n amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bo Israɛl tɛntɛp, ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt, nɛ bo yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk bárɨŋɨ bhɔ.”
44015022	Bǒnto Yesu nɛ bǒbatí nɛ bǒnkwɔ́ Yesu mankɛm bághɔ́ bɛ́ chí ɛrɨ́tí nkaysi. Báká ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt bɛ mánjáp bo mánto Antiɔk nɛ Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas. Báyáp yɛ Sáilas nɛ Júdas anɛ nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛ́chák nɛ́chí bɛ Básabas. Bɔ batí apay bábhak bǒbatí nkwɔ Yesu.
44015023	Ɛkáti ɛnɛ́ báchyɛ́ bhɔ́ mándɔ́k nɛ yɔ ɛ́ré rɛm bɛ, “Bɛsɛ́ bǒnto Yesu nɛ bǒbatí nɛ bǒnkwɔ́ Yesu mankɛm sɛ́kàka be bɔ̌máyɛsɛ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl awu Antiɔk, nɛ abhɛn Síria nɛ abhɛn Silísha.
44015024	Sɛ́ghok bɛ mbɔk bo báfu fá ntá yɛsɛ́ batwɔ awu nɛ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnap bɛ́chyɛ bhe ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ bafyɛ bhe ɛbyɔk antɨ ɛnɛ́ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tó bhɔ́.
44015025	Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ sɛ́chɔ́kɔ́, sɛkǎ ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt bɛ́ sɛ́njap bo sɛ́nto ntá yɛka nɛ abhɛn ɛkɔŋ abhɛsɛ, Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas,
44015026	bo abhɛn báká nɛwú ɛ̌ti Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo.
44015027	Sɛ́tò yɛ Júdas nɛ Sáilas ntá yɛka. Mǎnaŋ mǎngáká awu chɔŋ mángati bhe bɛsí nɛ bɛsi nkúbhɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́nsɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm ɛkáti.
44015028	Ɛ́chí bɛ́ sɛ́bhɔŋ nkaysi amɔt nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ bɛ sɛ́kɛ́ chyɛ bhe batu áchák anɛ acha bɛbhé ɛbhɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhʉrɛ.
44015029	Nɔ chi bɛ bǎkɛ́ nyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛfǔ ndʉ̌ akap anɛ́ báchíɛ ntá mandɛm nsé, nɛ bǎkɛ́ nyiɛ́ manoŋ, nɛ yɛ̌ chi nnya anɛ manoŋ ami ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ amɨk. Nɛ bɛ mǎndɔ́ ɛpúsí. Mbák mǎndɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, chɔŋ ɛ́mbak ɛrɨ́rɨ́ nɛ bhe. Mǎnchɔkɔ sayri.”
44015030	Bǒbhɔ bati anwi báfa Yerúsalɛm barɔk Antiɔk. BɔPɔ̌l bábhɨ́ŋɨ nkwɔ́ Yesu báchɛ́m nɛbhʉɛt amɔt bachyɛ bhɔ ɛkáti ɛnɛ bapɔkɔ.
44015031	Bápáy nɔkɔ yɔ, maníɛ́ amɛn áchi amɛm ɛ́fyɛ́ bo Antiɔk ntɨ, bábhɔŋ maŋák.
44015032	Júda nɛ Sáilas babhak barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ. Bágháti bǒnkwɔ Yesu bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ ndu bɛ́fyɛ́ bhɔ́ ntɨ nɛ bɛ́kwák bɔ mántaŋ ndu nɛsɨkɨ́ntɨ ɛnap nɛ Yesu.
44015033	Báchɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ́ nɛ bhɔ́ ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ mpok, bǒnkwɔ́ Yesu bátɨ́k bhɔ́, nɛ maŋák bɛ mámpɛ́tnsɛm Yerúsalɛm ntá bo abhɛn bátó bhɔ́.
44015034	[Kɛ Sáilas akʉ ntɨ bɛ́rɔp Antiɔk.]
44015035	Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas bárɔp Antiɔk. Arɛ́, báre tɔ́ŋ, mángati nɔkɔ bo ɛyɔŋ Acha nɛ bɛyǎ bo báchák nkwɔ.
44015036	Ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, Pɔ̌l arɛm ntá Banábas bɛ, “Sɛ́mpɛtnsɛm ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ sɛ́ghátí ɛyɔŋ Acha arɛ sɛ́ngɔ́ ndǔ bǒnkwɔ́ báchí.”
44015037	Banábas are yáŋ bɛ́ mánsɔ́t Jɔ̌n Mák yí ándɔ́k nɛ bhɔ.
44015038	Kɛ Pɔ̌l kɛka bɛ́ ɛ́chi sayri bɛ́sɔt yi mbɔnyunɛ arɔ́ nyaka bhɔ ɛtɔk Pamfília ɛnɛ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́rɛ naŋa bɛtɨk ɛbhap.
44015039	Ɛ̌ti yɔ, Pɔ̌l nɛ Banábas bákɛ́m bɛyǎ ɛpʉ́ítí kpát akɔrɛ akwɛn nɛntɨ nap. Banábas asɔt Jɔ̌n Mák báchwe achwǐnyɛ́n, bárɔk Sáyprɔs.
44015040	Kɛ Pɔ̌l ayap chi Sáilas. Bǒnkwɔ́ Yesu mánɨkmʉɛt bɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu Acha mɛ́mbak nɛ bhɔ.
44015041	Pɔ̌l asɔt Sáilas bárɔk Síria nɛ Silísha ɛnɛ́ yi afyɛ́ ntɨ nta bakwɔ́ Yesu abhɛn báchí arɛ ntɨ.
44016001	Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas barɔk baghaka Dɛ́be nɛ bafu nɔkɔ arɛ barɔk Lístra. Nkoŋo Yesu amɔt abhak arɛ́ anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Tímɔti. Máyi abhak mmu Israɛl anɛ ánókó Yesu, kɛ aywi chí abhak mmǔ Grik.
44016002	Bǒnkwɔ abhɛn Lístra nɛ Ikɔ́niɔm bárɛ̀m nyaka ɛrɨrɨ ɛ̌ti Tímɔti.
44016003	Ɛ́kʉ́ Pɔ̌l are yaŋ bɛsɔt Tímɔti bɛ andɔk nɛ bhɔ. Akʉ yɛ básyɛ́p yi mbɔnyunɛ bo Israɛl bachi nyaka ndǔ bɛtɔk ɛbhɔ nɛ bárɨ́ŋɨ bɛ chi Tímɔti achi chi mmǔ Grik.
44016004	Arɔk yɛ nɛ Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas. Ndu bárɔ̀ŋ, mángati nɔkɔ bo ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ bachwɔbhɛ arɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǒnto nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk abhɛn bachi Yerúsalɛm bárɛ́mɛ́, nɛ mánsɛmti nɔkɔ bhɔ́ bɛ mámbʉrɛ bɛbhé ɛbhɔ sayri.
44016005	Ɛyɔ ɛkʉ bakwɔ Yesu bárɔk ambɨ bɛ́sɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Yesu, nɛ mpǎy yap anjá andɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ.
44016006	Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas nɛ Tímɔti baghat bafʉɛt atú Frijia nɛ atú Galéshia mbɔnyunɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ mángati bo Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm atú Esia.
44016007	Bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ ndiɛrɛ ɛbhɨ Mísia nɛ Bitínia, báré yaŋ bɛrɔŋ atú Bitíni, kɛ Ɛfóŋó Yesu kɛka bɔ́ mándɔ́k.
44016008	Ɛ́kʉ́ baghat bafʉɛt atú Misia, bárɔ́k Troas.
44016009	Arɛ́, Pɔ̌l aghɔ́ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k antifú nɛ bɛti ndǔ mmu Masidónia áté ánɨ̀kmʉɛt andɛm nɔkɔ ntá yi bɛ, “Twɔ́ fá Masidónia kwak bhɛsɛ!”
44016010	Pɔ̌l ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ kɛnɔ́ ɛkɔ, sɛ́ká bɛ́ Mandɛm abhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɛsɛ́ sɛ́ndɔ́k sɛ́ngátí Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ntá bǒ atú Masidónia. Tɛ́mté wu, Mmɛ Lukas nchɛm nɛ bhɔ sɛ́tóŋti mmʉɛt bɛ́rɔ́ŋ arɛ́.
44016011	Sɛ́chwe áchwi anɛ árɔ̀ŋ Troas. Sɛ́rɔk téé sɛ́gháká Samótras, ɛtɔk ɛnɛ́ nnyɛ́n nɛ́kábhɛ́. Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ ntɨnywɔp, sɛ́gháká Neápolis.
44016012	Sɛ́fú nɔkɔ arɛ́, sɛkɔ amɨk sɛ́gháka Fílipi. Fílipi abhak ɛtɔk ɛgho atú Masidónia, nɛ abhak antɛn Mfɔ Rom. Sɛ́bhak Fílipi ndu mpǎy manywɔp.
44016013	Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt bo Israɛl, sɛ́fú amɛm ɛtɔk sɛ́rɔk angɔkɔnyɛ́n ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ sɛ́káysí bɛ́ bo báchɛ̀m arɛ mɛ́nɨkmʉɛt. Sɛ́chɔ́kɔ amɨk sɛ́ndɛm nɔkɔ kɛpɨ nɛ baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn báchɛ́mtí arɛ́.
44016014	Ngɔrɛ́ amɔt anɛ aká nnyɛ́n bɛ Lídia afʉ́ ɛtɔk ɛgho ɛnɛ babhɨŋɨ bɛ Tiatíra. Abhak nkɔsíɛ́ ndǔ ndɛn ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí mmʉɛt chu nɛ ɛ́yá nkáp. Ǎchyɛ nyaka Mandɛm kɛnókó. Mandɛm akʉ yi anɛnɛ ntɨ ɛni aghók sayri nɛ anoko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Pɔ̌l árɛ̀m.
44016015	Bájwiti yi nɛ ɛfo ɛyi. Anɨk bhɛsɛ mmʉɛt arɛm bɛ, “Mbák bǎsɔt mɛ mbɔ mmǔ anɛ ánókó Yesu tɛtɛp, twɔ́ ká chɔkɔ́ ɛkɛt ɛyá.” Anyiɛrɛ bhɛsɛ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ kpát sɛrɔk.
44016016	Ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t, ɛnɛ́ sɛ́rɔ̀ŋ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt, sɛ́tɛ́mɛri mɔ́ngɔsɔ́ŋ anɛ áchi nsɛm. Ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́ɛbʉ ɛbhak nɛ yi ɛ́kʉ́ are rɛ́m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔŋɔ bɛfakari. Ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ̀ nyaka bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ yí bɛyǎ nkáp.
44016017	Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bhɛsɛ nɛ Pɔ̌l, abho bɛkoŋo bhɛsɛ ambɨkɨ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Bǒbhɛn chí bǒ bɛtok Mandɛm mfay! Bághàti bhe ɛnyu Mandɛm ápɛmɛ bho.”
44016018	Arɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ nɔ ndǔ bɛyǎ manywɔp kpát ntɨ nɛ́bé Pɔ̌l, ayibhiri mmʉɛt asáy ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí ngosɔ́ŋ wu amʉɛt bɛ, “Ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo nchí ghati wɔ bɛ ɔ́mfú yí amʉɛt.” Tɛ́mté wu ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ yɔ ɛ́rɔ́ ngɔsɔ́ŋ wu.
44016019	Ndu ɛ́fákárí nɔ, bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ yi bághɔ́ bɛ mbǐ wap bɛbhɔŋ nkáp áchɔŋti. Bákɛ́m Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas, báya gbaka gbaka gbaka bárɔk nɛfísiɛ, bɛsí bǒbatí ɛtɔk, amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ manyé.
44016020	Bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ́ bárɛm bɛ, “Bǒbhɛn chí bo Israɛl nɛ báchyɛ̀ ɛsɔŋɔri amɛm ɛtɔk ɛyɛsɛ́.
44016021	Bátɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛpɨŋɨ́tɔk ɛbhɛ́n ɛbhé ɛyɛsɛ́ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ sɛ́nkóŋó. Sɛ́chí bo Rom nɛ sɛ́pú kwáy bɛ́kóŋo bɛpɨŋɨ́tɔk ɛbhap.”
44016022	Bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bachi arɛ bachɛm nɛ bǒ ngɔsɔ́ŋ wu bɛbhat bɔPɔ̌l barak amʉɛt. Bataŋá manyé báchyɛ́ ɛyɔŋ, báyók bɔ́ ndɛn amʉɛt nɛ bádɛ́n bɔ́ nɛ bɛkpa.
44016023	Bádɛ́n nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ́ sayri, bágʉɛ́p bhɔ́ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, bágháti mmu anɛ ábhàbhɛri ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ bɛ́ ánsɔ́t mpok bɛ́ bákɛ́ bʉɛ.
44016024	Mbabhɛri wu ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, asɔt bhɔ́, arɔk afyɛ́ ndu mɔ́kɛt anɛ achi tɛ amɛm. Báfyɛ́ bhɔ́ bɛko bɛkak.
44016025	Kɛ ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ mbɔ nɛ́ntɨ́bhɛti, Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas babho mɛnɨkmʉɛt mánkway nɔkɔ bakwáy ndu bɛbɨti Mandɛm, batɨ̌ bǒkɛnɔŋ bachak mángoko nɔkɔ.
44016026	Bápɛ́rɛ ghɔ́ nɛnyɨkɨsí mmɨk nɛ́kwɛ́n, kpát mmɨk anɛ báté ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ arɛ́ anyɨkɨsi. Babhǐnywɔp ánɛ́nɛ ndǔ mmʉɛt yap tɛ́mté, ngɛm ɛnɛ́ báfé bǒkɛnɔŋ nɛ yɔ ɛ́káŋári ɛnkɛm, ɛ́kwɛ́nti amɨk.
44016027	Mbabhɛri ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ afate. Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ babhǐnywɔp fúfú, akaysi bɛ́ bǒkɛnɔŋ mankɛm bábʉɛ. Agwɔp akparɛnja ywi ndu bɛway mmʉɛt.
44016028	Kɛ Pɔ̌l abɨk arɛm bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ way mmʉɛt. Bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́chí fá!”
44016029	Mbabhɛri wu arɛm bɛ́ mántwɔ́ yí nɛ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́. Bátwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛ yɔ́, arɔk ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ ntiɛ́t ntiɛt akwɛ́n ndǔ bɛkak Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas angwɛrɛ nɔkɔ nɛ bɛcháy.
44016030	Asɔt yɛ bɔ́ nɛfí abhɛ́p bɔ́ bɛ́, “Bɔtá, chɔŋ nkʉ yi kɛ Mandɛm ampɛmɛ mɛ?”
44016031	Bákɛ́mɛ yí bɛ, “Nokó Yesu Acha nɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ampɛmɛ wɔ nɛ ɛfo ɛyɛ ɛnkɛm.”
44016032	Bɔ Pɔ̌l bágháti yɛ yí nɛ ɛfo ɛyi Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Acha.
44016033	Nkúbhɛ́ bɛti ɛbhɔ, asɔt bhɔ́ tɛ́mté aso bɛfʉɛt ɛbhap. Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas bájwiti yi nɛ ɛfo ɛyi ɛnkɛm.
44016034	Asɔt yɛ bɔ́ ɛkɛt ɛyi achyɛ bhɔ́ nɛnyíɛ́. Yi nɛ ɛfo ɛyi ɛnkɛm bájwi nɛ maŋák bɛ mánóko Mandɛm.
44016035	Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́ bǒ batí ɛtɔk bátó bǒ mbɨ̌ŋ nkú ntá mbabhɛri ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ nɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ, “Dɔ̌ bǒbhɔ mándɔk!”
44016036	Mbabhɛri ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ arɔk aghati bɔPɔ̌l bɛ, “Bǒbatí báto ɛyɔŋ bɛ ndɔ be mǎndɔ́k. Bǎkwáy yɛ bɛrɔŋ. Mǎnkɔ sayri.”
44016037	Kɛ Pɔ̌l arɛm ntá bo mbɨ̌ŋ nkú bɛ, “Báway bhɛsɛ nɛ mantɛm bɛsí bho, mámɛsɛ bhɛsɛ́ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ ɛnɛ́ bábhɨkɨ taŋ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌ndu sɛchi bǒ Rom. Nɛ́nɛ, báyàŋ sɛ́mfú sɛ́ndɔ́k bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́? Wáwák! Bɔ́ babhɔŋ bǒbatí bábhɔŋ bɛ́twɔ ndu mmʉɛt ɛyap mámfɛrɛ bhɛsɛ́.”
44016038	Bǒ mbɨ̌ŋ nkú bápɛtnsɛm baghati bǒbatí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Pɔ̌l arɛmɛ nɛ bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas báchí bǒ Rom, bɛcháy bɛkɛm bɔ.
44016039	Babhɔ̌ŋ bǒbatí bárɔ́k yɛ mánɨkmʉɛt ntá Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas bɛ mǎmfóŋórí bhɔ́. Báfɛ́rɛ yɛ bɔPɔ̌l ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, mánɨ́kmʉɛt ntá yap bɛ mándɔ́ ɛtɔk ɛyap.
44016040	Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas báfú yɛ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, bárɔk ɛkɛt Lídia. Bátɛ́mɛri bǒnkwɔ Yesu arɛ báchíɛ bhɔ maníɛ́ nɛ báfyɛ́ bɔ́ ntɨ. Báfá yɛ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ.
44017001	BɔPɔ̌l bárɔk báfʉɛ́t bɛtɔk Amfípolis nɛ Apolónia báchwɔp ɛtɔk Tɛsalónika, nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl ɛchi.
44017002	Pɔ̌l arɔk achwe amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí ɛyɔ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak yí árɔ́ŋɔ́, ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ yí ákʉ̀ nyaka. Ndǔ bɔsɔnde barat are fyɛ́ mbok nɛ bhɔ ndu bɛkʉ bɔ mámbɔŋ nɛjwǐmɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm,
44017003	nɛ anɛnɛ nɔkɔ nɛ antɔŋ nɔkɔ bɛ Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ angú, kɛ ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Pɔ̌l are ghati bhɔ́ bɛ, “Yesu mmu nchí ghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi kɛ áchí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.”
44017004	Mbɔk ɛyap mánóko, báchɛ́m mmʉɛt nɛ Pɔ̌l. Bɛyǎ bǒ Grik abhɛn mánɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm bo Israɛl nɛ bɛyǎ manɛ́m baghɔrɛ́ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ mánóko nkwɔ, báchɛ́m mmʉɛt nɛ bɔPɔ̌l mbɔ bakoŋo Yesu.
44017005	Kɛ mbɔk bo Israɛl bábhɔŋ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ bɔPɔ̌l. Manyokoti bo abhɛn bághabhɛ ghap nɛ bákʉ bo mángʉ́ɛ́p ɛbyɔk ɛtɔk. Bárɔ́k bádákáti babhǐnywɔp báchwe amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ mmu anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Jáson ndu bɛyaŋ Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas bɛ mánsɔt bhɔ mandɔk ndǔ nchɛmti bo abhɛn bachi nɛfí.
44017006	Kɛ ndǔ bábhɨkɨ ghɔ bɔPɔ̌l, báyá Jáson nɛ bǒnkwɔ́ Yesu báchák gbaka gbaka gbaka bárɔ́k ntá bǒbatí ɛtɔk nɛ bhɔ, mambɨkɨ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Bǒ abhɛn bákɔ̀ mbǎnkɛm mánchyɛ nɔkɔ ɛsɔŋɔri bátwɔ fá nkwɔ́
44017007	nɛ Jáson asɔt bɔ́ afyɛ́ anywɔ́p. Bɔ́ mankɛm bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ bápú bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé mfɔ ngo anɛ Rom mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ Mfɔ achák áchí anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Yesu.”
44017008	Bǒbatí nɛ bǒtɔk bághók nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, batí átáka bhɔ amɛm.
44017009	Bákʉ Jáson nɛ bǒnkwɔ bhɔ bághɔ́kɔ nkáp ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ bápú pɛrɛ chyɛ ɛsɔŋɔri. Bárɔ́ yɛ bɔ́ mandɔk.
44017010	Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nɛ bɛti, bǒnkwɔ́ bátɨ́ŋ bákʉ́ Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas bábʉ́ɛ barɔk ɛtɔk Bɛ́roa. Arɛ́, bárɔ́k báchwé ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl.
44017011	Bo Israɛl abhɛn Bɛ́roa bábhɔ́ŋ ntɨ bɛghok mbok Yesu anɛ́ Pɔ̌l nɛ Sáilas bághàti bhɔ ɛ́cha abhɛn Tɛsalónika, mbɔnyunɛ básìɛpti nyaka Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ bɛyǎ ɛkwak. Báre chak Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛghɔ mbák mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Pɔ̌l átɔ̀ŋ bɛchi tɛtɛp.
44017012	Ɛ́kʉ bɛyǎ-bhap mánóko Yesu Acha. Manɛ́m baghɔrɛ́ Grik nɛ bɛyǎ babhakanɛm mánóko nkwɔ́.
44017013	Kɛ bo Israɛl abhɛn Tɛsalónika bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ Pɔ̌l ǎghati Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛtɔk Bɛ́roa nkwɔ́, bárɔ́k arɛ́ mányíkɨ́si batɨ̌ bo, bɛ mánchyɛ́ bɔPɔ̌l ɛsɔŋɔri.
44017014	Tɛ́mté wu, batɨ̌ bǒ nkwɔ́ Yesu bátɨ́k Pɔ̌l bɛ andɔk tɛ angɔkɔnyɛ́n, kɛ Sáilas nɛ Tímɔti bárɔ́p Bɛ́roa.
44017015	Bo abhɛn bárɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ Pɔ̌l, barɔk nɛ yi kpát bágháka Atɛns. Pɔ̌l aghati yɛ bhɔ mpok anɛ bápɛ̀tnsɛm bɛ́ mángátí Sáilas nɛ Tímɔti bɛ mánjáŋ mbi mántɛmɛri yi ayak amɛm ɛtɔk Átɛns.
44017016	Ɛnɛ́ Pɔ̌l ánòŋ Tímɔti nɛ Sáilas ɛtɔk Atɛns, ntɨ nɛ́ré sɔŋɔri yi amɛm bɛghɔ bɛ́ ɛtɔk ɛ́jwí nɛ bɛbhó njɔ ɛnɛ bo básɔt mbɔ bɔmandɛm.
44017017	Ɛ́kʉ́ are rɔŋ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp ankɛm nɔkɔ ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ bhɔ nɛ bǒ Grik abhɛn mánóko nyaka Mandɛm nkwɔ. Ǎrɔŋ nyaka nkwɔ nɛfísiɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp ankʉ nɔkɔ ɛnyumɔ́t nɛ bo abhɛn bátwɔ̀ árɛ́.
44017018	Bǒfú bábhak abhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kɔ̀ ndɔ́ŋ ámɔ́t nɛ bakoŋo Ɛpikurɔs nɛ bɔ Stɔik, Bɔ́ nkwɔ́ bákɛ̀m nyaka ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ yi. Pɔ̌l ǎghàti nyaka bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti Yesu andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ́ chɔŋ bawú mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Ɛ́kʉ́ mbɔk ɛyap báré way Pɔ̌l mandɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ́, “Ɛchɨŋtǐ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nkwɔ́ ǎrɛ̀m nɔ́ mbɔŋ yi?” Báchák bɛ, “Ɛ́chí mbɔ bɛ yi ǎghàti bho chí ɛ̌ti bɔmandɛm abhɛn sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ fá ɛtɔk ɛnɛ.”
44017019	Básɔt Pɔ̌l barɔk Ariyopagɔs, nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bǒbatí báchɛ̀m nɔkɔ nyaka, bárɛ́m ntá yi bɛ, “Sɛ́kɔŋ bɛ́rɨŋɨ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ bɛkɔ ɛbhɛ́n ɔ́tɔ̀ŋ.
44017020	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n ɔ́rɛ̀m bɛchi maknkay ntá yɛsɛ́ nɛ sɛ́yàŋ bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́rɛ̀m.”
44017021	Báre rɛm ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ bo Atɛns nɛ mankɔ mankɛm abhɛn báchí arɛ́ bákɔŋ nyaka bɛ́chɔ́kɔ bɛghok nɛ bɛ́fyɛ mbok ɛ̌ti barak akɔ.
44017022	Pɔ̌l afate yɛ ate nɛ́ntɨ́ bǒ ɛchɛmɛ́ Areopagɔs yɔ abho bɛ́rɛm bɛ, “Bǒ Atɛns, ngɔ bɛ́ bǎfyɛ́ ntí ndǔ baraká bɔmandɛm tontó.
44017023	Ɛnɛ́ nchí kɔ ɛtɔk mfyɛ́ nɔkɔ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎchyɛ kɛnókó mbɔ bɔmandɛm, ndɔk ngaka nɛbhʉɛ́t amɔt anɛ ɛfɛmɛ akap ɛchi, ngɔ́ ndu básɨŋ arɛ́ bɛ, ‘Ntá mandɛm anɛ bo bábhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ.’ Mandɛm anɛ nɔ bé bǎchyɛ̀ kɛnókó yɛ̌ndu bǎbhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ yí kɛ mɛ́ghàti bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi.
44017024	Mandɛm mmu ághókó mmɨk nkɛm nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́chí arɛ́, yí kɛ áchí Acha anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm amfay nɛ fá amɨk. Apú chɔkɔ amɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhɛ́n bakwǎŋwaŋ bághókó.
44017025	Nɛ nkwǎŋwaŋ apú kwáy bɛ́kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ánchyɛ́ yí mbɔnyunɛ yi apu chɛ́p yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Yímbɔŋ kɛ áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m nɛ ɛ̌yú nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
44017026	Ayámbɨ aghókó nyaka mmǔ amɔt nɛ amʉɛt mmu wu kɛ̌ manɛrɛ́kɛrɛ́ bho ankɛm fá amɨk áfú. Ápɛ́rɛ ghoko yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nnɛrɛ́kɛt, ayambɨ abhʉrɛ nɛbhʉɛ́t anɛ bǒnɛrɛ́kɛt wu bábhàk nɛ mpok anɛ bɔ́ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhak arɛ́.
44017027	Mandɛm akʉ ɛnyu yɔ bɛ́ bɔ́ mánjáŋ yi nɛ ndu báyàŋ yi mbɔ mmǔ anɛ ámɔ̀ nɛ amɔ́ bɛyaŋ ɛnyɨŋ amɛm ɛjuri, mánkwáy bɛrɨŋɨ yi. Kɛ sayri sayri, Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ sap nɛkɔ nɛ yɛ̌ mmu ywɛsɛ amɔt.
44017028	Ɛ́chi nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mmǔ ywɛka amɔt árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ, ‘Nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ́ nɛ́fù chi ntá yi, nɛ yí kɛ áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ́ bɛtaŋ sɛ́kɔ̀, nɛ yí kɛ ákʉ́ bɛ sɛmbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m.’ Ɛ́chí mbɔ ɛnyǔ mbɔk batɛmɛ́ bakay bhɛka bárɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, ‘Bɛsɛ́ nkwɔ́ sɛ́chí bɔ̌ abhɛn Mandɛm.’
44017029	Tɛ̌ndu sɛ́chí yɛ́ bɔ̌ Mandɛm, sɛ́kɛ́ kaysi bɛ́ Mandɛm achí mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mmu ákwày bɛ́sɔt gol nɛ yɛ̌ chí silbha nɛ yɛ̌ chí ntáy angoko nɛ kɛboŋ ɛki nɛ ɛka ɛyi nkwɔ.
44017030	Mandɛm afɛ́rɛ́ ntí ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bákʉ́ ndǔ mpok anɛ bɔ babhɨkɨrɛ rɨŋɨ nkaysi yi. Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, ághàti bo mankɛm mbankɛm bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu antɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi,
44017031	mbɔnyunɛ abhʉ́rɛ́ nywɔp ɛnɛn yi átàŋ bǒ mankɛm ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛchi chak. Anáŋ ayap mmu anɛ átàŋ manyé yɔ, nɛ atɔ́ŋ ɛrɨŋ bɛkʉ bǒ mmɨk mankɛm mándɨ́ŋɨ́ mmu wu, ndu ákʉ́ yi ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
44017032	Mpok bághoko ndu Pɔ̌l árɛ̀mɛ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛrɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, mbɔk ɛyap bare yɔkɔ yi, kɛ bachak barɛm bɛ, “Sɛ́kɔŋ bɛ ɔ́mpɛt ɔ́mfʉɛ́t ɔngati bhɛsɛ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛrɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
44017033	Pɔ̌l arɔ yɛ bɔ́ afú arɔk.
44017034	Kɛ mbɔk bákóŋo yí. Bɔ́bhɔ mánóko. Dionisiɔs, mmǔ ɛchɛmɛ́ Ariyopagɔs, nɛ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Damarís nɛ bo báchák babhak ndǔ nkwɔ bho abhɛn bakoŋo Pɔ̌l.
44018001	Pɔ̌l afa Atɛns arɔk ɛtɔk Kɔrint.
44018002	Atɛmɛri mmu Israɛl amɔt arɛ́ anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Akwíla, mmǔ atú Pɔ́ntɔs. Ɛbhɨkɨre tat nyaka, ɛnɛ́ Akwíla nɛ ngɔrɛ́ ywi Prisíla bárɔ́ ɛtɔk Ítali mbɔnyunɛ Klaudiɔs Mfɔ Rom, achyɛ nyaka ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ bo Ju mankɛm mámfá Rom. Pɔ̌l arɔk bɛghɔ bhɔ.
44018003	Babhɔ̌ŋ nyaka awɔ́-bɛtɨk ámɔ́t nɛ Pɔ̌l, nɔ́ chí bɛtɨk bɛ́ghóko bɛ́tɛm nɛ ndɛn. Pɔ̌l achɔkɔ nɛ bhɔ mángoko nɔkɔ bɛ́tɛm.
44018004	Pɔ̌l are rɔ́ŋ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt ɛnap ankɛm nɔkɔ ɛpʉiti nɛ bhɔ nɛ anu nɔkɔ bɛ bo Israɛl nɛ abhɛn Grik mánóko mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ághàti bhɔ ɛ̌ti Yesu.
44018005	Mpok Sáilas nɛ Tímɔti báfú atú Masidónia báchwɔ́bhɛ́ Atɛns, Pɔ̌l arɔ bɛtɨk bɛghoko bɛ́tɛm arɔbhɛ kʉ chi bɛtɨk bɛghati bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ndu mpok nkɛm anɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́, anu nɔkɔ bɛkʉ bo Israɛl mángɔ́ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ Yesu kɛ achí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.
44018006	Kɛ bɔ́ kɛka nɛ yi. Mánsɔkɔti nɔkɔ yi. Akwɛt ndɛn ɛ́nɛ ɛchi yi amʉɛt, arɛm bɛ, “Ntǔ bɛbʉ́ bhɛka arɔp nɛ bhe. Amɔya achi pɛ́pɛ́p. Nɛbho ɛchɔŋ ntɨ̌knsɛm ntá yɛka nɛ ndɔbhɛ rɔ́ŋ chí ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl.”
44018007	Afa yɛ arɛ́, arɔk achɔkɔ ɛkɛt mmu amɔt anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Títiɔs Jɔ́stɔs. Jɔ́stɔs abhak mmǔ anɛ áchyɛ̀ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Ɛkɛrɛ yi ɛ́bhák kɛkwɔt nɛ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl.
44018008	Mmǔ amɔt abhak arɛ́ anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Kríspɔs. Abhak mǔnti ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt. Yi anoko Yesu Acha nɛ ɛfo ɛyi ɛnkɛm. Bɛyǎ bǒ Kɔrint bachak abhɛ́n bághòk nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Pɔ̌l árɛ̀m mánóko nkwɔ, nɛ bájwíti bhɔ.
44018009	Bɛti mɛ́mɔt, Yesu Acha aghati Pɔ̌l ndǔ kɛnɔ́ amɨk anti fúú bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ cháy. Dɔ́k ambɨ bɛ́gháti bo ɛ̌ti ya. Kɛ́chɔkɔ kpak.
44018010	Nchí nɛ wɔ nɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛkʉ wɔ ɛnyɨŋ. Bɛyǎ bo bachi ɛtɔk ɛnɛ abhɛn babhak chɔŋ bǒbha.”
44018011	Pɔ̌l arɔk yɛ ambɨ bɛ́chɔ́kɔ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ ndu mmíɛ́ nɛ bataŋ átándát, antɔŋ nɔkɔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
44018012	Bǒ Rom bákʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Galío gɔ́bhanɔ atú Gris, bo Israɛl abhɛn bachi arɛ bágwɔ́t nnɛt nɛ bákɛ́m Pɔ̌l bárɔk ndu acha manyɛ́ nɛ yi.
44018013	Arɛ́, bágháti Galío bɛ, “Mmǔnɛ ánù bɛkʉ bo mánchyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Mandɛm kɛnókó ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɛbhé yɛsɛ́ ɛ́pú yaŋ mmu ankʉ.”
44018014	Kɛ mpok Pɔ̌l áyàŋ bɛrɛm ɛnyɨŋ bɛ́ ántáŋá mmʉɛt, Galio arɛm ntá bo Israɛl bɛ, “Bě bo Israɛl, mbɔ yí akʉ chi ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ nɛ yɛ̌ ndak abʉ́abʉ, mbʉ nkáá nɛ bhe.
44018015	Kɛ tɛ̌ndu ndak anɛ achi chi ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bárɛ̀m nɛ manyɛ́n bo nɛ bɛbhé ɛbhɛka, be babhɔŋ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyǔ bátàŋ wu. Mpú kwáy bɛtáŋ ayɔ barak.”
44018016	Galío árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, abók bhɔ́ bɛ mámfú amɛm acha manyé.
44018017	Bafu nɔkɔ, bakɛm Sɔstɛ́nes mmu anɛ achi nyaka mǔnti ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛyɔ bádɛ́n nɛfí acha manyé. Yɛ̌ nɔ, Galío akɛ fyɛ́ ntí arɛ́.
44018018	Pɔ̌l apɛt atat nɛ bǒnkwɔ Yesu abhɛn Kɔrint ndǔ bɛyǎ manywɔp. Arɔ yɛ bhɔ, asɔt achwǐnyɛ́n arɔk atú Síria nɛ Prisíla nɛ Akwíla. Báchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛtɔk Kɛnkreya, Pɔ̌l amu ntí bɛtɔŋ bɛ ǎbhʉ́rɛ́ bariɛp amɛn yi afyɛ́ bɛsí Mandɛm.
44018019	Báchwé achwi bárɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs. Pɔ̌l arɔ Prisíla nɛ Akwíla angɔkɔnyɛ́n arɔk achwe amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt, are kɛ́m ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ bo Israɛl.
44018020	Nkwɔ́ wap abhɛn mánóko bárɛm bɛ Pɔ̌l ántát nɛ bhɔ kɛ yi kɛka.
44018021	Pɔ̌l arɛm chi bɛ, “Mbák chí nkaysi Mandɛm chɔŋ mpɛtnsɛm fá ntá yɛka.” Arɛm nɔkɔ nɔ, arɔ bhɔ achwe áchwí bare rɔŋ.
44018022	Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ Seséria akó ɛtɔk, arɔk akaka nkwɔ́ Yesu abhɛn bachi arɛ́, asɛp arɔk Antiɔk.
44018023	Átát nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ́ mpǎy manywɔp, afa are kɔ bɛtɔk nɛ bɛtɔk atú Galéshia nɛ Fríjia, amfyɛ nɔkɔ bakoŋo Yesu mankɛm ntɨ ndǔ nɛsɨkɨ́ntɨ ɛnap.
44018024	Mmu Israɛl amɔt anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Apólos atwɔ́ Ɛ́fɛsɔs. Ɛtɔk nɛbhe ɛyi ɛ́bhák Aleksándriya. Yi achí nyaka mmu anɛ árɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛrɛm kɛpɨ nɛ arɨŋɨ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm sayri.
44018025	Mánaŋ bátɔŋ nyaka yí mbi Yesu Acha nɛ ághàti nyaka bo mɛnyɨŋ abhɛn bɛ́dù yi antɨ bɛghati bo ɛ̌ti Yesu nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu bɔ bɛchi. Kɛ arɨŋɨ chí nɛjwiti ɛnɛn Jɔ̌n atɔŋɔ bo.
44018026	Amɛm ɛtɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs, Apólos abho bɛ́gháti bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti Yesu amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt kɛbhɔ́ŋ bɛcháy. Prisíla nɛ Akwíla bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ yi ághàti bho ɛ̌ti Yesu, básɔ́t yí ɛkɛt ɛyap, mánáŋa batɔŋ yi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ mbi Mandɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bɛchi.
44018027	Apólos ákʉ ntɨ bɛ́rɔ́ŋ Akáiya. Bǒbati bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn Ɛ́fɛsɔs báfyɛ́ yi ntɨ nɛ básɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ntá bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn Akáiya bɛkʉ bɛ mánsyɛpti yi sayri. Aghaka nɔkɔ arɛ́, akwak tontó bo abhɛn Mandɛm atɔŋ bɔ bɛrɨ̌ndu nɛ mánóko.
44018028	Arɛ́, are kɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ bo Israɛl bɛsí bo mankɛm. Adɛbhɛ nɔkɔ bɔ amɨk ndu ɛpʉ́ítí ɛyɔ nɛ are sɔt mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛtɔŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ Yesu kɛ achí Mpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò.
44019001	Ɛnɛ́ Apólos áchí Kɔrint, Pɔ̌l are kɔ atú Esia. Akɔ kpát aghaka Ɛ́fɛsɔs. Atɛmɛri mpay bakoŋo Yesu arɛ́.
