44019002	Abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ atwɔ ntá yɛka mpok mǎnókó Yesu?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ́ “Áe! Yɛ̌ chí bɛghok bɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achí sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re ghok.”
44019003	Pɔ̌l abhɛ́p bhɔ́ bɛ, “Ntí anɛ bájwítí yɛ nyaka bhe achi bɛ yi?” Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Chí ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Jɔ̌n ághàti bho kɛ bájwítí bhɛsɛ.”
44019004	Pɔ̌l abho yɛ bɛkʉ bɔ́ mánjwímɛm. Arɛm bɛ, “Jɔ̌n ǎjwìti nyaka bo bɛtɔŋ bɛ bátɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap angati nɔkɔ bo Israɛl bɛ́ bábhɔŋ mɛ́nóko mmu anɛ átwɔ̀ yi ansɛm, nɔ chi Yesu.”
44019005	Bǒ Ɛ́fɛsɔs bhɔ bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, báka bájwíti bhɔ mbɔ bo abhɛn mánóko Yesu Acha.
44019006	Pɔ̌l anyaŋa yɛ bɔ́ amɔ anti. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhak nɛ bhɔ, bábho bɛrɛm bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk nyáŋá nyáŋá ɛbhɛ́n bɔ́ babhɨkɨ ghɔ́k, mándɛm nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n Mandɛm afyɛ́ bhɔ́ antɨ.
44019007	Bɔ mankɛm babhak mbɔ batí byo nɛ apay.
44019008	Pɔ̌l abhak Ɛ́fɛsɔs ndǔ bataŋ árát andɔk nɔkɔ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bɛghati bhɔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy ankɛm nɔkɔ ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ bhɔ ndu áyàŋ bɛ bɔ́ mándɨ́ŋɨ́, mánoko, ɛnyǔ Mandɛm áyàŋ bɔ mambak nɛ yi mbɔ Mfɔ wap.
44019009	Kɛ mbɔk ɛyap báchók batú kɛnoko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Pɔ̌l árɛ̀m. Báré rɛm chí bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti mbi Acha bɛsí bo mankɛm. Ndu bákʉ̀ nɔ Pɔ̌l asɔt bo abhɛn mánókó arɔk nɛ bhɔ́, ankɛm nɔkɔ ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ bhɔ ɛ̌ti Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm amɛm áchá Tiránɔs yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp.
44019010	Arɔk ambɨ bɛ́kʉ ɛnyuyɔ ndǔ mamiɛ́ ápay. Ɛ́kʉ bo mankɛm abhɛn báchí atú Esia, bághók Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Acha, nɔ chi bo Israɛl nɛ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl.
44019011	Ndǔ Pɔ̌l átɔ̀ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, Mandɛm achyɛ yí bɛtaŋ bɛ́kʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛ́n bo bábhɨkɨre ghɔ́.
44019012	Ɛ́kʉ́ kpát bo babho bɛsɔt bɛbhɔ́kɔ́ ndɛn ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɛ́sɛ bɛsí nɛ nkú yi, mámbarɛ nɔkɔ amʉɛt bǒmame, nɛ bɔ́ mántaŋ nɔkɔ, nɛ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ mɛ́mfu nɔkɔ bo amʉɛt.
44019013	Mpǎy bo Israɛl babhak arɛ abhɛn bákɔ̀ mánkʉ nɔkɔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ mɛ́mfú mɛ́ndɔ́ bo abhɛn bɔ bɛsɔŋɔri. Báre mɔ bɛ́bok bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu Acha nkwɔ́. Babho yɛ bɛrɛm ntá bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ, “Ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu mmu Pɔ̌l ághàti bo ɛ̌ti yi, fú ka yi amʉɛt.”
44019014	Bɔ̌ Sɛva bati tándrámɔt bare kʉ nɔ. Sɛva achi nyaka mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm amɔt.
44019015	Ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛghati bhɔ bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ Yesu, ndɨŋɨ Pɔ̌l, kɛ báchí ntɨkɨ bho?”
44019016	Mmǔ anɛ ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛsɔŋɔri yí akwɛ́n bɔ́ amʉɛt arakati ndɛn ɛyap nɛ aták bɔ́ mankɛm kpát bábʉɛ́ báfú bɛbho bɛwɔ nɛ bɛfʉɛt amʉɛt.
44019017	Bo abhɛn báchi Ɛ́fɛsɔs mankɛm, bo Israɛl nɛ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ndak anɛ́ áfákárí, bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m bɔ́ bábhó bɛchyɛ nnyɛ́n Yesu Acha kɛnókó.
44019018	Bɛyǎ bo abhɛn mánókó babho bɛfu kpoŋoroŋ mánsu nɔkɔ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ̀.
44019019	Bɛyǎ bǒ abhɛn bákʉ̀ baraká mandɛm nsé, bátwɔ́ nɛ bɛkátǐ-njɔ ɛbhap mɛnkɛm básɔ́ŋ bhɔ bɛsí bo mankɛm. Nɛ mbɔ báti nyaka bhɔ ti mbʉ bɛchyɛ nkáp anɛ aghaka bɛbhɔk silbha nka bɛsa bɛpay nsɛm byo (50.000).
44019020	Ɛ́kʉ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ataka mbaŋ nɛ mbaŋ, ɛndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ nɛ bɛtaŋ.
44019021	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fákárí nɔ́kɔ́, Pɔ̌l akʉ ntɨ ɛni bɛ́ yí abhɔŋ bɛ́fʉɛ́t atú Masidónia nɛ atú Akáiya ampɛtnsɛm Yerúsalɛm. Arɛm bɛ, “Nnáŋ ngáká arɛ́, mbɔŋ bɛrɔŋ Rom nkwɔ.”
44019022	Ató yɛ bakwak abhi batí ápay, Tímɔti nɛ Ɛrástɔs, bɛ́ mándɔ́k ambɨ atú Masidónia. Yímbɔŋ arɔp ansɛm atú Esia ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ mpok.
44019023	Mpok yɔ, ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́bhó ɛtɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs ɛ̌ti Mbi Yesu Acha.
44019024	Ntɛnátɛn achí nyaka arɛ́ anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Dɛmɛ́triyɔs. Ǎsɔt nyaka Silbha ankʉ nɔkɔ bɔ̌bɛkɛrɛ́ mandɛm nsé anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Atɛ́mis. Awɔ́-bɛtɨk ɛbhi áre chyɛ̀ yí nɛ bo báchák abhɛn bákʉ̀ bhɔ bɛyǎ nsay.
44019025	Dɛmɛ́triyɔs abhɨŋɨ bhɔ báchɛ́m nɛbhʉɛt amɔt, arɛm bɛ, “Bɔtá, bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ́ kɛnɛ́m ɛkɛsɛ́ kɛnkɛm kɛ́fù chí ndǔ awɔ́-bɛtɨk anɛ.
44019026	Bě babhɔŋ bǎghɔ̀ nɛ bǎghòk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Pɔ̌l ákʉ̀, puyɛ̌ chí ndiɛrɛ fá Ɛ́fɛsɔs, kɛ atú Esia ankɛm. Akʉ bɛyǎ bo báka nɛ yi ndu yi árɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Bɔmandɛm abhɛn bo bághókó nɛ amɔ bápú bo mandɛm wáwák!’
44019027	Ǎkway bɛ́chɔ́ŋti yɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛsɛ́ ɛbhɛn mbák sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt mpok. Ǎkway bɛkʉ nkwɔ́ bɛ́ bo bákɛ́pɛrɛ sɔt ɛkɛrákap mandɛm ngɔrɛ́ Atɛ́mis, mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ. Mbák ɛ́mfákárí nɔ, Atɛ́mis mmu áchí mandɛm ngo ywɛsɛ apú pɛrɛ bhak yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Nɛ yí kɛ̌ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu atú Esia nɛ bǒ mmɨk mankɛm báchyɛ̀ kɛnókó!”
44019028	Bɔ bághók nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ nɛ Dɛmɛ́triyɔs arɛmɛ, batí átáka bɔ amɛm, bábho bɛ́bɨk mandɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Atɛ́mis, mandɛm bǒ Ɛ́fɛsɔs, chi mandɛm ngo!”
44019029	Ɛbyɔk ɛ́kwɛ́n ɛtɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs ɛnkɛm. Bo barɔk ayak bákɛ́m Gáyɔs nɛ Arístakɔs báyá, bárɔk amɛm acha ɛtɔk nɛ bhɔ́. Gáyɔs nɛ Arístakɔs babhak bǒ Masidónia abhɛn bákɔ̀ nɛ Pɔ̌l.
44019030	Pɔ̌l are yáŋ bɛrɔŋ ndǔ nchɛmti-bǒ bhɔ bɛ ádɛm ɛnyɨŋ, kɛ bakoŋo Yesu kɛchyɛ yí mbi bɛ ánkʉ nɔ.
44019031	Mbɔk bǒbatí ɛtɔk bábhák mamʉɛrɛ bhi. Bɔ́bhɔ bátó nkwɔ́ ɛyɔŋ mɛnɨk yi mmʉɛt bɛ akɛ sá ɛkak amɛm áchá.
44019032	Ɛbyɔk ɛ́kwɛn amɛm áchá mbɔnyunɛ bɛyǎ bho bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nyaka mbɔ̌ŋ ndak anɛ achi amɨk. Ɛbhak yɛ bɛ mbɔk bábɨ̀k mándɔkɔ nɔkɔ ɛyap ɛbhe, báchák mántaŋ mandɔkɔ nɔkɔ ɛyap.
44019033	Mbɔk ɛyap bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ bo Israɛl bátó Aleksánda ambɨ, bákáysi bɛ́ yí kɛ átwɔ́ nɛ ɛsɔŋɔri, ɛ́kʉ́ Aleksánda asá áwɔ́ amfay ndu áyàŋ bɛ́rɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ndu bɛ́táŋa mmʉɛt.
44019034	Kɛ bárɨŋɨ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ achí mmu Israɛl, bápɛ́t bábho bɛwat mandɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Atɛ́mis, mandɛm anɛ bǒ Ɛ́fɛsɔs, chí mandɛm ngo!” Barɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ ɛnyuyɔ ndǔ maŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp ápáy.
44019035	Nsɨŋɨ́-bɛkati anɛ ɛtɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs anu kpát akʉ mbaŋ akwɛn. Abho yɛ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Bo Ɛ́fɛsɔs! Agha abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ bɛ ɛtɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs kɛ ɛ́bhàbhɛri ɛkɛrákap ɛnɛ Atɛ́mis nɛ ntay mandɛm ɛnɛn nɛ́fú amfay nɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́ fá amɨk ntá yɛsɛ?
44019036	Tɛ̌ndu yɛ̌ mmu apú kwáy bɛ́táŋa mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, bǎbhɔŋ mbʉ bɛ́chɔ́kɔ chí kpák kɛchyɛ ɛsɔŋɔri.
44019037	Bǎsɔt bǒbhɛn bǎtwɔ fá nɛ bhɔ ɛnɛ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ ghɛp yɛ̌nyɨŋ amɛm ɛkɛrákap ɛyɛsɛ nɛ yɛ̌ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm ɛ̌ti Mandɛm aywɛsɛ
44019038	Sɛ́bhɔ̌ŋ bǒ batí nɛ manywɔp anɛ bátaŋ manyé. Mbák Dɛmɛ́triɔs nɛ bǒ ɛka bábhɔŋ ndak nɛ mmu, mántwɔ́ arɛ́ nɛ wú bɛ mántáŋ.
44019039	Kɛ mbák ndak áchák áchí anɛ́ bǎyàŋ bɛrɨŋɨ, chɔŋ mányurɛ wú amɛm áchá ɛtɔk ndu nywɔp ɛnɛn manyé.
44019040	Nchí rɛm ɛnyunɛ́ nɛ ntí bɛ, bǎkway bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ́ ɛsɔŋɔri bɛ́ sɛ́twɔ́ nɛ ɛbyɔk ɛtɔk ɛnyu ɛnɛ́, mbák mámbɛ́p bhɛsɛ́, sɛpu bhɔ́ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ sɛ́rɛ̀m.”
44019041	Árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, aghati bhɔ́ bɛ́ mángúrɛ́. Ɛchɛm ɛ́táka.
44020001	Ɛbyɔk ɛyɔ ɛ́máy nɔ́kɔ́ Ɛ́fɛsɔs, Pɔ̌l abhɨŋɨ bakoŋo Yesu. Arɛm kɛpɨ nɛ bhɔ́ ndu bɛ́fyɛ́ bɔ́ ntɨ. Arɔ yɛ bhɔ́ abho bɛrɔŋ atú Masidónia.
44020002	Ndǔ árɔ̀ŋ, are fyɛ́ bakoŋo Yesu ntɨ amɛm bɛtɔk Masidónia mɛnkɛm, kpát achwɔp ɛtɔk Gris.
44020003	Abhak arɛ́ ndǔ bataŋ árát. Ndu átòŋti mmʉɛt bɛ́sɔt áchwi andɔk Síria, aghók bɛ́ bo Israɛl bápà bɛ́kɛm yi. Ayibhiri ntɨ ɛni arɔbhɛ sɔt chí mbi atú Masidónia bɛ́kɔ́ amɨk ámpɛ́tnsɛm.
44020004	Bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ nɛ yi babhak Sopátɛ mmɔ̌ Pírɔs mmu ɛtɔk Bɛ́roa, nɛ bǒ Tɛsalónika bati apay, nɔ chi Arístakɔs nɛ Sɛkúndus, nɛ Gáyɔs mmu ɛtɔk Dɛ́be, nɛ Tímɔti, nɛ bo atú Esia bati apay, nɔ chi Tíkíkɔs nɛ Trofímɔs.
44020005	Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, bɔ́ bárɔ́ bhɛsɛ́ bárɔ́k ambɨ mɛnoŋ bhɛsɛ́ ɛtɔk Troas.
44020006	Sɛ́sɔt achwǐnyɛ́n ɛtɔk Fílipi, sɛ́ré koŋo bhɔ, mpok ɛpǎ bo Israɛl ɛnɛ́ brɛt anɛ kɛbhɔŋ yís ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́. Sɛ́kɔ́ anyɛ́n anyɛn ndǔ manywɔp átáy sɛ́tɛ́mɛri bhɔ Troas, nɛ sɛ́bhák arɛ́ ndu manywɔp tándrámɔt.
44020007	Ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛ́n mbɨ ndǔ sɔ́nde, sɛ́chɔ́kɔ nɛ bǒnkwɔ́ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt ndǔ Nɛnyiɛ Ɛta. Pɔ̌l abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛ́rɔ́ betí. Ɛkʉ́ arɛm kɛpɨ nɛ bhɔ kpátɛ nɛntɨ bɛti.
44020008	Bɛyǎ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhak ndǔ mɔ́kɛt anɛ áchí amfay anɛ bhɛsɛ́ nɛ bhɔ́ sɛ́chɛ́mɛ́ arɛ́.
44020009	Ɛsakámú amɔt anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Yútikɔs abhak ndǔ ɛchɨ́kɨ́ ɛnɛ nyɛ́sɛ́kɛt chɔ́kɔ́. Mɔ́kɛt anɛ sɛ́chí arɛ abhak ndǔ nɛŋɔk ɛkɛt ɛnɛn nɛjwi arat. Ndǔ Pɔ̌l árɔ̀ŋ ambɨ bɛ́gháti bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ ɛrɔri mpok, Yútikɔs abho mɛmɔk kɛnɔ́. Ákwɛ́n nɔ́kɔ́ kɛnɔ́, amok akwɛ́n amɨk nɛfí. Bápɛ́rɛ sɛp bɛ mámpɔ́kɔ́ yi agú.
44020010	Pɔ̌l asɛp yɛ amɨk akuri akɛ́m yí nɛ amɔ́ ápáy abhɛnɛ, arɛm bɛ, “Bǎkɛ́ cháy, achí nɛpɛ́m”.
44020011	Pɔ̌l apɛt yɛ nsɛm amfay. Mányiɛ nɔ́kɔ́ Nɛnyiɛ́ Acha, arɛm kɛpɨ nɛ bhɔ ndǔ ɛrɔ́rí mpok tɛ̌ nywɔp nɛ́yí. Arɔ yɛ bɔ́ arɔk.
44020012	Básɔt ɛsakámu wu bápɛtnsɛm anywɔ́p nɛ yí mbɨk nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák antɨ.
44020013	Sɛ́yámbɨ ndu áchwí sɛnok bɛrɔŋ Asɔs. Yímbɔŋ anaŋa atɨ nyaka bɛ́kɔ́ amɨk. Sɛ́ré rɔ́ŋ nɛ́ nkaysí bɛ́ Pɔ̌l arɔbhɛ tɛmɛri bhɛsɛ́ ɛtɔk Asɔs nɛ sɛ́nsɔt yí arɛ́.
44020014	Átɛ́mɛ́rí nɔ́kɔ́ bhɛsɛ Asɔs, achwe nkwɔ́ ndu áchwi anɛ sɛchi amɛm nɛ bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́rɔ́k Mitilene.
44020015	Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, sɛ́rɔ́k sɛ́chwɔ́p nɛchyɛ̌nyɛ́n Kios. Nɛ́pɛ́t nɛ́yi nɔ́kɔ́, sɛ́nók sɛ́chwɔ́p Sámɔs, nɛ ndǔ ntɨnywɔp sɛ́gháka Milɛ́tɔs.
44020016	Pɔ̌l anáŋ atɨ nyaka bɛ sɛ́mfʉɛt kɛte Ɛ́fɛsɔs, mbɔnyunɛ abhɨkɨ yáŋ nyaka bɛ sɛ́nchɔ́ŋti mpok atú Esia. Are wɛ̀nɛ bɛ mbák Mandɛm ánkwák, yi ánchwɔ́p Yerúsalɛm ndǔ nywɔp Ɛpǎ Pɛntɛkɔs.
44020017	Sɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ Milɛ́tɔs, Pɔ̌l ató ɛyɔŋ bɛ bǒbatí nkwɔ Yesu abhɛn Ɛ́fɛsɔs mántɛ́mɛ́rí yi arɛ.
44020018	Bátɛ́mɛ́rí nɔ́kɔ́ yi, aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Bě babhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna nɛ́chí mpǒknkɛm anɛ mɛnchí atú Esia bɛ́bhó nywɔp ɛnɛ́n mbɨ bɛ́gháka ɛchɔŋ.
44020019	Nchí kʉ nyaka bɛtɨk Yesu Acha nɛ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt nɛnkɛm, nɛ babhɛsɛ amɨ́k ɛ̌ti mamɔ anɛ ǎtwɔ̀ ntá ya ndǔ bo Israɛl bápà bɛfyɛ mɛ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri.
44020020	Bǎrɨŋɨ ndǔ ntwɔ́ ntɔ́ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ntá bɛká bho nɛ nkɔ nɔkɔ bɛkɛt nɛ bɛkɛt nkɛ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kwáy bɛkwak bhe.
44020021	Nde ya batú bo Israɛl nɛ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bɛ́ mántɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhap mánkóŋó Mandɛm nɛ bɛ́ mámbɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo.
44020022	“Nɛ́nɛ, mɛ́rɔ̀ŋ Yerúsalɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ányìɛrɛ mɛ, yɛ̌ndu mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fákari chɔŋ nɛ mɛ arɛ́.
44020023	Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ chí bɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ághàti mɛ bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ nchwɔ́bhɛ́ chɔŋ bo mámfyɛ́ mɛ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ nɛ mánchyɛ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔri.
44020024	Kɛ mpú sɔt nɛpɛ́m ɛna mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ. Nchí yáŋ chí bɛ njɛt tɛndǔ ngwɛnti, nnáŋá bɛtɨk abhɛn Yesu Acha áchyɛ́ mɛ́ nkʉ. Bɛtɨk ɛbhɔ chí bɛ́gháti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ bo.
44020025	“Nnáŋ nkɔ mbáŋ nɛ mbaŋ, ngáti bhe ɛnyǔ Mandɛm ábhàk nɛ bo mbɔ Mfɔ wap, nɛ nɛ́nɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka amɔt apú pɛrɛ ghɔ́ mɛ.
44020026	Nchí ghati yɛ bhe ɛchɔŋ bɛ́ mbák mmu ywɛka amɔt arɔp ansɛm anɛ́m ɛbhɨ amɔ aya apu arɛ.
44020027	Ngátí bhé yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ nkaysi Mandɛm nɛ yɛ̌ ɛ́mɔ́t mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɛsɛ.
44020028	Kɛ́m ká mmʉɛt sayri, mǎnkɛm bǒnkwɔ Mandɛm ankɛm nkwɔ sayri. Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ Mandɛm asɔt manoŋ Mɔ́ywi akʉ bɔ mámbák bǒbhi. Nɛ ɛ̌ti yap kɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ákʉ́ mǎmbak bǒ batí bhap.
44020029	Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ mpok ndɔ́ bhe, chɔŋ nkwɔ ɛ́nchwe nɛntɨ ɛnɛka, nɛ ɛ́pú rɔ bhe.
44020030	Mpok ǎtwɔ nɛ mpok yɔ ánáŋ ánkwáy, mbɔk bǒnkwɔ báyibhiri tɛtɛp Mandɛm mándɔbhɛ rɛm chi barak anɛ ápɔ̀kɔ bho angʉrɛ ɛbhɨ kpát mánja bakoŋo Yesu bɛ mandɔbhɛ koŋo chi bhɔ.
44020031	Sɔt yɛ ka mpok nɛ bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ nchí ghati nyaka bhe mɛnyɨŋ nɛ babhɛsɛ amɨ́k, njɛp nɔkɔ be batú bɛ̌ti nɛ ngósí ndǔ mamiɛ́ árát.
44020032	Nɛ́nɛ, nchí fyɛ́ bhé amɔ Mandɛm nɛ nchí rɔ bhe Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi. Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛ́kwày bɛkʉ mǎngó mǎnsɛ́nɛ́, nɛ ɛkway bɛchyɛ bhe áfɔ́k anɛ́ Mandɛm ábhʉ́rɛ́ ntá bǒ abhɛn yí ákʉ́ mámbák abhi.
44020033	Mpok nchí nɛ bhe, mbɨ́kɨ́ fyɛ́ amɨ́k ndǔ nkáp anɛ mmu nɛ yɛ̌ chi ndɛn ɛnɛ mmú.
44020034	Bě babhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ́ nkʉ bɛtɨk nɛ amɔ́ya ndu bɛbhɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ nɛ bo abhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀ bɛtɨk Mandɛm nɛ bhɔ sɛ́chɛbhɛ.
44020035	Ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm, ntɔŋ be bɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk bɛ sɛ́nkwák bo abhɛn mmʉɛt apu bhɔ, nɛ sɛ́kɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Acha árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, ‘Ɛ́rɨ̌ ntá mmu anɛ áchíɛ ɛcha mmu anɛ ásɔrɛ sɔt.’”
44020036	Pɔ̌l ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́rɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m, bɔ́ mankɛm bátɛp mánɛ́n amɨk, babho mɛnɨkmʉɛt.
44020037	Mankɛm bábho bɛdi kɛbhɔ mámbɛnɛ nɔkɔ yi nɛ mándiɛbhɛ nɔkɔ yi nɛkɔ bɛ, “Ɔ́nkɔ sayri.”
44020038	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kpɨ́k ɛ́kʉ́ bɔ bádí kɛbhɔ tontó chi ndǔ yi ághátí bhɔ bɛ bápú pɛrɛ ghɔ yi.
44021001	Bɛsɛ́ nɛ Pɔ̌l sɛ́rɔ́ bǒbatí nkwɔ́ Ɛ́fɛsɔs. Achwi ápɔ́kɔ bhɛsɛ́ sɛ́pé sɛrɔk téé sɛ́gháká ndǔ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ nnyɛ́n nɛkabhɛ ɛnɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Kós. Nɛ́yí nɔkɔ sɛ́rɔ́k sɛ́chwɔ́p Ródes. Sɛ́fú nɔ́kɔ́ árɛ́ sɛ́rɔ́k sɛ́gháka Patara.
44021002	Arɛ́ sɛ́ghɔ́ áchwi áchák anɛ́ árɔ̀ŋ atú Foníshia. Sɛ́chwé sɛ́ré rɔ́ŋ.
44021003	Sɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ sɛ́ghɔ̀ Sáyprɔs, sɛ́rɔ́ yɛ Sáyprɔs ɛbhe awɔ́ghɔ, sɛ́fʉɛ́t bɛ́rɔ́ŋ ndǔ mmɨk Síria. Sɛ́rɔ́k sɛ́chwɔ́p Táya, nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛ́fɛ́rɛ batu.
44021004	Sɛ́fú amɛm áchwí sɛ́kó sɛ́rɔ́k ɛtɔk. Sɛ́ghɔ́ mpay bakoŋo Yesu arɛ, sɛ́chɔ́kɔ nɛ bhɔ́ ndǔ manywɔp tándrámɔt. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ akʉ bɔ baghati Pɔ̌l bɛ ákɛ́mɔ bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm.
44021005	Kɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti mpok anɛ sɛchɔkɔ nɛ bhɔ, sɛrɔ bhɔ bɛrɔŋ. Bɔ́ mankɛm, baghɔrɛ́ nɛ babhakanɛm nɛ bɔ bárɔ́k bɛ́tɨk bhɛsɛ́ kpát bágháka angɔkɔnyɛ́n. Bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛtɛp manɛ́n amɨk sɛ́nɨkmʉɛt, sɛ́káka batɨ.
44021006	Sɛ́rɔ́k yɛ sɛ́chwé amɛm áchwí, bɔ bápɛtnsɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhap.
44021007	Sɛ́rɔ́ yɛ Táya, áchwí ápɔ́kɔ bhɛsɛ kpát sɛ́gháka Tolemays. Sɛ́rɔ áchwí sɛ́kó ɛtɔk sɛ́káka bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn bachi arɛ, nɛ sɛbhak nɛ bhɔ́ ndǔ nywɔp nɛmɔt.
44021008	Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, sɛrɔ, sɛrɔk Seséria. Ngati Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm amɔt abhak arɛ́ anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Fílip. Abhak mmu amɔt ndǔ nkwɔ́ bo batí tándrámɔt abhɛn báyábhɛ́ nyaka Yerúsalɛm bɛ mánkwak nɔkɔ bǒnto. Sɛ́rɔ́k sɛchɔkɔ ɛkɛt ɛyi.
44021009	Fílip abhɔ́ŋ bɔ̌baghɔsɔ́ŋ batí ánwi. Bɔ́ kɛbháy manɛm. Mandɛm áchyɛ́ nyaka bhɔ akap bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n yí afyɛ́ bɔ́ antɨ.
44021010	Ɛnɛ́ sɛ́náŋ sɛ́chí arɛ ndu mpǎy manywɔp, ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm amɔt anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Ágábɔs afú atú Judɛ́ya atwɔ arɛ́.
44021011	Atwɔ́ ntá yɛsɛ asɔt mgbat anɛ Pɔ̌l agwɔ́t amɔ nɛ bɛkak ɛbhi yímbɔŋ arɛm bɛ, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ arɛm bɛ, “Ɛnyunɛ́ kɛ̌ bo Israɛl bágwɔt chɔŋ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mgbat anɛ awu Yerúsalɛm mámfyɛ yi amɔ bo abhɛn bápu bo Israɛl.”
44021012	Sɛ́ghókó nɔ́kɔ́ ndak wu, bɛsɛ́ bho sɛ́kɔ̀ nyaka nɛ yi nɛ bǒnkwɔ abhɛn bachi Seséria sɛ́nɨ́k Pɔ̌l mmʉɛt bɛ́ ákɛ́rɔŋ Yerúsalɛm.
44021013	Kɛ Pɔ̌l akɛmɛ chi bɛ, “Ndaká yí bǎdì ɛnyunɛ? Bǎyɛ̀m ntɨ ɛna amɛm! Mɛnká bɛ mámfyɛ mɛ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ, nɛ yɛ̌ chí nɛwú nká bɛgu ɛ̌ti Yesu Acha.”
44021014	Nɛ ndu sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kwáy bɛkʉ yi anjibhiri ntɨ̌ ɛni, sɛ́rɔ, sɛ́rɛm bɛ, “Ɛ́mbák mbɔ ɛnyǔ mbɔŋ Mandɛm Acha áyàŋ.”
44021015	Manywɔp ayɔ áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, sɛ́tóŋti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛsɛ, sɛ́fá sɛbho bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm.
44021016	Mbɔk bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn Seséria barɔk nɛ bhɛsɛ́ básɔ́t bhɛsɛ́ ɛkɛt Násɔn mmǔ Sáyprɔs anɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛ́chɔ́kɔ ɛkɛt ɛyi. Násɔn áchi nyaka mmu amɔt anɛ áyámbɨ bɛbhak nkoŋo Yesu.
44021017	Mpok sɛ́chwɔ́bhɛ́ Yerúsalɛm batɨ bǒnkwɔ abhɛn bachi árɛ́ básɔ́t bhɛsɛ nɛ maŋák.
44021018	Nɛ́yí nɔkɔ Pɔ̌l asɔt bhɛsɛ́ sɛ́rɔk bɛghɔ Jems. Bǒbati bǒnkwɔ bachak abhɛn Yerúsalɛm mankɛm bábhák arɛ.
44021019	Pɔ̌l akaka bhɔ́ aghati bhɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ nɛ́ntɨ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl mpok yí ákʉ̀ bɛtɨk Mandɛm nɛntɨ nap.
44021020	Bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi arɛmɛ báchyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm. Barɛm yɛ ntá Pɔ̌l bɛ, “Manɔ́, wɔmbɔ̌ŋ ɔghɔ ndǔ bɛyǎ nká bo Israɛl mánókó Yesu, nɛ bábhʉɛt bɛfyɛ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛbhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé Moses sayri.
44021021	Bo Israɛl abhɛn fá Yerúsalɛm bárɛm bɛ́ ɔ̌kɔ̀ ɔ́ngati nɔkɔ bo Israɛl mankɛm abhɛn báchí amɛm bɛtɔk bɛchak bɛ mámfɛ́rɛ́ ntí ndǔ bɛbhé Moses nɛ bɛ mándɔ bɛ́syɛ́p bɔ̌bhap, nɛ bɛ mándɔ́ bɛ́kóŋo bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛn bachǐmbɨ bhap.
44021022	Chɔŋ sɛ́nkʉ yɛ ná? Bɔ bábhɔŋ chɔŋ bɛghok bɛ wɔ ɔtwɔ!
44021023	Ɔ́bhɔ̌ŋ yɛ bɛkʉ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́ghàti wɔ. Bǒ bati anwi mányiɛ mgbá nɛ Mandɛm.
44021024	Dɔ́k yɛ nɛ bhɔ amɛm ɛkɛrákap bɛ mǎnsó bɛsí nɛ Mandɛm, bɛtɔŋ bɛ nku yap amay. Wɔmbɔ̌ŋ chyɛ̌ nkáp anɛ bɔ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛchyɛ kɛ mǎmu bati yap. Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu andɨŋɨ bɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bárɛ̀m ɛ̌ti yɛ bɛ́pú tɛtɛp, nɛ bɛ́ ɔ̌bhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé Moses.
44021025	Mbák chi bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, sɛ́to bɔ bɛkáti ndu bɛ́gháti bhɔ́ bɛ́ bákɛ́ nyiɛ́ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ báchyɛ́ ntá mandɛm nsé mbɔ akap. Nɛ bɛ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mɛ́nyiɛ́ manoŋ nɛ nnya anɛ manoŋ ami ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ amɨk, nɛ bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ fyɛ amɔ ndǔ barak ɛpúsí.”
44021026	Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, Pɔ̌l asɔt yɛ bǒbhɔ batí anwi, bɔ́ mankɛm básó bɛsí nɛ Mandɛm. Arɔk yɛ amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm bɛkʉ bǒ batí mándɨ́ŋɨ kpoŋoroŋ nywɔp ɛnɛn nɛsǒ-bɛsí ɛnap nɛ Mandɛm nɛ́may, kɛ mánchyɛ akap ɛ̌ti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ndǔ nkwɔ bho bati anwi.
44021027	Manywɔp tándrámɔt anɛ Pɔ̌l afyɛ́ árɔ́p nɔ́kɔ́ kɛkwɔt mɛmay, mbɔk bo Israɛl abhɛn bafu atú Esia bághɔ́ Pɔ̌l amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Mányɨ́kɨ́si batɨ̌ bo bɛ mánkɛ́m Pɔ̌l, nɛ bákɛ́m yi,
44021028	mámbɨk nɔkɔ bɛ, “Bo Israɛl, kwak ka bhɛsɛ́! Ghɔ́ ká mmu anɛ ákɔ̀ antɔŋ nɔkɔ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti bo bhɛsɛ́ nɛ bɛbhé Moses nɛ ɛ̌ti ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ɛnɛ. Akʉ kpát nɛ́nɛ asɔt bǒ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl achwe fá amɛm ɛkɛrákap ɛnɛ nɛ bhɔ. Anyɔ̌p Ɛkɛt Mandɛm nɛ ɛ́pɛt ɛpu ɛkɛrɛ́ bɛdyɛrɛ!”
44021029	Bárɛ̀m nyaka ɛnyuyɔ mbɔnyunɛ mǎnáŋ nyaka bághɔ̌ Pɔ̌l nɛ Trofimɔs mmu Ɛ́fɛsɔs, amɛm ɛtɔk. Ɛkʉ basɔt bɛ Pɔ̌l achwe amɛm ɛkɛrákap nɛ yi.
44021030	Ɛbyɔk ɛ́kwɛ́n yɛ ɛtɔk ɛnkɛm nɛ bo babho bɛjɛt mándɔkɔ nɔkɔ ndǔ ɛkɛrákap. Bákɛ́m Pɔ̌l baya gbaka gbaka gbaka báfú nɛ yi batɨŋ batiɛp babhǐnywɔp ɛkɛrákap.
44021031	Nɛ ndu báyàŋ bɛway Pɔ̌l, ɛyɔŋ ɛ́rɔ́k ntá mǔngo batɛmɛ́ nɛnu Rom bɛ, ɛbyɔk ɛ́kwɛn amɛm ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm ɛnkɛm.
44021032	Tɛ́mté wu, asɔt batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nɛ mbɔk bǒbati bhap básɛ́p barɔk arɛ. Bo bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yí ndǔ átwɔ̀ nɛ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu, bábhɔ́t bɛdɛn Pɔ̌l.
44021033	Mǔngo batɛmɛ́ nɛnu akɛ́m yi nɛ achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ mámfé yi nɛ ngɛm ɛpay. Abhɛ́p bhɔ bɛ, “Mmǔ-nɛ chi agha? Akʉ yi?”
44021034	Bǒbhɔ bábho bɛbɨk mandɛm nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ kɛkuri kɛkuri ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ mbɔk bárɛ̀m ɛyap ɛnyu, báchák mándɛm nɔkɔ ɛyap. Ɛbyɔk ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ mǔngo batɛmɛ́ nɛnu kɛ́kɛm ntí nɛ nnɛt ndǔ ndak anɛ áfákárí. Aghati bǒbhi bɛ́ mansɔt Pɔ̌l mandɔk mamfyɛ amɛm ɛbhǎ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu.
44021035	Ágháká nɔ́kɔ́ ndu nkɔ́k anɛ bɛ́chwe anywɔ́p, batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bápɔ́kɔ yi ndǔ bághɔ́ bɛ́ bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bachi arɛ babho bɛ́twɔ nɛ baraká bɛtaŋ.
44021036	Bɛyǎ bǒbhɔ báre koŋo yi mándɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, “Wáy ka yi!”
44021037	Ndu ɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t bɛ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu manchwe amɛm ɛbha, Pɔ̌l abhɛ́p mǔngo wu bɛ, “Ɛ́tá, chɔŋ ɔ́nka bɛ́ ngátí wɔ, ndak-a?” Mǔngo wu aghok nɔkɔ ndǔ yi árɛ̀m chi Grik, abhɛ́p yi bɛ, “Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛyɔŋɔ́ Grik-ɛ?
44021038	Pú wɔ́ ɔ́chí mmu Íjip? Pú wɔ kɛ ɔkʉ bo bágʉɛ́bhɛ́ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛtɔk nɛ ɔkʉ bawǎy bho nka ɛnwi bárɔ́k nɛ wɔ amɛm baso?”
44021039	Pɔ̌l akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Puyɛ̌ mɛ. Nchí mmu Israɛl, mmɔ̌ ɛtɔk Tásɔs, ɛtɔk ɛgho ɛnɛ ɛbhɔŋɔ mɛnwɔp atú Silísha. Nnɨkmʉɛt, chyɛ mɛ ɛpok ndɛm kɛpɨ ntá bo abhɛn.”
44021040	Mǔngo wu akaa. Pɔ̌l ate yɛ ndǔ nkɔ́k anɛ bɛchwe anywɔ́p asá awɔ amfay bɛ bo mánkwɛn kpák. Bákwɛ́n nɔ́kɔ́ kpák, abho yɛ bɛrɛm kɛpɨ nɛ bhɔ ndǔ Híbru, ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛyap.
44022001	Pɔ̌l arɛm bɛ, “Bɔtá nɛ bɔmá, Tá ká batú mǎngok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm ndu bɛ́táŋa mmʉɛt bɛsí ɛbhɛka.”
44022002	Bɔ́ bághók ndǔ yi árɛ̀m chí ɛyɔŋ bo Israɛl. Mbǎŋ akwɛn chák. Pɔ̌l arɔk yɛ ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ,
44022003	“Mɛ, nchí mmu Israɛl. Nchí mmɔ́ Tásɔs atú Silísha, kɛ ngo chí fá Yerúsalɛm amɔ ntɔŋ ngo ywɛsɛ, Gamáliɛl. Ngɔk ɛkáti chi antɛn ɛyi. Atɔ́ŋ mɛ bɛkoŋo bɛbhé bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhak nɛ nchyɛ́ mmʉɛt bɛkoŋo Mandɛm mbɔ be mankɛm abhɛn bǎchí fá ɛchɔŋ.
44022004	Nchí chyɛ nyaka nɛnyok ntá bo abhɛn bákòŋo Mbi Yesu wu kpát mbɔk mángu nɔkɔ, nɛ ńkɛ́mti nɔkɔ baghɔrɛ́ nɛ babhakanɛm mámfyɛ nɔkɔ bhɔ́ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
44022005	Mǔngo bachiǎkap nɛ bǒ ɛchɛmɛ́ bǒ batí ɛtɔk bákwày bɛ́te mɛ ntísiɛ bɛ́ nchí kʉ nyaka ɛnyu yɔ. Ntá yap kɛ nchi nsɔt nyaka bɛkáti ndu bɛrɔŋ ntá batɨ̌ bo Israɛl abhɛn Damáskɔs. Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́kɛ́mti bakoŋo Yesu arɛ́ bɛ mpɛ́tnsɛm Yerúsalɛm nɛ bhɔ́ mánchyɛ́ bɔ́ ntɛ́msí.
44022006	“Ndǔ nchí rɔŋ, ngáká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t ɛtɔk Damáskɔs, mbɔ nkárɛ́nká byó nɛ ɛpay nɛ ngósí, ɛtaŋtí bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ bɛ́fú amfay tɛ́mchok bɛ́kwɛ́n bɛkap mɛ, mbaŋ aghɔ tontó.
44022007	Ɛ́kʉ́ nkwɛ́n amɨk ngók ɛyɔŋ ndǔ ɛ́rɛ̀m ntá ya bɛ, ‘Sɔ̌l! Sɔ̌l! Ɔ́chyɛ̀ mɛ nɛnyok ndaká yí?’
44022008	Nkɛmɛ bɛ, ‘Acha chí wɔ agha?’ Ɛyɔŋ ɛ́kɛ́mɛ bɛ, ‘Chí mɛ Yesu Mmu Násárɛt kɛ ɔ́chyɛ̀ nɛnyok.’
44022009	Bǒ abhɛn nkɔ́ nɛ bhɔ́ bághɔ́ nkwɔ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhɔ kɛ bákɛ ghók ɛyɔŋɔ́ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m kɛpɨ nɛ mɛ.
44022010	Ngók nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛyɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́ghàti mɛ, ndɛm bɛ, ‘Acha, ɔ̌yàŋ mɛ nkʉ yi?’ Acha arɛm ntá yá bɛ, ‘Faté dɔ́k Damáskɔs. Arɛ́, chɔŋ mángátí wɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Mandɛm áyábhɛ bɛ ɔbhɔŋ bɛkʉ.’
44022011	Ɛtaŋtí bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhɔ bɛ́kʉ́ nkɛpɛrɛ kwáy bɛghɔ mbaŋ. Bǒ nkɔ́ nɛ bhɔ́ bárɔ́bhɛ́ kɛm mɛ chí ndǔ awɔ́ kpátɛ sɛ́gháka Damáskɔs.
44022012	“Mmu amɔt abhak Damáskɔs anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Ananías. Abhak mmu anɛ ákòŋo Mandɛm sayri, mmu anɛ ábhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé ɛbhɛsɛ́ bo Israɛl, nɛ mmu bo Israɛl mankɛm abhɛn báchí arɛ́ báchyɛ̀ kɛnókó.
44022013	Ananías atwɔ́ ntá ya, ate mɛ nɛ́kú mmʉɛt arɛm bɛ, ‘Manɔ́ wa Sɔ̌l, pɛt bo bɛghɔ mbaŋ.’ Tɛ́mté wu amɨ́k ánɛ́nɛ mɛ mpɛt mbo bɛ́ghɔ mbaŋ. Ngɔ́ yɛ́ yi.
44022014	Arɛm ntá ya bɛ, ‘Mandɛm bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ́ ayap wɔ bɛ́ ɔ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi atɨ bɛkʉ. Ayap wɔ bɛ ɔ́ngɔ́ anɛ babhɨŋɨ bɛ Mmu Chak. Ayap wɔ bɛ ɔ́ngɔ́k ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fù yi anyu.
44022015	Ayap wɔ nɛ ntí bɛ́ chɔŋ ɔ́mbak ntísiɛ aywi ndu bɛ́gháti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n ɔ́ghɔ́ nɛ ɛbhɛn ɔghoko.
44022016	Ɔ́kɛ́pɛrɛ chɔŋti yɛ mpok. Faté mánjwítí wɔ, ɔ́ndɔ Mandɛm anso bɛbʉ́ bhɛ, ɔmbɨŋɨ nɔkɔ nnyɛ́n Acha.’
44022017	“Mpɛt nɔ́kɔ́ nsɛm Yerúsalɛm, ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t ndǔ nchí nɨkmʉɛt amɛm ɛkɛrákap, ngɔ́ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k antifu.
44022018	Ngɔ́ Yesu Acha téé ndǔ ághàti mɛ bɛ, ‘Kʉ ayak dɔ̌ Yerúsalɛm. Bǒ abhɛn fá bápú noko chɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́ghàti bhɔ́ ɛ̌ti ya.’
44022019	Nkɛmɛ yi bɛ, ‘Acha, bɔ́ babhɔŋ bárɨ́ŋɨ sayri bɛ nchí rɔ́ŋ nyaka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí bo Israɛl nkʉ nɔkɔ bɛ mánkɛ́mtí bo abhɛn mánóko wɔ, nɛ mandɛn, mámfyɛ nɔkɔ mbɔk yap ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
44022020	Nɛ mpok báwày Stífin ntísiɛ aywɛ, mbak arɛ́ nkwɔ téé, mbabhɛri nɔkɔ ndɛn bo abhɛn bátɛ́mtí yí nɛ batay baway. Nka bɛ́ mángwáy yi.’
44022021	Kɛ Acha aghati mɛ bɛ, ‘Fǎ Yerúsalɛm dɔ́k mbɔ ɛnyǔ ngátí wɔ. Dɔ́k mbɔnyunɛ nchí tó wɔ nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl.’”
44022022	Ndǔ Pɔ̌l árɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bachi arɛ́ bátá batú mángoko nɔkɔ sayri. Kɛ nɛtaka yí átáká bo Israɛl bɛyǎ bǒbhɔ bábho bɛbɨk nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Naŋá ká yí, apú mmú ábhák nɛpɛ́m.”
44022023	Ndǔ bábɨ̀k, bábhó bɛfok ndɛn ɛyap nkwɔ nɛ báre toko mfok mántak nɔkɔ amfay.
44022024	Mmǔ ntí batɛmɛ́ nɛnu Rom ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu mansɔt Pɔ̌l manchwe nɛ yí amɛm ɛbhá ɛyap. Aghati bɔ mandɛn yi nɛ ɛ́kpá bɛkʉ yí ángátí bhɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yí akʉ́ kɛ bo Israɛl báré bé ntɨ nɛ yí kpát mámbɨkɨ nɔkɔ ɛnyuyɔ.
44022025	Bágwɔ́t nɔ́kɔ́ yí ndu bɛdɛn, Pɔ̌l abhɛ́p mǔnti batɛmɛ́ nɛnu amɔt anɛ achi arɛ tee bɛ, “Ɛbhé ɛ́chyɛ́ wɔ bɛtaŋ bɛ́ ɔ́ndɛ́m mándɛ́n mmu Rom ɛnɛ bábhɨkɨ re yɨŋɨ mbɔ̌ŋ manyé ayi mángɔ́ bɛ́ akʉ ɛnyɨŋɨ́?”
44022026	Mǔnti batɛmɛ́ nɛnu wu ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́ afa arɔk ntá mǔngo batɛmɛ́ nɛnu arɛm bɛ, “Ɔ́yàŋ bɛkʉ nɔ yi? Mmǔ-nɛ abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ mbɔ mmu Rom. Ɔbhɛ́ mándɛ́n yí?”
44022027	Mǔngo batɛmɛ́ nɛnu ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, arɔk abhɛp Pɔ̌l bɛ, “Ghatí mɛ́, ɔchí mmu Rom tɛtɛbhɛ?” Pɔ̌l aka bɛ, “Nchí mmu Rom.”
44022028	Mǔnti batɛmɛ́ nɛnu wu arɛm ntá Pɔ̌l bɛ, “Nchɔ́ŋtí bɛyǎ nkáp kɛ báchyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ mbɔ mmu Rom”, Pɔ̌l akɛmɛ yí bɛ, “Kɛ mɛ Pɔ̌l nchí mmu Rom tɛ nɛbhě ɛna.”
44022029	Ɛ́kʉ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋ bɛbhɛp yí mɛnyɨŋ báfɛ́rɛ yi amɔ tɛ́mté, bɔ́ kɛpɛrɛ bhɛ́p yi yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m mǔngo batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nkwɔ́ mpok yí árɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ Pɔ̌l mmu yí ákʉ́ bákɛ́mɛ́ báfyɛ́ ngɛm amɔ chí mmu Rom.
44022030	Mǔngo batɛmɛ́ nɛnu are yáŋ bɛ́rɨŋɨ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bo Israɛl bárɛ̀m bɛ́ Pɔ̌l akʉ. Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, arɛm yɛ bɛ mámfɛ́rɛ́ Pɔ̌l ngɛm amɔ. Achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ bǒbatí bachiǎkap nɛ bǒbatí ɛtɔk mankɛm mánchɔ́kɔ́ mánjɨ́ŋɨ́ ndaká Pɔ̌l. Báchɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ achyɛ ɛyɔŋ básɔt Pɔ̌l bakʉ yi ate bɛsí bhap.
44023001	Pɔ̌l atɛp bɔ́ amɨ́k amʉɛt arɛm bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma, mpoknkɛm anɛ nchí bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ kpatɛ̌ ɛchɔŋ ntɨ ɛna nɛchi amɛm pɛ́pɛ́p.”
44023002	Mpok yi arɛmɛ nɔ, Ananías mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm, achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ bo abhɛn bachi kɛkwɔt nɛ Pɔ̌l mándɛp nnyu yi.
44023003	Pɔ̌l arɛm bɛ, “Wɔ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́rí nkok anɛ bawati nɛ mbɨ pɛ́pɛ́p bɛ bo bǎkɛ́ rɨŋɨ! Chɔŋ Mandɛm andɛp wɔ. Ɔchɔ́kɔ́ afɔ bɛ́sɔt ɛbhé ɔ́ntaŋ mɛ, nɛ ɔ̌rɛ̀m bɛ mándɛp mɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛbhé ɛbhɨkɨ chyɛ wɔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɔ̌? .”
44023004	Bo abhɛn báté kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ Pɔ̌l bábhɛp yi bɛ, “Ɔ̌sɔkɔti mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm-ɛ?”
44023005	Pɔ̌l akɛmɛ bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma, mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mbʉ bɛ chi mǔngo bachiǎkap. Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Ɔ́kɛ́rɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti mǔnti bǒbhɛ.’”
44023006	Pɔ̌l aghɔ nɔkɔ bɛ mbɔk bǒ bati bhɔ bachi chí bǒnkwɔ Sádusi nɛ bɛ báchak babhak bǒnkwɔ Fárisi, abɨk bɛsí bǒ ɛchɛmɛ arɛm bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma, nchí mǔnkwɔ Fárisi nɛ mmɔ̌ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi. Nté fá acha manyé chí ndu nnókó bɛ́ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ bawú mámpɛtnsɛm ndu nɛpɛ́m.”
44023007	Arɛm nɔkɔ nɔ, ɛpʉ́ítí ɛ́kwɛ́n nɛ́ntɨ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi nɛ bǒnkwɔ Sádusi nɛ ɛchɛmɛ ɛ́kɔ́rɛ.
44023008	Ɛ́fákárí nyaka ɛnyu yɔ mbɔnyunɛ bǒnkwɔ Sádusi bárɛ̀m bɛ bawú bápú kway bɛpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɛ bɛ bɔángɛl bápú, nɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛpu ɛnɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ bɛfoŋɔ. Kɛ bǒnkwɔ Fárisi mánoko bɛ chɔŋ bawú mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɛ bɛ bɔángɛl bachi nɛ bɛfóŋó nkwɔ bɛchi.
44023009	Ɛrɛmɛ́ ɛbyɔk ɛ́kwɛ́n, mbɔk batɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm abhɛn báchí bǒnkwɔ Fárisi báfáte báre rɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ́ yɛ̌ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmǔ-nɛ ákʉ́. Ngufú ɛfóŋó kɛ ɛ́ghátí yi ɛnyɨŋ nɛ ngufu ángɛl kɛ árɛ́mɛ́ kɛpɨ nɛ yi!”
44023010	Bɛ́táŋá bɛ́yá bɛ́chá, ɛrɔp chi bɛ́kɛm batɨ nɛ amɔ. Ɛkʉ mǔngo batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɔ́ŋ bɛcháy bɛ bákway bɛdakati Pɔ̌l. Achyɛ yɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bhi mánsɛp mámfɔ́ŋɔ́ Pɔ̌l ntá bǒbhɔ mándɔk amɛm ɛbhá batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nɛ yi.
44023011	Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ nɛ bɛti Yesu Acha atwɔ́ ate nɛpakámʉɛt Pɔ̌l arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ chay! Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́rɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti ɛya fá Yerúsalɛm, ɔbhɔŋ bɛ́kʉ ɛnyuyɔ amɛm ɛtɔk Rom nkwɔ́.”
44023012	Nɛ́yi nɔ́kɔ́, mbɔk bo Israɛl bákɛ́m ɛchɛmɛ báte ɛyu bɛway Pɔ̌l. Mányú nku bɛ bapu nyiɛ nɛnyiɛ nɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bápú nyu kpátɛ mangway yi.
44023013	Mpǎy bo abhɛn mányú nku yɔ báchá bɛsa bɛ́pay.
44023014	Barɔk ntá bǒbatí bachiǎkap Mandɛm nɛ bǒbati ɛtɔk baghati bhɔ bɛ, “Sɛ́nyǔ nku, sɛ́yɨ́kɨ́ mmʉɛt bɛ́ sɛ́pú nyiɛ́ nɛ sɛ́pú nyú yɛ̌nyɨŋ tɛ sɛ́ngway Pɔ̌l.
44023015	Bě nɛ nkwɔ Ɛchɛmɛ́ bǒ batí ɛtɔk tó yɛ ka ɛyɔŋ ntá mǔngo batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bɛ́ ántó Pɔ̌l ntá yɛka mbɔ bɛ bǎyàŋ bɛghok ɛyɔŋɔ́ manyé ɛyi sayri. Mbák ɛ́mfákárí nɔ́, chɔŋ sɛ́ngway yi ambi.”
44023016	Mmǔfu aghók ɛ̌ti nɛkatínɛt ɛnɔ. Abhak mmɔ̌ manɔ Pɔ̌l. Afa arɔk amɛm ɛbhǎ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu aghati Pɔ̌l.
44023017	Pɔ̌l abhɨŋɨ mǔnti batɛmɛ́ nɛnu amɔt aghati yí bɛ, “Sɔt ɛsakámu anɛ́ dɔ́k ntá mǔngo nɛ yí. Abhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ́gháti yi.”
44023018	Mǔnti wu asɔt yí arɔk ntá mǔngo wap arɛm bɛ, “Pɔ̌l mǔkɛnɔŋ abhɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ arɛm bɛ́ nsɔt ɛsakámu anɛ́ ntwɔ́ ntá yɛ nɛ yí mbɔnyunɛ abhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ́gháti wɔ.”
44023019	Mǔngo batɛmɛ́ nɛnu akɛ́m yí ndu awɔ́ aya bárɔk ansɛm, abhɛ́p yí ansɛm ansɛm bɛ, “Ntɨkɨ ndak ɔ́yàŋ bɛghati mɛ?”
44023020	Akɛmɛ yí bɛ, “Bǒbatí bo Israɛl báte ɛyu bɛ mángáti wɔ ɔ́nsɔt Pɔ̌l ɔnsɛp nɛ yí ndu ɛchɛmɛ́ bataŋá manyé ɛgho mburɛ mbɔ bɛ báyàŋ chí bɛ́rɨŋɨ ndaka ywi sayri.
44023021	Kɛ kɛ́ka nɛ bhɔ́. Bǒ bhap bábhɛ́sɛ́ ambi mánòŋ bɛ mankɛm yí mangway. Bácha batí bɛsa bɛpay. Nɛ mányǔ nku bɛ́ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bápú nyiɛ nɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bápú nyú kpátɛ mángwáy yí. Mánaŋ batoŋti mmʉɛt, barɔbhɛ noŋ chí bɛ́ ɔ́ntó Pɔ̌l antwɔ.”
44023022	Mǔngo batɛmɛ́ nɛnu aya yí batú bɛ, “Dɔ́k, kɛ kɛ́kʉ yɛ̌ mmu andɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɔghátí mɛ ndak anɛ.”
44023023	Mǔngo batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɨŋɨ yɛ bǒ batí batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bhi bapay aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Sɔt ka batɛmɛ́ nɛnu batí bɛsa byo, bǒ batí bɛsa bɛ́rát nsɛm byo abhɛn bákɔ̀ nɛ mpɔŋɔ́ndɨ́k, nɛ batɛmɛ́ bakɔŋ bɛsa byó. Toŋtí ká mmʉɛt bɛ́sɔt Pɔ̌l ndu nkarɛnka nɛ́nɛnamɔt beti ɛbhɛn ɛchɔŋ, mǎndɔ́k Seséria nɛ yi.
44023024	Chiɛ̌ mpɔŋɔ́ndɨ́k ɛnɛ Pɔ̌l ákɔ̀ nɛ yɔ́. Nɛ kʉ Pɔ̌l ánchwɔ́p dok ntá gɔ́bhanɔ Fɛ́liks ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛbhɨkɨ fakari nɛ yi.”
44023025	Árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, asɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ́ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ,
44023026	“Mɛ Klaudiɔs Lísias kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ ntá Ɛta yɛsɛ gɔ́bhanɔ Fɛ́liks. Ɛta, nchí to wɔ bakak.
44023027	Bo Israɛl bakɛm mmu wu báre yáŋ bɛway yi. Ngók nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ yi abhɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ ɛtɔk Rom mbɔ mɔ̌mɨk, nsɔt batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bha ndɔk mfɛ́rɛ́ yi amɔ́ yap.
44023028	Nsɔt yí ndɔk ndu áchá manyé agho wap bɛ́rɨŋɨ ndak anɛ yí akʉ.
44023029	Arɛ́, ngɔ́ bɛ́ abhɨkɨ kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́yàŋ bɛ mángwáy yí, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ mámfyɛ yi amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Báre rɛm chi barak anɛ ayɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛbhé bhap.
44023030	Nɛ mmǔfu ághátí nɔ́kɔ́ mɛ ansɛm ansɛm bɛ́ bo Israɛl báte ɛyu bɛway yi, tɛ́mté wu ndɛm bɛ́ mbɔŋ bɛto yi ntá yɛ. Ngátí bo abhɛn bábhárɛ́ yí ndak amʉɛt bɛ mántwɔ́ ntá yɛ mangati wɔ ndak anɛ yi ákʉ́.”
44023031	Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bákʉ mbɔ ɛnyu mǔngo wap ághátí bhɔ́. Básɔ́t Pɔ̌l bɛtǐ bhɔ bárɔk nɛ yi kpát bágháka Antipatris.
44023032	Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bákɔ́ chi nɛ bɛkak bápɛtnsɛm amɛm ɛbhá. Bárɔ́ abhɛn bákɔ̀ amfay mpɔŋɔ́ndɨ́k mándɔ́k Seséria nɛ Pɔ̌l.
44023033	Bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ Seséria, báchyɛ ɛkáti ntá gɔ́bhanɔ, bárɔ Pɔ̌l amɔ yi.
44023034	Ápáy nɔ́kɔ́ ɛkáti yɔ, abhɛp Pɔ̌l bɛ, “Ayɛ̌ atú ɛtɔk chi anɛ?” Pɔ̌l akɛmɛ yí bɛ, “Silísha.” Ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ,
44023035	arɛm ntá Pɔ̌l bɛ, “Bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ndak nɛ wɔ mǎnáŋ mántwɔ́, chɔŋ ngók nnyé ɛnɛ.” Achyɛ yɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ mámfyɛ́ yi anywɔ́p amɛm áchá anɛ gɔ́bhanɔ, mámbahɛri nɔkɔ yi. Áchá wu chi anɛ Hɛ́rɔd áté nyaka.
44024001	Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp átay, mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Ananías asɛp arɔk Siséria nɛ mbɔk bǒbatí ɛtɔk, nɛ ntaŋanyu amɔt anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Tɛtúlɔs. Báchwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛsí gɔ́bhanɔ Fɛ́liks, babho bɛbhat Pɔ̌l barak amʉɛt.
44024002	Bábhɨ́ŋɨ́ Pɔ̌l, achwe anywɔ́p. Tɛtúlɔs abho bɛ́rɛ́m ɛ̌ti yi ntá gɔ́bhanɔ bɛ, “Ɛta! Ɛ̌ti yɛ kpák achi fá ɛtɔk ɛyɛsɛ ndǔ ɛrɔ́ri mpok, nɛ ɛ̌ti nɛkʉ ywɛ anɛ ndɨ́ndɨ́, ɛgúpsí ɛ́chí ɛtɔk.
44024003	Ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɔ́kʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ ɔ́kʉ̀ bhɔ́, sɛ́ka bhɔ nɛ sɛ́kàka wɔ.
44024004	Mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ bɛ́chɔ́ŋti mpok ayɛ tontó, nchí nɨk chi mmʉɛt bɛ ɔ́nsɛ́bhɛ́ ntɨ ɛnɛ́ amɨk ɔ́ngɔ́k mbɨŋɨ́ ndak anɛ́ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛghati wɔ.
44024005	Sɛ́ghɔ bɛ́ mmǔ-nɛ chí nchyɛ ɛsɔŋɔri anɛ tɔ́ŋ sɛ́ngɔ́ nɛ nyɔŋ-ndak ndǔ nkwɔ bo Israɛl mbaŋ ɛnkɛm. Achí nkwɔ́ mǔnti ndǔ ɛká bho abhɛn bábhɨŋɨ bɛ bo Násárɛt.
44024006	Akʉ kpát are yáŋ bɛgʉɛp ɛbyɔk amɛm ɛkɛrákap awu Yerúsalɛm, kɛ sɛ́kɛ́m nɔ́ yi. [Mbʉ́ sɛ́taŋ yi bɛkoŋo ɛbhé,
44024007	kɛ Lísias mǔngo batɛmɛ́ nɛnu atwɔ́ afɔŋɔ yí amɔ yɛsɛ nɛ bɛtaŋ,
44024008	yí bɛ́ bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ndak nɛ yi mántwɔ́ ntá yɛ.] Mbák wɔmbɔŋ ɔ́ndɛ́m kɛpɨ nɛ yi, chɔŋ ɔ́ndɨŋɨ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ yi ákʉ́ ɛchí tɛtɛp.”
44024009	Tɛtúlɔs árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, bo Israɛl báchɛ́m nɛ yí báká bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ́ Pɔ̌l ákʉ́ ɛchi tɛtɛp.
44024010	Gɔ́bhanɔ atɔ́ŋ yɛ nɛ awɔ bɛ Pɔ̌l andɛm kɛpɨ. Pɔ̌l abho bɛrɛm bɛ, “Ngɔ bɛ́ ɔnáŋ ɔtaŋ manyé amɛm ɛtɔk ɛnɛ ndǔ bɛyǎ mamiɛ, nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ maŋák bɛ́táŋa mmʉɛ́t bɛsí bhɛ.
44024011	Mbák ɔ́mbɛ́p, chɔŋ wɔmbɔŋ ɔ́ndɨŋɨ bɛ ɛbhɨ́kɨ́ cha manywɔp byo nɛ apay ɛnɛ́ ndɔ́ŋɔ́ Yerúsalɛm ndu bɛchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó.
44024012	Nɛ bo Israɛl bábhɨkɨ ghɔ́ mɛ ndǔ nchí kɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ yɛ̌ mmu amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, bábhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ mɛ ndǔ nchí nyɨkɨsi batɨ̌-bho bɛ mánchyɛ ɛsɔŋɔri amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛtí nɛ yɛ̌ chí ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt achak amɛm ɛtɔk.
44024013	Nɛ bápú kwáy bɛtɔŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ́ nkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bábhàt nɛ́ mɛ amʉɛt.
44024014	Kɛ nká ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔ́t bɛsí bhɛ kpoŋoroŋ. Nchí koŋo Mbi anɛ́ bo Israɛl bárɛ̀m bɛ abhɔŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ndu nchí nɨkmʉɛt nchyɛ́ nɔkɔ kɛnókó ntá Mandɛm bachǐmbɨ abhɛsɛ. Nɛ nnókó yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɛbhé Moses bɛ́yàŋ sɛnkʉ nɛ yɛ̌ chí ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm basɨŋɨ́ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ.
44024015	Mbákántɨ nɛ Mandɛm ɛnyumɔ́t mbɔ bhɔ́, bɛ́ ɛwak ɛ́mɔt chɔŋ yí ankʉ bawú mankɛm abhɛn báchí chak bɛsí bhi nɛ abhɛn bapu mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
44024016	Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ nchí kʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ́ ntɨ ɛna nɛ́mbák pɛ́pɛ́p nɛ Mandɛm, nɛ́mbak pɛ́pɛ́p nɛ bo.
44024017	“Nnáŋ ntat nyaka mpǎy mamiɛ́ kɛrɔ́ŋ Yerúsalɛm. Ndɔk yɛ arɛ́ nɛ nkáp bɛ́chyɛ́ nɛkwak ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho ɛtɔk ɛya, nɛ bɛ́chyɛ́ akap ntá Mandɛm.
44024018	Ɛnɛ́ nchí Yerúsalɛm ndu batí barak ayɔ ápáy kɛ̌ bághɔ́ mɛ amɛm ɛkɛrákap. Bághɔ́ mɛ ndǔ nchí naŋa bɛkʉ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛbhé Moses ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ́ mmu ankʉ bɛso bɛsí nɛ Mandɛm. Ɛká bho ɛ́pú nyaka arɛ nɛ mɛ, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ɛbyɔk.
44024019	Kɛ mbɔk bo Israɛl abhɛn báfú atú Esia bábhak arɛ́. Bɔ babhɔŋ bɛ́twɔ fá mántɛbhɛ mɛ bɛsí bhɛ mbák bághɔ bɛ nkʉ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ.
44024020	Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ́, bɛ́p bo abhɛn bachi fá téé, bɛ bɔ babhɔŋ mandɛm bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ɛbhɛn baghɔ ɛbhe ɛya mpok ntée amɛm ɛchɛmɛ́ bǒbati ɛtɔk.
44024021	Bǎbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bárɛ̀m bɛ nkʉ, ɛbhɨkɨ fʉɛt chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ɛnɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ ndɛm mpok ntée nɛntɨ ɛnap bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ bawú mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.’”
44024022	Fɛ́liks arɨŋɨ nyaka sayri ɛ̌ti Mbi Yesu Acha. Ɛ́kʉ́ ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ Pɔ̌l arɛmɛ, ábhʉ́rɛ́ manyé, arɛm ntá bo Israɛl bɛ́ Lísias mǔngo batɛmɛ́ nɛnu ántwɔ́ chɔŋ mkpɔ́t nnyé ɛnɛká ɛnɛn.
44024023	Achyɛ yɛ ɛyɔŋ ntá mǔnti batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bɛ́ ámfyɛ́ Pɔ̌l anywɔ́p, mambabhɛri nɔkɔ yi, kɛ ámbɔ́ŋ ngangaŋ mandú. Nɛ bɛ bákɛ́ kaŋ mamʉɛrɛ bhi bɛrɔŋ bɛghɔ yi nɛ bɛchyɛ yi nɛkwak.
44024024	Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mpǎy manywɔp, Fɛ́liks nɛ ngɔrɛ́ aywi Drusíla batwɔ. Drusíla abhak mmu Israɛl. Báto mmu bɛ ambɨŋɨ Pɔ̌l. Atwɔ nɔkɔ, bátá batu bare ghok ndu yi árɛ̀m ɛnyǔ mmu ákway bɛbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo.
44024025	Ndǔ Pɔ̌l ákɛ̀m ɛpʉ́ítí andɛmɛ nɔkɔ ɛnyǔ mmu ákwày bɛbhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ ɛnyǔ mmu ákwày bɛ́kɛ́m mmʉɛt bɛ ákɛ́ kʉ bɛbʉ́, nɛ ɛ̌ti nywɔp ɛnɛn Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu, bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m Fɛ́liks, arɛm bɛ, “Dɔ́k kpɨ́k, nnaŋ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛ́pók chɔŋ mpɛt mbɨŋɨ wɔ.”
44024026	Árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, abhaka ntɨ bɛ ngufú chɔŋ Pɔ̌l anchyɛ yí bɛsɔŋ. Ɛkʉ are bhɨŋɨ yí mpok nɛ mpok andɛm nɔkɔ kɛpɨ nɛ yi.
44024027	Are kʉ ɛnyu ɛyɔ ndǔ mamiɛ́ ápáy kpátɛ̌ Pɔ́síɔ́s Fɛ́stɔs ásɔ́t ɛ́pók ɛyi mbɔ gɔ́bhanɔ. Ndu Fɛ́liks ayaŋ bo Israɛl mámbɔŋ maŋák nɛ yi, arɔ Pɔ̌l ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
44025001	Fɛstɔs arɔk Seséria bɛ́bhó bɛtɨk mbɔ gɔ́bhanɔ atú Judéya. Ɛfʉɛrɛ nɔkɔ manywɔp arat, afa akó Yerúsalɛm.
44025002	Arɛ́, bǒbati bachiǎkap nɛ manɛ́m bo Israɛl barɔk batɛmɛri Fɛstɔs babho bɛbhat Pɔ̌l barak amʉɛt. Nɛ manɨk Fɛstɔs mmʉɛt bɛ,
44025003	ankwak bɔ bɛkʉ manto Pɔ̌l Yerúsalɛm. Mǎnaŋ batɨ nyaka bɛ bo mámbɛ́sɛ́ ambi mankɛm yi mangway.
44025004	Fɛstɔs aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Pɔ̌l achí ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ amɛm ɛtɔk Seséria nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ nkaysi bɛrɔŋ arɛ́ mandú mpok.
44025005	Bǒbatí bhɛka mánkóŋó mɛ Seséria nɛ mbák yi abhɔŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ chɔŋ mǎndɛm bɛsí ɛbha arɛ́.”
44025006	Fɛstɔs abhak nɛ bhɔ́ mbɔ manywɔp ánɛ̀n nɛ byó. Apɛt yɛ nsɛm Seséria. Nɛ́yi nɔ́kɔ́, achɔkɔ ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ manyé ɛyi, achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ mánsɔ́t Pɔ̌l mántwɔ́ nɛ yí.
44025007	Bátwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛ yí bo Israɛl abhɛn báfú Yerúsalɛm bákáp yí báfyɛ́ nɛ́ntɨ́ mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ́ Pɔ̌l ákʉ́ bɛyǎ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bɔ́ kɛkwáy bɛtɔŋ kpoŋoroŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ́ bárɛ̀m bɛ́ yí akʉ́.
44025008	Pɔ̌l abho bɛ́táŋa mmʉɛt andɛm nɔkɔ bɛ, “Bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́pú nɛ mɛ wáwák bɛyɨŋɨ ɛbhé bo Israɛl nɛ ɛbhé ɛkɛrákap nɛ yɛ̌chi ɛbhé Mfɔ Rom.”
44025009	Fɛstɔs áyàŋ nyaka bo Israɛl mankɔŋ yi. Ɛ́kʉ́ abhɛp Pɔ̌l bɛ, “Ɔkɔŋ bɛ́ko Yerúsalɛm bɛ́ ntáŋ ndak anɛ arɛ?”
44025010	Pɔ̌l akɛmɛ bɛ, “Nchí fá amɛm acha manyé Mfɔ Rom, nɛ fá kɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́táŋ nyé ɛnɛn. Wɔmbɔŋ ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ kʉ bo Israɛl bɛbʉ́.
44025011	Mbák nkwɛn ɛbhé nɛ nkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́yàŋ bɛ mángwáy mɛ nká nɛwú. Kɛ tɛ̌ndu barak anɛ́ bɔ́ bábhàt mɛ amʉɛt apú tɛtɛp, yɛ̌ mmú apú kwáy bɛfyɛ mɛ amɔ́ yap. Nyé ɛna nɛ́bhɔŋ bɛ́rɔ́ŋ ntá Mfɔ Rom.”
44025012	Fɛstɔs ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ Pɔ̌l árɛ́mɛ́, abhɨŋɨ bataŋá manyé abhi bárɛ́m kɛpɨ. Aghati yɛ Pɔ̌l bɛ, “Ɔrɛm bɛ́ nyé ɛnɛ nɛ́ndɔ́k ntá Mfɔ Rom, nɛ chɔŋ ɔ́ndɔk ntá Mfɔ Rom.”
44025013	Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mpǎy manywɔp, Mfɔ Agripa nɛ mɔ́mayi anɛ ngɔrɛ́ Bɛnis bárɔ́k Seséria ndu bɛ́káka Fɛstɔs.
44025014	Bátát nɔ́kɔ́ árɛ́ mpǎy manywɔp, Fɛstɔs aghati Mfɔ Agripa ɛ̌ti nyé Pɔ̌l bɛ, “Mmǔfú achí fá anɛ Fɛ́liks arɔ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
44025015	Nɛ mpok nchí Yerúsalɛm, bǒ batí bachiǎkap nɛ bǒ batí ɛtɔk báré bhat yí barak amʉɛt nɛ báré yáŋ bɛ mɛnchyɛ́ ɛyɔŋ mángwáy yi.
44025016	Kɛ nkɛmɛ bhɔ́ bɛ ɛpɨŋɨ́ bǒ Rom ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ mángwáy mmu ɛnɛ́ babhɨkɨre taŋ yi. Mmu abhɔŋ bɛ́té bɛsí nɛ bɛsí nɛ bo abhɛn bátí yí anchyɛ ɛyi ɛyɔŋɔ́ manyé.
44025017	Bátwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ fá, mbɨ́kɨ́ chɔŋti mpok. Nɛ́yí, nchyɛ́ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mánsɔ́t mmǔ wu mantwɔ ndu acha manyé nɛ yi.
44025018	Mpok bo abhɛn bábhárɛ́ yi barak amʉɛt báfáté, bɔ́kɛ rɛm yɛ̌ ndak abʉ́abʉ mbɔ anɛ nkaysi bɛ bɔ bakway bɛrɛm bɛ yi akʉ.
44025019	Báré kɛ́m chi ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ yí ɛ̌ti baraká Mandɛm ayap nɛ ɛ̌ti mmu anɛ ákà nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Yesu anɛ ánáŋ ágú, kɛ Pɔ̌l ǎrɛ̀m bɛ́ achi nɛpɛ́m.
44025020	Ngɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ mɛ̌kwáy bɛkʉ bɛ mbɔŋ nɛjwǐmɛm ndu barak anɛ, mbɛ́p Pɔ̌l mbák yi akɔŋ bɛrɔŋ Yerúsalɛm bɛ mántaŋ nnyé ɛni arɛ́.
44025021	Kɛ Pɔ̌l kɛka. Ate chí bɛ́ mambabhɛri nɔkɔ yi kpatɛ Mfɔ Rom antáŋ nyé ɛni. Nchyɛ́ ɛyɔŋ bɛ mambabhɛri nɔkɔ yi kpatɛ mpok anɛ mɛ́tò yi ntá Mfɔ Rom.”
44025022	Mfɔ Agripa arɛm ntá yi bɛ, “Chɔŋ mɛmbɔŋ nkɔŋ bɛghok nɛ batú ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m.” Fɛstɔs akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Chɔŋ ɔ́ngok yi mbúrɛ́.”
44025023	Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ, Mfɔ Agripa nɛ mɔ́mayi Bɛnis bárɔk amɛm áchá-ɛtɔk nɛ bɛyǎ kɛnókó, báchwé nɛ bǒbati batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nɛ manɛm bǒ ɛtɔk. Fɛstɔs achyɛ yɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu mánsɔ́t Pɔ̌l mántwɔ́ nɛ yí.
44025024	Bátwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛ yí, Fɛstɔs arɛm bɛ, “Mfɔ Agripa nɛ be mankɛm abhɛn báchí fá nɛ bhɛsɛ, ghɔ́ mmǔrɛ́. Bo Israɛl mankɛm abhɛn Yerúsalɛm nɛ abhɛn fá Seséria bátwɔ ntá ya mpoknkɛm, mámbɨk nɔkɔ bɛ, ‘Apú mmu anɛ bárɔ̀ bɛ ámbák nɛpɛ́m.’
44025025	Kɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ́ nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yi ákʉ́ bɛ mangway yi, nɛ tɛ̌ndu yímbɔŋ árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ manyé ayi abhɔŋ bɛ́rɔŋ ntá Mfɔ Rom, nka nɛ yí.
44025026	Yɛ̌ nɔ, mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ɛsáyrí ɛnyɨŋ bɛsɨŋ ntá Mfɔ Rom ɛ̌ti yi. Ɛ̌tiyɔ kɛ ntwɔ́ nɛ yí bɛsí ɛbhɛka, nɛ sayri sayri, bɛsí ɛbhɛ, Mfɔ Agripa! Ntwɔ nɛ yi bɛ sɛ́njɨ́ŋɨ́ nyé ɛni ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ nchí kway bɛbhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́sɨ̀ŋ.
44025027	Mbɨ́kɨ́ kaysi bɛ́ ɛ́chí sayri bɛ́tó mǔkɛnɔŋ ntá Mfɔ Rom nkɛrɛm mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́.”
44026001	Fɛstɔs ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m, Agripa arɛm bɛ, “Pɔ̌l, mbák ɔbhɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ́rɛm ndu bɛ́táŋá mmʉɛt, dɛm sɛ́ngók.” Pɔ̌l abho yɛ bɛ́táŋa mmʉɛt, antɔŋ nɔkɔ nɛ awɔ́ bɛ,
44026002	“Mfɔ Agripa, nkáysɨ́ bɛ́ ɛrɨ ɛcha bɛ nté bɛsí ɛbhɛ ɛchɔŋ ndu bɛ́táŋa mmʉɛt ndǔ barak anɛ́ bo Israɛl bábhàt mɛ amʉɛt.
44026003	Ɛ́rɨ sayri bɛ mbɔ̌ŋ mfɔ arɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛpɨŋɨ́ bo Israɛl mɛnkɛm nɛ mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ bhɔ nɛ ákɔ́rɛ́. Nchí nɨk yɛ wɔ mmʉɛt bɛ́ ɔ́nkɛ́pntɨ ɔ́ngɔ́k ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́rɛ̀m.
44026004	“Bo Israɛl mankɛm bárɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ tɛ kɛ̌mbɔ́ ɛka. Ngo chí nɛ bǒbha nɛ amɛm ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm.
44026005	Bɔ́ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ sayri ndǔ ɛrɔ́rí mpok bɛ́ nchí nyaka ndǔ nkwɔ́ bǒ Farisi abhɛn báfyɛ̀ bɛtaŋ tontó ndǔ baraká Mandɛm. Mbák ɔmbɛ́p bhɔ chɔŋ mángati bhe ɛnyúmɔt mbák báyaŋ bɛrɛm tɛtɛp anɛ bárɨŋɨ.
44026006	Nté fá ɛchɔŋ bǎtàŋ mɛ chí mbɔnyunɛ mbákántɨ ndǔ bariɛp amɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka ntá bachǐmbɨ abhɛsɛ.
44026007	Chí nkúbhɛ́ bariɛp amɛn manɛrɛ́kɛt yɛsɛ́ byo nɛ apay babhaka ntɨ arɛ́ bɛ́ chɔŋ amfú kpoŋoroŋ ndǔ mánɨ̀kmʉɛt mánchyɛ nɔkɔ Mandɛm kɛnókó bɛti nɛ ngósí. Mfɔ, mbɔ̌ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ bo Israɛl ɛchɔŋ chi ɛ̌ti mbákántɨ ndǔ bariɛp amɔ.
44026008	Ndaká yí ɛ́bemʉɛt ntá yɛ̌chi mmǔ ywɛka amɔt mɛnoko bɛ Mandɛm ǎkway bɛkʉ bawú mampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m?
44026009	“Mɛmbɔŋ ngɔ nyaka bɛ, ɛ́chí ɛpók ɛya bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ndu mɛnu nɛ bo abhɛn mánókó nnyɛ́n Yesu mmu Násárɛt.
44026010	Nɛ nkʉ́ nɔ amɛm ɛtɔk Yerúsalɛm. Bǒ-batí bachiǎkap báchyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ́fyɛ́ bo Mandɛm amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Nɛ mpok anɛ bárɛ́mɛ́ bɛ mángwáy bhɔ́, nka bɛ mángwáy.
44026011	Mpok nɛ mpok, nchí rɔŋ nyaka ndǔ bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt mɛnkɛm nchyɛ́ nɔkɔ bhɔ ntɛ́msi bɛkʉ bɔ mandɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Yesu. Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ bɛběntɨ nɛ bhɔ́ kpát ndɔk nɔkɔ bɛtɔk bo báchák ndu bɛ́chyɛ́ bhɔ nɛnyok arɛ́.
44026012	“Ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t, nde rɔ́ŋ Damáskɔs nɛ bɛkáti ɛbhɛ́n nsɔ́rɛ́ nta bǒ batí bachiǎkap bɛchyɛ mɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ ndɔ́k nkɛ́mtí bhɔ.
44026013	Mfɔ, ndu nchí rɔ́ŋ, bɛ́gháka nɛ́ntɨ́ ngósí, bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chá ɛbhɛn nnyɔ́mok bɛ́fú amfay bɛ́kwɛ́n bɛkap mɛ nɛ bo abhɛn mɛ́kɔ̀ nɛ bhɔ.
44026014	Bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́kwɛ́nti amɨk. Tɛ́mté wu, ngók ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́rɛ̀m ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk Hibru bɛ, ‘Sɔ̌l, Sɔ̌l, ndaká yí ɔ́chyɛ̀ mɛ nɛnyok? Ɔkáysí bɛ́ ɔ̌kwáy mɛ́nú nɛ mɛ? Mbák ɔ́nsɔ́t ɛkak ɔndɛp sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́ wɔ kɛ ɔ́ghòk bɛbe.’
44026015	Mbɛ́p bɛ́, ‘Acha chí wɔ́ agha?’ Acha akɛmɛ mɛ bɛ, ‘Mɛ Yesu kɛ̌ ɔ́chyɛ̀ nɔ́ nɛnyok.
44026016	Kɛ faté. Mbésí wɔ bɛsí ndu bɛyap wɔ ɔ́mbák mǔbɛtok awa. Chɔŋ ɔ́mbak ntísiɛ wa, ɔ́ngati nɔkɔ bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́ghɔ́ fá ambi ɛchɔŋ, nɛ ɛbhɛ́n mɛ́tɔ̀ŋ chɔŋ wɔ ansɛm mpok.
44026017	Chɔŋ mbak ɛkuti ɛyɛ mpoknkɛm, nɛ bǒbhɛ bápú kway bɛkʉ wɔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ, nɛ yɛ̌ chí bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl. Nchí to wɔ ntá yap nɛ́nɛ.
44026018	Mɛ́tò wɔ ɔndɔk ɔ́nɛ́nɛ́ bɔ́ amɨ́k bɛ mándɔ́ ɛjuri mankoŋo bɛdiɛ́rɛ́, nɛ bɛ mamfu ndu bɛtaŋ Satan, mánkoŋo Mandɛm ɛnyu ɛnɛ Mandɛm áfoŋori bhɔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhap, ankʉ mámbak ndu nkwɔ bo abhɛn yi ákʉ́ bachi nyáŋá mbɔnyunɛ babhɔŋ nɛka nɛ mɛ.’
44026019	“Mfɔ Agripa, ndǔ Yesu áfú amfay atwɔ ntá ya ndu kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k antifú, mbɔ̌ŋ yɛ nyaka bɛ́kóŋo ɛyɔŋ ɛyi.
44026020	Ɛ́kʉ́ mbo bɛ́gháti Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛtɔk Damáskɔs, nɛ nkɔ ndɔk nɔkɔ Yerúsalɛm, nɛ atú Judɛ́ya ankɛm, kɛ nde rɔ́ŋ ntá abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nkwɔ, bɛ́ bɔ́ mántɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap mámpɛtnsɛm ntá Mandɛm nɛ mámbo bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ bɔ́ bátɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap.
44026021	Ɛ́yɔ kɛ ɛ́kʉ́ bo Israɛl bákɛ́m mɛ amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, nɛ báré yaŋ bɛ́wáy mɛ.
44026022	Kpátɛ̌ ɛchɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ ákwàk mɛ, nɛ ákʉ́ bɛ́ nté fá ndɛ́m ntá bǒ mankɛm, manɛ́m bho nɛ ndɛ́ndɛ́mɛ́ bho, nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bárɛ́mɛ́ nyaka nɛ Moses árɛ̀m bɛ́ chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari.
44026023	Nɔ chi ɛnyɨŋ bárɛ́mɛ́ bɛ Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò abhɔŋ bɛghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri angú, nɛ ambak mmǔ mbɨ bɛ́pɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m angati bo Israɛl nɛ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl ɛ̌ti ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnɛ ɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m.”
44026024	Ɛnɛ́ Pɔ̌l ábhʉɛ́t bɛ́táŋa mmʉɛt ɛnyu yɔ, Fɛstɔs abɨk arɛm bɛ, “Pɔ̌l, ɛbhókórí ɛ́kɛm wɔ! Bɛyǎ ɛkáti bɛ́kʉ ɛbhókórí ɛ́kɛm wɔ!”
44026025	Kɛ Pɔ̌l akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ɛta, wo mmu kɛnókó ɛkɛ kɛya kɛcha, mpú bhokori! Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n mɛ́rɛ̀m bɛchi tɛtɛp.
44026026	Mfɔ árɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm, ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ nchí ghati wɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nkɛbhɔ́ŋ bɛcháy. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm ɛnɛ́ ɛ́bhɛ́sɛ́ wɔ ɛ́pú, mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́bhɨkɨ fakari bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́.
44026027	Mfɔ Agripa, pú ɔnókó ɛnyɨŋ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ básɨ́ŋɨ́? Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɔnókó!”
44026028	Mfɔ Agripa akɛmɛ bɛ, “Pɔ̌l, ɔkáysí bɛ́ ndǔ mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok anɛ kɛ̌ ɔ́kwày bɛkʉ mɛ mbak mǔnkwɔ Kristo?”
44026029	Pɔ̌l akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Yɛ̌ chí ndǔ mandú mpok yɛ̌ ndǔ ɛrɔ́rí mpok, nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛna ntá Mandɛm chí bɛ ɛ́kɛ́bhak chi ndiɛrɛ wɔ, kɛ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achák anɛ áchí fá ɛchɔŋ ághòk mɛ, ámbák mbɔ mɛ ɛbhɨkɨfʉɛt chi bɛbhak nɛ ngɛm amɔ́ mbɔ mɛ.”
44026030	Afɔ̌ kɛ Mfɔ Agripa, nɛ gɔ́bhanɔ Fɛstɔs, nɛ Bɛnis manɔ Mfɔ Agripa, nɛ bǒ mankɛm abhɛn báchí chɔ́kɔ́ nɛ bhɔ́ báfáté.
44026031	Báfú nɔ́kɔ́, báré rɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Mmǔ-nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́yaŋ bɛ mángwáy yí nɛ yɛ̌ chi bɛfyɛ yi ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.”
44026032	Nɛ Mfɔ Agripa arɛm ntá Fɛstɔs bɛ, “Mbɔ abhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm bɛ mántɛn manyé yi ntá Mfɔ Rom, mbʉ sɛ́rɔ́ yi arɔŋ.”
44027001	Barɛm bɛ sɛnsɔt áchwí sɛndɔk Itali. Básɔt yɛ Pɔ̌l nɛ mbɔk bǒkɛnɔŋ báchyɛ́ ntá Juliɔs mǔnti ɛká batɛmɛ́ nɛnu ɛnɛ babhɨŋɨ bɛ ɛká batɛmɛ́ nɛnu Mfɔ Rom.
44027002	Sɛ́rɔ́k sɛ́chwé áchwí anɛ áfú Adramatium. Abhɔ́ŋ nyaka bɛ́tɛ́mɛ ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛchyɛ̌nyɛ́n atú Esia. Sɛ́fá sɛ́ré rɔ́ŋ. Arístakɔs mmu Masidónia wu áfú Tɛsalónika abhak nɛ bhɛsɛ́.
44027003	Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, sɛ́tɛ́mɛ ndǔ nɛchyɛ Sídɔn. Júliɔs atɔ́ŋ Pɔ̌l bɛrɨ̌ntɨ. Arɔ Pɔ̌l ánkó ɛtɔk, ángɔ́ mamʉɛrɛ bhi bɛ mánkwák yí nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛkway bɛ́kwák yi.
44027004	Ɛtarɛ nɔkɔ sɛ́pɛ́t sɛ́chwé áchwí sɛ́ré rɔ́ŋ. Mbʉ́ɛ́p ataŋataŋ ábhó bɛ́fú bhɛsɛ́ ambɨ. Ɛ́kʉ́, sɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ kɛ́kwɔ́t Sáyprɔs, ɛtɔk ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí nɛ́ntɨ́ nnyɛ́n, sɛ́rɔ́bhɛ nók sɛ́mfʉɛt nɔkɔ chí ɛbhě ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí tɨɨɨ.
44027005	Sɛ́nók sɛ́pé manyu ndǔ ɛbhe ɛnɛ ɛ́yɨ̀ŋɨ atú Silísha nɛ Pamfília sɛ́tɛ́mɛ ɛtɔk Míra ndǔ atú Lúcia.
44027006	Arɛ́ ndǔ nɛchyɛ Míra, mǔnti batɛmɛ́ nɛnu aghɔ́ áchwí anɛ áfú Aleksándriya, ɛtɔk Íjip, árɔ̀ŋ Itali. Afɛrɛ bhɛsɛ́ ndǔ ayɛsɛ́ áchwí afyɛ́ amɛm awu.
44027007	Sɛ́ré nók sɛ́ndɔkɔ nɔkɔ pɛtii ndǔ mpǎy manywɔp. Sɛ́bhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri kɛ sɛ́chwɔp kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ Kɨnídɔs. Mbʉ́ɛ́p ataŋataŋ kɛka sɛ́ndɔ́k ámbɨ. Sɛ́mɔ́kɔ́ri sɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ nók sɛ́mfʉɛrɛ nɔkɔ chi ɛbhě Krɛt ɛnɛ́ nnyɛ́n nɛ́chí tɨ̌í, kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ njiɛ Salmɔ́nɛ.
44027008	Babhʉɛ́p áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, sɛ́ré rɔ́ŋ pɛti pɛti, sɛ́mfʉɛrɛ nɔkɔ ɛbhě Krɛt ɛyɔ kpát sɛ́chwɔ́p ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ Ɛrɨ́tɨ́ Nɛchyɛ̌nyɛ́n, kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ ɛtɔk Lásea.
44027009	Sɛ́naŋ sɛ́chɔ́ŋti nyaka bɛyǎ mpok nɛ bɛkɔ ndu achwǐnyɛ́n ɛrɔp chi ndak anɛ́ nɛpɛ́m nɛ nɛwú mbɔnyunɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛfoŋorǐ Bɛbʉ́ ɛnaŋ ɛfʉɛt nyaka nɛ mpok babhʉɛ́p ataŋataŋ akwáy. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, Pɔ̌l achyɛ bhɔ maniɛ bɛ,
44027010	“Bɔta, ngɔ bɛ́ mbák sɛ́ndɔ́k ambɨ nɛ nɛkɔ ɛnɛn chɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́mfú, bɛyǎ mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́ mɛ́mbak, puyɛ́ ndiɛrɛ nɛ áchwí nɛ batu, kɛ nɛ bapɛ́m ayɛsɛ nkwɔ.”
44027011	Kɛ mǔnti batɛmɛ́ nɛnu afyɛ́ ntí ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mǔngo bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk amɛm áchwí nɛ mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋ áchwí bárɛ̀m ɛcha ɛnɛ́ Pɔ̌l árɛ̀m.
44027012	Nɛchyɛ̌ nyɛ́n ɛnɛ́n bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ Ɛrɨtí Nɛchyɛ̌nyɛ́n nɛ́chí nyaka raŋáraŋa kɛbhák sayri bɛ́ sɛ́nchɔ́kɔ́ arɛ́ sɛ́nóŋ mpok anɛ mbʉ́ɛ́p ataŋataŋ anɛ anu mpok mbaŋ ákwɛ̀n ámáy. Ɛ́kʉ́ bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛtɨk amɛm áchwí báré yáŋ mbi bɛ́rɔ́ŋ Foiniks. Foiniks abhak nɛchyɛ̌nyɛn Krɛt ɛnɛn áchwí ate arɛ́ bɛcháy ti, yɛ chí ndǔ mpok yɔ.
44027013	Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, mandú mbʉ́ɛ́p abho bɛ́fók bɛ́fú ɛbhe manyu nɛ bo bakaysi bɛ chɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ mɛ́mbak sayri. Báya yɛ ndo báfɛ́rɛ anyɛ́n, babho mɛnok bɛrɔŋ ambɨ mámfʉɛrɛ nɔkɔ nɛkʉ nnyɛ́n.
44027014	Kɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tat, mbʉ́ɛ́p ataŋataŋ anɛ átwɔ̀ nɛ bɛyǎ mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn abho mɛnu, bɛ́fú atú ɛtɔk anɛ mmok, áfù arɛ. Bábhɨŋɨ nyaka mbʉ́ɛ́p wu bɛ Mbʉ́ɛ́p Nɔt-Is bɛkoŋo atú anɛ wu áfù.
44027015	Nɛ mpok mbʉ́ɛ́p ǎdɛp áchwí, sɛ́kɛpɛrɛ kway mɛ́nok bɛrɔŋ tɛbhɛ tɛbhɛ nɛ mbʉ́ɛ́p. Sɛ́kpɨ́k sɛ́rɔ́ bɛ wu ámpɔ́kɔ́ áchwí.
44027016	Sɛ́rɔ́k sɛ́ré fʉɛt chi ansɛm mɔ́kpɔkɔ́ mmɨk anɛ ate nnyɛ́n. Aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Kaúda. Mmɨkɨ yɔ achɛ́t mbʉ́ɛ́p mandú. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kwák bhɛsɛ, sɛ́nú sɛya áchwí nɨŋɨnɨŋɨ anɛ achi anɛt áchwí bɛ ákɛ́ rakati ansɛm áchwí.
44027017	Sɛ́sɔ́t manɨk sɛ́gwɔ́t áchwí wu amfay anɛ sɛchi amɛm ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ápú kwáy bɛ́dákáti áyák. Bakʉ̌-bɛtɨk amɛm áchwi báré cháy bɛ chɔŋ áchwí ándɔk ampaŋ ndǔ ɛ̌siɛ́p ɛnɛ ɛ́chí ndǔ ɛbhɔ́k manyu ɛnɛ ɛtɔk Sitis. Ɛ́kʉ́ báfɛ́rɛ ndo mámɛ́sɛ anyɛ́n, bɛ́, ndǔ áchwí áyà wu, mbʉ́ɛ́p ákɛ́pɛrɛ pɔkɔ́ wu tontó. Bákʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, bárɔ́ mbʉ́ɛ́p árɔ́bhɛ wu pɔkɔ́ áchwí.
44027018	Ndu mbʉ́ɛ́p ataŋataŋ ádɛ̀p áchwí ywɛsɛ, are jaŋari mbɔ bɛ ǎyaŋ bɛbɛt. Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, bábhó mɛ́mɛ́sɛ batu ányɛn.
44027019	Ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp árát, bǒ bɛtɨk babho bɛ́fɛ́rɛ mbɔk mɛnyɨŋ áchwí mbɔ manɨk nɛ bɛchak mánto nɔkɔ anyɛ́n.
44027020	Mbʉ́ɛ́p ataŋataŋ ándɔkɔ nɔkɔ chí ambɨ ndǔ bɛyǎ manywɔp. Nɛ ngósí mmok kɛtyɛ́, nɛ bɛti bɔ́ kɛghɔ́ mambe. Ɛnyuyɔ̌ ɛnyuyɔ, kpátɛ sɛ́fɛ́rɛ ntɨ sɛ́rɛ́m bɛ́ ndak ywɛsɛ ámay.
44027021	Bo mánaŋ bátat nyaka kɛnyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́, ɛ́kʉ́ Pɔ̌l afate ate nɛ́ntɨ́ ɛnap arɛm bɛ, “Bɔta, mbɔ bǎghók ɛyɔŋ ɛya mbʉ́ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fá Krɛt sɛmbɔŋ nchɔŋtí nɛ mbʉ́ mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́ ɛbhɛn bɛ́pú.
44027022	Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, nchí ghati bhe bɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka ámbɔ́ŋ nɛtaŋántɨ́! Chɔŋ áchwí ánɛm kɛ yɛ̌ mmu apu gu.
44027023	Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ ndǔ nkubhɛ bɛti ɛbhɛn Mandɛm anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́, Mandɛm anɛ mɛ̌chyɛ kɛnókó, ató ángɛl aywi átwɔ́ áté mɛ nɛpak mmʉɛt,
44027024	árɛ́m bɛ, ‘Pɔ̌l, kɛbhɔ́ŋ bɛcháy. Ɔ́bhɔŋ bɛ́té bɛsí Mfɔ Rom. Nɛ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm nɛ wɔ, ǎpɛ́mɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ɔ́kɔ̀ nɛ yi.’
44027025	Bɔtá, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ámbɔ́ŋ yɛ́ nɛtaŋántɨ. Mbɔ̌ŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm, nɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ chɔŋ ɛ́mbak mbɔnyǔ yí árɛ́mɛ́.
44027026	Kɛ mbʉ́ɛ́p ábhɔŋ bɛ́pɔ́kɔ chɔŋ bhɛsɛ kpát áchwí andɔk ántu mmʉɛt ndǔ ɛtɔkɔfú ɛnɛ́ nnyɛ́n nɛ́kábhɛ́.”
44027027	Ɛ́gháka nɔ́kɔ́ nɛ́ntɨ́ bɛ̌ti, ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn nɛ́kú manywɔp byó nɛ ánwi, ndǔ mbʉ́ɛ́p ápɔ̀kɔ bhɛsɛ́ bɛkɨŋɨ manyu Adriya bɛti bhɔ, bǒ abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛtɨk amɛm áchwí bákáysi bɛ nɛ́kú nnyɛ́n nɛ́náŋ nɛ́chí kɛ́kwɔ́t.
44027028	Ɛ́kʉ́ básɔ́t nnɨk anɛ básɛrɛ ndo arɛ́, mámɛ́sɛ ndo anyɛ́n bɛ mándɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ nnyɛ́n nɛchwe amɨk. Bághɔ́ bɛ mmɨkɨ nyɛ́n arɔp mbɔ mɛta bɛsa bɛpay. Bɛ́rɔŋ ambɨ mandú, bápɛt bákʉ nɔ, bághɔ́ bɛ mmɨkɨ nyɛ́n arɔp bɔ mɛta ɛsǎ nsɛm byo.
44027029	Báré cháy bɛ chɔŋ mbʉ́ɛ́p ámpɔkɔ áchwí wu ándɔk ántɛm ndǔ sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́, nɛ́kú nnyɛ́n. Báfɛ́rɛ yɛ baro ánwi ansɛm áchwí mámɛ́sɛ anyɛ́n bɛ́ andɔ́p téé, báré nɨkmʉɛt bɛ́ nywɔp nɛ́njí nɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ bhɔ.
44027030	Bakʉ̌-bɛtɨk amɛm áchwí báré yáŋ mbi bɛpɛmɛ mmʉɛt ɛyap. Básɔt áchwí nɨŋɨnɨŋɨ anɛ́ básɛ́rɛ́ amfay básɛ́bhɛ anyɛ́n bɛ manok manko abhɨ kɛ bákɔt ngɛpti mbɔ bɛ bárɔ̀ŋ bɛfɛrɛ chi baro áchák ambɨ áchwí mánsɛbhɛ anyɛ́n.
44027031	Kɛ Pɔ̌l ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, aghati mǔnti batɛmɛ́ nɛnu nɛ bǒbhi bɛ, “Mbák bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhɛn áchwí mámfú, yɛ̌ mmú ywɛka apú pɛ́m.”
44027032	Ɛ́kʉ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bákpɔ́ti manɨk anɛ ákɛ̀m áchwí bárɔ́ bɛ nnyɛ́n nɛ́ndɔbhɛ wu pɔkɔ́ wú.
44027033	Ndǔ mbaŋ ábhó bɛ́kaŋari, Pɔ̌l anɨk bɔ́ mankɛm mmʉɛt bɛ mányiɛ nɛnyíɛ́. Arɛm bɛ, “Ɛchɔŋ chí manywɔp byó nɛ anwi ɛnɛ́ bǎbhɨkɨ tɔk awɔ anyu ndǔ bǎbhɔŋɔ bɛcháy antɨ.
44027034	Nchí ghati yɛ bhe bɛ manyíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ bɛ nɛnchyɛ bhe bɛtaŋ. Yɛ̌ ɛkak ɛmɛnɛ́nti mmǔ yɛka ɛpu nɛm.”
44027035	Pɔ̌l árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, asɔt brɛt anɨkmʉɛt achyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm bɛsí bhap mankɛm, abɔ́k abho mɛ́nyiɛ́.
44027036	Ɛyɔ ɛ́fyɛ́ yɛ́ bɔ́ ntɨ, básɔ́t nɛnyíɛ́ mányíɛ́.
44027037	Bɛsɛ́ mankɛm abhɛn sɛ́chí nyaka amɛm áchwí sɛ́bhák bo bɛsa byó nɛ bɛ́rát nsɛm nɛkú nɛ amɔt.(276)
44027038	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anyíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ ajwi, báfɛ́rɛ yɛ batǔ amɛm nchwi ankɛm mamɛsɛ anyɛ́n bɛ áchwí amfʉɛp.
44027039	Mbaŋ ákáŋári nɔ́kɔ́, bághɔ́ ngɔkɔnyɛ́n kɛ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk kɛrɨŋɨ mmɨk ɛyɔ. Kɛ bághɔ́ ɛ̌fabhɛ́ nyɛ́n nɛ ɛ̌siɛ́p arɛ, bákáysi bɛ ngufú bákwày bɛ́tɛ́mɛ arɛ́ mámfu mǎnkó ɛbhɨ.
44027040	Bákpɔ́ti manɨk anɛ́ baro bárɔ́ yɔ ankɛm anyɛ́n. Bákáŋari manɨk anɛ bagwɔ́rɛ mɛnyǔ nsɔm nɛ yɔ, básɛ́bhɛ nsɔm anyɛ́n bɛ mánók áchwí. Bátɛ́n ndɛn ɛnɛ ɛ́kɛ̀m mbʉ́ɛ́p amfay bɛ ampɔkɔ áchwí ankɔ, babho bɛrɔŋ angɔkɔnyɛ́n.
44027041	Áchwi arɔk achwe ndu ntó ɛ̌siɛ́p ɛnɛ babhɨkɨ re ghaka angɔkɔnyɛ́n. Ntí áchwí ápaŋ arɛ. Bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn mbʉ́ɛ́p bɛ́kʉ mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn ɛ́rákáti nnɛt áchwí.
44027042	Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bábhɔ́ŋ nkaysi bɛway bǒkɛnɔŋ mankɛm bɛ yɛ̌ amɔt ákɛ́ bhɔ́ŋ mbi bɛghɔk nnyɛ́n ámbwɛ́.
44027043	Kɛ mǔnti batɛmɛ́ nɛnu ǎyáŋ nyaka bɛ́pɛ́mɛ Pɔ̌l. Ɛ́kʉ́ akɛ chyɛ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu mbi bɛ́wáy bǒkɛnɔŋ. Achyɛ ɛyɔŋ chí bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛghɔk nnyɛ́n ánjámbɨ ángɔ́k ánkó ɛbhɨ.
44027044	Yí bɛ́ bǒ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛghɔk nnyɛ́n mánkɛ́m bɛbhɔ́k ɛnɔk nɛ bɛbhɔ́k áchwí anɛ ádákáti mánkwák mmʉɛt mǎnkó ɛbhɨ. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛ́fákárí kɛ bhɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́kó ɛbhɨ nyɔ́rɛ́ɛ́.
44028001	Sɛ́bʉ́ɛ nɔ́kɔ́ sɛ́kó ɛbhɨ. Bákʉ́ yɛ sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ ɛkpɔkɔ́ mmɨk ɛnɛ́ nnyɛ́n nɛ́kábhɛ chi ɛnɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Málta.
44028002	Bo abhɛn bachi arɛ bátɔŋ bhɛsɛ bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ nɛ básɔt bhɛsɛ mankɛm sayri. Manyiɛp ábhó nɔ́kɔ́ mɛniɛ, nɛ ndǔ mbaŋ ǎkwɛn, bábháyti ngo bɛ sɛ́ngwák.
44028003	Pɔ̌l anyokoti mɔ́nɛkɔkɔ́ kɛbhe. Ɛnɛ́ yi afyɛ́ kɔ ango, bɛsɔŋɔ́ ngó bɛkʉ ɛfé ɛ́fú ndǔ kɛbhe ɛkɔ ɛ́nɛ́m yi ndu awɔ́ ɛ́rɔ́p arɛ́.
44028004	Bǒ ɛtɔk ɛyɔ bághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ nnyɔ́ yɔ áchí yi awɔ jɨ́ŋjɨŋjɨ́ŋ, bábho bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Tɛtɛp, mmǔ-nɛ chí ngwayti bho! Yɛ̌ndu ábʉɛ́ nɛwú anyɛ́n, Mandɛm mmu ákɛmɛ kɛ́mbé abhɨ́kɨ́ rɔ yi ambak nɛpɛ́m.”
44028005	Kɛ Pɔ̌l amyák awɔ́, nnyɔ́ yɔ akwɛ́n ango, yɛ̌nyɨŋ kɛkʉ yi.
44028006	Báre noŋ mánkàysi nɔkɔ bɛ chɔŋ Pɔ̌l amwɔt nɛ bɛ mbák abhɨ́kɨ́ mwɔt abhɔŋ bɛkwɛn amɨk angú. Mánóŋ ndǔ ɛrɔ́ri mpok. Kɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ kɛkʉ yi. Báyíbhíri nkaysi yap, bábho bɛrɛm nɛ batɨ bɛ, “Pɔ̌l chí ɛnyǔ mandɛm ɛfú.”
44028007	Mǔngo amɔt anɛ áchí ndǔ ɛkpɔk ɛbhɨ ɛyɔ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Pɔbliɔs. Abhɔ́ŋ bakɨ kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ ngɔkɔnyɛ́n. Asɔt bhɛsɛ sayri. Ane bhɛsɛ ndǔ manywɔp arat.
44028008	Ɛ́fákári bɛ chi Pɔbliɔs achí amɨk bhʉrɛ ndǔ ámè. Abhɔ́ŋ mbʉ́ɛ́p nɛ mɔ́nɛ́m kɛbi. Pɔ̌l arɔk aghɔ yi. Ányáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ amɔ yi amʉɛt, anɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yi. Ataŋ.
44028009	Ɛyɔ ɛ́fákári nɔ́kɔ́, bǒmame báchák ɛtɔk ɛyɔ ɛnkɛm bátwɔ́ ntá Pɔ̌l mankɛm abú bɔ nkwɔ.
44028010	Báchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ́ bɛyǎ akap. Nɛ mpok sɛ́fá bɛ́rɔŋ bachyɛ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛkway bɛkwak bhɛsɛ ndu nɛkɔ ɛnɔ.
44028011	Sɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Malta ndu bataŋ árát, sɛ́sɔ́t áchwí achak anɛ́ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ, Bɔmandɛm Bɛfak. Áfǔ nyaka Aleksándriya kɛ átat Malta ndu mbaŋ akwɛn tontó.
44028012	Sɛ́chwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ nɛchyɛ̌nyɛ́n ɛnɛn ɛtɔk Sírakɔs, sɛ́tát arɛ ndu manywɔp árát.
44028013	Sɛ́fá Sírakɔs, sɛ́ghabhɛri sɛchwɔp ndǔ nɛchyɛ̌nyɛ́n ɛnɛn ɛtɔk Rejiɔm. Nɛ́yí nɔ́kɔ́, mbʉ́ɛ́p anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ mbʉ́ɛ́p saut abho mɛnu, nɛ ndǔ ntɨnywɔp, sɛ́chwɔ́p ndǔ nɛchyɛ̌nyɛ́n ɛnɛn ɛtɔk Putioli, atú Itali. Sɛ́fú ndu áchwí sɛ́chwe ɛtɔk.
44028014	Arɛ́, sɛ́tɛ́mɛ́ri mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Yesu. Barɛm bɛ́ sɛnchɔkɔ nɛ bhɔ́ ndu manywɔp tándrámɔt. Sɛ́chɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛ bhɔ, sɛfǎ yɛ sɛrɔk Rom.
44028015	Batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ abhɛn Rom bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ sɛ́twɔ̀, bábho bɛ́twɔ bɛtɛmɛri bhɛsɛ. Mbɔk ɛyap bátɛ́mɛri bhɛsɛ ndǔ Ɛsyɛ Apius, bachak ndǔ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́, “Bɛkɛrɛ́ Mankɔ Bɛrat.” Pɔ̌l ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bhɔ́, ɛyɔ ɛ́fyɛ́ yi ntɨ nɛ akaka Mandɛm.
44028016	Sɛ́chwɔ́bhɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Rom, bárɔ́ Pɔ̌l ánchɔ́kɔ́ ndu mmʉɛt ɛyi, ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu amɔt ámbábhɛ́rí nɔ́kɔ́ yí.
44028017	Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp árát, Pɔ̌l abhɨŋɨ bǒ batí bo Israɛl abhɛn bachi arɛ́. Bátwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ arɛm ntá yap bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma, mbɨ́kɨ́ kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ntá bo bhɛsɛ́ nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛ́byak bɛpɨŋɨ́ ɛtɔk ɛbhɛ́n bachǐmbɨ barɔ ntá yɛsɛ. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bǒ bhɛsɛ́ bákɛ́m mɛ Yerúsalɛm báfyɛ́ amɔ bǒ Rom.
44028018	Mpok mánaŋ bǎbhɛbhɛ mɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nkʉ, bághɔ́ bɛ́ mbɨ́kɨ́ kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́yàŋ bɛ mángwáy mɛ. Bátɨ bɛrɔ mɛ.
44028019	Kɛ ndǔ bo Israɛl bábhɨkɨ ka, nkɛbhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak bɛkʉ, ɛbhɨkɨ fʉɛt chi bɛrɛm bɛ́ mántɛn nyé ɛna ntá Mfɔ Rom, yɛ̌ndu mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mbɔ̌ŋ manyé nɛ bǒbha.”
44028020	Ɛ̌tíyɔ kɛ mbɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe bɛ mǎntwɔ́ ndɛ́m kɛpɨ nɛ bhe tɛ̌ndu nchí fá mbɔ mǔkɛnɔŋ ɛ̌ti mmu anɛ bo Israɛl mankɛm babhaka ntɨ bɛ́ ǎtwɔ̀ bɛ́pɛ́mɛ bhɛsɛ.
44028021	Bǒ-batí bo Israɛl bhɔ bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌ ɛkáti ɛnɛ ɛ́fú Judɛ́ya ɛ̌ti yɛ nɛ yɛ̌ mmu ywɛsɛ́ abhɨ́kɨ́ fu arɛ́ ántwɔ́ nɛ ɛyɔŋ ntá yɛsɛ bɛ ɔkʉ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ.
44028022	Kɛ sɛ́kɔŋ bɛghok ayɛ nkaysi mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak bo mankɛm bárɛ̀m chi ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti nkwɔ bho abhɛn wɔ ɔchí mmǔ wap.”
44028023	Bɔ́ nɛ Pɔ̌l báfyɛ́ nywɔp nɛ́chák ɛnɛ́n bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́tɛ́mɛri. Nywɔp ɛnɔ nɛ́kwáy nɔ́kɔ́, bɛyǎ bhap barɔk ɛkɛt ɛnɛ Pɔ̌l áchɔ̀kɔ. Bɛ́bhó bětí kpát bɛ́gháka beku. Pɔ̌l are ghati bhɔ́ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm ábhàk nɛ bo mbɔ Mfɔ wap. Nɛ are tɔ́ŋ bɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti Yesu mbɔ ɛnyu bɛ́chí amɛm basɨ́ŋɨ́ Moses nɛ amɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ, anu nɔkɔ bɛkʉ bɔ́ mánókó mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yí ághàti bhɔ.
44028024	Mbɔk baghɔ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m ɛchi tɛtɛp, kɛ báchák kɛnókó.
44028025	Bákwɛ́n yɛ bɛyɔŋ bɛyɔŋ. Bápɛ́rɛ taka, Pɔ̌l aghati bhɔ ndak achak amɔt bɛ, “Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ arɛm nyaka tɛtɛp mpok yi akʉ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Aisáya angati bachǐmbɨ bhɛka bɛ:
44028026	‘Dɔ́k ntá bǒbhɛn ghatí bhɔ bɛ chɔŋ mǎngok ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ, kɛ bǎpú jwimɛm wáwák. Chɔŋ mǎnjɨŋɨ ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ kɛ bǎpú ghɔ́,
44028027	mbɔnyunɛ bǒbhɛn bágwɔt batɨ yap amɛm, nɛ báchók batú, mánɛ́mámɨ́k bɛ́ bákɛ́ ghɔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Ɛkʉ amɨ́k ayap ápú kway bɛghɔ mbaŋ, batú yap ápú kway bɛghok mbaŋ nɛ batɨ̌ yap apu kway bɛjwimɛm bɛ mantwɔ ntá ya, mɛ mbú bhɔ.’”
44028028	Pɔ̌l arɛm nɔkɔ nɔ, apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Dɨŋɨ́ yɛ ka bɛ́ bápɔ́kɔ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ árɛ̀m ɛnyǔ Mandɛm ápɛ̀mɛ bho bárɔŋ ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nkwɔ nɛ yɔ. Nɛ chɔŋ mǎntá batú mangok!”
44028029	[Pɔ̌l arɛm nɔkɔ nɔ bo Israɛl bátáka nɛ bágúrɛ mankɛm nɔkɔ bɛyǎ ɛpʉítí nɛ batɨ.]
44028030	Ndu mamiɛ́ ápay gbók, Pɔ̌l abhak ndu ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ yi ásɔ́rɛ́ áchɔkɔ arɛ, yímbɔŋ anchyɛ nɔkɔ nkábhɛ́ ɛkɛt. Ansyɛpti nɔkɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ arɔŋ bɛghɔ yi.
44028031	Nɛ are ghati bo ɛnyǔ Mandɛm ábhàk nɛ mmu mbɔ Mfɔ ywi, antɔŋ nɔkɔ nkwɔ́ bo mɛnyɨŋ kpoŋoroŋ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo Acha, nɛ yɛ̌ mmu kɛmɔ bɛchɛt yi mbi bɛ akɛ kʉ nɔ.
45001001	Mɛ Pɔ̌l kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí mɔ̌bɛtok Yesu Kristo. Mandɛm abhɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ bɛ mbak mǔnto, abhʉrɛ mɛ nyáŋá bɛ ngati bhó Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́.
45001002	Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nɛ kɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛchyɛ tɛ mpok Yesu ábhɨ́kɨ́re two fá amɨk. Afʉɛ́t ntá barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bhi bɛkʉ nɔ, nɛ bɔ básɨ́ŋ ɛ̌ti bariɛp amɔ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm.
45001003	Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nɛ achí ɛ̌ti Mɔ́ywi. Yí achi nyaka ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Mfɔ Debhít ndǔ nɛtwɔ́ anɛ yi átwɔ́ fá amɨk mbɔ nkwǎ.
45001004	Mandɛm atɔ́ŋ nɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo achi Mmɔ Mandɛm mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ Ɛfóŋó ɛnɛ ɛchi nyáŋá mpok ákʉ́ Acha ápɛ́tnsɛm ndu nɛpɛ́m.
45001005	Ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo kɛ Mandɛm atɔŋ mɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu, akʉ mɛ mbák mǔnto. Akʉ nɔ́ bɛ nkʉ́ bǒ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm mámbɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu, mángoko nɔkɔ chi yi nɛ mánchyɛ nɔkɔ nnyɛ́n ɛni kɛnókó.
45001006	Bě bǒ Rom nkwɔ bǎchi ndǔ mpǎy bo abhɛn Mandɛm ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mǎmbak bǒ Yesu Kristo.
45001007	Nchí ghati bhe mankɛm, bɛ Mandɛm akɔŋ be tontó nɛ abhɨ́ŋɨ́ be bɛ mǎmbak bǒbhi. Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha mántɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, mánchyɛ bɛ kpák.
45001008	Ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɨ chi bɛ nchí kaka Mandɛm. Chi Yesu Kristo kɛ ákʉ̀ bɛ ɛmbak nɔ mbɔnyunɛ mmɨk nkɛm aghok ɛ̌ti ɛnyǔ nɛka ɛnɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ Yesu.
45001009	Mandɛm mmu mɛ̌kʉ̀ bɛtɨk ɛbhi nɛ ntɨ ɛna nɛnkɛm ndu nchí ghati bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Mɔ́ywi achi ntísiɛ wa bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt, mpú rɔ bɛfyɛ bhe ndǔ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnɛ.
45001010	Nchí nɨkmʉɛt bɛ mbák chí nkaysi Mandɛm, yi ánkwak mɛ mbɔ̌ŋ mbi bɛ́twɔ awu nɛ́nɛ ndu bɛghɔ bhe. Nnáŋ njambɨ nnu bɛ́twɔ awu ndɔŋ ɛchak.
45001011	Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛghɔ bhe ndu bɛkʉ mǎmbɔŋ ákɔ́rɛ́ ndu áfɔ́k anɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ chɔŋ be bɛ mǎntáŋ ndǔ mbi Mandɛm.
45001012	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́rɛ̀m nɔ chi bɛ, sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛfyɛ batɨ ntɨ, nɔ chí bɛ, mǎnsɔt nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Yesu mǎmfyɛ mɛ ntɨ, mɛ nkwɔ nsɔt nɛka ɛná nɛ Yesu mfyɛ́ bhe ntɨ.
45001013	Bɔ̌ma, nnáŋ ntɨ bɛ́twɔ awu bɛyǎ mpok, kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chɛ̀t mɛ mbi. Nnáŋ nte bɛ́twɔ awu bɛ bɛtɨk ɛbha mɛnyu kɛpɛm ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka mbɔ ɛnyu bɛ́kʉ̀ ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl amɛm bɛtɔk bɛchak.
45001014	Mbɔ̌ŋ barɛm bɛkwɔ ntá bo abhɛn amɨ́k anɛnɛ bhɔ nɛ ntá bǒbhɨ, nɛ ntá barɨŋɨ ɛ́káti nɛ abhɛn babhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ ɛkáti.
45001015	Ɛ̌ti yɔ, mbɔŋ yɛ bɛyǎ ɛkwak ndu bɛghati be nkwɔ bǒ bǎchi Rom Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́.
45001016	Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ mbɔnyunɛ yɔ achi bɛtaŋ Mandɛm ndǔ bɛpɛmɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ánókó yɔ bɛbho nɛ bo Israɛl, nɛ bɛghaka ntá abhɛn bapu bo Israɛl nkwɔ.
45001017	Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ kɛ ákʉ̀ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyu Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bo mambak chak bɛsí bhi. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́yàŋ chi bɛ bo mámbɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu, mándɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ nɔ tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti. Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm, Mandɛm ákʉ̀ yi ambak chak bɛsí bhi nɛ chɔŋ ambɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m.”
45001018	Mandɛm ǎkʉ bɛběntɨ bhi mɛ́mfú amfay mɛ́nsɛp amɨk ndǔ bɛbʉ́ nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo abhɛn bápú koŋo mbi ywi bákʉ̀. Bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́chyɛ̀t bo báchák mbi bɛrɨŋɨ tɛtɛp Mandɛm.
45001019	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmu ákway bɛrɨŋɨ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm bɛ́chí kpoŋoroŋ ntá bǒ abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm atɔŋ bɔ́ ntá yap bɛ mandɨŋɨ bhɔ.
45001020	Bɛbho ndǔ mpok anɛ Mandɛm aghoko mmɨk, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi aghoko bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi nɛ ɛnyǔ mmu yi achi mbɔ Mandɛm. Ndu ɛchi bɛ, bápú ghɔ yi nɛ amɨ́k ntí apu anɛ bɔ bárɛ̀m bɛ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛpu nɛ bhɔ ndu bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm.
45001021	Yɛ̌ndu bɔ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka bɛ Mandɛm achi, babhɨkɨ chyɛ yi kɛnókó mbɔ Mandɛm, nɛ yɛ̌ chi bakak bábhɨkɨ chyɛ yi. Kɛ bárɔ́bhɛ́ kaysi chi bɛchǒŋ mɛnyɨŋ nɛ bɔ kɛkway bɛjwimɛn ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ bɔ mandɨŋɨ.
45001022	Yɛ̌ndu bárɛ̀m bɛ babhɔŋ kɛboŋ barɔp chi bɛchɨŋtǐ bho.
45001023	Bárɔ́ bɛchyɛ kɛnókó ntá Mandɛm mmu apu gu, bárɔ́bhɛ chyɛ kɛnókó chi ntá mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bághókó nɛ amɔ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛchi mbɔ nkwǎŋwaŋ nɛ bɛchak bɛchi mbɔ kɛnɛn nɛ bɛ́chák mbɔ nnya ɛnɛ́ bɛkak mɛnwi, nɛ ɛbhɛ́nɛ́fú mbɔ nnya ɛnɛ ɛ́su mɛniɛ amɨk. Bɔ mɛnkɛm bɛ́gùgu.
45001024	Ɛ̌ti yɔ, Mandɛm afɛ́rɛ́ amɔ nɛ bhɔ bɛ mámkpɨk mánkʉ bɛpɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn batɨ yap áŋwaka bɛ mánkʉ, ɛnyu ɛnɛ básɔ̀t mmʉɛt ɛyap bɛkʉ nɛ batɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ̀ bhɔ ntíánwɔ́p.
45001025	Mandɛm afɛ́rɛ́ amɔ nɛ bhɔ mbɔnyunɛ barɔ mɛnoko mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp ɛ̌ti yi bárɔbhɛ koŋo chi nsé. Nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ághókó kɛ bɔ bárɔ́bhɛ́ chyɛ kɛnókó, puyɛ̌ mmu anɛ ághókó yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. Yi kɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛchyɛ bakak mpoknkɛm. Amen.
45001026	Ndu bákʉ̀ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ Mandɛm afɛ́rɛ́ amɔ nɛ bhɔ bɛ máŋwáká nɔ́kɔ́ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ̀ bhɔ ntíánwɔ́p. Baghɔrɛ́ bhap bárɔ babhakanɛm bárɔbhɛ bhʉrɛ chi nɛ batɨ baghɔrɛ́, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛbhɨkɨ kway wawak.
45001027	Ɛnyumɔt kɛ ɛchi nkwɔ nɛ babhakanɛm. Bárɔ baghɔrɛ́ bárɔbhɛ ŋwaka bɛbhʉrɛ chi nɛ batɨ̌ babhakanɛm, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛbhɨkɨ kway. Bákʉ̀ baraka ntíánwɔ́p nɛ batɨ̌ babhakanɛm. Bákʉ̀ nɔ mámbɔŋ nɔkɔ ntɛmsi anɛ akway nɛ bhɔ.
45001028	Tɛ̌ndu bǒbhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ bɛkaysi ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ ɛchi tɛtɛp ɛ̌ti Mandɛm, Mandɛm afɛ́rɛ́ amɔ nɛ bhɔ. Arɔ́ bhɔ́ ndǔ bɛpɔ̌ nkaysi yap, nɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛbhɨkɨ kway bɛ bɔ mankʉ.
45001029	Batɨ yap ájwí nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ ndak abʉ́abʉ mbɔ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ nɛ bɛfyɛ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bo bachak, nɛ ɛpɨŋ bɛyaŋ bɛkʉ batɨ bɛbʉ́, nɛ mpabhamɨ́k, nɛ bɛway bho, nɛ bɛtaŋa ɛbhɛn mmu ábhɔ̀ŋ nɛ batɨ ndu áyɛ̀nti mmʉɛt nɛ bhɔ, nɛ bɛrwɔ bho, nɛ ɛpɨŋ bɛkʉ batɨ bɛbʉ́, nɛ ɛnáŋtí.
45001030	Nɛ bɛrɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti bo ndǔ bɛchɔ́ŋti manyɛ́n ayap, nɛ bɛpap Mandɛm, nɛ nɛsaŋ, nɛ nɛyoŋómʉɛt, nɛ mpányu, nɛ bɛkaysi babhi akɔ anɛ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́, nɛ bɛtaŋ ntí nɛ bɔtáyap nɛ bɔmáyap.
45001031	Nɛ bɛbhak ɛchɨŋtímu, nɛ ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu apu bhʉɛrɛ bariɛp, nɛ bɛbhɔŋ ntɨ ɛnɛn mmu abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ, nɛ bɛbhɔŋ ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu apu ghɔ batɨ ntínso.
45001032	Bǒbhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bárɨŋɨ bɛ Mandɛm arɛm bɛ bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bábhɔŋ bɛgu. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ nɛ bárɔ̀ŋ tɛ ambɨ bɛka nɛ bo bachak abhɛn bákʉ̀ bhɔ bɛ ɛrɨ bɛkʉ bhɔ.
45002001	Yɛ̌ ɔchí agha, mpok ɔ́tàŋ bo nɛ ɔ́nkʉ nɔkɔ nkúbhɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ̀, ɔpú kway bɛtaŋa mmʉɛt bɛsí Mandɛm. Bɛ́taŋ mmu kɛ ɔ́nkʉ nɔkɔ nkúbhɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀ chi bɛrɛm bɛ wɔmbɔŋ ɔ́kwɛ̌n manyé bɛsí Mandɛm.
45002002	Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ Mandɛm achi chak ndǔ nɛtáŋ anɛ yi átàŋ bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ.
45002003	Yɛ̌ ɔchí agha, mpok ɔ́tàŋ bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ, kɛ wɔmbɔŋ ɔ́nkʉ nɔkɔ bhɔ, ɔkaysi bɛ ɔ̌kway bɛbʉɛ ɛnyu ɛnɛ Mandɛm apu chyɛ wɔ ntɛmsi kɛ?
45002004	Kɛ chi bɛ ɔ̌sɔ̀t bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm átɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ, nɛ nɛghɔ́ anɛ yi ághɔ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́kʉ̀ mbɔ bɛ apú ghɔ, nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́ ɛyi mbɔ ɛráká ndak? Ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ bɛ ntí anɛ Mandɛm átɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ chi bɛkwak bhɛsɛ sɛntɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ?
45002005	Kɛ ɛ̌ti ɔ́gwɔ̀t ntɨ ɛnɛ amɛm ɔkɛ ka bɛ́tɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛ, ɔ̌kʉ̀ bɛběntɨ Mandɛm nɛ wɔ mɛnja mɛndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ. Nɛ chɔŋ mɛ́mfú kpoŋoroŋ ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn Mandɛm átɔ̀ŋ bɛběntɨ ɛbhi, antáŋ bo ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛchi chak.
45002006	Chɔŋ Mandɛm ankap yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu bɛkoŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́.
45002007	Bo abhɛn bákɛ̀m ɛkɨ́kɨ́ ndǔ bɛrɨ ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ̀, báfyɛ̀ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ bɛ Mandɛm anchyɛ bhɔ kɛnɛ́m nɛ kɛnókó nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn mmu ápú gu. Mandɛm ǎchyɛ̀ bhɔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
45002008	Kɛ bo abhɛn babhɨkɨ bhɔŋ mpok nɛ batɨ ndu báyɨ̀ŋɨ chi mmʉɛt ɛyap, nɛ bápu koŋo tɛtɛp ndu nɛpɛ́m ɛnap kɛ bákoŋo chi bɛbʉ́, chɔŋ Mandɛm antɔŋ bɔ bɛběntɨ ɛbhi, anchyɛ bhɔ ntɛmsi.
45002009	Chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́ ámbák ndǔ bɛyǎ ɛkwɛt nɛ angók bɛyǎ bɛbe. Ákʉ̀ nɔ bɛbho nɛ bo Israɛl nɛ bɛghaka amʉɛt bo abhɛn bapu bo Israɛl nkwɔ.
45002010	Kɛ bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛrɨ bábhɔŋ kɛnɛ́m nɛ kɛnókó nɛ kpák. Ɛ́bhàk ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛbho nɛ bo Israɛl bɛghaka amʉɛt bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nkwɔ.
45002011	Mandɛm apu tɔŋ kɛ́rɨ́ŋámík.
45002012	Chɔŋ bo mankɛm abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́ ɛnɛ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛbhé Moses mánɛ́m yɛ̌ndu bátàŋ bhɔ kɛkoŋo bɛbhé Mandɛm. Nɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm amkpɔ́t manyé bo mankɛm abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́ mpok bárɨŋɨ bɛbhé Moses bɛkoŋo bɛbhé Moses.
45002013	Puyɛ̌ bo abhɛn bághòk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛbhé ɛ́ghàti bhɔ kɛ bábhàk chak bɛsí Mandɛm, chi bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛbhé ɛ́rɛ̀m kɛ bábhàk chak bɛsí bhi.
45002014	Mpok anɛ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɛbhé ɛ́rɛ̀m mbɔ ɛnyǔ batɨ yap aghati bhɔ, yɛ̌ndu babhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛbhé ɛbhɛn bɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ ntá Moses, bátɔ̀ŋ ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ̀, bɛ bárɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ babhɔŋɔ bɛkʉ nɛ ɛnɛ babhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛkʉ.
45002015	Bɔ bátɔ̀ŋ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛ Mandɛm asɨŋ bɛbhé amɛm batɨ yap. Batɨ yap átè ntísiɛ bɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́chí tɛtɛp, tɛ̌ndu mpokófu batɨ yap ághàti bhɔ bɛ babhɔŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ nɛ mpok achak bɛ báchí chak.
45002016	Ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn Mandɛm áfʉɛt ntá Yesu Kristo bɛtaŋ bo mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ mɛ́ghàti bo árɛ̀m, chɔŋ antáŋ bo bɛkoŋo nkaysi anɛ achi bhɔ antɨ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ̀ bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́.
45002017	Mbák chi be, bǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ mmʉɛt ɛyɛka bɛ bǎchí bo Israɛl nɛ bǎghɔ̀kɔ mmʉɛt ndǔ ɛbhé ɛnɛ bǎbhɔŋɔ nɛ bǎpà bɛ bǎchi bo Mandɛm.
45002018	Bǎrɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak bɛkʉ mbɔnyunɛ bǎghɔ̀k bɛbhé.
45002019	Bǎrɨŋɨ sayri bɛ báyà bo abhɛn bachi mbɔ manɛ́mámɨk mbi nɛ bɛ bǎchi mbɔ ɛrɔŋɔ ntá bo abhɛn bachi amɛm ɛjuri.
45002020	Nɛ bǎrɨŋɨ sayri bɛ mǎnyurɛ bɛchɨŋtǐ bho nɛ bɛ bǎtɔ̀ŋ bo abhɛn báchí mǎmbɔ ndǔ mbi Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ bǎkàysi bɛ ɛbhé ɛ́kʉ bǎrɨŋɨ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ nɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ be tɛtɛp nkɛm.
45002021	Ɛ̌, be bho bǎtɔ̀ŋ bo bachak, ndaká yí bǎpú tɔŋ mmʉɛt ɛyɛka? Bǎghàti bo bɛ bákɛ́ ghɛ́p aghɛp, kɛ bě babhɔŋ bǎpú ghɛ́p aghɛ́bhɛ́?
45002022	Bě bo bǎrɛ̀m bɛ, “Mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛkwɛn bɛrwɔp,” Bě babhɔŋ bǎpú kwɛn bɛrwɔbhɛ? Bě bo bǎre pap baraká bɔmandɛm nsé, bǎpú ghɛp mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ bɔmandɛm nsé?
45002023	Bě bo bǎpà bɛ bǎrɨ̀ŋɨ ɛbhé Mandɛm, bǎpú chyɛ nɔ Mandɛm ntíánwɔ́p ndǔ bapú bhʉɛrɛ ɛbhé ɛyi?
45002024	Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Bě bo Israɛl bǎkʉ̀ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bárɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm.”
45002025	Nsyɛ́p anɛ bǎsiɛ̀p bo bɛtɔŋ bɛ bachí bo Mandɛm chi ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ mbák bǎbhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé, kɛ mbák bǎpú bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm nsyɛ́p anɛ bǎsiɛ̀p bo achi chi ndɛ́ndɛm.
45002026	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, mbák mmu anɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ syɛp yi ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛbhé ɛ́yàŋ, Mandɛm apu sɔt yi mbɔ mmu anɛ basyɛphɛ?
45002027	Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ syɛp bhɔ ndǔ nkwɔmʉɛt kɛ bábhʉ̀ɛrɛ ɛbhé mándɛm chɔŋ bɛ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛchi nɛ be bo Israɛl mbɔnyunɛ bǎpu bhʉɛrɛ ɛbhé yɛ̌ndu Mandɛm achyɛ nyaka bhe bɛbhé ɛbhɛn básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɨk, apɛt achyɛ bhe ɛpɨŋ bɛsyɛp bho.
45002028	Puyɛ̌ bɛsyɛp mmu kɛ ákʉ̀ yi ambak mbɔ̌ŋ mmu Israɛl tɛ́mɛ́ tɛ́mɛ́, nɛ nsyɛ́p anɛ tɛtɛp puyɛ̌ anɛ nkwɔmʉɛt.
45002029	Mmu ǎbhák mmu Israɛl tɛtɛp chí ndǔ ntɨ ɛni nɛ nsyɛ́p anɛ tɛtɛp ǎbhak chí antɨ. Chí bɛtɨk Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm, puyɛ̌ ɛbhɛn nkwɔmʉɛt. Mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnyǔ nsyɛp ɛyɔ Mandɛm kɛ ábɨti yi, puyɛ̌ nkwǎŋwaŋ.
45003001	Bɛbhak mmu Israɛl ǎkʉ̀ mmu ánchá bo abhɛn bapu bo Israɛl kɛ? Nɛ nsyɛ́p ǎkwak mmu ndǔ ntɨkɨ mbi?
45003002	Mɛnkɛm bɛ́kwàk ndǔ bɛyǎ babhi. Ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɨ ɛnɛ ɛkwak mmu anɛ achi mmu Israɛl chi bɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi amɔ ayap.
45003003	Kɛ mbɔk yap bábhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ báfyɛ nyaka bariɛp nɛ Mandɛm bɛ babhɔŋ bɛkʉ chi bɛ Mandɛm apu pɛrɛ bhʉrɛ bariɛp ami kɛ?
45003004	Wáwák! Yɛ̌ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achi nsěnse, Mandɛm ákʉ̀ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́. Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, “Ɔ̌tɔ̀ŋ kpoŋoroŋ ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́rɛ̀m bɛ ɔchí chak, nɛ mpok bákpɔt manyé yɛ, bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛpu bhak nɛ wɔ.”
45003005	Kɛ mbák bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn sɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ́kʉ̀ bo mangɔ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ Mandɛm achi chak, chɔŋ sɛ́ngati bhɔ bɛ Mandɛm apu chak ndu bɛ́bentɨ anchyɛ bhɛsɛ ntɛmsi? [Nchí rɛm nɔ chi nɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn bakwǎŋwaŋ.]
45003006	Ɛ́pú ɛnyu ɛyɔ wáwák! Mbɔ Mandɛm apu chak mbʉ ná yi ákway bɛtaŋ bo?
45003007	Kɛ mpok mmu árɛ̀m bɛ, “Nsé ɛnɛ mɛ̌sè ɛ́kwak bo mángɔ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ Mandɛm achi mmu tɛtɛp, nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ mánchyɛ yi kɛnókó. Mbák ɛchi nɔ, ná Mandɛm akway bɛtaŋ mɛ andɛm bɛ nchí mmu bɛbʉ́ ndu nchí sense.”
45003008	Ndaká yí bǎpú rɛm bɛ, “Sɛ́ndɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ bɛ Mandɛm antɔŋ bhɛsɛ bɛrɨ,” mbɔ ɛnyǔ mbɔk bo báchɔ̀ŋti manyɛ́n ayɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m ɛnyu yɔ. Chɔŋ mámbɔŋ ntɛmsi anɛ akway nɛ bhɔ.
45003009	Chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm yɛ bɛ yi? Bɛ́ nté ayɛsɛ bo Israɛl acha anɛ bo bachak kɛ? Wáwák! Nnáŋ ntɔŋ bɛ bɛbʉ́ bɛbhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay bo mankɛm, yɛ̌ chi bo Israɛl nɛ yɛ̌ chi abhɛn bapu bo Israɛl.
45003010	Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Yɛ̌ mmu apu chak bɛsí Mandɛm, yɛ amɔt apu,
45003011	yɛ̌ mmu apu yaŋ bɛrɨŋɨ Mandɛm, yɛ̌ mmu apu yaŋ mbi Mandɛm.
45003012	Mankɛm bátɨknsɛm ntá Mandɛm, bɔ mankɛm barɔp bǒ bɛkwɛnɛ, yɛ̌ amɔt apú kʉ bɛrɨ, wáwák! Yɛ̌ amɔt apu.”
45003013	“Ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu yap ɛ́nɛ̀m mbɔ ɛriɛp ɛnɛ ɛ́fú ndǔ nnɛm ɛnɛ́n ɛnɛ́n mánɛ́nɛ́, bárɔ́ fúú. Básɔ̀t bárɨ́ yap bɛrwɔ bho.” “Bɛyɔŋɔ́nyu bhap bɛ́wày mmu way mbɔ ɛfé mpok ɛ́nɛ́m mmu.”
45003014	“Ɛyak nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí bɛyɔŋ kɛ bɛ́fù bɔ anyu mpoknkɛm.”
45003015	“Bɛkak ɛbhap bɛ́wàkari bɛpɔkɔ bɔ bɛ mandɔk mangway bo.
45003016	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ bɔ bárɔ́ŋɔ́, bátwɔ̀ chi nɛ mɛnɛmɛ nɛ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ.
45003017	Bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛkʉ bo mámbɔ́ŋ kpák nɛ batɨ.”
45003018	“Bápu chyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó wáwák!”
45003019	Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi amɛm bɛkáti ɛbhé Moses bɛ́yɨ̀ŋɨ chi bo abhɛn Mandɛm achyɛ bhɔ ɛbhé ɛyɔ. Ɛ́yɔ ɛ́chòk manyu bo abhɛn báyàŋ bɛtaŋa mmʉɛt bɛ bapu bo bɛbʉ́. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛte bɛsí Mandɛm ndǔ manyé.
45003020	Ɛ́bhàk ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ, yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛbhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ ntɨ bɛ ǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɛbhé ɛ́yàŋ yi ankʉ. Ɛbhé ɛ́kʉ̀ mmu andɨŋɨ bɛ yi achi mmu bɛbʉ́.
45003021	Nɛ́nɛ, Mandɛm ákʉ́ bo mandɨŋɨ kpoŋoroŋ ɛnyǔ mmu ákway bɛbhak chak bɛsí bhi. Ɛyɔ ɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ ɛbhé yɛ̌ndu bɛbhé Moses nɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ mɛnáŋ báté ntísiɛ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bo mámbák chak.
45003022	Mandɛm ǎkʉ̀ bo mámbák chak mpok babhɔŋɔ nɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo. Ǎkʉ̀ nɔ nɛ yɛ agha anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo. Mandɛm apu tɔŋ kɛ́rɨ́ŋámík.
45003023	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ákʉ́ bɛbʉ́ nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ ghaka ndǔ nte anɛ Mandɛm ághókó nyaka yi ambak.
45003024	Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, Mandɛm átɔ̀ŋ bo bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi ndu ákʉ̀ mámbák chak bɛsí bhi. Ɛyɔ chi akap Mandɛm nɛ ǎfʉ̀ɛt chi ntá Yesu Kristo bɛkʉ nɔ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu ákʉ́ ndu bɛfɛrɛ bhɛsɛ ndǔ kɛsɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́.
45003025	Mandɛm achyɛ́ nyaka Yesu mbɔ akap, bɛ ɛ̌ti manoŋ mi amɛn árɔ́ŋɔ́ amɨk, Mandɛm amfoŋori bɛbʉ́ bo abhɛn mánóko Yesu. Mandɛm ǎkʉ̀ nɔ bɛtɔŋ bɛ yi achi chak. Ɛ̌ti ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́ ɛyi, asó nyaka bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn bo bákʉ́. Ǎghɔ̀ nyaka bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn bo bákʉ́ ndu mpok anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm mbɔ bɛ apu ghɔ.
45003026	Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, ǎtɔ́ŋ bo bɛ yi achi chak nɛ ǎkʉ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ abhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu ambak chak bɛsí bhi.
45003027	Ndu ɛchi yɛ̌ nɔ, yi ɛ́kway bɛkʉ sɛ́mpányu? Yɛ̌nyɨŋ! Nɛ ntí achi bɛ yi? Chi bɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ kɛ? Wáwák! Chi bɛ sɛ́noko.
45003028	Sɛ́ghɔ̀ yɛ bɛ Mandɛm ǎsɔt bɛ mmu achi chak chi mbák abhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu. Ɛyɔ ɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmu ákʉ̀ bɛkoŋo ɛbhé.
45003029	Mandɛm achi Mandɛm chi ndiɛrɛ ntá bo Israɛl? Apu Mandɛm bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl? Achi Mandɛm bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nkwɔ.
45003030	Mandɛm amɔt kɛ achi nɛ ǎkʉ̀ bo abhɛn básiɛ̀p bo nɛ abhɛn bapú syɛp bo mámbák chak chi mbák bábhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu.
45003031	Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ sɛ́nsɔt bɛ ɛbhé ɛpu yɛ̌nyɨŋ kɛ? Wáwák! Mbák sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu, sɛ́kɛ̀m bɛbhé sayri.
45004001	Chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm yɛ bɛ yi ɛ̌ti Ábraham mmu achí chi-mbɨ ywɛsɛ?
45004002	Mbɔ Ábraham achi nyaka chak bɛsí Mandɛm ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ́tí bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́, mbʉ ntí achi anɛ yi ápanyu. Kɛ ápu kway nyaka bɛkʉ nɔ bɛsí Mandɛm.
45004003	Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mpok Ábraham abhɔ̌ŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm, Mandɛm asɔt bɛ yi achi chak bɛsí bhi.”
45004004	Nkáp anɛ báchyɛ̀ mmu ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhɔŋ ɛ̌ti bɛtɨk ɛbhɔ. Nkáp wu puyɛ̌ akap.
45004005	Kɛ mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ fyɛ ntí chi ndǔ bɛtɨk kɛ abhɔ̌ŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm mmu ákʉ̀ bɛ́ bǒ bɛbʉ́ mambak chak, chɔŋ ansɔt yi bɛ achi chak ɛ̌ti nɛka ɛnɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ yi.
45004006	Nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ Debhít arɛmɛ nyaka bɛ áfɔ́k áchí nɛ mmǔ anɛ Mandɛm ásɔ́rɛ́ bɛ achi chak, yɛ̌ndu abhɨkɨ kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛkʉ bɛ Mandɛm anchyɛ yi áfɔ́k wu.
45004007	“Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá bo abhɛn Mandɛm áfóŋórí ɛpɨŋ ɛyap ɛnɛ bápú bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé, antɛsɛ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhap nkwɔ,
45004008	Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá mmu anɛ Acha ápú sɔt bɛ abhɔŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bhi.”
45004009	Áfɔ́k wu achí yɛ chi ntá bo abhɛn básiɛ̀p bhɔ, kɛ ntá bo abhɛn bapu syɛp bhɔ nkwɔ? Sɛ́rɛ̀m mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mandɛm asɔt nyaka bɛ Ábraham achi chak bɛsí bhi mpok yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ yi.”
45004010	Mpok Mandɛm ásɔ́rɛ́ Ábraham bɛ achi chak, mánaŋ basyɛp nyaka yi kɛ? Chi mpok bábhɨ́kɨ́ re syɛp yi, puyɛ̌ mpok manaŋ basyɛphɛ yi.
45004011	Nsyɛ́p anɛ básiɛ́bhɛ́ Abraham kɛ achi nyaka ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ yi amʉɛt bɛtɔŋ bɛ yi abhɔŋ nɛka nɛ yi tɛ mpok anɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ re syɛp yi. Mandɛm ákʉ́ nyaka nɔ bɛ Ábraham ambak chi-mbɨ ntá bo mankɛm abhɛn mánóko Mandɛm mpok bábhɨ́kɨ́ re syɛp bhɔ, nɛ nta abhɛn nɛka ɛnap nɛ Mandɛm nɛ́kʉ́ yi ásɔ́rɛ́ bɛ bɔ bachi chak bɛsí bhi.
45004012	Abraham achi nkwɔ chi-mbɨ ntá bǒ abhɛn basyɛp bhɔ mbák bákòŋo bayarɛ́kak yi ndu babhɔŋɔ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi áchi nyaka yɛ̌ chi ndu mpok anɛ babhɨkɨ re syɛp yi.
45004013	Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ chɔŋ Ábraham nɛ bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ bhi mányiɛ mmɨk. Ɛpú nyaka chi ɛ̌ti Ábraham abhʉrɛ bɛbhé. Bɛfʉɛt ndǔ nɛka Ábraham kɛ Mandɛm ásɔ́rɛ́ yi bɛ achi chak.
45004014	Mbɔ bo abhɛn bábhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé kɛ babhɔ̌ŋ nyaka mɛnyiɛ mmɨk mbʉ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Mandɛm nɛchi chi ndɛ́ndɛm, nɛ mbʉ bariɛp ami nkwɔ abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ntí.
45004015	Ɛbhé ɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ ntɛmsi Mandɛm ntá bo ndu bápú bhʉɛrɛ yɔ, kɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɛbhé ɛpú, mmu apu kway bɛkwɛn ɛbhé.
45004016	Ɛ̌tiyɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ bariɛp Mandɛm achi chi ntá bo abhɛn babhɔŋɔ nɛka nɛ yi, bɛtɔŋ bɛ chi ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi kɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛkʉ ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Ábraham. Bariɛp ami apú chi ndiɛrɛ ntá bo abhɛn bákòŋo bɛbhé, kɛ ntá bo bachak mankɛm nkwɔ abhɛn babhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm mbɔ Ábraham, tɛ̌ndu bɛsɛ mankɛm sɛchi bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ bhi.
45004017	Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Nkʉ wɔ ɔ́mbák chi ntá bo bɛyǎ bɛtɔk. Yi achi bɛsí Mandɛm mmu yi ánókó, Mandɛm mmu ákʉ̀ bawú mámpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Yí ǎchyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́pú ɛmbak, ɛ́mbak.”
45004018	Ábraham arɔŋ nyaka ambɨ mɛnoko bariɛp Mandɛm. Are noŋ ambaka nɔkɔ ntɨ yɛ̌ndu ɛ́be nyaka mmʉɛt mɛnoko bɛ bariɛp Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛfu tɛtɛp. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, achí chi ntá bo bɛyǎ bɛtɔk bɛkoŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm aghati yi bɛ, “Chɔŋ bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ bhɛ mánja máncha.”
45004019	Ábraham anaŋ aghaka nyaka mbɔ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛtay (100) nɛ arɔbhɛ sɔt mmʉɛt chi mbɔ ngú, nɛ árɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ ngɔrɛ́ ywi Sará achi nkongɔrɛ́. Yɛ̌ nɔ, ate kpirí ndǔ nɛka ɛni nɛ Mandɛm, anoŋ nɔkɔ bɛ Mandɛm ankʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi árɛ́mɛ́.
45004020	Arɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka bɛ bariɛp Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛfu tɛtɛp. Yi kɛmakati yɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm árɛ́mɛ́, kɛ abhɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm andɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ nɛ anchyɛ nɔkɔ yi kɛnókó.
45004021	Arɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka bɛ Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛkʉ.
45004022	Nɛ bɛfʉɛt ndǔ nɛka ɛni, “Mandɛm asɔt bɛ Ábraham achi chak bɛsí bhi.”
45004023	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ Mandɛm asɔt yi bɛ achi chak bɛsí bhi ɛbhɨkɨ yɨŋɨ nyaka chi yi aywǐntí.
45004024	Ɛchi nyaka ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ nkwɔ ndu sɛ́nókó Mandɛm mmu ákʉ́ nyaka Yesu Acha ywɛsɛ apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
45004025	Yi, Yesu, kɛ Mandɛm arɔ bɛ angu ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ, akʉ yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ndu bɛkʉ bɛsɛ sɛ́mbak chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
45005001	Tɛ̌ndu sɛ́chí yɛ chak bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ́nɛ ndu sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Yesu, sɛ́chí ndu kpák nɛ Mandɛm ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo ákʉ́ ntá yɛsɛ.
45005002	Kristo akʉ sɛ́bhɔŋ mbi bɛbhak ɛnyu ɛnɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm bɛbhak nɛ bhɛsɛ bɛfʉɛt ndu nɛka ɛnɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ yi. Nɛ sɛbhɔŋ maŋák mbɔnyunɛ sɛbhaka ntɨ ndǔ kɛnɛ́m ɛkɛn sɛ́bhɔŋ chɔŋ nɛ Mandɛm.
45005003	Kɛ mbɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛcha ɛyɔ chi bɛ sɛbhɔŋ maŋák ndu bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛsɛ mbɔnyunɛ sɛrɨŋɨ bɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛkwak bhɛsɛ sɛngɔk bɛte kpirí.
45005004	Nɛ bɛ́te kpirí ǎkwak bhɛsɛ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ sɛ́fʉɛt nɛmɔ. Nɛ ɛpɨŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ sɛmbaka ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ mbɔnyu yi arɛmɛ.
45005005	Nɛ mbák sɛ́bhɔŋ nɛbhakántɨ, ɛyɔ ɛ́pú twɔ bhɛsɛ nɛ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́. Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ Mandɛm akɔŋ bhɛsɛ tontó, mbɔnyunɛ akʉ bɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmu yi achyɛ bhɛsɛ ánkʉ ɛkɔŋ ɛyi ɛnjwi bhɛsɛ antɨ.
45005006	Mpok anɛ sɛ́chí nyaka kɛbhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛkwak mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ, Kristo agǔ ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn Mandɛm ayabhɛ, bɛ ánkwak bhɛsɛ bǒ bɛbʉ́.
45005007	Ɛ́taŋ bɛ́ mmu ánká bɛgu ɛ̌ti mmu anɛ achi chak, yɛ̌ndu mmu akway bɛka nɛwú ɛ̌ti ɛrɨ́tí mmu.
45005008	Kɛ Mandɛm atɔŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ yi akɔŋ bhɛsɛ ndu Kristo ágú ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ mpok sɛbhʉɛt nyaka bǒ bɛbʉ́.
45005009	Tɛ̌ndu manoŋ Kristo árɔ́ŋɔ́ amɨk ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ, Mandɛm ásɔ̀t bɛ sɛ́chí chak bɛsí bhi nɛ́nɛ. Ɛchi mbɔ̌ŋ tɛtɛp ɛcha bɛ Kristo ǎpɛmɛ chɔŋ bhɛsɛ bɛ bɛběntɨ Mandɛm bɛ́kɛ́ bhak nɛ bhɛsɛ.
45005010	Mpok sɛ́bhʉɛ́t nyaka bǒmpap Mandɛm, yi akʉ sɛ́mpɛtnsɛm ntá yi, bɛfʉɛt ndǔ nɛwú Mɔ́ywi. Ná nɛ nɛ́nɛ, ɛnɛ́ sɛ́pɛ́tnsɛm ntá Mandɛm? Ɛchi mbɔ̌ŋ tɛtɛp ɛcha bɛ Mɔ́ywi apu nɔ́k bɛpɛmɛ bhɛsɛ, tɛ̌ndu yi achi nɛpɛ́m.
45005011	Kɛ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnɛ ɛcha ɛyɔ chi bɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ maŋák ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afʉɛrɛ ntá Yesu Kristo Acha akʉ ntá yɛsɛ. Yi Kristo kɛ ákʉ́ sɛ́pɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ntá Mandɛm.
45005012	Bɛbʉ́ bɛ́fʉɛt ntá mmu amɔt kɛ bɛ̌twɔ fá amɨk, nɛ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi bɛ́twɔ́ nɛ nɛwú. Nɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ nɛwú nɛ́pɔ̀kɔ bo mankɛm mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ákʉ bɛbʉ́.
45005013	Bɛbʉ́ mɛ́naŋ bɛchi nyaka fá amɨk kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ bɛbhé bɛ́fʉɛ́t ntá Moses bɛ́twɔ́. Kɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɛbhé ɛpu bápú kwáy bɛrɛm bɛ mmu akwɛn ɛbhé.
45005014	Yɛ̌ nɔ, bɛbʉ́ bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfǎy bo mankɛm bɛbho mpok Adam kpát bɛghaka mpok Moses, nɛ yɛ̌ chi bo abhɛn bɛbʉ́ bhap bɛpu nyaka mbɔ ɛbhɛn Adam mmu ákwɛ́nɛ́ ɛbhé Mandɛm abhak mbɔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛ́twɔ. Kɛ apɛt abhak kɛkúrí nɛ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́twɔ.
45005015	Kɛ ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ Mandɛm átɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛ̌ti Kristo ɛchi kɛkúrí nɛ ɛnyu ɛnɛ Adam ákʉ́ bɛbʉ́. Bɛyǎ bo bágu nyaka ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ mmu amɔt, kɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm bɛyǎ mbɔŋ bɛcha. Ɛnyu ɛnɛ kɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ áfɔ́k ntá bɛyǎ bho ndɛ́ndɛm bɛkoŋo ɛnyǔ mmu amɔt, Yesu Kristo, átɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɨ̌ndu.
45005016	Nɛ akap anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ bho ndɛ́ndɛm achi kɛkúrí tontó nɛ akap anɛ bɛbʉ́ mmu wu amɔt bɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ wu. Bɛkoŋo bɛbʉ́ bhɔ mɛmɔt Mandɛm atǎŋ bo mankɛm nɛ bákwɛn manyé. Kɛ akap anɛ́ Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ ndɛ́ndɛm bɛkoŋo bɛbʉ́ bɛyǎ bho ákʉ̀ bo mámbák chak bɛsí bhi.
45005017	Tɛ̌ndu bɛbʉ́ mmu amɔt bɛkʉ nɛwú nɛ́bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfǎy bo mankɛm, ɛchi mbɔ̌ŋ tɛtɛp ɛcha, bɛ bo mankɛm abhɛn Mandɛm átɔŋ bɔ bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ndu nɛ ǎchyɛ bhɔ akap ndɛ́ndɛm ndu bɛkʉ bɔ mambak chak bɛsí bhi, mámbɔŋ bɛtaŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap ndu bɛsɔt awɔ́nɛm amfǎy yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu amɔt, Yesu Kristo ákʉ́.
45005018	Nɔ kɛ ɛ́chí bɛ, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bo mankɛm babhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ mmu amɔt, ɛnyu ɛyɔ nkwɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ mbɔnyunɛ mmu amɔt ákʉ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ɛyɔ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak, bo mankɛm babhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́, kɛ babhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
