45005019	Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ nɛtaŋántɨ mmǔ amɔt nɛ́kʉ́ bo mankɛm mámbák bǒ bɛbʉ́, mmu amɔt anɛ ákʉ́ mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm aghati yi, akʉ bo mankɛm mámbák chak.
45005020	Mandɛm ákʉ́ nyaka ɛbhé ɛntwɔ bɛ bo mángó sayri bɛ bɛbʉ́ bhap bɛyǎ tontó. Kɛ mpok bo bákʉ̀ nyaka bɛyǎ bɛbʉ́ mandɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, Mandɛm atɔ́ŋ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɛ́yá mbɔŋ ɛ́chá,
45005021	bɛ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bɛbʉ́ bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi amfay bho ndu bɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ nɛwú, bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm nkwɔ bɛbhɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ amfay bho ndu bɛ́kʉ̀ bɔ mámbák chak bɛsí bhi. Nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ bɔ mámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo ákʉ́.
45006001	Chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm yɛ bɛ yi? Sɛ́ndɔ́k ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ bɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm mɛnja mɛncha kɛ?
45006002	Wáwák! Bɛsɛ bho sɛrɔbhɛ chi mbɔ bawú ndǔ nté yɛsɛ nɛ bɛbʉ́, sɛ́ndɔ́k ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́?
45006003	Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ bɛsɛ mankɛm abhɛn bájwítí bɛ Mandɛm achɛm bhɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo, bájwiti nyaka bhɛsɛ chi bɛ sɛmbak mbɔ bɛ sɛ́gu nyaka nɛ yi mpok yi agu?
45006004	Ɛchi yɛ mbɔ bɛ manaŋ babhɛmɛ nyaka bhɛsɛ nɛ yi mpok bajwiti bhɛsɛ, bɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ ákʉ́ nyaka Kristo apɛtnsɛm ndu nɛpɛ́m ndu bɛtaŋ ɛbhi ɛbhɛn bɛyǎ bɛcha, bɛsɛ nkwɔ sɛ́nkwáy bɛbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ.
45006005	Tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm áchɛ́mɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛ Kristo ndu nɛwú ɛni, chɔŋ sɛ́mbak nɛ yi mpok sɛ́pɛ́rɛnsɛm ndu nɛpɛ́m nkwɔ mbɔ yi.
45006006	Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ ɛchi nɛ́nɛ mbɔ bɛ bágo nyaka nɛpɛ́m nɛsɨ́ ɛnɛsɛ ndu ɛkotákátí nɛ yi, bɛ Mandɛm anchɔŋti mmʉɛt bɛbʉ́ ayɛsɛ bɛ sɛkɛ pɛrɛ bhak ndu kɛsɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́.
45006007	Ɛchi nɔ mbɔnyunɛ bɛbʉ́ bɛpú pɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay mmu anɛ ánáŋ ágú.
45006008	Tɛ̌ndu sɛ́gú nɛ Kristo, sɛ́noko bɛ chɔŋ sɛ́mbak nkwɔ nɛ yi.
45006009	Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm akʉ Kristo apɛtnsɛm ndu nɛpɛ́m, yi apú pɛrɛ gu wáwák. Nɛwú nɛbhɨkɨ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni.
45006010	Nɛwú ɛnɛn yi agu, agú bɛchɔŋti bɛtaŋ nɛwú. Agú ndɔŋ amɔt ndak amay. Kɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛchi chi ndu bɛchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó.
45006011	Bě nkwɔ bǎbhɔŋ bɛsɔt mmʉɛt ɛyɛka mbɔ bɛ bǎgu, nɛ bɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ bɛbʉ́, nɛ bɛ bǎchi nɛpɛ́m ndu bɛ́tok Mandɛm ndu yi áchɛ́mɛ́ bhe nɛ Yesu Kristo.
45006012	Bǎkɛ́ pɛrɛ rɔ yɛ bɛbʉ́ mɛ́mbɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛyɛka ɛnɛ ɛ́gùgu bɛkʉ be mǎnkoŋo nɔkɔ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yɔ ɛŋwaka bɛ mǎnkʉ.
45006013	Yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka ákɛ chyɛ yɛ ɛpókómʉɛt ɛyi mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ básɔt bɛkʉ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ nɛ yɔ. Kɛ chyɛ̌ ka mmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm mbɔ bo abhɛn mánáŋ bágú kɛ yi ákʉ́ bǎpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Nɛ chyɛ ká bɛpókómʉɛt ɛbhɛka ntá Mandɛm mbɔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bǎsɔt bɛkʉ chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
45006014	Mbák mǎnkʉ nɔ nkaysi bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ apu pɛrɛ bhɔŋ chɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfǎy yɛka, tɛ̌ndu ɛbhé ɛbhɨkɨ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ ndu nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka, nɛ ndiɛrɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm kɛ bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ ndu nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka.
45006015	Chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm yɛ bɛ yi? Sɛ́ndɔ́k ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ mbɔnyunɛ ɛbhé ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ́, nɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm kɛ bɛ́rɔ́hɛ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ kɛ? Wáwák!
45006016	Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ mbák mǎnchyɛ́ mmʉɛt ntá mmu bɛkʉ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi áyàŋ mǎnkʉ, nɔ bǎchi basɛm ntá mmu wu? Mmu ǎkway bɛkoŋo bɛbʉ́, nɛ bɛbʉ́ mɛntwɔ yi nɛ nɛwú. Mbák ɛpu nɔ, mmu ǎkway bɛkoŋo Mandɛm, nɛ Mandɛm ankʉ yí ambak chak bɛsí bhi.
45006017	Kɛ sɛbhɔŋ bɛkaka Mandɛm bɛ yɛ̌ndu bǎchi nyaka ndu kɛsɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́, nɛ́nɛ, bǎkòŋo nɛ batɨ ayɛka ankɛm, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bátɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bhe. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ kɛ bárɔ́ amɔ yɛka.
45006018	Mandɛm afɛ́rɛ́ be ndǔ kɛsɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́ nɛ bǎrɔp chi basɛm abhi bɛ mǎnkʉ nɔkɔ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí chak bɛsí bhi.
45006019	Nchí sɔt ɛrɨŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ ntí bɛ mɛ́yàŋ mǎnjwimɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́rɛ̀m, mbɔnyunɛ ɛ́bemʉɛt bɛ bakwǎŋwaŋ mámbɔ́ŋ nɛjwǐmɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhɛn. Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎchyɛ́ nyaka bɛpókómʉɛt ɛbhɛka ndǔ kɛsɛm ɛkɛn bɛkʉ barak ɛpúsí nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak ɛbhɛn bɛyǎ mɛndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, chyɛ ká bɛpókómʉɛt ɛbhɛka nɛ́nɛ mbɔ basɛm ntá Mandɛm bɛ yi ankʉ mǎmbák chak bɛsí bhi ɛnyu ɛnɛ babhak nyáŋá.
45006020	Ndǔ mpok anɛ bǎchí ndu kɛsɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nyaka yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak.
45006021	Mpok ɛyɔ, bǎbhɔŋ nyaka ntɨkɨ nsáy ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bákʉ̀, ɛbhɛn-nɛ bǎbhɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p bɛkʉ nɛ́nɛ? Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́twɔ̀ chi nɛ nɛwú.
45006022	Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, ɛnɛ́ Mandɛm ánáŋ áfɛ́rɛ́ be ndǔ bɛbʉ́, bǎrɔp chi basɛm abhi, nɛ nsáy anɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ chi nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛchi nyáŋá, nɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti, bǎbhɔŋ chi nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
45006023	Nsáy bɛbʉ́ chi nɛwú, kɛ akap anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ ndɛ́ndɛm chi nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ abhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ.
45007001	Bɔ̌ma, bǎrɨŋɨ ɛbhe. Bǎrɨŋɨ yɛ bɛ ɛbhé ɛbhɔŋ bɛtaŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m mmu chi ndiɛrɛ mpok yi achi nɛpɛ́m?
45007002	Nchí sɔt ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ngɔrɛ́ nɛbhay. Mpoknkɛm anɛ nnɛ́m achi nɛpɛ́m ɛbhé ɛ́gwɔ̀t yi nɛ nnɛ́m ɛyi. Kɛ mbák nnɛ́m agu, ɛbhé yɔ ɛ́pu pɛrɛ gwɔt yi.
45007003	Mbák ngɔrɛ́ achi nɛ mmu achak mpok nnɛ́m ábhʉɛ́t nɛpɛ́m, nɔ achi nkwɛnɛ́ bɛrwɔp. Kɛ mbák nnɛ́m agu, ɛbhé ɛnɛ́ ɛ́gwɔ́rɛ́ yi nɛ nnɛ́m ɛpu pɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay yi. Nɛ mbák abhay mmǔ chak, apú bhak nkwɛnɛ́ bɛrwɔp.
45007004	Bɔ̌ma, ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛchi nɛ bhe. Ɛbhé ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka mbɔnyunɛ, bɛyɨŋɨ ɛbhé, bǎgú nyaka nɛ Kristo mpok yi agu ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Nɛ́nɛ, bǎbhat mmʉɛt nɛ mmu anɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m bɛ ankʉ bhɛsɛ sɛ́mbák bo abhɛn sɛ́kʉ̀ bɛrɨ ndǔ bɛtok Mandɛm.
45007005	Mpok anɛ sɛ́kòŋo nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bakwǎŋwaŋ báyàŋ sɛnkʉ, ɛbhé ɛ́kú sɛ́ré ŋwaka bɛkʉ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ nɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ mɛntwɔ bhɛsɛ nɛ nɛwú.
45007006	Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, ɛbhé ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ bhɛsɛ mbɔnyunɛ, bɛyɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́gwɔ́rɛ́ nyaka bhɛsɛ, sɛ́rɔp chi mbɔ bawú. Nɛ́nɛ, sɛ́pɛt sɛ́pú ndǔ kɛsɛm bɛkoŋo mbi bɛbhé ɛbhɛn basɨŋɨ mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́rɔbhɛ koŋo chi mbi akɔ anɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm átɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ.
45007007	Sɛ́ndɛ́m yɛ bɛ yi? Bɛbhʉɛrɛ ɛbhé chi bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ kɛ? Wáwák! Ɛbhé kɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ bo mándɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɛbʉ́ bɛchi. Mbɔ ɛbhé ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ fyɛ ngoŋo ndǔ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmu” mbʉ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn bɛchi ndu bɛfyɛ ngoŋo ndu ɛnyɨŋɨ mmu.
45007008	Kɛ ɛbhé ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ́ nyaka mfyɛ́ ngoŋo ndǔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ bho mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu. Mbák ɛbhé ɛ́pú, bɛbʉ́ bɛ́bhàk chi mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́gú.
45007009	Mpok achi anɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛbhé ɛ́yàŋ bo mankʉ. Kɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛbhé, ngɔ́ bɛ nnáŋ nkwɛn nyaka ɛbhé, nɛ ngú.
45007010	Nkúbhɛ́ ɛbhé ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ nyaka bɛ ɛnkʉ mɛ mbɔ̌ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛ́twɔ́ mɛ chi nɛ nɛwú.
45007011	Ɛbhé ɛnɛ ɛchi mɛ antɨ ɛ́rɔ́bhɛ twɔ́ mɛ chi nɛ nɛwú.
45007012	Sɛ́ghɔ̀ yɛ bɛ bɛbhé mɛnkɛm bɛchi nyáŋá. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛbhé ɛ́rɛ̀m ɛchi nyáŋá, ɛ́chí chak, nɛ ɛrɨ.
45007013	Kɛ ɛbhé ɛnɛ́ ɛchi ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́twɔ̀ nyaka mɛ chi nɛ nɛwú kɛ? Wáwák! Bɛbʉ́ kɛ bɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́twɔ́ mɛ nɛ nɛwú. Ndu ɛchi nɔ, sɛ́ghɔ̀ yɛ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ bɛbʉ́ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́bɛ́bhɛ́ ɛ́chá. Bɛ́fʉɛ̀t ndu ɛrɨ́tí ɛbhé Mandɛm, bɛbʉ́ bɛ́twɔ̀ bho nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bɛ́bhɛ́ bɛcha.
45007014	Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ ɛbhé chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛsɛ. Kɛ nchí chí nkwǎŋwaŋ anɛ achi ndǔ kɛsɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́.
45007015	Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀. Mpú kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́yàŋ bɛkʉ. Nchí kʉ chi nkúbhɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mpábhɛ́.
45007016	Tɛ̌ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀ chi ɛbhɛn mbɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ bɛkʉ, ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ nká bɛ ɛbhé chi ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ.
45007017	Sayri sayri, puyɛ̌ chi mɛ kɛ nchí kʉ yɛ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ. Chi bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn bɛchi mɛ antɨ.
45007018	Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ bɛ yɛ̌ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ ɛpu ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna mbɔ nkwǎŋwaŋ. Yɛ̌ bɛrɨ bɛpu fu mɛ antɨ. Yɛ̌ndu mbɔ́ŋɔ́ ntɨ bɛkʉ bɛrɨ, mmʉɛt apu mɛ.
45007019	Mpú kʉ bɛrɨ ɛbhɛn mbɔ́ŋɔ́ ntɨ bɛkʉ. Kɛ nchí kʉ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mpu yaŋ bɛkʉ.
45007020	Kɛ mbák nchí kʉ chi bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mpu yaŋ bɛkʉ, ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ, sayri sayri, puyɛ̌ chi mɛ kɛ nchí kʉ bɔ, chí bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn bɛchi mɛ antɨ.
45007021	Ɛchi yɛ chi mbɔ ɛbhé ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna bɛ mpok mɛ́yàŋ bɛkʉ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ, ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ kɛ nchí kʉ.
45007022	Nkɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ ntɨ ɛna nɛnkɛm.
45007023	Kɛ ngɔ bɛ ɛbhé ɛchak ɛ́chí ndǔ amʉɛt ɛya ɛnɛ́ ɛ́nù nɛ nkaysi aya, ɛ́nkʉ nɔkɔ bɛ mbak ndǔ kɛsɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn bɛbhʉɛt ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna.
45007024	Ɛyá ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɛ́bɛp ɛcha! Chɔŋ agha ámfɛrɛ mɛ ndǔ bɛtaŋá nkaysi bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ anɛ átwɔ̀ mɛ nɛ nɛwú?
45007025	Bakak ámbák nɛ Mandɛm mmu ákʉ̀ nɔ bɛfʉɛt ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ ákʉ́. Ɛchi yɛ bɛ ndǔ nkaysi aya, nchí ndǔ kɛsɛmɛ́ ɛbhé Mandɛm, kɛ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna mbɔ nkwǎŋwaŋ, nchí ndǔ kɛsɛm ɛbhé bɛbʉ́.
45008001	Nɛ́nɛ, yɛ̌ mbi apu anɛ Mandɛm árɛm bɛ bo abhɛn bábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo bákwɛn manyé.
45008002	Nti achi bɛ, ɛbhé Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm mmu áchyɛ mɛ nɛpɛ́m ndu nchɛmɛ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo, ɛ́fɛ́rɛ́ mɛ ndǔ ɛbhé ɛnɛ́ ɛchyɛ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ chi nɛ nɛwú.
45008003	Bɛbhɛ́ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ́ ntá Moses bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kway nyaka bɛpɛmɛ bhɛsɛ ndǔ bɛbʉ́ nɛ ntí bɛ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ mbɔ bakwǎŋwaŋ, sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nyaka bɛtaŋ bɛbhʉrɛ bhɔ. Mandɛm kɛ ápɛ́mɛ́ bhɛsɛ ndǔ átó mbɔŋ Mɔ́ywi, nɛ yí atwɔ́ fá amɨk nɛ nɛpɛmɛ́ nkwǎnwaŋ mmu ákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́. Nɛ ndu atwɔ́ ɛnyu yɔ, akʉ bɛ bɛbʉ́ bɛkɛpɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfǎy bho.
45008004	Mandɛm ákʉ́ nɔ bɛ bɛsɛ bo sɛ́pú pɛrɛ kɔ chi ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛsɛ babhɔŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bakwǎŋwaŋ bákʉ̀, kɛ sɛ́rɔbhɛ kɔ chí ndu bɛtaŋ abhɛn Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm, sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛbhak chak bɛsí bhi mbɔ ɛnyǔ bɛbhé Moses bɛ́yaŋ sɛ́mbak.
45008005	Bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ chi bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ bɛkoŋo nɛpɛ́m bakwǎŋwaŋ, bábhʉ̀rɛ ntɨ chi ndǔ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛpɛ́m bakwǎŋwaŋ nɛ́yàŋ. Kɛ bo abhɛn bákʉ chi bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ bɛkoŋo ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ árɛ̀m, bábhʉ̀rɛ ntɨ chi ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ákɔ́ŋɔ́.
45008006	Mbák mmu abhʉ́rɛ́ ntɨ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bakwǎŋwaŋ báyaŋ, ɛyɔ ɛ́twɔ̀ yi chi nɛ nɛwú. Kɛ mbák mmu abhʉ́rɛ́ ntɨ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áyaŋ, Mandɛm ǎchyɛ yi nɛpɛ́m nɛ kpák.
45008007	Mmu anɛ akaysi chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bakwǎŋwaŋ báyàŋ bɛkʉ achí mǔmpap Mandɛm. Apú sɛptimʉɛt bɛkoŋo bɛbhé Mandɛm, nɛ apú kway bɛkʉ nɔ wáwák.
45008008	Nɛ bo abhɛn bákòŋo chi nɛpɛ́m bakwǎŋwaŋ, bápú kway bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ Mandɛm maŋák.
45008009	Kɛ be bǎpú koŋo nɛpɛ́m bakwǎŋwaŋ. Bǎkòŋo chi Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm tɛ̌ndu yi achi nɛ bhe. Mmu anɛ Ɛfóŋó Kristo apu nɛ yi apú mmu Kristo.
45008010	Kɛ tɛ̌ndu Kristo achi nɛ bhe, yɛ̌ mmʉɛt ɛyɛka agǔgú ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́, bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛka bɛchi nɛpɛ́m, mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ bǎchi chak bɛsí bhi.
45008011	Tɛ̌ndu Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm mmu ákʉ́ Yesu Kristo áfú ndǔ nɛwú achi nɛ bhe, chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ mmʉɛt ɛyɛka ɛnɛ ɛ́gù nkwɔ ɛ́mpɛt ɛ́mbak nɛpɛ́m ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmu achi nɛ bhe.
45008012	Bɔ̌ma, ɛnyɨŋ ɛchi ɛnɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ, kɛ puyɛ̌ bɛ sɛbhɔŋ bɛkoŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bakwǎŋwaŋ báyàŋ bɛkʉ.
45008013	Mbák mmu ywɛka ánkóŋó mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bakwǎŋwaŋ báyàŋ bɛkʉ, ǎgú. Kɛ mbák mǎnkoŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Ɛfóŋó áyàŋ mǎnkʉ chɔŋ mǎmbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m.
45008014	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákòŋo Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm achí mmɔ́ Mandɛm.
45008015	Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm áchyɛ́ bhe apú kʉ mǎmbak basɛm bɛ mǎmpɛt mǎmbɔŋ bɛ́chay. Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ǎkʉ mǎmbak bɔ Mandɛm. Nɛ ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ yi bɛ, “Ɛta, Ɛtaya!”
45008016	Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ mbɔ̌ŋ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ǎchɛm nɛ batɨ yɛsɛ nɛ ǎkʉ sɛndɨŋɨ bɛ sɛchi bɔ Mandɛm.
45008017	Nɛ tɛ̌ndu sɛ́chí bɔ Mandɛm, chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔŋ áfɔ́k anɛ yi ábhʉ́rɛ́ ntá bɔ̌bhi, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ábhʉ̀rɛ ntá Kristo. Mbák sɛ́nká bɛ́chɛm mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛyi, chɔŋ sɛ́nchɛm nɛ yi ndǔ kɛnɛ́m ɛki.
45008018	Bɛyɨŋɨ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghɔ́ nɛ́nɛ, bɛ́pú yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu ákway bɛyɛnti nɛ kɛnɛ́m ɛkɛn Mandɛm ákʉ chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ.
45008019	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ághókó mɛnkɛm mɛ́nòŋ nɛ bɛyǎ ɛkwak nywɔp ɛnɛn yi átɔŋ kpoŋoroŋ bo abhɛn bachi bɔ̌bhi.
45008020	Ɛchi nɔ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi aghoko mɛ́mbák chí ndɛ́ndɛm. Puyɛ̌ bhɔ kɛ bɛ́yàŋ bɛbhak ɛnyu yɔ. Mandɛm mmu ághókó bhɔ kɛ ákʉ́ bɛ ɛ́mbák nɔ. Kɛ bɛrɨ bɛ́chí ambɨ.
45008021	Nɛ ɛ́chí bɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm amfɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ághókó ndǔ kɛsɛm antɛn mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ bɔ mɛ́mpɔ́ɔ́ bɛ bɔ nkwɔ mɛ́mbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛbhɔŋ kɛnɛ́m mbɔ ɛnyǔ bɔ̌ Mandɛm bábhɔŋ kɛnɛ́m.
45008022	Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ághókó bɛ́tòŋ mbɔ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ághòk bɛbe mpok ánòŋsi.
45008023	Nɛ puyɛ̌ chi ndiɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ághókó kɛ bɛ́ghòk bɛbe, mɛ́ntoŋ nɔkɔ. Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ bo Mandɛm achyɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mbɔ akap anɛ mbɨ anɛ́ átɔ̀ŋ bɛ chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔŋ kɛnɛ́m ɛkɛn kɛbhʉɛ́t ambɨ, sɛ́tòŋ nkwɔ, sɛnoŋ nɔkɔ bɛ Mandɛm ansɔt bɛsɛ amʉɛt mbɔ bɔ̌bhi. Nɔ chi bɛ anchyɛ bhɛsɛ mmʉɛ́t nkɔ.
45008024	Mandɛm apɛ́mɛ́ bhɛsɛ, mpok sɛ́bhàka ntɨ nɛ yi. Mpok sɛ́ghɔ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́bhàka ntɨ arɛ́ sɛ́pú pɛrɛ rɔŋ ambɨ bɛbhaka ntɨ arɛ. Agha ákway bɛbhaka ntɨ ndu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ánáŋ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́?
45008025	Kɛ mbák sɛ́bháká ntɨ ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛbhɨkɨre ghɔ́, sɛ́rɔŋ ambɨ mɛnoŋ yɔ nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́.
45008026	Ɛchi ɛnyumɔt bɛ ndu sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ mɛnɨkmʉɛt mbɔ ɛnyu sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ǎkwak bhɛsɛ. Yímbɔŋ ǎnɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ ansɔk nɔkɔ nsɔ́k ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛ́chá ɛnyǔ mmu ánɨkmʉɛt nɛ ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu.
45008027	Nɛ Mandɛm mmu árɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi bhɛsɛ antɨ arɨ́ŋɨ́ nkwɔ nkaysi Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ, mbɔnyunɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ǎnɨ̀kmʉɛt ɛ̌ti bo Mandɛm kɛ ǎkoŋo chi nkaysi Mandɛm.
45008028	Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí nɛ bhɛsɛ, Mandɛm ǎsɔt yɔ ankʉ bɛ́ ɛ́ntwɔ́ nɛ bɛrɨ ntá bo abhɛn bákɔŋ yi, bo abhɛn yi ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛkoŋo nkaysi yi.
45008029	Ɛ́chí nɔ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm anáŋ arɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka bɔ̌bhi ambɨ ambɨ. Ndu ɛchi nɔ, áyap bɔ́ nkwɔ bɛkʉ bɛ mándɔp chi mbɔ Mɔ́ywi.
45008030	Nɛ bo abhɛn yi áyábhɛ́, abhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɔ nkwɔ. Nɛ akʉ bo abhɛn yi ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ mámbák chak bɛsí bhi, nɛ bo abhɛn yi akʉ mámbák chak, akʉ mámbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛbhak ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt kɛnókó yi nɛ yi.
45008031	Chɔŋ sɛ́mpɛt sɛ́ndɛm ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak? Mbák Mandɛm achi nɛ bhɛsɛ, agha ákway mɛnu nɛ bhɛsɛ ansɔt awɔ́nɛm?
45008032	Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ kɛm nyaka Mɔ́ywi bɛ akɛ bhɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri. Arɔ yi bɛ ankwak bhɛsɛ mankɛm. Tɛ̌ndu yi áchyɛ́ nyaka yi ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ, sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ bɛ chɔŋ anchyɛ bhɛsɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ?
45008033	Agha akway bɛrɛm bɛ bo abhɛn Mandɛm ayabhɛ bɛ mambak abhi bákwɛ́n manyé? Mandɛm kɛ ákʉ̀ bhɔ mámbák chak.
45008034	Agha ákway bɛrɛm bɛ mántɛ́msí bhɛsɛ? Chí Yesu Kristo mmu ágú nyaka kɛ Mandɛm akʉ yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ achi ɛbhé awɔ́nɛm ɛywi, nɛ sayri sayri, ǎnɨ̀kmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ kɛ?
45008035	Agha ákway bɛfɛrɛ bhɛsɛ ndǔ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ Kristo ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ bhɛsɛ? Chi nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́táŋá kɛ chi ɛsɔŋɔri? Chi nɛnyok ɛnɛn báchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ kɛ chi nsay? Chi nchɛ́bhɛ́ ndɛn kɛ nɛpá anɛ bɔ bápà bhɛsɛ kɛ chi nɛwáy anɛ bo báyaŋ bɛway bhɛsɛ?
45008036	Ɛ́chí mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Ɛ̌ti yɛ, bo báyàŋ bɛway bhɛsɛ mpoknkɛm. Básɔ̀t bhɛsɛ chi mbɔ ághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n anɛ báyà bɛrɔŋ bɛway.”
45008037	Wáwák! Ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́fakari nɛ bhɛsɛ, Kristo mmu ákɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɛsɛ ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ awɔ́nɛm tontó.
45008038	Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́pú kway bɛfɛrɛ bhɛsɛ ndǔ ɛkɔŋ ɛyi. Nɛwú nɛpu kway bɛkʉ nɔ. Sɛ́chí chi nɛpɛ́m, nɛ nɛpɛ́m nɛ́pú kway bɛkʉ nɔ. Bɔángɛl Mandɛm bápú kway bɛkʉ nɔ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfay bɛ́pú kway bɛkʉ nɔ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛ́nɛ, nɛ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ ambɨ bɛ́pú kway bɛkʉ nɔ.
45008039	Bɛtaŋtí mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́pú kway bɛkʉ nɔ. Yɛ̌ chí mfay, yɛ̌ chi mmɨk ápú kway bɛkʉ nɔ. Nɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ághókó mɛnkɛm yɛ ɛ́mɔt ɛpu kway bɛfɛrɛ bhɛsɛ ndǔ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ bhɛsɛ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo ákʉ́ ndu bɛkwak bhɛsɛ.
45009001	Mɛ mmǔ Kristo nchí rɛm chi tɛtɛp, mpú sénse. Ntɨ̌ ɛna nkwɔ́ nɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ nchí rɛm chi tɛtɛp, nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ árɛ̀m chi ɛnyumɔt.
45009002	Basɛ́mɛ́ aya mɛ antɨ tontó nɛ ntɨ nɛ́sɔ̀ŋɔri mɛ amɛm mpoknkɛm ɛ̌ti bɔ̌maya, bo Israɛl, bo ɛtɔk ɛya.
45009003	Yɛ̌ chí bɛ́ká nɛwú ka bɛ ntɛmsi Mandɛm ambak nɛ mɛ, nɛ bɛ yi amfap mɛ nɛ Kristo mbák ɛyɔ ɛ́kway bɛkwak bɔ mánókó Kristo.
45009004	Báchí bo Israɛl. Bɔ́ kɛ Mandɛm ásɔ́rɛ́ bɛ mámbák bǒbhi. Ntá yap kɛ̌ yi átɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ bhi. Anyǔ nku chi nɛ bhɔ. Ntá yǎp kɛ̌ yi achyɛ bɛbhé. Bɔ kɛ̌ yi atɔŋɔ ɛnyǔ bo babhɔŋɔ bɛchyɛ yi kɛnókó nɛ, nɛ bɔ́ kɛ̌ yi afyɛ́ bariɛp.
45009005	Bɔ́ kɛ báchi bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham nɛ Áisek nɛ Jekɔ́p. Nɛ bábhé Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò chi ɛtɔk ɛyap. Bábhé yi chi ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛrɛ wu. Yí Kristo, achí Mandɛm nɛ abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfǎy mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm. Sɛ́mbɨ́tí yi mpoknkɛm. Amen.
45009006	Mpú rɛm bɛ Mandɛm ǎnɔk bɛbhʉrɛ bariɛp amɛn yi afyɛ́ nyaka nɛ bo Israɛl. Puyɛ̌ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu Israɛl kɛ achi mmǔ Mandɛm.
45009007	Nɛ puyɛ̌ bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham mankɛm kɛ bachi bǒbhi tɛtɛp. Mandɛm arɛm nyaka bɛ, “Bɛfʉɛt ntá Áisek kɛ̌ ɔ́bhɔŋ chɔŋ bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ abhɛn mfyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ wɔ.”
45009008	Ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔŋ bɛ puyɛ̌ chi bɔ abhɛn bábhé mbɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmɔ́ achak kɛ bachi bɔ̌ Mandɛm. Chi bɔ̌ abhɛn bábhé bɛkoŋo bariɛp ami kɛ Mandɛm ásɔ́rɛ́ bɛ báchí bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham tɛtɛp.
45009009	Bariɛp Mandɛm amɔ ntá Ábraham achí nyaka bɛ, “Nkúbhɛ́ mpok anɛ mmíɛ́ mburɛ, chɔŋ mpɛtnsɛm, nɛ Sará ambé mɔ́mbakanɛm.”
45009010	Mandɛm abhɨkɨ fyɛ bariɛp chi ndiɛrɛ nɛ Ábraham, kɛ nɛ Rɛbɛ́ka nkwɔ mpok yi achi nyaka nɛ mɛniɛ̌ bɛfak ɛbhɛn chi mbi ywɛsɛ Áisek afyɛ́,
45009011	yɛ̌ndu bɔ bábhʉɛt nyaka amɛm mɛniɛ, kɛkʉ yɛ̌ bɛbʉ́ nɛ yɛ̌ bɛrɨ, ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ Mandɛm ǎyàp mmu chi bɛkoŋo nkaysi anɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́. Mandɛm apu yap mmu bɛkoŋo bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi. Ǎyap mmu chi bɛkoŋo nɛbhɨŋɨ anɛ yí ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ yi.
45009012	Mandɛm ághátí Rɛbɛ́ka bɛ, “Chɔŋ mɔ̌mbɨ ántók anɛ mɔ́nkwɛn.”
45009013	Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ Mandɛm arɛm nyaka bɛ, “Nkɔŋ Jekɔ́p, kɛ mpap Isau.”
45009014	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm bɛ yi? Bɛ́ Mandɛm apu chak ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀ kɛ? Wáwák!
45009015	Arɛm nyaka ntá Moses bɛ, “Nchí ghɔ ntínso nɛ mmu anɛ mɛ̌yaŋ bɛghɔ yi ntínso, ntɔŋ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ ntá anɛ mɛ́yaŋ bɛtɔŋ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ.”
45009016	Ɛ́chí yɛ bɛ Mandɛm apu yap mmu chi bɛkoŋo nkaysi bakwǎŋwaŋ, nɛ puyɛ̌ chi bɛkoŋo bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn mmu afyɛ́ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk. Ǎyap mmu chi ndu ághɔ̀ yi ntínso.
45009017	Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ Mandɛm árɛm nyaka ntá Mfɔ Íjip bɛ, “Nkʉ wɔ ɔ́mbák Mfɔ bɛ ntɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ ɛbha wɔ amʉɛt ɛnyu ɛnɛ mmɨk nkɛm ághok chɔŋ ɛ̌ti ya.”
45009018	Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ́ŋ yɛ bɛ, Mandɛm ǎghɔ ntínso nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ yi áyàŋ bɛghɔ yi ntínso, angwɔ́t ntɨ̌ nɛ mu anɛ yi áyàŋ bɛgwɔt ntɨ ɛni.
45009019	Mmǔ ǎkway yɛ bɛbhɛp bɛ, “Tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm áyap mbɔ ɛnyǔ nchí rɛm nɛ, ndaká yí yi ájì yɛ bho? Nɛyap anɛ yi áyàp bho apu tɔŋ bɛ mmu ákʉ̀ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ásɔ̀t bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛkʉ mmu ankʉ?”
45009020	Kɛ wɔ nkwǎ, ɔchí agha bɛkɛm ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ Mandɛm? Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ngoko-bɛte ásɔ́rɛ́ ntɔp ánɨ́ ɛ́kway bɛrɛm ntá ngoko bɛtě ntɔp bɛ, “Ndaká yí ɔ́ghókó mɛ chi ɛnyu ɛnɛ kɛ?”
45009021	Ngoko bɛtě ntɔp ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay ntɔp ndu bɛkʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi akɔŋɔ nɛ ntɔp anɛ yi aghoko? Apú kway mɛnyɔbhɛri ntɔp ansɔt mbɔk anɨ́ ɛte ɛnɛ́ bábhʉ̀ɛrɛ nyáŋá ndǔ bɛpa, ansɔt ntɔp áchák anɨ ɛte ɛnɛ bákʉ mɛnyɨŋ nɛ yɔ manywɔp ankɛm-ɛ?
45009022	Ɛchi ɛnyumɔt nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́. Ǎyàŋ nyaka bɛ bɔ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ yi ǎbè ntɨ mpok bo bákʉ́ bɛbʉ́ nɛ bɛ ábhɔ̀ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́tɛ́msi bǒ bɛbʉ́. Kɛ abhɔŋ bɛyǎ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́ nɛ bo abhɛn yi aghoko.
45009023	Mandɛm ákʉ̀ nyaka nɔ bɛtɔŋ ɛnyǔ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛyǎ kɛnɛ́m nɛ ɛnyǔ áchyɛ bhɛsɛ mbɔk kɛnɛ́m ɛki. Atóŋtí nyaka bhɛsɛ ambɨ ambɨ bɛ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛchwe ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt kɛnókó yi.
45009024	Nɛ sɛ́chí bo abhɛn Mandɛm ábhɨ́ŋɨ́. Abhɨ́ŋɨ́ bho, puyɛ̌ chi ndiɛrɛ bo Israɛl kɛ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nkwɔ.
45009025	Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyu ɛkáti ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Hoseya ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ Mandɛm arɛm nyaka bɛ, “Bo abhɛn bapu nyaka ‘Bǒbha’ chɔŋ mbɨŋɨ bhɔ bɛ bǒbha. Nɛ abhɛn mbɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ nyaka, chɔŋ mbɨŋɨ bhɔ bɛ ‘Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ.’
45009026	Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ngati nyaka bhɔ bɛ, ‘Bě bǎpú bǒbha’, arɛ́ chɔŋ Mɛ Mandɛm mmu nchí nɛpɛ́m ndɛm bɛ, ‘Bǎchi bǒbha.’”
45009027	Aisáya ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm arɛm nyaka ɛ̌ti bo Israɛl bɛ, “Yɛ̌ndu bo Israɛl baya mbɔ ɛ̌siɛ́p ɛnɛ ɛchi angɔkɔ manyu, Mandɛm ǎpɛmɛ chɔŋ chi bǎru bhap.
45009028	Chɔŋ Mandɛm antwɔ́, antáŋ bo fá amɨk, yi kɛ chɔŋti mpok, ndak amay.”
45009029	Nɛ mbɔ ɛnyu Aisáya arɛmɛ nyaka bɛ chɔŋ ɛmfakari, “Mbɔ Mandɛm Acha bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ naŋa rɔ̌ nyaka mbɔk bho amɛm manɛrɛ́kɛt ayɛsɛ mbʉ sɛ́may mankɛm mbɔ bǒ Sódom nɛ abhɛn Gomóra.”
45009030	Chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm bɛ yi ɛ̌ti barak anɛ? Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m chi bɛ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, bábhɨ́kɨ́ fyɛ nyaka bɛtaŋ ndu bɛyaŋ mbi bɛbhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bábhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm bɛfʉɛt ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ Yesu.
45009031	Kɛ bo Israɛl, bo báfyɛ́ nyaka bɛtaŋ ndu bɛbhʉrɛ bɛbhé, bɛ mámbák chak bɛsí Mandɛm, bɛkʉ nɔ ɛyɔ ɛ́bhak chi ndɛ́ndɛm.
45009032	Ɛyɔ ɛ́bhak chi ndɛ́ndɛm ndaká yí? Nti achi nyaka bɛ bɔ bákʉ̀ nyaka bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ndu mɛnu bɛbhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm, ɛkʉ bɔ kɛbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm bɛ yi ankʉ bɔ mambak chak. Ɛchi nyaka mbɔ bɛ bo Israɛl báchɨ́ŋtí nɛkwɛ́n ndǔ ntay ɛnɛn nɛkwáy bɛkʉ mmu ankwɛn.
45009033	Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ Mandɛm arɛm nyaka bɛ, “Ghɔ́ ká, nchí bhʉɛrɛ ntay ɛtɔk Síɔn ɛnɛn nɛ́kʉ̀ chɔŋ bo mánchɨ́ŋtí nɛkwɛ́n. Ntay ɛnɔ chi sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́ ɛsɛn sɛ́kʉ̀ bo mánkwɛn ɛ̌ti yi. Kɛ mmu anɛ ánókó yi, apú bhɔŋ chɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p.”
45010001	Bɔ̌ma, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌yaŋ nɛ ntɨ ɛna nɛnkɛm, nnɨ́k nɔkɔ mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti bo ɛtɔk Israɛl chi bɛ Mandɛm ampɛmɛ bhɔ.
45010002	Nchí kway bɛte bhɔ ntísiɛ bɛ bɔ báfyɛ̀ bɛtaŋ bɛkoŋo Mandɛm, kɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mbɔ̌ŋ mbi anɛ tɛtɛp.
45010003	Bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyu Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bo mámbák chak bɛsí bhi. Mánù chi bɛkʉ wap mbi anɛ bɔ babhak chak bɛsí bhi. Ɛ́kʉ bábhɨ́kɨ́ ka mbi anɛ yi ákʉ̀ bo mambak chak bɛsí bhi.
45010004	Kristo ákʉ bɛ bɛbhé ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ́ nyaka ntá Moses bɛkɛpɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ, bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ánókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Kristo akʉ ntá yi ámbák chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
45010005	Moses asɨŋ nyaka bɛ mmu anɛ áyàŋ bɛbhʉrɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm bɛ ambak chak abhɔŋ bɛbhʉrɛ bɛbhé mɛnkɛm kɛ ambɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m.
45010006	Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti ɛnyǔ mmu anɛ ábhàk chak bɛsí Mandɛm ndǔ yi ásɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ Yesu chi bɛ, “Kɛ́ bhɛ́p mmʉɛt bɛ, ‘Chɔŋ agha ankó amfay?’” [Nɔ chi bɛ mmu abhɔŋ chɔŋ bɛko amfay, ansɔt Kristo, ansɛp fá amɨk nɛ yi.]
45010007	Kɛ́ bhɛ́p yɛ mmʉɛt bɛ, “Chɔŋ agha ansɛp amɨk ndu ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú?” [Nɔ chi bɛ, “Mmu abhɔŋ chɔŋ bɛsɛp andɔk amɨk ndǔ ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú bɛkʉ Kristo ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”]
45010008	Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m chi bɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎkway bɛrɨŋɨ. Chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mǎnáŋ bǎrɛ́mɛ́ nɛ ɛchi amɛm batɨ yɛka. Bǎkway mɛnoko yɔ ndu yɔ́ ɛchí amɛm manyu yɛka nɛ chi nkúbhɛ́ Ɛyɔŋ ɛ́rɛ kɛ sɛ́ghàti bho.
45010009	Mbɔnyunɛ mbák mmu andɛm kpoŋoroŋ bɛ Yesu achi Acha, nɛ anoko amɛm ntɨ ɛni bɛ Mandɛm akʉ nyaka yi áfú ndǔ nɛwú apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, Mandɛm ǎpɛmɛ yi.
45010010	Ɛchi nɔ mbɔnyunɛ, mmu anɛ ánókó Yesu Kristo nɛ ntɨ ɛni, Mandɛm ǎkʉ̀ yi ámbák chak bɛsí bhi. Nɛ mbák ándɛm kpoŋoroŋ bɛ Yesu Kristo achi Acha, Mandɛm ǎpɛmɛ yi.
45010011	Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyu Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Apú rɔ yɛ̌ mmu anɛ ánókó yi ambɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p.”
45010012	Yɛ̌ mmu achi chi mmu Israɛl, yɛ apú mmu Israɛl, ɛwupsi ɛ́pú arɛ́. Nkúbhɛ́ Acha árɛ amɔt kɛ achi Acha bǒ mankɛm. Nɛ yi ǎchyɛ̀ bɛyǎ áfɔ́k ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ǎnɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá yi.
45010013	Ɛ́chí mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ǎnɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm Acha bɛ ankwak yi, Mandɛm ǎpɛmɛ yi.”
45010014	Kɛ ná bo bákway mɛnɨkmʉɛt ntá mmu anɛ bɔ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko? Nɛ ná bákway mɛnoko mmǔ anɛ babhɨkɨre ghók ɛ̌ti yi? Nɛ ná bɔ bákway bɛghok ɛ̌ti mmu wu mbák yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ ghati bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi?
45010015	Nɛ ná bo bákway bɛghati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ mbák bábhɨ́kɨ́ to bhɔ? Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Maŋák ǎya ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn bɛkak ɛbhap bɛ́pɔ̀kɔ bɔ bɛ mándɔk mángati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́!”
45010016	Kɛ puyɛ̌ bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bághókó Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ kɛ báká yɔ́. Ɛ́chí mbɔ ɛnyǔ Aisáya arɛmɛ bɛ, “Acha, agha ánókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́ghátí bhɔ?”
45010017	Ɛchi yɛ bɛ mmu ǎghok kɛ anoko, nɛ mpok bághàti bho ɛ̌ti Kristo, bo bághòk Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́.
45010018	Kɛ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ bɛbhɛp. Bo Israɛl, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ re ghók Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo kɛ? Bǎghok. Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ básɔ́rɛ́ bɛ́ghátí bhɔ mbok, ɛ́kɔ ɛghaka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛbhʉɛt fá amɨk, yɛ̌ chí ndǔ bɛbhak ɛbhɛn bɛ́sábhɛ́ nɛkɔ tontó.”
45010019	Kɛ nchí bhɛp bɛ, bo Israɛl bábhɨ́kɨ́ jwi nyaka mmɛm kɛ? Bájwimɛm mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm árɛ̀m mbɔ ɛnyǔ Moses ásɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ, “Chɔŋ nkʉ mǎmbɔŋ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ɛtɔk. Chɔŋ nkʉ batɨ ámbe be amɛm ɛ̌ti bǒ bɛtɔk bɛchak abhɛn bachi bɛchɨŋtǐ bho.”
45010020	Nɛ Aisáya arɛm nyaka nkwɔ kɛbhɔ́ŋ bɛcháy bɛ, Mandɛm arɛm bɛ, “Bo abhɛn bápú yaŋ nyaka mɛ bághɔ́ mɛ. Ntɔ̌ŋ mmʉɛt ntá bo abhɛn bápú bhɛp mɛ.”
45010021	Kɛ ɛ̌ti bo Israɛl, Mandɛm arɛm bɛ, “Nywɔp nɛnkɛm, nsá amɔ, nnɨ́k nɔkɔ mmʉɛt bɛ mámpɛtnsɛm ntá ya, kɛ bɔ bátɔ̀ŋ chi nɛtaŋántɨ. Bǒbhɛn bákʉ̀ chi ɛyap ɛnyu.”
45011001	Nchí bhɛp yɛ bɛ Mandɛm agʉɛp bo Israɛl ɛbhɨ kɛ? Wáwák! Mɛmbɔ̌ŋ nchí mmu Israɛl nɛ ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Ábraham nɛ mfǔ ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt amɔt anɛ Bɛnjamin achí chi-mbɨ.
45011002	Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ gʉɛp bǒbhi abhɛn yi áyábhɛ́ tɛ ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt ɛbhɨ. Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Ɛláija ndu yi ághàti nyaka Mandɛm mɛnyɨŋ, anji nɔkɔ bo Israɛl? Yi ǎrɛ̀m nyaka bɛ,
45011003	“Acha, bo abhɛn báwáy barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bhɛ nɛ mámokoti bɛbhak ɛbhɛn sɛ́chyɛ̀ wɔ akap. Mɛ awánti kɛ ndɔ́bhɛ́ nɛ báyàŋ bɛway mɛ nkwɔ.”
45011004	Mandɛm akɛ́mɛ́ nyaka yi bɛ yi? Akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mbʉ́rɛ́ bo nka tándrámɔt (7000) abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ nɨkmʉɛt ntá mandɛm nsé anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Bál.”
45011005	Ɛchi ɛnyumɔt ɛchɔŋ. Bǎru bo bachi ndǔ nkwɔ bo Israɛl abhɛn Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi.
45011006	Nɛ mbák ayap bhɔ chi ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi, nɔ chi bɛ, abhɨ́kɨ́ yap bhɔ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ bákʉ́. Mbɔ ayap bhɔ chi ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bákʉ́, mbʉ ɛ́pú bɛ ǎkʉ̀ bɔ bɛrɨ ndɛ́ndɛm.
45011007	Ɛyɔ ɛ́ghàti bhɛsɛ bɛ yi? Chí bɛ́ bo Israɛl bábhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ báyàŋ. Bǎru bho abhɛn Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ kɛ bághɔ́ nyaka yɔ. Mbák chí báchák, bágwɔt nyaka batɨ yap amɛm
45011008	mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mandɛm ákʉ bɔ bákɛ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ, áchyɛ bhɔ amɨ́k anɛ ápú ghɔ mbaŋ, nɛ batú anɛ apu ghok mbaŋ, nɛ nɔ kɛ bɔ bachi kpatɛ ɛchɔŋ.”
45011009	Debhít nkwɔ árɛm nyaka bɛ, “Mɛnyɨŋɨ́nyiɛ bhap mɛ́mbák nta ɛnɛ ɛ́kɛ̀m bɔ, mɛ́mbak ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ mándɨŋɨ nɛkwɛ́n ɛnɛn bákwɛ́nɛ́, bɛ Mandɛm ántɛ́msí bhɔ.
45011010	Ɛrɨ bɛ amɨ́k ágiri bhɔ bɛ bákɛ́ ghɔ mbaŋ, nɛ bɛ́ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́nyɨ́rɛ́ bhɔ amɨk mpoknkɛm.”
45011011	Mpɛt nchí bhɛp yɛ bɛ, mpok bo Israɛl báchɨ́ŋtí nɛkwɛ́n, bákwɛ́n ndak ámáy kɛ? Wáwák! Kɛ ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bhap, bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, bábhɔ̌ŋ mbi anɛ Mandɛm ápɛmɛ bhɔ. Mandɛm akʉ nɔ bɛ bo Israɛl mámbɔ́ŋ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ bo abhɛn bápu bo Israɛl, bɛ́ Mandɛm ampɛmɛ bhɔ bo Israɛl nkwɔ.
45011012	Tɛ̌ndu bɛbʉ́ bo Israɛl bɛ́kʉ́ Mandɛm áyɛ́rɛ́ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, nɛ tɛ̌ndu bo Israɛl bákwɛ́nɛ́ bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ nyaka bɛ mánkʉ, ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ́ Mandɛm ayɛt bo bachak tontó. Chɔŋ Mandɛm apú chyɛ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ áfɔ́k anɛ áyá áchá ntá bo bachak mpok anɛ bo Israɛl mankɛm bápɛtnsɛm ntá yi kɛ?
45011013	Nɛ́nɛ, nchí rɛm ntá yɛka bo bǎpú bo Israɛl, tɛ̌ndu nchí mǔnto ntá yɛka, bɛ́ mpú sɔt bɛtɨk ɛbha mbɔ ndaká ntok,
45011014	ndu nchí yaŋ bɛ bǒ ɛtɔk ɛya mámbɔ́ŋ mpabhamɨ́k, mánjaŋ bɛbhak mbɔ bhe. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kwáy bɛkʉ bɛ mbɔk ɛyap mántɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap bɛ Mandɛm ámpɛ́mɛ́ bhɔ́.
45011015	Tɛ̌ndu nɛgúɛ́p anɛ Mandɛm ágʉ́ɛbhɛ́ bo Israɛl ɛbhɨ ákʉ́ bɛ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl mámbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛbhak ndǔ kɛmʉrɛ nɛ Mandɛm, mpok Mandɛm apɛt asɔrɛ bo Israɛl amʉɛt, chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkwak ná? Chɔŋ ɛ́nkʉ bɛ bawú mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m kɛ?
45011016	Mbák mǎnkʉ́ brɛt, mǎnchyɛ́ anɛ bǎyámbɨ bǎkʉ́ ntá Mandɛm, nɔ brɛt achak nkɛm achi brɛt Mandɛm nkwɔ. Nɛ mbák bakaŋánɔk achi ntá Mandɛm, nɔ batábhɛ́nɔk ɛyɔ nkwɔ achi chi ayi.
45011017	Mbák mámkpɔ́t mbɔk batap ɛnɔk ólif mámfɛrɛ ndǔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ bápɨ́, mánsɔt yɛ batap ɛnɔk ólif ɛnɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ pɨ mambat ambɨ-ɛnɔk ɛnɛ bápɨ́, nɔ nɛnyíɛ́ batap anɛ bábhárɛ́ nɛ́fù chi ndǔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ bápɨ́. Bo Israɛl abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl báchí mbɔ batap ɛnɔk ɛnɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ pɨ.
45011018	Bǎkɛ́ yoŋ yɛ mmʉɛ́t nɛ bo abhɛn bachi mbɔ batábhɛ́nɔk anɛ bákpɔ́t bágʉɛ́bhɛ́ ɛbhɨ. Mbák bǎyòŋ mmʉɛt, bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ puyɛ̌ be kɛ bǎkɛ́mɛ́ bakaŋ ɛnɔk. Bakaŋ ɛ́nɔk kɛ ákɛ́mɛ́ bhe tɛ̌ndu bǎchi chi batábhɛ́ ɛnɔk.
45011019	Bǎkway bɛrɛm bɛ, “Mandɛm afɛ́rɛ́ nyaka mbɔk batábhɛ́nɔk bɛ ambat bhɛsɛ ndu ɛnɔk.”
45011020	Ɛ́chí tɛtɛp. Mandɛm afɛ́rɛ́ nyaka batap ɛnɔk mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo. Mbák chí be bho bǎpu bo Israɛl, bǎchi batábhɛ́nɔk chi ɛ̌ti bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo. Bǎkɛ́ yoŋ yɛ mmʉɛ́t. Cháy ká Mandɛm.
45011021	Bák ká nɔ mbɔnyunɛ tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm áfɛ́rɛ́ nyaka mbɔ̌ŋ batábhɛ́nɔk ɛnɛ bapɨ, chɔŋ amfɛrɛ be bho bábhárɛ́bhat nkwɔ mbák bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ noko.
45011022	Ghɔ yɛka ndǔ Mandɛm are bhɔŋ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ nɛ ndǔ yi achi kɨ́kɨ́rɨ́k nkwɔ nɛ bo. Achí kɨ́kɨ́rɨ́k nɛ bo abhɛn bákwɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ bɛbʉ́. Kɛ ntá yɛka, ǎtɔ̀ŋ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ mbák mǎndɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi áyàŋ. Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ, ǎkpɔt be nkwɔ amfɛrɛ ndǔ ɛnɔk.
45011023	Nɛ mbák bo Israɛl mángúpsí batɨ yap mánoko Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu, Mandɛm ǎsɔ̀t bhɔ ankʉ bɛ mámpɛt mambak batábhɛ́nɔk ɛnɛ bapɨ. Yi abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ nɔ.
45011024	Mbák Mandɛm afɛ́rɛ́ be bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl ndǔ ɛnɔk ólif ɛnɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ pɨ abhat ndǔ ɛnɛ bápɨ́, mbák yi ǎkway bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛyɔ, nɔ ɛchi mandú ɛnyɨŋ ntá yi bɛkɛmɛ bo Israɛl ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ achi nyaka awap, tɛ̌ndu bɔ kɛ bachi mbɔ̌ŋ batap ɛnɔk ólif ɛnɛ bapɨ.
45011025	Bɔ̌ma, mɛ̌yaŋ mǎndɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ kɛka mǎnkaysi bɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛyǎ kɛboŋ. Ɛchi bɛ bo Israɛl abhɛn bágwɔ́rɛ́ nyaka batɨ yap bápú gwɔt chɔŋ yɔ mpoknkɛm. Ɛ́bhak chɔŋ chi kpatɛ bɛghaka mpok anɛ mpǎy bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, abhɛn Mandɛm áyábhɛ́, mánoko.
45011026	Ɛ́náŋ ɛ́mfákárí ɛnyu ɛyɔ, Mandɛm ǎpɛmɛ bo Israɛl mankɛm. Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Chɔŋ mmu amfú ɛtɔk Síɔn anɛ ǎfɛrɛ bo Mandɛm ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri. Chɔŋ yi amfɛrɛ ɛpɨŋ bɛ́byak Mandɛm amʉɛt bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Jekɔ́p.”
45011027	“Mpok mfɛ́rɛ́ bɛbʉ́ bhap, chɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛmbak mbɔ ɛnyǔ nyú nyaka nku nɛ bhɔ.”
45011028	Bo Israɛl bachi bǒmpap Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo. Ɛ́fakari nɔ ɛ̌ti yɛka bo bǎpú bo Israɛl bɛ mbi ámbák Mandɛm ámpɛ́mɛ́ bhe. Kɛ bo Israɛl báchí mamʉɛrɛ Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ yi anáŋ ayap nyaka bhɔ ɛ̌ti bachǐmbɨ bhap.
45011029	Ɛ́chí nɔ mbɔnyunɛ mbák Mandɛm ayap mmu nɛ ayɛt yi, apú pɛrɛ wupsi ntɨ ɛni nɛ mmu wu.
45011030	Ndǔ mpok anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, be bho bǎpú bo Israɛl bǎtàŋ nyaka ntí nɛ Mandɛm, kɛ nɛ́nɛ, Mandɛm ághɔ̀ bhe ntínso ɛ̌ti nɛtaŋántɨ bo Israɛl.
45011031	Ɛnyumɔt kɛ ɛchi bɛ nɛ́nɛ, bo Israɛl bátàŋ ntí nɛ Mandɛm bɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ághɔ̀ bhe ntínso, ángɔ́ bɔ́ nkwɔ ntínso.
45011032	Mandɛm arɔ́ bo mankɛm mǎnchwe ndǔ kɛnɔŋ ɛ̌ti nɛtaŋántɨ ɛnap bɛ yi angɔ bhɔ mankɛm ntínso.
45011033	Ghɔ́ ká, Mandɛm achɨk achá! Nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛni nɛyǎ nɛ́chá, nɛ arɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. Yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛrɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ nkaysi ayi áchí Yɛ̌ mmu apu rɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ yi ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ.
45011034	“Agha árɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Acha ákàysi? Agha ánáŋ áchí nchyɛ maníɛ́ ntá yi?”
45011035	“Agha ánáŋ áchyɛ́ Mandɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yi áyàŋ Mandɛm ankɛmɛ yi yɔ?”
45011036	Yi kɛ aghoko mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm nɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm bɛchi chi ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm bɛchi chi ndǔ bɛchyɛ yi kɛnókó. Sɛ́nchíɛ yi kɛnókó mpoknkɛm. Amen.
45012001	Bɔ̌ma, ndu ɛchí mbɔ ɛnyǔ nchí rɛm nɔkɔ, nɛ ɛ̌ti ntínso Mandɛm nɛ bhɛsɛ, nchí kwɛn be bɛkak bɛrɛm bɛ mǎnchyɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛka ɛnkɛm ntá yi mbɔ akap anɛ achi nɛpɛ́m, nɛ nyáŋá, nɛ anɛ yi akɔŋɔ. Ɛyɔ kɛ ɛchi ɛsayri mbi bɛchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó.
45012002	Bǎkɛ́ koŋo ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛnɛ́ bǒ mmɨk. Dɔ́ ká Mandɛm ángúpsí nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka. Ǎkʉ̀ nɔ ndu áchyɛ̀ bhe nkaysi nkɔ. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ mǎndɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ. Yɔ́ ɛ́rɨ, yɔ́ kɛ ɛ́chyɛ̀ yi maŋák, nɛ yɔ́ kɛ ɛ́rɨ́ ɛ́chá ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi.
45012003	Ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn Mandɛm átɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ, nchí rɛm ntá yɛka mankɛm bɛ yɛ̌ mmu akɛ sɔt mmʉɛt yi mbɔ bɛ achá ɛnyǔ mmu yi achi. Kɛ ámbɔ́ŋ chi nkaysi anɛ achi chak ɛ̌ti ɛnyu ɛnɛ yi achi, bɛ́kóŋó ɛnǐ nɛka ɛnɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ yi.
45012004	Ɛchi nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ mmʉɛt nkwǎ anɛ achi amɔt, yɛ̌ nɔ, abhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ bɛpókómʉɛt nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛpókómʉɛt ɛbhɔŋ ɛbhi bɛtɨk.
45012005	Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛchi nɛ bhɛsɛ. Yɛ̌ndu sɛ́yá, sɛ́chí mbɔ mmʉɛt amɔt mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́chɛm mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achi nɛ batɨ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛpókómʉɛt ɛchi nɛ bɛchak.
45012006	Mandɛm achyɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu yɛsɛ ayi akap bɛkoŋo bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi nɛ bhɛsɛ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ánkʉ yɛ ɛbhi bɛtɨk nɛ aywi akap. Mbák Mandɛm achyɛ́ mmu akap bɛrɛm kɛpɨ̌ntɨ mmu wu abhɔŋ bɛkʉ nɔ bɛkoŋo ɛnyu ɛnɛ yi anoko Mandɛm.
45012007	Mbák Mandɛm achyɛ́ mmu akap bɛkwak bho, ánkwák bho. Mbák chí akap bɛtɔŋ bho, ántɔ́ŋ bho.
45012008	Mbák mmu abhɔŋ chi akap bɛfyɛ bo ntɨ, ɛrɨ yi ankʉ nɔ. Mbák mmu ábhɔ́ŋ akap bɛchyɛ bo mɛnyɨŋ, ánkʉ nɔ nɛ awɔ́ fúú. Nɛ mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ akap bɛbhak mǔnti, ánkɛ́m bo abhɛn bachi antɛn yi sayri. Nɛ mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ akap bɛtɔŋ bo bɛrɨ̌ntɨ, ánkʉ́ nɔ nɛ maŋák.
45012009	Kɔ́ŋ ka batɨ nɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ tɛtɛp. Pap ka barak abʉ́abʉ. Kɛ́m ká sayri yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ.
45012010	Kɔŋ ka batɨ mbɔ bǒ nnɛrɛkɛt Mandɛm. Bɔ́ŋ ká bɛyǎ ɛkwak ndu bɛchyɛ batɨ kɛnókó.
45012011	Fíɛ́ ká bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ bɛtɨk, bǎkɛ́ bhak babhɔt. Kʉ ka bɛtɨk Yesu Acha nɛ batɨ ayɛka ankɛm.
45012012	Bɔ́ŋ ká maŋák ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbháká ntɨ arɛ́ bɛ Mandɛm ankʉ ntá yɛka. Bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́ ndǔ mpok ɛsɔŋɔri. Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt mpoknkɛm.
45012013	Kwak nɔ́kɔ́ ká bo Mandɛm abhɛn ɛyap ɛ́pú, mǎnsyɛpti nɔkɔ mankɔ amɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhɛka sayri.
45012014	Mbák bo báchyɛ̀ wɔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ̌ti ɔchí nkoŋo Yesu, nɨkmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm anjɛt bhɔ. Kɛ́ rɛm bɛ ɛyak ɛmbak nɛ bhɔ. Nɨk chí mmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm anjɛt bhɔ.
45012015	Ŋák ka nɛ bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ maŋák. Dí ká nɛ abhɛ́n bachi ndǔ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ.
45012016	Bák ká ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt nɛ batɨ. Bǎkɛ́ yoŋ mmʉɛt, fyɛ́ ka mmʉɛt nɛ yɛ̌ chí bo abhɛn bápú yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Bǎkɛ́ kaysi bɛ bǎrɨŋɨ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
45012017	Bǎkɛ́ kɛmɛ bɛbʉ́ amfay bɛbʉ́. Káysí nɔ́kɔ́ ká bɛkʉ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛrɨ bɛsí bo mankɛm.
45012018	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákway bɛkʉ bɛ ambak kpák nɛ bo mankɛm mpoknkɛm.
45012019	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka ákɛ́ kɛmɛ kɛ́mbé. Dɔ̌ ká Mandɛm antɛmsi mmu anɛ ákʉ́ ntɨ bɛbʉ́ mbɔnyunɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ Mandɛm arɛm bɛ, “Mɛ kɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kɛ́mɛ kɛ́mbé. Mɛ kɛ nchí kap mmu ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́.”
45012020	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ chi bɛkoŋo ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mbák nsay ǎnù mǔmpap aywɛ, chyɛ yi nɛnyíɛ́. Mbák manyiɛp ǎkwàk yi, chyɛ yi manyiɛp ányú. Mbák bǎkʉ̀ nɔ, ɛ́bhak mbɔ bɛ bǎtò kɛfɨkɨsǐ ngó anti mǔmpap aywɛ, nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ mǔmpap ámbɔ́ŋ ntíánwɔ́p.”
45012021	Bǎkɛ́ rɔ barak abʉ́abʉ ambɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfǎy yɛka. Kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ ká chi bɛrɨ bɛ, mǎmbɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfǎy barak abʉ́abʉ.
45013001	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu yɛka abhɔŋ bɛghok bǒbati mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm kɛ áyàp mmu anɛ ákɛ̀m ɛtɔk nɛ yi kɛ afyɛ́ abhɛn bachi nɛ́nɛ.
45013002	Ndǔ ɛ́chí nɔ, mmǔ anɛ átàŋti nɛ bǒbati ǎtàŋti nɛ bo abhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bɛ mankɛm ɛtɔk. Bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ nɔ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ chi ntɛmsi amʉɛt.
45013003	Mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛrɨ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛcháy bǒbati. Bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ bábhɔŋ bɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy. Mbák ɔ̌yàŋ bɛ ɔ́kɛ́ bhɔŋ bɛcháy nɛ bǒbati, bák mmǔ anɛ ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak. Mbák ɔ̌kʉ̀ nɔ, bǒbati bábhɔ̀ŋ maŋák nɛ wɔ.
45013004	Mǔnti ɛtɔk ǎkʉ̀ chi bɛtɨk Mandɛm ndu bɛkwak bhe. Kɛ mbák ɔ̌kʉ̀ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ, ɔbhɔŋ bɛ́chay yi mbɔnyunɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́pú ndɛ́ndɛm. Mandɛm achyɛ́ yi bɛtaŋ chi bɛ antɛmsi nɔkɔ bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ.
45013005	Mmu abhɔŋ yɛ bɛsɛpti mmʉɛt ntá bǒbati. Nɛ mmu ákɛ́ kʉ nɔ chi ndu áchày bɛ Mandɛm akɛ kʉ bo mántɛmsi yi. Ntí achak achi bɛ ntɨ̌ mmu nɛ́ghàti yi bɛ ɛrɨ bɛkʉ nɔ.
45013006	Chi ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ bǎchyɛ̀ nkwɔ nkábhɛ́nti. Bǒbati bákʉ̀ chi bɛtɨk Mandɛm ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ.
45013007	Chiɛ́ yɛ́ ka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mǔnti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛchyɛ yi. Mbák chi nkábhɛ́nti kɛ mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛchyɛ, ánchyɛ́. Mbák chí nkáp anɛ mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛchyɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́, ánkʉ̌ nɔ. Mbák mmu abhɔŋ bɛsɛpti mmʉɛt ntá achak, ánsɛ́ptí mmʉɛt ntá yi. Nɛ mbák mmu abhɔŋ bɛchyɛ kɛnókó ntá achak, ánchyɛ́ yi kɛnókó.
45013008	Bǎkɛ́ kɛm mmu barɛm kɛ kwɔ. Barɛ̌m amɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ bɛkɛm bo chi amɛn bɛkɔŋ bɔ. Mmu anɛ ákɔ́ŋ bo ǎbhʉrɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm mɛnkɛm.
45013009	Bɛbhé Mandɛm bɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ kwɛn bɛrwɔp” nɛ, “Ɔkɛ́ way mmu” nɛ, “Ɔkɛ́ ghɛp aghɛp” nɛ, “Ɔkɛ́ fyɛ amɨ́k ndǔ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmu achak.” Ɛbhé ɛ́mɔt ɛ́pɔ́kɔ́ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm nɛ bɛchak nkwɔ. Nɛ ɛbhé ɛyɔ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Kɔŋ ntɨ nkwǎ mbɔ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ.”
45013010	Mmǔ anɛ ákɔ̀ŋ bo apú kʉ bhɔ bɛbʉ́. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ bɛkɔŋ bo chi bɛbhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé mɛnkɛm.
45013011	Ndu bɛrɔŋ ambɨ, bǎrɨŋɨ mpok anɛ sɛchi arɛ́ nɛ́nɛ. Mpok mɛ́ŋɛ́mɛ ndǔ kɛnɔ́ akway mbɔnyunɛ mpok anɛ Mandɛm ánaŋa bɛpɛmɛ bhɛsɛ achí kɛkwɔt nɛ́nɛ achá mpok anɛ sɛ́bho nyaka mɛnoko Yesu Kristo.
45013012	Bɛti mɛ́naŋ bɛ́fʉɛ̀t, nɛ nywɔp nɛbho bɛyi. Sɛ́ndɔ́ yɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bákʉ̀ amɛm ɛjuri, sɛ́nsɔt mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛnu ɛbhɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛnu nɛ bhɔ nɛ nywɔp ámfay mbɔ bo abhɛn mánaŋ báfú ndǔ ɛjuri.
45013013	Sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ ɛrɨ́tí ɛkakánɛkɔ mbɔ bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ nɛ nywɔp ámfay. Sɛ́kɛ́ chwe ndǔ bɛpǎ ɛbhɛn bo mányù mmɛ́m mánkwɛn, nɛ mámbo barak ɛ́púsí. Nɛ sɛ́kɛ́ fyɛ mmʉɛt ndǔ baraká kɛbhʉrɛ nɛ barak ɛ́pusi achak. Sɛ́kɛ́ chwe ndǔ bɛ́táŋá, nɛ mpabhamɨ́k.
45013014	Kɛ dɔ̌ ká Yesu Kristo Acha ámbɔŋ bɛtaŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bo báyɨŋɨ bhe mándɨŋɨ ɛnyu mmu yi achi mbɔnyu bayɨŋɨ mmu mandɨŋɨ ndɛn anɛ yi afyɛ́ amʉɛt. Nɛ bǎkɛ́ chyɛ mbi ntá bɛpɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛpɛ́m nkwǎŋwaŋ nɛ́ŋwàka bɛ bo mǎnkʉ.
45014001	Sɔt ka bǒnkwɔ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́re sɛnɛ ndǔ baraká Mandɛm amʉɛt. Kɛ bǎkɛ́ kɛ́m ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ bhɔ ɛ̌ti ayap nkaysi.
45014002	Sɛ́nsɔt ndaká nɛnyiɛ mɛnyiɛ. Mmǔ amɔt ǎkway mɛnoko bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́rɨ mɛnyiɛ. Achák anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ sɛnɛ ndǔ baraká Mandɛm andɛm bɛ yí ǎnyiɛ chi nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn bákwáŋá.
45014003	Mmu anɛ ányìɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ákɛ́ byak anɛ apu nyiɛ mbɔk mɛnyɨŋ. Nɛ mmǔ anɛ apu nyiɛ mbɔk mɛnyɨŋ ákɛ́ ji anɛ ányìɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm aka yi.
45014004	Ɔchí agha bɛji mmɔ̌bɛtok mǔchak? Mmu anɛ akway bɛrɛm bɛ mmɔ̌bɛtok akʉ sayri, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ɛbʉ́bʉ, chí chi-bɛtɨk aywi. Mmɔ̌ bɛtok apú kwɛn mbɔnyunɛ Acha abhɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ yi ánté sɛnɛ́.
45014005	Mbɔk bo básɔ̀t mbɔk manywɔp bɛ acha achak. Bachak básɔ̀t manywɔp ankɛm bɛ achi ɛnyumɔ́t. Ɛrɨ mbɔ̌ŋ mmu angɔ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákàysi amɛm ntɨ ɛni ɛchi chak.
45014006	Bo abhɛn básɔ̀t mbɔk manywɔp bɛ acha achak bákʉ̀ nɔ chi bɛchyɛ Acha kɛnókó. Mmǔ anɛ ányìɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ákʉ̀ nɔ chi bɛchyɛ Acha kɛnókó, tɛ̌ndu áchyɛ̀ Mandɛm bakak kɛ anyiɛ yɔ. Nɛ mmu anɛ apu nyiɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ǎkʉ̀ nɔ chi ndu áyàŋ bɛchyɛ Acha kɛnókó nkwɔ nɛ ǎchyɛ̀ bakak ntá Mandɛm.
45014007	Yɛ̌ mmu apú nɛpɛ́m bɛ achi ndǔ mmʉɛt yi. Nɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú gu bɛ achi ndǔ mmʉɛt yi.
45014008	Mbák sɛ́chí nɛpɛ́m, chi bɛ sɛ́nchíɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Nɛ mbák sɛ́gù, sɛ́gù chi bɛ sɛ́nchíɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Ndǔ ɛchi nɔ, yɛ sɛ́chí chí nɛpɛ́m, yɛ sɛ́gù gu, sɛ́chí chí awɔ Mandɛm.
45014009	Ɛ̌tiyɔ kɛ̌ Kristo ágú, ápɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m bɛ ambak Acha ntá bo abhɛn báchí nɛpɛ́m nɛ abhɛn bágú.
45014010	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, ndaká yí ɔ́jì ntɨ mǔnkwɔ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀? Yɛ̌ chí wɔ nkwɔ, ndaká yí ɔ́byàk ntɨ mǔnkwɔ ndǔ yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́kʉ̀? Chɔŋ bɛsɛ mankɛm sɛ́nte ndǔ manyé bɛsí Mandɛm.
45014011	Ɛ́chí mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Acha árɛm bɛ, ‘Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛchi tɛtɛp bɛ nchí nɛpɛ́m, ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛchi tɛtɛp bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛtɛp mánɛ́n bɛsí bha. Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛrɛm nɛ nnyu ywi bɛ, Mɛ Nchí Mandɛm.’”
45014012	Ɛchi yɛ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛte bɛsí Mandɛm andɛm yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́.
45014013	Sɛ́kɛ́ pɛrɛ ji yɛ batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ, kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛrɨ chi bɛ bǎkɛ kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛkway bɛkʉ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ ankwɛn ndǔ bɛbʉ́.
45014014	Ndǔ bǎchɛ́mɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Acha, mɛmbɔŋ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ sayri bɛ yɛ̌ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ́pú ɛnɛn nɛpu pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm. Kɛ mbák mmu ánkáysí bɛ mbɔk nɛnyíɛ́ nɛpu pɛ́pɛ́p, nɔ nɛ́pú bhak pɛ́pɛ́p ntá yi.
45014015	Mbák ɛnyǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ wɔ ɔ́nyìɛ ɛ́chyɛ̀ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ ɛsɔŋɔri, nɔ ɔpú pɛrɛ kʉ mɛnyɨŋ nɛ ɛkɔŋ. Ɔ́kɛ́ rɔ ɛnyǔ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn ɔ́nyìɛ nɛ́ntwɔ́ nɛ mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́ ntá ntɨ mǔnkwɔ mbɔnyunɛ Kristo agu nyaka ɛ̌ti yi nkwɔ.
45014016	Ɔ́kɛ́ rɔ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́káysí bɛ ɛrɨ ɛ́ndɔ́p chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bo básɔ̀t bɛrɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti yɛ.
45014017	Nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ntá bo abhɛn Mandɛm achi Mfɔ wap puyɛ̌ chi nɛnyíɛ́ mɛnyiɛ nɛ mmɛm mɛnyu. Nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ chi bɛbhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm, nɛ bɛbhak kpák nɛ batɨ, nɛ bɛbhɔŋ maŋák amɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ̀.
45014018	Mbák mmu ǎkʉ̀ bɛtɨkɨ́ Kristo ɛnyǔ ɛyɔ, Mandɛm ǎbhɔ̀ŋ maŋák nɛ yi, nɛ bo bárɛ̀m bɛ yi ǎkʉ̀ sayri.
45014019	Ɛ́rɨ yɛ bɛ sɛ́mfyɛ́ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ sɛ́mbák kpák nɛ batɨ, nɛ bɛ sɛ́mfyɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kwàk batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ mango ndu nɛka ɛnɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ Mandɛm.
45014020	Ɔ́kɛ́ chɔŋti bɛtɨk Mandɛm ɛ̌ti nɛnyíɛ́. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛnyíɛ́ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bo bákway mɛnyiɛ. Kɛ ɛpu chak mbák ɔ́nyìɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ batɨ bǒnkwɔ mǎnkwɛn ndǔ bɛbʉ́.
45014021	Ɛchí chak bɛ ɔ́kɛ́ nyiɛ nnya, nɛ bɛ ɔ́ndɔ́ mɛnyu mmɛ́m, nɛ bɛ ɔ́ndɔ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛkway bɛkʉ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ ánkwɛ́n ndǔ bɛbʉ́.
45014022	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́káysí ɛ̌ti barak anɛ, dɔ̌ yɔ ɛ́njɨ́ŋɨ́ chí wɔ nɛ Mandɛm. Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá mmu anɛ árɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ̀ ɛchi chak, nɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛpu sɔŋɔri yi amɛm ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ.
45014023	Mbák mmu ǎmàkati nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn yi áyàŋ mɛnyiɛ, yɛ̌ nɔ, andɔk ambɨ anyíɛ́ nɔ́, nɔ abhɔ̌ŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ ntí bɛ ǎnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ noko bɛ ɛchi chak bɛ yi ányíɛ́. Mbák mmu ǎkʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi anoko bɛ ɛpu chak, nɔ ákʉ́ bɛbʉ́.
45015001	Bɛsɛ bho sɛ́sɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛsɛ, sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛkwak nɔkɔ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́re sɛnɛ ndǔ nɛka ɛnap nɛ Mandɛm. Sɛ́kɛ́ kʉ nɔkɔ chi ndiɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ maŋák.
45015002	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛsɛ abhɔŋ bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ bǒnkwɔ mámbɔ́ŋ maŋák ndǔ bɛkwak bhɔ bɛ mángó ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛn bábhɔŋɔ nɛ Mandɛm.
45015003	Kristo abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ nyaka chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ yímbɔŋ maŋák. Kɛ ɛ́fákári nɛ yi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Nsɔk ɛnɛ bo abhɛn básɔ̀kɔti nyaka wɔ ɛ́kwɛn mɛ amʉɛt.”
45015004	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm básɨŋ yɔ chí ndǔ bɛtɔŋ bɛsɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm bɛ sɛ́mbɔŋ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́ nɛ bɛ mɛ́mfyɛ́ bhɛsɛ ntɨ. Ɛyɔ ɛnkʉ yɛ sɛ́mbaka ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ bariɛp Mandɛm amfú tɛtɛp.
45015005	Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm mmu áchyɛ̀ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́ nɛ afyɛ́ bho ntɨ, ánkwák be mǎmbak ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt nɛ batɨ bɛkoŋo ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Yesu Kristo árɔ́,
45015006	bɛ́ bě mankɛm mǎnchyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ kɛnókó nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt ntá Mandɛm mmu áchí chi Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ.
45015007	Sɔt nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ́ ka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Kristo ásɔ́rɛ́ bhe. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ bo mánchyɛ́ Mandɛm kɛnókó.
45015008	Nchí ghati bhe bɛ Kristo ákʉ́ nyaka mmʉɛt ɛyi mǔbɛtok ntá bo Israɛl ndu bɛtɔŋ bhɔ bɛ Mandɛm ǎbhʉrɛ bariɛp ami amɛn yi afyɛ́ nyaka nɛ bachǐmbɨ bhap.
45015009	Akʉ mmʉɛt yi mmɔ̌bɛtok bɛ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl mánchyɛ nɔkɔ Mandɛm kɛnókó mbɔnyunɛ yi ághɔ́ bhɔ ntínso. Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyu Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Ndu ɛ́chí nɔ, chɔŋ ndɛm yɛ nɛ́ntɨ́ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bɛ, wɔ ɔchí Mandɛm. Chɔŋ nkway nɔkɔ bakwáy ndu bɛ́bɨ́ti wɔ.”
45015010	Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛpɛt ɛ́rɛ̀m ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt achak bɛ, “Bě bho bǎpú bo Israɛl, ŋák ka nɛ bo Mandɛm”,
45015011	nɛ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt achak amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm yɔ́ ɛ́pɛ́t ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Bě mankɛm abhɛ́n bápú bo Israɛl, bɨ̌tí nɔ́kɔ́ ka Acha. Bo mankɛm, bɨ̌tí nɔ́kɔ́ ká yi.”
45015012	Nɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛpɛt ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ Aisáya arɛm nyaka bɛ, “Chɔŋ ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Jése antwɔ́. Ǎtwɔ̀ bɛbhak Mfɔ ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, nɛ chɔŋ mámbaka ntɨ bɛ yi ampɛmɛ bhɔ.”
45015013	Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm mmu ákʉ̀ bɛ bo mámbáká ntɨ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ, ánkʉ́ bɛ batɨ yɛka ánjwí nɛ maŋák nɛ kpák ndǔ mǎnókó yi. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ, bǎkway bɛrɔŋ ambɨ bɛbhaka ntɨ nɛ yi ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ tontó tonto.
45015014	Bɔ̌ma, mɛmbɔ̌ŋ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ bɛrɨ ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ̀ bɛyǎ nɛ bɛ bǎrɨ̀ŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm sayri ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bǎkway bɛtɔŋ batɨ bǒnkwɔ.
45015015	Kɛ, amɛm ɛkáti ɛnɛ, nsɨ̌ŋ ntá yɛka nkɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy ɛ̌ti mbɔk mɛnyɨŋ mbɔnyunɛ nchí yaŋ bɛ́tɨ́k be bhɔ. Nsɨ̌ŋ ɛnyu ɛyɔ ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm ntá ya.
45015016	Akʉ mɛ̌mbák mmǔ bɛtok Yesu Kristo ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl mbɔ nchiakap anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm. Nchí ghati bhɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm bɛ́ mánókó yi, nɛ bɛ mámbák mbɔ akap anɛ yi áká bɛ́sɔt nɛ anɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ábhʉ́rɛ́ nyáŋá ntá yi.
45015017	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, nɛ ndǔ mbát mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo nchí kwáy bɛdɛp awɔ́ antɨ ɛ̌ti bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀ ntá Mandɛm.
45015018	Ndiɛrɛ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Kristo áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ntá ya ákʉ́ kɛ nchí rɛm ndǔ bɛyǎ mɛnyu ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bɛ mángúpsí bɛpɨŋ ɛbhap, mankʉ nɔkɔ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm áyàŋ.
45015019	Akʉ nɔ ndu áchyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ bɛtɔŋ bɛrɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm nɛ ndu bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ bɛ nnáŋ nnáŋá bɛghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo, bɛbho Yerúsalɛm kpátɛ Iliríkɔm.
45015020	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chí ɛnɛ nnáŋ nchí yaŋ nɔkɔ bɛkʉ, nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ chi bɛghati bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo mbǎŋ ɛnkɛm ɛnɛ́ bo bábhɨ́kɨ́re ghok yɔ. Kɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk ndǔ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́kɛt ɛnɛn mmu achak.
45015021	Ɛ́chí yɛ mbɔ ɛnyu Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Chɔŋ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́re ghati bhɔ ɛ̌ti yi mángɔ yi, nɛ chɔŋ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́re ghok ɛ̌ti yi, mánjwimɛm.”
45015022	Bɛyǎ ndɔŋ ɛnɛ́ ntɨ bɛ́twɔ bɛghɔ bhe mbɨ́kɨ́ kway bɛkʉ nɔ.
45015023	Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, ɛnɛ́ nnáŋ nnáŋá bɛtɨk ndǔ mbaŋ ɛnɛ ɛnkɛm, mbɔ̌ŋ ntɨ bɛghɔ bhe mbɔ ɛnyǔ nnáŋ nchí yáŋ bɛkʉ ndǔ bɛyǎ mamiɛ́ anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm.
45015024	Nɛ́nɛ, mbákántɨ bɛ chɔŋ ńdɔk Spen. Mpok nchí rɔŋ chɔŋ mbɔ̌ŋ maŋák bɛghat bɛ mbak nɛ bhe ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ mpok kɛ ndɔk nɔkɔ ambɨ. Nɛ mpok bɛrɔ be akway nɔkɔ, nkaysi bɛ chɔŋ mǎnkwak mɛ nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ndǔ nɛkɔ ɛna.
45015025	Kɛ nchí rɔŋ kpɨk Yerúsalɛm bɛ nchyɛ́ nɛkɛp ɛnɛ́n batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ bátó ntá bo Mandɛm abhɛn bachi arɛ.
45015026	Bǒnkwɔ abhɛn atú Masidónia nɛ abhɛn atú Akáiya bábhɔŋ maŋák bɛchyɛ mbɔk nkáp awap ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho ndǔ nkwɔ bo Mandɛm abhɛn Yerúsalɛm.
45015027	Bɔ́ babhɔŋ kɛ bághɔ́ bɛ ɛrɨ bɛkʉ nɔ, nɛ sayri sayri, bábhɔŋ bɛkʉ nɔ tɛ̌ndu ɛchi bɛ, ɛ̌ti bo Israɛl bo báchí bo Mandɛm kɛ bǒ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bághókó Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu. Nɛ báchí nkwɔ bo Mandɛm nɛ́nɛ, nɛ Mandɛm ǎyɛ̀t bhɔ nɛ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ. Bábhɔŋ yɛ bɛkwak bo Israɛl abhɛn bachi bachɛ́bhɛ́bho nɛ mbɔk mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́.
45015028	Nnáŋ ngáká yɛ arɛ́ nchyɛ́ bhɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎto ntá yap, chɔŋ ndɔk Spen. Kɛ chɔŋ njambɨ ntee awu ngɔ bhe.
45015029	Nɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ mpok ntwɔ́ awu, chɔŋ Kristo anjɛt bhɛsɛ tontó.
45015030	Bɔ̌ma, ɛ̌ti sɛ́chi bo Yesu Kristo Acha nɛ ndǔ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ákʉ́ sɛ́nkɔŋ batɨ, nchí nɨk be mmʉɛt bɛ mǎnu mɛnɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm ɛ̌ti ya nɛ ntɨ nɛnkɛm mbɔ ɛnyǔ mɛmbɔŋ nchí kʉ.
45015031	Nɨk ka mmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ankʉ bǒ Judeya abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko yi bákɛ́ kʉ mɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛbʉ́bʉ. Nɨk ka mmʉɛt bɛ bǒ Mandɛm abhɛn Yerúsalɛm mánsɔ́t nɛkɛp ɛnɛ́n mɛ́rɔ̀ŋ ntá yap nɛ nɔ nɛ maŋák.
45015032	Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ́ bɛ mɛ nkwáy bɛ́twɔ bɛghɔ bhe nɛ maŋák mbák Mandɛm aká, nɛ bɛ́ nkwáy bɛbhɔŋ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt nɛntɨ ɛnɛka.
45015033	Mandɛm mmu áchyɛ̀ bho kpák ambak nɛ bhe mankɛm. Amen.
45016001	Nchí yaŋ mǎndɨŋɨ mɔ́mayɛsɛ Foibe mmu ákù bɛtɨk ntá Nkwɔ Kristo anɛ ɛtɔk Kɛnkreya.
45016002	Ánáŋ ántwɔ́ awu, syɛptí ká yi mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǒ Mandɛm bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛsyɛpti ntɨ mǔnkwɔ, nɛ mǎnkwak bɛchyɛ yi yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́chɛ́bhɛ́ yi. Yímbɔŋ anáŋ akwak bɛyǎ bho, nɛ yɛ̌ chi mɛmbɔ̌ŋ nkwɔ.
45016003	Kaká ká Príska nɛ nnɛ́m ayi Akwíla. Bákʉ̀ nyaka bɛtɨk Yesu Kristo nɛ mɛ.
45016004	Báchí bo abhɛn bákway nyaka bɛka yɛ̌ chí nɛwú ndu bɛpɛmɛ mɛ nkɛ́ gu. Puyɛ̌ chi ndiɛrɛ mɛ kɛ nchí kaka bhɔ. Bakwɔ́ bho abhɛn bapu bo Israɛl bákaka bhɔ nkwɔ.
45016005	Kaká ká bǒnkwɔ abhɛn báchɛmɛ nɔkɔ ɛkɛt ɛyap, nɛ mǎnkaka mʉɛrɛkɔŋ awa Ɛpainɛ́tɔs. Yí achi nyaka mmǔ mbɨ bɛbhak nkoŋo Kristo atú Esia.
45016006	Kaká ká María mmu ákʉ́ bɛyǎ bɛtɨk ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka.
45016007	Kaká ká nkwɔ batɨ̌ bo Israɛl bha, Androníkɔs nɛ Júnias bo báchí nyaka ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ nɛ mɛ. Báchí manɛ́m bo ndǔ nkwɔ bǒnto Yesu Kristo nɛ báyámbɨ bɛbhak bakoŋo Kristo kɛ mɛ̌twɔ ansɛm.
45016008	Kaká ká Ampliátɔs. Achí mmʉɛrɛkɔŋ awa nɛ abhat mmʉɛt nɛ Acha mbɔ mɛ.
45016009	Kaká ká Ubánɔs mmu ákʉ́ bɛtɨk Kristo nɛ mɛ. Kaká ká nkwɔ mmʉɛrɛkɔŋ awa Stákis.
45016010	Kaká ká Apɛ́lis mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ̌ti Kristo nɛ atɔ́ŋ bɛ achi mmu ywi tɛtɛp. Kaká ka bo ɛfo ɛnɛ Aristobulɔs mankɛm.
45016011	Kaká ká Hɛródion ntɨ mmu Israɛl wa. Kaká ká nkwɔ bo ɛfo Nasísɔs abhɛn bábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Acha.
45016012	Kaká ká nkwɔ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk Yesu Acha abhɛn baghɔrɛ́, Trifína nɛ Trifósa. Kaká ká mmʉɛrɛkɔŋ awa Pɛ́sis mmu ákʉ́ bɛyǎ bɛtɨk ntá Acha.
45016013	Kaká ká Rúfɔs mmu achi nnɛ́m mmú ndǔ nkwɔ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abhɛn Acha. Kaká ká máyi nkwɔ mmu ásɔ́rɛ́ mɛ mbɔ mɔ́ywi.
45016014	Kaká ká Asínkritɔs nɛ Flɛ́gɔn nɛ Hɛ́mis nɛ Patróbas nɛ Hɛ́mas nɛ batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ bachak abhɛn bachi nɛ bhɔ.
45016015	Kaká ká Filólogɔs nɛ Júlia nɛ Nériɔs nɛ mɔmáyi anɛ ngɔrɛ́, nɛ Olímpas nɛ bo Mandɛm abhɛn bachi nɛ bhɔ.
45016016	Kaká ká batɨ sayri nɛ ɛkɔŋ Mandɛm. Bakwɔ́ bho Kristo mankɛm bátò bhe bakak.
45016017	Bɔ̌ma, nchí nɨk be mmʉɛt bɛ mǎnsɔt mpok nɛ bo abhɛn bátwɔ̀ nɛ ákɔ́rɛ́ nɛntɨ ɛnɛka nɛ bákʉ̀ bo mántɨ́knsɛm ntá Mandɛm ndǔ bátɔ̀ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi kɛkúrí nɛ ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ́kɔ́. Bák ká nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ nɛ bhɔ́.
45016018	Mɛnyǔ bǒbhɔ bapu kʉ chi bɛtɨk Acha Kristo. Bákʉ̀ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ babhɔŋ bakɔŋɔ. Nɛ básɔ̀t chi sɛ́rwɔ́rɛ́nyu nɛ ɛrɨ́tí ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu bɛrwɔ bo abhɛn amɨ́k ayap ábhɨ́kɨ́re nɛ́nɛ.
45016019	Kɛ bo mankɛm bághók ɛnyǔ bǎghòk Mandɛm, nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ̀ mɛ maŋák ɛ̌ti yɛka. Nchí yaŋ mǎmbák barɨŋɨ́ndak bɛ mǎnkʉ nɔkɔ chi bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ, kɛ bo abhɛn amɨ́k ábhɨ́kɨ́re nɛ́nɛ bhɔ bɛ bákɛ́ kʉ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ.
45016020	Mandu mpok, chɔŋ Mandɛm mmu áchyɛ̀ kpák anchyɛ bhe awɔ́nɛm amfay Satan mpok bǎyátí yi amɨk. Nchí nɨkmʉɛt bɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu Yesu Kristo Acha mɛ́mbak nɛ bhe.
45016021	Tímɔti mmu ákʉ̀ bɛtɨk Kristo nɛ mɛ ǎtò be bakak. Batɨ̌ bo Israɛl bha, Lusiɔs nɛ Jáson nɛ Sɔsipatɛ bátò nkwɔ be bakak.
45016022	Mmɛ, Tɛ́tiɔs mmu Pɔ̌l ághátí mɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nsɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm ɛkáti ɛnɛ nchí to nkwɔ be bakak mbɔ ntɨ nkoŋo Acha.
45016023	Gáyɔs mmu mɛ́chɔ̀kɔ ɛkɛt ɛyi, nɛ nkúbhɛ́ arɛ́ kɛ̌ bǒnkwɔ báchɛ̀m, ǎtò be bakak. Ɛrástɔs, mbʉrɛ nkáp ɛtɔk nɛ máyɛsɛ Kwátɔs bátò bhe bakak.
45016024	Áfɔ́k Yesu Kristo Acha ambak nɛ bhe mankɛm. Amen.
45016025	Sɛ́mbɨ́tí Mandɛm. Yi ǎkway bɛkʉ be mǎntáŋ ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka bɛkoŋo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ mɛ̌ghàti bo ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo nɛ bɛkoŋo tɛtɛp anɛ nchí ghati bho. Yɔ́ achí nyaka bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ndǔ ɛrɔri mpok kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ yɔ.
45016026	Nɛ́nɛ, akʉ bǒ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm mándɨ́ŋɨ́ yɔ kpoŋoroŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ básɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm mmu achi nɛpɛ́m mpoknkɛm ághátí bhɔ. Aghati bhɔ mánsɨ́ŋ bɔ amɨk bɛ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl mánkoŋo ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m bɛ mánoko yi nɛ mangók nɔkɔ yi.
45016027	Kɛnókó kɛ́mbák ntá Mandɛm mmu árɨ́ŋɨ́ wu mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm mpoknkɛm. Sɛ́chyɛ̀ yi kɛnókó ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Kristo ákʉ́. Amen.
46001001	Mɛ Pɔ̌l mmu Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ bɛ́ mbák mǔnto Yesu Kristo kɛ̌ nchí nsɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Mandɛm abhɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ́ bɛ́koŋo nkaysi ayi yímbɔŋ. Nchí fá nɛ manɔ́ ywɛsɛ́ Sɔstɛ́nes.
46001002	Sɛ́sɨ̀ŋ ntá yɛká bǒ nkwɔ Mandɛm awu ɛtɔk Kɔrint. Sɛ́sɨ̀ŋ ntá yɛká bo Mandɛm ábhɨ́ŋɨ́, akʉ mǎmbák nyáŋá bɛ́ mǎmbak bǒbhi. Akʉ mǎmbák bǒbhi mpoknkɛm ndǔ bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo. Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ̌ yí ákʉ́ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu mbǎnkɛm. Nɔ́ chí yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ápú rɔ mɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Yesu Kristo anchyɛ nɔkɔ yí kɛnókó. Yí Yesu kɛ̌ achí Acha ywɛsɛ nɛ abhak Acha ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ mmu wu anɛ ághòk chí nɛ yí.
46001003	Mandɛm Ɛta yɛsɛ́ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha mántɔ́ŋ bé bɛrɨ̌ndu, mánchyɛ bhe kpák.
46001004	Mpú rɔ bɛ́chyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm mpoknkɛm ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn yi átɔ́ŋɔ́ bé ndǔ bǎbhàt mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo.
46001005	Ayɛt bɛ̌ká bǒ nkwɔ́ abhɛn Kɔrint ndǔ babhi ankɛm. Sayri sayri, akʉ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo abhɛn bábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu bábhɔ́ŋ bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ. Nɛ achyɛ́ bhé akap bɛ́gháti bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n yí ákʉ́ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́.
46001006	Ɛ́chí ɛnyuyɔ mbɔnyunɛ akap anɛ́ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ bhé átɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ mbok anɛ sɛ́ghàti bhé ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo achwe amɛm batɨ yɛka sayri.
46001007	Nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ bɛ́ ndǔ bǎchi nɛ amɨ́k ambi mǎnòŋ Yesu Kristo Acha ámpɛ́tnsɛm, bǎbhɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ akap anɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ̀.
46001008	Chɔŋ Ɛta Mandɛm ankʉ bɛ́ mǎnte kpirí tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti, kɛbhɔ́ŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn Yesu Kristo Acha ápɛ̀tnsɛm.
46001009	Mandɛm apú rɔ bɛkʉ nɔ́ ntá yɛká mbɔnyunɛ yí ǎkʉ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yí árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ́ yí ǎkʉ. Nɛ yímbɔŋ kɛ̌ ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhé bɛ mǎmbat mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ.
46001010	Bɔ̌ma, ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo Acha, nchí nɨk be mmʉɛt bɛ́ mǎndɔ́ bɛ́kɛm kɛfě nɛ batɨ, mǎmbák ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt. Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ́ bɛ ákɔ́rɛ́ ámbák nɛ́ntɨ́ ɛnɛká. Nchí nɨk be mmʉɛt, bák ká ntɨ nɛ́mɔ́t, mǎnkoŋo nɔkɔ chi nkaysi amɔt.
46001011	Bɔ̌ma, nchí rɛm nɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ mbɔk bo abhɛn báfú ɛkɛt Klóe bághátí mɛ́ kpoŋoroŋ, bɛ́ bǎtáŋ nɛ batɨ.
46001012	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌yáŋ bɛkʉ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ chí bɛ bǎchí ndǔ bakwɔ́, bǎbhák bɛyɔŋ bɛyɔŋ. Mbɔk ayɛká bárɛ̀m bɛ, “Bákòŋo chí Pɔ̌l”, báchák bɛ, “Mɛ̌kòŋo chí Apólos”, abhɛ́nɛ́fú bɛ, “Mɛ̌kòŋo chí Píta”, nɛ nkwɔ́ áchák bɛ, “Mɛ̌kòŋo chí Kristo”.
46001013	Mbɛ́p kpɨ́k be, mmǔ ǎkwáy bɛ́kɔ́rɛ Kristo ndǔ bakwɔ́? Ghatí ka mɛ. Mɛ Pɔ̌l kɛ̌ bágó ndǔ ɛkotákátí ɛ̌ti yɛká kɛ? Yɛ̌ mmǔ ywɛka achí anɛ bájwítí yí ndǔ nnyɛ́n Pɔ̌l?
46001014	Nkáká Mandɛm bɛ́ mbɨ́kɨ́ jwiti yɛ̌ mmǔ ywɛka ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛ́t chí Kríspɔs nɛ Gáyɔs.
46001015	Yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka apú kwáy yɛ bɛrɛm bɛ́ mɛnjwítí bhé ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna bɛ́ mǎmbák bakoŋo bha.
46001016	Mhm, njwítí nyaka nkwɔ Stɛfánas nɛ ɛkɛt ɛyi ɛnkɛm. Mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ́ njwítí yɛ̌ mmu achák.
46001017	Kristo abhɨ́kɨ́ tó mɛ́ bɛjwiti bho. Ató mɛ́ chí bɛ́ ngátí nɔ́kɔ́ bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́. Nɛ mpú sɔt chí nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn bǒ mmɨk nɛ sɛ́rwɔrɛ́nyu bɛ́gháti bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ mbɔnyunɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ yáŋ bɛ́ bɛtaŋá nɛwú ɛnɛ́n Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí mɛ́mbák ndɛ́ndɛm.
46001018	Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ sayri bɛ́ mbok nɛwú Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí chí ɛchɨŋti ntá bǒ abhɛn báchí ndǔ mbi nɛwú. Kɛ ntá yɛsɛ́ bǒ Mandɛm ǎpɛ̀mɛ, sɛ́ghɔ̀ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm ndǔ nɛwú Yesu.
46001019	Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́ghàti bhɛsɛ bɛ Mandɛm ǎrɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ ńchɔnti nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn barɨŋɨ́ndak nɛ kɛboŋ ɛkɛn bǒ abhɛn báchi mbɔ mmu anɛ ághɔ̀ mɛnyɨŋ chi ndu ɛ́kírísú.”
46001020	Ndǔ ɛ́chí nɔ́, nɛrɨŋɨ́kɛpɨ ɛnɛn barɨŋɨ́ndak nɛ́chí fá? Batɔŋɔ́ bɛbhé Moses bárɨ́ŋɨ́ yi? Bǒ mmɨk abhɛn bákɔ́ŋ bɛ́kɛm ɛpʉ́ítí báchí kpɨ́k bɔ agha? Mandɛm atɔŋ bɛ́ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn bǒ mmɨk nɛ́chí ndɛ́ndɛmɛ́ ndak.
46001021	Mandɛm mmu árɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ abhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ́ bǒ mmɨk mánsɔ́t chí ndyɛrɛ kɛboŋ ɛkap mándɨ́ŋɨ́ yí. Yí arɛm bɛ́ ǎpɛmɛ chí bǒ abhɛn mánóko Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ́ bhɛsɛ́ sɛ́ghàti bhɔ, yɛ̌ndu mbɔk bho básɔ̀t Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ chí mbɔ ɛchɨŋti.
46001022	Mbok Mandɛm áchí mbɔ ɛpɔ̌ndak ntá bo Israɛl ndǔ báyàŋ bɛ́ghɔ ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fù amfay kɛ mánoko bɛ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ achí tɛtɛp. Bǒ Grik mánoko chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kɔ̀ ndɔ́ŋ ámɔ́t nɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnap.
46001023	Kɛ sɛ́ghàti bho chí bɛ́ báway Kristo ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Nɛ mbok yɔ́ ákʉ́ batí bo Israɛl átáká amɛm. Nɛ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl básɔ̀t yɔ́ chí mbɔ ɛchɨŋti.
46001024	Kɛ bǒ abhɛn Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ bɛ mámbák abhi mpoknkɛm, yɛ̌ chí bo Israɛl, yɛ̌ chí bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, bárɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ amʉɛt Yesu Kristo kɛ̌ bo bághɔ̀ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm nɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak Mandɛm.
46001025	Nkaysi Mandɛm anɛ bakwǎŋwaŋ básɔ̀t bɛ́ chi ɛpɔ̌ndak, chí nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛ́n nɛ́yá tontó nɛ́chá nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn bǒ mmɨk. Nɛ bɛtɨk Mandɛm ɛbhɛ́n bo básɔ̀t bɛ́ bɛ́pú yɛ̌nyɨŋ, bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́yǎ bɛ́chá bɛtaŋá bǒ mmɨk.
46001026	Bɔ̌ma, bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk mɛnyǔ bo be bǎchí nyaka mpok Mandɛm ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe. Puyɛ̌ bɛyǎ bhɛka kɛ̌ bachí barɨŋɨ́ndak ndǔ nɛyɨŋɨ anɛ bǒ mmɨk. Puyɛ̌ bɛyǎ bhɛka kɛ̌ báchí nyaka manɛ́m bo, nɛ puyɛ̌ bɛyǎ bhɛka kɛ̌ báfú nyaka ndǔ bɛsáyrí manɛrɛ́kɛt.
46001027	Mbɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ̌ áyábhɛ́ bo abhɛn bápú barɨŋɨ́ndak bɛsí bǒ mmɨk bɛ́ mámbák bǒbhi. Akʉ nɔ́ bɛ́ ntíánwɔ́p ámbák nɛ bǒ abhɛn básɔ̀t mmʉɛt ɛyap mbɔ barɨŋɨ́ndak. Ayap nkwɔ́ bǒ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛsí bǒ mmɨk bɛ́ ntíánwɔ́p ámbák nɛ bǒ abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ.
46001028	Mandɛm ayap nkwɔ́ ndɛ́ndɛ́mɛ́ bho abhɛn bǒ mmɨk bábyàk mbɔ bɛ bápú yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Akʉ nɔ́ bɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bǒ mmɨk bákáysí bɛ́ bɔ́ kɛ̌ bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛnwɔp bɛ́kɛ́ pɛrɛ bhák yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
46001029	Ndǔ ɛ́chí nɔ́, yɛ̌ mmu apú kwáy bɛ́panyu bɛsí Mandɛm.
46001030	Mandɛm aywǐntí kɛ̌ ákʉ́ bɛ́ mǎnkwáy bɛ́bhát mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo. Yí kɛ̌ apɛt ákʉ́ bɛ Yesu ánchyɛ́ bhe nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛ́n tɛtɛp, nɛ ɛ̌ti Yesu kɛ̌ Mandɛm ásɔ́rɛ́ be mbɔ bǒ abhɛn báchí chák bɛsí bhi. Akʉ bɛsɛ́ sɛ́mbák pɛ́pɛ́p, bakwap tí. Yesu rɛ́ kɛ̌ ákʉ́ bɛ́ sɛ́ndɔ́p chí bo Mandɛm nɛ achyɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni bɛ́kú bɛsɛ́ sɛ́kɛ́ pɛrɛ bhák ndǔ kɛsɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́.
46001031	Ɛ̌ti ɛyɔ, kɛ̌ ɛ́chí mbɔ ɛnyǔ básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Mmǔ anɛ áyaŋ bɛ́panyu, ámpányu chí ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm Acha ákʉ́.”
46002001	Bɔ̌ma, mpok ntwɔ́ awu ntá yɛka, mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ́ bɛ́gháti bhe Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm mbɔ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ sɛ́rwɔrɛ́nyu, nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ́ mbɔ mmǔ anɛ achí ndɨŋɨndak.
46002002	Mpok nchí awu, nkʉ ntɨ ɛna bɛ́ mpú yáŋ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́fʉɛt chi bɛrɛm ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo nɛ, sayri sayri ɛ̌ti nɛwú ɛnɛn yí ágú amfay ɛkotákátí.
46002003	Ntwɔ nyaka awu ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ bɛtaŋ bɛ́pú nɛ mɛ nɛ mbɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ bɛcháy, ngwɛt nɔkɔ gbagbǎgbak.
46002004	Nɛ mpú sɔt nyaka chí nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn bǒ mmɨk ndu bɛtɔŋ, ngati nɔkɔ bhe Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ndu nchi nu bɛkʉ mǎnókó. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ kɛ̌ ásɔ́rɛ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi ákʉ́ mǎngɔ́ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ sɛ́ghàti bhe ɛ́chí tɛtɛp.
46002005	Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ puyɛ̌ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn bǒ mmɨk kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Yesu. Chi bɛtaŋ Mandɛm.
46002006	Yɛ̌ nɔ́, mpok sɛ́chí nɛ bo abhɛn mǎnáŋ básɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ mbi Mandɛm, sɛ́ghàti bhɔ́ chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́chyɛ bhɔ́ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak, kɛ puyɛ̌ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛkɛn bǒ mmɨk. Nɛ ɛ́pú bhák ɛnyǔ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛ́n bǒ abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ fá amɨk, bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fʉɛ̀rɛ fʉɛt.
46002007	Nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛ́n nɛ́ sɛ́ghàti bho chí ɛnɛ́n nɛ́fù ntá Mandɛm. Nɛ́chí bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bo bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nyaka nɔ́. Tɛ ndǔ mpok anɛ mmɨk ábhɨ́kɨ́ re bho, Mandɛm anáŋ aghókó nyaka nɔ́ abhʉrɛ ntá yɛsɛ́ ndu bɛ́kwák bɛsɛ́ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ kɛnókó.
46002008	Bǒ abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ fá amɨk bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nyaka yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ̌ti nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak Mandɛm ɛnɛn. Mbɔ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka ɛ̌ti nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak Mandɛm ɛnɛn mbʉ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ gó Acha ywɛsɛ mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ kɛnókó kɛnkɛm ndǔ ɛkotákátí.
46002009	Ɛ̌ti ɛyɔ kɛ̌ básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yɛ̌ mmu ábhɨ́kɨ́ kaysi bɛ́ chɔŋ mɛ́mfakari wáwák, bɔ́ kɛ̌ Mandɛm átóŋtí ábhʉ́rɛ́ ntá bǒ abhɛn bákɔŋ yi.”
46002010	Mandɛm ákʉ́ sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmu yí átó kɛ̌ ákʉ́ sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɔ́. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ arɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, arɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́chí tɛ amɛm ntɨ̌ Mandɛm.
46002011	Ndiɛrɛ ɛfóŋó mmu kɛ ɛ́kwày bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ nkaysi anɛ áchí yí antɨ, mmu achák apú kwáy bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ yɔ́. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ̌ ɛ́chí nɛ Mandɛm, ndiɛrɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ kɛ̌ árɨ́ŋɨ́ nkaysi anɛ áchí Mandɛm antɨ.
46002012	Nɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ chí Ɛfóŋó yi yímbɔŋ, puyɛ̌ chí ɛfóŋó ɛnɛ ɛ́fú fá amɨk. Mandɛm ato bhɛsɛ Ɛfóŋó yi bɛ Ɛ́fóŋó yi ankwak sɛndiŋi bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ntɨ ɛbhi.
46002013	Ɛ́chí yɛ́ bɛ mpok sɛ́ghàti bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ, sɛ́pú kʉ nɔ chi nɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn nɛ́fú ntá bakwǎŋwaŋ. Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm kɛ̌ ákʉ̀ sɛndiŋi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́rɛ̀m. Nɛ sɛ́gháti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm chi ntá bo abhɛn Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm achi nɛ bhɔ.
46002014	Mmu anɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm apu nɛ yi, apú kway bɛbhɔŋ akabhɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù ntá Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm. Apú kway bɛrɨŋɨ bhɔ, nɛ bɛbhak chi ɛpɔ̌ndak ntá yi, mbɔnyunɛ ndiɛrɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm kɛ̌ ákʉ̀ mmu andɨŋɨ bhɔ.
46002015	Mmu anɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm achi nɛ yí, ǎkwáy bɛrɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm, kɛ bǒ abhɛn Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm apu nɛ bhɔ, bápú kwáy bɛrɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmu anɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm achi nɛ yi ákʉ̀.
46002016	Ɛ́chí mbɔ ɛnyǔ básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Agha ákwày bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí antɨ Mandɛm Acha? Agha ákwày bɛ́chyɛ́ yí maníɛ́?” Kɛ mbák chí bhɛsɛ́ bo bho Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm áchí nɛ bhɛsɛ́, sɛ́bhɔ́ŋ ɛnyǔ ntɨ ɛnɛ́n Yesu Kristo áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ́.
46003001	Bɔ̌ma, mpok nchí awu nɛ bhe, mpú kwáy nyaka bɛghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m kɛpɨ ntá bo abhɛn Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm achi nɛ bhɔ. Mbɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ chi mbɔ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m kɛpɨ ntá bo abhɛn mánóko Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, kɛ bǎkoŋo chi nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn fá amɨk mbɔnyunɛ bǎchí nyaka mbɔ bɔ abhɛn bábhʉɛ́t amɔ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka mbɔ bakoŋo Kristo.
46003002	Mbɔŋ yɛ́ bɛ́dɨk nyaka be chí nɛ nɛ́bhɨ, puyɛ̌ nɛ nɛnyiɛ́ mbɔŋ mbɔnyunɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ re kwáy nyaka bo abhɛn mǎnyìɛ nɛnyiɛ́ mbɔŋ. Kpátɛ̌ ɛchɔŋ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ re kwáy bo abhɛn mǎnyìɛ nɛnyiɛ́ mbɔŋ.
46003003	Bǎbhʉɛ́t chí mǎmbɔ mbɔnyunɛ nkaysi yɛká abhʉɛ́t chí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk. Bǎbhɔŋ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ batɨ. Bǎgwà nɛ batɨ. Ɛyɔ ɛ́pú tɔ́ŋ nɔ́ bɛ́ nkaysi yɛká abhʉɛ́t chí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨkɨ nɛ? Chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ.
46003004	Mbák mbɔk ayɛká bárɛ̀m chí bɛ́ bákòŋo chí mɛ́ Pɔ̌l, báchák mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ chí bɛ́ bákòŋo Apólos, nɔ́ ɛ́tɔŋ bɛ́ bǎchí chí mbɔ bǒ mmɨkɨ nɛ.
46003005	Apólos achí kpɨ́k agha? Mɛ Pɔ̌l nchí agha? Bɛsɛ́ sɛ́chí chí bǒ bɛtok abhɛn Mandɛm átó bɛ sɛ́nkʉ́ mǎnókó Yesu. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛsɛ́ ǎkʉ́ chí ɛbhi bɛtɨk ɛbhɛ́n Mandɛm áchyɛ́ yí ánkʉ́.
46003006	Mpɨ ɛrɨ́tí mbwɔ́t amɛm batɨ yɛka, Apólos amíákátí manyiɛp arɛ́. Kɛ Mandɛm kɛ̌ ákʉ̀ mbwɔ́t ángó.
46003007	Mmu anɛ ápɨ̀ mbwɔ́t nɛ mmu anɛ ámyàkati manyiɛp arɛ́ bápú yɛ̌nyɨŋ, Mandɛm mmu ákʉ̀ mbwɔ́t ángó kɛ̌ ákʉ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
46003008	Mmu anɛ ápɨ̀ mbwɔ́t nɛ mmu anɛ ámyàkati manyiɛp arɛ́ báchí ɛnyu ɛ́mɔ́t, mbɔnyunɛ bákʉ̀ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́rɛ́ ɛ́mɔ́t. Mandɛm ǎkap yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap bɛ́kóŋo ɛbhi bɛtɨk ɛbhɛ́n yí ákʉ́.
46003009	Sɛ́chɛ̀m amɔ ndǔ bɛtɨk Mandɛm. Nɛ bǎchí mbɔ nkɨ Mandɛm, anɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk amɛm, bǎpɛ́t bǎbhak mbɔ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ Mandɛm átè.
46003010	Mandɛm achyɛ́ mɛ́ akap, mbo bɛtɨk awu ntá yɛká mbɔ ɛsáyrí nte bɛkɛt, ngoko nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́mɨk bɛ́tée ɛkɛt sayri, nɛ nɛ́nɛ, mmu achák ǎte ɛkɛt arɛ́. Kɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ átè ɛkɛt ndǔ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́kɛt ɛnɔ, abhɔŋ bɛ́sɔ́t mpok, ante yɔ sáyrí.
46003011	Yesu Kristo kɛ̌ áchí nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́kɛt ɛnɛ́n bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́tée ɛkɛt arɛ́. Nɛ yí kɛ̌ áchí nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́kɛt ɛnɛ́n bághókó bábhʉ́rɛ́. Yɛ̌ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́kɛt nɛ́chák nɛ́pú ɛnɛn mmu ákway bɛ́ghóko.
46003012	Mbɔk bho básɔ̀t pú nɛ silbha nɛ batay ŋaŋaŋ bɛ́tée ɛkɛt ndǔ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́kɛt ɛnɔ. Báchák básɔ̀t mɛnɔk nɛ tákɔ anɛ nnya ɛ́nyìɛ nɛ tákɔ anɛ nnya ɛ́bhʉ̀rɛ arɛ́ ndu bɛ́tée ɛkɛt ndǔ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́kɛt ɛnɔ.
46003013	Kɛ ɛwak ɛnɛ Yesu ápɛ̀tnsɛm fá amɨk, bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nte-bɛkɛt ákʉ́ bɛ́fù kpoŋoroŋ. Ɛwak ɛyɔ, Mandɛm ǎkʉ̀ ngó ántɔ́ŋ ɛnyǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛ́n yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu bɛ́chí.
46003014	Mbák ngó ábhɨ́kɨ́ sɔŋ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛ́n mmu ákʉ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́kɛt ɛnɔ, chɔŋ Mandɛm ankap yí ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhi.
46003015	Kɛ mmu anɛ ngó ásɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛ́n yí ákʉ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́kɛt ɛnɔ, ǎbhɔŋ chí mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́. Mandɛm ǎpɛmɛ ɛnyǔ nte-bɛkɛt wu, kɛ ǎbhák chí mbɔ mmu anɛ árɔ́bhɛ́ chí mandú bɛ́sɔ́ŋɔ amɛm ɛkɛt, kɛ anɔnɛ, afú, ɛkɛt ɛ́sɔ́ŋɔ́ kurukotok.
46003016	Bě bakoŋo Yesu bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ sayri bɛ́ bǎchí mbɔ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm nɛ bɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm achí nɛ bhe.
46003017	Mbák mmu ánchɔ́ŋtí ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, chɔŋ Mandɛm ǎnaŋa yí. Mandɛm ǎnaŋa yí mbɔnyunɛ ɛkɛrɛ́ Mandɛm ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛbhak chí ntá yi aywǐntí, nɛ be bakoŋo Yesu bachí ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ɛyɔ.
46003018	Dɔ̌ ká bɛ́rwɔ́ mmʉɛt yɛka! Mbák yɛ mmǔ ywɛka akáysí bɛ́ achí ndɨŋɨndak bɛ́kóŋo nkaysi bǒ mmɨk, ɛ́rɨ́ yí ánjíbhírí ámbák mbɔ mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ntá bǒ mmɨk. Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkwak yí ambak ndɨŋɨndak, bɛ́kóŋo nkaysi Mandɛm.
46003019	Nchí ghati bhe nɔ́ nɛ ntí bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǒ mmɨk básɔ̀t mbɔ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak chí ɛchɨŋti bɛsí Mandɛm. Ɛ́chí nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Mbɔk bo bákáysí bɛ́ báchí barɨŋɨ́ndak. Kɛ nkúbhɛ́ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnap kɛ̌ Mandɛm ásɔ̀t bɛ́dɛ́p bɔ́ amɨk.”
46003020	Ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt achák amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm, básɨŋ bɛ, “Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǒ mmɨk bákáysí bɛ́ chí nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak, ɛ́pú yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛsí Mandɛm.”
46003021	Yɛ̌ mmǔ ywɛka ákɛ́ pá yɛ́ nnyu ɛ̌ti bǒ abhɛn Mandɛm átó mankwák yi. Bǎbhɔŋ bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ bhe, achyɛ́ ntá yɛká mankɛm, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ bhe, ɛ́chí chí ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka.
46003022	Mandɛm ato bhe batɔŋ mbɔ mɛ Pɔ̌l, nɛ Apólos nɛ Píta bɛ́ sɛ́nkwák bhe. Mandɛm aghókó mmɨk bɛ ánkwák bhe. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fàkari nɛ bhe ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ndǔ mpok anɛ mmu ágú ɛ́kwàk be. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛchi nɛ́nɛ nɛ yɛ̌ chi ɛnɛ ɛ́twɔ̀ ambɨ ɛ̌twɔ́ be chi nɛ bɛrɨ. Mɛnkɛm chi ɛbhɛka.
46003023	Kɛ Kristo kɛ abhɔŋ bhe. Nɛ Mandɛm kɛ abhɔŋ Kristo.
46004001	Mɛ̌yáŋ mǎnsɔ́t mɛ nɛ Apólos mbɔ bǒ bɛtok Yesu Kristo. Mandɛm achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ tɛtɛp ywi anɛ áchí bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ bɛ́ sɛ́nkʉ bo mánjwimɛm.
46004002	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí arɛ́ chí bɛ mǔbɛtɨk anɛ báfyɛ́ yí ɛnyɨŋ awɔ́ bɛ́ ánkɛ́m sayri, abhɔŋ bɛtɔŋ chi-bɛtɨk aywi bɛ́ yí achí mmǔ tɛtɛp.
46004003	Kɛ mbák chí mɛ́, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎrɛ̀m ɛ̌ti ya, ɛyɔ ɛ́pú chyɛ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔri antɨ, yɛ̌ chí bɛ́ bo báchák kɛ̌ báyàŋ bɛ́rɛm ɛnyǔ mmʉ̌ bɛtok mɛnchí. Mɛmbɔŋ mpú kwáy bɛ́rɛm bɛ́ nchí ɛsáyrí mǔbɛtok, nɛ mpú kwáy bɛ́rɛm bɛ nchí ɛbɛ́ptí mǔbɛtok.
46004004	Mpú ghɔ yɛ̌ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́chí nɛ mɛmbɔŋ. Kɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tɔ́ŋ bɛ́ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́, Acha aywǐntí kɛ̌ átàŋ mɛ́, puyɛ̌ chi mɛmbɔŋ.
46004005	Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ́ yɛ́ bɛ́ mmu ántáŋ ntɨ ɛnɛ́ mpok ábhɨ́kɨ́ re kwáy. Nywɔp Yesu ápɛ̀tnsɛm, chɔŋ ankʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí amɛm ɛjuri nɛ́nɛ ɛ́mfú kpoŋoroŋ. Mpok yɔ, chɔŋ ankʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nkaysi anɛ áchí mmu antɨ amfú kpoŋoroŋ. Mpok ɛyɔ chɔŋ Mandɛm ambɨti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu bɛ́kóŋo ɛbhi bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́.
46004006	Bɔ̌ma, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ́ mɛ̌ghati bhe bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ mɛ nɛ Apólos. Ntí achí bɛ mǎngɔ́k ɛnyɨŋ arɛ́, ndu bɛ́kóŋó chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm. Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ́ bɛ́ mǎmpányu ɛ̌ti mbɔk bǒbatí, mǎmbyaka nɔkɔ báchák.
46004007	Wɔ mmu ɔ́pànyu, agha ághátí wɔ́ bɛ́ ɔchá bo báchák? Mmu ywɛká anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ puyɛ̌ Mandɛm kɛ̌ áchyɛ́ yí yɔ́, chí agha? Mbák Mandɛm kɛ áchyɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛká ábhɔ́ŋɔ́, ndáká yí bǎpányu mbɔ bɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́, bǎbhɔŋ bɔ chí ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛka?
46004008	Pú bǎrɛm bɛ mǎnáŋ bǎbhɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ? Mǎnaŋ bájwí nɛ akap anɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ̀ bhɔ́! Bǎkwɛn bafɔ, yɛ̌ndu sɛ́pú bafɔ. Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌yaŋ chi bɛ mǎmbák bafɔ tɛtɛp ndǔ baraka Mandɛm bɛ bɛsɛ bǒnto Yesu nkwɔ sɛ́mbák bafɔ nɛ bhe.
46004009	Ɛ́chí mbɔ bɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ bɛsɛ́ bǒnto Yesu sɛ́mbák bǒ abhɛn báchókó nnɛt nɛntɨ bǒnkwɔ mankɛm. Sɛ́chí mbɔ bǒ abhɛn báré kʉ́ ɛbɛ́ptí ndak, manyé ákwɛ́n bhɔ́, bápɔ́kɔ yɛ bhɔ bɛ́rɔ́ŋ bɛ́wáy bɛsí bo mankɛm, bɛsí bǒ mmɨk nɛ bɛsí bɔángɛl.
46004010	Bɛsɛ́ bǒnto sɛ́chí bɛchɨŋtǐ bho ndǔ sɛ́chíɛ bapɛ́m yɛsɛ́ ntá Kristo, kɛ be bachí barɨŋɨ́ndak ndǔ babhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu. Sɛ́chí mbɔ bǒ abhɛn Mandɛm ábhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ bhɔ́ bɛtaŋ, kɛ be bǎbhɔŋ bɛtaŋ. Bo báchyɛ̀ be kɛnókó, kɛ báwày bhɛsɛ́ wáy.
46004011	Kpátɛ̌ ɛchɔŋ, sɛ́chí bo nsay nɛ nchɛbhɛ manyiɛp mɛnyu nɛ ndɛn bɛfyɛ amʉɛt. Sɛ́chí bǒ mantɛm, nɛ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ mmu ywɛsɛ ábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ ɛyi ɛ́pú.
46004012	Sɛ́pɛrɛ́ bhɔ́ŋ nɛnyíɛ́ sɛ́náŋ sɛ́kpɔt nsɔ́ŋtí ndu bɛkʉ bɛtɨk nɛ amɔ́. Mpok bo básɔ̀kɔti bhɛsɛ́, sɛ́nɨ̀k chí mmʉɛt bɛ́ Mandɛm ánjɛ́t bhɔ́. Nɛ mpok bo báchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ́ ɛsɔŋɔri, sɛ́kɛ̀p chí ntɨ.
46004013	Mpok bo bárɛ̀m bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ́, sɛ́kɛ̀mɛ bhɔ́ chí nɛ ɛyɔŋɔ́ ɛkɔŋ. Sɛ́rɔp chi kɛbí bɛsí bǒ mmɨk. Kpát tɛ̌ ɛchɔŋ, sɛ́rɔp chi mbɔ mɛ́nyɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛbhɛn mányɔ́ bɛto ndǔ ɛbhwɔ́rɛ́ mɛnyɨŋɨ́.
46004014	Mpú sɨ́ŋ be mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn chí ndu bɛkʉ ntíánwɔ́p ánkɛ́m bé ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ. Nchí sɨ́ŋ chí bɛ́chyɛ́ be maníɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ bachí bɔ̌bha abhɛn nkɔ́ŋɔ́ tontó.
46004015	Yɛ̌ bǎbhɔ́ŋ chí bɛyǎ bo báchák abhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ be mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti Kristo, bǎbhɔŋ chí chi amɔt. Bǎbhɔŋ chí chi amɔt mbɔnyunɛ be bho bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo nɛ́nɛ, mɛ kɛ̌ ntwɔ́ ngátí nyaka bhé Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ kɛ mǎnókó.
46004016	Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá yɛka bɛ́ mǎnkóŋó ɛpɨŋ ɛyá mbɔ ɛnyǔ mmɔ́ ákòŋo ɛpɨŋɨ́ ɛ́táyi.
46004017	Ɛ̌ti ɛyɔ kɛ̌ nchí tó bé Tímɔti mmu áchí mɔ́wa ndǔ ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Acha mbɔ mɛ. Nkɔŋ yí tontó, nɛ achí mmú tɛtɛp. Nchí tó yi bɛ antwɔ antɨk be ɛnyǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna, mbɔ mmǔ Yesu Kristo nɛchi, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mɛ̌tɔ̀ŋ bǒnkwɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak.
46004018	Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mbɔk ɛyɛka bǎpànyu mbɔnyunɛ bǎkaysi bɛ mpú pɛrɛ kway bɛ́twɔ bɛghɔ bhe.
46004019	Kɛ mbák chí nkaysi Mandɛm, chɔŋ ntwɔ́ awu mandú mpok. Nɛ nnáŋ nchwɔ́p awu, chɔŋ mɛmbɔŋ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mbák bǒ abhɛn bápà nɔ́ nyu báchí chí bǒ nyu wúwú, nɛ mbák bɛtaŋ Mandɛm bɛ́chí nɛ bhɔ́ tɛtɛp. chɔŋ ndɨ́ŋɨ́.
46004020	Nchí rɛm nɔ́ nɛ ntí bɛ bǎrɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ Mandɛm achí nɛ mmu mbɔ Mfɔ aywi chí mbák bɛtaŋ Mandɛm bɛ́chí nɛ yí ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni. Ɛ́pú wɛnti chí ndǔ ɛrɨ́tí ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu yɔ́yɔ́.
46004021	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎyàŋ chi ɛnɛ? Bǎyàŋ ntwɔ́ awu chí nɛ ɛ́kpá awɔ́, kɛ chi nɛ ɛyɔŋ pɛtii bɛtɔŋ bɛ nkɔŋ be tɛtɛp?
46005001	Cháá! Bághátí mɛ́ ɛpúsí ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí nɛ́ntɨ́ ɛnɛká. Nɛ ɛnyǔ ɛpúsí ɛnɛ, yɛ̌ chí bǒ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Mandɛm bápú kwáy bɛ́ká bɛ ɛ́mbák ndǔ nkwɔ́ wap. Mmu áre bhʉrɛ nɛ ngɔrɛ́ ɛ́táyi ná?
46005002	Nɛ mǎmpa nɔkɔ chí nyu? Pú ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhak chí ndǔ nɛdǐ-kɛbhɔ̌? Bǎbhɔŋ bɛ́fɛ́rɛ mmu anɛ ákʉ́ ɛyɔ ɛnyǔ ɛpɔ̌ndak ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka.
46005003	Yɛ̌ndu mpú awu nɛ bhe bɛsí nɛ bɛsi, nchí nɛ bhe mbɔnyunɛ ntɨ ɛna nɛ́chí awu nɛ bhe. Nɛ nnáŋ mkpɔt nnyé mmu anɛ ákʉ́ awu ndak,
46005004	ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo Acha, nɛ nchi bhák nɛ bhe ndǔ nkaysi ya mpok bǎchɛm ndu bɛchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Chɔŋ bɛtaŋ Yesu Acha ywɛsɛ mɛ́mbak nkwɔ́ nɛ bhe.
46005005	Fíɛ́ ká mmu anɛ ákʉ́ awu ndak awɔ́ Satan, bɛ́ ánchɔ́ŋtí mmʉɛt yi. Ánáŋ ambak awɔ́ Satan, chɔŋ Satan anchɔŋti mmʉɛt ɛyi. Kʉ ka ɛnyu ɛyɔ nɛ manɔ ywɛka, bɛ Mandɛm ampɛmɛ ɛfóŋó ɛyi ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn Yesu Acha ápɛ̀tnsɛm.
46005006	Ndaká yí bǎpányu? Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ́ mandú yís anɛ báfyɛ́ ndu fláwa anɛ bábáy ndu bɛ́ghaŋ pɔfpɔ́f, ǎkʉ fláwa amwɔt kɛ?
46005007	Fɛrɛ́ yɛ́ ka bɛbʉ́ bhɔ amʉɛt, bɛ́ bɛ́kɛ́ go mɛntaka ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka. Fɛrɛ́ ká bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɔ bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka ambak pɛ́pɛ́p nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt. Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ nɛwú Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí nɛ́kʉ bakoŋo Yesu bǎrɔp chi pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm. Yí Kristo, achí mbɔ mɔ́nkwɔmɛn anɛ bo Israɛl básɔ̀t nyaka manchyɛ mbɔ akap ntá Mandɛm ndǔ mpok anɛ mányìɛ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ.
46005008	Sɛ́ndɔ́ yɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ bɛbʉ́, bɛ́ bɛbʉ́ bɛ́kɛ́ gó mɛ́njwí ndǔ nkwɔ́ aywɛsɛ́. Sɛ́nkʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ chí bɛrɨ, sɛ́nkoŋo nɔkɔ mbi Mandɛm nɛ ntɨ nɛ́mɔ́t. Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ sɛ́mbak mbɔ brɛt anɛ kɛbhɔŋ yís anɛ bo mányiɛ nyaka mpok Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ̌ bɛsɛ́ nkwɔ́ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́nyiɛ́ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ mbɔ bǒ tɛtɛp abhɛn bapu ápú nɛ bhɔ́.
46005009	Ndǔ ɛkáti ɛnɛ njámbɨ ntǒ bhe, ngátí bhé bɛ bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ barak ɛpúsí.
46005010	Mpú rɛm chi ɛ̌ti bǒ abhɛn bápú bakoŋo Yesu, yɛ̌ bachi chi bo ɛpusí, yɛ̌ chí bǒ abhɛn báfyɛ̀ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bo báchák, yɛ̌ bághɛ̀p, yɛ̌ chí bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɔmandɛm bɛ́chák. Mpú rɛm ɛ̌ti bǒ mmɨk mbɔnyunɛ mbák mmu ándɛ́m bɛ́ apú chɛm mmʉɛt nɛ bhɔ́, abhɔŋ bɛ́rɔ́ mmɨkɨ nɛ.
46005011	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nsɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka bɛkʉ be mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ chi bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ bhɔ́ŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m bɛ yí achi nkoŋo Yesu, yɛ̌ nɔ, ankʉ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ barak ɛpúsí, nɛ bɛ́fyɛ́ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bo báchák, nɛ bɛbhɔŋ bɔmandɛm báchák, nɛ bɛrɛm bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti bo báchák, nɛ yɛ̌ chí bɛbhak nyǔmɛ́m, nɛ bɛghɛp aghɛp. Yɛ̌ chí nɛnyíɛ́, bǎkɛ́ nyiɛ́ nɛ ɛnyǔ mmu wu.
46005012	Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́táŋ bǒ abhɛn bápú bakoŋo Yesu. Bǎbhɔŋ bɛ́táŋ chí batɨ̌ bǒ nkwɔ́ abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛbɛptí mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛbhɛn.
46005013	Mandɛm kɛ̌ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ́táŋ bo nɛfí, nɛ chɔŋ yí antáŋ bɔ́. Kɛ ɛ́mbák chí bhe bǒ nkwɔ́ Yesu, mankʉ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Bǎbhɔŋ bɛ́fɛ́rɛ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́ ndǔ nkwɔ́ ywɛká.”
46006001	Ɛ́kɔ̀ ná kɛ mmu ywɛká ansɔt ndak andɔk bɛsí bataŋá manyé abhɛn bápú bakoŋo Yesu mpok yí ábhɔ̀ŋ ndak nɛ ntɨ mmǔ Mandɛm, ɛnɛ́ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɔŋ ntá batɨ bo Mandɛm?
46006002	Bě babhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t, chɔŋ bo Mandɛm mántáŋ bǒ mmɨk kɛ? Mbák bǎbhɔŋ bɛtáŋ bǒ mmɨk ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t, bɔ̌bɛkpɨ́kɨ́ri abhɛn báchí nɛ́ntɨ́ ɛnɛká kɛ̌ bapú kwáy bɛ́táŋ kɛ́?
46006003	Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ́ ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t, chɔŋ bɛsɛ bo Mandɛm sɛ́ntàŋ bɔángɛl? Bǎrú bɛkpɨ́kɨ́ri abhɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋ nɛ batɨ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ́n fá amɨk kɛ̌ báchá be bɛ́táŋ?
46006004	Mbák yɛ̌ mmǔ ywɛka abhɔŋ mɛnyǔ bɛkpɨ́kɨ́ri ɛbhɔ, ákɛ́ sɔt bɔ bɛsí bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ kɛnókó bɛsí bǒnkwɔ Yesu bɛ́ mántáŋ bɔ́.
46006005	Nchí rɛm nɔ́ bɛ́ ntíánwɔ́p ánkɛ́m bé. Yɛ̌ ndɨŋɨndak apú ndǔ nkwɔ́ ywɛká anɛ ákwày mɛ́nyúrɛ bo nkwɔ́ abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛkpɨ́kɨ́ri nɛ batɨ kɛ?
46006006	Cháá! Mmu Mandɛm ánkʉ́ manyé nɛ ntɨ, bɛ́ bo Mandɛm mándɔk mánte bɛsí bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Yesu Kristo mántáŋ bɔ́?
46006007	Mbɔŋ bɛkʉ manyé nɛ ntɨ, ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ mǎnáŋ bǎkwɛn ndǔ mbi Mandɛm. Mmu ánká bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ɛbhɛ́n ntɨ ákʉ́ yí, nɔ ɛ́bɛp kɛ? Mmu ányíɛ́ wɔ́ nsɛm amɔt, ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ yi?
46006008	Nɛ be babhɔŋ bǎkʉ̀ batɨ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́, mǎnyiɛ nɔkɔ batɨ̌ bǒ nkwɔ́ nsɛm amɔt.
46006009	Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ yɛ̌ ɛwak, Mandɛm apú bhák Mfɔ ntá bǒ abhɛn bápú chak kɛ? Mmu ákɛ́ rwɔ mmʉɛt. Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ákʉ̀ barak ɛpʉsi, yɛ̌ agha anɛ ákòŋo bɔmandɛm bachak, nɛ bakwɛnɛ́ bɛrwɔp, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbakanɛm anɛ ákʉ̀ kɛbhʉ́rɛ́ nɛ ntɨ mbakanɛm nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ákʉ̀ kɛbhʉ́rɛ́ nɛ ntɨ ngɔrɛ́,
46006010	nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ághɛp aghɛp, nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ áchí nyǔmɛ́m, nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɛ̀m bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti bo báchák, nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ áchi ngɛ́p ntántaŋ, mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ mankɛm bápú kway bɛbhak ndǔ nkwɔ bho abhɛn Mandɛm achi Mfɔ wap.
46006011	Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ̌ mbɔk yɛká báchí nyaka. Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ anáŋ asó bɛbʉ́ bhɛka afɛ́rɛ́, akʉ bɛ́ mǎmbák bo Mandɛm. Nɛ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Yesu Kristo Acha ákʉ́, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ akʉ nkwɔ́ bɛ́ be mǎmbák chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
46006012	Mmu ǎkwáy bɛ́rɛ́m bɛ, “Mbɔŋ ngǎngaŋ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ nkɔ́ŋɔ́.” Ɛ́chí tɛtɛp, kɛ ɛ́chí nkwɔ́ tɛtɛp bɛ́ puyɛ̌ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ kɛ̌ ɛ́kwày bɛ́kwák bhe. Mbɔŋ ngǎngaŋ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌bhák nsɛm antɛn ɛyi ɛ́pú.
46006013	Mmu achák ǎkwáy bɛ́rɛ́m bɛ, “Mandɛm aghókó nɛnyíɛ́ chí bɛ́ mányíɛ́ mámfyɛ́ mɛniɛ, aghoko mɛniɛ bɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛmfʉɛt arɛ kɛ nɛ́nchwe mmu amʉɛt.” Ɛ́chí tɛtɛp, kɛ ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, Mandɛm ǎkʉ bɛ mɛniɛ bɛ́kɛ́pɛrɛ bhak, nɛnyíɛ́ nkwɔ kɛpɛrɛ bhák. Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ ghoko mmʉɛt nkwǎ chí ndǔ barak ɛpúsí. Aghókó mmʉɛt yɛsɛ́ chí bɛ́ sɛ́nkóŋó Yesu Acha nɛ yɔ́. Nɛ yí Yesu Acha kɛ̌ áchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kwàk mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ ɛmbak sayri.
46006014	Mandɛm ákʉ́ nyaka Yesu apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɛ ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi, chɔŋ ankʉ bɛsɛ́ nkwɔ́ sɛ́mpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ mmʉɛt ɛkɔ.
46006015	Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ́ nkwɔ́ Kristo mankɛm chí mmʉɛt Kristo? Ɛ́rɨ yɛ́ bɛ́ mmu ánsɔ́t mmʉɛt anɛ áchí ɛpókómʉɛt Kristo anchyɛ ntá ngɔrɛ́-nɛkɔ? Wáwák!
46006016	Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ́ mmu anɛ áchɛ́mɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ ngɔrɛ́-nɛkɔ, arɔp chí mmʉɛt amɔt nɛ yi? Ɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛghati bhɛsɛ bɛ, “Bǒ bati apay, bárɔp chí mmǔ amɔt.”
46006017	Kɛ mmu anɛ ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Acha, ǎbhɔ́ŋ nkaysi amɔt nɛ yi.
46006018	Bǎkɛ́ bhɔ́ŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ barak ɛpúsí! Bɛbʉ́ bɛ́chák mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛ́n mmu ákʉ̀ bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ ndak nɛ mmʉɛt mmu. Kɛ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ barak ɛpúsí, ǎchɔŋti chí mmʉɛt ɛyi yímbɔŋ.
46006019	Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ́ mmʉɛt ɛyɛka chí ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ɛnɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchɔ̀kɔ arɛ́? Mandɛm achyɛ́ bé Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ bɛ ámbák nɛ bhe, nɛ́nɛ, bǎrɔp chí bo Mandɛm. Bǎpɛt bǎpu ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛyɛka.
46006020	Mandɛm aku be nɛ bɛyǎ nkáp, bǎbhɔŋ yɛ́ bɛchyɛ yi kɛnókó nɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛka.
46007001	Nchí yáŋ bɛ́gháti be ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhɛ́bhɛ́ mɛ ndǔ ɛkáti ɛnɛ́ bǎsɨ́ŋɨ́. Nká nɛ bhe bɛ́ ɛ́rɨ́ mmu ánchɔ́kɔ́ kɛbháy ngɔrɛ́.
46007002	Kɛ tɛ̌ndu bɛyǎ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nɛbhay bábhɔ̀ŋ mamɔ bɛkʉ ɛpúsí, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbakanɛm abhɔŋ bɛbhay ngɔrɛ́ anchɔkɔ nɛ yí, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ngɔrɛ́ ámbɔ́ŋ aywi nnɛ́m anchɔkɔ nɛ yi.
46007003	Nnɛ́m abhɔŋ bɛ́chyɛ mmʉɛt nta ngɔrɛ́ ywi, nɛ ngɔrɛ́ abhɔŋ bɛchyɛ mmʉɛt nta nnɛ́m, mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́yàŋ.
46007004	Ɛbhɔŋ bɛbhak nɔ mbɔnyunɛ puyɛ̌ ngɔrɛ́ kɛ̌ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mmʉɛt ɛyi, chí nnɛ́m. Nɛ puyɛ̌ nnɛ́m kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mmʉɛt ɛyi, chí ngɔrɛ́.
46007005	Ngɔrɛ́ nɛ nnɛ́m bákɛ́ kaŋ yɛ batɨ kɛbhʉ́rɛ́, ɛbhɨkɨfʉɛt ndǔ mpok anɛ báká ɛyɔŋ ɛmɔt bɛ báyàŋ bɛ́chwé ndǔ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ntá Mandɛm. Mpok yɔ ánáŋ ámfʉɛ́t, bǎbhɔŋ bɛpɛt bɛchɛm mmʉɛt, bɛ Satan ákɛ́ rwɔ bhe mǎnkwɛ́n ndǔ nɛmɔ ndǔ bǎpú kway bɛkɛm mmʉɛt.
46007006	Mpú rɛm nɔ́ chí bɛ́fyɛ́ bé ɛbhé bɛ́ bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ nɔ́, nchí chyɛ be chí maníɛ́,
46007007	bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ámbák ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛyi kɛbhɔ́ŋ ngɔrɛ́ mbɔ mɛ, kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ aywi akap anɛ́ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ yi. Achyɛ́ mbɔk akap bɛ́bhɔŋ nɛbhay, achyɛ báchák chí akap bɛ́chɔ́kɔ ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛyap kɛbháy nɛbhay.
46007008	Ntá bǒ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ nɛbhay, nɛ mánkwɛ́sɛ́, nchí rɛm bɛ mándɔ́p mmʉɛ́rɛ́mʉɛt ayap mbɔ mɛ.
46007009	Kɛ mbák mbɔk bho báchí ndǔ nkwɔ́ ywɛká abhɛn bápú kwáy bɛ́kɛ́m mmʉɛt, ɛ́rɨ bɛ́ mámbɔ́ŋ nɛbhay. Ɛ́rɨ bɛ́ bɔ́ mámbɔ́ŋ nɛbhay ɛcha bɛchɔkɔ nɔ, ɛkwaká kɛbhʉ́rɛ́ ɛ́ndu nɔkɔ bhɔ antɨ.
46007010	Nɛ́nɛ, nchí fyɛ́ ɛbhé ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛbhay, nɛ ɛbhé ɛnɛ ɛ́fú chí ntá mbɔŋ Yesu Acha. Ngɔrɛ́ abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́rɔ́ nnɛ́m ndǔ nɛbhay.
46007011	Kɛ mbák ngɔrɛ́ arɔ́ nnɛ́m, abhɔŋ bɛ́chɔ́kɔ ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛyi, kɛbháy mmu achák. Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ́, ámpɛ́tnsɛm ntá nnɛ́m aywi. Mbakanɛm nkwɔ abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́rɔ́ ngɔrɛ́ ywi ndǔ nɛbhay.
46007012	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌ghati bhe nɛ́nɛ ɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ábháy ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ápú nkoŋo Yesu, nɛ mɛmbɔŋ kɛ̌ nchí ghati bhe yɔ́, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fú chí ntá Yesu Acha. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mǔnkwɔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Yesu, kɛ ngɔrɛ́ wu akɔŋ bɛ́chɔ́kɔ nɛ yí, nnɛ́m ákɛ́ rɔ yí ndǔ nɛbhay.
46007013	Nɛ mbák ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ásɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ Yesu abhɔŋ nnɛ́m anɛ ápú nkoŋo Yesu, kɛ nnɛ́m akɔŋ bɛ́chɔ́kɔ nɛ yí, ngɔrɛ́ wu ákɛ́ rɔ yí ndǔ nɛbhay.
46007014	Ntí achí bɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ngɔrɛ́ anɛ achi nkoŋo Kristo nɛkwáy bɛkʉ nnɛ́m ambak mmǔ Mandɛm. Nɛ nɛpɛ́m nnɛ́m anɛ achí nkoŋo Kristo nɛkwáy bɛkʉ ngɔrɛ́ ywi ambak mmǔ Mandɛm. Mbɔ ɛ́pú nɔ́, mbʉ́ bɔ̌ bhɛka bápú kwáy bɛbhak bo Mandɛm. Kɛ ndǔ ɛ́chí nɔ́, Mandɛm ǎsɔ̀t bɔ̌bhap mambak bǒbhi.
46007015	Kɛ mbák mmu anɛ ápú nkoŋo Yesu, yɛ̌ chí mbakanɛm, yɛ̌ chí ngɔrɛ́, ǎyáŋ bɛ́rɔ́ ntɨ, mándɔ́ yí ándɔ́k. Ɛ́mbák nɔ́, ɛbhé Mandɛm ɛ́pú kɛ́m yɛ̌ chí ngɔrɛ́, yɛ̌ chí mbakanɛm, mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm apú yáŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́nsɔ́ŋɔ́rí ntɨ mɔ́ywi amɛm.
46007016	Bě baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn bachí bakoŋo Yesu, barɨ́ŋɨ́ ná mbák ɛ̌ti ɛyɛká kɛ Mandɛm ǎkwáy bɛ́pɛ́mɛ manɛ́m abhɛka abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Mandɛm? Nɛ be babhakanɛm abhɛn bachí bakoŋo Yesu, barɨ́ŋɨ́ ná bɛ́ ɛ̌ti yɛká Mandɛm ǎkwáy bɛ́pɛ́mɛ baghɔrɛ́ bhɛka abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Mandɛm?
46007017	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔŋɔ bɛrɨŋɨ chí bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛ́bhʉrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm áyàŋ yí ambak. Ɛnɛ́ kɛ̌ ɛ́chí ɛbhé ɛnɛ́ nchí chyɛ bǒnkwɔ mankɛm yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak.
