46007018	Mbák mǎnáŋ básyɛp nyaka mmu kɛ Mandɛm ǎbhɨŋɨ yí, ákɛ́ nu bɛbhak mbɔ mmu anɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ syɛp yí. Nɛ mbák mmu achí anɛ Mandɛm ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ yí ɛnɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ re syɛp yí, ákɛ́ nu bɛ́ mánsíɛ́p yí bɛkoŋo ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ bo Israɛl.
46007019	Nchí rɛm nɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ básyɛ́p mmu yɛ̌ bábhɨ́kɨ́ syɛp, ɛyɔ ɛ́pú kwak ndǔ yɛ̌ mbi. Nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ chí bɛ́bhʉrɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm.
46007020	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛká ándɔ́p ɛnyǔ yí áchí nyaka mpok Mandɛm ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ yí ámbák nkoŋo Yesu.
46007021	Mbák ɔchí nyaka chí nsɛm mpok Mandɛm ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ́, ɛyɔ ɛ́kɛ́ sɔŋɔri ntɨ ɛnɛ amɛm. Mbák ɔbhɔŋ mbi bɛkʉ bɛ́ ɔ́kɛ́ pɛrɛ bhák nsɛm, dɔ́k ambɨ.
46007022	Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ nsɛm anɛ Mandɛm ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ apɛt apú nsɛm bɛsí Mandɛm. Mbɔnyunɛ abhat mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Acha, nɛ apɛt apú ndǔ kɛsɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́. Nɛ mmu anɛ ápú nsɛm fá amɨk, ndǔ Mandɛm abhɨ́ŋɨ́ yí, arɔp chí nsɛm Yesu Kristo.
46007023	Mandɛm aku bhe nɛ bɛyǎ nkáp afɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ kɛsɛm. Bǎrɔp chí basɛm Yesu Kristo. Bǎkɛ́pɛrɛ kʉ yɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛka basɛm ntá bǒ mmɨk.
46007024	Bɔ̌ma, ɛ́rɨ yɛ bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛká ándɔ́k ambɨ bɛbhak ndu nte anɛ yí áchí nyaka mpok Mandɛm ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ yí.
46007025	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌ghati bhe nɛ́nɛ ɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ bakwǎy bho nɛ mánkwɛ́sɛ́. Puyɛ̌ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fú ntá Yesu Acha. Nchí ghati bhe chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ nkáysí. Kɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛghok mɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ nchí mmu anɛ nchí rɛm ndak mángók, nɛ ntí bɛ́ Yesu Acha achí nɛ mɛ.
46007026	Bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí ndǔ mpok anɛ, nchí rɛm bɛ́ mmu anɛ áchí ndǔ mmʉɛt mmʉɛt ɛyi, ámbák mbɔ ɛnyǔ áchí.
46007027	Mmu ywɛka anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ngɔrɛ́, ákɛ́ rɔ yí. Anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ ngɔrɛ́, ákɛ́ nu bɛ́bháy ngɔrɛ́.
46007028	Kɛ mbák mmu ywɛká abhay ngɔrɛ́, abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ bɛbʉ́. Nɛ mbák mɔ́nkwɛn ngɔrɛ́ abhay nnɛ́m, abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ bɛbʉ́. Kɛ dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ́ bǒ abhɛn bábhày nɛbhay bábhɔ̀ŋ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri fá amɨk, nɛ nchí yáŋ chí bɛkʉ bɛ bǎkɛ́ chwe ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri.
46007029	Bɔ̌ma, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌yáŋ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ chí bɛ manywɔp anɛ́ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ́ ábhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ yá. Ɛ́yàŋ yɛ bɛ́ bɛ́bhó nɛ́nɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ábháy ngɔrɛ́ ámbák mbɔ mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ ngɔrɛ́.
46007030	Nɛ bǒ abhɛn báchí ndǔ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ babhɔŋ bɛbhák mbɔ bǒ abhɛn bápú ndǔ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ. Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ maŋák áchí nɛ yí, ámbák mbɔ mmu anɛ maŋák ápú nɛ yí. Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákù mɛnyɨŋ, ámbák mbɔ mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ mɛnyɨŋ.
46007031	Nɛ bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk, bákɛ́ noko mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ, mbɔnyunɛ mmɨkɨ nɛ ǎfʉɛrɛ fʉɛt nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi mɛnkɛm.
46007032	Mbɨ́kɨ́ yáŋ bɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛsɔŋɔri batɨ yɛka amɛm. Mmǔ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bháy ngɔrɛ́, afyɛ́ ntí ndu bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Acha Yesu, nɛ ǎkaysi bɛkʉ́ chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛkʉ Mandɛm ambɔŋ maŋák nɛ yi.
46007033	Kɛ nkaysi mmu anɛ ábháy ngɔrɛ́ ǎbhák chí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk. Ǎyaŋ bɛkʉ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛkʉ ngɔrɛ́ ywi ámbɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ yi.
46007034	Mmu wu ǎbhɔ́ŋ yɛ chí batɨ ápáy. Mɔ́nkwɛn ngɔrɛ́ nɛ baghɔrɛ́ bachak abhɛn bábhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ manɛm bafyɛ́ ntí chí ndǔ bɛtɨk Acha Yesu. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ǎyaŋ bɛ́chyɛ ntɨ nɛ mmʉɛt nkɛm chí ntá Mandɛm. Kɛ nkaysi ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ábháy nnɛ́m, ǎbhák chí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ mmɨk, nɛ ǎyáŋ bɛkʉ chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́kʉ nnɛ́m aywi ambɔŋ maŋák nɛ yi.
46007035	Nchí rɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndu bɛkwak bhe, puyɛ̌ chi ndu bɛchɛt bhé mbi. Nchí yaŋ chi bɛkwak mǎnkɔ́ ndǔ mbi anɛ́ achi chak nɛ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka ankʉ bɛtɨk Acha nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt.
46007036	Bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ mmǔ anɛ átɨ́ bɛbhay ngɔrɛ́, mbák aghɔ bɛ abhɔŋ bɛbhay ngɔrɛ́ ndǔ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛ́chí yi antɨ nɛ apu kway bɛkɛm mmʉɛt, nɛ mpok ǎfʉɛ̀t, ɛ́rɨ bɛ́ ámbáy ngɔrɛ́. Bɛbʉ́ bɛpu arɛ.
46007037	Kɛ mbák mbɔ̌ŋ mbakanɛm akʉ ntɨ ɛni bɛ́ yí apú pɛrɛ bháy ngɔrɛ́ anɛ yí átɨ́, nɛ ǎkwáy bɛ́kɛ́m mmʉɛt, nɔ́ akʉ sayri ndǔ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bháy ngɔrɛ́.
46007038	Ɛ́chí yɛ́ bɛ́ mmu anɛ ábháy ngɔrɛ́ anɛ yí átɨ́, akʉ sayri. Kɛ mmu anɛ áchɔ́kɔ́ kɛbháy ngɔrɛ́, akʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́rɨ́ ɛ́chá.
46007039	Ngɔrɛ́ abhɔŋ bɛbhák nɛ nnɛ́m aywi tɛ ndiɛrɛ nɛwú. Kɛ mbák nnɛ́m agu, abhɔŋ ngǎngaŋ bɛ́bháy yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achák anɛ yí ákɔ́ŋɔ́. Kɛ mmu wu abhɔŋ bɛbhak chí mmu anɛ áchí nkoŋo Yesu Acha.
46007040	Kɛ ndǔ nkáysí ya, ɛrɨ ɛcha bɛ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ nnɛ́m ɛ́ywi ágú anchɔkɔ ɛnyu ɛyɔ, yi kɛ bhay nnɛ́m. Nɛ mɛ nnókó bɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm kɛ̌ áchyɛ́ mɛ́ nkaysi anɛ.
46008001	Nɛ́nɛ, bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎsɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti nɛnyíɛ́ bɔmandɛm nse, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́gháti bhe chí bɛ ɛ́chí tɛtɛp mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎrɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, “Bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ.” Kɛ ɛnyǔ nɛrɨŋɨ́ ɛnɔ nɛ́kʉ̀ mmu anjoŋ nɔkɔ mmʉɛt. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chyɛ̀ bǒ nkwɔ́ Yesu bɛ́táŋ chí ɛkɔŋ.
46008002	Mmu anɛ ákáysí bɛ́ arɨ́ŋɨ́, ǎtɔ̀ŋ chí bɛ́ abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ yí ándɨ́ŋɨ́.
46008003	Kɛ mmǔ anɛ akɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ Mandɛm árɨŋɨ mbɔ aywǐ mmu.
46008004	Bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn báchyɛ ntá bɔmandɛm nse, bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ mandɛm nsé apu yɛ̌nyɨŋ nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m. Mandɛm amɔt kɛ achi, achák ápú.
46008005	Mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chí amfay, bɛ́chák bɛ́chí fá amɨk ɛbhɛ́n bo básɔ̀t mbɔ bɔmándɛ́m. Bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chí ɛnyuyɔ nɛ mbɔk bho básɔ̀t bɔ mbɔ bafɔ bhap.
46008006	Kɛ ntá yɛsɛ, sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ Mandɛm amɔt kɛ áchí. Yí chí Ɛta nɛ yi kɛ ághókó yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. Aghókó bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́mbák bǒbhi. Yesu Kristo Acha achí nkwɔ chi amɔt. Mandɛm afʉɛrɛ́ ntá yi kɛ ǎghoko yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ nɛ́fù chi ntá yi.
46008007	Kɛ yɛ̌ndu sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ mandɛm nsé abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m, mbɔk bho báchí ndǔ nkwɔ́ ywɛsɛ́ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nɔ. Mpok mányìɛ̀ nɛnyíɛ́ mandɛm nsé, ɛ́bhàk amɛm batɨ yap chí mbɔ bɛ bɔmandɛm nsé chí bɔmándɛ́m abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛpɛ́m tɛtɛp. Nɛ ndǔ bábhɨ́kɨ́ re sɛnɛ ndǔ mbi Mandɛm, bákàysi bɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ mandɛm nsé nɛ́chɔŋti bɔ́ bɛsí Mandɛm.
46008008	Ɛ́chí tɛtɛp bɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ́pú kwáy bɛkʉ bɛsɛ́ sɛmbák kɛ́kwɔ́t nɛ Mandɛm. Mbák sɛ́nyìɛ nɛnyíɛ́, ɛyɔ ɛ́pú kwak bhɛsɛ́. Nɛ mbák sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ nyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́, ɛyɔ ɛ́pú kʉ bhɛsɛ́ yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
46008009	Bǎbhɔŋ ngǎngaŋ mɛ́nyiɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎkɔ́ŋɔ́. Kɛ sɔt ka mpok bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ kʉ mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ re sɛnɛ ndǔ mbi Mandɛm ánkwɛ́n ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mányìɛ.
46008010	Sɛ́nsɔ́t bɛ́ mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́re sɛnɛ ndǔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm aghɔ wɔ mmu ɔ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndǔ ɔ́chí amɛm ɛkɛt mandɛm nsé ɔ́nyìɛ nɛnyíɛ́. Wɔ ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɛyɔ ɛ́pú kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Kɛ ɔkáysí bɛ́ ɛ́pú kʉ yi ánkwɛ́n ndǔ ntá anɛ mɛnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn bachyɛ ntá mandɛm nsé? Mbák ɛ́mfákárí nɔ, ɛ́pú chɔŋti ntɨ ɛni amɛm bɛsí Mandɛm?
46008011	Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ wɔ mmu ɔ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɔ́kʉ́, ɛ́nchɔŋti nɛpɛ́m mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ re sɛnɛ ndǔ mbi Mandɛm. Kɛ ɔ́kɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ́ yí wu chí ntɨ manɔ anɛ Kristo ágú ɛ̌ti yi nkwɔ́.
46008012	Dɨŋɨ́ yɛka bɛ́, mbák mmu ákʉ́ ntɨ mmu nkwɔ bɛbʉ́, anchɔŋti ntɨ ɛni ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ re taŋ amɛm, nɔ́ ákʉ́ Kristo nkwɔ bɛbʉ́.
46008013	Ɛ̌ti yɔ, mbák nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn mɛ́nyìɛ nɛbhɔŋ bɛkʉ ntɨ mmu nkwɔ ánkwɛn, chɔŋ mkpɨ́k ndɔ mɛnyiɛ nnya ndu nɛpɛ́m ɛna, tɛ̌ndu mpu yaŋ bɛkʉ ntɨ mmu nkwɔ ankwɛn.
46009001	Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ́yàŋ bɛkʉ kɛ? Mpú mǔnto Yesu Kristo? Mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ́ Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ nɛ amɨ́k kɛ? Pú bɛtɨk ɛbhá kɛ bɛkʉ bǎchí bakoŋo Acha?
46009002	Yɛ̌ ɛ́mbak chí bɛ́ bo báchák bábhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ́ nchí mǔnto Yesu Kristo, be bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ nchí mǔnto Yesu. Nɛbhat anɛ bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Acha, ǎtɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ nchí mǔnto ywi tɛtɛp.
46009003	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́ghati bǒ abhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛ mɛmpú mǔnto Yesu chí bɛ
46009004	bɛsɛ́ bǒnto sɛpú bo abhɛn sɛkway mɛnyiɛ, sɛnyu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎchyɛ̀ wu bhɛsɛ ɛ̌ti bɛtɨk ɛbhɛ́n sɛ́kʉ̀ kɛ?
46009005	Bɛsɛ́ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngǎngaŋ bɛbhay baghɔrɛ́ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛsɛ ánkɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ achi ntɨ mmu nkwɔ, mbɔ bɔ̌nnɔ Yesu Acha nɛ mbɔ Sɛ́fas nɛ bǒnto bachak?
46009006	Kɛ chí ndiɛrɛ Banábas nɛ mɛ kɛ sɛ́chí bǒnto abhɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk nɛ amɔ́ yɛsɛ́ kɛ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ nɛnyíɛ́ mɛ́nyiɛ́?
46009007	Ntɨkɨ mmu ábhák ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu kɛ kɛchyɛ yí nkáp nɛ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chák? Ntɨkɨ mmu ábhɔ̀ŋ nkɨ kɛ yí kɛbhɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́sɔt nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn yí áfɛ́rɛ́ arɛ́ anyiɛ? Ntɨkɨ nchɨkɨ mpɔŋ abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ mɛ́nyú nɛ́bhɨ̌ mpɔŋ?
46009008	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ndɛ́mɛ́ puyɛ̌ chí nkaysi bǒ mmɨk. Pú ɛnyiŋ ɛ́rɛ́ ɛ́mɔt kɛ ɛbhé Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ́mɛ́?
46009009	Nɛ básɨŋ ndǔ bɛbhé Moses bɛ, “Mpok anɛ mpɔŋ ákʉ̀ bɛtɨk ɛbhɨ, bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́gwɔ́t nnyu ywi bɛ́ ákɛ́ nyiɛ́ mbwɔt anɛ yɔ áyàti bɛ amfu ndu bɛkwɔp.” Mandɛm arɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ chí ɛ̌ti mpɔŋ kɛ?
46009010	Pú Mandɛm arɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ chí ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ́? Tɛtɛp, básɨŋ yɔ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm chí ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ ɛ́rɨ bɛ́ mmu anɛ ákwáŋá nkɨ nɛ mmu anɛ áfɛ́rɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛbhɨ mámbáká ntɨ bɛ́ báchyɛ̀ bɔ́ ɛnap nɛnyíɛ́, ndǔ ɛnɛn bɔ báfɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhɨ.
46009011	Sɛ́ghátí bhe Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm mbɔ mmu ǎpɨ̀ mbwɔt ɛbhɨ. Ɛ́bɛp bɛ bě bho bǎbhɔ̀ŋ nsáy ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛsɛ mǎnchyɛ bhɛsɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak kɛ?
46009012	Mbák bǎchyɛ̀ bo báchák nɛnyíɛ́, pú bɛsɛ́ sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́bhɛp be mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́cha bo bachak abhɔ? Yɛ̌ nɔ, sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɛp be mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyu sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhɛp. Sɛ́ká yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ ɛsɔŋɔri. Ɛyɔ ɛ́rɨ ntá yɛsɛ́ ɛ́chá bɛ́kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kwày bɛchɛt be mbi bɛyɨŋɨ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Kristo.
46009013	Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ́ bǒ abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛtɨk amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm, nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnap nɛ́fù chí arɛ́? Nɛ bǒ abhɛn báwày nnya ɛnɛ́ bo bátwɔ̀ nɛ yɔ́ mbɔ akap, bábhɔ̀ŋ nɛnyíɛ́ ndu nnya ɛnɛ́ bɔ́ báwày?
46009014	Ɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛ́mɔ́t mbɔnyu Yesu Acha arɛmɛ bɛ, “Nɛnyiɛ́ mmu anɛ ághàti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nɛ́bhɔŋ bɛ́fú ntá bo abhɛn Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ yi aghati bho áyɛ̀t bhɔ.”
46009015	Yɛ̌ndu ɛ́chí nɔ́, mbɨ́kɨ́ rɛm bɛ́ mǎnkwák mɛ nɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Nɛ mpú sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ ndu bɛ́kʉ mǎntó mɛ mɛnyɨŋ. Ɛ́chí sayri bɛ ngú ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́chá mɛ bɛbhɛp bɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ. Mbɨ́kɨ́ yáŋ yɛ̌ mmu ankʉ nkɛ́pɛrɛ dɛp awɔ́ antɨ bɛ mɛ́ghàti bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nkɛbhɛ́p bɔ mánkwák mɛ.
46009016	Puyɛ̌ bɛ́gháti bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, kɛ ákʉ̀ mɛ mpányu, mbɔnyunɛ ɛyɔ chí bɛtɨk ɛbhɛ́n Mandɛm arɛmɛ bɛ mɛmbɔŋ bɛkʉ. Nɛ mbák mbɨ́kɨ́ ghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, ɛ́bɛ̀p ntá ya ɛ́ncha!
46009017	Mbɔ mɛmbɔŋ kɛ̌ njábhɛ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn, mbʉ́ ɛ́rɨ bɛ́ bo mánchyɛ́ mɛ́ akap ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhá. Kɛ mɛ̌kʉ̀ chí bɛtɨk ɛbhɛ́n Mandɛm ayabhɛ mɛ, afyɛ́ bhɔ́ amɔya, nɛ mbɔŋ bɛkʉ bhɔ.
46009018	Nsáy ya achí yɛ́ bɛ́ yi ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn? Nsáy ya achí chí maŋák amɛn mbɔŋɔ bɛ́gháti bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ndɛ́ndɛm, nkɛ yáŋ nsáy anɛ ngati Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhɔŋ.
46009019	Mmu anɛ nchí nsɛm nta yi apú. Yɛ̌ nɔ́, mɛmbɔŋ nkʉ mmʉɛ́t ɛya nsɛm ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ndǔ nchí yaŋ bɛ́kwák bɛyǎ bo mántwɔ́ ntá Yesu Acha.
46009020	Mpok nchí nɛ bo Israɛl, nchí bhák mbɔ mmu Israɛl ndǔ nchí nu bɛ́kwák bhɔ́ mánsɨ́kɨ́ntɨ nɛ Yesu. Mpok nchí bhák nɛ bǒ abhɛn bákòŋo bɛbhé Moses, nchí bhák mbɔ bhɔ yɛ̌ndu mpú antɛn bɛbhé Moses, ndǔ nchí nu bɛkʉ bɔ́ mántwɔ ntá Yesu Acha.
46009021	Mpok nchí bhak nɛ bǒ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nchí kʉ mɛnyɨŋ chí mbɔ mmu anɛ ápú koŋo bɛbhé Moses, ndǔ nchí nu bɛ́kwák bɔ́ mántwɔ ntá Yesu Acha. Ɛnɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tɔ́ŋ bɛ́ mpú bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm. Ɛbhé Yesu Kristo achyɛ kɛ̌ nchí koŋo.
46009022	Mpok nchí bhák nɛ bǒ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ re sɛnɛ ndǔ mbi Mandɛm, nchí bhak mbɔ bhɔ́ ndǔ nchí nu bɛ́kwák bɔ́ mántwɔ ntá Yesu Acha. Nká bɛbhak yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ntá bǒ mankɛm, ndǔ nchí nu bɛ́bhɔ́ŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi bɛ́kwák bɔ́ mántwɔ ntá Yesu Acha, yi ámpɛ́mɛ́ bhɔ́.
46009023	Nchí kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm chí bɛ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo ántáká mbǎnkɛm, nɛ bɛ́ Mandɛm ánjɛ́t mɛ́ nkwɔ nɛ bɛrɨ ɛbhɛn bo abhɛn bákòŋo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ bábhɔ̀ŋ.
46009024	Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ mpok bɛjɛt ntiɛt, bɛyǎ bo bájɛ̀t, kɛ ndiɛrɛ mmu anɛ ájɛ́rɛ́ áchá batɨ kɛ̌ ábhɔ̀ŋ akap. Nchí ghati yɛ bhe bɛ́ mamfyɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛjɛ́t ntiɛt ɛnyu ɛnɛ bákway bɛ́bhɔ́ŋ akap.
46009025	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ átoŋti mmʉɛt ndu bɛjɛt ntiɛt anɛ bɛbhɔŋ akap, ǎkɛm mmʉɛt ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. Bákʉ̀ nɔ ndu bɛbhɔŋ akap anɛ átàt ánchɔŋti. Kɛ akap anɛ́ sɛ́nù bɛbhɔŋ, chí akap anɛ ábhak mpoknkɛm.
46009026	Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ nchí jɛt téé bɛ́rɔŋ ndǔ ngwɛnti. Mpú mbɔ mmu anɛ áté bɛ́dɛ́p ɛ̌kwɔ́t nɛ ntɨ, kɛ andɔ yí, andɛp nɔkɔ chí mbʉ́ɛ́p.
46009027	Kɛ nchí dɛn mmʉɛt nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ ɛsɔŋɔri bɛ mbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛkɛm mmʉɛt ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. Nchí yaŋ bɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti, Mandɛm akɛ rɔ mɛ ansɛm, mɛ mmu ngati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, ansɔt bo báchák.
46010001	Bɔ̌ma, mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ mǎngɔ́kɔ́ntɨk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí nyaka nɛ bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ mpok bákɔ̀ nɛ Moses amɛm baso. Mandɛm akʉ ɛkpɔkɔ́ nɛbhaŋ ɛ́kúti bhɔ, Manyu Chu akɔrɛ bɛbhe bɛ́páy bákɔ́ amɨk bápé bárɔ́k ɛbhe ɛ́chák.
46010002	Ɛ́bhák chí mbɔ bájwítí bhɔ́ amɛm nɛbháŋ nɛ amɛm Manyu, bɛ́ mámbat mmʉɛt nɛ Moses mǔnti wap.
46010003	Bɔ́ mankɛm báré nyiɛ́ nkúbhɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ maknkay ɛnɛ́n nɛ́fù ntá Mandɛm.
46010004	Nɛ bɔ mankɛm mányú nkúbhɛ́ manyiɛp maknkay amɛn áfù ntá Mandɛm. Nkúbhɛ́ manyiɛp mɛ́rɛ́ kɛ̌ bɔ́ mányú mbɔnyunɛ manyiɛp amɛn áfú ndǔ sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́ ɛsɛ́n sɛ́kɔ̀ nyaka nɛ bhɔ kɛ̌ mányú. Nɛ sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́ ɛsɔ sɛ́bhák Kristo.
46010005	Yɛ̌ndu bághɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ nɔ Mandɛm ákʉ̀ ntá yap, bɛyǎ ɛbhap báré kʉ chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛkʉ Mandɛm ámbé ntɨ nɛ bhɔ́. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, bɛyǎ bhap bágú amɛm baso, bɛrɛnɛ bhap bɛ́rɔ́p arɛ́, mbǎŋ nɛ mbaŋ.
46010006	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fákárí nyaka nɛ bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ́ chí bɛ́ mɛ́nsɛ́mtí nɔ́kɔ́ bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́kɛ́ ŋwaka bɛkʉ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ bɔ́.
46010007	Nɛ bǎkɛ́ koŋo bɔmandɛm nsé mbɔ ɛnyǔ mbɔk ɛyap bákʉ̀ nyaka, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Bo báchɔ́kɔ ndǔ ɛpa mányiɛ, mányú, báfáte bábhɛn bɛpɔ̌ babhɛn ɛ́púsí.”
46010008	Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́chwé ndǔ barak ɛ́púsí mbɔ ɛnyǔ mbɔk ɛyap bákʉ̀ nyaka, ɛ́kʉ́ nká bo ɛsa nsɛm ɛ́rát (23000) ndǔ nkwɔ́ wap bágú ndǔ nywɔp nɛ́mɔ́t.
46010009	Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ mɛ́mɔ́ Acha mbɔ ɛnyǔ mbɔk ɛyap bákʉ̀ nyaka, ɛ́kʉ́ Mandɛm ató nnyɔ́, nɛ nnyɔ́ ɛre waytí bɔ́.
46010010	Nɛ sɛ́kɛ́ bhak bǒ ɛnywíntí mbɔ ɛnyǔ mbɔk ɛyap báchí nyaka, ɛ́kʉ́ ángɛl nɛwú anaŋa bho.
46010011	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm, ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́fákárí nyaka ntá bo Israɛl, bɛ́chí chí bɛrɨŋ ntá bo báchák. Kɛ ntá yɛsɛ, básɨŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ mɛ́nsɛ́mtí nɔ́kɔ́ bhɛsɛ bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ánsɔ́t mpok nɛ́nɛ, ɛnɛ́ ngwɛnti mmɨk arɔbhɛ kɛkwɔt.
46010012	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákáysí bɛ́ atéé sayri, ánsɔ́t yɛ mpok bɛ́ ákɛ́ kwɛ́n.
46010013	Kɛ dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛmɔ ɛnɛn nɛ́tɛ́mɛ́rí mmu ywɛka, chí ɛnyǔ nɛmɔ ɛnɛ́n nɛ́náŋ nɛ́tɛ́mɛ́rí bo báchák nkwɔ. Mandɛm apú nɔ́k bɛbhʉrɛ bariɛp ami, nɛ apú kwáy bɛrɔ yɛ̌ nɛmɔ nɛ́ntwɔ́ ntá mmu ywɛka ɛnɛn nɛtaŋa nɛcha yi. Mpok nɛmɔ nɛ́twɔ́ ntá mmu ywɛka, Mandɛm ǎtɔŋ yi mbi bɛ́ yi ántaŋ ancha nɛmɔ ɛnɔ, ante kpirí kɛ kwɛn.
46010014	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, ndǔ ɛ́chí nɔ́, bǎkɛ́ fyɛ́ yɛ́ amɔ ndǔ barak mandɛm nsé.
46010015	Bǎchí bǒ abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ kɛboŋ. Bě bábhɔŋ mǎnjɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛghɔ mbák ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́nɛ́ mɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ́pú tɛtɛp.
46010016	Mpok sɛ́nyìɛ nɛnyíɛ́ Acha, sɛ́sɔ̀t nkɔ́p mmɛm sɛ́nchyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm, bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́nyú. Nɛkʉ anɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ nɔ́, pú sɛ́chɛ̀m mmʉɛt nɛ batɨ ndǔ manoŋ Kristo? Nɛ mpok sɛ́bɔkɔti brɛ́t sɛ́nyìɛ, pú sɛ́chɛ̀m mmʉɛt nɛ batɨ ndǔ mmʉɛt Kristo?
46010017	Ɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛ́t ɛ́mɔt kɛ ɛchí. Yɛ̌ndu bɛsɛ́ sɛ́yá, sɛ́chí mmʉɛt amɔt, mbɔnyunɛ bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́nyìɛ chi brɛ́t ɛ́rɛ amɔt.
46010018	Yɨŋɨ́ ká bo Israɛl, báwày nnya mánchyɛ mbɔ akap ntá Mandɛm. Pú bo mankɛm abhɛn mányìɛ̀ nnya yɔ báchɛ̀m mmʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm amfay ɛfɛmɛ akap ndǔ akabhɛ wu?
46010019	Mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌yáŋ bɛkʉ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ chí yí? Chí bɛ́ mandɛm nsé anɛ́ bǒ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm báchyɛ̀ akap nta yi abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ kɛ? Kɛ chí bɛ́ nnya ɛnɛ́ báchyɛ̀ mbɔ akap ntá mandɛm nsé ɛcha nnya ɛ́chák?
46010020	Wáwák! Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌yàŋ bɛkʉ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ chí bɛ akap anɛ́ bǒ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm báchyɛ̀, báchyɛ̀ chí ntá bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ, puyɛ̌ chí ntá Mandɛm. Nɛ mpú yáŋ mǎnchɛ́m mmʉɛt nɛ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ.
46010021	Bǎpú kwáy bɛsɔt nkɔ́p Acha mǎnjibhiri mmʉɛt mǎnyú nɔkɔ mmɛ́m bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ. Nɛ bǎbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ mɛ́nyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ Acha, mǎnjibhiri mmʉɛt mányìɛ̀ nɔkɔ nɛnyíɛ́ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ.
46010022	Kwáé! Bǎyàŋ bɛkʉ bɛběntɨ́ Mandɛm mɛ́mbák nɛ bhɛsɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bo Israɛl bákʉ́ nyaka? Bǎkáysí bɛ́ sɛ́taŋ sɛ́chá Mandɛm kɛ́?
46010023	Bǎrɛ̀m bɛ́ bábhɔŋ ngǎngaŋ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. Kɛ puyɛ̌ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ kɛ̌ ɛ́kwàk mmu. Nɛ bǎrɛ̀m bɛ́ bǎbhɔŋ ngǎngaŋ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, kɛ puyɛ̌ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ kɛ̌ ɛ́kwàk mmu ántáŋ ndǔ barak Mandɛm.
46010024	Yɛ̌ mmǔ ywɛka ákɛ́ kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kwák yí aywǐntí. Mmu ywɛká apɛrɛ́ kʉ́ ɛnyɨŋ, ánkʉ́ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kwàk bo báchák nkwɔ́.
46010025	Bǎkwày mɛ́nyiɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nnya anɛ bátì ɛsiɛ́, kɛbhɛ́p mbák chí nnya anɛ báchyɛ́ mbɔ akap ntá njɔ̌ fú. Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ bɛ mǎnkʉ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chɔŋti batɨ yɛka amɛm.
46010026	Nchí rɛm nɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ básɨŋ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Mandɛm kɛ̌ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mmɨk, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́chí arɛ́.”
46010027	Mbák mmu anɛ ápú nkoŋo Yesu ámbɨ́ŋɨ́ mmu ywɛká ɛkɛt ɛyi ndǔ nɛnyíɛ́, nɛ mmu wu anka bɛ́rɔ́ŋ, ánáŋ ándɔ́k, ányiɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bábhʉ́rɛ́ yí bɛsí. Ákɛ́ bhɛp mbák chí nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn báchyɛ́ mbɔ akap ntá njɔfú. Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ bɛ yi ankʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛkway bɛchɔŋti ntɨ ɛni amɛm.
46010028	Kɛ mbák bághátí wɔ́ bɛ, “Nɛnyiɛ́ ɛnɛn chí nɛnyíɛ́ mandɛm nsé”, kɛ́nyiɛ́ nɔ́. Nɛ́kwày bɛ́chɔ́ŋti ntɨ mmu wu amɛm.
46010029	Mpú rɛm nɔ chí ɛ̌ti ntɨ mmu ywɛká. Nchí rɛm chí ɛ̌ti ntɨ mmu achák wu. Mmu ǎkwáy bɛ́rɛ́m bɛ, “Ndaká yí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chɔ̀ŋti ntɨ mmu achák amɛm ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kaŋ mɛ bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mbɔŋ ngǎngaŋ ndǔ mmʉɛ́t ɛya?”
46010030	Mbák mɛ̌chyɛ̀ Mandɛm bakak kɛ nnyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ ndaká yí mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́chɔ́ŋti nnyɛ́n ɛna?
46010031	Nchí ghati yɛ bhe bɛ yɛ̌ mmǔ ywɛka ǎnyìɛ chí nɛnyíɛ́, yɛ̌ ɛnyɨŋ kɛ̌ yí ányù, abhɔŋ bɛkʉ yɔ́ ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bo bághɔ̀ mánchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó.
46010032	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛ́bhʉrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ nɛ́pú chyɛ mmu áchák ɛsɔŋɔri ndǔ ɛni nɛpɛ́m, Yɛ̌ chí mmu Israɛl, yɛ̌ chí mmu anɛ ápú mmu Israɛl, nɛ yɛ̌ chí bǒ nkwɔ́ Mandɛm.
46010033	Mɛmbɔŋ nchí kʉ ɛnyu yɔ. Nchí nu chí bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ámbɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ́kʉ̀. Mpú kʉ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛmbɔŋ nkɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́rɨ́ ntá ya. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɨ́ ntá bo bachak kɛ̌ mɛ́kʉ̀, mbɔnyunɛ nchí yaŋ bɔ mántwɔ ntá Mandɛm bɛ yi ampɛmɛ bhɔ.
46011001	Ŋɔkɔ́ ká ɛpɨŋ ɛya, mbɔ ɛnyǔ mɛ̌ŋɔ̀kɔ ɛpɨŋɨ́ Kristo.
46011002	Nchí bɨ́tí bhe tontó bɛ́ bǎkaysi mɛ ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ nɛ bǎkòŋo sayri mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ntɔ́ŋɔ́ bhe.
46011003	Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chí ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌yáŋ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́. Kristo achí mǔnti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbakanɛm, mbakanɛm achí mǔnti ngɔrɛ́ aywi, nɛ Mandɛm achí mǔnti Kristo.
46011004	Mbakanɛm anɛ yɛ̌ ǎnɨ̀k chí mmʉɛt yɛ̌ ǎghati chí bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm, mbák ǎkʉ̀ nɔ ntí kútí, nɔ apú chyɛ Kristo mǔnti ywi kɛnókó.
46011005	Nɛ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ, yɛ̌ ǎnɨ̀k chí mmʉɛt yɛ̌ ǎghati chí bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm, mbák ǎkʉ̀ nɔ kɛkuti ntí, nɔ́ apu chyɛ mǔnti ywi kɛnókó, nɛ achí ɛnyumɔt mbɔ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ámú ntí.
46011006	Mbák ngɔrɛ́ apú yaŋ bɛkuti ntí, ámkpɨk andɔk mamu wu. Kɛ tɛ̌ndu mɛ́mu ntí chí ɛnyɨŋɨ́ ntíanwɔ́p ntá ngɔrɛ́ abhɔŋ yɛ́ bɛkuti ntí.
46011007	Mbakanɛm ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́kúti ntí ndǔ mpok nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm ághókó mbakanɛm bɛ ámbák mbɔ yímbɔŋ ndǔ bɛyǎ babhi. Mbakanɛm abhɔŋ bɛkʉ́ bo mangɔ́ mɛnwɔp Mandɛm, kɛ ngɔrɛ́ ǎtɔ́ŋ chí mɛnwɔp ɛbhɛn nnɛ́m ywi.
46011008	Bě bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ mbakanɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ fú ntá ngɔrɛ́, ngɔrɛ́ kɛ̌ áfú ntá mbakanɛm.
46011009	Nɛ Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ ghoko mbakanɛm ɛ̌ti ngɔrɛ́, kɛ aghókó ngɔrɛ́ ɛ̌ti mbakanɛm.
46011010	Ndu ɛ́chí nɔ́, ngɔrɛ́ abhɔŋ bɛkuti ntí ywi mbɔ ɛrɨŋ bɛtɔŋ bɛ yí achi antɛn nnɛ́m ywi, mbɔnyunɛ bɔángɛl báyɨ̀ŋɨ.
46011011	Yɛ̌ndu ɛchi nɔ, bɛsɛ́ bo sɛ́bhárɛ́ mʉɛt nɛ Acha sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ngɔrɛ́ apú ndǔ mʉɛt ɛyi, achí antɛnɛ́ mbakanɛm. Nɛ mbakanɛm apú ndǔ mʉɛt ɛyi, achí antɛnɛ́ ngɔrɛ́.
46011012	Ɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ, ngɔrɛ́ afú chí amʉɛt mbakanɛm. Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, ngɔrɛ́ kɛ ábhe mbakanɛm. Nɛ bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm bɛ́fù chí ntá Mandɛm.
46011013	Bě babhɔŋ mǎngati mɛ ndak anɛ: ɛ́chí sayri bɛ ngɔrɛ́ ánɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm nɛntɨ bǒnkwɔ kɛkuti ntí?
46011014	Bɛkoŋo ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ Mandɛm ághókó mɛnyɨŋ, be babhɔŋ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ́ ɛrɔ́rí ɛmɛnɛ chí ɛnyɨŋ ntíánwɔ́p nta mbakanɛm?
46011015	Kɛ ngɔrɛ́, ɛrɔ́rí ɛmɛnɛ ɛ́kwǎy nɛ yí tontó. Ɛ́kwǎy nɛ yí mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm achyɛ́ yí ɛmɛnɛ́ntí bɛ ɛ́mbák mbɔ ndɛn anɛ ngɔrɛ́ ákuti ntí nɛ yɔ.
46011016	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ áyàŋ bɛkɛm ɛpʉ́ítí ndǔ ndak anɛ, ándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bɛsɛ́ bǒnto Yesu nɛ batɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ bǒnkwɔ Mandɛm bachak, sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́chák bɛrɛm.
46011017	Kɛ bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌yàŋ bɛghati bhe nɛ́nɛ, mpú bɨti bhe mbɔnyunɛ mpok anɛ bǎchɛm nɛbhʉɛt amɔt ndu mɛnɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm bǎpú kʉ nɔ chí ndu bɛ́ghóko, bǎchɔ̀ŋti chɔ́ŋti.
46011018	Ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɨ ɛnɛ́ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́rɛm ɛchi bɛ: Bághátí mɛ bɛ mpok bǎchɛmti mbɔ bǒ nkwɔ́, bǎkɔ̀rɛ mmʉɛt ndǔ bakwɔ́, mǎnkɛm nɔkɔ ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ batɨ. Nɛ nnókó bɛ́ tɛtɛp achí ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bághátí mɛ́.
46011019	Ɛrɨ mbɔŋ bɛ ákɔ́rɛ́ ámbák nɛ́ntɨ́ ɛnɛká ndu bɛkʉ mǎngɔ́ bǒ abhɛn bákòŋo Yesu nɛ ntɨ nɛ́mɔ́t.
46011020	Mpok anɛ bǎchɛm nɛbhʉɛt amɔt, puyɛ̌ chí nɛnyíɛ́ Acha kɛ̌ mǎnyìɛ.
46011021	Nchí rɛm nɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ mpok bǎchɛm ɛbhak ɛ́mɔ́t, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ǎwɛnɛ chi mɛ́nyiɛ ɛni nɛnyíɛ́, kɛnoŋ batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ. Ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ bɛ mbɔk yɛka manchɔkɔ nsay, ɛnɛ́ báchák mányìɛ, mányu, mánkwɛn.
46011022	Kwáé! Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛkɛt ɛbhɛn mǎnyiɛ́ mǎnyú arɛ́ kɛ? Bǎyàŋ bɛ́byak chí bǒ nkwɔ́ Mandɛm mǎnchyɛ bǒ abhɛn ɛyap ɛ́pú ntíánwɔ́p kɛ? Bǎyàŋ ngátí bhe bɛ yi ɛ̌ti ndak anɛ? Bǎyáŋ bɛ mbɨ́tí bhe kɛ́? Nse. Mpú kwáy bɛ́bɨti bhe wáwák!
46011023	Mpú kwáy bɛ́bɨti bhe mbɔnyunɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Acha ághátí mɛ́ kɛ̌ ngátí bhé nkwɔ́. Ɛ́chí bɛ́ ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ bɛti ɛbhɛ́n bátí yi, asɔt ɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt,
46011024	achyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm, abho bɛ́bɔ́kɔ́ti ɛkpɔkɔ́ brɛt ɛyɔ anchyɛ nɔkɔ ntá bakoŋo bhi andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Nɛ́ chí mmʉɛ́t ɛya anɛ mɛ̌chyɛ̀ ɛ̌ti yɛká. Kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ ká ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ndu bɛ́tɨk mɛ.”
46011025	Mánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ mɛ́nyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́, asɔt nkɔ́p nɛ mmɛ̌m amɛm, achyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yí ákʉ́ nɛ nɛnyíɛ́, abho bɛ́chyɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap andɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Nɛ́ chí nku nkɔ anɛ Mandɛm ányú nɛ bǒ mmɨk ɛ̌ti nɛwú ɛna. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ mǎnyu mmɛm ndu nkɔ́p anɛ kʉ ka nɔ́ ndu bɛ́tɨ́k mɛ.”
46011026	Ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ kpatɛ mpok anɛ Acha ápɛ̀tnsɛm, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ mǎnyìɛ brɛt anɛ, mǎnyú mmɛ̌m amɛn, bǎghati bo bɛ́ yi agu nyaka ndu bɛ́pɛ́mɛ bhɛsɛ́.
46011027	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, yɛ̌ agha anɛ ányìɛ nɛnyíɛ́ Acha, ansɔt nkɔ́p ayi anyu ɛnɛ́ ápú chyɛ yí kɛnókó, ɛnyǔ mmu wu ǎkʉ̀ bɛbʉ́ mbɔnyunɛ yí ásɔ̀t mmʉɛt Acha nɛ manoŋ ami mbɔ ɛráká ndak.
46011028	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ yɛ́ bɛ́chák ntɨ ɛni kɛ ansɔt brɛt nɛ nkɔ́p Acha.
46011029	Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ányìɛ nɛnyíɛ́ Acha, ansɔt nkɔ́p ayi ɛnɛ́ yí ábhɨ́kɨ́ kaysi bɛ́chyɛ́ mmʉɛt Acha kɛnókó, chɔŋ Mandɛm antɛmsi yí.
46011030	Ɛ̌ti ɛyɔ kɛ̌ bɛyǎ bhɛka mámè, báchák kɛpɛrɛ bhɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ, nɛ abhɛ́nɛ́fú bágu.
46011031	Kɛ mbák bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛ́chàk mmʉɛt, Mandɛm apú táŋ bhɛsɛ́.
46011032	Kɛ mbák Acha ǎtàŋ bhɛsɛ́, ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ́ ntɛ́msí ndu mɛ́nyúrɛ bhɛsɛ́ bɛ́ ɛwak ɛnɛ Mandɛm átàŋ bǒ mmɨk, ákɛ́ tɛmsi bhɛsɛ́ nkwɔ́.
46011033	Bɔ̌ma, mpok anɛ bǎchɛmti bɛ mǎnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛkɔŋ kɛ mǎnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ Acha, bo abhɛn báyámbɨ, bábhɔŋ mɛnoŋ batɨ.
46011034	Mbák nsay ǎnu mmǔ, ánjámbɨ ányíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛkɛt ɛyi, bɛ́ mpok bǎchɛ́mɛ́ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt, bǎkɛ́ kʉ Mandɛm ámbé ntɨ. Bɛ́yɨŋɨ barak áchák, chɔŋ mɛmbɔŋ ntwɔ́ awu nchyɛ́ bhe maníɛ́ ɛnyǔ babhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ.
46012001	Bɔ̌ma, nɛ́nɛ, bɛyɨŋɨ mɛnyǔ akap anɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ̀, mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ mǎmbák ndǔ ɛjuri.
46012002	Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ mpok anɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ re bho bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ baraká Mandɛm, bo bákʉ̀ nyaka mǎnɛ́m ɛbhɨ ndǔ bɛyǎ mɛnyu, mǎnchyɛ nɔkɔ kɛnókó ntá bɔmandɛm abhɛn bápú rɛm kɛpɨ.
46012003	Nchí yáŋ yɛ́ be mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mbák Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm achí nɛ mmu, apú kway bɛ́rɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo. Nɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛ́rɛm bɛ Yesu chí Acha mbák Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ apú nɛ yi.
46012004	Akap anɛ bǒ Mandɛm bábhɔ̀ŋ áchí mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu, kɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ́ amɔt kɛ̌ áchyɛ̀ akap ankɛm.
46012005	Bɛtɨk Yesu Acha ɛbhɛ́n bo Mandɛm bákwày bɛkʉ bɛ́chí mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu kɛ Acha ɛrɛ amɔt kɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk ɛbhi.
46012006	Babhi áchí mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu anɛ́ Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bɛtɨk ndǔ bapɛ́m ayɛsɛ́, kɛ Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ amɔt kɛ̌ áchyɛ̀ bɛtaŋ ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ndu bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ.
46012007	Chi bɛkwak bǒnkwɔ kɛ̌ Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ akap anɛ́ átɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achí nɛ mmu.
46012008	Ntá mmu amɔt, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ǎchyɛ akap bɛchyɛ maníɛ́. Ntá mmu achak Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ anchyɛ akap bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́ yi andɨ́ŋɨ́.
46012009	Ntá mmu amɔt Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ǎchyɛ nɛka, ntá mmu achák anchyɛ akap bɛ́bú bo mame.
46012010	Ntá mmu amɔt Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ǎchyɛ akap bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay, ntá achák anchyɛ akap bɛghati bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛfu ntá Mandɛm. Ntá mmu amɔt ǎchyɛ akap bɛrɨŋɨ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nɛ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ, ntá achák anchyɛ akap bɛrɛm bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn yi abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, nɛ ntá anufú anchyɛ akap mɛ́nɛ́nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu arɛmɛ ndǔ ɛyɔŋ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ yi abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.
46012011	Nkúbhɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm amɔt kɛ áchyɛ akap anɛ ankɛm. Yí ǎchyɛ akap ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu mbɔ ɛnyu yí áyàŋ.
46012012	Sɛ́rɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ nkwǎŋwaŋ abhɔŋ chí mmʉɛt amɔt, kɛ bɛ́pókómʉɛt bɛchi nyáŋá nyáŋá. Yɛ̌ndu bɛ́pókómʉɛt bɛyǎ, ndiɛrɛ mmʉɛt amɔt kɛ áchí. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛ́chí nɛ Kristo.
46012013	Mbɔk yɛsɛ́ sɛ́chí bo Israɛl, báchák bápú bo Israɛl. Mbɔk yɛsɛ́ sɛ́chí basɛm, báchák bápú basɛm. Kɛ bájwítí bhɛsɛ́ mankɛm chí ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ɛ́rɛ́ amɔt, nɛ sɛ́rɔp chí mmʉɛt amɔt mbɔ mmu amɔt.
46012014	Ɛ́chí tɛtɛp bɛ́ mmʉɛt nkwǎŋwaŋ abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ chi ɛ́pókómʉɛt ɛ́mɔt. Abhɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ bɛ́pókómʉɛt..
46012015	Mbák ɛkak ɛ́ndɛ́m bɛ, “Tɛ̌ndu mpú awɔ, mpú ɛ́pókómʉɛt.” Ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ bɛ ɛkak ɛ́kɛ́ bhak ɛ́pókómʉɛt kɛ́?
46012016	Nɛ mbák atú ándɛm bɛ, “Tɛ̌ndu mpú nyɛ́sɛ́, mpú ɛpókómʉɛt”, ɛyɔ ɛ́pú kʉ bɛ́ atú ákɛ bhák ɛ́pókómʉɛt.
46012017	Mbák mmʉɛt nkɛm achí chí nyɛ́sɛ́, mmu ǎkwáy bɛ́ghok mbaŋ ná? Nɛ mbák mmʉɛt nkɛm áchí chí átú, mmu ǎkwáy bɛ́ghok ɛriɛp ná?
46012018	Kɛ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́chi, Mandɛm aghókó bɛ́pókómʉɛt mɛnkɛm, akʉ bɛ bɔ mɛ́mbak mmu amʉɛt mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi áyáŋá nyaka bɛ mɛ́mbak.
46012019	Mbɔ bɛ́pókómʉɛt mɛnkɛm bɛ́chí chí ɛ́pókómʉɛt ɛ́mɔ́t, mbʉ́ mmʉɛt nkwǎŋwaŋ ǎfu fá?
46012020	Kɛ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́chi, bɛ́pókómʉɛt bɛ́yǎ, kɛ ndiɛrɛ mmʉɛt amɔt kɛ achi.
46012021	Nyɛ́sɛ́ mmu nɛ́pú kwáy bɛ́gháti awɔ́ bɛ, “Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ́kʉ nɛ wɔ?” Nɛ ntí apu kway bɛ́gháti bɛkak bɛ, “Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛ́kʉ nɛ wɔ.”
46012022	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛrɨŋɨ chí bɛ mmu apú kway bɛbhák nɛpɛ́m mbák mámfɛ́rɛ́ bɛ́pókómʉɛt ɛbhɛ́n bo bákáysí bɛ́ bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ mɛnwɔp yi amʉɛt.
46012023	Nɛ bɛ́pókómʉɛt ɛbhɛ́n sɛ́kàysi bɛ́ bɛ́pú yɛ̌nyɨŋ, bɔ́ kɛ̌ sɛre sɔt mpok bɛ́kɛ́m. Nɛ bɛ́pókómʉɛt ɛbhɛ́n sɛ́bhɛ̀sɛ bɛ́ bo bákɛ́ ghɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k, bɔ kɛ sɛ́kɛ̀m sayri ɛncha,
46012024	bɛ́pókómʉɛt ɛbhɛn bɛ́pú chyɛ mmu ntíánwɔ́p. Kɛ Mandɛm aghókó mmʉɛt yɛsɛ́ ɛnyu ɛnɛ sɛ́chyɛ̀ bɛ́pókómʉɛt ɛbhɛ́n bo bábhɔ̀ŋ ntíánwɔ́p nɛ bhɔ kɛnókó ɛ́ncha bɛ́pókómʉɛt bɛ́chák.
46012025	Mandɛm aghókó mmʉɛt nkwǎŋwaŋ ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛ́pókómʉɛt ɛmbak sayri nɛ bɛ́pókómʉɛt bɛ́chák.
46012026	Mbák ɛ́pókómʉɛt ɛ́mɔ́t ɛ́ghòk bɛbe, bɛ́chák mɛnkɛm bɛ́ghòk bɛbe, nɛ mbák báchyɛ̀ ɛpókómʉɛt ɛ́mɔ́t kɛnókó, bɛ́chák bɛ́bhɔŋ maŋák nɛ yɔ́.
46012027	Bě bǒnkwɔ mankɛm bǎchí mmʉɛt Kristo nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka achi ɛ́pókómʉɛt Yesu.
46012028	Nɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ bo abhɛn babhɔ́ŋɔ́ akap mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu ndǔ nkwɔ bakoŋo Yesu. Bǒ mbɨ chí abhɛn yi áchyɛ́ akap bɛbhak bǒnto Yesu. Abhɛn bákòŋo chí bo abhɛn Mandɛm achyɛ akap bɛ́gháti bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛfu ntá yi. Abhɛn bapɛt bákòŋo chí abhɛn yi áchyɛ akap bɛ́tɔŋ bo Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Ǎchyɛ̀ báchák akap bɛ́kʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay, abhɛ́nɛ́fú anchyɛ akap bɛ́bu bǒmame, báchák akap bɛ́kwak bho. Ǎchyɛ̀ abhɛnɛfu akap bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ bɛkɛm bo sayri. Achyɛ bachak akap bɛrɛm bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛ́n bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.
46012029	Bo mankɛm báchí bǒnto kɛ́? Bo mankɛm báchí barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ kɛ? Bo mankɛm báchí batɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ? Bo mankɛm bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay kɛ?
46012030	Bo mankɛm babhɔŋ akap bɛ́bu bǒmame kɛ? Bo mankɛm bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ akap bɛrɛm bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛ́n bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ kɛ? Bo mankɛm babhɔŋ akap mɛnɛnɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bárɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn babhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ kɛ?
46012031	(a) Kɛ fyɛ́ ká nti ndǔ bɛbhɔŋ akap anɛ acha achak. (b) Nɛ́nɛ, chɔ́ŋ ntɔŋ be mbi anɛ árɨ́ áchá áchák ankɛm, bɛ mǎnkoŋo chí wu.
46013001	Yɛ̌ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛrɛm chi bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk mɛnkɛm nɛ bɛyɔŋɔ́ bɔángɛl nkwɔ, mbák mbɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ bo, nɔ́ nchí chí mbɔ akánkáŋ nɛ njánɛ́ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́yɔ̀ŋ.
46013002	Nɛ yɛ̌ mbɔ́ŋ chí akap bɛ́gháti bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm nɛ mbák ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm, yɛ̌ chí mɛnyɨŋ Mandɛm ɛbhɛ́n bɛchí bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́, nɛ mbák mbɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌kwáy bɛ́gháti njiɛ ngo bɛ, “Fǎ fá”, amfa, kɛ nkɛ kɔŋ bo, nɔ mpú yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
46013003	Mbák nchyɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhá mɛnkɛm ntá bho, nchyɛ́ yɛ̌ chí mmʉɛ́t ɛya bɛ mánsɔ́ŋ, kɛ nkɛ kɔŋ bo, ɛyɔ ɛpu kwák mɛ ndǔ yɛ̌ mbi.
46013004	Mbák mmu akɔŋ bo, ǎbhɔŋ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́ nɛ bhɔ, ǎtɔŋ bɔ bɛrɨ́ntɨ, apú bhɔŋ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ bhɔ, nɛ apu pányu nɛ bhɔ.
46013005	Mbák mmu akɔŋ bo apú yoŋ mmʉɛt, apú kʉ barak ntíánwɔ́p, apú yɨŋɨ chi ndiɛrɛ mmʉɛt yi. Apú kaysi chí ndiɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛkwak yímbɔŋ, apú wakari bɛbent, apú fyɛ bo antɨ mbák bákʉ yi bɛbʉ́.
46013006	Mmu anɛ akɔŋ bo apú bhɔŋ maŋák mpok bákʉ́ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ, ǎbhɔŋ maŋák mpok bo bákʉ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛchí chak.
46013007	Mmu anɛ akɔŋ bo, apú fɛrɛ ntɨ nɛ bo abhɛn bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́, ápú rɔ bɛ́fyɛ ntí nɛ bo mpoknkɛm, ápú rɔ bɛbhaka ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛmbak sayri, nɛ ǎte kpirí ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
46013008	Ɛkɔŋ ɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Kɛ mbák chi akap bɛghati bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú nta Mandɛm, chɔŋ wu ámfʉɛt. Chɔŋ akap bɛrɛm bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn mmu abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ ámay nɛ anɛ́ bɛrɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áfʉɛrɛ fʉɛt nkwɔ.
46013009	Nɛ́nɛ, sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ chí mbɔk mbɔk. Nɛ sɛ́ghàti bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bhɛsɛ antɨ chí mbɔk mbɔk.
46013010	Kɛ mpok anɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́jwí pɔɔt bɛ́twɔ́, chɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí mbɔk nɛ́nɛ mɛ́may.
46013011	Mpok mbʉɛ́t mandu mmɔ, nchí rɛm nyaka kɛpɨ mbɔ mǎmbɔ, nkaysi nɔkɔ barak mbɔ mǎmbɔ, ngɔ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ mǎmbɔ. Kɛ mpok nnáŋ nchɨ́kɨ́, ndɔ baraká kɛ̌mbɔ́.
46013012	Nɛ́nɛ, sɛ́ghɔ̀ mɛnyɨŋ chi bɛbhɛrí bɛ́bhɛ́rí mbɔ bɛ sɛ́yɨ̀ŋɨ chí ɛ́kírísú ɛnɛ ɛchí bɛbhɛrí bɛ́bhɛ́rí. Kɛ mpok yɔ ánkwáy, chɔŋ sɛ́ngɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ sayri nɛ amɨ́k. Nɛ́nɛ, ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ chí mbɔk mbɔk, kɛ mpok yɔ ánkwáy, chɔŋ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ sayri nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm árɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ sayri.
46013013	Mɛnyɨŋ bɛchi bɛrat ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhak mpoknkɛm. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhɛrɛ chi nɛka, nɛbhakántɨ, nɛ ɛkɔŋ. Kɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛrat, ɛnɛ ɛcha bɛchak mɛnkɛm chi ɛkɔŋ.
46014001	Fiɛ́ ká ntí ndǔ bɛ́bhɔŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ bho, mǎmbɔŋ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ánchyɛ́ be akap, sayri sayri, akap bɛ́gháti bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm.
46014002	Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn yi abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ, apú rɛm mɛnyɨŋ ntá bho, ǎrɛ̀m chi ntá Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ mmu apu jwimɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m. Ǎrɛ̀m chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛyɨŋɨ Mandɛm nɛ bɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́, ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm.
46014003	Kɛ mmu anɛ ághàti bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú nta Mandɛm ǎchyɛ̀ bhɔ bɛtaŋ, afyɛ́ bho ntɨ, nɛ ǎchyɛ̀ bhɔ nɛpɔptǐntɨ.
46014004	Mmǔ anɛ árɛ̀m bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, ǎchyɛ̀ chi mmʉɛt yi bɛtaŋ. Kɛ mmu anɛ ághàti bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ǎchyɛ̀ batɨ bǒnkwɔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm.
46014005	Nchí yaŋ bɛ be mǎnkɛm mǎndɛm bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, kɛ sayri sayri, nchí yaŋ mǎngati bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ be antɨ. Mmu anɛ árɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ yi antɨ achá anɛ árɛ̀m bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn yi abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ mbák mbɔ̌ŋ mmu akabhɛ́ bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk abhɨ́kɨ́ nɛ́nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ ɛnchyɛ bo bɛtaŋ.
46014006	Bɔ̌ma, mbák ntwɔ́ ntá yɛka ndɛmɛ nɔkɔ chi bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, chɔŋ nkwak be ná? Mbɔŋ bɛkʉ mǎndɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ mɛndɨ́ŋɨ́, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm, nɛ ɛbhɛ́n yi afyɛ́ mɛ antɨ bɛ ngati bho, nɛ mbɔŋ bɛtɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi.
46014007	Mbák mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m mbɔ mbaŋ bɛ́fé nɛ nɛkɨ́ŋ bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ ɛrɨ́tí ɛyɔŋ, ná mmu ákway bɛrɨŋɨ nɛkwáy ɛnɛn báfè nɛ mbaŋ, nɛ ɛnɛ́n bákwɛ̀t?
46014008	Nɛ mbák mmbá nɛnu ábhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ ɛyɔŋ sayri, agha ákway bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ chi mmbá nɛnu, antoŋti mmʉɛt bɛ́ ándɔ́k ɛbhɨ̌nɛnu?
46014009	Ɛ́chí ɛnyumɔt nɛ bhe. Mbák mǎndɛm ɛnyɨŋ ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, bo bápú kway bɛjwimɛm. Ná bɔ bákway yɛ bɛrɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bárɛ̀m? Ɛ́bhak ntá yap chi mbɔ bɛ bǎrɛ̀m kɛpɨ nɛ mbʉ́ɛ́p, nɛ́ ɛ́pú bhɔŋ ntí.
46014010	Bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk bɛyǎ fá amɨk, nɛ bɛ́chí kɛkúrí kɛkúrí. Nɛ yɛ ɛ́mɔt ɛpu ɛnɛ bo abhɛn bárɛ̀m yɔ bápú ghok.
46014011	Kɛ mbák mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ mmu árɛ̀m, nchí bhak chi kɛnkɔ ntá yi, yí nkwɔ ambak chí kɛnkɔ ntá ya.
46014012	Nchí ghati yɛ bhe bɛ, tɛ̌ndu bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛbhɔŋ akap anɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm áchyɛ̀, fyɛ́ ká ntí tontó ndǔ akap anɛ́ ákwak bǒnkwɔ mántaŋ mandɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ.
46014013	Mmu anɛ árɛ̀m ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, anɨ́kmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ánchyɛ́ yi akap mɛ́nɛ́nɛ́ nta bho ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ yi abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ.
46014014	Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ mbák nchí nɨkmʉɛt ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, ɛfóŋó ɛya kɛ ɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt ɛnɛ́, ndǔ nkaysi ya, mpú jwimɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́rɛ̀m.
46014015	Chɔŋ nkʉ yɛ yi? Chɔŋ nnɨ́k nɔkɔ mmʉɛt nɛ ɛfóŋó ɛya nɛ nnɨkmʉɛt nɛ nkaysi ya nkwɔ. Chɔŋ nkway nɔkɔ bakway nɛ ɛfóŋó ɛya nɛ nkwáy nɔkɔ nɛ nkaysi ya nkwɔ́.
46014016	Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ, mbák mmu ywɛka ǎnɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛchyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm ndu ɛfóŋó, ná mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m ǎkway bɛka bɛ, “Amen” ɛnɛ́ yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ jwimɛm?
46014017	Yɛ̌ mmu ánchyɛ chyɛ́ ɛrɨ́tí bakak ntá Mandɛm, nɛnɨkímʉɛt ɛnɔ nɛ́pú chyɛ mmu achak bɛtaŋ.
46014018	Nkáká Mandɛm bɛ, ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ, ndɛm bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ncha bhe mankɛm.
46014019	Yɛ̌ nɔ, ndǔ nchɛmti bǒnkwɔ, ɛrɨ ntá ya, bɛghati bho mɛnyɨŋ nɛ bɛyɔŋ bɛtay ɛbhɛn bo bághòk mánjwimɛm, ɛcha bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ nɛ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛya bɛcha nka byo ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.
46014020	Bɔ̌ma bǎkɛ́ bhak mǎmbɔ ndǔ nkaysi yɛka. Bák ká mbɔ bɔ abhɛn babhʉɛt amɔ ndu barak bɛbʉ́, kɛ ndǔ nkaysi ayɛka bák ká bɛsɛ́nɛ́ bho.
46014021	Básɨŋ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ Acha arɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ nsɔt bǒ bɛtɔk bɛchak abhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn bǒbha bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ndɛm kɛpɨ ntá yap. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bǒbha bápú tá chɔŋ batú bɛghok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́rɛ̀m.”
46014022	Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛ bɛrɛm kɛpɨ ndǔ bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn bo bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, chí ɛrɨŋ ntá bo abhɛn babhɨkɨ noko Yesu Kristo, puyɛ̌ ntá bo abhɛn mánóko. Kɛ akap bɛghati bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm, chí ɛrɨŋ ntá bo abhɛn mánóko.
46014023	Mbák Nkwɔ Kristo ankɛm achɛm ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ achi amɛm ǎrɛ̀m ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, kɛ ɛ́mfakari bɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ akap wu nɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko manchwe amɛm, bɔ́ bhɔ bapu rɛm bɛ ɛbhokori ɛ́kɛm be?
46014024	Kɛ mbák bo mankɛm bárɛ̀m chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm, nɛ mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Yesu Kristo, nɛ yɛ̌ chí anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn antwɔ́ anchwe, ǎghok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎrɛm anjwimɛm anka bɛ yi achi mmǔ bɛbʉ́, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ághókó mɛ́mbo bɛtaŋ yi.
46014025	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ághókó ɛ́ghati yi kpoŋoroŋ mɛnyɨŋ bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ɛbhɛn bɛchi yi antɨ, ɛ́nkʉ yi ankwɛn bɛsí Mandɛm anchyɛ yi kɛnókó, andɛm bɛ, “Mandɛm achi nɛ be tɛtɛp!”
46014026	Bɔ̌ma, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ yɛ bɛkʉ chi bɛ, mpok bǎchɛ́mɛ́ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt ndu mɛnɨkmʉɛt, mbák mmu amɔt achyɛ́ nɛkwáy, achak antɔ́ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, anɛfu andɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm akʉ yi andɨŋɨ, nɛ mbák achak andɛm kɛpɨ ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ yi abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ, anɛfú ánɛ́nɛ́ yɔ ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́mbɔŋ. Kʉ ká yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛmbak anɛ ɛchyɛ bo mankɛm bɛtaŋ ndú baraka Mandɛm.
46014027	Mbák bo báchí abhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, ɛrɨ bati apay, nɛ yɛ̌ bati arat mandɛm. Nɛ bábhɔŋ bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ mmǔ amɔt amɔt, nɛ mmǔ achak ambak anɛ ánɛnɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bárɛ̀m.
46014028	Kɛ mbák yɛ̌ mmu apú mɛnɛnɛ ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́mbɔŋ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ akap wu ánchɔ́kɔ́ kpák amɛm ɛchɛmɛ Nkwɔ Kristo, andɛm nɔkɔ bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nɛ mmʉɛt yi nɛ ntá Mandɛm.
46014029	Bǒbati apay, mbák ɛpu nɔ, batí arat, mándɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm aghati bhɔ, bachak mánde chak mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bárɛ̀m.
46014030	Nɛ mbák Mandɛm ákʉ́ mmu anɛ achi chɔkɔ andɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ anɛ bárɛ̀m, ánkúsí kpɨ́k.
46014031	Bo abhɛn bárɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm bǎkway bɛkʉ nɔ amɔt amɔt bɛ bǒ mankɛm mángɔ́k ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ ɛ́mfyɛ́ bhɔ ntɨ.
46014032	Bǒ abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ akap bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm bákwáy bɛkɛm mmʉɛt manchɔkɔ kpák, bɛ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ mpok anɛ bákway bɛrɛm kɛpɨ.
46014033	Mandɛm apu Mandɛm ɛbyɔk, ǎyàŋ sɛmbɔŋ chi ɛyɔŋ ɛmɔt nɛ kpák ndǔ nkwɔ yɛsɛ. Mbɔ ɛnyu ɛchí amɛm bakwɔ́ bho Mandɛm ankɛm,
46014034	baghɔrɛ́ bábhɔŋ bɛchɛkɔ kpák amɛm bɛchɛmɛ bǒnkwɔ. Bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛrɛm kɛpɨ. Bábhɔŋ bɛsɛptimʉɛt mbɔ ɛnyu ɛbhé Moses ɛ́rɛ̀m.
46014035	(a) Mbák ɛnyɨŋ ɛchi ɛnɛ bɔ báyàŋ bɛrɨŋɨ, mámbɛ́p manɛ́m abhap anywɔ́p. (b) Ɛchi ɛnyɨŋ ntíánwɔ́p ntá ngɔrɛ́ bɛrɛm kɛpɨ amɛm ɛchɛmɛ́ bǒnkwɔ.
46014036	Kwae! Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ́bho chi ntá yɛka kɛ? Kɛ chí bɛ ndiɛrɛ ntá yɛka kɛ yɔ ɛ́chwɔ́bhɛ́?
46014037	Mbák mmu akáysí bɛ yi achi ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ, nɛ yɛ bɛ́ abhɔŋ akap anɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm achyɛ yi, ándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌sɨ̀ŋ-nɛ ntá yɛka chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Acha ághátí mɛ nsɨŋ.
46014038	Mbák mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ ɛchi ɛnyu ɛyɔ, bǎkɛ́ ka yi nkwɔ.
46014039	Bɔ̌ma, bɔ́ŋ yɛ ka bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ánchyɛ́ bhe akap bɛghati bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm, nɛ bǎkɛ́ káŋ bo bɛ bákɛ́ rɛm bɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛbhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ.
46014040	Bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ sayri nɛ ɛbyɔk ti.
46015001	Bɔ̌ma, nchí yaŋ bɛtɨk bhe ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ ngátí nyaka bhe, bǎbhʉ́rɛ yɔ antɨ nɛ bǎté kpɨrí ndu yɔ.
46015002	Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́-nɛ kɛ Mandɛm ásɔt bɛpɛmɛ bhe, mbák mǎndɔ́k ambɨ bɛkɛm yɔ nɛ bɛtaŋ. Mbák ɛ́pú ɛnyu ɛyɔ, nɔ mǎnókó chi ndɛ́ndɛm.
46015003	Nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌ghàti bhe mbɔ ɛnyǔ bághátí nyaka mɛ nkwɔ chi bɛ: Kristo agú nyaka ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bhɛsɛ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari.
46015004	Bábhɛ́mɛ yi nɛ ɛ́gháká nɔ́kɔ́ manywɔp arat, Mandɛm akʉ yí apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari.
46015005	Atɔ́ŋ yɛ mmʉɛt ntá Píta nɛ, ansɛm mpok, ntá bǒnto bhi batí byo nɛ apay.
46015006	Atɔ́ŋ yɛ mmʉɛt ntá mpǎy bakoŋo bhi mpok amɔt. Báyá bácha bati hɔndrɛt ɛtay (500). Yɛ̌ndu mbɔk ɛyap mǎnáŋ bágú, bɛyǎ bhap bábhʉɛ́t nɛpɛ́m.
46015007	Abhesi yɛ ntá Jems nɛ, ansɛm mpok, ntá bǒnto mankɛm.
46015008	Ndǔ ngwɛnti, abhesi ntá ya nkwɔ, mmɛ mmu nchí mbɔ mmɔ̌ anɛ bábhé ndu mpok anɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhakantɨ bɛ chɔŋ mámbe yi.
46015009	Ndǔ nkwɔ́ bǒnto Yesu, mmɛ kɛ nchí ansɛm mankɛm, nkɛ kwáy mmu anɛ bo bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ mǔnto mbɔnyunɛ mɛ̌chyɛ̀ nyaka bǒnkwɔ Mandɛm bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri.
46015010	Kɛ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm, nchí mmu anɛ nchí ɛchɔŋ, nɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu bhi nɛ mɛ bɛ́pú nyaka ndɛ́ndɛm. Bɛ́pú nyaka ndɛ́ndɛm mbɔnyunɛ nkʉ́ bɛtɨk nchá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mǔnto achak, yɛ̌ndu ɛpu chi nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbha kɛ ndǔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm ndǔ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi bɛchi nɛ mɛ.
46015011	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, yɛ̌ chí mmɛ kɛ ngátí nyaka bhe Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, yɛ̌ chi bǒnto báchák, bɛsɛ mankɛm sɛ́ghàti bho chi nkúbhɛ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ́rɛ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo, nɛ yɔ kɛ̌ be mǎnókó.
46015012	Mbák Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ sɛ́ghàti bho achí bɛ Kristo ápɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, ná yɛ mbɔk yɛka bákway bɛrɛm bɛ bawú bapu pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m?
46015013	Mbák ɛ́chí tɛtɛp bɛ bawú bapu pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɔ́ Kristo abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
46015014	Nɛ mbák Kristo abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́gháti bhe ɛ̌ti yi bɛchi chi ndɛ́ndɛm nɛ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ yi nɛchi chi ndɛ́ndɛm.
46015015	Mbák ɛ́chí tɛtɛp bɛ bawú bapu pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɔ sɛ́sè chi nsé ɛ̌ti Mandɛm, ndu sɛ́ghàti bho bɛ Mandɛm akʉ Kristo apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Mbák ɛchí tɛtɛp bɛ bawú bapu pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɔ Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ Kristo ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ nɔ nɛka ɛnɛsɛ nɛchi chi ndɛ́ndɛm.
46015016	Ɛ́chí ɛnyu yɔ mbɔnyunɛ mbák bawú bapu pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɔ Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ nyaka Kristo ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
46015017	Nɛ mbák Kristo abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɔ nɛka ɛnɛsɛ nɛchi chi ndɛ́ndɛm, nɛ nɔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka bɛbhʉɛt be anti.
46015018	Mbɔ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛchi, mbʉ bo abhɛn mánóko Kristo bǎgu mánɛ́m.
46015019	Mbák ndiɛrɛ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn fá amɨk kɛ sɛ́bháká ntɨ nɛ Kristo, nɔ ndǔ bǒ mmɨk mankɛm ɛbɛp ɛbhe yɛsɛ́ ɛcha.
46015020	Kɛ ɛchí tɛtɛp bɛ Mandɛm akʉ Kristo apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ chɔŋ yí ankʉ bawú mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
46015021	Mbɔ ɛnyǔ nɛwú nɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ ntá mmu amɔt, kɛ nɛ́twɔ́ fá mmɨk, nɔ kɛ nɛpɛrɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nkwɔ nɛfʉɛrɛ ntá mmu amɔt kɛ nɛ́twɔ́.
46015022	Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǒ bágù mbɔnyunɛ bachi bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Adam, nɔ kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ chɔŋ bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
46015023	Kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ndǔ mpok anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́. Kristo kɛ áyámbɨ ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Mpok yi apɛt átwɔ́ kɛ̌ bǒbhi bápɛt chɔŋ nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
46015024	Mmɨk amay yɛ, Yesu Kristo ansɔt awɔ́nɛm amfǎy bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfǎy bho, ansɔt kɛfɔ ɛki anchyɛ ntá Mandɛm mmu achi Ɛtayi.
46015025	Yesu abhɔŋ bɛkɛm kɛfɔ kpátɛ Mandɛm ankʉ bǒmpap abhi mámdɔp mbɔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ yi anyaŋa bɛkak amfay.
46015026	Mǔmpap anɛ Mandɛm ánaŋa chɔŋ ndǔ ngwɛnti chi nɛwú.
46015027	Ɛ́chi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mandɛm afyɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ antɛn yi.” Kɛ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm bɛ́chí antɛn yi” abhɨ́kɨ́ tɔŋ bɛ Mandɛm mmu afyɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm antɛn Kristo ǎbhák nkwɔ antɛn yi.
46015028	Kɛ mpok anɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm mɛ́mbak antɛn Kristo kɛ̌ mbɔŋ Mɔ́ywi afyɛ́ mmʉɛt antɛn Mandɛm, mmu afyɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ antɛn yi, bɛ Mandɛm aywǐntí ambak Mfɔ, nɛ yɛ̌ mmu achak ákɛ́ bhak mbɔ Mandɛm.
46015029	Mbák bawú bápú pɛtnsɛm chɔŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, ntí anɛ bájwìti bho ndǔ ntí bo abhɛn bawú achi bɛ yi?
46015030	Mbák bawú bápú pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, ntí anɛ sɛ́kà nɛwú mpoknkɛm achi bɛ yi?
46015031	Bɔ̌ma, nchí anyǔ nɛwú mpoknkɛm. Nchí rɛm nɔ ntá yɛka mbɔnyunɛ mɛ̌pànyu ɛ̌ti yɛka nɛ ntí bɛ bɛtɨk Yesu Kristo Acha yɛsɛ ɛbhɛn mɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ́kʉ́ bǎchi bǒbhi.
46015032	Mpok nchí ɛtɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs, mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ bo abhɛn báchí arɛ. Ntɨkɨ nsáy mɛ́bhɔ̀ŋ ndǔ nɛnu ɛnɛ́n mɛ́nù ɛnɛ́n nnú nɛ nnyǎbhɨ ɛyɔ mbák bawú bapu pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m? Mbák bapu pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, “Sɛ́nyíɛ́, sɛ́nyú, mbɔnyunɛ mandú mpok sɛ́gu.”
46015033	Bǎkɛ́ rɔ bo mándwɔ bhe. “Ɔ̌kɔ̀ nɛ ngɛ́p, ɔ́ngɛ́p aghɛp.”
46015034	Bɔ́ŋ nkaysi anɛ achi chak, mǎndɔ bɛbʉ́. Mbɔk ayɛka bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm wáwák. Nchí rɛm nɔ bɛ ntíánwɔ́p ankɛm be.
46015035	Mmu akwáy bɛbhɛp bɛ, “Chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ bawú mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ná? Bápɛ̀tnsɛm nɛ ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ mmʉɛt?”
46015036	Mbák mmu ámbɛ́p nɔ́, nɔ achí ɛchɨŋtɨ́mu! Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ, mmu ámpɨ́ mbwɔt, mbák yɔ abhɨ́kɨ́ yambɨ angu, apú chak ángó?
46015037	Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu ápɨ́, puyɛ̌ chi nnɛrɛ́ nchwi nɛ puyɛ̌ nnɛrɛ́ mbwɔt achak, chi mɔ́nyɛsɛ nchwi, mbák ɛ́pú nɔ, mɔ́nyɛsɛ mbwɔt achák.
46015038	Kɛ Mandɛm ǎchyɛ́ nyɛ́sɛ́ mbwɔt ɛnɛn bápɨ́ aywi mmʉɛt anɛ nɔ nɛ́chak, nɛ́ngo, nɛmbɔŋ mbɔ ɛnyu yi átɨ́ bɛ́ ɛ́mbák. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ mbwɔt ǎfu amik ambɔ́ŋ chí ayi ɛnyǔ mmʉɛt.
46015039	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛpɛ́m bɛbhɔŋ mmʉɛt kɛkúrí kɛkúrí. Bakwǎŋwaŋ bábhɔŋ ayap ɛnyǔ mmʉɛt, nnya ɛ́bhɔ́ŋ ɛyap ɛnyǔ mmʉɛt, kɛnɛn kɛbhɔ́ŋ ɛyap ɛnyǔ mmʉɛt, nɛ nsi ɛ́bhɔ̌ŋ ɛyap ɛnyu mmʉɛt.
46015040	Mmʉɛt mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amfǎy ɛ́chí kɛkúrí nɛ mmʉɛt mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi fá amɨk. Nɛ bɛrɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn amfay bɛ́chí kɛkúrí nɛ bɛrɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn fá amɨk.
46015041	Mmok abhɔŋ ɛbhi bɛrɨ, ntaŋ ábhɔ́ŋ ɛbhi bɛrɨ, mambe ábhɔ́ŋ ɛbhap bɛrɨ, nɛ mambe ábhɔ́ŋ bɛrɨ kɛkúrí kɛkúrí.
46015042	Ɛnyuyɔ kɛ ɛbhak mpok Mandɛm ákʉ bawú mámpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Mmʉɛ́t ngú anɛ bábhɛ́mɛ́, ǎpɔpɔ́ɔ. Kɛ mpok yi ákʉ̀ bawú mámpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, mmʉɛt nkwǎ ǎbhák chi anɛ ápú gu wáwák.
46015043	Mpok bábhɛ̀mɛ mmu, ɛrɛnɛ yi ɛ́bɛ̀p nɛ apú bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ. Mpok Mandɛm áku bawú mámpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, mmʉɛt ɛyɔ ǎrɨ, ambɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ.
46015044	Mpok bábhɛ́mɛ́ mmu, bábhɛ̀mɛ mmʉɛt bǒ mmɨk. Mpok Mandɛm ákʉ bawú mámpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, mmu ǎbhɔ̀ŋ chi ɛnyǔ mmʉɛt ɛnɛ amfay. Mbák mmʉɛt bǒ mmɨk achi, nɔ mmʉɛt ɛnɛ amfay ɛbhɔŋ bɛbhak nkwɔ.
46015045	Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́ghàti bhɛsɛ bɛ, “Adam, mmu Mandɛm áyámbɨ aghoko, achí nyaka nkwǎŋwaŋ anɛ achi nɛpɛ́m.” Kɛ Adam anɛ áfú ansɛm chí Ɛfóŋó nɛ yi ǎchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m.
46015046	Puyɛ̌ mmʉɛt anɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ kɛ ayambɨ. Anɛ bǒ mmɨk kɛ áyámbɨ, kɛ anɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ antwɔ chɔŋ ansɛm mpok.
46015047	Mandɛm aghókó mmǔ mbɨ chí nɛ ntɔp, anɛ átwɔ́ ansɛm afú chi amfay.
46015048	Bǒ mmɨk mankɛm báchí mbɔ mmu anɛ Mandɛm ághókó nɛ ntɔp, nɛ bǒ mfay mankɛm báchi mbɔ mmu anɛ áfú amfay.
46015049	Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ sɛ́chí mbɔ mmu anɛ bághókó nɛ ntɔp nɛ́nɛ, mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ sɛ́bhak mbɔ mmu anɛ áfú amfay.
46015050	Bɔ̌ma, nchí ghati bhe bɛ ɛnyǔ mmʉɛt ɛnɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛpú kway bɛbhak ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Mandɛm achi Mfɔ arɛ, nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́gugu ɛ́pú kway bɛchɔkɔ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛpu kway bɛgu wáwák.
46015051	Ghók ká, nchí ghati bhe ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́chí bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ntá yɛka. Bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́pú gu chɔŋ, kɛ báyibhiri mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ.
46015052	Chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔŋ mmʉɛt ɛkɔ tɛ́mchók, ndǔ mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok anɛ mmu ákiɛp amɨ́k, ndǔ mpok anɛ mmbá anɛ ngwɛnti ákwɛ́nɛ́. Mpok ɛyɔ, bawú bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ mmʉɛt ɛnɛ ɛ́pú gu wawak; kɛ mánjibhiri bhɛsɛ abhɛn sɛchi pě tɛ́mté, sɛ́mbɔŋ mmʉɛt ɛkɔ.
46015053	Ɛ́bhak ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ ɛnɛ ɛ́pɔpɔ́ɔ ɛbhɔŋ bɛyibhiri ɛndɔp mmʉɛt ɛkɔ ɛnɛ ɛ́pú gu wáwák. Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́gugu ɛbhɔŋ bɛyibhiri ɛndɔp chi ɛnɛ ɛ́pú gu wáwák.
46015054	Mpok ɛyɔ, chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari bɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ ɛnjibhiri ɛnyu yɔ, bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́ghati bhɛsɛ ɛ́mfú tɛtɛp. Nɔ chi bɛ, “Mámɛn nɛwú. Básɔt awɔ́nɛm amfǎy nɛwú ndak amay.”
46015055	Nɛwú, bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛ amfay nɛpɛ́m bɛchi fá? Bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́sɔ̀t bɛsak bho bɛ́chí fá?
46015056	Bɛbʉ́ kɛ bɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛwú bɛtaŋ. Bɛbhé Mandɛm kɛ bɛ́chyɛ̀ bɛbʉ́ bɛtaŋ.
46015057	Kɛ sɛ́nkáká Mandɛm bɛ achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ awɔ́nɛm amfǎy bɛbʉ́ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ ákʉ́.
46015058	Bɔ̌ma, abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, ndǔ ɛ́chí nɔ, tě yɛ ka kpirí, kɛ́ fɛrɛ amɔ́. Dɔ́k ká ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Acha nɛ batɨ yɛka ankɛm mpoknkɛm, tɛ̌ndu bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ bɛtɨk Yesu Kristo Acha ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ̀ bɛpu nɛm ndɛ́ndɛm.
46016001	Bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ nkáp anɛ bǎchwɔ̀p ndu bɛkwak bo Mandɛm, bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ mbɔ ɛnyu ngátí bǒnkwɔ abhɛn atú Galéshia mánkʉ.
46016002	Ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka ámbʉ́rɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ, bɛkoŋo nkáp anɛ yi ákʉ́ bɛtɨk ábhɔ́ŋɔ́, bɛ bǎkɛ́ chwɔp bakap chi ndiɛrɛ mpok anɛ ntwɔ́ awu.
46016003	Nnáŋ ngáká awu, chɔŋ nsɨŋ ɛkáti nchyɛ́ ntá bo abhɛn bǎyábhɛ́ bɛto Yerúsalɛm nɛ akap aywɛka.
46016004	Nɛ mbák ɛrɨ bɛ mɛnkwɔ ndɔ́k, chɔŋ ndɔk nɛ bhɔ.
46016005	Chɔŋ ntwɔ́ bɛghɔ bhe mpok nnáŋ mfʉɛ́rɛ́ atú Masidónia mbɔnyunɛ mbɔ̌ŋ ntɨ bɛfʉɛt arɛ.
46016006	Ngufú chɔŋ ntat nɛ be mandú, nɛ ɛ́kway bɛbhak ndǔ ɛso ɛnkɛm. Mpok ánkwáy yɛ anɛ mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ ɛbhak ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɔ́ŋ, mǎnkwak mɛ ndɔ́k arɛ́.
46016007	Mpú yaŋ bɛ ntwɔ́ ngɔ́ bhe mfʉɛrɛ fʉɛt. Mbɔ̌ŋ ntɨ bɛ́twɔ bɛtat nɛ bhe, mbák Mandɛm ankwak.
46016008	Kɛ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛbhak fá Ɛ́fɛsɔs kpatɛ mpok Ɛpǎ Pɛntɛkɔs ankwáy.
46016009	Mbɔ̌ŋ ɛrɨ́tí mbi bɛkʉ ɛsayri bɛtɨk fá yɛ̌ndu bɛyǎ bo mánù bɛchyɛt mɛ mbi.
46016010	Tímɔti ánáŋ ántwɔ́ awu, kɛ́m ká yi sayri, ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yi ábhɔŋ maŋák bɛbhak nɛ bhe. Yi chí mmǔ anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛtɨk Mandɛm mbɔ mɛ.
46016011	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, bǎkɛ́ rɔ yɛ̌ mmu ámbyák yi. Tɨ́k ká yi sayri bɛ ámpɛtnsɛm ntá ya. Batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ nɛ mmɛ sɛ́nòŋ yi.
46016012	Mbák chí manɔ ywɛsɛ Apólos, ngátí yi bɛyǎ mpok bɛ ántwɔ́ awu nɛ bǒnkwɔ bachak mángɔ bhe, kɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ́twɔ nɛ́nɛ. Chɔŋ antwɔ́ mpok yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛpok.
46016013	Bák ká pě, mǎnte kpirí ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Yesu. Bɔ́ŋ ká nɛtaŋántɨ, mánte sɛnɛ́.
46016014	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎkʉ̀, kʉ́ ka yɔ nɛ ɛkɔŋ.
46016015	Bɔ̌ma, bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ ndǔ bo Akáiya mankɛm, ɛfo ɛnɛ Stɛfánas kɛ ɛ́yámbɨ bɛkoŋo Yesu Kristo, nɛ báchíɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap ndu bɛkǔ bɛtɨk bɛ mánkwak bo Mandɛm.
46016016	Sɛptí ká mmʉɛt ntá bǒ mbɔ abhɔ nɛ ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak anɛ áchɛ́mɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ bhɔ ndǔ bɛtɨk.
46016017	Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ maŋák bɛ Stɛfánas nɛ Fɔtunátɔs nɛ Akaikɔs bátwɔ fá, mbɔnyunɛ nɛtwɔ́ wap achi mbɔ bhɛ bě nkwɔ bǎtwɔ.
46016018	Báfyɛ mɛ ntɨ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu báfyɛ́ bhe ntɨ. Chíɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ká mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ kɛnókó.
46016019	Bakwɔ́ bho Kristo abhɛn Ésia bátó be bakak. Akwíla nɛ Príska nɛ bǒnkwɔ abhɛn báchɛmɛ nɔkɔ ɛkɛt ɛyi bátó be bɛyǎ bakak ndǔ nnyɛ́n Acha.
46016020	Bɔ́mayɛsɛ abhɛn fá mankɛm bátǒ bakak. Kaká ká batɨ nkwɔ sayri mbɔ bǒ Kristo.
46016021	Mmɛ Pɔ̌l, kɛ nchí sɨŋ bakak amɛn nɛ awɔ́ wa.
46016022	Mbák mmú achi anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ Yesu Kristo Acha, ɛyak ɛ́mbák nɛ yi. Acha ywɛsɛ, twɔ́!
46016023	Bɛrɨ̌ndu Yesu Acha mɛ́mbák nɛ bhe.
46016024	Nkɔŋ bě mankɛm. Sɛ́rɔp chi ndǔ nsoŋ amɔt ndu sɛ́bhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo.
47001001	Mɛ Pɔ̌l, mǔnto Yesu Kristo bɛkoŋo nkaysi Mandɛm, kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí fá nɛ Tímɔti, mɔmáyɛsɛ amɔt. Nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka bǒnkwɔ Mandɛm abhɛn ɛtɔk Kɔrint nɛ bo Mandɛm mankɛm abhɛn báchi atú Akáiya ankɛm.
47001002	Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha mántɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, mánchyɛ bɛ kpák.
47001003	Sɛ́mbɨ́tí Mandɛm nɛ Chi Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ. Achí Mandɛm ntínso nɛ ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́.
47001004	Ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ ndǔ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛsɛ́ mɛnkɛm bɛ sɛ́nkwáy bɛchyɛ bo abhɛn báchí ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛpɔptǐntɨ́. Nkúbhɛ́ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ ɛnɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ mpok ɛsɔŋɔri, kɛ nɛ́kʉ̀ sɛ́nkwáy bɛchyɛ bo abhɛn bachi ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛpɔptǐntɨ́.
47001005	Ndu sɛ́ghɔ̀ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ̌ti sɛ́bhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo nɔ́ kɛ Mandɛm áfʉɛt ntá Kristo bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́.
47001006	Sɛ́bhɔ̀ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri chí bɛ́ Mandɛm anchyɛ bhe nɛpɔptǐntɨ́, ampɛmɛ bhe. Nɛ Mandɛm ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ́ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ chi bɛ sɛ́nkwáy bɛchyɛ bhe nɛpɔptǐntɨ́. Ɛnkʉ mǎnkwáy yɛ bɛbhɔŋ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ ndu bɛte kákátí ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn sɛ́bhɔ̀ŋ.
47001007	Sɛ́bhàka ntɨ nɛ bhe, nɛ sɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛcháy mbɔnyunɛ sɛrɨŋɨ bɛ ndǔ bǎká bɛbhɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔ bhɛsɛ, Mandɛm ǎchyɛ bhe nkwɔ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ákʉ̀ nɛ bhɛsɛ.
47001008	Bɔ̌ma, sɛ́yàŋ mǎndɨŋɨ bɛyǎ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ awu atú Esia. Báchyɛ bhɛsɛ nɛnyok ɛnɛn nɛ́yá nɛcha. Ɛkʉ sɛ́fɛ́rɛ ntí ndǔ sɛ́kàysi bɛ ndak ywɛsɛ ámay.
47001009	Ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́yá kpát sɛ́rɔ́bhɛ noŋ chi nɛwú. Kɛ ɛfakari nyaka nɔ chi bɛkʉ sɛ́ndɨŋɨ bɛ sɛ́pú kwáy bɛkwak mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ. Sɛ́ghɔ́ bɛ́ sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm mmu ákwày bɛkʉ bawú mampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
47001010	Mandɛm áfɛ́rɛ bhɛsɛ́ ndǔ nɛwú, nɛ chɔŋ andɔk ambɨ bɛpɛmɛ bhɛsɛ. Sɛ́bhàka ntɨ chi nɛ yi bɛ chɔŋ ampɛt ampɛmɛ bhɛsɛ.
47001011	Be nkwɔ bǎbhɔŋ bɛkwak bɛsɛ ndǔ nɛnɨkímʉɛt. Nɛ chɔŋ bɛyǎ bo mánchyɛ nɔkɔ Mandɛm bakak ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ, bɛyɨŋɨ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ ɛbhɛn yi átɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɛsɛ ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt.
47001012	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ́ sɛ́dɛ̀p awɔ antɨ chi bɛ batɨ̌ yɛsɛ ághàti bhɛsɛ bɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ nɛchi sayri nɛ bǒ mmɨk, sayri sayri nɛ bhe. Sɛ́kʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ bo Mandɛm nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt nɛ tɛtɛp ndu sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ koŋo nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn bǒ mmɨk. Sɛ́kʉ nɔ chi ndǔ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm bɛchi nɛ bhɛsɛ.
47001013	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎpày ndǔ bɛkáti ɛbhɛsɛ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi bhɛsɛ antɨ, sɛbhɨkɨ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Yɛ̌ bǎbhɨkɨ jwimɛm nɛ́nɛ bɛyɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ bo sɛchi, nókó ká bɛ chɔŋ mǎnjwimɛm sayri ɛwak ɛ́mɔt, bɛ nywɔp Yesu Acha átwɔ̀, mǎnkwáy bɛdɛp awɔ antɨ ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bɛsɛ́ sɛ́dɛ̀p mburɛ awɔ antɨ ɛ̌ti yɛka.
47001015	Tɛ̌ndu mpú makati nyaka wáwák bɛ chɔŋ mǎnsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ mɛ, mbɔ̌ŋ nkaysi bɛyambɨ bɛ́twɔ awu ntá yɛka bɛ maŋák bɛghɔ mɛ ámbák nɛ bhe ndɔŋ ɛpay.
47001016	Mbɔ̌ŋ nyaka nkaysi bɛ́te awu ntá yɛka kɛ mfʉɛt ndɔk atú Masidónia, mpɛ́t ntě bɛ́ghɔ bhe mpok mfú atú Masidónia nchí pɛtnsɛm, bɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ mǎmbɔŋ mbi bɛ́chyɛ mɛ nɛkwak ndǔ nɛkɔ ɛnɛn mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ Judɛ́ya.
47001017	Nchí kʉ nyaka mbɔ bǒ mmɨk kɛ? Mmǔ mmɨk kɛ árɛ̀m ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ankʉ chi ɛ́chák.
47001018	Tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm achi tɛtɛp, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ngátí bhe puyɛ̌ ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ nkwǎ mmu ákà ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ankʉ chi ɛchak.
47001019	Yesu Kristo Mmɔ Mandɛm anɛ Silvánɔs nɛ Tímɔti nɛ mɛ sɛ́ghàti nyaka bhe ɛ̌ti yi ndǔ nkwɔ ayɛka apú mmu bɛyɔŋ bɛyɔŋ. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́, yɔ́ kɛ yi ákʉ̀.
47001020	Chi bɛfʉɛt ntá Yesu kɛ̌ bariɛp Mandɛm mankɛm áfù tɛtɛp. Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo bɛ́ “Amen” ndu bɛchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó.
47001021	Mandɛm kɛ áchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ nɛ be bɛtaŋ bɛ sɛ́nté kpirí nɛ Kristo. Yi kɛ afyɛ́ bhɛsɛ bɛ́ sɛ́mbák bǒbhi,
47001022	afyɛ́ bhɛsɛ ɛrɨŋ amʉɛt, bɛtɔŋ bɛ sɛchi bɔ̌bhi. Akʉ nɔ ndu áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmu achi amɛm batɨ yɛsɛ́ ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ chɔŋ anchyɛ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak.
47001023	Mandɛm achi ntísiɛ wa bɛ mpú sénse. Ntí anɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ pɛtnsɛm Kɔrint chi bɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ mpɛt nchyɛ́ bhe ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́chák.
47001024	Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ bɛsɔt chi bɛtaŋ bɛghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́nóko. Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ́ bǎbhɔŋ bǎte kpirí ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Yesu. Sɛ́yàŋ chi bɛ sɛ́nchɛm amɔ́ nɛ bhe sɛnkʉ bɛtɨk bɛ maŋák amɛka anja.
47002001	Ɛ̌ti ɛyɔ kɛ̌ nkʉ ntɨ bɛ mpú pɛrɛ twɔ awu ntá yɛka ndɔŋ achák ndu mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ bɛchɔŋti batɨ ayɛka amɛm.
47002002	Mbák nkʉ́ batɨ ánchɔ́ŋɔ́ be amɛm, agha achák áchi awu anɛ ákway bɛkʉ mɛ mbɔ́ŋ maŋák? Pú nkúbhɛ́ be mbák nkʉ batɨ áchɔ́ŋɔ́ be amɛm?
47002003	Ɛ̌ti ɛyɔ kɛ nsɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nsɨŋ yɔ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ nnáŋ ntwɔ́ awu, be bho bǎbhɔŋɔ bɛchyɛ mɛ maŋák, bǎkɛ́ kʉ ntɨ nɛnchɔŋɔ́ mɛ amɛm. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ sayri bɛ mbák nchí maŋák, be nkwɔ bǎbhak maŋák.
47002004	Nsɨŋ be nɛ bɛyǎ bɛbe antɨ, nɛ basɛ́mɛ́, nɛ babhɛsɛ amík. Mbɨ́kɨ́ sɨŋ bɛ́chɔŋti batɨ ayɛka amɛm. Nsɨŋ chi bɛkʉ mǎndɨŋɨ bɛ nkɔŋ be tontó.
47002005	Kɛ mmǔ anɛ átwɔ́ nɛ ɛsɔŋɔri, abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ chi mɛ. Mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ bɛrɛm tontó, kɛ ngɔ bɛ ákʉ́ chi be mankɛm.
47002006	Ntɛ́msí anɛ bɛyǎ bhɛka bǎká bɛ mánchyɛ mmu wu akway nɔ.
47002007	Foŋorí yɛ́ ka yi, mǎnchyɛ yi nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ bɛkɛ taŋ mɛncha yi ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yi ákpɨkɨ fɛrɛ amɔ.
47002008	Nchí nɨk yɛ be mmʉɛt bɛ mǎmpɛt mǎnkʉ yi angɔ bɛ bǎkɔŋ yi tɛtɛp.
47002009	Nti anɛ nsɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe ɛkáti ɛyɔ chi bɛ mmɔ́ be ngɔ́ mbák chɔŋ mǎnkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ngátí bhe.
47002010	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ bǎfoŋori bɛbʉ́ bhi, mɛ nkwɔ nchí foŋori yi. Nɛ mɛ̌foŋori mbák ɛnyɨŋ ɛchi mbɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́yàŋ bɛ mámfoŋori yi. Nchí foŋori yi ɛ̌ti yɛka ndu nnyɛ́n Kristo mmu átó mɛ.
47002011	Ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ Satan ákɛ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay yɛsɛ. Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛrɨŋɨ nkaysi yi.
47002012	Mpok nchwɔ́bhɛ́ Troas ndu bɛghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo, Acha ánɛ́nɛ́ mbi ntá ya.
47002013	Yɛ̌ nɔ, ntɨ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ pɔp mɛ amɛm ndu mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ mmʉɛrɛ wa Táytɔs arɛ́. Ngati yɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mǎnchɔkɔ sayri.” Mfa ndɔk atú Masidónia.
47002014	Bakak ámbák nɛ Mandɛm mmu ánù ansɔt chi awɔ́nɛm. Asɔt bhɛsɛ́ mbɔ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bákɛ́mɛ́ ɛbhɨ̌nɛnu nɛ ǎya bɛsɛ mbi mpoknkɛm ndu sɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ nu chi ɛbhe Yesu nɛ́nɛ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ sɛ́rɔ̀ŋ, Mandɛm áfʉɛ̀t ntá yɛsɛ bɛkʉ bo mándɨ́ŋɨ́ Kristo ndu sɛ́kʉ̀ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ántáká nɔ́kɔ́ mbɔ ɛrɨ́tí ɛriɛp mbǎnkɛm
47002015	Bapɛ́m ayɛsɛ achi mbɔ bawɛt ɛrɨ́tí ɛriɛp amɛn Kristo áchyɛ́ ntá Mandɛm. Ɛriɛp ɛyɔ ɛ́tàka ndǔ nkwɔ bo abhɛn Mandɛm ǎpɛ̀mɛ nɛ ndǔ nkwɔ́ bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ chi ndǔ mbi nɛwú.
47002016	Ntá bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ ndǔ mbi nɛwú, ɛriɛp ɛnɛ ɛchi chi mbɔ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛriɛp ɛnɛ́ ɛ́wày bhɔ way. Kɛ ntá bo abhɛn Mandɛm ápɛ̀mɛ, sɛ́chi ɛrɨ́tí ɛriɛp ɛnɛ ɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m. Ntɨkɨ mmu ákway bɛkʉ ɛnɛ́ ɛnyǔ bɛtɨk?
47002017	Bɛyǎ bo básɔ̀t Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ bághàti bho mbɔ mbi bɛyaŋ nkáp. Bɛsɛ́ sɛ́pú nɔ, sɛ́ghàti bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ chí nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt, ndǔ bɛtaŋ Kristo, nɛ sɛrɨŋɨ bɛ amík Mandɛm achi bhɛsɛ amʉɛt.
47003001	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ ɛ́kɛ́ kʉ mǎnkaysi bɛ sɛ́pɛt sɛ́yàŋ chi bɛ mǎndɨŋɨ ɛnyu bho sɛ́chi. Bo báchí abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́twɔ be nɛ bɛkáti ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɛ̀m ɛrɨ́rɨ́ ɛ̌ti ɛya. Mɛnyǔ bo bho, bápɛt báyàŋ nɔ chi bɛ mǎnchyɛ bhɔ bɛkáti bɛ mántɔŋ ntá bo bachak? Bɛsɛ sɛ́pu nɔ.
47003002	Bɛ̌ bǎbhɔŋ kɛ bachí ɛkáti ɛnɛ́ ɛ́rɛ̀m ɛrɨ́rɨ́ ɛ̌ti bɛtɨk ɛbhɛsɛ. Básɨŋ ɛkáti ɛyɔ chi amɛm batɨ ayɛsɛ, bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ampay andɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ bo sɛ́chi.
47003003	Nɛ bǎtɔ̀ŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ́ Kristo kɛ ásɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛkáti ɛnɛ ató bhɛsɛ nɛ yɔ́. Abhɨ́kɨ́ sɨŋ yɔ nɛ ɛnɔkɛ́kati. Asɨŋ yɔ chi nɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm mmu áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m. Abhɨ́kɨ́ sɨŋ yɔ ndǔ bɛ́gbáká batay. Asɨŋ yɔ chi amɛm batɨ̌ bakwǎŋwaŋ.
47003004	Sɛ́kway bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́sɨ̀kɨ ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo.
47003005	Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tɔŋ bɛ bɛsɛ babhɔŋ sɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ sɛ́kway bǒ abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn. Mandɛm kɛ ákʉ́ sɛ́nkwáy bɛku bhɔ.
47003006	Nkúbhɛ́ Mandɛm kɛ ákʉ́ sɛ́nkwáy bɛbhak bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk, ndu bɛ́gháti bho ɛ̌ti Nku Nkɔ. Nku Nkɔ anɛ ǎyàŋ bɛ, nɛbho nɛ́nɛ, bo bákɛ́ koŋo chi ɛbhé mbɔ ɛnyu básɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka, kɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛghok chi Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ. Ɛbhé ɛ́twɔ̀ mmu chi nɛ nɛwú kɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ǎtwɔ̀ chi nɛ nɛpɛ́m.
47003007	Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ yɛ̌ndu nku nsɨ́ anɛ átwɔ̀ nɛ nɛwú, ǎkʉ̀ nyaka bo mángɔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm kpoŋoroŋ. Mandɛm asɨ́ŋ bɛbhé ndǔ bɛ́gbáká batay achyɛ ntá Moses. Ɛnɛ́ Moses ásɛ̀p bɛ́rɔŋ ntá bo Israɛl nɛ batay yɔ, bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mamdɛm bɛ́re ghɔ yi bɛsí. Ndu ásɛ̀p bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm ɛbhɔ mɛ́may nɔkɔ. Yɛ̌ nɔ, yɛ̌ mmu wap kɛkwáy bɛyɨŋɨ yi bɛsí tɛbhɛ tɛbhɛ.
47003008	Mbák ɛ́kway bɛ́bhak nyaka ɛnyu yɔ ndǔ mpok nku nsɨ́, ná nɛ ɛchɔŋ, ndǔ mpok nku nkɔ? Bɛtɨk Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmu áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m bɛbhɔŋ bɛtɔŋ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm tontó ɛncha mpok nku nsɨ́.
47003009	Nku nsɨ́ ǎtwɔ̀ nyaka nɛ ntɛ́msi. Yɛ̌ nɔ, abhak chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm. Nɛ́nɛ, Nku Nkɔ, yɔ́ anɛ ákʉ̀ sɛ́mbák chak bɛsí Mandɛm, abhɔŋ bɛ́tɔŋ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm ancha Nku Nsɨ́.
47003010	Tɛtɛp, ndǔ ndak anɛ, nku nsɨ́ abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́rɔbhɛ koŋo chi Nku Nkɔ anɛ áchá nku nsɨ́ ndǔ átɔ̀ŋ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm tontó.
47003011	Tɛtɛp, mbák nku nsɨ́ anɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ tat ǎkway nyaka bɛtɔŋ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm, Nku Nkɔ anɛ abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti abhɔŋ bɛtɔŋ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhi ancha anɛ nsɨ́.
47003012	Tɛ̌ndu sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛbhakántɨ́, sɛ́bhɔŋ ngǎngaŋ nɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ nɛ nɛtaŋántɨ.
47003013	Moses ǎkùti nyaka bɛsí bhi nɛ ndɛn mpoknkɛm anɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́ghɔ̀ bɛsí bhi bɛ́bhó mɛmay mandú mandú, bɛ bo Israɛl bákɛ́ ghɔ ndǔ mɛ́nɛ̀msi. Sɛ́pú bhɛsɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
47003014	Bo Israɛl bághɔ̀ nyaka bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm, yɛ̌ nɔ, bágwɔ́t batɨ̌ yap amɛm. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛchi nɛ bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ bhap kpátɛ ɛchɔŋ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ bápày bɛkáti Mandɛm ɛbhɛn nku nsɨ́, ɛ́bhak chi mbɔ bɛ ndɛn ɛyɔ akútí batɨ yap, nɛ ɛ́kʉ bɔ bákɛ́ jwimɛm ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bápày. Ndiɛrɛ Kristo kɛ ákway bɛfɛrɛ ɛkúti ɛyɔ ndǔ batɨ yap.
47003015	Nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛ́chi kpátɛ ɛchɔŋ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ bápày basɨŋ amɛn Moses, bápú jwimɛm, mbɔnyunɛ ɛ́bhak ntá yap chi mbɔ bɛ básɔt ɛnyɨŋ bákuti batɨ̌ ayap.
47003016	Kɛ mpok mmu átɨ́kɨ́nsɛm ndǔ ɛsɨ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni, ǎtwɔ̀ ntá Acha bɛ amfɛrɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kútí ntɨ ɛni.
47003017	Nɛ́nɛ, Acha anɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m nɔ ɛ̌ti yi ǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ chi nɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Acha achi nɛ bho, bábhɔŋ ngangaŋ.
47003018	Nɛ́nɛ, bɛsɛ bo sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ ndɛn anɛ ákútí batɨ yɛsɛ, sɛ́ghɔ̀ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Acha, nɛ sɛ́yìbhiri bɛbhak mbɔ yi. Nɛ ndǔ sɛ́yìbhiri nɛŋɔ̌k nɛ nɛŋɔk, bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhi bɛ́ghɔ̀ bhɛsɛ amʉɛt mɛ́nja mɛndɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ. Acha mmu ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ nɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm kɛ ákʉ ɛmbak nɔ.
47004001	Tɛ̌ndu sɛrɨŋɨ bɛ Mandɛm ntínso kɛ áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn-nɛ sɛ́kʉ̀, sɛpú fɛrɛ amɔ́.
47004002	Sɛ́fɛ́rɛ́ ntí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ ntíánwɔ́p nɛ ndǔ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bákʉ̀ ansɛm ansɛm. Sɛ́pú kʉ bɛtábhá nɛ mmu wáwák nɛ sɛpu mɔ bɛyibhiri Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ chi bɛghati bho tɛtɛp Mandɛm ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ákwày bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ sɛchi bǒ tɛtɛp bɛsí Mandɛm.
47004003	Mbák Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ sɛ́ghàti bho achi chi mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́, ǎbhák ɛnyu ɛyɔ chi ntá bo abhɛn bachi ndu mbi nɛwú.
47004004	Bǒ bhɔ bápú jwimɛm ndǔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ mbɔnyunɛ Satan mmu achi mandɛm mmɨk anɛ́mɛ́ bɔ amɨk bɛ bákɛ noko Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́. Yi apu yaŋ bɔ́ mangɔ́ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhɛn bɛ́ghɔ̀. Nɔ chi, bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù ndǔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo. Apu yaŋ bɔ mandɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ Kristo achi, Kristo mmu achi ɛnyu ɛ́mɔt nɛ Mandɛm.
47004005	Sɛ́pú kɔ bɛghati bho ɛ̌ti mmʉɛt ayɛsɛ. Sɛ́ghàti bho chi ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo nɛ bɛ yi achi Acha. Mbák chi bhɛsɛ babhɔŋ, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́ghàti bhe chi bɛ sɛchi chi bǒ bɛtok bhɛka ɛ̌ti Yesu.
47004006	Ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt, ɛnɛ́ Mandɛm ághòko mmɨk, arɛm bɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ mɛ́ngɔ́ɔ́ ndǔ ɛjuri, nɛ ɛbhak nɔ. Nkúbhɛ́ Mandɛm kɛ ákʉ́ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhi bɛ́ghɔ̀ amɛm batɨ yɛsɛ. Nɛ sɛ́ghɔ̀ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm ndǔ bɛ́ghɔ̀ bɛsí Kristo nɛ sɛ́rɨŋɨ nɛ́nɛ ɛnyǔ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm bɛchi.
47004007	Bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhɛn bɛ́ghɔ̀ bɛsɛ antɨ chi nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bɛsɛ babhɔŋ sɛchi chi mbɔ bɛtě ntɔp, bɛtaŋ ti. Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ, bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Mandɛm bɛ́fù chi ntá yi, puyɛ̌ ntá yɛsɛ.
47004008	Mpok nɛ mpok, báchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ bɛsɔŋɔri mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu, kɛ bɛsɔŋɔri bhɔ bɛpu bɔkɔti bɛtě ntɔp ɛbhɛn bhɛsɛ sɛchi. Ɛcha bhɛsɛ́ ɛnyǔ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kʉ kɛ sɛpu fɛrɛ amɔ́.
47004009	Mányòk bhɛsɛ, kɛ Mandɛm apú rɔ bɛbhak nɛ bhɛsɛ. Bádɛp bhɛsɛ amɨk, kɛ bápú kway bɛway bhɛsɛ.
47004010	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ sɛ́rɔ̀ŋ, bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghɔ̀ bɛchi mbɔ bɛ sɛ́pɔ́kɔ́ nɛwú Yesu amʉɛt sɛ́kɔ̀ nɛ nɔ. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, bo bághɔ̀ nɛpɛ́m Yesu ndu nɛ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk amʉɛt yɛsɛ.
47004011	Tɛtɛp, sɛchi anyǔ nɛwú mpoknkɛm ɛ̌ti Yesu, nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ Mandɛm ántɔ́ŋ ɛnyǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn mbɔŋ Yesu Acha nɛ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ́ ɛnɛ ɛ́pú tat fá amɨk.
47004012	Sɛ́ká yɛ nɛwú, bɛ́ mǎnkwáy bɛ́bhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ́n nɛ́bhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛ́nti.
47004013	Tɛ̌ndu sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nkúbhɛ́ ɛfóŋó nɛka mbɔ mmǔ anɛ arɛmɛ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Nnókó, nɛ ɛ̌ti yɔ ndɛm”. Bɛse nkwɔ sɛ́noko, nɛ ɛ̌ti yɔ sɛ́ghàti bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́.
47004014	Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ Mandɛm mmu ákʉ́ Yesu Acha ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, ǎkʉ chɔŋ bɛsɛ́ nkwɔ́ sɛ́mpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ yi, nɛ ansɔt bhɛsɛ nɛ bhe sɛ́mbak nɛ Yesu ndǔ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́t bɛchɔkɔ bhi.
47004015	Bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛchi chi ndǔ bɛrɨ ɛbhɛka, bɛ ndǔ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm bɛ́gháká ntá bɛyǎ bho, mɛ́nkʉ́ bo abhɛn báchyɛ̀ Mandɛm bakak mánjá mándɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, bɛ bo mánchyɛ nɔ́kɔ́ Mandɛm kɛnókó.
47004016	Tɛ̌ndu sɛ́rɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, sɛ́pu fɛrɛ amɔ. Yɛ̌ndu bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn nkwɔmʉɛt mɛ́mày mɛ́ndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, Mandɛm ǎkʉ̀ sɛmbɔŋ nɔkɔ bɛtaŋ bɛkɔ amɛm batɨ ayɛsɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp.
47004017	Nɛ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghɔ̀ fá amɨk bɛ́chi mandú tontó, nɛ bɛ́pu tat. Bɛ́kwàk bhɛsɛ kwak bɛ sɛ́nkwáy bo abhɛn sɛ́chwè ndǔ bɛyǎ maŋák Mandɛm ɛwak ɛ́mɔt. Maŋák amɔ acha yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ nɛ abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
47004018	Sɛ́pú yɨŋɨ yɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bághɔ̀ nɛ amɨ́k. Sɛ́yɨ̀ŋɨ chi ɛbhɛn bápú ghɔ, mbɔnyunɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo baghɔ bɛ́fʉɛrɛ fʉɛt. Ɛbhɛn bápú ghɔ kɛ bɛbhak mpoknkɛm.
47005001	Sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mmʉɛt ayɛsɛ́ anɛ fá amɨk achí mbɔ bɛ́tɛm. Mbák bɛ́tɛm ɛbhɛn mɛ́nkwɛ́n, Mandɛm ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ ɛkɛt ɛkɔ awu amfay. Puyɛ̌ chi bakwǎŋwaŋ kɛ bághókó yɔ, mbɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ áchyɛ̀ mmʉɛt nkɔ yɔ, nɛ yɔ abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
47005002	Tɛtɛp, sɛ́chi ndǔ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ fá amɨk nɛ sɛ́nòŋ nɛ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛ Mandɛm anchyɛ bhɛsɛ mmʉɛt ɛkɔ ɛnɛ ɛchi amfay,
47005003	bɛ ndu afyɛ́ yɔ bhɛsɛ amʉɛt, sɛ́kɛ́ bhak bɛbho bɛwɔ.
47005004	Ndǔ bɛ́tɛm ɛbhɛn sɛchi arɛ́ nɛ́nɛ, sɛ́bhɔ̀ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ sɛ́chí ndǔ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ. Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tɔ́ŋ bɛ sɛ́yàŋ Mandɛm ámfɛ́rɛ́ mmʉɛt anɛ ágù. Sɛ́yàŋ chi bɛ yi anchyɛ bhɛsɛ mmʉɛt nkɔ, bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛpu gu ɛ́mɛn ɛnɛ ɛ́gù.
47005005	Mbɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ̌ ákʉ́ sɛ́mbák bo abhɛn sɛ́kwày bɛ́bhɔ́ŋ mmʉɛt nkɔ yɔ. Achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ́ Ɛfóŋó ɛyi mbɔ nkɛm bɛ́ chɔŋ anchyɛ bhɛsɛ mmʉɛt nkɔ yɔ nkwɔ tɛtɛp.
47005006	Sɛ́bhɔŋ yɛ ntɨ nɛtaŋ nɛtaŋ mpoknkɛm ndu sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ, ɛnɛ́ sɛ́bhʉɛ́t ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛnɛ, sɛ́pú kway bɛbhak amfay nɛ Yesu Acha.
47005007	Ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ fá amɨk sɛ́bhɔ̌ŋ nɛka nɛ yi. Sɛ́pú ghɔ yi nɛ amɨ́k.
47005008	Sɛ́bhɔŋ ntɨ nɛ ɛ́rɨ ntá yɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́ndɔ́ mmʉɛt ɛnɛ sɛndɔk sɛmbak anywɔ́p nɛ Acha.
47005009	Ndu ɛchi yɛ nɔ, yɛ̌ sɛ́bhʉɛ́t chi fá amɨk, yɛ̌ sɛ́chí chí awu nɛ yí, nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ chi bɛ́ sɛ́nkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛkʉ yi ámbɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ bhɛsɛ mpoknkɛm.
47005010	Ntí achi bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛ́te bɛsí Kristo mmu átàŋ bo mankɛm. Chɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ambɔ́ŋ nsáy anɛ ákwáy nɛ yi bɛ́kóŋo nɛpɛ́m ɛni fá amɨk. Mbák sɛ́kʉ bɛrɨ, chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ ɛrɨ́tí akap, nɛ mbák sɛ́kʉ bɛbʉ́, sɛ́mbɔŋ ntɛ́msi.
47005011	Ndu sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ ǎtàŋ chɔŋ bo mankɛm, sɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy nɛ Yesu Acha. Bɛchay ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ sɛ́fyɛ̀ yɛ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ bɛ bo mánóko bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghàti bhɔ bɛchi tɛtɛp. Mbɔŋ Mandɛm arɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɛsɛ́ sayri, nɛ nkáysí bɛ be nkwɔ bǎrɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ bo sɛ́chi.
47005012	Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ tɔŋ bɛ sɛ́pɛt sɛ́yàŋ bɛkʉ mǎndɨŋɨ mɛnyu bo sɛchi. Sɛ́yàŋ chi bɛkʉ mǎndɨŋɨ ntí anɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́panyu ɛ̌ti ɛyɛsɛ bɛ́ mǎndɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kɛ́mɛ bo abhɛn bárɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ. Mpányu yap apu yɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ ntɨ mmu nɛchi amɛm nɛ Mandɛm. Báyɨ̀ŋɨ bho chi ndǔ nté yap achi.
47005013	Mbák sɛchi bɛchɨŋtǐ bho mbɔ ɛnyǔ mbɔk bo bárɛ̀m, sɛ́bhák nɔ chí ndu sɛ́nù bɛchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Kɛ mbák bǎká bɛ sɛ́pú bɛchɨŋtǐ bho, dɨŋí yɛ́ ka bɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk chi ɛ̌ti yɛka.
47005014	Bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn sɛ́kʉ̀, sɛ́kʉ̀ bhɔ chi mbɔnyunɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ Kristo ɛ́pùri bhɛsɛ. Sɛ́noko bɛ ndu Kristo ágú ɛ̌ti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu, bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́náŋ sɛgu.
47005015	Agú ɛ̌ti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu bɛ bo abhɛn básɔ́rɛ́ nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ ɛnɛn yi áchyɛ̀ nɛ maŋák bákɛ́ pɛrɛ bhak chi ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛyap. Bapɛ́m ayap ándɔp chí mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi áyàŋ mbɔnyunɛ ɛ̌ti yap kɛ yi ágú nɛ ɛ̌ti yap kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ yi ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
47005016	Bɛbho nɛ́nɛ, sɛ́pú pɛrɛ yɨŋɨ yɛ bho chí bɛkoŋo nkaysi bǒ mmɨk. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ sɛ́yɨ̀ŋɨ nyaka Kristo, kɛ nɛ́nɛ, sɛrɨŋɨ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyǔ mmu yi áchí.
47005017	Ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ mmu anɛ ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo arɔp yɛ chi mmǔ nkɔ. Mɛnyɨŋ bɛsɨ́ bɛ́fʉɛt, ɛbhɛn bɛkɔ kɛ bɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́.
47005018	Mandɛm kɛ ákʉ́ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm mɛ́mbák ɛnyu ɛyɔ. Yí kɛ átó Kristo ánkʉ sɛ́mpɛ́tnsɛm ntá yi, nɛ achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ bɛtɨk bɛkʉ bo mámpɛ́tnsɛm mámbɔŋ kpák nɛ Mandɛm.
47005019	Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ Mandɛm áfʉ̀ɛt nyaka ntá Kristo bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ámpɛ́tnsɛm ambɔŋ kpák nɛ yi. Abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ yɨŋɨ nyaka ndǔ bɔ bapu bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé. Nɛ afyɛ́ ntó amɔ yɛsɛ ɛnɛ́n nɛ́kʉ̀ bo mámpɛ́tnsɛm mámbɔŋ kpák nɛ yi.
47005020	Sɛ́chí yɛ bo abhɛn Kristo afyɛ́ ntó ɛnɛn bhɛsɛ́ amɔ. Mbɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ áfʉɛ̀t yɛ ntá yɛsɛ́, ndu ábhɨ̀ŋɨ be nɛ ɛkɔŋ. Ndǔ nnyɛ́n Kristo, sɛ́nɨ̀k be mmʉɛt, pɛt ka nsɛm ntá Mandɛm.
47005021	Ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ, Mandɛm akʉ Kristo mmu ábhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ yɛ bɛbʉ́ ámbák mbʉ́mbʉ bɛ sɛ́mfʉ́ɛ́t ntá yi sɛ́mbák chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
47006001	Bɛsɛ bo sɛ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk nɛ Mandɛm, sɛ́nɨ̀k be mmʉɛt bɛ bǎkɛ́ rɔ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn yi atɔŋɔ bhe mɛ́mbák ndɛ́ndɛm.
47006002	(a) Yi ǎrɛ̀m mbɔ ɛnyǔ básɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ, “Mpok ákwáy nɔ́kɔ́ bɛtɔŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, ngók nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnɛka, nywɔp bɛ́pɛ́mɛ bho nɛkwáy nɔkɔ, nkwak bhe.” (b) Ghók ká, nɛ́nɛ chi mpok anɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ bɛtɔŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, nɛ́nɛ chi mpok anɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ bɛpɛmɛ bhe.
47006003	Sɛ́pú kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́chɛ̀t mmu mbi nɛ Mandɛm bɛ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́kɛ́ bhak ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛsɛ.
47006004	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́yàŋ chi bɛ ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́kʉ̀, sɛ́ntɔ́ŋ bɛ sɛ́chí bǒ bɛtok Mandɛm tɛtɛp. Sɛ́bhɔŋ maŋák mpoknkɛm. Sɛ́bhɔ̀ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu, yɛ̌ nɔ sɛ́bhɔŋ maŋák mpoknkɛm.
47006005	Mánáŋ badɛn bhɛsɛ, mánáŋ báfyɛ̌ bhɛsɛ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Mǎnaŋ bágʉɛ́p ɛbyɔk bɛ bǒ mánchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ ɛsɔŋɔri. Sɛ́yaŋá gu bɛtɨk. Mpok nɛ mpok, sɛ́kɛ bhɔŋ mbi bɛbhʉrɛ kɛnɔ́ nɛ ɛ́nchɛbhɛ nɔkɔ bhɛsɛ tɛ nɛnyíɛ́ mɛnyiɛ.
47006006	Batɨ̌ yɛsɛ achi amɛm pɛ́pɛ́p, nɛ sɛ́rɨŋɨ tɛtɛp anɛ Mandɛm. Sɛ́bhɔŋ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́ nɛ bho, nɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achi nɛ bhɛsɛ, nɛ sɛ́kɔŋ bo tɛtɛp.
47006007	Sɛ́ghàti bo chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp. Bɛtaŋ Mandɛm bɛ́chi nɛ bhɛsɛ. Sɛ́chí chak bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ ɛyɔ ɛchi mbɔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛnu ɛbhɛn bɛ́kwàk bhɛsɛ sɛ́nu nɛ bǒmpap abhɛsɛ, sɛ́nchɛt bɔ mbi bɛbhɔŋ bhɛsɛ.
47006008	Mbɔk bho báchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ kɛnókó kɛ bachak bábyak bhɛsɛ byak. Mbɔk bho bárɛ̀m ɛrɨ́rɨ́ ɛ̌ti ɛyɛsɛ, kɛ báchák bárɛ̀m chi ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti ɛyɛsɛ. Bo básɔ̀t bhɛsɛ mbɔ bǒ bapu, ɛnɛ́ sɛ́rɛ̀m chi tɛtɛp.
47006009	Bo bárɛ̀m bɛ agha arɨŋɨ kpɨk bhɛsɛ́, yɛ̌ nɔ bo bárɨŋɨ bhɛsɛ sayri. Ɛ́chí mbɔ bɛ sɛ́gùgu, yɛ̌ nɔ, sɛ́chi nɛpɛ́m. Báchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ ɛsɔŋɔri, kɛ sɛ́pú gú.
47006010	Sɛ́chí ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri, yɛ̌ nɔ, sɛbhɔŋ maŋák mpoknkɛm. Sɛ́chí amɔ apay, yɛ̌ nɔ sɛ́kʉ̀ bɛyǎ bo bábhɔ̀ŋ bɛyǎ áfɔ́k. Ɛchi mbɔ bɛ sɛ́bhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ, yɛ̌ nɔ, sɛ́bhɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
47006011	Bě bo Kɔrint, sɛ́ghati bhe yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ kpoŋoroŋ nɛ sɛ́nɛnɛ batɨ yɛsɛ ntá yɛka.
47006012	Bǎbhɨkɨ fu bɛsɛ antɨ, be kɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ kɔŋ bhɛsɛ.
47006013	Nchí ghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m ɛnyɨŋ ntá bɔ́bhi. Nɛnɛ́ ká batɨ ntá yɛsɛ, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ sɛ́kɔ́ŋ bhe.
47006014	Bǎkɛ́ nyɔ́p mmʉɛt nɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨkɨ noko Yesu. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm, ɛ́bhɔŋ yi bɛkʉ nɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pú chak. Bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ bɛkway bɛ́bhak nɛbhʉɛt amɔt nɛ ɛjuri kɛ?
47006015	Kristo abhɔŋ yi bɛkʉ nɛ Satan? Mmu anɛ ánókó Yesu abhɔŋ yi bɛkʉ nɛ mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ noko?
47006016	Ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ɛbhɔŋ yi bɛkʉ nɛ bɔmandɛm nsé? Bɛsɛ bo sɛ́nókó Yesu kɛ sɛ́chí ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm mmu achi nɛpɛ́m. “Chɔŋ nnte ɛkɛt ɛya nɛntɨ ɛnap, mbak nɛ bhɔ. Chɔŋ mbak Mandɛm wap, bɔ́ mámbak bǒbha.”
47006017	Ɛta Mandɛm árɛ̀m yɛ bɛ, “Fú ká nɛntɨ nap fap ka mmuɛ́t nɛ bhɔ. Bǎkɛ́ nyɔ́p mmʉɛt nɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bakwap, nɛ chɔŋ mpɛt nsɔt be amʉɛt.”
47006018	Mandɛm Acha Bɛtaŋ Mɛnkɛm ǎrɛ̀m mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛchi nɛbhʉɛt achak amɛm Ɛkáti ɛyi bɛ, “Chɔŋ mbak Ɛtayɛka, mǎmbak bɔ̌bha.”
47007001	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ bariɛp amɛn, sǒ ká amɔ́ fɛrɛ́ ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kwày mɛnyɔp mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ nɛ batɨ̌ ywɛsɛ. Sɛ́ncháy Mandɛm, sɛ́nu bɛbhak nyáŋá bɛsí bhi ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi.
47007002	Nɛnɛ́ ká batɨ ntá yɛsɛ. Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ yɛ̌ mmu ɛbɛ́pti ɛnyɨŋ, sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ chɔŋti ntí mmu amɛm, nɛ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ nyiɛ́ mmu ɛbhɔ́ŋ.
47007003	Mpú rɛm nɔ chi ndu bɛtaŋ be bɛ bǎkʉ bɛbʉ́. Nnáŋ njámbɨ ngátí bhe bɛ́ sɛ́kɔŋ be nɛ batɨ yɛsɛ́ ankɛm, nɛ yɛ̌ chi nɛwú yɛ̌ chi nɛpɛ́m, yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́pú kɔrɛ bhɛsɛ nɛ bhe.
47007004	Mbákántɨ nɛ bhe tontó. Mɛ̌dɛ̀p awɔ́ antɨ tontó ɛ̌ti yɛka. Bǎchyɛ̀ mɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ tontó, nɛ yɛ̌ndu sɛ́bhɔ̀ŋ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, maŋák ama aya acha.
47007005	Yɛ̌ chi mpok anɛ sɛ́gháká atú Masidónia sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt. Bɛsɔŋɔri bɛre twɔ bɛbhě mɛnkɛm.
47007006	Kɛ Mandɛm mmu áchyɛ bo abhɛn batɨ apɛt apu bɔ amɛm nɛpɔptǐntɨ́, achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ ndu Táytɔs átwɔ́.
47007007	Puyɛ̌ ndiɛrɛ nɛtwɔ Táytɔs kɛ Mandɛm ásɔ́rɛ́ bɛchyɛ bɛsɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak ɛ́chí bɛ bǎchyɛ́ Táytɔs nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ mpok yi achi awu nɛ bhe. Ágháti mɛ ɛnyǔ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛkwak bɛ ntwɔ́ awu, nɛ ɛnyǔ batɨ ábè bhe amɛm nɛ áyɔ́mɛ. Apɛt aghati mɛ ndǔ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ ntɨ tontó bɛte nɛ mɛ. Ɛ́kʉ́ maŋák ama apɛt aya acha.
47007008	Yɛ̌ ɛmbak chi bɛ ɛkáti ɛnɛ́ nsɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe ɛ́kʉ́ bǎbhɔ́ŋ basɛ́mɛ́, áyɔ́mɛ apú nɛ mɛ bɛ nsɨŋ yɔ́. Ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt mbɔ́ŋ áyɔ́mɛ mbɔnyunɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ yɔ́ ɛ́chyɛ́ bhe basɛ́mɛ́, yɛ̌ndu basɛ́mɛ́ mɔ áchí chí ndǔ mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok.
47007009	Tɛtɛp, mbɔ̌ŋ maŋák bɛ nsɨŋ be ɛkáti kɛ puyɛ̌ chí ɛ̌ti yɔ́ ɛ́chyɛ́ bhe basɛ́mɛ́. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ́ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ maŋák chi bɛ basɛ́mɛ́ amɛn ɛkáti ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ́ bhe akʉ bǎtɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka. Bɛběntɨ ɛbhɛká bɛchi ɛnyǔ bɛběntɨ ɛbhɛ́n Mandɛm áyàŋ bǒbhi mámbɔ́ŋ. Ɛ́kʉ bɛ ɛkáti ɛyɔ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ twɔ nɛ mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́ ntá yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka.
47007010	Basɛ́mɛ́ amɛn Mandɛm ákɔ́ŋɔ́ ǎkʉ̀ mmu ántɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi, antwɔ́ ntá yi bɛ́ yí ámpɛ́mɛ́ yi, nɛ apu twɔ nɛ áyɔ́mɛ. Kɛ basɛ́mɛ́ bǒ mmɨk ǎtwɔ̀ chi nɛ nɛwú.
47007011	Bě babhɔŋ mǎngɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ basɛ́mɛ́ amɛn Mandɛm akɔŋɔ ákʉ́ ntá yɛka. Nɛ́nɛ, bǎbhɔŋ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛ́yíbhiri mɛnyɨŋ. Ɛ́kʉ bǎso amɔ ndǔ ndak anɛ nɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ bɛběntɨ́ ɛ̌ti ndak anɛ́ mmu wu ákʉ́ nɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋ bɛcháy ɛ̌ti ndak anɛ áfákárí. Bǎbhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛghɔ mɛ nɛ bǎyàŋ tontó bɛ mántɛ́msí mmǔ anɛ átwɔ́ nɛ ndak.
47007012	Yɛ̌ndu nsɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ be ɛkáti, mbɨ́kɨ́ sɨŋ chi bɛkʉ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ mmu anɛ ákʉ́ nɛfwɔp nɛ mmu anɛ bǎkʉ́ yi nɛfwɔp. Nsɨŋ chi ɛ̌ti bǎghɔ́ bɛsí Mandɛm, bɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋ ntɨ nɛ bhɛsɛ tontó.
47007013	Ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ̀ yɛ bɛsɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́. Bǎfyɛ́ bhɛsɛ ntɨ, nɛ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ, sɛchi maŋák ɛ̌ti maŋák amɛn Táytɔs ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ndǔ be mankɛm bǎsɔ́rɛ́ yi awu sayri, bǎkʉ́ ntɨ ɛni nɛpɔp amɛm.
47007014	Mɛ̌ghàti nyaka bhe chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp mpoknkɛm. Nɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ mɛ ntíánwɔ́p ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ngátí Táytɔs ndɛbhɛ nɔkɔ awɔ́ antɨ ɛ̌ti yɛka, nɛ ɛ́fú nkwɔ tɛtɛp.
47007015	Nɛ́nɛ, Táytɔs apɛt akɔŋ be áchá, sayri sayri, mpok yi átɨ̀k ɛnyǔ bǎsíɛ́ptí yi nɛ bɛcháy, mǎngwɛrɛ nɔkɔ, nɛ ɛnyǔ bǎkʉ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ághátí bhe.
47007016	Nɛ́nɛ, nchí ŋák, mbɔnyunɛ mbákántɨ nɛ bhe ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi.
47008001	Bɔ̌ma, sɛ́yàŋ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm ɛbhɛn bakwɔ́ bho Kristo abhɛn atú Masidónia bátɔ́ŋɔ́.
47008002	Bɛyǎ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn bɔ́ bághɔ́, bɛ́kʉ bábhɔŋ mamɔ tontó. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bábhɔŋ bɛyǎ maŋák. Ɛ́kʉ bábhɔŋ bɛyǎ ɛkɔŋ bɛ́chyɛ akap kɛyɨŋɨ nsɛm ndu bɛ́kwak bo, yɛ̌ndu báchí ndǔ bɛyǎ kɛchɛ́p.
47008003	Nchí ghati bhe bɛ báchyɛ mbɔ ɛnyǔ amɔ yap átɔ̀ŋ. Nɛ mpok báchyɛ̀, báchyɛ́ mbɔŋ ɛcha ɛnyǔ amɔ́ ayap átɔ́ŋɔ́, mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛ́fú bhɔ antɨ.
47008004	Báchyɛ́, mánɨk nɔkɔ bhɛsɛ mmʉɛt ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ nɛ ntɨ nɛnkɛm bɛ́ sɛ́nchíɛ bɔ́ mbi mánkwák bo Mandɛm abhɛn bachi Yerúsalɛm.
47008005	Nkwɔ́ bho Masidónia bákʉ́ bacha ɛnyu ɛnɛ sɛ́kàysi nyaka bɛ bákway bɛkʉ. Nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ anɛ bɔ báyámbɨ bákʉ́ chí bɛ báchyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap nɛnkɛm ntá Mandɛm Acha. Báchyɛ́ yɛ mmʉɛt ntá yɛsɛ nkwɔ ndu bɛkoŋo nkaysi Mandɛm.
47008006	Táytɔs anáŋ abho bɛsɔt bakap ntá yɛka ndǔ bɛkwak bachɛ́bhɛ́bho. Ɛ́kʉ sɛ́ghátí yɛ yi bɛ ampɛtnsɛm awu ankwak be mǎndɔk ambɨ mɛnaŋa bɛtɨkɨ́ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn bǎbhó.
47008007	Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ndu mbi Mandɛm bǎcha. Bǎbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu ɛrɨ́rɨ́. Bághàti bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu sayri. Bǎrɨŋɨ tɛtɛp Mandɛm. Bǎchyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka nɛnkɛm ndu bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Mandɛm nɛ bǎkɔŋ bhɛsɛ tontó. Kʉ yɛka nkwɔ bɛtɨk ndu bɛchyɛ nɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn bɛya bɛcha.
47008008	Mpu rɛm nɔ chí bɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ngátí bhe. Nchí kʉ chi bɛ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyǔ bǒ báchák bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛkɔŋ ndu bɛ́kwák. Nkʉ chi bɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛtɔŋ bɛ bǎkɔŋ bo bachak tɛtɛp.
47008009	Bě bǎbhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn Yesu Kristo Acha átɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɛsɛ. Yɛ̌ndu yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, ayibhiri arɔp nchɛ́bhɛ́ mmu ɛ̌ti yɛka bɛ kɛchɛp ɛki kɛ́nkʉ mǎmbák bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛsí Mandɛm.
47008010	Maníɛ́ ama ndǔ ndak anɛ chi bɛ: Mmíɛ́ ɛ́yú, bě kɛ̌ bǎyambɨ bɛchyɛ akap, nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ be kɛ̌ bǎyámbɨ bɛbhɔŋ ɛkwak bɛkʉ nɔ.
47008011	Naŋá yɛ ká bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bǎbho mbɔ ɛnyǔ amɔ́ ayɛka átɔ̀ŋ, bɛ nɛkʉ ywɛka ánkɔ ɛnyumɔt nɛ ɛkwak bɛkʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎtɨ́
47008012	Mbák mmu abhɔŋ ntɨ bɛ́chyɛ akap, Mandɛm ǎsɔt ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi áchyɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ amɔ́ yi átɔ̀ŋ. Apú bhɛp mmu ánchyɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ.
47008013	Mpú rɛm nɔ chi bɛ mámfɛ́rɛ́ ntu amʉɛt bǒ bachak mámbay be anti.
47008014	Nchí yaŋ chi bɛ ndǔ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ tontó nɛ́nɛ, mǎnkwak bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ, bɛ mpok bɔ nkwɔ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́, mánkwak be ndǔ mpok anɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ be mankɛm bǎbhak sayri ɛnyumɔt.
47008015	Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́ghàti bhɛsɛ bɛ, “Mmǔ anɛ ápɔ́kɔ́ bɛyǎ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́fú amfay ntá Mandɛm, ǎnyiɛ nyaka yɛ̌nyɨŋ kɛrɔp, anɛ ápɔ́kɔ́ chi mandú abhɔ́ŋ ɛnɛn nɛkwáy yi gbák.”
47008016	Nchí kaka Mandɛm bɛ akʉ Táytɔs ámbɔ́ŋ nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyǔ ntɨ ɛnɛn mɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ ndu bɛkwak bhe.
47008017	Puyɛ̌ chi bɛ aká bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́ghátí yi. Yímbɔŋ anáŋ abhɔŋ ɛkwak bɛpɛt bɛ́twɔ awu bɛghɔ be mankɛm. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, ǎtwɔ̀ yɛ nkwɔ ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛyi.
47008018	Sɛ́tò manɔ achak nkwɔ nɛ Táytɔs. Nkwɔ́ bo Kristo mbaŋ ɛnkɛm bárɨ́ŋɨ́ yi sayri ɛ̌ti bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀ ndu bɛ́gháti bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́.
47008019	Nɛ ndu bɛrɔŋ ambɨ, yi kɛ bakwɔ́ bho Kristo mbankɛm báyábhɛ́ bɛ́ ankɔ nɔkɔ nɛ bhɛsɛ ndǔ bɛtɨkɨ́ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn sɛ́kʉ̀. Sɛ́kʉ̀ bhɔ ndu nkwɔ ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ́ sɛ́nchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó nɛ bɛ́tɔŋ bɛ sɛbhɔŋ ntɨ bɛ́kwak bho.
47008020	Ndǔ sɛ́kɔ̀ ndu nkwɔ, ɛyɔ ɛpu chyɛ mbi bɛ mmu ánkáysí bɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ batɨ apay. Sɛ́sɔ̀t mpok bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ ji bhɛsɛ bɛyɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ sɛ́kʉ̀ nɛ bɛyǎ akabhɛ́ nkáp anɛ.
47008021	Sɛ́yàŋ chí bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak, puyɛ̌ chi ndiɛrɛ bɛsí Mandɛm Acha, kɛ bɛsí bho nkwɔ.
47008022	Sɛ́tò nkwɔ mɔ́mayɛsɛ achák nɛ bhɔ. Sɛ́naŋ sɛmɔ yi ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ, ndu bɛyǎ babhi, nɛ sɛ́ghɔ́ bɛ abhɔŋ ntɨ bɛ́kʉ bɛtɨkɨ́ Mandɛm. Nɛ́nɛ, áchyɛ́ mmʉɛt ndu bɛkʉ bhɔ achá mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyu ɛsɨ́ mbɔnyunɛ abháká ntɨ nɛ be tontó.
47008023	Mbák chí Táytɔs, chi ntɨ nkʉbɛtɨk awa. Ǎkʉ̀ bɛtɨk nɛ mɛ ndu bɛkwak be. Mbák chí bɔ̌mayɛsɛ bachak abhɔ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap achi mǔnto ndǔ ntí bakwɔ́ bho Kristo abhɛn bátó yi, bɔ bho báchyɛ̀ Kristo kɛnókó.
47008024	Kʉ yɛka bakwɔ́ bho Kristo mángɔ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ bho, nɛ bɛ ntí achi anɛ sɛ́dɛ̀p awɔ antɨ ɛ̌ti ɛyɛka bɛsí bhap.
47009001	Ntí apu anɛ mɛ̌sɨŋ be ɛ̌ti nɛkwak ɛnɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛchyɛ nkwɔ Kristo abhɛn Yerúsalɛm.
47009002	Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ ɛkwak bɛkwak nɛ ngátí nkwɔ Kristo abhɛn atú Masidónia ɛ̌ti yɛka ndɛp nɔkɔ awɔ antɨ bɛ běka bɔ̌mayɛsɛ mankɛm abhɛn atú Akáiya mǎnaŋ bǎtoŋti mmʉɛt ndu bɛchyɛ nɛkwak tɛ mmíɛ́ ɛyu. Nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn bǎfyɛ̀ ndǔ ndak anɛ ndu mɛ́nyɨ́kɨ́si batɨ̌ bɛyǎ bhap bɛ mántóŋtí awap akabhɛ́ nkáp nkwɔ.
47009003	Kɛ nchí to bɔ̌mayɛsɛ abhɛn ntá yɛka ndu bɛkʉ bɛ nɛpá anɛ sɛ́pànyu ɛ̌ti ɛyɛka ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ákɛ́ bhak ndɛ́ndɛm. Ɛnɛ, chi bɛkʉ bɛ mǎnkwáy bɛ́tóŋti mmʉɛt nɛ aywɛka akap mbɔ ɛnyǔ ngátí bhɔ bɛ chɔŋ mǎnkʉ.
47009004	Mbák ntwɔ́ awu nɛ mbɔk bǒnkwɔ Masidónia ɛnɛ́ bǎbhɨkɨ re toŋti mmʉɛt sayri, chɔŋ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ ntíánwɔ́p mbɔnyunɛ ngátí bhɔ́ ɛnyǔ nsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ bhe. Mbák ɛ́mfákárí nɔ, ntíánwɔ́p ɛnɛka nɛ́ya mbɔŋ nɛ́ncha.
47009005	Ɛ̌tiyɔ kɛ nkaysi yɛ bɛ ɛrɨ mfyɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ bɔ̌mayɛsɛ mánjámbɨ mántwɔ awu mǎntoŋti akap anɛ bǎfyɛ bariɛp bɛchyɛ kɛ mɛ̌ntwɔ. Ɛrɨ bɛkʉ bɛ akap wu ámbák chi anɛ áfù be antɨ, puyɛ̌ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mányiɛrɛ be nyiɛrɛ mǎnkʉ.
47009006	Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ mmǔ anɛ apɨ́ mbwɔt anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ ya, ǎghɛm mbwɔt anɛ abhɨkɨ ya. Kɛ mmǔ anɛ ápɨ́ bɛyǎ, ǎghɛm bɛyǎ.
47009007	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛchyɛ akap chi mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi akʉ ntɨ bɛchyɛ, puyɛ̌ chi nɛ basɛ́mɛ́ antɨ, nɛ ɛ́kɛ́bhak chi mbɔ bɛ bápùri yi puri, mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm akɔŋ mmu anɛ áchyɛ̀ akap nɛ maŋák.
47009008	Nɛ Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛchyɛ bhe áfɔ́k anɛ aya acha bɛ mǎmbɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́chɛ́bhɛ́ be ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛ́ya ɛncha kpát mǎnkwáy bɛkwak bo abhɛn mɛnyɨŋ bɛchɛbhɛ bhɔ.
47009009	Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mmu Mandɛm achi awɔ́ fúú. Ǎchyɛ bo abhɛn ɛyap ɛpu kɛyɨŋɨ nsɛm. Bɛrɨ́tí bɛtɨk ɛbhi bɛ́pú nɛm.”
47009010	Chɔŋ Mandɛm mmu áchyɛ̀ mbwɔt ntá nkwaŋankɨ nɛ ánchyɛ̀ nɛnyíɛ́ mɛnyiɛ anchyɛ be nkwɔ mbwɔt, ankʉ yɔ anjá ancha, nɛ ankʉ bɛrɨ́tí bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka mɛ́nchyɛ́ bɛyǎ mbwɔt.
47009011	Chɔŋ Mandɛm anchyɛ bhe kɛnɛ́m ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi bɛ mǎnkwáy bɛchyɛ tontó nɛ awɔ́ fúú. Nɛ akap aywɛka wu ámfʉɛt ntá yɛsɛ angaka ntá bo abhɛn bǎtò wu ntá yap, nɛ ánkʉ bɔ́ mánchyɛ́ Mandɛm bakak.
47009012	Bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn-nɛ bǎkʉ̀ bɛ́kwàk nkwɔ bo Kristo ndu mɛnyu bɛpay. Bɛ́kwàk bɔ mámbɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchɛbhɛ bhɔ nɛ bɛ́kwàk bɔ mánchyɛ́ Mandɛm bɛyǎ bakak.
47009013	Ndǔ bǎchɛ́mɛ́ nkáp nɛ bǎchyɛ́ bo bhɔ, bǎtɔŋ bɛ bǎkoŋo tɛtɛp anɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ bǎrɛm bɛ mǎnókó. Ndǔ bǎchyɛ ɛnyu yɔ nɛ awɔ fuu ndu bɛkwak bhɔ nɛ bo bachak, bo bághɔ nɛ báchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó.
47009014	Ndu bɛrɔŋ ambɨ, chɔŋ bɔ́ mánɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yɛka. Bábhɔŋ ɛkɔŋ bɛghɔ bhe mbɔnyunɛ bághɔ bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm amʉɛt yɛka.
47009015	Sɛ́nkáká nɔ́kɔ́ Mandɛm ndǔ akap anɛ yi áchyɛ́ anɛ mmu apú kway bɛrɛm ɛnyǔ wu achí.
47010001	Mɛmbɔŋ Pɔ̌l kɛ nchí nɨk be mmʉɛt ndǔ nnyɛ́n Kristo mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ nɛ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt. Chi mɛ mmu mbɔk bho bárɛ̀m bɛ mpok nchí nɛ bhe bɛsí nɛ bɛsi nchí rɛm kɛpɨ nɛ bɛcháy, kɛ mpok mpu nɛ bhe nchí sɨŋ be bɛkáti nɛ bɛtaŋtí bɛyɔŋ.
