47010002	Nchí nɨk be mmʉɛt bɛ bǎkɛ́ puri mɛ bɛ mbák bɛběbɛbe nɛ bhe mpok ntwɔ́ awu. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mbɔŋ bɛ́bhak bɛběbɛbe chi nɛ bo abhɛn bákàysi bɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ bǒ mmɨk.
47010003	Yɛ̌ndu sɛ́chí ndǔ mmɨkɨ nɛ sɛ́pú nu mbɔ bǒ mmɨk.
47010004	Mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛnu ɛbhɛsɛ puyɛ̌ chi ɛbhɛn bakwǎŋwaŋ. Mandɛm kɛ áchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ bhɔ, nɛ bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛchɔŋti bɛpok ɛbhɛn bǒmpap abhɛsɛ bábhɛ̀sɛ.
47010005	Sɛ́chɔ̀ŋti nɛtaŋányu nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́té bɛchɛt bo mbi bɛ bákɛ́ rɨŋɨ baraka Mandɛm. Sɛ́kɛ̀m yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ nkaysi mbɔ mǔkɛnɔŋ anɛ bákɛ́mɛ́ ɛbhɨ̌nɛnu, nɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ yɔ ándɔ́bhɛ ghok chi Kristo.
47010006	Mpok mǎnaŋ bǎchyɛ mmʉɛt ɛnkɛm ntá Mandɛm, chɔŋ sɛ̌ntoŋti mmʉɛt bɛ́tɛ́msi yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ anɛ átaŋntí nɛ Kristo.
47010007	Bǎrɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛyɨŋɨ mɛ chi amfay amfay. Mbák yɛ mmu arɨŋɨ sayri bɛ yi achi nkoŋo Kristo, ándɨŋɨ bɛ bɛsɛ nkwɔ sɛchi bakoŋo Kristo mbɔ yi.
47010008	Yɛ̌ ɛmbak chi bɛ nchí dɛp awɔ antɨ tontó mandú ncha ɛnyǔ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ ɛ̌ti bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu Acha áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ, ɛyɔ ɛpu kʉ mbɔ̌ŋ ntíánwɔ́p. Achyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɔ chi bɛkʉ mǎngo, puyɛ̌ bɛkʉ mǎnkwɛn.
47010009	Mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ ɛmbak mbɔ bɛ mɛ̌sɔ̀t bɛkáti ɛbhɛn mɛ̌sɨ̀ŋ bɛkʉ mǎmbɔŋ bɛcháy.
47010010	Mbɔk bho bárɛ̀m bɛ, “Bɛkati Pɔ̌l ásɨ̀ŋ bɛtaŋ bɛcha nɛ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhi bɛ́tɔ̀k mmu tɛ antɨ, kɛ mpok yi achi nɛ bhɛsɛ, apú bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ nɛ apú rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chwè bo antɨ.”
47010011	Mɛnyǔ bǒbhɔ bábhɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́sɨ̀ŋ ndǔ bɛkáti mpok sɛ́pú awu, bɔ́ kɛ sɛ́kʉ chɔŋ mpok sɛ́bhak awu nɛ bhe.
47010012	Puyɛ̌ bɛ sɛ́mɔ̀ bɛyɛnti mmʉɛt nɛ bo abhɛn bákàk mmʉɛt. Kɛ nɛyɛnti mmʉɛt ɛnap nɛ batɨ ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ bácha bhɔ, nɛ́tɔ̀ŋ chi bɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mbɔ̌ŋ kɛboŋ.
47010013	Mbák chi bhɛsɛ, sɛ́pú pányu ɛncha ɛnyu sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ. Sɛ́tɨ bɛwɛnti chi ndǔ ndiɛrɛ anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ bɛ sɛ́nkʉ sɛ́ngwɛnti arɛ́, nɛ be nkwɔ bǎchí ɛbhe ɛyɛsɛ.
47010014	Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kɨŋɨ ndiɛrɛ anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ mpok sɛ́yambɨ sɛ́twɔ́ ntá yɛka. Bɛsɛ babhɔŋ kɛ sɛ́yambɨ sɛ́twɔ́ bhe nɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo.
47010015	Sɛ́pú kɨŋɨ ndiɛrɛ anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ ndu ɛbhɛsɛ bɛtɨk. Sɛ́bhaka ntɨ chi bɛ ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Kristo nɛ́gò nɛ́ndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, chɔŋ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛsɛ nkwɔ nɛntɨ ɛnɛka mɛ́ngo mɛndɔk nɔkɔ chí ambɨ.
47010016	Mbák ɛchi nɔ, chɔŋ sɛ́nkway bɛrɔŋ bɛghati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ amɛm bɛtɔk bɛchak ɛbhɛn yɛ̌ mmu abhɨkɨ re kʉ bɛtɨk arɛ́, kɛpányu ɛ̌ti bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ́ ndǔ ɛbhe mmu achak.
47010017	Kɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Yɛ̌ agha anɛ áyaŋ bɛ́panyu, ámpányu ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm Acha ákʉ́.”
47010018	Puyɛ̌ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m ɛrɨ́rɨ́ ɛ̌ti mmʉɛt ɛyi kɛ Mandɛm Acha ásɔt nɛ maŋák, chi mmu anɛ Mandɛm árɛ̀m ɛrɨrɨ ɛ̌ti yi.
47011001	Nchí nɨkmʉɛt bɛ mǎnkɛpntɨ nɛ mɛ ndu nchí rɛm kɛpɨ mbɔ ɛchɨŋtɨ́mu. Kɛ́p ká ntɨ nɛ mɛ.
47011002	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ nkɔŋ be nɛ mpabhamɨ́k anɛ Mandɛm. Nsɔt be mbɔ ngɔsɔ́ŋ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mbakanɛn nɛ nnáŋ mfyɛ́ bariɛp nɛ mmǔ amɔt anɛ ábháy bhe. Mmǔ wu chi Kristo.
47011003	Kɛ mbɔŋ bɛcháy bɛ bǒfú bákway bɛrwɔ bhe mbɔ ɛnyǔ Satan ásɔ́rɛ́ nyaka bapu mi arwɔ́ Ifa, ɛ́nkʉ nkaysi ayɛka ampɔkɔ bhe mǎngurɛ ɛbhɨ, kɛpɛrɛ koŋo mbi Kristo nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt ɛnɛn nɛchi pɛ́pɛ́p.
47011004	Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ ɛchi mbɔ bhɛ mbák mmu atwɔ ntá yɛka aghati bhe ɛnyɨŋ, yɛ̌ yi árɛ̀m chi ɛ̌ti Yesu achak anɛ achi kɛkúrí nɛ anɛ sɛ́ghàti bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi, mǎnoko nóko. Nɛ yɛ̌ árɛ̀m chi ɛ̌ti ɛfóŋó ɛnɛ ɛchi kɛkúrí nɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm mmu mǎnɛnɛ batɨ ntá yi bǎkaka, nɛ yɛ̌ árɛ̀m chi ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ achi kɛkúrí nɛ anɛ mǎnókó, mǎnsɔrɛ sɔt amɔ apay.
47011005	Mbɨ́kɨ́ kaysi bɛ bo abhɛn bǎsɔt bɛ bachi manɛm bǒnto bacha mɛ.
47011006	Ngufú mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛrɛm kɛpɨ, kɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nchí rɛm, nɛ sɛ́naŋ sɛ́kʉ be mǎndɨŋɨ nɔ́ kpoŋoroŋ ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ, nɛ ndǔ bɛyǎ babhi.
47011007	Mpok ngátí bhe Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Mandɛm, mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɛp be nkáp. Nsɛ́ptímʉɛ́t ntá yɛka ndu bɛkwak mǎmbak manɛ́m bo. Nkʉ̌ nyaka nɔ chi bɛbʉ́ kɛ?
47011008	Nchí sɔt nyaka nkáp ntá bakwɔ́ bho achak ndǔ bɛkwak bhe.
47011009	Nɛ mpok nchí awu nɛ bhe nkɛ bhɔŋ nkáp mbɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔnyunɛ batɨ bɔ̌mayɛsɛ abhɛn báfú atú Masidónia kɛ báchyɛ̀ nyaka mɛ nɛkwak. Mbɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ bhe ntu wa bɛ mǎmpɔkɔ wáwák. Nɛ ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ nchí bhak.
47011010	Ndǔ tɛtɛp Kristo achi nɛ mɛ, nchí rɛm bɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛkʉ mɛ mbɔt bɛdɛp awɔ antɨ ndǔ atú Akáiya ankɛm.
47011011	Nchí kʉ nɔ ndak yi? Chi bɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ be kɛ? Wáwák! Mandɛm arɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ nkɔŋ be!
47011012	Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nchí kʉ, chɔŋ ndɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ yɔ, bɛ́ mkpɔt bɛkak bo abhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛ bákʉ̀ bɛtɨk ɛbhap nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mɛ́kʉ̀ ɛbha.
47011013	Mɛnyǔ bǒbhɔ puyɛ̌ bǒnto abhɛn tɛtɛp. Chi bo abhɛn báyíbhírí mkpá, nɛ bárwɔ̀ bho ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ bɛ báchi bǒnto Kristo.
47011014	Ndak anɛ apu anɛ́ maknkay. Yɛ̌ chí mbɔŋ Satan ǎyibhiri mkpá ankʉ mbɔ bɛ achi ángɛl anɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm bɛ́ghɔ̀ yi amʉɛt.
47011015	Ɛ́pú yɛ́ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay mbák bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk Satan bákʉ̀ nkwɔ mbɔ bɛ báchí bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Ndǔ ngwɛnti yap bábhɔŋ chi nsáy bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ̀.
47011016	Mpɛt nchí rɛm bɛ, yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ kaysi bɛ ntí ábhɨ́kɨ́ kway mɛ amɛm. Mbák bǎkaysi nɔ, sɔt ká mɛ ɛnyu ɛnɛ bǎkway bɛghok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu anɛ ntí abhɨkɨ kway yi amɛm árɛ̀m, bɛ́ mɛnkwɔ ndɛp awɔ antɨ mandú.
47011017	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ́rɛ̀m puyɛ̌ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Acha aghati mɛ. Nchí rɛm chi mbɔ ɛchɨŋtímu.
47011018	Tɛ̌ndu bɛyǎ bo bápànyu ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bakwǎŋwaŋ básɔ̀t bɛ bɛbhɔŋ mɛnwɔp be mǎngok nɔkɔ nsé yap, bǎbhɔŋ yɛ bɛghok mɛnyɨŋɨ́ tɛtɛp ɛbhɛn mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́gháti bhe ɛ̌ti mmʉɛt ɛya.
47011019	Bě bho bǎchi barɨŋɨ́ndak, bǎchɔ̀kɔ mǎngoko nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchɨŋtǐ bho bárɛ̀m nɛ maŋák.
47011020	Bǎkà bo abhɛn bábhʉ̀rɛ bhe mbɔ basɛm nɛ mányiɛ bhe nsɛm amɔt, nɛ mányìɛrɛ be amɨk, nɛ báyɨŋɨ be fúú kpát bádɛn be.
47011021	Ɛ̌! Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nɔ chi bɛtaŋ-ɛ! Foŋorí ká mɛ bɛ mpú kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ ntá yɛka. Chɔŋ ndɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm mbɔ ɛchɨŋtímu. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ mmu ándɛp awɔ antɨ, mɛ nkwɔ mɛ̌kwáy bɛdɛp awɔ antɨ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ.
47011022	Mbák bádɛ̀p awɔ antɨ bɛ́ báchi bo Hibru, mɛ nkwɔ nchí mmu Hibru. Mbák báchí bo Israɛl, mɛ nkwɔ nchí mmu Israɛl. Mbák báchi bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham, mɛ nkwɔ nchí ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Ábraham.
47011023	Mbák báchi bǒ bɛtok Kristo, mɛ nchá bhɔ́. [Nchí rɛm mbɔ ɛbhokori mmu.] Nkʉ bɛtɨk nchá bɔ́ mankɛm. Nchwe kɛnɔŋ ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ ncha yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu, mǎntɛm áyá acha, nɛ ndɔp kɛ́kwɔ́t bɛgu ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ.
47011024	Bo Israɛl mánaŋ bádɛp mɛ nnɛt nɛ ɛ́kpá ndɔŋ ɛsǎ nsɛm nɛkú nɛ ɛnwi. Bákʉ nɔ ndɔŋ ɛtay.
47011025	Bǒ Rom bádɛ́n mɛ nɛ ɛ́kpa kɛnɔŋ ndɔŋ ɛ́rát. Bo bátɛ́mti mɛ nɛ batay ndu bɛway ndɔŋ amɔt. Achwi abɛt anyɛ́n nɛ mɛ ndɔŋ ɛ́rát. Achwi árákáti amɛm manyu ɛkʉ ngɔ́kɔ́nyɛn ndǔ bɛti mɛ́mɔt nɛ nywɔp nɛ́mɔt.
47011026	Mfórí nɛwú bɛyǎ mpok ɛnɛ́ mɛ́rɔ̀ŋ nɛkɔ. Mfórí nɛwú amɛm manyɛ́n anɛ ájwí ágbóko, mfori nɛwú amɔ bɛtaŋtí baghɛ́p nɛ amɔ́ batɨ̌ bo Israɛl nɛ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl. Mfórí nɛwú amɛm bɛtɔk bɛgho, nɛ amɛm baso, nɛ amɛm manyu nɛ amɔ́ bǒnkwɔ abhɛn bɛtábhá.
47011027	Nnáŋ nkʉ bɛtɨk, nsɔŋɔri mmʉɛt bɛyǎ mpok nkɛ kway bɛbhʉrɛ kɛnɔ́, nɛ nchɔ́kɔ́ nsay nkɛ kwáy bɛbhɔŋ yɛ̌ manyiɛp mɛnyu nɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn nɛ́kwáy mɛ, nɛ mbʉ́ɛ́p ákɔ́k mɛ ndu mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ndɛn bɛkuti mmʉɛt.
47011028	Bɛsɔŋɔri bɛchak bɛ́chí kɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ yaŋ bɛrɛm ɛ̌ti bɛsɔŋɔri yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛwak. Puyɛ̌ chi ndiɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn. Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ basɛ́mɛ́ bɛyɨŋɨ ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ běka bakwɔ́ Kristo bǎchi.
47011029	Agha ákway bɛbhɔŋ bɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́ kɛ ɛ́kɛbhak ntá ya mbɔ bɛ mɛ kɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ɛbhɔ? Agha bákway bɛkʉ yi ankwɛn ndu bɛbʉ́ kɛ ntɨ̌ kɛdu mɛ amɛm nɛ bɛběntɨ?
47011030	Mbák mbɔŋ bɛdɛp awɔ antɨ chɔŋ nkʉ nɔ chi ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ.
47011031	Mandɛm Mmu achí Chi ntá Yesu Acha arɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mpú sénse. Bakak ámbak nɛ yi ngwɛnti ti.
47011032	Mpok nchí ɛtɔk Damáskɔs, Gɔ́bhanɔ anɛ mfɔ ngo Arɛtas afyɛ́, áchyɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu mambabhɛri nɔkɔ nyǔbha anɛ́ ɛtɔk ɛnyu ɛnɛ bɔ bákway bɛkɛm mɛ.
47011033	Kɛ bǒnkwɔ bákʉ nchwe amɛm ɛkay ɛnɛ básɛ́rɛ́ nnɨk arɛ bátɔ́ ndu mbok anɛ achi ankok, básɛ́bhɛ mɛ amɨk, mbʉɛ.
47012001	Mbɔŋ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ bɛdɛp awɔ́ antɨ yɛ̌ndu nsáy ápú arɛ́. Kɛ dɔ̌ ká ngati bhe ɛ̌ti kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k anti fúú, ɛkɛn ngɔ́ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu Acha ákʉ́ mɛ ndɨŋɨ.
47012002	Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mmǔ anɛ achi nyaka nkoŋo Kristo. Ɛ́gháká mamiɛ́ byo nɛ anwi ɛchɔŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ásɔ́rɛ́ yi tɛ amfay.
47012003	Mpɛt nchí rɛm bɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ Mandɛm asɔt nyaka mmu wu árɔk Paradays nɛ yi, kɛ chí ndu ɛfóŋó kɛ chí ndu nkwɔmʉɛt a, mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ. Mbɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ árɨ́ŋɨ́.
47012004	Arɛ́, aghók mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmu ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛghati bho ɛnyǔ bɔ bɛchi, nɛ mmu apú kway mbɔŋ bɛrɛm ɛnyǔ bɛchi.
47012005	Mbɔŋ bɛdɛp awɔ antɨ ɛ̌ti mmu wu, kɛ mpú kʉ nɔ ɛ̌ti mmʉɛ́t ɛya. Nchi dɛp awɔ antɨ chi ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ.
47012006	Yɛ̌ ɛmbak chi bɛ nchí yaŋ bɛdɛp awɔ antɨ mpú bhak ɛchɨŋtímu mbɔnyunɛ nchí rɛm chi tɛtɛp. Kɛ mpú kʉ nɔ́ ndǔ mpú yáŋ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ánkáysí bɛ ncha ɛnyǔ mmu ɛnɛ yi ághɔ̀ nɛ ɛnɛ́ yi ághòk mɛ̌rɛm bɛ nchí.
47012007	Ndu bɛkʉ bɛ nkɛ́ pányu ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́ mɛndɨ́ŋɨ́, áchyɛ́ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔri. Mbák mbɔ mmu anɛ báfyɛ́ yi nsé amʉɛt. Ɛsɔŋɔri ɛyɔ ɛbhak ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Satan átó bɛ ɛ́nyíɛ́rɛ́ mɛ amɨk, ɛ́nkaŋ mɛ nkɛ pányu.
47012008	Nnɨk Yesu Acha mmʉɛt ndɔŋ ɛ́rát bɛ yi amfɛrɛ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ amʉɛt.
47012009	Kɛ akɛmɛ mɛ bɛ, “Bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbha bɛ́kway nɛ wɔ mbɔnyunɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbha bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ kpoŋoroŋ chi amʉɛt bo abhɛn mmʉɛt apú bhɔ.” Ndu ɛchi yɛ̌ nɔ, chɔŋ ndɔk ambɨ bɛdɛp awɔ́ antɨ nɛ maŋák ɛ̌ti mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ, bɛ bɛtaŋ Kristo mɛ́mbak nɛ mɛ.
47012010	Ɛ̌ti Kristo, nchí yɛ maŋák bɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ, yɛ̌ básɔ̀kɔti mɛ sɔkɔti, yɛ̌ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́taŋa taŋ ntá ya, nɛ yɛ̌ nchí bhɔŋ nɛnyok mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu, nɛ yɛ̌ báchyɛ̀ mɛ chi bɛsɔŋɔri. Ɛchi nɔ mbɔnyunɛ mpok anɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ kɛ nchí taŋ sayri.
47012011	Ndɛm kɛpɨ mbɔ ɛchɨŋtímu. Bě kɛ̌ bǎpúrí mɛ nkʉ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ, be kɛ bǎbhɔŋɔ bɛghati bho ɛnyǔ mmu mɛ nchí. Yɛ̌ndu mpú yɛ̌nyɨŋ, bǒnto abhɛn bǎyòŋ nɔ manyɛ́n ayap amfay bábhɨkɨ cha mɛ.
47012012	Mpok nchí awu nɛ bhe nkʉ mɛnyɨŋ bɛtɔŋ be bɛ nchí mǔnto tɛtɛp. Mbɔ́ŋ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́ nɛ nkʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu.
47012013	Ndiɛrɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ kʉ ntá yɛka ɛnɛ́ nkʉ ntá bakwɔ́ Kristo bachak ncha chi bɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɛp bhe nɛkwak? Foŋorí ká mɛ ndǔ nɛfʉɔp ɛnɔ!
47012014	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ nnáŋ ntóŋtí bɛ́twɔ bɛghɔ bhe ndu ndɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́jwí ɛ́rát. Mpú bhak chɔŋ ntu ntá yɛka mbɔnyunɛ be kɛ mɛ̌yaŋ, puyɛ̌ bakap ayɛka. Ɛchi nɔ mbɔnyunɛ puyɛ̌ mǎmbɔ kɛ babhɔŋɔ bɛbhʉrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ntá bachi nɛ manɔ bhap, chi bachi nɛ manɔ kɛ bábhɔŋɔ bɛbhʉrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ntá bɔ̌bhap.
47012015	Chɔŋ mbɔŋ bɛyǎ maŋák bɛchyɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́, yɛ̌ chi mmʉɛt ɛya, ndu bɛkwak bhe. Ndǔ ɛkɔŋ ɛya nɛ bhe ɛ́gò ɛ́ndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, ɛyɛka nɛ mɛ ɛ́may nɔkɔ may kɛ?
47012016	Sayri sayri, bákà nɛ mɛ bɛ mpok ntwɔ́ awu, mpú sɔt nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ntá yɛka, yɛ̌ nɔ mbɔk bárɛ̀m bɛ nchí mmu bɛtábhá, nɛ bɛ nchí sɔt mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛka ndu ngwáy.
47012017	Ndǔ nkwɔ bho abhɛn ntó ntá yɛka, yɛ̌ amɔt ábhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt nnyɛ́n ɛna bɛrwɔ bhe. Ɛ́pú nɔ kɛ?
47012018	Nnɨk nyáka Táytɔs nɛ mɔmáyɛsɛ bɛ mántwɔ́ awu ntá yɛka. Átwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ asɔt mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛka ndǔ ngwáy kɛ? Mɛ nɛ Táytɔs sɛ́bhɔŋ chi nkaysi amɔt. Pú nɔ́? Bɛsɛ nɛ yi sɛ́bhɔŋ chi ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛ́mɔt. Pú nɔ́?
47012019	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, bǎkáysí bɛ ndu mpok anɛ nkɛm sɛ́rɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn chi ndu bɛ́táŋá mmʉɛt ntá yɛka kɛ? Wáwák! Sɛ́rɛ̀m chi ɛnyǔ Kristo áyàŋ bɛ sɛ́ndɛm nɛ bɛsí Mandɛm. Sɛ́kʉ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ chi bɛ mǎnsɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ mbi Mandɛm.
47012020	Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛcháy bɛ ngufú mpok ntwɔ́ awu bɛghɔ bhe nchí kway bɛtɛmɛri bhe ndu nte anɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ káysi bɛtɛmɛri bhe, nɛ be nkwɔ mǎngɔ bɛ mpú ndu nte anɛ bǎkaysi bɛghɔ mɛ. Ngufú, nchí kway bɛtɛmɛri bhe ndǔ bǎgwà, nɛ ndǔ bǎbhɔ̀ŋ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ batɨ, nɛ ndǔ ɛchókóntɨ, nɛ ndǔ mǎŋɛm mɛŋɛ́mɛ́, nɛ ndǔ bǎchɔŋti manyɛ́n batɨ, nɛ ndǔ ɛnaŋti, nɛ ndǔ ɛpɨŋ bɛkáysi bɛ bǎcha batɨ, nɛ ndǔ bǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ táká táká.
47012021	Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛcháy bɛ nnáŋ mpɛt ntwɔ awu chɔŋ Ɛta Mandɛm ánkʉ mbɔ́ŋ ntíánwɔ́p bɛsí ɛbhɛka, nɛ mbak ndǔ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ bǒ ahbɛn bákʉ̀ nyaka bɛbʉ́ nɛ bábhʉɛt bɛkʉ bɛpɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ, nɛ ɛpúsí, nɛ mányiɛ bɛpǎ ɛpusi.
47013001	Ndɔŋ anɛ ákʉ́ ɛ́rát ɛnɛ nchí twɔ bɛghɔ bɛ bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ mbák bo mándɛm bɛ mmǔ ákʉ́ ndak, bábhɔŋ bɛ́twɔ nɛ batísiɛ bapay, mbák apu nɔ, barat.
47013002	Mpok ntwɔ́ awu ndǔ nɛkɔ ɛnɛn nɛ́jwí ndɔŋ ɛpay, njɛp batú bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́ nɛ bǒnkwɔ bachak mankɛm. Nɛ́nɛ, mpɛt nchí sɛmti bhɔ ɛnɛ́ mpú awu nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ nkʉ nyaka mpok ntwɔ́ awu bɛ, mbák mpɛ́t ntwɔ, mpú rɔ bhɔ ɛnyu ɛyɔ.
47013003	Chɔŋ nkʉ mǎngɔ bɛrɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ nchí rɛm chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá Kristo. Apú kɛm be mbɔ mmǔ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ. Ǎtɔŋ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi mpok áchí nɛntɨ ɛnɛka.
47013004	Yɛ̌ndu bágó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí mbɔ mmu anɛ abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ, Mandɛm ákʉ́ yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Bɛsɛ nkwɔ sɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ ndu sɛ́bhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ yi. Kɛ ndu sɛ́tòk bhe, chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m nɛ Kristo ndǔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm.
47013005	Chák ká mmʉɛt bɛghɔ mbák, ndǔ ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛyɛka, bǎkòŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mǎnókó. Yɨŋɨ́ ká mmʉɛt. Mbák ɛpu nɔ, nɔ́ bǎkwɛn nɛmɔ.
47013006	Nókó ká bɛ chɔŋ mǎngɔ bɛ sɛbhɨkɨ kwɛn nɛmɔ.
47013007	Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm bɛ bǎkɛ́ kʉ nɛfwɔp. Sɛ́pú kʉ nɔ chi bɛkʉ bo mángɔ́ bɛ sɛ́chí chak. Sɛ́yáŋ chi bɛ mǎmbák chak, yɛ̌ndu bǎkway bɛyɨŋɨ bhɛsɛ mbɔ bo abhɛn babhɔŋɔ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́.
47013008	Yɛ̌ ɛmbak yi, sɛpú kway bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́chɛt tɛtɛp mbi. Sɛ́kʉ̀ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛkʉ tɛtɛp anɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ándɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ambɨ.
47013009	Sɛ́bhɔ̀ŋ maŋák mbák bǎtaŋ, yɛ ɛ́mbak chi bɛ sɛbhɨkɨ taŋ. Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm bɛ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ́ngó nɛnjwi pɔɔt.
47013010	Nti anɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ ntá yɛka ambɨ ambɨ chi bɛ mpok anɛ mɛ̌twɔ chɔŋ awu, nkɛ́sɔt bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ́ mɛ mbak bɛběbɛbe nɛ bhe. Mandɛm achyɛ́ mɛ bhɔ chi bɛkʉ mǎnte ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka, puyɛ̌ chi bɛkʉ mǎnkwɛn.
47013011	Bɔ̌ma, bɛrɔŋ ndǔ ngwɛnti, ghók ká maníɛ́ ma, mǎnchɔkɔ sayri. Nyurɛ́ ká ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛyɛka, mǎmbak ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt nɛ batɨ. Bák ká sayri nɛ bo báchák. Mbák mǎnkʉ nɔ, chɔŋ Mandɛm mmu ákɔŋ bhɛsɛ nɛ ǎchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ kpák, ambak nɛ bhɛsɛ, ambak nɛ bhe.
47013012	Kaká ka batɨ sayri mbɔ bo Mandɛm.
47013013	Bǒnkwɔ mankɛm abhɛn báchí fá bátò nkwɔ bhe bakak.
47013014	Yesu Kristo Acha ántɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, nɛ ɛkɔŋ Mandɛm ɛmbak amɛm batɨ yɛka, nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ̀ ɛmbak nɛ be mankɛm.
48001001	Mɛ Pɔ̌l mǔnto Yesu Kristo kɛ nchí sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Puyɛ̌ bakwǎŋwaŋ kɛ báyábhɛ́ mɛ, nɛ puyɛ̌ nkwǎ kɛ átó mɛ. Chi Yesu Kristo nɛ Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ mmu akʉ Yesu ampɛtnsɛm ndu nɛpɛ́m.
48001002	Nchí sɨ́ŋ ntá yɛka bǒnkwɔ abhɛn atú Galéshia, nɛ batɨ bǒnkwɔ abhɛn báchí fá nɛ mɛ bachɛm nɛ mɛ bɛ́to be bakak.
48001003	Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha mántɔŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, mánchyɛ bhe kpák.
48001004	Yesu Kristo achyɛ́ nyaka mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bhɛsɛ ndǔ mkpáká mmɨk bɛbʉ́ anɛ ɛchɔŋ. Akʉ nɔ bɛ́kɔ́ŋɔ nkaysi Mandɛm mmu achi Ɛtayɛsɛ.
48001005	Yi kɛ bo mankɛm bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́chyɛ́ kɛnókó ngwɛnti ti. Amen.
48001006	Ɛchí mɛ maknkay bɛ́ bǎtɨŋ bǎrɔ̀ Mandɛm mmu ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ be ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu Kristo bɛ mambák bǒbhi, nɛ bárɔ́bhɛ́ koŋo chí Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ achak.
48001007	Puyɛ̌ chi mbɔŋ bɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ achak achi, kɛ mbɔk bo báfyɛ̀ bhe ɛbyɔk antɨ nɛ báyàŋ chí bɛ́yibhiri Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak.
48001008	Kɛ yɛ̌ ɛmbák chi bɛsɛ, yɛ̌ chí ángɛl kɛ ághátí bhe mbok anɛ áchí kɛkúrí nɛ anɛ sɛ́ghátí bhe, ɛyak ɛmbak nɛ yi.
48001009	Mbɔ ɛnyǔ sɛ́náŋ sɛ́gháti bhe, mpɛt nchí ghati bhe bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ághàti bhe mbok anɛ achí kɛkúrí nɛ anɛ sɛ́ghàti nyaka bhe, mǎnókó, ɛyak ɛmbak nɛ yi.
48001010	Nchí yaŋ nɛ chí bɛ bo mankak mɛ kɛ? Wáwák! Mandɛm kɛ̌ mɛ̌yaŋ ánkák mɛ. Nchí yaŋ chí bɛ́ bo mambɔŋ maŋák nɛ mɛ kɛ? Mbɔ mbʉɛ́t chí mmu anɛ nchí yaŋ bɛ bo mambɔŋ maŋák nɛ mɛ, mbʉ mpú mmɔ̌bɛtok Kristo.
48001011	Bɔ̌ma, dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ ngátí bhe abhɨki fu ndǔ nkaysi bakwǎŋwaŋ,
48001012	abhɨ́kɨ́ fu ntá nkwǎ, nɛ yɛ̌ nkwǎŋwaŋ abhɨkɨ tɔŋ mɛ. Mbɔŋ Yesu Kristo kɛ ákʉ́ mɛndɨ́ŋɨ́ yɔ.
48001013	Bǎghok ɛnyǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna nɛchi nyaka mpok mɛ́kòŋo bɛpɨŋɨ́ bo Israɛl, bǎghók ndu nchí chyɛ nyaka bǒnkwɔ Mandɛm bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, nnu nɔkɔ bɛ nnáŋá nkwɔ wap.
48001014	Nchí nu nyaka tontó bɛ́kóŋo bɛpɨŋ abhɛn bachǐmbɨ bha. Nɛ nchí koŋo nyaka mbi Mandɛm bo Israɛl nɛ ntɨ ɛna nɛnkɛm, kpát ncha bo Israɛl báchák abhɛn ɛkaká nɛbhe ɛya.
48001015	Kɛ Mandɛm anáŋ ayap nyaka mɛ tɛ ndǔ mpok anɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ re bhe mɛ. Ayap mɛ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi, abhɨŋɨ mɛ bɛ mbak mmɔ̌bɛtok ayi.
48001016	Abhɔ́ŋ maŋák bɛkʉ mɛndɨ́ŋɨ́ Mɔ́ywi, bɛ mbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl. Ákʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, mbɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ ntá yɛ̌ mmu bɛ anchyɛ mɛ maniɛ.
48001017	Yɛ̌ chí Yerúsalɛm mbɨ́kɨ́ ko ndɔk bɛghɔ bo abhɛn báyámbɨ bɛbhak bǒnto kɛ mɛ̌twɔ ansɛm. Ndɔkɔ́rɔ́ŋ téé atú Arébia, kɛ ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, mpɛtnsɛm Damáskɔs.
48001018	Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mamiɛ́ arat, ndɔk Yerúsalɛm bɛghɔ Píta. Mbak nɛ yí ndu manywɔp nɛkú.
48001019	Nkɛ ghɔ yɛ̌ mǔnto achak arɛ, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fʉɛ́t Jems, manɔ Yesu Acha.
48001020	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́sɨ̀ŋ ntá yɛka ɛchi tɛtɛp. Mandɛm arɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mpu sénse.
48001021	Mfá nɔ́kɔ́ Yerúsalɛm, ndɔk nkó atú Síria nɛ atú Silísha nkwɔ.
48001022	Bě bǒnkwɔ Kristo atú Judɛ́ya bǎbhɨkɨ re ghɔ nyaka mɛ nɛ amɨ́k.
48001023	Bághòk nyaka ghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bárɛ̀m ɛ̌ti ya bɛ, “Mmǔ nyaka áchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ ɛsɔŋɔri, arɔbhɛ ghati chí bo bɛ mbák mmu ásɨ́kɨ́ntɨ nɛ Yesu Kristo, Mandɛm ǎpɛmɛ yi, ɛnɛ́ nkúbhɛ́ nɛsɨkɨ́ntɨ nɛ Kristo kɛ yi ánù nyaka bɛ́chɔ́ŋti.”
48001024	Ɛkʉ́ bo bare bɨti Mandɛm ɛ̌ti ya.
48002001	Ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mamiɛ́ byo nɛ anwi, mpɛt nkó ndɔk Yerúsalɛm nɛ Banábas. Nsɔt Táytɔs sɛ́rɔ́k nɛ yi.
48002002	Ndɔk mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm akʉ nyaka mɛndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mbɔŋ bɛ́rɔŋ arɛ́. Ngáká nɔ́kɔ́ arɛ, mɛ nɛ bǒbati sɛ́chɔ́kɔ́ ansɛm ansɛm, nkʉ bɔ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ mɛ́ghàti bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl. Nkʉ nɔ bɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀ nɛ ɛbhɛn mbʉ́ɛ́t bɛkʉ bɛkɛ bhak ndɛ́ndɛm.
48002003	Táytɔs mmu ákɔ̀ nɛ mɛ abhak mmu Grik. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bákɛ te mbɔŋ kákáti bɛ mánsíɛ́p yi.
48002004	Kɛ bǒ nse bachwe ndu nkwɔ bakoŋo Yesu ansɛm ansɛm mánjaŋa nɔkɔ bɛ mansyɛp yi. Mánɔ́nɛ báchwe ndu nkwɔ ywɛsɛ ndu bɛghɔ ɛnyu sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ ngangaŋ amfǎy bɛbhé bo Israɛl, ndu sɛbharɛ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo. Báyàŋ nyaka bɛ sɛ́mpɛ́tnsɛm ndu kɛsɛm antɛnɛ bɛbhé bo Israɛl.
48002005	Sɛ́kɛ chyɛ bhɔ mbi yɛ mandú. Sɛ́kɛ yáŋ bɛ bɔ manchɔŋti tɛtɛp anɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, tɛ̌ndu bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ mɛnoko yɔ.
48002006	Mbák chí bo abhɛn báyábhɛ́ bɛ́ mámbák bǒbati ntá bǒnkwɔ, bɛtaŋ ɛbhap bɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ mɛ. Mandɛm ápú tɔŋ kɛ́rɨ́ŋámík. Bɔ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ tɔ́ŋ mɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛkɔ mɛ́máka ndǔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ mɛ̌ghàti bho.
48002007	Bághɔ́ bɛ tɛtɛp, Mandɛm kɛ afyɛ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ amɔya bɛ ngati bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi akʉ nɛ Píta bɛ yi angati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ntá bo Israɛl.
48002008	Nkúbhɛ́ mmu anɛ áchyɛ́ Píta bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn ntá bo Israɛl, kɛ áchyɛ́ mɛ nkwɔ bɛtaŋ, bɛkʉ bɔ ntá abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl.
48002009	Jems nɛ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n báchí nyaka mbɔ bɛkwap nɛntɨ bǒnkwɔ. Bághɔ́ nɔkɔ bɛ́ Mandɛm afyɛ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn amɔ́ya tɛtɛp, bákáka mɛ nɛ Banábas nɛ amɔ́ ndu bɛ́tɔŋ bɛ́ bɛsɛ́ nɛ bhɔ sɛchi ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt. Sɛ́ka nɛ bhɔ bɛ́ mɛ nɛ Banábas sɛbhɔŋ bɛ́rɔŋ ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl nɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, bɔ mándɔk ntá bo Israɛl.
48002010	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt kɛ baghati bɛsɛ, nɔ chi bɛ, sɛkɛ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛchyɛ nɔkɔ nɛkwak ntá bachɛ́bhɛ́bho abhɛn Yerúsalɛm, nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi nyaka mɛ antɨ bɛ́kʉ.
48002011	Píta átwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Antiɔk, nji yi bɛsí bhi mbɔnyunɛ akʉ nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛpu chak.
48002012	Mpok yí áyámbɨ átwɔ́, are nyíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl. Kɛ bo abhɛn Jems átó bátwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́, abho bɛya mmʉɛt ansɛm, akɛpɛrɛ nyíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ bo abhɛn bapu bo Israɛl, ndu áchay nkwɔ́ bo abhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛ babhɔŋ bɛsyɛp yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nkoŋo Yesu anɛ apu mmu Israɛl.
48002013	Bo Israɛl bachak abhɛn bachi bakoŋo Yesu babho bɛkʉ bɛtábhá mbɔ Píta, ɛnyu ɛnɛ́, yɛ̌ chi Banábas nkwɔ akʉ́ ɛnyumɔt mbɔ bhɔ.
48002014	Kɛ ngɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ bápú kɔ ndɔ́ŋ amɔt nɛ tɛtɛp anɛ achi ndu Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, mfate ngati Píta bɛsí bhap mankɛm bɛ, “Mbák wɔ mmu Israɛl ɔ̌kʉ̀ mbɔ mmu anɛ apu mmu Israɛl, ndaká yi ɔ́nù bɛkʉ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl mámbák mbɔ bo Israɛl?”
48002015	Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛ́chí bo Israɛl, bɔtayɛsɛ nkwɔ bo Israɛl. Sɛ́pú bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, bɔ́ bhǒ bo bárɛ̀m bɛ báchi bǒ bɛbʉ́.
48002016	Yɛ̌ nɔ, bɛsɛ bo Israɛl sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ puyɛ̌ bɛbhʉrɛ bɛbhé bo Israɛl kɛ ákʉ mmu ambak chak bɛsí Mandɛm, chi bɛsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Yesu Kristo. Yɛ̌ chi bɛsɛ sɛ́nókó Yesu Kristo bɛ Mandɛm ansɔt bɛsɛ mbɔ bo abhɛn bachi chak ɛ̌ti nɛka ɛnɛsɛ nɛ Kristo, puyɛ̌ chi ɛ̌ti sɛ́bhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé. Ɛchi ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ, bɛbhʉrɛ bɛbhé apú kʉ yɛ̌ mmu ambak chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
48002017	Mbák ndu sɛ́yaŋ bɛbhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm kɛ sɛ́bhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo, kɛ ɛ́mfakari bɛ bɛsɛ babhɔŋ sɛ́kʉ̀ bɛbʉ́, nɔ Kristo ǎtó bhɛsɛ ndǔ bɛbʉ́ kɛ? Wáwák!
48002018	Kɛ mbák mpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nnáŋ ndɔ́, nɔ nchí mbɔ̌ŋ mmu bɛbʉ́.
48002019	Mbák chi mɛ, bɛyɨŋɨ bɛbhé Moses ndɔp chi ngú, mbɔnyunɛ bɛbhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ mɛ. Ɛ́fákári ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ́ mbák nɛpɛ́m bɛsí Mandɛm.
48002020	Bágó mɛ ndǔ ɛkotákátí nɛ Kristo. Nɛ́nɛ, nɛpɛ́m ɛna fá amɨk puyɛ̌ ɛna, chi ɛ́nɛ́n Kristo mmu achi nɛ mɛ. Nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛna nɛ́nɛ chi ɛnɛn Mmɔ Mandɛm mmu akɔŋ mɛ, achyɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛ̌ti ya ndu mbɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ yi.
48002021	Mpu sɔt bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm mbɔ bɛ bɛ́pú yɛ̌nyɨŋ, mbɔnyunɛ mbák mmu ǎbhák chak bɛsí Mandɛm chi ndu yi ákoŋo bɛbhé, nɔ nɛwú Kristo agu nɛ́chí ndɛ́ndɛm!
48003001	Bě bo Galéshia, bɛchɨŋti bho! Agha ányíɛ́ bhe nɛ ɛpɛm akʉ mǎnɛ́m ɛbhɨ? Pú nkʉ bǎrɨŋɨ Yesu Kristo mbɔ bɛ ntɔŋ be kpoŋoroŋ ndu yi ágǔ amfay ɛkotákátí?
48003002	Dɔ̌ ká mbɛp be ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́mɔt. Mandɛm achyɛ bhe Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ chi ɛ̌ti bǎbhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé kɛ chi ndu bǎghókó Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo nɛ mǎnókó?
48003003	Ndu bǎre chɨŋti nɔ? Bǎbho bɛkoŋo Kristo ndu bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ, nɛ́nɛ, barɔbhɛ yaŋ bɛ́wɛ́nti chi ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛka babhɔŋɔ́
48003004	Bɛyǎ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ̀ ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ mɛ́mbák ndɛ́ndɛmɛ́? Mbɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ bɛchi nyaka chi ndɛ́ndɛm.
48003005	Mandɛm mmu áchyɛ̀ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nɛ ǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay nɛntɨ ɛnɛka, ǎkʉ̀ nɔ chi ɛ̌ti bǎbhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé Moses kɛ? Kɛ chi ndǔ bǎghókó Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nɛ mǎnókó?
48003006	Ɛchí mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ Ábraham anókó nyaka Mandɛm, nɛ ɛ̌ti ɛyɔ, Mandɛm asɔt yi bɛ achi chak bɛsí bhi.
48003007	Sɛ́ghɔ́ yɛ bɛ bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm kɛ báchí bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham.
48003008	Nɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛnaŋ ɛrɛm nyaka tɛsáy bɛ́ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl mámbak chak bɛsí ɛbhi mbɔnyunɛ bábhɔ̌ŋ nɛka nɛ yi. Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́pɛt ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ Mandɛm aghati nyaka Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ntá Ábraham bɛ, “Ɛ̌ti yɛ, chɔŋ njɛt manɛrɛ́kɛrɛ bhǒ mmɨk ankɛm.”
48003009	Nɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ Mandɛm ǎyɛt yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Kristo, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi áyɛ́rɛ́ nyaka Ábraham ndu yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ yi.
48003010	Mbák chi bo abhɛn bákàysi bɛ bɛbhʉ́rɛ bɛbhé bo Israɛl kɛ ákʉ̀ bɔ mámbák chak bɛsí Mandɛm, ɛyak ɛchi nɛ bhɔ, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Ɛyak ɛchi nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ápú bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm.”
48003011	Nɛ́nɛ, ɛchí kpoŋoroŋ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛbhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yi ábhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé. Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mmu anɛ achi chak bɛsí Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yí ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Kristo, ǎbhɔ̀ŋ nɛpɛ́m.”
48003012	Bɛbhé bɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌ ɛnyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ nɛka ɛnɛn mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ Kristo. Ɛbhé Moses ɛ́rɛ̀m mbɔ ɛnyǔ basɨŋɨ bɛ, “Mmu anɛ ábhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé, ǎbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛ̌ti yɔ.”
48003013	Kristo aku bhɛsɛ afɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ ɛyak ɛnɛ ɛchi nɛ bo abhɛn bápú bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé mɛnkɛm. Akʉ nɔ ndu ásɔ́rɛ́ ntɛmsi bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ. Ɛ́bhak mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Ɛyak ɛchi nɛ mmu anɛ ágú ndǔ ɛkotákátí.”
48003014	Yesu Kristo akʉ nɔ bɛ áfɔ́k anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛchyɛ Ábraham, ámbák nɛ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, ndu bábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ yi, nɛ bɛ́ Mandɛm anchyɛ bɛsɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nyaka yi afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛ́chyɛ́ ɛ̌ti nɛka ɛnɛsɛ.
48003015	Bɔ̌ma, sɛ́nsɔt ɛrɨŋ ndu nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn bo abhɛn fá amɨk. Mbák bo bati apay manka bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ, mányu nku, yɛ̌ mmu ápú kway bɛway nku yɔ, nɛ mmu ápú kway mɛmaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak arɛ́, tɛ̌ndu manyu nku.
48003016	Nɔ kɛ ɛ́chí nɛ nku anɛ Mandɛm anyǔ nyaka nɛ Ábraham. Mandɛm afyɛ́ Ábraham nɛ ɛbhárɛ́ mɔ́ywi bariɛp. Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛpú rɛm bɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka yi nɛ bɛbhárɛ́ bɔ̌bhi bariɛp, bɛtɔŋ bɛ báya, kɛ ntá yi nɛ ɛbhárɛ́ mɔ́ywi, bɛtɔŋ bɛ chi amɔt. Ɛbhárɛ́mɔ wu chí Kristo.
48003017	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́yàŋ mǎnjwimɛm chi bɛ Mandɛm anaŋ anyu nyaka nku nɛ Ábraham, kɛ ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mamiɛ́ bɛsa ɛsa nsɛm amɔt nsɛm byo, achyɛ bo Israɛl ɛbhé. Bɛbhé bhɔ bɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛway nku anɛ Mandɛm anyu nɛ Ábraham, bɛ bariɛp amɛn yi afyɛ́ nyaka akɛ pɛrɛ téé.
48003018	Mbɔ Mandɛm ǎchyɛ́ bo akap chi ɛ̌ti bábhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé, mbʉ apú koŋo chi bariɛp ami ndu akap anɛ yi áchyɛ̀ bo. Kɛ chi ɛ̌ti bariɛp ami ntá Ábraham kɛ yi áchyɛ́ nyaka akap wu.
48003019	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, ndaká yi Mandɛm achyɛ yɛ bɛbhé? Achyɛ́ bɛbhé bɛ mɛ́nkʉ bɛsɛ sɛndɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ bɛbʉ́ bɛchi. Nɛ bɛbhé bɛbhɔŋ nyaka bɛbhak chi ndu mandú mpok, mɛnoŋ nɛtwɔ́ anɛ ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Ábraham. Ntá yi kɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛchyɛ akap wu. Mandɛm achyɛ nyaka bɛbhé ntá bɔángɛl bɛ mansɔt mantwɔ nɛ bhɔ, nkwǎŋwaŋ abhak nɛntɨ Mandɛm nɛ bǒ mmɨk.
48003020	Bɛrɛm bɛ mmu achi nɛntɨ bho, ǎtɔ̀ŋ bɛ bakwɔ́ bho achi apay anɛ yi áté nɛntɨ ɛnap. Kɛ mpok Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp ntá Ábraham, abhak chi aywǐnti.
48003021	Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́chí nɛntɨ bɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ bariɛp Mandɛm kɛ? Wáwák! Mbɔ bachyɛ bo ɛbhé ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ mmu ámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m mbák ábhʉ̀rɛ yɔ, mbʉ bɛbhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé ákʉ̀ mmu ambak chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
48003022	Kɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ mmɨk nkɛm achi antɛnɛ kɛsɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́. Ɛchi yɛ bɛ, ndiɛrɛ bo abhɛn babhɔŋɔ nɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo kɛ bákway bɛbhɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛchyɛ ntá bo abhɛn mánókó Yesu Kristo.
48003023	Mpok apɛ́rɛ́ ghaka anɛ bákʉ́ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mmu abhɔŋ bɛsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Kristo kɛ ambak chak bɛsí Mandɛm, sɛchi nyaka antɛnɛ́ bɛbhé, sɛ́bhak mbɔ bo abhɛn báfyɛ́ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
48003024	Bɛbhé kɛ bɛ́chí yɛ̌ nyaka mbɔ mmǔ anɛ ábhàbhɛri, ányurɛ nɔkɔ bhɛsɛ, kpatɛ mpok anɛ Kristo átwɔ́, bɛ sɛ́nkwáy bɛbhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm ɛ̌ti sɛ́sɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ yi.
48003025	Nɛ́nɛ, ɛnɛ́ sɛ́sɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ Kristo bɛbhé bɛ́pú mbɔ mmu anɛ ábhàbhɛri, anyurɛ nɔkɔ bhɛsɛ.
48003026	Ɛ̌ti bǎsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Yesu Kristo, be mankɛm bǎrɔp chí bɔ̌ Mandɛm.
48003027	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ bájwítí yi bɛ ambat mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo arɔp chí mbɔ Kristo, ndu asɔrɛ́ ɛpɨŋɨ́ Kristo.
48003028	Yɛ̌ mmu achí chi mmu Israɛl yɛ ápú, yɛ̌ mmu achí chí nsɛm yɛ mɔ̌mɨk, yɛ chí ngɔrɛ́ yɛ mbakanɛm, be mankɛm abhɛn babhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo bǎrɔp chí ɛnyu ɛ́mɔt.
48003029	Nɛ ndu bǎchi bo Kristo, bǎchí yɛ bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham, nɛ chɔŋ mǎnyíɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛ́chyɛ́ bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham.
48004001	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́yàŋ be mǎndɨŋɨ chí bɛ mmɔ́ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́nyiɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́táyi achi ɛnyu ɛ́mɔt nɛ nsɛm mpok yi abhʉɛ́t chí mɔ́nkwɛn, yɛ̌ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́táyi mɛnkɛm chí ɛbhi.
48004002	Mpok yɔ, bo báchák kɛ mánè yi, mambabhɛri nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi, kpátɛ mpok ɛ́táyi afyɛ́ ankwáy.
48004003	Nɔ kɛ ɛchi nɛ bɛsɛ nkwɔ. Mpok sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nyaka baraka Mandɛm, sɛ́bhák basɛm antɛnɛ́ bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛtaŋ fá mmɨk.
48004004	Kɛ mpok anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp ákwáy nɔ́kɔ́, ató Mɔ́ywi bɛ antwɔ fá amɨk. Ngɔrɛ́ abhé yi, nɛ abhak antɛnɛ́ bɛbhé bo Israɛl.
48004005	Atwɔ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛkʉ bo abhɛn bachi nyaka antɛnɛ́ bɛbhé, bɛ Mandɛm ansɔt bɛsɛ mbɔ bɔ̌bhi.
48004006	Nɛ ndu bǎrɔbhɛ chi bɔ̌bhi, Mandɛm ató Ɛfóŋó Mɔ́ywi bɛ ambak amɛm batɨ yɛsɛ, nɛ yi Ǎkwàk bhɛsɛ sɛmbɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Mandɛm bɛ, “Ɛta, Ɛtaya!”
48004007	Mandɛm akʉ yɛ be bǎpɛt bǎpu basɛm, bǎrɔp chi bɔ́. Nɛ tɛ̌ndu yi asɔrɛ bhe bɛ mǎmbák bɔ̌bhi, chɔŋ anchyɛ bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛchyɛ bɔ̌bhi.
48004008	Mpok bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ re rɨŋɨ Mandɛm, bǎbhak ndǔ kɛsɛmɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chi bɔmandɛm nsé.
48004009	Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, ɛnɛ́ mǎnaŋ bǎrɨŋɨ Mandɛm, nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm chi bɛ, nɛ́nɛ, ɛnɛ́ Mandɛm árɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe, ná bǎkway bɛpɛt bɛbhak basɛm ntá bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛtaŋ fá amɨk, ɛnɛ́ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ ɛbhap bɛ́pú yɛ̌nyɨŋ, nɛ bɛpú kway bɛkwak bhe?
48004010	Bǎyɨ̀ŋɨ ɛnɔ nywɔp, mǎnsɔt bɛ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛgho. Mǎnjɨŋɨ awǔ ntaŋ, mǎnsɔt bɛ ntaŋ agho. Mǎnjɨŋɨ ayɔ̌ mpok, mǎnsɔt bɛ mpok ɛpǎ ɛgho. Nɛ ɛnɔ̌ mmíɛ́, mǎnsɔt bɛ mmíɛ́ nɛgho.
48004011	Ndu bǎkʉ̀ nɔ, mbɔŋ bɛcháy mbɔnyunɛ ɛchi mbɔ bɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn nkʉ bɛkwak bhe bɛchi chi ndɛ́ndɛm.
48004012	Bɔ̌ma, nchí nɨk be mmʉɛt bɛ mǎmbák mbɔ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ ndɔp chí mbɔ bhe. Bǎbhɨkɨ kʉ mɛ bɛbʉ́.
48004013	Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ́ ndǔ ndɔŋ anɛ mbɨ, nɛme kɛ nɛkʉ ngati bhe Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́.
48004014	Nɛ yɛ̌ndu nɛme ɛna nɛchyɛ nyaka bhe bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, bǎbhɨkɨ byak mɛ. Bǎsyɛpti mɛ mbɔ ángɛl Mandɛm, mbɔ bɛ nchí chi Yesu Kristo.
48004015	Ndǔ manywɔp ayɔ, bǎbhɔŋ nyaka bɛyǎ maŋák. Yi ɛ́fákárí nɛ maŋák amɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka? Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ sayri bɛ yɛ̌ ngati nyaka bhe chi bɛ mǎmpóŋórí amɨ́k ayɛka mǎnchyɛ mɛ bǎkʉ nɔ.
48004016	Ndɔp yɛ chi mǔmpap aywɛka ndu ngátí bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp kɛ?
48004017	Bǒbhɔ bákʉ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ndu bɛyibhiri batɨ yɛka bɛ mǎnkóŋó bhɔ́, kɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ɛrɨ́tí nkaysi. Báyàŋ chi bɛkʉ mǎndɔ bhɛsɛ mǎnkoŋo bhɔ.
48004018	Mbák bǎtɔ̀ŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ anɛ bɛbʉ́ bɛpu arɛ́, mbák bǎkʉ̀ nɔ nɛ ɛrɨ́tí nkaysi, kʉ ka nɔ́ mpoknkɛm, puyɛ̌ chi ndyɛrɛ ndǔ mpok anɛ nchi nɛ bhe.
48004019	Bǒbha, mpɛt nchí mbɔ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ánòŋsi, nɛ mpu rɔ bɛghok bɛbe kpátɛ mǎmbɔŋ ɛpɨŋɨ́ Kristo.
48004020	Mbɔ̌ŋ ntɨ bɛbhak awu nɛ bhe nɛ́nɛ bɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyu nchí ghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, mbɔnyunɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mbɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ bɛrɛm.
48004021	Ghatí ká mɛ, be bo bǎyàŋ bɛ bɛbhé mɛmbɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay yɛka, bǎpú ghok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛbhé ɛ́rɛ̀m-ɛ?
48004022	Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ Ábraham abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɔ̌babhakanɛm bati apay. Amɔt abhak mmɔ̌ nsɛm, achak abhak mmɔ̌ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ápú nsɛm.
48004023	Bábhé mmɔ́ ngɔrɛ́ nsɛm mbɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak. Mmɔ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ápú nsɛm, bábhé yi chi bɛkoŋo bariɛp Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka nɛ Ábraham.
48004024	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛfakari nyaka ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛ baghɔrɛ́ abhɔ bati apay bate ndǔ nku ɛpay. Amɔt afú amfay njiɛ Sináy. Nku yɔ ate ndu ntí Hága, mmu abhé bɔ abhɛn báchí ndǔ kɛsɛm.
48004025	Hága chi njiɛ Sináy amɛm ɛtɔk Arébia. Nɛ Hága até mbɔ Yerúsalɛm anɛ manywɔp anɛ ɛchɔŋ, mbɔnyunɛ achi nyaka ndǔ kɛsɛm nɛ bɔ̌bhi.
48004026	Kɛ Yerúsalɛm anɛ amfay apú ndu kɛsɛm nɛ yi kɛ achi máyɛsɛ.
48004027	Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Wɔ, nkongɔrɛ́, wɔ mmu ɔpú bhe, bɔ́ŋ maŋák. Nnɔ anɛ ápú bhɔŋ bɛbě nɛbhe, kway nɛ maŋák, mbɔnyunɛ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ bárɔ́ ndu nɛbhay, bɔ̌bhi baya bacha. Abhɛn ngɔrɛ́ anɛ abhay nnɛ́m.”
48004028	Bɔ̌ma, bǎchi yɛ bɔ Mandɛm chí mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ chɔŋ mǎmbak bɔ̌bhi. Ɛ́chí nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ chɔŋ Ábraham ambɔ́ŋ Áisek.
48004029	Nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛchi nyaka mpok ɛyɔ, mmɔ̌ anɛ bábhé mbɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak ǎchyɛ̀ nyaka mmɔ́ anɛ bábhé ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ɛsɔŋɔri. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛchi nɛ́nɛ.
48004030	Kɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ yi? Ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Bók ngɔrɛ́ anɛ achi nsɛm nɛ mɔ́ywi, mbɔnyunɛ mmɔ̌ nsɛm ápú kwáy mɛnyiɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́táyi nɛ mmɔ̌ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ápú nsɛm.”
48004031	Bɔ̌ma, bɛsɛ sɛ́pú yɛ bɔ̌ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ achí nsɛm, sɛchi chi bɔ̌ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ apu nsɛm.
48005001	Kristo afɛ́rɛ́ bɛsɛ ndǔ kɛsɛm bɛ sɛ́kɛ́pɛrɛ bhak basɛm. Tě yɛ ka kpirí nɛ bǎkɛrɔ yɛ̌ mmu ankʉ mǎmpɛtnsɛm ndǔ kɛsɛm.
48005002	Ghók ká, mɛ Pɔ̌l nchí ghati bhe bɛ mbák mǎnka bɛ mansyɛp bhe nɛ nkaysi bɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ mǎmbak chak bɛsí Mandɛm, nɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Kristo ákʉ́ ntá yɛka ɛpu yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
48005003	Mpɛt nchí sɛmti be bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ aka bɛ mansyɛp yi abhɔŋ bɛbhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé mɛnkɛm.
48005004	Nkwɔ ywɛka anɛ bákàysi bɛ bɛbhʉrɛ bɛbhé bo Israɛl kɛ ǎkʉ bɔ mambak chak bɛsí Mandɛm babhɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ báfap mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo. Báfɛrɛ mmʉɛt ndǔ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm.
48005005	Mbák chi bɛsɛ, sɛ́bhaka ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ bɛsɛ sɛmbak chak bɛsí bhi ɛ̌ti sɛ́sɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ Kristo. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ kɛ sɛ́nòŋ ndu bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.
48005006	Mmu anɛ ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo, yɛ basyɛp yi syɛp, yɛ bábhɨkɨ syɛp, ɛyɔ ɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ. Nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ chí bɛ mmu ántɔ́ŋ bɛ yi asɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ Yesu Kristo ndu yi ákɔŋ bo.
48005007	Bǎkʉ̀ nyaka sayri. Agha áchɛ́rɛ́ bhe mbi bɛ bǎkɛ́pɛrɛ koŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp?
48005008	Puyɛ̌ mmu anɛ ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe kɛ afyɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ mǎnkʉ nɔ.
48005009	Mandu yís ǎkʉ fláwa anɛ bábáy ndǔ ɛte ánkó nkɛm.
48005010	Ndu sɛbharɛ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha, dɨŋɨ́ ká sayri bɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛkoŋo chí nkaysi aya, puyɛ̌ achak. Mmu anɛ afyɛ́ be ɛbyɔk antɨ, ntɛmsi Mandɛm ǎbhák nɛ yi, yɛ yi achi agha!
48005011	Bɔ̌ma, mbák chi mɛ, mbɔ mbʉɛ́t bɛghati bho bɛ babhɔŋ bɛsyɛp mmu kɛ yi ambak chak bɛsí Mandɛm, mbʉ bo Israɛl báchyɛ̀ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ndaká yi? Mbʉ́ mbok nɛwú Yesu ndu ɛkotákátí apu chyɛ bo Israɛl ɛsɔŋɔri.
48005012	Ntá bo abhɛn báchyɛ̀ nɔ bhe ɛsɔŋɔri ndu báté bɛ bábhɔŋ bɛsyɛp mmu kɛ ambak chak bɛsí Mandɛm, mɛ̌yàŋ bɛ mámkpɨ́k mángak mmʉɛt ɛyap.
48005013	Bɔ̌ma, mbák chi bhe, Mandɛm abhɨ́ŋɨ́ be bɛ bǎkɛ́pɛrɛ bhak basɛm antɛn bɛbhé, kɛ nɛfɛrɛ anɛ bafɛrɛ bhe ndǔ kɛsɛm ákɛ́ bhak ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ mǎnkáysí bɛ bǎkway bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt nkwǎ áyàŋ mmu ankʉ. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔŋɔ bɛkʉ chi bɛkwak batɨ ndǔ ɛkɔŋ.
48005014	Bɛbhé mɛnkɛm bɛchɛm ndu ɛbhé ɛ́mɔt ɛnɛ ɛpɔkɔ bɔ, nɛ yɔ ɛrɛm bɛ, “Kɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu mbɔ mmʉɛt yɛ.”
48005015	Kɛ mbák bǎkʉ̀ chi mbɔ nyǎbhɨ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́nɛmti, ɛndakati nɔkɔ batɨ, sɔt ka mpok bɛ bǎkɛ́ bho bɛway batɨ.
48005016	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nchí ghati yɛ bhe chi bɛ dɔ̌ ká Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ anja nɔkɔ bhe mbi, nɛ bǎkɛ́ kʉ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt nkwǎ áŋwaka bɛ yi ankʉ.
48005017	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt nkwǎ áŋwaka bɛ bo mankʉ bɛ́pú kɔ ndɔŋ amɔt nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áyàŋ bo mankʉ, nɛ ɛnyumɔt kɛ ɛchi bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áyàŋ bo mankʉ bɛ́pú kɔ ndɔŋ amɔt nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt nkwǎ áŋwaka bɛ mmu ankʉ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛpay bɛpu kɔ ɛkak ɛ́mɔt, nɛ ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ bǎpú kway bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ ntɨ bɛkʉ.
48005018	Kɛ mbák Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áyà bhe mbi, nɔ bǎpu antɛnɛ́ bɛbhé.
48005019	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt nkwǎ átò mmu ankʉ bɛ́pú bhɛsɛ. Bɛchi chi bɛbʉ́ kɛbhʉ́rɛ́, nɛ bɛpɔ̌ nkaysi ndu baraká kɛbhʉrɛ nɛ mɛ́ŋwáka ndǔ baraká kɛbhʉrɛ.
48005020	Mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak chi bɛkoŋo bɔmandɛm nsé, nɛ baraká babú, nɛ bɛpap batɨ, nɛ bɛ́táŋá, nɛ mpabhamɨ́k, nɛ bɛbentɨ, nɛ nkaysi anɛ mmu abhɔŋ chi ndyɛrɛ ɛ̌ti mmʉɛt ɛyi, nɛ bɛ́kɔ́rɛ mmʉɛt ndǔ bakwɔ́, nɛ ɛpɨŋ ákɔ́rɛ́,
48005021	nɛ bɛbhɔŋ amɨ́k abʉ́abʉ nɛ batɨ, nɛ bɛkwɛn mmɛ́m, nɛ bɛpǎ ɛbhɛn bɛ́tò bo ndǔ ɛpúsí, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak mbɔ ɛbhɔ. Nchí ya be batú mbɔ ɛnyu ɛsɨ́ bɛ́, bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bápú kway bɛbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti nɛ Mandɛm.
48005022	Kɛ ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ̀ mmu chi ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ̀ yi ambɔŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ, nɛ ambɔŋ maŋák, nɛ kpák, nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ, nɛ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ, nɛ ambɔ́ŋ ɛrɨ́tí ntɨ, nɛ ambak mmu tɛtɛp,
48005023	nɛ yi kɛbhak gum gum, nɛ nɛkɛ́mɛ́mʉɛt. Yɛ̌ ɛbhé ɛpu ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kaŋ bo bǎkɛ́ kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn.
48005024	Nɛ bo Yesu Kristo mánaŋ báfɛrɛ ntí ndǔ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ máŋwàka nyaka bɛkʉ. Ɛchi mbɔ bɛ bágo mmʉɛt nkwǎ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yɔ áyàŋ mmu ankʉ ndu ɛkotákátí.
48005025	Tɛ̌ndu Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ kɛ áchyɛ́ bɛsɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ́nɛ, sɛbhɔŋ bɛrɔ yi ámbɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ.
48005026	Bɔ̌ma, yɛ̌ mmu akɛ yoŋ mmʉɛt. Mmu ákɛ́ yɔkɔ ntɨ, nɛ mmu akɛ yɨŋɨ ntɨ nɛ amɨ́k abʉ́abʉ.
48006001	Bɔ̌ma, be bho Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achi nɛ bhe, mbák mǎngɔ́ ndǔ mmu ákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́, kwák ká yí pɛtii bɛ ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ mbi Mandɛm. Nɛ ndǔ bǎkʉ̀ nɔ, sɔt ká mpok bɛ be babhɔŋ bǎkɛ kwɛn ndǔ nɛmɔ.
48006002	Pɔkɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ká batu batɨ. Mbák mǎnkʉ nɔ, nɔ bábhʉ̀rɛ ɛbhé Kristo.
48006003	Mbák mmu akaysi bɛ achi mǔngo, ɛnɛ́ yi apú yɛ̌nyɨŋ, ǎrwɔ́ chi mmʉɛt.
48006004	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ánjɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀, nɛ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ sayri áŋák nɛ mmʉɛt ɛyi, kɛbhak bɛ ǎyɛ̀nti mmʉɛt nɛ mmǔ achak.
48006005	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛ́kʉ chi ɛbhi bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn Mandɛm achyɛ yi ankʉ.
48006006	Mmu anɛ bátɔ̀ŋ yi Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛchyɛ mmu anɛ átɔ̀ŋ yi aywi ákɔ́rɛ́ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́.
48006007	Mmu akɛ́ rwɔ mmʉɛt, yɛ̌ mmu ápú kwáy bɛrwɔ Mandɛm. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mmu ápɨ́, yɔ́ kɛ yi aghɛm.
48006008	Mmu anɛ ápɨ́ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchyɛ mmʉɛt yi maŋák, ǎghɛm chi nɛwú. Kɛ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm áyàŋ yi ankʉ ǎghɛm nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
48006009	Sɛ́kɛ́ pɔp yɛ bɛkʉ bɛrɨ mbɔnyunɛ, mbák sɛbhɨkɨ fɛrɛ amɔ́, mpok ánkwáy, chɔŋ sɛ́ngɛm ɛrɨ́tí mbwɔt.
48006010	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ mbi, sɛnkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu bɛrɨ, sayri sayri, batɨ bǒnkwɔ.
48006011	Ghɔ́ ká bɛrɛmɛ́ basɨŋ amɛn nsɔ́rɛ́ bɛsɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ ntá yɛka nɛ awɔ́ awa mɛmbɔŋ.
48006012	Bo abhɛn báyàŋ bɛkʉ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ambɔŋ maŋák nɛ bhɔ kɛ báfyɛ̀ bɛtaŋ bɛ mansyɛp bhe. Bákʉ̀ nɔ ndu bápú yaŋ bɛ bo Israɛl mánchyɛ bhɔ ɛsɔŋɔri bɛ́ bághàti bo bɛ́ nɛwú Kristo ndǔ ɛkotákátí kɛ nɛ́pɛmɛ mmu.
48006013	Bo abhɛn basyɛphɛ bhɔ bápú bhʉɛrɛ mbɔŋ bɛbhé mɛnkɛm. Kɛ báyàŋ bɛsyɛp bhe bɛ mámpányu bɛ́ bǎchi bakoŋo bhap.
48006014	Kɛ Mandɛm akɛka bɛ́ mpányu ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́fʉɛt chi ɛ̌ti nɛwú Yesu Kristo Acha ndu ɛkotákátí. Ɛ̌ti nɛwú Yesu ndu ɛkotákátí. Mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk bɛrɔp ntá ya chi mbɔ bɛgú mɛnyɨŋ, nɛ mɛ ndɔp chi mbɔ ngú ntá mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk.
48006015	Yɛ̌ básyɛp mmu syɛp, yɛ̌ babhɨkɨ syɛp, ɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ. Nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ chi bɛ́ sɛmbak bǒ bakɔ.
48006016	Kpák ambak nɛ bhe, ntínso Mandɛm nɛ́mbak nɛ bǒ Mandɛm mankɛm abhɛn bákòŋo ɛbhé ɛkɔ ɛnɛ.
48006017	Bɛbho ɛchɔŋ, yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́pɛrɛ chyɛ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔnyunɛ bɛrɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi mɛ amʉɛt bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ nchí mmu Yesu.
48006018	Bɔ̌ma, bɛrɨ̌ndu Yesu Kristo Acha mɛ́mbak amɛm batɨ ayɛka. Amen.
49001001	Mɛ Pɔ̌l, mǔntó Yesu Kristo bɛkoŋo nkaysi Mandɛm, kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka bo Mandɛm abhɛn bǎbhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp ndǔ Mandɛm áchɛ́mɛ́ bhe nɛ Yesu Kristo.
49001002	Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Acha yɛsɛ Yesu Kristo mántɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, mánchyɛ be kpák.
49001003	Sɛ́mbɨ́tí Mandɛm Mmu achi Chi Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ. Yi achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ áfɔ́k anɛ́ áfù amfay ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi achi Mfɔ arɛ́, mbɔnyunɛ ábhat bhɛsɛ nɛ Kristo.
49001004	Mandɛm ápɛ́rɛ́ ghoko mmɨk, anáŋ ayap nyaka bhɛsɛ ndu áchɛ́mɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛ Kristo, bɛ sɛ́mbák nyáŋá, kɛbhɔ́ŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛsí bhi.
49001005	Ndu ákɔ́ŋ bhɛsɛ, anáŋ atɨ nyaka bɛ sɛ́mfʉ́ɛ́t ntá Yesu Kristo sɛmbak bɔ̌bhi. Akʉ nɔ bɛkoŋo ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi átɨ́ nyaka bɛkʉ,
49001006	bɛ sɛ́mbɨ́tí yi ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn yi átɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɛsɛ ndɛ́ndɛm, ndu ábhárɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛ Mɔ́ywi mmu yi akɔŋ tontó.
49001007	Mandɛm aku bhɛsɛ nɛ manoŋ Kristo afɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ kɛsɛm ndu ábhárɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛ Kristo. Nɛ afóŋórí bhɛsɛ ndǔ sɛ́pú bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé. Akʉ nɔ bɛkoŋo ɛnyǔ yi átɔ́ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ndu
49001008	ɛbhɛn yi áre tɔŋ bhɛsɛ, akʉ nkwɔ bɛ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak nɛnkɛm nɛ nɛjwǐmɛm nɛnkɛm.
49001009	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi átɨ́ nyaka bɛkʉ ɛnɛ́ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́re rɨŋɨ nyaka, atɨ̌ bɛkʉ yɔ bɛfʉɛt ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Kristo ákʉ́.
49001010	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ nɔ Mandɛm atɨ bɛkʉ ɛchi nyaka bɛ mpok ánáŋ ánkwáy, yi ǎchɛm mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm, ɛbhɛn amfay nɛ ɛbhɛn fá amɨk, amfyɛ́ amɔ Kristo.
49001011	Mandɛm ǎkʉ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi átɨ́ bɛkʉ. Ayap bhɛsɛ tɛntɛp ndu ákɔ́ŋ nyaka bɛkʉ nɔ, bɛ́ sɛ́mbák bɔ̌bhi ndǔ yi ábhárɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛ Kristo mbɔnyunɛ yi ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi átɨ́ nyaka bɛkʉ bɛkoŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi áyàŋ bɛkʉ.
49001012	Bɛsɛ́ bho sɛ́yámbɨ bɛbhaka ntɨ nɛ Kristo sɛbhɔŋ bɛkʉ bo mámbɨ́tɨ́ yi ɛ̌ti kɛnɛ́m ɛki.
49001013	Ɛchi ɛnyumɔt nɛ bhe nkwɔ. Mǎnáŋ bǎghok ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi tɛtɛp, nɛ chí Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ bɛ Mandɛm ǎpɛmɛ chɔŋ bhe, nɛ mǎnókó Kristo. Mpok anɛ mǎnókó, Mandɛm achyɛ bhe Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mbɔ sɛbhaŋ ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ bǎchi bǒbhi nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu yi afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎkʉ.
49001014	Achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmu yi áchyɛ̀ bɔ̌bhi. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ Mandɛm ǎfɛrɛ chɔŋ bɛsɛ mankɛm bo sɛ́chí bɔ̌bhi ndǔ kɛsɛm. Ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ́ bo báre bɨti Mandɛm ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛyǎ bɛcha.
49001015	Tɛ mpok anɛ njámbɨ ngoko bɛ bǎsɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ Yesu Acha nɛ bɛ́ bǎkɔŋ bo Mandɛm mankɛm,
49001016	mbɨ́kɨ́ rɔ bɛkaka Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yɛka ndǔ mpok anɛ mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt.
49001017	Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm. Achi Mandɛm Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ. Achi nkwɔ Ɛtayi. Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ yi anchyɛ bhe Ɛfóŋó yi mmu ákʉ̀ mǎndɨŋɨ Mandɛm mǎndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ.
49001018	Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ yi ánɛ́nɛ́ batɨ̌ yɛka sayri ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bǎrɨŋɨ manɛ́m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbháká ntɨ arɛ bɛ chɔŋ yi ankʉ ntá bo abhɛn yi ábhɨ́ŋɨ́. Nchí yaŋ bɛ mǎndɨŋɨ bɛyǎ áfɔ́k anɛ yi afyɛ́ bariɛp ndu bɛkʉ manɛ́m mɛnyɨŋ ntá bo abhɛn bachi abhi.
49001019	Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ mǎndɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛyǎ ɛnyǔ ɛnɛ́ sɛpu kway bɛyɛnti bhɔ. Bɛyǎ ndu bɛkwak bhɛsɛ bho sɛ́nókó yi. Bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bhɔ bɛyǎ tontó.
49001020	Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ nyaka Yesu ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m achɔkɔ ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm ywi awu amfay ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Kristo achi arɛ mbɔ Mfɔ.
49001021	Arɛ́, abhɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ amfǎy bɔángɛl mankɛm nɛ bafɔ bhap, nɛ amfǎy yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ awu amfay nɛ fá amɨk. Abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfǎy bafɔ mankɛm, abhɛn bakwǎŋwaŋ nɛ abhɛn bachi bɛfóŋó nkwɔ amfǎy bo abhɛn báchí ndǔ nɛŋɔkɔ́mɨk ɛnɛn mfay ɛnɛn nɛ́twɔ̀.
49001022	Afyɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm amɔ́ yi bɛ ndǔ ákʉ́ yi mmu abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, ámbák mǔnti ntá bǒnkwɔ.
49001023	Nɛ bǒnkwɔ mankɛm báchí mmʉɛt Yesu. Amʉɛt bǒnkwɔ kɛ bághɔ bɛrɨ̌ Kristo mɛnkɛm nɛ mbák chi Kristo, amʉɛrɛ-yi kɛ bo bághɔ bɛrɨ Mandɛm.
49002001	Ndǔ mpok anɛ afʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, bǎchi nyaka mbɔ bawú bɛsí Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ bǎpú bhʉɛrɛ nyaka bɛbhé Mandɛm ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka.
49002002	Mpok yɔ, bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛka bɛbhak chi ɛbhɛn bǒ mmɨk nɛ mǎnkoŋo nɔkɔ chi mfɔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ anɛ, nɛ́nɛ, abhɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ ndǔ bɛpɨŋɨ́ bho. Mfɔ bɛfóŋó wu ǎkɛ̀m batɨ̌ bo abhɛn bátàŋti nɛ Mandɛm.
49002003	Bɛsɛ mankɛm nkwɔ sɛ́kʉ̀ nyaka mbɔ bhɔ, sɛ́nkoŋo nɔkɔ chi bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ nɛ batɨ̌ yɛsɛ áŋwàka bɛ sɛnkʉ. Ndǔ ntee ayɛsɛ yɔ, Mandɛm abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ ntɛ́msí mbɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak ndu ábé nyaka ntɨ tontó ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́.
49002004	Kɛ ntínso Mandɛm nɛya tontó. Atɔ́ŋ yɛ bhɛsɛ chi ɛkɔŋ ɛyi ɛnɛ ɛ́yá ɛ́chá.
49002005	Nɛ yɛ̌ chi mpok anɛ sɛ́chí nyaka mbɔ bawú ɛ̌ti sɛpu bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm, yí akʉ sɛ́bhak nɛpɛ́m chɛ́chɛm nɛ Kristo mmu ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Bɛkoŋo bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi kɛ̌ yi ápɛ́mɛ́ bhé.
49002006	Ndu Mandɛm ábhárɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo, yí akʉ sɛ́pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ yi. Nɛ akʉ sɛ́chɔ́kɔ́ nɛ Kristo amfay ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi achi Mfɔ.
49002007	Ákʉ́ bhɛsɛ bɛyǎ bɛrɨ ɛnyu yɔ bɛfʉɛt ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Kristo ákʉ́ ndu bɛkwak bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́ntɔ́ŋ bo abhɛn mpok anɛ átwɔ̀ ansɛm ɛnyǔ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi bɛyǎ tontó ɛnyu ɛnɛ sɛ́pú kway bɛyɛnti bhɔ.
49002008	Mandɛm ápɛ́mɛ́ bhe ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu bhi nɛ ndǔ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ yi. Abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛmɛ bhe ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ̀, chi akap anɛ yi áchyɛ́ bhe ndɛ́ndɛm.
49002009	Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛmɛ be bɛ bǎkʉ nyaka bɛrɨ́tí bɛtɨk. Yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ pá yɛ nnyu.
49002010	Sɛ́chí yɛ chí awɔ́-bɛtɨk Mandɛm. Aghókó bhɛsɛ, abhat nɛ Yesu Kristo, bɛ́ sɛ́nkʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ chí bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ. Nɛ Mandɛm anáŋ átóŋtí nyaka bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ ábhʉ́rɛ́ ntá yɛsɛ, bɛ sɛ́nkʉ nɔkɔ bhɔ.
49002011	Bě bho bǎpú bo Israɛl, bǎkɛ ghɔkɔntɨk ɛnyǔ bǎchí nyaka ndǔ mpok anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm. Bo Israɛl básyɛp bho, nɛ ɛ̌ti yɔ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ mmʉɛt yap bɛ, “Bo abhɛn bǎsyɛphɛ bho nɛ bǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bɛ, bo abhɛn babhɨkɨ syɛp bhɔ.”
49002012	Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ mpok ɛyɔ bǎbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nyaka yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ Kristo. Bě kɛbhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ nɛ bǎbhak mankɔ ndu nkwɔ bo abhɛn Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ afyɛ́ bariɛp ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi áyàŋ bɛkʉ ntá yap, kɛ ɛyɔ ɛbhɨkɨ yɨŋɨ nyaka bhe. Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nyaka yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎbhaka ntɨ arɛ́ mǎnòŋ nɔkɔ fá ndǔ mmɨkɨ nɛ, nɛ be kɛrɨŋɨ Mandɛm.
49002013	Bǎsap nyaka nɛkɔ nɛ Mandɛm, kɛ nɛ́nɛ, Mandɛm abhat be nɛ Yesu Kristo, ákʉ mǎmbák kɛkwɔt nɛ yi bɛfʉɛt ndǔ manoŋ Kristo amɛn árɔ́ŋɔ́ amɨk.
49002014	Kristo yímbɔŋ ákʉ́ bhɛsɛ́ bo Israɛl nɛ be bho bǎpu bo Israɛl bɛ sɛ́mbák kpák nɛ batɨ. Mpap achí nyaka nɛntɨ ɛnɛsɛ mbɔ nkók anɛ ákɔ́rɛ́ bhɛsɛ. Afɛ́rɛ́ mpap ayɔ mpok yi ágú, akʉ sɛ́rɔp chi mmu amɔt.
49002015	Achɔ́ŋtí bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn bɛbhé Moses mɛnkɛm. Mbɔk bɛbhé bɛbhak ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo babhɔŋɔ bɛkʉ. Bɛchak bɛkóŋo bɛpɨŋɨ́tɔk. Akʉ́ ɛnyuyɔ bɛ bakwɔ́ bho apay andɔp chi nkwɔ amɔt, nɔ chi, nkwɔ bo bakɔ abhɛn Mandɛm ábhárɛ́ nɛ yi. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ̌ yi akʉ kpák ámbák nɛntɨ bo Israɛl nɛ abhɛn bapu bo Israɛl.
49002016	Afɛ́rɛ́ mpap nɛntɨ bakwɔ́ bho bhɔ apay bɛfʉɛt ndǔ nɛwú ɛni ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Akʉ bɛ́ bakwɔ́ bho apay mándɔp chi nkwɔ amɔt, nɛ bɛ bo Israɛl nɛ abhɛn bapu bo Israɛl, mambak ɛrɨrɨ nɛ Mandɛm.
49002017	Atwɔ́ yɛ aghati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ árɛ̀m bɛ kpák achi nɛ bě bho bǎchi nyaka nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ nɛ abhɛn bachi kɛkwɔt.
49002018	Chi bɛfʉɛt ntá Yesu Kristo kɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ákwàk bhɛsɛ nɛ be bɛ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛrɔŋ ntá Ɛta.
49002019	Bě bho bǎpu bo Israɛl bǎpɛt bǎpú yɛ mankɔ, nɛ bǎpú bo abhɛn báfú nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ. Bǎrɔp chí bǒ ɛtɔk mbɔ bo Mandɛm bachak, nɛ bǒ nnɛrɛkɛt Mandɛm anɛ áchí mbɔ ɛfo ɛ́mɔt.
49002020	Bě nɛ bhɔ bǎchi bɛkpɔkɔ́ ntɔp ɛbhɛn básɔ́rɛ́ báté ɛkɛt ɛyɔ. Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nɛ bǒnto Yesu báchí nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́kɛt ɛnɛn bághókó báté ɛkɛt ɛyɔ arɛ, nɛ Yesu Kristo yímbɔŋ achi ɛkwap ɛnɛ ɛ́kɛ̀m ɛkɛt.
49002021	Yi akʉ bɛsɛ bho sɛchi maŋɔkɔ́kɛt nyáŋá nyáŋá sɛ́bhàt mmʉɛt nɛ batɨ sayri ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛkɛrákap ɛ́té sɛnɛ nɛ ɛ́gò bɛbhak nyáŋá ndǔ ɛchi ntá Acha.
49002022	Nɛ ndǔ Mandɛm áchɛ́mɛ́ bhe nɛ Kristo, yí ákʉ́ bǎbhàt mmʉɛt nɛ bǒnkwɔ bachak mankɛm bɛ be nɛ bhɔ mǎmbák ɛkɛt ɛnɛ Mandɛm áchɔ̀kɔ arɛ bɛfʉɛt ntá bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.
49003001	Mɛ Pɔ̌l, mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yɛka bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl. Nchí mǔkɛnɔŋ mbɔnyunɛ nchí ghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo ndu bɛkwak bhe.
49003002	Nkáysí bɛ mǎnaŋ bǎghok ɛ̌ti bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ́ mɛ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi bɛ nkʉ ndǔ bɛkwak bhe.
49003003	Atɔ́ŋ mɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí nyaka bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́, ákú ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɔ, mbɔ ɛnyǔ nsɨ́ŋɨ́ mandú ngátí bhe ɛ̌ti mbɔk mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ.
49003004	Mpok bǎpày ɛkáti ɛnɛ, chɔŋ mǎnkwáy bɛghɔ bɛ njwímɛm sayri ndǔ nkaysi Mandɛm anɛ achi nyaka bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo.
49003005	Ndǔ mkpáká bho anɛ ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ bho mándɨŋɨ nkaysi yɔ, mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ákʉ́ nɛ́nɛ bɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ántɔ́ŋ yɔ ntá bǒnto nɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bhi, bɔ́ bho báchi nyáŋá ntá yi.
49003006	Nkaysi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ yɔ achi bɛ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bábhɔ̀ŋ nkwɔ áfɔ́k anɛ bo Israɛl bábhɔ̀ŋ, bɛ bɔ bárɔp chi mmu amɔt nɛ bo Israɛl nɛ bɛ chɔŋ mámbɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛ ǎkʉ ntá bɔ̌bhi ndǔ yi ábhárɛ́ bhɔ nɛ Kristo. Bɛfʉɛt ndǔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo kɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ.
49003007	Mandɛm atɔŋ mɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu, asɔt mɛ bɛ nkʉ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhi ndu bɛghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́-nɛ. Akʉ nɔ ndǔ áchyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi.
49003008	Tɛ̌ndu mbɨ́kɨ́ ghaka mbɔ yɛ̌ mmu Mandɛm achak, yi atɔŋ mɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu, áchyɛ́ mɛ bɛtɨk bɛghati bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl áfɔ́k anɛ áfù ntá Kristo. Áfɔ́k wu áya ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ mmu apu kway bɛjwimɛm ndǔ wu ankɛm achi.
49003009	Bɛtɨk bɛchak ɛbhɛn yi áchyɛ́ mɛ chi bɛ nkʉ́ bǒ mankɛm mángɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm mmu ághókó mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ábhʉ́rɛ́ nyaka bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ndǔ mpoknkɛm anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm.
49003010	Mandɛm akʉ nɔ bɛ nɛ́nɛ, bɛfʉɛt ntá nkwɔ Kristo, ántɔ́ŋ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ nɛ bafɔ bhap nɔ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfay ndu nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Yesu achi Mfɔ arɛ ɛnyǔ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ̀.
49003011	Mandɛm ákʉ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi átɨ́ nyaka tɛ mpok yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ re fʉɛt ntá Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo.
49003012	Ndu Mandɛm ábhárɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛ Kristo nɛ sɛ́sɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ yi, sɛ́kwáy bɛrɔŋ ntá Mandɛm ndu bɛrɛm kɛpɨ nɛ yi, kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy nɛ kɛmakati bɛ yi ǎghòk bhɛsɛ.
49003013	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, nchí ghati bhe bɛ bǎkɛ́ fɛrɛ amɔ ɛ̌ti bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn mɛ̌ghɔ̀ ɛ̌ti yɛka ndu bɛkwak bhe.
49003014	Ndu Mandɛm ákʉ́ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ, nchí kwɛn bɛsí Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ ndǔ mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛka.
49003015	Yi afyɛ́ nnyɛ́n ɛni ndǔ manɛrɛ́kɛt ankɛm, awu amfay nɛ fá amɨk.
49003016	Yǐ ataŋ acha nɛ abhɔŋ bɛyǎ áfɔ́k. Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ yi ankʉ batɨ̌ yɛka antaŋ amɛm ndu bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ,
49003017	bɛ Kristo ámbák amɛm batɨ yɛka mpoknkɛm ndǔ bǎsɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ yi, nɛ bɛ mǎmbak mbɔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ bakaŋ ɛyi áchwè amɨk sayri nɛ mbɔ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ ɛ́té sɛnɛ́ ndǔ ɛkɔŋ Mandɛm.
49003018	Ɛnyu ɛyɔ, be nɛ bo Mandɛm báchák mankɛm bǎkwáy bɛjwimɛm bɛ Kristo akɔŋ bhɛsɛ tontó ɛnyu ɛnɛ mmu apu kway bɛyɛnti yɔ.
49003019	Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ Kristo, yɛ̌ndu sɛ́pú kway bɛrɨŋɨ yɔ ɛnkɛm, bɛ́ mǎnkwáy bɛrɔp chi mbɔ Mandɛm ndǔ ɛpɨŋ ɛyɛka.
49003020	Mandɛm ǎkway bɛkʉ ɛncha mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn sɛ̌kwáy mɛnɨkmʉɛt bɛ yi ankʉ ndǔ bɛkwak bhɛsɛ, nɛ ɛncha ɛnyǔ ɛnɛ sɛ́kway bɛkaysi bɛ chɔŋ yi ankʉ. Ǎkʉ̀ nɔ nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk amɛm nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ.
49003021	Bɛsɛ bho sɛchi ndu Nkwɔ Kristo, bo Mandɛm ábhárɛ́ nɛ Yesu Kristo, sɛ́nchíɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Ndǔ mkpáká bho ɛnkɛm, mpoknkɛm. Amen.
49004001	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, mɛ Pɔ̌l mǔkɛnɔŋ ɛ̌ti Yesu Acha, nchí sɛmti bhe bɛ ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛyɛka ɛ́mbák ɛnɛ ɛ́kwáy nɛ bo abhɛn Mandɛm ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mambak abhi.
49004002	Bɔ́ŋ ká nɛsɛptímʉɛt nɛnkɛm. Bǎkɛ́ bhak gum gum nɛ bho. Bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ. Tɔ́ŋ nɔ́kɔ́ ká batɨ ɛkɔŋ, mǎnsɔt bhɔ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bachi.
49004003	Bɔ́ŋ ká bɛyǎ ɛkwak ndu bɛkɛm nɛchɛmɛ́mʉɛt ɛnɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ákʉ́ mǎmbɔŋ bɛfʉɛt ndǔ kpák anɛ ágwɔ̀t bhe nɛ batɨ̌ bǒ Kristo.
49004004	Bɛsɛ mankɛm sɛchi ndu mmʉɛt amɔt, sɛbhɔŋ chi Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ amɔt. Nɛ ɛchi ɛnyu ɛ́mɔt nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt kɛ ɛchi ɛnɛ sɛ́bháká ntɨ arɛ, bɛ Mandɛm abhɨŋɨ bɛsɛ bɛ sɛmbɔŋ chɔŋ yɔ.
49004005	Acha amɔt kɛ sɛ́tòk. Bɛsɛ mankɛm sɛ́noko chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt. Sɛ́bhɔŋ chi nɛjwiti nɛmɔt.
49004006	Mandɛm amɔt kɛ achi, nɛ yi achi Ɛtayɛsɛ mankɛm. Achí Mfɔ bɔ̌bhi mankɛm, áfʉ̀ɛt ntá yɛsɛ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhi nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achi nɛ bɔ̌bhi mankɛm.
49004007	Kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ ayi njɛnti akap kɛkúrí anɛ Kristo áchyɛ́ yi ndu bɛkʉ bɛtɨk nɛ wu.
49004008	Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mpok yi ákó tɛ amfay, ásɔ́t ngɛ́mtáy bo abhɛn yi ákɛ́mɛ́ bɛ́ mankoŋo yi, akɔrɛ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ntá bho.”
49004009	Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Yi akó amfay”, ɛghati bhɛsɛ bɛ yi? Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛ anáŋá asɛp nyaka ndǔ ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú.
49004010	Nkúbhɛ́ mmu anɛ ásɛ́bhɛ́ amɨk kɛ ákó kpát afʉɛ́t nɛbu, bɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm mɛ́mbak mbɔ ɛnyu bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛbhak.
49004011	Nɛ yi kɛ ákɔ́rɛ́ akap ntá bho. Ntá mbɔk, achyɛ́ akap bɛbhak bǒnto. Ntá bachak, achyɛ́ akap bɛbhak barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ. Nɛ ntá abhɛnɛfu, anɛ bɛghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, nɛ achyɛ́ mbɔk akap bɛbhak babhabhɛri.
49004012	Kristo ákʉ́ nɔ bɛ bo mankɛm abhɛn yi áchyɛ́ batí bɛtɨk ayɔ, mánkwak bo Mandɛm bɛ mánkwáy bɛkʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhi ɛnyu ɛnɛ mmʉɛt Kristo átaŋ andɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ.
49004013	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, chɔŋ bɛsɛ mankɛm sɛndɔk ambɨ mɛnoko Mmɔ Mandɛm, nɛ ndu bɛrɨŋɨ yi ɛnyu ɛ́mɔt. Mbák sɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ, chɔŋ sɛ́ngo sɛ́nsɛnɛ, nɛ sɛ́naŋa bɛbhak mbɔ Kristo.
49004014	Sɛ́kɛ́pɛrɛ bhák bo abhɛn bachi mbɔ mɔ́áchwi anɛ mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn ɛ́dɛ̀p ɛ́ntɛn ɛbhé ɛ́mɔt, ɛ́ndɛp ɛntɛn ɛbhé ɛchak mpok batɔŋɔ́ nse bárwɔ̀ bhɔ nɛ nsé yap. Batɔŋɔ́ nse bhɔ bákʉ̀ bo manɛm ɛbhɨ ndu bákòŋo baraká nse anɛ bɔ́ bátɔ̀ŋ.
49004015	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ chi bɛkɔŋ batɨ, nɛ bɛrɛm chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp ɛ̌ti Mandɛm bɛ sɛ́ngo nɔkɔ ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi kpátɛ sɛ́ndɔp chi mbɔ Kristo mmu achi ntí ntá Nkwɔ Kristo.
49004016	Yí kɛ áchɛ̀m bǒbhi mankɛm ndǔ nkwɔ amɔt bɛ mámbák mbɔ mmu amɔt nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mmʉɛt nkwǎ achi nɛ maŋɔk anɛ áfáŋá byoŋómʉɛt mɛnkɛm bɛ́ mmʉɛt ambak amɔt. Nɛ ndǔ mmʉɛt nkwǎ, mpok yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́mʉɛt ákʉ̀ ɛbhi bɛtɨk sayri, mmʉɛt ǎgò ɛrɨrɨ. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛchi nɛ bǒnkwɔ Kristo. Mpok bɔ́ bákɔ̀ŋ batɨ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ǎkʉ̀ ɛbhi bɛtɨk sayri, bákwàk batɨ mánsɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛn babhɔŋɔ nɛ Yesu.
49004017	Nchí ghati yɛ bhe nɛ nchí sɛmti bhe ndǔ nnyɛ́n Acha bɛ bǎbhɨkɨ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛ́bhak mbɔ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl. Bɔ bákɔŋ chi bɛpɔ̌ nkaysi yap.
49004018	Báchí amɛm ɛjuri nɛ báfap nyaka bhɔ nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ̀, mbɔnyunɛ bachi amɨ́k nɛ́mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ nɛjwǐmɛm ɛnap nɛ bágwɔ́t batɨ ayap amɛm.
49004019	Bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌ mandú ntíánwɔ́p. Báchyɛ́ yɛ mmʉɛt ndǔ bɛkʉ baraká ntianwɔp anɛ mmʉɛt ɛyap ɛ́yàŋ bɔ mankʉ. Bákʉ̀ barak ɛ́pusi ankɛm, nɛ bápú rɔ bɛkʉ yɔ.
49004020	Kɛ be, puyɛ̌ ɛnyǔ ɛyɔ kɛ bátɔ́ŋ bhe ɛ̌ti Kristo.
49004021	Nɛ mánaŋ batɔŋ be mɛnyɨŋɨ́ tɛtɛp ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu.
49004022	Fɛrɛ́ yɛ́ ka ɛsɨ́ mkpá ayɛka anɛ áchyɛ̀ nyaka be ɛbɛ́ptí ɛkakánɛkɔ. Bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mǎŋwaka nyaka bɛkʉ bɛ́rwɔ̀ nyaka bhe nɛ mɛ́nchɔŋti nɔkɔ batɨ̌ yɛka amɛm.
49004023	Dɔ̌ ká Mandɛm ankʉ mǎmbak bǒ bakɔ ndǔ batɨ yɛka bɛ nkaysi ywɛka ámbák nkɔ.
49004024	Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛ́fyɛ mkpá nkɔ anɛ Mandɛm aghoko, bɛ ámbák mbɔ yímbɔŋ. Mkpá nkɔ yɔ chi ɛpɨŋ ɛkɔ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak tɛtɛp bɛsí Mandɛm, nɛ ɛchi nyáŋá tɛtɛp.
49004025	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, dɔ̌ ká baraká nse. Bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́ndɛm nɔkɔ chi tɛtɛp nɛ batɨ, mbɔnyunɛ sɛchi mbɔ bɛpókómʉɛt nyáŋá nyáŋá ndǔ mmʉɛt amɔt.
49004026	Mbák mmu ywɛka aběntɨ, ákɛ́ rɔ bɛběntɨ bhi mɛnto yi ndǔ bɛbʉ́, nɛ ákɛ́ bhʉɛrɛ bɛběntɨ antɨ ndǔ nywɔp nɛnkɛm.
49004027	Kɛ́chyɛ ka Satan mbi bɛ́ ándwɔ́ mmu ankʉ bɛbʉ́.
49004028	Mmu anɛ áchi ngɛ́p ákɛ́pɛrɛ ghɛ́p aghɛ́p. Mmu abhɔŋ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk sayri ndǔ bɛkɛm nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛ ndǔ bɛkwak bachɛ́bhɛ́bho.
49004029	Yɛ̌ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛyɔŋ ɛ́kɛ́ fu be anyu. Dɛm nɔ́kɔ́ ká chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kwàk bo mántaŋ ndǔ mbi Mandɛm mbɔ ɛnyǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛgo. Mmu abhɔŋ bɛrɛm chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kwak abhɛn bághòk yi.
49004030	Nɛ bǎkɛ́ kʉ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ Mandɛm ambɔŋ kɛsɔ́ti. Mandɛm achyɛ́ bhe Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mbɔ ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ bǎchi bǒbhi nɛ bɛ chɔŋ anaŋa bɛfɛrɛ bhe ndǔ kɛsɛm ɛwak ɛ́mɔt.
49004031	Dɔ̌ ká nkaysi bɛyǎ mpap, nɛ bɛběntɨ, nɛ ɛchoko-ntɨ, nɛ bɛ́táŋá, nɛ bɛchɔŋti manyɛ́n batɨ, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nkaysi bɛkʉ batɨ bɛbʉ́.
49004032	Tɔ́ŋ ká batɨ bɛrɨ, mǎngɔ bhɔ ntínso. Nɛ foŋorí nɔ́kɔ́ ká batɨ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ntá Kristo afoŋori bhe.
49005001	Tɛ̌ndu bǎchi bɔ̌ Mandɛm nɛ yi akɔŋ be tontó, ŋɔkɔ́ yɛka ɛpɨŋ ɛyi.
49005002	Bǎbhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ bo ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka nɛnkɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Kristo ákɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɛsɛ nɛ áchyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ. Áchyɛ́ mmʉɛt mbɔ akabhɛ́nya anɛ áchyɛ́ Mandɛm bɛyǎ maŋák.
49005003	Bǎchi bo Mandɛm. Bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ ɛpúsí, nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí nkaysi. Bǎkɛ́ fyɛ́ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ bo bachak. Bǎkɛ rɔ mbɔŋ bɛ mántáká mɛnyɨ̌ŋ ɛbhɔ ndu nkwɔ ywɛka.
49005004	Bǎkɛ́ rɛm yɛ̌ bɛpɔ̌-kɛpɨ nɛ bɛbhokori kɛpɨ, nɛ bǎkɛ́ kʉ bɛchoŋó ntok. Kɛ chyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ká bakak ntá Mandɛm.
49005005	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ yɛ̌ nkoŋo baghɔrɛ́, nɛ yɛ̌ chi mmu anɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛ́pú amɛm pɛ́pɛ́p, nɛ mmu anɛ afyɛ́ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bo bachak apú bhɔŋ ákɔ́rɛ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt kɛfɔ Kristo nɛ Mandɛm. Mmu anɛ afyɛ́ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bo bachak achi mbɔ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɔmandɛm bachak mbɔnyunɛ akɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ acha Mandɛm.
49005006	Bǎkɛ́ ka yɛ bɛ mmu ánsɔ́t bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi fuu andwɔ̀ bhe. Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ kɛ bɛ́kʉ̀ Mandɛm ambentɨ, nɛ chɔŋ antɛmsi bo abhɛn bapu ghok yi.
49005007	Bǎkɛ́ bhak ndǔ nsoŋ amɔt nɛ mɛnyǔ bǒbhɔ.
49005008	Bě bǎchi nyaka ndǔ ɛjuri. Nɛ̌nɛ, ɛnɛ́ Mandɛm áchɛ́mɛ́ bhe nɛ Yesu Acha, bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛnɛ ɛ́kwáy nɛ bo abhɛn bachi amɛm bɛdiɛ́rɛ́.
49005009	Bɛdiɛrɛ́ bɛ́kʉ̀ bo mǎmbɔŋ ɛrɨ́tí ɛpɨŋ, mámbak chak, nɛ mámbak bo abhɛn bachi tɛtɛp.
49005010	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ánú bɛrɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ Acha bɛyǎ maŋák.
49005011	Bǎkɛ́ fyɛ́ mmʉɛt ndǔ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo abhɛn bachi amɛm ɛjuri bákʉ̀. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́chí ndɛ́ndɛm. Bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ bo mandɨŋɨ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́bɛp.
49005012	Mbɔŋ bɛ́rɛm ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ̀ bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ chi ɛnyɨŋɨ́ ntíánwɔ́p.
49005013	Mpok bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ bɛ́ghɔ̀ ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ, bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ ɛnyu yɔ ɛchi,
49005014	mbɔnyunɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ kɛ bɛ́kʉ̀ mángɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ. Ndu ɛchi nɔ kɛ bárɛ̀m bɛ, “Mbʉɛrɛ kɛnɔ́, ŋɛmɛ́! Fú ndǔ nɛwú, nɛ chɔŋ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Kristo mɛ́ngɔ wɔ amʉɛt.”
49005015	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ánsɔt yɛ mpok nɛ ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛyi. Bǎkɛ́ bhak mbɔ bɛchɨŋtǐ bho. Bák ká chi mbɔ barɨŋɨ́ndak.
49005016	Kʉ ka bɛrɨ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ mbi bɛkʉ nɔ, mbɔnyunɛ bɛyǎ bo bákʉ̀ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ nɛ́nɛ.
49005017	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, bǎkɛ́ bhak bɛchɨŋtǐ bho. Nu ka bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Acha áyàŋ mǎnkʉ.
49005018	Bǎkɛ́ bhak bakwɛnɛ́ mmɛ́m. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ákɛ́ kway bɛkɛm mmʉɛt, ɛ́ntwɔ yɛ yi nɛ mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́. Kɛ dɔ̌ ká Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ambak nɛ bhe, ambɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka.
49005019	Kwáy nɔ́kɔ́ ka mɛnyǔ bakwáy Nku Nsɨ́, nɛ bakwáy Mandɛm, nɛ bakwáy anɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ̀ ndu bɛ́fyɛ́ batɨ ntɨ. Kwáy nɔ́kɔ́ ka bakway ndu bɛbɨti Acha nɛ batɨ yɛka ankɛm.
49005020	Kaká ká Ɛtayɛsɛ Mandɛm mpoknkɛm ɛ̌ti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo Acha.
49005021	Sɛptí nɔ́kɔ́ ka mmʉɛt ntá batɨ. Ɛpɨŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́mfú ndǔ kɛnókó ɛkɛn bǎchyɛ̀ Kristo.
49005022	Baghɔrɛ́ nɛbhay, sɛptí nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt ntá manɛ́m abhɛka mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎsɛpti mmʉɛt ntá Acha.
49005023	Nnɛ́m achi mǔnti ntá ngɔrɛ́ ywi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Kristo achi mǔnti ntá bǒnkwɔ. Bǒnkwɔ chi mmʉɛt yi nɛ yímbɔŋ kɛ ápɛ̀mɛ bhɔ.
49005024	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ngɔrɛ́ abhɔŋ yɛ bɛsɛpti mmʉɛt ntá nnɛ́m aywi ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǒnkwɔ básɛ̀pti mmʉɛt ntá Kristo.
49005025	Bě manɛ́m, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ ngɔrɛ́ ywi nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Kristo ákɔ́ŋ bǒnkwɔ nɛ agú ɛ̌ti yap.
49005026	Agú bɛ́kʉ bɔ mámbák pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm ndu ásó bhɔ nɛ manyiɛp nɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
49005027	Kristo akʉ nɔ́ bɛ ankway bɛkʉ nkwɔ Kristo mantwɔ ntá yi nɛ bɛyǎ bɛrɨ, kɛbhɔ́ŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ Mandɛm nɛ yɛ̌ chi bo mánji bhɔ.
49005028	Ɛnyu ɛyɔ nkwɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nnɛ́m abhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ ngɔrɛ́ ywi mbɔ mmʉɛt yi. Mmu anɛ ákɔ̀ŋ ngɔrɛ́ ywi ǎkɔ̀ŋ chi mmʉɛt yi.
49005029	Mmǔ anɛ ápábhɛ́ mmʉɛt yi apú. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu áyɨ̀ŋɨ mmʉɛt yi sayri ankɛ́m yɔ ɛrɨrɨ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Kristo áyɨ̀ŋɨ bǒnkwɔ,
49005030	nɛ bɛsɛ mankɛm sɛchi bɛpókómʉɛt ɛbhi.
49005031	Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mbakanɛm abhɔŋ bɛrɔ máyi nɛ ɛtayi anchɛm mmʉɛt nɛ ngɔrɛ́ ywi, bɔ bati apay mándɔp mmǔ amɔt.”
49005032	Bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɛ̀m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ bɛ́rɛ̀m chi ɛnyǔ Kristo achi nɛ Nkwɔ Kristo.
49005033	Kɛ ɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ nɛ bhe nkwɔ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ ngɔrɛ́ ywi mbɔnyu ákɔ́ŋɔ́ mmʉɛt ɛyi yímbɔŋ, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ngɔrɛ́ abhɔŋ bɛchyɛ nnɛ́m ywi kɛnókó.
49006001	Bɔ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛghok máyi nɛ ɛtayi, mbɔnyunɛ bǎchi bakoŋo Acha nɛ ɛchi chak bɛkʉ nɔ.
49006002	“Nokó ka manɔ nɛ bachi bhɛka.” Ɛnɛ, chí ɛbhé mbɨ ɛnɛ́ Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp amɛn abhak nɛ mmu anɛ ábhʉ̀rɛ yɔ.
49006003	Bariɛp amɔ achi bɛ, “Mmǔ anɛ ábhʉ̀ɛrɛ ɛbhé ɛnɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛbhak sayri nɛ yi, nɛ ǎbhɔŋ ɛrɔri nɛpɛ́m fá amɨk.”
49006004	Bě bachǐbhɔ, bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ ɛpɨŋ bɛkʉ batɨ ambe bɔ̌ bhɛka. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ chi mɛ́nyúrɛ nɛ bɛtɔŋ bhɔ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Acha áyàŋ.
49006005	Basɛm, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛ́ghok mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ yi fá amɨk sayri. Chiɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ka bhɔ kɛnókó nɛ bɛchǎy nɛ nɛwɛrɛ́mʉɛt nɛ mǎnkʉ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bághòk Kristo.
49006006	Bǎkɛ́ ghok bhɔ chi ndiɛrɛ bɛsí bhap nɛ ndǔ bɛkʉ bɔ mambɔŋ maŋák. Kɛ kʉ ka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ mǎnkʉ nɛ ntɨ nɛnkɛm mbɔ basɛm Kristo.
49006007	Kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ ka bɛtɨk nɛ maŋák mbɔ bɛ bǎtòk chi Acha, puyɛ̌ nkwǎ.
49006008	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ yi ǎkap yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu bɛkoŋo bɛrɨ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́, yɛ̌ achi nsɛm, yɛ apu.
49006009	Bě nkwɔ bho bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ basɛm, kɛ́m ká bhɔ sayri. Bǎkɛ́ pá bɛchyɛ bhɔ ntɛmsi. Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ Ɛta mmu achi amfay kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ be nɛ bhɔ, nɛ yi apú tɔŋ kɛ́rɨ́ŋámík.
49006010	Ɛnyɨŋɨ́ ngwɛnti ɛnɛ nchí ghati bhe chi ɛnɛ: Kɛ́m ká nɛbhárɛ́mʉɛt ɛnɛka nɛ Acha bɛ mǎntáŋ nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi ɛbhɛn bɛyǎ bɛcha.
49006011	Kɛ́m ká mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛnu mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ̀, bɛ́ mǎnkwáy mɛnu nɛ Satan, mǎnte kpirí mpok yi áyàŋ bɛrwɔ bhe.
49006012	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ sɛ́pú nu chi nɛ bakwǎŋwaŋ. Sɛ́nù chi nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí bɛfóŋó, nɛ bafɔ bhap, nɛ mɛnyǔ bɛtaŋ bɛchak. Sɛ́nù nkwɔ nɛ bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛtaŋ ndǔ mmɨk ɛjuri nɛ, nɛ sɛ́nù nɛ ngɛ́mtáy bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛtaŋ amfay ndǔ mbʉ́ɛ́p.
49006013	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ánsɔt yɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛnu mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ̀, bɛ mpok ɛsɔŋɔri ántwɔ́, mǎnu tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti, nɛ mǎndɔk ambɨ bɛte kpirí.
49006014	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, dɔ́k ká ambɨ bɛte kpɨrí. Tɛtɛp anɛ bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ ámbák mbɔ mgbat anɛ ákɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋí nɛnu ɛbhɛka. Kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ ká chi ndiɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak mbɔnyunɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛchi mbɔ nkú bɛsé anɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu afyɛ́ ndu bɛkuti mbeápak ɛyi.
49006015	Ghatí nɔ́kɔ́ ka bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ ákʉ̀ bɔ mambɔŋ kpák bɛsí Mandɛm. Ndǔ bǎkʉ̀ nɔ, ɛbhak mbɔ mpok ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu afyɛ́ bɛtaŋtí nkwɔbhɛ́nya bɛ́ ákɛ́ kwɛn amɨk mpok ájɛ̀t ntyɛt.
49006016	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák chi bɛ mǎndɔ́k ambɨ bɛbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Kristo, bɛ nɛ́mbák ɛkuti ɛyɛka mbɔ ɛnɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu ákɛ̀m awɔ́ bɛ anchyɛt bakɔŋ anɛ ádù nɛ ngó anɛ́ mbʉ́mbʉ átò.
49006017	Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ Mandɛm apɛ́mɛ́ bhe. Bɛrɨŋɨ nɔ ǎbhák ndǔ nkaysi ayɛka mbɔ kɛndɛ́n anɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu ákùti ntí ywi nɛ yɔ. Sɔt ka nkwɔ́ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ́ bhe mbɔ akparɛnja nsɛm ɛpay anɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu.
49006018	Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt mpoknkɛm nɛ ɛ̌ti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áyà bhe mbi. Bǎk ká pě. Kɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ ká ɛkɨ́kɨ́ ndǔ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛ̌ti bǒ Mandɛm mankɛm bɛ yi ankwak bhɔ.
49006019	Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti ya nkwɔ bɛ Mandɛm anchyɛ mɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛghati bo ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ achi nyaka bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ nkɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy.
49006020	Ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ kɛ̌ Kristo ásɔ́rɛ́ mɛ, akʉ mɛ nté ndǔ ntí ywi, nɛ nchí mǔkɛnɔŋ nɛ́nɛ. Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm anchyɛ mɛ nɛtaŋántɨ bɛ ngátí nɔkɔ bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ mbɔnyu mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ.
49006021	Chɔŋ Tíkíkɔs antwɔ́ awu angati bhe ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchi fá nɛ mɛ nɛ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́kʉ̀. Achi manɔ ywɛsɛ anɛ sɛ́kɔ́ŋɔ́. Achi nkʉbɛtɨk anɛ Acha nɛ yí achi mmu anɛ abhʉrɛ bariɛp ami.
49006022	Ɛ̌ti yɔ, kɛ nchí to yi ntá yɛka bɛ ankʉ mǎndɨŋɨ ɛnyu bɛsɛ sɛchi, nɛ bɛ́ ámfyɛ́ bhe ntɨ.
49006023	Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha mánchyɛ́ běka bǒnkwɔ kpák, mánkwak be bɛ mǎnkɔŋ batɨ, nɛ bɛ mǎndɔ́k ambɨ bɛbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo.
49006024	Nchí nɨkmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ántɔ́ŋ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi ntá bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bákɔ́ŋɔ́ Yesu Kristo Acha nɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛpu gu manyiɛp.
50001001	Mɛ Pɔ̌l nɛ Tímɔti, bɛsɛ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk Yesu Kristo kɛ sɛ́sɨ̀ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Sɛ́sɨ̀ŋ ntá yɛka bo Mandɛm mankɛm, bě bhó bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu awu ɛtɔk Fílipi. Sayri sayri, sɛ́sɨ̀ŋ ntá yɛká bǒ batí nɛ be bho bǎkwàk bǒ batí bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Mandɛm ndǔ nkwɔ bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn Fílipi.
50001002	Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha mántɔŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, mánchyɛ bhe kpák.
50001003	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ ntɨ ɛna nɛ́kwɛ́n be amʉɛt, nchí nɨkmʉɛt nkaka Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yɛká!
50001004	Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛka mankɛm, nchí kʉ nɔ chí nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák.
50001005	Nchí kʉ nɔ nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák mbɔnyunɛ bǎchɛm mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ tɛ nɛbhǒnɛt bɛghaka ɛchɔŋ, ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀ bɛ́gháti bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu.
50001006	Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ chɔŋ Mandɛm mmu ábhó ɛrɨ́tí bɛtɨk amɛm batɨ yɛka andɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ bhɔ kpátɛ mpok anɛ yi ánaŋa bhɔ ndu nywɔp ɛnɛn Yesu Kristo ápɛtnsɛm.
50001007	Ɛ́chí ɛrɨ́rɨ́ bɛ́ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyǔ bakaysi amɛn ákʉ̀ nɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛka nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák. Ɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ nkɔŋ be tontó nɛ ntí bɛ be mankɛm bǎchɛm mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn. Mandɛm atɔŋ mɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi ndǔ áchyɛ́ mɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhi nkʉ́. Bǎchɛm mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ nɛ́nɛ, ɛnɛ́ nchí mǔkɛnɔŋ, nɛ mpok anɛ nchí nyaka ndǔ mmʉɛ́t ɛya nte nɔkɔ ndu áchá manyé bɛtɔŋ bɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ achí tɛtɛp, nɛ bɛkʉ bo mánóko yɔ sayri.
50001008	Ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ mbɔ̌ŋ nɛ bhe ɛ́fǔ ntá Yesu Kristo. Mbɔŋ Mandɛm arɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ.
50001009	Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm bɛ́ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ batɨ ɛ́ngó ɛ́ndɔ́k nɔ́kɔ́ chí ambɨ. Nɛ bɛ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ mǎndɔ́k nɔ́kɔ́ chí ambɨ, mǎndɨŋɨ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
50001010	Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ mǎnkóŋó chí ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́rɨ́ ɛ́chá bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bakwap nɛ bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bo bákwày bɛji bhe. Bák ká chi ɛnyu yɔ kpatɛ ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn Kristo átwɔ̀.
50001011	Mǎnáŋ mǎmbák ɛnyu ɛyɔ, Yesu Kristo ǎkʉ mǎmbɔ́ŋ ɛrɨ́tí ɛpɨŋ. Kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ ká chí bɛyǎ bɛrɨ bɛ́ bo mángɔ́ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ mánchyɛ nɔkɔ Mandɛm kɛnókó nɛ mándɛm nɔkɔ bɛ́, “Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ achá.”
50001012	Bɔ̌ma, mɛ̌yáŋ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fákárí nɛ mɛ fá, ɛ́kwak Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu ándɔ́k chí ambɨ.
50001013	Ɛ́kʉ kpát batɛmɛ́ nɛnu mankɛm abhɛn bábhàbhɛri ɛ́kírí Mfɔ Rom nɛ bo báchák mankɛm, bárɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɛ̌ti nchí nkoŋo Kristo kɛ̌ báfyɛ́ mɛ fá amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ, “Mbɔ mǔkɛnɔŋ.”
50001014	Nɛ nɛfyɛ́ báfyɛ́ mɛ fá mbɔ mǔkɛnɔŋ ákʉ́ bɛyǎ bǒnkwɔ básɨkɨntɨ nɛ Yesu Acha sayri, kpatɛ bághàti bho báchák Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm kɛbhɔ́ŋ bɛcháy.
50001015	Ɛ́chí tɛtɛp bɛ́ nɛyɨŋɨ anɛ mbɔk ɛyap báyɨ̀ŋɨ mɛ nɛ amɨ́k abʉ́abʉ nɛ nɛyɛnti bɔ́ báyɛ̀nti mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ kɛ̌ ákʉ́ bɔ́ bághàti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo, kɛ mbɔk báchi abhɛn bághàti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nɛ ɛrɨ́tí nkaysi.
50001016	Bɔ́ bhɔ bághàti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nɛ ɛrɨ́tí nkaysi ndu bákɔ́ŋ mɛ. Bákɔŋ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ bɔ́ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ Mandɛm ayap mɛ nɛ ákʉ́ bɛ mbák fá amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ mbɔ mǔkɛnɔŋ chí ndu bɛkʉ bo mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ achí tɛtɛp.
50001017	Kɛ mbák chí bǒ abhɛn báyɨ̀ŋɨ mɛ nɛ amík abʉ́abʉ, mánjɛnti nɔkɔ mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ, bɔ́ bághàti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo chí mbɔnyunɛ mánù bɛ́chá mɛ. Bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ ɛrɨ́tí nkaysi. Báyàŋ bɛbay mɛ chí batú áchák antí nɛ́nɛ, fá amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
50001018	Kɛ yɛ̌ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́pú arɛ́. Yɛ̌ bábhɔŋ chí ɛrɨ́tí nkaysi yɛ̌ bábhɔŋ chí nkaysi mbʉ́mbʉ, nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ chí bɛ́ bo bághòk Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo. Ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ̀ mɛ maŋák.
50001019	Mpú rɔ bɛ́bhɔŋ maŋák mbɔnyunɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ be mǎnɨk Mandɛm mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti ya nɛ bɛ́ ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Yesu Kristo, chɔŋ mámfɛrɛ mɛ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ.
50001020	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌yaŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna nɛ ntɨ ɛna nɛnkɛm nɛ ɛnɛ́ mbákántɨ arɛ́ chi bɛ nkɛ́ kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ ntíánwɔ́p ánkɛm mɛ. Mɛ̌yàŋ chi bɛ mbɔ́ŋ nɛtaŋántɨ mpoknkɛm bɛ nɛ́nɛ, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ndǔ mpok anɛ átwɔ̀ ambɨ, nɛtaŋántɨ ɛna nɛ́nchyɛ́ Kristo kɛnókó, yɛ̌ ngǔgú, yɛ̌ nchí chí nɛpɛ́m.
50001021	Ntá ya, bɛbhak nɛpɛ́m chí bɛ́chyɛ Kristo kɛnókó, kɛ bɛ́gu arɨ mbɔŋ achá.
50001022	Kɛ mbák ndɔ́k ambɨ bɛbhak nɛpɛ́m fá amɨk, ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ̀ mɛ mbi bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Kristo ndu bɛkwak bo. Chɔŋ nsɔt yɛ chí nɛpɛ́m kɛ nɛwú-e? Ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́páy, ɛ́chá mɛ ɛnɛ́ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛsɔt.
50001023	Mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́páy bɛ́chí mɛ antɨ nɛ nchí mbɔ mmu anɛ áchí ndǔ manyé mbi kɛrɨŋɨ mbi anɛ yí ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkoŋo. Mpok nɛ mpok, nchí bhɔ́ŋ nkaysi bɛ ɛ́rɨ bɛ mbák nɛpɛ́m, kɛ mbɔ̌ŋ ntɨ bɛ́rɔŋ bɛbhak nɛ Kristo, nɛ ɛyɔ kɛ̌ ɛ́rɨ́ ntá ya ɛ́chá.
50001024	Kɛ ɛ̌ti yɛká, ɛ́rɨ bɛ́ mbák nɛpɛ́m.
50001025	Nɛ tɛ̌ndu ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ ɛ́rɨ bɛ manywɔp ɛya ándɔ́k ambɨ ɛ̌ti yɛká, ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ chɔŋ mbak nɛpɛ́m, ndɔk ambɨ bɛbhak nɛ bhe ndu bɛ́kwák mǎmbɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu ɛ́nchá ɛnyu ɛsɨ́, bɛ́ maŋák amɛká anjá ancha.
50001026	Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ yɛ bɛ́ mpok mpɛ́t nchí pɛtnsɛm ntá yɛká, ntí ámbák anɛ be bǎbhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ maŋák ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Yesu Kristo ákʉ́ ntá ya.
50001027	Nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ achí bɛ bapɛm ayɛka ámbák mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo ághàti bhe. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ yɛ̌ ntwɔ́ awu ntá yɛká, yɛ̌ mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ́, mɛ̌yáŋ ngók chí bɛ́ bǎté kpirí ndǔ nkaysi amɔt, nɛ bɛ́ mǎnu nɛ ntɨ ɛnɛká nɛ́mɔ́t bɛ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo ándɔ́k ambɨ.
50001028	Bǎkɛ́ cháy bǒ abhɛn bápábhɛ́ bhe. Mánáŋ mángɔ́ bɛ bǎpú chay bhɔ bárɛ̀m bɛ, “Ɔ́e! Bácha bhɛsɛ. Mandɛm ǎtɛmsi chɔŋ bhɛsɛ.” Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ Mandɛm ǎpɛmɛ chɔŋ bhe.
50001029	Ɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ mǎmbák bakoŋo Yesu Kristo puyɛ̌ chí ndiɛrɛ ndu mɛnoko yí, kɛ ndu bɛghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ̌ti yi nkwɔ.
50001030	Nɛ́nɛ, bǎkwáy bɛchɛm mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ ndu mɛnu nkúbhɛ́ nɛnu ɛnɛn mɛ̌nù nyaka ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo, nɛ bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ mbʉɛ́t ndǔ nɛnu ɛnɛn fá amɛm ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ nchí arɛ́ mbɔ mǔkɛnɔŋ.
50002001	Mɛ, ndɨ́ŋɨ́ sayri bɛ́ tɛ̌ndu bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo, yí afyɛ́ bhe ntɨ ndǔ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ yí ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ bhe. Nɛ tɛ̌ndu bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ, ǎkʉ bɛ́ mǎnkɔ́ŋ batɨ, mǎntɔŋ bɔ́ bɛrɨ̌ndu.
50002002	Nchí ghati yɛ bhe bɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ nkaysi amɔt, mǎmbɔ́ŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ, mǎmbak ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔ́t ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ nɛ ntɨ nɛ́mɔ́t. Mbák mǎnkʉ́ nɔ́, maŋák ama ǎyá ancha.
50002003	Bǎkɛ́ kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ndu bɛtɔŋ mmʉɛt bɛ́ bǎchá batɨ, kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛsɛptimʉɛt ntá batɨ mbɔ bɛ bɔ́ báchá yi.
50002004	Mmu ywɛka ákɛ́ yɨŋɨ chi ndiɛrɛ mmʉɛt yi. Abhɔŋ bɛ́fyɛ́ ntí nɛ batɨ nkwɔ.
50002005	Bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛka bɛbhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛnyu ɛ́mɔt mbɔ ɛnɛ Yesu Kristo ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka.
50002006	Yɛ̌ndu yi achí nyaka ɛnyu ɛ́mɔt mbɔ mbɔŋ Ɛta Mandɛm ndǔ babhi ankɛm, abhɨ́kɨ́ kɛ́m kɨ́kɨ́rɨ́k bɛ́ yi achi Mandɛm.
50002007	Akʉ mmʉɛt mbɔ bɛ apu yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Asɔt mmʉɛt mbɔ nsɛm, atwɔ́ fá amɨk mbɔ nkwǎŋwaŋ.
50002008	Nɛ átwɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ fá amɨk mbɔ nkwǎŋwaŋ, arɔk ambɨ bɛ́sɛ́pti mmʉɛt amɨk anchyɛ nɔkɔ Mandɛm kɛnókó, kpatɛ agú nɛwú ntíánwɔ́p ndǔ ɛkotákátí.
50002009	Ɛ̌ti yɔ, Mandɛm akósí yí áchyɛ́ yí bɛtaŋ amfǎy mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm, achyɛ yi nnyɛ́n kɛnókó ɛnɛ́n nɛ́chá manyɛ́n ankɛm.
50002010	Mandɛm akʉ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ ndu bɛchyɛ nnyɛ́n Yesu kɛnókó bɛ bǒ abhɛn báchi amfay nɛ abhɛn báchí fá amɨk, nɛ abhɛn báchí ndǔ ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap abhɔŋ bɛ́tɛ́p mánɛ́n bɛsí Yesu anchyɛ yí kɛnókó.
50002011	Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛrɛm kpoŋoroŋ bɛ chi Yesu Kristo kɛ achi Mfɔ bo mankɛm. Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ bɛ bo mánchyɛ́ Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ́ bakak nɛ kɛnókó.
50002012	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, Mandɛm apɛ́mɛ́ bhe. Bǎghók yɛ ɛnyǔ Kristo ásɛ́ptímʉɛt bɛsí Mandɛm. Bǎghók nyaka mɛ mpok nchí nɛ bhe. Nɛ́nɛ, ndǔ mpɛ́t mpú nɛ bhe, bǎkɛ́ gʉɛ́p ɛyɔŋ ɛyá ɛbhɨ. Ghók ká mɛ ɛ́nchá ɛnyu ɛsɨ́. Nu ká bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎkwáy bɛkʉ ndu bɛ́chyɛ́ Mandɛm kɛnókó nɛ batɨ ayɛká ankɛm. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ́ Mandɛm ámbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛkʉ bapɛm ayɛka ambak mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi áyàŋ.
50002013	Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm achi nɛ bhe mpoknkɛm nɛ ǎkwàk bhe bɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ ntɨ bɛ́ghok yi, anchyɛ nɔkɔ be bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi áyàŋ mǎnkʉ.
50002014	Kʉ ka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ kɛnywinti ansɛm nɛ batɨ, nɛ bǎkɛ bhak bɛyɔŋ bɛyɔŋ.
50002015	Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu akɛ ji bhe nɛ bɛ bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ bakwap bɛsí Mandɛm. Ɛ́kʉ nkwɔ bɛ be bɔ̌ Mandɛm abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ nɛ́ntɨ́ bǒ abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛpɔ̌ bɛpɨŋ, mǎmbák mbɔ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ntá yap.
50002016	Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ́kwàk bo mámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m. Ghatí nɔ́kɔ́ ká yɔ ntá bho. Bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ nɔ bɛ mbɔ́ŋ maŋák ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn Kristo ápɛ̀tnsɛm, nɛ bɛ ntiɛt anɛ́ njɛ́rɛ́ nɛ́ntɨ́ ɛnɛka nɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn nkʉ́, bɛ́kɛ́ bhak ndɛ́ndɛm.
50002017	Bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ̀ ndǔ bǎbhɔŋɔ nɛka nɛ Yesu bɛ́chí mbɔ nnya anɛ básɔ́rɛ́ bɛchyɛ akap ntá Mandɛm mbɔ akap. Yɛ̌ ɛmbak chi bɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛna nɛ́rɔ̀ŋ mbɔ mmɛ́m amɛn bátò amfay nnya yɔ, mɛ̌bhák chi maŋák, nɛ nchí ŋák nɛ bhe mankɛm.
50002018	Bě nkwɔ́ bǎbhɔŋ bɛbhak maŋák. Ŋák ká nɛ mɛ.
50002019	Mbák chí nkaysi Yesu Kristo Acha bɛ́ ntó Tímɔti awu ntá yɛká, chɔŋ ntó yi mandú mpok. Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́nchyɛ nkwɔ mɛ maŋák mpok yi áfú awu ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ntá ya, ághátí mɛ ɛnyǔ bǎchí awu.
50002020	Mɛ, mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ yɛ̌ mmu mbɔ yi anɛ ákway bɛkwak be ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́yɨ́ŋí nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka, bɛ mǎmfyɛ́ mɛ ntɨ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ Yesu Kristo.
50002021	Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ bo báchák mankɛm bákàysi chi ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛyɨŋɨ ɛnap nɛpɛ́m, kɛfyɛ́ ntí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛyɨŋɨ Yesu Kristo.
50002022	Kɛ be babhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ Tímɔti átɔ́ŋ bɛ achi ɛrɨ́tí nkʉbɛtɨk Yesu Kristo Acha nɛ mǔbɛtok bo bachak nɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛnkɛm. Akwak mɛ bɛ́gháti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu mbɔ mmɔ́ anɛ ákòŋo ɛ́táyi ansɛm bɛkʉ bɛtɨk.
50002023	Nnáŋ ngɔ́ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chí ɛbhe ɛya, chɔŋ mbɔŋ nkaysi bɛto yi awu ntá yɛka.
50002024	Nɛ nsɨkɨ ntɨ bɛ́ chɔŋ Yesu Acha ankʉ bɛ mɛ nkwɔ ntwɔ awu mandú mpok.
50002025	Nnáŋ nkʉ ntɨ bɛ ɛ́chí sayri bɛto Ɛpafrodáytɔs ámpɛ́tnsɛm awu ntá yɛka. Ɛpafrodáytɔs mmu bǎtó bɛ ántwɔ́ ankwak mɛ mɛnu mbɔ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu ndu bɛtɨk Yesu chí nkoŋo Yesu nkwɔ́ mbɔ mɛ.
50002026	Mɛ́tò yi ampɛtnsɛm ntá yɛka, mbɔnyunɛ abhɔŋ ɛ́kwak bɛghɔ bhe mankɛm ndu bǎghókó nyaka bɛ yi ǎmè.
50002027	Bɛrɛm tɛtɛp, ǎme nyaka, kpát ɛ́rɔ́p chí nɛwú, kɛ Mandɛm aghɔ́ yi ntínso. Nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ chí yi aywǐnti ntínso, aghɔ mɛ nkwɔ ntínso. Mbɔ abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ nɔ, mbʉ basɛ́mɛ́ ma aya acha.
50002028	Mbɔŋ yɛ ɛkwak nɛ́nɛ ncha ɛnyu ɛsɨ́ bɛto yi ampɛtnsɛm antɛmɛri bhe awu bɛ mǎngɔ yi batɨ ámpɔ́p be amɛm nɛ bɛ basɛ́mɛ́ ma nkwɔ ámay.
50002029	Sɔt yɛka yí nɛ bɛyǎ maŋák mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛsyɛpti ntɨ nkoŋo Yesu. Chiɛ̌ ká yi kɛnókó, mǎnchyɛ kɛnókó ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achák anɛ áchí mbɔ yi.
50002030	Chiɛ́ ká yi kɛnókó mbɔnyunɛ ntí ywi áyaŋá rɔŋ ɛ̌ti bɛtɨk Kristo. Chiɛ̌ ká yi kɛnókó nɛ ntí bɛ́ be kɛ bǎtó yi antwɔ tɛ fá ankwak mɛ tɛ̌ndu be babhɔŋ bǎpú kway nyaka bɛ́twɔ.
50003001	Bɔ̌ma, ndu bɛrɔŋ ambɨ, yɛ̌ yí yɛ̌ yi, bɔ́ŋ ká maŋák ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Acha ákʉ́. Yɛ̌ndu nchí ghati bhe chí nkúbhɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn njámbɨ ngati bhe, ɛyɔ ɛ́pú chyɛ mɛ ɛsɔŋɔri tɛ̌ndu ɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ bǒmpap bákɛ́ bhɔŋ mbi nɛ bhe.
50003002	Sɔt ka mpok nɛ bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ, mmú ɛyɔ nɔ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ bábhɔŋ bɛkpɔt mmʉɛt mbakanɛm kɛ ambak mmu Mandɛm, ɛnɛ́ ɛyɔ ɛ́twɔ̀ chi nɛ ɛsɔŋɔri.
50003003	Bɛsɛ́ kɛ sɛ́chí bo Mandɛm tɛtɛp, yɛ̌ndu bábhɨ́kɨ́ syɛp bhɛsɛ. Sɛ́chí bo Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ kɛ ákwàk bhɛsɛ sɛ́nɨ́kmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm. Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ fyɛ nti ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmǔ mmɨk ághɔ́kɔ́ mmʉɛt arɛ́ mbɔ ɛpɨŋ bɛsyɛp babhakanɛm. Sɛ́pànyu chi ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Yesu Kristo ákʉ́ ndu bɛ́pɛ́mɛ bhɛsɛ.
50003004	Ɛchi tɛtɛp bɛ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kwáy bɛ́ghɔ́kɔmʉɛt arɛ́. Mbɔ ɛchi bɛ mmu abhɔŋ bɛghɔkɔ mmʉɛt chi ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀, mbʉ mbɔŋ bɛdɛp awɔ́ antɨ bɛ ɛya ɛnyu ɛcha ɛnɛ batɨ.
50003005	Bɛ́kóŋo bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛsɛ bo Israɛl, básyɛp mɛ mpok bábhe mɛ. Nchí mmǔ ɛtɔk Israɛl, ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Bɛnjamin. Bachǐmbɨ bha chí bo Israɛl. Bárɨ́ŋɨ bɛpɨŋ bo Israɛl nɛ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk bo Israɛl nkwɔ́. Nɛ nchí mmu nkwɔ Fárisi, bɔ bho báte kpirí bɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛbhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé bɔtayɛsɛ.
50003006	Nchí fyɛ nyaka bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nkáysí bɛ Mandɛm kɛ áyàŋ nkʉ bhɔ kpát, nchyɛ́ nɔkɔ Nkwɔ Kristo bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri. Nɛ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ kɛbhak nɛ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ nchí bhʉɛrɛ nyaka bɛbhé bo Israɛl mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛ́yàŋ.
50003007	Kɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ mɛnkɛm nyaka nkáysí bɛ́ bɔ́ kɛ bɛ́kʉ̀ mɛ́mbak mmu Mandɛm, bɛ́rɔp chí bɛpɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ntá ya ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Kristo akʉ ntá ya.
50003008	Bɛ́rɛ́m tɛtɛp, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák ɛ́rɔp chi mbɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mfɛ́rɛ́ ndu áchwí nto anyɛ́n bɛ ntí wa ándɔp mɛ̌mbát mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo. Bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ Yesu Kristo Acha wa achá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna nɛ́nɛ. Ɛ̌ti mɛ́yàŋ bɛrɔp nɛ Yesu, mfɛ́rɛ́ ntí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛ́n nkáysí nyaka bɛ bɛ́kʉ̀ Mandɛm ámpɛ́mɛ́ mɛ. Nɛ bɛ́rɔp ntá ya chi mbɔ mɛ́nyɨ́ŋ ɛbhɛn bátó ndǔ ɛbhwɔ́rɛ́ mɛnyɨŋɨ́.
50003009	Nchí yaŋ bɛ mbát mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu sayri. Puyɛ̌ chí ɛ̌ti mɛ̌bhʉ̀ɛrɛ bɛbhé bo Israɛl kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ bɛ mbák chak bɛsí bhi. Ɛ̌ti nɛka ɛnɛ nɛ Kristo kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ bɛ́ mbák chák bɛsí bhi.
50003010	Nchí yaŋ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ Kristo ndɔ́k nɔ́kɔ́ chí ambɨ, nɛ nchí yaŋ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ásɔ́rɛ́ nyaka ákʉ́ Yesu ápɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Nchí yaŋ mbat mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu, nka ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔ yi, nchɛm mmʉɛt nɛ yi ndǔ nɛwú ɛni. Nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt bɛsí Mandɛm, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka kpát aka nɛwú
50003011	bɛ́ mbák Mandɛm ánkwák, mɛ nkwɔ́, mpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m mbɔ Yesu.
50003012	Mpú rɛm nɔ́ chi bɛ nnáŋ ngaka ɛnyu mmu anɛ mɛ́yàŋ bɛbhak, nɛ mpú rɛm nɔ chi bɛ nnáŋ nsɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ mbi Mandɛm. Kɛ nchí nu ndɔk nɔkɔ chí ambɨ, bɛ́ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkwak mɛ mbak ɛnyu mmu Yesu Kristo áyàŋ nyaka bɛ mbak mpok yi ayabhɛ mɛ bɛ́ mbák mmǔ ywi.
50003013	Bɔ̌ma, mpú yɨŋɨ mmʉɛ́t ɛya bɛ́ nnáŋ nnu kpát nsɔt awɔ́nɛm, mbɔ̌ŋ akap. Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔ́t ɛnɛ mɛ̌kʉ̀ chí bɛ njɛt ntiɛt, mfɛ́rɛ́ ntí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛfʉɛrɛ ansɛm, ndɔbhɛ jɛt ndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ.
50003014	Mpú rɔ bɛ́fyɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ́ njɛt téé tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti, mbɔ́ŋ nsáy. Nsáy yɔ achí bɛ Mandɛm abhɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ ntwɔ bɛ mbak amfay nɛ yi ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo mmu ágú ɛ̌ti ya.
50003015	Ɛ́rɨ bɛ bɛsɛ bakoŋo Yesu bho sɛ́náŋ sɛ́sɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ mbi Mandɛm, sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ nkaysi amɔt ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn. Nɛ mbák mmu achí anɛ ayi nkaysi achi nyáŋá, chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ yí angɔ bɛ nkaysi ya ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn achi ɛrɨ́tí nkaysi.
50003016	Yɛ̌yi yɛ̌yi, sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ bɛrɨŋɨ tɛtɛp anɛ Mandɛm ákʉ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́.
50003017	Bɔ̌ma, Koŋó nɔ́kɔ́ ká ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛya nɛ fyɛ́ ká amɨ́k amʉɛt bo abhɛn bákòŋo bɛkaká nɛkɔ ɛbhɛsɛ. Bǎrɨŋɨ ndǔ bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛsɛ bɛchi nyaka mpok sɛ́chí awu nɛ bhe.
50003018	Nchí ghati bhe bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ rɔ bɛkoŋo bɛkaká nɛkɔ ɛbhɛsɛ mbɔnyunɛ bɛyǎ bho bachi abhɛn bɛpɨŋ ɛbhap bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ bɔ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ árɛ̀m bɛ́ Kristo agu ndǔ ɛkotákátí ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ. Nnáŋ nchí ghati nɔkɔ bhe ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mpok nɛ mpok, nɛ nɛ́nɛ, mpɛt nchí ghati bhe nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́rɛ́ nɛ babhɛsɛ amɨ́k.
50003019	Ngwɛnti yap chi mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́. Mandɛm awap chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fʉɛ̀t bɔ anyu ɛ́nchwe bɔ mɛniɛ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chák ɛbhɛn bɔ báfyɛ̀ ngoŋo arɛ́. Bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bághɔ̀ mámbɔ́ŋ chí ntíánwɔ́p, yɛ̌ nɔ, bɔ́ babhɔŋ bápànyu ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ. Nɛ bábhʉrɛ batɨ yap ndǔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk.
50003020	Kɛ mbák chí bhɛsɛ, ɛyɛsɛ́ ɛtɔk ɛ́chí amfay, ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ Yesu Kristo Acha achi. Nɛ sɛ́bhaka ntɨ bɛ́ yí mmu áchí Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ́ ámfú arɛ́ ámpɛtnsɛm.
50003021	Yí ánáŋ ántwɔ́, ǎsɔt nkúbhɛ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mbák antɛn yi, anjibhiri mmʉɛ́rɛ́ ntɔp ɛyɛsɛ-nɛ, ankʉ yɔ́ ɛ́ndɔp chí mbɔ mmʉɛt anɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka mpok Mandɛm ákʉ́ yí apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
50004001	Bɔ̌ma, nkɔŋ be tontó nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛghɔ bhe mbɔnyunɛ be kɛ̌ bǎchí maŋák ama, nɛ be kɛ̌ bǎchí nsáy bɛtɨk ɛbha. Tě yɛka kpirí, mǎnkʉ nɔkɔ mbɔ ɛnyu ngátí be bho bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu.
50004002	Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Ɛyódia nɛ Sintíke bɛ́ mándɔ́ bɛgwá ɛbhap mámbák ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔ́t, tɛ̌ndu bɔ́ bati apay báchí bǒ Yesu Kristo Acha.
50004003	Nɛ wɔ ɛrɨ́tí ntɨ nkʉbɛtɨk wa, nchí yáŋ nkwɔ́ bɛ ɔ́nkwák mɛ́nyúrɛ́ bághɔrɛ́ abhɛn bati apay bɛ́ mámbák ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt. Bákʉ́ bɛyǎ bɛtɨk nɛ mɛ ndu mɛ́nu bɛ́gháti bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́. Bákʉ́ bɛtɨk nɛ Klɛ́mɛn, nɛ batɨ̌ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abha báchák. Bɔ́ mankɛm báchí bo Mandɛm ásɨ́ŋɨ́ manyɛ́n ayap amɛm ɛkáti manyɛ́n bǒ abhɛn bábhɔ̀ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
50004004	Bák ká maŋák mpoknkɛm bɛ bǎchí bǒ Yesu Acha. Mbʉɛ́t bɛ́sɛ́mti bhe, bák ká maŋák mpoknkɛm.
50004005	Kʉ ka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ángɔ́ bɛ́ bǎpú mmʉɛt gum gum ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka. Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ Yesu Acha ǎpɛ̀tnsɛm mandú mpok.
50004006	Mmu ákɛ́ rɔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́nsɔ́ŋɔ́rí ntɨ ɛni amɛm. Yɛ̌yi yɛ̌yi, ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ chí mɛnɨk nɔ́kɔ́ mmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎyàŋ yi ánchyɛ́ bhe. Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt, mǎnkaka nɔkɔ yí ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́.
50004007	Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm nɛ chɔŋ yi anchyɛ bhe kpák. Nɛ ɛnyu kpák anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ̀, bǒ mmɨk bápú kwáy bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ wáwák. Nɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ kpák ámbák amɛm batɨ yɛka, ankʉ bɛ kpák ámbák nkwɔ́ ndǔ nkaysi yɛká, bɛ yɛ̌yi yɛ̌yi, bǎkɛ bhɔŋ bɛcháy. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́chí tɛtɛp mbɔnyunɛ bǎbhat mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo.
50004008	Nɛ́nɛ, bɔ̌ma, bʉrɛ́ ká nkaysi ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɨ́, nɛ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́chyɛ̀ mmu kɛnókó, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí chak bɛsí Mandɛm, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bakwap, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bo bághɔ̀ mánkɔŋ, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bo bábhɔ̀ŋ ɛkwak bɛghɔ, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́rɨ́ bɛ́chá, nɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́kʉ̀ bo mámbɨti bhe.
