50004009	Bǎkɛ́ rɔ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎghɔ́kɔ́ ntá ya, nɛ ndu bɛ́kóŋo yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nkaysi anɛ áfú ndǔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ́ bǎsɔrɛ ntá ya, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎghókó ntá ya, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎghɔ́ mɛ́ nkʉ. Nɛ chɔŋ kpák anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ ambak nɛ bhe.
50004010	Mɛ mmǔ Yesu Kristo Acha, mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ maŋák bɛ yɛ̌ndu ɛ́náŋ ɛ́tárɛ́, bǎpɛt bǎtɔ̀ŋ ndǔ akap anɛ bǎtó mɛ bɛ bǎbhɨkɨ ghɔkɔntɨk mɛ. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ bǎkaysi mɛ mpoknkɛm, kɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nyaka chi mbi bɛkwak mɛ.
50004011	Mpú rɛm nɔ́ chi ɛ̌ti nchɛ́bhɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ. Yɛ̌ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ, yɛ̌ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ, ngɔk bɛbhak mbɔ mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ chɛp yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
50004012	Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyǔ mɛ̌kwáy bɛbhak mbɔ mmu anɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́pú sɔŋɔri yí mpok mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chɛ́bhɛ́ mɛ́ nɛ yɛ̌ chí mpok mbɔ́ŋɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. Yɛ̌ ɛ́mbak bɛ́ yi, ngɔk bɛbhak mbɔ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mpǒknkɛm, yɛ̌ chí mpok nnyiɛ́ njwí, nɛ mpok anɛ nchɔkɔ nsay, nɛ yɛ̌ mbɔ́ŋ, yɛ̌ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ.
50004013	Yɛ̌ ɛ́mbak bɛ yi, mɛ̌tee kpɨrí ɛ̌ti bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu áchyɛ̀ mɛ.
50004014	Kɛ nkáká bhé tontó bɛ́ bǎchɛm amɔ nɛ mɛ ndǔ nɛkwak ɛnɛ́n bǎchyɛ́ mɛ́ mpok mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́táŋá mɛ amʉɛt.
50004015	Nɛ be bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn ɛtɔk Fílipi, be babhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ sayri bɛ mpok njámbɨ ntwɔ́ awu nɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ndɔ ɛtɔk ɛyɛka atú Masidónia ndɔk atú ɛtɔk ɛchak, ndiɛrɛ be kɛ̌ bǎtó nyaka mɛ nkáp ndu bɛ́chyɛ mɛ nɛkwak. Yɛ̌ bǒnkwɔ báchák bábhɨ́kɨ́ chɛm amɔ nɛ mɛ ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn mɛ́kʉ̀.
50004016	Nchí rɛm nɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ chí mpok anɛ nchí ɛtɔk Tɛsalónika ɛnɛ́ mbɨ́kɨ́re rɔ atú ɛtɔk ɛyɛká Masidónia, be bǎtó mɛ nkáp, puyɛ̌ chí ndɔŋ amɔt, kɛ ndɔŋ ɛ́páy, mpok mɛnyɨŋ bɛtaŋa mɛ amʉɛt.
50004017	Mpú rɛm nɔ́ chí bɛ mɛ́yàŋ mǎntó mɛ́ akap áchák. Ɛnyɨŋ mɛ̌yáŋ chí bɛ́ mǎndɔ́k ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛrɨ, mɛ́máka ndǔ ɛbhɛ́n mǎnáŋ bǎkʉ́ ansɛm mbɔ mmǔ anɛ ámàka nkáp ndǔ anɛ́ yí ánáŋ áyámbɨ afyɛ́ amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́nkap bɛ nsáy yi ánja.
50004018	Be bǎkap mɛ ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbha kpát yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɔp. Nɛ́nɛ, bakáp anɛ bǎtó Ɛpafrodáytɔs ántwɔ́ ánchyɛ́ mɛ ákʉ́ mbɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ nchɛ́bhɛ́. Nɛ akap aywɛka áchí mbɔ akap ɛrítí ɛriɛp anɛ́ bǎchíɛ ntá Mandɛm, nɛ Mandɛm ǎbhɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ wu.
50004019	Mandɛm mmu nchí mmɔ̌bɛtok ywi abhɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́yá bɛ́chá. Nɛ chɔŋ anchyɛ bhe yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chɛ́bhɛ́ bhé ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Kristo ákʉ́ ntá yɛsɛ.
50004020	Kɛnókó kɛ́mbák nɛ Mandɛm mmu áchí Ɛ́táyɛsɛ́ mpoknkɛm. Amen.
50004021	Kaká ká bo Mandɛm báchák abhɛn báchí bakoŋo Yesu Kristo awu mankɛm ntá ya. Batɨ̌ bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn báchí fá Rom nɛ mɛ bátó nkwɔ bhe bakak.
50004022	Bǒ Mandɛm báchák mankɛm abhɛn báchí fá Rom nɛ mɛ, sayri sayri, abhɛn báchi bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk ntá mfɔ-ngo anɛ Rom, bátó nkwɔ bhe bakak.
50004023	Nchí nɨkmʉɛt bɛ́ bɛrɨ̌ndu Yesu Kristo Acha mɛ́mbak amɛm batɨ ayɛka. Amen.
51001001	Mɛ Pɔ̌l mǔnto Yesu Kristo bɛkoŋo nkaysi Mandɛm, kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí fá nɛ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ ywɛsɛ Tímɔti.
51001002	Sɛ́tò yɔ ntá yɛka bo Mandɛm, be batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ abhɛn bábhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp awu ɛtɔk Kɔlɔse nɛ Mandɛm abhat be nɛ Kristo. Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ ántɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu anchyɛ bhe kpák.
51001003	Sɛ́kàka Mandɛm mmu Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ achi Mɔ́ywi, nɛ sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛka,
51001004	mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́ghok bɛ bǎbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo nɛ bǎkɔŋ bo Mandɛm mankɛm.
51001005	Bǎkʉ̀ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ bǎbháká ntɨ ndǔ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ábhʉ́rɛ́ amfay ntá yɛka. Mpok bǎghókó Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ kɛ bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, nɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ achi tɛtɛp.
51001006	Mbok yɔ atwɔ ntá yɛka mbɔ ɛnyǔ átwɔ́ ntá bo mmɨk nkɛm nɛ ǎnyù kɛpɛm nɛ ágò. Nɔ kɛ yɔ achi nyaka ndǔ nkwɔ yɛka bɛbho ndu nywɔp ɛnɛn bǎghókó ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm nɛ bǎjwimɛm ɛnyu bɔ bɛchi tɛtɛp.
51001007	Bǎghók Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nɛ ntá Ɛpafras. Yi achi ntɨ mǔbɛtok Mandɛm anɛ sɛ́kɔ́ŋɔ́ tontó. Achi nkʉbɛtɨk Kristo anɛ ábhʉ̀ɛrɛ bariɛp ami. Achi awu ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛnɛsɛ.
51001008	Yi aghati bhɛsɛ ɛnyǔ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ákʉ́ bɛ mǎnkɔŋ batɨ.
51001009	Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔt mɛnɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛka bɛbho nywɔp ɛnɛn sɛ́ghókó nɔ. Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm amfʉɛt ntá Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ánkwak mǎndɨŋɨ sayri ɛnyiŋ ɛnɛ yi áyàŋ mǎnkʉ. Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ánkʉ nɔ ndu ákʉ mǎmbak barɨŋɨ́ndak bɛyɨŋɨ baraká Ɛfoŋo nɛ ndu akwak mǎmbɔŋ nɛjwǐmɛm ndu bɔ bɛchi. Achyɛ́ bhe nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak bɛ mǎndɨŋɨ sayri yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi atɨ́ nyaka bɛkʉ nɛ ǎkʉ̀ ntá bǒbhi.
51001010	Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ nɛjwǐmɛm ɛnɔ nɛ́nkwák mǎmbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́kwáy ntá nkoŋo Yesu Acha. Ɛnɔ nɛ́kʉ̀ Mandɛm ambɔŋ maŋák, nɛ nɛ́kwàk mǎnkʉ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛrɨ ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi, nɛ nɛ́kʉ̀ mǎndɨŋɨ Mandɛm mǎndɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ.
51001011	Nɛ sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ánsɔt bɛtaŋ ɛbhi ɛbhɛn bɛyǎ bɛcha ánkʉ mǎmbɔŋ nɔkɔ bɛtaŋ, bɛ yɛ̌yí yɛ̌yi, mǎmbɔŋ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́, mǎnte sɛnɛ́, mǎndɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ nɛ maŋák,
51001012	mǎnkaka nɔkɔ Ɛta. Yí kɛ ákʉ́ mǎnkwáy bɛbhɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi atoŋti ntá bǒbhi abhʉɛrɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhi bɛ́ghɔ̀.
51001013	Afɛ́rɛ́ bhɛsɛ ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn ɛjuri, akʉ bɛ Mɔ́ywi mmu yi ákɔ́ŋɔ́ tontó ámbák wu Mfɔ ywɛsɛ.
51001014	Bɛ́fʉɛt ntá Mɔ́ywi wu sɛ́bhɔŋ mbi bɛ mánku bhɛsɛ mǎmfɛrɛ ndǔ kɛsɛm ɛkɛn bɛbʉ́, nɔ chi, mǎmfóŋórí bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ.
51001015	Yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛghɔ Mandɛm. Mɔ́ywi kɛ ákʉ́ sɛ́njwimɛm ɛnyu Mandɛm achi. Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mɔ̌mbɨ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt, nɔ kɛ Mɔ́ywi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfǎy mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ághókó.
51001016	Ɛchi nɔ mbɔnyunɛ yi kɛ Mandɛm árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ ángókó yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, ɛbhɛn bɛchi amfay nɛ ɛbhɛn bɛchi fá amɨk, ɛbhɛn bo bághɔ̀ nɛ ɛbhɛn bo bápú kway bɛghɔ, bɛtaŋtí bɛfóŋó, ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛtaŋ bɛcha bafɔ bachak nɛ bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn nɛŋɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛkap nɛcha ɛkɛn bachak, nɛ yɛ̌ chí ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfay bho mbɔ bafɔ. Bɛ́fʉɛt ntá yi, nɛ ntá yi, kɛ bághókó mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm.
51001017	Bápɛ́rɛ ghoko yɛ̌nyɨŋ, yi achi. Nɛ yi kɛ ákɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm bɛ mɛ́mbak mbɔ ɛnyu bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛbhak.
51001018	Yírɛ kɛ achi mǔnti anɛ bǒnkwɔ, nɛ bǒnkwɔ chi mmʉɛt yi. Yí kɛ ágháy nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́mɨk ntá bǒnkwɔ.
51001019	Ɛchi ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka maŋák bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyu mmu yi achi, Mɔ́ywi nkwɔ achi.
51001020	Nɛ yí kɛ Mandɛm ásɔ́rɛ́ bɛ ankʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, yɛ̌ chi ɛnɛ́ fá amɨk nɛ yɛ̌ chi ɛnɛ amfay, bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛpɛt bɛbhak ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt nɛ yi ɛ̌ti nɛwú Mɔ́ywi ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Nɛ́nɛ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́kwày bɛbhak ndu kpák ndu nté anɛ yɔ́ ɛchi nɛ Mandɛm.
51001021	Bě nkwɔ bǎchi nyaka nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ nɛ Mandɛm, bǎbhak bǒmpap abhi ndu nkaysi yɛka ɛ̌ti bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ̀ nyaka.
51001022	Kɛ Kristo asɔt nyaka mmʉɛt nkwǎŋwaŋ, agú ndǔ ɛkotákátí ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka. Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ bɛ mǎmpɛt mǎmbak ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt nɛ yi, bɛ mǎmbak nyáŋá, kɛbhɔŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛsí bhi.
51001023	Kɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ bɛbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, mǎnte sɛnɛ́ nɛ kpirí. Bǎkɛ́ rɔ nɛbhakántɨ ɛnɛn Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ákʉ́ bǎbhɔŋɔ mpok bǎghókó yɔ. Bághati Mbok anɛ ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu fá amɨk. Mɛ Pɔ̌l nchí mǔbɛtok anɛ nchí kʉ bo mándɨŋɨ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́-nɛ.
51001024	Nɛ́nɛ, mbɔŋ maŋák ndu bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn mɛ́bhɔ̀ŋ mbɔnyunɛ bɛ́kwàk bhe. Nchí bhɔŋ bɛsɔŋɔri ndǔ nkwɔmʉɛt mbɔnyunɛ nchí naŋa bɛbhɔŋ bɛsɔŋɔri mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bɛrɔbhɛ nyaka bɛ Kristo ámbɔ́ŋ, ɛ̌ti bǒnkwɔ. Bǒnkwɔ Kristo bhɔ chi mmʉɛt ɛyi.
51001025	Ɛ̌ti bǒnkwɔ kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ bɛ mbak mǔbɛtok ndu bɛkʉ mǎndɨŋɨ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm sayri.
51001026	Ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi nyaka bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ntá mkpaká bho ɛnɛ ɛ́fʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, kɛ nɛ́nɛ, Mandɛm akʉ bǒbhi mándɨ́ŋɨ́ yɔ.
51001027	Mandɛm áyàŋ nyaka bɛ bǒbhɔ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ɛnɛ yi átóŋtí abhʉrɛ chi nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛbhɔŋɔ bɛkwak bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl. Kristo achí amɛm batɨ yɛka, nɛ bǎkway bɛbhaka ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ mǎnyiɛ kɛnɛ́m ɛki nɛ yi.
51001028	Kristo ɛ́rɛ kɛ sɛ́ghàti bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi. Ndu sɛ́kʉ̀ nɔ, sɛ́yà batú yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛkʉ nɛ sɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ. Sɛ́sɛ̀mti bhɔ, nɛ sɛ́tɔ̀ŋ nɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak nɛnkɛm bɛ́ sɛ́nkwáy bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ánkwáy ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi, mbɔ mmu anɛ ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo, ndǔ mpok anɛ sɛ́te bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ yi.
51001029	Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ nchí fyɛ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk, ndɛp nɔkɔ mmʉɛt nɛ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn Kristo áchyɛ̀ mɛ.
51002001	Nchí yaŋ mǎndɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ nchí nu tontó ɛ̌ti nkwɔ Kristo anɛ Laodísia nɛ ɛ̌ti bakwɔ́ bho bachak ankɛm, abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́re ghɔ mɛ.
51002002	Nchí yaŋ bɛfyɛ bhe ntɨ, ndǔ bǎgwɔ́rɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ batɨ ndu ɛkɔŋ. Nchí yaŋ bɛ be mankɛm nɛ bhɔ mǎnjwimɛm sayri ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo, bɛ mǎndɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti Kristo ɛbhɛn bɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ nɛ bɛ́kʉ̀ mǎmbɔŋ bɛyǎ áfɔ́k ndǔ bákòŋo mbi ywi.
51002003	Yí kɛ ánɛ̀nɛ mbi bɛ sɛ́mbák barɨŋɨ́ndak nɛ bɛ sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ. Nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn nɛ́rɨ nɛcha.
51002004	Nchí ghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ sɔt sɛ́rwɔrɛ́nyu ándwɔ bhe ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛyɨŋɨ Kristo, bɛ mǎnɛm ɛbhɨ.
51002005	Yɛ̌ndu mpú awu, ntɨ ɛna nɛchi nɛ bhe mpoknkɛm. Nkɔŋ bɛghok bɛ bǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́yàŋ nɛ bɛ bǎte kpirí ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Kristo.
51002006	Tɛ̌ndu bǎsɔ́rɛ́ bɛ Yesu Kristo achi Acha, bʉrɛ́ ká nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi áyàŋ.
51002007	Dɔ̌ ka bapɛ́m ayɛka ambak nɛ Yesu mbɔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ ɛ́mʉ́rɛ́ bakaŋ amɨk, mǎnsɛnɛ ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ yi nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bátɔ́ŋ be, mǎnchyɛ nɔ́kɔ́ Mandɛm bɛyǎ kɛnókó.
51002008	Sɔt ka mpok bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ sɔt nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn bǒ mmɨk nɛ sɛ́rwɔrɛ́nyu andwɔ be mǎmbák basɛm ntá mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bátɔ̀ŋ be. Ɛnyǔ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɔ nɛ́fù chi ndǔ nkaysi bakwǎŋwaŋ nɛ ntá bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛtaŋ fá amɨk, nɛ́pú fu ntá Kristo.
51002009	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ mmu Mandɛm achi, ɛnyuyɔ kɛ Kristo achi.
51002010	Ndǔ bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ yi, bǎjwi pɔɔt. Yi kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfǎy mɛnyǔ bɛfóŋó mɛnkɛm.
51002011	Ndǔ bǎchɛ́mɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo, afɛ́rɛ́ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛpɨŋ amɛm batɨ yɛka. Ɛyɔ chí ɛrɨŋ bɛtɔŋ bɛ bǎchi bǒbhi. Puyɛ̌ chi ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu afyɛ́ amʉɛt mpok báyaŋ bɛsyɛp yi mbɔ ɛnyǔ bo Israɛl bákʉ mpoknkɛm. Chí Kristo kɛ afyɛ́ ɛrɨŋ ɛyi amɛm batɨ ayɛka.
51002012	Mpok bájwítí bhe, bábhɛ́mɛ be nɛ Kristo. Bě nkwɔ bǎpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ yi mpok yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Ɛ́fákári nɔ mbɔnyunɛ bǎsɨkɨ nyaka ntɨ ndǔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm mmu ákʉ́ Kristo apɛtnsɛm ndu nɛpɛ́m.
51002013	Bǎchi nyaka chi bawú ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́re fyɛ nyaka be ɛrɨŋ amʉɛt bɛtɔŋ bɛ bǎchi bo Mandɛm. Kɛ achyɛ́ bhe nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ nɛ Kristo ndu áfóŋórí bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ mɛnkɛm.
51002014	Sɛ́kwɛn nyaka manyé bɛsí Mandɛm ndu sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi áyàŋ. Kɛ adákátí ɛkati manyé bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ, nɛ ɛ́bhak mbɔ bɛ ábáy nyaka bhɔ anti Yesu, nɛ bágó yi ndǔ ɛkotákátí nɛ bhɔ.
51002015	Afɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ ntá bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ fá amɨk, akʉ bɛ bɔ́ bɛ́kɛ́ bhɔŋ kɛnókó bɛsí bho ndǔ ású bhɔ́ amɨk. Atɔ́ŋ bhɔ mbɔ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bákɛ́mɛ́ ɛbhɨ̌nɛnu. Ɛbhɨ̌ nɛnu ɛyɔ ɛbhak nɛwú Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Asɔt awɔ́nɛm amfǎy bɛfóŋó ɛbhɔ ɛnyuyɔ bɛfʉɛt ndǔ nɛwú Kristo ndǔ ɛkotákátí.
51002016	Ndu ɛchi yɛ̌ nɔ, bǎkɛ́ rɔ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ánji be bɛ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́chí nɛ bhe ɛ̌ti mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mǎnyìɛ nɛ ɛbhɛn mǎnyù. Nɛ bǎkɛ́ rɔ bɛ mmu ampuri bhe mǎnkoŋo bɛbhé ɛ̌ti bɛpǎ mmyɛ́, nɛ ɛpǎ ntaŋ akɔ, nɛ ɛ̌ti ɛpǎ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt.
51002017	Bɛbhé ɛbhɔ mɛnkɛm bɛchi chi mbɔ ndɨ́kándi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ábhʉ́rɛ́ nyaka bɛ bɛ́twɔ chɔŋ. Mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi ansɛm ndɨ́kándi wu ankɛm chi Kristo yímbɔŋ.
51002018	Bǎkɛ́ rɔ yɛ̌ mmu ándɛ́m bɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ kway, ansɛt nkwɛrɛ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛbhɔŋ ɛnyǔ nɛsɛptímʉɛt ɛnɛn nɛ́pú tɛtɛp, nɛ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛchyɛ kɛnókó ntá bɔángɛl. Bǒbhɔ bápà bɛ Mandɛm ǎtɔ̀ŋ bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k anti fúú, nɛ báyòŋ mmʉɛt ndɛ́ndɛm. Nkaysi yap achí chí anɛ bǒ mmɨk.
51002019	Ɛkʉ bɔ bábhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhat mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo, mǔnti wap. Yí kɛ achi mbɔ ntí nɛ bǒnkwɔ bachi mbɔ mmʉɛt ɛyi. Básɔ̀t bɛtaŋ ɛbhap mɛnkɛm chi ntá yi nɛ ǎkʉ̀ bɔ mánchɛm mmʉɛt ndǔ nkwɔ amɔt mbɔ ɛnyǔ barɨŋ ákɛm byoŋómʉɛt. Bágò yɛ ndǔ mbi Mandɛm mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi áyàŋ.
51002020	Bǎgú nɛ Kristo, nɛ Mandɛm afɛ́rɛ́ bhe antɛn bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛtaŋ fá amɨk. Ndu ɛ́chí nɔ, ndaká yi bǎchi mbɔ bǒ mmɨk? Ndaká yí bǎbhʉɛt bɛkoŋo bɛbhé bǒ mmɨk, mbɔ ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ,
51002021	“Bǎkɛ́ kɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ nɛ awɔ. Yɛ̌ chi bɛghokoti, bǎkɛ́ ghokoti ɛnyǔ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɔ. Yɛ̌ bɛtɔk, bǎkɛ́ tɔk ɛnyǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ.”
51002022	Mɛnyǔ bɛbhé ɛbhɔ bɛ́fʉɛrɛ fʉɛt. Mɛnyǔ bɛbhé ɛbhɔ bɛ́fù chi ntá bǒ mmɨk nɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bátɔ̀ŋ.
51002023	Bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ bɛbhé ɛbhɔ, mmu ǎkway bɛkaysi bɛ bɛ́chyɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak mbɔnyunɛ bo abhɛn báfyɛ̀ bhɔ bátè kpɨrí bɛ mmu abhɔŋ bɛfyɛ mmʉɛt ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ Mandɛm ɛbhɔ, nɛ bárɛ̀m bɛ mmu abhɔŋ bɛsɛpti mmʉɛt amɨk, nɛ bɛ mmu abhɔŋ bɛchyɛ mmʉɛt yi bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri. Bɛbhe ɛbhɛn bɛchi chi ndɛ́ndɛm. Bɛ́pú kway bɛkwak mmu ambɔŋ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkɛm mmʉɛt bɛ ákɛ́ koŋo bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt ɛyi áyàŋ yi ankʉ.
51003001	Tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm ákʉ́ bǎfú ndǔ nɛwú bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ nɛ Kristo, bʉrɛ́ ká ntɨ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amfay, ɛbhak ɛnɛ Kristo áchɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt kɛnókó, ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm Mandɛm.
51003002	Bʉrɛ́ ka nkaysi chi ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amfay, puyɛ̌ ndǔ ɛbhɛn bɛchi fá amɨk.
51003003	Ɛchi mbɔ bɛ bǎgu mpok anɛ Yesu ágú. Nɛ́nɛ, nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ ɛnɛka nɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ awɔ́ Kristo ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi achi nɛ Mandɛm.
51003004	Nɛ mpok Kristo mmu achi nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ ábhèsi, chɔŋ be nkwɔ mǎmbesi nɛ yi nɛ mǎmbɔŋ ákɔ́rɛ́ ndu kɛnɛ́m ɛki.
51003005	Sǒ yɛ́ ka amɔ́ mǎmfɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́yɨ̀ŋɨ nɛpɛ́m nɛsɨ́ ɛnɛka. Nɔ chi ɛpúsí, nɛ yɛ̌ chí bɛpɔ̌ baraká kɛbhʉrɛ, nɛ mɛ́ŋwáka ndǔ baraká kɛbhʉrɛ, nɛ nkaysi bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́, nɛ yɛ̌chi bɛfyɛ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bo bachak mbɔnyunɛ bɛfyɛ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ chi bɛsɔt bhɔ mbɔ bɔmandɛm mmɨk.
51003006	Ɛ̌ti barak abʉ́abʉ yɔ kɛ Mandɛm ǎbè chɔŋ ntɨ, antɛmsi bho.
51003007	Ndǔ mpok anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, bǎkʉ nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mpok bachi ndǔ ɛsɨ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka.
51003008	Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ bɛběntɨ, nɛ ɛchoko-ntɨ, nɛ nkaysi bɛkʉ batɨ bɛbʉ́, nɛ bɛchɔŋti manyɛ́n batɨ, nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛkɛ fu be anyu.
51003009	Bǎkɛ́ sénse ntá batɨ tɛ̌ndu mǎnáŋ bǎrɔ ɛsɨ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɔ nɛ́tò nyaka be mǎnkʉ nɔkɔ,
51003010	nɛ bǎrɔbhɛ koŋo chi ɛpɨŋ ɛkɔ. Bǎyíbhírí bǎrɔp bǒ bakɔ nɛ bǎyìbhiri mǎndɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ mǎndɔbhɛ nɔkɔ mbɔ Mandɛm. Yi kɛ ághókó bhe mbɔ bǒ bakɔ bɛ mǎndɨŋɨ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi.
51003011	Ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ ɛnɛn, yɛ̌ mmu achi chi mmu Israɛl yɛ̌ mmu ɛtɔk ɛchak, yɛ̌ básyɛp mmu yɛ̌ bábhɨ́kɨ́ syɛp, yɛ̌ chi mmu anɛ amɨ́k ánɛ́nɛ́ yi yɛ̌ chi anɛ achi nyabhɨ, yɛ̌ chi nsɛm yɛ chi mɔ̌mɨk, mankɛm báchí ɛnyumɔt. Nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ chi Kristo nɛ yi achi amɛm batɨ bǒbhi mankɛm.
51003012	Mandɛm ayap be bɛ mǎmbak bǒbhi, bǎchi nyáŋá, nɛ akɔŋ be tontó. Ndu ɛchi nɔ, bǎbhɔŋ bɛghɔ batɨ ntínso, mǎntɔŋ bɔ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ nɛ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt, nɛ ɛpɨŋ bɛsɔt mɛnyɨŋ pɛtii, nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ.
51003013	Bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ nɛ batɨ, mǎndɔk ambɨ bɛfoŋori batɨ, yɛ̌ ɛ́mbak chi bɛ bákʉ mǎmbentɨ. Bǎbhɔŋ bɛfoŋori batɨ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu Acha ywɛsɛ áfóŋórí bhe.
51003014	Nɛ nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛcha ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtɔŋ batɨ chi bɛkɔŋ bhɔ. Ɛkɔŋ ɛ́gwɔ̀t mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ndǔ nsoŋ amɔt.
51003015	Dɔ̌ ká kpák anɛ Kristo áchyɛ̀ ántɔ́ŋ be ɛnyǔ bǎbhɔŋɔ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ be bɛ mǎmbak ndu mmʉɛt amɔt, nɛ bɛ kpák ambak nɛ bhe. Nɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛkaka Mandɛm ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀.
51003016	Dɔ̌ ká Ɛyɔŋ Kristo ɛ́mbɔŋ bɛtaŋ amɛm batɨ ayɛka. Tɔ́ŋ nɔ́kɔ́ ká batɨ ɛkɔŋ ɛyɔ, mǎnchyɛ nɔkɔ bhɔ maniɛ́, nɛ bɛyǎ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak. Kwáy nɔ́kɔ́ ka bakwáy anɛ áfù ndu Ɛkáti Bakway ɛnɛ ɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm, nɛ bakwáy Mandɛm achak, nɛ bakwáy anɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ afyɛ́ be antɨ. Kwáy nɔ́kɔ́ ka yɔ nɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm amɛm batɨ yɛka.
51003017	Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎkʉ̀, nɛ ɛnɛ́ bǎrɛ̀m, mǎnkʉ yɔ ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu Acha, mǎmfʉɛt ntá yi mǎnchyɛ nɔkɔ bakak ntá Ɛta Mandɛm.
51003018	Bě baghɔrɛ́ nɛ manɛ́m, sɛptí nɔ́kɔ́ ka mmʉɛt ntá manɛ́m abhɛka ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mbɔnyunɛ ɛyɔ kɛ ɛrɨ bɛsí Yesu Kristo Acha.
51003019	Manɛ́m, kɔŋ ka baghɔrɛ́ bhɛka, nɛ bǎkɛ́ bhak bɛbebɛbe nɛ bhɔ.
51003020	Bɔ, ghók nɔ́kɔ́ ka bachi nɛ manɔ bhɛka ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bághàti be mǎnkʉ, mbɔnyunɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ̀ Yesu Acha maŋák.
51003021	Bachǐ-bhɔ, bǎkɛ́ kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ bɔ̌bhɛka mambe ntɨ. Mbák mǎnkʉ nɔ, bákway bɛfɛrɛ amɔ.
51003022	Basɛm, ghók nɔ́kɔ́ ka bachi bhɛka abhɛn fá amɨk ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. Bǎkɛ́ kʉ nɔ chi ndiɛrɛ mpok anɛ amɨ́k ayap achi be amʉɛt, mbɔ bo abhɛn báyàŋ chi bɛchyɛ bhɔ maŋák. Ghók ká bhɔ nɛ batɨ ayɛka ankɛm mbɔnyunɛ bǎchyɛ̀ Mandɛm kɛnókó.
51003023	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn báchyɛ́ bhe, kʉ ka bhɔ nɛ batɨ ayɛka ankɛm tɛ̌ndu bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ bátòk nɔ chi Yesu Acha, puyɛ̌ nkwǎ.
51003024	Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ chɔŋ mǎmbɔŋ akap anɛ Yesu Acha ábhʉ́rɛ́ ntá bǒbhi. Chi Kristo Acha kɛ bátòk nɔ!
51003025	Dɔ́k ká ambɨ bɛkʉ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌agha anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́ ǎbhɔŋ nsáy ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi, nɛ Mandɛm ǎtaŋ bo kɛtɔ́ŋ kɛ́rɨ́ŋámík.
51004001	Bě abhɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ basɛm, kɛ́m ká bhɔ ɛrɨ́rɨ́ nɛ ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛchi chak. Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ be nkwɔ bǎbhɔŋ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ be amfay.
51004002	Tě ka kákátí ndǔ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt, mǎmbak pě, nɛ mǎnkaka nɔkɔ Mandɛm.
51004003	Nɨk nɔkɔ ka mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ nkwɔ bɛ Mandɛm ánɛ́nɛ́ bhɛsɛ mbi ndu bɛghati bho kpoŋoroŋ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo anɛ achi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́. Chi ɛ̌ti mɛ́ghàti bho yɔ kɛ nchí ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
51004004	Nɨk nɔkɔ ka mmʉɛt bɛ ngátí bho yɔ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ, ɛnyu ɛnɛ bághòk mánjwimɛm.
51004005	Ɛkaká nɛkɔ ɛyɛka ɛbhɔŋ bɛtɔŋ bɛ bǎchi barɨŋɨ́ndak bɛsí bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm, nɛ bǎkɛ́ chɔŋti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ bǎbhɔŋɔ mbi bɛghati bɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́.
51004006	Ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu ɛyɛka ɛbhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chyɛ̀ bo maŋák, ɛ́mbak mbɔ ɛnɛ́ mmu anɛ afyɛ́ ngaŋ anyu bɛ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyǔ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kɛ́mɛ bo abhɛn bábhɛ̀p be mɛnyɨŋ.
51004007	Chɔŋ Tíkíkɔs ángati bhe yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti ya. Achí manɔ nɛ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ anɛ nkɔ́ŋ tontó. Ǎkʉ̀ bɛtɨk nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt nɛ ǎtok Acha nɛ mɛ.
51004008	Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ ntó yi ntá yɛka bɛ ankʉ mǎndɨŋɨ ɛnyu sɛchi, nɛ bɛ ámfyɛ́ be ntɨ.
51004009	Ǎtwɔ̀ awu nɛ Ɔnɛ́simɔs, mmǔ ywɛka amɔt. Ɔnɛ́simɔs achi mmu tɛtɛp nɛ manɔ anɛ sɛ́kɔ́ŋɔ́ tontó. Chɔŋ bɔ mángati bhe yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fákárí fá.
51004010	Arístakɔs mmu achi fá ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ nɛ mɛ ǎtò be bakak. Mbák Mák manɔ Banábas mmu ngátí bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi ántwɔ́ awu, sɔt ka yí nɛ amɔ́ apay.
51004011	Nɛ Jísɔs anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Jɔ́stɔs ǎtò bhe bakak nkwɔ. Ndiɛrɛ bo Israɛl abhɛn bati arat kɛ bachi batɨ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk nɛ mɛ ndú bɛkʉ bo mándɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyu Mandɛm abhak nɛ bho mbɔ Mfɔ wap. Bɔ́ mankɛm báchyɛ̀ mɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ tontó.
51004012	Ɛpáfras nkwɔ ǎtò be bakak. Achi mmǔ ywɛka amɔt nɛ mǔbɛtok Yesu Kristo. Ǎnɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛka nɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛnkɛm mpoknkɛm bɛ mǎnsɛnɛ ndǔ mbi Mandɛm, nɛ bɛ mǎndɨŋɨ sayri yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ mǎnkʉ.
51004013	Nchí ntísiɛ Ɛpáfras bɛ ákʉ́ tontó ɛ̌ti yɛka nɛ bǒnkwɔ Laodísia, nɛ abhɛn Hiɛrapolis.
51004014	Lukas, ngaŋ anɛ sɛ́kɔ́ŋɔ́ tontó, nɛ Démas bátò be bakak.
51004015	Kaká ká bǒnkwɔ abhɛn ɛtɔk Laodisia, nɛ Nímfa, nɛ ɛka bǒnkwɔ abhɛn báchɛ̀m ɛkɛt ɛyi.
51004016	Mǎnáŋ mǎmpay ɛkáti ɛnɛ ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka, kʉ ká mámpay yɔ ntá nkwɔ́ Laodísia nkwɔ. Pay ká nkwɔ ɛkáti ɛnɛ́ ntó ntá nkwɔ́ ɛtɔk Laodísia mpok anɛ bɔ bátó yɔ ntá yɛka.
51004017	Nɛ ghati ká Akípɔs bɛ, “Ghɔ bɛ ɔnáŋá bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn Yesu Acha achyɛ wɔ.”
51004018	Mɛ Pɔ̌l nchí sɨŋ bakak amɛn nɛ awɔ́ awa mɛmbɔŋ. Tɨk ka bɛ́ nchí ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Mandɛm antɔŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu.
52001001	Mɛ Pɔ̌l kɛ̌ nchí sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ ntá yɛka nkwɔ Yesu abhɛn Tɛsalónika. Nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka bǒ Mandɛm mmu achi Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ be bho bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha. Nchí fá nɛ Sáilas nɛ Tímɔti. Mandɛm antɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, anchyɛ bhe kpák.
52001002	Sɛ́chyɛ̀ bakak ntá Mandɛm mpoknkɛm ɛ̌ti yɛka mankɛm nɛ sɛ́fyɛ̀ bhé ndǔ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnɛsɛ́ mpoknkɛm.
52001003	Ɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ bɛsí Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ, sɛ́pú ghɔkɔntɨk bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ̀ ndǔ bǎbhɔŋɔ nɛka nɛ Yesu, nɛ ɛnyǔ bǎdɛ́nɛ́ mmʉɛt ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka ɛ̌ti ɛkɔŋ, nɛ ɛnyǔ bǎte kpirí ndǔ nɛbhakántɨ́ ɛnɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha.
52001004	Bɔ̌ma, sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ Mandɛm akɔŋ be nɛ ayap be
52001005	tɛ̌ndu Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ sɛ́ghàti bho abhɨkɨ twɔ nyaka ntá yɛka chí ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu yɔyɔ, kɛ ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nkwɔ. Nɛ bǎrɨŋɨ nyaka bɛ yɔ achi tɛtɛp. Mpok sɛ́chí awu nɛ bhe, bǎrɨŋɨ nyaka ɛnyǔ ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛyɛsɛ ɛchi. Sɛ́bhʉ̀rɛ nyaka mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ ɛnyu ɛyɔ ndu bɛkwak bhe!
52001006	Nɛ bǎkóŋo ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛyɛsɛ nɛ ɛkakánɛkɔ Yesu Kristo Acha. Yɛ̌ndu bǎghɔ̀ nyaka bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, bǎsíɛ́pti Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ maŋák amɛn Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ̀.
52001007	Ɛ́kʉ bǎrɔ́p ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bakoŋo Yesu mankɛm atú Masidónia nɛ Akáiya máŋɔ̀kɔ.
52001008	Nɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ́tàka atú Masidónia nɛ atú Akáiya ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ́, kɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ may nɔ. Mbok nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Mandɛm akɔ mbankɛm, ɛnyu ɛnɛ sɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛrɛm ndu bɛtɔŋ ɛnyǔ mǎnoko.
52001009	Bɔ́ babhɔŋ bárɛ̀m ɛnyǔ básɔ́rɛ́ bhɛsɛ mpok sɛ́twɔ́ awu ntá yɛka nɛ ɛnyǔ bǎtɨknsɛm ntá bɔmandɛm nsé bǎrɔ́bhɛ chyɛ kɛnókó chi ntá Mandɛm. Yi aywǐnti kɛ achi Mandɛm anɛ tɛtɛp nɛ yi kɛ áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m.
52001010	Bǒ bhɔ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ nkwɔ bɛ mǎnòŋ Mmɔ Mandɛm ámfú amfay antwɔ. Nɔ chi, Yesu mmu Mandɛm ákʉ́ nyaka áfú ndǔ nɛwú apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Yí wu kɛ ápɛ̀mɛ bhɛsɛ mpok Mandɛm átàŋ bo ndu ábè ntɨ nɛ bhɔ ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bhap.
52002001	Bɔ̌ma, bǎbhɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ nɛtwɔ́ anɛ sɛ́twɔ́ awu bɛghɔ bhe ápú nyaka ndɛ́ndɛm.
52002002	Yɛ̌ndu mánáŋ báchyɛ́ nyaka bhɛsɛ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ ntíánwɔ́p ɛtɔk Fílipi mbɔ ɛnyu bǎrɨŋɨ, Mandɛm ywɛsɛ afyɛ́ bhɛsɛ ntɨ bɛ sɛ́ntwɔ́ sɛ́ngátí bhe Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ áfú ntá yi yɛ̌ndu bɛyǎ bo mánù nyaka tontó bɛchyɛt bhɛsɛ mbi.
52002003	Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ sɛ́gháti bhe ɛ́chí tɛtɛp nɛ yɛ̌ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛpu arɛ́. Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ nkaysi bɛ́rwɔ́ yɛ̌ mmu.
52002004	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ chi bɛ, tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm áyɨ́ŋɨ́ ághɔ́ bɛ sɛ́kwǎy bo abhɛn yi afyɛ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ amɔ́, nɔ kɛ sɛ́ghàti bho yɔ. Nɛ puyɛ̌ chi bɛ bo mámbɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ bhɛsɛ, kɛ chí bɛ́ Mandɛm mmu áyɨ̀ŋɨ bɛghɔ ɛnyǔ bati ayɛsɛ achi amɛm, ámbɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ bhɛsɛ.
52002005	Bǎrɨŋɨ nkwɔ bɛ mpok sɛ́chí nɛ bhe sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt sɛ́rwɔrɛ́nyu bɛkʉ mǎmbɔ́ŋ maŋák. Nɛ mbɔŋ Mandɛm achi ntísiɛ bɛ sɛ́pú ghati nyaka bhe Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ chí nɛ nkaysi bɛbhɔŋ nsáy anɛ áfù ntá yɛka.
52002006	Nɛ sɛ́pú kʉ nyaka yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛ́ yɛ̌ chi be, yɛ chi bo báchak, mánkaka bhɛsɛ. Sɛ́kwáy nyaka bɛbhɛp be mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ bǒnto Kristo.
52002007	Kɛ sɛ́kɔ́pti bhe mbɔ ɛnyǔ nnɔ ákɛ̀m bɔ̌bhi.
52002008	Sɛ́kɔŋ be tontó, kpát ɛ́kʉ́ sɛ́ká bɛ sɛbhɔŋ bɛchyɛ be, puyɛ̌ chí ndiɛrɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm, kɛ yɛ chi mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ nkwɔ ndǔ bǎchí bhɛsɛ antɨ tontó.
52002009	Bɔ̌ma, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔkɔntɨk ndu sɛ́re kʉ bɛtɨk, sɛ́mkpɔt nɔkɔ nsɔ́ŋti bɛti nɛ ngósí mpok sɛ́chí awu nɛ bhe. Sɛ́kʉ̀ nyaka bɛtɨk ɛnyu yɔ bɛ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chɛ́bhɛ́ bhɛsɛ. Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ nyaka bɛbhak ntu ntá yɛka mpok sɛ́ghàti bhe Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm.
52002010	Bǎchi batísiɛ bhɛsɛ. Mandɛm nkwɔ achi ntísiɛ bɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ́ nɛntɨ ɛnɛka bakoŋo Yesu nɛchí nyáká nyáŋá nɛ chak nɛ nɛ́kɛ bhɔŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛsí Mandɛm.
52002011	Bǎrɨŋɨ ɛnyu sɛ́kɛ̀m nyaka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka mbɔ ɛnyǔ chi bhɔ ákɛ̀m bɔ̌bhi.
52002012	Sɛ́fyɛ̀ nyaka bhe ntɨ nɛ sɛ́kpɛ̀mɛ nyaka bhe bɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka nɛ́nchyɛ Mandɛm maŋák. Yí kɛ ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe bɛ mǎmbak bo abhɛn yi achi Mfɔ wap nɛ bɛ mǎmbák ndu kɛnɛ́m ɛki nɛ yi.
52002013	Nɛ nkwɔ sɛ́kàka Mandɛm mpoknkɛm mbɔnyunɛ mpok sɛ́gháti bhe Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt yɔ́ mbɔ ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ nkwǎ. Bǎsɔ́t bɛ tɛtɛp chi Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk amɛm batɨ yɛka, be bho mánóko.
52002014	Bɔ̌ma, bǎrɔp bo abhɛn mǎŋɔkɔ ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛnɛ́ bǒnkwɔ Mandɛm abhɛn atú Judɛ́ya. Bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo mbɔnyunɛ bǎghɔ̌ ɛsɔŋɔri amɔ batɨ bo ɛtɔk ɛyɛka nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bo Israɛl báchyɛ́ nyaka bhɔ ɛsɔŋɔri atú Judɛ́ya.
52002015	Bo Israɛl bhɔ kɛ báwáy nyaka Yesu Acha nɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm nɛ bɔ́ kɛ báboko bhɛsɛ ɛtɔk. Bákʉ̀ ntɨ nɛ́mbé Mandɛm. Bachi bǒmpap ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
52002016	Bo Israɛl bhɔ báchɛ̀t bhɛsɛ mbi bɛ sɛkɛ ghati bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Mandɛm ámpɛ́mɛ́ bhɔ. Bákʉ́ bɛbʉ́ kpát mánáŋá. Kɛ bákʉ́ kpát bɛběntɨ Mandɛm bɛchi nɛ bhɔ.
52002017	Bɔ̌ma, yɛ̌ndu bákʉ́ sɛ́rɔ́ nyaka bhe ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ mpok, batɨ yɛsɛ ábhʉ́ɛ́t nyaka nɛ bhe, nɛ ɛ́kʉ́ ɛkwak bɛpɛt bɛghɔ bhe bɛsí nɛ bɛsi ɛ́re yá ɛ́ndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ nɛ sɛre nu bɛghɔ bhe.
52002018	Sɛ́yàŋ nyaka bɛ́twɔ awu ntá yɛka. Mɛmbɔŋ Pɔ̌l, mmɔ́ bɛ́twɔ awu ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ, kɛ Satan achɛ́t bhɛsɛ mbi.
52002019	Pú sɛ́bháká ntɨ chi nɛ bhe? Pú be kɛ̌ báchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ maŋák-á? Pú be kɛ̌ bǎkʉ̀ sɛ́ndɛp chɔŋ awɔ́ antɨ bɛsí Yesu Acha ywɛsɛ ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn yi apɛtnsɛm, bɛ sɛ́kʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛsɛ́ sayri?
52002020	Tɛtɛp, be kɛ bǎkʉ sɛ́dɛ̀p awɔ́ antɨ, nɛ be kɛ báchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ bɛyǎ maŋák.
52003001	Sɛ́chɔ́kɔ́ kpát, sɛ́kɛ pɛrɛ kwáy bɛkɛpntɨ, sɛ́ka bɛrɔp ansɛm ndu ɛtɔk Atɛns,
52003002	sɛ́tó mɔ́mayɛsɛ Tímɔti ntá yɛká. Yí achí ntɨ nkʉbɛtɨk Mandɛm ndu bɛ́gháti bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo. Sɛ́tó yi bɛ ámfyɛ bhe ntɨ, ankʉ mǎnté kpirí ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka,
52003003	bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka amɔt ákɛ́ kwɛn ansɛm ɛ̌ti bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn. Bě babhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ, bɛkoŋo nkaysi Mandɛm, bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́tɛ́mɛ́ri bhɛsɛ.
52003004	Mpok sɛ́chí nyaka nɛ bhe, sɛ́ghàti nyaka be ambɨ ambɨ bɛ chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔŋ bɛsɔŋɔri, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛ́fákárí, nɛ bǎrɨŋɨ ɛnyu ɛyɔ.
52003005	Ɛ̌ti yɔ, mpok mbɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ kway bɛ́kɛpntɨ, ntó Tímɔti bɛ ántwɔ́, ángɔ́ mbák babhʉɛ́t bɛ́sɨ́kɨ ntɨ nɛ Kristo. Mbɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛcháy bɛ ngufú Satan mmu ámɔ̀ bo ndu bɛkʉ bɔ bákɛ́pɛrɛ noko Yesu, abhɔŋ mbi nɛ bhe nɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛsɛ mɛnkɛm bɛrɔŋ ndɛ́ndɛm.
52003006	Kɛ Tímɔti anáŋ áfǔ awu apɛtnsɛm fá, nɛ ɛrɨ́tí ntó bɛ bǎtaŋ ndǔ nɛsɨkɨ́ntɨ ɛnɛka nɛ Kristo nɛ ndǔ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ batɨ. Nɛ aghátí bhɛsɛ bɛ bǎkàysi bhɛsɛ nɛ maŋák mpoknkɛm nɛ bǎbhɔŋ ɛkwak bɛghɔ bhɛsɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛkwak bɛghɔ bhe.
52003007	Bɔ̌ma, ɛkʉ yɛ bɛ yɛ̌ndu báchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ́ nɛnyok nɛ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, batɨ apɔp bhɛsɛ amɛm mbɔnyunɛ bǎte kpirí ndu nɛsɨkɨ́ntɨ ɛnɛka nɛ Kristo.
52003008	Tɛ̌ndu bǎte kpirí ndu mbi Yesu Acha, sɛ́chí sayri.
52003009	Ntɨkɨ ɛnyu bakak sɛ́kway bɛchyɛ Mandɛm ɛ̌ti maŋák mankɛm amɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛsí bhi ɛ̌ti yɛka?
52003010	Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt nɛ batɨ yɛsɛ ankɛm bɛti nɛ ngósí bɛ́ Mandɛm ánkwak sɛmpɛt sɛngɔ bhe bɛsí nɛ bɛsi, nɛ sɛ́ntɔŋ be mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhɨ́kɨ́re rɨŋɨ, ndu bɛkwak mǎmbɔŋ nɛka nɛ Kristo mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛ́yaŋ.
52003011	Sɛ́nɨkmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ yímbɔŋ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha mánkʉ sɛ́ntwɔ ntá yɛka.
52003012	Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ Yesu Acha ánkʉ ɛkɔŋ ɛyɛka nɛ batɨ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak ɛ́ngó ɛ́ndɔ́k nɔ́kɔ́ chí ambɨ, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ ntá yɛka.
52003013	Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ yi ankʉ batɨ ántáŋ be amɛm nɛ bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́, nɛ bɛ́ mǎmbák nyáŋá bɛsí Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ, kɛ mpok anɛ Yesu Kristo Acha átwɔ̀ nɛ bo Mandɛm ankway.
52004001	Bɔ̌ma, ndu bɛrɔŋ ambɨ, sɛ́ghati bhe ɛnyǔ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhʉrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎkʉ̀ nɔ bɛ Mandɛm ámbɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ bhe. Sɛ́nɨ̀k yɛ be mmʉɛt sɛ́mkpɛmɛ nɔkɔ ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu Acha bɛ mǎndɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ nɔ.
52004002	Bě babhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghátí nyaka bhe ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Acha bɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛ́kʉ.
52004003	Ɛnyɨŋ Mandɛm áyàŋ chi bɛ mǎmbák nyáŋá, bɛ bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ barak ɛ́pusi.
52004004	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ankɛ́m mmʉɛt ɛyi, ɛnyu ɛnɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛ́bhak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm, nɛ bo mámbɔŋ kɛnókó nɛ yi.
52004005	Bǎkɛ́ ŋwaka ndǔ barak ɛ́pusi, kɛkɛ́m mmʉɛt mbɔ bo abhɛn babhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm.
52004006	Yɛ̌ mmú ákɛ́ kʉ ntɨ bɛbʉ́ ndǔ ndaká kɛbhʉrɛ anɛ́, nɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ nyiɛ ntɨ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋ! Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ Yesu Acha ǎkɛmɛ kɛ́mbé ntá bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɔ mɛnkɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ sɛ́náŋ sɛ́gháti bhe bɛ mǎnsɔt mpok.
52004007	Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɨŋɨ bhɛsɛ chí bɛ sɛmbak bǒ ɛpúsí, abhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́mbak nyáŋá bɛsí bhi.
52004008	Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábyàk yɛ ndak anɛ apú byak chi nkwǎ, ǎbyàk chí Mandɛm mmu áchyɛ̀ bhe Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ yi.
52004009	Nti apú bɛsɨŋ be bɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ̌ bakoŋo Yesu. Mandɛm yímbɔŋ anáŋ átɔ́ŋ be ɛnyu bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkɔŋ batɨ.
52004010	Nɛ tɛtɛp, bǎkɔŋ batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ atú Masidónia ankɛm. Kɛ bɔmá, sɛ́ghàti bhe bɛ́ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ batɨ ɛ́ndɔ́k nɔ́kɔ́ chi ambɨ.
52004011	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ánkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛ́kɛ́ chyɛ bho ɛsɔŋɔri. Mmu ákɛ́ chwe ndǔ ndaká ntɨ. Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk nɛ amɔ́ yi nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ sɛ́ghátí nyaka bhe.
52004012	Mǎmbák ɛnyu ɛyɔ bɛ́ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko mánchyɛ́ bhe kɛnókó nɛ bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ kɔ bɛsɨ́kɨ́.
52004013	Bɔ̌ma, nɛ́nɛ, sɛ́yàŋ bɛkʉ bɛ bǎkɛ́ rɔp amɛm ɛjuri bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ bo abhɛn bágú bɛ bǎkɛ́ di bhɔ mbɔ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhakantɨ bɛ chɔŋ bawú mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
52004014	Tɛ̌ndu sɛ́nókó bɛ́ Yesu ágú nyaka, apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, sɛ́noko nkwɔ bɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn bágú mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m mpok Yesu átwɔ.
52004015	Bɛ́kóŋo ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔŋ Yesu Acha árɛ́mɛ́, sɛ́ghàti bhe bɛ mpok Yesu Acha átwɔ́, bɛsɛ́ bho sɛchi nɛpɛ́m sɛ́pú yambɨ bɛ́tɛ́mɛri yi kɛ abhɛn bágú mántɛmɛri yi.
52004016	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ chɔŋ mbɔŋ Yesu Acha amfú amfay antwɔ́ anchyɛ ɛyɔŋ nɛ bɛtaŋ. Mfɔ bɔángɛl Mandɛm andɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ, nɛ mmbá Mandɛm ankwɛ́n. Ɛ́mfakari yɛ bɛ́ bakoŋó Kristo abhɛn bágú mánjambɨ mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m,
52004017	kɛ bɛsɛ́ bho sɛchi nɛpɛ́m nɛ sɛ́bhʉɛ́t ansɛm, sɛ́nko ndǔ nɛbháŋ tɛ́mté nɛ bhɔ, sɛ́ntɛmɛri Yesu Acha ndǔ yi ásɛ̀p. Nɛ bɛbho mpok ɛyɔ, sɛ́mbak nɛ yi mpoknkɛm.
52004018	Chiɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yɛka batɨ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ nɛ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn.
52005001	Bɔ̌ma, ntí apú bɛsɨŋ be ɛ̌ti mbɔ̌ŋ mpok anɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́fákari.
52005002	Bǎbhɔŋ bɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ nywɔp Yesu Acha átwɔ̀ nɛ́bhak chɔŋ mbɔ ngɛ́p anɛ átwɔ̀ nɛ bɛti.
52005003	Mpok anɛ bo bárɛ̀m bɛ, “Mbǎŋ achi kpák, yɛ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́pu.” Mpok ɛyɔ kɛ̌ ɛrɛ̌m ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ́kwɛn bɔ amʉɛt tɛ́mchok mbɔ bɛbe ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ánòŋsi. Nɛ mbi bɛ́bʉ́ɛ kɛbhák.
52005004	Bɔ̌ma, kɛ mbák chí bhe, bǎpú amɛm ɛjuri, bɛ́ nywɔp ɛnɔ nɛ́mfɔ́kɔ́rí bhe mbɔ ngɛ́p.
52005005	Bǎchí bo abhɛn bǎkɔ̀ nɛ ngósí, mpok mbaŋ ághɔ̀. Sɛ́pú bo ɛjuri, sɛ́pú bo bɛti.
52005006	Sɛ́kɛ́ bhʉrɛ yɛ kɛnɔ́ mbɔ mbɔk bho. Sɛ́mbák chí pě, sɛ́nkɛm nɔkɔ mmʉɛt.
52005007	Bo abhɛn bábhʉ̀rɛ kɛnɔ́, bábhʉ̀rɛ chi nɛ bɛ́ti, nɛ bo bákwɛ̀n mmɛ́m chí nɛ bɛti.
52005008	Kɛ tɛ̌ndu sɛ́chí chí bǒ ngósí, sɛ́nkɛ́m mmʉɛt. Sɛ́ndɔ́k ambɨ mɛ́nóko Yesu nɛ bɛ́bhɔŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ bo, bɛ ɛyɔ ɛmbák mbɔ kɛndɛ́n anɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu ákɛ́mɛ́ bɛchyɛt mmʉɛt. Sɛ́mbáká ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ Yesu ampɛmɛ bhɛsɛ, nɛ bɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́mbák ntá yɛsɛ́ mbɔ ntá ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu anɛ ákuti ntí ywi.
52005009	Bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ yap bhɛsɛ chi bɛ sɛ́mbák bo abhɛn yi átàŋ anchyɛ ntɛmsi. Ayap bhɛsɛ chi bɛ ánkʉ Yesu Kristo Acha ámpɛmɛ bhɛsɛ.
52005010	Yesu ágú ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ́ bɛ yi ánáŋ ántwɔ́, yɛ̌ sɛbhʉɛt chí pě, yɛ̌ sɛ́gǔ gu, sɛ́nkwáy bɛ́bhak nɛ yi.
52005011	Ndu ɛ́chí nɔ, fyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ́ka batɨ ntɨ mǎnkwak nɔkɔ batɨ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎkʉ̀ nɔ.
52005012	Bɔ̌ma, sɛ́ghàti bhe bɛ mǎnchyɛ́ nɔkɔ bǒ abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛtɨk Acha ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka kɛnókó bɛ mánchyɛ nɔkɔ bhe maniɛ bɛ bǎkɛ́ kʉ bɛbʉ́.
52005013	Bǎbhɔŋ bɛchyɛ bhɔ bɛyǎ kɛnókó, mǎnkɔŋ bɔ́ ɛ̌ti bɛtɨk ɛbhɛ́n bɔ bákʉ̀. Nɛ mǎmbák sayri nɛ batɨ.
52005014	Bɔ̌ma, sɛmtí nɔ́kɔ́ bábhɔ́t, mǎmfyɛ nɔkɔ abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛcháy ntɨ. Kwak nɔ́kɔ́ ká abhɛn mmʉɛt ápú bhɔ. Bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
52005015	Ghɔ́ ká bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ kɛmɛ bɛbʉ́ amfǎy bɛbʉ́. Nu nɔ́kɔ́ ká bɛkʉ chi bɛrɨ̌ndu ntá batɨ bǒnkwɔ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak.
52005016	Bák ká maŋák mpoknkɛm,
52005017	mǎnɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt mpoknkɛm.
52005018	Nɛ yɛ̌ ɛ́mbak bɛ yi, chyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ká Mandɛm bakak, tɛ̌ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm chi ɛbhɛn yi áyàŋ mǎnkʉ́ ndǔ bǎchí bo Yesu Kristo.
52005019	Bǎkɛ́ nɛmɛ ngó Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ.
52005020	Bǎkɛ́ byák ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ákʉ́ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ ándɛm.
52005021	Bǎbhɔŋ bɛchak yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ sayri, mǎnkɛm ɛ́nɛ ɛ́rɨ́.
52005022	Bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ barak abʉ́abʉ.
52005023	Mbɔ̌ŋ Mandɛm mmu áchɨ̀ɛ kpák ánkʉ́ mǎmbák nyáŋá ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi. Yímbɔŋ ámbʉ́rɛ́ nkaysi, nɛ ɛfóŋó, nɛ mmʉɛt yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ápú bhɔŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ kpátɛ mpok Yesu Kristo Acha átwɔ.
52005024	Mandɛm mmu ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ be bɛ mǎmbák bǒbhi, ǎbhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp ami, nɛ chɔŋ ankʉ nɔ.
52005025	Bɔ̌ma, fyɛ́ ká bhɛsɛ ndǔ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt.
52005026	Kaká ká batɨ nɛ ɛkɔŋ Mandɛm.
52005027	Nchí ghati bhe ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Acha bɛ mǎmpáy ɛkáti ɛnɛ ntá bǒnkwɔ mankɛm.
52005028	Bɛrɨ̌ndu Yesu Kristo Acha mɛ́mbák nɛ bhe.
53001001	Mɛ Pɔ̌l kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ́ ntá yɛka bǒnkwɔ Yesu abhɛn Tɛsalónika. Nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛká bo Mandɛm mmu achi Ɛtayɛsɛ, be bho bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha. Nchí fá nɛ bɔ̌mayɛsɛ Sáilas nɛ Tímɔti.
53001002	Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha mántɔŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, mánchyɛ bhe kpák.
53001003	Bɔ̌ma, sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛ́chyɛ́ bakak ntá Mandɛm mpoknkɛm ɛ̌ti yɛka. Ɛ́kway bɛ sɛ́nkʉ́ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ bǎbhɔ̀ŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo mǎndɔk nɔkɔ chí ambɨ, nɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ batɨ ɛ́rɔ̀ŋ chí ambɨ.
53001004	Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛ́pànyu ntá bǒnkwɔ Mandɛm báchák ɛ̌ti yɛka, ndǔ bǎté kpirí ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Yesu, yɛ̌ndu bo báchyɛ̀ bhe nɛnyok nɛ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri.
53001005	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm átàŋ chɔŋ bo ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɛchi chak. Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛnkʉ mǎnkwáy bɛbhak bo abhɛn Mandɛm ábhàk Mfɔ wap. Tɛ̌ndu ɛ̌ti Kɛfɔ ɛki kɛ bǎbhɔ̀ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri.
53001006	Mandɛm ǎkʉ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchí chak. Nɛ chɔŋ yi ankɛmɛ kɛ́mbé ntá bo abhɛn báchyɛ̀ bhe ɛsɔŋɔri.
53001007	Chɔŋ anchyɛ bhe nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ndǔ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛka, anchyɛ bhɛsɛ nkwɔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt. Chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ nɔ́ mpok Yesu Acha ábhèsi nɛ bɛtaŋtí bɔángɛl bhi amɛm ngó anɛ ákàp bhɔ nɛ ádù gum gum gum.
53001008	Chɔŋ yí antɛmsi bǒ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ bɛrɨŋɨ Mandɛm nɛ abhɛn bápú ka bɛkoŋo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ.
53001009	Chɔŋ amfɛrɛ bhɔ́ bɛsí bhi nɛ ndǔ bɛdíɛ́rɛ́ bhi nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi, anchyɛ bhɔ ntɛmsi anɛ abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
53001010	Mpok Yesu Acha átwɔ̀, bo Mandɛm mankɛm báchyɛ̀ yi kɛnókó nɛ bǒ abhɛn mánókó mámbak maknkay bɛ bághɔ́ yi. Bě nkwɔ bǎbhak chɔŋ nɛ bhɔ mbɔnyunɛ mǎnókó mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghátí bhe.
53001011	Ɛ̌ti ɛyɔ kɛ sɛ́nɨ̀k Mandɛm mmʉɛt mpoknkɛm ɛ̌ti yɛka bɛ yi ánkʉ mǎmbak bo abhɛn bákwáy bɛ́bhak bǒbhi. Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ́ yi anchyɛ bhe bɛtaŋ mǎnáŋá bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎyaŋ bɛkʉ nɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bákʉ̀ ɛ̌ti nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo.
53001012	Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt nɔ bɛ bo mánchyɛ́ nyɛ́n Yesu Acha kɛnókó ɛ̌ti yɛka nɛ bɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ kɛnókó nɛ yi bɛ́kóŋo bɛrɨ̌ndu abhɛn Mandɛm ywɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha bátɔ̀ŋ be.
53002001	Bɔ̌ma, bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ nɛtwɔ́ Yesu Kristo Acha nɛ nɛnyokoti anɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́nyókóti bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́ntɛ́mɛ́rí yi, sɛ́ghàti bhe bɛ,
53002002	bǎkɛ́ rɔ batí ywɛka ángwákárí bɛtaka amɛm. Yɛ̌ mmu andɛm chi bɛ yi achi ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ, yɛ̌ chi bɛ achi ngati Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, nɛ yɛ̌ chi bɛ ɛkáti ɛ́fú ntá yɛsɛ bɛ nywɔp Yesu Acha átwɔ̀ nɛ́gháká, bǎkɛ fyɛ́ ntí.
53002003	Bǎkɛ́ rɔ yɛ̌ mmu andwɔ bhe ndu yɛ̌ mbi, mbɔnyunɛ nywɔp ɛnɔ nɛ́pɛrɛ́ twɔ, bɛyǎ bo báte nɛsaŋ nɛ Mandɛm Acha mámbyaka nɔkɔ bɛbhé bhi kɛ mbʉ́mbʉ ambesi. Ngwɛnti yi chi mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́.
53002004	Chɔŋ yí andɛm bɛ Mandɛm apú yɛ̌nyɨŋ nɛ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bo báchíɛ kɛnókó mbɔ Mandɛm ɛpú yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Yí ǎrɛm mbúrɛ́ bɛ achá Mandɛm nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ mɛnkɛm, andɔk kpát anchɔkɔ amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm andɛm bɛ yímbɔŋ achi Mandɛm.
53002005	Bǎkɛ́ ghɔ́kɔ́ntɨk bɛ ngátí nyaka bhé mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n mpok nchí nɛ bhe?
53002006	Nɛ bǎrɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kɛ̀m yi ansɛm. Abhɔŋ bɛ́bhési chi mbák mpok yi akway.
53002007	Ɛnyu bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn mbʉ́mbʉ abhɔŋɔ mɛ́naŋ bɛ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk fá amɨk bhɛsɛ́ bhɛsɛ́. Kɛ mmu anɛ áchɛt bo mbi bɛ bǎkɛ́ bhʉrɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm ǎrɔŋ chɔŋ ambɨ bɛkʉ nɔ kpatɛ mpok anɛ Mandɛm áfɛrɛ yi ambi.
53002008	Mpok yɔ kɛ mbyaká bɛbhé Mandɛm wu abhesi, kɛ Yesu Acha ánáŋ ántwɔ́, ǎfɛp chi ɛ̌yu, ɛyi ɛ́may. Mbɔ̌ŋ nɛtwɔ Yesu ǎnaŋa bɛtaŋ ɛbhi.
53002009	Mbyaká bɛbhé Mandɛm wu ǎtwɔ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Satan. Nɛ chɔŋ ansɔt bɛtaŋ ɛbhi ankʉ baraká maknkay anɛ bapu mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu ndu bɛ́rwɔ bho.
53002010	Chɔŋ ansɔt yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbɛ́pti ɛnyɨŋ bɛrwɔ bo abhɛn bachi ndǔ mbi nɛwú. Chɔŋ ankʉ nɔ ndu bábhɨkɨ ka bɛkɔŋ tɛtɛp anɛ áyɨ́ŋɨ́ Yesu Kristo bɛ Mandɛm ampɛmɛ bhɔ.
53002011	Ɛ̌ti yɔ, Mandɛm ǎto ɛtati ɛ́njwi bɔ antɨ ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bárɔbhɛ noko chi baraká nsé.
53002012	Ɛyɔ ɛnkʉ yi anchyɛ ntɛ́msí ntá bo mankɛm abhɛn bábhɨkɨ noko tɛtɛp anɛ ayɨ́ŋɨ́ Yesu, kɛ bakɔŋ bɛkʉ chí bɛbʉ́.
53002013	Bɔ̌ma, be bo Yesu Acha ákɔ́ŋɔ́, sɛbhɔŋ bɛkaka Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yɛka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok mbɔnyunɛ ayap be bɛ́ ámpɛ́mɛ́ bhe tɛ mpok anɛ yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ re ghoko mmɨk. Ayap bɛpɛmɛ bhe bɛfʉɛt ndǔ bɛtaŋá Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ Mmu ákʉ̀ mǎmbák nyáŋá nɛ ɛ̌ti mǎnókó tɛtɛp anɛ ayɨ́ŋɨ́ Yesu Kristo.
53002014	Mandɛm afʉɛt ndǔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ sɛ́ghátí bhe abhɨ́ŋɨ́ be. Akʉ nɔ bɛ́ mǎmbɔ́ŋ ákɔ́rɛ́ ndu kɛnɛ́m Yesu Kristo Acha.
53002015	Bɔ̌ma, tě yɛka kpirí, mǎndɔk ambɨ mɛnoko mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́tɔ́ŋ be mpok sɛchi nɛ bhe nɛ ɛbhɛn sɛ́sɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm bɛkáti ɛbhɛn sɛ́tó ntá yɛka.
53002016	Mbɔŋ Yesu Kristo Acha nɛ Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ mmu akɔŋ bhɛsɛ mántɔ́ŋ bɛsɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu, mánchyɛ bɛsɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ mpoknkɛm nɛ nɛbhakántɨ ndǔ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛfakari.
53002017	Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo mánchyɛ bhe nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ nɛ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ nɛ bɛrɛm chi bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ.
53003001	Bɔ̌ma, ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák chi bɛ mǎnɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ bɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Acha antaka ayak nɛ bɛ́ bo abhɛn bághòk yɔ mánsyɛpti yɔ nɛ kɛnókó, mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́fákárí nyaka nɛ bhe.
53003002	Nɨk ka mmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ámfɛ́rɛ́ bhɛsɛ amɔ bɛbɛ́ptí bho. Puyɛ̌ bo mankɛm abhɛn bághòk Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ kɛ mánóko.
53003003	Kɛ Yesu Acha apú nɔ́k bɛbhʉrɛ bariɛp ami. Chɔŋ ankʉ batɨ antaŋ be amɛm, ankuti bhe bɛ mbʉ́mbʉ ákɛ́ kʉ be yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
53003004	Yesu Acha akʉ sɛ́sɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ bhe bɛ bǎkʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghátí bhe mǎnkʉ nɛ bɛ chɔŋ mǎndɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ bhɔ.
53003005	Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ Yesu Acha antɔ́ŋ be ɛnyǔ Mandɛm akɔŋ bhe nɛ ɛnyu bɛkɛpntɨ mbɔ Kristo.
53003006	Bɔ̌ma, sɛ́ghàti bhe ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo Acha bɛ bǎkɛ́ chɛm mmʉɛt nɛ yɛntɨkɨ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ anɛ ábhɔ̀t abhɔt kɛbháká koŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́tɔ́ŋ be.
53003007	Bě babhɔŋ bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛkoŋo bayarɛ́kak ayɛsɛ. Sɛ́pú bhɔt nyaka abhɔ́t mpok sɛchi nɛ bhe.
53003008	Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ nyiɛ nyaka nɛnyíɛ́ mmu ywɛka kɛchyɛ nkáp. Kɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ nyaka bɛtɨk bɛti nɛ ngósí, sɛ́mkpɔt nɔkɔ nsɔ́ŋti bɛ́ sɛ́kɛ́ chyɛ bhe ɛsɔŋɔri.
53003009	Sɛ́pú kʉ nyaka nɔ chi bɛ sɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́gháti bhe bɛ mǎnchyɛ bhɛsɛ nɛkwak. Sɛ́yàŋ nyaka chí bɛ sɛ́ntɔ́ŋ be ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kóŋo.
53003010	Yɛ̌ chi mpok sɛchi nɛ bhe sɛ́ghàti nyaka be bɛ mbák mmu apú kʉ bɛtɨk bǎkɛ́ chyɛ yi nɛnyíɛ́.
53003011	Sɛ́rɛ̀m nɔ mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́ghok bɛ mbɔk ywɛka bǎbhɔ̀t abhɔt nɛ bɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhap chi bɛ́fyɛ nnyu ndǔ barak bo bachak.
53003012	Ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo Acha sɛ́ghàti mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ sɛ́njɛp nɔkɔ bhɔ batú bɛ mánkʉ ɛbhap bɛtɨk. Mándɔ́ bɛ́chyɛ ɛsɔŋɔri mánkʉ bɛtɨk ndu bɛbhɔŋ ɛnap nɛnyíɛ́.
53003013	Bɔ̌ma, kɛ mbák chi bhe, bǎkɛ́ pɔp bɛ́kʉ bɛrɨ.
53003014	Mbák mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ́kóŋo ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́sɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm ɛkáti ɛnɛ, fyɛ́ ká yi amɨ́k amʉɛt nɛ bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ yí. Kʉ́ ká yí ɛnyu yɔ bɛ ntíánwɔ́p ánkɛ́m yi.
53003015	Kɛ bǎkɛ́ sɔt ɛnyu mmu wu mbɔ mǔmpap. Kɛ ya ká yí batú nɛ ɛkɔŋ mbɔ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ.
53003016	Mbɔŋ Yesu Acha mmu áchyɛ̀ kpák ánchyɛ be kpák ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi mpoknkɛm. Yesu Acha ámbák nɛ bhe mankɛm.
53003017	Mɛ Pɔ̌l kɛ nchí sɨŋ nɛ awɔ́ wa ndu bɛkaka bhe. Ɛnyunɛ kɛ nchí sɨŋ ndǔ ngwɛnti bɛkáti bha mɛnkɛm bɛkʉ bo mándɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛkáti ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fú ntá ya.
53003018	Bɛrɨ̌ndu Yesu Kristo Acha mɛ́mbák nɛ bhe mankɛm.
54001001	Mɛ Pɔ̌l kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí nkʉbɛtɨk Mandɛm nɛ mǔnto Yesu Kristo. Mandɛm mmú ápɛmɛ bhɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo mmu sɛ́bháká ntɨ nɛ yi ndu nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́twɔ̀ ambɨ kɛ bátó mɛ.
54001002	Tímɔti, nchí sɨ́ŋ ntá yɛ, wɔ mmu ɔ́chí mbɔ mɔ́wa tɛtɛp ndu ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Yesu mbɔ mɛ. Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ mántɔŋ wɔ bɛrɨ̌ndu nɛ ntínso, mánchyɛ wɔ kpák.
54001003	Tímɔti, dɔp Ɛ́fɛsɔs nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu ngati nyaka wɔ ɔ́nkʉ. Mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ atú Masidónia. Dɔp arɛ́ ghati bo abhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ baraká nse bɛ mándɔ́ bɛ́tɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ. Mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ atú Masidónia
54001004	Ghatí bhɔ́ bákɛ́pɛrɛ chɔŋti mpok yap ndǔ bɛrɔ́rí mbok ɛ̌ti bachǐmbɨ bhap. Bɛrɔ́rí mbok ɛbhɔ bɛ́pú kwak bo mánkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyaŋ bɔ́ mánkʉ. Mmu ǎkway bɛ́koŋo nkaysi Mandɛm chí mbák abhɔŋ nɛka nɛ yi.
54001005	Ntí anɛ ngátí wɔ ɔ́ndɛm bǒbhɔ mándɔ́ bɛ́tɔŋ baraká nsé chí bɛ bo Mandɛm mámbɔŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ. Nɛ chi ɛnyǔ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fù ndǔ ntɨ ɛnɛ́n nɛchí amɛm pɛ́pɛ́p, ntɨ ɛnɛn nɛpú ka mmu ánkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́twɔ̀ yi nɛ áyɔ́mɛ, ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp.
54001006	Mbɔk bho bárɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bágúrɛ ɛbhɨ ndu kɛ́mbwɔ́bhɛ́ ntí ti.
54001007	Báyàŋ bɛ́bhak batɔŋ ɛbhé ɛnɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ nyaka Moses, kɛ bábhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nɛjwǐmɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù bɔ anyu, yɛ̌ndu bátɔ̀ŋ nɛ ntɨ nɛnkɛm mánkaysi nɔkɔ bɛ́ bárɨŋɨ.
54001008	Bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm áchyɛ́ nyaka ntá Moses bɛ́rɨ mbák bo bábhʉ̀rɛ bhɔ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛ́yàŋ.
54001009	Sɛ́rɨŋɨ nkwɔ bɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ fyɛ́ bɛbhé ɛbhɛn ntá bo abhɛn báchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm, nɔ chi bo abhɛn bábhʉ̀ɛrɛ bɛbhé. Báfyɛ bɛbhé chi ntá bo abhɛn bápu bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé, nɛ abhɛn bátáŋntí, nɛ ntá bo abhɛn bábhɨkɨ bhɔŋ mpok nɛ Mandɛm, nɛ bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ápú yáŋ sɛ́nkʉ. Bɛbhé bɛ́chí ntá bo abhɛn bákáysi bɛ ntí apu anɛ mánɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm nɛ abhɛn bábyàk Mandɛm. Bɛbhé ɛbhɛn bɛ́chi nkwɔ ntá bo abhɛn báway bachi nɛ manɔ bhap nɛ bo bachak.
54001010	Báchyɛ bɛbhé ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn bákòŋo baghɔrɛ́ nɛ babhakanɛm nɛfí. Bachyɛ bɛbhé ɛ̌ti babhakanɛm abhɛn bábhʉrɛ nɛ batɨ̌ babhakanɛm nɛ baghɔrɛ́ nkwɔ abhɛn bákʉ̀ nɔ. Bachyɛ bɛbhé ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn bághɛ̀p batɨ̌ bakwǎŋwaŋ ndu bɛti bhɔ mbɔ basɛm. Báfyɛ bɛbhé ɛ̌ti basěnse. Bachyɛ bɛbhé ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn bátè ntísiɛ ákwárɛ́, nɛ Mandɛm achyɛ bɛbhé ɛ̌ti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pú ndɔ́ŋ ámɔt nɛ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛ́n tɛtɛp.
54001011	Nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp nɛ́kɔ̀ ndɔ́ŋ amɔt nɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ mɛ amɔ́ bɛ ngati bho. Yí kɛ̌ bo báchyɛ̀ bakak nɛ áfɔ́k ankɛm áfù chi ntá yi.
54001012	Nchí kaka Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ tontó. Yi kɛ áchyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn. Nchí chyɛ yí bakak mbɔnyunɛ aghɔ bɛ́ nkway bɛ́bhak mǔbɛtok yi, ayap yɛ mɛ bɛ́ nkʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhi.
54001013	Akʉ nɔ nɛ mɛ yɛ̌ndu nchí rɛm nyaka ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti yi nchyɛ́ nɔkɔ yi ɛsɔŋɔri, nsɔkɔti nɔkɔ yi. Kɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ nyaka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌kʉ̀ nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ re noko nyaka yi. Ɛ́kʉ́ aghɔ mɛ ntínso.
54001014	Mandɛm Acha akʉ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi bɛ́jwi nɛ mɛ tontó mbɔ nnyɛ́n ɛnɛ́n nɛ́jwí, nɛ́gbóko, nɛtaka ɛbhɨ. Akʉ mɛ mbɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu, achyɛ́ mɛ ɛkɔŋ nkwɔ́. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛ́chí nɛ bo abhɛn bábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo.
54001015	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chi tɛtɛp nɛ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ákwày mɛ́noko nɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛnkɛm. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́rɛ chi bɛ Mandɛm ákʉ bo mándɨŋɨ bɛ Yesu Kristo atwɔ nyaka fá amɨk ndu bɛ́pɛ́mɛ bǒ bɛbʉ́. Nɛ mɛ nchí mmu anɛ ɛbhá bɛbʉ́ bɛ́yá bɛ́chá ɛbhɛn yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak.
54001016	Nchí mmǔ bɛbʉ́, yɛ̌ nɔ, Mandɛm aghɔ mɛ ntínso ndu áyaŋ bɛtɔŋ ɛnyǔ Yesu Kristo ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛyǎ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ nɛ mɛ, mɛ mmu nkʉ́ nyaka bɛbʉ́ ncha yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak. Yesu akʉ nɔ́, bɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́mbák ɛrɨŋ ntá bho ndu bɛ́kwák bɔ mánkway mɛnoko yi, mámbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
54001017	Bakak nɛ kɛnókó ámbák nɛ Mandɛm anɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ ngwɛ́nti. Achi Mfɔ anɛ ápú gú nɛ bápú ghɔ́ yi nɛ amɨ́k nɛ ndiɛrɛ yí kɛ achí Mandɛm. Amen.
54001018	Mɔ́wa Tímɔti, mɛ̌ghati wɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ. Bɛ́kɔ̀ ndɔ́ŋ ámɔt nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bo antɨ nɛ bárɛm ɛ̌ti yɛ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn-nɛ mɛ̌ghàti wɔ bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛ́bhák ntá yɛ mbɔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛnu ndu bɛkʉ ɔ́nu sayri nɛ bo abhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́pú tɛtɛp.
54001019	Ndu ɔ́nù, kɛ́m nɛka ɛnɛn ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ Yesu sayri. Mbɔk bho bábyàk ɛnyǔ ntɨ ɛnɛn nɛpu twɔ mmu nɛ áyɔ́mɛ, nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ nɛka ɛnɛn bábhɔŋɔ nɛ Yesu nɛ́rɔp mbɔ áchwi anɛ́ árákátí anyɛ́n ndǔ batay. Kɛ́m yɛ̌ ntɨ ɛnɛ bɛ ɔ́kɛ́ kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ áyɔ́mɛ.
54001020	Himɛ́neɔs nɛ Aleksánda báchí nkwɔ́ mbɔ bo abhɛn bábyàk ɛnyǔ ntɨ ɛnɛn nɛpu twɔ nɛ áyɔ́mɛ. Ndɔ́ bhɔ́ bati apay amɔ Satan bɛ mándɔ́ bɛrɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm.
54002001	Ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɨ ɛnɛ́ nchí ghati yɛ wɔ chí bɛ bǎkɛ́ rɔ mɛnɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti bo mankɛm. Ɛ́rɨ mǎnɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chɛ́bhɛ́ bhɔ nɛ ɛ̌ti bo báchák. Ɛ́rɨ mɛnɨkmʉɛt bɛ́chyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́ ntá bho mankɛm.
54002002	Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti bafɔ nɛ bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfay bo bachak. Kʉ ka nɔ́, bɛ sɛ́mbák sayri nɛ batɨ, kɛbhɔ́ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri. Sɛ́nkoŋo nɛpɛ́m bo abhɛn bághòk Mandɛm nɛ nɛpɛ́m bo abhɛn mánòko mmʉɛt.
54002003	Ɛrɨ mɛ́nɨkmʉɛt ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ ɛ́chyɛ̀ Mandɛm mmú ápɛ́mɛ́ bhɛsɛ maŋák.
54002004	Yi ǎyaŋ bɛpɛmɛ bo mankɛm nɛ ǎyaŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ándɨ́ŋɨ́ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo.
54002005	Yí aywǐnti kɛ áchí Mandɛm ntá bo mankɛm nɛ mmǔ amɔt kɛ ásɔ̀t bo ntá yi. Mmu wu chí Yesu Kristo mmu ákʉ́ mmʉɛt bɛ ambak nkwǎŋwaŋ.
54002006	Achyɛ nyaka mmʉɛt bɛ́ anku bo mankɛm ámfɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ kɛsɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́. Akʉ nɔ ndǔ mpok Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ bɛ́tɔŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ́ ǎyaŋ bɛ́pɛ́mɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
54002007	Ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu ákʉ́ kɛ Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ mɛ bɛ mbak mǔnto, bɛ́ ngátí nɔ́kɔ́ bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo nɛ bɛ ntɔŋ nɔkɔ bǒ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm bɛ́ mánókó mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp. Nchí rɛm chi tɛtɛp, mpú sénse.
54002008	Nchi yaŋ yɛ̌ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bǒnkwɔ báchɛ́mɛ́, babhakanɛm abhɛn báchyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap ntá Mandɛm mánsá amɔ anɛ achi pɛ́pɛ́p amfay mánɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt kɛbhɔŋ bɛběntɨ nɛ bɛ́táŋá nɛ batɨ.
54002009	Nchi yaŋ nkwɔ́ bɛ baghɔrɛ́ mánsɔ́bhɛ́rí nɔ́kɔ́ mmʉɛt nɛ kɛnókó, mándɨŋɨ ndu báyàp ndɛn nɛ mámfyɛ yɔ sayri ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛ́kwáy. Bákɛ́ ghoko batí ámbák yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyu nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ŋwaŋwaŋ arɛ́ kpaŋtí kpáŋtí nɛ bákɛ́ fyɛ ndɛn bɛyǎ nkáp.
54002010	Bɛrɨ̌ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ áchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó tɛtɛp bɛ́fú chí ndǔ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ abhɛn yi ákʉ̀.
54002011	Ngɔrɛ́ abhɔŋ bɛ́chɔ́kɔ kpák ámbɔ́ŋ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt, antá batu ndu bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ amɛm ɛkɛt Mandɛm.
54002012	Mbɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ ngɔrɛ́ ántɔ́ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ́ ngɔrɛ́ ámbɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay babhakanɛm. Abhɔŋ bɛ́chɔ́kɔ chí kpák.
54002013	Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ́ Mandɛm ayámbɨ aghókó Adam kɛ ǎghoko Ifa,
54002014	nɛ Satan abhɨ́kɨ́ rwɔ nyaka Adam. Ifa kɛ ákóŋó nsé Satan akwɛ́n ndǔ bɛbʉ́.
54002015	Yɛ̌ nɔ, chɔŋ Mandɛm ampɛmɛ baghɔrɛ́ bɛfʉɛt ndǔ nɛbhé anɛ bɔ́ bábhè bɔ, nɛ mbák bapu tɔŋ mmʉɛt, nɛ mbák bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɔ bɛsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Kristo, nɛ mbák bárɔ̀ŋ ambɨ bɛkɔŋ bɛtɨ̌ bakwaŋwaŋ, nɛ mbák báchi nyáŋá ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap, kɛbhɔŋ bɛkwɛnɛ.
54003001	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mɛ̌rɛ̀m nɛ́, ɛ́chi tɛtɛp: Mbák mmu ámfyɛ̌ ntí bɛ́bhak mǔnti Nkwɔ Kristo, nɔ ǎyaŋ bɛkʉ ɛrítí bɛtɨk.
54003002	Mmǔ ntí bǒnkwɔ abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ nɛ abhɔŋ bɛ́bhɔŋ chí ngɔrɛ́ amɔt. Abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mɛ́ŋwaka ndu yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Abhɔŋ bɛbhak mmu anɛ ákɛ̀m mmʉɛt, nɛ abhɔŋ bɛ́bhʉɛrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bo báchyɛ̀ yi kɛnókó, nɛ abhɔŋ bɛbhak mmu anɛ ásɔ̀t mankɔ sayri, nɛ abhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛrɨ́tí ntɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
54003003	Mmǔ ntí bǒnkwɔ abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛbhak nkwɛnɛ́-mɛ́m. Abhɔŋ bɛ́bhak mmu anɛ ápú tɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ. Abhɔŋ bɛ́bhak sayri nɛ bho. Abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛbhak ntaŋ-bɛ́táŋá nɛ mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ngoŋó nkáp.
54003004	Mmǔ ntí bo Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛbhak mmu anɛ ákɛ̀m ɛfo yi sayri, ankʉ bɔ̌bhi mámbak bo abhɛn bághòk yí mánchyɛ nɔkɔ bo kɛnókó ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
54003005	Mbák mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ́kɛm ɛkɛt ɛyi sayri, ná yí ákway bɛbhak ɛrɨ́tí mǔnti ntá bǒnkwɔ abhɛn bachi antɛnɛ́ yi?
54003006	Mǔnti abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛbhak mɔ̌nkɔ ndǔ Nkwɔ Yesu mbɔnyunɛ ǎkway bɛyoŋ mmʉɛt nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ Mandɛm antɛmsi yi mbɔ ɛnyu átɛ́msí nyaka Satan.
54003007	Abhɔŋ bɛbhak mmǔ anɛ bǒ nɛfí nkwɔ báchyɛ̀ kɛnókó. Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ, bákwày bɛ́chyɛ yi ntíánwɔ́p ankwɛ́n ndǔ ntá Satan.
54003008	Bo abhɛn bákwak bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Mandɛm, bábhɔŋ bɛbhak bo abhɛn bápú kʉ ntok nɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhap nkwɔ́. Bábhíkɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛbhak bǒ bɛyɔŋ bɛyɔŋ, bábhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ bɛbhak manyǔ mmɛ́m, nɛ bákɛ́ bhák bǒ ngoŋó nkáp.
54003009	Bábhɔŋ bɛ́kɛm nɛ bɛtaŋ mɛnyɨŋ bhɛ́sɛ bhɛ́sɛ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ákʉ bo mándɨŋɨ nɛ mánóko. Babhɔŋ bɛkɛm bɔ nɛ ntɨ ɛnɛn nɛchi chak.
54003010	Bo bábhɔŋ bɛ́fyɛ kpɨk amɨ́k bɔ amʉɛt. Mbák mángɔ́ yɛ bɛ́ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́pú nɛ bhɔ́, mánsɔt bhɔ́ mbɔ bo abhɛn bákwàk bɛ́kʉ bɛtɨk Mandɛm.
54003011	Baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn bákwàk bɛ́kʉ bɛtɨk Mandɛm, bábhɔŋ nkwɔ́ bɛ́bhɔŋ ɛrɨtí ɛpɨŋ. Bákɛ́ bhák bo abhɛn bárɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti bo báchak, bábhɨkɨ bhɔŋ mɛ́ŋwaka ndǔ yɛ̌ ɛnyɨŋ nɛ bábhɔŋ bɛ́bhak bǒ tɛtɛp ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
54003012	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmú anɛ ákwàk bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Mandɛm, abhɔŋ bɛbhay chi ngɔrɛ́ amɔt. Yí nɛ ngɔrɛ́ ywi bábhɔŋ bɛ́kɛm bɔ̌bhap nɛ ɛfo yap ɛnkɛm sayri.
54003013	Mbák bǒ abhɛn bákwàk bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Mandɛm bákʉ̀ bhɔ sayri, bo báchyɛ bhɔ kɛnókó nɛ bákway bɛ́rɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy.
54003014	Mbɔ̌ŋ ntɨ bɛ́twɔ awu ntá yɛ mandú mpok. Yɛ̌ nɔ, nchí sɨŋ bɛ́gháti wɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ mbɔnyunɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́kway bɛ́fákári nkɛ wakari bɛ́twɔ awu.
54003015	Mbák mbɨ́kɨ́ wakari bɛ́twɔ, ɔ̌kwáy bɛ́rɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ bǒ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhak ndu nnɛrɛ́kɛt Mandɛm, nɔ chí Nkwɔ Yesu. Mandɛm ywɛsɛ́ achí nɛpɛ́m, nɛ Nkwɔ Yesu bachi mbɔ bɛkwap ɛbhɛn bɛ́kɛ̀m nɛtɔŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp.
54003016	Ɛnyɨŋ bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ nɛ sɛ́nóko ɛ́chí ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay. Agha ákway mɛ́mákáti yɔ? Ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́chí bɛ yi? Ɛ́chí bɛ: Yí, Yesu Kristo akʉ mmʉɛt bɛ ámbák nkwǎ, Atwɔ́ fá amɨk, Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm átɔ́ŋ bo bɛ yí achi chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Bɔangɛl Mandɛm bághɔ́ yi. Bo bágháti bachak ɛ̌ti yi amɛm bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk, bǒ mmɨk mánoko yi, Mandɛm asɔt yɛ yi amfay ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛyi.
54004001	Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ǎghàti bhɛsɛ sayri bɛ mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ mbɔk bho bárɔ bɛ́koŋo nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp, mándɔbhɛ koŋo chí bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́rwɔ bho nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ.
54004002	Batɨ bǒ-nsé nɛ bǒ bapu bhɔ ájwi nɛ ɛjuri nɛ básɔ̀t mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ bɛtɔŋ bo.
54004003	Mpok yɔ, bǒ-nsé bhɔ bárɛ̀m chɔŋ bɛ nɛbhay nɛbhɨkɨ rɨ, nɛ bɛ́ bo bákɛ́ nyiɛ́ mbɔk mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́nyiɛ, nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛ́n Mandɛm ághókó bɛ́ bo abhɛn mánókó Yesu nɛ bárɨŋɨ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛ́nɛ́n tɛtɛp mányíɛ́, mánchyɛ nɔkɔ Mandɛm bakak.
54004004	Tɛ̌ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ághókó ɛ́rɨ, bo bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛbyak yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Sɛ́kway mɛ́nyiɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ sɛ́nchyɛ nɔkɔ bakak ntá Mandɛm,
54004005	mbɔnyunɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bɛ́kʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛmbak nyáŋá bɛsí Mandɛm.
54004006	Mbák ɔ́ntɔ́ŋ bǒnkwɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, chɔŋ ɔ́mbak ɛrɨ́tí nkʉbɛtɨk Yesu Kristo anɛ máné nɛ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ nɛka nɛ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛ́n tɛtɛp ɛnɛn ɔ́kóŋó.
54004007	Ɔ́kɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛ́kʉ nɛ bɛchákárí mbok ɛ̌ti bachǐmbɨ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pú ka mmu ánchyɛ́ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Fíɛ́ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ nɛmbak mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm áyaŋ.
54004008	Kʉ nɔ, mbɔnyunɛ nɛghɔkɔsǐ mmʉɛt ɛnɛ́n nkwɔmʉɛt nɛ́chyɛ̀ mmu mandu nsáy, kɛ bɛghɔkɔsǐ mmʉɛt ndu bɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ámbák anɛ ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ, ǎchyɛ̀ mmu nsáy ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi. Ɛchí ɛnyu yɔ mbɔnyunɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɔ nɛ́bhɔŋ bariɛp amɛm nsáy ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn fá amɨk nɛ ɛnɛ́n nɛ́twɔ̀ ambɨ.
54004009	Bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp nɛ ɛrɨ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anoko bhɔ́ sayri.
54004010	Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ sɛ́fyɛ̀ bɛtaŋ bɛ́kʉ bɛtɨk nɛ sɛ́nù bɛ bo mándɨŋɨ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛ́n tɛtɛp mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́bhaka ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm anɛ ápɛ̀mɛ bǒ mankɛm, sayri sayri, abhɛn mánókó.
54004011	Tɔ́ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ fyɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ bo mángɔ́k bhɔ.
54004012	Ɔ́kɛ́ rɔ mmu ámbyak wɔ bɛ́ ɔchí mɔ́nkwɛn. Bák ɛrɨŋ ntá abhɛn mánoko Yesu, ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu yɛ, nɛ ndǔ nɛkʉ ywɛ, nɛ ndǔ ɛkɔŋ ɛyɛ, nɛ ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛ nɛ Yesu, nɛ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bakwap.
54004013	Ghɔ́ bɛ bápày Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ntá bho, nɛ ghɔ́ bɛ́ báfyɛ̀ bho ntɨ nɛ bɛ bátɔ̀ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Kʉ nɔ, kpátɛ mpok anɛ mɛ̌twɔ̀ awu.
54004014	Kɛ́ rɔ akap anɛ́ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ myákámyáká, nɔ chí akap anɛ́ nyaka barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bágháti ɛ̌ti yɛ nɛ ɛ́kʉ bǒ batí mányáŋa wɔ amɔ́ antí bɛ́ ántwɔ́ ntá yɛ.
54004015	Kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhɛn. Fíɛ́ ntí arɛ́ bɛ́ bo mángɔ́ ndu ɔ́kʉ̀ sayri.
54004016	Sɔt mpok nɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́tɔ̀ŋ. Kɛ́m bɔ́ nɛ bɛtaŋ mbɔnyunɛ mbák ɔ́nkʉ ɛnyu yɔ, chɔŋ ɔ́mpɛmɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ nɛ bo abhɛn ɔ́tɔ̀ŋ.
54005001	Ɔ́kɛ́ ji nsénsí nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ. Chiɛ̌ yi chi maniɛ́ mbɔ bɛ achi chi ɛtayɛ. Sɔt babhakanɛm abhɛn bábhíkí ghaka ɛkaká nɛbhe ɛyɛ mbɔ bɔ̌máyɛ.
54005002	Sɔt basénsí baghɔrɛ́ mbɔ bɔmáyɛ, ɔ́nsɔt baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ ghaka ɛkaká nɛbhe ɛyɛ mbɔ bɔ̌máyɛ. Nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ nɛ́kɛ́ bhɔŋ bakwap.
54005003	Tɔ́ŋ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ abhɛn bábhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nɛkwak bɛrɨ̌ntɨ bɛ bɔ́ mámbɔ́ŋ mɛnwɔp.
54005004	Mbák kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ abhɔ̌ŋ bɔ nɛ yɛ̌chi bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ, bɔ́ bábhɔŋ bɛ́kwak nnɛrɛ́kɛt wap mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm áyàŋ. Bábhɔŋ bɛ́kap bachi nɛ manɔ bhap ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bɔ́ bákʉ́ mbɔnyunɛ́ ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ̀ Mandɛm maŋák.
54005005	Kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ mmu anɛ ákwàk yi ǎrɔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛnkɛm ntá Mandɛm nɛ ǎnɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛti nɛ ngósí bɛ́ Mandɛm ánkwak yi.
54005006	Kɛ kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ anɛ árɔ́ mmʉ́ɛt myáká myáká ndu ɛpɔ̌ nɛpɛ́m, achí ngú ndǔ ɛfóŋó, yɛ̌ndu abhʉɛ́t nɛpɛ́m ndǔ nkwɔmʉɛt.
54005007	Ghatí bhɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́kɛ́ bhak nɛ bhɔ́.
54005008	Mbák mmu apú yɨŋɨ bǒbhi, sayri sayri bǒ nnɛrɛ́kɛt ywi, nɔ apú pɛrɛ koŋo nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp. Ɛnyǔ mmu wu abɛp achá mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Yesu wáwák.
54005009	Bǎkway bɛ́fyɛ́ nnyɛ́n kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ ndu nkwɔ́ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ abhɛn báyàŋ nɛkwak mbák arɛm agháká mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛ́rát. Ɛnyu kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ wu abhɔŋ bɛbhak chí ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka ndiɛrɛ nnɛ́m amɔt.
54005010	Abhɔŋ bɛbhak chí ngɔrɛ́ anɛ bo bárɛ̀m bɛ ǎkʉ nyaka ɛrɨ́rɨ́ mbɔ mɛ́ne bɔ̌bhi sayri, nɛ bɛtok bo Mandɛm, nɛ bɛ́kwak bo abhɛn báchí ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri. Ɛnyǔ kɛ́nkwɛ́sɛ́ wu abhɔŋ bɛbhak ngɔrɛ́ anɛ áchyɛ́ nyaka nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛnkɛm ndu bɛ́kʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ bɛrɨ.
54005011	Kɛ ɔ́kɛ́ fyɛ manyɛ́n mánkwɛ́sɛ́ abhɛn bábhʉɛ́t nɛ manoŋ amʉɛt ndǔ nkwɔ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ abhɛn báyàŋ nɛkwak mbɔnyunɛ mbák ɛkwak bɛbhɔŋ nnɛ́m ɛ́nkó bɔ́ antí, bághɔkɔntɨk Kristo,
54005012	nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ mánchɔŋti bɛsí bhap nɛ Yesu ndu bábhíkí bhʉɛrɛ nku mbɨ anɛ mányú nɛ yi.
54005013	Bákway bɛbhak babhɔ́t, mánkɔ nɔkɔ bɛkɛt nɛ bɛkɛt. Bakway bɛbhak bo kɛ́mbwɔ́bhɛ́ nɛ bǒ ɛnáŋtí, nɛ bo abhɛn báchwè ndǔ baraká bo báchák, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛrɛm.
54005014	Nkɔŋ yɛ bɛ́ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ abhɛn bábhʉɛ́t nɛ manoŋ amʉɛt mámbáy manɛ́m, mámbe bɔ, mánkɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhap sayri, bɛ bákɛ́ chyɛ mǔmpap ywɛsɛ mbi bɛrɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ.
54005015	Ndɛm nɔ nɛ ntí bɛ mbɔk yap bágúrɛ́ ɛbhɨ nɛ bárɔbhɛ koŋo chí Satan.
54005016	Mbák ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ánókó abhɔŋ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt ywi, ánkwak bhɔ́. Ákɛ́ rɔ ntǔ wap ntá bakoŋo Yesu báchák. Mbák mánkʉ nɔ, nkwɔ́ Yesu bábhɔŋ mbi bɛ́kwak mánkwɛ́sɛ́ abhɛn kɛbhɔ́ŋ nɛkwak.
54005017	Bǒ nkwɔ́ bábhɔŋ bɛ́chyɛ bǒ batí abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛtɨk ɛbhap ɛrɨrɨ kɛnókó nɛ ɛrɨ́tɨ́ akap. Ɛ́mbák ɛnyu yɔ, sayri sayri nɛ abhɛn báfyɛ̀ bɛtaŋ bɛ́gháti nɛ bɛ́tɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
54005018	Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́ghàti bhɛsɛ́ bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ gwɔt nnyǔ mpɔŋ bɛ́ ákɛ́ nyiɛ́ nchwi mpok yɔ ákʉ̀ bɛtɨk amɛm nkɨ̌ nchwi.” Ɛ́pɛt ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Nkʉ bɛtɨk abhɔ̌ŋ ngǎngaŋ bɛ mánchyɛ yi akap.”
54005019	Mbák bǒ nkwɔ́ mándɛ́m bɛ́ mǔnti akʉ ndak, kɛ́tɨŋɨ ka, kpatɛ batísiɛ mámfú mbɔ batí ápay nɛ arat.
54005020	Ji bo abhɛn bápú rɔ bɛbʉ́ bɛsí bǒ mankɛm bɛ bakoŋo Yesu bachak mámbɔ́ŋ bɛcháy.
54005021	Bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ Yesu Kristo nɛ bɔángɛl Mandɛm, nchí ghati wɔ bɛ ɔ́mbʉ́rɛ́ bɛbhé ɛbhɛn sayri, ɔkɛ́ tɔ́ŋ kɛnkábhɛ́ nɛ kɛ́rɨ́ŋámík.
54005022	Kɛ́ wakari mɛ́nyáŋa mmu amɔ antí ndu bɛ́kʉ yi mǔnti bǒ nkwɔ́ kɛ́ka ɔ́mbɔŋ mbát ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bo bachak. Kɛ́m mmʉɛt ɛyɛ bɛ ɔ́kɛ́ kwɛn ndǔ bɛbʉ́.
54005023	Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɔrɔp chi mame mame, kɛ́pɛrɛ nyú yɛ̌ chí ndiɛrɛ manyiɛp. Sɔt nɔ́kɔ́ nkwɔ mandú mmɛ́m bɛ ánkwák bɛkʉ mɛniɛ ɛbhɛ mɛ́mpɔp.
54005024	Bɛbʉ́ mbɔk bho bɛchi kpóŋóróŋ nɛ bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ chɔŋ mántáŋ bɔ́, kɛ bɛbʉ́ bo bachak bɛchi bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛ́tat kɛ bo mándɨŋɨ bhɔ.
54005025	Nɔ́ kɛ ɛ́chí nɛ bɛrɨ ɛbhɛn mmu ákʉ̀. Bɛ́ghɔ̀ kpoŋoroŋ. Kɛ yɛ̌ chí ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́chí bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́, bɛ́pú rɔp bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ mpoknkɛm.
54006001	Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bachi basɛm bábhɔŋ bɛchyɛ kɛnókó ntá bachi bhap bɛ bo bákɛ́ rɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti nnyɛ́n Mandɛm nɛ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́tɔ̀ŋ.
54006002	Abhɛ́n bachi bhap mánókó Yesu bákɛ́ rɔ bɛ́chyɛ bhɔ kɛnókó ɛkɛ́n kɛ́kwáy nɛ bhɔ nɛ bákɛ rɔ bɛghok bhɔ yɛ̌ndu bárɔ́bhɛ́ chí bǒ mmu amɔt. Ɛrɨ́ bɛ́ mántók bachi bhap sayri ɛ́ncha mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyu ɛsɨ, mbɔnyunɛ bachi abhɛ́n bɔ́ bákwàk mánoko Yesu Kristo nɛ Mandɛm akɔŋ bhɔ́. Tɔ́ŋ bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, ɔ́ngati bɔ́ mánkʉ bhɔ́.
54006003	Mbák mmu ǎtɔ̀ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́chák ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pu ndɔ́ŋ ámɔ́t nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ngáti wɔ, ansɔt bɛyɔŋ Yesu Kristo Acha mbɔ ndaká-nsé nɛ yí kɛka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́tɔ̀ŋ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛ́m bǒ nkwɔ́ Yesu,
54006004	nɔ achí paka nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Ɛnyǔ mmu wu abhɔŋ chí ɛpɔ̌ ɛpɨŋ bɛ́kɛm ɛpʉ́ítí, nɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ́táŋá ɛ̌ti bɛyɔŋ, ɛnɛ́ ɛyɔ ɛ́twɔ̀ chí nɛ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ bo mántáŋ nɛ batɨ, mándɛm nɔkɔ ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti batɨ, nɛ mánkaysi nɔkɔ bɛ mmu ákú ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ngufú abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ.
54006005	Ɛnyǔ mmu wu chí mmu ɛpʉ́ítí mpoknkɛm nɛ bho báchák. Batɨ̌ mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ ábɛp amɛm nɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ rɨŋɨ mbɔ̌ŋ ndaká Mandɛm. Bákaysi bɛ bɛ́kʉ mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm áyàŋ chí mbi bɛyaŋ nkáp.
54006006	Ɛrɛmɛ́ nsáy achí nɛ mmu anɛ ábhʉ̀ɛrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm áyàŋ nɛ ambɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́.
54006007	Yɛ̌nyɨŋ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ twɔ fá ammɨk nɛ yɔ́, nɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ mmu apú rɔŋ nɛ yɔ.
54006008	Mbák sɛ́bhɔŋ yɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ ndɛn sɛ́ndɔ́ ɛbhɔ mɛ́nkwáy nɛ bhɛsɛ.
54006009	Bo abhɛn báyàŋ bɛbhɔŋ bɛyǎ nkáp báwakari bɛkwɛn ndǔ nɛmɔ, mánkwɛn ndu ntá nɛ nkaysi anɛ átwɔ̀ bhɔ́ nɛ mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́ nɛ nɛwú.
54006010	Ɛ́chí ɛnyu yɔ mbɔnyunɛ ɛkɔŋɔ́ nkáp ɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm. Chí ɛ̌ti ngoŋó nkáp kɛ̌ mbɔk bho bárɔ́ mbi Mandɛm bárɔp ndǔ nɛměntɨ ɛ̌ti nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ ɛnɛn nɛchi nɛ bhɔ.
54006011	Kɛ wɔ Tímɔti, mmǔ Mandɛm, kɛ́fyɛ́ amɔ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ. Kʉ ntɨ ɛnɛ bɛ́ ɔ́mbák chak bɛsí Mandɛm, nɛ búrɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ mbɔnyu Mandɛm áyàŋ. Bɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu, kɔŋ bo, bɔ́ŋ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ, nɛ bák ndu kpák nɛ bo báchák.
54006012	Nu ɛrɨ́tí nɛnu ɛ̌ti Yesu nɛ́ bɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ yi, ɔ́ngɔ́ bɛ́ ɔbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Mandɛm abhɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ chí ɛ̌ti nɛpɛ́m ɛnɔ mpok ɔ́rɛ́mɛ́ kpoŋoroŋ bɛsí bɛyǎ batísiɛ bɛ́ ɔnókó Yesu.
54006013	Mɛ̌ghati wɔ bɛsí Mandɛm mú áchyɛ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ nɛpɛ́m, nɛ bɛsí Yesu Kristo mu áté ntísiɛ ndǔ tɛtɛp Mandɛm bɛsí Pɔ́ntiɔs Páílet,
54006014	bɛ́ ɔ́nkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ngátí wɔ mɛnkɛm. Kɛ́ kwɛn ndu yɛ̌ ɛ́mɔt ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛ́ji wɔ. Ɛ́mbák nɔ́ kpát bɛ́gháka ɛwak ɛnɛ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo ábhèsi.
54006015	Mandɛm anɛ bo bábɨ̀ti, yi mmu áchi Mfɔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfay yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, Acha nɛ Mfɔ bafɔ, chɔŋ yí ankʉ Yesu ambesi ndǔ mpok anɛ yi áyábhɛ́.
54006016	Mandɛm apú gú. Bɛchɔ́kɔ́ bhi bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhɛn mmu ápú kwáy bɛyɨŋɨ. Yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ yi nɛ mmu apú kwáy bɛ́ghɔ yi. Kɛnókó kɛnkɛm kɛchi ɛki nɛ bɛtaŋá kɛfɔ bɛchi ɛbhi mpoknkɛm. Amen.
54006017	Ghatí bǒ bakáp fá ammɨk bɛ bákɛ́ yoŋ mmʉɛt, nɛ bɛ bákɛ́ bhakantɨ ndǔ kɛfɔ̌ mmɨk, mbɔnyunɛ kɛ́fʉ̀ɛrɛ fʉɛt. Ghatí bhɔ́ mánsɨ́kɨ́ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm mmu áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ sɛ́mbɔŋ ɛrɨ́tɨ́ nɛpɛ́m.
54006018	Ghatí bɔ́ mánkʉ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛrɨ. Mánkʉ́ nɔkɔ bɛrɨ ndǔ bɛyǎ babhi. Bákɛ́ taŋ awɔ́. Mánkɔrɛ nɔkɔ nɛ batɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ maŋák.
54006019	Mbák mánkʉ ɛnyʉ yɔ, nɔ bábhʉ̀ɛrɛ ɛrɛmɛ́ kɛfɔ ɛkɛ́n kɛ́chí ntá yap, kɛfɔ ɛkɛ́n bábhɔ̀ŋ amfay ndǔ mpok anɛ átwɔ̀ ambɨ. Mbák mánkʉ nɔ, chɔŋ mámbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn tɛtɛp.
54006020	Tímɔti, kɛ́m bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn báchyɛ́ wɔ sayri. Ɔ́kɛ́ chwe ndǔ kɛpɨ ɛkɛn kɛpu chyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó nɛ ɛpʉ́ítí nti ti ɛnɛ ɛpu kɔ ndɔ́ŋ ámɔt nɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Bo bákaysi bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ chi nɛrɨŋɨ́, ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pú nɔ.
54006021	Nɛrɛm anɛ mbɔk bho bárɛ̀m bɛ bárɨŋɨ ǎkʉ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ noko nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp. Bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm mɛ́mbák nɛ bhe mankɛm.
55001001	Mɛ Pɔ̌l, kɛ nchi sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí mǔnto Yesu Kristo, bɛkoŋo nkaysi Mandɛm. Yi ayap mɛ bɛ ngati bho Mbok Ndɨndɨ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo anɛ achi ɛ̌ti bariɛp amɛm yi afyɛ́ nyaka bɛchyɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti nta bo abhɛn manoko Yesu Kristo.
55001002	Nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛ Tímɔti, wɔ mú ɔ́chí mbɔ mɔ̌wa anɛ nde kɔŋ. Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ mántɔ́ŋ wɔ bɛrɨ̌ndu, mángɔ wɔ ntínso nɛ mánchyɛ wɔ kpák.
55001003	Tímɔti, nchí kaka Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yɛ. Nchí nɨkmʉɛt ntá yi nɛ ntɨ ɛnɛn nɛchí amɛm pɛ́pɛ́p mbɔ bachǐmbɨ bha bákʉ̀ nyaka. Nchí nɨkmʉɛt ndu bɛ́káka Mandɛm bɛti nɛ ngósí, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok, anɛ ntɨ ɛna nɛ́kwɛ́n wɔ amʉɛt.
55001004	Mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔkɔntɨk babhɛsɛ mɛ nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ mbɔŋ ɛkwak bɛti nɛ ngósí bɛ́ghɔ wɔ bɛ́ maŋák ánjwí mɛ antɨ.
55001005	Nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ ghɔkɔntɨk ɛnyu ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Yesu tɛtɛp nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ nnɔ máyɛ Lóis nɛ máyɛ Yúnis bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka. Nnókó tɛtɛp bɛ ɛnyǔ nɛka ɛnɔ nɛbhʉɛt nɛ wɔ.
55001006	Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ mɛ̌tɨk yɛ wɔ bɛ́ ɔ́nkʉ bɛ akap anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ wɔ mpok nyáŋá wɔ amɔ anti ambak mbɔ ngó anɛ́ áyaŋ mɛnɛmɛ kɛ báfok wu ádù.
55001007	Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ bhɛsɛ ntɨ bɛcháy. Ǎchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ chi nɛtaŋántɨ, nɛ ɛkɔŋ, nɛ nɛkɛ́mɛ́mʉɛt.
55001008	Ɔ́kɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ ntíánwɔ́p bɛghati bho ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu. Ɔ́kɛ́ bhɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p ɛ̌ti ya, yɛ̌ndu nchí mǔkɛnɔŋ ɛ̌ti nsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ yi. Kɛ dɔ̌ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ wɔ mɛ́nkwák wɔ ɔ́nka ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔ mɛ ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Yesu.
55001009	Mandɛm apɛ́mɛ́ bhɛsɛ ndu áfɛ́rɛ́ bhɛsɛ ndǔ bɛbʉ́. Ayap bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́mbák bǒbhi. Akʉ nɔ yɛ̌ndu sɛ́pú bɛrɨ́tí bho. Anáŋ abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka nkaysi bɛ́pɛ́mɛ bhɛsɛ, tɛ mpok mmɨk ábhɨ́kɨ́re bho. Mandɛm anáŋ abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka nkaysi bɛ́fʉɛ́t ntá Yesu Kristo, antɔŋ bhɛsɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu bhi.
55001010	Mandɛm anáŋ atɔ́ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi ndu átó Yesu Kristo mmu átwɔ́. Yí achi Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ. Awǎy bɛtaŋá nɛwú nɛ achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́. Yɔ́ achí mbɔ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ ǎtɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ mbi nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
55001011	Mandɛm ayap mɛ bɛ mbák mǔnto Yesu, ayap mɛ bɛ́ mbák mmú nchí ghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, nɛ ayap mɛ mbák mmú anɛ nchí tɔ́ŋ bo Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi.
55001012	Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ nchí ghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ ɛnkɛm. Kɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p mbɔnyunɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mmu anɛ nnókó. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ yí abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛkɛm bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn yi achyɛ mɛ sayri kpátɛ bɛghaka ɛwak ɛnɛ yi átwɔ̀.
55001013	Bʉrɛ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbha sayri bɛ mɛ́nkwak wɔ ɔ́ntɨk ɛnyǔ nɛtɔŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp nɛchi. Kʉ nɔ dɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ ndu bɛ́bhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu, nɛ ɔ́nkɔŋ bo báchák. Ɔ̌kway bɛ́kʉ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ ɔbhat mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo.
55001014	Ndǔ bɛtaŋá Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmú achí nɛ bhɛsɛ, kɛ́m Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ báfyɛ wɔ amɔ sayri.
55001015	Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bǒnkwɔ Yesu mankɛm abhɛn báfú atú Esia bátɨ̌knsɛm ntá ya. Fijɛ́lɔs nɛ Hɛmogɛ́nes nkwɔ́ bátɨknsɛm ntá ya.
55001016	Yesu Acha ángɔ́ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Ɔnɛsifórɔs ntínso. Akwɛ́nɛ́ mɛ ntɨ bɛyǎ mpok, kɛbhɔ́ŋ ntíánwɔ́p bɛ nchí mǔkɛnɔŋ nɛ ngɛm amɔ.
55001017	Nɛchwɔp yí áchwɔ́bhɛ́ fá Rom, ayáŋ mɛ mbǎnkɛm kpát aghɔ́ mɛ.
55001018	Nchí nɨkmʉɛt bɛ Acha ángɔ́ yi ntínso ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ manyé. Ɔ̌rɨŋɨ sayri nɛkwak ɛnɛ́n yi áchyɛ́ mɛ amɛm ɛtɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs.
55002001	Mɔ́wa Tímɔti, dɔ̌ yɛ Mandɛm anchyɛ wɔ bɛtaŋ. Ǎkwáy bɛ́kʉ nɔ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi nɛ wɔ ndu ɔ́bhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo.
55002002	Sɔt mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́ghókó ndǔ mɛ̌tɔ̀ŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛsí bɛyǎ batísiɛ tɔ́ŋ ntá bǒ tɛtɛp. Sɔt bɔ́ tɔ́ŋ ntá bo tɛtɛp abhɛn bákway bɛtɔ́ŋ bhɔ́ ntá bo báchák nkwɔ́.
55002003	Mbɔ ɛrɨ́tí ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu Yesu Kristo, ɔbhɔŋ bɛ́te kákáti ndu ɛnyǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ́ bakoŋo Yesu báchák bábhɔ̀ŋ.
55002004	Ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu anɛ áchí ndǔ bɛtɨk nɛ ǎnù bɛ mǔnti ywi ámbɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ yi, apú fyɛ mmʉɛt ndǔ baraká ɛtɔk áchák.
55002005	Mmǔ anɛ ájɛ́t ntiɛt nɛ batɨ, apú kway bɛbhɔŋ nsáy mbák abhɨkɨ jɛt ankoŋo bɛbhé ntiɛt.
55002006	Nkwaŋa-nkɨ anɛ afyɛ́ bɛtaŋ ndǔ bɛtɨk kɛ áyámbɨ bɛbhɔŋ mbwɔ́t anɛ áfú ɛbhɨ.
55002007	Sɔt nɔ́kɔ́ nkaysi ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ngátí-nɛ́ wɔ, mbɔnyunɛ chɔŋ mbɔŋ Mandɛm Acha ankwak wɔ ɔ́mbɔ́ŋ nɛjwǐmɛm ndu bɔ́ mɛnkɛm.
55002008	Ɔ́kɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk Yesu Kristo, ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Mfɔ Debhít mmu Mandɛm ákú nyaka yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m mbɔ ɛnyu ɛchi amɛm Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ mɛ̌ghati bho.
55002009	Ndu mɛ̌ghati bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nɛ, kɛ nchí ghɔ́ ɛsɔŋɔri, nɛ ngɛm amɔ mbɔ nkʉ bɛbʉ́. Kɛ mmu ápú kwáy bɛ́fe Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
55002010	Nká yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ̌ti bǒ abhɛn Mandɛm ayabhɛ bɛ mámbak abhi. Nká ɛsɔŋɔri bɛ́ Yesu Kristo ámpɛ́mɛ́ bhɔ nkwɔ mámbák nɛ Mandɛm mmú áchyɛ bhɔ kɛnókó ngwɛnti ti.
55002011	Bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chi tɛtɛp. Bɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mbák sɛ́gu nɛ yi, chɔŋ sɛ́mbak nkwɔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ yi.
55002012	Mbák sɛ́nkɛ́pntɨ ndǔ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛsɛ, chɔŋ sɛ́mbak bafɔ nɛ yi nkwɔ. Mbák sɛ́ndɛm bɛ́ sɛ́bhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ yi, chɔŋ yí nkwɔ andɛm bɛ́ abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ bhɛsɛ.
55002013	Mbák sɛ́pu bhʉrɛ bariɛp amɛsɛ, yí ǎbhʉrɛ bariɛp ami mpoknkɛm. Kristo apú kwáy bɛ́táŋa bɛ yí apú mmu anɛ yi achi.”
55002014	Tɨk nɔkɔ bǒnkwɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ngáti-nɛ́ wɔ. Yɛp nɔkɔ bɔ́ batú ndǔ nnyɛ́n Mandɛm bɛ́ mándɔ́ bɛ́kɛm ɛpʉ́ítí ɛ̌ti bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ chi nɛ bɛ́táká. Ɛyɔ̌ ɛnyǔ ɛpʉ́ítí ɛ́pú kwak yɛ̌ mmu, ɛ́twɔ̀ chí nɛ mɛnɛmɛ ntá bo abhɛn bághòk.
55002015	Nu bɛ́ Mandɛm anjɨŋɨ wɔ ambɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ wɔ bɛ́ ɔchí nkʉbɛtɨk anɛ apú kway bɛbhɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p, nɛ bɛ́ ɔ̌tɔŋ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ sayri.
55002016	Kɛ́ chwe ndǔ kɛ́mbwɔ́bhɛ́ ɛkɛ́n kɛ́pú chyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Ɛ́nyu kɛ́mbwɔ́bhɛ́ ɛkɔ kɛ́kʉ̀ bo mánsap nɛkɔ nɛ Mandɛm.
55002017	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo abhɛn básábhɛ́ nɛkɔ nɛ Mandɛm bátɔ̀ŋ bɛ́chí mbɔ nsak ntá bo abhɛn bɔ́ bátɔ̀ŋ, nɔ chí, mbɔ nsak anɛ ányiɛ mmʉɛt andɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ. Himɛ́neɔs nɛ Filɛ́tɔs báchi mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ.
55002018	Batí yap ápay bárɔ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛ́n tɛtɛp bágurɛ ɛbhɨ ndǔ bátɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ Mandɛm anáŋ akʉ bo bápɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Bákʉ kpát mbɔk bho abhɛn mánókó Yesu bápú pɛrɛ noko yi.
55002019	Kɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛchí mbɔ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́mɨk ɛnɛn baghoko sayri ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́pú kway mɛnyɨkɨsi nɔ́ kɛ báte ɛkɛt arɛ́. Básɨŋ ndǔ ntay ɛnɛn bápɨ́ arɛ bɛ, “Ɛta Mandɛm arɨ́ŋɨ́ bo abhɛn bachi abhi.” Básɨŋ nkwɔ bɛ, “Yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɛ̀m bɛ achi mmu Acha ándɔ́ bɛbʉ́.”
55002020	Amɛm ɛkɛt ɛgho puyɛ̌ ndiɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bághókó nɛ pú nɛ ɛbhɛn bághókó nɛ ɛ́gírí kɛ bɛ́bhak arɛ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn baghoko nɛ mɛnɔk nɛ ɛbhɛn bághoko nɛ ntɔp bɛ́bhak arɛ́ nkwɔ. Mbɔk mɛnyɨŋ chí ɛbhɛn básɔt mánkʉ ɛnyɨŋ arɛ nɛ kɛnókó. Bɛ́chák chi ɛbhɛn bápu sɔt mankʉ ɛnyɨŋ arɛ nɛ kɛnókó.
55002021	Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛ́chí nɛ Bǒ nkwɔ́ Yesu. Yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɔ́ bɛbʉ́ akʉ ntɨ ɛni nɛ́mbak amɛm pɛ́pɛ́p, Mandɛm ǎchyɛ yí kɛnókó. Mandɛm ǎkʉ nɔ nɛ yi, mbɔnyunɛ achyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛnkɛm ntá Mandɛm mmu áchí mbɔŋɔ́kɛt. Ɛnyǔ mmu wu abhɔŋ ntɨ bɛ́kʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ bɛrɨ.
55002022	Ghɔ́ yɛ bɛ́ ɔfɛ́rɛ́ ntí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛsak báfyɛ̀ ngoŋo arɛ́. Kʉ ntɨ bɛ́bhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm, nɛ ndu bɛbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu, nɛ bɛkɔŋ bo báchák. Kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, ɔ́mbak sayri nɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨ̀ŋɨ nnyɛ́n Ɛta nɛ batɨ pɛ́pɛ́p bɛ́ ánkwak bhɔ.
55002023	Ɔ́kɛ́ chwe ndǔ bɛpʉítí ɛbhɛn bɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ntí nɛ nnɛt. Mɛnyǔ bɛpʉítí bhɔ bɛ́twɔ̀ chi nɛ bɛ́táŋá.
55002024	Nɛ mǔbɛtok Acha abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛbhak ntaŋ-bɛ́táŋá. Abhɔŋ bɛbhak chi mmǔ anɛ átɔ̀ŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu bɛrɨ̌ntɨ nɛ, abhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛrɨ́tí ntɔ̌ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, nɛ ambak mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ nɛ bǒ abhɛn báchyɛ̀ yi ɛsɔŋɔri.
55002025	Puyɛ̌ nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ kɛ̌ mǔbɛtok Yesu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́tɔŋ bo abhɛn bápú ka nɛ yi. Mandɛm ǎkwáy bɛ́kʉ bɔ́ mántɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap nɛ mánoko nɛtɔŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp.
55002026	Nɛ mbák mánókó nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp, kɛboŋ ɛkap kɛ́kway bɛ́pɛ́tnsɛm nɛ mámfú ndǔ ntá anɛ Satan. Bákwɛn nyaka ndǔ ntá yi mankʉ nɔkɔ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi áyaŋ bɔ́ mánkʉ.
55003001	Dɨŋɨ́ bɛ́ ndǔ manywɔp anɛ ngwɛnti, bɛyǎ bɛsɔŋɔri bɛ́bhak fá amɨk.
55003002	Ntí achi bɛ mpok ɛyɔ, bo bákɔŋ mmʉɛt ɛyap máncha, mánkɔŋ nkáp máncha, mámpányu, mámbɔŋ nɛyoŋómʉɛt, mámbak basɔkɔtɨ̌ bho, bɔ́ kɛka bɛghok bachi nɛ manɔ bhap. Nɛ yɛ̌ mmú ankʉ bhɔ́ bɛrɨ ná bákɛ sɔt mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ. Mpok ɛyɔ, bo bákaysi bɛ́ ntí apú anɛ bɔ́ mánɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm ndu bɛ́chyɛ yi kɛnókó.
55003003	Ndu bɛ́rɔŋ ambɨ, mpok ɛyɔ bo bápu bhɔŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ nɛ yɛ̌ chí amɛm manɛrɛ́kɛt, bápu foŋori batɨ. Bárɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti batɨ ndu bɛchɔŋti manyɛ́n ɛyap. Ndǔ mpok ɛyɔ, bo bápú kway bɛkɛm mmʉɛt, kɛ bádù mbɔ nkwɔ kɛbhɔ́ŋ ntínso nɛ batɨ, nɛ bápú kɔŋ ɛrɨ́tɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ.
55003004	Mpok ɛyɔ, chɔŋ bo mánti batɨ ntá bǒmpap abhap, nɛ mámbak bo tákátáká, nɛ chɔŋ mánkʉ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ kɛ yambɨ mánsɔt nkaysi arɛ́. Chɔŋ bo mánde yoŋ mmʉɛt nɛ mánkɔŋ mɛ́nyiɛ chi nɛpɛ́m, kɛkɔŋ Mandɛm.
55003005	Mpok ɛyɔ chɔŋ bo mánde kɔt ngɛpti bɛ báchi bo Mandɛm yɛ̌ndu bábhɨkɨ noko bɛ́ Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́kʉ bɔ́ mámbak bǒbhi. Kɛ́chɛm ɛkak nɛ mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ.
55003006	Yɛ̌ nɛ́nɛ, mbɔk yap báchwè ndǔ manɛrɛ́kɛt mándwɔ nɔ́kɔ́ baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn bápu ka bɛkɛm mmʉɛt bɛ mángwákárí bɛkwɛn ndǔ ntǎ bɛbʉ́.
55003007	Ɛnyǔ baghɔrɛ́ bhɔ bábhɔŋ ɛkwak ndu bɛ́ghɔk mɛnyɨŋ bɛkɔ mpoknkɛm kɛ bápú kwáy bɛbhɔŋ nɛ́jwǐmɛm ndǔ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛ́n tɛtɛp.
55003008	Batɔŋɔ́ nse bhɔ bágʉɛti mmʉɛt mǎnchwe ndǔ manɛrɛ́kɛt mánu nɔkɔ bɛ́ bo bákɛ́ noko tɛtɛp Mandɛm. Báchi mbɔ Jánɛs nɛ Jambrɛs bo mánú nyaka bɛ bo bákɛ́ noko mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm átó Moses ángati Mfɔ Íjip. Báchí bǒ bɛbɛ́ptí nkaysi nɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu tɛtɛp.
55003009	Kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nkaysi yap abhɔŋ bɛ́kwɛnɛ́kwɛn mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ǎghɔ chɔŋ ɛchɨŋti yap. Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛ́fákárí nyaka nɛ Jánɛs nɛ mmʉɛrɛ yi Jámbrɛs.
55003010	Kɛ wɔ Tímɔti, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌tɔ̀ŋ wɔ, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛna, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌kay ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ ndu mbɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Yesu, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ ndǔ mɛ̌kɛ̀pntɨ, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ ndu mbɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛkɔŋ nɛ bho, nɛ ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ ndǔ mɛ̌tè kákáti mpok ɛsɔŋɔri.
55003011	Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ nkwɔ́ ndǔ bo báre nyok mɛ. Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn nde bhɔ́ŋ. Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ ndu báre nyok mɛ amɛm bɛtɔk Antiɔk, nɛ Ikɔ́niɔm nɛ Lístra. Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ ndé bhɔ́ŋ kɛ Acha Yesu ǎfɛrɛ mɛ ndu bɔ́ mɛnkɛm.
55003012	Tɛtɛp, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ntɨ bɛbhʉɛ́rɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm áyàŋ ɛ̌ti yi ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo, bo báchyɛ́ yi nɛnyok.
55003013	Kɛ mbák chí bǒ bɛbʉ́ nɛ bǒ bapu bábɛ̀p mándɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, bárwɔ̀ bho, bo mándwɔ nɔkɔ bhɔ́.
55003014	Kɛ mbák wɔ Tímɔti, ɔ́kɛ́ rɔ bɛ́kóŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bátɔ́ŋɔ́ wɔ nɛ ɔnoko bhɔ́ sayri. Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bo abhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ wɔ bhɔ.
55003015	Ɔ́kɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ́ ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ basɨ́ŋ amɛn áchí amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm tɛ kɛ̌mbɔ́ ɛkɛ. Basɨŋ amɛn achi Nyáŋá ǎkwáy bɛ́kwak wɔ ɔ́mbɔŋ kɛboŋ bɛbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo nɛ ɔ́mbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m.
55003016	Mandɛm kɛ áchyɛ́ nkaysi basɨŋ mankɛm amɛn áchí amɛm Ɛkáti yi. Basɨ̌ŋ ǎkwak ndu bɛtɔŋ bhɛsɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp nɛ ǎji bhɛsɛ ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛpu sayri ndǔ bapɛm ayɛsɛ. Basɨ̌ŋ ǎkwak mɛnyurɛ bhɛse ndǔ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ɛbhɛsɛ nɛ ndu bɛtɔŋ bhɛsɛ ɛnyu bɛbhak chak ndǔ bapɛm yɛsɛ.
55003017	Ɛyɔ ɛ́kwak bɛ mǔbɛtok Mandɛm ánkwáy ndǔ yɛntɨkɨ mbi nɛ bɛ ámbɔ́ŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́yàŋ ndu bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛrɨ́tɨ́ bɛtɨk.
55004001	Tímɔti, nchí sɛmti yɛ wɔ bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ bɛsí Yesu Kristo mmú átaŋ mburɛ bo abhɛn báchi pě nɛ abhɛn bágu ɛwak ɛ́mɔt mpok yi ábhèsi bɛkʉ bo mángɔ bɛ yi achi Mfɔ.
55004002	Nchí sɛmti wɔ bɛ́ ɔ́ngátí nɔ́kɔ́ bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Kɛ́rɔ bɛ́ghati bhɔ́. Mpok yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́kɔ̀ sayri, ghati bho. Yɛ̌ chí mpok anɛ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́pu kɔ sayri, ghatí bhɔ́. Kʉ bo mándɔ bɛbʉ́ bhap. Ji bhɔ́ mandɔ́ bɛbʉ́ bhap. Kɛ fyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ bɔ́ ntɨ nkwɔ́. Kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ nɛ ntɨ bɛtɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
55004003	Nchí sɛmti wɔ, tɔ́ŋ bo Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ mpok ǎtwɔ anɛ bo bápú pɛrɛ kɔŋ bɛghok nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛn tɛtɛp. Mpok yɔ, chɔŋ bo mándɔbhɛ koŋo chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ́ babhɔŋ bákɔ́ŋɔ́, mánjaŋ batɔŋ abhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ bɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ́nyɨ̀ŋɨ bhɔ batú.
55004004	Mpok ɛyɔ, chɔŋ bo mándɔ bɛghok tɛtɛp anɛ Mandɛm áyaŋ bo mándɨŋɨ, mándɔbhɛ fyɛ́ ntí bɛ́ghok chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn batɔŋɔ́ nse bátɔŋ.
55004005	Kɛ wɔ Tímɔti, yɛ̌ ɛ́mbak ná, kɛ́rɔ bɛbhak nɛ ntɨ amɛm kpák. Yɛ̌ ɔ̌ghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri ná, kɛ́p ntɨ. Kʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn ngati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, nɛ ɔbhɔŋ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn Mandɛm achyɛ wɔ ɔ́nkʉ.
55004006	Mbák chí mɛ, nɛpɛ́m ɛna nɛ́naŋ nɛ́rɔ̀ŋ mbɔ nnya anɛ bárɔ̀ŋ bɛchyɛ akap ntá Mandɛm nɛ yɔ. Mandú mpok mɛ̌rɔ mmɨk.
55004007	Mɛ, nnu sayri. Njɛt, nkóŋó barak Mandɛm tɛ ndǔ ngwɛntí nkɛ kɛmɛ mmʉɛt ansɛm.
55004008	Nɛ́nɛ, nsáy ǎnoŋ mɛ. Nsáy yɔ, Yesu Acha mmu achí ntaŋá manyé kɛ áchyɛ̀ mburɛ mɛ yɔ́ ndǔ ɛwak ɛnɛ yi ápɛtnsɛm. Yi achi chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Nɛ nsáy yɔ apu chí ntá ya mɛ awánti. Achí ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ anɛ ánòŋ nɛpɛrɛ́nsɛm Yesu nɛ maŋák.
55004009	Nu bɛ́twɔ, kɛ́chɔŋti mpok.
55004010	Démas achɛn mɛ arɔ́, arɔŋ ɛtɔk Tɛsalónika mbɔnyunɛ akɔŋ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk. Krésens arɔŋ Galéshia, arɔŋ Táytɔs, nɛ Damátia.
55004011	Ndiɛrɛ Lukas kɛ áchi nɛ mɛ. Mpok ɔ́yaŋ bɛ́twɔ, sɔt Mák twɔ́ nɛ yi mbɔnyunɛ ǎkwak chɔŋ mɛ fá.
55004012	Ntó Tíkíkɔs andɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs.
55004013	Fʉɛ́t Troas sɔt nkú mbʉ̌ɛ́p ya anɛ ndɔ́ ntá Kápɔs. Sɔt bɛkáti ɛbha nkwɔ́, sayri sayri nkúbhɛ́ nnya nɛ́nɛ́p ɛnɛ́ básɨ́ŋɨ́ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm arɛ́.
55004014	Bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn Aleksánda ntɛnátɛn ákʉ́ mɛ bɛ́yǎ bɛcha. Kɛ chɔŋ Acha Yesu anchyɛ yi nsáy ndu bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi.
55004015	Yi abhɨkɨ yaŋ nyaka bɛghok Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ sɛ̌ghàti bho wáwák. Wɔ mbɔŋ ɔbhɔŋ bɛ́kɛm mmʉɛt nɛ yi.
55004016	Ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ mbɨ ɛnɛ́n nchwé amɛm áchá manyé bɛ ntáŋá mmʉɛt, yɛ̌ mmu apú nyaka nɛ mɛ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abʉɛ́ mɛ. Mandɛm ámfóŋóri bhɔ́.
55004017	Bǒ mankɛm bábʉɛ mɛ, kɛ Yesu Acha abhɨkɨ rɔ mɛ. Achi nɛ mɛ mpoknkɛm ankwaka nɔkɔ mɛ ndu áchyɛ mɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ́gháti bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ yi. Ngátí bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nkɛm bɛ́ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl mángók. Yesu afɛ́rɛ́ mɛ ndu nɛwú nkwɔ, afɛrɛ mɛ anyǔ nkʉ.
55004018	Chɔŋ Yesu Acha amfɛrɛ mɛ ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbɛ́pti ɛnyɨŋ, ampɛmɛ mɛ bɛ́ mbák amfay nɛ yí mmu achí Mfɔ bo Mandɛm. Kɛnókó kɛ́mbák nɛ yi mpoknkɛm, Amen.
55004019	Kaká mɛ Príska nɛ Akwíla. Kaká ɛfo ɛnɛ́ Ɔnɛsifórɔs nkwɔ́.
55004020	Ɛrástɔs arɔp ɛtɔk Kɔ́rint. Ndɔ́ Trofímɔs ɛtɔk Milɛ́tɔs mbɔnyunɛ ǎme.
55004021	Nu bɛ́twɔ ndǔ mpok anɛ mbaŋ ábhɨ́kɨ́ re bho bɛ́kwɛn tontó. Nɔ́ chí ndǔ mpok nnɛ́m nɛbháŋ. Ɛbúlɔs nɛ Púdɛns nɛ Láinɔs nɛ Kláúdia nɛ bo nkwɔ́ Yesu báchak fá Rom báto wɔ bakak.
55004022	Yesu Acha ámbák nɛ wɔ. Bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm mɛ́mbák nɛ be mankɛm.
56001001	Mɛ Pɔ̌l, nkʉbɛtɨk Mandɛm nɛ mǔnto Yesu Kristo kɛ nchi nsɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Bɛtɨk ɛbha chí bɛ́kwak bo abhɛn Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ bɛ́ mámbák abhi bɛ mánsɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ Yesu sayri, nɛ bɛ́kʉ bɔ́ mándɨŋɨ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ Yesu átɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka. Ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ̀ bo mámbʉrɛ bapɛ́m ayap mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm áyàŋ.
56001002	Ɛ́nkʉ mámbaka ntɨ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp ɛ̌ti nɛpɛmɛ́ nɔ tɛndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt, nɛ Mandɛm ápú sense.
56001003	Mpok Mandɛm anɛ ápɛmɛ bhɛsɛ́ afyɛ́ ákwáy nɔkɔ, akʉ bo mándɨŋɨ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ́n bɛ́fʉɛ́t ndu Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Yesu anɛ yi afyɛ́ amɔ́ya bɛ ngati bho.
56001004	Táytɔs, ɔ́chí mɔ́wa mbɔnyunɛ ɔbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu mbɔ mɛ. Mandɛm mmu achi Ɛta nɛ Yesu Kristo Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ mántɔŋ wɔ bɛrɨ̌ndu, manchyɛ wɔ kpák.
56001005	Ntí anɛ ndɔ́ wɔ Krɛt chí bɛ ɔ́nyábhɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ mɛ́nyábhɛ arɛ́, nɛ bɛ ɔ́mfyɛ́ bǒ batí bɛkɛrɛ́ Mandɛm ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔkɔ́ Krɛt. Kʉ nɔ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔnyu ngátí wɔ.
56001006	Mǔnti chí mmu anɛ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́pu nɛ yi, abhɔŋ bɛ́bhɔ́ŋ chi ngɔrɛ́ amɔt, chí mmu anɛ bɔ̌bhi mánókó nɛ mmu apú kwáy bɛ́ji bhɔ́ bɛ́ bábhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ kɛnókó nɛ máyap nɛ ɛtayap.
56001007	Tɛ̌ndu mǔnti bo Mandɛm chí mmu anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhi nta yi, bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́bhak nɛ yi, abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́bhak mmǔ mpányu, abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́bhak mmu ɛchókóntɨ, abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́bhak nnyǔmɛ́m, abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛ́bhak mmu anɛ átɔ̀ŋ bɛtaŋ, abhɔŋ bɛ́bhak chí sayri nɛ bho. Abhɔŋ nkwɔ́ bɛ́bhak mmu anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ ngoŋó nkáp nɛ apú kʉ bapu ɛ̌ti nkáp.
56001008	Mmǔ ntí bo Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛbhak mmu anɛ ásɔ̀t mankɔ sayri, mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ maŋák bɛkʉ bɛrɨ, mmǔ anɛ ákɛ̀m mmʉɛt sayri, mmǔ anɛ áchí chak bɛsí Mandɛm bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛ bo báchák. Abhɔŋ bɛbhak nyáŋá, nɛ mmǔ ntɨ ɛnɛn nɛpu to yi ankʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́twɔ̀ yi nɛ áyɔ́mɛ.
56001009	Nɛ bɛ́rɔ́ŋ ndu ngwɛ́nti, mǔnti bo Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛ́kɛ́m Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu nɛ bɛtaŋ mbɔ ndu sɛ́tɔ́ŋ. Mbok yɔ́ achí tɛtɛp nɛ ɛnyumɔt mpoknkɛm. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kwàk mǔnti ámfyɛ́ bo ntɨ ndu átɔ̀ŋ bhɔ, ɛ́mpɛt ɛ́nkwak yi ányúrɛ́ bo abhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́pú ndɔ́ŋ ámɔ́t nɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
56001010	Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ, bɛyǎ bo bátɔ̀ŋ nɛtaŋántɨ, sayri sayri mbɔk bo Israɛl abhɛn mánóko mbok Yesu Kristo. Bárɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ntí nɛ nnɛt nɛ bárwɔ̀ bo bɛ mánókó kɛ́mbwɔ́bhɛ́ kap.
56001011	Ɔ́bhɔ̌ŋ bɛkʉ bǒbhɔ́ mánchók manyu yap. Bátɔ̀ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bábhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ bɛtɔŋ, mánchɔŋti nɔkɔ batí bo mankɛm ndǔ mbɔk manɛrɛ́kɛt bɛ mándɔ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu. Bákʉ̀ nɔ, chi bɛsɔt bakáp ntá bho, ɛnɛ́ ɛyɔ chí ɛnyɨŋɨ́ ntíánwɔ́p.
56001012	Mbɔ̌ŋ mmu Krɛt wap amɔt, anɛ básɔ́rɛ́ mbɔ ndɨŋɨndak arɛm ɛ̌ti yap tɛntɛp bɛ, “Bǒ Krɛt báchí basěnsi mpoknkɛm! Báchi nyǎbhɨ, bábhɔ̀t abhɔt, mányiɛ nɔkɔ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ ngoŋo.”
56001013	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu wu árɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti bǒ ɛtɔk ɛyi Krɛt ɛ́chí tɛtɛp. Ɔbhɔŋ yɛ bɛghati bhɔ sayri bɛ mándɔ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bhap. Kʉ nɔ bɛ mankɛm Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ bɛtaŋ,
56001014	mámfɛrɛ ntí ndu bakǎy bapu amɛn bo Israɛl nɛ ndǔ bɛbhé ɛbhɛ́n bo abhɛn bápú koŋo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Yesu báfyɛ́.
56001015	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́rɨ ntá mmu anɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛ́chi pɛ́pɛ́p, kɛ ntá mmu anɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛ́pú pɛ́pɛ́p nɛ abhɨkɨ noko Yesu, ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́rɨrɨ ɛpu. Bɛ́rɛm tɛtɛp, nkaysi yap nɛ batɨ̌ yap ánáŋ áchɔ́ŋɔ amɛm.
56001016	Bárɛ̀m bɛ́ bárɨŋɨ Mandɛm, kɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɔ́ bákʉ̀ bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ́ bábhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ yi. Bábɛp báchá, bátàŋ ntí nɛ Mandɛm, nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bɔ́ bákwày bɛ́kʉ ɛ́pú.
56002001	Kɛ wɔ Táytɔs, ɔbhɔŋ bɛtɔŋ bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́kɔ̀ ndɔŋ amɔt nɛ nɛtɔ́ŋ ɛnɛ́n tɛtɛp.
56002002	Ghatí baséansi abhɛn babhakanɛm bɛ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛkɛm mmʉɛt nɛ bɛ mámbʉrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bo báchyɛ̀ bhɔ kɛnókó. Ghatí bhɔ bɛ bábhɔŋ bɛtɔŋ bɛ bábhɔ̌ŋ kɛboŋ, mánkɛm baraká Mandɛm ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɛ́yàŋ nɛ bɛ bábhɔŋ bɛbhɔŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ.
56002003	Ghatí baséansi baghɔrɛ́ nkwɔ bɛ mambʉrɛ bapɛ́m yap ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ átɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ báchyɛ̀ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Bǎkɛ́ rɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti batɨ nɛ bǎkɛ́ bhak manyǔmɛ́m. Tɔ́ŋ bo báchák bɛ́kʉ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ.
56002004	Tɔ́ŋ yɛ̌ nɛŋɔkɔ́ baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn bákòŋo bhɔ́ ansɛm bɛ mánkɔŋ manɛ́m abhap nɛ bɔ̌bhap.
56002005	Kwak bɔ mámbak mbɔ bo abhɛn babhɔŋɔ kɛboŋ nɛ bákɛ̀mʉɛt bɛ bákɛ́ fu nɛfí. Bǎbhɔŋ bɛtɔŋ bhɔ bɛ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyu bákɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhap mántɔŋ ɛrɨ́tí ɛpɨŋ ntá bo abhɛn bachi arɛ, nɛ bɛ mámbɔ́ŋ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt nɛ manɛ́m abhap. Mámbák ɛnyu yɔ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ kwáy bɛrɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm.
56002006	Ghatí bɛsakábho sayri bɛ mántɔ́ŋ bɛ bábhɔŋ kɛboŋ nɛ bɛ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ ndu bákɛ̀m mmʉɛt.
56002007	Wɔmbɔŋ tɔ́ŋ bɔ́ ɛrɨ́tí ɛpɨŋ. Kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛrɨ. Mpok ɔ́tɔ̀ŋ bɔ, kʉ mándɨŋɨ bɛ́ ɔ̌chyɛ chi Mandɛm kɛnókó nɛ bɛ ɔ̌kwàk bɔ kwak. Kʉ bɔ́ mándɨŋɨ bɛ ɔ̌kʉ̀ sayri.
56002008	Bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛ bɛbhɔŋ bɛbhák ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ manyu ánchók bo nɛ ntíánwɔ́p ámbák nɛ bo abhɛ́n bápú ka nɛ wɔ ndu bábhɨkɨ bhɔŋ mbi bɛrɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ.
56002009	Ghatí bo abhɛn báchí basɛm bɛ ɛ́rɨ mángók nɔkɔ bachi bhap ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. Ɛrɨ bɛ mámbɔŋ ntɨ bɛkʉ bachi bhap mámbɔŋ maŋák nɛ bhɔ mpoknkɛm nɛ bɛ bákɛ́ kɛmɛ bhɔ ɛyɔŋ anyu.
56002010	Bákɛ́ sɔt mɛnyɨŋɨ́ bachi bhap ansɛm ansɛm. Bábhɔŋ bɛtɔŋ bachi bhap bɛ báchi bo bɛsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ bhɔ sayri. Ɛpɨŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ bɔ mántɔŋ ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bákʉ̀ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bátɔ́ŋ bɔ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm mmu ápɛ̀mɛ bhɛsɛ bɛrɨ, ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bo bachak bákway bɛbhɔŋ ɛkwak bɛ́kóŋo bhɔ.
56002011	Ntí anɛ bo bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhʉrɛ bapɛm ayap ɛnyu ɛyɔ chi bɛ Mandɛm atɔ̌ŋ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi ndu áchyɛ́ mbi anɛ bo mankɛm bákway bɛfʉɛt arɛ, yi ampɛmɛ bhɔ.
56002012	Bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́ndɔ́ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo abhɛn bábhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm bákʉ̀, bɛ́ sɛ́ndɔ́ bɛfyɛ ngoŋo ndu mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ̀ bo maŋák fá amɨk.
