Bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ nkwɔ bɛ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ fá amɨk, sɛbhɔŋ bɛ́rɨŋɨ ndu sɛ́kɛ̀mmʉɛt bɛ́kʉ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí chak bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ bɛbhʉɛrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm áyàŋ.
56002013	Ndu sɛ́kʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ, sɛ́bháká ntɨ ndu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛrɨ ɛcha. Sɛ́bhaka ntɨ bɛ kɛnɛ́m ɛkɛn kɛbhesi chɔŋ nɛ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm ywɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Mmu ápɛ̀mɛ bhɛsɛ.
56002014	Yesu achyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni bɛ́fɛ́rɛ bhɛsɛ ndǔ bɛtaŋá bɛbʉ́ mɛnkɛm nɛ ndu bɛso batɨ ywɛsɛ. Akʉ nɔ, bɛ sɛ́mbák bǒbhi yímbɔŋ, nɔ chi bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛkʉ chi bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ.
56002015	Tɔ́ŋ yɛ bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn. Fíɛ́ bhɔ́ ntɨ nɛ ghatí bhɔ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bhap. Kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ́ wɔ mɛnkɛm. Ɔ́kɛ́ rɔ yɛ̌ mmu ámbyák wɔ.
56003001	Táytɔs, ghatí bakoŋo Yesu bɛ mámbɔŋ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt nta bo bati ɛtɔk nɛ bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfay yap. Bákɛ́ tɔ́ŋ nɛtaŋántɨ nɛ bɛ́ ɛ́mbák wɨkɨrɨk nta yap bɛ́kʉ bɛtɨk nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt.
56003002	Ghatí bhɔ́ bɛ mmu ákɛ́ rɛm ndak abʉ́abʉ ɛ̌ti ntɨ, nɛ bɛ mánchɔ́kɔ́ sayri nɛ batɨ, mámbak ndu kpak nɛ batɨ. Ɛrɨ mámbɔ́ŋ nɛsɛptímʉɛt bɛsí bo mankɛm.
56003003	Ghatí bhɔ́ ɛnyu yɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ ndǔ mpok anɛ áfúɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, bɛsɛ babhɔŋ sɛ́chí nyaka amɨ́k nɛ́mɛ́ nɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ baraka Mandɛm. Sɛ́tàŋ nyaka ntí. Nɛ bo bárwɔ̀ nyaka bhɛsɛ sɛ́nkʉ́ nɔkɔ bɛbʉ́. Sɛ́bhák ndǔ kɛsɛmɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ ɛ́nŋwaka bɛ́ sɛ́nkʉ. Sɛ́kaysi nyaka bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́chyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ maŋák. Sɛ́kʉ̀ nyaka bɛbʉ́ nɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋ mpap amɨ́k. Bo bápàp nyaka bhɛsɛ, bɛsɛ́ nkwɔ sɛ́mpap nɔkɔ batɨ.
56003004	Kɛ Mandɛm Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ́ átɔ́ŋ nɔkɔ bhɛsɛ́ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ ɛbhi nɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛyi,
56003005	apɛmɛ bhɛsɛ. Ɛ́pú nyaka chí bɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ bɛrɨtí mɛnyɨŋ, chi ɛ̌ti ntínso ɛni. Apɛ́mɛ́ bhɛsɛ́ ndu ákʉ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ yi áfɛ́rɛ́ bhɛsɛ́ bɛbʉ́ antɨ, akʉ sɛ́rɔp chí bo bakɔ abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ.
56003006	Mandɛm anɛ, apɛrɛ́ chyɛ mmu ɛnyɨŋ, ǎchyɛ kɛrɔ mbɔk ansɛm, achyɛ bɛsɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ tontó bɛfʉɛt ntá Mɔ́ywi, Yesu Kristo Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ́,
56003007	bɛ ankʉ sɛmbak chak bɛsí Mandɛm ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi. Akʉ nɔ bɛ́ sɛmbak bɔ̌bhi, sɛ́mbáká ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ sɛmbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
56003008	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhɛn ngátí nɛ́ wɔ bɛ́chí tɛtɛp. Nchi yaŋ yɛ bɛ ɔ́ngáti bo abhɛn mánoko Mandɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sayri bɛ mámfyɛ́ ntí bɛ́kʉ bɛrɨ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɨ tontó nɛ bɛ́kwàk yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
56003009	Kɛ ɔbhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́kɛm kɛfě nɛ bo ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́bhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ ntí nɛ nnɛt, nɛ ɛ̌ti manyɛ́n bachǐmbɨ. Kɛ́ táŋ nɛ bho ɛ̌ti bɛbhé ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ nyaka Moses. Bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ apú kwak yɛ̌ mmu, nɛ bɛ́bɛp tontó.
56003010	Ghatí mmu anɛ átwɔ̀ nɛ ákɔ́rɛ́ ándɔ́ barak ákɔ́rɛ́., Mbák ɔ́ngátí yí ndɔŋ amɔt, ndɔŋ ɛ́pay, abhɨkɨ ghók, fɛrɛ́ nti nɛ yi.
56003011	Ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ nkaysi ɛnyǔ mmu wu apú chak. Ǎkʉ bɛbʉ́ mpǒknkɛm nɛ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́chí nɛ yi.
56003012	Mɛ̌tò wɔ mmu awu. Mbák ɛ́pú Atɛ́mas, chɔŋ ɛ́mbak Tíkíkɔs. Nɛghɔ́ anɛ ɔ́ghɔ́ mmu wap, ɔ́kɛ́ nɔ́k bɛ́twɔ ayak ndu bɛtɛmɛri mɛ ɛtɔk Nikópolis. Arɛ́ kɛ̌ mɛ̌bhák mpok manyiɛp áyá nɛ mbǎŋ ǎkwɛn tontó.
56003013	Mpok Sɛ́nas ntaŋá manyé nɛ Apólos báté bɛ́rɔ́ŋ nɛkɔ, kʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ́ghɔ bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhɨkɨ chɛp bɔ́ ndǔ nɛkɔ ɛnap.
56003014	Bǒ bhɛsɛ chi bǒ Mandɛm nɛ bábhɔŋ bɛ́fyɛ ntí ndu bɛkʉ bɛrɨ, bɛ́ ɛ́kɛ́ be bhɔ mmʉɛt bɛ́kwak bo abhɛn ɛyap ɛ́pú. Bákɛ́ bhák mbɔ mmu anɛ ápú kʉ bɛrɨ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni.
56003015	Bo abhɛn báchi fá nɛ mɛ bátó wɔ bakak. Kaká bǒ nkwɔ́ abhɛn bákɔ́ŋ bhɛsɛ́ nɛ manoko ɛnyumɔt mbɔ bɛsɛ. Mandɛm ántɔ́ŋ bé bɛrɨ̌ndu.
57001001	Mɛ Pɔ̌l, mǔkɛnɔŋ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí fá nɛ mɔ́mayɛsɛ Tímɔti. Filɛmɔn, nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛ anɛ ɛkɔŋ, nɛ ntɨ nkʉbɛtɨk ywɛsɛ.
57001002	Kaká mɔmáyɛsɛ Afia, nɛ Akipɔs, ntɨ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu Yesu mbɔ bhɛsɛ, nɛ ɔ́nkaka bǒnkwɔ abhɛn báchɛ̀m nɔkɔ ɛkɛt ɛyɛ ndu mɛnɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm.
57001003	Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha mántɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu mánchyɛ be kpák.
57001004	Filɛmɔn, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt nchí kaka Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yɛ,
57001005	mbɔnyunɛ nchí ghok ɛ̌ti ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ bo Mandɛm, nɛ ɛnyu ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Yesu Acha.
57001006	Nɛ nchí nɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm bɛ ɔ́nchɛ́m mmʉɛt nɛ batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ ɔ́ndɔ́k nɔ́kɔ́ chi ambɨ, nɛ bɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkwak wɔ ɔ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ ndu sɛbharɛ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo.
57001007	Manɔ́, ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛkɔŋ nɛ batǐ bǒnkwɔ ɛ́chyɛ̀ mɛ bɛyǎ maŋák nɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́ tontó mbɔnyunɛ ɔ́kʉ́ batɨ̌ bo Mandɛm mankɛm ataŋ amɛm.
57001008	Ndu mbárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo, nchí kway bɛghati wɔ ɔ́nkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ.
57001009	Yɛ̌ nɔ, ɛ̌ti ɛkɔŋ, mɛ Pɔ̌l, mmǔ nsensi nɛ mǔkɛnɔŋ nɛ́nɛ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo, nchí nɨk wɔ chi mmʉɛt.
57001010	Nchí nɨkmʉɛt ntá yɛ ɛ̌ti mɔ́wa Ɔnɛ́simɔs mmu ndɔ́bhɛ́ ɛtayi fá amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
57001011	Ndǔ mpok anɛ áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, apú nyaka yɛ̌nyɨŋ ntá yɛ, kɛ nɛ́nɛ achí mmu anɛ ákway bɛkwak wɔ, nɛ ǎkwáy bɛkwak mɛ nkwɔ.
57001012	Nchí to yi ampɛtnsɛm ntá yɛ, nɛ ɛchi mbɔ bɛ ntɨ ɛna kɛ mɛ̌tò nɔ ntá yɛ.
57001013	Mbʉ́ nkɔŋ bɛ yi andɔp fá ánkwáká nɔ́kɔ́ mɛ ndǔ kɛnɔŋ ɛkɛ́nɛ nchí arɛ ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́. Mbʉ yi arɔp fá bɛkwak mɛ ndǔ ntí ywɛ.
57001014	Kɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ bɛkʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ mɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ nkʉ. Ɛ́rɨ bɛ́ bɛrɨ ɛbhɛn ɔ́kʉ̀ mɛ́mfú chi wɔmbɔŋ antɨ, kɛbhak bɛ mɛ̌jirɛ wɔ jirɛ.
57001015	Ngufú, ɛ́fákárí nyaka bɛ Onɛ́simɔs ándɔ́ wɔ ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ mpok chi bɛ ámpɛ́tnsɛm ntá yɛ ndu nté anɛ yi ákway bɛbhak nɛ wɔ mpoknkɛm.
57001016	Yi apɛt apu chi ndiɛrɛ nsɛm. Acha nsɛm nɛ́nɛ. Arɔp chi ntɨ manɔ́ anɛ ɔ́kwáy bɛkɔŋ. Nkɔŋ yi tontó, kɛ ɔbhɔ̌ŋ mbɔŋ bɛkɔŋ yi ɛncha ɛnyu ɛnɛ nkɔ́ŋɔ́ yi. Achí nsɛm aywɛ, apɛt abhak ntɨ manɔ́ ntá yɛ ndu ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Acha mbɔ wɔ.
57001017	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, mbák ɔsɔt mɛ mbɔ ntɨ nkʉbɛtɨk Kristo, yi ánáŋ ántwɔ́ awu, syɛpti yi nɛ maŋák nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu ɔ́syɛpti nɔkɔ mɛ.
57001018	Yɛ̌ ákʉ́ wɔ chi ɛnyɨŋ, yɛ̌ ǎkɛ̀m wɔ chi barɛm, fyɛ́ mɔ́ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna.
57001019	Mɛmbɔ̌ŋ Pɔ̌l kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nɛ awɔ́ wa bɛ́ chɔŋ ńkwɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ barɛm amɛn Ɔnɛ́simɔs ákɛ̀m wɔ. Nɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ bɛrɛm bɛ ɔ̌kɛ̀m mɛ barɛm nkwɔ, nɛ barɛmɛ́ mɔ chi nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ ɛnɛ.
57001020	Manɔ́, kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ntá ya ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu Acha. Kʉ mbɔ ntɨ mmǔ Kristo bɛ ntɨ nɛ́mpɔ́p mɛ amɛm.
57001021	Ndu nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti-nɛ, mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛcháy nɛ wɔ mbɔnyunɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ chɔŋ ɔ́nkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́yàŋ wɔ ɔ́nkʉ, nɛ ɔ́nkʉ mbɔŋ ɛncha ɛnyu ɛnɛ mɛ́yàŋ.
57001022	Mpɛt nchí yaŋ bɛ ɔ́ngoko mɔ́kɛt ɔmbʉrɛ ntá ya. Nnókó bɛ́ chɔŋ Mandɛm angók nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnɛka, ankʉ ńtwɔ awu.
57001023	Ɛpáfras, ntɨ mǔkɛnɔŋ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo ǎtò wɔ bakak.
57001024	Mák nɛ Arístakɔs nɛ Demas nɛ Lukas, batɨ̌ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk Mandɛm, bátò bhe bakak nkwɔ́.
57001025	Bɛrɨ̌ndu Yesu Kristo Acha mɛ́mbak nɛ bhe.
58001001	Ndǔ mpok anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, Mandɛm ǎfʉ̀ɛt nyaka ntá barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bhi ndu bɛrɛm kɛpɨ ntá bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ. Akʉ́ nɔ ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ nɛ ndǔ bɛyǎ babhi.
58001002	Kɛ ndǔ manywɔp anɛ ɛchɔŋ, anɛ́ achí kɛkwɔt nɛ ngwɛnti mmɨk, afʉɛ́t chi ntá Mɔ́ywi kɛ ǎrɛ̀m kɛpɨ ntá yɛsɛ. Yí kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ bɛ́ ámbák mmu anɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhak ɛbhi. Nɛ afʉɛ́t chí ntá yi kɛ ǎghoko yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
58001003	Yí amʉ́ɛ́t kɛ̌ kɛnɛ́m Mandɛm kɛ́tɔ̀ŋ kpoŋoroŋ nɛ ɛnyǔ mmu Mandɛm achi, nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu mmu wu kɛ yi achi. Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛbhɔŋ bɛtaŋ nɛ yɔ kɛ yi ásɔ̀t bɛkɛm mmɨk nkɛm. Mpok yi ánáŋá bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ Mandɛm amfoŋori bɛbʉ́ bho bɛ mámbák pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí bhi, akó amfay achɔkɔ ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm Mandɛm mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm.
58001004	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, Mandɛm akʉ bɛ́ Mɔ́ywi ánchá bɔángɛl nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ nnyɛ́n ɛnɛn yi áchyɛ́ yi nɛcha ɛnɛn bɔángɛl.
58001005	Yɛ̌ ángɛl apú anɛ Mandɛm ághátí yi bɛ, “Wɔ, ɔchí Mɔ́wa, nɛ ɛchɔŋ nchí rɛm bɛ ndɔp Ɛtayɛ.” Nɛ yɛ̌ chí bɛ́rɛ́m bɛ, “Chɔŋ mbak Ɛtayi nɛ ɔ́mbak Mɔ́wa”, abhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm ntá bɔángɛl.
58001006	Nɛ yɛ̌ chí mpok Mandɛm átó Mmɔ̌ mbɨ ywi fá amɨk, arɛm chí bɛ́ bɔángɛl abhi mankɛm mánchyɛ́ Mɔ́ywi kɛnókó.
58001007	Ɛ̌ti bɔángɛl, yi ǎrɛ̀m bɛ́ ákʉ̀ bɔ mambak mbɔ mbʉ́ɛ́p, ákʉ̀ bǒ bɛtok abhi mámbák mbɔ bárɨ́-ngo.
58001008	Kɛ ntá Mɔ́ywi arɛm chi bɛ, “Ɛ̌ Mandɛm, kɛfɔ ɛkɛ kɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Mpok ɔ́kɛ̀m bǒbhɛ, ɔ́kʉ̀ nɔ ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛchí chak.
58001009	Ɔkɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛchí chak nɛ ɔpap ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ bo bapu bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé. Mɛ Mandɛm ywɛ nkʉ yɛ wɔ ɔ́mbɔ́ŋ maŋák mbɔnyunɛ nchyɛ́ wɔ kɛnókó ɛkɛ́n kɛ́chá ɛkɛn mamʉɛrɛ bhɛ mankɛm.”
58001010	Mandɛm apɛt arɛm ntá Mɔ́ywi bɛ, “Wɔ, Acha, kɛ ɔ́ghókó mmɨk ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt. Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi amfay, chí awɔ-bɛtɨk aywɛ.
58001011	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛ́fʉɛ̀rɛ fʉɛt, kɛ wɔ ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Chɔŋ bɔ́ mɛnkɛm mɛ́nkɔk mɛndɔp mbɔ bɛsɨ ndɛn.
58001012	Chɔŋ ɔ́mpɛt bhɔ́ ɔ́mfɛrɛ mbɔ bɛsɨ́ ndɛn ɛbhɛn mmu áwùpsi, kɛ wɔ ɔchí ɛnyumɔt mpoknkɛm, nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.”
58001013	Kɛ ntɨkɨ ángɛl Mandɛm ánáŋ ághátí yi bɛ, “Chɔkɔ́ fá ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm awa kpatɛ nkʉ bǒmpap abhɛ mándɔp mbɔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ ɔ́nyàŋa bɛkak arɛ?”
58001014	Pú bɔ́ mankɛm bachi chi bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk ɛbhi nɛ Mandɛm átò bhɔ bɛ mankwak bǒ abhɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛpɛmɛ?
58002001	Ndu ɛchi yɛ̌ nɔ, sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛsɔt mpok sɛ́mbʉrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́náŋ sɛ́ghɔ́kɔ́ bɛ sɛ́kɛ́ rɔ bhɔ sɛnɛm ɛbhɨ.
58002002	Tɛ̌ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔángɛl barɛmɛ bɛchi nyaka tɛtɛp, nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ abhɨkɨ bhʉɛrɛ bhɔ nɛ mmu anɛ átàŋ ntí, abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka ntɛmsi anɛ ákwáy nɛ yi,
58002003	ná sɛ́kwày bɛbʉɛ ntɛmsi anɛ átwɔ̀ mbák sɛ́mbyak ɛrɛmɛ́ nɛpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ bɛ́pɛ́mɛ́ bhɛsɛ? Mbɔŋ Yesu Acha kɛ áyámbɨ bɛrɛm kpoŋoroŋ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm ápɛ̀mɛ bho, kɛ bo abhɛn bághókó bákʉ bɛsɛ sɛndɨŋɨ bɛ ɛchi tɛtɛp.
58002004	Mandɛm are tɔ́ŋ bɛrɨŋ, ankʉ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu ndu bɛtɔŋ nkwɔ bɛ́ bɛchí tɛtɛp. Are fʉɛ́t nkwɔ ndǔ akap anɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ̀ bho, bɛ́kóŋo nkaysi yi.
58002005	Puyɛ̌ ntá bɔángɛl kɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ bɛtaŋ amfay mmɨk anɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m nɛ́ bɛ ǎtwɔ̀ ansɛm.
58002006	Básɨŋ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́fu amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Mandɛm Acha, nkwǎŋwaŋ chí agha anɛ ɔ́re kaysi yi? Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm chi agha anɛ ɔ́re fyɛ ntí nɛ yi?
58002007	Ndǔ mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ mpok, ɔsɛ́ptí yi bɛ bɔángɛl máncha yi. Ɔkʉ yɛ yí ámbɔ́ŋ kɛnɛ́m nɛ kɛnókó mbɔ mfɔ.
58002008	(a) Ɔchyɛ́ yi bɛtaŋ amfǎy yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.” (b) Bɛrɛm bɛ báchyɛ yi bɛtaŋ amfǎy yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɔp ɛnɛ ɛpu antɛnɛ́-yi. Kɛ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchi antɛnɛ́-yi.
58002009	Kɛ sɛ́ghɔ̀ Yesu mmu bákʉ́ bɔángɛl máncha yi ndǔ mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok. Báchyɛ́ yi kɛnɛ́m nɛ kɛnókó mbɔ mfɔ ɛ̌ti ɛsɔŋɔri nɛwú. Chi ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm kɛ yi ágú ɛ̌ti bo mankɛm.
58002010	Mandɛm kɛ ághókó yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchi ntá yi. Ndu áyàŋ nyaka bɛ bɛyǎ bho mámbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛbhak bɔ̌bhi nɛ mámbɔŋ kɛnɛ́m, ɛrɨ nyaka bɛ yi mmu ánɛ́nɛ́ bhɔ mbǐ wu ámfʉɛ́t ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri bɛ ankwáy ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi mbɔ mmǔ anɛ ákʉ̀ bɔ mámbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m.
58002011	Yesu mmu ákʉ̀ bo mambák pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm abhɔŋ chi amɔt nɛ bo abhɛn yi ákʉ́ bɛ mambák pɛ́pɛ́p. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p ndu bɛbhɨŋɨ bɔ bɛ, “Bɔ̌ma.”
58002012	Yi arɛm ntá Mandɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ ndɛm ɛ̌ti yɛ ntá bɔ̌maya mpok bǒbhɛ báchɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt, nte bɛsí bhap nchyɛ́ wɔ bakak.”
58002013	Apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ nsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm.” Nɛ bɛ, “Ghɔ́ mɛ́ nɛ́, nɛ bɔ̌ abhɛn Mandɛm achyɛ mɛ.”
58002014	Tɛ̌ndu bɔ̌ abhɛn yi arɛmɛ nɔ ɛ̌ti yap báchí bakwǎŋwaŋ, mbɔŋ Yesu ayíbhírí nyaka arɔp nkwǎ. Akʉ nɔ́ bɛ́ ámfʉɛ́t ndǔ nɛwú anchɔŋti bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋá nɛwú, nɔ chi Satan.
58002015	Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ yi ákway nyaka bɛfɛrɛ bho ndǔ bɛcháy nɛwú. Báchí nyaka basɛm ndǔ bɛcháy ɛbhɔ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap nɛnkɛm.
58002016	Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ atwɔ nyaka bɛkwak chi bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham, puyɛ̌ bɔángɛl.
58002017	Abhɔŋ yɛ bɛrɔp nyaka mbɔ bhɛsɛ bakwǎŋwaŋ ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi, bɛ́ ámbák mǔngo bachiǎkap anɛ ábhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp ami bɛsí Mandɛm ndu bɛtɨk ɛbhi nɛ bɛ ánkway bɛchyɛ akap ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bǒ mankɛm.
58002018	Tɛ̌ndu yímbɔŋ ánáŋ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ mamɔ, abhɔŋ mbi bɛkwak abhɛn mamɔ átwɔ̀ ntá yap.
58003001	Bɔ̌ma, be bho bǎchi nyáŋá, mmu anɛ achi amfay abhɨ́ŋɨ́ be bɛ mǎmbak bǒbhi. Kaysí yɛ ka mmu anɛ Yesu achi. Yi kɛ Mandɛm átó mbɔ mǔngo bachiǎkap anɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhɛn sɛ́nókó, mbɔnyu sɛ́ghàti bho kpoŋoroŋ.
58003002	Ǎbhʉ̀rɛ nyaka bariɛp ami bɛsí Mandɛm mmu áyábhɛ́ yi bɛ ambak mǔngo bachiǎkap nɛ mǔnto nkúbhɛ́ mbɔnyu Moses nkwɔ achi nyaka mmu anɛ ábhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhi amɛm ɛkɛrɛ Mandɛm.
58003003	Yesu kɛ Mandɛm ásɔ́rɛ́ bɛ abhɔŋ bɛbhɔŋ kɛnókó ancha Moses, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mmu anɛ áté ɛkɛt ábhɔ́ŋ kɛnókó acha ɛkɛt ɛnɛ yi ate.
58003004	Mmu kɛ áte yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛkɛt, kɛ Mandɛm kɛ ághókó mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm.
58003005	Moses achí nyaka mmǔ tɛtɛp ndu bɛtɨk ɛbhi mbɔ mǔbɛtok amɛm ɛkɛrɛ Mandɛm. Bɛtɨk ɛbhi bɛ́te ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛkʉ bo mándɨ́ŋɨ́ ansɛmpok.
58003006	Kɛ mbák chi Kristo, ǎkɛm ɛkɛt Ɛtayi nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt mbɔ Mɔ́ywi. Nɛ bɛsɛ bǒ Mandɛm sɛ́chí bo ɛkɛt ɛyi ɛnkɛm mbák sɛ́nté kpirí ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́sɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ sɛ́bháka ntɨ arɛ nɛ sɛ́dɛ̀p awɔ antɨ bɛ chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔŋ bɔ.
58003007	Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ bɛghok ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ árɛ̀m mbɔ ɛnyǔ ɛchí amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Ɛchɔŋ, mbák mǎngok Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi,
58003008	bǎkɛ́ gwɔt batɨ amɛm mbɔnyu bachǐmbɨ bhɛka bágwɔ́rɛ́ nyaka batɨ yap nɛ Mandɛm mpok bághàp amɛm baso. Bátáŋntɨ nɛ mɛ nɛ, mamɔ mɛ.
58003009	Mámɔ́ mɛ amɛm baso ɛnyu ɛyɔ, nɛ bághɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nkʉ́ nɛ́ntɨ́ ɛnap ndǔ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛpay.
58003010	Ɛ̌ti yɔ ntɨ nɛ́bé mɛ nɛ mkpáká bobhɔ, ndɛm bɛ, ‘Batɨ̌ yap ápɔ̀kɔ bhɔ ɛbhɨ mpoknkɛm, nɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mbi wa.’
58003011	Njɨkɨ ndǔ bɛběntɨ bɛ, ‘Bápú kway bɛchwe ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛna wáwák.’”
58003012	Bɔ̌ma, sɔt ka mpok bɛ ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka, yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ bhak anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛbɛ́ptí ntɨ, nɛ akɛka bɛ́sɨ́kɨ ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm, ɛ́nyu ɛnɛ́ yi arɔ mbi Mandɛm mmu achí nɛpɛ́m.
58003013	Sɛmtí nɔ́kɔ́ ka batɨ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp bɛ bɛbʉ́ bɛkɛ rwɔ mmǔ ywɛka ántáŋntɨ nɛ Mandɛm. Kʉ ka nɔ, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok, ɛnɛ́ nywɔp nɛ́chák nɛ́bhʉɛ́t ɛnɛ́n bábhɨŋɨ bɛ, “Ɛchɔŋ.”
58003014	Sɛ́bhɔŋ ákɔ́rɛ́ ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu Kristo ákʉ́ nta yɛsɛ mbák sɛ́ndɔ́k ambɨ bɛte kpirí ndǔ nɛsɨkɨ́ntɨ ɛnɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka nɛ yi ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt. Sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛkʉ nɔ tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti.
58003015	Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bárɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ, “Ɛchɔŋ, mbák mǎngok Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi bǎkɛ́ gwɔt batɨ amɛm mbɔ ɛnyǔ bachǐmbɨ bhɛka bátàŋ nyaka ntí nɛ Mandɛm.”
58003016	Bɔ agha bághókó nyaka Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm yɛ̌ nɔ, bátáŋ ntɨ? Pú bo Moses abhɛn yi áfú nyaka ɛtɔk Íjip nɛ bhɔ?
58003017	Bɔ agha bákʉ́ nyaka Mandɛm ambe ntɨ ndǔ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛpay? Pú bo abhɛn bákʉ́ bɛbʉ́, nɛ bágú amɛm baso?
58003018	Nɛ mpok Mandɛm áyɨ́kɨ́ arɛm bɛ, “Bápú kway bɛchwe ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛna wáwák”, ntɨkɨ bho yi árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka nɔ ɛ̌ti yap? Pú bǒ abhɛn bápú ghok nyaka yi?
58003019	Sɛ́ghɔ yɛ bɛ bápú kway nyaka bɛchwe ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko nyaka yi.
58004001	Bariɛp amɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ tɛsáy bɛ chɔŋ bǒbhi mǎnchwe ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛni abhʉɛ́t. Sɛbhɔŋ yɛ bɛsɔt mpok bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka akɛ bhak anɛ bárɛm ɛ̌ti yi bɛ abhɨkɨ kway mmu anɛ achwe ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛnɔ.
58004002	Sɛ́ghok nkwɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bo abhɛn tɛntɛp bághókó nyaka. Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ bághòk ɛ́kɛ kwak bhɔ mbɔnyunɛ batɨ yap apu nyaka arɛ.
58004003	Ndiɛrɛ bɛsɛ bho sɛ́nókó kɛ sɛ́chwè ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛnɔ, puyɛ̌ bǒ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko. Kɛ Mandɛm árɛ́m nyaka ɛ̌ti yap bɛ, “Njɨ́kɨ́ ndǔ bɛběntɨ ɛbha bɛ, ‘Bápú kway bɛchwe ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛna wáwák.’” Mandɛm arɛm nɔ yɛ̌ndu ánáŋ ánáŋá nyaka bɛghoko nɛbhʉɛt nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛnɔ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi atɨ bɛkʉ tɛ mpok anɛ yí ághókó mmɨk.
58004004	Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ ɛchi ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ, ndǔ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́fu amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm, bárɛm ɛ̌ti nywɔp ɛnɛn nɛjwi tándrámɔt bɛ, “Mandɛm anaŋa nɔkɔ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛkʉ, aywe mmʉɛ́t ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn nɛjwi tándrámɔt.”
58004005	Ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt achak amɛm ɛkáti ɛyi, Mandɛm apɛt ǎrɛm nyaka bɛ, “Bɔ́ bápú kway bɛchwe ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛna wáwák.”
58004006	Mbi anɛ báchwè ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt Mandɛm abhʉɛ́t yɛ fúú. Kɛ bo abhɛn baghoko Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ mpok ɛyɔ bábhɨ́kɨ́ chwe arɛ ɛ̌ti nɛtaŋántɨ ɛnap.
58004007	Ɛ̌ti yɔ, Mandɛm afyɛ́ mpok achak anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ, “Ɛchɔŋ”. Debhít kɛ ákʉ́ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm afʉɛt nyaka ntá yi tɛntɛp arɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mánáŋ bárɛ́mɛ́ bɛ yi arɛm bɛ, “Ɛchɔŋ, mpok bǎghoko ɛyɔŋ ɛyi, bǎkɛ́ gwɔt ntɨ.”
58004008	Mbɔ bo abhɛn Jóshua ásɔ́rɛ́ achwe ɛtɔk Kánǎn nɛ bhɔ bábhɔ̌ŋ nyaka nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt tɛtɛp, mbʉ Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ rɛm ɛ̌ti mpok nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt achak.
58004009	Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ yɛ bɛ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt nɛchak nɛbhʉɛt ambɨ ntá bo Mandɛm.
58004010	Yɛ̌ agha anɛ áchwe ndu nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt Mandɛm, ǎywɛ́mʉɛt ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhi mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋ nyaka nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt mpok ánáŋá bɛghoko mmɨk.
58004011	Sɛ́nú yɛ bɛchwe ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛnɔ bɛ ɛnyǔ nɛtaŋa ntɨ bo Israɛl nɛ́kɛ́ kʉ yɛ̌ mmu ywɛsɛ ankwɛn.
58004012	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛchi nɛpɛ́m nɛ ɛbhɔŋ bɛtaŋ. Ɛ́chap ɛcha yɛ̌ntɨkɨ akparɛnja nsɛm ɛpay. Ɛ́chwè tɛ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ nɛpɛ́m nkwǎ nɛ́chɛm nɛ ɛfóŋó ɛyi. Ɛ́chwè mmu antɨ ɛ́ntɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi átɨ́ bɛkʉ.
58004013	Yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́pú bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ bɛsí Mandɛm. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi aghoko ɛchi kpoŋoroŋ bɛsí bhi. Ntá yi kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛsɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm ntí anɛ yi ákʉ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́.
58004014	Sɛ́ghɔ bɛ sɛbhɔŋ mǔngo bachiǎkap anɛ ákó áchí amfay nɛ Mandɛm. Yí chí Yesu, Mmɔ Mandɛm. Sɛ́ndɔ́k yɛ ambɨ bɛkɛm sayri mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́nókó ɛ̌ti yi.
58004015	Mǔngo bachiǎkap ywɛsɛ chi mmu anɛ ághɔ̀ bhɛsɛ ntínso ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bè bhɛsɛ mmʉɛt mbɔnyunɛ yímbɔŋ abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka mamɔ mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu, Yɛ̌ nɔ, akɛ kʉ bɛbʉ́.
58004016	Sɛ́ndɔ́k yɛ kɛkwɔt kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy ntá Mandɛm mmu achi ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛyi. Achí Mandɛm bɛrɨ̌ndu nɛ chɔŋ angɔ́ bhɛsɛ ntínso, antɔŋ bhɛsɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi ndu bɛkwak bhɛsɛ́ ndǔ mpok anɛ sɛ́chɛ́bhɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ.
58005001	Bo báyàp yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mǔngo bachiǎkap ndǔ nkwɔ wap, mámbʉrɛ, yi ankʉ nɔkɔ bɛtɨk Mandɛm ndǔ ntí wap. Yi kɛ ásɔ̀t yɛ akap anɛ bho nɛ akabhɛ́nya nkwɔ ánchyɛ̀ nɔkɔ ntá Mandɛm ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bho.
58005002	Arɨ́ŋɨ́ ndu ákɛ̀m sayri bo abhɛn bábhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ yɛ̌nyɨŋ nɛ abhɛn babhɔŋɔ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ tɛ̌ndu yímbɔŋ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nkwɔ bɛyǎ bɛkwɛnɛ bɛsí Mandɛm.
58005003	Abhɔŋ yɛ bɛchyɛ nɔkɔ akap ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi yímbɔŋ, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu áchyɛ̀ akap ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bo abhɛn yi áté ndǔ ntí wap.
58005004	Yɛ̌ mmu ápú chyɛ mmʉɛt kɛnókó andɛm bɛ yi ǎkway bɛbhak mǔngo bachiǎkap. Mandɛm kɛ áyap mmu, ankʉ yí ambak mǔngo bachiǎkap nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu ákʉ́ nyaka nɛ Árɔn.
58005005	Nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyǔ yɔ kɛ ɛchi nɛ Kristo. Puyɛ̌ yímbɔŋ kɛ áyóŋó nyaka mmʉɛt bɛ́ ámbák mǔngo bachiǎkap ambɔ́ŋ kɛnókó nchiakap. Mandɛm kɛ ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ yi, arɛm bɛ, “Wɔ, ɔchí Mɔ́wa, nɛ ɛchɔŋ nchí rɛm bɛ ndɔp chi Ɛtayɛ”.
58005006	Apɛt árɛ̀m nɛbhʉɛt achak bɛ, “Chɔŋ ɔ́mbak nchiakap mpoknkɛm mbɔ ɛnyu bárɛ́mɛ́ nyaka ɛ̌ti Mɛlkísɛdɛk.”
58005007	Mpok Yesu achi fá amɨk, arɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka bɛ Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ nɛwú nɛmfʉɛt yi ansɛm. Anɨkmʉɛt nɛ ntɨ nɛnkɛm kpát ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛre ko amfay, babhɛsɛ ansɛp nɔkɔ. Mandɛm aghok nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛni mbɔnyunɛ asɛ́ptí nyaka mmʉɛt, anchyɛ nɔkɔ Mandɛm kɛnókó.
58005008	Yí achi nyaka Mmɔ Mandɛm tɛtɛp, yɛ̌ nɔ, aghɔ́k bɛghok Mandɛm ndǔ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn yi ághɔ̀.
58005009	Mandɛm ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛkʉ yi ankway ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi, ayibhiri arɔp mmu anɛ áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ághòk yi.
58005010	Mandɛm afyɛ́ yi ambak ɛnyǔ mǔngo bachiǎkap anɛ Mɛlkísɛdɛk achi nyaka.
58005011	Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak ɛbhɛn nchí kway bɛrɛm ɛ̌ti Yesu mǔngo bachiǎkap ywɛsɛ. Kɛ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bè mmʉɛt bɛkʉ be mǎnjwimɛm tɛ̌ndu bǎrɔ́bhɛ́ chi bo abhɛn bapu kɛm ɛnyɨŋ ayak.
58005012	Yɛ̌ndu bǎchi bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhak batɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ́nɛ, nté yɛka ǎtɔ̀ŋ bɛ bǎbhʉɛt chi bo abhɛn mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtɔŋ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɨ ɛbhɛn mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛghɔk ɛ̌ti Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Bǎchí mbɔ mǎmbɔ abhɛn bábhʉɛt mɛnyu chi nɛ́bhɨ. Bǎpú mbɔ bǒ abhɛn bákwáy mɛnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ mbɔŋ.
58005013	Mmu anɛ ányù chi amɨ, ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ɛka ndu bɛrɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ achí mmɔ́.
58005014	Nɛnyiɛ́ mbɔŋ nɛchi chi ntá baseansi. Bɔ́ kɛ mánáŋ bághɔ́kɔ́sí mmʉɛt nɛ bárɨŋɨ ɛwupsi ɛnɛ ɛchi ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛrɨ́ nɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́bhɛ́bhɛ́.
58006001	Sɛ́ndɔ́ yɛ bɛyɨŋɨ nɔkɔ chi ndiɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɨ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo, sɛ́ndɔ́k ambɨ ndu bɛchak bɛ sɛ́nsɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ nɛjwǐmɛm ɛnɛsɛ. Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛsɔt mpok bɛrɛm ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kɛ́mɛ́ nɛka ɛnɛsɛ mbɔ ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ mmu abhɔŋ bɛtɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi, andɔ bɛkʉ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ yi chi nɛ nɛwú, nɛ bɛ mmu abhɔŋ bɛka nɛ Mandɛm.
58006002	Nɛ bɛ bábhɔŋ bɛsɔt mpok bɛrɛm ɛ̌ti nɛjwiti, nɛ ɛ̌ti ɛpɨŋ mɛ́nyáŋa bho amɔ́ anti, nɛ ɛnyǔ mbúrɛ́ Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bawú mámpɛ́tnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, nɛ ɛ̌ti nɛtáŋ anɛ mbúrɛ́ bátàŋ bo mámkpɔt manyé yap ndɔŋ amɔt ndak amay.
58006003	Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛ́tɨ́ŋɨ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ. Chɔŋ sɛ́ndɔ́k chi ambɨ mbák ɛ́chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyaŋ.
58006004	Sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ bápú kway bɛkʉ mmu anɛ arɔ mbi Mandɛm bɛ ámpɛt antɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi. Nchí rɛm ɛ̌ti ɛnyǔ mmu anɛ mánáŋ bákʉ́ amɨ́k ánɛ́nɛ́ yi, aghɔ́ akap anɛ Mandɛm ǎchyɛ̀ bǒ bhi, nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ abhak nɛ yi nkwɔ.
58006005	Ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni, anáŋ aghɔ nkwɔ bɛrɨ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù ndu Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, aghɔ́ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhàk chɔŋ ndǔ nɛŋɔkɔ́ mpok ɛnɛn nɛ́twɔ̀ ansɛm.
58006006	Mbák mmu wu ántáŋ ntí nɛ Kristo, bápú kway bɛkʉ yi ampɛt antɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi, tɛ̌ndu yi achi mbɔ mmu anɛ apɛt ágò Mmɔ Mandɛm ndǔ ɛkotákátí, anchyɛ nɔkɔ yi ntíánwɔ́p bɛsí bho, ɛnɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́twɔ̀ yi chi nɛ mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́.
58006007	Mandɛm ǎyɛt mmɨk anɛ ányù manyiɛp amɛn ákwɛ̀n arɛ, ankʉ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ́ngó, nɛnchyɛ mbwɔt ntá mmu anɛ ákwáŋá yɔ.
58006008	Kɛ mbák mmɨk ǎgò chi bɔ̌mɛnɔk nɛ tákɔ nsěnse, nɔ yɔ abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ́, ǎrɔp chi mmɨk anɛ báchɔ̀ŋti chɔŋti, nɛ ndu ngwɛnti, mánsɔŋ yɔ sɔŋ.
58006009	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, yɛ̌ndu mɛ́rɛ̀m nɔ nɛ bhe, mbɔ̌ŋ ntɨ nɛ bhe bɛ́ bǎkʉ̀ chi bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kɔ̀ ndɔŋ amɔt nɛ nɛpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm ápɛ̀mɛ bhe.
58006010	Mandɛm achi chak mpoknkɛm nɛ apu kway bɛghɔkɔntɨk bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka nɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ bǎtɔ́ŋɔ́ yi ndǔ bǎkwàk batɨ bǒnkwɔ nɛ bǎrɔ̀ŋ ambɨ bɛkʉ nɔ.
58006011	Nɛ sɛ́yàŋ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ándɔ́k ambɨ bɛtɔŋ nkúbhɛ́ ntɨ ɛnɔ tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti, nɛ bǎpú nɔ́k chɔŋ bɛbhɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhaka ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ mǎmbɔŋ.
58006012	Mpú yaŋ mǎndɔ abhɔt ánkɛ́m be. Nchí yaŋ chi bɛ mǎnkoŋo ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ bo abhɛn mánókó, nɛ bábhɔŋ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ nɛ bághaka ndǔ nté anɛ bábhɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ.
58006013	Mpok Mandɛm afyɛ́ Ábraham bariɛp, ayɨkɨ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛni yímbɔŋ, tɛ̌ndu yɛ̌ mmu apu anɛ acha yi bɛ yi ánkwáy bɛyɨkɨ ndu nnyɛ́n mmu wu.
58006014	Ayɨkɨ arɛm bɛ, “Mpú nɔ́k bɛ́yɛt wɔ, nɛ chɔŋ nchyɛ́ wɔ bɛyǎ bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ.”
58006015	Ábraham ánoŋ yɛ nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ kpát abhɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ yi.
58006016	Nkwǎŋwaŋ ǎyɨkɨ chi ndǔ nnyɛ́n mmu anɛ acha yi, nɛ mpok bo bákɛ̀m ɛpʉ́ítí, mánáŋ mányú nku, ɛpʉ́ítí ɛ́may.
58006017	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ kɛ ɛ́kʉ́ Mandɛm áyɨ́kɨ́ nyaka ndu bɛ́tɔŋ bo abhɛn bariɛp ami achi ntá yap kpoŋoroŋ bɛ bɔ́ báká ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi atɨ bɛkʉ.
58006018	Mandɛm akʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛpay ndu bɛ́fyɛ bhɛsɛ ntɨ, bɛsɛ bho sɛ́bʉɛ́ sɛ́rɔ́ŋɔ́ ntá yi bɛ yi ampɛmɛ bhɛsɛ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛpay bɛpu wupsi mbɔnyunɛ yí apú kway bɛsense. Afyɛ́ bɛsɛ ntɨ bɛ sɛkɛ rɔ bɛbhaka ntɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ.
58006019	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ sɛbhaka ntɨ arɛ ɛ́kɛ̀m bɛsɛ ɛrɨ́rɨ́ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ mbɔ ɛnyǔ ndo ákɛ̀m áchwí nɛbhʉɛt amɔt kpɛmm bɛ nnyɛ́n nɛ́kɛ pɔkɔ́ wu. Nɛbhakántɨ́ ɛnɛsɛ nɛ Yesu nɛ́kʉ́ sɛ́fʉɛ́t ɛkat sɛ́chwe tɛ amɛm mɔ́kɛrɛ kóŋ, ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm.
58006020	Yesu anáŋ ayámbɨ arɔŋ arɛ ndǔ ntí ayɛsɛ mpok yi árɔ́bhɛ́ chi mǔnti bachiǎkap anɛ mpoknkɛm mbɔ ɛnyǔ bárɛ́mɛ́ nyaka ɛ̌ti Mɛlkísɛdɛk.
58007001	Mɛlkísɛdɛk-nɛ achi nyaka mfɔ ɛtɔk Salɛm nɛ nchiakap Mandɛm Acha. Ábraham anu nyaka nɛ bɛyǎ bafɔ awáy bhɔ. Mpok yi áfú ɛbhɨ̌nɛnu ápɛ̀tnsɛm, Mɛlkísɛdɛk atɛmɛri yi, ayɛ́t yi.
58007002	Ábraham akɔrɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn yi áfú ɛbhɨ̌nɛnu nɛ bhɔ ndu baru byo, achyɛ yi ndu amɔt. Nnyɛ́n Mɛlkísɛdɛk ɛnɔ nɛ́te ndǔ “Mfɔ anɛ ákʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak.” Achi nkwɔ Mfɔ Salɛm, nɔ chi “Mfɔ anɛ áchyɛ kpák.”
58007003	Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ̌ti ɛtayi nɛ máyi nɛ nnɛrɛ́kɛt ywi nɛ mpok anɛ bábhé yi. Nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Achí nchiakap Mandɛm ngwɛnti ti mbɔ Mmɔ Mandɛm.
58007004	Ghɔ́ ká ɛnyǔ nnɛ́m mmu yi achi nyaka! Yɛ̌ndu Ábraham achi nyaka chi mbɨ anɛ bo Israɛl, akɔ́rɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi áfú ɛbhɨ̌nɛnu nɛ bhɔ ndǔ baru byo, achyɛ yi ndu amɔt.
58007005	Mbɔk bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Lɛ́vi bachi bachiǎkap Mandɛm. Ɛbhé Moses ɛ́ghàti bhɔ bɛ mánsɔt ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ amɔt ndǔ anɛ byo ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu Israɛl, yɛ̌ndu bɔ nɛ bo Israɛl mankɛm bachi bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Ábraham, nɔ chi bǒ nnɛrɛ́kɛt amɔt.
58007006	Kɛ Mɛlkísɛdɛk mmu ápú nyaka mbɔ̌ŋ mmǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Lɛ́vi asɔt nyaka ɛnyǔ akap wu nɔ Ábraham áchyɛ́ yi, ayɛ́t yi mmu Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp nɛ yi.
58007007	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu arɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mmu anɛ áyɛt ntɨ kɛ áchá mmu anɛ yi áyɛ́rɛ́.
58007008	Bɛyɨŋɨ bachiǎkap abhɛn bachi bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Lɛ́vi, bɔ́ mankɛm abhɛn básɔt akap anɛ ndu-amɔt ntá bho, bágù mbɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak. Kɛ bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ Mɛlkísɛdɛk, mmu ásɔ́rɛ́ nyaka nkwɔ akap wu, Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛsɛ bɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
58007009	Sɛ́kwáy mbɔŋ bɛ́rɛm bɛ Lɛ́vi mmu bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ bhi básɔt ɛnyǔ akap wu ntá bho, achyɛ́ nyaka ɛnyǔ akap wu ntá Mɛlkísɛdɛk tɛ̌ndu chi-mbɨ ywi Ábraham áchyɛ́ nyaka wu ntá Mɛlkísɛdɛk.
58007010	Ɛchi ɛnyuyɔ mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ re bhe nyaka Lɛ́vi mpok Mɛlkísɛdɛk atɛmɛri Ábraham. Yɛ̌ nɔ, Lɛ́vi ánáŋ achí nyaka ndǔ manoŋ Ábraham.
58007011	Mpok Mandɛm ákʉ́ bachiǎkap abhɛn bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Lɛ́vi manchyɛ bɛbhé ɛbhɛn bɛ́kwáy nɛ nkwɔ́ bachiǎkap abhɔ, mbɔ bɛtɨk ɛbhap bɛ́kway nyaka bɛkʉ bɛ bo mámbák chak mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm áyàŋ, mbʉ́ ntí apu anɛ nchiakap achak átwɔ anɛ achi mbɔ Mɛlkísɛdɛk, nɛ abhak kɛkúrí nɛ bachiǎkap abhɛn nnɛrɛ́kɛt Arɔn.
58007012	Mpok nnɛrɛ́kɛt anɛ bachiǎkap áwúpsí, ɛwúpsí ɛbhak ndu ɛbhé nkwɔ.
58007013	Mmu anɛ bárɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɛ̌ti yi afu chí ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt anɛ́ achí kɛkúrí nɛ anɛ́ yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ re fu arɛ, nɛ anɛ́ ákʉ̀ bɛtɨkɨ́ Mandɛm mbɔ nchiakap.
58007014	Ɛchi kpoŋoroŋ bɛ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu afu nyaka ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Júda, nɛ Moses ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ̌ti nnɛrɛ́kɛt wu mpok yi árɛ̀m ɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti bachiǎkap.
58007015	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛpɛt ɛ́kʉ̀ sɛngɔ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ ɛbhé ɛ́yíbhiri, chi nɛtwɔ anɛ nchiakap achak átwɔ́ mbɔ Mɛlkísɛdɛk.
58007016	Achí nchiakap, puyɛ̌ chi bɛkoŋo ɛbhé ɛnɛ ɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti nnɛrɛ́kɛt anɛ nchiakap ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛfu arɛ, kɛ chi bɛkoŋo bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛnɛn yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛchɔŋti.
58007017	Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ bárɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti Kristo bɛ, “Wɔ, ɔchí nchiakap Mandɛm ngwɛnti ti mbɔ Mɛlkísɛdɛk.”
58007018	Ndu bɛrɔŋ ambɨ, bárɔ ɛsɨ́ ɛbhé mbɔnyunɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ nyaka bɛtaŋ, ɛ́kɛpɛrɛ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ bhɛsɛ.
58007019	Nti achi bɛ ɛbhé yɔ ɛ́pú kway bɛkwak mmu ankway ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi bɛsí Mandɛm. Nɛ́nɛ, bátwɔ́ nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak ɛnɛ ɛcha bɛbhé. Yɔ́ kɛ sɛ́bháká ntɨ arɛ́ nɛ ɛ́yà bhɛsɛ kɛkwɔt nɛ Mandɛm.
58007020	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛchak ɛnɛ sɛ́ghɔ̀ ɛ̌ti nchiakap wu chi bɛ Mandɛm anyu nyaka nku bɛ Yesu ǎbhák nchiakap. Yɛ̌ nchiakap achak apú, anɛ mányú nku ɛ̌ti yi.
58007021	Ntá Yesu kɛ yi áyɨ́kɨ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́ghàti bɛsí bɛ, “Ɛta Mandɛm ayɨkɨ, nɛ ápú kway bɛyibhiri nkaysi yi. Ayɨ́kɨ́, arɛm bɛ, ‘Ɔchí nchiakap ngwɛnti ti.’”
58007022	Nku anɛ Mandɛm ányú ɛ̌ti Yesu ɛnyuyɔ ǎtɔ̀ŋ bɛ, mpok sɛ́ghɔ̀ Yesu, sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ yi achi sɛbhaŋ ɛsɛn Mandɛm achyɛ ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ nku yɔ atéé acha anɛ nsɨ.
58007023	Ɛwupsi ɛchak ɛchi bɛ, bachiǎkap abhɛn mbɨ baya nyaka nɛ ntí bɛ báchí nyaka bo abhɛn nɛwú nɛ́káŋ bɔ bákɛ́ rɔŋ ambɨ nɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhap.
58007024	Kɛ mbák chi Yesu, yi ǎrɔ̀ŋ ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhi mbɔ nchiakap mpoknkɛm, mbɔnyunɛ yi apu gu wáwák.
58007025	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, yi ǎkway bɛpɛmɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ntá yi atwɔ ntá Mandɛm ndɔŋ amɔt ndak amay, tɛ̌ndu yi achi nɛpɛ́m mpoknkɛm ndu mɛnɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yap.
58007026	Ɛnyǔ mǔngo bachiǎkap wu kɛ ákwáy yɛ bɛkwak bɛsɛ, mbɔnyunɛ yi achi nyáŋá, abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́, abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bakwap, achí kɛkúrí nɛ bǒ bɛbʉ́, nɛ achí ndǔ nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́ kɛnókó amfay.
58007027	Nti apu anɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛchyɛ akap yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp mbɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mǔngo bachiǎkap anɛ mbɨ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ǎyambɨ nyaka anchyɛ akap ɛ̌ti ɛbhi bɛbʉ́, kɛ andɔk yɛ ambɨ bɛkʉ nɔ ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bo bachak. Yesu achyɛ́ akap ndɔŋ amɔt ndak ámáy, mpok yi achyɛ mmʉɛt bɛ mango ndu ɛkotákátí.
58007028	Ɛbhé Moses ɛ́kʉ̀ nyaka bo abhɛn bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛ́chí nɛ bhɔ mámbák bǒ bagho bachiǎkap, kɛ Mandɛm anyu nku akʉ Mɔ́ywi mmu ákwáy ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi mpoknkɛm ámbák mǔngo bachiǎkap.
58008001	Mbɔ̌ŋ ntí-ndak anɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m chi bɛ sɛbhɔŋ ɛnyǔ mǔngo bachiǎkap anɛ áchɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́ kɛnókó nɛ Mandɛm mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm awu amfay.
58008002	Mǔngo bachiǎkap wu ákʉ̀ bɛtɨk ɛbhi amɛm ɛtɛm ɛnɛ ɛchi nyáŋá, ɛnɛ́ mbɔŋ Mandɛm Acha áté, kɛbhak chi nkwǎŋwaŋ.
58008003	Báfyɛ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mǔngo bachiǎkap chi bɛ anchyɛ nɔkɔ akap nɛ akabhɛ́nya ntá Mandɛm. Ndu ɛchi nɔ, nchiakap ywɛsɛ nkwɔ abhɔŋ bɛ́bhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi áchyɛ ntá Mandɛm mbɔ akap.
58008004	Mbɔ yi achi chi fá amɨk, mbʉ ápú bhak nchiakap wáwák, tɛ̌ndu bachiǎkap bachak bachí fá amɨk abhɛn báchyɛ̀ akap bɛkoŋo ɛnyǔ ɛnɛ́ ɛbhé Moses ɛ́rɛ̀m.
58008005	Bɛtɨk ɛbhap bɛchi mbɔ ndɨkandi anɛ ákʉ̀ sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fàkari amɛm ɛtɛm ɛnɛ amfay. Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ ɛchi nɔ mbɔnyunɛ mpok Moses ábhɔŋ nyaka bɛte ɛ́tɛm akap, Mandɛm aghati yi bɛ, “Ɔbhɔŋ bɛghɔ bɛ ɔté ɛtɛm ɛyɔ mbɔ ɛnyu ntɔ́ŋɔ́ wɔ amfay njiɛ.”
58008006	Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn Kristo bɛ́chá ɛbhɛn bachiǎkap abhɛn Nku Nsɨ́, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ nku anɛ ákʉ́ Yesu ate nɛntɨ Mandɛm nɛ bho áchá anɛ nsɨ́, mbɔnyunɛ akɔ nɛ nku anɛ árɨ́ áchá.
58008007	Mbɔ nku nsɨ́ yɔ ǎkway nyaka bɛkwak bo mambak chak bɛsí Mandɛm, mbʉ ntí apu bɛbhɔŋ nku achák.
58008008	Kɛ Mandɛm Acha aghɔ̌ nyaka bɛ bɛ́kwɛ́nɛ́ bɛchí nɛ bǒbhi. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, arɛm bɛ, “Mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ nchí nyu nku achák nɛ bo Israɛl, nɛ bǒ Júda nkwɔ.
58008009	Nku anɛ apú bhak mbɔ anɛ nsɨ́ nyaka nyu nɛ bachǐmbɨ bhap mpok nsɔ́rɛ́ bhɔ́ nɛ awɔ́ wa mfɛ́rɛ́ ɛtɔk Íjip. Bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ nyaka ambɨ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nku nsɨ́ áyaŋ bɔ mankʉ. Ɛ́kʉ́ Acha arɛm bɛ, ‘Ndu ɛ́chí nɔ, mbɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ mpok nɛ bhɔ. Mmɛ Mandɛm Acha kɛ nchí rɛm.’
58008010	Nɛ́ chi nku anɛ mɛ̌nyú chɔŋ nɛ bo Israɛl ndǔ manywɔp anɛ átwɔ̀. Mmɛ Acha nchí rɛm bɛ chɔŋ mfyɛ́ bɛbhé ɛbha bɔ́ antí, nsɨŋ bhɔ amɛm batɨ yap. Chɔŋ mbak Mandɛm awap, nɛ bɔ mámbak bǒbha.
58008011	Yɛ̌ mmu apu bhɔŋ chɔŋ bɛtɔŋ ntɨ, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ntɨ manɔ bɛ, ‘Dɨŋɨ́ Mandɛm’, mbɔnyunɛ bo mankɛm bárɨ̀ŋɨ chɔŋ mɛ, bɛbho amʉɛt ndɛ́ndɛmɛ bho bɛghaka amʉɛt manɛ́m bho.
58008012	Nɛ chɔŋ ngɔ́ bhɔ ntínso, mfóŋórí bɛbʉ́ bhap nkɛpɛrɛ tɨk bhɔ́ wawak.”
58008013	Nɛrɛm anɛ Mandɛm árɛm ɛ̌ti Nku Nkɔ ǎtɔ̀ŋ bɛ anɛ mbɨ abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́náŋá ɛ́fʉ́ɛrɛ́ mpok, yɔ kɛpɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ, ɛ́nɛmɛnɛm.
58009001	Nku mbɨ anɛ Mandɛm ányú nɛ bo Israɛl abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛbhé ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ ɛnyǔ bo babhɔŋɔ bɛchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó, nɛ ɛtɛm ɛbhak fá amɨk ɛnɛ́ bǒ báchyɛ̀ yi kɛnókó arɛ́.
58009002	Ɛtɛm ɛyɔ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋ bɔ̌bɛkɛt bapay. Anɛ mbɨ abhak Nɛbhʉɛt Bɛdiɛrɛ. Arɛ́ kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛpɔkɔ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ mkpak ɛchi nyaka, nɛ brɛt Mandɛm.
58009003	Ndɛn akɔ́rɛ́ nyaka mɔ́kɛt anɛ mbɨ nɛ anɛ ansɛm. Bábhɨ̀ŋɨ nyaka mɔ́kɛt wu bɛ Nɛbhʉɛt anɛ achi Nyáŋá Áchá.
58009004	Ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ akap ɛnɛ bághákó nɛ pú ɛbhak amɛm mɔ́kɛt wu. Amfay ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ ɛyɔ kɛ básɔ̀ŋ nyaka ɛnyɨŋɨ́ ɛriɛp ɛnɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ ínsɛns. Ɛkʉbhɛ́ Nku ɛ́bhak nkwɔ amɛm. Bákúti yɔ ɛnkɛm nɛ pú. Mɔ́te anɛ mána achi amɛm abhak amɛm ɛkʉbhɛ́ yɔ. Ntɛ́m Arɔn ɛnɛn nɛ́tɛ́mɛ́ bɛyé nɛ́bhák nkwɔ amɛm. Bɛ́gbáká batay apay anɛ Mandɛm ásɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka bɛbhé arɛ kɛ áchyɛ ntá Moses bɛbhak nkwɔ amɛm ɛkʉɛp ɛyɔ.
58009005	Bɛfóŋó bɛpay ɛbhɛn bághókó mbo bɔángɛl bɛbhak amfay ɛkʉbhɛ yɔ. Bɛbhap ɛbhap mɛ́nyábhɛ amfay nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Mandɛm áfoŋori nyaka bɛbʉ́ bho arɛ. Kɛ sɛ́pú kway bɛrɛm yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ́nɛ.
58009006	Mánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛbhʉɛrɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ndǔ ayi nɛbhʉɛt, bachiǎkap báre rɔŋ ndǔ mɔ́kɛt anɛ mbɨ, mpok nɛ mpok, ndǔ bɛkʉ ɛbhap bɛtɨk.
58009007	Kɛ mǔngo bachiǎkap aywǐnti kɛ áchwè amɛm mɔ́kɛt anɛ achi Nyáŋá Acha ndɔŋ amɔt ndǔ mmíɛ́. Nɛ abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛchwe arɛ̌ chi nɛ manoŋ amɛn yi áchyɛ̀ ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bhi nɛ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn bo bákʉ́ kɛrɨŋɨ bɛ chi bɛbʉ́.
58009008	Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ǎsɔ̀t mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛtɔŋ bɛsɛ bɛ mpoknkɛm anɛ mɔ́kɛt anɛ mbɨ abhʉɛt téé, mbi bɛchwe arɛ apu bhak.
58009009	Ɛnɛ chí ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ ndǔ mkpáká mmɨk anɛ ɛchɔŋ bɛ akap nɛ akabhɛ́nya anɛ báchyɛ̀ Mandɛm apu kway bɛkʉ ntɨ mmu nɛ́nkwáy ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi bɛsí Mandɛm.
58009010	Bɛsɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ mɛnkɛm bɛ́yɨ̀ŋɨ chi mɛnyɨŋ mɛnyiɛ nɛ ɛbhɛn mɛnyu, nɛ mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chák ɛbhɛn bo básɔ̀t mánso mmʉɛt bɛ bákɛ bhɔŋ bakwap bɛsí Mandɛm. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́yɨ̀ŋɨ chi bɛbhé ɛ̌ti mmʉɛt nɛ mɛ́may mpok Mandɛm átwɔ nɛ ɛnyu ɛkɔ.
58009011	Kristo atwɔ́ mbɔ mǔngo bachiǎkap anɛ ákʉ́ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ mɛ́mfákárí. Achwe amɛm ɛkɛrɛ́ Mandɛm ɛnɛ ɛ́kwáy ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi ɛ́cha ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí nyaka fá amɨk. Puyɛ̌ bo kɛ báté yɔ, nɛ ɛ́pú ndǔ mpǎy mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn fá amɨk.
58009012	Achwe ndǔ mɔ́kɛt anɛ achi Nyáŋá Áchá ndɔŋ amɔt, ndak ámáy. Puyɛ̌ chi nɛ manoŋ mmɛ́n nɛ amɛn bɔ̌mpɔŋ kɛ̌ yí achwe arɛ́ nɛ mɔ. Manǒŋ mi yímbɔŋ kɛ̌ yí áchyɛ́, nɛ ndǔ ákʉ́ nɔ aku bhɛsɛ afɛrɛ ndǔ kɛsɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́ mpoknkɛm.
58009013	Ndǔ mpok anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, básɔt nyaka chi manoŋ mmɛ́n nɛ amɛn nnɛ́m mpɔŋ nɛ batwɔp amɛn mɔ́ngɔ̌ mpɔŋ anɛ básɔ́ŋɔ́, mámyakati amʉɛt mmu anɛ apú pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm, bɛ ambak yɛ pɛ́pɛ́p.
58009014	Mbák manoŋ nnya ǎkway nyaka bɛkʉ mmu ambak pɛ́pɛ́p, ná nɛ manoŋ Kristo, yi mmu achyɛ mmʉɛt anɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́bhɨkɨ nyɔ́p ntá Mandɛm mbɔ akap ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó mmu achi mpoknkɛm? Manoŋ ami abhɔŋ bɛ́bhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ bɛ batɨ yɛsɛ ambak pɛ́pɛ́p, nɛ bɛ́ sɛ́kɛ́pɛrɛ kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ bhɛsɛ nɛ nɛwú. Akʉ́ nɔ́ bɛ́ sɛ́ndɔ́bhɛ tok chi Mandɛm mmu achi nɛpɛ́m.
58009015	Nɛchyɛ anɛ yi áchyɛ́ mmʉɛt mbɔ akap ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ákʉ́ yi ate nɛntɨ Mandɛm nɛ nkwǎ ndǔ Nku Nkɔ ndu bɛkʉ bɛ bo abhɛn Mandɛm abhɨŋɨ, mámbɔ́ŋ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɔ, tɛ̌ndu nɛwú nɛ́fɛ́rɛ́ bho ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn Nku Nsɨ́.
58009016	Ɛkáti nɛwú-bɛ́su ɛchi mbɔ nku. Mbák sɛ́kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu ásɨ́ŋɨ́ arɛm ɛnyǔ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkɔrɛ nɛwú ɛni, bápú kway bɛkoŋo yɔ kpatɛ ɛ́mbak kpoŋoroŋ bɛ yi ánáŋ ágú.
58009017	Ɛkáti nɛwú mmu ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ chi mpok yi ánáŋ ágú, tɛ̌ndu ɛ́pú bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ mpoknkɛm anɛ mmu anɛ ásɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛkáti yɔ achi nɛpɛ́m. Ɛchi mbɔ nku.
58009018	Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ manoŋ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛrɔŋ amɨk ndu bɛkʉ bɛ ɛsɨ́ nku ɛmbɔŋ bɛtaŋ.
58009019	Mpok Moses ánáŋá ághátí bho bɛbhé Mandɛm mɛnkɛm, asɔt ntábhɛ́nɔk hysɔp, anɛp babyɔk mmɛ́n amɛn achi chu arɛ. Asɔt manoŋ mɔ́mpɔŋ nɛ amɛn mmɛ́n, achɔpti nɛ manyiɛp. Asɔt yɛ ntábhɛ́nɔk hysɔp wu, atap amɛm manoŋ mɔ, amyakati ndǔ ɛkáti bɛbhé nɛ amʉɛt bo mankɛm.
58009020	Ndu ákʉ̀ nɔ, are rɛm bɛ, “Manoŋ amɛn ákɛm nku anɛ Mandɛm anyu nɛ bhe nɛ ǎghati bhe bɛ mǎmbʉ́rɛ́ yɔ.”
58009021	Ɛnyu ɛ́mɔt kɛ Moses amyakati nyaka manoŋ ndǔ ɛtɛm nɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn básɔ̀t nyaka bɛchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó nɛ bhɔ.
58009022	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ bɛ́kóŋó bɛbhé Moses, babhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛsɔt manoŋ ndu bɛkʉ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ mɛ́mbak pɛ́pɛ́p. Mbák manoŋ abhɨkɨ rɔŋ amɨk, bápú foŋori bɛbʉ́ bho.
58009023	Ɛ̌ti ɛyɔ kɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi fá amɨk ɛbhɛn bɛ́chí ndɨkandi mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amfay bɛ mɛ́mbák pɛ́pɛ́p ɛnyu ɛyɔ. Kɛ ndu bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mfay mɛ́mbák pɛ́pɛ́p bábhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛsɔt chi manoŋ amɛn acha manǒŋ nnya.
58009024	Kristo abhɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ ndǔ ɛkɛrɛ́ Mandɛm ɛnɛ bághókó nɛ amɔ, ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí ndɨ́kándi ɛkɛrákap ɛnɛ mbɔŋ awu amfay. Achwe chi amɛm mbɔŋ ɛtɛm ɛnɛ́ amfay nɛ achí arɛ nɛ́nɛ bɛsí Mandɛm, ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ.
58009025	Nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ amfay ndu bɛchyɛ mmʉɛt mbɔ akap ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mǔngo bachiǎkap áchwe nyaka ndǔ mɔ́kɛt anɛ achi Nyáŋá Acha yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmíɛ́ nɛ manoŋ amɛn apu ami.
58009026	Sayri sayri, mbɔ yi ǎrɔ̀ŋ nyaka amfay ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ ndu bɛchyɛ akap, mbʉ́ yi abhɔŋ bɛbhɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti mmɨk. Kɛ abhésí ndɔŋ amɔt ndak ámáy ndǔ ngwɛnti mpok achyɛ mmʉɛt mbɔ akap anɛ ápɔ́kɔ́ bɛbʉ́ bo.
58009027	Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ mmu abhɔŋ bɛ́gu ndɔŋ amɔt, nɛ ánáŋ ángú, andɔbhɛ noŋ chi manyé,
58009028	ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛchi yɛ bɛ Kristo achyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni mbɔ akap ndɔŋ amɔt ndu bɛ́pɔkɔ bɛbʉ́ bo mankɛm, nɛ chɔŋ ampɛt antwɔ́, puyɛ̌ ndu bɛfɛrɛ bɛbʉ́, kɛ ndu bɛpɛmɛ bo abhɛn bachi nɛ amɨ́k ambi mánòŋ yi.
58010001	Bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ bɛbhé Moses, bɛchi mbɔ ndɨ́kándi bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛ́twɔ, puyɛ̌ mbɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ. Ɛnyu ɛsɨ́ ɛnɛ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ mánchyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ akap ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmíɛ́ ɛ́pú kway nyaka bɛkʉ bo abhɛn bátwɔ ntá Mandɛm ndu bɛchyɛ yi kɛnókó mánkwáy bɛsí bhi ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi wáwák.
58010002	Mbɔ akap wu ákʉ̀ bo mambak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm mbʉ bábhʉɛt bɛchyɛ wu? Mbʉ batɨ̌ bho ápú pɛrɛ taŋ bɔ ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bhap.
58010003	Kɛ akap anɛ báchyɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmíɛ́, áchí nyaka chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ bo mántɨk bɛbʉ́ bhap.
58010004	Ɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ manoŋ mpɔŋ nɛ manoŋ mmɛ́n ápú kway bɛfɛrɛ mmu bɛbʉ́ anti wáwák.
58010005	Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ mpok Kristo ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛ́twɔ fá amɨk, arɛm ntá Mandɛm bɛ, “Ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ yaŋ bɛ bo mánchyɛ́ akabhɛ́nya nɛ mɛnyǔ akap áchák. Kɛ ɔghókó chí mmʉɛt nkwǎ ɔchyɛ́ mɛ bɛ́ nchyɛ́ wɔ akap nɛ yɔ.
58010006	Akabhɛ́ nya bɛsɔŋ bɛchyɛ wɔ ápú chyɛ wɔ maŋák. Yɛ̌ chí akap anɛ bo báchyɛ bɛ ampɔkɔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhap apu chyɛ wɔ maŋák.”
58010007	Ndɛm yɛ bɛ, “Ɛta Mandɛm, ghɔ́ mɛ́ nɛ. Ntwɔ bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ wɔ ɔ́yàŋ mɛnkʉ́ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ basɨŋɨ ɛ̌ti ya amɛm ɛkáti ɛyɛ.”
58010008	Kristo arɛm bɛ, “Ɔpú yaŋ, mánchyɛ́ wɔ akabhɛ́nya nɛ akabhɛ́ mbwɔt, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ɛnyǔ akap achak, nɛ akabhɛ́nya ɛnɛ básɔ̀ŋ ango nɛ ɔpú bhɔŋ maŋák nɛ akap ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́. Báchyɛ̀ akap anɛ́ bɛkoŋo bɛbhé Moses. Arɛm nɔ yɛ̌ndu bo báchyɛ nyaka akap chi bɛkoŋo bɛbhé Moses.”
58010009	Kristo árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Ɛta Mandɛm, ghɔ́ mɛ́ nɛ́. Ntwɔ bɛ́kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́yàŋ mɛnkʉ.” Kristo ǎtɔ̀ŋ ndǔ nɛrɛm anɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ bɛ Mandɛm afɛ́rɛ́ ɛsɨ́ akap, afyɛ́ anɛ akɔ.
58010010	Nɛ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo ákʉ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ nyaka bɛ yi ankʉ, achyɛ mmʉɛt yi mbɔ akap ndɔŋ amɔt ndak amay, sɛ́rɔ́p chi pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm.
58010011	Ndǔ nku nsɨ́, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nchiakap ǎte nyaka ndǔ bɛtɨk, ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ báchyɛ akap arɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp, ndu bɛ́chyɛ nkúbhɛ́ akap anɛ apu kway bɛpɔkɔ bɛbʉ́ bho wáwák.
58010012	Kɛ Kristo achyɛ mmʉɛt yi mbɔ akap ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bho ndɔŋ amɔt nɛ akap wu ákwáy ndǔ mpoknkɛm. Akó yɛ amfay achɔkɔ amɛm mɔ́kɛt anɛ achi Nyáŋá, ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm Mandɛm.
58010013	Arɛ́, ǎnoŋ Mandɛm ankʉ bǒmpap abhi mámbák mbɔ ɛnɔk ɛnɛ yi ányaŋa bɛkak arɛ.
58010014	Nɔ́ kɛ ɛchi bɛ Kristo asɔt akap amɔt akʉ bo abhɛn Mandɛm ákʉ́ mambák abhi mánkwáy ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi bɛsí Mandɛm mpoknkɛm.
58010015	Nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nkwɔ ǎtè ntísiɛ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp. Ayámbɨ arɛm bɛ,
58010016	Mandɛm Acha arɛm bɛ, “Nɛ́ chi nku nkɔ anɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛnyu nɛ bǒbha mpok anɛ manywɔp ayɔ áfʉɛ́rɛ́. Chɔŋ mfyɛ́ bɛbhé bha amɛm batɨ yap, nsɨŋ bhɔ amɛm nkaysi yap.”
58010017	Apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Mpú pɛrɛ tɨk chɔŋ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhap nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ̀ wáwák!”
58010018	Mánaŋ mámfóŋórí bɛbʉ́ bho, ntí apu pɛrɛ bhak anɛ bɔ báchyɛ akap.
58010019	Bɔ̌ma, tɛ̌ndu manoŋ Yesu árɔ́ŋɔ́ amɨk ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ, sɛ́kway yɛ bɛrɛm bɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ ngǎngaŋ bɛchwe ndǔ nɛbhʉɛ́t anɛ achi Nyáŋá.
58010020	Yesu ánáŋá anɛnɛ ɛkat, achyɛ bhɛsɛ mbǐ akɔ anɛ nɛpɛ́m bɛ́ sɛ́nkwáy bɛ́fʉɛt arɛ́ sɛndɔk tɛ amɛm. Ɛkat ɛnɛ yi ánɛ́nɛ́ chi mmʉɛt yi anɛ yi áchyɛ́, ndu ágú ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ.
58010021	Nɛ tɛ̌ndu sɛ́bhɔŋɔ Nnɛ́m Nchiakap nɛ yi kɛ ákɛ́mɛ́ ɛkɛrɛ́ Mandɛm,
58010022	sɛ́ndɔ́k kɛkwɔt nɛ Mandɛm nɛ batɨ anɛ tɛtɛp nɛ sɛ́nsɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ ɛnyu ɛnɛ sɛpu pɛrɛ makati yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Sɛ́nkʉ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ Yesu anáŋ amyakati manoŋ ami ndǔ batɨ yɛsɛ nɛ áchí pɛ́pɛ́p, nɛ yɔ ápú pɛrɛ taŋ bhɛsɛ ndǔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Asó mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ nkwɔ nɛ manyiɛp amɛn abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bakwap.
58010023	Sɛ́nkɛ́m sayri nɛbhakántɨ ɛnɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ ambɨ ɛbhɛn sɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ sɛbhaka ntɨ arɛ́. Sɛ́kɛ́ makati mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm mmu afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ ǎbhʉrɛ bariɛp ami.
58010024	Sɛ́mfyɛ́ ntí bɛ́ghɔ ɛnyǔ sɛ́kwáy mɛnyɨkɨsi batɨ anɛ batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ ɛnyu ɛnɛ bákway bɛbhɔŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ bho nɛ mánkʉ nɔkɔ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ.
58010025	Sɛ́kɛ́ fɛrɛ ntí ndu bɛchɛm nɛ batɨ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mbɔk bo bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛpɨŋ bɛkʉ. Ɛnyɨŋ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ chi bɛ sɛ́mfyɛ́ nɔkɔ batɨ ntɨ, sayri sayri, nɛ́nɛ, ɛnɛ́ nywɔp ɛnɛn Yesu átwɔ̀ nɛchi kɛkwɔt.
58010026	Mbák sɛ́nchók batú, sɛ́ndɔ́k ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́, ɛnɛ́ sɛ́náŋ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ tɛtɛp anɛ Mandɛm, sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ yɛ̌ akap achak apu anɛ ákway bɛkʉti bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ.
58010027	Mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ nɔ, abhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛchak ɛnɛ yi ánoŋ, ɛbhɨkɨ fʉɛt chi mɛnoŋ nɛ bɛcháy manyé anɛ átwɔ̀ ambɨ nɛ ngó anɛ́ ádù gum gum gum anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́mɛn bǒmpap Mandɛm.
58010028	Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábyak nyaka ɛbhé Moses nɛ bo bati apay, yɛ̌ bati arat, mánte ntísiɛ bɛ akʉ nɔ tɛtɛp, báway yi kɛbhɔŋ ntínso nɛ yi.
58010029	Ná nɛ mmu anɛ ábyak Mmɔ Mandɛm? Bǎkaysi bɛ ntɨkɨ ntɛ́msí anɛ ábɛ́bhɛ́ áchá ákwáy nɛ yi? Ɛnyǔ mmu wu ǎsɔ̀t manoŋ nku anɛ ákʉ́ yi ambak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛpú nyáŋá, nɛ ǎrɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmu ákʉ̀ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm mɛ́mbak nɛ bǒbhi.
58010030	Sɛ́rɨŋɨ mmu anɛ árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, “Mɛ kɛ nchí Nkɛmɛ kɛ́mbé.” Apɛt arɛm bɛ, “Chɔŋ Acha ántáŋ bǒbhi.”
58010031	Bɛ́kwɛn amɔ́ Mandɛm mmu achi nɛpɛ́m chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́cháy.
58010032	Tɨk ka manywɔp anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, mpok bákʉ́ amɨ́k ánɛ́nɛ́ bhe. Mpok yɔ, bǎté kpirí ndǔ bɛyǎ bɛsɔŋɔri ndǔ mǎnù nɛ bhɔ.
58010033	Mpok achi nyaka anɛ básɔ̀kɔti, manchyɛ nɔkɔ bhe nɛnyok bɛsí bho. Mpok achak bǎre té ansɛm bǒ abhɛn báchyɛ bhɔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnyu yɔ.
58010034	Bǎbhɔŋ nyaka ntínso nɛ bǒkɛnɔŋ. Nɛ mpok báfɔ̀ŋɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛka, bǎka nɛ maŋák bɛ mankʉ nɔ, ndǔ bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛcha ɛbhɔ, nɛ bɛ bɔ bɛ́bhak mpoknkɛm.
58010035	Bǎkɛ́ rɔ yɛ nɛsɨkɨ ntɨ ɛnɛka. Nɛ́twɔ nɛ bɛyǎ nsáy.
58010036	Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ bɛte kpirí bɛ mǎnkwáy bɛkoŋo nkaysi Mandɛm, mǎmbɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yí afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ be.
58010037	Mandɛm arɛm bɛ, “Mandú mpok, mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́twɔ, ǎtwɔ, nɛ apú chɔŋti mpok.
58010038	Kɛ mmǔ wa anɛ achi chak ǎbhak chɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ndu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ mɛ. Kɛ mbák ánjá mmʉɛt ansɛm, mpú bhɔŋ maŋák nɛ yi.
58010039	Kɛ mbák chi bɛsɛ, sɛ́pú bo abhɛn báyà mmʉɛt ansɛm mangu manɛm. Sɛ́chí chí bo abhɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm, nɛ yi ǎpɛmɛ bhɛsɛ.”
58011001	Bɛbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm chi yi? Chí nɛka anɛ mmu ákà bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi abhaka ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ ambɔ́ŋ ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛ́fákári, nɛ mɛ́nóko nɛ ntɨ nɛnkɛm bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmu apú ghɔ́ nɛ amɨ́k bɛ́chi tɛtɛp.
58011002	Nɛka ɛnɛn bo abhɛn tɛ nyaka kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ nyaka Mandɛm arɛm bɛ bɔ bákʉ sayri.
58011003	Nɛka kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ Mandɛm asɔt chi ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu ɛyi kɛ ǎghoko mmɨk. Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghɔ̀ nɛ amɨ́k bɛ́fù chi ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmu apu kway bɛghɔ nɛ amɨ́k.
58011004	Nɛka Ábɛl kɛ nɛkʉ yi achyɛ nyaka Mandɛm akap anɛ́ ákwáy achá anɛ Ken. Nɛsɔt anɛ Mandɛm ásɔ́rɛ́ akap Ábɛl atɔ́ŋ bɛ aká bɛ Ábɛl achi chak bɛsí bhi. Yɛ̌ndu Ábɛl ágú, nɛka ɛni nɛ́kʉ abhʉɛt bɛrɛm kɛpɨ ntá yɛsɛ tɛ̌ ɛchɔŋ.
58011005	Nɛka ɛnɛn Ɛnɔk kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ Mandɛm asɔrɛ yi amfay ɛnɛ́ yi abhɨkɨ ghɔ́ nɛwú. Ɛ́kʉ yɛ̌ mmu kɛghɔ́ yi ndu Mandɛm anaŋ asɔrɛ nyaka yi. Kɛ Mandɛm ápɛ́rɛ́ sɔt Ɛnɔk, ánáŋ atɔŋ nyaka bɛ abhɔŋ maŋák nɛ yi.
58011006	Bǎghɔ yɛ bɛ mbák mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm, ɛ́pú kway bɛfakari bɛ Mandɛm ambɔŋ maŋák nɛ yi. Yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɔ̀ŋ kɛkwɔt nɛ Mandɛm abhɔŋ mɛ́nóko bɛ Mandɛm achi, nɛ bɛ ǎchyɛ̀ ǎkap yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ áyàŋ yi nɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛnkɛm.
58011007	Nɛka Nóa kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ bɛ, mpok Mandɛm ásɛ́mtí yi ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yɛ̌ mmu abhɨkɨ re ghɔ́ nyaka nɛ amɨ́k, anoko, aghoko ɛrɛm áchwí, achwe amɛm nɛ ɛfo ɛyi ɛnkɛm, Mandɛm apɛmɛ bhɔ. Nɛkʉ Nóa akʉ nɔ ɛghori ɛ́kwɛ́n amʉɛt bǒ mmɨk nɛ. Mandɛm asɔt bɛ Nóa achi chak ndu abhɔŋ nyaka nɛka.
58011008	Nɛka Ábraham kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ yi ákʉ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm aghati yi. Mpok Mandɛm ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ yi bɛ́ ámfá, ándɔ́k nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ yi, arɔ ɛtɔk ɛyi, are kɔ andɔk nɔkɔ, kɛrɨŋɨ atú anɛ́ yi árɔŋ.
58011009	Nɛka ɛni kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ yi achɔkɔ atú anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ yi. Abhak arɛ́, achɔkɔ ndu bɛ́tɛ́m mbɔ bɛ achi chi kɛnkɔ. Ɛnyumɔt, mɔ́ywi Áisek, nɛ ɛbhárɛ́ mɔ́ywi Jekɔ́p, bo Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɔ mmɨk yɔ nkwɔ, báchɔ́kɔ ndu bɛ́tɛ́m nɛ yi Ábraham.
58011010	Ábraham achɔ́kɔ́ nyáká ndu bɛ́tɛ́m mbɔnyunɛ abháká nyaka ntɨ ndǔ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ ɛ́bhak mpoknkɛm ɛnɛ Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nkaysi ɛnyu ɛbhɔŋɔ bɛbhak, yímbɔŋ ate yɔ.
58011011	Nɛka ɛnɛn Sará ngɔrɛ́ Ábraham kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ yi ákway nyaka bɛ́pɔ́kɔ mɛniɛ, yɛ̌ndu mamiɛ yi ánáŋ acha nyaka anɛ́ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ akway bɛpɔkɔ mɛniɛ. Ɛ́bhak ɛnyu yɔ mbɔnyunɛ anókó nyaka bɛ Mandɛm achi Mmǔ tɛtɛp, nɛ ǎbhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp ami.
58011012	Mpok yɔ, Ábraham anáŋ akɔk nyaka tontó, ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yi apu pɛrɛ kway bɛbhɔŋ bɔ. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ bhi báyá kpát mbɔ mambě mfay nɛ mbɔ ɛ̌siɛ́p ɛnɛ ɛchi angɔkɔnyɛ́n ɛnyu ɛnɛ yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛpay bhɔ.
58011013	Bǒbhɛn mankɛm babhɔ̌ŋ nyaka nɛka nɛ Mandɛm tɛ ndiɛrɛ nɛwú. Nɛ yɛ̌ mmu wap abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɔ. Bághɔ̀ nyaka bhɔ ghɔ tɛ nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ, bábhɔŋ bɛyǎ maŋák mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ báchi chi mankɔ abhɛn báfʉ̀ɛrɛ fʉɛt fá amɨk.
58011014	Nɛ bo abhɛn bárɛ̀m ɛnyu ɛyɔ bátɔ̀ŋ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ́ báyàŋ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ bɔ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ ɛyap.
58011015	Mbɔ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ bɔ báfú arɛ kɛ̌ bákàysi, mbʉ́ báyàŋ nyaka mbi bɛpɛtnsɛm arɛ́.
58011016	Báyàŋ nyaka chi ɛtɔk ɛnɛ ɛ́rɨ́ ɛ́chá, nɔ chi ɛnɛ ɛchí amfay. Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ ntíánwɔ́p apu nɛ Mandɛm bɛ bɔ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ yi bɛ Mandɛm awap. Sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm aghókó ɛtɔk abhʉrɛ ntá yap.
58011017	Nɛka Ábraham kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ bɛ mpok Mandɛm áchyɛ́ yi nɛmɔ ndu aghati yi bɛ ándɔ́k ánchyɛ́ mɔ́ywi Áisek mbɔ akap, Ábraham mmu Mandɛm afyɛ́ yi bariɛp, aka bɛchyɛ njaŋa mɔ́ywi mbɔ akap.
58011018	Aka bɛkʉ nɔ yɛ̌ndu Áisek ɛ́rɛ kɛ̌ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka Ábraham bariɛp ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, “Áisek kɛ achi mmɔ́ anɛ ákʉ chɔŋ ɔ́mbɔŋ bɛyǎ bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ.”
58011019	Ábraham anoko bɛ́ yɛ Áisek agǔ gu, Mandɛm ǎkway bɛkʉ bawú mampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Sɛ́kway yɛ bɛrɛm bɛ Áisek achí nyaka chi mbɔ mmu anɛ ánáŋ ágú kɛ Mandɛm akʉ yi afú ndǔ nɛwú, apɛtnsɛm ntá ɛtayi.
58011020	Nɛka Áisek kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ yi áyɛ́rɛ́ nyaka bɔ̌bhi Jekɔ́p nɛ Isau, aghati bhɔ ɛ̌ti áfɔ́k anɛ átwɔ ansɛm.
58011021	Nɛ nɛka ɛnɛn Jekɔ́p nɛ Mandɛm kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ yi áyɛ́rɛ́ bɔ̌mɔ́ywi Josɛ́f bati apay mpok yi arɔbhɛ kɛkwɔt bɛgu, aghɔkɔ mmʉɛt ndǔ ntɛm ɛni, achyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó.
58011022	Nɛka ɛnɛn Josɛ́f nɛ Mandɛm kɛ̌ nɛ́kʉ́ bɛ́ mpok yi arɔbhɛ chi bɛ́gu, arɛm ɛ̌ti nɛfú anɛ bo Israɛl bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛfu ɛtɔk Íjip, nɛ aghati bhɔ bɛ mpok bɔ báfù, mánsɔt bɛghɛp ɛbhi mandɔk nɛ bhɔ.
58011023	Nɛka ɛnɛn chi nɛ nnɔ Moses kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ bábhɛ́sɛ́ yi anywɔ́p ndǔ bataŋ arat mpok bábhé yi, bɛ́ bákɛ́ way yi. Bákʉ nɔ ndǔ bághɔ́ bɛ Moses arɨ acha, bɔ kɛchay bɛkwɛn ɛbhé Mfɔ Íjip.
58011024	Nɛka Moses nɛ Mandɛm kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ bɛ mpok yi ágó aghaka ɛsakámu akɛ ka bo mámbɨ́ŋɨ́ yi bɛ mmɔ̌ mɔ̌mfɔ Íjip anɛ ngɔrɛ́.
58011025	Arɛm bɛ ɛchi sayri bɛbhɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ bo Mandɛm ɛcha mɛ́nyiɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn bɛbʉ́ ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok.
58011026	Aghɔ̌ nyaka bɛ ɛ́rɨ mámbyak yi ɛ̌ti Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò ɛcha yi bɛbhɔŋ kɛnɛ́m ɛtɔk Íjip. Ɛ́bhak ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ yi ǎnòŋ nyaka chi akap anɛ átwɔ̀ ambɨ.
58011027	Nɛka Moses nɛ Mandɛm kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ yi arɔ ɛtɔk Íjip kɛcháy bɛběntɨ Mfɔ Íjip. Akɛ́pntɨ, arɔk mbɔ bɛ yi ǎghɔ̀ nyaka Mandɛm mmǔ bo bápú ghɔ nɛ amɨ́k.
58011028	Nɛka Moses nɛ Mandɛm kɛ̌ nɛ́kʉ́ yi ághátí bo Israɛl bɛ mámbʉ́rɛ́ Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ. Arɛm bɛ bɔ mámyákátì manoŋ mɔ́mɛn amfay ndǔ bɛchɨ́kɨ́ mfay ɛbhɛn babhǐnywɔp ayap, bɛ ángɛl Mandɛm anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛway yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mɔ̌mbɨ bo Íjip, ánáŋ ángáká ndǔ ɛkɛt ɛnɛ́ mmu Israɛl, ankɨŋɨ, kɛtɔk yɛ̌ mmɔ́ wap.
58011029	Nɛka kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ bo Israɛl bákɔ́ bápé manyu anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ Manyu Chu mpok ákɔ́rɛ́ mbɨŋ ɛpay, ɛ́rɔp mbɔ bɛ bákɔ̀ chi ndǔ mmɨk anɛ nnyɛ́n nɛ́pú fʉɛt arɛ. Kɛ mpok bo Íjip mámɔ́ bɛkʉ ɛnyumɔt, nnyɛ́n nɛ́gbókó nɛ́pɔ́kɔ bhɔ mankɛm.
58011030	Nɛka ɛnɛ́n bo Israɛl nɛ Mandɛm kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ bákɔ́ bághábhɛ́rí ɛtɔk Jɛríko ndǔ manywɔp tándrámɔt, nkok anɛ́ ákábhɛ́ ɛtɔk, ámóko akwɛn.
58011031	Nɛka ɛnɛn ngɔrɛ́-nɛkɔ anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Ráhab kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ yi ásɔ́rɛ́ nyaka bǒ abhɛn bárɔ́ŋɔ́ ndu bɛghokoti kɛpɨ abhɛsɛ amɛm ɛkɛt ɛyi, yí kɛgú mpok amɔt nɛ bo abhɛn bapú ghok nyaka Mandɛm.
58011032	Mbák ndɔk ambɨ bɛ́rɛm ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka nɛka nɛ Mandɛm, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ́, nchí rɛm ngaka fá? Mpok apu bɛrɛm ɛ̌ti Gidiɔn, nɛ Bárak, nɛ Samsɨn, nɛ Jɛ́fta, nɛ Debhít, nɛ Samuɛl nɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ mankɛm bachak mankɛm nkwɔ.
58011033	Nɛka ɛnɛn bǒ bho bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka nɛ Mandɛm kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ mbɔk ayap mánú nɛ bɛtɔk bɛchak básɔt awɔ́nɛm. Báchák bákɛ́m ɛtɔk ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛchi chak, nɛ bábhɔ́ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɔ. Nɛka ɛnɛ́n abhɛ́nɛ́fú nɛ́kʉ́ manyǔ anɛ́ nkʉ áchók.
58011034	Mbɔk yap mánɛ́mɛ ngó anɛ ádù gum gum gum, wu kɛsɔŋ bhɔ. Mbɔk yap bábʉ́ɛ bǒ abhɛn báyàŋ nyaka bɛway bhɔ nɛ akparɛnja. Yɛ̌ndu bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nyaka bɛtaŋ, bɛtaŋ bɛ́kó bɔ amʉɛt. Mbɔk bábhák bɛtaŋtí batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛ́n mánú básɔt awɔ́nɛm amfǎy nkwɔ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu abhɛn bɛtɔk bɛchak, nɛ bákʉ́ nkwɔ wu bábʉɛ́.
58011035	Nɛka nɛ́kʉ́ mbɔk baghɔrɛ́ bághɔ́ ndǔ bǒbhap abhɛn bágú bápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Bádɛ́n mbɔk kpát bágú, yɛ̌ nɔ, bɔ kɛka bɛ́fɛ́rɛ ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm bɛ mamfɛrɛ bhɔ amɔ́. Báká bɛ ɛ́rɨ tontó bɛ bɔ mángú bɛ́ Mandɛm ankʉ bɔ mampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́rɨ nɛcha.
58011036	Bo básɔ́kɔ́ti mbɔk yap, nɛ bádákáti nsɛm ɛyap nɛ bɛkpa. Báfyɛ́ báchák ngɛm amɔ́ nɛ mamɛsɛ bhɔ amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ.
58011037	Bátɛ́mti mbɔk nɛ batay baway, bákpɔ́t abhɛ́nɛ́fú mbɨŋ ɛpay nɛ nsɔ̌. Báwáy báchák nɛ bɔ akparɛnja. Mbɔk yap báré kɔ nɛ nkwɔbhɛ́mɛ́n amʉɛt mbɔ ɛyap ndɛn, nɛ babhak ndu kɛchɛp. Bo báré chyɛ bhɔ nɛnyok nɛ bɛsɔŋɔri mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu.
58011038	Bárɔ́bhɛ bóŋóbóŋ amɛm ɛbhɨ nɛ ndǔ mmɨk njiɛ, mámbɛsɛ nɔkɔ amɛm bɔbasɛm nɛ amɛm babhok. Mmɨkɨ nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ kway nyaka nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bɛrɨ́tí bo mbɔ bhɔ bábhak arɛ.
58011039	Ɛ̌ti nɛka ɛnap, Mandɛm arɛm bɛ bǒbhɔ mankɛm bákʉ́ sayri. Yɛ̌ nɔ, yɛ̌ mmu wap amɔt akɛ bhɔ́ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɔ.
58011040	Mandɛm abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɨ́ bɛ́chá antɨ ntá yap, nɛ bɔ bɛchi ntá yɛsɛ nkwɔ. Nɛ ɛchi bɛ bɛsɛ́ nɛ bhɔ sɛ́chɛm nɛbhʉɛt amɔt kɛ bɛsɛ mankɛm sɛ́nkwáy ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi bɛsí Mandɛm.
58012001	Mbák chí bɛsɛ, bɛyǎ batísiɛ bakap bhɛsɛ. Ndu ɛchi nɔ, sɛ́ndɔ́ yɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́nwɔ̀p bhɛsɛ, nɛ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn bɛ́gwɔ̀t bɛsɛ, sɛ́njɛt ntiɛt anɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́jɛt nɛ ɛkɨ́kɨ́.
58012002	Ndu sɛ́jɛ̀t, sɛ́ntɛ́p amɨ́k amʉɛt Yesu. Yí kɛ ánɛ́nɛ́ mbi bɛ sɛmbɔŋ nɛka nɛ yi. Nɛ yírɛ kɛ̌ nɛka ɛnɛsɛ́ nɛ́jwi pɔɔt mbɔ ɛnyu nɛbhɔŋɔ bɛbhak. Aká nyaka bɛgu ndǔ ɛkotákátí, abyák ntíánwɔ́p anɛ achi ndu ɛnyǔ nɛwú ɛnɔ, mbɔnyunɛ arɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka bɛ maŋák achi ambɨ amɛn Mandɛm abhʉ́rɛ́ ntá yi. Nɛ́nɛ, achí ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm Mandɛm ndu ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ̌ ɛyi.
58012003	Kaysí ka Yesu mmu bǒ bɛbʉ́ báre kʉ yi bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ, yɛ̌ nɔ ate kpirí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ mɛnkɛm, bɛ batɨ ákɛ́ nɛ́m be amɛm, mǎmfɛrɛ amɔ.
58012004	Ndú nɛnu ɛnɛn mǎnù nɛ bɛbʉ́, yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka abhɨ́kɨ́ re chyɛ ntí ɛ̌ti nɛnu ɛnɔ.
58012005	Bǎghɔ́kɔ́ntɨk ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ághátí bhe mbɔ bɔ̌bhi ndu bɛ́fyɛ bhe ntɨ? Arɛm nyaka bɛ “Mɔ́wa, ɔ́kɛ́ sɔt mbɔ ɛráká ndak, nɛnyurɛ anɛ Acha ányùrɛ wɔ, nɛ ɔ́kɛ́ rɔ ntɨ nɛ́nɛ́m wɔ amɛm, mpok yi áchyɛ̀ wɔ ntɛ́msí.
58012006	Dɨŋɨ́ bɛ Acha ǎnyurɛ mmu anɛ yi akɔŋɔ, nɛ ǎtɛmsi yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ anɛ yí ásɔ́rɛ́ bɛ mɔ́ywi.”
58012007	Kɛ́p yɛ́ ka ntɨ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ bǎghɔ̀. Chi mbi anɛ Mandɛm ányùrɛ bhe. Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ Mandɛm asɔt be mbɔ bɔ̌bhi. Ntɨkɨ mmɔ́ ɛtayi apu nyurɛ yi mbák ákʉ́ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ?
58012008	Mbák Mandɛm apu nyurɛ bhe mpok anɛ bǎkʉ́ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ákʉ̀ nɛ bɔ̌bhi mankɛm, nɔ bǎpú bɔ̌bhi tɛtɛp. Nɔ nɔ bǎchi chi mbɔ bɔ̌-ɛnɔŋ.
58012009	Nɛ ndu bɛ́rɔŋ ambɨ, mpok bɔtáyɛsɛ abhɛn fá amɨ́k báchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ ntɛmsi ndǔ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ɛbhɛn sɛ́kʉ̀, sɛ́chyɛ̀ bhɔ kɛnókó, ná nɛ Ɛtayɛsɛ anɛ amfay? Sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛchyɛ yi mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛsɛ kɛnókó ɛncha, nɛ chɔŋ sɛ́mbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m.
58012010	Bɔtayɛsɛ mányùrɛ nyaka bhɛsɛ ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok mbɔ ɛnyǔ bɔ́ bághɔ́ bɛ ɛ́rɨ ntá yɛsɛ. Mbák chi Mandɛm, nɛnyurɛ anɛ yi ányùrɛ bɛsɛ achi ndu bɛkʉ bhɛsɛ bɛrɨ mbɔnyunɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́kwak bhɛsɛ sɛmbak nyáŋá mbɔ yímbɔŋ.
58012011	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ mányùrɛ mmu ɛ́bhak ntá yi mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛbhɨkɨ rɨ, puyɛ̌ mbɔ ɛnɛ ɛrɨ. Kɛ ansɛm mpok, bo abhɛn bághɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛkɔ mpok anɛ mányùrɛ bhɔ, bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm, nɛ kpák ǎbhak amɛm batɨ yap.
58012012	Tɛ̌ndu bǎrɨŋɨ ɛnyu ɛyɔ, kʉ́ ka amɔ ywɛka anɛ áwɛ̀t ántáŋ ndu bɛkʉ bɛtɨk. Tɛ̌ ka sɛnɛ́ bɛ bɛkak ɛbhɛka bɛ́kɛ́ pɛrɛ wɛt gbagbǎgbak.
58012013	Kɔ nɔ́kɔ́ ká ndǔ babhi anɛ achi chak. Bo abhɛn bɛkak ɛbhap bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ sɛnɛ amɨk mánkóŋó babhi yɔ́, nɛ chɔŋ maŋɔk ayap anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ taŋ, ántaŋ.
58012014	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ánú bɛbhak kpák nɛ bo mankɛm, anu bɛbhak nyáŋá bɛsí Mandɛm, mbɔnyunɛ mmu anɛ apu nyáŋá apú kway bɛghɔ Acha.
58012015	Kʉ ká yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ rɔ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm mɛmfʉɛt yi. Kʉ ka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ nɛn mbɔ kɛ́ngɔ́-bɛchi. Mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ bátwɔ̀ nɛ ɛsɔŋɔri mánchɔŋti bapɛ́m bɛyǎ bho.
58012016	Kʉ ka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka akɛ chwe ndǔ barak ɛpúsí nɛ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ bhák anɛ apu bhɔŋ mpok nɛ Mandɛm, mbɔ Isau mmu átí kɛsénsí ɛki ntá manɔ anɛ mɔ́nkwɛn ɛ̌ti nchaŋ nɛnyíɛ́ amɔt.
58012017	Bǎbhɔŋ bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ mpok anɛ yi ánáŋ ákʉ́ nɔ, are yaŋ bɛ ɛtayap ánjɛ́t yi mmu achi nsensi, kɛ ɛtayap anisi mbɔnyunɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nyaka mbi bɛyibhiri ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákú yɛ̌ndu mɔ́wu áyàŋ nyaka áfɔ́k nɛ babhɛsɛ amɨ́k.
58012018	Tɨk ka nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bǎté arɛ ndu bɛrɔŋ kɛkwɔt nɛ Mandɛm. Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ te chi ndu nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mmu ákway bɛtɔk nɛ awɔ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bo Israɛl báté nyaka anɛrɛ́-njiɛ Sináy, mángɔ́ nɔkɔ ndǔ ngó ádù amfǎy njiɛ gum gum gum, bághɔ́ ɛjuri ɛnɛ ɛ́giri pyɔɔ ndu ɛ́chwé, mbaŋ kɛpɛrɛ ghɔ, nɛ mbʉ́ɛ́p ataŋataŋ ánu nɔkɔ.
58012019	Nɛ bághók ɛtaŋtí ɛyɔŋɔ́ mmba, nɛ bághók Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nkwɔ. Bɛcháy bɛ́kɛ́m bɔ, bábho mɛnɨkmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm andɔ bɛrɛm kɛpɨ nɛ bhɔ,
58012020	mbɔnyunɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ághátí bhɔ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛcha bɛtaŋ ɛbhap. Ǎghàti nyaka bhɔ bɛ “Mbák mmu antɔk njiɛ-nɛ, tɛmtí ká yi nɛ batay mǎngwáy, yɛ̌ chi nnya, tɛmtí ká wáy mbák atɔk njiɛ nɛ.”
58012021	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ bághɔ́ ɛ́bhak ɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chay tontó, kpát Moses yímbɔŋ arɛm bɛ, “Mmʉɛt ǎwɛt mɛ gbagbǎghak nɛ bɛcháy.”
58012022	Kɛ mbák chí bhe, bǎtwɔ̀ kɛkwɔt nɛ njiɛ Síɔn nɛ yɔ chi ɛtɔk Mandɛm mmu achi nɛpɛ́m. Ɛtɔk ɛyɔ chi Yerúsalɛm anɛ amfay. Ngɛ́mtay bɔángɛl Mandɛm báchí arɛ́ ndǔ ɛpǎ maŋák.
58012023	Bǎtwɔ́ ndǔ ɛchɛmɛ bɔ̌mbɨ Mandɛm abhɛn yi ásɨ́ŋɨ́ manyɛ́n ayap amɛm ɛkáti ɛyi amfay. Bǎtwɔ́ ntá Mandɛm mmu átàŋ bho mankɛm. Bǎtwɔ́ bǎchɛm nɛ bɛfóŋó bo abhɛn bayambɨ bátwɔ́. Chí bɛfóŋó bo abhɛn bachi chak, abhɛn Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bákwáy ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi bɛsí bhi.
58012024	Bǎtwɔ́ ntá Yesu mmu áté nɛntɨ Mandɛm nɛ bǒ mmɨk kɛ Mandɛm anyú nku nkɔ nɛ bhɔ. Bǎtwɔ́ ndǔ manoŋ Yesu amɛn yi amyakati be amʉɛt. Manoŋ mi atéé ndu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́rɨ́ ɛchá ɛnɛ́ manoŋ Ábɛl atee ndu ntí ywi.
58012025	Sɔt ká mpok bɛ bǎkɛ byak mmǔ anɛ ághàti bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn. Bo Israɛl báchòk nyaka batú ntá mmu anɛ áyɛ̀p bhɔ batú fá amɨk. Mbák bɔ́ bápú kway nyaka bɛ́bʉɛ bɛ bákɛ́ chwe ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri, nɔ chɔŋ ɛntaŋ mbɔŋ ɛncha bɛ sɛ́mbʉ́ɛ mbák sɛ́byàk mmu anɛ achi amfay, nɛ áyɛ̀p bhɛsɛ batú?
58012026	Ndu mpok ɛyɔ, Mandɛm ǎrɛm nyaka kɛpɨ, mmɨk anyɨkɨsi, kɛ nɛ́nɛ afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛ, “Chɔŋ nkʉ mmɨk anyɨkɨsi ndɔŋ achak gbogbǒgbok, nɛ puyɛ̌ mmɨk yɔ́yɔ́, kɛ mfǎy nkwɔ.”
58012027	Ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ bɛ, “Ndɔŋ achak” ɛ́tɔŋ bhɛsɛ kpoŋoroŋ bɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm amfɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kway mɛnyɨkɨsi, mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn yi ághókó, bɛ ɛbhɛn bɛpu nyɨkɨsi mɛ́ndɔp.
58012028	Sɛ́nkáká yɛ Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ ákʉ́ bɛ sɛ́mbák bo abhɛn yi achi Mfɔ wap, nɛ kɛfɔ ɛki kɛ́pú ɛkɛn mmu ákway mɛnyɨkɨsi. Ndu ɛ́chí nɔ, sɛ́nchíɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó ɛkɛn kɛ́chyɛ̀ yi maŋák, sɛ́nsɛpti mmʉɛt bɛsí bhi, sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ bɛcháy bɛsí bhi,
58012029	mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm ayɛsɛ achí ngó anɛ ásɔ́ŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
58013001	Dɔ́k ká ambɨ bɛkɔŋ batɨ nɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ bakoŋó Kristo.
58013002	Bǎkɛ́ nɔ́k bɛsyɛpti mankɔ, sayri mbɔnyunɛ mbɔk bho básìɛpti nyaka mankɔ nɛ ɛ́fákári bɛ básiɛ́pti bɔángɛl kɛrɨŋɨ bɛ chi bɔángɛl.
58013003	Kaysí nɔ́kɔ́ ka bo abhɛn báchí ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ mbɔ bɛ bǎchi arɛ nɛ bhɔ. Kaysí nɔ́kɔ́ ka bo abhɛn batɨ̌ bakwǎŋwaŋ báchyɛ bhɔ ɛsɔŋɔri, tɛ̌ndu be nkwɔ bǎkwáy bɛbhɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri bɔ bhɔ.
58013004	Bo mankɛm bábhɔŋ bɛkɛm nɛbhay nɛ kɛnókó. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ngɔrɛ́ abhɔŋ bɛbhak tɛtɛp nɛ nnɛ́m, yí kɛkwɛ́n bɛrwɔp, nnɛ́m nkwɔ abhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛnyumɔt, mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm apú rɔ bɛ́táŋ mmu anɛ ákʉ́ ɛpúsí nɛ nkwɛnɛ́ bɛrwɔp.
58013005	Bǎkɛ́ nyiɛ ɛkɔŋ nɛ nkáp. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛbhak maŋák nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm yímbɔŋ arɛm bɛ, “Mpú kway bɛrɔ wɔ, mpú kway bɛfɛrɛ ntí nɛ wɔ.”
58013006	Ndu ɛ́chí nɔ, sɛ́kwáy bɛrɛm nɛ ntɨ̌ nɛnkɛm bɛ, “Mandɛm Acha achi nkwak wa, mpú chay yɛ̌nyɨŋ, mmu ǎkway bɛkʉ mɛ yi?”
58013007	Kaysí ka bǒbati bhɛka, bɔ́ bho bághàti nyaka bhe Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Kaysí ká bɛrɨ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap, mǎmbɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm mbɔ bhɔ.
58013008	Yesu Kristo achí ɛnyumɔt ɛyu, nɛ ɛchɔŋ, nɛ mpoknkɛm.
58013009	Mbɔk bho bátɔ̀ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi bɛkɔ nɛ kɛkúrí. Bǎkɛ́ rɔ yɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ́ bátɔ̀ŋ mɛ́mpɔ́kɔ́ bhe mǎngúrɛ́ ɛbhɨ. Ɛrɨ bɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm mɛ́nkʉ batɨ yɛsɛ antaŋ, puyɛ̌ chí bɛbhé ɛ̌ti nɛnyíɛ́. Bɛbhé bhɔ bɛ́pú kwak bo abhɛn bákòŋo bhɔ.
58013010	Sɛ́bhɔŋ ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ akap ɛnɛ bachiǎkap abhɛn bákʉ̀ nyaka bɛtɨk amɛm ɛtɛm bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngǎngaŋ bɛsɔt ɛnyɨŋ arɛ manyíɛ́.
58013011	Mǔngo bachiǎkap ǎsɔt nyaka manoŋ nnya anɛ báwáy ndu bɛchyɛ akap anchwe amɛm nɛbhʉɛt anɛ áchí nyáŋá anchyɛ akap bɛ Mandɛm amfoŋori bɛbʉ́ bho. Kɛ mbák chi mbɔ̌ŋ nnya ɛnɛ báwáy, báfu nyaka ɛtɔk nɛ yɔ kɛ mánsɔŋ. Bápú sɔ́ŋ yɔ́ amɛm ɛtɔk.
58013012	Ɛnyu yɔ nkwɔ kɛ ɛ́chí nyaka nɛ Yesu. Aghɔ̌ nyaka ɛsɔŋɔri, agu chi nɛfí, puyɛ̌ amɛm ɛtɔk. Akʉ nɔ bɛ manoŋ mi ankʉ bo mámbák nyáŋá.
58013013	Sɛ́mfú yɛka amɛm ɛtɔk sɛndɔk sɛntɛmɛri yi nɛfí, sɛ́mbɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p anɛ́ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka.
58013014	Sɛ́ndɔ́k mbɔnyunɛ sɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ɛtɔk ɛnɛ ɛbhak mpoknkɛm fá amɨk. Sɛ́yàŋ chi ɛtɔk ɛnɛ ɛbhɔŋɔ bɛ́twɔ.
58013015	Ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu, sɛ́nchíɛ nɔ́kɔ́ Mandɛm bakak mbɔ aywɛsɛ akap. Akap wu chí nɛrɛm anɛ sɛ́rɛm nɛ manyu yɛsɛ bɛ yi kɛ achi Acha.
58013016	Bǎkɛ́ rɔ bɛkʉ bɛrɨ, nɛ bɛkwak batɨ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhɔŋɔ. Ɛnyǔ akap wu kɛ Mandɛm ábhɔŋ maŋák nɛ wu.
58013017	Ghók nɔ́kɔ́ ka bǒbati bhɛka, mǎmbɔ́ŋ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt bɛsí bhap, mbɔnyunɛ bɔ kɛ báyɨ̀ŋɨ bhe, mbɔ bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́ghátí Mandɛm ɛnyu bɔ bákɛ́mɛ́ bhe. Ghók nɔ́kɔ́ ká bhɔ bɛ mánkʉ bɛtɨk ɛbhap nɛ maŋák, nɛ bɛ bɔ bákɛ́ bhɔŋ kɛsɔ́ti.
58013018	Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ. Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ batɨ yɛsɛ achi pɛ́pɛ́p, nɛ sɛ́yaŋ bɛbhak chak ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́kʉ̀.
58013019	Nchí ghati bhe nɛ ntɨ ɛna nɛnkɛm bɛ mǎnɨ́k nɔ́kɔ́ mmʉɛt ɛ̌ti ya bɛ Mandɛm ankwak mɛ mpɛt ntwɔ ntá yɛka mandú mpok.
58013020	Mandɛm mmu ákʉ̀ bɛ batɨ ayɛsɛ ambak amɛm kpák, ámbák nɛ bhe. Yi kɛ ákʉ́ Acha yɛsɛ Yesu Kristo áfú ndǔ nɛwú, apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Yi, Yesu, chi Mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n ngo, anɛ ábhabhɛri bo Mandɛm mankɛm. Ɛ́chí ɛnyu yɔ mbɔnyunɛ manoŋ ɛmi arɔŋ nyaka amɨk ndu bɛkʉ bɛ nku anɛ Mandɛm ányú nɛ bo ánté mpoknkɛm.
58013021	Mandɛm ánchyɛ́ bhe yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ, bɛ mǎnkóŋó nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi áyàŋ mǎnkʉ. Mandɛm ankʉ Yesu Kristo ankwak be mǎnkʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ yi maŋák. Sɛ́nchíɛ Yesu Kristo bakak mpoknkɛm ɛ̌ti kɛnɛ́m ɛki. Amen.
58013022	Bɔ̌ma, mpɛt nchí ghati bhe bɛ mǎnsɔt ɛyɔŋ ɛya ɛnɛ nsɨ́ŋɨ́ ndu bɛ́fyɛ bhe ntɨ nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ. Mbɨ́kɨ́ sɨŋ ɛrɔ́rí ɛkáti.
58013023	Nchí yaŋ mǎndɨŋɨ bɛ báfɛ́rɛ́ mɔmáyɛsɛ Tímɔti ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ. Mbák yi antwɔ ayak, chɔŋ ntwɔ́ nɛ yi ndu bɛghɔ bhe.
58013024	Kaká ká bǒbati bhɛka mankɛm, nɛ bo Mandɛm báchák mankɛm. Bǒnkwɔ abhɛn báfú Itali bátó bhe bakak.
58013025	Bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm mɛ́mbak nɛ bhe mankɛm.
59001001	Mɛ Jems, mmɔ̌bɛtok Mandɛm nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha kɛ̌ nchí sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí sɨ́ŋ ntá yɛká bǒ Mandɛm, bě bho bǎtaka ndǔ bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk mɛnkɛm. Nchí tó be mankɛm bakak.
59001002	Bɔ̌ma, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɛ́mɛ́rí mmu ywɛka ámbɔ́ŋ chi maŋák,
59001003	mbɔnyunɛ bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ mbák mamɔ ántwɔ́, mǎndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ bɛtɔŋ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm tɛtɛp, ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ mǎnté kpirí nɛ Mandɛm tɛndǔ ngwɛ́nti ɛ́ncha ɛnyu ɛsɨ́.
59001004	Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ́ bɛ́té kpirí tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti bɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ mǎngó mǎnjwi pɔɔt, mmǔ ywɛka kɛbhák mbɔk bɛyɨŋɨ bɛpɨŋɨ́ bo Mandɛm.
59001005	Kɛ mbák mmǔ ywɛka achɛp kɛboŋ bɛrɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ yi abhɔŋɔ bɛkʉ, ánɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm nɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm anchyɛ yi kɛboŋ. Nɛ bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ Mandɛm apɛrɛ́ chyɛ mmu ɛnyɨŋ, ǎchyɛ yi nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt, kɛyáŋ bɛji mmu.
59001006	Kɛ mmu apɛrɛ́ nɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm, ánókó bɛ́ Mandɛm ǎghok yi. Ákɛ́ makati wawak, mbɔnyunɛ mmu anɛ ánɨ̀kmʉɛt amakati nɔkɔ achí mbɔ mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛ́n ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chi amɛm manyu. Mpok anɛ mbʉ́ɛ́p áfòk, ádɛ̀p yɔ́ ántɛn nɔkɔ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ wú árɔ̀ŋ.
59001007	Ɛnyǔ mmu wu, mmu batɨ ápáy, ákɛ́ kaysi bɛ ǎkwáy mɛnɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm ambɔ́ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi áyàŋ.
59001008	Nɔ́ kɛ ɛ́chí nɛ mmu batɨ ápáy mbɔnyunɛ apú te kákáti ndǔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yí ákʉ̀.
59001009	Mmu Mandɛm anɛ áchí nchɛ́bhɛ́ mmu, ámbɔ́ŋ maŋák bɛ́ Mandɛm akósí yí ndǔ ákʉ́ yí ámbák mmu ywi.
59001010	Kɛ mbák chí mǔnkáp ámbɔ́ŋ maŋák chí bɛ́ Mandɛm asɛ́ptí yí, akʉ yi ángɔ́ bɛ́ áchí nchɛ́bhɛ́ mmu bɛsí Mandɛm. Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ bǒ bakáp báfʉɛ̀t mandú mpok mbɔ bɔchuchu ndu tákɔ. Bábhak sayri, kɛ mandú mpok mángu.
59001011	Ǎgu mbɔnyunɛ mpok mmok áfú, átíɛ́ nɛ bɛtaŋ, ánku tákɔ ansɔŋɔ, bɔchuchu mánkuri, bɛrɨ̌ bhap mɛ́may mɛnkɛm. Ɛ́chí ɛnyumɔt nɛ mǔnkáp. Yɛ̌ chí mpok anɛ yi áyàŋ nkáp, ɛyi ɛ́kwáy mɛ́máy.
59001012	Ɛ́rɨ ɛchá ntá mmu anɛ ápú rɔ bɛ́sɨ́kɨ ntɨ nɛ Yesu Kristo ndǔ átè kpirí mpok bɛsɔŋɔri bɛ́twɔ̀ ntá yi. Ɛrɨ ntá yi mbɔnyunɛ ǎnu kpát ansɔt awɔ́nɛm, Mandɛm anchyɛ yí akap anɛ́ yi afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛ́chyɛ́ bǒ abhɛn bákɔ́ŋ yi, nɔ chi, nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
59001013	Nɛ dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mmu anɛ nɛmɔ nɛ́twɔ̀ ntá yí, nɛ ǎyàŋ bɛ́kʉ bɛbʉ́, ákɛ́ rɛm bɛ́ “Mandɛm kɛ̌ átó mɛ́ nɛmɔ ɛnɛn.” Yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́pú kway mɛmɔ Mandɛm ɛ́ntɛn yi ndǔ bɛbʉ́. Nɛ yímbɔŋ Mandɛm apú kwáy mɛmɔ yɛ̌ mmu bɛ ánkʉ bɛbʉ́.
59001014	Nkaysi mbʉ́mbʉ anɛ áchí mmu antɨ kɛ áyà mmu ankwɛ́n ndǔ nta anɛ nɛmɔ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́.
59001015	Nkaysi bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́, ánáŋ yɛ ángó, ánjwi mmu antɨ, ǎtó yí ndǔ bɛbʉ́, nɛ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɔ mɛ́náŋ mɛ́njwí ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni, nɔ́ nɛwú nɛ́twɔ.
59001016	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, bǎkɛ́ rɔ yɛ̌ mmu ándwɔ́ bhé bɛ́ Mandɛm kɛ̌ átò mmu nɛmɔ.
59001017	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ akap anɛ́ árɨ́ ndǔ babhi ankɛm áfù chí amfay. Mandɛm mmu ághókó bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ mfáy kɛ̌ áchyɛ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛrɨ́tí akap, nɛ yí ápú yibhiri ɛnyu mbɔ ndɨ́kándi. Mmok ákɔ̀ amfay, bɛsap ndɨ́kándi mɛ́ngupsi nɔkɔ.
59001018	Ndǔ nkaysi mbɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ yi áyábhɛ́ bɛsɛ́ bɛ́ sɛ́mbák bɔ̌bhi. Afʉɛ́t ndǔ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi bɛkʉ bɛsɛ́ bɔ̌bhi. Nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛ́chí tɛtɛp mpoknkɛm. Ayap bɛsɛ́ bɛ sɛ́mbák bɔ̌bhi bɛ́ sɛ́mbák ambɨ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛ́n yí ághókó.
59001019	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛ́wákári bɛta batú ndu bɛ́ghok mɛnyɨŋ, kɛ ákɛ́ wakari bɛrɛm kɛpɨ nɛ ákɛ́ wakari bɛ́bentɨ.
59001020	Bɛběntɨ nkwǎ bɛ́chɛt yí mbi bɛ ákɛ́ kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ yí ánkʉ́.
59001021	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka abhɔŋ yɛ́ bɛrɔ bɛpɔ̌ bɛpɨŋ mɛnkɛm nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn bɛ́gháŋá yi amʉɛt. Sɛptí ká mmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm, mǎmfyɛ́ ntí ndǔ Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛnɛ yi ápɨ̀ amɛm batɨ yɛka. Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛnɛ ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́pɛ́mɛ bhe.
59001022	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ́ghati bhɛsɛ. Mbák bǎghókó ghok, nɔ bǎrwɔ chí mmʉɛt.
59001023	Nɔ bǎrwɔ chí mmʉɛt mbɔnyunɛ mbák mmu ǎghok Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ yi kɛbháká kʉ ndiɛrɛ yɔ́ ɛ́ghàti yí, ǎbhák chí mbɔ mmu anɛ ásɔ́rɛ́ mpok bɛ́yɨŋɨ mmʉɛt ndu ɛ́kírísú angɔ́ bɛsí ɛbhi mbɔ ɛnyu bɛ́chí.
59001024	Kɛ nɛtɨ́k yi atɨ́kɨ́nsɛm ndǔ ɛ́kírísú, antɨŋ angɔkɔntɨk ɛnyǔ yi achi.
59001025	Kɛ mmu anɛ afyɛ́ ntí ndǔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, ankʉ nɔkɔ mbɔnyǔ ɛ́ghàti yi, yí kɛghɔkɔntɨk yɔ, ɛ́rɨ ntá yi ɛncha. Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm chí ɛbhé Mandɛm. Ɛ́rɨ ndǔ babhi ankɛm, nɛ ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́fɛ́rɛ bɛsɛ ndǔ bɛbʉ́.
59001026	Mbák mmu asɔt mmʉɛt yi mbɔ mmu Mandɛm kɛ yí kɛkɛ́m nɛ́rɨ́ ɛni, nɔ́ ǎrwɔ́ chi mmʉɛt nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yí ákʉ̀ mbɔ mmu Mandɛm ǎchɔŋti chí mpok.
59001027	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmu Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɨ́ bɛsí Mandɛm chí bɛ́ yí ánkwák bɔ̌bɛrǎ nɛ mánkwɛ́sɛ́, nɛ ankɛ́m mmʉɛt bɛ́ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk bɛ́kɛ́ chɔŋti yi mɛ́nkʉ́ yi ánjíbhírí ámbák mmǔ bɛbʉ́. Mmǔ Mandɛm anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnyǔ ɛpɨŋ ɛyɔ kɛ ábhak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm.
59002001	Bɔ̌ma, tɛ̌ndu bǎbhɔŋɔ nɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ kɛnókó kɛnkɛm, bǎkɛ́ chyɛ kɛnókó ntá bo abhɛn bǎghɔ́ bɛ́ báchí sayri, mǎmbyak abhɛn ɛyap ɛ́pú.
59002002	Sɛ́nsɔ́t bɛ́ bǒ bati apay bátwɔ ndǔ ɛchɛmɛ ɛyɛká. Amɔt ansɔbhɛri mmʉɛt nɛ ndɛn bɛyǎ nkáp nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ŋwaŋwǎŋwaŋ amʉɛt, nchɛ́bhɛ́mu nkwɔ́ antwɔ́ nɛ bɛsɨ́ ndɛn amʉɛt.
59002003	Mbák mǎmfyɛ́ amɨ́k ntá anɛ áchí mǔnkáp mǎndɛm bɛ, “Ɛta twɔ́ chɔkɔ́ fá”, kɛ ntá nchɛ́bhɛ́ mmu mǎndɛm chí bɛ, “Tě awu. Mbák ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ te awu, twɔ́ sɛbhɛrí fá”.
59002004	Mbák mǎnkʉ́ nɔ, pú kɛ́rɨ́ŋámík nɔ bǎtɔ̀ŋ nɛ́ntɨ ɛnɛká? Ɛ́rɨ nɔ? Nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ nkaysi yɛká abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ.
59002005	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, tá ká batú mǎngók. Mandɛm ayap bo abhɛn báchí bachɛ́bhɛ́bho bɛsí bǒ mmɨk bɛ́ mámbɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu, mámbɔŋ kɛfɔ bɛsí Mandɛm. Akʉ nkwɔ́ bɛ́ bɔ́ mámbák bo abhɛn yí ábhàk nɛ bhɔ́ mbɔ Mfɔ wap. Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ̌ yí afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛkʉ nɛ bo abhɛn bákɔ́ŋ yi.
59002006	Kɛ mbák chí bhe, bǎchyɛ bachɛ́bhɛ́bho ntíánwɔ́p! Ntɨkɨ bo báchyɛ̀ bhe ɛsɔŋɔri mánja nɔkɔ bhe ndǔ báchá manyé? Pú bǒ bakábhɛ?
59002007	Pú bɔ́ bhɔ kɛ bárɛ̀m bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ndu bɛ́chɔ́ŋti ɛrɨ́tɨ́ nnyɛ́n Ɛtayɛka mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bhe?
59002008	Mbák tɛtɛ̌tɛp bǎbhʉɛrɛ nnɛ́m ɛbhé Mandɛm Mfɔ ywɛsɛ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛ́chí amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Kɔŋ ntɨ nkwǎ mbɔ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ”, nɔ́ bǎkʉ̀ sayri.
59002009	Kɛ mbák bǎchyɛ̀ kɛnókó ntá mbɔk bho, mǎmbyaka nɔkɔ abhɛ́nɛ́fú, nɔ́ bǎkʉ bɛbʉ́ ndǔ bǎkwɛ̀n ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ bǎchí bo abhɛn bǎpú bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm.
59002010	Bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhʉ̀ɛrɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm mɛnkɛm kɛ ankwɛ́n bɛ́bhʉrɛ ɛbhé ɛ́mɔ́t, bɛsí Mandɛm, achí ɛnyumɔ́t mbɔ mmu anɛ ákwɛ́nɛ́ bɛbhé mɛnkɛm.
59002011	Ɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm mmu árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ kwɛn bɛrwɔp”. Nkúbhɛ́ yí kɛ árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ wáy”. Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ yɛ bɛ́ mbák ɔ́ngwáy mmu, nɔ́ ɔ́kwɛ̌n ɛbhé Mandɛm yɛ̌ndu ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kwɛ́n bɛrwɔp.
59002012	Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ́ bɛ́ghɔ bɛ́ bɛyɔŋɔ́nyu ɛbhɛká nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bǎkʉ, mǎnkʉ bhɔ mbɔ bo abhɛn bákòŋo ɛbhé Mandɛm ɛnɛ́ ɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ́fɛ́rɛ bɛsɛ́ ndǔ bɛbʉ́. Ɛbhé ɛyɔ kɛ̌ Mandɛm ásɔ̀t bɛ́táŋ bɛsɛ ndǔ ɛwak manyé.
59002013	Bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ nɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ bo abhɛn bápú bhɔ́ŋ ntínso nɛ batɨ, Mandɛm ǎtáŋ bhɔ ɛwak manyé kɛbhɔ́ŋ ntínso. Kɛ mmu anɛ ábhɔ̀ŋ ntínso nɛ batɨ, Mandɛm ǎtɔ́ŋ yí ntínso ɛwak manyé.
59002014	Bɔ̌ma, mbák mmu árɛm bɛ́ yí abhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm kɛ yí kɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ yi ánkʉ, ɛyɔ ɛ́kwàk yi ná? Bɛ́rɛ́m chi nɛ nyu bɛ yi abhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm, apú kwáy bɛ́pɛ́mɛ yi wáwák ndǔ ɛwak ɛnɛ Mandɛm átàŋ bo.
59002015	Sɛ́nsɔ́t bɛ́ mmu ywɛká amɔt, yɛ̌ ngɔrɛ́, yɛ̌ mbakanɛm, anɛ áchí ntɨ mmu Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ndɛn ɛnɛ yí afyɛ́ amʉɛt nɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn yi ányìɛ.
59002016	Nɛ mmǔ ywɛka amɔt ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yi, andɔk antɨ́k yí nɛfí andɛm bɛ, “Ɔ́nkɔ sayri, Mandɛm anjɛt wɔ ɔ́mbɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ ndɛn nɛ nɛnyíɛ́”, kɛ yí kɛchyɛ yi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi áchɛ́bhɛ́, nɔ́ akwak yi ndǔ ntɨkɨ mbi?
59002017	Ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛ́chí nɛ nɛka. Mbák mmu ǎrɛm bɛ ábhɔ̌ŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm, kɛ yí kɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ yi ánkʉ́, nɔ́ nɛrɛm yí árɛ̀m bɛ abhɔ̌ŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm achi chi ndɛ́ndɛm.
59002018	Ngufú mmu ǎkwáy bɛ́kɛm ɛpʉ́ítí bɛ, “Akap Mandɛm áchyɛ́ mbɔk bho chi nɛka ɛnɛ́n bɔ́ bábhɔ́ŋ nɛ yí, ɛnɛ́ akap anɛ bo báchák chi bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mánkʉ”. Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́rɛ́m ntá ɛnyǔ mmǔ wu chí bɛ, “Ghatí mɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ ɔbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm mbák ɔpú kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mánkʉ́?” Mbák chí mɛ́, mɛ̌kwáy bɛ́sɔ́t mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀ ntɔ́ŋ wɔ́ bɛ́ nká nɛ Mandɛm tɛtɛp.
59002019	Ɔnókó bɛ́ Mandɛm amɔt kɛ áchí, achák ápú? Ɛrɨ! Kɛ ɔ́kɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ́ yɛ̌ chí bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ mɛ́nókó nkwɔ́ bɛ́ Mandɛm amɔt kɛ áchí nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ̀ bhɔ́ bɛcháy, mángwɛrɛ nɔkɔ gbagbǎgbak.
59002020	Wɔ ɛchɨŋtɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ, ɔ̌yàŋ mántɔ́ŋ wɔ́ bɛ mbák mmu anókó bɛ Mandɛm achi kɛ yi kɛbháká kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mánkʉ́, nɔ nɛnoko yi ánókó bɛ Mandɛm achi, achí chí ndɛ́ndɛmɛ́?
59002021	Ɔ́kɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ Mandɛm arɛm nyaka bɛ ɛtayɛsɛ Ábraham achi chak bɛsí bhi ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ́. Nɔ́ chí ndǔ ásɔ́rɛ́ mɔ́ywi Áisek arɔk bɛchyɛ mbɔ akap ndǔ mpok anɛ Mandɛm aghati yi ánkʉ ɛnyuyɔ.
59002022	Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ Ábraham abhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm tɛtɛp, aka bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ághátí yi ánkʉ́. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yí ákʉ́, kɛ ɛ́tɔ́ŋ bɛ́ yi aká nɛ Mandɛm tɛtɛp.
59002023	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ kɛ básɨ́ŋɨ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Ábraham anókó nyaka Mandɛm, ɛ́kʉ́ Mandɛm arɛm bɛ́ Ábraham achí chak bɛsí bhi, nɛ bo báré bhɨŋɨ Ábraham bɛ́ mmʉɛrɛ Mandɛm”.
59002024	Bě babhɔŋ bǎkwáy yɛ́ bɛ́ghɔ bɛ́ bɛrɨ ɛbhɛn mmu ákʉ̀ kɛ bɛ́kʉ̀ Mandɛm ánsɔ́t yí mbɔ mmu anɛ áchí chak bɛsí bhi. Púyɛ chí nɛrɛm yí árɛ̀m nɛ nyu bɛ́ áká nɛ Mandɛm.
59002025	Nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛ́chí nyaka nɛ Ráhab, ngɔrɛ́-nɛkɔ. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yí ákʉ́ kɛ̌ Mandɛm ághɔ́, asɔt bɛ́ yí achí chak bɛsí bhi. Nɔ́ chí, Ráhab asɔt baghokotǐ kɛpɨ abhɛn báfú Israɛl abhɛsɛ amɛm ɛkɛt ɛyi, achyɛ bhɔ́ maniɛ́. Báfʉɛ́t yɛ́ mbi áchák bápɛtnsɛm Israɛl kɛbhɔ́ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri.
59002026	Tɛ̌ndu yi ákʉ́ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ Mandɛm ǎsɔ́t bɛ yi achi chak bɛsí bhi, dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔnyǔ mmu apu kway bɛbhak nɛpɛ́m mbák abhɨkɨ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ ɛ̌yú, nɔ́ kɛ ɛchi bɛ mbák mmu apú kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mankʉ, nɛrɛm yi árɛ̀m bɛ abhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm ǎbhak chi ndɛ́ndɛm.
59003001	Bɔ̌ma, puyɛ̌ be mankɛm kɛ̌ babhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhak batɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ ɛwak ɛnɛ Mandɛm átàŋ bo, manyé ásɔ̀ŋ bɛsɛ́ bhó sɛ́tɔ̀ŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm amʉɛt ɛ́ncha bo báchák.
59003002	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ǎkwɛ́n ndǔ bɛyǎ babhi. Kɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu ɛyi, achí mmu anɛ ájwí pɔɔt nɛ ǎkwáy nkwɔ́ bɛkɛm mmʉɛt ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi.
59003003	Sɛ́nsɔ́t mpɔŋɔndɨ́k. Mmu ǎsɔt mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ sɛnɔŋ amfyɛ́ yɔ́ anyu ndu bɛkʉ yɔ angok yi, andɔk yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ yi áyàŋ yɔ́ ándɔ́k.
59003004	Ná nɛ áchwɨ̌nyɛn nkwɔ? Yɛ̌ndu áré chɨk, nɛ yɛ̌ mbʉ́ɛ́p anɛ́ ádɛ̀p wu ántaŋ ná, nsɔm achí anɛt áchwi babhát anɛ mbák mmu ánjá anjɛp, áchwi árɔ̀ŋ chí ɛbhak ɛnɛ yí áyàŋ wu andɔk.
59003005	Nɛ́rɨ́ nkwǎ nɛchi mbɔ nsɔm anɛ achi anɛt áchwí. Yɛ̌ndu nɛ́chí nɨ́ŋɨ́ nɨ́ŋɨ́, nɛ́pà bɛkʉ bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ. Bě babhɔŋ mǎnkáysí ndǔ mɔ́nɛmbě ngó ákɛm ndǔ ɛrɛmɛ́ nchɔ́t ámbo bɛ́du gum gum gum.
59003006	Nɛ́rɨ́ nkwǎ nɛ́chí mbɔ ngó. Ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu ɛnɛ mmu ɛ́kwày bɛ́twɔ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ bɛbʉ́ fá amɨk. Bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn nɛ́rɨ́ nɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ bhɔ bɛ́chɔ̀ŋti nɛpɛ́m nkwǎŋwaŋ nɛnkɛm. Nɛ́kʉ̀ ngó ánkɛ́m anɛ́ ásɔ̀ŋ nɛpɛ́m nkwǎŋwaŋ nɛnkɛm. Nɛ ngó wu áfù chí ndǔ nɛpǐngo anɛ́ ápú nɛmɛ.
59003007	Nkwǎ ǎkwáy bɛ́bhʉɛ́rɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ nyǎbhɨ, kɛnɛn, nnya ɛnɛ́ ɛ́sù mɛniɛ amɨk nɛ ɛnɛ ányɛ́n, ankʉ yɔ́ ɛ́ngók yi, nɛ bo mánáŋ bákʉ́ nɔ.
59003008	Kɛ yɛ̌ mmu apú kwáy bɛkɛm nɛ́rí ɛni. Nɛ́rí nɛ́bɛp nɛ́chá. Nɛ́chí mbɔ babhé amɛn mmu ányìɛ angú.
59003009	Nɛ nɛ́rɨ́ kɛ sɛ́bɨti Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ. Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ nɛrɨ́ kɛ sɛ́sɔ̀t bɛrɛm bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ntá bo abhɛn Mandɛm ághókó, akʉ mǎmbák mbɔ yímbɔŋ ndǔ bɛyǎ babhi.
59003010	Bɔ̌ma, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛbhak ɛnyu yɔ! Nnyu amɔt ámbɨti Mandɛm, nkúbhɛ́ nnyu wu ámbɨk mmu ɛyak.
59003011	Mbokónyɛ́n ámɔt ápú kwáy bɛchyɛ ɛrɨ́tí manyiɛp, ámpɛt ánchyɛ nɔkɔ manyiɛp amɛn áchí ngáŋ ngaŋ.
59003012	Bɔ̌ma, nnɛt nsúkúrú ápú kwáy mɛ́nyú bakwa nɛ nnɛt nsɨ́ŋɨ́ ápú kwáy mɛ́nyú nsúkúrú. Ɛ́nyu yɔ kɛ ɛ́chí bɛ nnyɛ́n ngáŋ ngaŋ nɛ́pú kwáy bɛ́chyɛ́ manyiɛp mɛnyu.
59003013	Ná mbɔk yɛká bátɔ̀ŋ mmʉɛt bɛ́ bárɨŋɨ? Mbák bo báchí ndǔ nkwɔ́ ywɛká abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ kɛboŋ, bárɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí chak nɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pú chak, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ámbɔ́ŋ ɛrɨ́tí ɛpɨŋ nɛ nɛsɛptímʉɛt ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni. Ɛpɨŋ ɛyɔ kɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ mmu achí ndɨŋɨndak tɛtɛp.
59003014	Kɛ mbák bǎbhɔŋ batɨ anɛ ájwí nɛ bɛyǎ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ánù chí ndǔ aywi ntí, bǎkɛ́ pányu ndɛ́ndɛm bɛ bǎchi barɨŋɨ́ndak mbɔnyunɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́bhak chi nsé.
59003015	Ɛnyǔ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɔ nɛ́pú fú ntá Mandɛm, nɛ́fù chí ntá bǒ- mmɨk. Ɛnyǔ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɔ nɛ́fù chí ntá bo abhɛn Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ɛ́pú nɛ bhɔ́ nɛ nɛ́fù chí ntá mfɔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ.
59003016	Ɛ́chí ɛnyu yɔ mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ bo bábhɔ̀ŋ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ batɨ nɛ ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ mmu ánù chí ndiɛrɛ ndǔ ayi mmʉɛt, ɛbyɔk ɛ́bhàk arɛ, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛpɨŋ ɛ́bhàk arɛ́ nkwɔ́.
59003017	Kɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ nɛchí kɛkúrí. Ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɨ chi bɛ nɛ́pú fyɛ mmu bakwap antɨ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kòŋo chí bɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛ́n Mandɛm áchyɛ nɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ámbák sayri nɛ batɨ, nɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ákɛ́ bhɔŋ ntɨ gum gum, nɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ámbɔ́ŋ ɛpɨŋ bɛghɔ bho ntínso, nɛ ɛpɨŋ bɛkʉ bɛrɨ mpoknkɛm. Mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛ́n nɛ́fù ntá Mandɛm, ǎbhák mmu tɛtɛp, ápú kʉ bɛtábhá.
59003018	Chi bɛbhak sayri nɛ batɨ kɛ ákʉ̀ bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ kpák ambak nɛntɨ bho mámpɨ́ mbwɔt, nɛ chɔŋ mángɔ mbwɔt mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bákʉ̀ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
59004001	Yi ɛ́kʉ̀ be bho bǎrɛm bɛ́ bǎchí bǒ Mandɛm mǎnù mǎntáŋ nɔkɔ nɛ batɨ? Pú bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎfyɛ́ ngoŋo arɛ́ kɛ bɛ́kʉ̀ mǎnu mpoknkɛm-ɛ?
59004002	Bǎyáŋ bɛ́bhɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ kɛ bǎpú bhɔ́ŋ bɔ́. Ɛ́kʉ bǎyàŋ bɛ́way bho. Nɛ bǎfyɛ̀ ámɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo báchák kɛ bǎpú kwáy bɛ́bhɔŋ bɔ́. Ɛ́kʉ bǎtàŋ nɛ batɨ, mǎnu nɔkɔ. Ntí anɛ bǎpú bhɔ́ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn chí bɛ́ bǎpú nɨkmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ánchyɛ́ bhé bɔ́.
59004003	Nɛ yɛ̌ mǎnɨk chí mmʉɛt bɛ́ Mandɛm ánchyɛ́ bhe ɛnyɨŋ, bǎpú bhɔ́ŋ yɔ́. Bǎpú bhɔ́ŋ yɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ bǎpú bhɛ́p nɛ nkaysi ndɨ́ndɨ́. Bǎbhɛ̀p chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎfyɛ̀ ngoŋo arɛ́.
59004004	Bě bho bǎpú kʉ mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm áyàŋ! Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ́ mmu anɛ ányìɛ ɛkɔŋ nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk chí mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ mmʉɛ́t yi mǔmpap Mandɛm-ɛ? Tɛtɛp, mmu anɛ ányìɛ ɛkɔŋ nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk, chí mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ mmʉɛ́t yi mǔmpap Mandɛm.
59004005	Bǎkɛ́ kaysi bɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́chí ndɛ́ndɛm, nɔ́ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ básɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ, “Ɛfóŋó ɛnɛ́ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ nkwǎ, ɛ́fyɛ̀ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bo báchák ɛ́chá.”
59004006	Kɛ Mandɛm ǎtɔŋ bɛsɛ bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ndu, nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́chyɛ̀ bɛsɛ́ bɛtaŋ amfǎy nkaysi bɛ́fyɛ ámɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bo báchák. Ɛ́chí mbɔnyǔ básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Mandɛm apú ka nɛ mmu anɛ áyòŋ mmʉɛt, kɛ ǎyɛt mmu anɛ ásɛ̀pti mmʉɛt mbɔ bɛ yí ápú yɛ̌nyɨŋ.”
59004007	Sɛptí yɛ̌ ka mmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm. Bǎkɛ́ chyɛ Satan mbi, nɛ chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ yi ambʉ́ɛ́ andɔ bhe.
59004008	Kokosí nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm nɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankokosi mmʉɛt nɛ bhe. Bě bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́, fɛrɛ́ ká amɔ́ ndǔ bɛbʉ́. Bě bho bǎchí ɛkak nɛfí ɛkak ánywɔp, fɛrɛ́ ká bɛbʉ́ antɨ bɛ́ batɨ yɛka ambak pɛ́pɛ́p.
59004009	Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka. Bák ká ndǔ basɛ́mɛ́ nɛ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ, babhɛsɛ ansɛbhɛ nɔkɔ amɨ́k byaká byaká byaká. Dɔ̌ ká nɛway-ámɛ́n ɛnɛká mǎmbák ndǔ basɛ́mɛ́. Dɔ̌ ká maŋák amɛká mǎndɔp ndǔ kɛbhɔ.
59004010	Sɔt ká mmʉɛt mbɔ bɛ́ bǎpú yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛsí Mandɛm, nɛ chɔŋ yi ankosi bhe.
59004011	Bɔ̌ma, mmu ákɛ́ rɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti ntɨ. Mbák mmu ándɛ́m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti ntɨ, mbák ɛ́pú nɔ́, ansɔt mmʉɛt mbɔ ntaŋá manyé bɛ́rɛ́m bɛ́ ntɨ abɛp, nɔ́ ǎrɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ ǎtáŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm. Kɛ dɨŋɨ ká bɛ mbák mmu ǎrɛm bɛ́ ɛbhé Mandɛm ɛ́bɛp, nɔ́ yí ápú bhʉɛrɛ yɔ́, kɛ ǎsɔ̀t mmʉɛt mbɔ ntaŋá manyé bɛrɛm bɛ́ ɛbhé ɛ́bɛp.
59004012	Mandɛm aywǐntí kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ́fyɛ bɛbhé, nɛ ndiɛrɛ yí aywǐntí, kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛ́táŋ bo. Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́pɛ́mɛ mmu, nɛ yí kɛ árɛ̀m bɛ́ mmu ángú, angú. Kɛ mbák chí wɔ́, ɔkáysí bɛ́ ɔchí agha bɛkʉ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ ntaŋá manyé, ɔ́ndɛm bɛ́ ntɨ mmu Mandɛm abɛp.
59004013	Bě bho bǎpà, mǎndɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Mbák ɛ́pú ɛchɔŋ nɔ́ mbúrɛ́, chɔŋ sɛ́ndɔ́k ɛtɔk ɛgho fú, sɛ́nchɔkɔ arɛ́ ndǔ mmíɛ́ nɛmɔt sɛ́nkɔ ɛsiɛ́, sɛ́mbɔŋ bɛyǎ nkáp,” Ghók ká.
59004014	Bǎkwáy bɛ́rɨŋɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fàkari mbúrɛ́ ná? Bapɛ́m ayɛka achi mbɔ mɔ́ngo. Ɔ̌ghɔ́ mɔ́ngo nɛ́nɛ kɛ mandú mpok anɛmsi.
59004015	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm chi bɛ, “Mbák chí nkaysi Mandɛm, chɔŋ ambʉɛrɛ bɛsɛ́ nɛpɛ́m, anchyɛ bɛsɛ́ bɛtaŋ sɛ́nkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ sɛ́yàŋ bɛkʉ.”
59004016	Kɛ bǎpú kʉ ɛnyu yɔ. Bǎpá chí nyu mǎnjoŋ nɔkɔ mmʉɛt. Nɛyoŋómʉɛt ɛnɛka ɛnɔ nɛnkɛm nɛ́bhɨkɨ rɨ.
59004017	Yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɨŋɨ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yí ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ, kɛ yí kɛkʉ yɔ́, bɛsí Mandɛm, akʉ bɛbʉ́.
59005001	Bě bǒ bakáp, tá ká batú mǎngók mǎncháp ɛ̌rí kɛbhɔ, mǎmbak ndǔ basɛ́mɛ́ ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ ambɨ ntá yɛká.
59005002	Bakáp ayɛká áchɔ́ŋtí, nɛ kɛngɔk anyiɛ bɛrɨ́tí ndɛn ɛyɛká.
59005003	Mfárɛ́káŋ anyiɛ bakáp ayɛká. Mfárɛ́káŋ anɛ ányíɛ́ nɔ́ wú, mpok Mandɛm átàŋ bé, kɛ̌ yi ásɔ̀t mbɔ ntísiɛ ndu bɛ́chyɛ́ bhe ntɛ́msí. Nɛ mfárɛ́káŋ yɔ kɛ ányìɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛká mbɔ ngó ányìɛ ɛnyɨŋ.
59005004	Bo bákʉ̀ bɛtɨk ndǔ bakɨ yɛka, be kɛchyɛ bakáp ayap. Ngway yɛká akʉ bɔ́ bádì kɛbhɔ bɛ́ Mandɛm ánkwák bhɔ́, nɛ Mandɛm Acha bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm ǎghok kɛbhɔ ɛkap.
59005005	Mǎnyìɛ nɛpɛ́m fá amɨk, mǎnkʉ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ bhe maŋák. Mǎnyiɛ, bǎchɨkɨti bǎrɔp muri múrí mbɔ ɛsɛnɛ́ mpɔŋ ɛnɛ́ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɔŋ bɛway.
59005006	Bǒ bakáp, bǎchyɛ́ bɛsɔŋ ntá bataŋá manyé nɛ bákʉ́ bachɛ́bhɛ́bho mǎnkwɛn manyé, nɔ chi bo abhɛn bábhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ mɛnu nɛ bhe mánchɛ́t bhe mbi.
59005007	Bɔ̌ma, kɛ́p yɛ ká ntɨ ndǔ mǎnòŋ mpok anɛ Yesu Acha átwɔ̀. Yɨŋɨ́ ká bakwaŋá bakɨ. Bákɛ̀pntɨ mɛ́noŋ manyiɛp nchyɛ́miɛ nɛ amɛn ákʉ̀ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ́ngó. Nɛ bákɛ̀pntɨ mɛnoŋ mpok anɛ báfɛ̀rɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛbhɨ.
59005008	Bě nkwɔ, bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ, mǎnte kpirí mbɔnyunɛ mpok anɛ Yesu Acha ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́twɔ arɔp kɛkwɔt.
59005009	Bɔ̌ma, mmu ákɛ́ nywinti ámbɨ́ŋɨ́ nnyɛ́n ntɨ. Mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ nɔ́, ǎkwɛ́n manyé ɛwak Mandɛm átàŋ bo. Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ Ntaŋá-manyé achi ambǐnywɔp téé, apu nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ.
59005010	Bɔ̌ma, bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk barɛmɛ́ kɛpǐntɨ Mandɛm, bo bárɛ̀m nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bɔ́ antɨ bɛ mándɛm. Báchí bɛrɨ́tí bɛrɨŋ ntá yɛsɛ́. Bɔ́ bábhɔ̀ŋ nyaka bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, yɛ̌ nɔ́, mánkɛbhɛ nɔkɔ chí ntɨ.
59005011	Sɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ́ ɛrɨ ntá yap ɛcha mbɔnyunɛ báté nyaka kpirí. Bǎrɨŋɨ ndǔ Job áté nyaka kpirí, nɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti, Mandɛm akʉ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛyi ɛ́máy ɛnkɛm, ɛ́rɨ́ yɛ ntá yi ɛcha. Tɛtɛp, Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛyǎ ntínso nɛ bɛsɛ́.
59005012	Bɔ̌ma, ndak anɛ chí ɛrɛmɛ́ ndak. Mbák ɔrɛm ɛnyɨŋ, ɔ́kɛ́ yɨkɨ. Ɔ́kɛ́ yɨkɨ ɔ́mbɨŋɨ nnyɛ́n Mandɛm mmu áchí amfay. Kɛ́yɨkɨ ɔ́mbɨ́ŋɨ́ mmɨk, nɛ ɔ́kɛ́ yɨkɨ ndǔ nnyɛ́n yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́chák. Mbák ɔká ɛnyɨŋ, dɛm bɛ, “Ɛɛ”, nɛ “Ɛ̌” ámbák chí Ɛɛ. Mbák ɔbhɨ́kɨ́ ká, dɛm bɛ, “Cháo” nɛ “Cháo” ambak chí Cháo. Mbák ɔká ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt, ɔ́nkʉ chí ɛ́chák nɔ ɔ́kwɛ̌n ɛbhé Mandɛm.
59005013	Mbák mmǔ ywɛka achí ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri, ánɨ́k nɔ́kɔ́ mmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ánkwák yí. Mbák mmu achí sayri, ákɛ́ rɔ bɛ́chyɛ́ bakak ntá Mandɛm.
59005014	Mbák mmu ywɛka ǎme, ámbɨ́ŋɨ́ bǒbati Nkwɔ Kristo. Ámbɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɔ bɛ mánɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti yi, mángwati yi bawɛt amʉɛt ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Acha.
59005015	Nɛ mbák bápú makati bɛ Mandɛm ǎghok nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnap, mmǔ nɛme ǎtaŋ. Mandɛm Acha ǎkʉ mmu nɛme antaŋ, amfoŋori yɛ̌ntɨkɨ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́.
59005016	Su nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ ká bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛká ntá batɨ, mǎnɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ámbú bo abhɛn mámè. Nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt mmu anɛ áchí chak bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ́bhɔŋ bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ.
