59005017	Yɨŋɨ́ ká Ɛláija. Áchí nyaka ntɨ nkwǎ mbɔ bhɛsɛ́. Anɨkmʉɛt nɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛnkɛm bɛ́ manyiɛp ákɛ́ kwɛn, nɛ yɛ̌ nɛkɔŋ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ chɨ amɨk ndǔ mamiɛ́ arat nɛ ɛbhɔk.
59005018	Apɛt anɨk mmʉɛt. Mandɛm akʉ yɛ nɛbu nɛ́nɛ́nɛ, manyiɛp asɛp gbokórókórók achwe amɨk, mmɨk apɔp, abho bɛchyɛ nɛnyíɛ́.
59005019	Bɔ̌ma, mbák mmu ywɛká arɔ́ mbi Mandɛm anɛ́m ɛbhɨ, achák ánjá yí ámpɛtnsɛm.
59005020	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ákwáká mmu bɛbʉ́ wu bɛ ántɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi ámpɛ́tnsɛm ntá Mandɛm, mmǔ wu afɛ́rɛ́ yí ndǔ nɛwú, nɛ Mandɛm ǎfoŋori bɛyǎ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi.
60001001	Mɛ Píta, mǔnto Yesu Kristo kɛ nchí sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí sɨ́ŋ ntá yɛka bo Mandɛm, be bho bǎchi mankɔ nɛ bǎtáká mbaŋ nɛ mbaŋ, mbɔk atú Pɔ́ntɔs, báchák atú Galéshia, abhɛnɛfu atú Kapadóshiya, báchák atú Esia, nɛ abhɛnɛfu atú Bitínia.
60001002	Mandɛm Ɛtayɛsɛ ayap be tɛsáy bɛkoŋo nkaysi anɛ yi ánáŋ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka ɛ̌ti yɛka. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ákú mǎmbák nyáŋá bɛ mǎmbák bo abhɛn bághòk Yesu Kristo nɛ bɛ ansɔt manoŋ mi ánkʉ mǎmbák pɛ́pɛ́p. Mandɛm ántɔ́ŋ be bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ndu, anchyɛ be kpák tontó tonto.
60001003	Sɛ́nchíɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm Mmu achi Chi ntá Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo! Ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ ntínso ɛni, achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ ndu ákʉ́ Yesu Kristo áfú ndʉ́ nɛwú apɛtnsɛm ndʉ́ nɛpɛ́m. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ sɛ́bhaka ntɨ nɛ́nɛ bɛ chɔŋ sɛmbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m nɛ yi.
60001004	Sɛ́chi nɛ amík ambɨ sɛ́nòŋ áfɔ́k anɛ Mandɛm ábhʉ́rɛ́ amfay ntá bǒbhi. Abhʉ́rɛ́ wu ntá yɛka. Áfɔ́k wu apu may nɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́pú kwáy bɛchɔŋti wu nɛ ápú gú manyiɛp.
60001005	Ndǔ bǎbhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm ǎbhàbhɛri bhe. Ǎkʉ̀ nɔ bɛ ámpɛ́mɛ́ bhe ndǔ ngwɛnti mpok. Mandú mpok yi ǎkʉ̀ be mǎndɨŋɨ ndǔ yi ápɛ̀mɛ bho.
60001006	Bǎkɛ́ rɔ yɛ bɛbhɔŋ maŋák ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, yɛ̌ndu nɛ́nɛ, bǎkway bɛbhɔŋ bɛyǎ bɛsɔŋɔri nɛ mamɔ mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu ndu mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ mpok.
60001007	Mamɔ anɛ átwɔ̀ chi bɛkʉ bo mángɔ́ mbák bábhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm tɛtɛp. Yɛ̌ndu pú áchɔ̀ŋti, báfyɛ yi ango mánsɔŋ sayri mámfɛrɛ bakwap ndu bɛrɨŋɨ mbák chi pú tɛtɛp. Nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Mandɛm nɛcha pú. Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ bɛghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri ndu bɛkʉ bo mandɨŋɨ mbák nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Mandɛm nɛ́chí tɛtɛp nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu básɔ̀ŋ pú ndu bɛghɔ mbák chi pú tɛtɛp. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ mbák mánte kpirí ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Mandɛm, chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́ntwɔ bhe nɛ bakak, nɛ kɛnɛ́m, nɛ kɛnókó ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn Yesu Kristo ápɛtnsɛm.
60001008	Bǎkɔŋ yi yɛ̌ndu bǎbhɨkɨ re ghɔ yi. Mǎnoko yi yɛ̌ndu bápú ghɔ́ yi nɛ́nɛ, nɛ bábhɔ̀ŋ maŋák amɛn ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ njɛnti nɛ amɛn mmu apú kwáy bɛrɛm ɛnyu mɔ achi.
60001009	Akap anɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛ̌ti nɛka ɛnɛká nɛ Yesu chi nɛpɛmɛ yí ápɛ́mɛ́ bhe.
60001010	Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ abhɛn bárɛ̀m nyaka ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛtɔŋ bhe, báyàŋ nyaka, mámbɛbhɛ nɔkɔ ndu bɛ́rɨŋɨ ɛ̌ti nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ ɛnɛn.
60001011	Ɛfóŋó Kristo ákʉ̀ nyaka barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ mángátí bho be Kristo abhɔŋ bɛbhɔŋ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, nɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti, ambɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ kɛnókó. Bɔ́ mánù nyaka bɛrɨŋɨ mpok anɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́fákári, nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ mmu anɛ bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛfakari nɛ yi.
60001012	Mandɛm akʉ bɔ́ mandɨŋɨ bɛ bě kɛ bǎbhɔŋ nsáy ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhap, puyɛ̌ bɔ babhɔŋ. Nsáy yɔ afʉ̌ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo abhɛn bághàti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ bághátí bhe ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmu Mandɛm átó. Yɛ̌ chi bɔángɛl bábhɔŋ nyaka ɛkwak bɛrɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn tɛntɛp.
60001013	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, toŋtí ká mmʉɛt ndu bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Mandɛm, mǎmbɔŋ nɛkɛ́mɛ́mʉɛt, mámbaka ntɨ sayri ndǔ bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ bhe ambɨ mpok Yesu Kristo ábhesi.
60001014	Tɛ̌ndu bǎchi bo abhɛn bǎghòk Mandɛm, bǎkɛ́ yibhiri mmʉɛt mǎnkóŋó bɛpɔ̌ bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka mpok bǎbhʉɛ́t amɛm ɛjuri.
60001015	Tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm mmu abhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe achi nyáŋá, be nkwɔ bǎbhɔŋ bɛbhak nyáŋá ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛn bǎkù,
60001016	nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Bǎbhɔŋ bɛbhak nyáŋá, mbɔnyu mɛnchí nyáŋá.”
60001017	Nɛ tɛ̌ndu bǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ Mandɛm bɛ Ɛta mpok mǎnɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá yi mmú átàŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu bɛkoŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀ kɛtɔ́ŋ kɛ́rɨ́ŋámík, bɔ́ŋ ká kɛnókó nɛ yi ndǔ ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛyɛka fá amɨk mbɔ mankɔ.
60001018	Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ Yesu Kristo aku bhe afɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ bɛpɔ̌ bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎsɔ́rɛ́ nyaka ntá bachǐmbɨ bhɛka. Abhɨ́kɨ́ ku bhe chí nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chɔ̀ŋti nkáp.
60001019	Aku bhe chi nɛ manoŋ mi nɛ mɔ́ acha nkáp tontó. Yí achi mbɔ mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n anɛ abhɨkɨ kʉ nchɔŋtí nɛ yɔ kɛnyɔp mmʉɛt.
60001020	Mandɛm ápɛ́rɛ ghoko mmɨk, anáŋ ayap nyaka yi. Kɛ ndǔ manywɔp ngwɛnti anɛ kɛ yi abhesi ɛ̌ti ɛyɛka.
60001021	Akʉ mǎmbɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm mmu akʉ yi ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ akʉ yi ambɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ kɛnókó, bɛ́ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ́mbák chi nɛ Mandɛm nɛ bɛ́ mǎmbaka ntɨ nɛ yi.
60001022	Nɛ́nɛ, ɛnɛ́ mǎnáŋ bafɛ́rɛ́ bɛbʉ́ antɨ ndǔ bǎkòŋo tɛtɛp Mandɛm, bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ tɛtɛp nɛ batɨ. Kɔŋ ka batɨ nɛ batɨ yɛka ankɛm.
60001023	Nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ fu chi ntá bachi nɛ manɔ abhɛka bo bapɛm ayap áfʉɛrɛ fʉɛt. Mandɛm asɔt chi Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi kɛ ǎchyɛ bhe nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn, nɛ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti mbɔnyunɛ nɛ́fǔ ndǔ Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m, nɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
60001024	Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́ghàti bhɛsɛ bɛ “Nkwǎŋwaŋ nkɛm achi mbɔ tákɔ, bɛrɨ bhi mɛnkɛm mbɔ bɔchuchu abhɛn tákɔ. Tákɔ ǎwɔsi, bɔchuchu mánkuri,
60001025	kɛ Ɛyɔŋ Acha ɛbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.” Ɛyɔŋ ɛyɔ chi Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ bághátí nyaka bhe.
60002001	Ndu Mandɛm achyɛ nɔ bhe nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛkɔ, fɛrɛ́ ká barak abʉ́abʉ ankɛm antɨ. Bǎkɛ́ pɛrɛ sénse, dɔ̌ ká bɛtábhá, dɔ̌ ká mpabhamɨ́k, nɛ dɔ̌ ká bɛrɛm barak abʉ́abʉ ɛ̌ti bho ndu bɛchɔŋti manyɛ́n ayap.
60002002	Bák ká mbɔ mɔ̌nkɔ mmu áŋwaka mɛnyu amɨ mpoknkɛm. Bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkwak nɛbhɨ ɛnɛn mbɔŋ, nɔ chi, Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Yɔ́ ɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ mǎngo Mandɛm ápɛmɛ bhe.
60002003	Ɛrɨ mǎmbɔ́ŋ ɛkwak ɛnyu yɔ mbɔnyunɛ mǎnaŋ bǎrɨŋɨ nɛ́nɛ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka ɛnyǔ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ ɛbhɛn Acha Yesu Kristo átɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ.
60002004	Twɔ́ yɛ ka ntá Acha. Yí achi mbɔ ntay ɛnɛn nɛchi nɛpɛ́m, ɛnɛ́n bǒ mmɨk bábyaka bɛ nɛpu yɛ̌nyɨŋ, kɛ Mandɛm ayap nɔ nɛbhɔŋ mɛnwɔp bɛsí bhi.
60002005	Bě nkwɔ bǎchi nɛpɛ́m. Bák yɛ ka mbɔ batay anɛ básɔ̀t bɛte ɛkɛt ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ábhàk arɛ́. Bǎchi bo abhɛn yi ábhʉ́rɛ́ nyáŋá bɛ mǎmbák nnɛrɛ́kɛt anɛ́ bachiǎkap, ndu bɛchyɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛka nkɛm ntá yi ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chyɛ̀ Mandɛm maŋák ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo.
60002006	Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyu básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Ghɔ́ ká! Nchí bhʉrɛ ntay ɛnɛn nɛ́kɛm ɛkɛt fá amɛm ɛtɔk Síɔn, chí ntay ɛnɛn njábhɛ́ nɛ nɛ́rɨ nɛcha. Mmu anɛ ánókó yi, bápú kʉ yi ámbɔ́ŋ ntíánwɔ́p wawak.”
60002007	Bě abhɛn mǎnókó yi, ntá yɛka yi arɨ acha kɛ ntá bo abhɛn babhɨkɨ noko yi basɨŋ bɛ, “Nkúbhɛ́ ntay ɛnɛn batěkɛt bábyáká, nɔ́ kɛ nɛ́yíbhírí nɛ́rɔ́bhɛ́ ntay ɛnɛn nɛ́kɛ̀m ɛkɛt.”
60002008	Basɨŋ nkwɔ amɛm ɛkáti bɛ, “Ntay ɛnɛ́n nɛ́kʉ̀ chɔŋ bo mántɛm ɛkak mánkwɛ́n, nkúbhɛ́ nɔ́ kɛ nɛchi sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́ ɛsɛn sɛ́kʉ̀ bo mánkwɛn.” Bátɛ̀m ɛkak arɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ bápú bhʉɛrɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm atɨ nyaka bɛ ɛ́mbák.
60002009	Kɛ mbák chi bhe, Mandɛm ayap bhe bɛ mǎmbak nnɛrɛ́kɛt anɛ bachiǎkap ntá Mfɔ ywɛsɛ. Bǎchi nyáŋá bɛsí Mandɛm. Ayap be bɛ mǎmbák bǒbhi mǎngátí nɔ́kɔ́ bho bɛtɨkɨ́ maknkay ɛbhi, yi mmu áfɛ́rɛ́ bhe ndǔ ɛjuri abhʉrɛ amɛm ɛrɛmɛ́ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́.
60002010	Mpok yɔ, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɔ ntínso Mandɛm nɛmbak nɛ bhe kɛ nɛ́nɛ, bǎrɔ ntínso Mandɛm nɛmbak nɛ bhe.
60002011	Abhɛ́n ɛkɔŋ, bǎchi mankɔ nɛ bǎfʉɛrɛ fʉɛt fá amɨk. Ndu ɛchi nɔ, nnɨkmʉɛt, fɛrɛ́ ká amɔ́ ndǔ barak abʉ́abʉ anɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛka ɛ́kʉ̀ mǎŋwaka bɛkʉ mbɔnyunɛ mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ mɛ́nù nɛ bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛka.
60002012	Kɛ́m ká ɛrɨ́tɨ́ ɛkakánɛkɔ yɛka nɛntɨ bo abhɛn babhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm bɛ yɛ̌ bárɛ̀m chi ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti yɛka, mánáŋ mángɔ́ bɛrɨ́ ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ̀, mánchyɛ kɛnókó ntá Mandɛm ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn yi átwɔ bɛtaŋ bo.
60002013	Ɛ̌ti Acha Yesu, sɛptí ká mmʉɛt ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mǔnti ywɛka, nɛ yɛ̌ chi mfɔ ngo mmu bo mankɛm bachi antɛnɛ yi,
60002014	nɛ yɛ̌ chi bɔgɔ́bhanɔ abhɛn yi átó bɛ mántɛ́msí nɔ́kɔ́ bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ, mánkaka nɔkɔ abhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak.
60002015	Mandɛm áyàŋ bɛ mǎnkʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak bɛ manyu ánchók bɛchɨŋtǐ bho abhɛn babhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
60002016	Bák ká mbɔ bo abhɛn bábhɔŋɔ ngǎngaŋ bɛbhak ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛyap. Kɛ bǎkɛ́ rɛm bɛ ɛ̌ti bǎbhɔŋ ngǎngaŋ, bǎkway bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́. Bák ká mbɔ bǒ bɛtok Mandɛm.
60002017	Chiɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ka bo mankɛm kɛnókó. Bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ bǒnkwɔ, Bɔ́ŋ ká bɛcháy Mandɛm, chyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ká mfɔ-ngo kɛnókó.
60002018	Bǒ bɛtok, bɔ́ŋ ká nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt bɛsí bachi abhɛka nɛ kɛnókó kɛnkɛm. Bǎkɛ́ bhak ɛnyu ɛyɔ ndiɛrɛ nɛ abhɛn bɛrɨ̌ntɨ nɛ abhɛn bákɛ̀m be sayri. Bák ká ɛnyu yɔ yɛ̌ chi nɛ abhɛn báchí bɛběbɛbe.
60002019	Mmu anɛ ákɛpntɨ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ báchyɛ̀ yi ndɛ́ndɛm ndu yi árɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ Mandɛm achi nɛ yi, Mandɛm ǎbhɔŋ maŋák nɛ yi.
60002020	Kɛ ntá mmu anɛ ákʉ́ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ, mbák mándɛ́n wɔ ɔ́nkɛpntɨ, nsáy anɛ ɔ́bhɔ̀ŋ ǎbhák bɛ yi? Kɛ mbák ɔ́kʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛchi chak kɛ ɔ́mbɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ ɔ́nkɛpntɨ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri yɔ, Mandɛm ǎbhɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ wɔ.
60002021	Chi ndu ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ kɛ Mandɛm abhɨŋɨ bhe mbɔ ɛnyǔ Yesu Kristo nkwɔ abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ̌ti yɛka, arɔ be ɛrɨŋ bɛ mǎnkóŋó nɔ́kɔ́ bayat yi.
60002022	Abhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ nyaka yɛ̌ bɛbʉ́, nɛ yɛ̌ mmu yi abhɨkɨ rwɔ.
60002023	Mpok básɔ̀kɔti yi, abhɨ́kɨ́ kɛmɛ yɛ̌ nsɔk. Mpok yi ághɔ̀ ɛsɔŋɔri, abhɨ́kɨ́ pa yɛ̌ mmu. Árɔ barak ankɛm ntá Mandɛm mmu átàŋ manyé ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛchi chak.
60002024	Yímbɔŋ ápɔ́kɔ́ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ mɛnkɛm amʉɛt ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Akʉ nɔ bɛ sɛ́ndɔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ sɛ́mbak chak. Bɛfʉɛt ɛbhɛ́n báfyɛ́ yi amʉɛt bɛ́bǔ bhe.
60002025	Bǎchí nyaka mbɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n anɛ́ ánɛ́mɛ́ ɛbhɨ, kɛ nɛ́nɛ bápɛtnsɛm ntá Mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n, mmu achi Mbabhɛri bapɛ́m ayɛka.
60003001	Bě baghɔrɛ́ nkwɔ bǎbhɔŋ bɛsɛptimʉɛt ntá manɛ́m abhɛka. Mbák mǎnkʉ nɔ, bǎkway bɛkʉ manɛ́m abhɛka abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm mánoko yɛ̌ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɛm chí ɛnyɨŋ ntá yap.
60003002	Bákway mɛnoko mpok bághɔ̀ kɛnókó ɛkɛn báchyɛ̀ Mandɛm nɛ ndǔ bǎchí chak bɛsí bhi.
60003003	Bɛrɨ ɛbhɛka bɛkɛ fú chi ndǔ mmʉɛt bɛsɔbhɛri nɛ bati bɛ́ghóko nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ pú nɛ ndu bɛfyɛ bɛrɨ́tí ndɛn.
60003004	Mɛ́mbák chí bɛrɨ̌ ɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù amɛm ntɨ, nɛ bɛbhak kpák, nɛ nɛsɛptímʉɛt mbɔnyunɛ ɛnyǔ bɛrɨ ɛbhɔ bɛpu gu manyiɛp, nɛ ɛbhɔ kɛ Mandɛm ákɔŋ tontó.
60003005	Baghɔrɛ́ abhɛn tɛsáy abhɛn bachi nyáŋá nɛ básɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm bághòk nyaka manɛ́m abhap nɛ ɛnyu ɛyɔ, báre fyɛ́ bɛrɨ amʉɛt.
60003006	Sará abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka ɛnyu ɛpɨŋ ɛyɔ, ambɨŋɨ nɔkɔ nnɛ́m ɛ́ywi Ábraham bɛ acha. Nɛ bǎchi bɔ̌ Sará nɛ́nɛ, mbák bǎkòŋo ɛrɨ́tí ɛpɨŋ ɛyi kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy.
60003007	Bě manɛ́m nkwɔ, mǎnkɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ baghɔrɛ́ bhɛka sayri, mǎnchyɛ nɔkɔ bɔ́ kɛnókó mbɔ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ mbɔ bhe. Bě nɛ bhɔ bǎbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn Mandɛm achyɛ ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi. Kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ ká nɔ bɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛkɛ chyɛt nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnɛka.
60003008	Ndǔ ngwɛnti, bɔ́ŋ ká nkaysi amɔt, mǎmbɔŋ nɔkɔ ntínso nɛ batɨ, mánkɔŋ batɨ bǒnkwɔ, mǎmbɔŋ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ nɛ batɨ, nɛ mǎmbɔŋ nɛsɛptímʉɛt.
60003009	Yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka ákɛ́ kɛmɛ bɛbʉ́ amfǎy bɛbʉ́. Mbák mu asɔk wɔ, ɔ́kɛ́ sɔk yi. Kɛ nɨkmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ankʉ yi bɛrɨ. Mandɛm abhɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ́ chi bɛ ɔ́mbak nɔ bɛ́ yi anjɛt wɔ.
60003010	Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mmu anɛ áyàŋ bɛbhɔŋ ɛrɨ́tí nɛpɛ́m, nɛ áyàŋ bɛbhak maŋák, ánkɛ́m nɛ́rɨ ɛni bɛ ákɛ́ rɛm ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ, bɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́kɛ́ fu yi anyu.
60003011	Mmǔ wu abhɔŋ bɛtɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́, ándɔ́bhɛ kʉ chi bɛrɨ, ánú bɛbhak kpák nɛ bho, andɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ nɔ.
60003012	Amɨ́k Mandɛm Acha áchí amʉɛt bo abhɛn bachi chak, nɛ yi ǎghòk yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnap, kɛ ǎtɨknsɛm ntá bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́.”
60003013	Mbák báyàŋ tontó bɛ́kʉ bɛrɨ, agha ákway mɛnɨ bhe?
60003014	Nɛ yɛ̌ ɛmbak chi bɛ bǎbhɔ̀ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ̌ti bǎchí chak, ɛyɛka ɛ́rɨ ɛncha. Bǎkɛ chay yɛ̌ mmu, nɛ batɨ ákɛ́ sɔŋɔri be amɛm.
60003015	Kɛ chyɛ nɔkɔ ka Kristo kɛnókó mbɔ Acha amɛm batɨ yɛka. Tě ká mpoknkɛm bɛghati yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhɛ̀p bhe ntí anɛ bǎbháká ntɨ nɛ Yesu. Kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ ka nɔ nɛ ɛrɨ́tí ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu, nɛ kɛnókó.
60003016	Bʉrɛ́ ká batɨ yɛka pɛ́pɛ́p, bɛ mpok bo básɔ̀kɔti bhe ɛ̌ti ɛrɨ́tí ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛyɛka mbɔ bakoŋó Kristo, ntíánwɔ́p ánkɛm bɔ.
60003017	Ɛ́chí sayri bɛghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ̌ti ɔ́kʉ̀ bɛrɨ mbák nɔ kɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ, ɛcha bɛbhɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ ntí bɛ ɔ̌kʉ̀ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ.
60003018	Kristo nkwɔ aghɔ nyaka ɛsɔŋɔri, agú ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bo mankɛm, ndɔŋ amɔt ndak ámáy. Anaŋa bɛtɨk ɛbhɔ, yi mmu achi chak, ɛ̌ti bo abhɛn bapu chak, bɛ́ ánsɔt bɛsɛ ntá Mandɛm. Báwáy yi, agú ndǔ nkwɔmʉɛt, kɛ ndǔ Ɛfóŋó, Mandɛm akʉ yi apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
60003019	Nɛ Yesu arɔk ndǔ Ɛfóŋó aghati Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ntá bɛfóŋó bo abhɛn bábhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú mɛnoŋ manyé anɛ ngwɛnti mmɨk.
60003020	Nɔ chí, bɛfóŋó bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko nyaka Mandɛm mpok Nóa. Mandɛm ǎnòŋ nyaka nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ bɛ bɔ́ mángúpsí batɨ yap mpok Nóa ághòko áchwí. Bǎru bho bati anɛn abhɛn bachi amɛm áchwí kɛ bápɛ́m nyaka ndu áchwí ághɔ̀k amfǎnyɛ́n.
60003021	Manyiɛbhɛ́ mɔ até ndǔ nɛjwiti ɛnɛn nɛ́pɛ̀mɛ bhe ɛchɔŋ. Nɛjwiti puyɛ̌ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fɛ̀rɛ bo bakwap amʉɛt. Chi nku anɛ mmu ányù nɛ Mandɛm nɛ ntɨ ɛnɛn pɛ́pɛ́p. Nɛjwiti nɛ́pɛ̀mɛ mmu ɛ̌ti nɛpɛrɛ́nsɛm ɛnɛn Yesu Kristo ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
60003022	Mpok ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, ákó amfay, achɔkɔ ndu ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm Mandɛm. Arɛ́, bɔángɛl, bɛfóŋó, nɛ bɛtaŋtí bɛfóŋó, nɛ mɛnyǔ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm bɛ́chí antɛnɛ yi.
60004001	Tɛ̌ndu Kristo ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ yɛ ɛsɔŋɔri fá amɨk, agú, bǎbhɔŋ bɛgwɔt mmʉɛt nɛ ɛnyǔ nkaysi anɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔ Kristo fá amɨk abhɨkɨ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ ɛnyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ bɛbʉ́.
60004002	Ɛyɔ ɛkʉ bɛ tɛ ndiɛrɛ nɛwú, bǎkɛ́ pɛrɛ ŋwaka bɛkʉ bɛpɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǒ mmɨk bábhɔ̀ŋ ɛkwak arɛ. Bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkwak chí bɛ́kóŋo nkaysi Mandɛm.
60004003	Ndǔ mpok anɛ áfʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, bǎkʉ̀ nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bákɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ. Ɛyɔ ɛkway! Bǎchyɛ̀ nyaka nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka ndu bɛpɔ̌ baraka ɛpúsí, bǎbhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ ɛkwak ndu bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ, bǎbhák manyǔ mmɛ́m, mǎnkoŋo nɔkɔ bɛpǎ ɛpusi nɛ bɛchɛmɛ́ manyǔ mmɛ́m, mǎnchyɛ nɔkɔ kɛnókó ntá bɔmandɛm nsé, ɛnɛ ɛbhé Mandɛm ɛpu ka nɔ.
60004004	Bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm bachi maknkay bɛ nɛ́nɛ, bǎpú pɛrɛ chɛm mmʉɛt nɛ bhɔ ndǔ ɛpɔ̌ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɔ. Ɛkʉ bɔ bárɛ̀m bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yɛka.
60004005	Kɛ mpok átwɔ̀ anɛ bo bhɔ bátè bɛsí Mandɛm ndǔ manyé bɛ mándɛm ɛnyu bákʉ́ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap. Mandɛm até bɛ́taŋ bo abhɛn bachi pě nɛ bawú.
60004006	Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ bághàti nyaka Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ yɛ̌ chí ntá bawú bɛ́ yɛ̌ndu bágú mbɔ ɛnyǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu, mánkwáy bɛbhak nɛpɛ́m ndu ɛfóŋó mbɔ Mandɛm.
60004007	Ngwɛnti mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm achi kɛkwɔt. Bǎkɛ́ bhak yɛ taka taka ndǔ nkaysi yɛka. Bák ká pě amɛm batɨ ayɛka bɛ mǎnkwáy mɛnɨkmʉɛt.
60004008	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛcha bɛchak mɛnkɛm chi bɛ mǎndɔk ambɨ bɛkɔŋ batɨ nɛ batɨ ayɛka ankɛm tɛ̌ndu ɛkɔŋ ɛ́kùti bɛyǎ bɛbʉ́.
60004009	Syɛptí nɔ́kɔ́ ká batɨ bǒnkwɔ amɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhɛka kɛbhák bɛ bákʉ̀ nɔ mǎnywinti nɔkɔ.
60004010	Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ bhe akap mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛkwak ntɨ nɛ aywi akap mbɔ ɛrɨ́tí nkʉbɛtɨk Mandɛm.
60004011	Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ághàti bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, abhɔŋ bɛkʉ nɔ mbɔ mmu anɛ árɛ̀m nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm. Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛtik Mandɛm, abhɔŋ bɛkʉ bhɔ́ chi nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ yi. Ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛbhak nɔ, bɛ ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, bo mánchyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ Mandɛm kɛnókó ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo. Mandɛm kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ kɛnókó kɛnkɛm nɛ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm bɛ́chí ɛbhi ngwɛnti tí. Amen.
60004012	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, bǎkɛ́ bhak maknkay ndǔ bɛrɛm bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ ntá yɛka. Bɛ́twɔ̀ chi mɛmɔ be mbák bǎsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm tɛtɛp. Bákɛ́ sɔt bhɔ mbɔ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bábhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ kɛ bɛ́fàkari nɛ bhe.
60004013	Bɔ́ŋ nɔ́kɔ́ ká chi maŋák tɛ̌ndu bábhɔ̀ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔ Kristo ndǔ bǎchɛ́mɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ yi, bɛ́ be nkwɔ mǎnjwi nɛ maŋák mpok yi átwɔ nɛ kɛnɛ́m ɛki.
60004014	Ɛ́rɨ ntá yɛka ɛcha mbák bǒ básɔ̀kɔti bhe ɛ̌ti bǎchi bakoŋo Kristo mbɔnyunɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ Ɛfóŋó bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm, nɔ chi Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm, achi nɛ bhe.
60004015	Kɛ yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka ákɛ́ bhɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ̌ti yi achi ngwayti bho, yɛ̌ chi ɛ̌ti yi achi ngɛp, yɛ̌ chi ɛ̌ti yi achi nkʉ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ, nɛ ɛ́kɛ́ bhak chi ɛ̌ti yi ákɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛchwe ndǔ baraka bo bachak.
60004016	Kɛ mbák mmu ǎbhɔ̀ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ̌ti yi achi mmu Kristo, ntíánwɔ́p ákɛ́ kɛm yi. Ánkáká nɔ́kɔ́ kaka Mandɛm bɛ yi aká nnyɛ́n bɛ mmǔ Kristo.
60004017	Ɛ́mbák chí nɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ mpok manyé akway, nɛ ábho chi ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Mandɛm. Nɛ mbák ámbó nɛ bhɛsɛ, chɔŋ ɛ́mbak ná nɛ bo abhɛn bápú koŋo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm?
60004018	Nɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mbák bo ábhɛn báchí chak bábhɔŋ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri kɛ mámpɛmɛ bhɔ, chɔŋ ɛ́mbak ná nɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm, nɛ bákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́?”
60004019	Bo abhɛn bábhɔ̀ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔnyunɛ ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ nkaysi Mandɛm achi, bábhɔŋ bɛrɔ́ŋ ambɨ bɛ́kʉ bɛrɨ, mándɔ bapɛm ayap ntá Mandɛm mmu aghoko bhɔ. Yi apú rɔ bɛbhʉrɛ bariɛp ami.
60005001	Nchí ghati yɛ bǒbati abhɛn bachi ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́kʉ. Mɛ nkwɔ nchí mǔnti mbɔ bhe. Ngɔ̌ nyaka ɛnyu Kristo ághɔ̀ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ nchí ndǔ mpǎy bo abhɛn Mandɛm ákʉ̀ chɔŋ mǎngɔ kɛnɛ́m Kristo mpok yi átwɔ̀.
60005002	Babhɛrí nɔ́kɔ́ ká bǒnkwɔ abhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ amɔ́ yɛka mbɔ mmu anɛ ábhàbhɛri nkwɔ́ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n. Kʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ká mbɔ bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ntɨ bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ mankʉ. Ɛ́kɛ́ bhak chi mbɔ bɛ mányiɛrɛ bhe nyirɛ. Kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ ká nɔ nɛ ntɨ nɛnkɛm kɛfyɛ́ ngoŋo ndǔ bɛbhɔŋ nsáy.
60005003	Bǎkɛ́ bhak mbɔ bafɔ amfáy bo abhɛn báfyɛ́ amɔ́ yɛka. Bák ká chɨ́ bɛrɨ́tɨ́ bɛrɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛ́ŋɔ́kɔ.
60005004	Nɛ mpok Mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n anɛ ngo abhesi, chɔŋ anchyɛ bhe akap anɛ́ árɨ́ achá, akap anɛ apu yibhiri ɛnyu.
60005005	Bě bɛsakábho nɛ baghɔsɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ŋ ká nɛsɛptímʉɛt ntá bǒ batɨ́ bhɛka. Bɔ́ŋ ká nɛsɛptímʉɛt nɛ batɨ. Nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt nɛ́mbák ntá yɛka mbɔ nkú anɛ mmu afyɛ́ amʉɛt. Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mandɛm apú chyɛ mbi ntá mmu anɛ áyòŋmʉɛt, kɛ ǎtɔ̀ŋ bɛrɨ̌ndu ntá bo abhɛn básɛptimʉɛt amɨk.”
60005006	Sɛptí yɛ ka mmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm bɛ́ mpok yi ankway, yí ankosi bhe.
60005007	Dɔ̌ ká bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛka mɛnkɛm ntá yi. Yí kɛ áyɨ̀ŋɨ bhe.
60005008	Kɛ́m ká mmʉɛt. Bák ká pě. Satan mǔmpap ywɛka ǎghàp, amkpe nɔkɔ mbɔ nkʉ, ndu áyàŋ mmu anɛ yi akɛm anyiɛ.
60005009	Bǎkɛ́ chyɛ yi mbi. Tě ka kpirí ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka. Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ batɨ bǒnkwɔ mbaŋ nkɛm fá amɨk, bághɔ̀ nkúbhɛ́ mɛnyu bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ̀.
60005010	Mǎnáŋ mǎngɔ ɛsɔŋɔri, nɛ ɛ́pú bhak chɔŋ ndu ɛrɔri mpok, chɔŋ mbɔŋ Mandɛm mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɨ̌ndu mɛnkɛm ankʉ mǎnte sɛnɛ́, ɛnyɨŋ kɛchɛp bhe, ambʉrɛ bhe ndu nté anɛ mǎnáŋ bǎchi nyaka arɛ, anchyɛ bhe bɛtaŋ. Yi kɛ ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ be bɛ mǎmbɔŋ ákɔ́rɛ́ ndǔ kɛnɛ́m ɛkɛn kɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti ndǔ bǎchɛ́mɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo.
60005011	Bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm chi ɛbhi mpoknkɛm. Amen.
60005012	Sáilas akwak mɛ bɛsɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nsɔt yí mbɔ ntɨ manɔ anɛ mɛ̌kwáy bɛsɨkɨntɨ nɛ yi. Ntí anɛ nsɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe mɔ́mbɨŋɨ́ ɛkáti ɛnɛ chi ndu bɛ́fyɛ bhe ntɨ nɛ bɛghati bhe ɛnyu Mandɛm áyɛ̀t bho. Tě ká kpirí arɛ́.
60005013	Ɛka bǒnkwɔ abhɛn bachi fá ɛtɔk Bábilɔn, bátò be bakak. Mandɛm ayap bɔ́ nkwɔ mbɔ bhe. Mɔ́wa Mák nkwɔ ǎtò be bakak.
60005014	Kaká ká batɨ sayri nɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ Yesu. Kpák ámbák nɛ be mankɛm abhɛn bǎchɛ́mɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo.
61001001	Mɛ Símun Píta, mǔbɛtok, nɛ mǔnto Yesu Kristo kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí sɨŋ ntá bo abhɛn mánoko Yesu Kristo mbɔ bhɛsɛ. Yi mmu achi Mandɛm ywɛsɛ nɛ Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ kɛ akʉ bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́bhɔŋ nɛka nɛ yi. Yi achi chak ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ yi ákʉ.
61001002	Mandɛm ántɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu andɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, anchyɛ bɛ kpák anɛ ájwi amɛm batɨ yɛka ndǔ bǎrɨ̀ŋɨ yi nɛ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo.
61001003	Yesu Kristo áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ sɛ́ndɨŋɨ Mandɛm mmu ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ kɛnɛ́m nɛ yi, nɛ bɛ sɛ́nkoŋo ɛpɨŋ ɛyi ɛnɛ́ ɛrɨ ɛcha. Ndu sɛ́rɨ̀ŋɨ yi, ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chɛ́bhɛ́ bhɛsɛ. Nɛ ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ nɛ ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bo Mandɛm bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhɔŋ.
61001004	Bɛ́fʉɛ́t ndǔ kɛnɛ́m ɛki nɛ ɛrɨ́tɨ́ ɛpɨŋ ɛyi, Mandɛm ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛrɨ bɛcha, ɛbhɛn yi afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ. Akʉ nɔ bɛ mǎmbʉ́ɛ́ bɛpɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo máŋwaka bɛkʉ fá amɨk, mǎndɔbhɛ bhɔŋ chi ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm.
61001005	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, nu ká mɛ́máka ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛrɨ ɛcha ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Yesu, mǎnu nkwɔ bɛrɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ.
61001006	Ndu mɛ́máka ndǔ nɛrɨŋɨ́mɛnyɨŋ bɔ́ŋ ká nkwɔ nɛkɛmɛ́mʉɛt. Nɛ mɛ́máka ndǔ nɛkɛmɛ́mʉɛt, tě ká kpirí. Nɛ mɛ́máka ndǔ nɛte kpirí, bɔ́ŋ ká ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bo Mandɛm bábhɔŋɔ bɛbhɔŋ.
61001007	Nɛ mɛ́máka ndǔ ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chyɛ̀ Mandɛm maŋák, bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ mbɔ bǒnɛrɛ́kɛt amɔt nɛ mǎnkɔŋ bǒ mankɛm.
61001008	Mbák mǎndɔ́k ambɨ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ, nɛrɨŋɨ anɛ bǎrɨŋɨ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo apú bhak ndɛ́ndɛm, kɛ bɛrɨ bɛ́fù ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎkʉ̀.
61001009	Kɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛpu ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni achí nnɛ́mámɨ́k. Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ́, apú ghɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ, nɛ ághɔ́kɔ́ntɨk bɛ Mandɛm asó bɛbʉ́ bhɛsɛ afɛrɛ.
61001010	Bɔ̌ma, fyɛ́ yɛ́ ka bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ Mandɛm abhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhe nɛ ayap bhe tɛtɛp mbɔnyunɛ mbák bákʉ̀ nɔ bǎpú kwɛn wáwák.
61001011	Nɛ Mandɛm ápú rɔ mɛ́nɛ́nɛ mbǐnywɔp fúú, bɛ mǎnchwe ndǔ kɛfɔ ɛkɛn Acha nɛ Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo. Kɛfɔ ɛkɔ kɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
61001012	Mbɔ̌ŋ yɛ nkaysi bɛtɨk bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm, mpoknkɛm, yɛ̌ndu bǎrɨŋɨ bhɔ nɛ bǎte kpirí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ tɛtɛp ɛbhɛn bátɔ́ŋɔ́ be.
61001013	Nkáysí bɛ ɛchi chak bɛ ntɨ́k nɔ́kɔ́ bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndu mbʉɛ́t fá amɨk bɛ bǎkɛ́ bhʉrɛ kɛnɔ́,
61001014	tɛ̌ndu ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo átɔ́ŋ mɛ bɛ manywɔp aya fá amɨk ábhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ yá.
61001015	Nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛghɔ bɛ mpok nnáŋ ndɔ́ mmɨk, mǎntɨk nɔ́kɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mpoknkɛm.
61001016	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghàti nyaka bhe ɛ̌ti nɛtwɔ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛ́pú bakay. Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛ́ghɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛki nɛ amɨ́k.
61001017	Mpok Mandɛm mmu achi Ɛta átɔ́ŋɔ́ kɛnɛ́m ɛki nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi, sɛbhak arɛ nɛ Yesu. Sɛ́ghók ndu Mandɛm mmu acha mankɛm árɛ̀m bɛ, “Nɛ́ chi Mɔ́wa. Nkɔŋ yi tontó. Ǎchyɛ̀ mɛ bɛyǎ kɛnókó.”
61001018	Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛ́ghók ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fǔ amfay mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́chí nyaka nɛ yi amfǎy njiɛ Mandɛm.
61001019	Ɛ̌ti yɔ, sɛ́rɨŋɨ mbɔŋ nɛ́nɛ ɛcha ɛnyu ɛsɨ́ bɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bárɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ́chí tɛtɛp. Fíɛ́ yɛ́ ka ntí ndǔ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhap, mbɔnyunɛ bɛ́chí mbɔ ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnɛ ɛ́ghɔ̀ amɛm ɛjuri. Dɔ́k ká ambɨ bɛghok bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɔ kpatɛ mpok anɛ nywɔp nɛ́yì. Ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɔ, nɛmbe ɛnɛn beti nɛ́ghɔ̀ amɛm batɨ yɛka.
61001020	Ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɨ ɛnɛ́ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɨŋɨ chi bɛ, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ barɛmɛ nyaka, ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm, yɛ̌ mmu apú kway bɛsɔt kɛboŋ ɛki ánɛ́nɛ́ bhɔ ntá bho,
61001021	mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ amɔt abhɨkɨ rɛm nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛfu ndu nkaysi nkwǎŋwaŋ. Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm kɛ áchwé nyaka bho antɨ, akʉ bɔ́ mándɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛfu ntá Mandɛm.
61002001	Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nsé báchi nyaka nɛntɨ bǒ Mandɛm. Nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛchi ɛchɔŋ bɛ batɔŋɔ́ nsé bábhɔŋ bɛbhesi nɛntɨ ɛnɛka mántɔŋ nɔkɔ be baraká nsé ɛ̌ti Mandɛm nɛ bapu ɛnɛ́ ɛyɔ ɛ́twɔ̀ bhɔ chi nɛ mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́. Bátɔ̀ŋ nɛ mánìsi bɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛtayap mmu ákú bhɔ́ áfɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ kɛsɛm. Nɛ ndu bákʉ̀ nɔ, ngwɛnti yap ǎbɛ́p ancha.
61002002	Chɔŋ bɛyǎ bho mánkoŋo bɛpɔ̌ barak ɛpúsí yap nɛ ɛyɔ ɛnkʉ bo bachak mándɛm bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti mbi anɛ tɛtɛp.
61002003	Nɛ chɔŋ batɔŋɔ́ nse bhɔ mánsɔt bɛyɔŋɔ́ nse ndu bɛrwɔ bhe bɛ mányiɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛka nɛ ngwáy yap. Mandɛm ánáŋ átàŋ bɔ tɛ mpok anɛ afʉɛrɛ ansɛm nɛ ɛrɔp chi bɛ mámbɔ́ŋ ntɛmsi yap.
61002004	Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ rɔ nyaka bɔángɛl mándɔ́k ndɛ́ndɛm mpok bákʉ́ bɛbʉ́, kɛ amɛsɛ bhɔ amɛm nɛpi, ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ágiri pyɔ́ɔ́, afe bɔ arɛ́ nɛ ngɛm bɛ mámbák arɛ tɛ mpok manyé ankway.
61002005	Abhɨ́kɨ́ rɔ nkwɔ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mpok nɛ yi, ndu mpok Nóa. Ató ɛghorǐ manyiɛp ɛ́wáy bǒbhɔ mankɛm. Apɛmɛ chí ndiɛrɛ Nóa mmu ághàti bho bɛ mámbák chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Nɛ apɛmɛ bo bachak bati tándrámɔt.
61002006	Bǎrɨŋɨ nkwɔ bɛ Mandɛm anáŋá nyaka bo Sódom nɛ Gomóra mpok yi átó ngo arɛ. Ásɔ́ŋ bhɔ krokotok, bɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́mbák mbɔ ɛrɨŋ ntá bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mpok nɛ yi.
61002007	Mpok yɔ, apɛ́mɛ́ Lɔt mmu achí chak, yi mmu bɛpɔ̌ barak ɛpúsí anɛ bǒ bɛbʉ́ bhɔ bákʉ̀, áchyɛ nyaka yi ɛsɔŋɔri antɨ.
61002008	Ǎchɔkɔ nyaka nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí bǒbhɔ, angɔ nɔkɔ bɛbɛ́ptí barak anɛ bɔ bákʉ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp nɛ angok nɔkɔ bɛpɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bárɛ̀m. Bɛbɛpti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́chɔ̀ŋti nyaka ntɨ ɛni amɛm tontó mbɔnyunɛ yímbɔŋ achi nyaka mmu chak.
61002009	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛ Mandɛm Acha arɨ́ŋɨ́ ndu áfɛrɛ bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bo Mandɛm bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ, nɛ ndu átɛ̀msi bo abhɛn bápù chak, bɛ ntɛmsi yap ambak nɛ bhɔ tɛ ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn manyé.
61002010	Arɨ́ŋɨ́ nkwɔ báráká ntianywɔp anɛ mmʉɛt ɛyap ɛ́ŋwaka bɛ mánkʉ nɛ bo abhɛn bábyak bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ.
61002011	Yɛ̌ndu bɔángɛl bacha bhɔ ndǔ bɛtaŋ bápú rɛm bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ. Bápú sɔkɔti bhɔ́ nɛ bápú rɛm ɛbʉbʉ ɛ̌ti yap bɛsí Ɛta Mandɛm.
61002012	Kɛ batɔŋɔ́ nse bhɔ bárɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mmʉɛt ɛyap ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ, mbɔ nyǎbhɨ ɛnɛ́ bábhe chi bɛ mankɛm mangway. Bǎbhɔŋ bɛ́way bhɔ mbɔ nyǎbhɨ.
61002013	Bǎbhɔŋ bɛ́chyɛ bhɔ ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔnyunɛ bɔ báchyɛ̀ bo bachak ɛsɔŋɔri. Bo abhɛn báyàŋ mɛnyiɛ nɛpɛ́m, Maŋák amap chi bɛkʉ nɔ yɛ̌ chi nɛ ngósí chuuu. Bɛpɨŋ ɛbhap bɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ ntíánwɔ́p ntá yɛka. Báchɔ̀kɔ nɛ bhe manyíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ kɛ bákʉ̀ chi bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ bɔ maŋák.
61002014	Nɛ bákʉ̀ barak ɛ́pusi nɛ amɨk, nɛ ɛkwak bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ ɛpu may bɔ antɨ. Bárwɔ̀ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Yesu. Batɨ yap achi chi batɨ bǒ ngwáy. Ntɛ́msí Mandɛm anáŋ achi nɛ bhɔ.
61002015	Bárɔ mbi anɛ achi chak, mánɛ́m ɛbhɨ. Bákʉ̀ chi mbɔ Bálam, Mmɔ Boas ákɔ́ŋ nyaka bɛ́kʉ bɛbʉ́ bɛ ámbɔ́ŋ nsáy-nkáp,
61002016	kɛ báji yi ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi. Ɛkʉ mpɔŋɔ batu anɛ apu rɛm kɛpɨ arɛm kɛpɨ ntá yi nɛ ɛyɔŋɔ́ nkwǎŋwaŋ, akʉ yi andɔ ɛbhokori ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákʉ̀ nyaka.
61002017	Batɔŋɔ́ nse bhɔ́ báchi chi babhok manyiɛp anɛ manyiɛp ápú nyáy arɛ. Báchí mbɔ nɛbháŋ ɛnɛn mbʉ́ɛ́p ápɔ̀kɔ nɛ manyiɛp kɛfú arɛ ánkwɛ́n. Mandɛm aghókó ɛbhak ɛnɛ ɛ́giri pyɔɔ abhʉrɛ ntá yap.
61002018	Bápànyu, mándɛmɛ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chi ɛchɨŋti. Mánù nkwɔ bɛrwɔ bo abhɛn báyàŋ bɛfap mmʉɛt nɛ nkwɔ bho abhɛn bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛchi nɛ bhɔ. Mánù mɛ́ŋɔ́kɔ́ti bhɔ bɛ́ mánkʉ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛpɔ̌ barak ɛ́pusi anɛ mmʉɛt ɛyap ɛ́ŋwaka bɛ bɔ mánkʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bɔ́ babhɔŋ bákʉ̀.
61002019	Báfyɛ̀ bho bariɛp bɛkʉ mánkáysí bɛ chɔŋ bɔ́ mámbɔŋ ngǎngaŋ bɛkoŋo nɛtɔŋ ɛnɛsɛ, ɛnɛ́ bɔ́ babhɔŋ bachi basɛ́mɛ́ bɛbʉ́. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfay mmu, mmu wu ǎbhák chi nsɛm ntá ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɔ.
61002020	Mbák bo mándɨ́ŋɨ́ Yesu Kristo mmu áchí Acha nɛ Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ, nɛ mámbʉɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk ɛbhɛn bɛ́gwɔ̀t bho gwɔt, kɛ mámpɛt mándɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ mɛngwɔt bhɔ nɛ bɛtaŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap, nte anɛ bɔ bábhák arɛ́ ǎbɛp ancha anɛ bɔ́ bachi nyaka arɛ mpok bábhɨ́kɨ́ re rɨŋɨ Yesu Kristo.
61002021	Ɛrɨ nyaka mbɔŋ bɛ bákɛ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ mmu abhak chak ɛ́cha bɔ bɛrɨŋɨ, kɛ mámpɛt mánjibhiri mmʉɛt, mándɔ bɛbhé Mandɛm áchyɛ́, kɛpɛrɛ koŋo bhɔ.
61002022	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fakari nɛ mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ bakay anɛ́ árɛ̀m bɛ, “Mmú ǎgwɔ ɛnyɨŋ ampɛtnsɛm anyiɛ yɔ”, nɛ bɛ, “Báso akók ampɛtsnɛm anyɔ́p mmʉɛt ndǔ batɔp”, achi tɛtɛp.
61003001	Bɔ̌ma, nɛ́ chi ɛkáti ɛnɛ́ ɛjwi bɛpay ndu bɛkáti ɛbhɛn nsɨŋɨ́ bhe. Ndu bɔ bɛpay mɛnkɛm, nchí tɨk be mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mǎnáŋ bǎrɨŋɨ, ndu bɛkwak mǎmbɔŋ nkaysi anɛ achi chak.
61003002	Nsɨŋ bɛkʉ mǎntɨk nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm bárɛ́mɛ́ tɛ́ntɛp bɛ bɛ́bhɔ́ŋ bɛfakari, nɛ bɛ mǎntɨk nkwɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Acha mmu achi Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ afʉɛrɛ ntá bǒnto aghati bhe bɛ mǎnkʉ nɔkɔ.
61003003	Ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɨ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɨŋɨ chi bɛ mpok anɛ nɛtwɔ́ Yesu Kristo árɔ́bhɛ́ kɛkwɔt, bo bátwɔ chɔŋ abhɛn báway bhe ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mǎnókó, mánkʉ nɔkɔ chi bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù bɔ antɨ.
61003004	Chɔŋ mámbɛbhɛ nɔkɔ bhe bɛ, “Yí afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎpɛtnsɛm, atwɔ kɛ́? Tɛsáy bɔtayɛsɛ bágú, mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́bhʉɛ́t chi ɛnyumɔ́t mbɔ mpok anɛ Mandɛm ághókó mmɨk.”
61003005	Bághɔkɔntɨk bɛ́ Mandɛm aghókó mfay tɛ́ntɛp chi nɛ ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu ɛyi, akʉ mmɨk afú ndǔ manyiɛp amɛn achi nyaka mbǎnkɛm. Nɛ manyiɛp kɛ yi ásɔ́rɛ́ ághókó mmɨk.
61003006	Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ manyiɛp kɛ Mandɛm áchɔ́ŋtí mmɨk.
61003007	Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu kɛ Mandɛm abhʉrɛ mfay nɛ mmɨk anɛ ɛchɔŋ mɛnoŋ ngó ansɔŋ mfay nɛ mmɨk, kɛ anaŋa bo abhɛn bapú mbɔ ɛnyǔ bo Mandɛm bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhak, ndǔ nywɔp manyé.
61003008	Kɛ abhɛ́n ɛkɔŋ, bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛghɔkɔntɨk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́mɔt! Nɛ Ɛta Mandɛm, nywɔp nɛmɔt nɛchi mbɔ nká mamiɛ́, nɛ nká mamiɛ́ achi mbɔ nywɔp nɛmɔt.
61003009	Mbɔk bho bákaysi bɛ Mandɛm ǎchɔ̀ŋti mpok tontó ndu bɛ́bhʉɛ́rɛ bariɛp ami. Ápú chɔŋti mpok mbɔ ɛnyu bɔ́ bákáysí. Ǎkɛp chi ntɨ nɛ bhe, ndu ápú yaŋ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu angu anɛm. Ǎyàŋ chi bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ántɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi.
61003010	Kɛ nywɔp ɛnɛn Yesu Acha ápɛ̀tnsɛm nɛ́twɔ chɔŋ mbɔ ngɛ́p. Mpok yɔ, chɔŋ nɛbu nɛ́ngwat wɔ́ɔ́ɔ́ nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ, nɛ́nɛ́msi. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛchi amfay ɛ́nsayri amɛm ngó, ɛnɛmsi. Nɛ mmɨk ansɔŋɔ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi arɛ́.
61003011	Tɛ̌ndu mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛbhɔŋɔ chɔŋ bɛsayri, mɛ́nɛmsi ɛnyu ɛyɔ, ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ rɨ nɔ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmǔ ywɛka ámbʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni pɛ́pɛ́p, ambak mbɔ ɛnyǔ mmu Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛbhaka?
61003012	Nɛ ndǔ mǎnòŋ nɛ nɛbhakántɨ́ nywɔp ɛnɛn Mandɛm átwɔ̀, kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ ká yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ nɛ́ntwɔ́ ayak. Ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɔ, ngó ásɔŋ mmɨk nkɛm, nɛ bɛsɔŋɔ́ ngó mɛ́nkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi amfay ɛnsayri.
61003013	Kɛ bɛ́koŋo bariɛp Mandɛm, sɛ́nòŋ mfay nkɔ nɛ mmɨk nkɔ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ábhákántɨ arɛ́, ǎbhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
61003014	Abhɛ́n ɛkɔŋ, tɛ̌ndu mánòŋ yɛ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛmfakari, fyɛ́ ká bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ Mandɛm angɔ bɛ bǎchi pɛ́pɛ́p, kɛbhɔ́ŋ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́, nɛ bɛ bɛsí Mandɛm kpák achi nɛ bhe.
61003015	Nɛ sɔt ká ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ Acha mbɔ mbi anɛ́ yi áchyɛ̀ bho bɛ mándɔ́ yi ámpɛ́mɛ́ bhɔ. Ɛchi nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mɔ́mayɛsɛ Pɔ̌l mmu sɛ́kɔ̀ŋ ásɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka nkwɔ ntá yɛka nɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn Mandɛm achyɛ yi.
61003016	Asɨ́ŋ, andɛmɛ nɔkɔ amɛm bɛkáti bhi mɛnkɛm ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn. Mbɔk mɛnyɨŋ bɛchi amɛm bɛkáti ɛ́bhɛn yi asɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bèmʉɛt bɛjwimɛm. Nɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ, nɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ te kpirí, báyìbhiri mɛnyɨŋ yi asɨŋɨ́, mángati nɔkɔ bho chi mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak ɛbhɛn bɛpú ndɔ́ŋ amɔt nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhɛn yi ásɨ́ŋɨ́. Ndu bákʉ̀ nɔ, bábhɨ̀ŋɨ chi mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́ amʉɛt.
61003017	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, tɛ̌ndu bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ambɨ ambɨ, sɔt ka mpok bɛ́ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bo abhɛn bápú bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé bɛ́kɛ́ pɔkɔ́ bhe mǎndɔp chi bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ te kpirí.
61003018	Kɛ dɔ́k ká ambɨ bɛgo ndǔ nɛrɨŋɨ anɛ bǎrɨ̀ŋɨ Yesu Kristo mmu achi Acha nɛ Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ, mǎndɔk ambɨ bɛ́go ndu bɛ́bhak ɛnyunɛ́ bɛrɨ̌ndu bhi bɛ́bhák nɛ bhe. Kɛnókó kɛ́mbak nɛ yi nɛ́nɛ, nɛ mpoknkɛm.
62001001	Ɛkáti ɛnɛ ɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti Ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi tɛ mpok anɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́re ghoko mmɨk. Sɛ́ghók ɛ̌ti yi, sɛ́ghɔ́ yi nɛ amɨ́k, sɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ yi, nɛ sɛ́tɔk yi nɛ amɔ. Ɛyɔŋ ǎchyɛ Nɛpɛ́m.
62001002	Nɛpɛ́m abhésí nyaka nɛ sɛ́ghɔ yi, nɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti yi. Sɛ́ghàti bhe ɛ̌ti Nɛpɛ́m. Abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti nɛ achi nyaka nɛ Ɛta kɛ ǎbhesi ntá yɛsɛ́.
62001003	Sɛ́ghàti bho ɛ̌ti mmǔ anɛ sɛ́ghɔ́, nɛ sɛ́ghók mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi átɔ́ŋɔ́, bɛ́ be nkwɔ mǎmbɔŋ nɛchɛmɛ́mʉɛt nɛ bhɛsɛ. Nɛ, sayri sayri, nɛchɛmɛ́mʉɛt ɛnɛsɛ ɛnɔ nɛchi nɛ Ɛta nɛ Mɔ́ywi Yesu Kristo.
62001004	Nchí sɨŋ be mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ maŋák amɛsɛ anjwi pɔɔt.
62001005	Mbok anɛ Mɔ́ywi áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́ngátí bhe achi bɛ, “Mandɛm achi Bɛdiɛrɛ, nɛ ɛjuri ɛpu nɛ yi wawak.”
62001006	Mbák sɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm, kɛ sɛ́nkɔ nɔkɔ amɛm ɛjuri, nɔ sɛ́sè chi nsé, nɛ sɛpu koŋo tɛtɛp anɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́.
62001007	Kɛ mbák sɛ́kɔ̀ ndǔ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu yímbɔŋ áchɨ́ Bɛdiɛrɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ nɛchɛmɛ́mʉɛt nɛ batɨ. Nɛ manoŋ Mɔ́ywi Yesu anso bhɛsɛ amfɛrɛ ndǔ bɛbʉ́ mɛnkɛm.
62001008	Mbák sɛ́ndɛ́m bɛ sɛpu bǒ bɛbʉ́, nɔ́ sɛ́rwɔ̀ chi mmʉɛt nɛ tɛtɛp apú amɛm batɨ yɛsɛ.
62001009	Mbák sɛ́nsu bɛbʉ́ bhɛsɛ ntá Mandɛm, ǎfoŋori bhɛsɛ, nɛ amfɛrɛ bɛsɛ́ bɛbʉ́ antɨ, ankʉ sɛ́mbak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí bhi. Yí apú nɔ́k bɛbhʉrɛ bariɛp ami, nɛ ndiɛrɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak kɛ̌ yi ákʉ̀.
62001010	Mbák sɛ́ndɛm bɛ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́re kʉ bɛbʉ́ wáwák, nɔ́ sɛ́sɔ̀t Mandɛm mbɔ nsěnse, nɛ nɔ́ Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛ́pú amɛm batɨ yɛsɛ.
62002001	Bɔ̌bha, ntí anɛ mɛ́sɨ̀ŋ be mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn chi bɛ mɛ́nkwák bhe bǎkɛ́ kʉ bɛbʉ́. Kɛ mbák mmu akʉ bɛbʉ́, sɛ́bhɔ̌ŋ mmu amɔt anɛ áté bɛsí Ɛtayɛsɛ ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ nɛ ǎnɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ yi amfoŋori bhɛsɛ. Mmǔ wu chi Yesu Kristo mmu achi chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
62002002	Yí kɛ achí akap anɛ́ ápɔ̀kɔ bɛbʉ́ bhɛsɛ. Nɛ ɛ̌ti yi, Mandɛm ǎfòŋori bɛbʉ́ bhɛsɛ, nɛ puyɛ̌ ndiɛrɛ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ, kɛ bɛbʉ́ bo mankɛm.
62002003	Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ sɛ́ndɨŋɨ bɛ sɛrɔp chi bo abhɛn bárɨŋɨ Mandɛm chi nɛkʉ anɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi áyàŋ sɛ́nkʉ́.
62002004	Mmu anɛ árɛ̀m bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ Mandɛm” kɛ yi kɛbháká kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mankʉ achí nsěnse nɛ tɛtɛp apu nɛ yi.
62002005	Kɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhʉ̀ɛrɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, ɛkɔŋ Mandɛm ɛjwi yi antɨ pɔɔt. Ɛyɔ kɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ sɛ́ndɨŋɨ bɛ sɛbharɛ mmʉɛt nɛ yí.
62002006	Mmu anɛ árɛ̀m bɛ́ abhat mmʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm, abhɔŋ bɛbhʉɛrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni mbɔ ɛnyǔ Yesu ákʉ̀ nyaka.
62002007	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, ɛbhé ɛnɛ mɛ́sɨ̀ŋ ntá yɛka nɛ́nɛ ɛ́pú ɛbhé ɛkɔ. Chí nkúbhɛ́ ɛbhé ɛnɛ bǎrɨŋɨ tɛ mpok anɛ bǎbho bɛkoŋo Yesu. Ɛbhé ɛ́rɛ́ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mǎnaŋ bǎghókó nɛ batú.
62002008	Yɛ̌ nɔ, nchí sɨŋ be ɛ̌ti ɛbhé ɛkɔ ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ kpoŋoroŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m Yesu nɛ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka, mbɔnyunɛ ɛjuri ɛ́fʉɛ̀t, nɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhɛn tɛtɛp mɛ́náŋ bɛ́ghɔ̀.
62002009	Mmǔ anɛ árɛ̀m bɛ, “Nchí kɔ amɛm bɛdiɛ́rɛ́” kɛ ampap nɔkɔ ntɨ manɔ́, abhʉɛ́t amɛm ɛjuri.
62002010	Mmǔ anɛ ákɔ́ŋ batɨ, ǎkɔ̀ amɛm bɛdiɛ́rɛ́. Nɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛ́pú bhak ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛnɛ ɛ́kway bɛkʉ yi ankwɛn ndǔ bɛbʉ́.
62002011	Kɛ mmǔ anɛ ápábhɛ́ mɔ́mayi, achí amɛm ɛjuri nɛ ǎkɔ̀ amɛm ɛjuri, kɛrɨŋɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ yi árɔ̀ŋ mbɔnyunɛ ɛjuri ɛnɛ yi achi amɛm ɛ́kʉ́ yi achi mbɔ nnɛ́mámɨ́k
62002012	Bɔ̌bha, nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm afóŋórí bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo.
62002013	Bɔtá, nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka mbɔnyunɛ bǎrɨŋɨ yi Mmu ánáŋ achi nyaka tɛ mpok bábhɨ́kɨ́re ghoko mmɨk. Bɛsak, nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka mbɔnyunɛ mǎnu nɛ mbʉ́mbʉ, kpatɛ bǎsɔt awɔ́nɛm.
62002014	Bɔ̌bha, nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka mbɔnyunɛ bǎrɔp chi bo abhɛn bárɨŋɨ Ɛta. Bɔtá, nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka mbɔnyunɛ bǎrɨŋɨ mmu anɛ ánáŋ achi nyaka tɛ mpok mmɨk ábhɨ́kɨ́re bho. Bɛsak, nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka mbɔnyunɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛtaŋ nɛ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛchi amɛm batɨ ayɛka, nɛ mǎnʉ́ nɛ mbʉ́mbʉ bǎsɔt awɔ́nɛm
62002015	Bǎkɛ́ nyiɛ ɛkɔŋ nɛ mmɨk, nɛ yɛ̌ chí mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk. Ɛkɔŋ Ɛta ɛpu amɛm ntɨ mmu anɛ ányìɛ ɛkɔŋ nɛ mmɨk.
62002016	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo báfyɛ̀ ngoŋo arɛ́ ndǔ bɛ́chyɛ̀ bhɔ maŋák, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn amɨ́k ayɛsɛ ákwɛ̀n arɛ ɛnkʉ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ ɛkwak bɛbhɔŋ bhɔ, nɛ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ̀ bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɔ báyòŋmʉɛt, bɔ́ mɛnkɛm bɛ́fù chi ndǔ mmɨk bɛbʉ́-nɛ. Bɛ́pú fu ná Ɛta.
62002017	Nɛ mmɨkɨ nɛ ǎfʉɛ̀rɛ fʉɛt nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi ɛbhɛn bo máŋwaka bɛbhɔŋ. Kɛ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mánkʉ, ǎbhak nɛpɛ́m mpoknkɛm.
62002018	Bɔ̌bha, mmɨk arɔp chi kɛkwɔt mɛmay. Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ sɛ́ghati nyaka bhe bɛ mǔmpap Kristo ǎtwɔ̀. Yɛ̌ chí nɛ́nɛ, bɛyǎ bǒmpap abhɛn Kristo mánaŋ bátwɔ. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ bɛsɛ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ mpok anɛ mmɨk ámay achi kɛkwɔt.
62002019	Bǒmpap bhɔ báfù chi ndǔ nkwɔ ywɛsɛ. Kɛ bápú nyaka mbɔ̌ŋ bǒ-bhɛsɛ. Mbɔ báchí bǒnkwɔ ywɛsɛ tɛtɛp, mbʉ bárɔp nɛ bhɛsɛ. Kɛ bárɔ́ bhɛsɛ bɛ ɛ́mbák kpoŋoroŋ bɛ bápú nɛ bhɛsɛ.
62002020	Kɛ mbák chi bhe, bǎpú ɛnyu ɛyɔ, mbɔnyunɛ Mmǔ anɛ achi Nyáŋá anɛ́nɛ́ bhe amɨk, nɛ be mankɛm bǎrɨ̀ŋɨ tɛtɛp Mandɛm.
62002021	Mpú sɨŋ be bɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ tɛtɛp. Nchí sɨŋ be chi ndǔ bǎrɨŋɨ tɛtɛp nɛ bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ baraká nsé apu fu ndǔ tɛtɛp Mandɛm.
62002022	Sayri sayri, nsěnse chi agha? Chi mmu anɛ abhɨkɨ ka bɛ Yesu chi Mpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò. Ɛnyǔ mmu wu kɛ achi mǔmpap Kristo. Ábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Ɛta nɛ Mmɔ.
62002023	Mmǔ anɛ ábhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ Mmɔ achi Mpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm átó apú kway bɛbhak mmu Ɛta. Kɛ mmǔ anɛ árɛ̀m kpoŋoroŋ bɛ Yesu achi Mmɔ̌ Ɛta, abhɔŋ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ Ɛta.
62002024	Dɔ̌ ká mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghókó tɛ nɛbhǒnɛt mɛ́mbak amɛm batɨ yɛka. Mbák mǎndɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghókó tɛ nɛbhǒnɛt mɛ́mbák amɛm batɨ ayɛka, bǎpú rɔ bɛbhak ndǔ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ Mmɔ nɛ Ɛta.
62002025	Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Kristo yímbɔŋ afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ chi nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti?
62002026	Nsɨŋ be mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ mɛ́nkʉ mǎndɨŋɨ bǒbhɔ nɔ báyàŋ bɛrwɔ bhe.
62002027	Kɛ Kristo achyɛ́ bhe Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ Mmu achi nɛ bhe. Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ chɛp yɛ mmu anɛ ákway bɛtɔŋ bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ǎtɔ̀ŋ bhe mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi átɔ̀ŋ bhe ɛchi tɛtɛp. Nsé apu arɛ. Nchí ghati yɛ bhe bɛ, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ átɔ̀ŋ bhe, bǎkɛ́ rɔ bɛbhak ndǔ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ Mmɔ.
62002028	Bɔ̌bha, bǎkɛ́ rɔ bɛbhak ndǔ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ Mmɔ, bɛ mpok anɛ yi ápɛ̀tnsɛm fá amɨk, mǎmbɔ́ŋ maŋák bɛghɔ yi, kɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy nɛ ntíánwɔ́p bɛsí bhi mpok yi átwɔ̀.
62002029	Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ yi achi chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm achi mmɔ́ Mandɛm.
62003001	Ghɔ́ ká ndu Ɛtayɛsɛ áre kɔŋ bhɛsɛ. Akɔŋ bhɛsɛ́ tontó kpát ǎbhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɛsɛ bɛ bɔ̌bhi, nɛ sɛchi bɔ̌bhi tɛtɛp. Ntí anɛ bǒ mmɨk babhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ bɛ sɛchi bɔ̌ Mandɛm chi bɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm.
62003002	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, sɛ́chí bɔ̌ Mandɛm nɛ́nɛ, yɛ̌ nɔ, bábhɨ́kɨ́re tɔŋ bɛsɛ ɛnyu sɛ́bhàk mburɛ́ mpok Kristo ápɛ̀tnsɛm. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ chi bɛ mpok yi ábhèsi chɔŋ sɛ́mbak mbɔ yi mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́ghɔ̀ ɛnyu yi achi.
62003003	Nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhákántɨ bɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari ɛnyu ɛyɔ, ǎbhʉ̀rɛ ntɨ ɛni pɛ́pɛ́p mbɔ Kristo.
62003004	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́, chi mmu anɛ ápú bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm, nɛ bɛ́kʉ bɛbʉ́ chí bɛkwɛn bɛbhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm.
62003005	Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ Yesu atwɔ́ nyaka fá amɨk chí bɛfɛrɛ bɛsɛ ndǔ nɛpɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́, nɛ bɛbʉ́ bɛ́pú nɛ yí.
62003006	Yɛ̌ mmu anɛ ábhat mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo kɛ andɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ apú. Mmu anɛ ábhʉɛ́t bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ ǎtɔ̀ŋ bɛ yi abhɨkɨ re ghɔ Yesu nɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ yi wáwák.
62003007	Bɔ̌bha, bǎkɛ́ rɔ yɛ̌ mmu ándwɔ́ bhe. Mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak achi chak mbɔ Yesu.
62003008	Mmu anɛ árɔ̀ŋ ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́, chi mmu Satan, mbɔnyunɛ Satan abho bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ tɛ ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt. Ntí anɛ Mmɔ Mandɛm átwɔ́ fá amɨk chi bɛchɔŋti bɛtɨk Satan.
62003009	Mmǔ anɛ árɔ́bhɛ́ chi mmɔ́ Mandɛm, apú pɛrɛ kʉ bɛbʉ́ mbɔnyunɛ nɛpɛ́m Mandɛm nɛchi nɛ yi. Nɛ apú kwáy bɛrɔŋ ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ yi abhɔŋ nɛbhě nɛkɔ.
62003010	Ghɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ sɛ́ndɨŋɨ bo abhɛn bachi bɔ̌ Mandɛm nɛ abhɛn bachi bɔ̌ Satan nɔ. Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ápú kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm apú mmɔ́ Mandɛm. Ɛchi ɛnyumɔ́t nɛ mmǔ anɛ abhɨkɨ kɔŋ ntɨ.
62003011	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎghókó tɛ nɛbhǒnɛt chi bɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ batɨ.
62003012	Sɛ́kɛ́ bhak mbɔ Ken mmu achi nyaka mmɔ̌ Satan, mbʉ́mbʉ, ɛ́kʉ awáy mɔ́mayi Ábɛl. Awáy manɔ ndaká yí? Awáy manɔ mbɔnyunɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi akʉ bɛbɛp nyaka, kɛ ɛbhɛn manɔ bɛbhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
62003013	Bɔ̌ma, ɛ́kɛ́ bhak yɛ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay ntá yɛka mbák bǒ mmɨk bápàp bhe.
62003014	Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ sɛ́fú ndǔ nɛwú sɛ́chwe ndǔ nɛpɛ́m mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́kɔŋ batɨ bǒnkwɔ. Mmǔ anɛ ábhɨkɨ kɔŋ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ abhʉɛ́t ndǔ nɛwú.
62003015	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ápàp ntɨ achí ngwayti bho. Nɛ bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti nɛ́pú bhak nɛ ngwayti bho.
62003016	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ ɛkɔŋ chi nɛchyɛ anɛ Yesu áchyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ. Nɛ bɛsɛ nkwɔ sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛka, yɛ̌ chi nɛwú, ɛ̌ti batɨ.
62003017	Mbák mmu abhɔŋ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk kɛ aghɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ mɔ́mayi angwɔ́t ntɨ nɛ yi, ná ɛkɔŋ Mandɛm ɛbhak yi antɨ?
62003018	Bɔ̌bha, sɛ́ndɔ bɛrɛm chi nɛ ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu bɛ sɛ́kɔŋ batɨ. Sɛ́ntɔ́ŋ tɛtɛp bɛ sɛ́kɔŋ batɨ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́kʉ̀.
62003019	Ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ batɨ kɛ ɛ́kwàk bhɛsɛ babhɔŋ sɛ́ndɨŋɨ bɛ sɛ́chi bɔ̌ Mandɛm mmu achi tɛtɛp. Ɛyɔ ɛ́fyɛ̀ bɛsɛ ntɨ ndǔ mpok anɛ sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm,
62003020	Yɛ̌ chí mpok anɛ batɨ yɛsɛ́ átàŋ bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́chí bǒ bɛbʉ́, sɛ́pú bhɔŋ bɛcháy bɛsí Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ nkaysi Mandɛm achá anɛ achi amɛm batɨ yɛsɛ nɛ yímbɔŋ arɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
62003021	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, mbák batɨ yɛsɛ ápú ji bhɛsɛ sɛ́pu bhɔŋ bɛcháy bɛsí Mandɛm mpok sɛ́nɨkmʉɛt.
62003022	Nɛ ǎchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ sɛ́nɨkmʉɛt bɛ yi anchyɛ bhɛsɛ mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́bhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé bhi nɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ̀ yi maŋák.
62003023	Nɛ ɛbhé ɛyi chi bɛ sɛ́nókó Yesu Kristo mmu achi Mɔ́ywi nɛ bɛ sɛ́nkɔŋ batɨ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔnyǔ yi aghati bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛnkʉ.
62003024	Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bábhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm chí bǒ abhɛ́n bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ yi, yí abhɔ́ŋ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ bhɔ. Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛ Mandɛm achi nɛ bhɛsɛ chí Ɛfóŋó yi mmu yi achyɛ bhɛsɛ.
62004001	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, bǎkɛ́ noko yɛ̌ntɨkɨ Ɛfóŋó, kɛ bǎbhɔŋ bɛchak ɛnɛ́ ɛchi ansɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu árɛ̀m ndu bɛghɔ mbák chi Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ, barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nsé báya fá amɨk.
62004002	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ mǎndɨŋɨ mbák Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm achi nɛ mmu chí bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɛ̀m kpoŋoroŋ bɛ Yesu Kristo asɔt nyaka mmʉɛt nkwǎŋwaŋ atwɔ́ fá amɨk, Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm achi nɛ yi.
62004003	Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ápú rɛm kpóŋóróŋ bɛ Yesu atwɔ nyaka fá amɨk mbɔ nkwǎŋwaŋ, ɛfóŋó ɛnɛ ɛ́bhak nɛ yi ɛpu fu ntá Mandɛm. Ɛnyu mmu wu ǎbhɔŋ chi ɛfóŋó mǔmpap Kristo anɛ bǎghòk nyaka bɛ ǎtwɔ̀ fá amɨk, nɛ anáŋ achi fá amɨk nɛ́nɛ.
62004004	Kɛ bɔ̌bha, bǎchí bo Mandɛm, nɛ mǎnaŋ mǎnu nɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nsé bǎsɔt awɔ́nɛm, mbɔnyunɛ mmǔ anɛ achi nɛ bhe ataŋ achá anɛ achi fá amɨk.
62004005	Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nsé chí bǒ mmɨk anɛ. Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ bɔ bátɔ̀ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chi nkaysi bǒ mmɨk nɛ bǒ mmɨk bághòk bhɔ.
62004006	Kɛ́ sɛ́chí bo Mandɛm nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ árɨ́ŋɨ́ Mandɛm ǎghòk ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́tɔ̀ŋ. Mmu anɛ apu mmǔ Mandɛm apú ghok bhɛsɛ. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ sɛ́rɨ̀ŋɨ mbák Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm mmu ákʉ̀ bo mándɨŋɨ tɛtɛp anɛ Mandɛm kɛ achi nɛ mmu, nɛ mbák ɛfóŋó ɛnɛ ɛ́rwɔ̀ bho kɛ ɛchi nɛ mmu.
62004007	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, sɛ́ndɔ́k ambɨ bɛkɔŋ batɨ mbɔnyunɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛ́fù chi ntá Mandɛm. Nɛ mmu anɛ akɔŋ bo achí mmɔ́ Mandɛm nɛ arɨŋɨ Mandɛm.
62004008	Mmu anɛ abhɨkɨ kɔŋ bo, abhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm chi Mmǔ ɛkɔŋ.
62004009	Mandɛm atɔ̌ŋ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ bhɛsɛ ndǔ átó Njaŋa Mɔ́ywi fá amɨk bɛ sɛ́mfʉ́ɛ́t ntá yi sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m.
62004010	Sɛ́ngɔ́ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ mbɔ́ŋ ndu ɛ́chí. Puyɛ̌ bɛ sɛkɔŋ Mandɛm, kɛ chí bɛ́ Mandɛm akɔŋ bhɛsɛ kpát ató Mɔ́ywi mbɔ akap anɛ́ ápɔ́kɔ́ bɛbʉ́ bhɛsɛ, bɛ yi amfoŋori bhɛsɛ.
62004011	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, tɛ̌ndu Mandɛm akɔŋ bhɛsɛ tontó ɛnyu ɛnɛ́, sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ batɨ nkwɔ.
62004012	Yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ Mandɛm nɛ amɨ́k. Kɛ mbák sɛ́nkɔŋ batɨ, Mandɛm ǎbhak nɛ bhɛsɛ nɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛyi ɛnjwi bhɛsɛ antɨ pɔɔt.
62004013	Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ sɛ́chi nɛ Mandɛm mpoknkɛm nɛ bɛ yí achí nɛ bhɛsɛ mpoknkɛm chí Ɛfóŋó yi ɛnɛ yi achyɛ bhɛsɛ.
62004014	Sɛ́ghɔ̌ nɛ amɨ́k, nɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ Ɛta ato Mɔ́ywi Yesu fá amɨk mbɔ Mpɛmɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
62004015	Yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɛ̀m kpoŋoroŋ bɛ Yesu chi Mmɔ Mandɛm, Mandɛm ǎbhɔŋ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ yi, nɛ yí ǎbhɔ́ŋ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm.
62004016	Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛ́rɨŋɨ yɛ nɛ sɛ́nókó bɛ Mandɛm akɔŋ bhɛsɛ tontó. Mandɛm chi Mmǔ ɛkɔŋ, nɛ mmu anɛ ákɔ̀ŋ batɨ ǎbhɔŋ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm nɛ Mandɛm ǎbhatmʉɛt nɛ yí.
62004017	Ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ sɛ́kway bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ ɛkɔŋ Mandɛm ɛjwi bɛsɛ antɨ pɔɔt chi bɛ nywɔp Mandɛm átàŋ bo sɛpú bhɔŋ bɛcháy, mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́chí mbɔ Mɔ́ywi ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ́ fá amɨk.
62004018	Bɛcháy bɛ́pú ndǔ ɛkɔŋ. Ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́jwí pɔɔt ɛ́fɛ̀rɛ mmu bɛcháy antɨ. Mmu anɛ bɛcháy bɛchi yi antɨ ǎchày chí ntɛmsi. Nɛ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛcháy chí anɛ ɛkɔŋ Mandɛm ɛbhɨ́kɨ́ jwi yi antɨ pɔɔt.
62004019	Sɛbhɔŋ ɛkɔŋ amɛm batɨ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm ayambɨ akɔŋ bɛsɛ.
62004020	Mbák mmu árɛ̀m bɛ akɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ ampap ntɨ nkwǎ, nɔ mmǔ wu achi nsěnse, mbɔnyunɛ mbák mmu abhɨkɨ kɔŋ ntɨ nkwǎ anɛ yi ághɔ̀, ná yi ákway bɛkaŋ Mandɛm mmu yi apu ghɔ nɛ amɨ́k?
62004021	Nɛ ɛbhé ɛnɛ Mandɛm achyɛ bhɛsɛ ɛchi bɛ mmu anɛ akɔŋɔ Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ ntɨ nkwǎ nkwɔ.
62005001	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ánókó bɛ Yesu chi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò achi mmɔ́ Mandɛm. Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákɔ́ŋ chi ǎkɔ̀ŋ mɔ́ywi nkwɔ́.
62005002	Sɛ́rɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ sɛkɔŋ bɔ̌ Mandɛm tɛtɛp mbák sɛ́kɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ mbák sɛ́bhʉɛ̀rɛ bɛbhé bhi.
62005003	Bɛkɔŋ Mandɛm chi bɛbhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé bhi. Nɛ bɛbhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé bhi puyɛ̌ ɛtaŋtí ɛnyɨŋ,
62005004	mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ ǎnù nɛ mmɨk ansɔrɛ nɔkɔ chi awɔ́nɛm. Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ́ sɛ́nù sɛ́nsɔt awɔ́nɛm chí ndu sɛ́bhɔŋ nɛka bɛ Yesu achí Kristo.
62005005	Agha átàŋ ancha mmɨk? Chi ndiɛrɛ mmu anɛ ánókó bɛ Yesu chí Mmɔ Mandɛm.
62005006	Nɛ́ chi Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò. Atwɔ́ fá amɨk, bájwíti yi nɛ manyiɛp. Ɛ́tárɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ manoŋ mi arɔk amɨk. Nɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achí ntísiɛ bɛ Yesu Kristo ǎrɛ̀m chi tɛtɛp.
62005007	Ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ batísiɛ́ abhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛ́ Yesu chi Kristo báchí bárát.
62005008	Batísyɛ bhɔ batí árát chi Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nɛ manyiɛp, nɛ manoŋ, nɛ bárɛ̀m chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt.
62005009	Mbák bakwǎŋwaŋ bárɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ́ bárɨ́ŋɨ́ sɛ́noko bhɔ. Sɛ́bhɔŋ yɛ́ mɛnoko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm árɛ̀m ɛ̌ti Mɔ́ywi ɛ́ncha ɛnɛ nkwǎ árɛ̀m mbɔnyunɛ yi achi Mandɛm. Nɛ Mandɛm até ntísiɛ ɛ̌ti Mɔ́ywi.
62005010	Ɛ́chí yɛ bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ anoko Mmɔ Mandɛm, ǎrɨŋɨ̀ amɛm ntɨ ɛni bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm arɛmɛ ɛ̌ti Mɔ́ywi ɛchí tɛtɛp. Bǒ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko bárɛ̀m bɛ Mandɛm ǎsè chi nsé mbɔnyunɛ bɔ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m ɛ̌ti Mɔ́ywi.
62005011	Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm árɛ̀m ɛ̌ti Mɔ́ywi chi bɛ yí áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɔ nɛ́fù chi ntá Mɔ́ywi.
62005012	Ɛ́chí yɛ bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Mmɔ Mandɛm, ǎbhɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Nɛ mmu anɛ abhɨkɨ bhat mmʉɛt nɛ Mmɔ Mandɛm abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɔ.
62005013	Nsɨŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ntá yɛka bo mǎnókó Mmɔ Mandɛm ndu bɛkʉ mándɨŋɨ bɛ mǎnaŋ bǎbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
62005014	Nɛ mpok sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt sɛ́pú makati mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ, ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ yɔ mbák ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́yàŋ ɛ́kɔ ndɔ́ŋ amɔt nɛ nkaysi yi.
62005015	Nɛ mbák sɛrɨŋɨ bɛ sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt yi ángók bhɛsɛ, sɛ́bhɔŋ yɛ bɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ bɛ yi anáŋ áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ yi anchyɛ bhɛsɛ.
62005016	Mbák mmu ywɛka ángɔ ntɨ mmǔ Mandɛm ndǔ ákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn bɛpu twɔ nɛ nɛwú, ánɨkmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm nɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm anchyɛ mmǔ wu nɛpɛ́m. Bɛbʉ́ bɛchi ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ nɛwú, kɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ rɛm bɛ mmu ánɨkmʉɛt ɛ̌ti mmu anɛ ákʉ́ ɛnyǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɔ.
62005017	Bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ mɛnkɛm chi bɛbʉ́. Kɛ bɛbʉ́ bɛchi ɛbhɛn bɛpu twɔ nɛ nɛwú.
62005018	Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ mmu anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ yi nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ apú pɛrɛ kɔŋ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ mbɔnyunɛ Mmɔ Mandɛm achi nɛ yi nɛ ákɛ̀m yi ɛnyu ɛnɛ Satan apu kway bɛkʉ yi yɛ̌nyɨŋ.
62005019	Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ sɛchi bɔ̌ Mandɛm kɛ bǒ mmɨk mankɛm báchí amɔ mbʉ́mbʉ.
62005020	Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ́ Mmɔ Mandɛm atwɔ anɛ́nɛ́ batɨ ayɛsɛ amɛm bɛ sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ Mandɛm mmu achi tɛtɛp. Nɛ́nɛ, sɛbharɛ mmʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm mbɔ ɛnyǔ sɛ́bhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Mɔ́ywi Yesu Kristo. Yí aywǐntí kɛ̌ áchí Mandɛm tɛtɛp nɛ yí kɛ̌ áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
62005021	Bɔ̌bha, bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ bɔ mandɛm nsé.
63001001	Mɛ Jɔ̌n mǔnti bakoŋo Yesu amɔt kɛ̌ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛ, wɔ máyɛsɛ anɛ Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ nɛ ntá bɔ̌bhɛ. Nkɔŋ be tɛtɛp, nɛ puyɛ̌ chi mɛ awánti kɛ̌ nkɔ́ŋ bhe. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu áchák anɛ árɨŋɨ tɛtɛp Mandɛm akɔŋ be.
63001002	Nkɔŋ be mbɔnyunɛ bɛsɛ́ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ tɛtɛp anɛ ǎbhák amɛm batɨ ayɛsɛ nɛ abhak nɛ bɛsɛ tɛ ndǔ nɛŋɔkɔ́mɨk ɛnɛn nɛ́twɔ̀.
63001003	Mandɛm Ɛta nɛ Yesu Kristo mántɔ́ŋ bɛsɛ́ bɛrɨ̌ndu, mángɔ́ bhɛsɛ́ ntínso, nɛ mánchyɛ bhɛsɛ kpák ndu sɛ́kòŋo tɛtɛp Mandɛm nɛ ndǔ sɛ́bhɔ̀ŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ.
63001004	Mbɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛyǎ maŋák ndu bɛtɛmɛri mbɔk bɔ̌bhɛ nɛ bɛghɔ bɛ bɔ́ bákòŋo tɛtɛp Mandɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Mandɛm Ɛta ághátí bɛsɛ sɛ́nkʉ́.
63001005	Máyɛsɛ, nchí nɨkmʉɛt bɛ sɛ́nkɔŋ batɨ. Ɛnɛ ɛ́pú ɛbhé ɛkɔ. Mɛ́chyɛ̀ wɔ chi nkúbhɛ́ ɛbhé ɛnɛ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ tɛ mpok sɛbho bɛkoŋo Yesu.
63001006	Nɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ tɛtɛp chi bɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm ághátí bhɛsɛ sɛnkʉ. Ɛbhé Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ sɛ́nkɔŋ batɨ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎghókó tɛ nɛbhǒnɛt.
63001007	Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ bǒ abhɛn bárwɔ̀ batɨ bachi yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak. Bábhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛ Yesu Kristo atwɔ nyaka fá amɨk mbɔ nkwǎŋwaŋ. Ɛnyǔ mmǔ wu achi mmu amɔt ndǔ mpáy bho abhɛn bárwɔ̀ bho, nɛ achí mǔmpap Kristo.
63001008	Sɔt yɛka mpok bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ kʉ bɛtɨk ndɛ́ndɛm, kɛbhɔŋ nsáy ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhɔ. Sɔt ká mpok ɛnyu ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ̀ŋ nsáy yɛka nkɛm.
63001009	Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ápú pɛrɛ koŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Kristo átɔ́ŋɔ́, kɛ ǎmàka nkaysi achák arɛ́, apú bhat mmʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm. Kɛ mmu anɛ árɔ̀ŋ ambɨ bɛkoŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Kristo átɔ́ŋɔ́, Ɛta ǎbhák nɛ yi, Mɔ́ywi nkwɔ ǎbhak nɛ yi.
63001010	Ɛ́tɔŋ yɛ bɛ mbák mmu átwɔ̌ ntá yɛka anɛ átɔ̀ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛpu ndɔ́ŋ amɔt nɛ ɛbhɛn Kristo átɔ́ŋɔ́, yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka ákɛ́ syɛpti mmǔ wu amɛm ɛkɛt ɛyi. Yɛ̌ chí bɛkaka yi bǎkɛ́ kaka.
63001011	Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákàka ɛnyǔ mmǔ wu áchɛ̀m mmʉɛt nɛ yí ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi.
63001012	Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ bɛchak bɛghati bhe, kɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ bɛfyɛ bhɔ mɛnkɛm amɛm ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Mbɔ̌ŋ nkaysi bɛ́twɔ bɛghɔ bhe bɛ sɛ́ndɛm kɛpɨ bɛsí nɛ bɛsi, bɛ́ maŋák amɛsɛ anjwi pɔɔt.
63001013	Bɔ mɔ́mayɛka anɛ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ bátò bhe bakak nkwɔ.
64001001	Mɛ Jɔ̌n mǔnti bakoŋo Yesu kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Gáyɔs, nchí sɨ́ŋ ntá yɛ, wɔ mmu nkɔ́ŋɔ́ tɛtɛp.
64001002	Anɛ ɛkɔŋ, nchí nɨkmʉɛt bɛ ɔ́kɛ́ me, nɛ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛmbak sayri nɛ wɔ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ mbɔ mmu Mandɛm nɛchi sayri.
64001003	Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ maŋák mpok ngókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mbɔk bɔ̌mayɛsɛ ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu bátwɔ́ fá baghati bɛsɛ. Bághátí bhɛsɛ bɛ wɔ ɔchí mmǔ tɛtɛp ndǔ mbi Mandɛm nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu, sayri sayri, ɔ́kóŋó tɛtɛp.
64001004	Yi ɛ́kwày bɛchyɛ mɛ maŋák ɛ́ncha bɛghok bɛ bɔ̌bha bákòŋo tɛtɛp Mandɛm?
64001005	Anɛ ɛkɔŋ, ɔ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk Mandɛm ɛrɨ́rɨ́ ndǔ ɔ́kɛ̀m bǒnkwɔ ɛrɨrɨ, sayri sayri, abhɛn bachi mankɔ.
64001006	Bághátí Nkwɔ Kristo abhɛn fá ɛ̌ti ɛkɔŋ ɛyɛ nɛ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́kʉ́ ntá yap. Mpok anɛ bɔ bárɔ̀ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ, chyɛ bhɔ nɛkwak ɛnɛn nɛ́kwáy ndǔ bɛtɨk Mandɛm ɛbhɛn bo bákʉ̀.
64001007	Bákɔ̀ chi bɛkʉ bɛtɨk Kristo. Ɛ̌ti yɔ bápú sɔt yɛ̌ nɛkwak ntá bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm.
64001008	Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛ́bhɔŋ yɛ bɛchyɛ mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ nɛkwak bɛ sɛ́mbák batɨ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk nɛ bhɔ ndu bɛghati bho tɛtɛp Mandɛm.
64001009	Nsɨ̌ŋ barɔ́ŋ ɛkáti ntá nkwɔ Kristo abhɛn awu, kɛ Diyotrifis mmu ákɔ́ŋ bɛbhak mǔnti, abhɨ́kɨ́ fyɛ́ ntí ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́rɛ̀m.
64001010	Mpok ntwɔ́ awu chɔŋ mbʉrɛ ndak anɛ nɛ ɛnyǔ yi áchɔ̀ŋti nnyɛ́n ɛna bɛsí bǒnkwɔ. Ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ɛ́may nɔ. Yímbɔŋ apú ka bɛsyɛpti batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ nɛ ǎkàŋ tɛ bo abhɛn báyàŋ bɛkʉ nɔ, nɛ abók bhɔ bɛ mándɔ Nkwɔ Kristo.
64001011	Anɛ ɛkɔŋ, ɔ́kɛ́ ŋɔkɔ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛpɨŋ. Ŋɔkɔ́ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́rɨ́. Mmǔ anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛrɨ chi mmu Mandɛm, kɛ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́ ábhɨ́kɨ́re ghɔ Mandɛm.
64001012	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ndǔ ɛká Mandɛm ǎrɛ̀m ɛrɨ́rɨ́ ɛ̌ti Dɛmɛ́triyɔs. Yɛ̌ chi nɛpɛ́m ɛni nɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ akɔŋ tɛtɛp Mandɛm nɛ achi ɛrɨ́tí mmu. Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ́rɛ̀m ɛchi tɛtɛp.
64001013	Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́gháti bhe, kɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ yaŋ bɛsɨŋ bɔ mɛnkɛm amɛm ɛkáti ɛnɛ.
64001014	Nnókó bɛ nchí twɔ chɔŋ bɛghɔ bhe mandú mpok. Mpok yɔ, chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm kɛpɨ bɛsí nɛ bɛsi.
64001015	Kpák Mandɛm ámbak nɛ bhe. Mamʉrɛ bhɛ mankɛm ndǔ nkwɔ Mandɛm abhɛn fá bátò wɔ bakak. Kaká yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmʉɛrɛ wa anɛ achi ndǔ nkwɔ Mandɛm abhɛn awu.
65001001	Mɛ Júd kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí mǔbɛtok Yesu Kristo nɛ nchí manɔ Jems. Nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka bo abhɛn Mandɛm mmu achi Ɛtayɛsɛ abhɨ́ŋɨ́. Yí akɔŋ be nɛ ákʉ́ bɛ Yesu ámbák Mbabhɛri ywɛka.
65001002	Mandɛm ángɔ́ bhe ntínso, ánchyɛ bhe kpák nɛ ɛkɔŋ ɛyi tontó tontó.
65001003	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, ndu nchí yáŋ tontó bɛsɨŋ be ɛ̌ti nɛpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm ápɛ́mɛ́ bhɛsɛ mankɛm, ngɔ́ bɛ mbɔŋ bɛsɨŋ ngáti bhe bɛ mǎnkɛ́m tɛtɛp anɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ bɛ ambak mbɔ ɛnyǔ báchyɛ́ yɔ ntá bo Mandɛm ndɔŋ amɔt ndak ámáy.
65001004	Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ mbɔk bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm mánɔ́nɛ bachwe ndǔ nkwɔ yɛka. Bɔ mánù bɛyibhiri Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi nɛ bhɛsɛ. Bákʉ̀ nɔ ndu bárɛ̀m bɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ ngǎngaŋ bɛ sɛnchwe ndǔ barak ɛpúsí. Bábyàk Yesu Kristo ɛnɛ́ yi kɛ achi Ɛta ntá yɛsɛ nɛ yi aywǐnti kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɛsɛ. Mǎnaŋ basɨŋ nyaka tɛntɛp bɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm antɛmsi mɛnyǔ bǒbhɔ.
65001005	Yɛ̌ndu bákʉ́ bǎrɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm ndɔŋ amɔt, nchí yáŋ bɛtɨk be bɛ Ɛta Mandɛm afɛ́rɛ́ nyaka bo Israɛl ámɔ́ bo Íjip kɛ bágháká nɔ́kɔ́ ambi, anaŋa abhɛn babhɨkɨ noko.
65001006	Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ bɔángɛl abhɛn babhɨkɨ ka bɛbhak ndǔ bɛchɔkɔ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bhɔ, asɔt nyaka bhɔ abhʉ́rɛ́ amɛm nɛpi ɛnɛn nɛ́giri pyɔɔ nɛ ngɛm bɛkak, nɛ ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ bábhak mpoknkɛm. Arɛ́, mánòŋ tɛ nywɔp nɛgho ɛnɛn Mandɛm átàŋ bho.
65001007	Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk nkwɔ ɛtɔk Sódom nɛ ɛnɛ́ Gomóra nɛ bɛtɔk bɛ́chák ɛbhɛn bɛ́kókósí nyaka nɛ bhɔ. Bo bɛtɔk ɛbhɔ báchyɛ́ nyaka mmʉɛt ndǔ barak ɛpúsí nɛ bɛpɔ̌ baraká kɛbhʉ́rɛ́ áchák anɛ bakwǎŋwaŋ babhɨkɨ bhɔŋ bɛkʉ. Bɔ́ nkwɔ bachi ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri amɛm ngó anɛ apu nɛmɛ, nɛ ɛyɔ chí ɛrɨŋ ntá bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko Mandɛm.
65001008	Yɛ̌ nɔ, ɛchi ɛnyǔ yɔ nɛ bǒbhɛn nkwɔ. Bághɔ̀ kɛnɔ́ amɨ́k antifú ɛkɛn kɛ́kʉ̀ bɔ mámbyak bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ amfáy yap. Bɛkoŋo kɛnɔ́ ɛkɔ bárɛ̀m bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ amfay bho, mánkʉ nɔkɔ bɛpɔ̌ barak ɛpúsí.
65001009	Kɛ yɛ̌ chi mpok Máikɛl mǔnti bɔángɛl ákɛ̀m nyaka ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ Satan ɛ̌ti mmu wap anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛsɔt ɛrɛnɛ Moses, abhɨ́kɨ́ sɔt bɛtaŋ ndǔ mmʉɛt yi bɛ́ ándɛm ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ ntá Satan. Arɛm nyaka chi bɛ, “Mandɛm Acha ánji wɔ!”
65001010	Kɛ bǒbhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bɔ bábhɨ́kɨ́ jwimɛm. Báchí mbɔ nyǎbhɨ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ kɛboŋ, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kó yɔ́ anti, ɛ́kʉ kʉ. Nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ kɛ bɛ́wày bhɔ.
65001011	Chɔŋ ɛ́mbɛp ntá yap ɛ́ncha! Bákòŋo chi bayarɛ́kak Ken. Bákʉ̀ nkwɔ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ndǔ bɛbhɔŋ nsáy mbɔ Bálam ákʉ̀ nyaka. Bágù mbɔnyunɛ bátàŋntí nɛ Mandɛm mbɔ ɛnyǔ Kóra akʉ nyaka, agú.
65001012	Mpok báchɛ̀m mɛnyiɛ nɛnyiɛ́-ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ, bábhak mbɔ bakwap amɛn áchɔŋti nɛnyíɛ́. Bátwɔ̀ mánchɔkɔ mɛnyiɛ nɛ mɛnyu, mánkaysi nɔkɔ chi ndiɛrɛ mmʉɛt ɛyap. Bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p. Báchí mbɔ bɛkpɔkɔ́ nɛbhaŋ ɛnɛn mbʉ́ɛ́p ápɔ̀kɔ amfay kɛ yɛ̌ manyiɛp kɛfú arɛ ánkwɛ́n. Báchí mbɔ mɛnɔk ɛbhɛn bɛ́pú nyu kɛpɛm yɛ̌ chi ndǔ mpok anɛ mɛnɔk mɛnyu kɛpɛm. Báchí mbɔ mɛnɔk ɛbhɛn bághɛ́mɛ́ nɛ bakaŋ nɛ bɛ́gú ndak ámay.
65001013	Bɔ báchi mbɔ bɛtaŋtí mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn amɛm manyu ngo ɛnɛ́ ɛ́gbògho ɛ́mbay nɔkɔ gboo, gboo. Mɛnyɨŋ ntianywɔp ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ̀ bɛchi mbɔ ɛfɛn ɛnɛ́ mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn ɛ́gbogho ɛmbay nɔkɔ angɔkɔnyɛ́n. Báchí mbɔ mambě mfay anɛ ábóŋoboŋ. Mandɛm abhʉ́rɛ́ ɛbhak ntá yap, ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ ɛ́giri pyɔɔ. Arɛ́ kɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhak ngwɛnti ti.
65001014	Ɛ́nɔk mmu achi nyaka ndǔ mkpák bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ tándrámɔt bɛbho amʉɛt Adam anáŋ arɛm nyaka tɛmbɨ ɛ̌ti bǒbhɛn bɛ, “Acha ǎtwɔ̀ nɛ ngɛ́mtáy bɔángɛl Mandɛm.
65001015	Ǎtwɔ̀ bɛkpɔt manyé bo mmɨk nkɛm, antɛmsi abhɛ́n bápú kʉ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ bo Mandɛm ɛ̌ti bɛpɛpti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bárɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti yi.”
65001016	Bǒbhɛn chi bo ɛnywíntí nɛ bákɔŋ bɛji batɨ. Bákòŋo chí bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù bɔ antɨ. Báchí bǒ mpányu nɛ básɔt sɛ́rwɔrɛ́nyu bɛsɔt nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ntá bho.
65001017	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, kɛ mbák chi bhe, bǎkɛ ghɔkɔntɨk mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǒnto Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ bárɛ́mɛ́ tɛntɛp bɛ bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛ́fákári.
65001018	Bárɛ̀m nyaka ntá yɛka bɛ, “Ndǔ manywɔbhɛ́ ngwɛnti mmɨk, chɔŋ bǒ kɛyɔ́kɔ́ mámfú mánjɔkɔ nɔkɔ bhe. Ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap, bɔ́ bákòŋo chí bɛbɛ́pti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt ɛyap ɛ́tò bɔ mánkʉ.”
65001019	Bɔ́ kɛ bátwɔ̀ nɛ ákɔ́rɛ́ nɛntɨ ɛnɛka. Mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk kɛ bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap, puyɛ̌ chi Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm.
65001020	Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, kɛ mbák chi bhe, bǎbhɔŋ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ndu bɛkwak batɨ, bɛ mǎngó ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mǎnókó, ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́fú ntá mbɔŋ Mandɛm. Mpok mǎnɨkmʉɛt dɔ̌ ká Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ankwak bhe.
65001021	Dɔ́k ká ambɨ bɛbhʉɛrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ Mandɛm akɔŋ bhe, mǎndɔk ambɨ mɛnoŋ bɛ́ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo ánchyɛ́ bhe nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti ɛ̌ti ntínso ɛni.
65001022	Ghɔ́ ká ntínso nɛ bo abhɛn bachi ɛkak ɛ́mɔt nɛfí, ɛkak ɛ́mɔt anywɔ́p.
65001023	Syɛ ka abhɛ́nɛ́fú fɛrɛ́ ndǔ ngó Satan, mǎmpɛmɛ bhɔ. Ghɔ́ ká bachak ntínso, kɛ mǎnsɔ́t mpok bɛ bɔ bákɛ́ charɛ bhe nɛ bɛbʉ́ bhap. Pap ka yɛ̌ chi ndɛn ɛyap ɛnɛ́ mánɔ́ nɛ bɛpɔ̌ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn máŋwaka, mánkʉ nɔkɔ.
65001024	Sɛ́nchíɛ yɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm. Yi ǎkway bɛkɛm be bɛ bǎkɛ́ kwɛ́n ansɛm. Chɔŋ yi ankʉ bǎkɛ nyɔ́p mmʉɛt, antwɔ́ nɛ bhe bɛsí bhi. Arɛ́, bǎghɔ́ kɛnókó ɛki, mǎmbak maŋák mpoknkɛm.
65001025	Sɛ́mbɨ́tí Mandɛm. Yi aywǐnti kɛ áchí Acha. Yí kɛ áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ ntá Yesu Kristo bɛ́pɛ́mɛ́ bɛsɛ. Yi kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ kɛnókó, nɛ kɛnɛ́m, nɛ bɛtaŋ, nɛ kɛfɔ kɛnkɛm, mpoknkɛm anɛ áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, nɛ nɛ́nɛ, ngwɛnti ti. Amen.
66001001	Ɛkáti ɛnɛ ɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛfakari mandú mpok. Mandɛm achyɛ́ nyaka Yesu Kristo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ yi antɔŋ bɔ ntá bǒbɛtɔk abhi. Yesu ató yɛ ángɛl akʉ mmɔ̌bɛtok aywi Jɔ̌n arɨŋɨ bhɔ.
66001002	Jɔ̌n até ntísiɛ ndǔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm, nɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu Kristo ákʉ́ yi arɨŋɨ. Asɨ́ŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ághɔ́.
66001003	Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá mmǔ-nɛ ápày nɛ ɛyɔŋ amfay bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛ́n-nɛ bɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛfakari. Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá bo abhɛn bátà batú bɛghok ndǔ bápày ɛkáti ɛnɛ nɛ mámbʉrɛ mɛnyɨŋ abhɛn básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm ɛkáti ɛnɛ mbɔnyunɛ mpok anɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛfakari arɔp chi kɛkwɔt.
66001004	Mmɛ Jɔ̌n nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ ntá bɛka bǒnkwɔ tándrámɔt abhɛn báchí atú Esia. Mandɛm mmu achi nɛ́nɛ, abhak tɛ̌ nyaka, nɛ ǎtwɔ̀ ántɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, anchyɛ bhe kpák. Bɛfóŋó tándrámɔt ɛbhɛn bɛchi bɛsí ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ Mandɛm mɛ́ntɔ́ŋ nkwɔ bhe bɛrɨ̌ndu, mɛ́nchyɛ be kpák.
66001005	Nɛ Yesu Kristo mmu achi ntísiɛ Mandɛm anɛ tɛtɛp ántɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, anchyɛ bhe kpák. Yi chí mmǔ mbɨ anɛ áfú ndǔ nɛwú, nɛ Mfɔ bafɔ̌ mmɨk. Akɔŋ bhɛsɛ́ nɛ afɛ́rɛ́ bhɛsɛ ndǔ bɛbʉ́ nɛ manoŋ ami.
66001006	Akʉ bɛsɛ sɛ́mbák bǒbhi abhɛn yi achi Mfɔ wap. Akʉ bɛ́ sɛ́mbák bachiǎkap ntá Ɛtayi Mandɛm. Kɛnɛ́m nɛ kɛfɔ chí ɛki mpoknkɛm. Amen.
66001007	Ghok ka, yi ǎtwɔ̀ amɛm nɛbháŋ, nɛ chɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu angɔ yi nɛ amɨ́k. Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ áyɛ́mɛ́ yi nɛ nɛkɔŋ ǎghɔ̀ chɔŋ yi nkwɔ. Manɛrɛ́kɛrɛ́ bho ankɛm fá amɨk bádì chɔŋ kɛbhɔ ɛ̌ti yi. Ɛ́bhɔŋ bɛfakari ɛnyu ɛyɔ. Amen.
66001008	Acha Mandɛm Bɛtaŋ Mɛnkɛm ǎrɛ̀m bɛ, “Mɛ kɛ Nchi kʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mbo bɛbhak nɛ Mɛ kɛ nchi kʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛntwɔ ndǔ Ngwɛnti.” Yi achí nɛ́nɛ, achí tɛ̌ mpok mmɨk ábhɨ́kɨ́ re bho, nɛ ǎtwɔ̀ chɔ́ŋ.
66001009	Mmɛ Jɔ̌n mɔmáyɛka, mɛ mmǔ amɔt ndǔ nkwɔ bakoŋo Yesu kɛ̌ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí nsoŋ amɔt nɛ be ndǔ bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghɔ̀, nɛ ndu Yesu achi Mfɔ ywɛsɛ nɛ ndǔ sɛchi kpirí ndǔ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ ɛyɛsɛ. Nchí mǔkɛnɔŋ amɛm ɛtɔk nɛntɨnyɛ́n ɛnɛ́ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Pátmɔs ndu nchi ghati bo Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ nte ntísiɛ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Yesu ákʉ́ bo bárɨŋɨ.
66001010	Ndǔ nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt nɛmɔt, ɛnɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ achi nɛ mɛ, ngók ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ ndǔ ɛ́fú mɛ ansɛm. Ɛbhák mbɔ ɛyɔŋɔ́ mmba.
66001011	Ɛ́re rɛm bɛ, “Sɔt ɛkáti sɨŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́ghɔ̀, ɔ́nto yɔ ntá bakwɔ́ bo Yesu tándrámɔt awu ɛtɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs, nɛ ɛtɔk Smína, nɛ ɛtɔk Pɛ́gamɔm, nɛ ɛtɔk Tiatíra, nɛ ɛtɔk Sádis, nɛ ɛtɔk Filadɛ́lfia, nɛ ɛtɔk Laodísia.”
66001012	Njibhiri yɛ mmʉɛt ndu bɛ́ghɔ mmu anɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛ́twɔ̀ ntá ya. Ngɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ pú tándrámɔt ɛbhɛn bɛ́pɔ̀kɔ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ mkpak.
66001013	Nɛ nɛ́ntɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛrɔŋɔ bhɔ, ngɔ́ mmǔfú. Abhak mbɔ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá Mandɛm. Abhɔ́ŋ ɛ́wɛt amʉɛt ɛnɛ ɛ́ghaka yi tɛ ndǔ mɛmɨ̌-bɛkak. Agwɔ́t mgbat nkʉɛt anɛ bághókó nɛ pú ambeápak.
66001014	Ɛmɛnɛ́nti yi ɛbhak pɛ́pɛ̌pɛ́p mbɔ ɛtɔkɔfiɔŋ. Ntí ywi ábhák ɛnyumɔt. Amɨ́k ayi ábhák mbɔ ngó anɛ ádù.
66001015	Bɛkak ɛbhi bɛbhak mbɔ brɔ́ns anɛ básɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ ɛtaŋtí ngó ndu bɛ́fɛ́rɛ mɛ́nyɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ́nkɛm arɛ́. Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛ́bhak mbɔ ɛwarɛ́ tutunyɛ́n.
66001016	Akɛ́m mambe tándrámɔt nɛ awɔ́nɛm aywi. Akparɛnja nsɛm ɛ́páy anɛ áchap are fú yi anyu, nɛ bɛsí bhi bɛre ghɔɔ mbɔ mmok anɛ ngósí.
66001017	Mpok ngɔ́ yi, nkwɛ́n bɛkak ɛbhi nkáy mbɔ ngú. Kɛ yi anyaŋa awɔ́nɛm aywi mɛ amʉɛt arɛm bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ chay, Mmɛ kɛ̌ nchí Ambɨ nɛ Ansɛm.”
66001018	Mmɛ kɛ̌ nchí mmu anɛ achi nɛpɛ́m. Ngǔ nyaka, kɛ ghɔ́, nchí nɛpɛ́m mpoknkɛm. Nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ bawú mambak nɛpɛ́m, nɛ mbɔ̌ŋ ɛfɨŋɨ́ ndu mɛ́nɛ́nɛ ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú.
66001019	Sɨ́ŋ yɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́ghɔ́, ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́chí, nɛ ɛbhɛn bɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́fákari ansɛm mpok.
66001020	Mbák chi ɛnyɨŋ bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ɛnɛ ɛyɨŋɨ mambe tándrámɔt anɛ ɔ́ghɔ́ ndǔ awɔ́nɛm awa nɛ mɛnyɨŋ gol tándrámɔt ɛbhɛn bɛ́pɔ̀kɔ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́, dɨŋɨ́ bɛ́ mambe tándrámɔt chí bɔángɛl tándrámɔt abhɛn bábhàbhɛri bɛka bǒnkwɔ tándrámɔt. Nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́pɔ̀kɔ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ tándrámɔt chí bɛká bǒnkwɔ tándrámɔt bhɔ.
66002001	Yesu aghati Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti-nɛ tó ntá ángɛl anɛ ábhàbhɛri bǒnkwɔ abhɛn ɛtɔk Ɛ́fɛsɔs. Sɨ́ŋ, kʉ bɔ́ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá mmu anɛ ákɛ́mɛ́ mambe tándrámɔt ndǔ awɔ́nɛm aywi, nɛ ǎkɔ̀ nɛ́ntɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ pú tándrámɔt ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́pɔ̀kɔ bɛrɔŋɔ.”
66002002	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛ́rɛ́m bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka, ndɨ́ŋɨ́ nsɔ́ŋtí anɛ mánɛ̀p ndu bɛtɨk, nɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ndǔ bǎté kpirí ndu ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ bǎpú chyɛ mbi ntá bǒ babʉ́abʉ. Kɛ mǎmɔ bo abhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛ bachi bǒnto ɛnɛ́ bápú, nɛ bǎghɔ bɛ bápú bǒ tɛtɛp.
66002003	Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ bǎtè kpirí nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ nɛ bǎkà bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ̀ ɛ̌ti ya kɛpɔp bɛkʉ nɔ.
66002004	Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ɛchi nɛ bhe ɛnɛ́ mbɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ. Ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ mbɨ ɛnɛ́ bǎbhɔŋɔ nyaka nɛ mɛ ɛpɛt ɛpu.
66002005	Tɨk yɛ ka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ́ bǎkwɛ́nɛ́ ansɛm, mǎntɨ́k nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka mǎmpɛt mǎnkʉ nɔkɔ bɛrɨ́tí bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ̀ nyaka. Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ, chɔŋ ntwɔ ntá yɛka mfɛ́rɛ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛyɛka ɛnɛ ɛ́pɔ̀kɔ bɛrɔŋɔ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yɔ ɛchi.
66002006	Kɛ nchí kaka bhe ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt. Bǎpap mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bakoŋó Níkolas bákʉ̀ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔnyu mpábhɛ́ bhɔ.
66002007	“Mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batú ángók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm árɛ̀m ntá bɛka bo Kristo. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ánú ásɔ́rɛ́ awɔ́nɛm, nchí chyɛ yi mbi bɛ anyiɛ kɛpɛm ɛkɛ́n ɛnɔk ɛnɛ ɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m. Yɔ́ ɛchí amɛm nɛbhʉɛt maŋák Mandɛm.”
66002008	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛ́gháti Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ to ntá ángɛl anɛ ábhàbhɛri bǒnkwɔ abhɛn ɛtɔk Smína. Sɨ́ŋ kʉ bɔ́ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá Mmǔ anɛ achi nɛbhǒnɛt nɛ ngwɛnti, yí mmú ágú nyaka kɛ apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
66002009	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛsɔŋɔri nɛ kɛchɛp ɛkɛka. Kɛ ndǔ baraká Mandɛm bǎbhɔŋ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǒ bárɛ̀m ɛ̌ti yɛka. Bɔ́bhɔ chí bo abhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛ báchi bo Israɛl ɛnɛ bápú. Báchí chi nkwɔ Satan.
66002010	Bǎkɛ́ cháy bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ be ambɨ. Ghok ka, mfɔ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ ǎkʉ chɔŋ mámfyɛ mbɔk ayɛka ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ ndu mɛmɔ bhe. Nɛ chɔŋ mǎmbɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri ndǔ manywɔp byó. Kɛ bɔ́ŋ ka nɛka tɛ ndǔ nɛwú. Nɛ chɔŋ mǎmbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti mbɔ nta kɛnókó mbɔnyunɛ mǎnu bǎsɔt awɔ́nɛm.
66002011	“Mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batú, ángók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm árɛ̀m ntá bɛka bǒnkwɔ. Mmu anɛ ánú ásɔ́rɛ́ awɔ́nɛm, nɛwú ɛnɛn nɛjwi apay nɛ́pú tɔk yi.”
66002012	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛ́gháti Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ tó ntá ángɛl anɛ ábhàbhɛri bǒnkwɔ abhɛn ɛtɔk Pɛ́gamɔm. Sɨ́ŋ kʉ bɔ́ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù ntá mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ akparɛnja nsɛm ɛpay anɛ ácháp.”
66002013	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bǎchí arɛ. Chí nɛbhʉɛt anɛ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ Satan ɛchi! Bǎte kpirí nɛ mɛ nɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔt bɛsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ mɛ yɛ̌ chí ndǔ mpok anɛ báwày Antipas mmu achi nyaka ntísiɛ wa anɛ ághàti nyaka bǒ tɛtɛp Mandɛm nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt. Báwáy yi nɛntɨ ɛnɛka ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Satan áchɔ̀kɔ.
66002014	Kɛ mpǎy mɛnyɨŋ bɛchi nɛ bhe ɛbhɛ́n mbɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ. Mbɔk yɛka bákòŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Bálam átɔ́ŋɔ́. Bálam ǎtɔ̀ŋ nyaka Bálak ɛnyǔ yí akway bɛkʉ bo Israɛl mánkwɛ́n ndǔ bɛbʉ́, nɛ bɛ mányíɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn bayɛrɛ bachyɛ mbɔ akap ntá bɔmandɛm nsé, nɛ mánkʉ nɔkɔ barak ɛ́pusi.
66002015	Ɛnyumɔt kɛ ɛ́chí bɛ́ mbɔk yɛka nkwɔ bǎte kpirí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bakoŋo Nikolas bátòŋ, bɛkʉ bɔ mankwɛn ndǔ nkúbhɛ́ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn.
66002016	Ndu ɛchi nɔ, tɨ́k ká nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka. Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ́, chɔŋ ntwɔ ntá yɛka mandú mpok, nsɔt akparɛnja nsɛm ɛpay wu nɔ áfù mɛ anyu nɛ ǎcháp, nnu nɛ bhɔ.
66002017	Mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batú ángók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm árɛ̀m ntá bɛka bǒnkwɔ. Mmǔ anɛ ánú asɔt awɔ́nɛm, chɔŋ nchyɛ́ yi nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ mána, ɛnɛn bábhɛ́sɛ́ amfay. Nɛ chɔŋ nchyɛ́ yí ntay nkwɔ ɛnɛn nɛchi pɛ́pɛ́p, ɛnɛ́n básɨ́ŋɨ́ nnyɛ́n nɛkɔ arɛ́. Yɛ̌ mmu abhíkí rɨŋɨ nnyɛ́n nɛkɔ ɛnɔ, ɛbhɨkɨ fʉɛt chi mmu anɛ báchyɛ̀ yi nɔ.”
66002018	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛghati Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ ntá ángɛl anɛ ábhàbhɛri bǒnkwɔ abhɛn ɛtɔk Tiatíra. Sɨ́ŋ kʉ bɔ́ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn chi bɛyɔŋɔ́ Mmɔ Mandɛm mmǔ amɨ́k ayi ápè chuuu mbɔ nɛ́rɨ́-ngó, bɛkak ɛbhi mɛ́ngɔɔ nɔkɔ ŋwaŋwǎŋwaŋ mbɔ brɔ́ns anɛ básɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ ɛtaŋtí ngó báfɛ́rɛ́ mɛ́nyɨ́ŋɨ́ arɛ́.
66002019	“Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka, ndɨŋɨ ɛkɔŋ ɛyɛka nɛ ɛnyǔ bǎsɨ́kɨ́ ntɨ nɛ mɛ. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyǔ bǎkwàk batɨ nɛ ndǔ bǎté nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ. Nɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛ́n bǎkʉ̀ nɛ́nɛ bɛ́chá ɛbhɛ́n mbɨ.
66002020	Kɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛchi nɛ bhe ɛnɛ́ mbɨ́kɨ́ kɔŋ. Bě bǎrɔ̀ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Jɛ́sɛbɛl ambak nɛntɨ ɛnɛká. Yí ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ mmʉɛt ɛyi bɛ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ nɛ ǎtɔ̀ŋ andwɔ nɔkɔ bǒ bɛtok abha bɛ mánkʉ nɔkɔ barak ɛ́pusi nɛ bɛ mányiɛ nɔkɔ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛ́n báyɛ́rɛ́ báchyɛ mbɔ akap ntá mandɛm nsé.
66002021	Nchyɛ́ yí mpok bɛ ántɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi, kɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ ka bɛtɨknsɛm ndǔ barak ɛpúsí yi.
66002022	Ghók ká, chɔŋ ntɛmsi yí nɛ nɛme, nɛ mbák bo abhɛn bákwɛ̀n bɛrwɔp nɛ yi bábhɨ́kɨ́ tɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbɛ́ptí barak ayi, chɔŋ nkʉ bɔ́ mámbɔŋ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri.
66002023	Chɔŋ nsɔt nɛwú nsak bo abhɛn bákòŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi átɔ̀ŋ. Nɛ chɔŋ bɛká bǒnkwɔ mankɛm mándɨŋɨ bɛ́ Mmɛ kɛ̌ nchí chak nkaysi bo nɛ batɨ̌ yap, nɛ chɔŋ ńkap yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ayɛka bɛ́kóŋó ɛbhi bɛtɨk.
66002024	Kɛ mbák chí be nkwɔ achak amɛm ɛtɔk Tiatíra abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ te kákátí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n Jɛ́sɛbɛl átɔ̀ŋ, be bho bábhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔk mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mbɔk bǒ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ barak Satan anɛ áré bhɛsɛ, nchí ghati bhe bɛ, mpú chyɛ be yɛ̌ ntu áchák.
66002025	Ndiɛrɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt kɛ nchí ghati bhe. Tě ká kpirí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mǎnókó kpátɛ mɛ̌mpɛtnsɛm.
66002026	Mmǔ anɛ ánú ásɔ́rɛ́ awɔ́nɛm, nɛ árɔ̀ŋ ambɨ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndɛmɛ tɛ ndu ngwɛnti, chɔŋ nchyɛ́ yi bɛtaŋ amfay bǒ bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk,
66002027	nkubhɛ mbɔ ɛnyu Ɛtaya áchyɛ́ mɛ bɛtaŋ amfǎy yap, chɔŋ yí ankɛ́m kɛfɔ amfay yap nɛ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛnɛ baghoko nɛ ɛse awɔ. Anchɔkɔti bhɔ mbɔ ɛnyu bádɛ̀p ɛtě ntɔp amɨk ɛ́nchɔkɔti.
66002028	Chɔŋ nchyɛ́ yi nɛmbe ɛnɛn nɛyǐnywɔp ndu bɛtɔŋ bɛ anu asɔt awɔ́nɛm.
66002029	Mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batú ángók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ághàti bɛka bǒnkwɔ́.”
66003001	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛghati Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ tó ntá ángɛl anɛ ábhàbhɛri bǒnkwɔ abhɛn ɛtɔk Sádis. Sɨ́ŋ kʉ bɔ mandɨŋɨ bɛ bɛyɔŋɔ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛfóŋó Mandɛm tándrámɔt nɛ mambe tándrámɔt. ‘Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka. Bǎbhɔŋ ɛrɨ́tí nnyɛ́n bɛsí bho bɛ bǎchí nɛpɛ́m, ɛnɛ́ bǎchi bawú.
66003002	Ŋɛmɛ́ ká mǎmfyɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ mandu bɛtaŋ anɛ árɔ́bhɛ́ ákɛ́ kpɨkɨ ɛ́may mǎngú. Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ ngɔ́ bɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ jwi pɔɔt bɛsí Mandɛm mmu mɛ́tòk.
66003003	Tɨk yɛ ka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghókó nɛ bǎkóŋo. Tɨ́k ká nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka, nɛ kɔ́ŋ ká mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ́kɔ́. Mbák bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ ŋɛmɛ, chɔŋ ntwɔ́ ntá yɛka mbɔ ngɛ́p, nɛ bapu rɨŋɨ mpok anɛ mɛ́twɔ̀.
66003004	Kɛ mbɔk bǒ bábhʉɛt ndǔ nkwɔ yɛka awu ɛtɔk Sádis abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ nyɔp nkú ɛyap nɛ bakwap. Chɔŋ bɔ mánkɔ nɛ mɛ nɛ ndɛn pɛ́pɛ́p amʉɛt, mbɔnyunɛ bákway bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ nɛ mɛ.
66003005	Mmu anɛ ánú asɔt awɔ́nɛm báfyɛ yí ɛ́wɛt pɛ́pɛ́p amʉɛt, nɛ mpú fɛrɛ nnyɛ́n ɛni ndǔ ɛkáti nɛpɛ́m. Chɔŋ ndɛm bɛsí Ɛtaya nɛ bɔángɛl bɛ yi achi mmu wa.
66003006	Mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batu ángók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ághàti bɛká bǒnkwɔ.’”
66003007	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛ́gháti Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ tó ntá ángɛl anɛ ábhàbhɛri bǒnkwɔ abhɛn ɛtɔk Filadɛ́lfia. Sɨ́ŋ kʉ́ bɔ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù ntá mmǔ anɛ achi Nyáŋá, mmǔ tɛtɛp, yí mmu ákɛ́mɛ́ ɛfɨŋɨ́ Mfɔ Debhít. Mpok yi ánɛ́nɛ́ yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛtyɛp, nɛ mpok yi atyɛbhɛ, yɛ̌ mmu apú kwáy mɛ́nɛ́nɛ.”
66003008	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka. Ghók ká, nnɛ́nɛ́ mbǐnywɔp ndɔ́ fúú ntá yɛka anɛ́ yɛ̌ mmu ápú kway bɛtyɛp. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ bǎbhɔŋ chi mandú bɛtaŋ, Yɛ̌ nɔ́, bǎkòŋo ɛyɔŋ ɛya nɛ bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ bʉɛ mɛ.
66003009	Kɛ mbák chí bǒnkwɔ bakoŋo Satan abhɛn bárɛ̀m bɛ́ báchí bo Israɛl ɛnɛ́ bápú kɛ básè chi nsé, chɔŋ nkʉ bɔ́ mántwɔ mántɛp mánɛ́n bɛsí ɛbhɛká nɛ nkʉ bɔ mándɨŋɨ bɛ nkɔŋ be.
66003010	Mbák chi bhe, bǎbhʉ́rɛ́ ɛyɔŋ ɛya, bǎrɔ́k ambɨ bɛte kpirí ndǔ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, chɔŋ mbak nɛ bhe bɛ bǎkɛ́ chwe ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ́ ɛ́twɔ̀ mɛmɔ bo abhɛn báchi fá amɨk mankɛm.
66003011	Mɛ́twɔ̀ mandú mpok. Tě ká kpirí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ fɔŋɔ nta kɛnókó yɛka anɛ́ átɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ mǎnu bǎsɔt awɔ́nɛm.
66003012	Mmu anɛ ánù ásɔt awɔ́nɛm, chɔŋ ntɛp yi mbɔ ɛkwap amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm Mmu mɛ̌tòk, yí kɛfú arɛ wáwák. Nɛ chɔŋ nsɨ́ŋ nnyɛ́n Mandɛm nɛ nnyɛ́n ɛtɔk Mandɛm yi amʉɛt. Ɛtɔk ɛyɔ chi Yerúsalɛm anɛ nkɔ anɛ áfù amfay ntá Mandɛm átwɔ̀ fá amɨk. Chɔŋ nsɨŋ nnyɛ́n nɛkɔ ɛna nkwɔ yi amʉɛt.
66003013	Mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batú ángók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ághàti bɛká bǒnkwɔ.”
66003014	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛghati Jɔ̌n bɛ, “Sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ tó ntá ángɛl anɛ ábhàbhɛri bǒnkwɔ abhɛn ɛtɔk Laodísia. Sɨ́ŋ kʉ bɔ mandɨŋɨ bɛ bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛfǔ ntá mmu anɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ ‘Amen.’ Yi achi mmǔ tɛtɛp nɛ Ntísiɛ anɛ tɛtɛp. Mandɛm afʉɛt chi nta yi kɛ ǎghoko mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm.”
66003015	Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka. Bǎchí mbɔ manyiɛp amɛn ásɔ́tí, sɔ́ŋ be kɛsɔŋ, kwɛn be kɛkwɛ́n! Ɛrɨ bɛ mǎmbák mbɔ manyiɛp bakwɛn, mbák ɛ́pú nɔ, mbɔ manyiɛp basɔŋ.
66003016	Tɛ̌ndu bachí mbɔ manyiɛp amɛn ásɔ́tí, kwɛn bě kɛkwɛn, sɔ́ŋ bě kɛsɔŋ, chɔŋ mpá be mfɛ́rɛ́ anyu wa.
66003017	Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka ǎrɛ̀m bɛ, ‘Nchí mǔnkáp, mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ mɛnyɨŋ. Mbɨ́kɨ́ chɛp yɛ̌nyɨŋ.’ Kɛ be bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ bǎchi ndǔ ɛkwɛt. Bǎchí bo abhɛn mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛghɔ be ntínso, bachí bachɛ́bhɛ́bho, bachí manɛmamɨ́k, bachí bɛbhó bɛwɔ́.
66003018	Nchí niɛ yɛ bhe bɛ mǎntwɔ ntá ya mǎnkú pú anɛ básɔ́ŋɔ́ ango bafɛrɛ mɛ́nyɨ́ŋ mɛnkɛm arɛ́ bɛ́ mǎmbák bǒ bakáp tɛtɛp. Twɔ́ ká ku ndɛn pɛ́pɛ́p mǎmfyɛ́ amʉɛt bɛ́ mǎnkútí bɛbhó bɛwɔ ɛbhɛka ɛbhɛn bɛ́chyɛ bhe ntíánwɔ́p. Twɔ́ ka, mǎnku babhé mǎmfyɛ amík bɛ mǎnkwáy bɛghɔ mbaŋ tɛtɛp.
66003019	“Nchí nyurɛ bo abhɛn nkɔ́ŋɔ́, nchyɛ́ bhɔ ntɛmsi. Fiɛ́ yɛ ka bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak, mantɨk nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka.
66003020	Ghók ká, nchí ambǐnywɔp téé nchí dɛp. Mbák mmú aghok ɛyɔŋ ɛya ánɛ́nɛ mbǐnywɔp chɔŋ nchwe anywɔ́p, nnyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ yi.
66003021	Mmu anɛ ánù ánsɔ̀t awɔ́nɛm, chɔŋ nchyɛ́ yí bɛtaŋ bɛ anchɔkɔ nɛ mɛ ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛya, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mɛmbɔŋ nnú, nsɔt awɔ́nɛm, nchɔkɔ nɛ ɛtayá ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛyi.
66003022	Mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batú, ángók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ághàti bákwɔ́ bo Kristo.”
66004001	Awu áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, njɨŋɨ ngɔ́ mbǐnywɔp anɛ achi fúú amfay. Nɛ mpɛt ngók ɛyɔŋɔ́ mbɨ ɛnɛ nnáŋ nyaka ngoko ndǔ ɛ́ghàti mɛ mɛnyɨŋ nɛ ɛyɔŋ mbɔ ɛnɛ́ mmbá. Ngók ndǔ yɔ ɛ́rɛ̀m ntá ya bɛ, “Twɔ́ wɛn amfay, nɛ chɔ́ŋ ntɔŋ wɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn chɔŋ bɛfakari.”
66004002	Tɛ́mte wu, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ atwɔ́ abhak nɛ mɛ. Ngɔ́ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ amfay. Mmǔ abhak arɛ́ chɔkɔ.
66004003	Mmʉɛ́t mmǔ wu are kɔt ŋwaŋwǎŋwaŋ mbɔ batay anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ jáspa nɛ kanɛ́lian. Mbaŋátámfoŋ átée ághabhɛri ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛyɔ ánkɔt nɔkɔ mbɔ ntay ɛ́meral.
66004004	Mɛnɔk kɛfɔ ɛsǎ nsɛm mɛnwi bɛ́káp ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛyɔ. Bǒbatí ɛsa nsɛm anwi báchɔ́kɔ ndǔ mɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap abhak nɛ nkú pɛ́pɛ́p amʉɛt, nɛ ntǎ-kɛfɔ anti anɛ bághókó nɛ pú.
66004005	Mmyamyaŋ are fú ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ. Nɛbu nkwɔ́ nɛ́re rɛmti, nɛfaŋ ansay nɔkɔ. Bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ tándrámɔt bɛbhak ambɨ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ mɛ́ndu nɔkɔ mbɔ sɛsay. Bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ bhɔ chí bɛfóŋó Mandɛm tándrámɔt.
66004006	(a) Ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhák bɛsí ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ mbɔ manyu. Ɛ́ngɔ nɔkɔ mbɔ glas anɛ áŋaŋari. (b) Mɛnyɨŋ mɛ́nwí ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛpɛ́m bɛ́tée bɛkáp ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ, ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛ́mɔt ɛchi ambɨ, ɛ́mɔt ansɛm, ɛchák ɛbhě awɔ́nɛm, ɛnɛ́fú ɛbhe awɔ́ghɔ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́bhɔ́ŋ bɛyǎ amɨ́k ambɨ nɛ ansɛm.
66004007	Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ambɨ ɛbhak mbɔ nkʉ, ɛnɛ ɛ́kòŋo ɛbhak mbɔ nnɛ́m mpɔŋ. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́jwí bɛ́rát ɛbhɔ́ŋ bɛsí mbɔ nkwǎŋwaŋ, nɛ ɛnɛ ɛjwi mɛnwi ɛbhak mbɔ ɛbhɔkɔ ɛnɛ ɛ́rè amfay.
66004008	Ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnwi ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛpɛ́m, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛ́mɔt ɛ́bhɔ́ŋ bɛbhap bɛtándat. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhap ɛ́bhák nɛ amɨ́k fúúú, anɛ́ amfǎy bɛbhap, nɛ anɛ́ amɛm bɛbhap. Báre kway nɛkwáy bɛti nɛ ngósí kɛywěmʉɛt bɛ, “Nyáŋá, nyáŋá, nyáŋá chi Ɛta Mandɛm Bɛtaŋ Mɛnkɛm yi mmu achi nyaka, nɛ achi, nɛ átwɔ̀ chɔŋ!”
66004009	Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́bɨ̀ti nɛ bɛ́chyɛ kɛnókó nɛ bakak ntá yi mmu achi chɔkɔ ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ, yi mmu achi nɛpɛ́m mpoknkɛm,
66004010	bǒbati ɛsa nsɛm manwi báré kwɛn bɛsí mmu anɛ achí ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ mánchyɛ nɔkɔ yi mmu achi nɛpɛ́m mpoknkɛm kɛnókó, nɛ mángʉɛbhɛ nɔkɔ ntǎ-kɛfɔ ɛyap amɨk bɛsí ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ mánkway nɔkɔ bɛ,
66004011	“Acha nɛ Mandɛm mmu sɛ́tòk, wɔ kɛ ɔ́kwáy mmu anɛ bo bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɛm bɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛ bɛyǎ bɛcha mánchyɛ wɔ kɛnókó nɛ bakak ɛ̌ti bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛ, mbɔnyunɛ wɔ kɛ ɔ́ghókó mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm nɛ chí bɛ́kóŋo nkaysi yɛ kɛ ɔghoko bhɔ nɛ bɛchi.”
66005001	Ngɔ́ nkwɔ ɛkáti nɛ́nɛ́p ndǔ awɔ́nɛm mmu anɛ achɔkɔ ndu ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ. Basɨ́ŋ abhak yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak amɛm nɛ ansɛm ɛkáti. Báfyɛ́ bɛ́bhánɛ́ anyǔ ɛkáti ndǔ bɛpók tándrámɔt, baghaŋa.
66005002	Nɛ ngɔ́ ɛtaŋtí ángɛl Mandɛm ndu árɛ̀m nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Agha ǎkway bɛfɛrɛ ɛ́bhánɛ́ ɛnɛ́, anɛnɛ ɛkáti ɛnɛ?”
66005003	Yɛ̌ mmu, yɛ̌ chi anɛ achi amfay nɛ Mandɛm nɛ yɛ̌ chi anɛ áchí amɨk nɛ yɛ̌ chi anɛ achi ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú kɛkwáy mɛ́nɛ́nɛ yɔ́. Yɛ̌ mmu kɛkwáy bɛ́pay ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ básɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm.
66005004	Ndi bɛyǎ kɛbhɔ mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ yɛ̌ mmu anɛ ákwáy mɛ́nɛ́nɛ ɛkáti nɛ́nɛ́p ɛyɔ, nɛ yɛ̌ chi bɛpay basɨŋ amɛn achi arɛ́.
66005005	Mǔnti amɔt ndu bǒbati ɛsa nsɛm manwi aghati mɛ bɛ, “Kɛ́pɛrɛ di! Yɨŋɨ́ mmú anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ Nkʉ Nnɛrɛ́kɛt anɛ bo Yúdah, Nnɛ́m ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Mfɔ Debhít. Anu asɔt awɔ́nɛm. Abhɔŋ ngǎngaŋ bɛbhakari bɛ́bhánɛ́ tándrámɔt ánɛ́nɛ ɛkáti nɛnɛp.”
66005006	Mpok ɛyɔ, ngɔ́ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n téé nɛntɨ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnwi ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛpɛ́m. Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n abhak ndǔ nkwɔ bǒbati. Ɛbhak mbɔ bɛ mánaŋ baway nyaka yi. Abhɔ́ŋ babhaŋ tándrámɔt nɛ amɨ́k tándrámɔt. Amɨ́k ayi tándrámɔt chí bɛfóŋó Mandɛm tándrámɔt ɛbhɛ́n bátó mbankɛm amɨk.
66005007	Arɔk ntá mmu anɛ áchí ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ asɔt ɛkáti nɛ́nɛ́p ɛyɔ nɔ́ ɛchi ndǔ awɔ́nɛm ayi.
66005008	Ásɔ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ɛkáti, mɛnyɨŋ mɛnwi nɛ bǒbati ɛsǎ nsɛm anwi, bákwɛ́n bɛsí Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap akɛ́m nɛkɨ́ŋ nɛ bɛkwɔp ɛbhɛn baghoko nɛ pú. Bɛkwɔbhɛ ɛbhɔ bɛ́jwí nɛ insɛns. Insɛns wu atee ndǔ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt bo Mandɛm.
66005009	Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ nɛ bǒbati bare kway nɛkwáy nɛkɔ bɛ, “Wɔ kɛ ɔ́kwáy bɛsɔt ɛkáti nɛ́nɛ́p ɔ́mbakari bɛ́bhánɛ́ mbɔnyunɛ báwǎy nyaka wɔ nɛ manoŋ amɛ amɛn árɔ́ŋɔ́ amɨk kɛ ɔ́kú bo nɛ mɔ bɛ mámbák bo Mandɛm. Ɔkʉ nɔ ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ manɛrɛ́kɛrɛ bho, nɛ bǒ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk, nɛ bǒ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nkwɔ́ bho.
66005010	Ɔku bhɔ bɛ mándɔp chi bo abhɛn ɔ́chí mfɔ wap, nɛ bo abhɛn báchiákap ntá Mandɛm mmu bɛsɛ sɛ́tòk. Nɛ chɔŋ bɔ́ mámbak bafɔ ntá bo fá amɨk.”
66005011	Njɨŋɨ yɛ, ngɔ́ ndǔ ngɛ́mtáy bɔángɛl bate bakabhɛ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛpɛ́m, nɛ bǒbati. Ngók bɛyɔŋ ɛbhap.
66005012	Ngók ndǔ bɔ bákwày nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ “Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n anɛ báwáy nyaka, akwǎy mmu anɛ bo bárɛ̀m ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, yí kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ mɛnkɛm. yi kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm yi kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak nɛnkɛm yi kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ kɛfɔ kɛnkɛm. yi kɛ bo babhɔŋɔ bɛchyɛ kɛnókó, nɛ mámbɨti yi kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛyǎ mɛnwɔp!”
66005013	Nɛ ngók ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi amfay, nɛ ɛbhɛn amɨk, nɛ ɛbhɛn ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú, nɛ ɛbhɛn amɛm manyu, bɔ mɛnkɛm bɛre kway bɛ, “Sɛ́mbɨ́tí mmu anɛ achi ndu ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ nɛ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n. Sɛ́nchíɛ bɔ kɛnókó. Kɛfɔ kɛnkɛm kɛchi chi ntá yap. Bɔ kɛ babhɔŋɔ bɛtaŋ mpoknkɛm!”
66005014	Mɛnyɨŋ mɛnwi ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛpɛ́m bɛrɛm bɛ, “Amen!” Nɛ bǒbati bákwɛ́n amɨk bare chyɛ kɛnókó ntá mmu anɛ achi ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ nɛ ntá Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n.
66006001	Ngɔ́ ndǔ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n áfɛ́rɛ́ ɛtabhɛ́ bɛbhanɛ ɛ́mɔt ndǔ bɛtap tándrámɔt ɛbhɛn ɛkáti nɛ́nɛ́p. Ngók ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́mɔt ndu ɛbhɛn mɛnwi ɛ́sáy mbɔ nɛfaŋ bɛ, “Twɔ́!”
66006002	Ngɔ́ mpɔŋɔndɨ́k anɛ pɛ́pɛ́p nɛ mmǔ anɛ ákɔ̀ yɔ. Mmu wu abhak nɛ nkʉɛt awɔ́. Báchyɛ́ yi nta kɛfɔ. Afa arɔk ndu bɛ́pɛt mɛnu bɛsɔt awɔ́nɛm.
66006003	Mpok Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n áfɛ́rɛ ɛ́bhánɛ́ ɛnɛ́ ɛjwi bɛpay, ngók ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛjwi bɛpay ndu ɛbhɛn mɛnwi ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Twɔ́!”
66006004	Mpɔŋɔndɨ́k achák afú yɛ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ. Are pe chuuu. Báchyɛ́ mmu anɛ ǎkɔ̀ yɔ́ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛfɛrɛ kpák ámɨk bɛ bǒ mámbo bɛway batɨ. Nɛ báchyɛ́ yi ɛrɛmɛ́ akparɛnja.
66006005	Mpok Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n anɛnɛ ɛbhánɛ́ ɛnɛ ɛjwi bɛrat, ngók ndǔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛjwi bɛrat ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Twɔ́!” Njɨŋɨ ngɔ́ mpɔŋɔndɨ́k pyɔ. Mmu anɛ ákɔ̀ yɔ abhak nɛ ɛ́rúmɛ́ awɔ.
66006006	Ngók ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛyɔŋ ndu ɛ́fù nɛ́ntɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛpɛ́m mɛnwi. Ɛyɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛre rɛm bɛ, “Nkáp bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn nywɔp nɛmɔt ákway bɛku nkɔ́bhɛ́ nchwi ɛnwi. Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ nkáp wu ánkway bɛ́ku chi nkɔ́p ɛnyǔ nchwi anɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ taŋ ɛsiɛ byo nɛ ɛpay. Kɛ bǎkɛ́ chɔŋti bawɛt nɛ mmɛm.”
66006007	Mpok Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n anɛnɛ ɛbhánɛ́ ɛnɛ ɛjwi mɛnwi, ngók ndu ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛjwi mɛnwi ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Twɔ́!”
66006008	Ngɔ yɛ mpɔŋɔ́ndɨ́k anɛ achi bɛ̌mm nɛ nnyɛ́n mmǔ anɛ ákɔ̀ yɔ nɛ́bhak bɛ Nɛwú, nɛ Ɛtɔkɔ́ Bawú ɛnkoŋo nɔkɔ yi ansɛm. Báchyɛ Nɛwú nɛ Ɛtɔkɔ́ Bawú bɛtaŋ bɛ mánsɔt nɛnu, nɛ nsay, nɛ ɛghorǐ nɛme, nɛ nnya mběmbe ɛnɛ fá mmɨk mángwáy bo abhɛn bachi ndǔ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́mɨk ɛ́mɔt ndu bɛbhɔkɔ mmɨk mɛnkɛm mɛnwi.
66006009	Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n anɛnɛ ɛ́bhánɛ́ ɛnɛ́ ɛjwi bɛtay, ngɔ́ antɛn ɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ akap Mandɛm bɛfóŋó bo abhɛn baway nyaka. Báwáy bhɔ mbɔnyunɛ bághàti bho Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt.
66006010	Ngók ndǔ bɛfóŋó ɛbhɔ bɛ́bɨ̀k nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Mandɛm Acha, wɔ mmu ɔ́chí nyáŋá, ɔbhak tɛtɛp, chɔŋ ɛ́ntat ná kɛ ɔ́ntaŋ bǒ mmɨk abhɛn báwáy bhɛsɛ, ɔ́nkɛmɛ kɛ́mbé?”
66006011	Báchyɛ yɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ɛ́wɛt ɛnɛ pɛ́pɛ́p nɛ bágháti bɔ bɛ mandɔk ambɨ bɛywemʉɛt mandú kpatɛ mpǎy batɨ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk nɛ batɨ̌ bǒ nkwɔ́ abhɛn bǒ mmɨk babhɔŋɔ bɛway mbɔ bhɔ ankwáy.
66006012	Mpok Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n ánɛ́nɛ́ ɛtabhɛ́ sɛrwɔ ɛnɛ ɛjwi ɛtandat, njɨŋɨ, ngɔ́ ɛrɛmɛ́ nɛnyɨkɨsi mmɨk. Mmok arɔp pyɔɔ mbɔ ndɛn nɛkwɛsɛ́. Ntaŋ arɔp mbɔ manoŋ.
66006013	Mambe áre fú amfay ánkwɛnti nɔkɔ amɨk mbɔ kɛpɛmɛ́nɔk ɛkɛn kɛ́kwɛ̀nti amɨk mpok mbʉ́ɛ́p ataŋataŋ áfòk nɛ ɛnɛm.
66006014	Nɛbu nɛ́nɛ́msi mbɔ ɛkáti nɛnɛp ɛnɛ bápɛ́t báfɛ́rɛ́. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ njiɛ afa ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yɔ achi, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmɨk anɛ achi nɛntɨ nnyɛ́n afa ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yɔ achi.
66006015	Bafɔ̌ mmɨk nɛ manɛ́m bho, nɛ bǒbatí batɛmɛ́ nɛnu, nɛ bǒ bakáp, nɛ bɛtaŋtí bho, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achák, yɛ̌ chí abhɛn bachí basɛm, nɛ yɛ̌ chi abhɛn bapu basɛm, bábʉ́ɛ́ bábhɛ́sɛ amɛm bɔbasɛm, kɛtárábhɛ́ ndǔ njiɛ ɛgho.
66006016	Báre bhɛsɛ arɛ́ mámbɨŋɨ nɔkɔ njiɛ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́ bɛ, “Kwɛ́n ká kuti bɛsɛ bɛ́ sɛ́kɛ ghɔ bɛsí mmu anɛ achi chɔkɔ ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ nɛ bɛ ntɛmsi Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n akɛ́ bhak nɛ bhɛsɛ.
66006017	Ɛrɛmɛ́ nywɔp ɛnɛn Mandɛm nɛ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n bátɔ̀ŋ bɛběntɨ ɛbhap nɛ́ghaka. Agha ákway bɛte?”
66007001	Awu áfʉ́ɛ́rɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́, ngɔ́ bɔángɛl manwi téé ndǔ amɔ́-mmɨk anwi, mánchɛrɛ nɔkɔ babhʉ́ɛ́p anwi bɛ akɛ fok antwɔ yɛ̌ chi amɨk, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ndǔ manyu, nɛ yɛ̌ chi ndǔ mɛnɔk.
66007002	Ngɔ́ yɛ ángɛl achák ndǔ áfú atú anɛ mmok áfù anko nɔkɔ amfay. Akɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ básɔ̀t bɛfyɛ bɛrɨŋ amʉɛt bo Mandɛm mmu achi nɛpɛ́m. Ángɛl wu asáy abhɨŋɨ bɔángɛl manwi abhɛn Mandɛm achyɛ bɛtaŋ bɛ mánchɔŋti mmɨk nɛ bɔmanyu.
